row.name: Lo Khawhna, Huan Bawlna, Gan Khawina

section.row: Meaning of Life, Purpose of Life

category.row: [14] Mangbuh lak hun laitakin gamlakah Reuben pai-in zawl-ai kungte va mu a, tuate a nu Leah’ kiangah a ciahpih hi. Tua ciangin Rachel in Leah kiangah, “Na tapa’ zawl-ai kungte kimkhat kei hong hawm in, hong thum ing,” a ci hi. [15] Ahih hangin Leah in, “Ka pasal nong suh thuneu sa na hi hiam? Ka tapa’ zawl-ai kungte zong hong sut lai ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Rachel in, “Tua ahihleh na tapa’ zawl-ai man dingin tuzanin amah, nang tawh hong lumkhawm thei ding hi,” a ci hi. [16] Nitakin lo panin Jakob hong ciah ciangin, amah a dawn dingin Leah paikhia a, “Kei’ kiangah hong lum in. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka tapa’ zawl-ai kungte tawh nang kong cial zo hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua zan amah tawh a lumkhawm hi.
[11] Tua ciangin Faro in a mipilte le a aisan siamte a sam hi. Egypt mitphial siamte in zong amau’ siamna tawh tua bang teek mahin a bawl thei uh hi.
[31] “Vankahte le aisanna lamah kihei kei un. Amaute tawh a kininsak dingin amaute zong kei un; kei pen TOPA na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
[27] “Numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin van a kah a, ai a saan leh kithat ding a, suang tawh amaute kidenglum ding hi. Amau’ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[23] Bang hang hiam cih leh Jakob mite a kibum nading om lo a, Israel mite’ langkhatah aisan ding om lo hi. Tu-in Israel-te tawh kisai-in, ‘Pasian’ sepna en un,’ kici ding hi.

[10] Note lakah a tanu ahi a, a tapa ahi zongin biakna-in a zang, ai a saan, khong a khai, mailam thu a gen, ai a tawi, [11] bum a zang, van a kah, sikhate tawh a kiho, sikha thu a dong kuamah na om kei ding uh hi. [12] Bang hang hiam cih leh hihte a hih mi peuhmah TOPA a dingin a kihhuai ahi hi. Hih bang a kihhuai gamtatnate hangin note’ mai panin TOPA na Pasian un amaute hawlkhia hi. [13] Note pen TOPA na Pasian uh mai-ah paubaang loin na om ding uh hi. [14] Bang hang hiam cih leh note in na suankhiat ding uh hih minamte in khongkhaite le aisante thu ngai uh hi. Ahih hangin note ahihleh tua bangin na gamtat ding uh TOPA na Pasian un hong phal lo hi.
[22] Beor’ tapa, aisan pa Balaam zong, Israel mite in adang a thahte lakah namsau tawh thatkhawm uh hi.
[2] Minam kua le alangte a dingin TOPA in Moses a thupiak bangin amau’ gamhte aisanna tawh kipia hi.
[11] A behbeh tawh kizui-in Benjamin minamte a’ ding aisan hun hong tung a, amau’ tungah a kipia gam pen Judah minam le Josef minamte kikalah hong kia hi.
[1] A beh zui-in Simeon minam a’ ding aisan nihna hong tung hi. Amau’ gamh in Judah minamte’ gamh ngahsa pawkhat huam hi.
[10] A beh tawh kizui-in Zebulun minam a dingin aisan thumna hong tung hi. Amau’ luah gam in Sarid ciang dong ban hi.
[17] A beh tawh kizui-in Issakhar minamte a dingin aisan lina hong tung hi.
[24] A beh tawh kizui-in Asher minamte a dingin aisan ngana hong tung hi.
[32] A beh tawh kizui-in Naftali minamte a dingin aisan gukna hong tung hi.
[40] A beh tawh kizui-in Dan minamte a dingin aisan sagihna hong tung hi.

[51] Hihte pen siampi Eleazar le Nun tapa Joshua le Israel minam beh lutangte in kikhopna bukkong, TOPA’ mai Shiloh-ah aisanna tawh a hawmkhiat uh gamh ahi hi. Tua bangin amaute in leitang hawmna a zo uh hi.

[9] Hihte pen Israel mi khempeuh le amaute lakah a peem khualmi a dingin sawm lopi-in mi khat a that khapa pen mihonte mai-ah a din ma-in phulapa khutah a sih loh nadingin a tai theih nadinga a kiseh khuapite ahi hi.

[4] Kohath behte a dingin aisan hong tung hi. Tua ahih ciangin siampi Aaron’ suanlekhak ahi Levi mite in Judah, Simeon, le Benjamin minamte tung panin aisanna tawh khuapi sawm le thum ngah uh hi. [5] Tua ciangin a omlai Kohath mite in Efraim minam, Dan minam le Manasseh minam alangte tung panin aisanna tawh khuapi sawm ngah uh hi. [6] Gershon mite in Issakhar minam, Asher minam, Naftali minam, le Bashan gam sunga om Manasseh minam alangte tung panin aisanna tawh khuapi sawm le thum ngah uh hi. [7] Merari mite in a beh uh tawh kizui-in Reuben minam, Gad minam, le Zebulun minamte tung panin khuapi sawm le nih ngah uh hi. [8] TOPA in Moses tungtawnin a thupiak bangin hih khuapite le a lonona gamte Israel mite in aisanna tawh Levi mite tungah a pia uh hi.
[2] Tua ciangin Filistia-te in siampite le aisante sam uh a, “ TOPA’ Thuciamna Singkuang bang cih ding ihi hiam? Ama omna munah bang tawh kha ding ihi hiam, hong gen un,” a ci uh hi.

[20] Tua ciangin Samuel in Israel minamte khempeuh a nai-ah hong paipih a, aisanna tawh Benjamin minam kila hi. [21] Amah in Benjamin minamte a behbehin hong paipih a, aisanna tawh Matri innkuan kila hi. A tawpna-ah amah in Matri innkuan a mi malin hong paipih a, aisanna tawh Kish’ tapa Saul kila hi. Ahih hangin amaute in amah a zon uh ciangin amah kimu zo lo hi.

[23] Bang hang hiam cih leh lehdona pen aisan mawhna bangmah hi a, lungkhauhna pen mawhna le milim biakna mah a bang ahi hi. Nangmah in TOPA’ thu nial khin na hih manin, amah in zong kumpi hihna pan nang hong nolh khin hi,” a ci hi.
[3] Tu-in Samuel si khin a, Israel-te khempeuh ama hangin kapin, ama khuapi Ramah-ah vui uh hi. Saul in vankahte le aisante a gam sung panin beisak hi.

[9] Numei in ama kiangah, “Saul’ hihsa thu, gam sung panin vankahte le aisante a suksiatna na thei taktak hi. Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin keima sih nading a piangsak dingin kei a dingin thangzak hong koih na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
[22] Joram in Jehu a muh ciangin, “Jehu aw, thuhoih ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Na nu Jezebel’ paktatnate le aisannate tua zahin a tam laiteng bang thuhoih om thei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
[17] Amaute in biakna-in a tanute uh le a tapate uh halin vankahna le aisanna zang uh a, TOPA’ muhna-ah a sia a gamta dingin kipia tawmin amah hehsak uh hi.
[6] Tua ciangin amah in biakna-in a tapa hal a, aisanna le mailam thugen kholhnate semin, vankah theite le aisante tawh na semkhawm hi. TOPA’ muhna-ah amah a sia tampi gamta a, amah hehsak hi.
[61] Kohath mi a omlaite tungah aisanna tawh Manasseh minam alangte’ gam sung panin khuapi sawm kipia hi.

[5] Eleazar’ suante le Ithamar’ suante lakah biakinn uliante le Pasian’ uliante om tuak uh ahih manin amaute in a kibangin aisanna tawh amaute koih uh hi. [6] Tua ciangin Levi mi Nethanel’ tapa ahi lai-at pa Shemaiah in kumpipa, uliante, siampi Zadok, Abiathar’ tapa Ahimelek, siampite, le Levi mi beh lutangte’ omna-ah amaute ciamteh hi. Eleazar’ suante-a’ dingin khat kiteelin, tua ciangin Ithamar’ suante a dingin khat kiteel a, kilaihsak niloh uh hi. [7] Aisanna a masa pen Jehoiarib tung, a nihna Jedaiah tung,
[8] Tua ciangin a neu a lian, sia le a sinte a kibangin, amaute in amau’ nasep ding uh ai a san uh hi.

[6] Tua ciangin amah in Hinnom’ tapa’ kuamah biakna-in a tapate hal a, aisanna le mailam thugenkholhna le khongkhaina zang a, vankah theite le aisante tawh na semkhawm hi. Amah in TOPA’ muhna-ah siatna tampi bawl a, amah hehsak hi.
[63] Urim le Thummim aisanna tawh ai a san ding siampi khat a om mateng amaute in biakna an siangpente a nek loh nading uh gam ukpa in a gen hi.
[65] Tua hi a, Urim le Thummim aisanna tawh ai san ding siampi khat a om matengin amaute in biakna an siangtho pente a nek loh nading uh gam ukpa in a gen hi.

[1] Tua ciangin Jerusalem-ah mi makaite teng uh hi. Tua lo midang teng, amau’ lak pan mi sawm-ah-khat, khuapi siangtho Jerusalem-ah a teng ding aisanna tawh kiteel uh a, a omlai mi sawmah kuate ahihleh khuapi dangte-ah om uh hi.

[7] Kumpi Ahasueras’ uk a kum sawm le nihna, a kha masa pen ahi Nisan kha a kipanin a ni ni, a kha kha-in Pur a kici aisanna tawh Haman’ muhin ai kisan a, a kha sawm le nihna Adar kha a ni sawm le thum ni-in ai a pha hi.
[33] Mite in bangbangin ai a san zongin, a piang ding thu pen TOPA’ deihna bangbek hizaw hi.
[6] Amaute pen nisuahna lam gam a om khongkhaite le Filistia mite bangin aisante tawh kidim uh a, gamdang mite’ ngeina zui uh ahih manin Jakob suanlekhak, na mite nang na nial hi.
[2] mi vanglian pa le galkap pa, thukhen pa le kamsang pa, aisan pa le upa pa,

[19] Amaute in note kiangah, “Phun suausuau-in a pau mualmual vankah theite le aisan theite kiangah thu dong un. Mite in amau’ pasian-te thu dongin, mihingte’ thu pen misite dot ding mah hi lo ahi hiam?” hong ci ding uh hi. [20] Tua ciangin note in, “ TOPA in note hong hilh thute ngai un. Aisante’ thu ngai kei un. Amaute’ hong gen thute a kimanna om lo hi,” ci-in dawng un.
[3] Egypt mite’ lungsim hawmsuak ding a, amau’ geelnate ka siasak ding hi. Amaute in milimte, vankah theite le aisan theite tungah thu dong ding uh hi.
[25] Zuau thugente’ hilhkholhna limte a siasak pa, aisante pen mihai a suaksak pa, mipilte lehhei kikin, amau’ thutheihte haina a suaksak pa;
[9] Aisan siamnate le mibum siamna vang lianpi na neih hangin ta khuaisuahna le meigonna, hih thu nihte thakhat thu-in ni khat sungin a kicing takin nangma tungah hong tung veve ding hi.
[12] Na neulai a kipan na sep na mibumna le na aisannate ah kiptakin om in. Phattuamna na ngah kha ding a, mite na lausakzo kha ding hi.
[3] No, aisan numeite’ tapate, numei tawh a mawh mite le numei pangtatte’ tuletate aw, hih lai-ah hong pai un.

[14] Tua ciangin TOPA in, “Tua kamsangte in kei’ min suangin zuauthu hong gen uh hi. Amaute ka sawl kei a, thu ka pia kei a, zong ka hopih kei hi. Note kiangah hong gen uh thute a man lo maangmuhna, bangmahin a kimang lo aisanna, le amau’ ngaihsuttawm thute ahi hi.
[9] Tua ahih manin Babylon kumpipa’ na sem kei un, ci-a note kiangah a hong gen na kamsangte uh, na aisan theite uh, na mang man theite uh, le na mangsan theite uh’ thugennate um kei un.
[8] Vanglian TOPA, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong genin-ah: Note’ lakah a om na kamsangte uh le na aisan theite uh’ khemsa-in ta kei unla, a mangmat hong gente uh na ngai kei un.

[18] Topa PASIAN ahi keimah in amaute tungah ka gen thu hih bangin gen in: No numeite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Mi khempeuh in a khutah a bulh ding uhleh a lu tungah a khip ding uh aite na bawl uh a, tua nate in mite’ lungsim uk hi. Note’ phattuam nadingin sih nading le hinna ding vangliatna thu, ka mihingte tungah na zang nuam uh hi.
[20] Kumpipa in bangbang thuhaksa nono a dot hangin, hih mi lite pen ama gam sung khempeuha mitphial siamte le aisan theite khempeuh sangin a zah sawmin a siamzawklam uh a mu hi.

[10] Khongkhai theite in, “Kumpipa aw, na deihna bang a hong gen thei ding hih leitungah mihing khat beek om lo ding hi. Kumpi gen loh milian pen le mi thupi pen khat beek in, a aisan theite, a mitphial siamte, le a khongkhai theite tungah tua bang thu a dong ngei kuamah om nai lo hi.
[27] Daniel in, “Kumpipa aw, tua na theihnop thu a hong gen thei ding khongkhai thei, mitphial siam, aisan siam kuamah om lo hi.
[7] Tua ciangin aisan theite, mitphial siamte, khongkhai theite, aksi et siamte khempeuh hong pai uh a, amaute kiangah ka mang ka gen hi. Ahih hangin a khiatna a hong gen thei kei uh hi.

[7] Amah in mitphial siamte, aisan siamte, aksi et siamte va sam pak un, ci-in a kiko hi. Tua mite a hong tun uh ciangin kumpipa in, “Hih lai kigelh a sim thei, a khiatna a hong gen thei peuhmah kumpi puanpi silhsakin, minphatna khamkhi a ngawngah ka oksak ding a, kumpi gam sungah a za lian a thumna-in ka koih ding hi,” a ci hi.

[11] Na gam sungah Pasian’ kha a nei mi khat a om hi. Na pa kumpi ahih laitakin, tua mipa in pasian-te’ pilna tawh a kibang pilna, theihna le lungsim navakna a nei hi. Tua hi a, kumpi ahi na pa Nebukhadnezzar in tua pa pen aisan theite, mitphial siamte, khongkhai siamte, le aksi et siamte’ ukpi dingin a koih hi.
[19] Ai a san ngei mi tampi tak in zong a aisanna laibute uh hong paipih uh a, mi khempeuh’ muhin a haltum uh hi. Tua laibu mante a gawm uh ciangin ngun peek then nga man bang ahi hi.
[21] A mi thahna, a aisanna, a paktatna, le a guktaknate uh zong khawl tuan lo uh hi.

[23] Na sungah meivak taang zong kimu nawn lo ding a, a kiteng nungak le tangval a lungdamte’ awging kiza nawn lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh na sumbawlte, leitungah a thahat pen hi a, na ai tawh leitung mi khempeuh na khem hi.
[8] Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, le zuaugente om nading mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[14] Khuapi kulhkongpi sungah a luttheih nading le nuntakna singgah a nektheih nadingun a puan uh a siangin a sawp mite, mi hampha ahi uh hi. [15] Ahi zongin a lampial mite, aisan mite, a paktat mite, mi thatte, milim biate, le zuaugen nuamsa-in zuau a gengen mite, khuapi pualamah a om uh hi.

[3] Numei paktatte’ kampau khuaizu bangin khum mahmahin a thugente uh a neel dakdak hangin, [4] a tawpna-ah lungkhamna le natna simloh nangma tungah bangmah dang hong guan lo hi. [5] Amah in sihna gamah nang hong paipih ding a, ama tot lampi pen sihna mun tunna lampi ahi hi. [6] Nuntakna lampi-ah amah om lo a, nang na phawk loh hangin amah lam pialin a vakvai ahi hi.
[11] Na sih kuan uh ciangin thumin na tau ding uh a, gawngin na guhguak bekun na om ding uh hi.

[26] Bang hang hiam cih leh anlum khat tawh numei paktat khat kingahzo a, ahi zongin numei tawh mawhna in nuntakna bup siasak hi. [27] Na ang sungah meikuang pom lecin na puan kang loin om ding ahi hiam? [28] Mei-am tungtawnin pai lecin na khe kang loin om ding ahi hiam?
[32] Ahi zongin numei tawh a mawhte pen thu ngaihsun thei lo mi hi a, amau le amau a kisusiatawm ahi uh hi.
[26] Tua bang numei in mi tampi tak siasakin, simzawh loh ding mi tampi’ sihna a piangsak hi. [27] Tua bang numei zuihna pen sihna gam zuatna hi a, sih baihna ding lampi zuatna ahi hi.
[18] Numei tawh mawhna na pelh un. Mi khat in a bawl mawhna tuamtuamte in ama pumpi sukha lo hi, a ci om hi. Ahi zongin numei tawh a mawhte, ama pumpi tungah a khial ahi hi.

[29] Pasian in, “En un, leitung maitang khempeuhah a om, tang a piangsak kungnote khempeuh le a gah sungah tang a om singkung khempeuh note tungah kong pia khinta hi. Tuate an-in na nei ding uh hi. [30] Leitung ganhing khempeuhte tung, huih lak vasate khempeuh tung, leitungah a bokvakte khempeuh tung, nuntakna hu a neite khempeuh tungah an dingin kung hing khempeuh ka hong pia khinta hi,” a ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.

[3] A nungta a gamtang peuhmah, note a dingin an hi ding hi. Kung hing khempeuh ka hong piak bangin na khempeuh zong note ka hong pia hi. [4] A nuntakna ahi a sisan pen a sa tawh na ne khawm kei bek ding uh hi.
[18] Tua ciangin Jerusalem kumpipa Melkhizedek in an le leenggahzu hong pusuah hi. Amah pen Sang Pen Pasian’ siampi zong ahi hi.

[31] A khelpi’ hangin amah bai kawmin Peniel a kantan laitakin ni hong suak hi. [32] Tua ahih ciangin tuni dongin Israel mite in khelkom tunga a om khel thagui ne lo uh hi. Amah in Jakob’ khelkom, a khel thagui tung a sukna hang ahi hi.

[1] Egypt-ah an a omna thu Jakob in a theih ciangin a tate kiangah, “Bang hangin khatlekhat ki-enen mawk na hi uh hiam? [2] Egypt-ah an om hi, ci-in ka za hi. Eite si loin i nuntak nadingin paisuk unla, ei a’ ding an va lei un,” a ci hi.

[31] Tu-in Israel mite in a min manna ci uh hi. Tua pen nannan tang tawh kibangin a mel kang a, a limna pen khuaizu tawh a kibawl mohpheng tawh kibang hi. [32] Moses in, “ TOPA’ thupiak hih bang ahi hi: ‘Egypt leitang panin note kong paikhiatpih lai-in sehnel gamah note kong vakna an na suanlekhakte un a muh theih nadingun na khang tawntungun lawhta dim khat kem un,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi. [33] Moses in Aaron kiangah, “Beel khat la inla, tua sungah manna lawhta dim khat koih inla, na khang tawntungun a kikem dingin TOPA’ mai-ah koih in,” a ci hi. [34] TOPA in Moses a thupiak bangin Aaron in kep dingin Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah a koih hi. [35] Amaute a ten theih nading uh leitang a tun mateng, kum sawmli sung Israel mite in manna ne uh a, Kanaan gamgi a tun matengun manna bek a ne uh ahi hi.

[39] “Note’ nek theih ding ganhing khat peuhpeuh a sih leh a sisa a lawng pa pen a nitak mateng a nin hi ding a, [40] a sisa a ne pa in ama puante sawpin a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi. A sisa a puapa in zong ama puante sawpin a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi. [41] “Leitungah a hontat ganhing peuhmah a kihhuai hi a, tuate kine lo ding hi. [42] A awmtal peuhmah leh khe li-a a pai peuhmah, ahih kei leh khe tampi a nei, leitungah a pai a hontat ganhing khempeuh, note in na ne kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tuate pen a kihhuai ahi hi. [43] A hontat ganhing khat peuhpeuh tawh nomau mah a kihhuai-in na kibawltawm kei ding uh a, tuate tawh nomau na kininsak tawm kei ding uh hi. Na kinitsak tawm uhleh a nin na suak ding uh hi.

[4] Tu-in amaute’ lakah a om gamdang mite in anlim a lunggulh mahmah uh hi. Israel mite zong kap kik uh a, “Sa nek ding nei hi leeng maw! [5] Egypt-ah man pia loin i nek ngasate, tangmaite, dawnpawlte, lo-uih neute, lo-uih sante, le lo-uih kangte i phawkphawk hi. [6] Ahih hangin tu-in i tha bei ta a, hih manna simloh bangmah dang om peuhmah lo hi,” a ci uh hi. [7] Manna pen nannan tang tawh kibang a, a mel pen bedolak singnai tawh kibang hi. [8] Mite pai kawikawi-in khawm uh a, an gawina tawh gawi-in, tua ahih kei leh sum sungah su-in, beelin huan uh a, mohin a bawl uh hi. A limna pen sathau tawh a kibawl moh ki-em tawh kibang hi. [9] Zanin giahphual tungah daitui a kiat ciangin manna tawh kia khawm hi.

[18] Mite tungah, ‘Zing cianga dingin note ki-ap pha un, sa na ne ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA’ zakin na kap uh a, “Sa nek ding kua in hong pia ding ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt gamah nuam i sa hi,” na ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin note’ tungah TOPA in sa hong pia ding a, note in sa na ne ding uh hi. [19] Note in ni khat sung, ahih kei leh ni nih sung, ahih kei leh ni nga sung, ahih kei leh ni sawm sung, ahih kei leh ni sawmnih sung bek ne loin, [20] na ikkhiat dong uh le na kih dong matengun kha khat sung tawntung sa na ne ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note’ lakah a om TOPA nialin a mai-ah na kap uh a, “Bang hangin Egypt panin paikhia ihi hiam?” na ci uh hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi. [21] Ahih hangin Moses in, “Kei tawh a kisim khawm mi tul zaguk tak om hi. Nangmah in, ‘Kha khat sung tawntung a nek dingun amaute sa pia ning!’ na ci hi. [22] Amaute’ khamzah dingin tuuhonte le bawnghonte amau a dingin kigozo ding ahi hiam? Tua ahih kei leh tuipi ngasate khempeuh amau’ khamzah ding kimanzo ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi. [23] TOPA in Moses kiangah, “ TOPA’ hih theih ding zah kiciangtan sa na hi hiam? Ka thugen a manin hong tun leh hong tun loh tu-in na mu ding hi,” a ci hi.

[3] Mite, an bek tawh nungta loin TOPA’ kamsung panin a pusuak thu khempeuh tawh nungta hi, ci-in note hong theihsak nadingin, amah in note hong niamkhiatin hong gilkialsak a, note hitaleh na pu na pate uh hitaleh in a theih ngei loh manna tawh hong vak hi.

[1] “Note pen TOPA na Pasian uh mite na hi uh hi. Misite hangin note ki-atkeh loin, na sam uh zong na mettol kei ding uh hi. [2] Bang hang hiam cih leh note pen TOPA na Pasian uh tungah a siangtho mite na hi uh a, leitung a om mite khempeuh sung panin ama neih dingin TOPA in note hong teel ahi hi. [3] “A kihhuai na khat peuhpeuh na ne kei ding uh hi. [4] Na nek theih ding uh ganhingte: Bawng, tuu, keel, [5] sakhital, sanang, simsakhi, sathak, saza, zosakhi, le gamtuu ahi hi. [6] Ganhingte lak panin a khecin a ka, eknel a hai ganhing peuhmah na ne thei ding uh hi. [7] Ahi zongin eknel a hai a, a khecin a ka ahi zongin na nek theih loh dingte uh: Kalaoh, bilpi, le sakikhte in eknel a hai hangin a khecin ka lo ahih manin note a dingin a nin ahi hi. [8] Vok pen a khecin a kat hangin eknel hai lo ahih manin note-a’ dingin a nin ahi hi. Tuate’ sa ne loin, a sisate zong na lawng kei ding uh hi. [9] “Tui sunga om khempeuh lak panin phe le lip a nei peuhmah na ne thei ding uh hi. [10] Phe le lip a nei lo peuhmah na ne kei ding uh a, tuate pen no-a’ dingin a nin ahi hi. [11] “Vasa a siang khempeuh na ne thei ding uh hi. [12] Ahih hangin na nek loh dingte uh: Muvanlai, musane, luimu, [13] mupi, mumeika, amau nam ciat; [14] va-ak nam khempeuh; [15] vasa-kalaoh, pengpelep, vatawt, musi nam khempeuh; [16] keising le simbu, gam vatawt [17] le tui vatawt, samuat ne musane le tuimu, [18] gun vapi, gun vazonei nam khempeuh; huihtun le bak ahi hi. [19] “Kha a nei insek ganhing khempeuh no a dingin a nin ahi hi; tuate kine lo ding hi. [20] A leng thei insek ganhing a siangte khempeuh na ne thei ding uh hi. [21] “Ama thu-a a si tawm ganhing peuhmah na ne kei ding uh hi. A nek dingun na khuasung uha om khualmite tungah na pia thei ding uh a, tua ahih kei leh zong gamdang mite tungah na zuak thei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note pen TOPA na Pasian uh tungah a siangtho mi na hi uh hi. “Keelno a pi’ nawizu tawh na huan kei ding uh hi. [22] “A kum kumin na lo uhah a piang, na khaici panun a piang khempeuh sawm-ah-khat na pia ding uh hi. [23] TOPA na Pasian uh na zahtak tawntung nading uh na theih nadingun, ama min a ten nadingin a teelna mun TOPA note’ Pasian’ mai-ah na an uh, na leenggahzu uh, na sathau uh sawm-ah-khat, le na bawnghon uh le na tuuhon tacilte uh na ne ding uh hi. [24] TOPA na Pasian un a min koih nadingin a teelna mun pen, TOPA na Pasian un no thupha hong piak ciangin note kiang panin gamla lua a, no a dingin lam a sau luat manin sawm-ah-khat na paipih zawh kei uhleh, [25] tuate sum na suah ding uh a, a sumte tunin, TOPA na Pasian un a teelna munah na pai ding uh a, [26] na deih peuhpeuh uh bawng ahi a, tuu ahi a, leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin, na duh peuhpeuh uh leina-in a sum na zang ding uh hi. TOPA na Pasian uh mai tua lai munah na ne ding uh a, note le na innkuanpihte uh na lungdam ding uh hi. [27] “Note bangin amaute in tanh le luah nei lo ahih manin na khuasung uha om Levi mite na mangngilh kei ding uh hi. [28] “Kum thum simin tua kum-a note’ anpiang sawm-ah-khat khempeuh hong paikhiatpihin na khuasung uhah na khol ding uh hi. [29] TOPA na Pasian un na sepnate khempeuh uhah thupha hong piak theih nadingin, note tawh kibangin amaute in tanh ahi a, luah ahi zongin nei lo uh ahih manin note’ khua sunga om Levi mite, peemtate, pa nei lote, leh meigong numeite hong pai-in tua ante ne-in a gilvah ding uh hi.
[9] Amah in hih mun hong tunpihin, bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin a luanna gam hih leitang ko tungah hong pia hi.

[3] Na pu na pate uh Pasian ahi TOPA in note tungah hong ciam mah bangin bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin a luanna leitang, TOPA na Pasian un note hong piakna gamah a lut dingin na galkah uh ciangin tua suangte tungah hih thute na gelh ding uh hi.

[11] Paisan Pawi khit a zing ciang ni teekteekin amaute in tua gam a piang silngo sawh loh moh le ankan a ne uh hi. [12] Tua gam a piang a nek ni uh a zing ciangin manna a bei ta hi. Israel mite in manna nei nawn lo uh a, ahih hangin tua kumin Kanaan leitang a piangte a ne uh hi.

[10] Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Tu-in ciah un. Anlim tuilim ne-in thadim unla, a nei zo lote zong va kholh un; bang hang hiam cih leh i TOPA a dingin tuni pen biakna ni siangtho ni ahi hi; dah kei un, bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA’ hong piak lungdamna in note hong thahatsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
[12] Tua ahih ciangin mi khempeuh anne tuidawnin midangte a kholh ding le lungdam a om dingin a ciah uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute tungah a kigen thute amaute in a theitel uh hi.
[20] Amaute hoihtakin thu na hilh a, na manna an zong amaute kiang panin na lakik kei a, a dangtakna uh a phasak dingin tui na pia hi.

[25] Tua hi a, amaute in kulhnei khuapite le gam hoihte la uh a, na hoih tampi tawh a kidim innte, suang kikhuak tuibemte, leenggui lote, oliv lote, le nek theih singgah kung tampi a luah uh hi. Amaute in tuate ne-in gilvahin thau uh a, nangma hoihna hangin nuamsa mahmah uh hi.
[5] Keima galte’ muhna munah an nong lui hi. Thupi takin nong pahtawi a, keima hai zong dimlet ta hi.
[17] Kitawngtawng kawmin sameh limpen nekna sangin ki-it diamdiamin anteh meh nek hoihzaw hi.
[26] An duhna in mi na semsak a, gilkialna in nak sepsak semsem zaw hi.
[7] “Ne ne un,” hong cih hangin a cih takpi hi lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh na dangtawng a hong sun samzang nekkhak tawh kibang ding hi.
[20] Zu nenete tawh kikhawl kei inla, a uisante tawh kithuahkha kei in.
[13] Eite khempeuh in an ne tui dawnin i sepna thaman tawh lungdamin i om ding kilawm a, tua pen Pasian’ hong piak letsong ahi hi.
[7] An ne-in lungdam inla, zu ne-in lungnuam in. Na gamtatna peuhpeuh Pasian in hoih a sa hi.

[6] Keivom pen tuuno tawh omkhawm ding a, kamkei gialbem pen keelno tawh lumkhawm ding hi. Bawngno le humpinelkai le ganhing thaute omkhawm ding uh a, naupangno khat nangawn in tuate hawlzo ding hi. [7] Bawngpi le vompi in an nekhawm ding uh a, amau’ note lumkhawm ding uh hi. Humpinelkai in bawngtal mah bangin buhkung ne ding hi. [8] Nawine naungek, gul gilo’ kua vangah kimawl ding a, nawine nawn lo naupang in gul gunei’ bu a sawk hangin a gul in tu lo ding hi. [9] Ka mual siangtho buppi tungah amaute khatlekhat kiliamsak lo ding uh a, kisusia lo ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tuite in tuipi omna a tuamcip mah bangin leitungah TOPA’ thu theihna kidim ding hi.

[25] Keivom le tuuno in an nekhawm ding uh a, humpinelkai in bawngtal bangin buhkung ne ding hi. Leivui pen gulpi’ an hita ding a, mite hong tu nawn lo ding hi. Keima mual siangtho tung tengah amaute kiliamsak lo ding uh a, kisusia lo ding uh hi, TOPA in ci hi,” a ci hi.
[15] Amah in a hoih lote nialin a hoihte a teel theih hun ciangin bawngnawi thaukhal le khuaizu ne ding hi.

[20] Tua ahih manin TOPA in kong cihin-ah: En in, ka hehna le ka thangpaihna hih munah ka bua ding a, mihingte’ tung le ganhingte’ tung, lo lai-a singkungte le leilak a singgahte tungah ka sung ding hi. Ka hehna mei bangin kuang ding a, kisumit lo ding hi. [21] “Vanglian TOPA, Israel mite’ Pasian in hih bangin kong ci hi: Mei tawh haltum ding na meihal biaknate uh hal nawn loin, sa nektheih biakpiaknate tawh kibangin ne vet un. [22] Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt gam panin na pute na pate uh ka lakkhiat lai-in ka hopih kei a, meihal biakna pia ding le biakpiakna a bawl dingin thu ka pia kei hi.
[22] a pute a pate uh tungah piak dingin na ciamsa, bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin a luanna hih gam na pia hi.

[9] “Tu-in mangbuh, mangbuhham, belawi, taang, le mangbuhman pawlkhat la inla, tuate hel khawmin anlumin bawl in. Na veilam delhphahin na lup hun ni zathum le ni sawmkua sung tua na bawl anlum na ne ding hi. [10] Nek khatin anlum shekel sawmnih gik bek na ne ding a, ni khatin khatvei bek na ne ding hi. [11] Tui zong duh zahzah hi loin, ni khatin thawl khat bek na dawn ding hi. [12] Na nek ding anlum pen mite’ muhin mihing ekkeu khawmin tuate mei-in na cih khit ciangin tua sungah na em ding hi,” hong ci hi. [13] Tua ciangin TOPA in, “Israel mite, gam dangah ka thehthang hun ciangin thukham in nek dingin a kham an ninte tu-a mah bangin ne ding uh hi,” a hong ci hi. [14] Ahi zongin kei zong ka dawngkik a, “Topa PASIAN aw, cikmahin kei ka kininsak ngei kei hi. Ka neu tung a kipan tu dongin ama thu-in a sitawm ganhing sa ahi a, gamsate’ nek baang ahi zongin ka ne ngei kei hi. A ninin a kiseh an khat peuhpeuh ka ne ngei nai kei hi,” ka ci hi. [15] Tua ciangin amah in, “Tua ahihleh pha hi. Mihing ek tangin bawng-ek na zang ding a, tua bawng-ek am sungah na em ding hi,” a hong ci hi.

[10] Engedi khua panin Eneglaim khua ciang dong tuipi dungah ngasa bengte omin, tua dungah a ngen uh zalin phokeu ding uh hi. Mediterranean Tuipi sungah ngasa a omzah mah bangin ngasa nam tampi om ding hi. [11] Ahi zongin tuipi dunga om nawnglakte le bualte-a om tuite siang lo ding a, cikhuk dingin a tuaci mahin omlai ding uh hi. [12] Hih gun pang tuakah a gah nek dingin singkung nam khempeuh po ding hi. A tehte pulh ngei lo ding a, a gah tawh zong kilawi ngei lo ding hi. Biakinn panin a luangkhia tui ngah ding uh ahih manin khasimin a gah thak gah tawntung ding uh hi. A singgahte an ding hi ding a, a tehte zatui-in kizang ding hi,” hong ci hi.

[12] Amah in, “Ni sawm sung hong ze-etin, anteh bek hong nesak inla, tui bek hong dawnsak in. [13] Tua ciangin kumpipa’ an a ne khangnote tawh hong enkak khawm in la, nong muhna bangbangin thu khenta in,” a ci hi. [14] Amah in amau’ ngetna bang mangin ni sawm sung ze-et dingin a thukim hi. [15] Ni sawm a cin khit ciangin amaute pen kumpi an nete sangin cidamzaw uh a, a ci a sa uh a hoihzaw hi. [16] Tua ciangin a cing pa in kumpi an le leenggahzu pia loin amaute anteh an a pia hi.
[4] Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Anlum bek tawh mite nungta lo a, Pasian genkhiat thute tawh nungta zaw hi,’ ci-in kigelh hi lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
[11] Nisim khamkhop an hong pia in.

[31] Tua ciangin dawite in Jesuh kiangah, “Kote hong hawlkhia ding na hih leh hua vokte sungah hong lutsak in,” ci-in a thum uh ciangin [32] Jesuh in, “Pai un,” ci ahih manin amaute zong paikhia-in vokte sungah a lut uh hi. Tua vok honte, keen luvum panin tuaksuk gawpin tuili sung tu uh ahih manin a vekpi-in tuikia-in a si khin hi.
[11] Kam sungah a tumsuk nate in mi ninsak lo a, kam sung panin a pusuak nate in mi a ninsak hizaw hi,” a ci hi.

[17] Kam sungah a tumsukte pen gil sung tawnin tua panin paikhiasuak hi lo ahi hiam? [18] Ahi zongin kam sung panin a pusuakte pen lungsim panin hong kipankhia hi a, hihte in mi ninsakthei hi. [19] Bang hang hiam cih leh lungsim panin mi thahnopna, mi zi tawh mawhnopna, nungak tawh mawhnopna, guktakna, zuau genna, mi gensiatna, le ngaihsut hoih lo a tuamtuam hong piangkhia hi. [20] Hih bang nate in mi ninsak a, khut sil loin annekna in mi ninsak lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[13] Tua ahih manin Jesuh in dawite a pai nading uh thu pia a, dawite zong mipa sung panin paikhia-in vokte sungah a lut uh hi. Tua vok honpite a vekpi-in tulnih bang pha hi. Mualtung panin taisuk henhan uh a, tuili sung kidenna-in tuikia mangkhin uh hi.
[30] Amaute tawh an ne dingin a tut ciangin Jesuh in anlum la a, Pasian tungah lungdamna a kohkhit ciangin balnenin amaute a pia hi.
[34] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Keimah hong sawl pa’ deihna bangin na semin, sep dingin hong piak nasep zawhna pen ka nuntakna an ahi hi.

[27] A ningthei ante ngaihsutin nei masa kei unla, nuntak tawntungna an kan masa zaw un. Pa Pasian in tua an a pia dingin kei hong sehsa ahih manin keimah in note tungah nuntak tawntungna an ka hong pia ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[48] Kei pen nuntakna an ka hi hi. [49] Na pu na pate un gam sungah manna ne uh a, a vekpi-un si veve uh hi. [50] Ahi zongin vantung panin a hong pai an a ne mi peuhmah si lo ding hi. [51] Kei pen vantung panin a hong paisuk nuntakna an ka hi hi. Tua an a ne mi peuhmah nungta tawntung ding hi. Leitung mite a nuntak nadingin ka piak ding an pen keima sa ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[9] Tui gei a tun uh ciangin mei-am tungah ngasa le anlum a ki-em a mu uh hi. [10] Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Tu-a na ngasa matte uh pawlkhat hong paipih un,” ci-in a gen ciangin [11] Simon Peter zong gunkuang tungah va kahin ngasa a dimin a om ngen va kai a, ngasa a vekpi-in za le sawmnga le thum pha-in tam mahmah napi-in a ngen uh themkhat zong kikeek lo hi. [12] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Hong pai un; zing an ne ni,” a ci hi. Amah pen Topa ahih lamtak thei uh ahih manin, “Nang kua na hi hiam?” ci-in a nungzuite khat beek in dong ngam lo uh hi.

[1] Tua khit ciangin thu um mi hong tam tektek a, Jew mite le Grik pau a zang Jew mite kikalah kiphunsanna thu hong om hi. Grik pau a zang Jew mite in, “Annek tuidawn, sumlepai hawmna-ah ka meigong numeite uh hong kipiaksak lo hi,” ci-in lungkim lo uh hi. [2] Tua ahih manin sawltak sawm le nihte in thu um mi khempeuh samin kaikhawm uh a, “Kote in Pasian’ thu hilh ding don man lo liangin annek tuidawn sumlepai vai-ah kong manlah ding uh kilawm lo hi.

[13] Awging khat in ama kiangah, “Peter aw, tho inla tuate go-in ne in,” a ci hi. [14] Ahi zongin Peter in, “Topa aw, tuate go-in ka ne het kei ding hi. A ninin a kingaihsun peuhmah ka ne ngei het kei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. [15] A awging in ama kiangah, “Pasian in a siangin a gensa khat peuhpeuh a ninin ngaihsun kei in,” a ci leuleu hi. [16] Tu-a bangin a thumveina dong a cihkhit ciangin vantung lamah tua a peek deda a kilato kik hi. [17] Peter in tua a maangmuhna bang a cihnopna hi ding ahi hiam, ci-in lamdangsa-in a om laitakin, Kornelias in a sawl mite in Simon’ inn hong kan kawikawi uh a, a inn hong thei uh ahih manin a kongbiang hong tungta uh hi. [18] Amaute in, “Simon Peter a kici mi khat, hih lai-ah zin hong tung kha hiam,” ci-in a hong dong uh hi. [19] Tua bangin Peter in a maang muh lungngaingai-in a om laitakin Kha Siangtho in, “En in, mihing thum in nang hong zong uh hi.

[6] Tua a peek deda tung, limtakin ka et ciangin ganhing, gamsa, a bokvak ganhing le vasate ka mu hi. [7] Tua ciangin awging khat in kei kiangah, ‘Peter aw, tho inla tuate go-in ne in,’ hong cihna ka za hi. [8] Ahi zongin keimah in, ‘Topa aw, tuate go-in ka ne het kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a ninin a kingaihsun an peuhmah ka kam ka tun ngei kei hi,’ ka ci hi. [9] Ahi zongin van panin a awging in, ‘Pasian in a siangin a gensa khat peuhpeuh a nin na ci kei ding hi,’ hong ci kik hi. [10] Tu-a bangin a thumveina dong hong cih khit ciangin vantungah tua a peek deda kilato kik hi.

[1] Upna neu mite pawlbawl unla, na ngaihsutna uh a kituah kei leh zong mawhsak kei un. [2] Mi pawlkhat in na khempeuh ka nektheih ding hi, ci-in ngaihsun uh hi; ahi zongin upna neute in anteh bek ne ngam uh hi. [3] Tua ahih manin a ne mite in a tang mite simmawhbawl kei hen la, a tang mite in zong a ne mite simmawhbawl kei hen. Bang hang hiam cih leh a ne mite zong Pasian in a san mite mah ahi hi.

[6] Ni khatpeuh thupi diak hi, ci-in a tang mite in Topa a pahtawina-in a tang ahi uh hi. An khempeuh a ne mi in zong Pasian’ tungah lungdamna ko-in ne uh ahih manin Topa a pahtawina mahin a ne uh ahi hi. Nek dingin kilawm lo hi, ci-in a ne lo mite in zong Pasian tungah lungdamna mah ko ahih manin Topa a pahtawina mahin a ne lo uh ahi hi.
[17] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ Ukna pen nekledawn tawh a kisai thu hi lo a, Kha Siangtho hangin i ngah Pasian’ deih bangin gamtatna, kilemna, lungdamna, cihte hizaw hi.

[20] Annek huhau-in Pasian’ sepsa thute susia kei ni. An khempeuh a kine thei ding ahi hi; ahi zongin tua nekna hangin mi khat peuhpeuh a pukding ahihleh a khial ihi hi. [21] Midangte in a puklawh theih annekna, zunekna, le na khat peuhpeuh i kikep ding a man pen ahi hi. [22] Hih thu-ah no’ upna le no’ ngaihsutnate, Pasian tawh note’ kikal thu hisak un. Amau lungsim sungah man a sak bangun a gamta zote pen a lung uh nuam mahmah hi. [23] Ahi zongin lunghimawh pipi-in a ne a om leh, a upna uh tawh kizui-in a gamta hi lo uh ahih manin Pasian in tua bang mite a mawhsak ding hi. I upna bangin gamtat lohna peuhpeuh mawhna ahi hi.

[13] “An pen i gilpi a’ ding hi a, gilpi zong an a’ ding mah hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci zong omkha ding hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in tua tegel a beisak hun hong tung ding hi. Pumpi pen paktatna-in zat ding hi lo a, Topa’ na sepna-in zat ding hizaw hi. Topa in pumpi a’ ding na hong sem hi.
[8] Ahi zongin tua i nek ante in Pasian tawh i kizopna hong hoihsak tuan lo hi. I nekloh hangin siatna om tuan lo a, i nek hangin zong phatna om tuan sam lo hi.
[13] Tua ahih manin nekna in thu upna sungah ka sanggamte khat a khialsak ding ahihleh, amah a pukkhak loh nadingin milim biakna sa ka ne ngei het kei ding hi.
[27] Thu um lo mi khat in an nekpih dingin hong samin tua an ne dingin na pai leh, na lungsimah kisuanna a om loh nadingin bang sa ahi hiam, ci-in dong se loin ne lel in.
[31] Tua ahih manin keimah in ka hong gennop thu in: Na hihna khempeuh uh, nekna dawnna-ah ahi zongin Pasian’ minthan nadingin na hih un.

[22] Hih bangin na gamtat uh, anletui na nek nading uh inn nei lo na hi uh hiam? Tua ahih kei leh Pasian’ pawlpi simmawh bawlin pawlpi mizawngte na maizumsak nopna uh ahi hiam? Hih thu tawh kisai-ah hong pakta ding nong sak uhleh note ka hong pakta het kei hi.
[33] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, nekkhawm ne dingin na kikhop uh ciangin kingakkim dimdiam un.
[16] Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn, biakna pawite, Khadet pawi, le Sabbath ni tawh kisai-in kuamah in ngeina zuih ding bawl kei un.
[10] Note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-un, “Na a sem nuam lo mi peuhmah an nesak kei un,” ci-in ka hong gen uh hi.
[14] Ahi zongin antak i cih pen a sia le a pha a khenthei, a lim le a lim lo a khentheita, a khangham khinsa mite a’ ding ahi hi.

[17] Tua ahih manin zak nading bil a neite in Kha Siangtho in pawlpite kiangah a gen thute na za un. A gualzo mi tungah a kiselcip manna an pawlkhat le min thak a kigelhna suangkang khat ka pia ding hi. Tua suangkang pen a ngahte simloh kuamah dang in thei lo ding hi.

[2] khuapi sung lampi laizangah a luang hi. Tua gun pang tuakah nuntakna singkung po a, kha simin gah ahih manin kum khat sungin sawm le nih vei a gah hi. A tehte zong natna dam nading zatui-in kizang hi.

[26] Tua ciangin Israel mite khempeuh, galkap vekpi paito-in Bethel-ah tungin a kap uh hi. Tua lai mun TOPA’ mai-ah amaute tu-in nitak dong tua ni an tang uh a, TOPA’ mai-ah meihal biakna le thunuama biakna a pia uh hi.

[6] Tua ahih ciangin amaute Mizpah-ah kikhawm uh a, tui tawi-in TOPA’ mai-ah sungkhia uh a, tua ni-in an tangin tua lai munah, “ TOPA’ tungah i khial khinzo hi,” a ci uh hi. Samuel in Israel mite Mizpah-ah thu khen hi.
[13] Amaute in a guhte la-in Jabesh khuasung makeng kung nuai-ah vui uh a, ni sagih sung an a tang uh hi.
[12] Tua ahih ciangin Saul, a tapa Jonathan, le TOPA’ mi Israel-te hangin amaute thumin kap uh a, nitak dong an a tang uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh gal sungah amaute si uh hi.

[15] Tua ciangin Nathan a inn-ah a ciah hi. Tua ciangin Uriah’ zi in David tawh a neih naungek TOPA in vat a, a ci hong na hi. [16] Tua ahih ciangin David in naungek a dingin Pasian’ tungah thum hi. David in an tangin zan tawntung leilakah a lum hi. [17] Tua ciangin leilak panin a phong dingin a innsung upate ama kiangah ding uh hi. Ahih hangin amah tho lo a, amaute tawh an zong ne nuam lo hi.
[21] Tua ciangin a nasemte in ama kiangah, “Hih banga na gamtatna a bangci hiam? Naungek a hin lai-in an tangin na kap hi; ahih hangin naungek a sih ciangin tho-in an na ne zawsop hi,” a ci uh hi.

[27] Ahab in hih thute a zak ciangin a puante balkek a, a pum tungah puanhampi silhin, an tangin puanhampi tungah lum a, maikhingin a vak kawikawi hi. [28] Tu-in Tishbe khuami Elijah tungah TOPA’ thu hong tung a, [29] “Keima mai-ah bangzahin Ahab a kiniamkhiatna na mu hiam? Keima mai-ah amah kiniamkhiat ahih manin ama hun sungin siatna ka tungsak kei ding hi. Ahih hangin a tapa’ hun sungin ama innkuan tungah siatna ka tungsak ding hi,” a ci hi.

[12] a thahat mi khempeuh kithawi-in Saul le a tapate’ luanghawmte lakhia-in Jabesh-ah a paipih uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in Jabesh-a tawsaw nuai-ah amaute’ guhte vui uh a, ni sagih sung an a tang uh hi.
[3] Tua ciangin Jehoshafat lau a, amahmah in TOPA’ lamlahna ding zong a, Judah gam khempeuhah an tan’ ding thu a zasak hi.

[21] Tua ciangin eite’ Pasian’ mai-ah kote kiniamkhiat thei-in, kote le ka naupangte uh le ka neihsa khempeuh uh nuamtakin ka khualzinna uhah ka pai theih nading uh Pasian’ tung pan ka nget theih nadingun Ahava lui-ah an tanna ding thu ka taangko hi. [22] Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa kiangah, “Ka Pasian un amah a zong mite khempeuh ompihin amau a dingin a hoih na sem a, amah a nusiate khempeuh tungah amah heh hi,” ci-in gen khin ka hih manun lampi-ah kote hong kha dingin galkapte le sakol tung tuangte kumpipa kiangah ka nget ding ka mai a zum hi. [23] Tua hi a, kote in an ka tang uh hi. Nuamtakin khual ka zin theih nading uh i Pasian’ tungah ka ngen uh a, amah in ka thungetna uh hong pia hi.
[4] Hih thu ka zak ciangin tusukin ka kap niloh a, ni tampi sung an tangin, vantung Pasian kiangah thu ka ngen hi.
[1] Tua kha mah a ni sawmnih le li ni-in an tang dingin Israel mite kikhawm uh a, puanhampi silhin a lu tung uhah lei kibuak uh hi.
[3] Kumpipa’ thupiakna a tunna gam Jew mite’ omna khempeuhah nakpi taka thumna le tauna, antanna, kahna, le dip-humna om hi. Mi a tamzaw in puanhampi silhin vut lakah lum uh hi.

[15] Tua ciangin Esther in Mordekai a dawnna lai amah puasak leuleu a, [16] “Pai-in Susa khua sunga om Jew mi khempeuh khawm inla, keimah ngaihsutna-in an na tang un. A sun a zan ci loin ni thum sung an ne lo, tui dawn loin na om un. Na tan’ uh mah bangin kei le ka nasem numeite in zong ka na tang ding uh hi. Tua khit ciangin ngeina ahihloh hangin kumpipa kiangah ka va pai ding hi,” a ci hi.
[13] Ahih hangin kei ahihleh, amaute a cinat uh ciangin, puanhampi silhin an tangin kei ka kigimtawm sak hi.
[10] An ngolhna tawh ka lungsim ka kiniamkhiat a, tua pen keimah hong kikona lehsuak zawsop hi.
[24] An ngolhna hangin ka khukte zaw a, ka pumpi silesa zong kiamgawp khinta hi.

[3] “Kote in an tang napi-in bang hangin kote hong phawk lo na hi hiam? Kote kiniamkhiatin om napi-in bang hangin kote hong thei kha lo na hi hiam?” hong ci uh hi. Note in an na tan’ uh ciangin nomau’ deihna na zong uh a, na nasemte uh na nengniam uh hi. [4] Note in a kitawng ding, a kilai ding, gitloh gamtatin, khuttum tawh a kitum ding bekin an na tang uh hi. Hih bang lelin antanna tawh na thungetna uh hong kingai ding ahi hiam? [5] Maugua kun bangin na lu uh kunsukin, puanhampi le vut tungah lumin, nomau na kigimsak tawmnate uh kei’ deih antanna nam sa na hi uh hiam? Hih bang hihna pen antanna man le TOPA’ santheih pawl hi, ci ding na hi uh hiam? [6] Kei’ deih antanna hih bang pawl ahi hi: Gitlohna khaute phelin, hakkol savun khaute phel a, a kinengniam mite khahkhia-in thuman lohna hakkol khempeuh suktan ding ahi hi. [7] Na an uh a gilkialte tawh nekhawm unla, inn nei lo a zawngte na innsung uhah paipihin, tangguakin a om mite puan silhsakin, na mipihte uh kiang panin bu lo ding hi lo na hi uh hiam?

[11] TOPA in kei kiangah, “Hih mite in thupha a ngah nadingin thu hong ngen nawn kei in. [12] An a tan’ uh hangin amau’ thumna ka ngai kei ding a, meihal biakna le an tawh biaknate hong piak uh hangin ka sang kei ding hi. Amaute namsau tawh ahi zongin, kial tawh ahi zongin, pulnatna tawh ahi zongin ka sisakzaw ding hi,” hong ci hi.

[9] Josiah’ tapa Judah kumpi Jehoiakim in a ukzawh kum nga a phak kum, a kha kuana kha-in Jerusalem khua-a om mi khempeuh le Judah gam khuapite panin Jerusalem khua-ah a hong pai mi khempeuh in TOPA’ maipha ngah nadingin an a tang uh hi.
[18] Kumpipa a inn-ah ciahkik a, tua zan tawntung an ngawlin gualnopna zong a bawl kei hi. Tua zanin a ihmu thei peuhmah kei hi.
[3] An ngawlin, puanhampi silhin, vut lakah tu-in, Topa’ kiangah deih takin thu ka ngen hi.
[14] An tan’ ding thu pia unla, a thupi biak kikhopna bawl un. Note’ TOPA Pasian’ biakinn sungah makaite le gammi khempeuh kaikhawm unla, TOPA’ tungah kiko-in thum un.

[12] TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Tu mahmah nangawnin lungsim tak tawh kisik kikin, an tangin, kapin, thumna tawh kei kiangah hong paikik un. [13] Na dah taktakna uh lungkhamna tawh langsak unla, na puante uh a balkek bek hi kei un,” hong ci hi. TOPA, note’ Pasian kiangah ciahkik un. Amah migi mahmahin hehpihna a nei hi a, a lungduai-in hong huh nuam tawntung a, gim hong pia loin hong maisak nuam tawntung hi. [14] TOPA, eite’ Pasian in a lungsim hong kheelin an hauhsakna tawh thupha hong piakha ding hi. Tua hileh ama tungah an le leenggahzu tawh biakna i pia thei ding hi. [15] Zion mual tungah peengkul tumin an tanna ding thu pia unla, biak kikhopna khat nei un.
[5] Nineveh khuamite kisikin Pasian um uh a, antan’ ding thu thangsakin, a golpen pan a kipan a neupen dongin puanhampi a silh uh hi.

[5] “Gam sung mi khempeuh le siampite tungah hih bangin gen in: Amaute in a beisa kum sawmsagih sung kha ngana le kha sagihna sungin an tangin a kahna uh, kei hong pahtawina uh hi lo hi. [6] A annek a tuidawnte uh zong, amau’ duh man bek ahi hi,” hong ci hi.

[19] amah in, “Kha lina, kha ngana, kha sagihna, le kha sawmna sunga antannate pen, Judah gammite a dingin lungdamin kipakin pawi bawlna hun suak ta ding hi. Tua ahih manin thuman le kilemna deih pha un,” hong ci hi.

[2] Jesuh in sun sawmli le zan sawmli sung an ne loin omkhin ahih manin a gil a kial hi. [3] Tua ciangin ama kiangah Dawimangpa hong pai a, “Pasian’ Tapa na hih takpi le hih suangte anlum a suah nadingin thu pia in,” a ci hi. [4] Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Anlum bek tawh mite nungta lo a, Pasian genkhiat thute tawh nungta zaw hi,’ ci-in kigelh hi lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.

[16] “An na tan’ uh ciangin a kineihkhem mite bangin maikhingin om kei un. Amaute in an a tanlam uh mite in a theih ding uh a ut manun gilkial mai pua-in a om uh hi. Amaute in a antan’ thaman uh a ngah khinta ahih lamtak limtakin thei un. [17] Ahi zongin an na tan’ uh ciangin na mai uh phiatin na sam uh hiat un. [18] Tua hileh midangte in na an tanlam uh a theih loh hangin na muh theih loh na Pa un hong thei veve ding a, kuama theih lohin na tanlam uh a hong thei na Pa un note’ tungah thaman hong pia ding hi.

[14] Tua ciangin Jesuh kiangah Tuiphumpa Johan’ nungzuite hong pai uh a, “Bang hangin kote le Farisi mite in an tang zelzel napi-in, na nungzuite in tang lo se ahi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. [15] Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Mopina pawi khatah, a zineipa a om sungin a mopawi simte dah dingin um na hi uh hiam? Dah het lo ding uh hi. Ahi zongin amaute kiang panin zineipa a kilakkhiat ding hun hong tung ding a, tua hun ciangin amaute in an a tang ding uh hi.
[13] Gamlakah ni sawmli sung om a, Satan in tua hun sungteng a ze-et hi. Tua lai-ah gamsa gilote zong om a, ahi zongin vantung mite hong pai-in amah huhin an a vak uh hi.

[18] Tua hun laitakin Tuiphumpa Johan’ nungzuite le Farisi mite in an a tang uh hi. Jesuh kiangah mi pawlkhat hong pai-in, “Bang hangin Tuiphumpa Johan’ nungzuite le Farisi mite’ nungzuite in an tang uh a, nangma nungzuite in tang lo se ahi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. [19] Jesuh in, “Mopawi a siim mite in an ne lo dingin um na hi uh hiam? Zineipa tawh a omkhawm sung uh an ne loin om lo ding uh hi. [20] Ahi zongin amaute kiang panin zineipa a kipaikhiatpih hun hong tung ding a, tua hun a tun ciangin an ne loin a om ding uh hi.
[37] kum sawmgiat le kum li sung meigongin a om ahi hi. Amah pen biakna a nusia ngei lo mi khat hi a, a sun a zanin Pasian bia-in an tangin thu a ngenngen mi khat ahi hi.
[2] Dawimangpa in ni sawmli sung a ze-et hi. Tua hun sung Jesuh in bangmah ne lo a, tua ze-etna hun a bei ciangin a gil kial mahmah hi.

[33] Tua ciangin amaute pawlkhat in Jesuh kiangah, “Johan’ nungzuite in an tangin thu ngen zelzel uh a, Farisi mite’ nungzuite zong tua bangmahin gamta napi-in, bang hangin nangma nungzuite in tang loin om se uh ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. [34] Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Mopawi-ah zineipa le pawisimte a omkhawm laitakin a pawisimte an tangsak thei ding na hi uh hiam? [35] Amaute kiang panin zineipa a kipaikhiatpih hun hong tung ding a, tua hun ciangin tang ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[12] Nipikal khatin ni nih sung an ka tang a, ka ngah khempeuh sung panin sawm-ah-khat nang tungah kong pia hi,’ a ci hi. [13] Ahi zongin siahdongpa pen a gamla simah ding a, vantung lamah zong dak ngam loin a dip humin kuncip a, ‘Pasian aw, kei mimawh mi khial pa hong hehpih in,’ ci-in a ngen hi. [14] Ke’n kong cihin-ah, hih mipa pen Pasian tawh a kilemsa-in a inn-ah ciah a, a khat pa pen tua bangin ciah lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a kiliansakte pen kiniamkhiatsuk ding a, a kiniamkhiatte pen a lianin kibawl ding hi,” a ci hi.

[2] Amaute in an tangin Pasian bia-in a om laitakun Kha Siangtho in amaute kiangah, “Keima na a sem dingin ka sapsa ahih manin kei a dingin Barnabas le Saul hong piakhia un,” a ci hi. [3] Amaute in zong an tangin, a lu tung uhah a khut uh nga-in thu a ngetsak khit uh ciangin a kuankhia sak uh hi.
[23] Khua pawlpi simah pawlpi upa ding sehsak uh a, an tangin thungetna tawh amaute’ muan ahi Topa’ khut sungah tua mite a ap uh hi.
[3] Tua hun sungin Kain in lei pana piang gah piakna TOPA’ tungah paipih a, [4] Abel in a tuuhon tacilte le a sa limcite paipih hi. TOPA in Abel le ama piakna thusim a,
[1] TOPA in Moses kiangah, [2] “Keima tungah tacil khempeuh hong ap in. Israel mite’ lakah, mihing hitaleh ganhing hitaleh, naubu a hong masa pen peuhpeuh keima-a’ ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[29] “Na anlakna pan uh le sathau le leenggah na suknate uh panin a leetkhiate piak khiat ding na zekai kei ding uh hi. “Na tapa cilte uh keima tungah nong pia ding uh hi.
[19] “Note in na anpalte uh lakah a tung masa pen TOPA na Pasian uh inn-ah na paipih ding uh hi. “Note in a pi’ nawizu tawh keelno na huan kei ding uh hi.
[22] “Nipikalte’ pawi, mangbuh a tung masa pawi, le kum bei ciangin an kaihkhop pawi na bawl ding uh hi.
[26] “Note in na anpalte uh lakah a tung masa pen TOPA na Pasian uh’ inn-ah na paipih ding uh hi. “Note in keelno a pi’ nawizu tawh na huan kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[12] Anpal tawh biakna ahihleh TOPA’ kiangah na paipih thei ding hi. Ahih hangin a gim namtui dingin biakna tau tungah kipia lo ding hi. [13] An tawh na biaknate khempeuh ci na sawh ding hi. An tawh na biakna-ah na Pasian tawh na thuciamna ci sawh loin na om kei ding a, na biakna khempeuh ci na sawh ding hi. [14] “Anpal tawh TOPA’ tungah biakna na piak leh, anpal tawh na biak nadingin a vui thak panin kila-in a kigawivui, mei-ah a kihangkeu na pia ding hi.
[10] “Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note tungah ka hong piak leitangah note tungin an na lak uh ciangin, note in an na lakna uhah anpal lom khat, siampipa kiangah na paipih ding uh hi.

[17] Note in na tenna uh panin vei dingin an lawh nih a kibawl anlum nih nong paipih ding uh hi. Tuate pen annel a kibawl, silngo sawhin a ki-em, TOPA’ tungah anpalin a kipia hi ding hi. [18] Note in anlum tawh, a sitbaang lo kum khat a pha tuuno sagih, le bawngtalno khat, le tuutal nih na pia ding uh hi. Tuate, TOPA’ tungah a gim namtui mei tawh kihal biak nadingin an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate tawh TOPA’ tungah meihal biakna hi ding hi. [19] Note in khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat le thunuama biakpiakna-in kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nih na pia ding uh hi. [20] Siampipa in TOPA’ mai-ah vei-a biakna-in anpal-anlum le tuuno nih tawh tuate vei ding a, tuate pen siampipa a dingin TOPA’ mai-ah a siangtho hi ding hi.
[20] Na anlak uh a masa pen sung panin biakna-in moh khat na pia ding uh a, an cilna pana biakna-in na piak bangun na bawl ding uh hi.

[12] “Sathau limci pen khempeuh, le leenggahzu le an a limci pen khempeuh, TOPA’ tungah amau’ piak anpalte, note’ tungah kong pia hi. [13] Amaute in TOPA’ tungah a piak uh, amau’ leitangah a min masa gah khempeuh nomau a’ hi ding hi. Na inn sunga om a siangtho mi peuhpeuh in ne thei ding hi.

[26] “Na nipikal pawi hunun TOPA’ tungah an thak tawh biakna na piak hun uh anpal piak ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uh hi. Tua ni-in leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh a, [27] meihal biakna, TOPA’ tungah a gim namtui na pia ding uh hi. Bawngtalno nih, tuutal khat, le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sagih, a vekpi-in a sitbaang lo hi ding hi.

[6] Tua lai-ah na pai ding uh a, na meihal biaknate uh le na biakpiaknate uh, note in na piak uh sawm-ah-khat le na piak thuahte uh, thuciamna biakpiakna, utthu-a na piakna, na bawnghon tacilte uh le na tuuhon tacilte uh tua lai-ah na paipih ding uh hi. [7] TOPA na Pasian uh mai tua lai munah na ne ding uh a, TOPA na Pasian un note thupha hong piakna hangin na hihna khempeuh uhah note le na innkuanpihte na lungdam ding uh hi.
[4] Na anpal, na leenggahzu, na sathau, le na meet masak uh na tuumul uh na pia ding uh hi.

[2] TOPA na Pasian un a hong piak leitang pana piang gah khempeuh panin a gah masa pawlkhat la-in lawh khat sungah na koih ding uh a, ama min na omsak nadingun TOPA na Pasian un a teelna munah na pai ding uh hi. [3] Tua hun laitakin na a sem siampipa kiangah pai-in ama kiangah, ‘ TOPA in kote piak dingin ka pu ka pate uh tungah a ciam leitangah ka tun khitna uh tuni-in TOPA na Pasian kiangah kong ko uh hi,’ na ci ding uh hi. [4] “Tua ciangin siampipa in note’ khut panin a lawh hong saang ding a, TOPA note’ Pasian biakna tau mai-ah koih ding hi.

[9] Amah in hih mun hong tunpihin, bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin a luanna gam hih leitang ko tungah hong pia hi. [10] Tua ahih ciangin en in, TOPA, nangmah in kote nong piaksa leitang panin a gah a min masa kong paipih uh hi,’ na ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin TOPA note’ Pasian’ mai-ah na koihsuk ding uh a, TOPA note’ Pasian’ mai-ah na bia ding uh hi.

[42] Mi khat Baalshalishah panin hong pai-in Pasian’ mipa kiangah anpal anlum, mangbuhham lum sawmnih, le anvui a thak a van sungah hong pua hi. Tua ciangin Elisha in a nasempa kiangah, “Amaute in a nek theih nadingun kamsangte tungah pia in,” a ci hi.

[5] Tua thupiakna a kitheihthang phetin Israel mite in anpalte, leenggahzu, le lo-a piang khempeuh tampi tak hong pia uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in na khempeuh sung pan sawm-ah-khat ahi tampi tak hong paipih uh hi.

[35] I leitang panin a piang anpalte le singgah kungte panin a gah masa khempeuh a kumkumin TOPA’ biakinn-ah puak ding ka kiciam uh hi. [36] Thukham sunga kigelh mah bangin i Pasian’ biakinn-ah a om, i Pasian’ biakinn sungah na a sem siampite kiangah zong tapa upa pente le bawngte’ tacilte, le ganhonte’ tacilte, le tuuhonte’ tacilte paipih ding, [37] le annel lom meek masak pen siampite tungah puak ding, le gah nei sing khempeuh panin a gah masa, sathau le leenggahzu thakte khempeuh i Pasian’ biakinn sung vankoihna-ah puak ding, le lokhawhna khuaneute khempeuhah sawm-ah-khat a kaikhawmte pen Levi mite ahih manin leitang panin sawm-ah-khat khempeuh Levi mite kiangah puak ding ka kiciam uh hi.

[44] Tua ciangin khuapite’ kiimah lo omte panin a golna le a neuna tawh kizui-in siampite le Levi mite a dingin thukham sunga om bangin a kaihkhop ding uh a kipia nate, anpalte, le sawm-ah-khatte a koihna ding uh vankoihna innte a uk dingin mi kiseh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh siampite le Levi mite’ nasepna hangin Judah mi khempeuh lungdam mahmah uh hi.
[31] Tua ciangin a kiseh hunin zat dingin cih ding sing tawh biakna le anpal tawh biakna ding ka vaihawmsak hi. Ka Pasian aw, a hoih lamin kei hong phawk in.
[3] Bulpite kisusia khin leh midikte in bangcih thei nawn ding hiam?” nong ci thei diam?
[51] Ham’ suante’ inn sungah a ta upa pen teng, Egypt gam sung tacil khempeuh amah in a vatmai hi.
[36] Amau’ sung pan a piang masa Egypt tacil khempeuh a satlum hi.
[9] Na neihsa le na anpalte tawh TOPA zahtak in. [10] Tua hileh na ansalte an tawh kidim ding a, beel dimletin leenggahzu na nei ding hi.
[3] Israel mite pen TOPA a dingin a tuam om hi a, ama anlakna ah a anpalte ahi uh hi. Amaute a ne peuhpeuh a mawh suak uh a, gimna a thuak uh hi, TOPA in hong ci hi, ci-in va gen in,” hong ci hi.

[28] “Israel mite tungah ka piak, khang khat pan khang khatah a kiluah suksuk ding sung panin siampite’ tanh pen siampi nasep za ahi hi. Amaute in Israel mite lakah neihsa gamh nei lo ding uh hi. Amaute’ kisapna khempeuhah kei a kicing khin ka hi hi. [29] An tawh biakna, mawhna le khialhna hanga biakna, le Israel mite lak panin keima a dingin a kipiakhiate khempeuh amaute in ne ding uh hi. [30] Anpal sung panin a limci penteng le kei tungah hong kipia na khempeuh, amaute in tang ding uh hi. Israel mite’ inn sungah ka thupha a tuntheih nadingin amaute in anlum a em simun, biakna-in siampite tungah a em masak penpen uh pia ding uh hi.
[10] “A tawmno-ah a diktatte pen a tamah zong diktat uh a, a tawmno-ah a citak lote pen a tamah zong citak lo uh hi.

[16] Anlum a ki-em masa sung panin a themkhat Pasian biakna-in a kipiak ciangin a anlum buppi zong Pasian-a’ mah hi pah a, singkung khat’ zung zong Pasian a kipiak ciangin a hiang khempeuh zong Pasian-a’ mah ahi hi.
[18] Ama piansakte khempeuh lakah eite a masa pen i suahtheih nadingin thuman thutak zangin ama utthu tawh eite a hong piangsak tawm ahi hi.

[5] Tua ciangin Israel mite in, “ TOPA a’ ding kikhopna-ah Israel minamte khempeuh sung panin kua teng hong pai lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in TOPA kiangah a pai lo mite tawh kisai-in Mizpah-ah kiciamna lianpi khat bawl uh a, “Kithat ding hi,” a ci uh hi. [6] Israel mite in a sanggam uh Benjamin mite khasiat uh a, “Tuni-in Israel-te’ sung panin minam khat bei hi.

[4] Ahih hangin tua zan mahin Nathan kiangah TOPA’ thu hong tung a, [5] “Pai inla ka nasempa David kiangah gen in. ‘ TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: Ten nading biakinn khat hong lamsak ding na hi hiam? [6] Israel mite Egypt panin ka paikhiatpih toh ni a kipan tuni dongin biakinn sungah ka om nai kei a, puanbuk sungah omin ka pai kawikawi hi. [7] Israel mite khempeuh tawh ka painasa mun khempeuhah, ka mi Israel-te a cing dingin ka piak thukhente khat peuhpeuh tungah, “Bang hangin taamtak biakinn hoih hong lamsak lo na hi hiam?” ci-in kam khat beek gen ngei ka hi hiam?’ ci hi.
[3] Siampite mi a kicingzah ding amau kisiansuah nai lo uh a, mite zong Jerusalem-ah kikhawm nai lo uh ahih manin a hunin bawl thei lo uh hi.
[16] Tua ciangin Israel mite, siampite, Levi mite, le sal a suaksa a hong ciahkik mi khempeuh in lungdamna lianpi tawh Pasian’ biakinn apna a bawl uh hi.

[11] Launa tawh TOPA’ na sem unla, linna tawh a khe nam un; tua hikeileh amah sinso-in lamkalah na siamang ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah heh pakpak hi. Amah a bel khempeuh mi nuamsate ahi hi.

[1] TOPA aw, na biakinn sungah kua om ding ahi hiam? Na mual siangtho tungah kua teng ding ahi hiam? [2] Paubaang loin gamta-in, a manin na sem a, lungsim tak a gen mi, [3] mi gensia loin, a lawmte tungah siatna bawl lo a, a vengte a mawhsak lo mi, [4] migilote thusim lo a, ahi zongin TOPA a zahtakte a pahtawi mi, ama natna ding nangawnah a ciampel lo mi, [5] ama sum a meetin a kha lo, thutang mite a langpan lo, golhguk a la lo mite teng ding uh hi. Hih bangin a gamtate pen ling ngei lo ding hi.

[3] TOPA’ mual tungah kuate kahto ding ahi hiam? Ama mun siangtho-ah kuate ding ding ahi hiam? [4] Gamtat siangtho le lungsim siangtho a nei, a man lo thu-ah a nuntakna pia loin, khemna tawh a kiciam lo mite ahi hi.
[4] TOPA’ tung panin na khat ka ngen khin a, tua ngenin ka zon ding pen: TOPA’ inn sungah ka khan tawntungin om ding, TOPA’ hoihna et ding le ama biakinn sungah thu dot dingte ahi hi.
[14] TOPA’ tungah ka thuciamnasa pen ama mite khempeuh a kikhopna munah ka pia ding hi.

[7] Minam dang khempeuh lokgawp ding ka hih manin a neihsa uh sum le paite, hih munah hong kipuak ding a, biakinn sungah a dimin van hong om ding hi. [15] “Na sanggamte uh na tung uhah hong khialh leh pai-in no tegel bek theihin a khialhna va gen un. Na thu uh a hong man’ leh na sanggampa uh a ngahkik na hi uh hi. [38] Johan in, “Sia aw, nangma min zangin dawi a hawlkhia mi khat ka mu uh hi. Amah, ei’ pawl hi lo ahih manin ka kham uh hi,” a ci hi. [39] “Amah kham kei un. Keima min zangin nalamdang a bawl mipa in keimah gensiat tawh thuahpah cih om thei lo ding hi.

[39] Kikhopna inn sungah, uliante a dingin a kikoihcing tutphah nuamte tungah tunuam uh a, pawi sungah zong uliante’ tutna mun hoihte bekah a tunuam uh hi. Amau’ kineihkhemna tawh kizui-in a gimthuak ding uh lianzaw ding hi,” a ci hi. [41] Biakinn sumpi khiatna kuang gei-ah Jesuh tu a, mihonte in sumpi a khiat laitakun a en hi. A haute in tampipi hong khia uh hi. [42] A zawng meigong numei khat zong hong pai a, sumnen tang nih hong khia hi. [44] Bang hang hiam cih leh adangte in a neihval a lamval sung panun a khia uh ahi hi; ahi zongin amah zawng mahmah napi-in ama kivak nading nangawn siit loin a neih khempeuh a khiakhin ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[9] “Limtakin kidawm un. Note hong kimanin thukhen zumah hong kipaipih ding a, kikhopna inn sungah zong hong kisat ding hi. Ukpite le kumpite mai-ah keima thu gen nading hun na ngah ding uh hi.
[16] Tua ciangin kawl vakhu zuakte kiangah, “Na kawl vakhute uh hih lai panin paikhiatpih un. Ka Pa’ inn pen sumzuakna inn phualpi-in nei kei un,” a ci hi.

Ni thum sungin dingsakkikzo ding na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi. [21] Ahi zongin Jesuh in biakinn a cih ciangin ama pumpi a cihna ahi hi. [22] Tua ahih manin sihna panin amah a kithawhkiksak ciangin a nungzuite in Jesuh’ thugen phawkkik uh a, Lai Siangtho le Jesuh’ thugente a um uh hi.
[46] Nisimin biakinn-ah kikhawm uh a, a innte uhah an nekhawmin, lungdamna le kiniamkhiatna tawh a ne ciat uh hi.

[3] Amaute in zong an tangin, a lu tung uhah a khut uh nga-in thu a ngetsak khit uh ciangin a kuankhia sak uh hi.
[23] Khua pawlpi simah pawlpi upa ding sehsak uh a, an tangin thungetna tawh amaute’ muan ahi Topa’ khut sungah tua mite a ap uh hi.

[2] Hih thu huhau-in Paul le Barnabas, le hih mite kikalah nakpitakin thu kinialna omin thu kisel uh ahih manin, Paul le Barnabas le Antiok khua-a a om mi pawlkhatte Jerusalem khua-ah va pai-in, hih thu tawh kisai-in tua lai-a om sawltakte le upate tawh a kimuh nadingun a vaihawm uh hi. [3] Amaute a pai uh ciangin pawlpi mite in khuanawl ciang va kha uh a, Gentail mite zong Pasian lamah a kiheina thu, a nawkna uh Foenisia gamah gen kawikawi uh ahih manin thu um mite khempeuh a nuam mahmah uh hi. [4] Jerusalem khua a tun uh ciangin sawltakte, upate, le pawlpite in limtakin zin na do uh a, Pasian in na a seppihna thu, amaute kiangah a gen uh hi. [5] Ahi zongin Farisi mite sung panin thu um mi pawlkhat in, “Amaute in Moses Thukham zui-in, a vun uh a ki-at nading uh gen ding kisam hi,” a ci uh hi. [6] Tua ahih manin hih thu a kikum dingin sawltakte le upate a kikhawm uh hi.

[22] Tua ciangin sawltakte, upate, le pawlpi buppi in amau sung panin mi pawlkhat teelin Paul le Barnabas tawh Antiok khua-ah a paikhawmsak ding uh a vaihawm uh hi. Amaute tawh a paikhawm dingin thu um mite in a zahtakbawl mahmah mi nih, Barsabbas Judas le Silas teelkhia uh a,

[4] Thuhilhin a paina uh khua khempeuha thu um mite kiangah Jerusalem khua-a om sawltakte le upate in zuih dingin a khensat uh ngeinate gen kawikawi uh a, tua ngeinate a zuih nadingun a hanthawn uh hi. [5] Tua ahih manin pawlpi mite a upna uhah kip semsemin, a nini-in mi a kibehlaplap hi. [6] Asia gam sungah thu a hilh ding uh Kha Siangtho in phal lo ahih manin Frigia le Galatia gam sungtengah a zin uh hi.

Tu-a note kiangah kong pulak Khrih pen Lai Siangtho sunga kigen Khrih ahi hi, ci-in Paul in a gen hi.

[11] Thesalonika khuamite sangin Berea khuamite in mipi lungsim neizaw uh hi. Amaute in lawp mahmahna tawh Paul’ thugente ngai uh a, Paul’ thugente man taktak hiam ci-in a theih nadingun nisimin Lai Siangtho a sim uh hi.
[24] Tua Pasian pen leitung buppi le a tunga om khempeuh a piangsak Pasian hi a, van le lei a uk Topa ahih manin mihingte’ lamsa biakinn sungah teng lo hi.
[17] Paul in Miletas khua panin Efesa khua-ah thu puak a, Efesa pawlpi upate in a na dawntuah nadingin a vaikhak hi.
[28] Kha Siangtho in note’ khut sungah a hong koih pawlpi mite le nomau pumpi mahmah limtakin na kem un. Pasian in a Tapa a sihna tawh a ngah a pawlpi hoihtakin a kemte na hi ta un.

[4] I pumpi tungah zong na tampi i nei a, tua nate’ nasep a tuamtuam ahi hi. [5] Tua mah bangin eite mi tampi ihih hangin pumkhat ihi a, pumpi nate bangin khatlekhat a kizom ciat ihi hi. [6] Tua ahih manin Pasian in hehpihna hong piakkhongna tawh kizui-in i siamna a tuamtuamte zang ciat ni. I siamna pen Pasian’ thu gentheih nading siamna ahih leh i upna neihzah tawh kizui-in gen ni. [7] Nasep nading siamna a nei ihih leh na sem ni. Hilh nading siamna a nei ihih leh hilh ni. [8] Midangte hanthot theih nading siamna a nei ihih leh midangte hanthawn ni. Midangte hop theih nading a nei ihih leh citna taktak tawh hawm ni. Makaih theih nading siamna a nei ihih leh hoihtakin na sem ni. Midangte hehpih theih nading a nei ihih leh maitai takin hih ni.
[1] Upna neu mite pawlbawl unla, na ngaihsutna uh a kituah kei leh zong mawhsak kei un.
