[18] Tua bang mite in i Topa Khrih’ na a sem hi loin, gilpi vai bek a sem uh ahi hi. Amaute in mite phatin kamkhum nono zang uh ahih manin mihoih pawlkhat a khemzo uh hi.
[23] Keima zintunna pa le pawlpite’ kikhopna inn nei pa zong ahi Gaias in zong hong hopih hi. Ka omna khuapi sumkem pa Erastas le i Khristian sanggam Kuartas in zong hong hopih uh hi.

[2] Jesuh Khrih tawh kipawlna hangin Pasian’ mi suakin, Pasian’ mi siangtho cihna a ngah, Korin khua-a om Pasian’ pawlpi mite le eite’ Topa bek hi loin, amaute’ Topa zong ahi, i Topa Jesuh Khrih tungah thu a ngen, mun khempeuhah a om mite tungah lai ka hong khak uh hi.
[10] Sanggamte aw, note khatlekhat kithutuakin, pawl kikhenna omkha loin, na lungsim, na ngaihsutna uh le na ngimna uh na kikhatsak nadingun i Topa Jesuh Khrih min tawh ka hong thum hi.

[9] Kote pen Pasian a dingin na a semkhawm mite ka hi uh a, note pen Pasian’ lo na hi uh hi. Note pen Pasian’ inn zong na hi uh hi. [10] Pasian in kei tungah a hong piak siamna zangin, innlam siamte’ nasepteng semin, a khuam thupiteng ka phut a, Apollos in tua khuam phuhsa tungah innlam a zom hi. Tua khuam tungah inn a lam pa a kingaihsut mahmah ding kisam hi. [11] Keima phuhsa khuam thupiteng ahi Jesuh Khrih cih simloh kuamah dang in khuam thupi dang phutthei nawn lo ding hi. [12] Ahi zongin tua khuam tungah kham, ngun, suangmanpha, sing, bi, lopa, a nam tuamtuam kilam thei hi. [13] Tua a kilam nate mei tawh a kize-et ding Ni hong tung ding a, tua nasepnate a bangci hiam, ci-in mei in ze-et ding ahih manin a lam mite’ nasep ciat hong kilang ding hi. [14] Mi khat in tua khuamte tungah a lam nate bangmah a cihzawh kei leh a nasep thaman a ngah ding hi. [15] Ahi zongin mi khat in a lam nate a kattum leh amah a sum hi ding hi. Tua nate a lam pa ahihleh meikat nading panin a suakta bang keekin a suakta bek ding hi. [16] Note pen Pasian’ biakinn na hihna uh le note sungah Pasian’ Kha Siangtho a teng ahih lamtak na theihsa uh ahi hi. [17] Mi khatpeuh in Pasian’ biakinn susia leh Pasian in tua mipa susia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ biakinn a siangtho hi a, note zong tua biakinn siangtho na hi uh hi.
[4] Tua bang hinapi-in hih bang thu themthem hong pian ciangin pawlpi sungah bangmahin a kisim lo mite’ mai kitun ding na hi uh hiam?

[17] Tua thu hangin note kiangah, ka it mahmah, Topa thu sungah a citak mahmah, ka tapa Timoti ka hong paisak hi. Amah in, Jesuh Khrih thu sungah ka nuntakna ziate le pawlpi a tuamtuamte kiangah ka thuhilhte khempeuh, note tungah hong hilh ding hi. [18] Note kiangah kei hong hawh lo ding, ci-in ngaihsun kha uh ahih manin mi pawlkhat a kiphasak uh hi.
[4] Note na kikhop khawm uh ciangin i Topa Jesuh Khrih vangliatna in eite hong ompih ahih manin, note tawh ka lungsimin ka hong omkhawm hi.

[1] Note khatlekhat thu na kineih uh ciangin Pasian’ mi siangthote khensakzaw loin lawki thukhente’ mai na kitun ngam uh hi. [2] Pasian’ mite in leitung mite’ thu a khensakzaw ding ahihlam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Note pen leitung mite’ thu a khensak ding na hih uh ciangin tua bang thu neute khen thei lo lawmlawm na hi uh hiam? [3] Eite pen vantung mite’ thu nangawn a khensak ding ihih lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam? Tua ahih manin hih leitung a no’ thu neuneute leltak na khentheih zawk kan ding uh ahi hi. [4] Tua bang hinapi-in hih bang thu themthem hong pian ciangin pawlpi sungah bangmahin a kisim lo mite’ mai kitun ding na hi uh hiam? [5] Note a dingin zumhuai mahmah hi. Note khatlekhat na kithuneihnate uh a khenthei ding note lakah mipil khat beek om buang ding hi. [6] Tua hinapi, khatlekhat thu kineihin zum na kitun uh a, lawki thukhente na khensak tazen uh hi. [7] Note khatlekhat zum na kitut mahmah uh zong a gina het lo na hihna uh hong kilangsak hi. Bang hangin thuakzaw mai lo a, sum ngamzaw mai lo na hi uh hiam? [8] Note khatlekhat kisu-in, khatlekhat na kisut zawsop uh a, na sanggamte teekteek nangawn uh tawh thu na nei uh hi.
[19] Na pumpi uh, Pasian in a hong piak, note’ sungah a teng Kha Siangtho’ biakinn ahih lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam? Note’ pumpi, nomau’ neihsa hi lo a, Pasian a’ ahi hi.

[13] Biakinn-ah nasem dingin a kicial mite in biakinn mah panin an ngah uh a, biakna tau-ah na a semte in biakna sa mah a ngahna uh thei lo na hi uh hiam? [14] Tua mah bangin lungdamna thu a hilhte in tua nasepna mah panin nuntakna a ngah nading uh Topa’ thupiak ahi hi.

[17] Ahi zongin a nuai-a thu tawh kisai-in note ka hong pakta kei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh pawlpi kikhopna na neih uh ciangin phatna sangin siatna na piangsakzaw uh hi. [18] A masa penin, pawlpi na kikhop uh ciangin note lakah pawl kikhenna om hi, ci-in ka za hi. Hih ka zak thu a manna omkha dingin ka um hi. [19] Bang hang hiam cih leh kuateng pawlpi mi citak ahi hiam, ci-in a kilat nadingin kikhenna a ommah ding ahi hi. [20] Nekkhawmna a bawl dingin note na kikhop uh ciangin Topa’ Nekkhawmna a ne dingin na pai kei uh hi. [21] Bang hang hiam cih leh nekkhawmna ne dingin na pai uh ciangin pawlkhatte amau’ an tawh na tung masa-in ne pah uh ahih manin, pawlkhatte a kham mahmahin na om uh hangin pawlkhatte gilkialin a om uh hi. [22] Hih bangin na gamtat uh, anletui na nek nading uh inn nei lo na hi uh hiam? Tua ahih kei leh Pasian’ pawlpi simmawh bawlin pawlpi mizawngte na maizumsak nopna uh ahi hiam? Hih thu tawh kisai-ah hong pakta ding nong sak uhleh note ka hong pakta het kei hi.

[12] Pumpi pen khat bek hinapi-in na a tuamtuam a nei hi. Pumpi in na a tuamtuam tampi a neih hangin pumpi khat bek mah ahih veve mah bangin Khrih zong pumpi na a tuamtuam a nei pumpi khat ahi hi. [13] Jew mi ihi a, Gentail mi ihi zongin, sila ihi a, sila ahi lo ihi zongin, eite minam tuamtuam ihih hangin Kha Siangtho khat bek mah in Jesuh’ pumpi a suak dingin ama sungah hong phum a, eite khempeuh tungah a hong kipia pen tua a kibang Kha Siangtho khat bek mah ahi hi. [14] Pumpi in na khat bek nei loin nam tampi tak a nei hi.

[25] Tua ahih manin i pumpi nate khatlekhat kithutuak lo cih om loin a vekpi-in a kilemkim uh hi. [26] Khat in natna ngah leh a vekpi-un thuakkhawm uh a, khat in pahtakna ngah leh a vekpi-un lungdam khawm uh hi. [27] Tu-in note khempeuh pen Khrih pumpi na hi uh a, na vekpi-un a pumpi na khat ciat na hi uh hi. [28] Tua ahih manin Pasian in pawlpi sungah mi khempeuh ama panmun ciat dingah a hong bulh hi. A masa-in sawltakte, a nihna-ah kamsangte, a thumna-ah laihilhte, tua ciangin nalamdang bawltheite, cina damsak theite, midang a huhtheite, thu vaihawm a siamte, le pau lamdang a pau theite ahi uh hi. [29] A vekpi-un sawltak hi lo a, a vekpi-un kamsang zong hi lo uh hi. A vekpi-un laihilh, thuhilh hi lo uh a, a vekpi-un nalamdang zong bawl lo uh hi. [30] A vekpi-un cina damsak nading siamna nei lo uh a, a vekpi-un pau lamdang pau thei lo uh a, a vekpi-un tua pau lamdangte a khiatna gen thei lo uh hi. [31] Tua ahih manin Pasian’ hong piak siamna a hoihpente deih belin na nei ta un. Tu-in a hoihpen thu khat ka hong gen ding hi.

[16] Na lungsim bek tawh Pasian tungah lungdamna na koh ciangin kikhopna sungah a om midangte in bangci-in nang’ thungetna, “Amen,” hong cihpih thei ding ahi hiam? Nangma thungette a theihtheih nading uh bangmah om lo hi. [17] Pasian tungah lungdam ko-in na thungetna a hoih mahmah hangin midangte in bangmah phattuamna ngah het lo hi.

[26] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, ka hong gennop thu a tomin: Pasian bia dingin note na kikhop uh ciangin khat in la sak ding nei, khat in Pasian’ thu a gen ding nei, khat in pau lamdang tawh thugen ding nei, khat in tua a kigente a khiatna gentheih nading nei cih bangin na om ding uh hi. Hih a tuamtuamte khempeuh, pawlpi’ phattuam nading ahih ding kisam hi.

[32] Pasian in eite ahi zelzul dingin a hong sam hi lo a, hoihtak nuamtakin a om dingin a hong sam ahih manin Pasian’ thu gen ding lawpna lungsim pen a gen ding pa a ki-ukzawh ding a kisam ahi hi. Pasian’ pawlpi mite khempeuh lakah a kizang ngeina ahih mah bangin, [33] Pasian in eite ahi zelzul dingin a hong sam hi lo a, hoihtak nuamtakin a om dingin a hong sam ahih manin Pasian’ thu gen ding lawpna lungsim pen a gen ding pa a ki-ukzawh ding a kisam ahi hi. Pasian’ pawlpi mite khempeuh lakah a kizang ngeina ahih mah bangin, [34] mihon biak kikhopna sungah numeite pau loin om uh hen. Numeite a kiniamkhiat nading thu Jew Thukham in a gen mah bangin amaute in mihon lakah thu a gen ding uh kiphal lo hi.

[19] Tu-in mihing pianzia hong kitel a, tuate pen: Numei tawh mawhna, thangtatna, lanluat mana khialhna, [20] milim biakna, mi bumna, kilangbawlna, kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, kikhenna, pawltuam lungsim neihna, [21] enna, zukhamna le biakna pawi-ah zukhamna a kipan adangdangte ahi hi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian’ Ukna sungah omkha het lo ding hi.

[22] Pasian in Khrih’ khenuai-ah na khempeuh koih a, thu khempeuhah pawlpi’ lutang dingin Khrih a bawl hi. [23] Tua pawlpi pen Khrih’ pumpi hi a, tua pawlpi a dingin amahmah kipia-in, mun khempeuha om pawlpite, thu khempeuhah a cingtaaksak hi.

[14] Khrih mahmah in Gentail mite le Jew mite pawlkhatin hong bawl ahih manin eite tungah nopsakna a hong piapa ahi hi. Hih minam nihte khenin gal a piangsak dalna pen Khrih in ama pumpi tawh a satkham hi. [15] Amah tawh kipawlna hangin minam nihte pawlkhat a suahtheih nadingin minam a dei Jew Thukham le a ngeinate khempeuh phiatin, eite pawlkhat hong suahin a hong kilemsak hi. [16] Singlamteh tungah a sihna tawh Khrih in kilangneihna beisak a, tua singlamteh hangin minam nihte pawlkhat suahin Pasian kiang a tunpih hi.

[19] Tua ahih ciangin no Gentail mite pen a pualam mi, gamdang mite na hi nawn kei uh a, Pasian mite tawh minam khat hita-in, Pasian innkuan sung mite na hita uh hi. [20] Note zong, sawltakte le kamsangte in a phuhsa innkhuam tungah a kilam na hi uh a, tua inn sutpi pen Jesuh mahmah ahi hi. [21] Tua inn sutpi Khrih pen inn-a a kilam khempeuh a puapi pen hi a, Topa a dingin biakinn siangtho a suah dongin tua inn a khangsak hi. [22] Note zong midangte tawh kigawmin ama tungah na kilam uh a, Kha Siangtho-in Pasian a ten nading inn na suak uh hi.

[20] Eite a dingin na a hong sepsak, eite’ ngetzah val, le i ngaihsut zawh loh zah dongin a vangliatna tawh tampi tak a hong hihsak thei [21] eite’ Pasian pen, pawlpi mite khempeuh le Khrih Jesuh tawh a kipawl mi khempeuh in a khang khangin a tawntungin phat ciat ta uh hen. Amen.

[3] Kha Siangtho kimakai sakin, khatlekhat kilemin pawlkhat na hihna uh na kipsak tawntung un. [4] A kibang lametna khat bek a ngahkhawm dingin Pasian in note hong sap mah bangin eite khempeuh pumkhat bek hi-in Kha Siangtho zong khat bek mah a neikhawm ihi hi. [5] Topa khat bek, upna khat bek, tuiphumna khat bek mah a zangkhawm ihi hi. [6] Mi khempeuh’ Pa ahi Pasian khat bek om a, mi khempeuh’ Topa hi-in, na khempeuh hih kimin, mun citengah a om hi.

[11] Amah in mite tungah siamna a tuamtuam hong pia a, pawlkhatte sawltak nasep a sem ding, pawlkhatte kamsang nasep a sem ding, pawlkhatte thuhilh kawikawi nasep a sem ding, pawlkhatte pawlpi kem nasep a sem ding, le pawlkhatte laihilh nasep a sem dingin a hong seh hi. [12] Hih nasep a tuamtuamte khempeuh a sem dingin Pasian’ mi khempeuh kigingkhol sakin Khrih a dingin na semin Khrih pumpi a khansak theihna ding deihna ahi hi.
[25] Tua ahih manin zuau gen nawn kei unla, Khrih pumpi nate ihihna hangin pawlkhat ihih manin khatlekhat tungah thuman kigen ni.

[23] Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih pen ama pumpi ahi pawlpi a honkhia pa hi-in, pawlpi tungah ukna thu a neih mah bangin pasal in a zi tungah ukna thu a nei ahi hi. [24] Pawlpi pen Khrih’ khutnuai ahih mah bangin zite zong thu khempeuhah a pasalte uh khutnuai hi ding uh hi. [25] Pasalte aw, Khrih in pawlpi itin a pumpi a piak mah bangin na zite uh na it un. [26] Pawlpi pen paubaanna a om het lo, a siangtho mahmahin Khrih kiangah a kipiak theih nadingin Pasian thu tawh tui-ah a silsiang khit ciangin Pasian kiangah a aptheih nadingin pawlpi a dingin Khrih a kipia ahi hi.

[29] Eite pen ama pumpi nate ihihna hangin Khrih in hong it mah bangin kuamah in ama pumpi mudah ngei lo a, hoihtakin kemin a vakzaw hi. [30] Eite pen ama pumpi nate ihihna hangin Khrih in hong it mah bangin kuamah in ama pumpi mudah ngei lo a, hoihtakin kemin a vakzaw hi.

[27] Note tawh a omkhawm dingin ka hong paithei a, ka hong paithei kei zongin note in lungdamna thu tawh kipawl upna thu-ah ngimna kikhatin kiptakin na om nading uh le deihna kikhatin na dokhawmna thu uh ka zak theih nadingin Khrih hanga lungdamna thu tawh a kilawm a kituakin na nuntak ding uh a thupi pen ahi hi.

[17] Na khempeuh khat beek a om ma-in amah om khinta a, amah tawh a kipawl manin na khempeuh ama mun sansanah hoihtakin a omthei hi. [18] Na khempeuhah amah a lianpen ahih theih nadingin, amah pen pawlpi ahi ama pumpi lutang hi a, pawlpi’ nuntakna a kipatna hi a, sihna panin a kithokiksak Tapa cil ahi hi.
[24] Tu-in ka pumpi-in ka thuakna tawh Khrih in ama pumpi ahi pawlpi a dingin a thuak ding a kisam laiteng a kitangcingsak suak ka hih manin note a dingin ka thuakna thu-ah ka lung a dam hi.
[5] Bang hang hiam cih leh note tawh ka hong omkhawm loh hangin ka lungsimin note tawh ka hong omkhawm a, Khrih na upna uh hangin kiptakin na omkhawmna uh ka theih manin ka nuam mahmah hi.
[19] lutang ahi Khrih a len nawn lo uh ahi hi. Lutang ahi Khrih’ ukna tawh pumpi na khempeuh kizom dimdiam uh ahih manin pumpi in thahatna ngah a, Pasian’ deih bangin a khangto hi.

[15] Note pumkhat suakin a lungdam khawm dingin Pasian in a hong sap ahih mah bangin Khrih hong piak nopsakna in note’ lungsim hong uk ta hen la, lungdamin om ta un. [16] Khrih thu a cingtakin note lungsimah hong om hen la, pilna tawh khatlekhat thu kihilhin na kitai un. Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Thuciam Lui sunga late, la thakte, le biakna late na sa un.

[1] Mi khatpeuh, pawlpi sia nasep a ut leh a hoih mahmah ahi hi, a cihna thu a man ahi hi. [2] Tua ahih manin siate pen paubaanna a nei lo mi, zi khat bek a nei mi, lungsim hoih hithiat mi, thu a ngaihsun thei mi, a kilawm a kituakin a gamta mi, zin le leengla do a siam mi, thuhilh a siam mi, [3] zu a kham lo mi, a ngongtat lo mi, lungsimnem mi, kitot a uk lo mi, sum a deihlua lo mite hi ding uh hi. [4] A innkuan sung hoihtakin a ukzo mi, a tate thumangsak thei-in, na khempeuhah a kilawm a kituakin a gamtasak thei mi hi ding uh hi. [5] Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khatpeuh in a innkuan sung ukzia ding a theih kei leh Pasian’ pawlpi kem thei lo ding hi. [6] Khristian a suaktungte zong hi lo ding hi. Tua bang mi thakte kiphasak thei a, Dawimangpa mah bangin thukhenna a thuak mite hikha thei ding hi. [7] Pawlpi mi ahi lo midangte in zong a zahtak mite hi ding hi. Tua hileh mindai kha lo ding a, Dawimangpa’ thangah awk kha lo zawdeuh ding hi. [8] Pawlpi upa dingte zong a gamtat hoih, a lungsim citak, leenggahzu tam a ne lo, sum thu-ah a huaiham mi hi lo ding uh hi. [9] Lungsim kisuanna a om lo, upna thu-ah a kip mite hi ding uh hi. [10] A masa-in kize-et phot ding a, paubaanna a om kei leh sem thei pan ding uh hi. [11] A zite uh zong a gamtat hoih mi hi-in, mi gensiat a hat lote hi ding uh a, lungsim citak, thu khempeuhah a thuman mi hi ding uh hi. [12] Upate pen zi khat bek a nei mi, a tate le a innkuansung hoihtakin a ukzote hi ding hi. [13] Pawlpi upa hoihtakin a semthei mite pen mite in zahtak uh a, Khrih Jesuh a upna thu uh kisuanna om hetloin hangtakin gen ngam uh hi.
[14] Kamsangte’ thugennate le upate in na tungah a khut uh nga-in thu hong ngetsakna ahi nangma hihtheih siamnate na valkhongsak kei in.

[17] Pawlpi sungah ukna le makaihna siamin, thuhilh le thugen hahkat tawh a thuah upate pen thaman a zah nih piak dingin kilawm hi. [18] Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho in, “Buh a cil bawngtal muk na tuam kei in,” a cih banah, “Nasempa in a thaman a ngah ding a kilawm ahi hi,” na ci hi.
[5] thuman thutak zui loin, a lungsim paizia uh a man nawn lo, biakna pen hauhtheih nading lampi bekin a ngaihsun mite in a tawntungin kitot kiselna a piangsak uh ahi hi.

[24] Topa’ na a sem mite, kitot a hatte hi lo ding a, mi khempeuh tungah lungsim nemin, thugen siamin, thuakzawhna nei-in, [25] thunem tawh a langte’ hoih lohna a puahtheite hi ding hi. Tua bang hileh Pasian in amaute kisiksak thei ding a, thuman thutak hong thei-in, [26] Dawimangpa in ama deihna bangin a gamta dingin a mat khit hangin ama thang panin amaute suakta khathei ding uh hi.
[5] biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deih lo ding uh hi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in.
[2] hunhoih hunsia cih khen tuan loin Pasian’ thu hilh ding na kin ngaihsut nading, lungduaina tawh mite’ lungsim zo-in, mite taii-in, hanthawnin na hilh nadingin thu a hong pia ka hi hi.

[5] Krete Tuikulh gam sung tengah a manin puahphat ding a kisam lai a omte a sem ding le khua simah pawlpi upa a koih dingin tua gamah a hong nusia ka hi hi. Nang tungah ka hong gensa thute hoihtakin na phawk in: [6] Upate pen paubaanna a om lote hi ding a, zi khat bek nei-in, a tate zong thu um mi hi-in, a thumang lo, a phengtat gawpte hi lo ding uh hi. [7] Pawlpi siate pen Pasian’ nasem ahih manin paubaanna a om lo, a kiphasak lo, zukham thei mi ahi lo, a ngongtat lo, a huaiham lo, [8] zinleleeng do a siam mi, thuhoih a deih mi, a pumpi a ki-ukzo mi, a thutang mi, a siangtho mi, le a kisekzo mi hi ding uh hi. [9] Upna bulpi tawh a kituak thute limtakin lenkip ding uh hi. Tua hileh thuhilhna man tawh midangte hanthawn thei ding uh a, thuman a nial mite’ khialhna zong laktel thei ding uh hi. [10] Bang hang hiam cih leh thu a mang lo, thu a mawk gengen, mi a khem thei, a diakdiakin Jew ngeina bangin vun-at nading thu a gen tampi tak a om uh hi. [11] Sum ngahtheih nading bekin a kilawm lopi-in thu hilhin biakna innkuan buppi nawngkaisak uh ahih manin thu a gen nawn loh nadingun khaktan ding ahi hi.

[10] Kitot, kikhen nading a piangsak mite pen khatvei nihvei bang na hilh khit ciangin kisukha nawn vet kei in. [11] Tua bang mite a kisiakhin hi a, a mawhna un a khialhna uh a kilangsak ahihna thu na thei in.
[25] Mi pawlkhatte in kikhop a pelh bang hi loin, eite in kikhop khawmnate pelh loin om ni. Topa’ hong pai ding Ni hong naina thu thei ihih manin khatlekhat kihanthawn semsemzaw ni.

[17] Na makaite uh thu na mang unla, a genna uh bangin na gamta un. Pasian kiangah amaute in a nasepnate uh a pulak ding uh ahih manin tawlnga loin note hong lunghimawh tawntung uh hi. Amaute’ thu mang le-uhcin a nasepna uhah lungdam mahmah ding uh a, mang kei le-uhcin dah pipi-in na sem ding uh hi. Dah pipi-in a nasepna uh note a dingin zong phattuamna a om tuan hi lo hi.
[14] A cina na om uhleh pawlpi upate sam un. Amaute in thu hong ngetsakin Topa min tawh sathau hong zut ding uh hi.
[22] Tu-in lungdamna thuman na zuihna hangun note kisiansuah khinin, na thu uppih mite uh lungsim tak tawh itthei khinta na hih manun na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh limtakin na ki-it un.
[5] Note zong nuntakna a piathei suangpi mah bangin kha thu tawh kisai biakinn lam nadingin na kizang unla, Jesuh Khrih hangin Pasian’ santheih biaknate a pia dingin a siangtho siampi na suak un.

[1] Keima pumpi mahmah zong pawlpi upa hi-in, Khrih thuakna zong ka mit tawh mu-in, mailam hunah a hong kilang ding minthanna zong a ngah ding pa ka hihna tawh note lakah a om pawlpi upate kiangah ka hong thum nop thu in: [2] Pasian in note’ khut sungah a hong piak tuuhonte hoihtakin na cing unla, ut lo pipi hi loin, Pasian’ hong deih bangin utna lungsim takpi tawh na cing un. Sum ngahnopna bek tawh a sem hi loin utna lungsim tawh a semte na hi un. [3] Note’ kep dingin a hong kipia tuute, aana neihna tawh a cing hi loin tuute’ etteh dingin a gamtate na hi un. [4] Tuucing pipa hong pai ciangin a mual ngei lo minthanna lukhu a hong pia ding hi.

[9] Mi khatpeuh in khuavak gamtatna ka gamta hi, ci napi-in a Khristian mipihte a muhdah leh khuamial gamtatna mah a gamta lai ahi hi. [10] A Khristian mipihte a it mite pen khuavak gamtatna a gamta hi a, tua bang mite a puktheih nading thu om lo hi. [11] Ahi zongin a Khristian mipihte a mudah mite pen khuamial sungah omin khuamial gamtatna a gamta uh hi a, tua khuamial in bangmah ngaihsunsak thei lo ahih manin a gamtat nading mel uh thei lo uh hi.

[15] A Khristian mipih a mudah mi peuhmah mi that hi a, mi thatte in nuntak tawntungna a neih lohna thu na thei uh hi. [16] Itna i cih bangci theih ding ihi hiam cih leh: Khrih in eite a dingin a nuntakna hong pia hi. Ei zong i Khristian mipihte a dingin i nuntakna i piak ngam ding ahi hi.

[20] Mi khatpeuh in, “Pasian ka it hi,” ci napi-in a Khristian mipihte a muhdah le a zuaupi a gen ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a muhtheih a Khristian mipih a it lo mi in a muhtheih loh Pasian it thei lo ding hi. [21] Khrih in eite tungah hong thupiakna in: Pasian a it mi in a Khristian mipihte zong it ding hi, cihna ahi hi.
[19] Hih mite in pawl kikhenna piangsakin, amau pumpi deihna bangin gamta uh a, Kha Siangtho zong nei lo uh hi.
[11] Tua ahih manin zak nading bil a neite in Kha Siangtho in pawlpite kiangah a gen thute na za un. A gualzo mite, nihvei sihna in gimsakkha nawn lo ding hi.

[20] Ahi zongin note ka hong mawhsak nading thu khat om hi. Kamsang numei ka hi, ci-in thu a gen Jezebel na nial kei uh hi. Ama thuhilhna hangin ka nasemte in numei-pasal paktatna gamta-in milim biakna ante a ne uh hi. [21] Tua numei a kisikkik nading hun ka piak hangin a paktatna panin kihei nuam lo hi. [22] Tua ahih manin tu-in tua numei tawh a paktatna uh panin a kisikkik kei uhleh tua numei le amah tawh a paktat mi khempeuh, lupna ngaksakin nakpitakin gimna ka thuaksak ding hi. [23] Tua numei’ thu a zui mi khempeuh ka that ding hi. Tua hileh, mihingte’ ngaihsutna le lungsim a kantel pa ka hihna thu pawlpi khempeuh in thei ding uh hi. Note’ gamtatna ciat tawh kizui-in ka hong thukkik ding hi.
[16] “Keimah Jesuh in pawlpite a dingin hih thute nang kiangah a hong gen dingin ka vantungmi ka hong sawl hi. Kei pen David’ zung le a suan ahi, zingsol ka hi hi,” a hong ci hi.
[7] Tua ahih ciangin amaute in a biak uh keeldawite a dingin amau’ biakpiaknate go nawn lo ding uh hi. Hih pen amau’ khang tawntungin amaute’ tungah ngeina kip khat hi ding hi.
[21] Nangmah in Molek tungah meihal biakna-a piak dingin na tate khat peuhpeuh na pia kei ding a, tua bangin na Pasian’ min na daisak kei ding hi; keimah pen TOPA ka hi hi.

[1] Shittim-ah Israel mite a om laitakin Moab gam numeite tawh paktat ding kipan uh hi. [2] Hih numeite in amau’ pasian biakpiakna pawi-ah Israel mite sam uh a, amaute in a pawi an nekpihin, amau’ pasian-te’ mai-ah kun uh hi. [3] Tua ahih ciangin Peor-a Baal tawh Israel mite va kizomtawm hi. Israel mite tungah TOPA heh mahmah a,
[28] Note in tua lai munah mite’ khut in a bawl, khua mu thei lo, khua za thei lo, a ne thei lo, a nam thei lo sing le suang pasian-te’ na na sem ding uh hi.

[30] na mai uhah amaute a kisuksiat khit ciangin amaute zui-in na awk khak loh nading uh le, ‘Kei zong amau’ hih bangin ka hih theih nadingin hih minamte in a pasian-te uh bangci biak ahi uh hiam?’ ci-in a pasian-te uh thu na kan loh nadingun kingaihsun un.
[17] Amaute in pasian ahi lo dawite, amau’ theih ngei loh pasian-te, hong suak nunung pasian thakte, na pu na pate un a theih ngei loh pasian-te’ tungah biakna a pia uh hi.
[14] Pai unla note’ teel pasian-te tungah ko un. Na lungkham hunun amaute kihonkhia sak un,” a ci hi.
[21] Meetna hong pia thei lo, hong hon thei lo, a mawkna milimte biakna lamah pial kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh tuate pen a mawkna ahi hi.

[1] Tua laitakin TOPA’ sawlna tawh Judah panin Pasian’ mi khat Bethel-ah hong pai hi. Paknamtui hal dingin biakna tau gei-ah Jeroboam na ding hi. [2] Tua ciangin TOPA’ sawlna bangin biakna tau langpangin mipa kiko a, “Biakna tau, biakna tau aw, TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: ‘En in, Josiah min nei tapa khat David’ suan sung pan hong piang ding hi. Amah in nangma tungah paknamtui a hal mualtung a biakna a pia siampite nangma tungah biakna-in pia ding a, nangma tungah mihingte’ guhte kihal ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi. [3] Tua ciangin tua ni mahin amah in lim khat pia a, “Hih pen TOPA in thu a gen khitna lim ahi hi: ‘En in, biakna tau kitam khamin a tunga om vutte kithehthang ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.

[23] Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in amau a dingin mualtung a biaknate, biakna songte le mual sang tung khempeuh le singniim nuai khempeuhah Asherah milimte bawl uh a, [24] biakna phualte-ah numei-pasal paktat pawlte zong om uh hi. TOPA in Israel mite’ mai-ah a hawlkhiat minam dangte’ gamtatna a kihhuai khempeuh bangin amaute gamta uh hi.

[24] Tua ciangin note in na pasian tung uhah thu ngen unla, keimah in zong TOPA’ tungah thu ka ngen ding hi. Tua ciangin thungetna mei tawh hong pia pasian pen Pasian taktak ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in dawngin, “Hih na thugen hoih hi,” a ci uh hi. [25] Tua ciangin Elijah in Baal kamsangte kiangah, “Note tam na hih manun note a dingin bawngtal khat teel unla bawl masa un. Tua ciangin na pasian uh tungah thu ngen unla, ahih hangin a tungah mei koih kei un,” a ci hi. [26] Tua ciangin amaute in amaute tungah a kipia bawngtal la-in bawl uh a, zingsang a kipan sun dong Baal tungah thu ngenin, “Baal aw, kote hong dawng in,” a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin awging om lo a, kuamah in dawng lo hi. Tua ciangin amau’ bawlsa biakna tau-ah amaute diang uh hi. [27] Sun ciangin Elijah in amaute zahpihin, “Amah pen pasian ahih ciangin a gingin kiko un. Amah in thu a lungngaih laitak, ahih kei leh mun dangah paikhia, ahih kei leh khualzin, ahih kei leh amah ihmu-in phot ding kisam hikhathei ding hi,” a ci hi. [28] Tua ciangin amaute a gingin kiko-in, amau’ ngeina bangin namsaute le sikzumte tawh, amaute tungah si a luan dongin ki-atin kisun uh hi. [29] Sunkim khit ciangin biakpiak hun dong mateng amaute awngsuak uh a, ahih hangin awging om lo hi. Kuamah in dawng lo a, kuamah in don lo hi.
[17] Amaute in biakna-in a tanute uh le a tapate uh halin vankahna le aisanna zang uh a, TOPA’ muhna-ah a sia a gamta dingin kipia tawmin amah hehsak uh hi.
[12] Ka pu ka pate in a suksiat minam Gozan, Haran, Rezef, le Telassar gam sunga Eden mite, tua minamte’ pasian-te in amaute honkhiazo ahi hiam?

[5] Tua ciangin amah in TOPA’ biakinn tual nihte sungah vantung nate khempeuh a dingin biakna taute lam hi. [6] Tua ciangin amah in Hinnom’ tapa’ kuamah biakna-in a tapate hal a, aisanna le mailam thugenkholhna le khongkhaina zang a, vankah theite le aisante tawh na semkhawm hi. Amah in TOPA’ muhna-ah siatna tampi bawl a, amah hehsak hi.
[5] A man biakpiaknate lui unla, TOPA muang un.

[37] Amaute in a tapate uh le a tanute uh dawi biakna-in a nei uh hi. [38] Amaute in Kanaan gam milimte a biakna-un mawhna nei lo a tanute uh le a tapate uh that uh a, hih mi thahna hangin gam sung a nin a suak hi. [39] Tua ahih ciangin amau’ sepna tawh amaute a nin suak uh a, amau’ gamtatnate tawh palhngulhna a bawl uh hi.
[8] Tuate a bawlte le tuate a muangte khempeuh pen tuate mah tawh kibang uh hi.

[15] Minam dangte’ pasian-te pen mihingte’ khut tawh a kibawl, ngun le kham ahi hi. [16] Amaute in kam nei napi, pau thei lo uh hi. Amaute in mit nei napi, khua mu thei lo uh hi. [17] Amaute in bil nei napi, khua za thei lo uh hi. Amaute’ kam sungah naksuk naktoh theihna nei lo uh hi.
[12] Ka pu ka pate un a suksiat minamte, Gozan minam, Haran minam, Rezef minamte, le Telassar khua-a om Eden mite pen amau’ pasian-te in honkhiazo ahi hiam?

[5] TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Na pute na pate uh kei kiang panin gamlapi-ah paikhia-in, bangmahin a kimang lo milim peuh bia-in, amau mahmah zong bangmahin a kimang lo a suah khit nadingun kei tungah bang mawhna hong mu uh ahi hiam?

[2] Amaute in a it uh, a na a sepsak uh, a delh uh, a zon uhleh a biak uh ahi ni le kha le vana om nate khempeuh mai-ah a kiphokhia ding hi. Tua guhte kikhawm nawn lo ding a, kiphum nawn lo ding hi. Leilak a ek kinusia bang ahi lel ding hi.

[12] Tua ciangin Judah mite le Jerusalem khuamite in meihal biakna tawh a biak uh a pasian-te uh’ kiangah pai-in a va thum ding uh hi. Ahih hangin hih gimna hong tun ciangin a honkhia thei tuan kei ding uh hi.
[20] Mi in ama pasian ding bawltawm thei ahi hiam? Tuate pasian hi lo hi,” hong ci ding uh hi.

[13] Jerusalem khua-a innte le Judah kumpite’ innte a kipan, innkhum zangah vantung a aksite khempeuh tungah paknamtui hal biakna a kipiakna innte le pasian dangte tungah dawn ding biakna a kibuakna innte khempeuh a vekin Tofeth mun bangin a nin a suak ding hi, ci hi, va ci in,” hong ci hi.

[16] Tua ciangin biakinn tual sungnungah hong paipih hi. Tua lai-ah biakinn kongkhak gei, biakna taute le innliim kikal sanah mihing sawmnih le nga khawng na om a, biakna tau nungngatin nisuahna lam nga-in nisuak tung na bia uh hi.

[16] Na puan pawlkhatte, na biakna mun zep nadingin na zang a, numei paktat bangin mi citeng tungah na pumpi na pia hi. [17] Nang kong piaksa kham le ngun kibawl kizepnate, pasal limin na bawl a, tuate tawh paktatna na gamta hi.

[4] Tua ciangin nakpitakin taangkona khat kibawl a, “Minam tuamtuamte le paunam tuamtuamte khempeuh aw! [5] Peengkul ging na za ding uh a, tua khit ciangin tamngaite, laiza lasakna gingte, harp lasakna gingte, gawsemte, le tumtheih a tuamtuamte a hong kitum ciangin Kumpi Nebukhadnezzar’ koih kham milim mai-ah kunin na bia ding uh hi. [6] A kun lo, a bia lo peuhmah thakhat thu-in mei phualpi sungah kikhul pah ding hi,” a ci hi. [7] Tua mah bangin minam kimte, minam tuamtuamte le paunam tuamtuamte khempeuh in tumtheih gingte a zak phetun kunsukin Kumpi Nebukhadnezzar’ kham milim koih a bia uh hi.

[13] Amaute in mualsangte dawna biakna munte-ah biakna pia uh a, a nuai liim hoih ahih manin mual neute tungah a po tawsaw kung, poplar kung, le terebinth kungte nuai-ah paknamtui halin a bia uh hi. Tua thu hangin na tanute uh numei paktat suak uh a, na mote un midang tawh mawhna a bawl uh hi. [14] Na tanute uh a paktat manin gim ka pia kei ding a, na mote uh midang tawh a mawh manin zong gim ka pia tuan kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh note mahmah numei paktatte tawh na mawh uh a, biakinn numeite tawh nulepa mawhna biakna na bawl uh hi. Paunak-ah, “Thuhoih phawktheihna a nei lo mite in siatna thuak ding hi,” kici hi.
[8] Kimanna a nei lo milim a biate in nangmah hong taisan uh hi.

[1] “Biakna tawh kizomin na hoih khat peuhpeuh na sep uh ciangin mite’ phat ding deihna tawh a kilang theithei dingin na sepkhak loh nadingun na kingaihsun un. Tua bangin gamta le-uhcin, vantungah a om na Pa uh kiang panin thaman na ngah kei ding uh hi.

[33] Mite in a lungsim khempeuh, a pilna khempeuh, le a hatna khempeuh uh tawh Pasian itin, amau pumpi a it bangin a vengte a it ding uh ahi hi. Pasian biak nadingin biakna tau tunga gan gawhnate le biakna dang khempeuh sangin hih thukham nihte zuih ding thupizaw takpi hi,” a ci hi.

[21] Kumpipa in a thugen hun ding a ciamkholh ni a tun ciangin a kumpi puan silhin a kumpi tokhom tungah tu a, mite tungah thu a gen hi. [22] Mite in a thugen a zak uh ciangin, “Hih thugen pen mihing hi loin pasian ahi hi,” ci-in a awng uh hi. [23] Herod in mite, Pasian phatsak loin amah phatsak ahih manin thakhatin Topa’ vantungmi in Herod cinasak a, a hut in amah netumin a si hi.
[29] Eite pen Pasian’ tate ihih manin, mihing khutsiamte in bawlin a zep ngunte, khamte, suang milimte tawh a kibang dingin Pasian i ngaihsun kei ding hi.

[26] Nomau mahmah in hih Paul’ thugen khempeuh za-in na thei uh hi. Amah in mihingte’ bawl pasian-te pen pasian hi het lo hi, ci-in thu hilh a, hih Efesa khua le Asia gam sung khempeuhah mi tampi tak a umsak hi.

[23] A hing tawntung Pasian bia loin, mi, vasa, ganhing, ahih kei leh a bokvak ganhingte tawh a kibang limte a bia zawsop uh hi. [24] Mihingte tua zahta-in hailua uh ahih manin amau ututin a gamtat theih nadingun Pasian in khahkhong vet a, a zumhuai mahmahpi-in a gamta uh hi. [25] Amaute in a man ahi Pasian’ thu um nuam lo uh a, a tawntungin phat dingin a kilawm a Piangsak pa bia loin, Pasian’ bawlsa nate bia-in a zui uh hi. Tu-a bangin hi takpi uh hi.
[20] Ka cihnopna pen, lawkite in gan a gawh uh ciangin dawi a biakna uh hi a, Pasian a biakna uh hi lo hi. Dawi biakna-ah note na kihel ding uh ka hong deih kei hi.

[4] Tua bang mite pen hih leitung pasian gilote in a lungsim mit uh tawsak ahih manin um lo uh a, Pasian tawh a kibang teekteek Khrih minthanna hangin amaute tungah a hong taang lungdamna thu khuavak mu thei lo uh hi.

[16] Pasian’ biakinn le lawkite’ milim bangci kilem theih ding ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in, “Ka mite lakah tengin amaute tawh ka omkhawm ding hi. Kei pen amaute’ Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute, keima mi ahi ding uh hi.
[3] Tua mah bangin eite zong kha thu-ah i neulai hun sungteng huihlak a uk vangneite’ khutnuai-ah a om ihi hi.
[8] A beisa hunah Pasian thei lo na hih manun Pasian ahi lo vangliatna a neite’ sila-in na om uh hi.

[8] Khrih thu tawh a kituak lopi-in, tangthu tuanthu ahi a, huihlak a ukte’ thu siksanin ahi zongin, bangmahin a kimang lo leitung pilna tawh mite’ khemsa-in sila na suahkhak loh nadingun kingaihsun un.

[4] Tua A Gilopa in mite’ biak pasian a kici khempeuh le na khempeuh nialgawp ding hi. Tuate khempeuh sangin a lianzaw-in a kingaihsut banah, Pasian ka hi hi, ci-in Pasian’ biakinn sung mahmahah pai-in va tu ding hi.

[4] Phuahtawm tangthute le min tampipi kizom deudau-a khangsimnate in upna tawh i ngahtheih Pasian’ vaihawmnate tangtungsak loin, khatlekhat kitotna piangsak lel ahih manin, tua bang thute a manlahpih loh nadingun na gen in.

[16] I biakna pen a thuthuk a thulian taktak ahihna thu hih bangin i thei hi: Mihing lim pua-in amah hong kilang a, a man taktak ahihna thu Kha Siangtho in kilangsak a, vantung mite in a mu uh hi. Mi khempeuh tungah ama thu kihilh a, mun khempeuhah ama thu ki-umin, vantungah amah kilato hi.
[5] thuman thutak zui loin, a lungsim paizia uh a man nawn lo, biakna pen hauhtheih nading lampi bekin a ngaihsun mite in a tawntungin kitot kiselna a piangsak uh ahi hi.

[5] biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deih lo ding uh hi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in. [6] Tua bang mite pawlkhat, mite inn-ah va hawh khiankhianin, deihna nam tuamtuam le mawhna lungsim tawh a kidim numeite na thuzawh uh hi.

[26] Mi khatpeuh in Khristian ka hi hi, ci napi-in kampau a kidopzawh kei leh amahmah a kikhemtawm hi lel a, ama biakna neih a mawkna ahi hi. [27] Pa Pasian in a siangtho biakna citakin a ngaihsut thu in: Tagahte le meigong numeite a haksatna uhah hoihtakin kemin, leitung siatnate tawh kisawhkha loin siangtho takin omna ahi hi.

[16] Lai a hong gelhna sungah a thugente tu-ate mah a gennuam ahi hi. A laigelhna sungah a telhak thu tampi om a, theihna kicing loin lungsim kip lo mi pawlkhatte in Lai Siangtho sung thu a ututun a kawihei uh bangin Paul’ thugente zong a man lopi-in khia uh ahih manin siatna a tuaklawh uh hi.

[20] Hih gimna tawh a si lo midangte pen amau’ gamtatnasa panin kikhelkik nuam lo uh hi. Dawi a biaknate uh, khua a mu thei lo, khua a za thei lo, lam a pai thei lo ngun, kham, sumngo, suang, le sing a kibawl milim a biakte uh khawl tuan lo uh hi. [21] A mi thahna, a aisanna, a paktatna, le a guktaknate uh zong khawl tuan lo uh hi.
[4] Gulpi in tua ganhing tungah ama aana pia ahih manin mite in tua gulpi a bia uh hi. A ganhing zong bia uh a, “Hih ganhing tawh a kibang kua om a, kua in amah suzo ding ahi hiam?” ci uh hi.
[8] Tua ahih manin a kigo Tuuno laibu sungah a nungta ding mite’ min, leitung pianma pekin a kikhumna-ah a kihel lo leitung mi khempeuh in tua ganhing bia ding uh hi.
[4] Abel in a tuuhon tacilte le a sa limcite paipih hi. TOPA in Abel le ama piakna thusim a, [5] ahih hangin Kain le ama piakna thusim lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin Kain heh mahmah a, a mai sia hi.
[2] Amah in, “Na it, na tapa neihsun Isaac, la inla Moriah gamah pai in. Tua lai mun a nang kiangah kong gen ding mual khat tungah meihal biakpiakna-in amah hong pia in,” a ci hi.

[9] Puanbukah Moses a tum ciangin meii khuam hong kum sukin puanbuk kongkhakah ding a, TOPA in Moses hopih hi. [10] Puanbuk kongkhakah meii khuam a ding a muh uh ciangin a milipin a puanbuk kong ciat uhah mi khempeuh dingto-in kun uh hi.

[1] Tu-in Aaron’ tapate Nadab le Abihu in amau’ paknamtui beel tuak la-in, a sungah mei koih uh a, a tungah paknamtui koihin, TOPA in amau’ tungah tua banga thu a piak ngei loh a siang lo mei, TOPA’ mai-ah a pia uh hi.

[3] Ahih hangin siangtho munah Aaron hong pai ding zia in: Khialhna hanga biak nadingin bawngtalno khat le meihal biak nadingin tuutal khat hong paipih ding hi. [4] “Amah in a siangtho saihadial puantungsilh silhin, saihadial pheituam teengin, saihadial kawnggak tawh kigakin, saihadial dialpi khim ding hi. Hihte pen a siangtho puan ahi hi. Amah in tui sungah a pumpi sil ding a, tua ciangin tua puante silh ding hi.
[5] TOPA note’ Pasian, na lungsim khempeuh uh, na nuntakna khempeuh uh, le na thahatna khempeuh uh tawh na it ding uh hi.

[5] TOPA na Pasian un na minam khempeuh uh sung panin ama min koih nadingin teelin, ama omna dinga a bawlna mun na zong ding uh hi. [6] Tua lai-ah na pai ding uh a, na meihal biaknate uh le na biakpiaknate uh, note in na piak uh sawm-ah-khat le na piak thuahte uh, thuciamna biakpiakna, utthu-a na piakna, na bawnghon tacilte uh le na tuuhon tacilte uh tua lai-ah na paipih ding uh hi. [7] TOPA na Pasian uh mai tua lai munah na ne ding uh a, TOPA na Pasian un note thupha hong piakna hangin na hihna khempeuh uhah note le na innkuanpihte na lungdam ding uh hi.

[22] Tua ciangin Samuel in, “ TOPA in meihal biaknate le biakpiaknate TOPA’ thu man’ ding zahin deih ahi hiam? En in, biakpiakna sangin thu man’ ding hoihzaw a, tuutal thaute sangin thu ngaih ding hoihzaw hi.

[20] Tua ciangin David leilak panin tho-in kisil a, sathau nilhin a puante khek a, TOPA’ inn-ah pai-in Pasian a bia hi. Tua ciangin ama inn-ah ciah hi. An a nget ciangin amaute in a mai-ah lui uh a, amah in a ne hi.

[30] Tua ciangin Elijah in mi khempeuh kiangah, “Ka kiang nai-ah hong pai un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh ama kiang nai-ah hong pai uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in TOPA’ biakna tau a kisupaisa khat puahkik hi. [31] “Israel, nangma min hi ding hi,” ci-in TOPA’ thu a tunna Jakob’ tapa minam sawm le nihte tawh kizui-in Elijah in suangtum sawm le nih la hi. [32] Tua ciangin tua suangte tawh TOPA’ minin biakna tau khat lam hi. Amah in khaici lawh nih a tazo dingin a lian hawklam khat biakna tau kimkotah bawl hi. [33] Tua ciangin amah in a ngeina bangin a sing koih a, a bawngtal semnenin a sing tungah koih hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Beel li sungah tui dim unla, meihal biakna tau tung le a sing tungah sung un,” a ci hi. [34] Tua ciangin amah in, “A nihveina hih un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in a nihveina hih uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “A thumveina hih un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in a thumveina hih leuleu uh hi. [35] Tua ciangin biakna tau kimkotah tui luang a, a hawklam zong tui tawh kidim hi. [36] Biakpiak hun ciangin kamsang Elijah a nai-ah hong pai-in, “Abraham, Isaac, le Israel Pasian, TOPA aw, nang pen Israel sungah Pasian na hihna, le kei pen nangma nasem ka hihna, le hih nate khempeuh nangma thu tawh ka hihna thu tuni-in kitheisak in. [37] TOPA aw, nangmah Pasian na hihna le amaute’ lungsim na heikikna thu hih mite in a theih nadingin hong dawng in, TOPA aw, hong dawng in,” a ci hi. [38] Tua ciangin TOPA’ meikuang hong kia a, a meihal biakna, a sing, a suangte, le a leivui kangtumin, hawklam sunga om tui nangawn kangcip hi. [39] Mi khempeuh in tua thu a muh uh ciangin a mai uh leilam ngatin puk uh hi. Amaute in, “ TOPA pen Pasian ahi hi; TOPA pen Pasian ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.

[23] Leitung mi khempeuh aw, TOPA la sak un! A ni ni-in ama hotkhiatna thu gengen un. [24] Minam dangte lakah ama minthanna genkhia unla, a lamdang ama septe mi khempeuh lakah gen un! [25] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA lian mahmah a, nakpitakin phat ding ahi hi; pasian khempeuh sangin lamdang sakzawk ding ahi hi. [26] Bang hang hiam cih leh minam dangte’ pasian-te milim hi lel a, ahih hangin TOPA ahihleh vantungte a bawlpa ahi hi. [27] Pahtawina le minliatna in amah umcih a, thahatna le lungdamna in amah kimkot hi. [28] Leitung mi khempeuh aw, TOPA theitel unla, TOPA’ minthanna le a thahatna theitel un! [29] Amah in a ngah ding a kilawm minthanna TOPA’ tungah pia un. Biakna puak unla, ama mai-ah pai un! Biakna puan silhin TOPA bia un. [30] Leitung mi khempeuh aw, ama mai-ah ling un; hi hi, leitung kip mahmah a, kilok ngei lo ding hi. [31] Vantung kipak hen la, leitung lungdam ta hen; minam khempeuhte lakah, “ TOPA maang hi!” amaute in ci ta uh hen.

[37] Tua ahih ciangin David in nisima a kisam bangin Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah na a sem tawntung dingin Asaf le a Levi mipihte TOPA’ Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah nusia a, [38] Obededom le a behte sawmguk le giatte zong a nusia hi. Jeduthun’ tapa Obededom le Hosah-te pen kongpi cing dingte ahi uh hi. [39] Tua ciangin amah in TOPA’ thukham sungah a kigelh ama thupiak khempeuh bangin, zingsang le nitakin meihal biakna tau tungah TOPA a dingin meihal biaknate a pia tawntung dingin, Gibeon-a om mual dawna TOPA’ biakbuk mai-ah siampi Zadok le a sanggam siampite a nusia hi. [40] Tua ciangin amah in TOPA’ thukham sungah a kigelh ama thupiak khempeuh bangin, zingsang le nitakin meihal biakna tau tungah TOPA a dingin meihal biaknate a pia tawntung dingin, Gibeon-a om mual dawna TOPA’ biakbuk mai-ah siampi Zadok le a sanggam siampite a nusia hi. [41] Tuate’ banah amaute tawh Heman le Jeduthun zong om a, ama itna kip kho tawntung ahih manin TOPA’ tungah lungdamna a ko dingin a kiteel, a minin a kilokhia midang omlai hi. [42] Heman le Jeduthun inla aw dingin peengkulte le daltuahte nei uh a, biakna lasak nadingin lasakna nate nei uh hi. Jeduthun’ tapate kulhkongpi cing dingin kiseh hi.

[6] Nang bek TOPA na hi hi. Nangmah in a sang pen vantung le vana om khempeuh, leitung le a tunga om khempeuh, le tuipi le a sunga om khempeuh na bawl hi. Nangmah in tuate khempeuh na omsak a, vantung mihonpi in nang hong bia uh hi.
[5] A man biakpiaknate lui unla, TOPA muang un.

[3] TOPA’ mual tungah kuate kahto ding ahi hiam? Ama mun siangtho-ah kuate ding ding ahi hiam? [4] Gamtat siangtho le lungsim siangtho a nei, a man lo thu-ah a nuntakna pia loin, khemna tawh a kiciam lo mite ahi hi.
[2] Ama minthanna TOPA’ tungah pia unla, a siangtho kizepna tawh TOPA bia un.

[6] Gan gawh biakna le khawhsa tawh biakna na deih kei a, khua ka zak theih nading bil na hong guan hi. Meihal biakna le mawhmaina ding biakna zong na kulsak kei hi. [7] Tua ciangin keimah in, “En in, laibu sungah keima thu a kigelh khinsa bangin ka hong pai hi. [8] Nangma deih bang hihna-ah nuam ka sa hi, ka Pasian aw. Nangma thukham ka lung sungah om hi,” ka ci hi.
[17] Pasian’ san theih biakna pen lungsim kitamzan ahi hi. Pasian aw, a kitamzan, a kisik lungsim na simmawh kei ding hi.
[4] Leitung mi khempeuh in nangmah hong bia uh hi. Amaute in nangmah phatna la hong sak uh a, nangma minphatna la hong sak uh hi,” ci-in gen un.
[6] Hong pai un, amah bia-in kun ni. Eite hong Bawl TOPA’ mai-ah khukdin ni.

[8] Ama min in a ngah dingin a kilawm minthanna TOPA’ tungah pia unla, biakpiakna hong kengin ama huang sungah hong pai un. [9] Puan siangtho silhin TOPA bia un. Leitung mi khempeuh aw, ama mai-ah ling un.
[5] I TOPA Pasian phat unla, ama khengakna munah bia un. Amah siangtho hi.

[11] TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Note’ biakpiakna a tampite pen kei’ tungah bang hi leltak ahi hiam? Tuutalte le ganhing thaute’ sathau tawh meihal biaknate ka kham ta hi. Bawngtalte, tuunote, le keelte’ si tawh kei ka lungkim kei hi. [12] Kei’ mai-ah a kilaak dingin na hong pai uh ciangin hih bangin ka huangsung na tuatcil gawpna uh kua’n hong deih ding ahi hiam? [13] Bangmahin a kimang lo piaknate hong paipih nawn kei un. Paknamtui halna ka kih hi. Khadet ni, Sabbath ni, le thupi takin na kikhopnate uh mawhna tawh kidim ahih manin ke’n ka thuakzo kei hi. [14] Note’ Khadet nite le na pawite uh ka mudah hi. Tuate pen kei a dingin vangikpi khat suakkhin a, tuate khempeuh ka puakna-in ka gim hi. [15] “Thungenin na khutte uh nong zaak uh ciangin note kong en kei ding a, thu tampi na nget uh hangin ke’n ka ngai tuan kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh sisan tawh note’ khut kidim hi. [16] Note kisil tawm unla, a siangtho-in kibawl un. Keima muhna-ah na gamtat siatnate uh paikhia-in, siatna na bawlte uh khawl un. [17] Gamtat hoih ding kisin un. Thumanin gamta unla, kinetniamna kheel un. Pa nei lote hu unla, meigong numei panpih un,” ci hi.

[6] Kei’ deih antanna hih bang pawl ahi hi: Gitlohna khaute phelin, hakkol savun khaute phel a, a kinengniam mite khahkhia-in thuman lohna hakkol khempeuh suktan ding ahi hi. [7] Na an uh a gilkialte tawh nekhawm unla, inn nei lo a zawngte na innsung uhah paipihin, tangguakin a om mite puan silhsakin, na mipihte uh kiang panin bu lo ding hi lo na hi uh hiam? [8] Tua ciangin ka maipha pen phalvaktung hong bang ding a, note’ tungah hong taangkhia ding hi. Manlang takin na liammate uh hong dam ding hi. Note hong ompih tawntungin note kong hon ding a, na nung na mai uhah ka hong dal ding hi. [9] Tua ciangin nong thungetna uh ka hong pia ding a, nong sap uh ciangin ka hong dawng ding hi. Mi bawlsiatnate khawlin, mi simmawhna le kam gilo na paunate uh na khawl uh a, [10] gilkial mite an pia-in, kisapna a nei mite tungah a kisapnate na piak uhleh na kimkot uha khuamial pen khuavak hong suak ding a, na lungzinna uh nitaang hong bang ding hi. [11] Tua ciangin note lam kong lak tawntung ding a, na hoihte tawh kong lungkimsak ding hi. A cidam a thahatin kong omsak ding hi. Tui tampi a ngah tawntung huan, a kang ngei lo ciktui tawh na kibang ding uh hi. [12] Tanglai-in a kisia na munte uh na lamkik ding uh a, khang tampi sung a kisia bulpite na dingtosakkik ding uh hi. Note pen a sia a puahkik, ten nadingin mun siate a ngei a bangsakkikte hong kici ding hi. [13] Note in Sabbath siangtho sakin, keima ni siangtho ni-in na nasepna panun khawlin Sabbath ni pen deihhuai sa-in, TOPA’ ni siangtho pen pahtawihuai na cih uh a, note in pahtawi-in note’ deih bang zui loin, note’ ut bang hi loin motpau loin na om uhleh, [14] keimah biakna hangin lungdamna na ngah ding uh a, leitung khempeuhah pahtawina kong ngahsak ding hi. Na pu uh Jakob tungah ka piak leitang luahin nuam na sa ding uh hi. TOPA ahi keimah in hih thu ka gen khin hi, a ci hi.

[16] Shadrak, Meshak, le Abednego-te in Kumpi Nebukhadnezzar kiangah, “Kumpipa aw, hih thu kong dawng kei ding uh hi. [17] Mei phualpi sung panin a hong honkhia thei pasian a om leh ka biak ka Pasian uh hi ding a, na khutsung panin a hong honkhia ding hi. [18] Kumpipa aw, a hong hotkhiat kei zenzen leh zong, na pasian lah ka bia tuan kei ding uh a, na kham milim mai-ah zong ka kun kei ding uh hi, ci-in theita in,” a ci uh hi.

[28] Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Shadrak, Meshak, le Abednego-te’ Pasian phat un. Amah in a vantung mite sawl a, amah a muang ama nasem hih mite a honkhia hi. Amaute in ka thupiakna mang loin, amau’ Pasian longal pasian dang’ mai-ah kun nuam lo, bia nuam lo uh ahih manin mei phualpi sungah khul ding a utzaw uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[6] Vantung Pasian, TOPA biak nadingin bang va keng ding ka hi hiam? Amah biakna-in hal dingin bawngno thaute va paipih ding ka hi hiam? [7] TOPA kiangah tuu a tul tulin va puakin, guntui bangin sathau va luangsak leng, tuate tawh amah lungdam ding ahi hiam? Ka mawhnate maisak nadingin ka ta upa pen tawh va bia ding ka hi hiam? [8] Mun khempeuhah a om no mihingte aw, TOPA in a hoih nate hong gen khinzo hi. TOPA in note tung panin hong kalh thu in: Thuman thutang sem ding a, itna kip nei tawntungin, kiniamkhiatna tawh Pasian’ thu man’ ding ahi hi.

[13] Note in, ‘Hihte cimtak khin hang,’ ci-in nong nap nitsan lel uh hi. Keimah biak nadingin a kigu ganhing khatpeuh ahi a, a liam a bai, ahih kei leh a cina peuh nong paipih uh hi. Tua bangte, a sang dingin hong ngaihsun na hi uh hiam?

[11] Inn sungah amaute lut uh a, naungek le a nu Mary a mu uh hi. Amaute khukdinin tua naungek a biak khit uh ciangin a vanpuakte uh suahkhia uh a, kham, saledi paknamtui, le myrrh paknamtuite, letsongin a pia uh hi.
[8] Lungsim takpi tawh Pasian a zong mite in Pasian mu ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.

[23] Tua ahih manin Pasian tungah biakna a pia dingin biakna tau mai-ah na om laitakin na sanggamte khat peuhpeuh na tungah a lungkim lohna thu na phawk leh, [24] Pasian na biak nading nate, a biakna tau mai-ah nusia photin, pai-in na sanggampa tawh va kilem phot inla, tua khit ciangin hong paikikin Pasian biakna pia in.

[7] Na tungthamun mihoih a kineihkhem mite aw, Isaiah in note’ thu a genna man mahmah hi. Tua a genna-ah, [8] ‘Hih mite in a kampi bek uh tawh kei hong zahtak bawl uh a, ahi zongin a lungsim taktak uh kei tawh kigamla hi. [9] Mihingte’ bawltawm thukhamte, Pasian’ thukham zahin mite tungah hilh uh ahih manin kei hong biak hangun a kimanna om lo hi,’ ci hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[37] Jesuh in, “Na Topa Pasian na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, le na pilna khempeuh tawh na it ding hi, cihna ahi hi.

[6] Jesuh in amaute dawng a, “A tungthama a hoihin a kilangkhem note’ thu, Isaiah in a genkholhna man mahmah hi. Ama genna-ah, ‘Pasian in hih bangin gen hi: Hih mite in a kampi bek uh tawh kei hong zahtakbawl uh a, a lungsim taktak uh kei tawh kigamla hi. [7] Mihingte’ bawltawm thukhamte, Pasian’ thukham zahin mite tungah hilh uh ahih manin, kei hong biak hangun a kimanna om lo hi,’ ci hi.
[30] Na Topa Pasian uh, na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na pilna khempeuh, le na thahatna khempeuh uh tawh na it un, a cihna ahi hi.

[27] Amah in, “Na Topa Pasian na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na hatna khempeuh, le na pilna khempeuh tawh na it inla, nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in,” ci-in kigelh hi, ci-in a dawng hi.

[21] Jesuh in, “Lawm aw, hih ka thugen ding hong um in: Mite in hih mualtung hitaleh Jerusalem hitaleh ah Pa Pasian a biak nawn loh hun hong tung ding hi. [22] No Samaria mite in na theih taktak lohpi uh na bia uh a, ahi zongin ko Jew mite tungtawnin hotkhiatna thu hong pai ahih manin kote in ka theih uh a bia ka hi uh hi. [23] Ahi zongin Pasian a bia taktakte in Pasian’ Kha’ lamlahna le thuman tak tawh a biak hun hong tung ding a, tu-in zong a hong tung khinta ahi hi. Pa Pasian in tu-a bangin amah i biak ding a hong deih ahi hi. [24] Pasian pen Kha ahi hi; amah a biate in tua Kha’ lamlahna le thuman taktak tawh a bia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[2] Amaute in an tangin Pasian bia-in a om laitakun Kha Siangtho in amaute kiangah, “Keima na a sem dingin ka sapsa ahih manin kei a dingin Barnabas le Saul hong piakhia un,” a ci hi.

[1] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Pasian in eite tam veipi tak hong hehpih ahih manin ama lungkim nading le ama nasep nadingin nomau mahmah a hingtangin Pasian tungah na kipiak nadingun ka hong thum hi. Tua banga kipiakna pen Pasian biakna man taktak ahi hi.

[26] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, ka hong gennop thu a tomin: Pasian bia dingin note na kikhop uh ciangin khat in la sak ding nei, khat in Pasian’ thu a gen ding nei, khat in pau lamdang tawh thugen ding nei, khat in tua a kigente a khiatna gentheih nading nei cih bangin na om ding uh hi. Hih a tuamtuamte khempeuh, pawlpi’ phattuam nading ahih ding kisam hi.
[40] Na khempeuh a kilawm a kituakin na hih un.

[52] Peengkul nunung hong gin’ ciangin mitphiat kikal sungin i kikhelpak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh peengkul hong gin’ ciangin misite a sithei nawn lo dingin hong tho ding a, i vekpi-in i kikheel ding hi.

[20] Tua ahih manin tuhuna ka nuntakna zia pen kei hang hi nawn loin ka sungah a hong om Khrih hang ahi hi. Tua hi a, keimah hong itin, keima a dingin a nuntakna a hong pia Pasian’ Tapa ka muanna tawh tu laitakin a nungta ka hi hi.

[2] Thu haksa na tuah uh ciangin khatlekhat na kihuh un. Tua hileh Khrih’ thukham a zui na hi uh hi. [3] Mi khatpeuh, bangmah hi lo napi-in amah a kithupi ngaihsut mawkmawk leh amah le amah a kikhem ahi hi.
[11] Khuamial gamtatna, bangmahin a kimang lo nasepnate su vet kei unla, tua bang gamtatnate a hoih lohna pholak zaw un.

[9] Hih thu hangin Pasian in a lianpenin amah koih a, min lian dang khempeuh sangin a min lianzaw-in a koih hi. [10] Tua ahih manin vantung, leitung, leinuai-a om mi khempeuh in Jesuh pahtawi-in khukdin ding uh a, [11] Jesuh Khrih in Topa ahi hi, ci-in taangko-in Pa Pasian a min thangsak ding uh hi.

[3] Bang hang hiam cih leh eite in Kha Siangtho’ hong huhna tawh Pasian bia-in, Jesuh Khrih tawh i kipawl manin lungdamin, a tung lama kilang vun-atna limte muanin nei lo ihih manin, amaute hi loin, eite pen vun-atna man taktak a zang mite ihi zaw hi.

[18] Note’ hong piak nate kicing piikpeek hi. Epafroditas in note’ hong na khakte hong tunpih ahih manin ka kitangsapna khempeuh kicingkim hi. Hih nate pen Pasian biakna-in na piak uh, lungdam takin a hong san, a namtui nate ahi hi.

[23] Hih bang gamtatnate pen a tungthamin i et ciangin limtakin biaknopna lungsim a piangsak ding, kiniamkhiatna a piangsak ding, pumpi ki-ukzawhna a piangsak ding tawh kibang hi. Ahi zongin a taktakin hihte khat beek in pumpi ki-ukzawhna piangsak zo lo hi.
[10] biakna lungsim neite a dingin a kilawm ahih mah bangin gamtat hoih a neih ding uh ka deih hi.

[6] Pasian biakna hangin a neihsateng tawh a lungkim mite pen biakna in mihau a suaksak takpi mah ahi hi. [7] A taktakin ci lehang, leitungah mihingin i suah laitakin sumlepai tawh i suak kei a, i sih ciangin zong leitung panin bangmah i keng thei tuan kei hi. [8] Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn, nikten puansilh i neih nakleh a phazo ahi hi. [9] Ahi zongin a haunuam mite in ze-etna a tuamtuam thuak a, duhhopna, huaihamna a haivai thute-ah awkcipin, haksatna le siatna a tuahlawh uh hi.

[1] Jew Thukham pen mailam hunah a taktak a hong tung ding lim lahkholhna hi bek ahih manin tua Thukham tawh kizui-in a kum a kumin a kipia biakpiakna in Pasian kiang a zuan mite mi cingtaak suahzo ngei lo hi.

[22] Tua ahih manin mawhna thu-ah kisuanna lungsim om nawn loin, tui siangtho tawh i pumpi a kisawpsa-in muanna le lungsim takpi tawh Pasian kiang zuan ni. [23] Pasian in piak dingin a hong ciam thu muangngam ihih manin i lametna thu kiptakin len ni.

[4] A upna hang mah tawh Abel in Kain’ piakna sangin a santheih huaizaw biakpiakna Pasian’ tungah a na pia hi. Pasian in ama biakna na sang ahih manin a upna hangin mihoih hi, ci-in Pasian’ pahtakna a na ngah hi. Abel a sihzawh a sawtpi hikhin napi-in tu dong mahin upna thu a hong gengen lai a suak hi.

[28] Tua ahih manin a kilingsak zo lo Pasian’ gam i ngah manin lungdamin, zahtakna le lamdangsakna tawh Pasian’ lungkimna bangin amah bia ni. [29] Bang hang hiam cih leh eite’ Pasian pen a kangtum thei meikuang tawh a kibang ahi hi.
[15] Tua ahih manin Jesuh tungtawnin amah i biakna-in i kam tawh ama min pulakin Pasian phat tawntung ni.
[27] Pa Pasian in a siangtho biakna citakin a ngaihsut thu in: Tagahte le meigong numeite a haksatna uhah hoihtakin kemin, leitung siatnate tawh kisawhkha loin siangtho takin omna ahi hi.
[8] Pasian kiang nai un. Amah in zong hong nai ding hi. Mawhneite in na khut uh silsiang unla, a kineihkhemte in na lungsim uh siangsak un.
[9] Khrih’ thuhilhna zui loin a khengvalin a pai mite pen Pasian tawh a kipawl lo ahi hi. Ahi zongin a thuhilhna a zuite pen Pa Pasian le a Tapa tawh a kipawl ahi uh hi.
[7] Amah nakpitakin kiko a, “Amah in mihingte thu a khen ding hun hong tungta ahih manin Pasian kihta unla amah phat un. Van le lei, tuinak le tuipite a bawlpa hong bia ta un,” a ci hi.
[23] Bang hang hiam cih leh Jakob mite a kibum nading om lo a, Israel mite’ langkhatah aisan ding om lo hi. Tu-in Israel-te tawh kisai-in, ‘Pasian’ sepna en un,’ kici ding hi.

[10] Note lakah a tanu ahi a, a tapa ahi zongin biakna-in a zang, ai a saan, khong a khai, mailam thu a gen, ai a tawi, [11] bum a zang, van a kah, sikhate tawh a kiho, sikha thu a dong kuamah na om kei ding uh hi. [12] Bang hang hiam cih leh hihte a hih mi peuhmah TOPA a dingin a kihhuai ahi hi. Hih bang a kihhuai gamtatnate hangin note’ mai panin TOPA na Pasian un amaute hawlkhia hi.
[3] mi sawmnga a ukpa le zalian a nei pa, thu lamlak pa le mitphial siampa, le bum siamte a lakhia hi.

[9] Aisan siamnate le mibum siamna vang lianpi na neih hangin ta khuaisuahna le meigonna, hih thu nihte thakhat thu-in ni khat sungin a kicing takin nangma tungah hong tung veve ding hi. [10] Na gitlohna-ah nang na lungmuang a, “Kuamah in kei hong mu kei hi,” na ci hi. Na pilna le na theihnate in lam hong pialsak a, na lungsim sungah, “Keimah hi’ng, kei simloh midang om kei,” na ci hi. [11] Ahih hangin nangmah in na beisak theih loh lungkhamna na tungah hong tung ding a, nangmah in maisakna na ngah theih loh gimna nang tungah hong tung ding hi. A thu na theih hetloh siatna na tungah hong tungvat ding hi. [12] Na neulai a kipan na sep na mibumna le na aisannate ah kiptakin om in. Phattuamna na ngah kha ding a, mite na lausakzo kha ding hi.
[2] Tua ahih ciangin bang mang man cih a hilh dingin mitphial siamte, mibum theite, le khongkhai siamte a samsak hi.
[4] Nineveh khuapi in a paktatna hangin gim thuak hi. Ngaihbaang mel pua-in bum siamna nei a, minamte zolin a khem hi.

[19] Tu-in mihing pianzia hong kitel a, tuate pen: Numei tawh mawhna, thangtatna, lanluat mana khialhna, [20] milim biakna, mi bumna, kilangbawlna, kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, kikhenna, pawltuam lungsim neihna, [21] enna, zukhamna le biakna pawi-ah zukhamna a kipan adangdangte ahi hi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian’ Ukna sungah omkha het lo ding hi.
[17] Tua ciangin Abraham in Pasian’ tungah thu ngen a, Pasian in Abimelek a damsak hi. Amaute in ta a neih theih nadingin a zi le a sila numeite zong a damsak hi.

[26] “Note in TOPA na Pasian uh thu limtakin na ngaih uh a, ama mai-ah a man nate hihin, ama thupiakte don a, ama ngeina kipte khempeuh na zuih uhleh, Egypt mite’ tungah ka tunsak natnate khat beek note’ tungah kong tungsak kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen TOPA, note hong damsak pa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
[12] “ TOPA na Pasian un note hong piak leitang tungah na khan uh a sau theih nadingin na nu le na pa uh zahtak un.

[39] Tua ahih ciangin tunga om vantung hitaleh nuai-a om leitung hitaleh ah TOPA pen Pasian ahihna thu tuni-in thei unla, na lungsim uhah ciamteh un; kuamah dang om lo hi. [40] Tua ahih ciangin note le note’ khita na tate uh tungah thu hong nuamin, TOPA na Pasian un a tawntung a hong piak gam sungah na khan uh na sausak theih nadingun tuni-a no kiangah kong gen ahi ama thukhamte le a thupiakte na zui ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[16] “‘ TOPA note’ Pasian in hong piak leitang tungah na khan uh sau-in na nopsak theih nadingun TOPA note’ Pasian in hong thupiak bangin na nu na pa uh zahtak un.

[14] Midangte khempeuh sangin note thupha hong kilim piakzaw ding hi. Note’ lak hitaleh na ganhingte uh lak hitaleh ah a nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a ciing om lo ding hi. [15] TOPA in note’ tung panin natna khempeuh lakhia ding hi. Note in na theihsa uh ahi Egypt gam a natna siate note’ tungah khat zong hong tung lo ding a, ahih hangin no hong mudahte khempeuh tungah tuate tungsak ding hi.

[6] “Vasabu khat, sing tung ahi a, leilakah ahi zongin, a no ahi a, a tui ahi zongin omin, a pi in a no a ompih ahi a, a op ahi zongin na muh khak zenzen uhleh, a pi pen a no tawh na la khawm kei ding uh hi. [7] A pi na khah ding uh a, a no na la thei ding uh hi. Hih bang gamtatna pen na nopsak nading uh, sauveipi na nuntak theih nading uh ahi hi.
[21] Kum sawmli tawntung gamlakah amaute na vak a, amaute in bangmah tangsapna nei lo uh hi. A puante uh zong sialo a, a khe uh zong bawk beek lo hi.
[2] TOPA ka Pasian aw, huhna a hong ngenin nang tungah kong awng a, kei na hong damsak khin hi.
[12] Nopna a neih theih nadingin nuntakna le khansau a deih kua ahi hiam?
[19] Thuman mi’ thuakna a tam mahmah hangin tuate khempeuh panin TOPA in amah a hon hi.

[2] TOPA in amaute hu-in hingsak ding a, leitungah amaute thupha ngah mi kici ding hi. Amau’ galte’ khut sungah amaute pia lo ding hi. [3] A ci uh a nat ciangin TOPA in amaute kem ding a, a cinatna khempeuh uh damsakkik ding hi.

[3] Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in thangsiah pa’ thangzak le a lauhuai pulnatna panin nang hong honkhia ding hi. [4] Amah in a khate tawh nang hong tuam ding a, ama khate’ nuai-ah bukna ding na mu ding hi. Ama thumanna in nang hong dalin hong hu ding hi.

[3] Amah in ka mawhna khempeuh hong maisak a, ka natna khempeuh hong damsak hi. [4] Hankhuk tung ding kimlai hong suaktasak a, itna le hehpihna tampi hong pia hi. [5] Muvanlai bangin ka tha a hat theih nadingin thupha namkim hong pia hi.
[37] Tua ciangin amah in ngun le kham tawh Israel-te paikhiatpih a, amaute a vekpi-in cidamin thahat kim uh hi.

[19] Tua ciangin amaute in a lungkhamna uhah TOPA ko uh a, amau’ cihmawhna panin amah in a honkhia hi. [20] Amah in thu vaikhakin amaute damsak a, siatna ding panin amaute a honkhia hi. [21] Ama itna kip le mihing tate tungah a lamdang a nasepnate hangin amaute in TOPA tungah lungdamna ko ta uh hen.
[17] Kei ka si kei ding a, ka hing ding hi. TOPA’ sepnate ka gengen ding hi.
[3] Amah in lungsim kitamte damsak a, amau’ meimate a tuamsak hi.
[1] Ka ta aw, kong thuhilhte mangngilh kei inla, kong thugente phawk tawntung in. [2] Kong thuhilhte in na khan hong sausak ding a, hong daupaisak ding hi.
[7] Nangmah a pilin kingaihsun tawm kei inla, TOPA zahtakin a sia peel in. [8] Tua hileh nang a dingin damna zatui tawh kibang ding a, na meimate hong damsakin na natnate hong daisak ding hi.

[20] Ka ta aw, ka thugente don inla, ka kammalte ngai in. [21] Na kiang panin paikhiasak kei inla, na lungsimah ciamteh in. [22] Bang hang hiam cih leh tua thu a zuite in nuntakna le cidamna-in a nei uh hi.
[27] TOPA zahtakna in khan sausak a, migilote khansih hi.
[30] Midikte a khansau a, migilote khansih hi.
[24] Kam khum pen khuaizu bang hi a, i kamah khum a, i pumpi a dingin zong hoih mahmah hi.
[22] Maitaina in ci damsak a, maigum tawntungna in guhtui teepkang hi.
[23] TOPA a zahtakte a khansau a, lungkim takin nuamsa-in om uh a, siatna bangmah tuak kha lo uh hi.
[17] Mawhnei mite engkha kei inla, TOPA zahtakna zom paisuak in. [18] Tua bang hi lecin lametna om a, cithei-in na khansau ding hi.
[10] nang hong ompih ka hih manin lau kei in. Na Pasian ka hih manin lungkia kei in. Nang hong thakhauhsakin ka hong huh ding a, nang hong huhin ka hong honkhia ding hi.

[4] “Amah in eite’ natna teng thuakin, eite’ gimna teng pua khin taktak hi. Ahi zongin eite in amah pen ama mawhna hangin Pasian in a gimsak, gimna a thuak bangin i ngaihsun hi. [5] Ahih hangin eite’ khialhna hangin amah kiliamsak a, eite’ mawhna hangin amah kisatnim hi. Ama gim thuakna hangin nopna i ngah a, ama liamna hangin damna i ngah hi.
[19] Nopsakna, nopsakna, a gamla le a nai mi khempeuh tungah om tahen. Keimah in amaute ka damsak ding hi, TOPA in ci hi.

[8] Tua ciangin ka maipha pen phalvaktung hong bang ding a, note’ tungah hong taangkhia ding hi. Manlang takin na liammate uh hong dam ding hi. Note hong ompih tawntungin note kong hon ding a, na nung na mai uhah ka hong dal ding hi.
[14] TOPA aw, hong damsak lecin ka natna teng bei ding a, hong honkhia lecin kei ka suakta ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang pen ka hong phatpa na hi hi.

[17] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in kong cihin-ah, na galte un note, pampaih mi pawl, hong ci-in, ‘Kuama don loh Zion na hi hi,’ hong cih uh hangin note kong cidamsakkik ding a, na liammate uh ka damsak ding hi.
[6] Ahih hangin tu-in, keimah in hih khuapi ka damsak ding a, cidamin ka omsak ding hi. A mite cidamsakin hauhna le lungmuanna a kicing ka lak ding hi.

Gimna na thuak hun ding uh ni sawm sung bek hi ding hi. Na sih dongun kei tungah hong citak un. Tua hileh nuntakna lukhu ka hong pia ding hi.
