[24] Ahi zongin Thiatira khua-a om note pawlkhat in tua numei’ thuhilhna hoih lote na zui kei uh a, mite in, ‘Satan’ thu thukpite hi,’ a cih thute na sukha kei uh hi. Note tungah vangik bangmah ka hong suan kei ding hi.
[9] Jew mi hi lo napi-in Jew mi hi ung, ci-in zuau a gen Satan’ pawlte, note’ mai-ah hong paisakin na khephung uhah ka boksak ding a, note ka hong itna thu amaute ka theisak ding hi.

[3] Tua ciangin lim lamdang adang khat mah vanah hong kilang leuleu hi. Gulpi san a lian mahmah khat om a, lutang sagih le ki sawm nei a, a lutang sagihte-ah lukhu mah nei ciat hi. [4] A mei tawh vanah a om aksi sehsawmsuah sehkhat vatkhia-in leilak a denna hi. A nau a suah phetin a ne pah dingin nausuak dingin a kithawi tua numei’ mai-ah a ding hi.

[7] Tu-in vantungah galkidona hong om a, Mikhael le a vantung mite in gulpi le a vantung mite a do uh hi. [8] Ahi zongin tua gulpi guallel ahih manin tua gulpi le a vantung mite, vantungah ki-om sak nawn lo hi. [9] Tua ciangin tua tanglai gulpi, Dawimangpa ahih kei leh Satan a kici, leitung mi khempeuh a khem pa pen a vantung mite tawh leitungah kilawnsuk hi. [10] Tua ciangin vantungah nakpitakin awging khat ka za a, “Tu-in Pasian in hong honkhia khinta a, kumpi vangliatna a neihna hong lakkhia khinta a, ama Khrih in aana a neihna thu lakkhia khinta hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a sun a zanin eite’ Pasian’ mai-ah dingin i sanggamte mawhsakna a gen tawntungpa, tu-in vantung panin kilawnkhia khinta hi.

[1] Tua ciangin vantung panin vantungmi khat hong paisukin, kuahawm thukpi honna tawhtang le sikkhau khainiang golpi khat a tawi ka mu hi. [2] Amah in tanglai gulpi, Dawimangpa ahih kei leh Satan zong a kici pa manin kum tulkhat sung a hencip hi. [3] Tua ciangin kuahawm thukpi sungah khiasuk a, kum tulkhat a cin mateng minam tuamtuamte a khemtheih nawn loh nadingin a tawh kalhin a ciamteh hi. Kum tulkhat a cinkhit ciangin tawlkhat sung a kikhah ding ahi hi.

[7] Kum tulkhat a cin ciangin a thongkiatna panin Satan kikhah ding a, [8] Gog le Magog a kici leitung gam khempeuhah a om minam khempeuh a khem dingin kuankhia ding hi. Satan in a galsimpih dingin tuipi gei-a sehnel zahin a tam mihonpi kaikhawm ding hi. [9] Leitung khempeuhah amaute pai uh a, Pasian’ mi siangtho omna mun le Pasian in a it khuapi umcih uh hi. Ahi zongin vantung panin meikuang hong paisukin amaute a kangtum hi. [10] Amaute a khem Satan pen ganhing le kamsang zuau pa a omna mun, kat a kikhulna meiphualpi sungah kilawn a, a sun a zanin tua lai munah amaute in gimna a thuak tawntung ding uh ahi hi.
[6] Tua ahih ciangin singkung a hoihna, mi a pilsak dingin tua a gah a deihhuaina a muh ciangin, a singgah loin a ne hi. Amah in singgah kimkhat a pasal pia a, a pasal in zong a ne hi.
[1] Satan in Israel mite gimsak nuam ahih manin Israel mi phazah a sim dingin David hanthawn hi.
[34] Amah in a kihtakhuai ganhing a kihisak pente nangawn nuai-et lai a, amah pen gamsa khempeuh’ kumpi ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[20] Tua ciangin note in, “ TOPA in note hong hilh thute ngai un. Aisante’ thu ngai kei un. Amaute’ hong gen thute a kimanna om lo hi,” ci-in dawng un.
[12] “Nang Khuavak’ ta, Zingsol, Babylon kumpipa aw, vantung panin nang bangci kiat na hi hiam? Minamte a niam koihpa ahi nangmah leilak dongah hong bangci kiphukpai ahi hiam?

[36] “Syria kumpipa a ut bangbangin a gamta ding hi. Amah in, pasian-te sangin ka lianzaw a, a Lianpen Pasian sangin zong ka thupizaw lai hi, ci-in a kisathei ding hi. Pasian in amah gim a piak mateng tua bangin a om ding hi. [37] Kumpipa in a pu a pate’ biak pasian le numeite in a it pasian a thusim kei ding hi. Pasian a kici peuhmah khat beek a thusim kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tuate sangin amah a lianzaw-in a kingaihsun hi. [38] Tua pasian-te sangin kulhpi a dal pasian a thupisim zaw ding hi. Amah in kham, ngun, suangmanpha, le a thupi letsongte, a pu a pate’ biak ngei loh pasian kiangah a pia ding hi. [39] Amah in a kulhpi a ciang dingin pasian dang a biate a sawl ding hi. Amah in amah kumpi-in a sang mite minphatna, zaliatna pia-in, leitang nangawn letsongin a pia ding hi.

[19] Mi pawlkhat in Pasian’ hong ukna tawh kisai a lungdamhuai thu za napi-in a thu theitel lo uh ahih manin Dawimangpa hong pai-in amau lungsim sunga a kivawh thu a lakkhiatsak hi. Hih bangte pen lolai lampi dung a tu khaicite tawh kibang hi.

[38] Lolai pen leitung hi a, taangci hoih i cih pen Pasian’ ukna sungah a om mite ahi uh hi. Tahumte pen Gilopa tawh a kipawl mite hi a, [39] tahum tang a vawh gal pa pen Dawimangpa ahi hi. Anlak hun pen leitung bei nading hun hi a, anla nasemte pen vantung mite ahi hi.
[41] “Tua ciangin a veilamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Pasian in a samsiat mite aw, keima kiang panin paikhia unla, Dawimangpa le a nungzuite a dingin a kibawl meikuang tawntung sungah pai un.
[18] Tua mah bangin Satan ukna sunga om mite zong khatlekhat kido le-uh a ukna bangci kip ding ahi hiam? Kei pen, Beelzebul’ vangliatna tawh dawi hawlkhia hi, nong ci uh hi.
[16] Tua mah bangin Satan in Abraham’ suante khat ahi hih numei pen kum sawm le giat sung hencip hi. Hih a kihencipna panin Sabbath ni-in hih numei khahkhiat ding kilawm hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
[70] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Note na sawm le nih mahun ka hong teel hinapi-in khat pen dawi na suakmawk uh hi,” a ci hi.
[41] Note pen na pa uh gamtat bangin a gamta na hi uh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, “Kote pen zawlta ka hi kei uh a, ka Pa uh Pasian ahi hi,” a cih uh ciangin

[44] Note pen na pa uh Dawimangpa’ tate na hi uh a, na pa uh deihna bangin a gamta nuam na hi uh hi. A kipat a kipanin na pa uh mi that hi a, thuman gen ngei lo ahih manin thuman tawh kipawl thei lo hi. Amah pen zuauna khempeuh a pianna a zuaugen pa ahih manin zuau a gen ciangin ama ngeina hi lel hi.
[2] Jesuh le a nungzuite nitak an ne-in a tukhawm uh hi. Tua hun laitakin dawimangpa in Simon Iskariot’ tapa Judas’ lungsim sungah Jesuh lehhek nading ngaihsutna koih khinzo hi.
[3] Peter in, “Ananias aw, bang hangin Satan’ thu-in gamta a, na lo zuak man sumte pawlkhat kem simin, Kha Siangtho khem na hi hiam?

[38] Nazareth khuami Jesuh tungah Pasian in Kha Siangtho le vangliatna pia a, Pasian in a ompihna hangin tua Jesuh in a paina khempeuhah na hoih semin, Dawimangpa in a gimsak mite khempeuh a damsakna thu zong na thei uh hi.
[10] “Dawimangpa tawh a kibang mipa aw, thuhoih khempeuh nialin, gitlohna ngian tuamtuam na nei a, Topa’ thuman pen zuau suahsak ding na hanciam tawntung hi.

[18] Pasian’ teel mite’ omna mun a amau om nading mun sanah hong om theih nadingun keimah hong upna uh tawh a mawhna uh a kimaisak theihna dingin Satan’ khutsung panin Pasian’ khut sungah a heikhia ding le khuamial panin khuavak lamah hei-in a mit uh khua a musak ding pa na hi hi,’ a hong ci hi.
[6] Mawhna khutnuai-ah eite i om nawn loh nadingin mawhnopna lungsim i neihnateng i sucip a, singlamteh tungah Khrih a sih laitak mahin i ngeina luiteng a sisak khawm ihihna thu i thei hi.

[16] Mi khatpeuh’ thu a mang dingin ama khut sungah na kipiak uh ciangin a thu na mante uh’ sila na hi uh hi. Mawhna na bawl uhleh sihna a thuak ding na hi uh a, thumangin na om uhleh Pasian tawh pawlkhat a suak ding na hi uh hi.
[11] Mawhna maisak kei lehang Satan in nuamtaksa-in eite tungah hong gualzo kha ding ahih manin mawhna a maisak ihi hi. Satan’ nasepna zia a thei lo ihi kei hi.

[4] Tua bang mite pen hih leitung pasian gilote in a lungsim mit uh tawsak ahih manin um lo uh a, Pasian tawh a kibang teekteek Khrih minthanna hangin amaute tungah a hong taang lungdamna thu khuavak mu thei lo uh hi.
[3] Ahi zongin gulpi in ama zuau ngian tawh Eve a khemzawh bangin na lungsim uh kihei-in Khrih tungah na kipiaknate uh na nusiatkhak ding uh ka lunghimawh hi.

[1] A beisa hunah na thuman lohna uh le na mawhna uh hangin kha thu tawh kisai-ah a si na hi uh hi. [2] Tuahun lai-in leitung gitloh gamtatnate na zui uh a, Pasian thu a um lo mite sungah tu laitakin na a sem, huihlak a ukte’ thu na mang uh hi. [3] A taktakin eite khempeuh zong amaute mah i bang ngei a, i pianpih lungsim zui-in nungta-in, i pumpi le i lungsim deihna bangin i gamta hi. Tua ahih manin eite khempeuh zong Pasian’ hehna hangin gim a thuak dingte ihi hi.

[5] Tua ahih manin ka thuakzawh nawn loh ciangin note’ upna zia a thei dingin Timoti ka hong sawl hi. Dawimangpa’ ze-etna in note hong puksakkha-in, kote’ nasepna a mawkna suakkha ding hi, ci-in ka lunghimawh uh hi.
[3] Ahi zongin kuama khemsa-in ta kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh nakpitakin Pasian langpanna lianpi le hell khuksung a tung ding ahi A Gilopa hong kilat matengin tua Ni hong tung lo ding hi.

[14] Tua ahih manin, i langte’ hong gensiat nading a om loh nadingin, a khangno lai meigong numeite in pasal nei-in, ta nei-in, amau innkuansung ukin a om ding uh ka deihzaw hi. [15] Bang hang hiam cih leh meigong numei pawlkhat, Satan’ nung a zui dingin kipan khinta uh hi.
[26] Dawimangpa in ama deihna bangin a gamta dingin a mat khit hangin ama thang panin amaute suakta khathei ding uh hi.
[14] Mi khatpeuh in ama deihna zui-in a gamtat ciangin mawhna a piangsak ahi hi. [15] Lungsim utna a gol semsem ciangin mawhna hong piang a, mawhna hong cingtaak ciangin sihna hong piang hi.

[1] Mite lakah kamsang man lo a omngei mah bangin note lakah sia man lo hong om ding hi. Siatna a piangsak thei thuhilhna a man lo hong lutpih simin, amaute mahmah a tankhia Topa nangawn nial ding uh hi. Tua ahih manin thakhat thu-in siatna thuaklawh ding uh hi.

[8] A kipat cil a kipanin Dawimangpa in mawhna bawl tawntung ahih manin mawhna a bawl mi khempeuhte zong Dawimangpa’ mi ahi hi. Hih Dawimangpa’ nasepna a beisak dingin Pasian’ Tapa a hong pai hi. [9] Pasian’ tate in mawhna bawlbawl lo uh hi. Pasian’ tate hi a, Pasian’ lungsim paii uh ahih manin mawhna zong bawl nuam lo uh hi. [10] Hih pen Pasian tate le Dawimangpa’ tate a kilamdanna ahi hi. A manin gamta loin, a Khristian mipihte a it lo mi peuhmah, Pasian’ tate hi lo uh hi. [11] A kipat cil a kipanin na zak tawntung uh thu pen khatlekhat i ki-it nading thu ahi hi. [12] Dawimangpa’ mi ahi, a naupa mahmah a that Kain bang kei ni. Kain a gamtatna man lo a, a naupa’ gamtatna man ahih manin Kain in a naupa a that ahi hi.

[4] Ka it tate aw, note, Pasian’ mite na hi uh a, tua bang kamsang kineihkhemte a zokhin na hi uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung mite a panpih dawimangpa sangin note hong ompih Pasian vanglian zaw hi.
[19] Leitung midang khempeuh Dawimangpa’ khut sungah a om ahi zongin eite pen Pasian’ mi ihihna thu i thei hi.

[9] Jew mi hi lo napi-in Jew mi hi ung, ci-in zuau a gen Satan’ pawlte, note’ mai-ah hong paisakin na khephung uhah ka boksak ding a, note ka hong itna thu amaute ka theisak ding hi. [10] Note in lungduai takin na thuak nading uh ka hong thupiakna zui na hih manun leitung a a om mi khempeuh ze-et nadingin leitung bupah a hong tung ding lungkhamna panin kei zong note ka hong suaktasak ding hi.

[12] Tua ahih manin vantungte le tuate sungah a teng mi khempeuh aw, lungdam un! Ahi zongin vantung panin Dawimangpa hong kilawnkhia suk a, hun tomno bek a neilai ahihlam thei ahih manin leitung le tui tungah a omte a dingin lauhuai mahmah ding hi,” hong ci hi.
[8] Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, le zuaugente om nading mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[26] Tua ciangin Pasian in, “Eima lim, eimah hong sunin mihing bawl ni. Tuipi ngasate tung, huihlak vasate tung, ganhingte tung, le leitung a a bokvakte khempeuh tungah ukna neisak ni,” a ci hi. [27] Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ama lim bangin mihing piangsakin, Pasian’ lim bangin amah a piangsak hi. Amah in pasal le numei a piangsak hi.

[11] Egypt gam a tum ding ciangin amah in a zi Sarai’ kiangah, “Nang pen nupi melhoih khat na hihna ka thei hi. [12] Egypt mite in nang hong muh ciangin amaute in, ‘Hih nu ama zi hi,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in kei hong that ding uh a, ahi zongin amaute in nang hong nungtasak ding uh hi.
[23] TOPA in ama kiangah, “Na gil sungah mi nam nih om a, nang’ sung pan a suak mihing nihte kikhen ding hi. Khat pen a khat sangin hat zaw ding a, a uzaw in a nauzaw’ na sem ding hi,” a ci hi.
[28] Isaac in Esau’ sa matsa nene ahih manin Esau mah itzaw a, ahi zongin Rebekah in Jakob itzaw hi.

[6] Rebekah in a tapa Jakob kiangah, “Na sanggampa Esau’ tungah na pa’ thugen ka za a, [7] ‘Ka sih ma-in TOPA’ mai-ah nang thupha kong piak theih nadingin ka nek dingin na sa matsa hong paipih inla, kei a dingin an lim hong bawl in,’ ci hi. [8] Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka ta aw, kong thupiak bangin gamta in. [9] Ama duh bangin na pa a dingin an lim ka bawl theih nadingin keelhon lakah va pai inla keelno a hoih nih hong paipih in. [10] Na pa in a sih ma-in nang thupha hong piak theih nadingin a nek dingin na pa kiangah na va paipih ding hi,” a ci hi.

[3] Tu-in Israel in a ta dangte khat peuhpeuh sangin Josef itzaw hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a teek khitin a neih a tapa ahi hi. Amah in ama a dingin puantualpi bansau khat a bawlsak hi. [4] Ahih hangin a pa un a sanggamte khempeuh sangin amah a itzawkna a sanggamte in a muh uh ciangin, amaute in Josef mudah uh a, nuamtakin amah hopih thei lo uh hi.

[20] Kote in ka topa uh kiangah, ‘Kote in a teek pa khat le a teek zawhin a neih sanggam pasal moilai khat ka nei uh hi. Ama sanggampa si a, a nu’ tate sung pan amah bek omlai hi. A pa in amah it mahmah hi,’ kong ci uh hi.

[9] Amah in a mipihte kiangah, “En un, Israel mite eite a dingin tam lua-in thahat lua uh hi. [10] Amaute hong tam kha ding uh ahih manin ngaihsut siamna tawh amaute hih ni. Eite tungah gal hong om leh amaute in i galte pawlin eite hong do-in hih gam panin taikhia kha ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[21] “Khualmi khatpeuh na bawlsia kei ding uh a, na nengniam kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note zong Egypt leitangah khual mite na hi ngei uh hi.
[3] Ama thu neihna-ah mizawng pa na langneih kei ding uh hi.

[14] Note in bilngongte phuisam loin, mittawte’ mai-ah a puk theih nading na na koih kei ding uh a, note in na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uh hi; kei pen TOPA ka hi hi. [15] “Note in thukhenna-ah thu a tang loin na khen kei ding uh hi. Mizawngte langgen loin, a liante’ thu zui loin, thumanna tawh na vengte uh thu na khen ding uh hi.

[33] “Na gam sung uhah note lakah khualmi khat hong peem leh, ama tungah a man loin na gamta kei ding uh hi. [34] Note lakah a hong peem khualmite tualsung mi mah bangin na ngaihsun ding uh a, nomau mah bangin amaute na it ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh note pen Egypt gam sungah khualmi na hi ngei uh hi; kei pen TOPA na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
[39] “Na gei-a om na sanggampa zawngin, nangma tungah amahmah hong kizuak leh, sila bangin na na semsak kei ding hi.

[1] Moses in Kush numei khat tenpih ahih manin, ama tenpih Kush numei’ hangin Miriam le Aaron in amah gensia-in, [2] “ TOPA in Moses’ tung bek tawnin thu gen ahi hiam? Eite’ tung zong tawnin hong gen hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. TOPA in tua thu a za hi.

[16] “Tua hun laitakin na thukhente uh ka thuhilh a, ‘Na sanggamte uh thu neihte za unla, mi khat le a sanggampa ahi a, amah tawh a om khualmipa tawh ahi zongin thu a mantakin khen un. [17] Thukhenna-ah angvan na nei kei ding uh hi. A neu le a liante a kibangin a thu na ngai ding uh a, maitang zahtak tuam na nei kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh thukhenna pen Pasian-a’ ahi hi. Note a dingin a haksa lua thute kei kiangah nong paipih ding uh a, keimah in tua thu ka za ding hi,’ ka ci hi.
[19] Thutang na heikhia kei ding uh a, angvan tuam na nei kei ding uh hi. Sumgolh in mipilte’ mit tawsakin thumante’ thu heikhia ahih manin sumgolh na la kei ding uh hi.

[15] “Mi khat in zi nih nei a, khat itin a khat mudah a, a it leh a muhdah a zi tegel in ta nei tuakin, tapa a neih cil pen a muhdah nu tawh a neih ahihleh, [16] a tapate tungah gamhluah dingin ama neihsa a hawm ciangin, a muhdah nu’ tapa cil sangin deihzawkna hangin a it nu’ tapa pen a ta cil-in bawl thei lo ding hi.

[7] “Mi khat in Israel mi a sanggamte khat gu-in, amah in sila bangin a bawl ahi a, a zuak ahi zongin a kimuh leh, tua guta pa kithat ding hi. Tua bangin note’ lak panin siatna na siangsak ding uh hi.

[5] Amah in Hannah a it hangin TOPA in amah ta neisak lo ahih manin Hannah tungah tanh khat bek a pia hi. [6] TOPA in amah ta neisak lo ahih manin amah a el a zipih in amah nakpitakin phin zel, hehsak zel hi.

[27] Ahih hangin bangmah a man lo mi pawlkhat in, “Hih mipa in eite hong bangci hotkhiat zawh ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Amaute in amah simmawhin ama kiangah letsong puak lo uh hi. Ahih hangin amah in tua mite bangmah cih lo hi.

[8] Saul heh mahmah a, hih thugenna in amah lungkim lo sak hi. Amah in, “Amaute in David tungah a tul sawmin pia-in, kei tungah a tulin hong pia bek uh hi. Kumpi min puak cih simloh bang dang nei nawn ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. [9] Tua ni a kipan Saul in David encik hi.

[10] Tua ciangin Nabal in David’ nasemte dawngin, “David kua ahi hiam? Jessi’ tapa kua ahi hiam? Tulai-in a tote kiang panin a taikhia nasem tampi om hi. [11] Ka anlum le ka tui le ka gan mul meette a dingin ka gawh ka sate la-in koilai panin hong pai cih ka theih loh mite tungah pia ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

[6] thukhente tungah, “Note in mi a’ ding hi loin TOPA a dingin a khen na hih manun na hih dingte uh limtakin ngaihsun un; thukhenna na piak laitakun note kiangah amah hong om hi. [7] Tu-in note in TOPA zahtak unla, na hihnate uhah kingaihsun un. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA i Pasian in thuman heikhiatna, mi deidanna, le sumgolh laknate deih lo hi,” a ci hi.
[3] Mite in hih thukham a zak uh ciangin Israel mite lak panin gamdang suan peuhmah khenkhia uh hi.
[16] Thukhen zumah amah samin hong pai hita mah leh zong ka thumna hong ngai dingin ka um tuan kei hi.

[15] Ka khialh phetin gim nong pia pah a, ka gamtat hoih ciangin zong nong pakta tuan kei hi. Mindaina le maizumna tawh kei ka kidim hi. [16] Mavanna khatpeuh neisun leng zong, humpinelkai bangin ka siatna ding na zong a, kei’ gimtheih nadingin nalamdang tuamtuam nangawn na bawl liang hi. [17] Kei a hong langpang dingin teci na nei tawntung a, keima tungah na hehna hong khang semsem a, kei nong sukna ding thuthak na mu tawntung hi.
[19] Pasian pen mi khempeuh a hong piangsak pa hi a, amah in uliante panpih tuan nei lo a, mizawngte sangin mihaute thupi ngaihsutzaw tuan lo hi.
[2] “Note in bang tanvei a man loin thu khenin, migilote tungah angvanna zang ding na hi uh hiam?
[2] A hau a zawng a kilamdanna om lo a, a nih tuakun TOPA’ bawlsa ahi uh hi.

[23] Mipil dangte in zong hih bangin thu gen uh hi: Mi lang muhin thukhenna hoih lo hi. [24] Mimawh kimlai a diksak thukhen pa leitung a mi khempeuh in mudahin phuisam ding hi. [25] A mawh mi gim a pia thukhen pa ahihleh thupha kipia-in daupai ding hi.
[21] Mi langbawlna hoih lo a, ahi zongin letsong neucik khat hangin thukhente gamta khial thei zel hi.
[13] Mizawng pa le mi bawlsia pa a kibatna uh khat om hi. TOPA in a nih tuakun mittang guan hi.
[6] Ka vom manin hong en neu kei un. Nisa ka thuakna hang ahi hi. Ka ute in kei hong gawtbawl uh a, lo hong kuansaksak uh a, ka pumpi ka don man kei hi.
[17] Gamtat hoih ding kisin un. Thumanin gamta unla, kinetniamna kheel un. Pa nei lote hu unla, meigong numei panpih un,” ci hi.

[11] A masa pen gun a min Pishon hi a, kham a omna, Havilah gambup kimkotah a luang pen ahi hi. [12] Tua gam a khamte hoih hi. Tua munah bedolak singnai le onik suang om hi. [13] A nihna gun min Gihon hi a, Kush gam kimkotah a luang pen ahi hi. [14] Assiria gam nisuahna lamah a luang a thumna gun min Hiddekel ahi hi. A lina gun pen Eufratis gun ahi hi. [15] TOPA Pasian in mipa la-in, Eden huan kho-in a kem dingin a koih hi. [16] TOPA Pasian in mipa thu pia a, “Na ut utin huan sung singkung gah khempeuh na ne thei ding hi. [17] Ahih hangin a pha le a sia theihna singkung gah pen na ne kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua na nek ni-in na si ding hi,” a ci hi.
[25] Mipa le a zi a guaktangin om uh a, maizum lo uh hi.
[23] Tua ahih ciangin TOPA Pasian in, amah a kipiansakna leitang a kho dingin Eden Huan panin mipa a sawlkhia hi.
[16] Tua ciangin TOPA’ omna panin Kain paikhia-in Eden nisuahna lam Nod gam sungah a teng hi.

[10] Lot zong khuadak a, Jordan gun kuam mun khempeuh in limtakin tui ngahin TOPA’ huan hitaleh, Zoar lama Egypt gam tawh hitaleh kibang hi, ci-in mu hi. Hih pen TOPA in Sodom le Gomorrah a suksiat hun ma ahi hi.
[12] Ka pu ka pate in a suksiat minam Gozan, Haran, Rezef, le Telassar gam sunga Eden mite, tua minamte’ pasian-te in amaute honkhiazo ahi hiam?

[12] Tua ciangin Levi mite, Kohath’ beh sung panin Amasai’ tapa Mahath, le Azariah’ tapa Joel; Merari’ beh sung panin Abdi’ tapa Kish, le Jehallelel’ tapa Azariah; Gershon beh sung panin Zimmah’ tapa Joah, le Joah’ tapa Eden;

[15] Eden, Miniamin, Jeshua, Shemaiah, Amariah, le Shekaniah-te in siampite’ khuapi sungah a moi a ham a kibangin a khen khenin, a ngah ding ciat a sanggamte uh tungah a hawm dingin cihtakna tawh amah huh uh hi.
[12] Ka pu ka pate un a suksiat minamte, Gozan minam, Haran minam, Rezef minamte, le Telassar khua-a om Eden mite pen amau’ pasian-te in honkhiazo ahi hiam?

[3] “Tu-in Zion ka hehnem ding hi. A kisia ama munte khempeuh puahpha-in, ama gamlakte Eden huansung ka bangsak ding a, ama sehnel gamte TOPA’ huan ka bangsak ding hi. Ama sungah lungdamna le kipahna, lungdamkohna le lasakna awging om ding hi.

[11] Tua ciangin note lam kong lak tawntung ding a, na hoihte tawh kong lungkimsak ding hi. A cidam a thahatin kong omsak ding hi. Tui tampi a ngah tawntung huan, a kang ngei lo ciktui tawh na kibang ding uh hi.
[26] Zuauthu tawh thu hilh a, a phuahtawm uh thu a hilh kamsangte’ lungsim sungah zuauthu bang tanvei tenglai ding ahi hiam?

[12] Amaute hong pai-in Zion mual tungah ngaihtakin la sa ding uh a, TOPA’ hehpihna ahi, buh, leenggahzu, sathau le tuuno, bawngnote’ hangin amaute a lungdam mahmah ding uh hi. A nuntakna uh, tui a kibuak huan bang ding a, lungkham nawn lo ding uh hi.
[23] Haran, Kanneh, Eden, Asshur, le Khilmad khuapite in zong nang tawh sumlei sumzuakna-ah kizopna hong nei uh hi.

[13] Pasian’ Eden huan sungah nang na teng a, suangmanpha nam khempeuh tawh na kizem hi. Karnelian, topaz, le jasper, khrisolait, beryl, le onik, sapfaia, karbankel, le emerald suangmanphate, nangma kizepna hi a, kham tawh kibawl kizepna tampi tak zong na nei lai hi. Hihte khempeuh nangma a dingin na suah ni-in a hong kibawlsak ahi hi. [14] Sathau a kinilh kherub-te nang ka hong cingsak a, ka mual siangtho tungah nang na teng a, a tee zaizai suangmanphate lakah na vak kawikawi hi.
[9] A melhoihin ka bawl a, a hiang ka zausak hi. Pasian’ huan sunga a po singkung khempeuhte’ enin ka bawl hi.

[16] Misite’ omna Leinuai khua-ah tua singkung ka khiatsuk ciangin, a kiatna ging in minam khempeuh lokgawp ding hi. Tua singkung a kiat manin Eden singkung khempeuh, le a hoihpen, limtakin tui a ngah Lebanon singkungte khempeuh in zong Leinuai-ah nuamtuam na sa ding uh hi. [17] Bang hang hiam cih leh a sisate a zuan dingin misite’ omna Leinuai-ah amah tawh a paikhawm ding uh hi. Ama liimnuai a belte khempeuh, minam dangte’ lakah kithehthang khin uh hi. [18] “Tua singkung pen Egypt kumpipa Faro le ama mite ahi hi. Eden huana singkungte nangawn tua zahin lianin hoih zo lo hi. Ahi zongin, Eden huana singkungte mah bangin, Pasian’ thu a ngaihsun lo, galsung a a site’ omna a zuan dingin, misite’ omna Leinuai a manawh ta ahi hi. Topa PASIAN in hih thu ka gen khin hi,” hong ci hi.

[35] Hih leitang pen gammang tulak a bang ngei hinapi-in tu-in Eden Huan a batna le a kisusia, a kiluhgawp, a kinusiacip khuapite pen tu-in a muanhuai kulh tawh ki-umin a sungah mi a tenna thu mi khempeuh in gen belin nei ding uh hi.

[3] A madawkte, a haltum thei meikuang bang a, a nungdalte, mei-am alh tawh kibang hi. Amau hong tun ma-in gam sung teng khempeuh Eden huan a bang hi a, amau’ khit ciangin a kinusiacip keugaw gam tawh kibang hi. Amaute kiang pan a suakta bangmah om lo hi.

[7] Tua ahih manin zak nading bil a neite in Kha Siangtho in pawlpite kiangah a gen thute na za un. A gualzo mite tungah, Pasian’ Huan sunga om nuntakna singgahte a nektheih nadingun thu ka pia ding hi.

[1] Tua ciangin vantungmi in Pasian le Tuuno tokhom panin a hong luangkhia, kristal suangmanpha bangin a tee selsel gun tui hong lak a, [2] khuapi sung lampi laizangah a luang hi. Tua gun pang tuakah nuntakna singkung po a, kha simin gah ahih manin kum khat sungin sawm le nih vei a gah hi. A tehte zong natna dam nading zatui-in kizang hi. [3] Pasian’ samsiatna a ngah peuhpeuh tua khua sungah om lo hi. Tua khuapi sungah Pasian le Tuuno’ tokhom om ding a, ama nasemte in amah a bia ding uh hi.
[14] TOPA in note a dingin hong dosak ding a, note ahihleh na om hithiat ding uh hi bek hi,” a ci hi.

[4] “Na langneih mite’ bawngtal ahi a, a la ahi zongin a gammang na tuah uhleh ama kiangah na hawlkik ding uh hi. [5] Nangmah a hong mudah pa’ la a van tawh a puk na muh leh a la tawh amah na nusia kei ding a, tua la phot toh ding na huh ding hi.
[22] “Ahih hangin note in ama aw limtakin ngai-in keima gen bangin na gamtat uhleh na galte uh’ tungah gal ka hi ding a, na langte uh’ tungah lang ka hi ding hi.

[6] “Keimah in gam sungah nopsakna hong pia-in, note lungnuam takin na lum ding uh a, bangmah in note hong lausak lo ding hi. Keimah in gam sung panin ganhing gilote ka hawlkhia ding a, galkidona in na gam uh hong nawk lo ding hi.

[17] “Na lungsim uhah, ‘Hih minamte ei sangin tamzaw hi. Amaute bangci suankhiat zawh ding ihi hiam?’ na cih khak uhleh, [18] amaute na kihta kei ding uh hi. TOPA na Pasian un Faro le Egypt mite khempeuh tungah a hih,

[1] “Na langte uh a do dingin pai-in a sakolte, a leengte, le a galkapte uh nomau-a’ sangin a tamzaw-in na muh uh hangin amaute na kihta tuan kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt gam panin note a hong paikhiatpih TOPA na Pasian uh note tawh hong om hi.
[7] “ TOPA in, note’ langah hong pang na galte uh na mai uhah lelhna thuaksak ding hi. Amaute lampi khat tawnin hong kuan ding uh a, note’ mai panin lam sagih tawnin taikeek ding uh hi.
[27] Tawntung Pasian pen nangma omna hi a, nangmah huh dingin tawntung khutte a om hi. Amah in na mai-ah galte nawtkhia-in, ‘Susia un,’ ci hi.
[11] Tua ciangin TOPA in Jerubbaal, Barak, Jefthah, le Samuel hong sawl a, na kiim khempeuh uha na galte uh khutsung panin note hong honkhia a, note lungmuang takin na om uh hi.

[6] Bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in nang hong mudahte itin, nang hong itte na mudah hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a ukte le nasemte nang adingin bangmah ahihlohna tuni-in na kitelsak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Absalom hingin, kote khempeuh tuni-in si le ung na nuam ding ka thei hi.

[1] Tua ciangin TOPA in ama galte khempeuh’ khutsung, le Saul’ khutsung panin amah a hotkhiat hunin David in hih la kammalte TOPA’ tungah a gen hi. [2] Amah in, “ TOPA, kei hong hupa, ka kulhpi, kei hong honkhia pa, [3] ka Pasian, ka kihutna, ka bukna pa, lum bangin kei a hong dal, ka munmuanhuai le ka belh, keimah hong honkhia pa hi a, ngong hihna panin hong hon hi.
[29] “Ka galte’n gim a thuak teh ka kipak ngei kei a, haksatna a tuah uh teh ka lungdam ngei kei hi. [30] A sih ding uh deihna tawh ka samsia ngei kei hi.
[7] Amau’ galte’ kiang panin nang hong belte a honpa aw, na itna kip lamdang takin hong lak in.
[48] ka galte kiang panin keimah a hong honkhia pa minthangin vanglian tahen. Ka langte tungah keimah nong liansak a, mi ngongtatte kiang panin na hong honkhia hi.
[5] Keima galte’ muhna munah an nong lui hi. Thupi takin nong pahtawi a, keima hai zong dimlet ta hi.

[1] TOPA aw, kei hong langpangte langpang inla, kei hong dote do in. [2] Lum lian le lum neu la inla, keimah hong huh in! [3] Teipi le teitangzang dok inla, kei hong delhte’ lam ngat in! Keima tungah, “Nang a hong honpa ka hi,” hong ci in. [4] Kei hong sawmte mai zumin mindaisak ta in! Keima siatna ding a bawlte nungkik sakin sisak in! [5] TOPA’ vantungmi’ hawlna tawh huih letkhiat ansite tawh amaute kibangsak in.
[1] Migilote’ hangin kilungsosak kei inla, a man loin a gamta mite en’ dingin ngaihsun kei in. [2] Bang hang hiam cih leh lopa bangin amaute vulpak ding uh a, lokung hingte bangin keutum ding uh hi.

[13] TOPA aw, keimah hong honkhia nuam in. TOPA aw, hong huh meng in. [14] Kei a hong that nuamte zahhuaisak inla, maisiasak in. Keima siatna ding a deihte nungkiksak inla minsiasak in. [15] Keima tungah, “Ha ha!” hong ci vialte zahhuaina tawh maikhingsak in.
[1] Pasian aw, ka dikna hong langsak inla, migilote tawh ka thu-ah kei hong panpih in. Mi khemte le thutang lote kiang panin kei hong honkhia in.
[5] Amaute in ka vai siatsak ding sunthapai-in hanciam uh a, amau’ ngaihsutnate khempeuh keima siatna ding ahi hi.

[4] Huaihamna tawh mihing a netum, humpinelkai tawh a kibang mite’ lakah ka om hithiat hi. Amau’ hate, namsau hiam tawh kibang hi. [5] Pasian aw, vantungah na liatna kilangsak in. Leitung khempeuhah na minthanna omsak in. [6] Amaute in keima khe, thang hong siah uh a, lungkhamin hong koih uh hi. Ka pai nading munah gum khat to uh a, ahih hangin tua gum sungah amaute mah kia uh hi.

[1] Ka Pasian aw, ka galte’ kiang panin keimah hong honkhia in. Kei a hong langpangte panin kei hong dal in. [2] Siatna a bawlte’ kiang panin hong suaktasak inla, mi that nuamte’ kiang panin keimah hong hon in.
[12] Pasian tawh khauhtakin i hih ding hi. Amah pen i galte hong sikcipsak ding pa ahi hi.
[4] Thu om lopi-in kei a hong mudah mi, ka lu tunga samzangte sangin tamzaw uh hi. Kei a hong susia ding, zuauthu tawh a hong dote hat mahmah uh hi. Kei’ guk lohpi ke’n loh ding ka hi hiam?

[1] TOPA aw, nang kong bel hi. Kei hong zahhuaisak kei in. [2] Na thumanna tawh kei hong huh inla, hong honkhia in. Keima lamah na bil hong ngat inla, hong hon in. [3] Hong hon dingin ka belh suangpi, ka kulh muanhuai, hong hi ta in; bang hang hiam cih leh keimah hong honpa le ka belh pa na hi hi. [4] Ka Pasian aw, migilote’ khutsung pan le thuman lo mite le migilote’ matna panin keimah hong hon in.
[10] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka galte kihoho-in, keimah hong thahnopna thu kikumkum uh hi.

[1] Israel mite bangin a lungsim a siangtho a thutang mite tungah Pasian hoih takpi hi. [2] Ahih hangin kei ka hih leh ka khe kisuipuk dektak a, ka khe taal dektak hi. [3] Bang hang hiam cih leh migilote’ daupaina ka muh ciangin mi kihisakte ka eng hi. [4] Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in nat velvalna bangmah thuak lo uh a, a pumpi uh cidamin zol hilhial hi. [5] Amaute in midangte bangin haksatna thuak lo uh a, amaute in midangte bangin gimna ngah lo uh hi. [6] Tua ahih ciangin amaute in khainiang bangin kiphatsakna ok uh a, puan bangin ngongtatna silh uh hi. [7] A lungsim panun gitlohna pusuaksak uh a, a ngaihsutna uh gitlohna tawh a dimlet hi. [8] Amaute in mi thusim loin el pau uh a, kiliatsakna tawh a sucip dingin mi a tawng uh hi. [9] Amaute’ gensiatna in vantung dong banto a, kiliatsakna tawh leitungah thu gen kawikawi uh hi.
[14] Pasian aw, mi kihisakte, kei langpangin hong kipan hi. Thu-helhawt mi pawlkhat in kei, thah hong sawm uh a, amaute in nang hong thudon lo uh hi.
[17] Amaute in tuikhang bangin sun tawntungin kei hong umcih uh a, kei hong tuamcip uh hi.

[1] Sangpenpa’ liahna sung, Vanglianpa’ liim sungah a om mi khempeuh in [2] TOPA’ tungah, “Ka bukna le ka munkip muanhuai, ka muan ka Pasian na hi hi,” ci ding uh hi. [3] Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in thangsiah pa’ thangzak le a lauhuai pulnatna panin nang hong honkhia ding hi. [4] Amah in a khate tawh nang hong tuam ding a, ama khate’ nuai-ah bukna ding na mu ding hi. Ama thumanna in nang hong dalin hong hu ding hi.
[8] Sun nilohin ka galte in kei hong zahko uh a, kei hong simmawhte in samsiatna-in ka min a zang uh hi.

[2] Bang hang hiam cih leh migilote le zuauthu gente keima langah hong pang uh a, keimah hong gensia-in, zuauthu bekbek genin nei uh hi. [3] Amaute in muhdah kamte pau-in kei hong gensia uh a, thu om lopi-in kei hong langpang uh hi. [4] Amaute ka itna, amaute a dingin thu ka ngetsakna nangawn amaute in hong thukna-in kei hong mawhsak uh hi. [5] Tua ahih ciangin amaute in hoihna a dingin siatna itna a dingin muhdahna tawh kei hong thuk uh hi.
[8] TOPA in sihna panin kei hong honkhia hi. Ka khituite hong kangsak a, kei hong guallelsak lo hi.
[134] Nangma thuhilhte ka zuih theih nadingin hong nengniamte’ kiang pan kei hong honkhia in.

[1] “Ka neu lai a kipanin nakpitakin amaute in kei hong gimsak uh hi,” Israel in tu-in ci tahen. [2] “Ka neu lai a kipanin nakpitakin amaute in kei hong gimsak uh a, ahih hangin amaute in kei hong zo nai lo uh hi. [3] Lo khote in lei a kuih bangin ka nungzang hong kuikek uh a, tu-ma-kuakte tawh kibangsak uh hi.
[24] I galte’ kiang pan eite hong honkhia pa tungah, bang hang hiam cih leh ama itna kip tawntung hi.
[7] Haksatna tuamtuamte ka thuak ciangin kei nong kem hi. A heh ka galte, kei’ tangin nong dosak a, na thahatna tawh kei na hong honkhia hi.
[1] TOPA aw, migilote kiang panin kei hong honkhia inla, mi ngongtatte kiang panin kei hong kem in. [2] Amaute in a lung sung uhah thusia geelgeel uh a, gal phuang ngitnget uh hi.
[9] TOPA aw, ka langte’ kiang panin kei hong honkhia in. Nangmah a bel dingin ka hong tai hi.
[11] A gilo galte kiang panin kei hong hon inla, a kam uh tawh zuauthu a gen limtakin kiciamna a bawl khit ciang nangawnin zuau a gen lai veve gamdang mite’ khutsung pan kei hong honkhia in.
[7] TOPA’ deih bangin gamtatna pen galte nangawn lawma kaihzawhna ahi hi.
[4] Migilote in gitlohna thu bek mah ngaihin nei uh a, zuautheite in zuauthu mah ngaihin nei hi.
[21] Na galte a gil a kial leh an pia inla, a dang a tak leh tui pia in. [22] Tua hileh amau’ maizum nadingin a bawl na hi a, TOPA in nang tungah thaman hong pia ding hi.
[26] Mihoih khat in mihoih lote’ gamtatna a zuihkhak ciangin hawktui nin, ahih kei leh tui uih tawh kibang hi.

[17] Nangmah do nadingin a kibawl hiam peuhmah maavang lo ding a, thukhenna sungah na langah a pang mi khempeuh na nialgawpzo ding hi. Hih thu pen TOPA’ nasemte’ gamhluah le keima kiang panin amaute’ dikna a kilahna ahi hi, TOPA in ci hi,” a ci hi.
[19] Amaute in nang’ langkhatah hong do ding uh hi. Ahih hangin a hong zo kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in kong cihin-ah, nangmah a hong hu dingin ka hong ompih ding hi,” a hong ci hi.

[5] Na vengte’ thu upin nei kei inla, na lawmte zong muanin nei kei in. Na ang a lum na zi kiang nangawnah thu na gen ding kidawm in. [6] Tuhun ciangin tapate in a pate haibawl a, tanute in a nute langpan’ uh a, mote in a teeknu uh langneih uh hi. Mi khat a dingin ama innkuanpihte mah a gal a suak mawk hi.

[38] “Note in, ‘Mittang khat tang ding mittang khat, ha khat tang ding ha khat,’ ci-in a kigenna na zaksa uh ahi hi. [39] Ahi zongin note kiangah ke’n kong genin-ah: A gilote na thukkik kei un. Mi khatpeuh in na paang taklam hong bet leh a langkhat zong na dawh lai zaw in.

[43] “Note in, ‘Na vengte uh na it unla, na galte uh na mudah un,’ ci-in a kigenna thu na zaksa uh ahi hi. [44] Ahi zongin ke’n note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong bawlsiate a dingin thu na ngetsak un. [45] Tua hileh vantungah a om na Pa uh tate na hi thei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in mihoihte le misiate tungah a kibangin ni taangsak khawm a, a gamtat phate le a gamtat siate tungah zong a kibang mahin guah zusak khawm hi.
[12] Kote tungah a hong mawhte mawh maisakna ka neih bangun ko’ mawhna zong hong maisak in.
[3] Bang hangin na lawmte’ mit sunga ninthem tang muhsak thei napi-in nangma mit sunga singluang tang phawk thei lo na hi hiam?

[21] Unau le unau, pa in a ta, tate in a nu a pate langpangin sihna a thuak dingin khatlekhat kiheek ding uh hi. [22] Keima hangin Gentail mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi. Ahi zongin a tawp dongin a thuakzo mite in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh hi.
[28] Pumpi a thah khit ciangin kha a that thei lote na kihta kei un. Hell khuk sungah pumpi le kha a nihin a susia thei pa na kihtazaw un.

[34] “Leitungah kilemna a omsak dingin hong pai hi, ci-in hong ngaihsun kei un. Kilemna a omsak dingin a hong pai ka hi kei a, kido nading namsau a khah dingin a hong pai ka hizaw hi. [35] Tate le pate a kidosak ding, tanute le nute a kidosak ding, monute le teeknute a kidosak dingin a hong pai ka hi hi. [36] Mi khat a dingin a gal lian penpen ama innkuanpih mite mah hong hi ding hi.
[30] Kei hong pawlpih lo peuhmah keima lang hi uh a, kei hong kaihkhoppih lo peuhmah a thehthang ahi uh hi.

[27] “Ahi zongin ka thugen a za note kiangah kong cihin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong mudah mite tungah a pha na bawl un. [28] No hong phuisamte thupha na pia unla, no hong bawlsiate a’ ding thu na ngetsak un. [29] Na paang langkhat a hong bengte, a langkhat zong na dawhlai un. Na puantungsilh uh a hong sutte tungah, na puansungsilh uh zong na piathuah lai un. [30] A hong ngente peuhmah na pia unla, na na uh a hong laksakte tung panin lakik kei un.

[35] Tua bang lelin note na gamta kei ding uh hi. Na galte uh itin amaute tungah thupha bawl unla, lohkik ding lamen loin leitawi pia un. Tua hileh na thaman uh lian ding a, a Lianpen Pasian’ tate na hi ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh lungdamna mel a theithei lo mite le a huaiham mite tungah amah migi hi. [36] Tua ahih manin na Pa un hehpihna a neih bangin note in zong hehpihna lungsim nei ta un.
[19] Tu-in thei un. Gulpi le momaite na sikgawp nading uh le na galte uh na zawh nadingun note tungah vangliatna ka hong piazo a, amaute in note bangmah hong cih zo lo ding uh hi.

[25] Jesuh a ze-et dingin Thukham hilh siate khat hong ding a, “Sia aw, nuntak tawntungna ka ngahtheih nadingin bang sem ding ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. [26] Jesuh in, “Thukham sungah bang kigelh a, bang sim na hi hiam?” a ci hi. [27] Amah in, “Na Topa Pasian na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na hatna khempeuh, le na pilna khempeuh tawh na it inla, nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in,” ci-in kigelh hi, ci-in a dawng hi. [28] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Na dawnna man mahmah hi. Tua bangin gamta lecin nuntak tawntungna na ngah ding hi,” a ci hi.

[51] Leitungah kilemna a omsak dingin a hong pai hong sa na hi uh hiam? Hilo hi. Ke’n kong cihin-ah, kikhenna a omsak dingin a hong pai ka hizaw hi. [52] Tu a kipanin innkuan sungah mihing nga a phate, a langah thum, a langah nihin kikhenin kido ding uh hi. [53] A pa in a tapa do-in, a tapa in a pa do ding a, a nu in a tanu do-in, a tanu in a nu do ding a, a teeknu in a monu do-in, a monu in a teeknu do ding hi,” a ci hi.
[1] Tua ciangin Jesuh in a nungzuite kiangah, “Mite a puktheih nading ze-etna hong piang hamtang ding hi. Ahi zongin tua puk nading a piangsak mipa in gimna ngah ding hi.
[27] Tu-in, kumpi dingin kei a hong deih lo ka galte pen hih lai-ah hong paipih unla, keima muhna-ah that un,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.

[18] “Leitung mite in note hong muhdah leh kei a hong mudah masa ahihna thu na thei un. [19] Hih leitung mite tawh a kipawl hi le-uhcin leitung mite in amau pawlte hong it ding hi. Ahi zongin hih leitung mite lak panin note ka hong teelkhia a, amaute tawh kipawl nawn lo na hih manun a hong mudah ahi uh hi.

[14] Amaute tungah na thu ka gen khin hi. Ahi zongin keimah bangin amaute zong hih leitung mite tawh kipawl lo uh ahih manin leitung mite in a mudah uh hi. [15] Leitung panin amaute na lakkhiat ding a hong ngetsak ka hi kei a, a Gilopa’ bawlsiat nading panin na kep ding a hong ngen ka hi hi.
[14] No a hong bawlsia mite, Pasian in thupha a piak nadingin thu ngetsak unla, tua bang mite samsia loin thupha piazaw un.

[20] Tua ahih ciangin Lai Siangtho sungah, “Na galte uh a gil a kial leh an na pia un. A dang a taak leh tui na pia un. Tua bangin na gamtat uhleh amaute’ maizum nadingin a bawl na hi uh hi,” ci-in a kigelh bangin gamtazaw un. [21] Tua ahih manin gitlohna kizosak kei unla, a pha gamtatna tawh gitlohnate a zo na hi ta un.
[26] A tawpna-ah suksiat ding a gal nunung pen in sihna ahi hi.

[9] Hong bawlsiate siatna tawh thukkik loin hong samsia mite samsia kik kei unla, Pasian in note a hong sap lai-in thupha a hong piak dingin hong ciamsa ahih manin, hong siat bawlte thupha tawh na thukzaw un.
[21] “Khualmi khatpeuh na bawlsia kei ding uh a, na nengniam kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note zong Egypt leitangah khual mite na hi ngei uh hi.

[10] Note in na leenggui lo uh hawkmai loin, leenggah a kiate zong na leenggui lo panun na tawm kei ding uh hi. Note in mizawngte le peemtate a dingin tuate na nusia ding uh hi; kei pen TOPA na Pasian uh ka hi hi.

[33] “Na gam sung uhah note lakah khualmi khat hong peem leh, ama tungah a man loin na gamta kei ding uh hi. [34] Note lakah a hong peem khualmite tualsung mi mah bangin na ngaihsun ding uh a, nomau mah bangin amaute na it ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh note pen Egypt gam sungah khualmi na hi ngei uh hi; kei pen TOPA na Pasian uh ka hi hi.

[22] “Note in na leitang panun an na lak uh ciangin, na lonawl dongun la loin, an na lak khit uh ciangin a sangte zong na khawm kei ding uh a, mizawngte le khualmi a dingin tuate na nusia ding uh hi; kei pen TOPA na Pasian uh ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
[22] Note in peemta le tualsung mi a dingin ngeina a kibang khat na nei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen TOPA na Pasian uh ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
[35] “Na sanggampa uh zawngin, note bangin amah a kivak zawh kei leh, note in amah na vak ding uh hi. Khualmi le peemta bangin amah pen note tawh hong om ding hi.
[15] Mihonpi a dingin ngeina khat om ding a, note le note’ lakah hong peem mi a dingin tawntung ngeina khat na khang tawntungun om ding hi. TOPA’ mai-ah note le peemta mite na kibang ding uh hi.
[16] “Tua hun laitakin na thukhente uh ka thuhilh a, ‘Na sanggamte uh thu neihte za unla, mi khat le a sanggampa ahi a, amah tawh a om khualmipa tawh ahi zongin thu a mantakin khen un.

[18] Amah in pa nei lote le meigong numeite a dingin thutang semin, peemtate itin an le puan a pia hi. [19] Tua ahih ciangin peemtate it un; bang hang hiam cih leh note zong Egypt gamah peemta na hi uh hi.

[7] “Edom mite khatpeuh na mudah kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute na sanggam uh ahi hi. Egypt mi khatpeuh na mudah kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ gamah peemta na hi ngei uh hi.
[14] “A zawng a cimawh a kicial nasempa, na sanggamte khat ahi a, na gam sung na khuapite sunga om peemta khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin, na nengniam kei ding uh hi.

[17] “Peemta’ thu ahi a, pa nei lo mi’ thu ahi zongin tuate a’ ding thutang na heisak kei ding uh a, meigong numei’ puan zong khapna-in na laksak kei ding uh hi. [18] Egypt-ah sila na hihna uh le TOPA note’ Pasian in tua lai panin hong hotkhiatna na phawk ding uh hi. Tua ahih manin hih banga na gamtat nading uh thu kong pia hi. [19] “Na lo-ah an la-in lo lai-ah anlom na mangngilh uh ciangin a tawm dingin na paikik kei ding uh hi. Tuate pen peemta, pa nei lo, le meigong numeite a’ ding ahi hi. Hih pen TOPA note’ Pasian in na khut uh tawh na sepna khempeuh uhah note thupha hong piak theih nading ahi hi. [20] Na oliv kungte uh na sat uh ciangin a hiangte na sat kikkik kei ding uh hi. Tuate pen peemta, pa nei lo, le meigong numeite a’ ding ahi hi. [21] Na leenggui lo panun leenggah na kaihkhop uh ciangin a sang na nung khop kik kei ding uh hi. Tuate pen peemta, pa nei lo, le meigong numeite a’ ding ahi hi. [22] Egypt gamah sila na hihna uh na phawk ding uh hi. Tua ahih manin hih bangin na gamtat nadingun thu kong pia hi.
[19] “‘Peemta, pa nei lo, le meigong numeite a’ ding thutang a heikhiatsak mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
[9] TOPA in peemtate kem a, meigong numeite le pa nei lote a huh hi. Ahih hangin amah in migilote’ vaihawmna a suksiatsak hi.

[24] Gam khempeuh le minam khempeuhte lak panin note hong kaikhawm kikin na gam uhah kong tunpih kik ding hi. [25] Note tungah tui siangtho kong theh ding a, na milim biakna uh le note hong ninsak na dang khempeuh panin kong siangsak ding hi. [26] Note sungah lungtang thak le lungsim thak kong guan ding a, na suang lungtang uh hong lakkhiatsakin mihing lungtang kong guan ding hi. [27] Note sungah keima kha kong guang ding a, note tungah kong piak ka thukhamte le ka thupiakte limtakin kong zuisak ding hi. [28] Tua ciangin na pu na pate uh tungah ka piaksa gamah na teng ding uh a, note pen keima mi hi-in, kei pen note’ Pasian ka hi ding hi.

[9] “Note in thu a tangin khenin, khatlekhat tungah itna le hehpihna kilakin, [10] note lakah a om meigong, tagah, gamdang mite, ahih kei leh mizawngte gim pia loin, khatlekhat kiliatsakna ding na ngaihsut lohna ding uh thu ka hong piazo hi,” a ci hi.

[33] Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Faro in thu ngaihsun siam mipil khat tengkhia inla, Egypt gam sung a uk dingin amah koih in. [34] Faro in gam sungah vaihawm ulian seh inla, a kihauh kum sagih sungin Egypt gam leitang pana piang sung panin nga-ah khat la in. [35] Hong tung ding kum hoih sunga an khempeuh amaute khawmsak inla, khuapite sungah an nek dingin Faro’ ukna nuai-ah antangte kholin, amaute kemsak in. [36] Kialpi hangin gam sung a siatloh nadingin Egypt gam sungah a hong tung ding kum sagih kialpi dal nadingin a kikoihcing an hi ding hi,” a ci hi.

[32] Tua ciangin Benjamin mite in, “A masa-a mah bangin i mai-ah amaute tai uh hi,” a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin Israel mite in, “Eite tai-in, khuapi panin lam lianpi-ah amaute paikhiasak ni,” a kici uh ahi hi. [33] Israel mite khempeuh amau’ omna mun panin dingin Baaltamar-ah a gualin pang uh hi. A pangsim Israel mite Gibeah nitumna lam amau omna panin hong ding khia uh hi.

[7] Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah, “Kumpipa na thukim leh, Judah gam ka tun dong amaute in hong paisuaksak theih nadingun Eufratis Gungal gam sung a uksawn mite ka piak ding laikhakte, [8] le biakinn hutna ding munmuanhuai kongpi ding, khuapi kulh ding, le ka omna ding inn lam nadingin sing hong piaktheih nadingin kumpipa’ tulak a kem Asaf’ tungah piak ding laikhak zong, kei tungah hong pia in,” ka ci hi. A dik ka Pasian in kei hong ompih ahih manin kumpipa in ka ngette hong pia hi. [9] Tua ahih ciangin Eufratis Gungal gam a uksawn mite kiang ka tung a, kumpipa’ laikhakte amaute tungah ka pia hi. Kumpipa in galkapmangte le sakol galkapte kei hong khasak hi. [10] Ahi zongin Israel mite’ phattuamna ding a sem dingin mi khat a paina thu Horonaim khuami Sanballat le Ammon mi sal ahi Tobiah in a zak uh ciangin nakpitakin lungkim lo uh hi. [11] Jerusalem khua ka tun ciangin ni thum sung ka tawlnga hi. [12] Tua ciangin zanin vakkhia-in mi tawmkhat ka tonpih hi. Ahi zongin Jerusalem a dingin ka bawlsak ding ka Pasian in ka lungsimah hong suahsak thu kuama kiangah ka gen kei hi. Keima tuanna simloh ganhing dang ka kizuisak kei hi. [13] Kuam Kongpi tawnin Gulpi Tuikhuk le Nin Kongpi lamah ka pai a, a kicimsa Jerusalem kulhpi le mei in a kattumsa a kongpite ka en hi. [14] Tua ciangin Tuinak Kongpi le Kumpipa’ Bual-ah ka paisuak hi. Ahi zongin ka tuanna ganhing a paisuak theih nading mun om lo hi. [15] Tua hi a, a zanpi mahin kuam lampi-ah pai-in khuapi kulh ka vel hi. Tua ciangin Kuam Kongpi mah tawnin khuapi sungah ka lutkik hi. [16] Tua hi a, khuasung upate in ka paina mun ahi a, ka sep ahi zongin thei lo uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hih nasep tavuan a la ding Judah mite, siampite, uliante, khuasung upate, le a dangte tungah ka gen nai kei hi. [17] Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, “I lungkhamna thu na thei uh hi. Jerusalem a siasa-in omin, a kongpite mei in kangtum hi. Hong pai un, zahkona i ngah nawn loh nadingin Jerusalem kulh ciangpha ni,” ka ci hi. [18] Tua ciangin a dik ka Pasian in kei hong ompihna le kumpipa in kei tungah hong gen thute zong amaute tungah ka gen hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, “Tu-in nasep kipan pah ni,” hong ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin lawp mahmahna le ngimna hoih tawh nasep a kipan uh hi.
[4] Na lungsim’ deihna amah in hong pia hen la, na geelna khempeuh hong tangtungsak ta hen!
[10] TOPA in minamte’ thungaihsutna a mawkna suahin, mite’ geelna a khaktan hi.
[1] TOPA in inn lampih kei leh innlamte’ sepna a mawkna ahi hi. TOPA in khuapi hutpih kei leh khuapi cingte’ cinna a mawkna ahi hi.
[8] Nang hong muang ka hih manin zingsang simin na itna kip kei hong phawksak in. Nangma tungah thu hong ngen ka hih manin ka pai nading lampi hong hilh ta in.
[5] Na lungsim khempeuh tawh TOPA muang inla, nang’ theihna suang kei in. [6] Na hihna khempeuhah amah phawk in. Tua hileh lampi man amah in hong lak ding hi.

[6] Thadahpa aw, miksite kiangah pai inla, amau’ nuntakzia va en in. [7] Amaute in a uk ding le a makai ding kuamah nei lo napi-in, [8] khuakhal sungin a nek ding uh, tuk hun sungin kaikhawm khol uh hi.
[22] Lim ngaihsut loin sepna tawh bangmah piang zo lo a, limtakin geelna tawh maa kitunzo bek hi.
[3] Na geelnate khempeuh TOPA ap in; tua hileh na geelna bangin tangtung ding hi.
[9] Mihing in thu geel a, ahi zongin TOPA’ deihna bangin kisemkhia hi.
[21] Mihing’ ngaihsutna-ah thu tampi om a, ahi zongin TOPA’ deihna tawh a kituakte bek kimang ding hi.
[5] Limtakin ngaihsunin geelgeelna pen hauhna lampi hi a, nawhsa-in lopthop hihna pen zawnna lampi ahi hi.
[3] Pilna tawh inn kilam a, ngaihsut siamna tawh inn kip hi. [4] Thungaihsut theihna inn sungah a hoih a manpha nate a dimtakin om hi.
[6] Geel siamna tawh galte kizo a, ngaihsut siamna tawh gualzawhna kingah hi.
[27] Na nuntakna ding zong masa inla, na an nek ding a kicin ciang bekin na inn ding lamin zi le ta nei pan in.
[23] Na tuuhonte hoihtakin thei inla, na bawnghonte hoihtakin kem in.
[1] Hih leitungah a piang thu khempeuh, Pasian in ama pian’ hun dinga a sehsa hunin a piansak ahi hi.

[11] Amah in na khempeuh amau’ hun ciat tawh a kituak dingin a bawl hi. Amah in mailam thu theihnopna lungsim eite tungah hong guan a, ahi zongin ama sepnate a cing a theihzawhna ding hong guan lo hi.
[15] “I leengguite pak ta ahih manin ngiano hon in a suksiat ma-in tua ngiano honte man ni,” hong ci hi.
[8] Ahih hangin mipi lungsim a nei mi in na a hoihte geel a, thuhoih nate-ah a pang hi.
[23] TOPA aw, mihing’ omdan ama uk theih ahih lohna ka theita a, ama kalsuanna ding ama geeltheih hi lo hi.
[11] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in kong cihin-ah, mai lamah lametna note kong piakkik ding, na siatna ding uh hi loin na phattuamna ding uh geelna ka neihte kei bek in ka thei hi.
[2] Bethlehem Efrathah khua aw, nang pen Judah gamah khua neupen khat na hi a, ahi zongin nang sung panin Israel-te a uk ding khat ka piangsak ding hi. Ama gui pen tangtawng pek tawh kizom hi.

[3] Hih thu a tunna ding hun hi pah nai lo ahih manin lai-in ciamteh in. Ahi zongin hong tung baihta ding a, kong lah khempeuh a manin hong tung ding hi. A tung hak tawh a kibangkha ahi zongin ngak keikai in. Ka seh hun a cin ciangin hong tung takpi ding a, zekai lua nawn lo ding hi.
[15] Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Pasian in hih dingin kisam a sak khempeuh i hih ding a kilawm thu ahih manin tu-in hong phum hoh in,” a cih ciangin Johan in zong a mang hi.

[25] “Tua ahih ciangin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na nuntak nadingun bang ne-in bang dawn ding cih ahi a, na pumpi uh a dingin bang silh ding cih ahi zongin lunghimawh lua kei un. Nuntakna pen an sangin thupizaw a, pumpi pen puan sangin thupizaw hi lo ahi hiam?

[31] Tua ahih manin bang ne ding a, bang dawn ding a, bang silh ding ihi hiam, ci-in lunghimawh lua kei un. [32] (Gentail mite in lunghihmawh penin a neihte uh hih bangte ahi hi.) Hih nate khempeuh na kisap lamtak uh vantungah a om na Pa un a thei hi.

[29] Mi khatpeuh in mi thahat khat pa’ inn sungah lutin a neihsate a laksak theih nadingin tua inn nei a thahatpa a hencip masak phot ding kisam hi. A hencip zawh khit ciang bekin a inn-ah lutin a neihsate lathei pan hi.
[1] Tua khit ciangin Jesuh in ama pai nading khua le mun khempeuhah nih nihin a na pai dingin mi sawmsagih seh a, ama mai-ah a mapaisak hi.
[21] “Mi thahat khat in a hiam neih khempeuh tawh ama inn a cin ciangin a neihsa khempeuh suakta hi.
[28] Mi khatpeuh in inn lianpi khat lamding a sawm le, ka zozo ding hiam cih a theih nadingin a bei dingzah tuat masa hi.

[31] Galkap tul sawm a nei kumpi khat in galkap tul sawmnih tawh a hong kuan kumpi khat do dingin a kithawi leh, tua kumpipa a dozo ding mahin i hat takpi hiam ci-in ngaihsun masa ding hi. [32] A zozo ding ahih vet kei leh, tua kumpipa a hong tun ma, a gamla-ah a om lai-in, ama kiangah kamtaite sawl ding a, kilem nading thu gensak ding hi.
[4] Tu’n ka gamtat nading ka theita hi. Tua ka ngaihsut bangin gamta leng, ka nasepna panin ka tawp ciangin lawm nei-in, amaute in a inn-ah kei hong tungsak ding uh hi,’ ci hi.
[24] Mi pawlkhat, namsau tawh kithat ding a, pawlkhat, galmatin gam dangah kiciahpih ding hi. Tua ciangin Gentail mite’ uk hun a bei matengin Jerusalem khuapi a siacipin om ding hi.

[19] Tua ahih manin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “A mantakin gen lehang: Tapa in ama thu bek tawh bangmah sem lo a, a Pa in a sep a muhteng bek a sem ahi hi. Tua hi a, a Pa in a septeng mah a Tapa in zong a sem ahi hi.
[2] Note’ om nading mun a bawlkhol dingin a pai ding ka hi hi. Ka Pa’ inn sungah om nading mun tampi om hi. A om lo ding hileh hih bangin thu ka hong gen kei ding hi.
[26] “Ahi zongin Thuman a hong lak ding Huhpa ahi Kha Siangtho ka Pa kiang panin ka hong sawl ding hi. Amah hong tun ciangin keima thu hong gen ding hi.

[13] Tua ahih manin thuman hong lak ding Kha Siangtho hong tun ciangin thu khempeuh a manin hong hilh ding hi. Ama ngaihsuttawm thu hong gen ding hi lo a, ama tungah a kigen thute le a hong tung ding thute a hong gen ding ahi hi.

[7] Sauveipi a kisel khit uh ciangin Peter hong ding a, “Lawmte aw, Gentail mite in Pasian’ thu za-in a uptheih nadingun amaute tungah Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin sawtpi lai pekin note lak panin Pasian in kei hong teelkhiatna thu na thei uh hi.

[26] Mihing khat tung panin leitung minam khempeuh hong piangsakin, leitung khempeuhah a omsak hi. Amah in mihingte a piansakma pekin, mihingte’ nuntak tanvei ding le a ten nading uh mun a sehsa ahi hi.
[7] Sani nitakin an nekhawm dingin ka kikhawm uh a, a zing ciangin a ding khia ding ahih manin Paul in a thuhilh zankim ciang dong a zomsuak hi.

[13] Khrih sungah sanggamte aw, Gentail midangte lakah thu um mi ka ngah mah bangin note lakah zong ngah ding lametna tawh note kiangah pai ding tam veipi ka geel zel hangin ka hong pai theih lohna thu nong theih ding uh ka ut hi.

[28] Ama deihna bang a sem dingin Pasian in a hong sap, amah a it eite a dingin na khempeuh a hoihlamin piangsak hi, ci-in i thei hi. [29] Pasian’ Tapa mi khempeuh lakah a upa pen a suahtheih nadingin Pasian in a teelkholhsa mite, a Tapa tawh a kibang dingin a sehsa ahi hi.
[6] Keima nasep pen khaici vawh hi a, Apollos’ nasep pen tuibuah hi a, ahi zongin a khangsak pa ahihleh Pasian ahi hi.
[11] Tua ahih manin na patsa uh thu a bei dongin zomsuak unla, na geelsa uh na tangtunsak theih nadingun na neihsa uh tawh lawptakin na sem un.
[5] Pasian in Jesuh Khrih hangin ama mite ahi dingin eite a hong bawl ding a sehkholhsa hi a, tua bangin a hong bawl ding pen ama tupna le a utna ahi hi.

[9] Pasian in a pilna le a thumuhnate zangin ama geelsa bangin hong sem a, Khrih zangin a sepnop thusimteng eite tungah hong kilangsak hi. [10] Tua a geel thu pen, a hunhoih a tun ciangin Khrih khutnuai-ah, vantung le leitungah a om khempeuh gawm ding ahi hi. [11] Na khempeuh, Pasian’ ngaihsutna le a geelsa bangin a piang hi. A cil pek a kipanin a ngaihsutsa thu tawh kizui-in Khrih tawh i kipawlna hangin Pasian’ tate ihih nadingin Pasian mah in a hong sehsa ihi hi. [12] Tua ahih manin Khrih a muang masa eite in Pasian phatin a minthanna vang kilangsak ni.

[12] Tua ahih ciangin ka hong it sanggamte aw, note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-in ka thu na hong man’ tawntung uh mah bangin, tu-in note tawh ka hong omkhawm loh hun ciangin zong ka thu na hong man’ ding uh thupizaw lai hi. Pasian kihtakna le zahtakna tawh na maa uh nawt unla, amah in note hong hotkhiatna thu a cingtaak suaksak un. [13] Bang hang hiam cih leh note in utna lungsim na neih nading uh le ama deihna na zuihzawh nadingun note sungah Pasian in a tawntungin na a hong sem ahi hi.
[7] Pasian’ thu tawh a kituak lo, a haihuai tangthu phuahtawmte ngaihsutin na nei vet kei in. Pasian’ deihna tawh a kituakin na nuntak zawh nadingin na kisin in.

[16] Mi khat in a sih khit ciangin a gamhluah dingin a deih pa lai-in ciamtehin a koih leh a laibawl pa a sih phot ding kisam hi. [17] A laibawl pa a hin laiteng tua lai kizang thei lo a, a sih khit ciangin kizang thei bek hi.

[13] Tuni ahih kei leh zing ciangin tua khua tua khua-ah va pai-in, kum khat bang va omin, sumbawlin a meet tampi va ngah ni, a ci mite aw, ka thugen hong ngai dih un. [14] Zing ciangin na nuntakna uh bangci ding cih nangawn na thei kei uh hi. Meiilum tawlkhat sung kaii-in a mangthang pak tawh a kibang lel na hi uh hi. [15] Note in, “Topa in hong thukimpih nakleh nungta-in tua bang tua bang i sem ding hi,” na cih ding uh hi bek hi.

[21] Sodom kumpipa in Abram’ kiangah, “A mite hong pia inla, ahih hangin a nate nang a dingin la in,” a ci hi. [22] Ahih hangin Abram in Sodom kumpipa kiangah, “Vantung le leitung a bawl Sang Pen TOPA Pasian tungah ka kiciam khinzo hi. [23] Nangmah in, ‘Abram ka hausak hi,’ ci kha ding na hih manin mimkhau ahi a, khedap khau ahi a, nangma a’ ahi na khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin ka la kei ding hi. [24] Tangvalte’ neksate le kei tawh hong kuan mite’ tanh dingte lobuang bangmah ka la kei ding hi. Aner, Eshkol, le Mamre-te amau’ tanh ding pia in,” a ci hi.

[21] Tua tham loin, mi khempeuh lak panin Pasian a zahtak mi, a muanhuai mi le sumgolh a mudah mi, mi siamte na teelkhia ding hi. Tua bang mite pen a tul, a za, a sawmnga, a sawmte tungah a uk dingin na koih ding hi.
[8] Sumgolh na la kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh sumgolh in uliante’ mit tawsak a, thuman mite’ thu heikhiatsak hi.
[15] “Note in thukhenna-ah thu a tang loin na khen kei ding uh hi. Mizawngte langgen loin, a liante’ thu zui loin, thumanna tawh na vengte uh thu na khen ding uh hi.

[17] bang hang hiam cih leh minphatna lianpi nang kong pia ding a, kei’ tunga nong gen peuhpeuh ka hih ding hi. Hong pai inla, hih mite hong samsiatsak in,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi. [18] Ahih hangin Balaam in Balak’ nasemte kiangah, “Balak in kham leh ngun tawh a kidim ama inn hong pia ding hitaleh zong, TOPA ka Pasian’ thupiakna banah a tamzaw hitaleh a tawmzaw hitaleh bangmah ka hih thei kei hi.
[17] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA na Pasian uh a lian, a vanglian, a kihtakhuai Pasian, angvan nei loin, sumgolh a la lo, pasian-te’ Pasian, topate’ Topa ahi hi.
[19] Thutang na heikhia kei ding uh a, angvan tuam na nei kei ding uh hi. Sumgolh in mipilte’ mit tawsakin thumante’ thu heikhia ahih manin sumgolh na la kei ding uh hi.
[25] “‘Mawhna nei lopa thah nadingin sumgolh a la mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.

[29] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka sih khit ciangin note siatgamtatin, note kong sawlna lampi panin na pial taktak ding lam uh ka thei hi. Note’ sepna tawh amah hehsakin, TOPA’ muhna-ah a sia gamta ding na hih manun, hong pai ding hunte-ah, note’ tungah gimna hong tung ding hi,” a ci hi.

[4] Tua khit ciangin Samson in Sorek kuamah Delilah a kici numei khat ngai hi. Na theihzawh le ngun pek tul le zakhat ciat nang kong pia ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

[27] Ahih hangin bangmah a man lo mi pawlkhat in, “Hih mipa in eite hong bangci hotkhiat zawh ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Amaute in amah simmawhin ama kiangah letsong puak lo uh hi. Ahih hangin amah in tua mite bangmah cih lo hi.

[3] Hih lai-ah ka om hi; ka mawhna a om leh TOPA’ mai le a sathau nilh pa’ mai-ah ka mawhna hong pulak un. Kua’ bawngtal ka laksak hiam? Ahih kei leh kua’ la ka laksak hiam? Ahih kei leh kua khem ka hi hiam? Kua nengniam ka hi hiam? Ahih kei leh keima mit a tawsak dingin kua’ tung panin sumgolh la ngei ka hi hiam? Ka mawhna nong lah theih uhleh kong dinkik ding hi,” a ci hi.

[18] Tua ciangin Asa in TOPA’ biakinn sung vankoihna le kumpipa inn vankoihna sungah a omlai ngun le kham khempeuh la-in ama nasemte’ khut sungah tuate a pia hi. Tua ciangin kumpi Asa in Damaskas-ah a teng, Syria kumpi, Hezion’ tapa Tabrimmon, a tapa Benhadad kiangah tuate puak a, [19] “Ka pa le na pa mah bangin kei le nang kikalah kipawlna khat omsak ni. Ngun le kham letsong nangma tungah kong puak hi. Keima kiang panin amah a nungkik theih nadingin Israel kumpi Baasha tawh na kipawlna va sutat in,” a ci hi.
[7] Tu-in note in TOPA zahtak unla, na hihnate uhah kingaihsun un. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA i Pasian in thuman heikhiatna, mi deidanna, le sumgolh laknate deih lo hi,” a ci hi.

[1] Tawikhaina man lo a zangte TOPA in mudah a, tawikhaina man a zangte tungah TOPA lungkim hi.

[4] Ah, a khial minam, mawhna in a nencip mite, siatna a bawlte’ suanlekhakte, a gamtatsia tapate! Amaute in TOPA nusia khin uh a, amaute in Israel-te’ Siangtho Pasian simmawh khin uh hi. Amaute in lam khial khin taktak uh hi.
[17] Gamtat hoih ding kisin un. Thumanin gamta unla, kinetniamna kheel un. Pa nei lote hu unla, meigong numei panpih un,” ci hi.

[23] Na uliante, mi lehdote hi a, gutate tawh a kikhawlte ahi hi. Mi khempeuh in sumgolh le letsong a deih uh hi. Amaute in pa nei lote panpih lo uh a, meigongnu’ thu amaute in sang lo uh hi. [22] Leenggahzu tampi a dawnte, khamtheih zunek a hatte, [23] mimawhte sumgolh tawh khah a, midikte a mawhsakte in gimna ngah ta hen!

[1] A cimawhte’ thutang kimlai hei khiatsakin, keima mite sungah a zawngte’ thuman sutkhia-in, meigong numeite’ neihsa amau a’ ding a suahtheihna ding le pa nei lote’ neihsa amau’ nek dingin a bawl theih nadingun a man lo thukhensatna pia a, nenniamna thu a gelhte in gimna ngah ta uh hen! [15] Thumanin gamta-in thutang na gen uhleh na suakta ding uh hi. Na vangliatna uh mizawngte khemna-in zang kei unla, sumgolh deih kei un. Mi thah ding le siatna gamtat ding a vaihawmte tawh kipawl kei un.

[12] Ama hang bek tawh hotkhiatna kingah thei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh eite in hotkhiatna i ngahtheih nadingin leitung khempeuhah Pasian in hong piak min dang khat zong om lo hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
[31] Amaute in, “Topa Jesuh um in. Tua hileh nang le na innkuanpihte in hotkhiatna na ngah ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.

[17] Mi khat bek’ mawhna hangin sihna in hong uk ahihleh mi khat mah ahi Jesuh Khrih hangin nakpitakin a lian Pasian’ hehpihna le mihoih-a sanna a ngah mite nungta-in thahatzaw kan ding uh hi. [18] Tua hi a, khialhna khat in mi khempeuh tungah thukhenna tungsak ahih mah bangin gamtatna hoih khat mah in mi khempeuh khahin nungtasak hi. [19] Mi khat in thu a man loh manin mi tampi mimawh a suahsak mah bangin mi khat in thu a manna hangin mi tampi in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna a ngah ding uh ahi hi.
[23] Bang hang hiam cih leh mawhna in thaman hong piak pen sihna hi a, ahi zongin i Topa Jesuh tawh i kipawl manin Pasian’ hong piakkhong pen nuntak tawntungna ahi hi.

[9] Jesuh pen Topa hi, ci-in mite kiangah genin, Pasian in sihna panin amah hingkiksak zo hi, ci-in na lungsim sung uhah na up taktak uhleh hotkhiatna na ngah ding uh hi. [10] Bang hang hiam cih leh i lungsim ah i up taktakna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna kingah a, i kamin i genna hangin hotkhiatna a kingah ahi hi. [11] Lai Siangtho in, “Amah a um mi peuhmah tavai lo ding hi,” ci hi. [12] Bang hang hiam cih leh Jew mi le Gentail mi a kideidanna om lo ahih manin Topa pen mi khempeuh’ Topa hi kim a, ama kiangah a ngen khempeuh tungah thupha tampi tak a pia hi. [13] Lai Siangtho in zong, “Topa tungah huhna a ngen khempeuhte in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh hi,” ci hi.

[3] Lungdamna thu ka hilhte uh kitel lo ahihleh zong siatna a thuak mite a’ ding bekin a kitel lo hi ding hi. [4] Tua bang mite pen hih leitung pasian gilote in a lungsim mit uh tawsak ahih manin um lo uh a, Pasian tawh a kibang teekteek Khrih minthanna hangin amaute tungah a hong taang lungdamna thu khuavak mu thei lo uh hi.
[17] Tua ahih manin mi khatpeuh, Khrih tawh a kipawl ciangin mi thak suak a, a mi lui ngeina bei-in a mi thak ngeina a neita ahi hi.

[8] Note’ upna hangin Pasian’ hong hehpihna tawh hotkhiatna a ngah na hi uh hi. Note’ thalawhna hangin a ngah hi loin Pasian’ hong piakkhong ahi hi. [9] Note’ hanciamna tawh a ngah hi lo na hih manun na kisialh nading uh a thu om lo hi.
[13] Amah in khuamial vangliatna panin eite hong honkhia-in, a lungmuanhuaina mun, a it a Tapa’ ukna sungah hong koih a,
[14] Eite a dingin a hoih lo, i mawhna a kiciamtehna khempeuh, hong phiatsak a, tuate khempeuh singlamteh tungah kilhcipin a beisak ta hi.

[11] Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh in hotkhiatna a ngahtheih nadingun Pasian in ama hehpihna hong lak khinzo hi. [12] Eite in i lamet, a lian Pasian le eite hong Hon Jesuh Khrih a vangliatna hong kilatkik ding hun ngakin i om laitakin i biakna tawh a kituak lo thute le leitung nate deihna phiatin, lungsim hi hithiatin omin, thutangin, hih leitungah Pasian’ deihna bangin i nuntak nadingin tua hehpihna thu in eite hong hilh hi. [13] Eite in i lamet, a lian Pasian le eite hong Hon Jesuh Khrih a vangliatna hong kilatkik ding hun ngakin i om laitakin i biakna tawh a kituak lo thute le leitung nate deihna phiatin, lungsim hi hithiatin omin, thutangin, hih leitungah Pasian’ deihna bangin i nuntak nadingin tua hehpihna thu in eite hong hilh hi.

[5] Note’ upna hangin nitawp ni ciangin na ngah ding uh hotkhiatna nomau-a’ ahihna a kilatsak nadingin Pasian in ama vangliatna tawh a hong kepsak ahi hi. [6] Tua ahih manin tu laitakin mite’ bawlsiatna a tuamtuam na thuak manun tawlkhat na lungkham uh ahi zongin hih bang thuakna hangin lungdamzaw un. [7] Hih bang thuaknate in a um takpi mah na hihna uh hong kilangsak hi. A siathei khamte nangawn, a hoih taktak mah ahi hiam, ci-in mite in mei tawh sin uh ahih manin, kham sangin a manphazaw note’ upna zong a kiptak mah ahi hiam, ci-in Pasian in hong sin ding mah ahi hi. Tua bangin na thuakzawh uhleh Khrih hong kilat Ni ciangin phatna, minthanna, le pahtawina na ngah ding uh hi. [8] Amah mu ngei lo napi-in na it uh a, amah mu ngei lo napi-in a thu umin kama genzawh loh zah dongin nakpitakin na lungdam uh hi. [9] Tua bangin na upna uh hangin kha thu-ah hotkhiatna a ngah na hi uh hi.
[23] A sithei nu le pate sung pan hi loin a sithei lo nu le pate sung panin a nungta tawntung Pasian’ thu tawh naungek bangin a suakkik na hi uh hi.
[14] Pa Pasian in leitung mite a honkhia dingin a Tapa a hong paisakna thu kote in thei-in midang kiangah genbelin ka nei uh hi.

[11] Tu-in Pasian’ teci panna in: Pasian in ama Tapa tungtawnin eite tungah nuntak tawntungna a hong pia hi. [12] Pasian’ Tapa tawh a kipawl peuhmah in nuntak tawntungna nei a, Pasian’ Tapa tawh a kipawl lote in nuntak tawntungna nei lo uh hi, cihna ahi hi. [13] Pasian’ Tapa a um mite in nuntak tawntungna a nei na hih lamtak uh na theih nadingun hih lai a hong gelh ka hi hi.
[5] TOPA Pasian in leitungah guah zusak nai lo a, leitang a kho ding mi om lo ahih manin gam sung kungnote lei sungah om nai lo a, lo sung ankungte pokhia lo hi.
[15] TOPA Pasian in mipa la-in, Eden huan kho-in a kem dingin a koih hi.

[18] Jakob in Rachel ngai hi. Amah in, “Na tanu a nauzaw Rachel thalawh nadingin nangma na kum sagih kong sem ding hi,” a ci hi. [19] Laban in, “Midang tungah amah ka piak ding sangin nang’ tungah amah kong piak ding hoihzaw hi; kei kiangah om in,” a ci hi. [20] Tua ahih ciangin Jakob in Rachel a ngah nadingin kum sagih sung na sem a, amah a itna hangin tua hunte ni tawmno khat tawh kibang a sa hi. [21] Tua ciangin Jakob in Laban kiangah, “Ka hun cingta ahih ciangin amah tawh ka lupkhawm theih nadingin ka zi hong pia in,” a ci hi.
[9] Ni guk sung nomau’ na semin na nasep ding khempeuh uh na hih ding uh hi.
[4] “Bawng in an a cil laitakin a muk na tuam kei ding uh hi.
[37] A kum lina, Ziv kha-in TOPA’ biakinn a bulpi kipan hi.

[38] a minin a kilo hih mite pen amau’ beh ciatah ulian hi uh a, amau’ beh ciat nakpitakin a khang hi. [39] A tuuhonte uh a dingin lonona a zong dingin kuam nisuahna lampang, Gedor lutna lamah khualzin uh a, [40] lei hoih, lonona, le gam zai-in, gam dai-in, a nopna mun mu uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua lai-ah a teng masate pen Ham mite ahi uh hi. [41] A minin a kiciamteh hih mite, Judah kumpi Hezekiah’ hun sungin hong pai uh a, tua lai-ah a om Meunim mite le amau’ puanbukte susia-in tuni dongin amaute beisak uh a, amau’ tuuhonte a dingin tua lai-ah lonona om ahih manin amau’ munah amaute a teng uh hi.
[7] Ahih hangin nang, hang in! Na nasepna thaman hong kipia ding ahih manin na khut zawsak kei in,” a ci hi.

[10] Tua ciangin amah in gamlakah tausangte lam a, Shefelah le zanglei-ah ganhon tampi nei ahih manin tuikhuk tampi to a, lei nasep uuk ahih manin mualtung le lei hoihna gamte-ah lokhote le leenggui puahte a nei hi.
[10] Amah le a innkuan le a neihsate khempeuh na hutna-in a kimkotah daai khan hi lo na hi hiam? Ama hihna khempeuhah thupha na pia a, genzawh lohin ama neihsa pung hi.
[17] Kote’ TOPA Pasian aw, kote tungah na thupha hong tungsak inla, kote’ nasepna khempeuh hong tangtungsak in.

[1] TOPA in inn lampih kei leh innlamte’ sepna a mawkna ahi hi. TOPA in khuapi hutpih kei leh khuapi cingte’ cinna a mawkna ahi hi. [2] Zingsangin tho baihin, gimpi a nangma sepsa an na nek hakna zong a mawkna mah ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in ama itte tungah a ihmut sung nangawnun a pia hi.
[2] Na khut tawh na sep thaman na ne ding a, na lungdamin na maavang ding hi.

[4] Ihmumu kei inla, om mawkmawk kei in. [5] Sabeng pa’ kiang panin a suahtak nadingin sakhi a tai bangin, thangah a awk vasa a kitom bangin na suahtak nadingin hanciam in. [6] Thadahpa aw, miksite kiangah pai inla, amau’ nuntakzia va en in. [7] Amaute in a uk ding le a makai ding kuamah nei lo napi-in, [8] khuakhal sungin a nek ding uh, tuk hun sungin kaikhawm khol uh hi. [9] Thadahpa aw, bang tanvei lumlum ding a, cik ciangin thokhia ding na hi hiam? [10] Tawmkhat sung mengme lai ning, na cih kikalin [11] zawnna le cihmawhna in migilo gutate bangin nang hong sugawp pak ding hi. [12] Miginalo pa, a gilo pa, thuzuau genin vak kawikawi a,
[4] Thadahna in zawnna hi a, thanuamna in hauhna hi. [5] A hunin an a lapa mipil hi a, anlak hunin a ihmu pa in maizumna a ngah hi.
[11] Nakpi takin lo khote in an hau a, man nei lopi-in hun beisakna in haina ahi hi.
[24] Mi thanuamte vanglian a, mi thadahte sila suak hi.
[4] Thadah mi in a deih ngahzo lo a, nasep hahkat mi in a deih khempeuh ngahzo hi.
[11] Ol takin hauhpakna oltak mahin kiamkik pah a, haksapi-in hauhtohna khangto semsem hi.
[23] Gimpi-a nasepna pen hauhna hi a, kam bek pau-in tutmawkna pen zawnna ahi hi. [24] Pilna pen mipilte’ minthanna lukhu hi a, haina pen mihaite’ kizepna bulpi ahi hi.
[3] Na geelnate khempeuh TOPA ap in; tua hileh na geelna bangin tangtung ding hi.
[11] A man tawikhaina le tawi tehnate TOPA a’ hi a, a tawisuang khempeuh ama bawlsa ahi hi.
[26] An duhna in mi na semsak a, gilkialna in nak sepsak semsem zaw hi.
[9] Na a susia mite a hoih loh zah mahin a thadahte zong mihoih lo ahi hi.
[15] A thadahte lumlum a, a mawk omte a gil kial hi.
[24] A thadah mi in a khut tawh ankuang sawksukin a kam sungah a tuttohkik ding nangawn ut lo liang hi.
[4] Lo khawh hunin a kho nuam lo thadahpa in tuk anlak hun ciangin bangmah nei lo ding hi.
[13] Lumlum lecin na zawng ding a, semsem lecin na hau ding hi.
[29] A nasepna-ah a siam mahmah mi na theikha uh hiam? Amah in mi mawkmawkte’ na sem lo ding a, kumpite’ na sem ding hi.
[4] Hauhnop man bekin sum’ sila suak kei unla, a man loin gamtakha kei un.

[32] Tua bang ka muh ciangin thu ka lungngaingai a, thu manpha khat ka mukhia hi. [33] Tawmkhat ihmutna, tawmkhat lusukna, tawmkhat sung na sep lohna, khutzepin ommawkna hangin [34] i tungah zawnna hong tung a, cihmawhna in hong khuhcip hi.
[19] Nakpi takin lo a khopa hau mahmah a, bangmahin a kimang tum lo na a sempa zawng mahmah hi. [20] A citak mipa in thupha tampi ngah ding a, a hau baih nuam mipa in gim tuak pelmawh ding hi.

[15] Phalvak tungin zingtho a, annek ding teng limtakin bawlin a nasem numeite’ sep dingteng a vaihawmsak hi. [16] Amah in leitang hoih penpen zong a, a thalawhsa sum tawh a leenggui lo ding a lei hi. [17] A nik singtenin a puanban zial a, thalawp takin na a sem hi. [18] Amah in a nasepte a manphatna thei a, zankim zankhang dongin nakpitakin na a sem hi. [19] Amah in khau kheekin a puan ding gantawm hi.
[2] Thugen Siampa in hih bangin ci hi: A mawknapi, a mawknapi, na khempeuh a mawknapi. [3] Gimpi-a nisa thuakin nasepna-ah mihing in bang noptuam ngah ahi hiam?
[24] Mihing khat in a nasepna thamanin an ne tui dawnin nuamsa-in a om sangin a hoihzaw bangmah dang om lo hi. Ahi zongin tua nangawn zong, Pasian’ hang ahihna ka phawk hi.

[22] Tua ahih ciangin mihingte in a sep thaman uh ne-in nuamsa-in a om ding uh a hoihpen ahihna ka phawk hi. Tua lo a hih theih ding uh bangmah dang om lo hi. I sih khit ciangin bang piang ding cih theihtheihna bangmah om lo hi.
[9] Mi khat sangin mi nih hoihzaw hi; amau’ sepna thaman a tamzaw ngah uh hi.
[10] Na mai-ah sep ding a om khempeuh, na tha neihzah tawh sem in. Bang hang hiam cih leh na zuat ding sihna gam sungah nasepna le thungaihsutna, pilna le theihna cihte om lo hi.
[10] Amaute tungah thu hoih ding hi, ci-in thuman mite kiangah hih thu gen un. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in amau’ gamtat hoih thaman ngah ding uh hi.
[5] Inn lam unla, a sungah teng un. Huan bawl unla, a sungah na cinte uh ne un.
[4] Tu-in note kuamah lungkia kei un. Note tawh hong omkhawm ka hih manin nasep kipan un.
[6] Pasian’ deihteng sep ding a hanciamte Pasian in lungkimna ngahsak ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.
[7] Nasemte in a thaman a ngah ding a kilawm ahih mah bangin na zintunna inn mah uhah omsuak unla, a hong piak peuhpeuh uh na ne un. Na zintunna inn uh kheel themthum kei un.
[40] Martha bek in na semin manlah mahmah ahih manin a heh suak a, “Topa aw, ka naunu in kei bek na hong sepsak niloh phamawh sa lo na hi hiam? Kei hong huh nadingin hong sawl in,” a ci hi.

[48] Ahi zongin a topa’ deihna a theih lohna hangin satthuak nading a gamtakha nasem pa pen kidamsat zawdeuh ding hi. Tampi a kipiakna pa tung pan tampi kikal ding a, a tamzaw a ki-apna pa tung pan a tamzaw kikal ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[17] Ahi zongin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Ka Pa in tuni dongin na sem tawntung ahih manin kei zong ka sep ding mah ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[33] Kuama neihsa, ngun, kham, le puante en’ dingin ka ngaihsun ngei kei hi. [34] Kei le ka kithuahpihte’ kisapna khempeuh ka ngahtheih nadingin keima khut mahmah tawh na ka sepna thu note in na thei uh hi. [35] Topa Jesuh mahmah in, ‘Ngahna sangin piak khiatna-ah lungdamna lianzaw hi,’ a cihna phawkkawmin nakpitakin nasepna tawh na khempeuhah a zawngkhalte huh ding hi hang, ci-in note kiangah kong lak khinzo hi,” ci-in a vaikhak hi.
[7] A thu omzia taktak hih bang ahi hi. Israel mi a tamzaw in a hanciamciam uh ngah lo uh hi. Pasian’ teel mi tawmkhat bek in ngah uh a, adangte in Pasian’ sapna thudon lo uh hi.
[11] Thadah kei unla, nakpitakin na sem un. Lawp mahmahna lungsim tawh Topa’ na sem un.
[19] Tua ahih ciangin mi tawh kilem theih nading le kha thu-ah khatlekhat thahatna i kipiak theih nading thute hanciam ciat ni.
[8] Khaici vawh pa le tuibuak pa a kizakim ahi hi. Pasian in komau sepna tuak tawh kizui-in thaman hong pia ding hi.
[2] Nasem i cih mite pen a topa uh tungah citakin a thuman ding uh kisam hi.
[31] Tua ahih manin keimah in ka hong gennop thu in: Na hihna khempeuh uh, nekna dawnna-ah ahi zongin Pasian’ minthan nadingin na hih un.

[58] Tua ahih ciangin ka hong it sanggamte aw, Topa’ hangin na nasepnate uh a mawkna hi ngei het lo hi, ci-in na theih uh mah bangin Topa a dingin a tawntungin na sem unla, ling hetloin lungsim kiptakin na om ta un.
[11] Tua ahih manin na patsa uh thu a bei dongin zomsuak unla, na geelsa uh na tangtunsak theih nadingun na neihsa uh tawh lawptakin na sem un.
[9] Tua ahih manin na hoih sep ding cimtak kei ni. Lungkia loin i sep nakleh a hun ciangin thaman i ngah ding hi.
[28] Guta ngeite in gu nawn loin, ama nuntak nading thuman takin thalawhin, mizawngte zong a huhtheih lai nadingin thatang tawh nasep ding kipan ta uh hen.

[15] Tua ahih ciangin hoihtakin kingaihsunin gamta unla, mihaite bang hi loin mipilte bangin gamta un. [16] Tuhun pen hun hoih lo hun ahih manin na hun neih khempeuh uh a hoih lamin zang un. [17] Tua ahih manin hai ommawk kei unla, Topa in bang a sem dingin hong deih ahi hiam, ci-in kan un.

[6] A hong pahtak ding uh deihna tawh amaute’ muhsung bekin tuaci gamtat kei unla, Khrih’ sila na hihna hangun Pasian’ hong deih bangin lungsim takpi tawh na sem un. [7] Mihingte’ na a sem bang lelin kingaihsun loin Topa’ na a sem bangin kingaihsun unla, thanopna tawh sem un. [8] Salte ahi a, sal ahi lote ahi zongin na hoih a sem mi khempeuh, Topa in thaman a piak ding lamtak na thei un.

[13] Bang hang hiam cih leh note in utna lungsim na neih nading uh le ama deihna na zuihzawh nadingun note sungah Pasian in a tawntungin na a hong sem ahi hi. [14] Na khempeuh phun lo, thu nial loin sem un. [15] Tua hileh a lungsim kawi, a hoih lo leitung mite lakah paubaanna a nei lo a siangtho, Pasian’ tate na hi ding uh a, nuntakna thu na genna uh hangin leitung mite lakah khuavak bangin na hoihna uh a kilang mite na hi ding uh hi.
[12] Ahi zongin ka utna tungkhin ing, cingtaak khinta ing, a ci ka hi kei hi. Khrih Jesuh in kei a dingin a hong sepsak hamphatnate kimtakin ka ngahtheih nadingin a hanciam lai ka hi hi.
[1] Note a kipan Laodisia khuamite le kei a hong thei ngei nai lo mi khempeuhte a’ ding nangawnin hahkat takin na ka sem hi.
[23] Mite’ nasem bangin kingaihsun loin, Pasian’ nasem bangin kingaihsun unla, na sep peuhpeuh uh lungsim takpi tawh lawpin sem un.

[11] Tu ma-a ka hong gensa uh mah bangin kamtam nuam se loin hoihtakin om hithiatna, no tawh a kisai thu bek ngaihsutna, le note’ nuntak nading na na sep nading uh hanciamin nei un. [12] Tua bangin gamta le-uhcin thu um lo mite in note hong zahtak ding uh a, mite’ neihsa na duhgawh kei ding uh hi.
[14] Sanggamte aw, a thadah mite hilh unla, a meidawite hanthawnin, a zawngkhal mite huh unla, hih bang mite ngongbawl kei un.

[10] Note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-un, “Na a sem nuam lo mi peuhmah an nesak kei un,” ci-in ka hong gen uh hi. [11] Hih bangin thu ka hong genna uh pen note lakah mi pawlkhatte thadahin na sem nuam lo uh a, midangte’ nasepna va nawngkaisak zawsop hi, ci-in ka zakna hang uh ahi hi. [12] Tu-in tua bang mite in kuamah nawngkaisak nawn loin man manin na sem hiathiatin amau’ nuntak nadingun na a sep nadingun Topa Jesuh Khrih min tawh hanthawnin thu ka hong pia uh hi.
[10] A diakdiakin ei thu umte in mi khempeuh a Honkhia, a nungta Pasian muangin lamen ihih manin nakpitakin hanciamin na a sem ihi hi.
[15] Mi khempeuh in na khantohna hong muhtheih nadingin hih thute limtakin ngaihsun inla, hahkatin na sem in.
[8] Mi khatpeuh in a beh a phung, a diakdiakin a innkuansung mite a vak nop kei leh a upna a nusia hita a, thu um lo mite sangin siazaw lai hi.
[6] Hahkat takin lo a khopa in anlak hun ciangin a tampen a ngah dingin a kilawm ahi hi.
[15] Pasian’ thuman a mantakin hilhin, na nasepna-ah maizumna thuak loin, Pasian’ pahtakna na ngahtheih nadingin na siam tawpin hanciam in.
[7] Kidemna-ah ka hat tawpin ka hih khin a, a mong dongin ka tai khin a, upna thu khotakin lenin ka zokhin hi.
[12] Tua ahih ciangin a zaw nuangnuang na khutte uh le a no dakdak na khukte uh khauhsak un. [13] Bai luangluangin a paite, na guh na taang uh a kipelh loh nadingin lampi tang zui-in na pai un.

[2] “Note’ nasepna, na gimna uh le lungduai takin na thuakna uh, le migilote koihmawk loin, sawltak hi lo napi-in sawltak hi ung, a ci mite dongtelin sawltak ahihlohna uh na muhkhiatnate uh ka thei hi. [3] Note in lungduai takin thuakin, keima min hangin thuakzo-in, lungkia hetloin na omna uh ka thei hi.

[6] TOPA in Kain tungah, “Bang hangin nang heh a, bang hangin na mai sia ahi hiam? [7] Limtakin hih lecin, nang hong kisang lo ding ahi hiam? Limtakin na hih kei le nang hong hih nuamin mawhna in hong buk a, nang hong uk nuam hi. Ahih hangin nang in tua mawhna na zawh ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
