[17] “Note in na lungsim sung uhah na sanggampa uh na mudah kei ding uh a, na vengte uh tawh thu na kituah lohna uh kikum khawmin na siangsak ding uh hi; tua hikeileh ama hangin khialhna na pua ding uh hi. [18] Note in nomau’ mipihte tungah phu la loin, amau na lungsim neih kei ding uh a, nomau na ki-it uh bangin na vengte uh na it ding uh hi; kei pen TOPA ka hi hi.
[7] Amah in, ‘Pha hi!’ a cih leh na nasempa a dingin a hoih hi ding hi; ahih hangin amah a heh leh amah in siatna a ngaihsutna thei in.
[18] Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite tungah TOPA heh a, ama muhna panin amaute hemkhia hi. Kuamah dang om nawn loin Judah gammi bek omlai hi.
[11] Pasian, thu a tangin a khen pa hi a, migilote tungah a heh den pa ahi hi.

[8] Hehna panin kikham inla, sinsona nusia in. Nangmah kilungso tawmsak ke’n; tua in siatna bekah a hong paipih hi. [9] Bang hang hiam cih leh migilote kipuaseh ding a, ahih hangin TOPA a ngakte in leitung luah ding uh hi.
[8] TOPA dikin hehpihna nei a, heh hak mahmahin itna kip lianpi a nei hi.
[16] Mihaite in a hehna uh langsakpah uh a, mipilte in a hehna uh ipzo hi.
[17] A lungtom mite hai gamtat a, mipilte lungduai hi.
[29] A lungduaite mipil hi a, lungtomna pen haina kilatna ahi hi.
[1] Kam nemin dawnna in hehna damsak a, kam khauh in hehna piangsak hi.
[18] Lungtomna in kitotna piangsak a, lungduaina in kilemna piangsak hi.
[11] Pilna in mi lungduaisak a, mi’ hong hehsaknate kiphawkmawh bawlna in minthanna ahi hi.
[19] Migilo pa ama thuak ding gimna mah thuaksak zaw in. Honkhia lecin na hotkhiatkik zelzel kul ding hi.
[15] Thutangin na a kisep ciangin midik khempeuh lungdam a, ahi zongin migilote lungkham hi.
[19] A phun hat zi gilo tawh tenkhop sangin gam simthamah khat guak tangten’ hoihzaw hi.
[24] A hehbaih mite tawh kipawl kei unla, a lungtom mite tawh kikhawl kei un.
[4] Hehna le sinsona siahuai a, ahi zongin hazatna siahuaizaw lai hi.
[11] Mihai pa a hehna bangin kam pau-in gamta gawp a, mipil pa ahihleh ki-ipin a hehna damsak hi.
[22] A heh pahpahte in kitotna piangsak a, a heh baihte khial thei tawntung hi.
[8] It hun om a, muhdah hun om hi. Kido hun om a, kilem hun om hi.
[9] Heh pahpah kei in; hehna a haihuai ahi hi.
[4] TOPA in zong, “Na heh ding kilawm sa na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

[23] Tua ahih manin Pasian tungah biakna a pia dingin biakna tau mai-ah na om laitakin na sanggamte khat peuhpeuh na tungah a lungkim lohna thu na phawk leh, [24] Pasian na biak nading nate, a biakna tau mai-ah nusia photin, pai-in na sanggampa tawh va kilem phot inla, tua khit ciangin hong paikikin Pasian biakna pia in.

[1] “Pasian in note hong mawhsak loh nadingin midangte va mawhsaksak nawn kei un. [2] Bang hang hiam cih leh midangte’ thu na khenzia uh tawh kizui-in note tungah hong khen ding a, midangte tungah na zat uh ngeina mah note tungah hong zang ding hi.

[14] Biakinn huangsung a lut ciangin bawng, tuu, le kawl vakhu zuakte mu a, sumkhekte zong a sumkhekna sabuai-ah a tu mu hi. [15] Amah in zong khauteep bawlin biakinn huangsung panin tuu le bawng a kipan ganhing khempeuh hawlkhia a, sumkhekte’ sabuai zong sawnpaih sakin a sum khempeuh a thehthang sak hi. [16] Tua ciangin kawl vakhu zuakte kiangah, “Na kawl vakhute uh hih lai panin paikhiatpih un. Ka Pa’ inn pen sumzuakna inn phualpi-in nei kei un,” a ci hi.
[18] Mihingte in a mawhna le a gitlohna hangun Pasian’ thuman seelcip uh ahih manin van panin a hehna hong kilang sakin a gimpiakna dingzia hong kilangsak hi.

[19] Lawmte aw, na hehna uh kuama tungah thukkik kei unla, Pasian’ thukkik dingin koih lel un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho sungah, “Keimah in amaute tungah ka thuk ding a, midangte a gimsak bangun ka gimsak ding hi, Topa in ci hi,” ci-in kigelh hi. [20] Tua ahih ciangin Lai Siangtho sungah, “Na galte uh a gil a kial leh an na pia un. A dang a taak leh tui na pia un. Tua bangin na gamtat uhleh amaute’ maizum nadingin a bawl na hi uh hi,” ci-in a kigelh bangin gamtazaw un. [21] Tua ahih manin gitlohna kizosak kei unla, a pha gamtatna tawh gitlohnate a zo na hi ta un.

[20] milim biakna, mi bumna, kilangbawlna, kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, kikhenna, pawltuam lungsim neihna, [21] enna, zukhamna le biakna pawi-ah zukhamna a kipan adangdangte ahi hi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian’ Ukna sungah omkha het lo ding hi.

[3] A taktakin eite khempeuh zong amaute mah i bang ngei a, i pianpih lungsim zui-in nungta-in, i pumpi le i lungsim deihna bangin i gamta hi. Tua ahih manin eite khempeuh zong Pasian’ hehna hangin gim a thuak dingte ihi hi. [4] Tua bang hinapi-in Pasian’ hong hehpihna le eite hong itna lian mahmah ahih manin, [5] i mawhna hangin kha thu tawh kisai-in misi ihih laitakin Khrih tawh eite hong nungtasak hi. Pasian’ hehpihna hangin hotkhiatna a ngah thei ihi hi.
[18] a ngaihsutnate uh khuamial tawh kibang hi. Amaute’ lungsim khauhin bangmah thei het lo uh ahih manin Pasian’ hong piak nuntakna neikha het lo uh hi.
[26] Na heh uh ciangin, tua hehna hangin khialkha kei unla, a tawntungin heh paisuak kei un. [27] Dawimangpa in hong suksiat theih nading hun omsak kei un.

[31] Kimuhdahna, hehna, thangpaihna, kitotna, kikona, kilungsim neihna khempeuh beisak unla, [32] khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim nem tawh na kihozaw unla, Khrih’ hangin Pasian in note’ mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.

[7] Note pen hih bangin gamta-in a nungta ngeite na hi uh hi. [8] Ahi zongin tu-in hehna, thangpaihna, muhdahna, gensiatna, kam hoih lo pauna cihte nei nawn kei un. [9] Ngeina lui le gamtatna lui khempeuh a beisakkhin na hihna uh kithei-in khatlekhat tungah zuauthu kigen nawn kei unla,

[13] Note lakah khatlekhat a kilungkim lo na om uh ciangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh kimaisakin na kihuh ciat un. Topa in note’ mawhna hong maisak bangin note zong khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ding uh hi.
[21] Pate aw, na tate un a thuak zawh loh zah dong dingin thuhilhin taii niloh kei un.

[23] Thu kihai seelna, thei lo pi-a thu kinialnate na pelh in. Tua bangte in kitotna a piansak lamtak na theihsa ahi hi. [24] Topa’ na a sem mite, kitot a hatte hi lo ding a, mi khempeuh tungah lungsim nemin, thugen siamin, thuakzawhna nei-in,

[2] Pasal khanghamte a kilawm a kituakin a omtheih nading, thu ngaihsun thei mi ahih nading, a kikemzo mite ahih theih nading, upna man a neihtheih nading, itna man a neihtheih nading uh le a manin lungkipin a thuakzawh nadingun na gen in.
[27] Moses pen kumpipa’ heh ding lau hetloin Egypt gam panin paikhia a, a kimu thei lo Pasian a mu bang keekin a nungkik hetlohna zong a upna hang mah ahi hi.
[20] Mihingte’ hehna in Pasian’ sep ding thuhoihte khaktan hi.

[1] Note lakah a om kitotna le kilaina koi panin hong piang ahi hiam? Deihluatna lungsim na neih manun note’ pumsung a kitoktok niloh ahi hi. [2] Na na deih uh a, ahi zongin nei lo na hih manun mi na thatnuam uh hi. Nate deihna lungsim na nei uh a, ahi zongin ngah zo lo na hih manun kitawngin na kilailawh uh hi. Pasian kiangah na deih uh ngen lo na hih manun a ngah lo na hi uh hi.

[11] Sanggamte aw, khatlekhat kigensia kei un. A mipihte gensia-in thu a khente in Thukham gensia-in thu a khen ahi hi. Thukham na gensiat uhleh Thukham a zui hi loin thu a khen na hi uh hi. [12] Thukham a pia pa le thu a khen pa pen Pasian bek hi a, amah bek in hong honkhiazo a, hong susiazo hi. Tua ahih manin bang hangin na mipihte uh gensia-in thu a khenthei dingin kingaihsun zenzen na hi uh hiam?
[19] Amah in, “Keima hoihna khempeuh na mai-ah ka paisak ding a, na mai-ah keima min, ‘ TOPA’ cihna ka pulak ding hi. Ka diknopna mite tungah ka dik ding a, ka hehpihnop mite ka hehpih ding hi.
[6] Na hoihna le nong itna in ka khantawnin a hong zuih ding tel takin-ah ka thei ta a, a tawntungin na inn sungah ka om ding hi.

[8] TOPA dikin hehpihna tawh kidim a, heh hakin, a lian mahmah itna kip tawh a kidim hi. [9] Amah in a tawntungin hong taii ngitnget lo ding a, amah heh paisuak lo ding hi. [10] Amah in eite’ khialhna tawh a kituakin eite tungah hong bawl lo a, eite’ mawhna tawh a kituakin hong thukkik lo hi. [11] Vantung pen leitung panin a san mah bangin amah a zahtakte’ tungah ama itna kip lianin sang mahmah hi. [12] Nisuahna pen nitumna panin a gamlat mah bangin i mawhna hangin gimnate eite’ kiang panin gamlapi-ah a nilkhia hi. [13] Pa in tate a hehpih bangin TOPA in amah a zahtakte hong hehpih hi.

[2] TOPA in hong genin-ah: “Namsau tawh thahna a thuak lote in gamlakah hehpihna a mu ding uh hi. Israel mite in tawldamna ding a zon laitakun, [3] gamlapi pek panin TOPA ka kilang hi. Keimah in nang kong it tawntung a, tua ahih manin nang’ tungah kong thuman tawntung hi.
[22] A bei thei lo TOPA’ hong itna le a hehpihna a kizom paisuak hi a,

[17] Vanglian TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Tua a kiciamteh mite pen keima mite hi ding uh hi. Keimah in na ka sep ni ciangin amaute pen keima neihtuam taktak mite hi ding uh hi. Pa in ama thu a mang a tapa a hehpih mah bangin kei zong amaute ka hehpih ding hi.

[45] Tua hileh vantungah a om na Pa uh tate na hi thei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in mihoihte le misiate tungah a kibangin ni taangsak khawm a, a gamtat phate le a gamtat siate tungah zong a kibang mahin guah zusak khawm hi.

[10] A kuan masa pente, ni tha sang dingin hong pai uh ciangin adangte sangin tam ngahzaw ding ci-in amau kilamen napi-in amaute zong ngun peek khat ciat mah kipia veve hi. [11] A sum a san uh ciangin lo nei pa tungah phun uh a, [12] ‘A nunungte in nai khat sung bek sem napi-in, sunthapai-in nisa thuakin na a sem kote tawh na kikimsak hi,’ a ci uh hi. [13] Tua ciangin lo nei pa in amaute khat kiangah, ‘Lawm aw, nang ka hong khem het kei hi. Ni khat sung nasep thaman dingin ngun peek khat piak dingin na thukimsa hi lo ahi hiam? [14] Hih na thalawhsa sum la inla ciah in. Nang ka hong piakzah mah, hih a kicial nunungte tungah zong ka pia nuam hi. [15] Keima sum pen keima ut bangin ka zattheih ding hi lo ahi hiam? Tua ahih kei leh kei ka cit manin na heh suak ahi hiam?’ a ci hi.
[16] A kicing ama hong itna hangin eite khempeuh tungah thupha a banbanin hong pia hi.

[16] Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawn loin a hin tawntung theih nadingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi. [17] Pasian in leitungah a Tapa hong sawlna pen mawhsakna thukhen dingin a hong paisak hi loin, leitung mite a honkhia dingin a hong paisak hizaw hi.
[24] “A mantakin kong genin-ah: Ka thugennate za-in kei hong sawl pa a um khempeuh a nungta paisuak ding hita hi. Mawhsak thukhenna ngah nawn loin, sihna panin a hingkik ta ahi hi.
[63] Nuntakna a piathei pen Pasian’ Kha hi a, mihingte’ hihtheih bangmah om lo hi. Keima hong gen thute pen nuntakna a hong piathei tua Kha thu ahi hi.

[34] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “A mantakin ci lehang mawhna a bawl mi peuhmah mawhna’ sila ahi uh hi. [35] Silate pen innkuan mite tawh omkhawm paisuak lo a, tapa ahihleh om paisuak hi. [36] Tua ahih manin Tapa in note hong khah le a suakta takpi na hi uh hi.

[16] Note in kei na hong teel kei uh a, ahi zongin keimah in note ka hong teel a, note va pai-in a kimang tawntung ding gah a gah dingin ka hong seh hi. Tua ahih manin keima min suangin Pa kiangah na nget peuhpeuh uh hong pia ding hi.
[3] Nang bek a man Pasian na hihna thu le nangmah in na hong sawl Jesuh Khrih hong theihna pen amaute a dingin nuntak tawntung ngah nading lampi ahi hi.

[12] Ama hang bek tawh hotkhiatna kingah thei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh eite in hotkhiatna i ngahtheih nadingin leitung khempeuhah Pasian in hong piak min dang khat zong om lo hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
[16] Lungdamna Thu ka muang mahmah hi. Tua thu pen a masa-in Jew mi, tua zomin minam dangte, thu um mi khempeuh a honkhiazo Pasian’ vangliatna ahi hi.
[23] Mi khempeuh mawh ciat uh a, a hong honkhia Pasian tawh kigamla uh hi. [24] Ahi zongin Pasian in a hong hehpihna hangin Khrih Jesuh tawh hong tatkhiat manin amah tawh i kipawlthei kik hi.

[16] Tua ahih manin Abraham’ suanlekhakte khempeuh tungah Pasian’ hehpihna piakkhong a suahtheih nadingin Thukham a zuite bek in ngah loin, Abraham’ up bangin a umte in zong a ngahtheih nadingun upna bulphuhin thuciamna kipia hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Abraham pen kha thu lamah eite khempeuh’ pupi ahi hi.

[1] Tu-in upna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl khinta ihih manin i Topa Jesuh Khrih hangin Pasian tawh a kilemkik ta ihi hi. [2] Ama hangin upna tawh tu-a i omna Pasian hehpihna sungah a tung ihi a, Pasian tawh minthanna ngahkhawm ding, ci-in lamen ihih manin i lung a dam hi.

[6] Eite cimawhin i om laitakin Pasian’ hoihsak hunin ei mi gilote a dingin Khrih hong si hi. [7] Mihoih khat a dingin a si ngam a omkha ahi zongin thukham zuizo mipa a dingin sih ngam nading a thu haksa mahmah khat ahi hi. [8] Ahi zongin eite mawhna nei ihih laitakin eite a dingin Khrih hong si ahih manin Pasian in eite hong it mahmahna thu hong lak khin hi.

[15] Ahi zongin Pasian’ hong piak letsong pen Adam’ mawhna tawh kibang lo ahih manin tua tegel tehkak theih ding hi lo hi. Tua mi khat a khialhna hangin mi tampi a sihna pen a man mah ahi hi. Ahi zongin Pasian’ hong itna le hong hehpihna nakpitakin lianzaw lai a, mi khat ahi tua Jesuh Khrih’ hehpihna hangin mi tampi tak tungah hong kipia letsong lian mahmah hi. [16] Pasian’ letsong le mi khat’ mawhna a hatna zia kilamdang hi. Khialhna khat a om khit ciangin, “Mawh hi,” ci-in thukhenna kipia a, ahi zongin khialhna tampi tak a om khit ciangin a kilawm lopi mahin, “Dik hi,” cihna piakkhong thupha a om hi. [17] Mi khat bek’ mawhna hangin sihna in hong uk ahihleh mi khat mah ahi Jesuh Khrih hangin nakpitakin a lian Pasian’ hehpihna le mihoih-a sanna a ngah mite nungta-in thahatzaw kan ding uh hi. [18] Tua hi a, khialhna khat in mi khempeuh tungah thukhenna tungsak ahih mah bangin gamtatna hoih khat mah in mi khempeuh khahin nungtasak hi. [19] Mi khat in thu a man loh manin mi tampi mimawh a suahsak mah bangin mi khat in thu a manna hangin mi tampi in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna a ngah ding uh ahi hi. [20] Khialhna a tam semsem nadingin thukham hong kipia hi. Ahi zongin khialhna a tamna munah Pasian’ hehpihna hong lianzaw zel hi. [21] Tua ahih manin mawhna thahatin hong sihsak mah bangin, i Topa Jesuh Khrih hangin Pasian’ hehpihna thahat zaw lai a, mihoihin hong sangin nuntak tawntungna sung a hong tunpih hi.

[1] Tua ahihleh Pasian’ hehpihna a liattheih nadingin mawhna bawlbawl ding ihi hiam? [2] Tua bang hi dek lo ding hi. Mawhna thu-ah a si eite in bangci-in mawhna bawl thei nawn ding ihi hiam? [3] Khrih Jesuh tawh i kipawl theih nadingin ama sungah a kiphum eite pen ama sihna mahah zong a sikhawm ihihlam thei lo na hi uh hiam? [4] I Pa’ vangliatna tawh sihna panin Khrih a kithawhkiksak mah bangin eite zong nuntakna thak i nuntak theih nadingin tui i kiphum ciangin amah tawh kiphum khawmin a sikhawm ihi hi.

[14] Note pen thukham’ sawlna hangin nasem hi loin Pasian’ hong lah thuhoihte’ hangin nasem na hih uh manin mawhna’ sawlna mangin na gamta nawn kei un. [15] Eite pen thukham’ uk hi loin Pasian’ hehpihna in hong uk ahih manin mawhna i gamta kei ding hi. [16] Mi khatpeuh’ thu a mang dingin ama khut sungah na kipiak uh ciangin a thu na mante uh’ sila na hi uh hi. Mawhna na bawl uhleh sihna a thuak ding na hi uh a, thumangin na om uhleh Pasian tawh pawlkhat a suak ding na hi uh hi.

[22] Ahi zongin tu-in mawhna bawlnopna panin suakta-in Pasian’ khutsung mi na hita uh hi. Tua thu hangin na ngah uh na pen Pasian a dingin a kipia khin nuntakna hi a, a tawntung nuntakna tawh a kizom ahi hi. [23] Bang hang hiam cih leh mawhna in thaman hong piak pen sihna hi a, ahi zongin i Topa Jesuh tawh i kipawl manin Pasian’ hong piakkhong pen nuntak tawntungna ahi hi.

[1] Ahi zongin tu-in ahihleh Khrih Jesuh tawh kipawlin a nungta mite pen mawhna thukhenna tawh kipelh hi. [2] Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih Jesuh tawh a hong kipawlsak Kha Siangtho in mawhna le sihna a piangsak thukham panin kei hong suaktasak khinta hi. [3] Mihingte thahat lo ihih manin Thukham in ahih zawh loh thute Pasian in a hihzo hi. Mawhna a beisak theih nadingin mihingte sunga om mawhna tungah thu a khenna-in ama Tapa hong sawl a, amah pen mihingte’ mawhna lungsim mah a nei-in a hong pai hi. [4] Eite’ deihna bangin nungta loin Pasian’ Kha Siangtho’ deihna bangin a nungta eite sungah Thukham’ deihna teng a kicin theih nadingin Pasian in a Tapa a hong sawl ahi hi.

[11] Sihna panin Jesuh a thokiksak Pasian’ Kha Siangtho note sungah hong om leh sihna panin Khrih a hingkik sakpa mah in note sungah a om ama Kha Siangtho mah tawh a sithei pumpi a hong nungtasak ding hi.

[15] Note tungah Pasian in a hong piak a Kha Siangtho in note na lau nadingun sila-in a hong bawl hi lo a, Kha Siangtho in Pasian’ tate a hong suaksak ahi zaw hi. Tua Kha Siangtho mah in Pasian pen, “Pa aw, Pa aw,” hong ci theisak hi. [16] Eite, Pasian’ tate ihihna thu eima lungsim bek in a gen hi loin Pasian’ Kha Siangtho in zong hong genpih hi.
[33] Pasian in mawh lo hi, ci-in a gen khitsa ahih manin, Pasian’ teelsa mite tungah kua in mawhna guanthei nawn ding ahi hiam?

[14] Tua bang ahihleh Pasian thutang lo hi, a kici thei ding hiam? Kici thei lo ding hi. [15] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in Moses kiangah, “Ka hehpih nopte ka hehpih ding a, ka khasiat nopte ka khasiat ding hi,” ci hi. [16] Tua ahih ciangin mite’ utna le sepna tawh kisai lo a, Pasian’ hehpihna bek tawh kisaizaw hi.
[9] Jesuh pen Topa hi, ci-in mite kiangah genin, Pasian in sihna panin amah hingkiksak zo hi, ci-in na lungsim sung uhah na up taktak uhleh hotkhiatna na ngah ding uh hi.

[5] Tua mah bangin tuhunin zong Pasian in ama hehpihna tawh a teelsa mi tawmkhat omlai hi. [6] A teelna ah mite’ nasepna bulphuhin a teel hi loin ama dikna hangin a teel hizaw hi. Pasian in mihingte’ nasepna bulphuhin a teel hileh Pasian’ dikna pen dikna kici thei lo ding hi.

[1] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Pasian in eite tam veipi tak hong hehpih ahih manin ama lungkim nading le ama nasep nadingin nomau mahmah a hingtangin Pasian tungah na kipiak nadingun ka hong thum hi. Tua banga kipiakna pen Pasian biakna man taktak ahi hi. [2] Leitung mihingte’ gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahphasak un. Tua hileh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkimsakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian’ deihna na phawk thei ding uh hi. [3] Pasian in kei tungah hehpihna hong piakkhongna hangin note tungah kong gennop thu in: Note tawh a kituakzah valin kilian ngaihsutzaw kha kei un. Pasian in note tungah upna hong piakzah tawh kizui-in kingaihsun bek zaw unla, a kilawm ciang khat bekin kingaihsun un.
[6] Tua ahih manin Pasian in hehpihna hong piakkhongna tawh kizui-in i siamna a tuamtuamte zang ciat ni. I siamna pen Pasian’ thu gentheih nading siamna ahih leh i upna neihzah tawh kizui-in gen ni.

[10] Tua bang hitaseleh Pasian’ hehpihna tawh tu-a ciangah ka om a, kei tungah a hong piak ama hehpihna a mawkna suak lo hi. Sawltak dangte khempeuh sangin na nakpitakin ka sem zawsop hi. Tua ka sepzawhna pen keima hatna hang hi loin Pasian’ hong hehpihna hang ahi hi.

[17] Tua ahih manin mi khatpeuh, Khrih tawh a kipawl ciangin mi thak suak a, a mi lui ngeina bei-in a mi thak ngeina a neita ahi hi. [18] Hih thu khempeuh Pasian’ vaihawm hi a, eite pen Pasian’ gal hinapi-in Khrih hangin amah tawh a kilem mi hong hisak a, kote tungah tua kilem nading nasep hong pia hi. [19] Tua ahih manin kote’ thugen bulpi in: Pasian in mite’ mawhnate ngaihsun nawn loin, Khrih hangin leitung mi khempeuh le amah a kilemin hong bawl a, tua kilemna thu a gen dingin kote hong seh hi.

[8] Tua natna tawh ka kipelh theih nadingin Topa kiangah thumvei tak thu ka ngen hi. [9] Ahi zongin Topa in kei kiangah, “Na tha a nem ciangin keima vangliatna hat mahmah ahih manin nangma kisapna pen keima hehpihna hi bek hi,” ci-in hong dawng hi. Tua ahih manin keima sungah Khrih vangliatna hong omtheih nadingin lungdam takin ka thaneemna ka kisialhpih semsem hi. [10] Kei ka thaneem mahmah laitakin a thahat mahmah suak ka hih manin Khrih hangin ka thaneemna, simmawh ka thuakna, haksatna, bawlsiatna le lungkhamna ka thuaknate tawh ka lung a kim mahmah hi.

[15] Ahi zongin Pasian in a hong hehpihna tawh ka suahma pekin kei hong teelin ama na a sem dingin hong sam khin hi. Keimah in ama Tapa hanga lungdamna thu, Gentail mite lakah ka hilhtheih nadingin kei tungah a Tapa hong kilatsak hun laitakin kuama kiangah thu dongin ka pai kei a,

[16] Ahi zongin Jesuh Khrih upna hang bek tawh Pasian tawh kipawl theihna kingahin, Thukham zuihna hang tawh kingah ngei lo hi, ci-in ka thei uh hi. Kote mahmah in zong, Khrih hangin Pasian tawh ka kipawl theih nadingun Jesuh Khrih ka um uh a, Thukham deihna ka zuihna hang uh tawh hi lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Thukham zuihna hang tawh kuamah in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna ngah zo lo hi.

[19] Thukham tawh kisai-in ahihleh Pasian a dingin ka nuntak theih nadingin tua Thukham mah in kei hong thatkhin ahih manin Thukham tawh kisai thu-ah misi bang ka hi hi. Singlamteh tungah Khrih a kithah lai-in kei zong amah tawh a sikhawm ka hi hi. [20] Tua ahih manin tuhuna ka nuntakna zia pen kei hang hi nawn loin ka sungah a hong om Khrih hang ahi hi. Tua hi a, keimah hong itin, keima a dingin a nuntakna a hong pia Pasian’ Tapa ka muanna tawh tu laitakin a nungta ka hi hi. [21] Hih bang ka gen ciangin Pasian’ hehpihna thupha ka deih lohna ahi kei a, Thukham zuihzawhna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna om hileh, singlamteh tungah Khrih sihna a mawkna hi lel ding hi, a cinuam ka hizaw hi.

[17] Tu-in ka hong gennop thu in: Pasian in Abraham tawh thuciamna bawl a, tua a thuciamna peksat sawm lo hi. Tua ahih manin tua thuciamna a kibawlzawh kum zali le kum sawmthum khit ciangin a kinung piak Thukham in tua thuciamna peksatin phiat thei lo ding hi. [18] Pasian’ hong piakkhong pen Thukham zuihna hang tawh a kingah hi mawk leh piak ding hong ciamna hangin a kingah hi nawn lo ding hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in Abraham tungah letsong a piakna pen a thuciamnasa tawh kizui-in a piak ahi hi.
[4] Thukham zuihna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theih nading a hanciamte pen Khrih tawh a kikhen na hi uh a, Pasian’ hehpihna in note hong huam thei lo hi.
[7] Khrih hong sihna hangin eite in suahtakna ngahin, i mawhnate hong kimaisak ahi hi. Tuazah dongin Pasian’ hong hehpihna thu bangzah takin lian ahi hiam?

[4] Tua bang hinapi-in Pasian’ hong hehpihna le eite hong itna lian mahmah ahih manin, [5] i mawhna hangin kha thu tawh kisai-in misi ihih laitakin Khrih tawh eite hong nungtasak hi. Pasian’ hehpihna hangin hotkhiatna a ngah thei ihi hi. [6] Khrih Jesuh tawh eite i kipawlna hangin vantungah amah tawh i ukkhawm theih nadingin sihna panin Pasian in a hong thokhawmsak hi. [7] Khrih Jesuh tungtawnin a hong lah ama hehpihna le a hong itna bangzah takin lianin lamdang ahi hiam, ci-in a hong tung ding hunah a hong lah tawntung theih nadingin hih bangin a hong thokhawmsak ahi hi. [8] Note’ upna hangin Pasian’ hong hehpihna tawh hotkhiatna a ngah na hi uh hi. Note’ thalawhna hangin a ngah hi loin Pasian’ hong piakkhong ahi hi. [9] Note’ hanciamna tawh a ngah hi lo na hih manun na kisialh nading uh a thu om lo hi.
[1] No Gentail mite hangin Jesuh Khrih thu tawh kisai-in thongkia keimah Paul in Pasian kiangah thu ka ngen hi.
[6] Note sungah hih nasep hoih a hong pankhia Pasian in Jesuh Khrih hong paikik hun ciang dong, mi cingtaak na hih nadingun hong huh ding hi, ci-in teltakin ka thei hi.

[7] Amah kiniamkhiat tawm zaw a, nasem lim a hong puazaw hi. Mihing bangin amah hong kibawl a, mihing teekteek mah a hong sun hi. [8] Amah hong kiniamkhiat tawm a, singlamteh tung nangawnah sih ding a ut hi.
[23] Topa Jesuh Khrih hehpihna thupha, note khempeuh tungah hong tung tahen.
[13] Amah in khuamial vangliatna panin eite hong honkhia-in, a lungmuanhuaina mun, a it a Tapa’ ukna sungah hong koih a, [14] tua a Tapa in eite hong khahkhia a, i mawhna hong kimaisak khinta hi.

[13] A beisa hunah na mawhna uh hangin kha thu tawh kisai-in misi na hi uh a, Gentail mi na hih manun Thukham nei lote na hi uh hi. Ahi zongin Khrih hangin Pasian in note hong hingsak a, i mawhna khempeuh hong maisak khinta hi. [14] Eite a dingin a hoih lo, i mawhna a kiciamtehna khempeuh, hong phiatsak a, tuate khempeuh singlamteh tungah kilhcipin a beisak ta hi. [15] Amah in huihlak a ukte le vangliatna a nei khempeuh, singlamteh tungah zogawp khin a, galzote in a sal matte a kaih uh bangin mi khempeuh muhin a gualzawhna a lak hi.
[16] I Topa Jesuh Khrih mahmah leh, eite hong itin, a hong hehpihna tawh thakhauhna le lametna a hong pia tawntung eite’ Pa Pasian in

[15] Khrih Jesuh, mawhneite a honkhia dingin leitungah hong pai hi, cihna thu a man hi a, a uphuai a sanhuai thu ahi hi. Keimah zong tua mawhnei mite lakah a mawhpha bel ka hi hi. [16] A mawhnei pha bel ka hihna thu hang mahin, nidang ciangin amah umin nuntak tawntungna a ngah ding mite’ etteh theih dingin Khrih Jesuh in a lungduaina cingtakin kei tungah hong lahtheih nadingin Pasian in kei a hong hehpih ahi hi.

[9] Eite’ sepzawhna hang hi loin ama ngimnasa bang leh a dikna hangin Pasian in eite hong honkhia-in ama mi dingin a hong sam hi. Pasian in leitung a pianma pekin Khrih Jesuh tungtawnin tua dikna a hong piak hi a,
[1] Ka ta aw, nang na hih leh Khrih Jesuh tawh i kipawl manin i ngah hehpihna hangin thahatin om in.
[22] Topa in nangmah hong ompih tahen. Note khempeuh tungah Pasian’ hehpihna thupha hong tung tahen.

[11] Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh in hotkhiatna a ngahtheih nadingun Pasian in ama hehpihna hong lak khinzo hi. [12] Eite in i lamet, a lian Pasian le eite hong Hon Jesuh Khrih a vangliatna hong kilatkik ding hun ngakin i om laitakin i biakna tawh a kituak lo thute le leitung nate deihna phiatin, lungsim hi hithiatin omin, thutangin, hih leitungah Pasian’ deihna bangin i nuntak nadingin tua hehpihna thu in eite hong hilh hi.

[4] Ahi zongin eite hong Honpa ahi Pasian’ itna le a migitna thu hong kilat ciangin, [5] amah in eite hong honkhia hi. Eite in na hoih i sepzawhna hangin hong honkhia hi loin eite tungah suahtakna le nuntakna thak a hong pia Kha Siangtho in hong sawpsiangna hangin a hong hehpihna tawh a hong honkhia ahi hi. [6] Pasian in eite hong Hon Jesuh Khrih hangin eite tungah a kicing takin Kha Siangtho hong pia ahih manin, [7] ama hong hehpihna hangin Pasian tawh kilemin i lamet nuntak tawntungna a ngah thei ihi hi.

[9] Ahi zongin Pasian’ hehpihna hangin mi khempeuh a dingin Jesuh a sih theih nadingin tawlkhat sung vantung mite sangin a neuzaw-in a kibawlna i mu a, sihna a thuakna hangin minthanna le pahtawina a ngahna thu i thei hi.

[16] Ama lunghihmawh pen vantung mite hi lo a, Abraham’ suanlekhakte a lunghimawh ahihna thu hong kitel hi. [17] Tua ahih manin mihingte’ mawhna a kimaisak theih nadingin Pasian’ na a sepna-ah mite a dingin hehpihna le cihtakna tawh Siampi Lianpen a suahtheih nadingin a sanggamte tawh a kibangin mihing lim a hong puak ding a kisam ahi hi.
[16] Tua ahih manin a kisap hunin, eite a hong huh dingin hehpihna le dikna thupha i ngahtheih nadingin, kimuanna lungsim tawh hehpihna tokhom va zuan ciat ni.
[14] Mawhna panin a sianthosak mite, khatvei bek biakpiakna a bawlna tawh siangtho paisuaksak hi.
[15] Pasian’ hehpihna a ngahlah na hihkhak loh nadingun na kidawm un. Zungkha a nei singkung hong khangin mi tampi gimsakin a siatsak bangin mite a siasak na hihkhak loh nadingun na kidawm un.

[9] Thuhilhna lamdang a tuamtuamte zui-in lam man panin pialkha kei un. A zui mite tungah bangmah phattuamna a piangsak thei lo annek tuidawn tawh kisai ngeina zuihna in thahatna hong pia thei lo a, Pasian’ hehpihna bek in i lungsim hong thahatsak thei hi.

[2] Pa Pasian in ama ngimnasa bangin note hong teel a, note in Jesuh Khrih’ thu mangin, ama sisan tawh sianthona a ngah dingin a Kha Siangtho tawh note mi siangtho-in a hong bawl hi. Note tungah hehpihna le nopsakna thupha hong tam tun semsem tahen. [3] I Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pa Pasian tungah lungdam ni. Ama hong hehpih mahmahna hangin sihna panin Jesuh Khrih a thawhkik sakna tawh eite tungah nuntakna thak a hong pia hi. Tua ahih manin i lametna kiam ngei lo a, [4] Pasian in ama mite a dingin a koih thuphate i ngah nadingin lamenin i om hi. Tua thuphate sia ngei lo, nin ngei lo, mual ngei loin a om tawntungna vantungah note a dingin a hong koihsak hi.

[9] Ahi zongin note pen Pasian in a hong teelkhiat minam, Kumpi siampi pawl, a siangtho minam, Pasian’ mite na hi uh a, khuamial sung panin a lamdang mahmah ama khuavak sungah a hong samkhia pa’ nasepna a lamdangte a genkhia dingin Pasian in a hong teel mite na hi uh hi. [10] Nidangin Pasian’ mi na hihloh uh hangin tu-in ama mi na hi uh a, nidangin Pasian’ hehpihna na theih loh uh hangin tu-in ama hehpihna na ngah uh hi.

[10] Tawlkhat na thuak khit uh ciangin, Khrih tawh na kipawlna hangun tawntung minthanna a ngah dingin note a hong sam, hehpihna kicingin a nei Pasian in note a cingtaakin hong bawl ding a, kipna, thahatna, bulkip kician hong pia ding hi.
[2] Pasian le i Topa Jesuh na theihna uh hangin hehpihna le nopsakna thupha note tungah tampi tak hong tung tahen.
[18] Hehpihna thu le i Topa le Honpa Jesuh Khrih theihna thu-ah na khangto semsem zaw un. Tuhun a kipanin a tawntungin amah in minthanna ngah paisuak tahen. Amen.
[10] Hih ka gen itna pen eite in Pasian i itna thu hi lo a, Pasian in eite hong itin, i mawhna a maitheih nadingin a Tapa a hong paisakna thu ahi hi.

[4] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ thu a ngaihsun lo mi pawlkhat, eite lakah kuama phawk lohin hong lutsim uh a, amaute’ mawh gamtat ngamnate a seelna-un Pasian’ hehpihna thupha a lehlamin hei-in, eite in khat bek i neih i Mangpa le i Topa ahi Jesuh Khrih a nial uh hi. Hih bang mite’ gimthuak ding thu tanglai pekin Lai Siangtho in a gensa thu ahi hi.
[10] Amaute nakpitakin awngin, “Tokhom tungah a tu i Pasian le Tuuno pen eite a hong honkhia ahi uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
[22] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka hehna in mei tawhkuang a, Leinuaite’ gamdong a kuang hi. Leitung le a tunga piangte kangtum a, mualte’ bulpite kuangsak hi.
[6] Leinuai khaute in kei hong kancip a, sihna thangte in kei hong dawntuah hi.
[8] Vantung sangin Pasian sangzaw a, ahi zongin tua vantung nangawn na banzo kei hi. Pasian in leinuai thu thei a, ahi zongin nangmah in tua thu na thei kei hi.
[6] Pasian’ muhna-ah misite’ gam kilang sinsen a, a muh theih loh nadingin a liah bangmah om lo hi.
[17] Pasian a mangngilh minam khempeuh sung panin migilote, Leinuai-ah pai ding uh hi.
[10] Bang hang hiam cih leh Leinuai nong zuansak kei a, na mihoih pa Leihawmpi na musak kei hi.
[5] Leinuai sihna khaute in kei hong kancip a, sihna thangte in kei hong dawntuah hi.
[15] Amau’ tungah sihna tungsak in. Leinuai-ah a hingtangin amaute paisuk sak inla, amaute launa lianpi tawh a han uhah paisak in.
[13] Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah na hong itna kip lian mahmah a, Leinuai thuk sung panin kei nong honkhia khin hi.
[3] Sihna khau in kei hong gakcip hi. Leinuai sihna in kei hong mancip a, natna le lungkhamna ka thuak hi.
[8] Vantungah kahto leng tua lai-ah nang na om ding a, Leinuai misite’ gamah lupna bawlta leng zong tua lai-ah zong nang na om veve ding hi.
[5] Amah in sihna gamah nang hong paipih ding a, ama tot lampi pen sihna mun tunna lampi ahi hi.
[27] Tua bang numei zuihna pen sihna gam zuatna hi a, sih baihna ding lampi zuatna ahi hi.
[18] Tua lai-ah a paite a sihna thu tua lai-ah a lutsate sihna gam thuk sungah a om khitna thu, a khemzawh mite in phawkkha lo uh hi.
[11] Sihna gam sungah a omte nangawn Pasian in mu ahihleh, mihingte’ ngaihsutna tel muhzaw kan ding hi lo ahi hiam?
[24] Mipilte in nuntakna lampi zuito uh a, sihna lampi zuisuk lo uh hi.
[20] Mihingte’ lungsim pen misite’ gam tawh kibang a, tamlua cih hun nei thei lo hi.
[14] Tua ahih ciangin Leinuai in a duhna khangsakin bangmah tawh a kiteh thei lo zahin a kam ka beba a, Jerusalem’ hoihna teng, a mipite, a mihonte, ama sunga a lungdam mite, a nawmvalh hi.

[9] “Nang na paisuk ciangin a hong dawntuah dingin Leinuai-a misite kihanthawn a, nangmah a hong hopih dingin leitungah a lian ngei misi uliante kipusuak sak hi. A minamte’ kumpite khempeuh amau’ kumpi tokhom panin hong ding uh hi.
[15] Ahih hangin nang pen Leinuai thuk penna Leihawm sungah hong kikoih suk ding hi.

[15] “Eite in sihna tawh thuciamna khat i bawl khin a, Leinuai tawh thukimna khat i neizo hi. A tuumcip ding tuiciin hong tun ciangin eite hong ban lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh zuauthu i bel a, zuauna-ah i bu hi,” na ci uh hi.
[18] Tua ciangin sihna tawh na thuciamna uh kiphiat ding a, Leinuai tawh na thukimna uh kip lo ding hi. A tuumcip ding tuiciin in a hong nawk ciangin note hong sugawp ding hi.

[14] Zion-a a om mawhnei mite lau uh a, Pasian’ thu a ngaihsun lo mite lau-in lingcip uh hi. Amaute in, “Pasian’ thukhenna pen a kuang tawntung mei tawh kibang hi. Tua bang meikuang kua in thuakzo ding ahi hiam?” ci uh hi.
[9] Molek pasian kiangah a pai dingin sathau tawh khual na zin a, na paknamtuite tawh na siam tawpin na kipuah hi. Nang in gamlapi-ah na tangmite na sawl a, Leinuai dong nangawnah na paisak hi.

[24] Amaute a ciah uh ciangin kei hong lehdo mite’ luanghawmte en ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau a ne thante si ngei loin, amau a kihalna mei mit ngei lo ding a, amaute pen mi khempeuh’ kih hi ding hi, a ci hi.

[20] A si ding pa pen a mawh mipa ahi hi. Ta in pa’ mawhna thuak lo ding a, tua mah bangin pa in ta’ mawhna thuak lo ding hi. Mihoih pa in a hoihna thaman ngah ding a, migilo pa in a gitlohna thaman thuak ding hi.

[16] Misite’ omna Leinuai khua-ah tua singkung ka khiatsuk ciangin, a kiatna ging in minam khempeuh lokgawp ding hi. Tua singkung a kiat manin Eden singkung khempeuh, le a hoihpen, limtakin tui a ngah Lebanon singkungte khempeuh in zong Leinuai-ah nuamtuam na sa ding uh hi. [17] Bang hang hiam cih leh a sisate a zuan dingin misite’ omna Leinuai-ah amah tawh a paikhawm ding uh hi. Ama liimnuai a belte khempeuh, minam dangte’ lakah kithehthang khin uh hi.
[21] Egypt mite a panpih galhang pente in misite’ gam Leinuai panin amaute na dawn ding uh a, ‘Pasian a thei lo, galsung a si mite hong paisuk uh a, hih lai-ah lumta uh hi,’ ci-in kiko ding uh hi.

[27] Hih mite pen misite’ omna Leinuai-ah a galvanteng uh tawh pai-in, a namsau uh kilukham sakin, a lum uh a awm tung uhah a kikoihsak kawmin limtakin a kivui tanglai galkapte bangin pahtawi a vuina ngah lo uh hi. Ahi zongin hih mite pen midang a lausakzo dingin a vanglian ngeite ahi uh hi.
[2] A sisa mi tampite in nuntakna a ngahkik ding uh hi. Pawlkhatte nungta tawntung ding uh a, pawlkhatte in a tawntung zumna le minsiatna a ngah ding uh hi.

[14] Leinuai-a misite’ omna-ah a pai nading uh panin honin, sih nading panin suaktasak ding ka hi hiam? Sihna aw, gimna na piakna-ah amaute ka hehpih kei hi. Leinuai-a misite’ gam aw, na suksiatna-ah amaute ka khasiat kei hi.
[2] Lei tosukin misite’ omna Leinuai-ah a va tun uh hangin tua lai-ah amaute ka su ding a, vantungah a kahtoh uh hangin zong, tua lai mahah amaute ka su veve ding hi.
[2] “Ka cihmawhna panin TOPA ka sam a, amah in kei hong dawng hi. Sihna gam Sheol panin kong kiko a, nangmah in ka aw nong za hi.
[12] Amah in a khutah anzapna tawi-in a ante zap a, a taksate khawmin a ansal sungah koih ding a, a ansite ahihleh a mit ngei lo mei sungah a khul ding hi,” ci-in thu a hilh hi.

[21] “Tanglai mite tungah, ‘Mi that kei un. Mi that peuhmah in sihna thuak ding hi,’ ci-in a kigenna thu na zaksa uh ahi hi. [22] Ahi zongin ke’n note kiangah kong genin-ah: A sanggampa tungah a heh mi in thukhenna thuakkha thei ding hi. A sanggampa kiangah, ‘Bangmah a kimang lo,’ ci-in a ko bawl mi in uliante mai-ah thusitna thuak thei ding a, a sanggampa kiangah, ‘Mi hai,’ ci-in a simmawh mi in hell meikuang sungah khulna thuak thei ding hi.

[29] Tua ahih manin na mit taklam in na mawh nading hong piansak leh khelkhia inla paai in. Na pumpi bupin hell khuk sungah hong kikhul sangin na pumpi na khat pelem leh nang a dingin hoihzaw lai hi. [30] Na taklam khut in na mawh nading hong piansak leh sattan inla paai in. Na pumpi bupin hell khuk sungah hong kikhul sangin na pumpi na khat pelem leh nang a dingin hoihzaw lai hi.

[13] “Kong kawcik bek tawnin lut un. Hell khuk tun nading kongvang pen lianin a lampi baih a, mi tampi in a zui uh hi. [14] Ahi zongin nuntak tawntungna tun nading kong kawcikin a lampi haksa a, mi tawmno bek in a zuizo uh hi.

[11] Nisuahna le nitumna panin mi tampi tak hong pai-in vantung ki-ukna sungah Abraham, Isaac, le Jakob-te tawh an ne-in sabuai-ah tukhawm ding uh hi. [12] Ahi zongin vantung ki-ukna sungah a om dingin a kingaihsun Israel mite ahihleh pualam khuamialna-ah kilawnkhia ding a, tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[28] Pumpi a thah khit ciangin kha a that thei lote na kihta kei un. Hell khuk sungah pumpi le kha a nihin a susia thei pa na kihtazaw un.

[23] Kapernaum khuapi mite aw, van a sangna munah hong kipahtawi ding sa na hi uh hiam? Hell khuk sungah hong kilawnsuk ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note’ khuasunga hong kibawl na lamdangte, Sodom khua sungah kibawl hileh tuni dongin tua khua kip lai ding hi.

[41] Mihing Tapa in a vantung mite hong sawl ding a, ama ukna sungah a om migilote le mi a mawh nadingin a bawl mi khempeuh kaikhawmin [42] meikhukpi sungah tua bang mite lawn ding uh a, tua lai-ah amaute kapin a hagawi ding uh hi.

[49] Leitung hun bei ciangin zong tua bangmah hi ding hi. Vantung mite hong pai-in mihoihte lak panin migilote lakhia-in, [50] meikhukpi sungah tua migilote a khul ding uh hi. Tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding uh hi.

[18] Ke’n kong genin-ah: Nang pen suangneu a cihnopna Peter na hi hi. Hih suangpi tungah ka pawlpi ka lam ding a, sihna nangawn in zo zo ngei lo ding hi. [19] Vantung ki-ukna sung lut nading tawhtangte, nangma tungah ka hong pia ding a, hih leitungah hoih lo na cihte, vantungah zong a hoih lo hi ding a, hih leitungah hoih hi na cihte, vantungah zong a hoih hi ding hi,” a ci hi.

[8] “Na khut ahi a, na khe in ahi zongin hong khialhsak leh sattan inla paikhia in. Meikuang tawntung sungah khut kim khe kimin hong kikhiat sangin nuntakna sungah khut sam khe samin lut lecin nang a dingin hoihzaw ding hi. [9] Na mit in hong khialhsak leh khelkhia inla paikhia in. Mit kim nei-in hell khuk sungah hong kikhul sangin mit langkhat bek tawh nuntakna sungah lut lecin nang a dingin hoihzaw ding hi.
[13] Tua ciangin kumpipa in a nasemte kiangah, ‘A khut a khe hen unla, pualam khuamialna lakah lawnkhia un; tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding hi,’ a ci hi.

[15] “Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Note in mi khat bek nangawn na ngah zawh nading uh na hanciamna un leitung tuitung lumletin khual na zin uh a, na ngahsunte uh zong note zah nihin a siahuai, hell khuk tung ding mi na suah uh hi.
[33] Gul a bang mite’ suanlekhak mite aw, hell khuk tun nading thukhenna panin a suakta dingin bangci-in kilamen thei na hi uh hiam?
[41] “Tua ciangin a veilamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Pasian in a samsiat mite aw, keima kiang panin paikhia unla, Dawimangpa le a nungzuite a dingin a kibawl meikuang tawntung sungah pai un.
[46] Tua ahih ciangin tawntung gimthuakna sungah amaute pai ding uh a, mihoihte ahihleh nuntak tawntungna sungah lut ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[29] Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho langpangin thu a gente in mawhna kip sukha uh ahih manin a mawhna uh kimaisak ngei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.

[43] Tua ahih manin na khut in hong khialhsak leh sattan in. Mei a mih ngei lohna hell khuk sungah khut kim tawh na lut sangin khut langkhat bui-in nuntakna sungah lut lecin nang a dingin hoihzaw hi. [44] (Tua lai-ah thante si ngei lo a, a mei zong mit ngei lo hi.) [45] Na khe in hong khialhsak leh sattan in. Khe kim nei-in hell sungah hong kikhiat sangin khe langkhat bui-in nuntakna sungah lut lecin nang a dingin hoihzaw hi. [46] (Tua lai-ah thante si ngei lo a, a mei zong mit ngei lo hi.) [47] Na mit in hong khialhsak leh khelkhia in. Mit kim tawh hell khuk sungah hong kikhiat sangin mit langkhat taw-in Pasian’ Ukna sungah om lecin nang a dingin hoihzaw hi. [48] Tua hell khuk sungah thante si ngei lo a, a mei zong mit ngei lo hi.
[15] No Kapernaum khuapi mite aw, van a sangna munah hong kipahtawi ding sa na hi uh hiam? Hell khuk sungah hong kilawnsuk ding hi,” a ci hi.

[28] Pasian’ Ukna sungah Abraham, Isaac, Jakob, le kamsangte khempeuh a omna mu napi-in, note a pualamah hong kihawlkhiat ciangin tua huna na kahna uh le na ha gawina uh bangzah takin nasia ding ahi hiam?

[23] Ahi zongin hell khuk sungah gimna thuakin a om hi. A khuadak leh, gamlapi mun khatah Abraham le Lazaras a omkhawm a galmuh hi. [24] Tua ahih manin nakpitakin kiko a, ‘Pa Abraham aw, kei hong hehpih in. Meiphual sungah omin nakpitakin gimna thuak ka hih manin Lazaras in a khutme dawn tui diahin ka leii hong votsak nadingin hong sawl in,’ a ci hi. [25] Ahi zongin Abraham in, ‘Ka ta aw, leitungah na nuntak laitakun nang nopsakna namkim na ngah laitakin Lazaras in haksatna namkim a thuak hi. Ahi zongin tu-in amah in hih lai-ah nopsakna a ngah laitakin nangmah in haksatna a thuak na hi hi.
[28] Inn-ah nau pasal nga ka nei lai a, ke’n gim ka thuakna hih lai munah hong tunkhak loh teitei nadingun kei’ gamtat bangin a gamtat loh nadingun hong hilhsak hen,’ a ci hi.
[27] Bang hang hiam cih leh misite’ gamah kei nong nusiacip kei ding a, na nasem keimah muatna nong thuaksak kei ding hi.
[31] Pasian in a sep ding thu David in mukhol ahih manin, ‘Mi site gam sungah amah kinusia lo a, a sa a muat kei hi,’ ci-in a gen ciangin, Khrih’ thawhkik nading thu a gengen ahi hi.
[23] Bang hang hiam cih leh mawhna in thaman hong piak pen sihna hi a, ahi zongin i Topa Jesuh tawh i kipawl manin Pasian’ hong piakkhong pen nuntak tawntungna ahi hi.

[8] Note tungah ka hong hilhsa uh lungdamna thu tawh a kilehngatin, kote a kipan vantungmi dongin thudang a hong hilh a om leh tua a hong hilh mipa hell khuk sungah tung ta hen! [9] Ka hong gen ngeisa mah bangin ka hong gen kikin-ah: Note’ sansa lungdamna thu tawh a kilehngatin thudang a hong hilh mi peuhpeuh hell khuksung tung ta hen!

[18] Singlamteh tungah Khrih a sihna thu tawh a kilehngatin a nungta mi tampi tak a omna thu, a beisa hunah tamveipi ka hong genkhin a, tu-in zong khitui tawh ka hong genpha kikkik hi. [19] Amaute in amau pumpi deihnate Pasian zahin ngaihsun uh a, a maizum nading uh thute-ah kisial zawsopin, leitung nate bek ngaihsutin nei uh ahih manin Hell khuksung a tung ding uh ahi hi.

[9] Ama mite khempeuh le thu um mite khempeuh hangin minthanna le pahtawina a ngah dingin Topa hong pai Ni ciangin a noptuak mahmah Topa’ minthanna huamsung panin amaute kihawlkhia ding a, tawntung suksiatna dan a thuak ding uh hi. Ahi zongin note in ka hong gen uh thute um na hih manun tua nopna sungah na om ding uh hi.

[26] Thuman thutak i theih khit ciangin mawhna i bawl hamtang lai leh i mawhna a kimaisak nadingin biakpiakna dang om nawn lo a, [27] a kihtakhuai thukhenna le Pasian’ thu a nial mite a kangtum ding meikuangpi bek omlai hi. [28] Moses Thukham a zui lote pen mi nih le thum in mawh mah hi, ci-in teci a pan’ khit nakleh kihehpih hetloin sihna kithuaksak hi. [29] Tua bang ahihleh Pasian’ Tapa a simmawh, mawhna a hong maisak Pasian’ thuciamna sisan a thudon lo, Pasian’ hehpihna a hong puak Kha Siangtho a hehsakte’ thuak ding bangzah takin lianzaw kan ding ahi hiam? [30] Bang hang hiam cih leh, “Phulakna keima a’ hi a, ka thukkik ding hi,” a ci pa le, “Topa in ama mite thu a khen ding,” a ci pa i theih ahi hi. [31] A nungta Pasian’ khut sungah thumang loin i tunkhak ding a lauhuai mahmah ahi hi.
[6] Leii pen mei tawh kibang hi. I pumpi na sung panin a neuno khat hinapi-in i pumpi buppi a sia suahthei a, hell khuk sung panin a hong piang mei tawh i nuntakna buppi hong kangtumsak thei hi.
[4] Bang hang hiam cih leh vantung mite nangawn in khialhna a neih ciangin Pasian in khahkhong loin hell khuk sungah khia a, Thukhen Ni hun dong ngakin khuamial sungah kol bulhsa-in a omsak hi.
[17] Hih bang mite pen a kangcip khinsa ciktui, huih in a mutkhiat meiipi tawh kibang uh a, Pasian in amaute’ om nadingin khuamial sahpi omna mun a koih kholhsak hi.

[7] Sodom khua le Gomorrah khua le a kiima om khuapi mite zong tua vantung mite mah bangin gamta uh a, numei tawh mawhnopna bek tham loin pasal le pasal kilunggulhna ciang dong nei uh ahih manin midangte’ etteh dingin tawntung meikuang a thuak uh hi.
[13] a sepna uh tawh amau mah’ maizum nading a piangsak tuipi hualte, le Pasian in amaute’ om nadingin leisung khuamial thukpi a koihsak tawntung, a lampial aksite tawh kibang bek uh hi.
[18] a nungta mipa zong ka hi hi. Kei ka si ngei hi. Ahi zongin tu-in hong en in, a nungta tawntung ka hi hi. Sihna le misite omna gam keima khutnuai ahi uh hi.

[8] Ka khuadak leh sakol puang khat ka mu a, a tungah a tuang pa’ min pen Sihna hi a, a nungah Hell in a zui hi. Amaute in namsau, kialpi, pulnatna, le gamsate tawh leitung mi sehlisuah sehkhat a thahtheih nadingun thu a kipia hi.

[1] Tua ciangin a ngana vantungmi in a peengkul hong tum a, vantung panin leitungah aksi khat a leengsuk ka mu hi. Tua aksi tungah kuahawm thukpi honna tawhtang a kipia hi. [2] Amah in tua kuahawm thukpi a hon ciangin meiphualpi panin meikhu bangin meikhu tampi hong pusuak a, tua meikhu hangin ni mialin khim a zing hi.

[10] Pasian’ leenggahzu zong dawn ding uh hi. Pasian in ama hehna ahi leenggahzu khauh pen ama hehna hai sungah a dimtakin sung khinzo ta hi. Tua bang mite pen a siangtho vantung mite le Tuuno mai-ah meikuang le kat khu tawh gimna kipia ding hi. [11] Amaute a kibawlsiatna mei, khu tawntung a, ganhing le a lim bia-in, a min kigelhna a nei mi peuhmah in a sun a zanin tatsat loin gimna thuak paisuak uh hi,” a ci hi.

[20] Tua ciangin a ganhing le tua ganhing omna-ah nalamdang a bawl kamsang zuau pa kiman khawm hi. Ganhing ciaptehna a neite le ganhing lim a biate pen tua na lamdangte tawh a kikhem ahi hi. Ganhing le kamsang zuau pa, a nihun kat kikhulna meiphualpi sungah a hingtangun kilawn hi.

[7] Kum tulkhat a cin ciangin a thongkiatna panin Satan kikhah ding a, [8] Gog le Magog a kici leitung gam khempeuhah a om minam khempeuh a khem dingin kuankhia ding hi. Satan in a galsimpih dingin tuipi gei-a sehnel zahin a tam mihonpi kaikhawm ding hi. [9] Leitung khempeuhah amaute pai uh a, Pasian’ mi siangtho omna mun le Pasian in a it khuapi umcih uh hi. Ahi zongin vantung panin meikuang hong paisukin amaute a kangtum hi. [10] Amaute a khem Satan pen ganhing le kamsang zuau pa a omna mun, kat a kikhulna meiphualpi sungah kilawn a, a sun a zanin tua lai munah amaute in gimna a thuak tawntung ding uh ahi hi. [11] Tua ciangin tokhom kang a lian khat le a tungah a tupa ka mu hi. Ama omna panin lei le van lengkhiamang a, a tunna mel uh kithei lo hi. [12] A lian a neu misite tua tokhom mai-ah dingin laibute a kilem ka mu hi. Tua ciangin a nungta mite a kigelhna laibu a dang khat zong a kilem ka mu hi. Amaute’ gamtatna tua laibute sungah a kigelhna tawh kizui-in misite tungah thu a kikhen hi. [13] Tuipi sungah a om misite, tuipi in hong pusuah a, Sihna le Misite’ Gam in zong amau sungah a om misite hong pusuah uh hi. Tua ciangin a vekpi-in amaute’ gamtatnasa tawh kizui-in thu a kikhen hi. [14] Tua ciangin Sihna le Misite’ Gam, meiphualpi sungah a kilawn hi. Hih meiphualpi pen sihna nihna ahi hi. [15] A nungta mite a kigelhna laibu sungah a min a om lo peuhmah meiphualpi sungah kilawn hi.
[8] Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, le zuaugente om nading mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[10] Amah in, “Vanglian Pasian, TOPA a dingin ka huaiham mahmah hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite in na thuciamna nusia-in, na biakna taute lawnkhia uh a, namsau tawh na kamsangte that hi; kei, kei bekbek ka omlai hi. Amaute in kei nangawn thah dingin hong zong lai uh hi,” a ci hi.
[20] “A huaihamna bei ngei lo a, a duh khempeuh siit nei lo hi.
[3] Bang hang hiam cih leh migilo in a lungsim deihna kisaktheihpih a, ngahna dingah a huaiham pa in TOPA phuisamin a taisan hi.
[4] Huaihamna tawh mihing a netum, humpinelkai tawh a kibang mite’ lakah ka om hithiat hi. Amau’ hate, namsau hiam tawh kibang hi.
[6] Thumanna in midikte honkhia a, thuman lo mite in amau’ huaihamna mah awkpih uh hi.
[22] Duhhopna pen mindaina hi a, zuau gen pa hihna sangin mizawng hihna hoihzaw lai hi.
[22] A huaiham mi in a hauh nadingin huai mengmeng a, a tawpna-ah a zawn’ ding lamtak phawkkha lo hi.
[25] A huaiham mi in kitotna piangsak a, TOPA a muang mite mihau hi ding hi.
[17] Amau’ huaiham-mawhna hangin ka heh mahmah a, ka hehna lungsim tawh amaute gim pia-in ka nusia hi. Ahih hangin amaute a lungsim uh khauhin, a gamtat ngei bangun gamta lai veve uh hi.
[13] Bang hang hiam cih leh a neupen pan a lianpen dongin, thuman lopi tawh sum zongin a huaiham uh hi. Kamsangte a kipan siampite dongin thuman lo khin uh hi.

[10] Tua ahih manin a zite uh midangte ka piaksak ding a, a lote uh zong midangte ka luahsak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a neupen pan a lianpen dongin thuman lopi tawh sum zongin a huaiham uh hi. Kamsangte a kipan siampite dongin thuman lo khin uh hi.

[13] TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: Ammon mite thumvei a khialh khit, a liveina hangin pel loin amaute gim ka pia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in huaihamin gam a deihthuah manun Gilead gam simgawp uh hi.

[5] Hauhna pen zuaupi hi a, a huaiham mite kiphasakin omkhong thei lo uh a, hankhuk mah bangin, phazo, cih omsak thei lo uh a, lungkim hun cih nei thei lo uh hi. Tua ahih manin minam dangte a ban banin simin a uk uh hi.
[3] A uliante, humpinelkai gilkial bang a, a thukhente, keivom gilkial bang uh hi. Zingsang khuavak mateng a saguh nek a nusia nuam lo, a huaiham gamsate tawh kibang uh hi.

[25] “Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Note in hai le kuangte a pualam na siangsak uh a, ahi zongin tuate sungah, thatanghat thu le huaihamna tawh mi-a’ na suh uh nate a om hi.
[22] huaihamna, gitlohna, khemna, gamtat hoih lohna, enna, mi gensiatna, kisialhna, le haitatna a piangsakthei ngaihsutna hoih lote khempeuh,

[35] Tua bang lelin note na gamta kei ding uh hi. Na galte uh itin amaute tungah thupha bawl unla, lohkik ding lamen loin leitawi pia un. Tua hileh na thaman uh lian ding a, a Lianpen Pasian’ tate na hi ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh lungdamna mel a theithei lo mite le a huaiham mite tungah amah migi hi.
[39] Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, “No Farisi mite in hai leh kuangte a pualam na siangsak uh a, ahi zongin note na lungsim sung uhah huaihamin na gi kei uh hi.

[15] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute khempeuh kiangah, “Hoihtakin kidawm unla, na huaiham loh nadingun kikem un. Bang hang hiam cih leh bangzahta-in mi khat a hauh hangin a neihsa tawh a nuntakna taktak kicing zo lo hi,” a ci hi.

[11] Farisi mipa dingin thu ngen a, ‘Pasian aw, kei pen midangte bangin a huaiham, a thuman lo, numei tungah a mawh mi ka hi kei hi; hua lai-a siahdongpa bang hi lo ka hih manin nangma tungah ka nuamna kong pulak hi.
[29] Siatna nam khempeuh ahi, hoih lohna, huaihamna, khatlekhat kisiatsak nopna, hazatna, mi thahna, kitotna, khemna, a sialam bekbek ngaihsutna, zuau genna,

[10] Tua bang ka hong cih ciangin numei tawh a paktat, a huaiham, a guta, milim a bia lawkite tawh na kikhawl kei un, ka cihnopna hi lo hi. Tuate tawh kikhawl lo ding ci lehang, leitung panin paikhia un, cihna suak ding hi.
[10] a gutate, a huaihamte, zukhamte, mi gensiate, ahih kei leh mi’ na a sutte khat beek, Pasian’ Ukna sungah lutthei het lo ding hi.

[20] Bang hang hiam cih leh note kiangah ka hong tun ciangin note’ omzia ding ka deih bangin na om loh khak ding uh le note in keima maisuah na muhnopzia bangun na hong muh loh khak ding uh ka lunghimawh hi. Note lakah kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, mi zahpihna, mi gensiatna, kiphatsakna, le buaina a omkhak ding ka lunghimawh hi.

[20] milim biakna, mi bumna, kilangbawlna, kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, kikhenna, pawltuam lungsim neihna, [21] enna, zukhamna le biakna pawi-ah zukhamna a kipan adangdangte ahi hi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian’ Ukna sungah omkha het lo ding hi.
[3] Note pen Pasian’ mi na hih manun note lakah nulepa khialhna, a kilawm lo-a gamtatna, huaihamna cihte genin zong na nei vet kei un.
[3] Huaihamna lungsim le kisialh nopna lungsim tawh bangmah gamta kei un. Kiniamkhiat ciat unla, midangte thupi ngaihsutzaw un.
[5] Tua ahih manin nulepa mawhna, a kilawm lo gamtatna, hukna lanna, a hoih lo lunggulhna, le milim biakna nam khat ahih manin huaihamna ahi note sungah a om leitung lungsimte na sisak un.
[8] Pawlpi upa dingte zong a gamtat hoih, a lungsim citak, leenggahzu tam a ne lo, sum thu-ah a huaiham mi hi lo ding uh hi.
[9] Ahi zongin a haunuam mite in ze-etna a tuamtuam thuak a, duhhopna, huaihamna a haivai thute-ah awkcipin, haksatna le siatna a tuahlawh uh hi.

[2] Tuahun ciangin mite in amau angsung ding bek ngaihsunin, huaihamin, kisialin, kihisakin, mi zahko-in, nu le pate’ thu mang loin, lungdam theihna mel nei loin, biakna lungsim nei loin, [3] mi khual loin, hehpihna nei loin, mi gensia-in, ngongtatin, kihtakhuai-in, thuhoih deih loin, [4] ciampelin, thu khual loin, kiphasak gawpin, Pasian don loin pumpi nopsakna bek deihin, [5] biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deih lo ding uh hi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in.
[7] Pawlpi siate pen Pasian’ nasem ahih manin paubaanna a om lo, a kiphasak lo, zukham thei mi ahi lo, a ngongtat lo, a huaiham lo,
[14] Ahi zongin na lungsim uhah enna, gitlohna, le huaihamna a om leh a zuaugen na hi uh a, pil ing, ci-in kisialh nading bangmah om lo hi.
[16] Enna le huaihamna a om nakleh buaina le siatna nam khempeuh tawh kizom pahpah hi.
[1] Note lakah a om kitotna le kilaina koi panin hong piang ahi hiam? Deihluatna lungsim na neih manun note’ pumsung a kitoktok niloh ahi hi.
[1] Tua ahih manin gitlohna, zuauna, kineihkhemna, huaihamna, le kigensiatnate na omsak nawn kei un.

[3] Hih sia man lote in a huaiham manun note kiang panin sum a ngahtheih nadingun phuahtawm thu hong gen ding uh hi. Ahi zongin sawtpek a kipanin amaute’ thu a Khen ding pa a kigingsa-in om niloh a, amaute a Susia ding pa in en gige hi.

[14] Numei bekbek etnopin nei uh a, a mawhnopna lungsim uh kam thei lo hi. Upna cingtaak lo mite zol belin nei uh a, huaihamna lungsim bekbek a nei uh hi. Tua bang mite, Pasian’ samsiat mite ahi uh hi.
[4] Bang hang hiam cih leh nangma muhna-ah kum tulkhat a bei ciangin zanni ahi a, zan ihmut laitakin khanlawh khat sung tawh ahi zongin a kibang bek hi.

[26] Topa’ vantungmi khat in Filip kiangah, “Kithawi inla, Jerusalem khua panin Gaza khua paina lampi zuan dingin leitaw lam manawhin pai in,” a ci hi. (Tua lampi tu-in kizang pha nawn lo hi.) [27] Filip zong kithawi-in a pai hi. Lampi-ah Ethiopia mi mang lian khat tawh kituak hi. Tua mangpa pen Ethiopia kumpinu Kandeis khutnuai-a mang lian khat hi a, kumpinu neihsa khempeuh a ukpa ahi hi. Jerusalem khua-ah Pasian bia dingin a va pai hi a, [28] inn zuan dingin leeng sungah a tuan kawmin kamsang Isaiah laibu a sim hi. [29] Tua laitakin Kha Siangtho in Filip kiangah, “Pai inla tua leeng mai-ah va om in,” ci-in a sawl hi. [30] Filip zong ama kiangah va tai a, kamsang Isaiah laibu a simna za ahih manin, “Na laisim a khiatna na thei hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. [31] Amah in, “Mi khatpeuh in hong hilhtel lohpi-in bangci theih ding ka hi hiam?” ci-in dawng a, ama leeng tungah Filip a tuang dingin a sam hi.

[37] Filip in, “Na lungsim takpi tawh na up nakleh tui na kiphum thei ding hi,” a cih ciangin, “Jesuh Khrih pen Pasian’ Tapa hi, ci-in ka um hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. [38] Tua ciangin a leeng a khawlsak nadingin mangpa in thu pia a, Filip tawh a nihun tui phualah pai-in Filip in amah a tuiphum hi. [39] Tui sung panin a paikhiat khit uh ciangin Topa’ Kha Siangtho in Filip paikhiatpih hi. Mangpa in Filip mu nawn lo hi; ahi zongin lungdam takin a lampai a zom hi. [40] Tua ciangin Filip pen Azotas khua-ah a om ahih lamtak amah kiphawk a, tua khua a kipanin Sisaria khua a tun dongin khua khempeuhah Lungdamna Thu a hilh hi.
[8] Ahi zongin ka itte aw, na mangngilh loh ding uh ka deih thu in: Topa a dingin ni khat le kum khat, kum tulkhat le ni khat a kilamdan’ luatna om lo hi.

[2] Nidang ciangin TOPA’ inn a omna mual pen mual liante lakah a sangpenin kikipsak ding a, mual neute tungah kisangsak ding hi. Tua lai-ah minam khempeuh pai muamua ding uh a, [3] mi tampite hong pai-in, “Hong pai un, amah in ama zialetongte hong hilh theih nading le ama lampite i zuih theih nadingin Jakob’ Pasian’ inn, TOPA’ mualah paito ni,” a ci ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in Zion panin thu hong gen ding a, Jerusalem khua panin TOPA’ thuhilhna hong paikhia ding hi. [4] Amah in minamte khatlekhat kikalah thu khenin, mi tampite’ thu khensak ding hi. Amaute in a namsaute uh lokhawhna tu, a teipite uh singhiang heuhna temkawi-in a seek ding uh hi. Minam khat le minam khat kido nawn lo ding uh a, galdo dingin kithawi nawn lo ding uh hi.

[2] TOPA’ kha in ama tungah ama mite a ukna ding pilna, thutheihna, le siamna pia ding hi. Amah in TOPA’ deihna thei-in TOPA zahtak ding hi. [3] Amah in TOPA’ nasep nuamsa ding hi. Amah in a tungtham bek muhna tawh thu khen lo ding a, kam lengsawn bek zakna tawh thu khentat lo ding hi. [4] Thumanna tawh mizawngte’ thu khenin, lungsim nem mite’ thu ahi bangin khensak ding hi. Ama kam panin a thupiakna tawh leitung mite gim kipia ding a, a muk panin a thugenna tawh migilote si ding uh hi. [5] Amah in thuman le thutak tawh ama mite uk ding hi.

[11] Tua ni ciangin Topa in Assiria gam, Egypt gam, Pathros gam, Ethiopia gam, Elam gam, Shinar gam, Hamath gam, le tuipi gei-a gamte panin ama mi a omlaite a ngahkik nadingin a vangliatna zang kik ding hi.
[6] Zion-a teng mite aw, nomau’ lakah Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa lianin om ahih manin lungdamin awng unla, lungdamin la sa un,” a cih hun uh hong tung ding hi.

[19] Hong nawk sialin note hong ban ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh zingsang khat khit zingsang khat, sun le zanin hong nawk tawntung ding hi. TOPA’ tung panin na zak uh thute a banbanin launa lianpi vive hi ding hi. [20] Bang hang hiam cih leh puanbuk sungah khe khuan nadingin lupna tom lua a, silh dingin puanza neu lua hi, a cih tawh na kibang ding uh hi. [21] Bang hang hiam cih leh a lamdang ama bawlte a bawl ding le a lamdang ama nasep a sem dingin Perazim Mual tungah a sep bangin TOPA in hong sem ding a, Gibeon kuama a heh bangin amah hong heh ding hi.
[27] En un, TOPA’ vangliatna le a minthanna vang, gamlapi panin kimu thei hi. Meikuang le meikhu in ama hehna hong kilangsak a, ama kampaunate, mei bangin a kuang hi.

[7] En un, galhangte huhna ngenin kiko uh a, kilemna ding palai semte nakpitakin kap uh hi. [8] Lam lianpite gambulak suak a, kuamah khualzinin pai ngam nawn lo uh hi. Thuciamnate kipeksatin, thukimnasate kipalsat a, khatlekhat kizahtakna om nawn lo hi. [9] Leitang kinusiacipin om mawk hi. Lebanon muala tulak singte vulgawp a, Sharon gam lei hoihpen sehnel gam bang ta hi. Bashan le Karmel muala singtehte pulhmang khinta hi. [10] TOPA in minam dangte kiangah, “Tu-in ka gamtang ding a, ka vangliatna ka lak ding hi. Tu-in kei hong kipahtawi ta ding hi. [11] Na geelnate uh a kimanna om lo a, na nasepnate uh a mawkna ahi hi. No le no a kisusia na hi uh hi. [12] Leikang ngah nadingin suangkang a kihal bangin na vui suak ding uh a, meikhuk sunga a kihaltum lingkungte na bang ding uh hi,” a ci hi. [13] Gamlapi-a a om mite aw, ka sepna thu za un. A nai-a a om mite aw, ka vangliatna thei un. [14] Zion-a a om mawhnei mite lau uh a, Pasian’ thu a ngaihsun lo mite lau-in lingcip uh hi. Amaute in, “Pasian’ thukhenna pen a kuang tawntung mei tawh kibang hi. Tua bang meikuang kua in thuakzo ding ahi hiam?” ci uh hi.

[3] Awging khat in, “Gamlakah TOPA’ lampi sial unla, sehnel gam sungah i Pasian a’ ding lam lianpi khat a tangin bawl un. [4] Kuam khempeuh kivuk dim ding a, mual liante le mual neute kitotam ding hi. A tamkim lo munte kitamkim sak ding a, suanghum omna munte kizalhtam ding hi. [5] TOPA’ kam in gen khin ahih manin, TOPA’ minthanna vang hong kilang ding a, mi khempeuh in mukhawm ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[15] Thuman om lo lua ahih manin siatna a pelh mipa pen mihai-in kingaihsun zawsop hi. TOPA in hih thu mu a, thutang om lo ahih manin amah lungkim lo hi. [16] Amah in nenniamna a thuakte a huh ding mi khat beek a om lohna a mu hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute a honkhia ding le a gualzawh nadingin ama vangliatna a zang ding hi. [17] Amah in thumanna pen awmdal lum bangin silh ding a, gualzawhna pen sik lukhu bangin khu ding hi. Na khempeuh a manin bawlkik nopna, gimna a piangsakte gim pia-in thukkik nopna lungsim puan bangin a silh ding hi. [18] Amau’ gamtatna bangin amah in thukkik ding a, amah a langpangte gim pia ding hi. Ama galte a thukkik ding hi. A gamla pekah a om tuipi gei-a gamte zong a thukkik ding hi. [19] Tua ahih ciangin nisuahna le nitumna kikalah a om mi khempeuh in amah zahtakin, a vangliatna kihta ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh huihpi nung bang, tuipi khang bangin amah hong pai ding hi. [20] TOPA in ama mite tungah, “Note a hong hu dingin Jerusalem-ah kong pai ding a, mawhna panin a kiheikhia mi peuhmah ka hong honkhia ding hi.

[8] A tuaci bang kua’n za ngei na hi uh hiam? A tuaci bang kua’n mu ngei na hi uh hiam? Ni khat thu-in gam khat piang ngei ahi hiam? Tomnokhat sungin minam khat piangkhia ngei ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh Zion in nausuak gimna a thuak phetin a minamte suakkhia pah hi.

[30] A dipkuathuai, a patauhhuai thu khat gam sungah a piang khinzo hi. [31] Kamsangte in thuman gen lo uh a, siampite in zong amau’ ut bangun a uk uh hi. Ka mite in phamawh sa lo sawnsawn uh hi. A tawpna hun hong tun ciangin bang cih ding uh ahi hiam, TOPA in ci hi, ci-in gen in,” hong ci hi.

[11] Gam sung khempeuh kisia-in, gam simtham suak ding a, hih mite khempeuh kum sawmsagih sung Babylon kumpipa’ salin a om ding uh hi. [12] Kum sawmsagih a cin khit ciangin TOPA in kong cihin-ah, Babylon kumpipa le a gam amau’ mawhna hangin gim ka pia ding a, tua gam a tawntungin gam simtham ka suaksak ding hi. [13] Tua gam a siatna ding ka gensa thute khempeuh hih laibu sungah kigelh a, Jeremiah in gam khempeuhte’ kiangah a gen hi. Tuate khempeuh ka tungsak ding hi. [14] Bang hang hiam cih leh gam tampi le kumpi liante in amaute salin man ding uh a, amau’ gamtatna amau’ tungah ka thukkik ding hi,” a ci hi.

[31] “En un, TOPA in kong cihin-ah, Israel minamte le Judah minamte tawh thuciamna thak khat ka bawl ni hun hong tung ding hi. [32] Tua pen, a pu a pate uh, Egypt gam panin ka lakkhiat nadingin a khut uh tawh ka kaihkhiat huna ka bawl uh thuciamna tawh kibang lo ding hi. Tua hun lai-in kei amaute’ pasal hinapi-in ka thuciamna a hong palsat uh hi, TOPA in kong ci hi. [33] Ahih hangin TOPA in kong cihin-ah, tua hun hong tun ciangin Israel minamte tawh hih bangin thuciamna ka bawl ding hi: Amaute’ sungah ka thukham ka koih ding a, amaute’ lungtang tungah ka gelh ding hi. Kei pen amaute’ Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute pen keima mite ahi ding uh hi. [34] Kuamah in midangte le a sanggamte uh kiangah, ‘ TOPA thei in,’ ci-in a kihilh nawn kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in kong cihin-ah, amaute in a neupen panin a lianpen dongin, a vekpi-un kei a hong thei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ khialhnate ka maisak ding a, amaute’ mawhnate zong phawkin ka nei nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
[14] “Amaute in gal peengkul tum uh a, a vekpi-un kiging uh hi. Ahi zongin mi khempeuh tungah ka hehna tungkim ding ahih manin galsim dingin kuamah kuankhia zo lo ding hi.

[42] Na pu na pate uh tungah piak dingin ka ciam Israel gam sungah note kong tunpih ciangin TOPA ka hihna thu na hong thei ding uh hi. [43] Tua hun ciangin, a kilawm loin na gamtatnate khempeuh uh le nomau mah na kinitsak tawmna thute uh na phawk ding uh a, na gamtat siatnasate uh hangin nomau mah na kimudahtawm ding uh hi. [44] Na gitlohna, na gamtatsiatna uh tawh kizui-in note tungah hong bawl loin, ka min a daikhak ding khualna tawh note tungah hong gamta ka hih manin kei pen TOPA ka hihna thu no Israel mite in na hong thei ding uh hi, Topa PASIAN in ci hi,” a hong ci hi.

[1] TOPA in kei kiangah thu hong gen a, [2] “Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, Magog gam a om Gog kumpipa mawhsakna thu gen in. Amah pen Meshek minamte le Tubal minamte a ukpa ahi hi. Amah mawhsakna thu gen inla, [3] Topa PASIAN in hih bangin ci hi, ci-in gen in: Meshek le Tubal minamte a ukpipa Gog aw, kei pen nangma langah ka pang hi. [4] Nang hong lehhei-in, na khaguh-ah sikkawi kong bulh ding a, na galkap honpite khempeuh tawh kong kaikhia ding hi. Na galkap honpite pen a sakolte uh le a sakol tung tuangte uh tawh tam mahmah a, na galkap khempeuh in lum le namsau nei kim uh hi. [5] Persia gam, Kush gam, le Put gammite in zong nang hong panpih uh a, amaute in lum le siklukhu nei kim uh hi. [6] Leilu lam gam peka om Gomer gam a galkapte khempeuh le Bethtogarmah gam a galkapte khempeuh in nang hong panpih uh a, minam dang tampite in zong nang hong pawlpih uh hi. [7] Tua ahih manin tu-in nang le na pawlte khempeuh a kigalging sa-in om unla, na thupiakna bangin a gamtang pah lian dingin na galkapte khempeuh omsak in. [8] Minam tuamtuamte lak panin kikaikhawm kikin a gam uh a kitutkik zawh gallauna nei loin a om Israel mite’ gam a sim dingin kum tampi khit ciangin kong sawl ding hi. Sauveipi sung kinusia-in gamkhing a suak ngei hinapi-in, tu-in a mite khempeuh lungmuang takin a omna Israel mualtung gamte a sim ding na hi hi. [9] Nang le na galkap honpite le nang hong pawlpih minam tampite in khuapi huih bangin na simgawp ding uh a, meiipi bangin a gam sung khempeuh na tuamcip ding uh hi.

[44] Tua kumpite a maan laitakun vantung Pasian in a bei thei ngei lo ding kumpi gam a hong phut ding hi. Tua kumpi gam kuamah in zo zo lo ding a, tua gam in gamdang khempeuhte zogawpin a kip tawntung ding hi.

[7] Ka et lai leh sapi lina ka mu hi. Tua sapi kihtakhuai mahmah a, lipkhaphuai-in a thupi mahmah hi. Amah in a gol mahmah sik-ha a nei hi. Amah in nene-in a nek valteng a khe tawh a tuancilgawp hi. Sapi dangte tawh kibang loin amah in ki sawm a nei hi. [8] Tua kite ka et laitakin tuate’ lakah adang ki neu khat hong po a, a omsa sung pan ki thumte a botkhia hi. Tua ki’ tungah mihing mittang tawh a kibang mittang le kam om a, kiphatsakna kam tampi a pau hi.
[22] Tua ciangin a nungta tawntung mipa hong pai a, a Lianpen Pasian’ mite a’ ding a hoih thukhenna a hong gen hi. Pasian’ mite in kumpi za a ngahna ding uh hun a hong tung hi.

[27] “Hih leitung kumpi gam, vangliatna, le liatna khempeuh a Lianpen Pasian’ mite tungah a kipia ding hi. Amau’ kumpi za cikmah hunin bei ngei lo ding a, leitung ukna za a nei khempeuhte in a thu uh mangin amaute’ na a sem ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.

[24] “Na mite le khuapi siangtho, a mawhna le a gamtat khialhnate a beina ding hun kum sawmsagih mun sagih sung a kisehzo hi. Tua ciangin mawhna kimaisak ding a, a tawntung thutang thu a hong tung ding hi. Genkholhna le maangmuhna thu a mantakin hong tangtung ding a, a Siangtho Pen Mun biakinnpi kisiansuah ding hi. [25] Hih thu ciamteh inla thei in: Jerusalem lamkikna ding thu a kipiak hun a kipan sathau kinilh pa hong pai dong kum sagih mun sagih sung hi ding hi. Jerusalem kongzing lampi nei le kulhpi nei-in kilamkik ding a, kum sawmguk le nih mun sagih sung kip ding a, ahih hangin buai hun sung ahi ding hi. [26] Tua hun a bei khit ciangin sathau kinilh pa thuman lopi-in a kithat ding hi. Galsim dingin a hong pai galkapmang lianpa in khuapi le biakinnpi a susia ding hi. A beina pen tuiciin tun bang hi ding a, a tawp dongin galdona le kisiatna vive ahi dingin Pasian in thu a khenzo hi. [27] Tua makai pa in mi tampite tawh kum sagih sung thuciamna kip bawl ding uh hi. Gangawh biakna le biakpiakna, hih hunlang sung a khawlsak ding hi. Biakinn dawn sangpen munah a Lipkhaphuai na kikoih ding hi; ahi zongin Pasian in tua a koihpa’ thuak dingin a geelsa thu a koihpa in a thuak hun ciang dong, a Lipkhaphuai na pen a koihna mun mahah omlai phot ding hi,” hong ci hi.
[4] Tu-in Daniel aw, beina hun a tun mateng laibu khupcip inla, a tungah ciaptehna koih in. A kallakah mi tampite in bang thu piang hiam cih theitel nuamin a hanciam ding uh hi,” a hong ci hi.
[11] Amaute in nisim biakpiakna a khawlsak, a Lipkhaphuai na a hong pian’ ciangin ni tulkhat zanih sawmkua sung a sawt ding hi.

[28] “Tua khit ciangin mi khempeuh tungah ka kha ka sung ding a, na puteekte un mang manin na tangvalte un maang mu ding uh hi. [29] Tua hun ciangin nasem numei le nasem pasalte tung nangawnah ka kha ka sung ding hi. [30] “Tua ciangin vantung le leitungah hilhkholhna lim ahi, sisan kiluansakna, meikatna le meikhu lompi hong om ding hi. [31] TOPA’ ni, tua a lauhuai hun a hong tun ma-in ni hong mialin, kha, sisan hong bang ding hi. [32] Ahi zongin TOPA’ tungah huhna a ngen khempeuh in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh hi. TOPA’ gensa bangmahin Zion Mual le Jerusalem khua sungah a suakta mi om ding uh hi. TOPA in a teel mite, suakta ding uh hi.

[1] Mailam hunah TOPA’ biakinn a omna mual, a sangpen mual hong suak ding a, minam tampi in hong zuan ding uh hi. [2] Minam tampite hong pai-in, “Israel mite’ Pasian’ biakinn, TOPA’ mualah va paito ni. Tua lai-ah ama deihna hong hilh ding a, ama deihna bangin i gamta ding hi,” ci ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Zion panin thuhilhna hong gingkhia a, Jerusalem panin TOPA’ thu hong paikhia hi. [3] Amah in minam tampite’ thu khensak ding a, Israel gam panin a gamla pekah a om, minam vangliante’ thu khensak ding hi. Amaute in a namsaute uh lokhawhna tu-in seek ding uh a, a teipite uh singhiang heuhna temkawi-in seek ding uh hi. Minam khatlekhat kido nawn lo ding uh a, galkidona theikha nawn lo ding uh hi. [4] A kuamah peuh lungnuamin a leenggui phung le a theikung nuai-ah tu hithiat ding a, kuamah in patausak nawn lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Vanglian TOPA mahmah in hih thu hong gen khinta hi. [5] Bang hang hiam cih leh midangte in amau’ pasian ciat bia-in a thu mang ding uh a, ahi zongin eite in ahihleh eima TOPA Pasian mah a tawntungin bia-in ama thu i mang ding hi. [6] TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: Keimah in gim ka piak ahi, sala om gimna a thuak mite, ka kaihkhop kik hun hong tung ding hi. [7] Amaute, a cimawhin gamlapi-ah om uh a, ahi zongin keimah in amaute pansa kikin, minam vanglian khatin ka bawlkik ding hi. Tua hun a kipan a tawntungin Zion mual panin amaute ka uk paisuak ding hi.

[1] Vanglian TOPA in kei tungah thu hong genin [2] amah in, “Jerusalem mite ka itluatna hangin Jerusalem khuapi ka huh nuam mahmah a, hih banga ka itluatna in a galte tungah ka heh hong suaksak hi. [3] Ka khuapi siangtho Jerusalem-ah ciahkikin ka teng ding hi. A citak khuapi, ci-in minthang ding a, Vanglian TOPA’ mual pen mual siangtho kici ding hi. [4] Jerusalem khuapi kongzing le lamkabomte-ah a tu dingin puteekte omkik ding a, teeklua kisa-in ciangkhut khunin pai ding uh hi. [5] Kongzing khempeuhah numei naupang kimawlin phezaizai ding uh hi. [6] “Tu-a a omlai note a dingin hih thu ahi thei lo ding tawh a kibat hangin kei a dingin ahi mawh ding thu hi lo hi.
[22] A vanglian a thahat minamte zong Vanglian TOPA a bia ding le ama tung panin thupha a ngen dingin Jerusalem-ah hong pai ding uh hi.

[10] “David’ suanlekhakte le Jerusalem khuamite’ tungah hehpihna lungsim le thungetna lungsim ka guan ding hi. Amaute in a sutlup uh mipa enin, ta khat neihsun a sihsuah mite bangin kap ding uh a, tacil a khuaisuahte bangin nakpitakin kapin thum ding uh hi.

[1] TOPA in na hong sep hun hong tung ding hi. Jerusalem khuapi kiluh gawpin, note’ muh mahmahin a na lakte uh hawm ding uh hi. [2] Jerusalem khuapi a sim dingin TOPA in minam khempeuh kaikhawm ding hi. A khuapi kila-in, a innte kiluh gawpin, a numeite zong kibuan gawp ding hi. Mi alang bang salin kipaikhiatpih ding a, adangte ahihleh kipaikhiatpih lo ding hi. [3] Tua ciangin TOPA hong kuankhia ding a, a beisa hunah a sim ngei bangin hih minam dangte hong sim ding hi. [4] Tua ciangin Jerusalem nisuahna lamah a om Oliv Mual tungah TOPA a ding ding hi. Tua ciangin nisuahna lam pan nitumna lamah Oliv Mual kitamin phel nih suak ding a, a kikalah kuampi om ding hi. A mual kimkhat leilu lamah kikhinin, kimkhat leitaw lamah kikhin ding hi. [5] Hinnom kuam sung kivukcip ding a, Judah kumpi Uzzah’ hun lai-in zinlinna-a a kivukcip mah bang ding hi. Tua ciangin TOPA ka Pasian hong pai ding a, a mi siangthote khempeuh hong tonpih ding hi.

[8] Tua ni hong tun ciangin Jerusalem khua panin tuicim hong luangkhia ding a, kimkhat, nisuahna lamah a om Si Tuipi-ah luang ding a, kimkhat, nitumna lamah a om Mediterranean Tuipi-ah luang ding hi. Tua tui in kan’ hun cih nei loin luang tawntung ding hi. [9] Tua ciangin TOPA pen leitung khempeuh’ kumpi suak ding a, mi khempeuh in amah bek thei-in bia ding uh hi.

[16] Tua bangin galte a kizawhgawp khit ciangin, galte sung panin a nungtalai mite in Vanglian TOPA, kumpi ahihna hangin a bia ding le ama gualzawhna pawi a bawl dingin kumsimin Jerusalem-ah pai tawntung ding uh hi.

[13] “Kong kawcik bek tawnin lut un. Hell khuk tun nading kongvang pen lianin a lampi baih a, mi tampi in a zui uh hi. [14] Ahi zongin nuntak tawntungna tun nading kong kawcikin a lampi haksa a, mi tawmno bek in a zuizo uh hi.

[49] Leitung hun bei ciangin zong tua bangmah hi ding hi. Vantung mite hong pai-in mihoihte lak panin migilote lakhia-in, [50] meikhukpi sungah tua migilote a khul ding uh hi. Tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding uh hi.

[2] Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Ni a tum khit nitak ciangin, ‘Van san ahih manin khua pha ding hi,’ na ci uh hi. [3] Zingsang hun ciangin, ‘Van sanin khua niim ahih manin guah zu ding hi,’ na ci thei uh hi. Note in van maitang na et uh ciangin khua pha ding le khua sia ding khenthei napi-in tuhun thute na theithei kei uh hi.

[3] Oliv Mual tungah Jesuh tu-in a om laitakin a nungzuite guak a tuamin hong pai uh a, “Hih thute cik ciangin hong piang ding a, nang na hong pai ding hun le hun bei nading bang lim hong om ding ahi hiam, hong gen in,” a ci uh hi. [4] Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Kidawm unla, mite’ khemsa-in ta kei un. [5] Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah a kineih mi tampi hong pai ding a, ‘Kei, Khrih ka hi hi,’ ci-in mi tampi tak umkhialsak ding uh hi. [6] A nai, a gamla-ah galkidona thu na za ding uh hi. Hihte a piang mah ding hi a, ahi zongin a bei nading hi nai lo ahih manin patau kei un. [7] Gam khat le gam khat, kumpi khat le kumpi khat hong kido ding a, mun tuamtuamah kialpi hong tungin, zin hong ling ding hi. [8] Hihte khempeuh pen gimna kipat nading hi pan hi. [9] “Tua ciangin note hong kibawlsia-in hong kithat ding a, keima hangin Gentail mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi. [10] Tua hun ciangin mi tampi in a upna uh khahsuah ding a, khatlekhat kimudahin khatlekhat kilehhek ding uh hi. [11] Kamsang kineihkhem mi tampi hong piang ding a, mi tampi tak umkhialsak ding uh hi. [12] Gitlohna khang mahmah ding ahih manin ki-itna hong kiam ding hi. [13] Ahi zongin a bei dongin a thuakzote in hotkhiatna ngah ding uh hi. [14] Tua ciangin mi khempeuh tungah teci ahi dingin Pasian’ hong ukna hangin a lungdamhuai thu, leitung khempeuhah kihilh ding hi. Tua khit ciangin beina hong tung ding hi. [15] “Tua ciangin kamsang Daniel in, ‘A lipkhaphuai zehphitna,’ ci-in a gen pen a siangtho munah hong om ciangin (hih lai a simte in Jesuh’ cihnopna thei ta un),

[28] “Sapul omna peuhah musane kikaikhawm ding hi.” [29] “Tua gimna hun a tunkhit phetin ni hong mialin kha hong taang nawn lo ding a, vantung panin aksite hong kia ding a, vantung a om nate a pai ngei-in pai thei loin lampialgawp ding hi. [30] Tua ciangin Mihing Tapa’ lim vantungah hong kilang ding hi. Tua ciangin leitung minam khempeuh dahin kap ding uh a, vangliatna le minthanna tawh meii lakah Mihing Tapa a hong pai a mu ding uh hi. [31] Nakpi takin peengkul hong ging ding a, leitung mun khempeuhah a vantung mite hong paisakin, leimong khat pan mong khat dongin, a teelsa mite a kaikhawmsak ding hi. [32] Thei kung tung panin thu phawk un. Thei a hiang hong meengin a teh hong no ciangin khuakhal hun hong naita hi, ci-in na thei uh hi. [33] Tua mah bangin hih ka thugente khempeuh na muh uh ciangin Mihing Tapa hong tun ding hun hong nai mahmah ta hi, ci-in na thei un. [34] A mantak a kong genin-ah: Hih lai-a a om mite a sihkhit ma-in hih ka thugen khempeuh hong tung ding hi. [35] Van le lei a maimang zongin ka thugente maimang ngei lo ding hi. [36] Ahi zongin a ni le a nai hun ding pen kuamah in thei lo hi. Vantungah a om vantung mite ahi a, Tapa nangawn in ahi zongin thei lo a, Pa Pasian bek in thei hi. [37] Noah hun lai-in up hun lohpi khatin tuiciin a tun bangin Mihing Tapa zong up hun lohpi khatin hong pai ding hi.

[42] Tua ahih ciangin bang hunin na Topa uh hong pai ding cih thei lo na hih manun na pilvang un. [43] Ahi zongin na phawk ding uh thu in: Inn nei pa in zan laitakin guta pa a pai ding hun theikhol leh amah in na pangin a inn luhsak lo ding hi. [44] Tua ahih manin Mihing Tapa zong, note’ upmawh loh hun laitakin hong pai ding ahih manin note zong na kiging tawntung ta un. [45] “A pil a citak nasem i cih a bangcite ahi hiam? A naseppih dangte ukin a hun manmanin amaute’ nekzah ding ciat an a pia dingin a topa in a seh a nasempa ahi hi. [46] A topa hong ciah ciangin ama sawl bangin na semin a om a muhpa pen mi hampha mahmah khat ahi hi. [47] Ke’n kong genin-ah, ama neihsa khempeuh a uk dingin a topa in tua nasempa a koih ding hi. [48] Ahi zongin tua nasempa nasem hoih lo hi hen la, a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka topa hong ciahhak ding hi,’ ci-in, [49] a naseppih a lawmte satgawp hen la, zukham thei mite tawh anne zune-in na om leh, [50] a topa tung dingin a uploh ni hun khatpeuhin a topa hong tung ding a, [51] a topa in nakpitakin gim pia-in, mihoih a kineihkhemte’ gimthuak dingteng thuaksak ding a, amah kapin a hagawi ding hi.

[31] “Mihing Tapa a vantung mite tawh Kumpi-in hong paikhawm uh ciangin a kumpi tokhom tungah hong tu ding hi. [32] Ama mai-ah leitung minam khempeuh hong kikhawm ding hi. Gancing pa in tuu le keelte a khen mah bangin mi khempeuh khen nihin hong koih ding hi. [33] Tuu a bang mite a taklamah koihin, keel a bang mite a veilamah koih ding hi. [34] Tua ciangin Kumpipa in a taklamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Ka Pa in thupha a piak mite aw, hong pai ta un. Leitung piancil a kipanin note a dingin a kibawlkholsa gamnuam hong luah un.
[20] Tua ciangin note tungah ka hong gen thute khempeuh a zuih nadingun na hilh un. Hun bei dongin note a hong ompih tawntung ding ka hihna thu phawk ta un,” a ci hi.

[12] Unau khatlekhat a sih nadingun kikhia ding uh a, pa in a ta khia-in, ta in a nu le a pate khia-in a thatsak ding uh hi. [13] Keima hangin Gentail mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh a, ahi zongin a sih dongun a thuakzote in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh hi.

[33] Tua hun ding thei lo na hih manun kikemin pilvang un. [34] Mi khat khualzin dingin paikhia a, a dinkhiat ding ciangin amau’ sep ding ciat a nasemte tungah tavuan pia a, kongcing pa in limtakin a cin ding a sawl mipa tawh kibang hi. [35] Inn nei pa, nitak ahi a, zankim ahi a, zingsang ak khuankuan ahi a, zingsang khuavak khit ahi zongin a bang hunin hong tung ding cih thei lo na hih manun ngakin na pilvang un. [36] Tua hikeileh amah thakhatin hong tungin na ihmut laitakun hong tuakkha ding hi. [37] Note tungah kong gen mah bangin mi khempeuh tungah zong, ‘Ngakin na pilvang un,’ ka ci hi,” a ci hi.
[8] Ke’n kong cihin-ah, amaute’ thu a manin manlang takin khensak ding hi. Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin leitungah amah a um mi a mu ding hiam?” ci-in a genthuah hi.
[11] Mun khempeuhah nakpitakin zin hong lingin, kialpi le pulnatna zong hong tung ding hi. A kihtakhuai a tuamtuamte le lim lianpipi vanah hong kilang ding hi.
