[21] Tua ciangin Judea gam sunga omte mualtungah tai un. Jerusalem khuasunga omte zong taikhia unla, gam sung khuaneu-a om mite, Jerusalem khua sungah lut nawn kei un. [22] Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin, ‘Gim Piak Ni,’ ahi hi. [23] Tua huna naupaiite le naungek neite a dingin haksa mahmah ding hi. Hih leitungah gimna lianpi hong tung ding a, Pasian in hih mite gim a pia ding hi. [24] Mi pawlkhat, namsau tawh kithat ding a, pawlkhat, galmatin gam dangah kiciahpih ding hi. Tua ciangin Gentail mite’ uk hun a bei matengin Jerusalem khuapi a siacipin om ding hi. [25] “Ni, kha, le aksite tungah lim hong om ding hi. Tuipi ging le tuihual liante kihtakna hangin leitung mi khempeuh lau-in lunggim ding uh hi. [26] Leitungah tu-in bang hong piang ding, ci-in a ngaihsut kawmun mite lau-in sibup ding uh hi. Vantunga om nate a pai ngei bangin pai nawn loin lampial mangkhin ding uh hi.
[36] Hih thupiang khempeuh thuakzawh nading thahatna na neih nading uh, le Mihing Tapa mai-ah na dintheih nadingun a tawntungin thu ngenin vil niloh un,” a ci hi.
[2] Amaute in a kikhopna uh innte panin note hong hawlkhia ding uh hi. Note hong that mite pen Pasian’ nasemin a kingaihsut ding uh hun hong tung ding hi.

[17] ‘Pasian in hih bangin gen hi: Nitawp ni ciangin, mi khempeuh tungah ka Kha ka sung ding a, na tanute uh le na tapate un keima thu taangko ding uh hi; na tangvalte un maang mu ding uh a, na puteekte un mang man ding uh hi. [18] Tua ni ciangin ka nasem numeite le ka nasem pasalte’ tung nangawnah ka Kha ka sung ding a, amaute in keima thu gen ding uh hi. [19] Tua ciangin vantung le leitungah hilhkholhna lim le nalamdang ka bawl ding hi. Sisan kiluansakna, meikatna le meikhu sahpi hong om ding hi. [20] Topa’ ni, a lian thupi ni, hong tunma-in ni hong mialin, kha, sisan hong bang ding hi. [21] Ahi zongin Topa tungah huhna a ngen khempeuh in hotkhiatna ngah ding uh hi,’ ci-in a kigelh hi.

[30] Pasian in mihingte’ theih loh hun lai-a a gamtatnate uh phamawh a sak loh hangin, tu-in mun khempeuha om mi khempeuhte a gamtat siatna panun a kihei nadingun thu a hong pia khinzo hi. [31] Amah in leitung mi khempeuh thu a mantakin ama teel mipa a hong khensak nading ni a sehkhol khinzo hi. Tua a ngaihsutna a man taktak hi, ci-in mi khempeuh tungah a hong lah nadingin a teel mipa, sihna panin a hingkiksak zo hi,” ci-in thu a hilh hi.

[25] Sanggamte aw, note in na theih dingun ka deih thusim khat om hi. Thei le-uhcin, “A pil mahmah hi hang,” na kici nawn kei pah ding uh hi. Tua thu in: Israel mite in a up nop lohna pen a tawntung ding thu hi lo hi. Pasian kiangah Gentail mite a pai dingzah in Pasian a zuat hun ciang dong ding bek ahi hi. [26] Tua hi a, Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin Israel mite khempeuh in hotkhiatna ngah ding uh hi. Lai Siangtho in, “Zion panin Honpa hong pai ding a, Jakob’ suanlekhakte sunga om gitlohna khempeuh maisak ding hi.

[11] Tuhun pen bang hun hita ahi hiam, ci-in theita na hih manun tu-a bangin na gamtat ding uh ahi hi. Tu-in note in khua phawkin na khanlawh ding uh hun hita hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Jesuh Khrih i up cil lai hun sangin tu-in Pasian in leitung haksatna panin eite hong hotkhiat ding hun hong naizaw hi. [12] Zan khuamial bei dektak a, sun khuavak hong tung dektak ta hi. Khuamial sunga gamtatnate khawlin khuavak sunga nazatte zam ta ni. [13] Sun khuavak sunga om mite bangin a kilawmin gamta ni. Gualnopna le zukhamna, mawhna le thangtatna, kitotna le kihazatnate-in i hun beisak kei ni. [14] Kidal nadingin, Topa Jesuh Khrih’ hong piak galhiamte zang unla, na pumpi uh deihna bangin gamtat nading hun omsak nawn kei un.

[20] Tua ahih manin tuhuna mipilte, miteite, le thusel a siamte, bangin kimang ahi hiam? Hih leitung pilna pen haina a suahsak khitna kilang khinzo hi. [21] Pasian in ama pilna hong zang a, mihingte in amau’ pilna tawh pasian a theih zawh loh nadingun a bawl hi. Tua ahih manin mite in, “A haihuai thu,” ci-in a ngaihsut uh i thuhilhna a umte, Pasian in hotkhiatna a piazaw hi. [22] A uptheih nadingun Jew mite in nalamdang kal uh a, Grik mite in pilna a thupisak uh hi. [23] Ahi zongin kote in singlamteh tungah a kikhai Khrih’ thu ka hilh uh a, tua thu pen Jew mite a dingin a hehhuai thu hi a, Gentail mite a dingin a haihuai thu ahi hi. [24] Ahi zongin Pasian in a hong sap ei Jew mite le Gentail mite a dingin Khrih pen Pasian’ vangliatna le Pasian’ pilna ahi hi. [25] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ haina pen mite’ pilna sangin sangzaw lai a, Pasian’ thaneemna pen mite’ hatna sangin hatzaw lai hi. [26] Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note hong sap laitakin na omzia uh ngaihsun un. Leitung mite’ hong muhna panin note a tamzaw, mipil na hi kei uh a, mi vanglian zong na hi kei uh a, mi thupi zong na hi kei uh hi. [27] Ahi zongin Pasian in mipilte a maizumsak nadingin mihaite hong teel a, mi thahatte a maizumsak nadingin mi thaneemte a hong teel hi. [28] Leitung mite in thupi a sakte uh a suksiat theih nadingin Pasian in leitung mite’ simmawh a niamte, bangmahin a ngaihsut loh uh mite a teel hi. [29] Tua ahih manin Pasian’ mai-ah mite a kisaktheih nading thu om lo hi.
[11] Leitung beikuan hun sungah a om eite a dingin hih thupiangte i etteh ding thu hi a, eite hilhkholh nadingin lai sungah a kiciamteh ahi hi.

[20] Ahi zongin a thuman taktak ci lehang, a sisa mite zong hingkik takpi ding hi cih a kitel theih nadingin sihna panin Khrih kihingkiksak khinzo hi. [21] Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khat hangin sihna a om mah bangin mi khat hang mahin misite zong hinkikna om hi. [22] Bang hang hiam cih leh Adam tawh a kizop manin mi khempeuh si a, tua mah bangin Khrih tawh a kizom khempeuh zong kihingkiksak ding hi. [23] Ahi zongin tua hinkikna pen ama hun tawh kizui-in a banbanin hi ding hi. A masa penin Khrih hi a, Khrih hong paikik ciangin ama pawlte khempeuh hingkik ding hi. [24] Tua ciangin Khrih in ukna, vangliatna, aana a nei ama galte khempeuh a zawhgawp khit ciangin Pa Pasian tungah ukna aana ap ding a, tua ciangin hih leitung hun beina hong tung ding hi. [25] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in a galte khempeuh zo-in a khenuai-ah a koihkhit hun dong mateng Khrih in uk ding hi. [26] A tawpna-ah suksiat ding a gal nunung pen in sihna ahi hi.

[52] Peengkul nunung hong gin’ ciangin mitphiat kikal sungin i kikhelpak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh peengkul hong gin’ ciangin misite a sithei nawn lo dingin hong tho ding a, i vekpi-in i kikheel ding hi.

[13] Amaute pen sawltak taktak hi loin, sawltak a kineihkhemte hi uh a, a nasepna uhah zong zuau-in, Khrih’ sawltak taktak a battheih nadingun a mel kiseel ahi uh hi. [14] Tua pen lamdangsak ding hi lo hi. Satan nangawn Pasian’ vantungmi tawh a kibangin kibawltawm thei hi. [15] Tua ahih manin Satan’ sawltakte pen thuman nasem bangin a kibawl manin lamdangsak ding hi lo hi. Hun bei ni ciangin amau gamtatna bangun thuak ngawn ding uh hi.
[21] Vantungah ukna, aana, vangliatna a neite khempeuh tungah Khrih in ukna aana nei lai a, hih leitung bekah hi loin a hong tung ding leitungah zong amah a lianpen ahi hi.
[5] Mi khempeuh tungah na dik un. Topa hong pai baih ta ding hi.

[13] Sanggamte aw, lametna a nei lo mite bangin na dahluat loh nadingun a sisa mite’ omzia ding thu na theih ding uh ka deih hi. [14] Jesuh si-in thokik hi, ci-in i up mah bangin Pasian in Jesuh hong paipih kik ciangin amah umin a si mite zong hong tonpih ding hi, ci-in i um hi. [15] Topa’ thugen note kiangah ka hong gen uh thu in: Topa hong paikik ni ciangin a nungta lai eite pen a sisa mite tawh i kimuh ma-in Topa tawh i kimu kei ding hi. [16] Pasian’ thupiakna awging lianpi, vantungmi mangpa’ thugenna, le Pasian’ peengkul hong ging ding a, vantung panin Topa mahmah hong paisuk ding hi. [17] Tua ciangin tua hun laitakin a nungta lai eite pen vankim lai-ah Topa a dawn dingin amah a um a sisa mite tawh hong kilakhawm ding a, Topa tawh i omkhawm tawntung ding hi, cihna ahi hi. [18] Tua ahih ciangin note khatlekhat hih thu tawh na kihehnem un.

[2] Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa hong pai ding Ni pen zan a gutate bangin theihkholh lohin hong tung ding hi, ci-in note in teltakin na theihsa uh ahi hi. [3] Mite in, “Thu khempeuh a hoih laitak hi a, bangmah patauh nading om lo hi,” a cih laitakin thakhatthu-in amaute tungah siatna hong tungvat ding hi. Nausuah natna bangin gimna thuak ding uh a, kuamah suakta lo ding uh hi.

[3] Ahi zongin kuama khemsa-in ta kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh nakpitakin Pasian langpanna lianpi le hell khuksung a tung ding ahi A Gilopa hong kilat matengin tua Ni hong tung lo ding hi. [4] Tua A Gilopa in mite’ biak pasian a kici khempeuh le na khempeuh nialgawp ding hi. Tuate khempeuh sangin a lianzaw-in a kingaihsut banah, Pasian ka hi hi, ci-in Pasian’ biakinn sung mahmahah pai-in va tu ding hi.
[7] Kuamah kim in a phawk loh Gitloh Gamtatna kigamta khinta a, ahi zongin hih thu a pian ding a khamcip pa a kilakkhiat khit matengin a hong piang ding thu hong piang nai lo ding hi.

[1] Nidang ciangin a upna panun mi pawlkhat pialin, zuauthu gente le dawi thu a kigente a zuih nading uh Kha Siangtho in teltakin a gen hi. [2] Tua bang zuau thuhilhnate pen zuau genin mi a khem, sik emsa tawh tatgawp bangin a lungsim un a hoih le a hoih lo a khenthei nawn lote’ kam panin hong gingkhia ding hi.

[1] Nitawp ni hun pen a lauhuai hun ahih ding lamtak phawk in. [2] Tuahun ciangin mite in amau angsung ding bek ngaihsunin, huaihamin, kisialin, kihisakin, mi zahko-in, nu le pate’ thu mang loin, lungdam theihna mel nei loin, biakna lungsim nei loin, [3] mi khual loin, hehpihna nei loin, mi gensia-in, ngongtatin, kihtakhuai-in, thuhoih deih loin, [4] ciampelin, thu khual loin, kiphasak gawpin, Pasian don loin pumpi nopsakna bek deihin, [5] biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deih lo ding uh hi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in. [6] Tua bang mite pawlkhat, mite inn-ah va hawh khiankhianin, deihna nam tuamtuam le mawhna lungsim tawh a kidim numeite na thuzawh uh hi. [7] Tua bang numeite in thu a zakzak uh hangin a man le a man lo khen thei lo uh ahih manin thuman thutak thei zo lo uh hi.

[3] Mite in thuman a ngaih nop loh hun, amaute’ deihna bek a zuihnop hun, amaute’ zaknop thute bek a gen ding sia a cial thuahthuah hun hong tung ding hi. [4] Amaute in thuman thutak ngainuam nawn loin tangthu phuahtawm peuh ngaihsutpi-in nei ding uh hi.
[14] Eite a dingin hih leitungah a kip khuapi om lo ahih manin a hong piang lai ding khuapi a zong ihi hi.
[7] Na khempeuh a bei nading hun hong naita hi. Nomau pumpi ki-uktawm thei-in pilvang unla, hoihtakin thu a ngen thei-in om ta un.

[9] Mi pawlkhatte’ ngaihsut bangin Topa in a kamciamna a hong tungsak hak hi zenzen lo hi. Note khat beek in siatna na thuakkhak ding uh deih loin na vekpi-un na kisik ding uh deih ahih manin hong pai nai lohna pen note hong khualna hizaw hi. [10] Ahi zongin theihkholh lohpi-in guta bangin Topa hong pai ding Ni hong tung ding hi. Tua Ni ciangin nakpitakin a ging in vantungte maimang sakin, vantung nate mei in kangtumin maimang ding a, leitung le a tunga om na khempeuh a mangthang ding hi. [11] Hih nate khempeuh hih bangin kisusia mangkhin ding ahih manin note a bangci mi dingin kilawm cih limtakin na ngaihsun un. A siangtho nuntakna nei-in Pasian’ deihna bangin na gamta unla, [12] vantungte mei in kangtumin, vantung nate sa lua-in a tuimang ding hun Pasian’ Ni hong tunbaih theih nadingin na hihtheih zahun hanciam unla, na ngak un.

[17] Leitung nate le leitung deihnate a beibei ding hita a, ahi zongin Pasian’ deihna bangin a gamta mite pen kip tawntung ding hi. [18] Tate aw, tu-in huntawpna hong naita hi. Khrih’ Gal hong pai ding hi, ci-in na zaksa uh mah bangin tu-in Khrih’ gal tampi tak hong tung khinta hi. Tua ahih ciangin bei nading nai taktakta hi, ci-in i thei hi. [19] Khrih’ gal ahi hih mite pen ei’ pawl hi ngei napi-in hong taisan uh hi. Ei’ pawl taktak hileh eite tawh omkhawm paisuak ding uh ahih manin, tu-in amaute paikhia uh ahih ciangin ei’ pawl taktak ahihlohna uh hong kilang hi.

[18] Amaute in note kiangah, “Hun nunung lam ciangin Pasian’ deihna tawh a kituak lo amau pumpi deihna zui-in note a hong simmawhbawl mi pawlkhat hong piang ding hi,” hong ci uh hi. [19] Hih mite in pawl kikhenna piangsakin, amau pumpi deihna bangin gamta uh a, Kha Siangtho zong nei lo uh hi.

[3] Hih laibu a sim mite mi hampha hi a, hih thu kigente ngai-in, hih laibu sungah a kigelh thu a zuite zong mi hampha mah ahi uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih thu kigente a tun ding hun hong naita hi.

[1] “Sardis khua pawlpi vantungmi kiangah lai gelh inla, Pasian Kha Siangtho sagih le aksi sagih a nei pa’ thugen in: Note’ gamtatnate ka thei a, note a si hinapi-in a hing min na pua uh hi. [2] Tua ahih manin khua phawk unla, na neihlai sunte uh a beimang ma-in thasanpha kik un. Bang hang hiam cih leh na nasepnate uh Pasian’ muhna-ah a cingtaak nai het lo ahihna thu ka thei hi. [3] Tua ahih manin note a hong kihilh na zaksa uh thute phawkkik unla, tua thute zui-in na mawhna panun kisik kik un. Khua na phawk kei uhleh note kiangah guta bangin ka hong pai ding a, ka hong tunlam nangawn na thei kei ding uh hi. [4] Ahi zongin Sardis khuasunga om note lakah a puan a ninsak nai lo tawmkhat na om uh hi. Tua bang mite kilawm uh ahih manin kei tawh puanpak silhin ka tonkhawm ding uh hi.

[10] Amaute nakpitakin kiko uh a, “A thuman, a siangtho, a Vanglian Topa aw, leitungah a omlai, kote a hong that mite tungah cik ciangin thu khenin, kote hong thahna hangin cik ciangin phu la ding na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi. [11] Tua ciangin amaute tungah puantualpi a kang khat ciat kipia a, amaute a kithah mah bangin a kithat lai ding a naseppihte uh le a sanggamte uh a kim matengin tawlkhat sung a tawlngak lai nading uh kigen hi. [12] Ciamtehna gukna a hon ciangin ka khuadak le nakpitakin zin hong ling a, ni pen puanvom bangin hong vomin, kha pen sisan bangin a hong san hi. [13] Aksite ahihleh huihpi in theipuam a mutkhiat bangin van panin kia zaizai uh hi. [14] Laidal a kizial bangin vanpi kizialin maimang a, mual le tuikulhte khempeuh a omna uh panin maimangta hi.

[1] Tua khit ciangin leitung kiu li-ah vantungmi li, kiu khatah khat ciat dingin leitung, tuipi tung, le singkung khat peuhpeuh a mutkhak loh nadingin leitung huih lite lencipin a om uh ka mu hi. [2] Tua ciangin a nungta Pasian’ ciaptehna a tawi vantungmi khat, nisuahna lam panin hong paito ka mu hi. Leitung le tuipi suksiat theih nading vangliatna a kipia vantungmi lite kiangah amah in nakpitakin gen a, [3] “I Pasian’ nasemte, a taltang uhah ciaptehna i bawl khit matengin leitung, tuipi, le singkungte susia nai kei in,” a ci hi.

[14] “Ka thei kei hi, topa aw. Nangmah in na theizaw ding hi,” ka ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in keima kiangah, “Hih mite pen bawlsiatna lianpi thuakin a hong suakta mite ahi uh hi. Amaute in a puan uh sawpsiangin Tuuno sisan tawh a paaksak uh ahi hi.

[2] Ahi zongin biakinn pualam tualte teh kei in. Minam dangte’ khut sungah kipia khin a, amaute in kha sawmli le nih sung Khuapi Siangtho tuancilgawp ding uh ahih manin tua a tualte teh loin nusia lel in. [3] Ka teci nihte puanhampi silhin ka paisak ding a, amaute in ni tulkhat zanih sawmguk sung Pasian’ thu a gen ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.
[9] Tua ciangin tua tanglai gulpi, Dawimangpa ahih kei leh Satan a kici, leitung mi khempeuh a khem pa pen a vantung mite tawh leitungah kilawnsuk hi.

[1] Tua laitakin tuipi sung panin ganhing khat a hong pusuak ka mu hi. Tua ganhing in ki sawm le lutang sagih nei a, a ki sawmte tungah lukhu khat ciat om a, a lutang sagihte tungah min hoih lo khat ciat a kigelh hi.

[15] Tua ganhing nihna in ganhing masa lim dingin a kibawl milim sungah a hu a muap ciangin hong pauthei a, tua milim a bia lo khempeuh a thahtheih nadingin thu a ngah hi. [16] Tua ganhing in a lian a neu, a hau a zawng, sila le sila ahi lo, mi khempeuh in a taklam khut tung uh ahih kei leh a taltang uhah ciaptehna a neih nadingun thu a pia hi. [17] Tua ahih manin tua ganhing min ahih kei leh a min tangin a nambat ciaptehna a tungah a nei lo mi peuhmah, vanlei vanzuakin paikhia thei lo uh hi.

[14] Tua ciangin ka khuadak leh meiipi a bang a kang biakbuak om a, tua meiipi tungah mihing tawh a kibang khat tu-in, kham lukhu khu-in, a khutah phiaukawi hiam khat a tawi ka mu hi. [15] Biakinn sung panin vantungmi khat hong paikhia a, meiipi tungah a tu mipa nakpitakin samin, “Leitung mite lak dingin min mahmah a, a lak hun hong tungta ahih manin na phiaukawi tawh at in,” a ci hi. [16] Tua ahih manin meii tungah a tupa in leitungah a phiaukawi hong van a, leitung mite a at hi. [17] Tua ciangin vantung biakinn panin vantungmi adang khat hong paikhia leuleu a, amah in zong phiaukawi hiam khat mah a tawi hi. [18] Tua ciangin biakna tau panin vantungmi adang khat hong paikhia leuleu hi. Tua vantungmi pen mei a ukpa hi a, phiaukawi hiam a tawipa kiangah nakpitakin, “Leitung mite leenggah bangin minta ahih manin leitung mite na phiaukawi tawh atin a lom lomin kaikhawm in,” a ci hi. [19] Tua ahih manin vantungmi in zong leitungah a phiaukawi hong van a, leitung mite kaikhawmin Pasian’ hehna lian leenggah cilna phualah a kaikhawm hi. [20] Khuapi pualamah kicil a, a cilna panin sisan vive luangkhia-in, pi nga bang thukin, tai zanih ciang bangah tuikhang bangin a luang hi.
[4] A thumna vantungmi in gunte le tuinakte tungah a hai hong bung a, a tui khempeuh sisan a hong suak hi.
[13] Tua ciangin gulpi kamsung, ganhing kamsung, le a man lo kamsangpa’ kamsung panin uiphuk tawh a kibang kha gilo thum a hong pusuak ka mu hi.
[21] Gial gol pipi, khat ciangin tawi sawmthum val a gik, van panin mite tungah hong kia hi. Tua gimna nasialua ahih manin tua gialte hangin mite in Pasian a samsia uh hi.
[1] Tua khit ciangin vantungah mihonpi a kikona awging tawh a kibang khat ka za a, “Pasian phat un! Hotkhiatna, minthanna le vangliatna pen eite’ Pasian-a’ ahi hi.

[11] Tua ciangin vantung a kihong ka mu a, sakol kang khat a om hi. A tungah a tuang pa pen a Citak a Thuman pa kici hi. Amah in thumanin thu khenin gal a do hi. [12] A mittangte meikuang tawh kibang a, lukhu tampi a khu hi. Amah simloh kuamah dang in a theih loh min khat ama tungah a kigelh hi. [13] Sisan sungah a kidiah puantualpi khat silh a, amah pen, “Pasian’ Thu,” cihna min tawh a kisam hi. [14] Vantung galkapte a siangtho puanpak hoih tawh kizem uh a, sakol kangte tungah tuangin amah a zui uh hi. [15] Minam dangte a zawhgawp nading namsau hiam khat a kam sung panin a pusuak hi. Amah in sik ciangkhut tawh minam dangte ukin, a Vanglian Pasian’ heh mahmahna tawh leenggah cilna-ah leengtui a sukkhia ding hi. [16] A puan tung le a phei tungah, “Kumpite’ Kumpi, topate’ Topa,” ci-in a min kigelh hi. [17] Tua ciangin ni sungah vantungmi khat a ding ka mu a, amah in vankim lai-ah a leeng vasa khempeuh nakpitakin samin, “Pasian’ pawi lianpi-ah a kikhawm dingin hong pai un. [18] Hong pai unla, kumpite’ sa, galkapmangte le galkapte’ sa, sakolte le a tungah a tuangte’ sa, a lian a neu, silate le sila ahi lo mi khempeuhte’ sa hong ne un,” a ci hi.

[1] Tua ciangin vantung panin vantungmi khat hong paisukin, kuahawm thukpi honna tawhtang le sikkhau khainiang golpi khat a tawi ka mu hi. [2] Amah in tanglai gulpi, Dawimangpa ahih kei leh Satan zong a kici pa manin kum tulkhat sung a hencip hi. [3] Tua ciangin kuahawm thukpi sungah khiasuk a, kum tulkhat a cin mateng minam tuamtuamte a khemtheih nawn loh nadingin a tawh kalhin a ciamteh hi. Kum tulkhat a cinkhit ciangin tawlkhat sung a kikhah ding ahi hi.

[7] Kum tulkhat a cin ciangin a thongkiatna panin Satan kikhah ding a, [8] Gog le Magog a kici leitung gam khempeuhah a om minam khempeuh a khem dingin kuankhia ding hi. Satan in a galsimpih dingin tuipi gei-a sehnel zahin a tam mihonpi kaikhawm ding hi. [9] Leitung khempeuhah amaute pai uh a, Pasian’ mi siangtho omna mun le Pasian in a it khuapi umcih uh hi. Ahi zongin vantung panin meikuang hong paisukin amaute a kangtum hi. [10] Amaute a khem Satan pen ganhing le kamsang zuau pa a omna mun, kat a kikhulna meiphualpi sungah kilawn a, a sun a zanin tua lai munah amaute in gimna a thuak tawntung ding uh ahi hi. [11] Tua ciangin tokhom kang a lian khat le a tungah a tupa ka mu hi. Ama omna panin lei le van lengkhiamang a, a tunna mel uh kithei lo hi. [12] A lian a neu misite tua tokhom mai-ah dingin laibute a kilem ka mu hi. Tua ciangin a nungta mite a kigelhna laibu a dang khat zong a kilem ka mu hi. Amaute’ gamtatna tua laibute sungah a kigelhna tawh kizui-in misite tungah thu a kikhen hi. [13] Tuipi sungah a om misite, tuipi in hong pusuah a, Sihna le Misite’ Gam in zong amau sungah a om misite hong pusuah uh hi. Tua ciangin a vekpi-in amaute’ gamtatnasa tawh kizui-in thu a kikhen hi. [14] Tua ciangin Sihna le Misite’ Gam, meiphualpi sungah a kilawn hi. Hih meiphualpi pen sihna nihna ahi hi. [15] A nungta mite a kigelhna laibu sungah a min a om lo peuhmah meiphualpi sungah kilawn hi.
[12] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Kei ka hong pai baihta ding a, mi khempeuh a gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in a thaman ding uh ka hong puak ding hi.

[9] Jakob in Faro kiangah, “Tawlkhat sung ka nuntak hun pen kum za le kum sawmthum ahi hi. Ka nuntak hun tom sungah siatna bekbek om a, ka pate tawlkhat a omsung uh a nuntak hunte ban nai lo hi,” a ci hi.

[14] Eite khempeuh i si ding a, a kikhawm kik thei lo leilakah a bua tui tawh i kibang hi. Ahih hangin a hawlkhiat pa a kipuasehin a kikoih loh nadingin lampi a zong mipa’ nuntakna Pasian in lakhia lo ding hi.
[15] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka pu ka pate khempeuh uh mah bangin kote pen nangma mai-ah khualmite le pemtate ka hi uh hi. Ka hunte uh leitungah niliim bang hi a, sih ding ka pelh thei kei uh hi.

[15] Tua laitakin Seba mite hong pai-in ganhingte hong sut a, namsau tawh gancingte thatkhin uh hi. Hih thu a hong zasak thei dingin kei bek kong suakta hi,” a ci hi. [16] Amah in a thugen a khit ma-in kamtai dang khat hong tungin, “Vantung panin keek hong kia a, tuute le tuucingte kha-in kangtum uh hi. Hih thu nang kiangah a hong ko thei dingin kei bek kong suakta hi,” a ci hi. [17] Tua pa in a thugen a khit ma-in kamtai dang khat hong tung leuleu-in, “Khaldea mite hon thum in kalaohte hong sut a, namsau tawh kalaoh tung tuangte khempeuh that hi. Hih thu nang kiangah a hong ko thei dingin kei bek kong suakta hi,” a ci hi. [18] Amah in a thugen a khit ma-in kamtai dang khat hong tung leuleu a, “Na tapate le na tanute a u pen uh inn-ah an ne zu ne-in om uh hi. [19] Tua laitakin sehnel gam panin huihpi pingpei hong nungin a inn mutpai-in na tate denglum hi. Nang kiangah hih thu a hong ko thei dingin kei bek kong suakta hi,” a ci hi.

[6] Ka hunte siamgante’ siam ciangtang sangin manlang zaw a, lametna om loin a mong tung pak hi. [7] “Pasian aw, ka nuntakna husan’ bang bek ahihna hong phawk in. Ka mit in hun nuam mukik ngei nawn lo ding hi.
[9] Eite pen zan mah mi ihi a, bangmah i thei kei hi. Leitung a i nuntakna pen niliim bang lel ahi hi.
[25] “Laitaite sangin ka hun nawhtai zaw a, beipak ahih manin nopna ngah kha lo hi.
[1] “Mihingte a nuntak hun tom mahmah a, lungkhamna tawh kidim hi. [2] Amaute paak bangin khangin keu pak uh a, niliim bangin pai hanhanin, mangthang uh hi.
[11] Mi khat a mawhna hangin tai-in na sat ciangin, nget in a nektum bangin ama na manpha na beisak hi. Mihing khempeuh husan’ khat bang bek hi takpi hi.
[20] Amaute pen zan a mangmat tawh kibang lel a, na khanlawh ciangin amaute a bangci pian hiam, ci-in na phawk nawn kei hi.
[39] Amah in, amaute pen mihing hi lel a, a hong paikik nawn lo huihnung bang ahihna uh a phawk hi.
[47] TOPA aw, nuntak hun a tom mahmahlam hong phawk in. Mihingte a mawk nadingin bawl na hi hiam?

[9] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka hun khempeuh uh na hehna-in bei a, ka nuntak hun uh husan’ khat bangin a bei hi. [10] Kote’ nuntak sung kum sawmsagih bang hi a, cidam le-ung kum sawmgiat bang hithei hi. Ahih hangin tua hunsung nangawn gimna le haksatna hi a, tua hunte bei pakin kote ka maimang uh hi. [11] Nang hong kizahtak nadingin na sinsona’ vangliatna kua in thei a, na hehna’ husiatna kua in thei ahi hiam? [12] Tua ahih ciangin pilna lungsim ka ngah theih nadingun ka nuntak hun uh a tomlam ka theih nadingun hong hilh in.
[10] Minamte a thuhilhpa in mi thuhilh lo ding ahi hiam? Mihingte tungah theihtheihna a hilh TOPA in mihingte’ ngaihsutna thei a, amaute pen husan’ bang bek ahihna teltakin a thei hi.
[3] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka nuntakna, meikhu bangin beimang a, ka pumpi meikuang bangin a sa hi.
[11] Keima nuntakna pen nitak lama a om niliim tawh kibang lel a, lopa bangin ka vulgawp hi.
[15] Eite ihih leh i nuntakna pen lopa tawh kibang a, lolai-ah a po paakte bangin a palh hi. [16] Bang hang hiam cih leh huih in amah semin beimang a, tua mun in amah thei nawn lo hi.
[19] Kei pen hih leitungah peemta ka hi hi; kei’ kiang panin na thuphate seel kei in.
[4] Mi pen husan’ khat tawh kibang a, ama hunte pen a tai dandan niliim tawh kibang hi.
[5] Ama hehna tomno sung bek hi a, ama hong deihsakna pen khang tawntung ading ahi hi. Zan hun sungteng kahna omkha mah ding a, ahih hangin zing khuavak tawh nuamna hong tung hi.

[4] “ TOPA aw, ka mong le ka hun a kisehzah hong theisak inla, ka nuntakna a beipak hun ding hong theisak in!” ka ci hi. [5] Ka nuntakna hun khutme tan bang bekin na bawl a, ka nuntakna hun nangma muhna-ah bangmah gentham lo hi. Mihing khempeuh, husan’ bang bek hi takpi hi. [6] Niliim bangin mihing pai kawikawi takpi hi. A mawkna-in amau lungkham takpi uh a, kua’ ngah ding cih thei lopi-in mite in na a khol uh hi.
[1] Zing ciang hun ading kima-sialh kei in. Tuhun le tua hun kikalah a piang ding thu bangmah na thei kei hi.
[4] Khang khat bei-in khang khat hong tung a, ahi zongin leitung kibangbang niloh hi.
[20] Pasian in lungdamin omsak ahih manin a nuntak tomlam phawkin nei kha lo ding hi.
[12] Niliim bangin a pai hanhan, a mawknapi hih nuntak tom sungah mihing a’ ding a hoihpen kua in thei ding ahi hiam? Ama sih khit ciangin leitungah bang piang ding cih kua in gen thei ahi hiam?
[5] A hing laite in a si ding ahihlam uh thei a, a sisate in bangmah thei nawn lo uh hi. A sisate in thaman bangmah nei nawn lo uh a, amaute kiphawkkha nawn lo hi.
[10] Na mai-ah sep ding a om khempeuh, na tha neihzah tawh sem in. Bang hang hiam cih leh na zuat ding sihna gam sungah nasepna le thungaihsutna, pilna le theihna cihte om lo hi.

[12] Tuucingpa’ puanbuk bangin ka omna inn kibotkhia-in kei kiang panin kilakhia hi. Siamgante in a hial bangin ka nuntakna kihial khin a, amah in siambu panin kei hong atkhia hi. Sun le zan tawntung gimna hong kithuaksak a,

[6] Awging khat in, “Kiko in!” hong ci hi. Tua ciangin keimah in, “Bang thu kiko ding ka hi hiam?” ka ci hi. “Mi khempeuh, lopa bang hi a, ama hoihnate khempeuh gamlakah a om pak tawh kibang lel hi. [7] TOPA’ hu in a mut ciangin lopa vulin, pak a pulh hi. Mihingte lopa bang lel hi taktak hi. [8] Lopa vul a, pak a pulh hi. Ahih hangin Pasian’ thu kho tawntung ding hi,” hong ci hi.
[12] TOPA in, “Kei, keimah pen note hong hehnem pa ka hi hi. Lopa sangin sauvei a nungta zaw tuan lo, mihing lellelte, bang hangin kihta na hi uh hiam?

[7] Tomno sung nang kong nusia pak a, ahih hangin hehpihna lianpi tawh nang kong lakik ding hi. [8] Hehluatna hangin tomno sung nang kiang panin ka maitang ka seel a, ahih hangin tawntung itna tawh nang kong hehpih kik ding hi, nangmah a hong honkhia TOPA in ci hi.
[18] Hoihtakin na phawk ding uh thu panin: Van le lei a bei mateng, hih thukhamte a neupen khat nangawn’ deihna tangtung lopi-in mawkmai lo ding hi.
[35] Van le lei a maimang zongin ka thugente maimang ngei lo ding hi.
[31] Van le lei mangthang ding a, ahi zongin ka thugente mangthang ngei lo ding hi.

[33] Van le lei a mangthang zongin ka thugente maimang ngei lo ding hi. [34] “Limtakin kidawm un. Thakhat thu-in tua Ni hong tung kha ding ahih manin zune anne le leitung nuntakna lunghimawhin thamang kei un. [35] Theihkholh lohin thang kisai bangin leitung mi khempeuh tungah hih thu hong piangvat ding hi.
[20] A taktakin ka hong genin-ah, note dahin na kap ding uh a, ahi zongin leitung mite lungdam ding uh hi. Note na dah ding uh a, ahi zongin na dahna uh lungdamna hong suak ding hi.
[31] leitung na nuamtakin a zangte pen a zang lo mah bangin kingaihsun ta uh hen. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih leitung pen sauveipi kip nawn lo ding hi.

[16] Tua thu hangin ka lungkia tuan kei uh hi. Kote’ leitung pumpi in damdamin muatlam ding a manawh ahi zongin ka kha nuntakna uh a nini-in thaksuak semsem hi. [17] Tuhun laitakin tomno sung lungkhamna ka thuakte uh in ka thuakna uh sangin nakpitakin a lianzaw tawntung minthanna sung hong tunpih ding hi. [18] Bang hang hiam cih leh a kimuthei nate a mitsuan ka hi kei uh a, a kimu thei lo nate a mitsuan ka hi uh hi. A kimuthei nate tomno sung bek kimang a, a kimu thei lo nate a tawntungin a kip ahi hi.

[15] Tua ahih ciangin hoihtakin kingaihsunin gamta unla, mihaite bang hi loin mipilte bangin gamta un. [16] Tuhun pen hun hoih lo hun ahih manin na hun neih khempeuh uh a hoih lamin zang un. [17] Tua ahih manin hai ommawk kei unla, Topa in bang a sem dingin hong deih ahi hiam, ci-in kan un.

[10] Tua banah, “Topa ahi nangmah in a kipat cil-in leitung na piangsak a, na khut tawh vantungte na bawl hi. [11] Tua nate khempeuh mangthang ding a, nang na hih leh na om paisuak ding hi. Tua nate puan bangin luisuak thei ding a, [12] puan khep bangin na khep ding a, tua nate khempeuh kikhelkhel ding uh hi. Ahi zongin nang na kibang tawntung ding a, teek hun cih na nei ngei kei ding hi,” na ci lai hi.
[27] Mi khempeuh khatvei si-in, tua khit ciangin Pasian’ thukhenna a thuak ding ahih mah bangin,

[26] Tuahun lai-in thu a gen ciangin leitung kiling a, ahi zongin tu-in amah in thu hong ciam a, “Leitung bek lingsak loin vantung tawh zong khatvei ka lingsak lai ding hi,” hong ci hi. [27] “Khat vei lingsakkik lai ding,” a cih ciangin a kipiangsak nate kilingsakin kipaikhia ding a, a kilingsak lo nate kip lai ding ahihna thu hong kilangsak hi.
[14] Eite a dingin hih leitungah a kip khuapi om lo ahih manin a hong piang lai ding khuapi a zong ihi hi.

[10] Mihaute zong a niam uh ciangin lungdam veve uh hen. Lopa pak bangin a mangthang veve ding ahi uh hi. [11] Ni hong suakin a sat ciangin lopate vul a, a paakte pulhin a hoihnateng a bei mah bangin a haute zong manlahin a om laitakun siatna a thuak ding uh ahi hi.

[13] Tuni ahih kei leh zing ciangin tua khua tua khua-ah va pai-in, kum khat bang va omin, sumbawlin a meet tampi va ngah ni, a ci mite aw, ka thugen hong ngai dih un. [14] Zing ciangin na nuntakna uh bangci ding cih nangawn na thei kei uh hi. Meiilum tawlkhat sung kaii-in a mangthang pak tawh a kibang lel na hi uh hi.
[24] Tua ahih manin Lai Siangtho sungah, “Mihingte, lopa tawh kibang a, a minthannate uh lopa pak tawh kibang hi. Lopate vulin paakte pulh a,
[11] Ka itte aw, hih leitungah gamdang mi, a peempak bangin kingaihsun unla, na kha nuntakna uh tawh a kilehngat pumpi’ deihnate na kikham un.

[10] Tawlkhat na thuak khit uh ciangin, Khrih tawh na kipawlna hangun tawntung minthanna a ngah dingin note a hong sam, hehpihna kicingin a nei Pasian in note a cingtaakin hong bawl ding a, kipna, thahatna, bulkip kician hong pia ding hi.

[27] Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ama lim bangin mihing piangsakin, Pasian’ lim bangin amah a piangsak hi. Amah in pasal le numei a piangsak hi. [28] Pasian in amaute thupha pia a, Pasian in amaute tungah, “Ci pha-in tampi pha unla, leitung dimin zo un. Tuipi ngasate tung, leitungah a gamtang, a nungtate khempeuh tungah ukna nei ta un,” a ci hi.

[14] Na suanlekhakte leilak leivui zah pha ding a, nitumna lam le nisuahna lam, leilu lam le leitaw lamah na kizelthang ding uh hi. Nang le na suanlekhakte thupha kong piak bangin leitung minam khempeuh in thupha a ngah nadingun hong ngen ding uh hi.
[5] Esau khuadak to-in nupite le naupangte a muh ciangin amah in, “Nang tawh a om hihte kua ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Jakob in, “Pasian in hehpihna tawh na nasempa a piak tate ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[12] “ TOPA na Pasian un note hong piak leitang tungah na khan uh a sau theih nadingin na nu le na pa uh zahtak un.

[8] Ka thukhamte zui unla, tuate sem un; note a hong siangthosak TOPA pen keimah ka hi hi. [9] “Bang hang hiam cih leh a nu ahih kei leh a pa a samsia mi peuhmah kithat ding hi. Amah in a nu ahih kei leh a pa samsia khin a, ama sihna amahmah ngawh ding ahi hi.
[16] “‘ TOPA note’ Pasian in hong piak leitang tungah na khan uh sau-in na nopsak theih nadingun TOPA note’ Pasian in hong thupiak bangin na nu na pa uh zahtak un.
[7] Na tate uh tungah limtakin na hilh ding uh a, na innsung uhah na tut uh ciang, lampi-ah na pai uh ciang, na lup ciang uh le na thawh ciangun tua thute na gengen ding uh hi.
[14] Midangte khempeuh sangin note thupha hong kilim piakzaw ding hi. Note’ lak hitaleh na ganhingte uh lak hitaleh ah a nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a ciing om lo ding hi.

[18] “Mi khat in a lungkhauh, a langpang thei, a nu’ thu ahi a, a pa’ thu ahi zongin a mang lo, a tai hangun amau’ thu a ngai lo tapa khat a neih leh, [19] a nu le a pa in tua mipa manin ama khuapi upate kiang, a tenna mun kongpi-ah paipihin, [20] amaute in a khuapi upate kiangah, ‘Hih ka tapa uh lungkhauhin hong langpang thei a, amah in ka thu uh hong mang lo a, an hai, zu hai bek ahi hi,’ ci ding uh hi.
[11] TOPA note’ Pasian in note le na innkuanpihte uh tungah hong piak na a hoih khempeuhte hangin note le Levi mite le note lakah a om peemtate na lungdam khawm ding uh hi.
[16] “‘A nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a zahtak lo mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.

[15] TOPA’ na na sepnop kei uhleh, Gun galkhat a a na na sepsak uh na pu na pate uh pasian ahi a, note’ tenna gam Amor mite’ pasian ahi zongin, a na na sepsak ding peuhpeuh uh tuni-in teel un. Ahih hangin kei le ka innkuanpihte in ahihleh TOPA’ na ka sem ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[28] Tua ahih ciangin TOPA’ tungah amah ka kawm hi. A nuntak laiteng TOPA’ tungah amah a kikawm ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in tua lai-ah TOPA a bia uh hi.

[2] Tua bang hi lo a, ka ngaihno pen numei khempeuh lak panin ling lak a a om unok pak tawh kibang hi.
[17] nitak huih vot mateng nitak nitum mateng a cing hi. Sanang bangin mualtung a sakhitalno bangin itluat aw, hong paikik in.

[6] Itluat aw na ngaihbaang a, na mel kong muh nuam zungzung hi. [7] Tuum kung bangin na etlawm a, na nawite pen, nisuh gah a bawk pha mahmah tawh a kibang hi. [8] Tuum kung tungah kahto-in a gah ka lo ding hi. Na nawite kei a dingin leenggah bawk tawh kibang a, na gimnam epel min bangin namtui hi. [9] Na kam, leenggahzu bangin khum zungzung hi. Ka ngaihno tungah leenggahzu khum luang hen la, a muk a ha tawk kim hen. [10] Ka ngaihno a’ ka hi a, amah in kei hong deih hi. [11] Ngaihno aw, gamlakah paikhia-in leenggui lo-ah va giak ni. [12] Zingsangin tho baihin leengguite a sel nai hiam, leengguite a pak nai hiam, mang kawlsing kungte a pak nai hiam, i en ding hi. Tua lai munah kong itna letsong ka hong pia ding hi.

[6] Kei simloh kuamah ngai kei inla, kei simloh kuamah kawi kei in. Itna zong sihna zahin thahat a, ngaihna zong sihna zahin khauh hi. Itna, mei bangin kuangkhia a, meikuang lianpen a suak hi. [7] Tui tampi nangawn tawh kisumit zo lo a, tui sungah i phumcip hangin mitzo tuan lo hi. Mi khat in a neihsa sum khempeuh tawh itna a lei dingin hong kithawi leh kinuihsan lel ding hi.

[4] TOPA ka Pasian’ kiangah thu ngenin ka mite’ mawhna ka pulak hi. Keimah in, “Topa Pasian aw, nang na lian a, ka hong zahtak uh hi. Nang na thuman a, na thuciamna le na thupiakna a mangte le a hong itte a tawntungin na it hi.

[8] Mun khempeuhah a om no mihingte aw, TOPA in a hoih nate hong gen khinzo hi. TOPA in note tung panin hong kalh thu in: Thuman thutang sem ding a, itna kip nei tawntungin, kiniamkhiatna tawh Pasian’ thu man’ ding ahi hi.
[17] TOPA na Pasian un note hong ompih a, ama vangliatna in hong gualzosak hi. Note tungah TOPA lungkim ding a, ama hong itna tawh hong thakbawl ding hi. Note’ hangin TOPA lungdamin la sa ding a,

[43] “Note in, ‘Na vengte uh na it unla, na galte uh na mudah un,’ ci-in a kigenna thu na zaksa uh ahi hi. [44] Ahi zongin ke’n note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong bawlsiate a dingin thu na ngetsak un. [45] Tua hileh vantungah a om na Pa uh tate na hi thei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in mihoihte le misiate tungah a kibangin ni taangsak khawm a, a gamtat phate le a gamtat siate tungah zong a kibang mahin guah zusak khawm hi. [46] Tua ahih manin no hong itte bek na it uhleh Pasian in bang thaman hong pia zenzen ding ahi hiam? Siahdongte nangawn in amau a itte it thei uh hi. [47] Na lawmte bek uh hopihin thupha na piak uhleh mi mawkmawkte sangin na hoihzawkna uh bang om ahi hiam? Gentail mite nangawn in tua bang ciang lel hih thei uh hi.
[37] “Kei sangin a nu a pa a itzawte kei tawh kilawm lo a, kei sangin a tapa a tanu a itzawte kei tawh kilawm lo hi.
[19] na nu na pa zahtak in; nang na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in, cihnate ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[36] “Sia aw, thukham khempeuh sung panin bang thukham lianpen ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. [37] Jesuh in, “Na Topa Pasian na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, le na pilna khempeuh tawh na it ding hi, cihna ahi hi. [38] Hih pen a masapen, a lianpen thukham ahi hi. [39] A nihna pen a masa mah tawh kibang a, nangma pumpi na it bangin na vengte na it in, cihna ahi hi. [40] Hih thukham nihte tung panin thukham dang khempeuh le kamsangte’ thuhilhna khempeuh a hong meengkhia ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[12] Gitlohna khang mahmah ding ahih manin ki-itna hong kiam ding hi.

[29] Jesuh in, “Thukham a lianpen in: Israel mite aw, ngai un: I Topa Pasian bek mah Topa ahi hi. [30] Na Topa Pasian uh, na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na pilna khempeuh, le na thahatna khempeuh uh tawh na it un, a cihna ahi hi. [31] A nihna in: Nangma pumpi na it bangin na vengte na it in, cihna ahi hi. Hih tegel sangin thukham a lianzaw a dang om nawn lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[31] Note tungah a hong kibawl ding na deih uh bangin midangte tungah na bawl un.

[35] Tua bang lelin note na gamta kei ding uh hi. Na galte uh itin amaute tungah thupha bawl unla, lohkik ding lamen loin leitawi pia un. Tua hileh na thaman uh lian ding a, a Lianpen Pasian’ tate na hi ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh lungdamna mel a theithei lo mite le a huaiham mite tungah amah migi hi.

[27] Amah in, “Na Topa Pasian na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na hatna khempeuh, le na pilna khempeuh tawh na it inla, nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in,” ci-in kigelh hi, ci-in a dawng hi.

[14] Tua Thu mihing hong suakin kote lakah hong om a, itna nei-in citak mahmah ahih manin Pasian’ pianzia a neihna ka mu cian uh hi. Hih pianzia pen Pasian’ Tapa khat bek hihna tawh a neih pianzia ahi hi.
[16] Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawn loin a hin tawntung theih nadingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi.

[34] Note tungah ka hong piak thak thu in: Note khatlekhat na ki-it ding uh ahi hi. Note ka hong it mah bangin note khatlekhat na ki-it un. [35] Note khatlekhat ki-it le-uhcin keima nungzuite na hihna uh mi khempeuh in hong thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[15] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Kei na hong it uhleh ka thupiakte zong na zui ding uh hi.

[21] Keima thupiakte sangin a zuite in keimah hong it ahi uh hi. Kei hong it mite pen ka Pa in zong it ding a, keimah in zong itin amaute tungah ka kilang ding hi,” a ci hi. [22] Tua ciangin Judas Iskariot ahi lo Judas dang khat in, “Topa aw, leitung mite tungah kilang loin kote tungah bangci-in hong kilangtuam thei ding na hi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin [23] Jesuh in, “Kei hong itte in ka thu zui ding uh hi. Ka Pa in zong it ding a, ka nihun tua mite kiangah pai-in amaute tawh ka omkhawm ding uh hi. [24] Kei hong it lote in ka thugente zui lo ding uh hi. Tu-a na zak uh thute pen keima thu hi lo a, kei hong sawl Pa Pasian kiang panin a hong pai thu ahi hi.

[9] Ka Pa in kei hong it zahin note hong it ka hih manin keima hong itna sungah om un. [10] Ka Pa’ hong thupiakte zui-in ama itna sungah ka om mah bangin note in zong ka thupiaknate na hong zuih uhleh ka itna sungah a om na hi ding uh hi. [11] Note hangin kei ka lungdam theih nading le note’ lungdamna a cingtaak a suahtheih nadingin hih thute a hong gen ka hi hi. [12] “Note tungah ka hong piak thu in: Note ka hong it zahin note khatlekhat na ki-it un. [13] Lawmte’ tang ding sih ngamna sangin lawmte itna a lianzaw om nawn lo hi.
[26] Kei na hong itna zah itna mah amaute sungah omin, amaute tawh kei ka omkhawm theih nadingin amaute tungah nangma min ka gen khin a, mai lamah zong ka gen lailai ding hi,” ci-in thu a ngen hi.

[15] An a nekkhit uh ciangin Jesuh in Simon Peter kiangah, “Johan’ tapa Simon aw, hih adang khempeuhte’ hong it sangin kei na hong nak itzaw hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin amah in, “Topa aw, ka hong itzaw hi. Nang ka hong itna na thei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. [16] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Ka tuunote na kem in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Jesuh in a nihveina dong leuleu a, “Johan’ tapa Simon aw, kei na hong it hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Topa aw, nang ka hong it a, ka hong itna thu na thei hi,” a cih ciangin, “Ka tuute na kem in,” a ci leuleu hi. [17] Jesuh in a thumveina dong leuleu a, “Johan’ tapa Simon aw, kei na hong it hiam?” a cih ciangin, “Kei na hong it hiam?” ci-in thumvei tak a dotna hangin Peter zong a dah suak hi. Tua ahih manin, “Topa aw, nangmah in na khempeuh na thei a, nangmah ka hong itna thu zong na thei hi,” ci-in a dawn ciangin Jesuh in, “Ka tuute na kem in.
[5] Pasian in eite tungah a hong piak a Kha Siangtho tawh eite sungah ama itna hong guang ahih manin hih lametna in eite hong lungkiasak ngei lo hi.
[8] Ahi zongin eite mawhna nei ihih laitakin eite a dingin Khrih hong si ahih manin Pasian in eite hong it mahmahna thu hong lak khin hi.
[28] Ama deihna bang a sem dingin Pasian in a hong sap, amah a it eite a dingin na khempeuh a hoihlamin piangsak hi, ci-in i thei hi.

[37] Eite a hong it pa’ hangin hih thu khempeuhah a gualzo pente ihi hi. [38] Bangmah in ama hong itna tawh hong kikhensakzo het lo ding hi, ci-in ka thei hi. Sihna, nuntakna, vantung mite, vantung vangliatnate, tuhun nate le a hong tung ding nate, [39] leitung a om nate, leinuai-a om nate, Pasian’ bawlsa nate khat peuhpeuh in i Topa Khrih Jesuh hangin Pasian in eite hong itna tawh hong khenzo het lo ding hi.
[9] Na ki-itnate uh lungsim takpi tawh hi sak unla, a siate mudahin a hoihte lenkip un. [10] Unau ki-itna lungsim nei unla, khatlekhat kizahtak bawl ding lamsang kidem un.
[14] No a hong bawlsia mite, Pasian in thupha a piak nadingin thu ngetsak unla, tua bang mite samsia loin thupha piazaw un.

[8] Khatlekhat ki-it ding cih lohbuang, kuama tungah leiba nei kei un. Midang a itte in Thukham deihna teng a zuikhin ahi hi. [9] Thukham sungah, “Nulepa mawhna bawl kei in, mi that kei in, guta kei in, hazatna lungsim nei kei in,” cihna le adang khempeuhte pen, “Nang na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in,” cihna thu in huam khinmang hi. [10] Midangte a it mi peuhmah in amaute tungah siatna bawl het lo ahih manin itna i neih ciangin Thukham buppi a zui khinta ihi hi.

[1] Tu-in milim biakna sa tawh kisai thu panin: Amaute in, “Ka thei uh hi,” a cih mah bangin eite khempeuh in theihna i neih ciatna thu i thei hi. Tua bang theihna in mite kisatheisak a, ahi zongin itna in mite kipsak hi.

[3] Ka neih khempeuh midangte tungah pia-in, Pasian’ nasepna hangin kihaltumna ka thuak ahi zongin itna ka neih kei leh ka phattuamna bangmah om lo hi. [4] Itna neite a lungduai-in migi hi. Itna neite in hazatna lungsim nei loin, zong kisathei lo hi. [5] Itna neite a kilawm loin gamta lo, heh pakpak lo, mite’ mawhna ciamteh lo hi. [6] Thuman lote-ah lungdam ngei lo uh a, thumante bekah lungdam uh hi. [7] Itna neite lungkia cih om ngei lo hi; a upna, a lametna, lungduai takin a ngaknate uh a mawkna cih om ngei lo hi. [8] Itna pen a tawntungin a kip ahi hi. Thuhilh siamna a om tei hangin tawlkhat sung bek kimangin, pau lamdang pautheih siamnate a om hangin bei ding a, thutheih siamna a om hangin maimang ding hi.
[13] Tu laitakin a omlai thu thumte pen upna, lametna, le itna hi a, tua thumte sung panin itna mah a thu lianpen ahi hi.
[14] Na sepna khempeuh uhah ki-itna tawh na gamta un.
[14] Mi khempeuh a dingin mi khat si khin ahih manin mi khempeuh zong a ngeina lui uhah si khinta hi, ci-in ka theihna hangun tua Khrih’ itna in kote’ nuntakna hong uk hi.

[20] Tua ahih manin tuhuna ka nuntakna zia pen kei hang hi nawn loin ka sungah a hong om Khrih hang ahi hi. Tua hi a, keimah hong itin, keima a dingin a nuntakna a hong pia Pasian’ Tapa ka muanna tawh tu laitakin a nungta ka hi hi.

[13] Sanggamte aw, note ahihleh a suakta mi ahi dingin Pasian in a hong sap ahi hi. Ahi zongin tua suahtakna pen na pumpi uh ut bangbangin gamtat theih nadingin paulam zonna-in nei kei unla, itna tawh khatlekhat kikhualna-in zangzaw un. [14] Bang hang hiam cih leh Thukham khempeuh thu khatin kigawm thei a, “Nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in,” cihna tawh kitomlak thei hi.

[22] Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho’ sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna, [23] dikna le pumpi ki-ukzawhna hi a, hih bangin a gamta mite, Thukham in bangmah cih thei lo hi.
[2] Kiniamkhiatin, thunemin, lungduai-in om tawntung un. Khatlekhat kihuhna tawh na ki-itna uh kilangsak un.
[32] khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim nem tawh na kihozaw unla, Khrih’ hangin Pasian in note’ mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.

[1] Note pen Pasian in a hong it a tate na hih manun amah tawh na kibat nadingun hanciam un. [2] Khrih in eite a hong it manin Pasian in eite’ mawhna hong maisak theih nadingin a namtui biakna-in Pasian kiangah a kipiak mah bangin note zong itna tawh na gamta un.
[25] Pasalte aw, Khrih in pawlpi itin a pumpi a piak mah bangin na zite uh na it un.

[33] Pasalte in amau pumpi zahin a zite uh itin, zite in zong amau pumpi zah mahin a pasalte uh a it ding uh ahih mah bangin, Lai Siangtho in hih bangin a gen ciangin a thukzaw khat, Khrih le pawlpi a ki-itna a gennopna ahi hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
[24] Tatsat loin i Topa Jesuh Khrih a it tawntung mi khempeuh tungah hehpihna thupha hong tung tahen.
[9] Note a’ ding deihsakna tawh thu ka hong ngetsak thu in: Note’ lungsimah itna khang semsemin, a sia le a pha a mantakin khenthei-in a hoihpen na teeltheih nading uh ahi hi.
[2] Tua ahih manin kei tawh ngaihsutna kibangin note khatlekhat ki-itin, khatlekhat lungsim kituakin na omna uh tawh keima lungdamna na hong cingtaaksak nadingun ka hong kun hi.

[12] Pasian in note hong itin, hong teelin, ama mi siangthote hikhin na hih manun note pen hehpihna nei-in, migi-in, kiniamkhiatin, dikin, na lungduai ding uh ahi hi. [13] Note lakah khatlekhat a kilungkim lo na om uh ciangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh kimaisakin na kihuh ciat un. Topa in note’ mawhna hong maisak bangin note zong khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ding uh hi. [14] Hihte khempeuh banah, mi khempeuh kilem takin a hong om khawmsak thei ahi ki-itna na bulphuh un.
[9] Ahi zongin thu uppih mite it ding tawh kisai-in bangmah gelh ding na kisam nawn kei uh hi. Khatlekhat na ki-it nading uh Pasian in note tungah hong hilh khinzo hi.
[5] Hih bangin thupiakna pen, upna taktak le kisuanna om hetloin lungsim siangtho taktak tawh ngaihsutna panin a hong piangkhia ki-itna a khantheih nading deihna ahi hi.
[14] Pasian in genzawh lohin kei hong hehpih a, Khrih Jesuh tawh kipawlna hangin i ngahtheih upna le itna a hong guan hi.
[6] Thu umte ihihna hangin Khristian sungah eite i kikholh manin, Khrih hangin i nuntakna sungah i ngah thupha a hoih khempeuh na theihna a kicin semsem nadingin thu ka ngen hi.

[10] Pasian, a man loin gamta ngei lo ahih manin na Khristianpihte uh a beisa hunah na huhna uh le tu dongin na huh laina uh tawh ama a dingin na nasepna uh le amah na itna uh na lahnate uh hong mangngilh het lo ding hi.
[24] Khatlekhat ki-itin a hoih nate i sep nadingin kihanthawn ciat ni.
[1] Khrih sungah unau bangin na ki-itna uh na zomsuak un.
[5] Sanggamte aw, hoihtakin na ngai un. Pasian a it mite tungah piak dingin a ciam vantung gam a ngah ding le upna thu-ah mihau a suak dingin Pasian in leitung mizawngte a teel hinapi-in,
[8] Lai Siangtho sungah, “Nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in,” ci-in a genna Topa’ Thukham zui le-uhcin a hoih hi pah hi.
[8] Amah mu ngei lo napi-in na it uh a, amah mu ngei lo napi-in a thu umin kama genzawh loh zah dongin nakpitakin na lungdam uh hi.
[22] Tu-in lungdamna thuman na zuihna hangun note kisiansuah khinin, na thu uppih mite uh lungsim tak tawh itthei khinta na hih manun na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh limtakin na ki-it un.
[8] A tawpna-ah kong gennop thu in: Lungsim le ngaihsutna kikhat nei-in unau ki-itna lungsim nei unla, migi-in kiniamkhiat un.
[8] Itna in mawhna tampi khuhcip thei ahih manin lungsim takpi tawh khatlekhat ki-it ding thupi ngaihsut pha pen un.

[5] Hih thu hangin na upna ban uhah gamtat hoihna na behlap unla, na gamtat hoihna uh thutheihna tawh na behlap un; [6] na thutheihna uh pumpi ki-ukzawhna tawh na behlap unla, na pumpi ki-ukzawhna uh thuakzawhna tawh na behlap un; na thuakzawhna uh Pasian’ deih bangin gamtatna tawh na behlap unla, [7] Pasian’ deih bangin na gamtatna uh sanggam ki-itna tawh na behlap un; na sanggam ki-itna uh itna thukpi tawh na behlapzawh nadingun na hanciam un.
[15] Hih leitung nate le Pasian tawh a kizom lo thute deihluatin nei kei un. Mi khatpeuh in hih leitung nate a deihluat leh amah in Pa Pasian it taktak thei lo hi.

[1] Pa Pasian in eite bangzah takin hong itna thu thei un. Ama hong itna lian mahmah ahih manin eite pen Pasian’ tate hong kici a, hong kicih mah bang ihi takpi hi. Leitung mite in tuhun ciang dong Pasian thei lo uh ahih manin eite zong a hong thei lo uh ahi hi.
[11] A kipat cil a kipanin na zak tawntung uh thu pen khatlekhat i ki-it nading thu ahi hi.

[16] Itna i cih bangci theih ding ihi hiam cih leh: Khrih in eite a dingin a nuntakna hong pia hi. Ei zong i Khristian mipihte a dingin i nuntakna i piak ngam ding ahi hi. [17] Mi khat hau mahmah hen la, a Khristian mipih a cimawhte mu napi-in huhna bangmah pianuam hetkei leh, bang hangin amah in Pasian ka it hi, ci thei ding ahi hiam? [18] Ka it tate aw, i kampi bek tawh ki-it loin, lungsim takpi tawh ki-itin i gamtatna tawh kilangsak ni.
[23] Ama hong thupiakna in: A Tapa Jesuh Khrih umin zui-in, Khrih’ hong sawl bangin eite khatlekhat i ki-it ding ahi hi.

[7] Ka it lawmte aw, Pasian pen itna hong piankhiatna bulpi ahih manin eite khatlekhat ki-it ni. Itna a nei mi peuhmah, Pasian’ tate hi a, Pasian a thei uh hi. [8] Pasian pen ki-itna ahih manin itna a nei lo mite in Pasian thei lo uh hi.

[10] Hih ka gen itna pen eite in Pasian i itna thu hi lo a, Pasian in eite hong itin, i mawhna a maitheih nadingin a Tapa a hong paisakna thu ahi hi. [11] Ka it lawmte aw, Pasian in tua zahta-in eite hong it ahihleh eite zong khatlekhat i ki-it ding a kilawm ahi hi. [12] Kuamah in Pasian mu ngei lo hi. Ahi zongin eite khatlekhat i ki-it leh eite tawh Pasian hong omkhawm a, ama itna eite lakah a cingtaakin a om ahi hi.

[16] Tua hi a, Pasian in eite a hong itna thu, eite mahmah in thei-in i um hi. Pasian pen ki-itna hi a, itna a nei mite pen Pasian tawh omkhawm uh a, Pasian zong amaute tawh a omkhawm hi. [17] Thukhen Ni ciangin kisuanna nei hetloin i omtheih nadingin eite in a cingtaak itna a nei ihi hi. Khrih mah bangin hih leitung i nuntakna-ah nungta-in gamta ihih manin tua bang kisuanna a nei lo ding ihi hi. [18] Itna nei lehang launa om lo a, itna cingtaak nei peuh lehang launa beimangta hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh launa i cih pen gimthuak ding kihtakna hi a, gimthuak ding a laute pen itna cingtaak a nei lote ahi hi. [19] Pasian in eite hong it masa ahih manin eite in itna i nei thei hi. [20] Mi khatpeuh in, “Pasian ka it hi,” ci napi-in a Khristian mipihte a muhdah le a zuaupi a gen ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a muhtheih a Khristian mipih a it lo mi in a muhtheih loh Pasian it thei lo ding hi. [21] Khrih in eite tungah hong thupiakna in: Pasian a it mi in a Khristian mipihte zong it ding hi, cihna ahi hi.
[6] Itna thu ka hong gen ciangin Pasian’ thupiakte zui ding cihna ahi hi. A kipat cil a kipan na zaksa uh ahi hih thupiakna pen na khan tawntungun zui-in itna na nei ta un.
[4] Ahi zongin note ka hong mawhsakna khat om a, tua in: A masa lai-a kei na hong it bangun tu-in na hong it nawn kei uh hi.

[11] Ahih hangin a kum sagihna ciangin, nomau’ mi a zawngte in a nek theih nadingin leitang tawlngasakin, lokhulin na omsak ding uh a, gamlak ganhingte in mizawngte’ nek loh teng ne thei ding uh hi. Na leenggui lote uh le na oliv lote uh zong tua bangmahin na hih ding uh hi.

[10] Note in a kum sawmngana siangthosakin, gam sunga a teng mi khempeuh tungah suahtakna thu na zasak ding uh hi. Note in nomau’ neihsa ciat ngahkikin, sila-in a kizuak mite nomau’ innkuanpihte ciat kiangah na ciahkik uh ciangin note a dingin jubilee hi ding hi. [11] Tua a kum sawmngana pen note a dingin jubilee hi ding hi. Tua kum sungin note in lo pawi loin, a li pote zong la loin, a kihah lo leengguite panin zong leenggah na khawm kei ding uh hi. [12] Bang hang hiam cih leh tua pen jubilee ahi hi. Tua pen note-a’ dingin siangtho ding a, note in lo panin a piang tawmte na ne ding uh hi. [13] “Hih jubilee kum sungin note khempeuh in nomau’ neihsa ciat na ngahkik ding uh hi. [14] Note in na vengte’ tungah na zuak uh ahi zongin na vengte’ kiang panin na lei uh ahi zongin note khatlekhat na kikhem kei ding uh hi. [15] Jubilee khit ciangin a jubilee kik dong a kum phazah tawh kituakin note in na vengte uh kiang panin lei-in, a an piang ding kum zah tawh kituakin amau in note tungah hong zuak ding uh hi.

[28] Ahih hangin amah in ama a dingin ngahkik zawh nading lampi a neih kei leh, tua ama zuak leitang pen jubilee kum mateng a leipa’ khut sungah om ding hi. Jubilee kum ciangin tua leitang kipiakhia ding a, amah in a neihsa ngahkik ding hi.

[30] Tua pen kum khat bit sungin a kitatkik kei leh, khuapikulh sunga om tua inn pen a leipa in khang tawntungin a neih dingin kibawlsak ding a, jubilee kum ciangin zong kipiakhia kik tuan nawn lo ding hi. [31] Ahih hangin a kimkotah kulh a nei lo khua neu-a innte pen gam sung lote tawh a kibangin kingaihsun ding hi. Tuate kitanhkik thei ding a, jubilee kum ciangin tuate kipiakhia ding hi. [32] Ahi zongin Levi mite’ khuapite, amau’ neihsa khuapite-a innte ahihleh, Levi mite in khatvei peuh ciangin tanh thei ding uh hi. [33] Levi mi khatpeuh in ama tatkik theih ding hinapi a tatkikzawh kei leh, amau’ neihsa khuapi sunga tua inn pen jubilee kum ciangin kipiakik ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Levi mite’ khuapi sunga innte pen Israel mite’ lakah amau’ neihsa ahi hi.
[40] Amah pen a kicial nasem le peemta bangin nang kiangah om ding hi. Amah in jubilee kum mateng nangma na hong sem ding a,

[50] Midang tungah amahmah a kizuak a kipan jubilee kum dong amah a leipa tawh tuat ding a, ama suahtak nading sum pen a kum phazah tawh kituak hi ding hi. A topa tawh a omkhawm hun sungteng pen a kicial nasem khat thaman zahin seh ding hi. [51] Kum tampi in a sap lai leh, amah in tuate tawh a kituakin ama thaman ding a kipiakna sung panin ama kitatkhiat nadingin pia kik ding hi. [52] Ahih hangin jubilee kum ding kum tawmkhat bek in a sap leh amah in a topa tawh tuatna khat nei ding hi. Ama sepsak ding kum a omlai tawh kituakin ama kitatkhiat nadingin sum piakik ding hi. [53] Amah pen a topa tungah a kum kumin a kicial nasempa tawh kibang ding hi. A topa in note’ muhna-ah hih gawpgawpna tawh amah uk lo ding hi. [54] Hih bang danin amah a kitatkhiat kei leh, jubilee kum ciangin amah le amah tawh a om a tate kikhahkhia ding hi. [55] Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite pen kei a dingin nasemte ahi uh hi. Amaute pen Egypt gam panin keimah in ka paikhiatpih keima nasemte ahi uh hi; kei pen TOPA na Pasian uh ka hi hi.

[16] “Mi khat in a luah ama leitang phelkhat TOPA’ tungah a ap leh, nangma sehna pen khaici vawh zah ding tawh kizui ding hi. Mangbuhham beem khat dim a pawina leitang pen ngun shekel sawmnga-in kiseh ding hi. [17] Amah in jubilee kum a kipanin a lo a ap leh, nangma sehna zahzah bit ding hi. [18] Ahih hangin jubilee kum khit ciangin amah in a lo a ap leh, siampipa in jubilee kumkik dong a omlai kumte tawh kizui-in a manzah sum seh ding a, nangma sehna zah panin kikhiam ding hi. [19] Lo a ap pa in a tatkik nop leh, a kisehna banah nga-ah khat sum tawh behlap ding a, tua lo ama a’ hisuak ding hi. [20] Ahih hangin amah in a lo a tanh nuam lo ahi a, amah in midang khat tungah a zuak ahi zongin ahihleh, tua pen amah in tanhkik thei nawn lo ding hi. [21] A lo pen, jubilee huna piak khiat ciangin, a ki-apsa lo mah bangin TOPA’ tungah a siangtho hi ding a, siampipa in tua lo tang ding hi. [22] “Amah in luahna tawh a neih ahi lo, a leisa lo pen TOPA’ tungah a ap leh, [23] siampipa in jubilee kum ciang dong ding tua man seh ding a, tua ni-in a mipa in a kiseh zah, TOPA’ tungah a siangtho-in pia ding hi. [24] Jubilee kum ciangin a lo pen a kileinapa, gamhluahna tawh tua leitang a nei mipa tungah tungkik ding hi.
[4] Israel mite’ Jubilee hong tun ciangin amau a’ te pen a manawh minamte’ tungah kipia beh ding hi. Ka pa uh namte’ gamhluah panin amau a’ kikhenkhia ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

[12] “Na sanggampa, Hebru pasal khat ahi a, Hebru numei khat ahi zongin nang tungah hong kizuak leh, amah in nangma na kum guk sung hong sem ding a, a kum sagihna ciangin nang kiang panin a suakta-in na paikhiasak ding hi. [13] Na kiang panin a suakta-in na paikhiatsak ciangin khuthawm guakin na paisak kei ding hi. [14] Na tuuhon lak, na ancilna le na leenggah sukna panin citna tawh tampi na pia ding a, TOPA na Pasian in nang thupha hong piak zahin amah na pia ding hi. [15] Egypt gamah sila na hihna uh le TOPA na Pasian un note hong suahtaksakna na phawk ding uh hi. Tua ahih manin hih thu tuni-in kong pia hi.
[25] Israel mite aw, gamlakah kum sawmli na om sungun gan go-a biakna le keima tungah piakna bangmah nong bawl kei uh hi.
[15] Nang le numei kikal na suanlekhakte le ama suanlekhakte kikalah kilangneihna ka omsak ding hi. Amah in na lutang hong sunim ding a, nang in ama khetul na sunim ding hi,” a ci hi.

[1] Leitungah mite tam dingin hong kipanin, amau’ sung panin tanute hong suah ciangin, [2] vana om mite in leitung mite’ tanute hoihsa uh ahih manin a deih bangun amaute zi-in a la uh hi. [3] Tua ciangin TOPA in, “Mihingte sungah ka Kha om paisuak nawn lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mihingte a mawh hi khinta a, kum za le kum sawmnih sung kisik nading hun kipia lai bek ding hi,” a ci hi. [4] Vana om mite in leitung mihing tanute luppihin, amaute in ta a neih hun laitak hitaleh tua khit hitaleh, amau’ suanlekhak Nefilim a kici mite leitungah om hi. Hih mite pen tang lai-a mi thahat, mi minthangte ahi uh hi. [5] Leitungah mihing a gitlohna a liatna le mihing lungsim ngaihsutna peuhmah a sia ahih ngitngetna thu TOPA in mu hi.

[17] Tua ciangin Saul in David kiangah, “Hih lai-ah ka tanu uzaw Merab om hi. Nang tungah zi dingin kong pia ding hi. Kei a dingin hang peuh inla, TOPA’ gal do in,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Saul in, “Keima khut sungah amah si loin Filistia-te’ khut sungah si hen,” ci-in ngaihsun hi.

[6] Tua ciangin Akhish in David samin ama kiangah, “ TOPA a nungta ahih mah bangin, nang na thuman a, hih vai-ah kei tawh hong kuankhia-in na ciah ding man ka sa hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kei kiangah nong pai a kipan tuni dong nang tungah khialhna bangmah ka mu kei hi. Ahih hangin uliante in nang hong thukim lo uh hi.
[15] A lai sungah, “Galsim a haksatna penah a madawkin Uriah koih inla, amah kivat tukin a sihtheih nadingin ama kiang panin nungkik un,” ci-in a gelh hi.
[5] Tua ciangin kumpipa’ inn sungah Joab hong pai-in, “Tuni-in nangma nuntakna, na tanute le na tapate’ nuntakna, na zite le na zineute’ nuntakna a hong honkhia na nasemte khempeuh na maizumsak hi.

[26] Amah in dawngin, “Ka topa! Aw Kumpipa, ka nasempa in kei hong khem hi; bang hang hiam cih leh na nasempa in ama kiangah, ‘Kei a tungah tuangin kumpipa ka zuih theih nadingin kei a dingin la khat tutphah vawh in,’ ka ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh na nasempa a khe bai hi. [27] Amah in ka to kumpipa kiangah na nasempa hong gensia hi. Ahih hangin ka to kumpipa pen Pasian’ vantungmi tawh kibang hi. Tua ahih ciangin hoih na sak bangin hong hih in.
[1] Ahab a sih khit ciangin Moab gam in Israel lehdo hi.
[9] Ka muan, ka lawm it pa, keima an a ne pa nangawn in a khetul tawh kei hong peek vial hi.

[12] Kei hong phin galte hi lo hi. Hi leh ka thuakzo ding hi. Kiphatsakna tawh kei hong bawlte, langpang mi hi lo hi. Hi leh ama kiang panin ka bu thei ding hi. [13] Ahih hangin ka kikimpih, ka kikholhpih, ka lawm theih mahmah, nangmah na hi hi. [14] Kam khum tawh i kihoho ngei a, Pasian’ inn sungah i kikhawl khawm ngei hi.
[9] Nangma inn ka deihluatna mei bangin ka sungah sa a, nangmah hong kote’ konate keima tung hong tu hi.
[4] Amaute ka itna, amaute a dingin thu ka ngetsakna nangawn amaute in hong thukna-in kei hong mawhsak uh hi.

[1] Judah gam kumpi ahi Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz, le Hezekiah-te’ hun lai-in Amoz’ tapa Isaiah in Judah gam le Jerusalem khua tawh kisai a maangmuhnate: [2] Vantungte aw, na za un; leitung aw, na ngai in; bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in thu hong gen khinzo a, “Ka pattahsa ka tate in kei hong lehdo uh hi. [3] Bawng in amah a nei pa thei a, la in zong a topa’ an piakna mun thei buang hi. Ahih hangin Israel in bangmah thei lo a, keima mite in thei thei lo uh hi,” a ci hi.

[18] En in, hih gambup langah a ding ding, Judah kumpite, uliante, siampite le hih gammi khempeuh langah a pang dingin tuni-in nang, khuapi muanhuai khat bang ahi zongin, sikkhuampi khat bangin ahi zongin, sumngo kulhpi khat bangin ahi zongin ka hong bawl hi.
[13] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka mite in mawhna nam nih a bawlzo uh hi. Nuntakna ciktui ahi keimah a hong taisanzo uh hi. Tuikhuk totawm uh a, a tuikhuk tawh uh keu-in, tui a vung thei kei hi.
[13] Na mawhna na phawk ding bek kisam hi. TOPA na Pasian na langpanna, singliim nuai khempeuhah gamdang pasian-te tawh na khialh kawikawina le ka thu nong man lohnate pulak in, TOPA in kong ci hi.

[11] Israel minamte le Judah minamte, TOPA in ka cihin-ah, kei’ tungah hong thuman nawn het lo uh hi. [12] “Amaute in TOPA hong nial uh a, ‘Amah in bangmah hihlo ding hi. Eite tungah siatna hong tung lo ding a, gal ahi zongin kial ahi zongin i thuak kei ding hi.

[6] Bang hang hiam cih leh na sanggamte le na innkuanpihte nangawn in nang hong zuak uh a, nang a hong do ding mihonpi a kaikhawm uh hi. Kam khum tawh nang a hong zol uh hangin um kei in,” ci-in hong dawngkik hi.

[5] Na vengte’ thu upin nei kei inla, na lawmte zong muanin nei kei in. Na ang a lum na zi kiang nangawnah thu na gen ding kidawm in. [6] Tuhun ciangin tapate in a pate haibawl a, tanute in a nute langpan’ uh a, mote in a teeknu uh langneih uh hi. Mi khat a dingin ama innkuanpihte mah a gal a suak mawk hi. [7] Ahi zongin ke’n ahihleh TOPA mah ka en ding a, kei hong suaktasak Pasian ka ngak ding hi. Ka Pasian in ka thu hong ngai ding hi.

[16] Nisuahna lam panin a hong pai mipilte in amah a khem lamtak Herod in a theih ciangin a heh suak mahmah hi. Tua mipilte tung panin aksi a kilat hun a dotna tawh kizui-in, Bethlehem khua le a kiima om naungek kum nih ciang le a nuaisiah khempeuh a that dingin a galkapte a sawl hi.

[9] “Tua ciangin note hong kibawlsia-in hong kithat ding a, keima hangin Gentail mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi. [10] Tua hun ciangin mi tampi in a upna uh khahsuah ding a, khatlekhat kimudahin khatlekhat kilehhek ding uh hi. [11] Kamsang kineihkhem mi tampi hong piang ding a, mi tampi tak umkhialsak ding uh hi.

[14] Tua ciangin sawm le nihte sung panin Iskariot’ tapa Judas a kici mipa siampi liante kiangah va pai a, [15] “Note’ khut sungah amah hong pia leng, note in kei bang tawh hong guai ding na hi uh hiam?” a cih ciangin ngun peek sawmthum a pia uh hi. [16] Tua hun a kipanin amah a lehhek theih nading hunhoih a zongpah hi.
[49] Judas zong Jesuh kiangah hong paipahin, “Topa aw, thupha ngah ta in,” ci-in hopihin limnap mahmah hi.
[74] Tua ciangin Peter kiciam a, “Hua mipa ka thei kei hi. Zuauthu ka gen taak leh Pasian in kei hong dawm kei ta hen!” a ci hi. Tua khitzawh phetin ak hong khuangta hi.

[3] A lehhek pa Judas in Jesuh a si dingin thu a kikhenna a muh ciangin kisikkik ahih manin siampi liante le upate kiangah a ngun peek sawmthumte va paipih kik a, [4] “Mawhna a nei lo mipa a si dingin lehhek kha ka hih manin ka mawh hi,” a va ci hi. Ahi zongin amaute in, “Kote tawh bang kisai nawn ding ahi hiam? Nangma tavuan ahi hi,” a na cihsan uh hi.

[10] Tua laitakin sawm le nihte sungpan Iskariot’ tapa Judas in amaute tungah Jesuh a piaktheih nadingin siampi liante kiangah a va pai hi. [11] Siampi liante in a thu a zak uh ciangin lungdam mahmah uh a, sum tawh kong guai ding uh hi, ci-in thu a ciam uh hi. Tua ahih manin Judas in Jesuh a lehhek theih nading a hunhoih a zong hi.

[52] Tu a kipanin innkuan sungah mihing nga a phate, a langah thum, a langah nihin kikhenin kido ding uh hi. [53] A pa in a tapa do-in, a tapa in a pa do ding a, a nu in a tanu do-in, a tanu in a nu do ding a, a teeknu in a monu do-in, a monu in a teeknu do ding hi,” a ci hi.

[3] Tua ciangin sawm le nihte sung panin Iskariot tapa Judas sungah Satan hong lut hi. [4] Tua ahih manin Judas va paikhia a, siampi liante le biakinncing palikmangte tawh va kiho uh a, amaute’ khut sungah Jesuh a piaktheihna dingzia a kikum uh hi. [5] Amaute na nuam mahmah uh a, sum tawh guaih dingin thuciam a na pia uh hi. [6] Judas zong thukim a, mihonte’ theih lohin amaute’ khut sungah Jesuh a piaktheih nading lampi zon ding a kipan pah hi.

[47] Tua bangin thu a gen laitakin mihonpi khat hong pai a, sawm le nihte sung panin Judas a kici mipa hong makai-in Jesuh a nam dingin hong naih hi. [48] Ahi zongin Jesuh in ama kiangah, “Judas aw, napna tawh Mihing Tapa lehhek na hi hiam?” a na ci hi.
[21] Jesuh in hih thuteng a genkhit ciangin lungkham mahmah ahih manin, “A mantakin ci lehang, note khat in kei nong lehhek ding uh hi,” ci-in a kilangin a genkhia hi.

[1] Jesuh in tu-a bangin thu a nget khit ciangin a nungzuite tawh Kidron lui kantanin a pai hi. Tua lai-ah huan khat om a, tua huan sungah a nungzuite tawh a lut hi. [2] Jesuh le a nungzuite tua munah pai zelzel uh ahih manin Jesuh a lehhek Judas in zong tua mun a thei hi. [3] Tua ahih manin Judas zong, siampi liante le Farisi mite in a sawl galkap honkhat le biakinncing palik pawlkhat tawh hiam tawi-in lalcin leh meilah de-in tua huanah a hong pai uh hi. [4] Jesuh in zong ama tungah a piang ding thu khempeuh theikhin ahih manin hong paikhia-in amaute kiangah, “Kua zong na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. [5] Amaute in, “Nazareth khuami Jesuh a zong ka hi uh hi,” a ci hi. Jesuh a lehhek Judas zong tua mihonte tawh hong dingkhawm hi. [6] Jesuh in, “Keimah ka hi hi,” a cih ciangin amaute nungkinin a puk uh hi.

[23] Bang hang hiam cih leh note kiangah ka hong gen thu pen Topa kiang panin ka ngah thu hi a, tua thu in: Topa Jesuh a kilehhek ding nitakin anlum la-in, [24] Pasian tungah lungdam a kohkhit ciangin balnen a, “Hih pen note a dingin a hong kipia keima pumpi ahi hi. Kei na hong phawk nadingun na ne un,” ci hi.
[2] Tuahun lai-in leitung gitloh gamtatnate na zui uh a, Pasian thu a um lo mite sungah tu laitakin na a sem, huihlak a ukte’ thu na mang uh hi.

[1] Tua hi a, eite in i kiim i pamah hih zahin a tam teci nei ihih ciangin eite a hong dongtangsak thei nate khempeuh le eite a hong gakcip mawhna le khialhnate khempeuh paikhia-in, i mai-ah a om tai nading lampi a mong dongin lungsim kiptakin tai ni. [2] Eite hong makai-in i upna a hong cingtaaksak Jesuh mitsuanin nei ni. Mailamah a ngah ding lungdamna hangin maizumna kihta loin singlamteh tungah sihna hong thuak a, tu-in Pasian tokhom taklamah a tu hi. [3] Tua zahta-in mawhnei mite’ langbawlna a thuaknate ngaihsun unla, note lungkia loin khauhtakin om un. [4] Tu ciang dong mawhna tawh na kidona uhah sihna zah ciang dongin na dona uh om nai lo hi.
[16] Sanggamte aw, mite’ khemsa-in om kei un.

[16] Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, “Nangma mawhna nangma lu tungah tung ta hen; bang hang hiam cih leh nangma kampau in nang’ langkhatah teci pangin, ‘ TOPA’ sathau nilh pa ka that khin hi,’ na ci hi,” a ci hi.

[1] TOPA aw, na biakinn sungah kua om ding ahi hiam? Na mual siangtho tungah kua teng ding ahi hiam? [2] Paubaang loin gamta-in, a manin na sem a, lungsim tak a gen mi, [3] mi gensia loin, a lawmte tungah siatna bawl lo a, a vengte a mawhsak lo mi, [4] migilote thusim lo a, ahi zongin TOPA a zahtakte a pahtawi mi, ama natna ding nangawnah a ciampel lo mi,
[14] TOPA, ka belh suangpi le keimah hong tankhia pa aw, ka kammal le ka lungsim ngaihsutnate nangma muhna-ah a sanhuai suaksak ta in!
[6] TOPA’ kampauna tawh vantung piang a, a kam pana husanna tawh vantung nate a piang hi.
[13] Siatna ding panin na leii kem inla, zuau genna panin na muk kem in. [14] Siatna panin kihemkhia inla, a hoih bawl in. Kilemna ding hanciam inla, na phak mateng delh in.
[30] Thuman mi’ kam in pilna gen a, a leii in thutang gen hi.
[1] “Ka leii tawh ka khialhloh nadingin ka gamtatna ka kikem ding a, ka omna-ah migilote a omlaiteng ka kam ka kham ding hi,” ka ci hi.
[3] TOPA aw, keima kam a cing ding khat koih inla, ka mukte’ kongkhak a vil ding khat koih in.
[24] A man lo thu gen ngei kei inla, zuauthu le a kiza khial thei ding kammalte zang het kei in.
[8] Mipilte in thuhilhna mang a, a hai paute in lungkhamna tuak hi.
[13] Thungaihsun theite’ kam sungah pilna om a, mihaite’ nungzangah ciangduai kinga hi.
[18] Ngaihsun lo-a kampauna in tem hiam bangin mi liamsak thei a, mipilte’ kampauna in tua bang liamna damsak thei hi.
[25] Lunghihmawhna in lungkhamna piangsak a, kampau hoih in mi lungdamsak hi.
[16] Thungaihsun theite pilna tawh gamta a, mihaite in a haina taangko hi.
[1] Kam nemin dawnna in hehna damsak a, kam khauh in hehna piangsak hi.

[28] Mihoih lote in kitotna piangsak a, mi gensiate in lawmta ki-it kimlai kimudahsak hi. [29] A ngongtat mite in a lawmte zol a, lungkhamna sung tunpih hi.
[7] Miliante in zuauthu gen ngei lo a, mihaite in na-a kimang kam pau ngei lo hi.

[27] Thu a thei taktakte in gengen khol lo a, a paupau khol lote thumu taktak hizaw hi. [28] Mihaite pau loin om leh a pil mahin kingaihsun hi. Thungaihsun thei na hihna a kilat nadingin pau loin om khinkhian in.
[2] Mihaite in thu a teltheih zawhna ding uh kin lo uh a, pil si, a kicih theih nading deihna bek tawh thu gen uh hi.
