[19] Mi a gensia kawikawite in thu im thei lo hi. Tua banga mi haipaute tawh kikhawl kei in.
[19] A phun hat zi gilo tawh tenkhop sangin gam simthamah khat guak tangten’ hoihzaw hi.
[23] Kampau a ki-ipzote lungkhamna tawh kipelh hi.
[7] Pil kampauna pen mihaite’ theihzawh dingin thuk lua mahmah a, mihaite in mihon lakah thu gen ngam lo uh hi.
[11] A kilawm hunin kammal khat paukhiatna pen ngun pek tunga kham pek khat a kisuang tawh kibang hi.
[25] A dangtak mipa in tuivot lim a sak bangin gamlapi-a om lawmte’ kiang panin thuzak nuam kisa hi.
[27] Khuaizu a tam lua nek ding a hoih loh bangin phat ding deihluatna a hoih lo ahi hi.
[9] Mihaite in paunak thuhilhnate a paukhiat ciangin zukham pa in a khut a ling om a khei dingin a kipan tawh kibang lel hi.
[11] Mihai pa a hehna bangin kam pau-in gamta gawp a, mipil pa ahihleh ki-ipin a hehna damsak hi.
[26] Amah in a pilna tawh thu gen a, kam khum takin pau hiathiat hi.

[2] Thu ngaihsun masa-in pau inla, Pasian’ tungah thu mawk ciampak kei in. Vantungah Pasian om a, leitungah nang om na hih manin na pau ding a kilawm zahval pau kei in. [3] Lunghimawh semsem lecin na mang sia semsem ding a, tam pau semsem lecin na haina kilang semsem ding hi.
[10] “Bang hangin nidang lai-in hih sangin hoihzaw tham ahi hiam?” ci-in dong kei in. Tua bangte pil thudotna hi lo hi.
[21] Mi’ gen khempeuh thudon kei in. Na nasempa’ hong samsiatna na zakha ding hi.

[37] Na gen peuhmah ahi ahihleh, ‘Hi,’ ci inla, ahi lo ahihleh, ‘Hilo,’ cihna tawh kicingsak in. Tua bang hi loin kiciamna kam na zat ciangin Dawimangpa tawh kizomin thuman lo na hih lamtak hong kilang hi.
[37] Bang hang hiam cih leh nomau kampauna tawh kizui-in thu hong kikhen ding a, dik hi, cihna ahi a, mawh hi, cihna ahi zongin na ngah nadingun nomau kampau mah hong kibulphuh ding hi,” a ci hi.
[26] “Mi khempeuh in note hong pahtakbawl ciangin gimna a thuak ding na hi uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a pu a pate un zong tua bangmahin kamsang zuaute a pahtakbawl uh hi.

[16] Tua ahih manin Jesuh in Sabbath ni-in cina a damsakna hangin amaute in Jesuh bawlsiat ding a kipan uh hi. [17] Ahi zongin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Ka Pa in tuni dongin na sem tawntung ahih manin kei zong ka sep ding mah ahi hi,” a ci hi. [18] Hih bangin ama kampauna hangin amaute in Jesuh thatnuam semsem uh hi. Amah in Sabbath thukham a palsat bek hi loin, Pasian nangawn ka Pa ci ahih manin Pasian tawh a kikimin kiseh hi, ci-in a mawhsak uh hi.
[13] A kam uh tawh mi that uh a, a kam uh tawh zuauthu gen uh a, a kampaute uh gulgu tawh kibang hi.

[17] Lawmte aw, note’ theihsa thute gensia langpangin, mite’ upna nawngkaisakin pawl a kikhensak mite kidawm un. Tua bang mite tawh kikhawl vet kei un. [18] Tua bang mite in i Topa Khrih’ na a sem hi loin, gilpi vai bek a sem uh ahi hi. Amaute in mite phatin kamkhum nono zang uh ahih manin mihoih pawlkhat a khemzo uh hi.

[1] Sanggamte aw, Pasian’ thu hilhin note kiangah kong pai lai-in, mipilte’ zat kam thukpipi le pilna kamte ka zang kei hi. [2] Bang hang hiam cih leh note kiangah ka om laitakin singlamteh tungah Jesuh Khrih a sihna thu simloh thudang peuhmah ngaihsut loh dingin ka ngaihsutsa ahi hi.
[12] Kote’ nektawm ding ka thatang mahmah uh tawh nakpitakin ka sem uh hi. Hong kisamsiat ciangin thupha ka lehpiak uh a, hong kibawlsiat ciangin ka gumthuak uh hi.
[29] Na kiho uh ciangin kamguh zang kei unla, na pauna uh a za mite in phattuamna a ngahtheih nadingin na-in a kimang kam hoihte bek na pau un.
[8] Ahi zongin tu-in hehna, thangpaihna, muhdahna, gensiatna, kam hoih lo pauna cihte nei nawn kei un.
[17] Na kampauna, na gamtatnate khempeuh uhah, Topa Jesuh hangin Pa Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Jesuh min paulamin na hih ding uh hi.
[6] Kam na pau uh ciangin mi’ zaknop, mi’ ngaihnop dingin na pau un. Tua hileh na kihopih uh mite khempeuh a dingin phattuamna a nei kam a pau na hi ding uh hi.

[11] Tu ma-a ka hong gensa uh mah bangin kamtam nuam se loin hoihtakin om hithiatna, no tawh a kisai thu bek ngaihsutna, le note’ nuntak nading na na sep nading uh hanciamin nei un. [12] Tua bangin gamta le-uhcin thu um lo mite in note hong zahtak ding uh a, mite’ neihsa na duhgawh kei ding uh hi.
[26] Thu uppih mi khempeuh khatlekhat a siangtho ki-itna lungsim tawh kinamin na kihopih un.
[12] Khangno lai na hihna thu hangin mite’ simmawh dingin na om kei inla, kampauna, gamtatna, itna, upna, le sianthona-ah thu um mite’ etteh dingin na om in.
[16] Pasian tawh mite a kigamlasak semsem thei thu ginalo, a haihuai thu kikup thu kiselnate na pelh in.

[2] Tuahun ciangin mite in amau angsung ding bek ngaihsunin, huaihamin, kisialin, kihisakin, mi zahko-in, nu le pate’ thu mang loin, lungdam theihna mel nei loin, biakna lungsim nei loin, [3] mi khual loin, hehpihna nei loin, mi gensia-in, ngongtatin, kihtakhuai-in, thuhoih deih loin, [4] ciampelin, thu khual loin, kiphasak gawpin, Pasian don loin pumpi nopsakna bek deihin, [5] biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deih lo ding uh hi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in.

[7] Nangma pumpi mahmah gamtat hoihna a kipan thu khempeuhah etteh hoih dingin na om in. Lungsim takpi tawh mite’ zahtaktheih dingin thu na hilh inla, [8] mite’ mawhmat theih loh ding kamhoihte na zang in. Tua hileh i langte in hong gensiat theih nading mu loin a mai uh zum lel ding hi.
[3] Pasian’ kampauna tawh leitung le vantung piang a, tu-a i muhtheih nate a om nai lopi panin hong piang hi, ci-in i upna bek mah tawh a thei ihi hi.
[19] Sanggamte aw, note in na theih ding uh ka deih thu in: Thu kigen khempeuh hoihtakin ngai pahpah un. Ahi zongin pau pahpah kei unla, heh pakpak kei un.
[26] Mi khatpeuh in Khristian ka hi hi, ci napi-in kampau a kidopzawh kei leh amahmah a kikhemtawm hi lel a, ama biakna neih a mawkna ahi hi.
[12] Tua ahih manin mi a khahkhia thei thukham tawh kizui-in thukhenna a thuak ding mi bangin kampau-in na gamta un.
[2] Eite khempeuh a khialthei zelzelte vive ihi hi. Kampauna-ah a khial ngei lo mi a om leh a cingtaak mahmah hi a, a pumpi zong a ukzo mi ahi hi.
[5] Tua mah bangin leii zong i pumpi na sung panin a neu mahmah khat hinapi-in thusia lianpipi piangsak zo hi. Gam khempeuh zong mei-ek neuno khat pan kipanin a kangtum thei hi.

[11] Sanggamte aw, khatlekhat kigensia kei un. A mipihte gensia-in thu a khente in Thukham gensia-in thu a khen ahi hi. Thukham na gensiat uhleh Thukham a zui hi loin thu a khen na hi uh hi. [12] Thukham a pia pa le thu a khen pa pen Pasian bek hi a, amah bek in hong honkhiazo a, hong susiazo hi. Tua ahih manin bang hangin na mipihte uh gensia-in thu a khenthei dingin kingaihsun zenzen na hi uh hiam? [13] Tuni ahih kei leh zing ciangin tua khua tua khua-ah va pai-in, kum khat bang va omin, sumbawlin a meet tampi va ngah ni, a ci mite aw, ka thugen hong ngai dih un. [14] Zing ciangin na nuntakna uh bangci ding cih nangawn na thei kei uh hi. Meiilum tawlkhat sung kaii-in a mangthang pak tawh a kibang lel na hi uh hi. [15] Note in, “Topa in hong thukimpih nakleh nungta-in tua bang tua bang i sem ding hi,” na cih ding uh hi bek hi.
[9] Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note tungah thu hong khenkhak loh nadingin khatlekhat na kiphunsan kei un. Thukhen ding pa hong nai mahmah ta a, hong tung dektak ta hi.

[12] Hih thute khempeuh banah, sanggamte aw, thu khat peuhpeuh na gen uh ciangin kiciam se kei un. Vantung ahi a, na khat peuhpeuh tawh ahi zongin kiciam kei un. Pasian’ thukhenna na thuakkhak loh nadingun a hite, “Hi,” ci lel unla, a hilote, “Hilo,” na ci lel un.
[1] Tua ahih manin gitlohna, zuauna, kineihkhemna, huaihamna, le kigensiatnate na omsak nawn kei un.
[15] Bang hang hiam cih leh thu thei loin a mot paupau mihaite, na gamtat hoihna un a daihsak ding, Pasian’ deihna ahi hi.

[8] A tawpna-ah kong gennop thu in: Lungsim le ngaihsutna kikhat nei-in unau ki-itna lungsim nei unla, migi-in kiniamkhiat un. [9] Hong bawlsiate siatna tawh thukkik loin hong samsia mite samsia kik kei unla, Pasian in note a hong sap lai-in thupha a hong piak dingin hong ciamsa ahih manin, hong siat bawlte thupha tawh na thukzaw un. [10] Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho in, “Nuntak nuam deihin, hunhoih a zang nuamte in kamsia pau kei uh hen la, zuauthu gen kei ta uh hen.

[5] Ama kiang panin za-in note tungah ka hong gen uh thu in: Pasian, khuavak hi a, khuamial tawh kizopna themkhat zong nei het lo hi. [6] Tua ahih manin Pasian tawh ka kipawl hi, ci napi-in khuamial tawh kisai gamtatnate i gamtat le i kampauna le i gamtatna tawh zuauthu a gen ihi hi.
[18] Ka it tate aw, i kampi bek tawh ki-it loin, lungsim takpi tawh ki-itin i gamtatna tawh kilangsak ni.
[6] TOPA in, “Ka thu za un: Note’ lakah kamsang a om leh TOPA keimah in ama tungah maangmuhna tawh ka kilak a, amah tawh mang sungah ka kiho hi.

[15] “ TOPA na Pasian un note lak ahi na sanggamte uh lak panin note a dingin kei tawh a kibang kamsang khat hong khangsak ding hi. Note in ama thu na ngai ding uh hi. [16] “Note in, ‘Si kha ding ka hih manun TOPA kote’ Pasian’ aw hong zasakkik kei in. Hih a lian mei zong hong musak nawn kei in,’ ci-in na kikhop ni-un Horeb-ah TOPA na Pasian uh tung pan na deih bang uh hi ding hi. [17] TOPA in kei kiangah, ‘Amaute’ hong ngetna thuman taktak hi. [18] Amau sanggamte lak panin nang tawh a kibang kamsang khat amaute a dingin ka khangsak ding hi. Ama gen dingte ka hilh ding a, amah ka thupiak khempeuh amaute tungah a gen ding hi. [19] Amah in keima min tawh a gen ka thute a don lo mi peuhmahte kei mahmah in ka thuk ding hi. [20] Ahih hangin keimah in thugen dingin thu pia lo napi-in keima min tawh thu a gen ngam kamsangpa hitaleh pasian dangte’ min tawh thu a gen pa hitaleh, tua bang mite si ding hi,’ hong ci hi. [21] “Na lungsim sung uhah, ‘ TOPA’ gen ahi lo thu bangci theih ding ihi hiam?’ na cih uhleh, [22] kamsang khat in TOPA’ min tawh thu genin, tua thu pen hong tung lo ahi a, a man lo ahi zongin hong hih leh, tua thu pen TOPA’ gen loh thu ahi hi. Kamsangpa in ama utthu a gen hi a, amah na kihtak ding uh kul lo hi.
[4] Tua hun lai-in Lappidoth’ zi kamsang numei Deborah in Israel-te thu khen hi.
[15] Samuel in a nuntak sung tawntung Israel-te thu khen hi.

[6] Ahih hangin amaute in, “Kote hong uk dingin kumpi khat hong pia in,” a cih uh ciangin hih thu in Samuel lungkim losak hi. Samuel in TOPA’ kiangah thu ngen hi. [7] Tua ciangin TOPA in Samuel kiangah, “Amaute in nang kiangah hong gen thu khempeuh ngai in; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in nang hong nial hi lo a, amaute tungah kumpi hihna panin kei hong nial ahi uh hi.

[21] Samuel in mite’ thugen khempeuh a zak khit ciangin TOPA’ kiangah tua thute a genkik hi. [22] Tua ciangin TOPA in Samuel kiangah, “Amaute’ thu ngai inla, amaute-a’ dingin kumpi khat koih in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Samuel in Israel mite kiangah, “Mi khempeuh na khuapi ciat uhah ciah un,” a ci hi.

[13] David in hih thu a zak ciangin Nathan kiangah, “ TOPA’ tungah ka khial khin hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Nathan in David kiangah, “ TOPA in zong na khialhna hong maisak khinzo hi; nang na si kei ding hi. [14] Ahi zongin, hih bangin gamtatna tawh TOPA thusim peuhmah lo na hih manin nang’ sung panin a hong piang naungek si ding hi,” a ci hi.

[11] Zingsangin David a thawh ciangin David’ thumu pa ahi kamsang Gad tungah TOPA’ thu hong tung a, [12] “Pai inla, David kiangah hih bangin gen in. ‘ TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: Nangma tungah thu thum kong pia hi; nang tungah kong hih theih nadingin tuate khat teel in,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.

[29] Tua hun sungin Jerusalem panin Jeroboam a paikhiat ciangin Shiloh khuami kamsang Ahijah in lampi-ah amah na dawn hi. Ahijah in puan thak khat na silhtawm a, amau nih tegel bek gamlakah om uh hi. [30] Tua ciangin Ahijah in ama tungah a silh a puan thak lenin seh sawm le nih suahin a balkek hi. [31] Tua ciangin amah in Jeroboam kiangah, “Nang a dingin bek sawm la in; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel Pasian, TOPA in hih bangin ci hi, ‘En in, Solomon’ khut panin kumpi gam a balkhia ding ka hi a, nangma tungah minam sawm kong pia ding hi.

[7] Tua tham loin Jeroboam innkuan bangin ama nasepna tawh hehsakin TOPA’ muhna-ah a sia a gamtatna khempeuh hang le amah in Jeroboam le a innkuan a suksiatna hangin Hanani’ tapa kamsang Jehu’ tungtawnin Baasha le a innkuan langpangin TOPA’ thu hong tung hi.

[22] Tua ciangin TOPA in Elijah’ aw ngai hi; naupang hong nak kikin a hingkik hi. [23] Tua ciangin Elijah in naupang la-in innkhumzang panin inn sungah paipihsuk a, a nu kiangah a pia hi. Tua ciangin Elijah in, “En in, na tapa nungta hi,” a ci hi. [24] Numei in Elijah kiangah, “Nang, Pasian’ mi na hihna le TOPA in nang tungtawnin thu a gen takpi ahihna tu-in ka thei hi,” a ci hi.

[13] Tua ciangin Israel kumpi Ahab kiang nai-ah kamsang khat hong pai-in, “ TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: Hih mihon tampi khempeuh na mu hiam? En in, tuni-in nangma khut sungah kong pia ding hi. Tua ciangin keimah, TOPA ka hihna na thei ding hi, ci hi,” a ci hi.
[11] Tua ciangin amaute a pai kawmkawm a kiho laitakun, mei leeng khat le mei sakolte in amaute nih a khen hi. Tua ciangin vantungah Elijah pingpei-in paito hi.

[3] Tua ciangin amah in, “A pua-ah paikhia inla, beel hawm a tawm lua lo, na vengte khempeuh’ beel va kawm in. [4] Tua ciangin sungtumin, nang le na tapate kong kikhaknelh unla, hih beelte khempeuh sungah sung in. Beel khat a dim simin tuamkoih pahpah in,” a ci hi. [5] Tua ahih ciangin ama kiang panin tua numei paikhia-in amah le a tapate kong kikhaknelh uh hi. Amah in a sun’ laitakin a tapate in ama kiangah a beelte paipih uh hi. [6] Beelte a dim ciangin amah in a tapa khat kiangah, “Beel dang khat hong paipih in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a tapa in, “Beel adang om nawn lo hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin sathau a luan a khawl hi.

[38] Tua gam sungah kialpi a tun laitakin Gilgal-ah Elisha hong paikik hi. Kamsangte ama mai-ah tu-in thu a ngaih laitakin amah in a nasemte kiangah, “Beelpi suang unla kamsangte a’ ding meh huan un,” a ci hi.
[3] Amah in a tonu kiangah, “Samaria-ah a om kamsangpa tawh ka topa kimu thei leh! Amah in a phakna damsak ding hi,” a ci hi.

[5] Ahih hangin khat in singluang a tan laitakin a heitang leengin tui sungah kia hi. Amah kiko-in, “Ala, ka topa! A kikawm hi ve’n,” a ci hi. [6] Tua ciangin Pasian’ mipa in, “Koi lai-ah kia ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in a kiatna mun ama kiangah a lah ciangin amah in ciangkang khat khiakin tua munah lawn a, a heitang laamtosak hi.

[13] Ahi zongin TOPA in kamsangte khempeuh le thumute khempeuh tungtawnin Israel le Judah mite hilhkhol a, “Na pu na pate uh ka thupiak thukhamte khempeuh, le kamsangte ahi ka nasemte’ tungtawnin note kiangah thu kong puak bangin na gamtat siate panun kihei-in ka thupiaknate le ka thukhamte zui un,” a ci hi.

[1] Tua hun laitakin Hezekiah cina-in si dektak hi. Tua ciangin Amoz’ tapa kamsang Isaiah hong pai-in ama kiangah, “ TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Na innkuan vai ding hawm in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang na si ding hi; na damkikzo kei ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.

[20] Tua ciangin zingsangin amaute tho baihin Tekoa gamlakah a paikhia uh hi. Amaute a paikhiat laitakin Jehoshafat dingin, “Judah gam le Jerusalem-a a tengte aw, ka thugen za un! TOPA na Pasian uh um un; tua hileh note na kip ding uh hi. Ama kamsangte um un; tua hileh na maavang ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[19] Ahi zongin TOPA’ lamah amaute a paipih kik dingin amah in amaute lakah kamsangte a puak hi. Hihte in amau’ langkhatah teci pang a, ahih hangin amaute in don lo uh hi.

[22] Tua ahih ciangin Hilkiah le kumpipa in a sawl mite, Hasrah, a tapa Tokhath, a tapa Shallum, biakinn puante a kem pa’ zi ahi kamsangnu Huldah kiangah pai-in (tu-in tua nu Jerusalem sung a Veng Nihna-ah teng hi) tua thu tawh kisai ama kiangah va gen uh hi.

[1] Tua hun laitakin Hezekiah a ci na-in si dektak hi. Amoz’ tapa, kamsang Isaiah ama kiangah hong pai-in, “ TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: Na innsung thu ding vaihawm in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang na damkikzo kei ding a, na si ding hi, hong ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
[4] “Amah in eite’ natna teng thuakin, eite’ gimna teng pua khin taktak hi. Ahi zongin eite in amah pen ama mawhna hangin Pasian in a gimsak, gimna a thuak bangin i ngaihsun hi.
[5] “Gil sungah kong bawl ma-in nang kong thei khinzo hi. Na suah ma-in nang kong teelkhia khinzo a, minam dangte tungah kamsang dingin kong koih khinzo hi,” hong ci hi.

[12] Pai inla leilu lam Israel gamah hih bangin va taangko in: ‘Hong kilehkik in, a zulhzau Israel aw, TOPA in kong ci hi. Hehna tawh nang kong en kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a hehpih thei pa ka hi hi, TOPA in kong ci hi. Ka heh tawntung kei ding hi. [13] Na mawhna na phawk ding bek kisam hi. TOPA na Pasian na langpanna, singliim nuai khempeuhah gamdang pasian-te tawh na khialh kawikawina le ka thu nong man lohnate pulak in, TOPA in kong ci hi.

[14] Tua ahih manin TOPA, Vanglian Pasian in hong hopih a, “Amaute, tu-a bangin kampau uh ahih manin na kam sungah mei bangin ka kuansak ka thute in sing tawh kibang hih minamte kangtum gawp ding hi. [15] “En un, Israel minamte aw, TOPA in kong cihin-ah, gamlapi panin note a hong sim dingin gam khat kong kuansak ding hi. Tua gam pen tanglai pekin a om khinsa, a hat mahmah, amaute’ pau na theih loh uh gam khat ahi hi. [16] Thal tawh a kap uh teh kaplum lianlian uh a, a vekpi-un galhang kim uh hi. [17] Amaute in lo-a na ante uh le na an huante uh hong gaihsak ding uh a, na tapate uh le na tanute uh hong thahsak ding uh hi. Na tuuhon, na bawnghonte uh hong gaihsak ding uh a, na leenggah, na theigahte uh hong nek mangsak ding uh hi. Na muan mahmah uh kulhpi tawh a ki-um na khuapite uh namsau tawh hong suksiatsak ding uh hi.

[30] A dipkuathuai, a patauhhuai thu khat gam sungah a piang khinzo hi. [31] Kamsangte in thuman gen lo uh a, siampite in zong amau’ ut bangun a uk uh hi. Ka mite in phamawh sa lo sawnsawn uh hi. A tawpna hun hong tun ciangin bang cih ding uh ahi hiam, TOPA in ci hi, ci-in gen in,” hong ci hi.

[14] Ahih hangin Jerusalem khuasunga om kamsangte’ sungah a mulkimhuaizaw na khat ke’n ka mu hi. Angkawmin zuauthu gen uh a, mite a gitlohna uh pan a kikhel loh nadingin mi hoih lote a hanthawn zawlai uh hi. A vekpi-un kei’ muhna-ah Sodom khuamite tawh kibang khin ka sa a, Gomorrah khuamite tawh zong kilamdang lo uh hi.

[16] Vanglian TOPA in, “Note kiangah thu hong hilh a, a hong lamen khialsak kamsangte’ thugennate na ngai kei un. Amaute in a lungsim uhah a geeltawm uh thu hong gen uh hi a, keima kiang pana hong pai thu ahi kei hi.
[26] Zuauthu tawh thu hilh a, a phuahtawm uh thu a hilh kamsangte’ lungsim sungah zuauthu bang tanvei tenglai ding ahi hiam?
[9] Ahi zongin, nopna hong tung ding hi, ci-in a gen kamsangpa pen TOPA’ hong sawl kamsangpa hi taktak hiam, cih kamsangpa’ gen bang hong tun ciangin a kithei pan ding ahi hi,” ka ci hi.
[1] Jerusalem khua panin Nebukhadnezzar in Babylon khua-ah salin a paikhiatpih uliante, siampite, kamsangte, le mi khempeuhte’ tungah lai khat ka khak hi.

[15] Ka nasem ahi kamsangte khempeuh note kiangah hong sawl tawntungin, ‘Tu-in note khempeuh na hoih lohna uh panin kihei unla, na gamtat hoih lote uh kipuahpha un. Pasian dangte nung delh loin a na na sep kei nak-uhleh note le na pu na pate uh kiangah ka piak gam sungah na teng ding uh hi,’ ci-in note tungah hong gen uh hi. Ahih hangin note in na bil uh nong ngat kei uh a, ka thu nong ngai kei uh hi.
[4] Ahih hangin note kiangah ka nasem kamsangte khempeuh kong sawl a, ‘Ka muhdah hih a kihhuai na na gamta nawn kei un,’ ci-in kong gensak tawntung hi.

[14] Na kamsangte un zuauthu longal thudang gen ding nei lo uh a, a thuhilhna uh khemna thu bek ahih manin, a khial na hihlam uh a hong hilhtel kei uh hi. Amaute in lam hong lakkhial uh a, kisikkik theih nading hun a hong pia kei uh hi.

[26] Lungkhamna khat khit khat a banbanin na tuak ding uh a, thusia bekbek na zaza ding uh hi. Kamsangte kiangah thu na dong ding uh hi. Siampite in mite tungah hong hilh ding thu thei lo ding uh a, upate in hong gen ding mel thei lo ding uh hi.
[3] Topa PASIAN’ thugen hih bang ahi hi: Hih kamsang haite in gimna thuak ding uh hi. Amaute in amau’ lungsim bangin thu gentawmin, maangmu kineih uh hi.

[6] Amaute’ maangmuhnate zuaupi hi a, a thugen kholhnate uh zong zuauthu ahi hi. Keimah in amaute sawl lo napi-in amaute in, ‘ TOPA in hih bangin ci hi,’ ci khem uh hi. Tua bang hinapi-in amaute’ thugente ka tunsak ding a lamen lai uh hi. [7] Tua ahih manin amaute kiangah ka gen thu in: ‘Na maangmuhnate uh zuaupi hi a, na thugen kholhnate uh zuauthu ahi hi. Note kiangah keimah in thu hong gen lo napi-in keima gen bangin na gen uh hi,’ ka ci hi,” a hong ci hi. [8] Tua ahih ciangin Topa PASIAN in amaute kiangah, “Na thugente uh zuaupi hi a, na maangmuhnate uh zuaupi ahi hi. Tua ahih manin note kong langpan’ hi. [9] Zuauthu tawh maangmu kineihin, mite a khialh theih nadingin zuauthu a genkhol no kamsangte gim a hong pia ding ka hita hi. Ka mite a kikhop uh ciangin tuate lakah na kihel kei ding uh a, Israel mite’ min a kigelhna lakah note’ min kigelh lo ding hi. Na gam uhah na ciahkik ngei nawn kei ding uh hi. Tua ciangin Topa PASIAN ka hihna thu na hong thei ding uh hi. [10] Bang hang hiam cih leh thu hoih lo napi-in hoih hi, ci khemin ka mite na makaih khial uh hi. Ka mite in kulh dingin suang a cian uh ciangin no kamsangte in a tungtham buan tawh na zut uh hi.

[16] “Kei pen a nungta Topa PASIAN ka hih mah bangin, kumpi tokhom tungah a tusak, Babylon kumpipa tawh a thuciamna palsat ahih manin Babylon gamah hih kumpipa si ding hi. [17] Babylon mite in mi tampi a thah theih nadingun kan bawlin dum a tawh uh ciangin a thahat Faro’ galkap honpite nangawn in amah huh zo lo ding uh hi. [18] Amah in a kiciamna le a thuciamna palsatin hih bangin gamta khin ahih manin, amah suakta ngei lo ding hi. [19] “Tua ahih ciangin kei pen a nungta Topa PASIAN ka hih mah bangin a zuih dingin keima min tawh a kiciam thukimna palsat ahih manin gim ka pia ding hi. [20] Amah a awk theih nadingin ngenthang ka zak ding a, amah ka awksak ding hi. Kei tungah amah hong thutak lo ahih manin Babylon-ah paipihin tua lai-ah gim ka pia ding hi. [21] A galkap muanhuai pente, gal sungah si ding a, a suakta sunte zong mun citengah kithehthang ding hi. Tua ciangin TOPA ahi keimah in thu a gen ka hihlam na phawk ding hi,” a hong ci hi.
[2] “Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, Ammon mite’ lam nga inla, amaute mawhsakna thu gen in.

[8] Topa PASIAN in kei kiangah thu hong gen a, “Moab mite in a thugenna uhah, Judah gammite pen minam dangte bangmah hi lel uh hi, ci se uh hi. [9] Tua ahih manin Moab gam hutna-in a kiphut a kiima om khuapite le a khuapi minthang pente ahi Bethjeshimoth, Baalmeon, le Kiriathaim khuapite, midangte ka simsak ding hi. [10] Ammon mite a zawhgawp mah bangin, Moab mite zong, nisuahna lam mite ka zogawpsak ding a, Moab mite pen minamin dingzo nawn lo ding uh hi. [11] Tua bangin Moab mite gim ka pia ding a, tua ciangin TOPA ka hihna thu hong thei ding uh hi,” a hong ci hi.
[2] “Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, Egypt kumpipa Faro’ lam nga inla, amah le Egypt gam khempeuh gim a kipiakna ding thu genkhol in.

[17] Ni khat ni ciangin Israel mite a sim dingin mi khat ka sawl ding hi, ci-in keima nasem Israel kamsangte tungtawnin, sawtpek lai-in ka gengen niloh mipa pen nang na hi hi. Hih thu Topa PASIAN in gen khinzo hi.
[2] Amah kumpi a suah a kum masa kumin keimah Daniel in, TOPA in kamsang Jeremiah tungah Jerusalem kum sawmsagih sung kisia ding hi, ci-in a genna thu ngaihsunin biakna laibute ka sim hi.
[10] Kamsangte tungah thu ka gen hi. Maangmuhna a banbanin pia-in, kamsangte tungah thugentehna tawh thu a gen pa zong keimah ka hi hi.

[3] TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: Damaskas khuamite thumvei a khialh khit, a liveina hangin pel loin amaute gim ka pia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in an gawina suang tawh gawizan bangin, Gilead gammite gawigawp uh hi.

[9] TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: Taia khuamite thumvei a khialh khit, a liveina hangin pel loin amaute gim ka pia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in minambup khat Edom mite tungah ap uh a, lawmta dinga a thuciamna uh zui lo uh hi.

[1] TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: Moab mite thumvei a khialh khit, a liveina hangin pel loin amaute gim ka pia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh leiseek cianna-ah a kizang leikang a zat dingin Edom kumpipa’ guhte a hal uh hi.
[7] Topa PASIAN in ama nasem kamsangte tungah ama geelna theisak masa lopi-in bangmah hih het lo hi.

[14] Amos in Amaziah dawng a, “Kei pen kamsang ka hi kei a, kamsangte’ ta zong ka hi beek kei hi. Kei pen tuucing ka hi a, theithek huan puah tawh a thuahkhawm ka hi hi. [15] Ka tuucinna panin TOPA in kei hong samkhia a, ama mi Israel-te tungah thugen dingin a hong sawl hi.
[4] Jonah zong khuasung lam manawhin kipan a, ni khat sung lam a pai khit ciangin, “Ni sawmli khit ciangin hih Nineveh khuapi kisusia ding hi,” ci-in a kiko hi.

[3] Ahi zongin tu-in kei kiangah hong ciahkik le-uhcin, kei zong note kiangah kong paikik ding hi. [4] Na pu na pate uh bang nawn kei un. Nidanga kamsangte in amaute kiangah ka thu gen uh a, gamtatsia gamta loin, a mawh nawn loh nading hilh uh hi. Ahi zongin amaute in ka thu ngainuam loin, ka thu hong mang lo uh hi. [5] Tu-in na pu na pate uh koi-ah om ahi hiam? Tua kamsangte nungtalai sa na hi uh hiam? [6] Ahi zongin ka nasem ahi kamsangte’ tungtawnin ka hilhkholhna le ka thupiaknate in note dongin hong sukhalo ding sa na hi uh hiam, ka ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin a tawpna-ah amaute kisik uh a, hih dinga ka lungsimah ka geelsa bangin amau’ gamtatna tawh kizui-in gim a pia ka hihna thu a phawk uh hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
[15] Herod a sih hun ciang dong tua gamah a va om uh hi. Kamsangpa tungtawnin Topa in, “Egypt gam panin ka Tapa ka samkhia hi,” ci-in a genna thu a tun nadingin hih bangin a piang ahi hi.

[17] Hih bangin thu hong pian’ ciangin kamsangpa Jeremiah in, [18] “Nakpi taka kahna awging Ramah gam sungah kiza hi. Rachel in a tate kah a, a tate khempeuh si khin ahih manin a kah a tawp nadingin kikhem zo lo hi,” ci-in a genna thu a tun nading ahi hi.
[11] “Midangte in keima hangin a man lopi-in hong simmawhin hong bawlsia a, a nam tuamtuamin hong gensiat uh ciangin thupha ngah mi na hi uh hi.

[15] “Kamsang taktak a hilote na muh uh ciangin limtakin kikem un. Amaute in a tungthamah tuu lim hong pua-in, ahi zongin a sungtawng taktak uh ngia hangsan bang ahi uh hi. [16] Amaute’ gamtatna tawh amau’ pianzia na thei ding uh hi. Lingvom kung panin leenggah kilo ngei a, sialtalling kung panin theigah kilo ngei ahi hiam? [17] Tua ahih manin singkung cidamte in gah limci gah a, singkung ginalote in gah ginalo gah uh hi. [18] Singkung cidamte in gah ginalo gah ngei lo a, singkung ginalote in gah limci gah ngei lo hi. [19] Gah limci a gah lo singkungte kiphukin meikhuk sungah kikhul hi. [20] Tua ahih manin amau’ gamtatna tawh amau’ pianzia na thei ding uh hi.
[17] Kamsang Isaiah in, “Amah in eite’ natna teng thuakin, eite’ gimna teng puakhia hi,” ci-in a genna thu a tun nadingin hih bang a piang ahi hi.
[11] Kamsang kineihkhem mi tampi hong piang ding a, mi tampi tak umkhialsak ding uh hi.

[24] Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih a kineihkhemte le kamsang a kineihkhemte hong piang ding a, ahih zawh leh a teelsa mite nangawn a khem nadingun lim le nalamdang lianpipi hong bawl ding uh hi. [25] A hun ma-in hong genkholkhin ka hih manin limtakin kidawm un.

[22] Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih kineihkhemte le kamsang kineihkhemte hong piang ding a, ahih zawhleh, a teelsa mite nangawn a khem nadingun lim le na lamdangte hong bawl ding uh hi. [23] Tua ahih manin kidawm un! A hun ma-in kong genkhin hi.

[17] Amah pen kamsang Elijah mah bangin thahatna le vangliatna tawh Pasian mai-ah hong mapai ding hi. Pate le tate kilemsakkikin, mihoihte’ lungsim bang a neih nadingun thumang lo mite’ lungsim heisak ding a, Topa a dingin a kilawm dingin mite a bawlkhol ding hi,” a ci hi.

[36] Tua laitakin Asher minamte sung panin Fanuel’ tanu Anna minnei kamsang numei khat a om hi. Amah a khangham mahmah khat hi a, a nungak laitakin a neih a pasal tawh kum sagih sung a tenkhop khit ciangin,
[24] Tua ciangin Jesuh in a thugen zomlai a, “Ke’n kong cihin-ah, kamsang a kuamah peuh ama khua-ah kipakta ngei lo hi.
[26] “Mi khempeuh in note hong pahtakbawl ciangin gimna a thuak ding na hi uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a pu a pate un zong tua bangmahin kamsang zuaute a pahtakbawl uh hi.

[17] ‘Pasian in hih bangin gen hi: Nitawp ni ciangin, mi khempeuh tungah ka Kha ka sung ding a, na tanute uh le na tapate un keima thu taangko ding uh hi; na tangvalte un maang mu ding uh a, na puteekte un mang man ding uh hi. [18] Tua ni ciangin ka nasem numeite le ka nasem pasalte’ tung nangawnah ka Kha ka sung ding a, amaute in keima thu gen ding uh hi.
[18] Ama Khrih in a thuak nading thu, Pasian in tanglai pekin kamsangte khempeuh tungtawnin genkhol a, tu-in hih bangin a thugen kholhna a hong tungsak ahi hi.

[27] Tua hun pawl laitakin Jerusalem khua panin Antiok khua-ah kamsang pawlkhat paisuk uh hi. [28] Amaute sung panin Agabas a kici kamsangpa hong ding a, leitung khempeuhah kialpi hong tung ding hi, ci-in Kha Siangtho sawlna tawh a genkhol hi. (Tua kialpi pen Klaudias in Gam uk Kumpi a sep laitakin a tung hi.) [29] Tua lai-a om thu um mite in amau hihzawh zah ciat hanciamin Judea gam a om thu um mite kiangah huhna a puak nading uh a vaihawm uh hi.

[9] Amah in Pasian thu a hilh tanu-ngak li nei hi. [10] Tua lai-ah tawlkhat ka taam khit uh ciangin Judea gam panin Agabas min nei kamsang khat hong tung hi. [11] Kote’ kiangah amah hong pai-in Paul’ kawnggak hong laksak a, tua kawnggak tawh ama khut le a khete a gakcip khit ciangin, “Kha Siangtho in, ‘Jerusalem khua sungah hih bangin Jew mite in hih kawnggak nei pa hencip ding a, Gentail mite’ khut sungah pia ding hi,’ ci hi,” a hong ci hi.
[18] Tua bang mite in i Topa Khrih’ na a sem hi loin, gilpi vai bek a sem uh ahi hi. Amaute in mite phatin kamkhum nono zang uh ahih manin mihoih pawlkhat a khemzo uh hi.

[18] Maang a muhna hangun a thupi diakin kingaihsunin, a kilawm lo zah dongin kiniamkhiat nading le vantung mite biak ding a hong hanthawn mite’ khemsa-in ta kei un. Tua bang mite pen amau’ ngaihsut tawmna tawh a kihisak mawk hi a,
[19] Kha Siangtho nasepna dongtangsak kei unla, [20] thuhilhnate simmawhbawl kei un. [21] Thu khempeuh entel pha unla, a hoihte kemin,
[14] Kamsangte’ thugennate le upate in na tungah a khut uh nga-in thu hong ngetsakna ahi nangma hihtheih siamnate na valkhongsak kei in.

[1] A beisa hunah Pasian in kamsangte zangin i pupite tungah a lam tuamtuam tawh a khen khenin thu na gen ngeizo hi. [2] Ahi zongin tuhun nunung ciangin leitung vantung na khempeuh a bawlin a zat, a tawpna-ah na khempeuh a luah dingin a seh a Tapa zangin eite tungah thu hong gen hi.

[19] Tua ahih manin kamsangte’ gen thute a man taktak ahihna thu ka teltheih uh hi. Note’ lungsimah Zingsol hong suakin khua a hong vak matengin khuamial lak a mei taang bangin hih thute ngaihsun le-uhcin hoih mahmah ding hi. [20] Na phawk ding uh a thupi mahmah khat in: Lai Siangtho sunga om thugen kholhnate, kuamah in ama pilna tawh a khiatna gen thei lo hi. [21] Bang hang hiam cih leh mihingte in a deih manin mailam thugenkholh theihna a kingah hi lo a, Kha Siangtho’ sawlna tawh Pasian’ kiang panin a hong pai thute a kigen ahi zaw hi.

[1] Mite lakah kamsang man lo a omngei mah bangin note lakah sia man lo hong om ding hi. Siatna a piangsak thei thuhilhna a man lo hong lutpih simin, amaute mahmah a tankhia Topa nangawn nial ding uh hi. Tua ahih manin thakhat thu-in siatna thuaklawh ding uh hi. [2] Tua bang hinapi-in mi tampi tak in amau’ gamtat hoih lohna zui ding uh a, tua bangin amau gamtatna hangin mite in thuman lampi gensia ding uh hi. [3] Hih sia man lote in a huaiham manun note kiang panin sum a ngahtheih nadingun phuahtawm thu hong gen ding uh hi. Ahi zongin sawtpek a kipanin amaute’ thu a Khen ding pa a kigingsa-in om niloh a, amaute a Susia ding pa in en gige hi. [4] Bang hang hiam cih leh vantung mite nangawn in khialhna a neih ciangin Pasian in khahkhong loin hell khuk sungah khia a, Thukhen Ni hun dong ngakin khuamial sungah kol bulhsa-in a omsak hi.

[2] Tanglai peka kamsang siangthote’ thugen kholhte le note lakah sawltak na a semte in Topa le Honpa’ thupiakte a hong gensawn uh thute na phawkkik ding uh ka deih hi. [3] A masa penin na theih ding uh panin: Hun nunung lam ciangin amau pumpi deihna zui-in a gamta mi pawlkhat hong om ding a, amaute in note hong zahpih bawlin, [4] “Amah a hong paikik nading a thuciamna a bangci ahi hiam? I pu i pate zong si khinta uh a, leitung piancil a kipanin tu dong na khempeuh a kibang mahin omom lai hi,” hong ci ding uh hi.

[1] Ka it lawmte aw, kha ka nei a ci mi khempeuh’ thugen um kei unla, tua thute Pasian kiang pan mah ahi hiam, ci-in kantel un. Bang hang hiam cih leh leitungah kamsang a kineihkhem tampi hong om khinta hi. [2] Pasian’ Kha sawlna tawh thugente le adangte bangci khentheih ding na hi uh hiam cih leh: Jesuh Khrih pen mihing bangin hong pai hi, ci-in a gente khempeuh Pasian Kha’ lamlahna tawh thugen ahi hi. [3] Ahi zongin hih thu a nial mi peuhmah, Pasian Kha’ sawlna tawh thugen hi lo uh hi. Hih bang mite pen Khrih’ Gal hi a, hong pai ding hi, ci-in na zaksa uh mah bangin tu-in leitungah a hong om khinta ahi uh hi. [4] Ka it tate aw, note, Pasian’ mite na hi uh a, tua bang kamsang kineihkhemte a zokhin na hi uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung mite a panpih dawimangpa sangin note hong ompih Pasian vanglian zaw hi.

[20] Ahi zongin note ka hong mawhsak nading thu khat om hi. Kamsang numei ka hi, ci-in thu a gen Jezebel na nial kei uh hi. Ama thuhilhna hangin ka nasemte in numei-pasal paktatna gamta-in milim biakna ante a ne uh hi.
[13] Tua ciangin gulpi kamsung, ganhing kamsung, le a man lo kamsangpa’ kamsung panin uiphuk tawh a kibang kha gilo thum a hong pusuak ka mu hi.

[20] Tua ciangin a ganhing le tua ganhing omna-ah nalamdang a bawl kamsang zuau pa kiman khawm hi. Ganhing ciaptehna a neite le ganhing lim a biate pen tua na lamdangte tawh a kikhem ahi hi. Ganhing le kamsang zuau pa, a nihun kat kikhulna meiphualpi sungah a hingtangun kilawn hi.
[10] Amaute a khem Satan pen ganhing le kamsang zuau pa a omna mun, kat a kikhulna meiphualpi sungah kilawn a, a sun a zanin tua lai munah amaute in gimna a thuak tawntung ding uh ahi hi.
[11] A mantakin, note in ka thugen na ngaih kei uhleh TOPA in a pau na theih loh uh gamdang mite, note tungah thu hong hilhsak ding hi.
[17] A um mite tungah hih vangliatna limte kipia ding hi: Keima hangin dawi hawlkhia thei ding uh a, pau dangte pau thei ding uh hi.

[4] Amaute khempeuh Kha Siangtho tawh kidim uh a, tua Kha in minam dangte’ pau tawh amaute a pau theisak hi. [5] Tua laitakin biakna pawi siim dingin gam tuamtuam panin a hong pai Jew mi biakna hahkat mi tampi tak, Jerusalem khua sungah a om uh hi. [6] Hih huging a zak uh ciangin mihon tampi tak hong kikhawm uh a, hih Jesuh a um mite’ thugen pen amau’ pau ciatin za uh ahih manin lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.

[44] Tua bangin Peter in thu a hilh laitakin tua thuhilhna a ngai mite khempeuh tungah Kha Siangtho hong tungsuk hi. [45] Gentail mite tungah zong Pasian in a Kha Siangtho a piakkhongna thu a muh uh ciangin Joppa khua panin Peter tawh a hong paikhawm Jew mi thu umte in lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi. [46] Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in pau lamdang pau-in Pasian’ liatna a phatnate uh amau bil mahmah tawh a za uh hi. Tua ciangin Peter in,
[6] Paul in amaute tungah a khut a ngakkhit ciangin amaute tungah Kha Siangtho hong tung hi. Amaute in pau lamdang hong paupah uh a, Pasian’ thu zong a gen uh hi.

[26] Tua ahih manin eite bangzahin ginalo hitalehang eite a hong huh dingin Kha Siangtho a hong pai hi. Eite in a kilawm bangin thunget ding nangawn i thei kei a, ahi zongin Kha Siangtho mah in tauna tawh eite a dingin a hong thumsak hi.

[27] Tu-in note khempeuh pen Khrih pumpi na hi uh a, na vekpi-un a pumpi na khat ciat na hi uh hi. [28] Tua ahih manin Pasian in pawlpi sungah mi khempeuh ama panmun ciat dingah a hong bulh hi. A masa-in sawltakte, a nihna-ah kamsangte, a thumna-ah laihilhte, tua ciangin nalamdang bawltheite, cina damsak theite, midang a huhtheite, thu vaihawm a siamte, le pau lamdang a pau theite ahi uh hi. [29] A vekpi-un sawltak hi lo a, a vekpi-un kamsang zong hi lo uh hi. A vekpi-un laihilh, thuhilh hi lo uh a, a vekpi-un nalamdang zong bawl lo uh hi. [30] A vekpi-un cina damsak nading siamna nei lo uh a, a vekpi-un pau lamdang pau thei lo uh a, a vekpi-un tua pau lamdangte a khiatna gen thei lo uh hi. [31] Tua ahih manin Pasian’ hong piak siamna a hoihpente deih belin na nei ta un. Tu-in a hoihpen thu khat ka hong gen ding hi.
[8] Itna pen a tawntungin a kip ahi hi. Thuhilh siamna a om tei hangin tawlkhat sung bek kimangin, pau lamdang pautheih siamnate a om hangin bei ding a, thutheih siamna a om hangin maimang ding hi.

[2] Bang hang hiam cih leh pau lamdang a paute pen mite’ tungah thugen hi loin Pasian’ tungah thugen ahi hi. Amaute’ pau kuamah in thei lo a, Kha Siangtho’ vangliatna tawh Pasian’ thusimte a gengen ahi uh hi.
[13] Tua ahih manin pau lamdang a paute in, amau paute a khiatna a gen theih nading uh siamna a neih nadingun thu ngen ta uh hen.
[19] Ahi ta zongin pawlpite’ biak kikhopna sungah pau lamdang kam tul sawm bang ka pau sangin midangte’ phattuam nadingin a theih ding uh kammal nga bek ka pauzaw ding hi.

[22] Tua ahih manin pau lamdang pen thu um mite a’ ding hi loin, thu um lo mite in a uptheih nading uh lim ahi hi. Tua mah bangin Pasian’ thuhilhna pen thu um mite a’ ding hi a, thu um lo mite a’ ding hi lo hi. [23] Tua ahih manin pawlpi mi khempeuh na kikhopna uhah na vekpi-un pau lamdangin pau-in, mi mawkmawkte ahih kei leh thu um lo mite in hong mu zenzen leh, note pen mihai hontang hi, hong ci ding hi lo ahi uh hiam?

[27] Pau lamdang tawh thugen nuam a om leh zong, nih bang, ahih kei leh a tam penin thum bang in gen bek ding a, tua bangin a gen uh ciangin zong khat a man khit ciangin khat in a banbanin gen ding uh hi. [28] Ahi zongin a khiatna a genthei ding a om kei leh zong, kikhopna sungah pau lamdangin a pau nuam pa gamdai takin om ding a, amah le Pasian tawh kikal bekah kigen ding uh hi.
[20] Ahi zongin ka it note ahihleh a siangtho na upna uhah na kip semsem unla, Kha Siangtho vangliatna tawh thu na ngen un.
[2] “ TOPA’ kha in kei tungtawnin thu hong gen a, ka kam sungah ama thugente om hi.
[18] Thu a gen dingin kha in kei hong sawl a, tu taktak ciangin ka kam ka ki-ipzo nawn het kei hi.

[15] Bang hang hiam cih leh a sang, a lian, a nungta tawntung Pa, ama min Siangtho ahipa in hih bangin ci hi: “Kei pen a sangna mun le a siangtho munah ka om a, a kiniamkhiat mite’ lungsim le a kisik mite’ lungsim a thakhauhsakkik dingin kisikna le kiniamkhiatna lungsim a neite tawh zong kei ka omkhawm hi.

[2] Hih nate khempeuh keima bawlsa ahih manin hih nate khempeuh keima-a’ ahi hi, TOPA in ci hi. Ahih hangin kiniamkhiatin, lungsim a kitamzan mipa, keima thu-ah lau-in a ling kelkel pa, keima deih mipa ahi hi.

[4] Pate aw, na tate uh a hehtheih nadingin bawl kei unla, Khristiante ngeina tawh kituakin taii-in hilhin pantah un.
[20] Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu man’ tawntung ding pen na Khristian nasep uh ahi hi. Tua bang thumanna in Pasian lungdamsak hi.
[12] Khangno lai na hihna thu hangin mite’ simmawh dingin na om kei inla, kampauna, gamtatna, itna, upna, le sianthona-ah thu um mite’ etteh dingin na om in.
[1] Nang sangin a uzaw mite taiibawl kei inla, na pa bangin ngaihsunin hanthawn in. Nang sangin a nauzawte na nau bangin bawl in.

[4] Meigong numei khatpeuh in tate ahi a, tute ahi zongin a neih leh innkuan sungah biakna tawh kisai-in tavuan a neihna uh hilh inla, a nu a pa, a pu a pite a huh nadingun gen in. Hih bang gamtatna pen Pasian’ muhna-ah a hoih thu ahi hi.
[5] Na pi Lois le na nu Eunis in a neih upna bangte pawl mah, lungsim takpi tawh na upna thu ka phawk a, tu-in zong nang sungah tua bang upna om hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
[22] Tua ahih manin khangno lunggulhna hoih lote pelh inla, lungsim takpi tawh Topa tungah huhna a ngen mite tawh thuman thutak, upna, itna, kilemna na neihtheih nadingun hanciam khawm un.
[6] Tua mah bangin khangnote zong amau pumpi a ki-ukzawh nadingun na hanthawn pha in.

[5] Tua mah bangin no khangnozaw deuhte in zong a khanghamte’ thu na mang un. Lai Siangtho in, “Pasian in a kiphasak mite nial a, a kiniamkhiat mite a hehpih hi,” a cih mah bangin na vekpi-un kiniamkhiatna puan bangin silhin, khatlekhat na na kisepsak un.

[14] Pate aw, note tungah lai ka hong gelhna pen a kipat cil a kipanin a na om pa na theihna hang uh ahi hi. Tangvalte aw, note tungah lai ka hong gelhna pen note na lungsim uh thahatin, Pasian’ thu zui-in, Dawimangpa zokhin na hihna hang uh ahi hi.
[14] Tu-in Saul’ tung panin TOPA’ kha paikhia a, TOPA in kha gilo sawlin tua kha gilo in amah gimsak hi.

[19] Amaute in note kiangah, “Phun suausuau-in a pau mualmual vankah theite le aisan theite kiangah thu dong un. Mite in amau’ pasian-te thu dongin, mihingte’ thu pen misite dot ding mah hi lo ahi hiam?” hong ci ding uh hi. [20] Tua ciangin note in, “ TOPA in note hong hilh thute ngai un. Aisante’ thu ngai kei un. Amaute’ hong gen thute a kimanna om lo hi,” ci-in dawng un.

[28] Tuili galkhat, Gadara gam a tun ciangin han panin dawivei mi nih hong paikhia-in Jesuh a na dawn uh hi. Tua mi nihte kihtakhuai mahmah ahih manin amaute omna lam tawnin kuamah pai ngam lo uh hi. [29] Amaute nakpitakin hong kiko uh a, “Pasian’ Tapa aw, kote bang hong nuammawh na hi hiam? A hun tung nai lopi-in kote gim a pia dingin hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi. [30] Tua laitakin tua san panin a gamla lo mun khatah vok honpi gamta-in a om hi. [31] Tua ciangin dawite in Jesuh kiangah, “Kote hong hawlkhia ding na hih leh hua vokte sungah hong lutsak in,” ci-in a thum uh ciangin [32] Jesuh in, “Pai un,” ci ahih manin amaute zong paikhia-in vokte sungah a lut uh hi. Tua vok honte, keen luvum panin tuaksuk gawpin tuili sung tu uh ahih manin a vekpi-in tuikia-in a si khin hi.
[1] Jesuh in a nungzui sawm le nihte sam a, dawite a hawlkhiat theih nading uh le natna nam khempeuh a damsak theih nadingun amaute tungah vangliatna a pia hi.
[22] Tua ciangin mi pawlkhat in Jesuh kiangah mittawt le pau theih loh a thuah dawivei mi khat hong paipih uh hi. Jesuh in amah damsak ahih manin amah hong pauthei-in khua zong hong muthei hi.

[43] “Mi khatpeuh sung panin dawi a kihawlkhiat khit ciangin a ten nading mun keuna zongin a vak kawikawi hi. Ahi zongin a ten nading mun a muh zawh loh ciangin, [44] ‘Ka paikhiatnasa inn mahah ciahkik ning,’ ci hi. A hong paikik ciangin tua inn na awng lai a, kipuah siangin hoihtakin a om a mu hi. [45] Tua ciangin va paikik a, amah sangin a siahuaizaw dawi sagih hong tunpihin tua mipa sungah a teng uh hi. Tua ahih manin tua mipa pianzia pen a masa huna sangin a siazaw hi. Tua ahih ciangin tuhuna migilote zong hih mipa’ pianzia mah tawh kibang ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[23] Tua laitakin kikhopna inn sungah dawivei mi khat hong lut a, [24] “Nazareth khuami Jesuh aw, kote tawh nang bang kisai ihi hiam? Kote a susia dingin hih lai-ah hong om na hi hiam? Pasian’ mi siangtho na hihlam kong thei hi,” ci-in a kiko hi.
[11] Tua laitakin mite’ sunga lut dawite in Jesuh a muh uh ciangin a mai-ah pukin kiko uh a, “Nang pen Pasian’ Tapa na hi hi,” a ci uh hi.

[2] Gunkuang tung panin Jesuh a kumsuk khit phetin, han lak panin a hong pai mi khat in na dawntuah hi. [3] Hih mipa dawivei hi a, han lakah a teng hi. Kuamah in hih mipa, sikkhau tawh henzo nawn lo uh hi. [4] Tamveipi tak, a khut le a khe, sikkhau tawh kihen khin ngei a, ahi zongin a kihen simin a sikkhaute botsatin, a khe-a kibulh kolte a sukham gawp hi. Amah hatlua ahih manin kuamah in hih zo lo hi. [5] Sun le zanin han lak le mualtung tengah vak kawikawi a, awng gawpin, suang hiamte tawh amah a kikuiliam hi. [6] Hih mipa in Jesuh a gal muh ciangin hong delhin ama mai-ah khukdin a, [7] nakpitakin kiko-in, “A Lianpen Pasian’ Tapa Jesuh aw, kei bang hong nuammawh na hi hiam? Kei, gim hong pia kei in, ci-in Pasian’ min tawh kong thum hi,” a ci hi.

[19] Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Upna nei lo mite aw, note bang tanvei hong ompih ding a, bang tanvei hong kikholhpih ding ka hi hiam? A naupang hong paipih un,” a ci hi. [20] Amaute in zong Jesuh kiangah a naupang hong paipih uh hi. Dawi in Jesuh a muh phetin naupang kongkawsak ahih manin leilakah pukin kikhuk a, a cilphuan a bua hi. [21] Jesuh in, “A nat zawh bang tanvei sawtta ahi hiam?” ci-in a pa kiangah a dong hi. “A neutung a kipan ahi hi.
[26] A dawi nakpitakin kiko-in naupang a kongkawtsak khit ciangin a taikhia hi. Naupang pen misi tawh kibangin omcip ahih manin mi khempeuh in, “Si ta hi,” a ci uh hi.

[33] Kikhopna inn sungah dawivei mi khat om a, nakpitakin kiko-in, [34] “Nazareth khuami Jesuh aw, kote tawh bang kisai ihi hiam? Kote a susia dingin hong pai na hi hiam? Pasian’ mi siangtho na hih lamtak ka hong thei uh hi,” a ci hi. [35] Jesuh in tua dawi taii a, “Pau kei inla, ama sung panin paikhia in,” ci-in thu a pia hi. Dawi in a mipa mihon lakah a puksak khit ciangin ama sung panin paikhia a, ahi zongin liamsak lo hi.

[1] Tuazawh tawlkhat khit ciangin khuapite le khuaneute-ah a ban banin Jesuh pai a, Pasian’ Ukna hangin Lungdamna Thu hilhin a vak kawikawi hi. Tua a vak kawikawina-ah nungzui sawm le nihte, [2] le a sungpan dawi a hawlkhiatsakte le natna tuamtuam pan a damsak numei pawlkhat in zong a zui uh hi. Tua numeite: A sung panin dawi sagih a kihawlkhiatna Mary (Magdala khuami Mary a kici nu), [3] Herod’ khutnuai-a ulian Khuza’ zi Joanna, Susanna, le numei dang tampite hi uh a, amau’ neihsa tawh Jesuh le a nungzuite a huh uh hi.
[12] Lamdungah khaici a tukna munte pen Pasian’ thu a zate a cihnopna ahi hi. Tuate in Pasian’ thu a zak hangun a thu um loin, hotkhiatna a ngah loh nadingun Dawimangpa hong pai-in a lakkhiatsak hi.
[30] Jesuh in ama kiangah, “Na min bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, ama sungah dawi tampi lut ahih manin, “A Honpi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[20] Ahi zongin dawite in na thu uh hong manna hangin lungdam kei unla, vantungah na min uh a kigelh manin lungdamzaw un,” a ci hi.
[26] Tua ciangin amah paikhia kikin, amah sangin a siazaw dawi sagih hong paipih a, a sungah lutin a teng uh hi. Tua mipa’ pianzia pen a masa sangin hong siazaw hi,” a ci hi.
[2] Jesuh le a nungzuite nitak an ne-in a tukhawm uh hi. Tua hun laitakin dawimangpa in Simon Iskariot’ tapa Judas’ lungsim sungah Jesuh lehhek nading ngaihsutna koih khinzo hi.
[10] “Dawimangpa tawh a kibang mipa aw, thuhoih khempeuh nialin, gitlohna ngian tuamtuam na nei a, Topa’ thuman pen zuau suahsak ding na hanciam tawntung hi.

[16] Nikhat, thungetna mun a zuan dingin ka pai laitakun mailam thu a genthei dawivei nasem numei khat in kote hong dawntuah hi. Tua numei in mailam thu a genna tawh a tote a dingin sum tampi a ngahsak hi. [17] Tua numei in Paul le kote hong zui-in, “Hih mite, A Lianpen Pasian’ nasemte ahi uh hi. Note a hong kihotkhiat theih nading thu a hong gen uh ahi hi,” ci-in a kiko hi. [18] Tua bangin ni tampi sung awng ngitnget ahih manin a sawtna ciangin Paul in nawngkaisa ahih manin kihei-in a dawi kiangah, “Hih numei sung panin na paikhiat nadingin Jesuh Khrih min tawh thu kong pia hi,” a cihkhit phetin, tua numei sung panin dawi a paikhia pah hi.

[11] Pasian in Paul’ tungtawnin nalamdang lianpipi a bawl hi. [12] Ama zat mainul ahi a, a puante ahi zongin cinate kiangah a kipaipih ciangin a natnate uh damin, a sunga om dawite zong a taikhia uh hi. [13] Dawi hawlkhia-in a vak kawikawi Jew mi aitawi pawlkhat in zong Topa Jesuh’ min zangin dawi hawlkhiat ding a sawm uh hi. Amaute in dawite kiangah, “Paul in a gengen Jesuh’ min tawh thu kong pia uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
[16] dawilutna mipa in amaute buan gawpin zogawp ahih manin, a liam a bai, puan keksa-in tua mipa’ inn panin a taikhia uh hi.

[4] Tua bang mite pen hih leitung pasian gilote in a lungsim mit uh tawsak ahih manin um lo uh a, Pasian tawh a kibang teekteek Khrih minthanna hangin amaute tungah a hong taang lungdamna thu khuavak mu thei lo uh hi.
[1] Tua ahih manin ka hong it lawmte aw, pumpi le lungsim a ninsak theite khempeuh panin kisiansuahin, Pasian zahtakna tawh nungta-in siangtho sinsenin om ni.
[3] Ahi zongin gulpi in ama zuau ngian tawh Eve a khemzawh bangin na lungsim uh kihei-in Khrih tungah na kipiaknate uh na nusiatkhak ding uh ka lunghimawh hi.

[3] Tua ciangin lim lamdang adang khat mah vanah hong kilang leuleu hi. Gulpi san a lian mahmah khat om a, lutang sagih le ki sawm nei a, a lutang sagihte-ah lukhu mah nei ciat hi. [4] A mei tawh vanah a om aksi sehsawmsuah sehkhat vatkhia-in leilak a denna hi. A nau a suah phetin a ne pah dingin nausuak dingin a kithawi tua numei’ mai-ah a ding hi.

[13] Tua ganhing nihna in nalamdang lianpipi bawl a, mi khempeuhte’ muhin van panin leitungah meikuang nangawn a kiasak thei hi. [14] Ganhing masa omna-ah nalamdang bawltheih nading thu ngah ahih manin a nalamdang bawlna tawh leitungah a om mi khempeuh khem a, namsau tawh a si ding zahin a kisat liamsa hinapi a nungta lai ganhing pahtawi nading milim khat a bawl nadingun a gen hi.

[13] Tua ciangin gulpi kamsung, ganhing kamsung, le a man lo kamsangpa’ kamsung panin uiphuk tawh a kibang kha gilo thum a hong pusuak ka mu hi. [14] Tuate pen dawite’ kha hi a, nalamdang a bawl uh hi. A Vanglian Pasian’ Ni hong tun ciangin gal a do dingin leitung gam khempeuhah a om kumpite a kaikhawm dingin a kuankhia uh hi.
[2] Leitung in limlemel nei loin a awngthawlpi ahi hi. Tuipi tung tengah khua mial bikbek a, tua tui tungah Pasian’ Kha in na a sem hi.

[3] Tua ciangin TOPA in, “Mihingte sungah ka Kha om paisuak nawn lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mihingte a mawh hi khinta a, kum za le kum sawmnih sung kisik nading hun kipia lai bek ding hi,” a ci hi.

[26] Giahphual ah mi nih om uh a, khat Eldad kici-in, a khat Medad kici a, amaute’ sungah tua kha a lut hi. Amaute pen a kiciamtehte lakah a kihelte hi uh a, ahih hangin Puanbukah pai loin, giahphual ah kamsangte bangin thu genin a kiko uh hi.
[10] TOPA’ Kha ama tungah tung a, amah, Israel mite’ thukhen a suak hi. Galsim dingin kuankhia a, TOPA in ama khut sungah Mesopotamia kumpipa Kushanrishathaim a pia hi.
[13] A hu a san ciangin vantung teng siang pah a, ama khut in a taikhia gulpi thatlum hi.
[4] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ kha in kei hong sawl a, Vanglianpa in kei tungah nuntakna hu hong pia hi.
[11] Nangma omna panin kei hong paaikhia kei inla, keima kiang panin na kha siangtho lakhia kei in.
[30] Na hu na sankhiat ciangin amaute a kipiangsak hi a, nangmah in leitung na bawlthak hi.
[2] TOPA’ kha in ama tungah ama mite a ukna ding pilna, thutheihna, le siamna pia ding hi. Amah in TOPA’ deihna thei-in TOPA zahtak ding hi.
[21] Taklamah na kihei ciang uh ahi a, veilamah na kihei ciang uh ahi zongin, “Hih pen lampi hi, hih tawn un,” cihna aw, na nunglam panun na bil un a za ding hi.
[19] Tua ahih ciangin nisuahna le nitumna kikalah a om mi khempeuh in amah zahtakin, a vangliatna kihta ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh huihpi nung bang, tuipi khang bangin amah hong pai ding hi.
[10] Ahih hangin amaute in lehdo uh a, ama kha siangtho a dahsak uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah pen amaute’ gal suak a, amahmah in amaute a do hi.

[26] Note sungah lungtang thak le lungsim thak kong guan ding a, na suang lungtang uh hong lakkhiatsakin mihing lungtang kong guan ding hi. [27] Note sungah keima kha kong guang ding a, note tungah kong piak ka thukhamte le ka thupiakte limtakin kong zuisak ding hi.

[8] Ahi zongin kei ahihleh, Israel mite tungah a mawhna uh a genkhia dingin TOPA’ kha le a vang tawh ka kidim a, thutang gen ngamna ding lungsim ka nei hi. [9] Ngai un! Israel a uk makaite aw. Note in thutang deih loin, thuman kimlai a khialin na hei uh hi.

[6] Tua ciangin vantungmi in kei kiangah, “ TOPA in Zerubbabel tungah hih bangin thu gen hi: Galkap tam neihna hang hi lo, nangma vangliatna hang zong hi lo, keima tung panin na ngah vangliatna bek tawh na ma na tunzo ding hi.

[11] Na kisikkik khitna uh a kilat nadingin tui sungah note ka hong phum a, ahi zongin kei nungah a hong pai pa in Kha Siangtho le mei sungah note hong phum ding hi. Tua a hong pai ding pa pen kei sangin nakpitakin lianzaw a, ama khedap a tawisak ding nangawnin ka kilawmzo nai kei hi.
[20] Thu na gen uh ciangin note’ gen hi loin, na Pa uh’ Kha Siangtho in note tungtawnin thu a gen ding ahi hi.
[18] “Keimah in ka teelsa ka nasempa, ka it mahmah, ka lungkimna pa en un. Keima Kha ama tungah ka pia ding a, Gentail mite tungah upna man a pulak ding hi.

[31] Tua ahih manin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Mihingte’ kampau khialhna le gamtat khialhnate kimaisak thei ding a, ahi zongin Kha Siangtho langpangin a gensiate kimaisak lo ding hi. [32] Mihing Tapa langpangin a gensiate a mawhna uh kimaisak thei ding a, ahi zongin Kha Siangtho langpangin a gensiate pen tuhun a kipan a tawntungin a mawhna uh kimaisak lo ding hi. [33] “Singgah limci a gahtheih nadingin a kung a cidam phot ding kisam a, a kung gina kei leh a gah limci lo hi. Tua ahih manin singkung khat a pianzia pen a gahin hong kithei hi.
[29] Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho langpangin thu a gente in mawhna kip sukha uh ahih manin a mawhna uh kimaisak ngei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
[35] Vantung mi in, “Nangma tungah Kha Siangtho hong tung ding a, nangma tungah Pasian’ vangliatna hong om ding hi. Tua ahih manin a hong suak ding a siangtho naungek pen Pasian’ Tapa kici ding hi.

[25] Jerusalem khua sungah Simeon a kici mi khat na om hi. Amah a thuman, a biakna mi mahmah khat hi a, Israel mite a kihotkhiat hun ding a ngakngak mi khat ahi hi. Kha Siangtho in a ompih mi khat hi a, [26] Topa’ hong ciamsa Khrih a muh matengin a sih loh nading thu zong ama tungah Kha Siangtho in na genkhin hi. [27] Kha Siangtho’ makaihna tawh biakinn sungah Simeon a pai hi. A nu le a pate in thukham sunga om ngeina bangin Topa tungah naungek a ap dingin biakinn-ah a hong paipih uh ciangin, [28] Simeon in naungek la-in a ang-ah tawi-in Pasian’ tungah lungdamna ko a, [29] “Topa aw, na thuciamna tu-in nong tungsak a, na nasempa keima lungsim nong nuamsak hi.
[1] Kha Siangtho tawh a kidimin Jordan gun panin Jesuh hong ciahkik a, Kha Siangtho in gamlakah paipihin,

[18] “Gimna a thuak mite tungah Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin Topa in kei hong sehkhin ahih manin keima sungah Topa’ kha hong om hi. Salin a kimante tungah suahtakna thu a gen ding, mittawte in khua a muhkik theih nading, a kinengniamte a suaktasak ding le
[13] Note mihoih lo hinapi-in na tate uh tungah a hoih piak ding theithei na hih uhleh, vantung a om na Pa un a ngente tungah Kha Siangtho piazaw kan ding hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

[47] Jerusalem khua a kipan minam khempeuh tungah a mawhna uh kisikin a kimaisak nading thu, ama min tawh kihilh ding hi, ci-in kigelh hi. [48] Note pen hih thu khempeuh a thei teci na hi uh hi. [49] Ka Pa’ hong ciamsa thu, note tungah ka hong pia ding hi. Ahi zongin vantung panin tua vangliatna na ngah mateng uh hih Jerusalem khuapi-ah na ngak un,” a ci hi.

[5] Jesuh in, “A mantakin kong genin-ah, mi khatpeuh tui le Kha Siangtho tawh a suahkik kei leh Pasian’ Ukna sungah lut thei lo ding hi. [6] Mihing sung panin a suakte mihing mah hi bek a, Kha tawh a suakte pen kha mi ahi hi. [7] Tua ahih manin, ‘Na suahkik ding ahi hi,’ ka hong cihna hangin lamdangsa kei in. [8] Huih zong a utna peuhpeuhah nung a, a huging na zaktheih hangin koi lam panin hong nung a, koi lamah nung ahi hiam, cih na mu thei kei hi. Kha tawh a suak mite zong tua mah bang ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[23] Ahi zongin Pasian a bia taktakte in Pasian’ Kha’ lamlahna le thuman tak tawh a biak hun hong tung ding a, tu-in zong a hong tung khinta ahi hi. Pa Pasian in tu-a bangin amah i biak ding a hong deih ahi hi. [24] Pasian pen Kha ahi hi; amah a biate in tua Kha’ lamlahna le thuman taktak tawh a bia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[38] Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Kei hong um mite sung panin nuntakna tui luangkhia ding hi,’ a cih mah bangin kei hong um mite ka kiangah hong pai-in hong dawn ta un,” a ci hi. [39] Jesuh in hih bang a gen ciangin amah a umte in a ngah ding Kha Siangtho thu a genna hi a, tua hun laitakin Pasian’ pianzia nei-in sihna panin Jesuh kithokiksak nai lo ahih manin Kha Siangtho kipiakhia nai lo hi.

[15] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Kei na hong it uhleh ka thupiakte zong na zui ding uh hi. [16] Keimah in Pa kiangah ka ngen ding a, note tawh a omkhawm tawntung dingin Thuman a hong lak Kha Siangtho, note hong Huhpa ding a hong pia ding hi. [17] Leitung mite in tua Kha Siangtho mu thei lo, theithei lo uh ahih manin sang thei lo ding uh hi. Ahi zongin note sungah tua Kha Siangtho hong om ding ahih manin note in na thei ding uh hi.

[26] Ahi zongin Pa in keima tangin a hong sawl ding Huhpa Kha Siangtho a hong tun ciangin note tungah thu khempeuh hong hilh ding a, note tungah ka hong gensa thu khempeuh zong hong phawksakkik ding hi.
[26] “Ahi zongin Thuman a hong lak ding Huhpa ahi Kha Siangtho ka Pa kiang panin ka hong sawl ding hi. Amah hong tun ciangin keima thu hong gen ding hi.

[7] A taktakin ci lehang, kei paikhia kei leng note hong Huh ding pa hong pai lo ding a, kei paikhia leng note hong Huh ding pa hong sawl ding ka hih manin kei va paikhia leng note a dingin hoihzaw tham hi. [8] Amah hong tun ciangin leitung mite tungah mawhna thu, thuman thu leh thukhenna thu laktel ding hi.

[12] “Ka hong gen ding tampi tak omlai hi; ahi zongin hong gen lai leng note a dingin tamlua ding hi. [13] Tua ahih manin thuman hong lak ding Kha Siangtho hong tun ciangin thu khempeuh a manin hong hilh ding hi. Ama ngaihsuttawm thu hong gen ding hi lo a, ama tungah a kigen thute le a hong tung ding thute a hong gen ding ahi hi. [14] Amah in keima gen ding thute note tungah hong gen ding ahih manin Pasian’ pianzia ka neihna hong kilangsak ding hi. [15] Ka Pa’ neihsa khempeuh keima-a’ suakkhin ahih manin keima gen ding thute le a gen dingin ka sawlteng Kha Siangtho in note kiangah hong gen ding hi,” a ci hi.

[21] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Note in nopna ngah ta un. Pa in kei a hong sawl bangin note zong ka hong sawl hi,” ci-in a vaikhak leuleu hi. [22] Tua khit ciangin amaute lamah a hu sang a, “Kha Siangtho na sang un. [23] Mite’ mawhna na maisak uhleh amaute’ mawhna a mai hi ding a, na maisak kei uhleh amaute’ mawhna a mai lo hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
[5] Johan in tui sungah mite phum a, ahi zongin a sawt loin Pasian in Kha Siangtho tawh note hong kidimsak ding hi,” ci-in thu a pia hi.

[8] Ahi zongin note tungah Kha Siangtho hong tun ciangin vangliatna tawh na kidim ding uh a, Jerusalem khuasung, Judea gam sung, Samaria gam sung, le leimong dongin note in keima thu na gen ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[1] Pentekos ni hong tun ciangin Jesuh a um mi khempeuh mun khatah kikhawm uh hi. [2] Tua laitakin huihpi nung bangin huging khat hong tungvat a, amaute’ kikhopna innsung khempeuh hong dim hi. [3] Tua ciangin leii tawh a kibang meikuang bang pian amaute lakah hong kithehthang a, tuate in mi khempeuh sukha kim hi. [4] Amaute khempeuh Kha Siangtho tawh kidim uh a, tua Kha in minam dangte’ pau tawh amaute a pau theisak hi.

[17] ‘Pasian in hih bangin gen hi: Nitawp ni ciangin, mi khempeuh tungah ka Kha ka sung ding a, na tanute uh le na tapate un keima thu taangko ding uh hi; na tangvalte un maang mu ding uh a, na puteekte un mang man ding uh hi. [18] Tua ni ciangin ka nasem numeite le ka nasem pasalte’ tung nangawnah ka Kha ka sung ding a, amaute in keima thu gen ding uh hi.

[33] Amah in Pasian’ taklamah omna dongin liatna ngah a, ama tungah Pasian in a ciamsa Kha Siangtho zong a ngahkhin hi. Tu laitak a na muh na zak uh nate pen kote tungah a hong piak tua Kha Siangtho ahi hi.

[37] Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a lungsim uh nakpitakin sukha a, Peter le sawltak dangte kiangah, “Sanggamte aw, bangci gamtat ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. [38] Tua ciangin Peter in amaute kiangah, “Na mawhna uh kisik unla, na mawhna uh hong kimaisak theih nadingin Jesuh Khrih min tawh tui kiphum ciat un. Tua hileh Pasian’ piakkhong Kha Siangtho na ngah ding uh hi.

[29] Tua ahih ciangin Topa aw, amaute in kote hong tawnnate thei inla, nangma nasem kote in lungsim han’ mahmahna tawh nangma thu ka gentheih nadingun hong huh in. [30] Cinate damsak theih nading vangliatna hong pia inla, a siangtho na Nasempa Jesuh’ min tawh nalamdang kibawl ta hen,” a ci uh hi. [31] Tua bangin thu a nget khit uh ciangin amaute’ kikhopna mun hong kilinggawp hi. Amaute khempeuh Kha Siangtho tawh kidim uh a, hang takin Pasian’ thu gen ding a kipan uh hi.

[32] Hih thute thei-in teci a pangte pen ko sawltakte bek hi loin Kha Siangtho tawh zong ka hi uh a, tua Kha Siangtho pen amah a um mite tungah Pasian in a khongin a piak ahi hi,” ci-in a dawngkik uh hi.
[51] “Na lungsim uh khauh mahmah a, lawki lungsim paii-in, Pasian’ thu-ah bilngong na bang uh hi. I pu i pate mah bangin Kha Siangtho thu na mang nuam kei uh hi.

[38] Nazareth khuami Jesuh tungah Pasian in Kha Siangtho le vangliatna pia a, Pasian in a ompihna hangin tua Jesuh in a paina khempeuhah na hoih semin, Dawimangpa in a gimsak mite khempeuh a damsakna thu zong na thei uh hi.

[44] Tua bangin Peter in thu a hilh laitakin tua thuhilhna a ngai mite khempeuh tungah Kha Siangtho hong tungsuk hi. [45] Gentail mite tungah zong Pasian in a Kha Siangtho a piakkhongna thu a muh uh ciangin Joppa khua panin Peter tawh a hong paikhawm Jew mi thu umte in lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi. [46] Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in pau lamdang pau-in Pasian’ liatna a phatnate uh amau bil mahmah tawh a za uh hi. Tua ciangin Peter in,

[6] Asia gam sungah thu a hilh ding uh Kha Siangtho in phal lo ahih manin Frigia le Galatia gam sungtengah a zin uh hi. [7] Mysia gamgi a tun uh ciangin Bithynia gam sungah lut dingin kithawi uh a, ahi zongin tua gamah a pai ding uh Jesuh’ Kha Siangtho in phal lo hi.

[1] Korin khua-ah Apollos a om laitakin Paul khual hong zinin Efesa khua hong tung hi. Tua khua-ah thu um mi pawlkhat tawh kimu a, [2] “Thu na up uh ciangin Kha Siangtho na ngah uh hiam?” ci-in a dot leh, “Kha Siangtho a omlam nangawn ka za nai kei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. [3] Tua ciangin Paul in, “Tua ahihleh na kituiphumna dan uh bangci bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Tuiphumpa Johan’ thugen bang pawl ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. [4] Tua ciangin Paul in, “Johan’ hilh tuiphumna pen mawhna a kisik mite a’ ding ahi hi. Amah in Israel mite kiangah, ‘Keima nunga hong pai ding pa Jesuh um un,’ ci-in gen hi,” a ci hi. [5] Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Topa Jesuh’ minin tui a kiphum uh hi. [6] Paul in amaute tungah a khut a ngakkhit ciangin amaute tungah Kha Siangtho hong tung hi. Amaute in pau lamdang hong paupah uh a, Pasian’ thu zong a gen uh hi.

[16] Tua ahih manin Abraham’ suanlekhakte khempeuh tungah Pasian’ hehpihna piakkhong a suahtheih nadingin Thukham a zuite bek in ngah loin, Abraham’ up bangin a umte in zong a ngahtheih nadingun upna bulphuhin thuciamna kipia hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Abraham pen kha thu lamah eite khempeuh’ pupi ahi hi.
[5] Pasian in eite tungah a hong piak a Kha Siangtho tawh eite sungah ama itna hong guang ahih manin hih lametna in eite hong lungkiasak ngei lo hi.

[1] Ahi zongin tu-in ahihleh Khrih Jesuh tawh kipawlin a nungta mite pen mawhna thukhenna tawh kipelh hi. [2] Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih Jesuh tawh a hong kipawlsak Kha Siangtho in mawhna le sihna a piangsak thukham panin kei hong suaktasak khinta hi.

[4] Eite’ deihna bangin nungta loin Pasian’ Kha Siangtho’ deihna bangin a nungta eite sungah Thukham’ deihna teng a kicin theih nadingin Pasian in a Tapa a hong sawl ahi hi. [5] Amau pumpi deihna bangin a nungtate, amau pumpi deihna in a lungsim uh a uk hi; Kha Siangtho deihna bangin a nungtate, Kha Siangtho in amau lungsim a uk hi. [6] I ngaihsutna, i pumpi deihna uksak lehang sihna tawh kizom hi; i ngaihsutna, Kha Siangtho uksak lehang nuntakna le nopsakna tawh a kizom hi.
[9] Note sungah Pasian’ Kha Siangtho hong om nakleh nomau pumpi deihna bangin gamta loin Kha Siangtho deihna bangin na gamta ding uh hi. Khrih lungsim a nei lote Khrih tawh kipawl lo hi.

[13] Na pumpi uh deihna zui-in na gamtat uhleh na si ding uh a, ahi zongin Kha Siangtho huhna tawh na mawh gamtatnate uh na sihsak uhleh na nungta ding uh hi. [14] Pasian’ Kha Siangtho in a makaih mite, Pasian’ tate ahi uh hi. [15] Note tungah Pasian in a hong piak a Kha Siangtho in note na lau nadingun sila-in a hong bawl hi lo a, Kha Siangtho in Pasian’ tate a hong suaksak ahi zaw hi. Tua Kha Siangtho mah in Pasian pen, “Pa aw, Pa aw,” hong ci theisak hi. [16] Eite, Pasian’ tate ihihna thu eima lungsim bek in a gen hi loin Pasian’ Kha Siangtho in zong hong genpih hi.

[26] Tua ahih manin eite bangzahin ginalo hitalehang eite a hong huh dingin Kha Siangtho a hong pai hi. Eite in a kilawm bangin thunget ding nangawn i thei kei a, ahi zongin Kha Siangtho mah in tauna tawh eite a dingin a hong thumsak hi. [27] Kha Siangtho in Pasian’ deihna tawh kizui-in Pasian’ mite a dingin hong thumsak ahih manin mihingte’ lungsimtawng thu a thei Pasian in Kha Siangtho’ ngaihsutna a thei hi.
[17] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ Ukna pen nekledawn tawh a kisai thu hi lo a, Kha Siangtho hangin i ngah Pasian’ deih bangin gamtatna, kilemna, lungdamna, cihte hizaw hi.
[13] Kha Siangtho’ huhna tawh note’ lametna a khan semsem theih nadingin, lametna a hong piathei Pasian in, amah na upna uh hangin lungdamna le nopsakna tawh note hong kidimsak tahen.

[11] Mihing khat’ ngaihsutna pen ama lungsim bek mah in a theih mah bangin Pasian’ Kha Siangtho bek mah in Pasian’ thu a cingin a thei hi. [12] Eite’ ngah lungsim pen leitung mite’ lungsim hi lo a, Pasian in eite tungah a hong piak na khempeuh i theih nadingin Pasian’ hong piak Kha Siangtho lungsim ahi hi. [13] Tua ahih manin hih bangin thu ka hong gen uh ciangin zong, mihingte’ hong hilh pilna kamte a zang hi loin, Kha Siangtho a nei mite tungah kha tawh kisai thu ka gen uh ciangin Kha Siangtho in a hong hilh kammalte zangin a gen ka hi uh hi. [14] Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho a nei lo mite in Pasian’ Kha Siangtho in a hong piak nate sang thei lo uh hi. Kha Siangtho a nei mite bek in theithei uh ahih manin amaute in tel thei lo uh a, amau a dingin a haihuai thu khat ahi lel hi. [15] Kha Siangtho a nei mite in na khempeuh theithei uh a, ahi zongin leitung mite in bangmah thei lo uh ahih manin a lungmang uh hi.
[16] Note pen Pasian’ biakinn na hihna uh le note sungah Pasian’ Kha Siangtho a teng ahih lamtak na theihsa uh ahi hi.

[11] Note pawlkhat, tua bangin na gamta uh hi. Ahi zongin note pen i Topa Jesuh Khrih le i Pasian’ Kha Siangtho hangin mawhna panin a hong kisiangsak khinsa, Pasian’ tungah a kipiasa, Pasian tawh a kipawlsa mite na hi uh hi.
[19] Na pumpi uh, Pasian in a hong piak, note’ sungah a teng Kha Siangtho’ biakinn ahih lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam? Note’ pumpi, nomau’ neihsa hi lo a, Pasian a’ ahi hi.

[1] Sanggamte aw, Kha Siangtho’ hong piak siamna a tuamtuamte tawh kisai thu na theih loh khak ding uh ka deih kei hi. [2] Lawki na hih lai-un a pau thei lo milimte’ thu-in na gamta uh a, na lungsim uh tua milimte in hong zo mahmah hi. [3] Tua ahih manin Kha Siangtho in lam a lah mite in, “Jesuh in samsiatna ngah ta hen,” a cih lohna, le Kha Siangtho in lamlak kei leh kuamah in, “Jesuh pen Topa hi,” a cih theih loh nading thu na theih ding uh ahi hi. [4] Tu-in siamna a nam tuamtuam om a, ahi zongin a hong pia Kha Siangtho a kibang ahi hi. [5] Nasepna a nam tuamtuam om a, ahi zongin a na i sepsak Topa a kibang ahi hi. [6] Nasep nading siamna a nam tuamtuam om a, ahi zongin septheih nading siamna a hong pia Pasian a kibang ahi hi. [7] Mi khempeuh a dingin phattuamna a omtheih nadingin Kha Siangtho’ hong ompihna a nam tuamtuamin hong kilang hi. [8] Kha Siangtho in mi khat tungah thuthuk pilna hong guan a, tua Kha Siangtho mah in adang khat tungah thugen siamna hong guan hi. [9] Adang khat tungah upna hong guan a, adang khat tungah cina damsak theihna hong guan hi. [10] Adang khat tungah nalamdang bawl theihna, adang khat tungah Pasian’ thu hilh ding siamna, adang khat tungah Kha Siangtho piak siamna ahi leh ahi lo khentheih nading siamna, adang khat tungah pau lamdang pau theihna, adang khat tungah tua pau lamdang tuamtuam paunate a khiatna gentheihna hong pia hi. [11] Hih siamna a tuamtuamte a hong pia pen Kha Siangtho a kibang khat bek mah hi a, mi a tuamtuamte tungah ama hoihsak bangin a hong piak ahi hi. [12] Pumpi pen khat bek hinapi-in na a tuamtuam a nei hi. Pumpi in na a tuamtuam tampi a neih hangin pumpi khat bek mah ahih veve mah bangin Khrih zong pumpi na a tuamtuam a nei pumpi khat ahi hi. [13] Jew mi ihi a, Gentail mi ihi zongin, sila ihi a, sila ahi lo ihi zongin, eite minam tuamtuam ihih hangin Kha Siangtho khat bek mah in Jesuh’ pumpi a suak dingin ama sungah hong phum a, eite khempeuh tungah a hong kipia pen tua a kibang Kha Siangtho khat bek mah ahi hi. [14] Pumpi in na khat bek nei loin nam tampi tak a nei hi.

[3] Hih lai pen Khrih mahmah in gelhin kote a hong puasak ahihna thu kitel mahmah hi. Laidal le suangpek tungah laitui le laikung tawh a kigelh hi lo a, mihing lungtang tungah a nungta Pasian Kha Siangtho tawh a kigelh ahi hi.

[6] Thuciamna thak nasem thei dingin kote tungah siamna a hong pia hi. Tua hong piakna pen lai-a kigelh thukham tawh hi loin Kha Siangtho tawh ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh lai-a kigelh thukham in sihna piangsak a, ahi zongin Kha Siangtho in nuntakna hong pia hi.

[17] Hih lai munah Topa a cih pen Kha Siangtho hi a, Topa’ Kha Siangtho a omna mun peuhpeuhah suahtakna om hi. [18] Tua ahih manin eite khempeuh i maitang hong kiliah nawn loin Topa’ minthanna vangtaang i kilangsak hi. Topa kiang panin a hong pai Kha Siangtho ahi tua minthanna vang in amah tawh a kibang dingin eite hong bawlpha a, minthanna khat panin minthanna sangzaw-ah hong omsak hi.
[5] Hih kikheel nading a hong vaihawmsak pa pen Pasian hi a, kote a hong piak dingte khempeuh hong pia taktak ding cih a lahna-in kote tungah ama Kha Siangtho a hong pia hi.

[1] Galati mihaite aw, singlamteh tungah Jesuh Khrih a sihna thu teltakin na theihsa uh ahih manin kua’ khemsa-in hici thei mawk na hi uh hiam? [2] Thukham na zuihna hangun Pasian’ Kha Siangtho ngah na hi uh hiam, ahih kei leh lungdamna thu za-in na upna hang uh hizaw ahi hiam? [3] Pasian’ Kha Siangtho tawh na patkhit uh ciangin nomau’ thatanghat thu tawh khup a sawm ding zahin hici hai lawmlawm na hi uh hiam?
[6] Note pen ama tate na hihna uh a hong lah nadingin Pasian in ama Tapa’ Kha Siangtho, eite sungah hong tumsak a, tua Kha Siangtho in Pasian pen, “Pa aw, pa aw,” hong cisak hi.

[16] Note kiangah ka hong gen thu in: Kha Siangtho’ hong sawlna bangin gamta unla, na pumpi uh utna bangin gamta kei un. [17] Bang hang hiam cih leh ei’ pumpi ut bangin gamta lehang Kha Siangtho’ deihna tawh na kituak lo a, Kha Siangtho’ deihna bangin gamta lehang ei’ pumpi deihna tawh na kituak lo zel ahih manin hih nih tegel a kilangpang niloh na hi a, note’ ut bangin a gamta thei lo na hi uh hi. [18] Kha Siangtho’ deihna bangin na gamtat uhleh Thukham khutnuai-ah na om nawn kei uh hi.

[22] Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho’ sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna, [23] dikna le pumpi ki-ukzawhna hi a, hih bangin a gamta mite, Thukham in bangmah cih thei lo hi. [24] Tua hi a, Jesuh Khrih a zui mite in a leitung lungsim pianzia uh le a leitung lungsim deihna khempeuh uh a phiat khitsa ahi hi. [25] Kha Siangtho in eite hong nungtasak khinta ahih manin ama hong sawlna bangin eite a nungta ding ihi hi. [26] Kuamah kiphasak loin, khatlekhat kiphin loin, kuamah i kihaza kei ding hi.

[1] Sanggamte aw, mi khatpeuh a gamta khial a om ciangin, Kha Siangtho’ deihna bangin a nungta note in tua a khial pa a manin a gamtatkik theih nadingin thunem zangin na huh un. Note in zong amah bangin ze-etna na tuahkhak loh nadingun na kikem un.

[13] Note in zong hotkhiatna a hong ngahsakthei Lungdamna Thu a man za-in Khrih na up uh ciangin, Pasian in a hong ciamsa bangin ama mi na hihna uh a kilat nadingin note tungah Kha Siangtho hong piakna tawh a hong ciamteh hi. [14] Tua Kha Siangtho pen, Pasian in piak dingin a hong ciamsa thu eite khempeuh in i ngah taktak ding a kician ahihna thu a hong lahna hi a, ama mi ahi taktak eite khempeuh pen a suakta takpi mite ihihna a kilat nading ahi hi. Tua ahih manin a kuamah peuh in Pasian phat ciat ni.
[16] note’ lungsim a thahat nadingin Pasian in a kicing ama vangliatna sung panin a Kha Siangtho tawh note hong thakhauh sakin,

[3] Kha Siangtho kimakai sakin, khatlekhat kilemin pawlkhat na hihna uh na kipsak tawntung un. [4] A kibang lametna khat bek a ngahkhawm dingin Pasian in note hong sap mah bangin eite khempeuh pumkhat bek hi-in Kha Siangtho zong khat bek mah a neikhawm ihi hi.

[30] Ni khat ni ciangin Pasian in note hong tatkhiat taktak nading thu a ciantakin hong lahna le Pasian’ neihsa na hihna uh hong ciamtehna-in Kha Siangtho hong pia ahih manin, tua Pasian’ Kha Siangtho na dahsak kei un.
[18] Zu in mi siasak thei ahih manin zu ne kei unla, Kha Siangtho tawh a kidimin omzaw un.
[12] Eite’ do pen leitung mite hi lo a, vantung huihlakah a om ukna, aana a neite, hih leitung khuamial a uk a tuamtuamte ahi hi.
[17] Siklukhu khuk bangin hotkhiatna nei unla, Kha Siangtho in a hong piak Pasian’ thu pen namsau zat bangin na zang un.
[6] Kote le Topa’ gamtat bangin note na gamta uh a, note in gimna nakpitakin thuaklawh napi-in Kha Siangtho’ huhna tawh lungdam takin thu umin na om uh hi.
[1] Nidang ciangin a upna panun mi pawlkhat pialin, zuauthu gente le dawi thu a kigente a zuih nading uh Kha Siangtho in teltakin a gen hi.

[4] Ahi zongin eite hong Honpa ahi Pasian’ itna le a migitna thu hong kilat ciangin, [5] amah in eite hong honkhia hi. Eite in na hoih i sepzawhna hangin hong honkhia hi loin eite tungah suahtakna le nuntakna thak a hong pia Kha Siangtho in hong sawpsiangna hangin a hong hehpihna tawh a hong honkhia ahi hi. [6] Pasian in eite hong Hon Jesuh Khrih hangin eite tungah a kicing takin Kha Siangtho hong pia ahih manin,

[14] tawntung Kha Siangtho hangin Pasian tungah a cingtaak biakpiak nadingin Khrih in a piak ama sisan in na tam semkhia zozaw ding a, a nungta Pasian’ na i septheih nadingin bangmahin a kimang lo nasepna panin ama sisan in i lungsim hong siangsak ding hi.

[29] Tua bang ahihleh Pasian’ Tapa a simmawh, mawhna a hong maisak Pasian’ thuciamna sisan a thudon lo, Pasian’ hehpihna a hong puak Kha Siangtho a hehsakte’ thuak ding bangzah takin lianzaw kan ding ahi hiam?

[11] Khrih in gimna thuakin, tua khit ciangin minthanna a ngah nading thu Kha Siangtho in a gen ciangin, amaute sungah a om tua Khrih’ Kha Siangtho in kua a cihna hi a, bang hun ciang hi ding hiam, ci-in a kankan uh pen tuhun thu a gen ahi hi.
[11] Ka itte aw, hih leitungah gamdang mi, a peempak bangin kingaihsun unla, na kha nuntakna uh tawh a kilehngat pumpi’ deihnate na kikham un.
[14] Khrih nungzui hihna hangin mite’ kosiatna na thuak uhleh note sungah a minthang Kha Siangtho ahi Pasian’ Kha Siangtho hong om ahihna lim ahih manin a hampha mahmah na hi uh hi.
[21] Bang hang hiam cih leh mihingte in a deih manin mailam thugenkholh theihna a kingah hi lo a, Kha Siangtho’ sawlna tawh Pasian’ kiang panin a hong pai thute a kigen ahi zaw hi.

[19] Khrih’ gal ahi hih mite pen ei’ pawl hi ngei napi-in hong taisan uh hi. Ei’ pawl taktak hileh eite tawh omkhawm paisuak ding uh ahih manin, tu-in amaute paikhia uh ahih ciangin ei’ pawl taktak ahihlohna uh hong kilang hi. [20] Ahi zongin Khrih in note tungah Kha Siangtho hong piakhin ahih manin note khempeuh in a man na thei uh hi.

[27] Khrih in note tungah ama Kha Siangtho hong piakhin a, tua Kha Siangtho na neih laiteng uh kuamah in note hong hilh ding kisam nawn lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Kha Siangtho in note tungah thu khempeuh hong hilh a, tua a hong hilh thute a man vive hi a, zuauthu khat zong om lo hi. Tua ahih manin Kha Siangtho’ hilhnate zui unla, Khrih sungah kiptakin om un.

[1] Ka it lawmte aw, kha ka nei a ci mi khempeuh’ thugen um kei unla, tua thute Pasian kiang pan mah ahi hiam, ci-in kantel un. Bang hang hiam cih leh leitungah kamsang a kineihkhem tampi hong om khinta hi.
[19] Hih mite in pawl kikhenna piangsakin, amau pumpi deihna bangin gamta uh a, Kha Siangtho zong nei lo uh hi.

[5] Mi khatpeuh in hong thah le ama tungah sihna dan ka pia ding hi. A hong that ganhing peuhmah ka that ding a, a mipihte a that mi peuhmah gim ka pia ding hi. [6] Mi a that peuhmahte pen, midangte in amah that ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in ama lim bangin mi bawl hi.

[20] Noah pen lo kho masa pa hi a, amah in leenggui lo khat a bawl hi. [21] Amah in leenggahzu ne-in kham a, a puanbuk sungah bangmah silh loin a lum hi. [22] Kanaan’ pa Ham in a pa guaktangin a omna mu a, a pualama om a sanggam nihte kiangah a gen hi. [23] Tua ciangin Shem le Jafeth in puan khat la-in amau tegel’ liangko tuakah baang uh a, a nung leh lamun pai-in a pa uh’ guaktang omna a khuh uh hi. Amaute in maingat lo uh ahih manin a pa uh guaktang omna mu lo uh hi.

[11] Tua ciangin Faro’ thupiaksa bangin Josef in leitang a hoihpen, Rameses leitang, Egypt gam sungah neihsa pia-in a pa le a sanggamte a tengsak hi. [12] Josef in a pa, a sanggamte, le a pa’ innkuante khempeuh a ne ding zah tawh kizui-in an a pia hi.
[12] “ TOPA na Pasian un note hong piak leitang tungah na khan uh a sau theih nadingin na nu le na pa uh zahtak un. [13] “Mi na that kei ding uh hi.
[17] “Ama pa hitaleh ama nu hitaleh a samsia mi peuhmah kithat ding hi.

[22] “Mite kitawngin numei naupaii khat liamsak a, tatolhin; ahi zongin siatna in a zuihbeh kei nakleh, tua nu’ pasal in ama tunga a cihzah tawh kituakin tua numei a liamsak mi kigam ding a, thukhente’ khenna bangin amah liau ding hi. [23] Siatna khatpeuh in a zuihbeh leh, tua ciangin nuntakna tang ding nuntakna, [24] mit tang ding mit, ha tang ding ha, khut tang ding khut, khe tang ding khe, [25] meikang tang ding meikang, liamna tang ding liamna, siatna tang ding siatna pia ding hi.

[2] Siatna a bawl dingin mihon na zui kei ding uh hi. Thutang a hei khia dingin mihonpi nung zui-in thu neihna-ah teci na pang kei ding uh hi. [3] Ama thu neihna-ah mizawng pa na langneih kei ding uh hi.
[3] Note a kuamah peuh in na nu le na pa uh zahtakin, note in ka Sabbath-te na tang ding uh hi; kei pen TOPA na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
[15] “Note in thukhenna-ah thu a tang loin na khen kei ding uh hi. Mizawngte langgen loin, a liante’ thu zui loin, thumanna tawh na vengte uh thu na khen ding uh hi.
[9] “Bang hang hiam cih leh a nu ahih kei leh a pa a samsia mi peuhmah kithat ding hi. Amah in a nu ahih kei leh a pa samsia khin a, ama sihna amahmah ngawh ding ahi hi.

[16] “Tua hun laitakin na thukhente uh ka thuhilh a, ‘Na sanggamte uh thu neihte za unla, mi khat le a sanggampa ahi a, amah tawh a om khualmipa tawh ahi zongin thu a mantakin khen un. [17] Thukhenna-ah angvan na nei kei ding uh hi. A neu le a liante a kibangin a thu na ngai ding uh a, maitang zahtak tuam na nei kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh thukhenna pen Pasian-a’ ahi hi. Note a dingin a haksa lua thute kei kiangah nong paipih ding uh a, keimah in tua thu ka za ding hi,’ ka ci hi.
[16] “‘ TOPA note’ Pasian in hong piak leitang tungah na khan uh sau-in na nopsak theih nadingun TOPA note’ Pasian in hong thupiak bangin na nu na pa uh zahtak un. [17] “‘Mi na that kei ding uh hi.
[4] TOPA na Pasian uh nung zui-in, amah na zahtak ding uh a, a thupiaknate zui-in a thu na ngai ding uh a, amah bia-in amah na beel ding uh hi.

[18] “Na minam uh tawh kizui-in TOPA na Pasian un note hong piakna khuate-ah thukhente le uliante na koih ding uh a, amaute in a manin mite tungah thu khen ding uh hi. [19] Thutang na heikhia kei ding uh a, angvan tuam na nei kei ding uh hi. Sumgolh in mipilte’ mit tawsakin thumante’ thu heikhia ahih manin sumgolh na la kei ding uh hi.
[16] “‘A nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a zahtak lo mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
