[14] “Tua ahih ciangin tu-in TOPA zahtak unla, lungsim tak le thumanna tawh ama na sem un. Na pu na pate un Gun gal le Egypt gam sungah a biak uh pasian-te koihkhia unla, TOPA’ na sem un.

[3] Tua lai mun panin Moab gam Mizpah-ah David a pai hi. Amah in Moab kumpipa kiangah, “Pasian in kei a dingin hong sepsak ding ka theih matengin ka nu le ka pa na kiangah hong omsak in, ci-in kong thum hi,” a ci hi.

[14] David in ama kiangah, “ TOPA’ sathau nilh pa a that dingin na khut na liik khiat ding na lau loh a bangci thu ahi hiam?” a ci hi. [15] Tua ciangin David in tangvalte khat samin, “Pai in; amah thatlum in,” a ci hi. Amah in tua thupuak pa sat a, amah a si hi.

[19] Tua ahih ciangin Adonijah tangin ama tungah thu a gen dingin Kumpi Solomon kiangah Bathsheba va pai hi. Tua ciangin tua nu a dawn dingin kumpipa dingin tua nu mai-ah a kun hi. Tua ciangin ama tokhom tungah tu-in kumpipa’ nu a dingin tutna khat lasak hi. Tua nu ama taklamah a tu hi.

[31] Kumpipa in amah dawngkikin, “Ama cihsa bangin hih in; amah satlum inla phum in. Joab in thu om lopi-in mi a thahna hangin mawhna pen keima tung le ka suanlekhakte’ tung panin tua bangin na siangsak ding hi. [32] TOPA in ama mawhna ama lu tung mahah tungsakkik ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka pa David’ theih loh kalin amah in Israel galkapte a uk Ner’ tapa Abner le Judah galkapte a uk Jether’ tapa Amasa, amah sangin thuman zaw-in a hoihzaw ahi mihing nih do-in namsau tawh a that hi. [33] Tua ahih ciangin mi thahna hangin gimna pen Joab’ lu tung le ama suanlekhakte’ lu tungah a tawntungin hong tungkik ding hi. Ahih hangin David’ tung, ama suanlekhakte’ tung, ama innkuan tung, le ama kumpi tokhom tungah TOPA’ kiang panin a tawntung nopna om ding hi,” a ci hi.

[20] Tua ciangin amah in a bawngtalte nusia-in Elijah’ nungah tai a, “Ka nu le ka pa kam vaikhakin hong namsak phot in; tua ciangin nang kong zui ding hi,” a ci hi. Amah in Elisha kiangah, “Paikik in; nang hong khaktan ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

[13] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka pumpi na khempeuh na hong piangsak a, ka nu’ gil sungah keimah nong khuituah hi. [14] Kihtak dingin a kilawm na hih manin nang ka hong phat hi. Na nasepnate lamdang mahmah! Nangmah in kei nong lim theih mahmah hi. [15] A thukna sung mun simthamah kei hong kikhuituahin hong kibawl laitakin, ka guh ka taang, na mai-ah kiliah lo hi. [16] A kipiangsak nai lo keima pumpi nate na mit in a mu hi. Ka pumpi nate khat beek a om ma, ka ni zah ding a kiciangtan laitakin, tuate khempeuh na laibu sungah kigelh khin hi.
[8] Ka ta aw, na pa’ hong thuhilhna hoihtakin zui inla, na nu’ hong thugente ngai in.
[31] Mizawngte bawlsiatna pen a piangsak Pasian simmawhna hi a, mizawngte tungah citna pen Pasian zahtakna ahi hi.
[5] A zawngte a simmawh pa in amah a Piangsak pa a simmawh hi a, midangte’ tuahsiatna-ah a lungdam mipa in gim thuak hamtang ding hi.

[23] Mipil dangte in zong hih bangin thu gen uh hi: Mi lang muhin thukhenna hoih lo hi. [24] Mimawh kimlai a diksak thukhen pa leitung a mi khempeuh in mudahin phuisam ding hi. [25] A mawh mi gim a pia thukhen pa ahihleh thupha kipia-in daupai ding hi.
[21] Mi langbawlna hoih lo a, ahi zongin letsong neucik khat hangin thukhente gamta khial thei zel hi.
[17] A pa a simmawh mipa, a nu’ thu a mang nuam lo mipa, va-ak in a mittang khelkhiat sakin musanete in a sa ne ding uh hi.
[10] A pa kiangah, “Nangmah in kua piangsak na hi hiam?” a ci pa hitaleh, a nu kiangah, “Nang in nausuak dingin kua gimpih na hi hiam?” a ci pa in gimna ngah ta hen!

[6] Vanglian TOPA in siampite tungah hih bangin hong ci hi: “Tapa in a pa zahtak a, nasempa in a topa kihta hi. Kei pen na pa uh hinapi, bang hangin hong zahtak lo a, na topa uh hinapi, bang hangin hong kihta lo na hi uh hiam? No siampite in kei hong simmawh napi-in, ‘Bang hong ci simmawh ka hi uh hiam?’ na cilai uh hi.

[4] Pasian in, ‘Na nu le na pa na zahtak in,’ ci a, tua banah, ‘A nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a gensiate in thahna thuak ding hi,’ ci lai hi. [5] Ahi zongin note in, ‘Mi khatpeuh in a nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a huh theih nading na khat peuhpeuh a neih leh, tua na pen Pasian a’ ding hi, ci peuh leh, a nu le a pa piak kul nawn lo hi,’ ci-in thu na hilh uh hi. [6] Tua ahih manin na pupa ngeina uh na zuihna uh hangin Pasian’ thu na palsat uh hi.
[19] na nu na pa zahtak in; nang na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in, cihnate ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[10] Moses in, ‘Na nu le na pa zahtak un. A nu a pa a samsiate kithat hen,’ ci hi. [11] Ahi zongin note in, ‘Mi khatpeuh in a nu a pa a piaktheih ding na khat peuhpeuh a neih hangin, hih penkorban(Pasian a’ ding) hi, ci peuh leh, [12] a nu le a pa a huh nading panin suakta thei hi,’ ci-in thu na hilh uh hi. [13] Hih bang danin mite thu na hilhna uh tawh Pasian’ thu na pampaih uh hi. Hih bangzia-in na gamtatna uh adang tampi zong omlai hi,” a ci hi.
[51] Tua ahih ciangin a nu le a pa zui-in Nazareth khua-ah ciahkik a, amaute’ thu mangin tua lai-ah hoihtakin a om hi. A nu in hih thu khempeuh a lungsim sungah ngaihsunsun hi.
[20] Numei tungah mawh kei in; mi that kei in; mi’ neihsa gu kei in; zuauthu gen kei in; na nu na pa zahtak in, cihna thukhamte thei lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

[26] Jesuh in ama nu le a it a nungzui pa a dingkhawm a muh ciangin a nu kiangah, “Nu aw, tua lai-ah na tapa om hi,” a ci hi. [27] Tua ciangin a nungzui pa kiangah, “Na nu tua lai-ah om hi,” a ci leuleu hi. Tua ahih manin tua hun a kipanin nungzui pa in ama inn-ah Jesuh’ nu Mary a kem hi.

[24] A zing ciangin Sisaria khua a tung uh hi. Kornelias in zong amaute’ tun ding lamen ahih manin, a beh a phungte le a lawm itteng a inn-ah a na samkhol hi. [25] Peter hong tun ciangin Kornelias in na dawn a, a khe kiangah bokin a bia hi. [26] Ahi zongin Peter in amah kaito a, “Ding in; kei zong mihing mah ka hi lel hi,” a ci hi. [27] Tua bangin a kiho kawmin Peter zong inn sungah tum a, mi tampi tak a na om a muh ciangin [28] amaute kiangah, “Note mahmah in zong limtakin na theih ciat uh mah bangin Jew mite pen minam dangte kiangah hawhin a kikholh ding a ngeina hi lo hi. Ahi zongin mi khat peuhpeuh a nin hi, ci-in ka ngaihsut loh nadingin Pasian in kei tungah a thu hong lakkhin zo hi.
[10] Unau ki-itna lungsim nei unla, khatlekhat kizahtak bawl ding lamsang kidem un.
[26] Kuamah kiphasak loin, khatlekhat kiphin loin, kuamah i kihaza kei ding hi.
[32] khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim nem tawh na kihozaw unla, Khrih’ hangin Pasian in note’ mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.

[21] Khrih na zahtakna uh hangin na thu uh na kimang tuak un. [22] Zite aw, Topa’ thu na man’ uh mah bangin na pasalte uh thu na mang un. [23] Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih pen ama pumpi ahi pawlpi a honkhia pa hi-in, pawlpi tungah ukna thu a neih mah bangin pasal in a zi tungah ukna thu a nei ahi hi. [24] Pawlpi pen Khrih’ khutnuai ahih mah bangin zite zong thu khempeuhah a pasalte uh khutnuai hi ding uh hi. [25] Pasalte aw, Khrih in pawlpi itin a pumpi a piak mah bangin na zite uh na it un.

[33] Pasalte in amau pumpi zahin a zite uh itin, zite in zong amau pumpi zah mahin a pasalte uh a it ding uh ahih mah bangin, Lai Siangtho in hih bangin a gen ciangin a thukzaw khat, Khrih le pawlpi a ki-itna a gennopna ahi hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.

[1] Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu na man ding uh Khristian ngeina hi a, ahi ding mah ahi hi. [2] Thupiakna a lian khat in, “Na nu le na pa zahtak in,” cihna hi a, khapna thu tawh kizom pahin, “Zahtak lecin nang a dingin thu hong hoihin, leitungah na khan a sau ding hi,” na ci pah hi. [3] Thupiakna a lian khat in, “Na nu le na pa zahtak in,” cihna hi a, khapna thu tawh kizom pahin, “Zahtak lecin nang a dingin thu hong hoihin, leitungah na khan a sau ding hi,” na ci pah hi.

[3] Huaihamna lungsim le kisialh nopna lungsim tawh bangmah gamta kei un. Kiniamkhiat ciat unla, midangte thupi ngaihsutzaw un. [4] Note’ phattuam nading bek ngaihsun kei unla, midangte’ phattuam nading ngaihsutsak zaw un.

[9] Ngeina lui le gamtatna lui khempeuh a beisakkhin na hihna uh kithei-in khatlekhat tungah zuauthu kigen nawn kei unla, [10] ngeina thak tawh kituakin gamta un. Eite a hong piangsak Pasian a kicing takin i theih semsem nadingin amah a sun dingin a hong thakbawl tawntung ahi hi. [11] Tua ahih manin Gentail mi le Jew mi, vun-at mi le vun-at loh mi, khuapi mi le khuaneu mi, sila le sila ahi lo, cih bangin a kilamdanna om lo a, Khrih pen mi khempeuh a’ ding hi thei a, thu khempeuh a’ ding hi thei a, thu khempeuhah amah bek ahi hi.

[18] Zite aw, Khristiante gamtat dingin a kilawm ahih mah bangin na pasalte uh thu na mang un. [19] Pasalte aw, na zite uh it unla, amaute tungah ngongtat kei un. [20] Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu man’ tawntung ding pen na Khristian nasep uh ahi hi. Tua bang thumanna in Pasian lungdamsak hi.
[26] Thu uppih mi khempeuh khatlekhat a siangtho ki-itna lungsim tawh kinamin na kihopih un.

[1] Nitawp ni hun pen a lauhuai hun ahih ding lamtak phawk in. [2] Tuahun ciangin mite in amau angsung ding bek ngaihsunin, huaihamin, kisialin, kihisakin, mi zahko-in, nu le pate’ thu mang loin, lungdam theihna mel nei loin, biakna lungsim nei loin,
[9] Tua banah, i leitung pate in gim hong pia a, zong i zahtak lai hi. Tua ahihleh kha thu tawh kisai-ah i Pa’ thu mang phazaw-in i nuntak ding kisam hi.

[1] Sanggamte aw, minthanna vang tawh a kidim i Topa Jesuh Khrih umin na om laitakun a pualama kilang pianziate siksanin mi na deidan kei un. [2] Gentehna-in, kham zungbuh bulhin puan manpha a silh mihau khat le puan siasa a silh mizawng khat, note’ kikhopna-ah hong paikhawm leh, [3] limtakin a kizem mipa zahtakbawl zaw-in, “Hih lai-ah tutna nuamah hong tu in,” ci le-uhcin a, ahi zongin mizawng pa kiangah, “Tua lai-ah na ding phot in,” cihna ahi a, “Sual tung hih ka khe kiang khawngah hong tu in,” cihna ahi zongin kam na zat uhleh, [4] mi a deidan na hi uh a, ngaihsutna hoih lo nei-in a gamta na hi uh hi. [5] Sanggamte aw, hoihtakin na ngai un. Pasian a it mite tungah piak dingin a ciam vantung gam a ngah ding le upna thu-ah mihau a suak dingin Pasian in leitung mizawngte a teel hinapi-in, [6] note in mizawngte na simmawhbawl uh hi. Note hong bawlsia-in thukhen zum hong tun pahpahte, mihaute hizaw uh hi. [7] Pasian in note a hong phuah min hoih a gensiate, mihaute mah ahi uh hi. [8] Lai Siangtho sungah, “Nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in,” ci-in a genna Topa’ Thukham zui le-uhcin a hoih hi pah hi. [9] Ahi zongin mi na deidan uhleh note a khial na hi uh a, Thukham a palsat na hi veve uh hi.

[9] I leii tawh eite’ pa ahi Topa i phat thei a, Pasian tawh a kisunin a kibawl i mipihte zong tua i leii mah tawh i samsia thei hi. [10] Kam khat sung panin thupha le thusia pusuak khawm hi. Sanggamte aw, hih bang ahi ding hi het lo hi.
[17] Mi khempeuh zahtak bawlin thu uppih mite na it unla, Pasian zahtak bawlin kumpipa zong na zahtak un.

[13] A zing ciangin mite’ thu a khen dingin Moses tu a, zingsang a kipan nitak dongin Moses’ kiimah mite a ding uh hi. [14] Mite a dingin ama hihte khempeuh Moses’ sungpa in a muh ciangin amah in, “Mite a’ dinga nang’ sep hih pen a bangci ahi hiam? Bang hangin nang bek tu a, zingsang a kipan nitak dongin na kiimah mite khempeuh ding ahi uh hiam?” a ci hi. [15] Moses in a sungpa kiangah, “Pasian’ thu a kan dingin kei’ kiangah mite hong pai uh hi. [16] Amaute in thu a neih uh ciangin kei kiangah hong pai uh a, mi khat le a vengpa’ kikalah thu ka khen a, Pasian’ ngeina kipte le ama thukhennate amaute ka theisak hi,” a ci hi.

[6] “Ama thu neihna-ah mizawng pa a thutang kimlai na lelsak kei ding uh hi. [7] A man lopi a mi mawhsak ding panin kikem unla, a dikpa le thuman pa that kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh a gilo mi ka khah kei ding hi.
[15] “Note in thukhenna-ah thu a tang loin na khen kei ding uh hi. Mizawngte langgen loin, a liante’ thu zui loin, thumanna tawh na vengte uh thu na khen ding uh hi.

[16] “Tua hun laitakin na thukhente uh ka thuhilh a, ‘Na sanggamte uh thu neihte za unla, mi khat le a sanggampa ahi a, amah tawh a om khualmipa tawh ahi zongin thu a mantakin khen un. [17] Thukhenna-ah angvan na nei kei ding uh hi. A neu le a liante a kibangin a thu na ngai ding uh a, maitang zahtak tuam na nei kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh thukhenna pen Pasian-a’ ahi hi. Note a dingin a haksa lua thute kei kiangah nong paipih ding uh a, keimah in tua thu ka za ding hi,’ ka ci hi.

[18] “Na minam uh tawh kizui-in TOPA na Pasian un note hong piakna khuate-ah thukhente le uliante na koih ding uh a, amaute in a manin mite tungah thu khen ding uh hi. [19] Thutang na heikhia kei ding uh a, angvan tuam na nei kei ding uh hi. Sumgolh in mipilte’ mit tawsakin thumante’ thu heikhia ahih manin sumgolh na la kei ding uh hi. [20] Note nungta-in TOPA na Pasian un hong piak leitang na luah theih nadingun a thuman bekbekin na gamta ding uh hi.

[15] “Mi khat in a hihkhak mawhna lian ahi a, khialhna khat peuhpeuh a gamtatna-ah ahi zongin tua mipa’ langah teci khat guak kicing lo ding a, teci nih ahih kei leh teci thum bang thugenna tawh mawhsakna kikipsak bek ding hi. [16] Elna lungsim a nei teci khat in mi khat gamta khial hi, ci-in a mawhsak leh, [17] thuneite a langnih tuakin, tuahun laitak a siampite le thukhente’ mai, TOPA’ mai-ah pai ding uh hi. [18] Thukhente in limtakin kan ding uh a, teci pa pen zuau teci hi-in, a man lopi-in a sanggampa a mawhsak ahihleh,
[15] Samuel in a nuntak sung tawntung Israel-te thu khen hi.

[3] Hih lai-ah ka om hi; ka mawhna a om leh TOPA’ mai le a sathau nilh pa’ mai-ah ka mawhna hong pulak un. Kua’ bawngtal ka laksak hiam? Ahih kei leh kua’ la ka laksak hiam? Ahih kei leh kua khem ka hi hiam? Kua nengniam ka hi hiam? Ahih kei leh keima mit a tawsak dingin kua’ tung panin sumgolh la ngei ka hi hiam? Ka mawhna nong lah theih uhleh kong dinkik ding hi,” a ci hi. [4] Tua ciangin amaute in, “Nangmah in kote nong khem kei a, zong nong nengniam kei a, mi khat peuhpeuh tung panin zong bangmah na la kei hi,” a ci uh hi.

[7] Ahih hangin TOPA in Samuel kiangah, “A tungtham hitaleh a tun sanna hitaleh en kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah ka nolh hi. TOPA in mihingte’ muh bangin mu lo hi. Mihingte in a pualam a kilangte en a, ahih hangin TOPA in a lungsim en hi,” a ci hi.
[28] Tua ciangin Israel mi khempeuh in kumpipa’ piak thukhenna za uh hi. Thutang a sem dingin ama tungah Pasian in pilna pia hi, ci-in phawk uh ahih manin amaute in kumpipa lamdangsa-in a om uh hi.
[6] thukhente tungah, “Note in mi a’ ding hi loin TOPA a dingin a khen na hih manun na hih dingte uh limtakin ngaihsun un; thukhenna na piak laitakun note kiangah amah hong om hi.

[5] Tua ahih ciangin migilote in thukhenna thuak zo lo ding uh a, mimawhte pen midikte’ pawl sungah kihel thei lo ding uh hi; [6] bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in midikte lam lakin hu tawntung a, migilote ahihleh sia maimang ding uh hi.
[23] A ginalo thukhente in sumgolh sangsim uh a, a thukhenna uhah thuman om nawn lo hi.
[10] Mihaite a nop lua-in a nuntak ding kilawm lo a, silate in miliante a uk ding kilawm lo zaw lai hi.
[13] Tapa hai pen a pa’ lungkhamna hi a, zi phunphun pen a theu thei lo guahciin tawh kibang hi.
[19] Migilo pa ama thuak ding gimna mah thuaksak zaw in. Honkhia lecin na hotkhiatkik zelzel kul ding hi.
[29] Mi a thusim lote in ciangduai thuak uh a, mihaite in satna thuak uh hi.
[15] Thutangin na a kisep ciangin midik khempeuh lungdam a, ahi zongin migilote lungkham hi.
[23] Mipil dangte in zong hih bangin thu gen uh hi: Mi lang muhin thukhenna hoih lo hi.
[17] Eite tawh a kisai lo kitotna sunga kiphumna pen ui ommuang khat a bil-in i kaihsak tawh kibang hi.
[21] Mi langbawlna hoih lo a, ahi zongin letsong neucik khat hangin thukhente gamta khial thei zel hi.
[9] Amau a’ ding thu genin thu a tangin khen inla, a zawng a cimawh mite amau a dingin a kilawm hamphatna ngahsak in.

[3] Amah in TOPA’ nasep nuamsa ding hi. Amah in a tungtham bek muhna tawh thu khen lo ding a, kam lengsawn bek zakna tawh thu khentat lo ding hi. [4] Thumanna tawh mizawngte’ thu khenin, lungsim nem mite’ thu ahi bangin khensak ding hi. Ama kam panin a thupiakna tawh leitung mite gim kipia ding a, a muk panin a thugenna tawh migilote si ding uh hi. [5] Amah in thuman le thutak tawh ama mite uk ding hi.
[35] Mite in Pasian thusim loin, i hamphatnate hong paihkhiat sakin, [36] zum thukhenna-ah a manin thu a kikhen loh ciangin, amah in a hong thei veve hi.

[14] Note in midangte’ hong mawhna na maisak uhleh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note’ mawhna hong maisak ding hi. [15] Ahi zongin note in midangte’ hong mawhna na maisak kei uhleh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note’ mawhna hong maisak lo ding hi.

[1] “Pasian in note hong mawhsak loh nadingin midangte va mawhsaksak nawn kei un. [2] Bang hang hiam cih leh midangte’ thu na khenzia uh tawh kizui-in note tungah hong khen ding a, midangte tungah na zat uh ngeina mah note tungah hong zang ding hi. [3] Bang hangin na lawmte’ mit sunga ninthem tang muhsak thei napi-in nangma mit sunga singluang tang phawk thei lo na hi hiam? [4] Nangma mit sungah singluang a tang kimlai, bangci-in na lawmte kiangah, ‘Na mit sunga ninthem tang hong lakkhiatsak ning,’ ci thei ding na hi hiam?
[12] Tua ahih manin note tungah hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah na bawl un. Moses Thukhamte le kamsangte’ thuhilhnate pen hih mah a deihna ahi hi.
[6] “Ahi zongin kei a hong um hih naupangnote khatpeuh a khialsak mi pen a ngawngah an gawina suang lianpi khat kikhihin tuipi thuk sungah kikhiasuk le ama a dingin hoihzaw thampek ding hi.

[15] “Na sanggamte uh na tung uhah hong khialh leh pai-in no tegel bek theihin a khialhna va gen un. Na thu uh a hong man’ leh na sanggampa uh a ngahkik na hi uh hi. [16] Ahi zongin na thu uh a hong mannop kei leh, Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Mi nih ahih kei leh mi thum’ theihna bek tawh mawhsakna khat peuhpeuh man pan hi,’ a cih mah bangin midang khat ahi a, nih ahi zongin tonpih un. [17] Amah in tua mite’ thu a mannop kei leh pawlpite tungah a thu ko un. Pawlpite’ thu nangawn a mannop kei leh Gentail mite le siahdongte bangin na ngaihsun un.

[13] Tua laitakin mihon lak panin mi khat in Jesuh kiangah, “Sia aw, ka pa un a hong sihsan gamh pawlkhat tawh ka u in kei hong inntuan nadingin hong gensak in,” a ci hi. [14] Ahi zongin Jesuh in a mipa kiangah, “No unau’ gamh a hawm dingin kua in kei hong seh ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.

[37] “Midangte’ thu khen kei un. Tua hileh no tungah zong Pasian in thu hong khen lo ding hi. Midangte mawhsak kei un. Tua hileh Pasian in note zong hong mawhsak lo ding hi. Midangte’ mawhna maisak un. Tua hi leh Pasian in note’ mawhna zong hong maisak ding hi.

[15] Thu a thei lopi-in kei na hong mawhsak uh hi; ahi zongin ke’n kuamah ka mawhsak kei hi. [16] Mi mawhsakin thu a khen hita mah leng zong, a thukhen pen kei bek hi loin kei a hong sawl Pa Pasian le keimah in a khenkhawm ka hih manun ka thukhennate a man taktak ahi hi.

[1] Tua ahih ciangin midangte’ thu a khen note pen kuakua hita le-uh cin na suakta tuan kei ding uh hi. Midangte na mawhsakna uh thute mah note zong gamta veve na hih manun, no zong a mawh mah na hi uh hi. [2] Tua bang mawhna a gamtate, Pasian in gim a piak pen a man mah ahihna i thei ciat hi. [3] Midangte a mawhna hangin thu khenin, no zong tua amau mawhnate mah na bawl veve uh ciangin Pasian’ thukhenna tawh kipelh tuan dingin ki-um peuhmah na hi uh hiam?

[4] Mi khat’ nasemte tungah kua in thu khen thei ding na hi uh hiam? A gina le a ginalo a khen ding pa pen amau’ Topa ahi hi. A Topa un hoih hi, a cih leh a kipsak zawh nading vangliatna nei ahih manin a kip hi lel ding uh hi.
[10] Tua ahihleh bang hangin na Khristianpihte uh tungah thu khen a, bang hangin simmawhbawl thei na hi uh hiam? Thukhenna a thuak dingin Pasian’ mai-ah eite khempeuh a ding ciat ding ihi hi.
[12] Tua ahih manin a kuamah peuh in i gamtatna ciat Pasian’ mai-ah a va kigentel ciat ding ihi hi.

[5] Tua ahih manin a hun a tunma-in kuamah mawhsakin thu khen kei un. Topa hong pai ciangin a tawpna thukhenna hong om ding a, amah in thusimte hong pholakin, mihingte in a lungsim sung uhah a ipcip uh thute hong telkheh ding hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in amau’ ngah dingin a kilawm phatna, Pasian’ kiang panin a ngah ciat ding uh hi.

[1] Note lakah numei tawh paktatna nasia mahmahin, lawkite nangawn a gamtat lohte na gamtatna uh hong kigen a, mi khat in ama nukik nangawn a luppihna thu ka za hi. [2] Tua bang kimlai bangci kisaktheih ding na hi uh hiam? Note na dah mahmah ding uh hizaw a, tua bang mite pen note lak panin na hepkhiat ding uh ahi hi. [3] Note tawh ka pumpi-in ka hong omkhop loh hangin note tawh ka lungsim hong omkhawm a, ka pumpi-in note tawh a hong omkhawm zah mah bangin tua bang a gamta mite tungah i Topa Jesuh’ min tawh mawhsakna thu ka khen khinzo hi.

[12] Tua bang a pualam mite mawhsakin thu ka khen ding kei’ nasep hi lo hi. Pasian in amaute’ thu khen ngawn ding hi. Ahi zongin note in na pawlpih uh mite tungah thu na khen ding uh ahi hi. Lai Siangtho in, “Note lak panin migilo pa na lakhia un,” na ci hi. [13] Tua bang a pualam mite mawhsakin thu ka khen ding kei’ nasep hi lo hi. Pasian in amaute’ thu khen ngawn ding hi. Ahi zongin note in na pawlpih uh mite tungah thu na khen ding uh ahi hi. Lai Siangtho in, “Note lak panin migilo pa na lakhia un,” na ci hi.

[1] Note khatlekhat thu na kineih uh ciangin Pasian’ mi siangthote khensakzaw loin lawki thukhente’ mai na kitun ngam uh hi. [2] Pasian’ mite in leitung mite’ thu a khensakzaw ding ahihlam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Note pen leitung mite’ thu a khensak ding na hih uh ciangin tua bang thu neute khen thei lo lawmlawm na hi uh hiam? [3] Eite pen vantung mite’ thu nangawn a khensak ding ihih lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam? Tua ahih manin hih leitung a no’ thu neuneute leltak na khentheih zawk kan ding uh ahi hi. [4] Tua bang hinapi-in hih bang thu themthem hong pian ciangin pawlpi sungah bangmahin a kisim lo mite’ mai kitun ding na hi uh hiam? [5] Note a dingin zumhuai mahmah hi. Note khatlekhat na kithuneihnate uh a khenthei ding note lakah mipil khat beek om buang ding hi. [6] Tua hinapi, khatlekhat thu kineihin zum na kitun uh a, lawki thukhente na khensak tazen uh hi.
[7] Muhna hang tawh lungmuangin a om hi loin upna hang tawh lungmuang takin a om ka hi uh hi.

[1] Sanggamte aw, mi khatpeuh a gamta khial a om ciangin, Kha Siangtho’ deihna bangin a nungta note in tua a khial pa a manin a gamtatkik theih nadingin thunem zangin na huh un. Note in zong amah bangin ze-etna na tuahkhak loh nadingun na kikem un.

[19] Sanggamte aw, note in na theih ding uh ka deih thu in: Thu kigen khempeuh hoihtakin ngai pahpah un. Ahi zongin pau pahpah kei unla, heh pakpak kei un. [20] Mihingte’ hehna in Pasian’ sep ding thuhoihte khaktan hi. [21] Tua ahih manin ngeina hoih lote le gamtat siate khempeuh nusia unla, Pasian’ thu mangin note’ lungsim sungah a hong koih thu zui un. Tua thu in note hong honkhia thei hi. [22] Nomau kikhem tawmin thu zak bek tawh maisak kei unla, na zak bangun zui-in semzaw un.

[11] Sanggamte aw, khatlekhat kigensia kei un. A mipihte gensia-in thu a khente in Thukham gensia-in thu a khen ahi hi. Thukham na gensiat uhleh Thukham a zui hi loin thu a khen na hi uh hi. [12] Thukham a pia pa le thu a khen pa pen Pasian bek hi a, amah bek in hong honkhiazo a, hong susiazo hi. Tua ahih manin bang hangin na mipihte uh gensia-in thu a khenthei dingin kingaihsun zenzen na hi uh hiam?

[9] Vantung milian pa Mikhael nangawn tua bangin gamta ngam lo hi. Moses’ luanghawm kituhin Dawimangpa tawh a kitot laitakin Mikhael in Dawimangpa zahkona kammal zang ngam loin, “Topa in nang hong taii ta hen,” ci bek hi.
[1] “Note in TOPA na Pasian uh thu mangin, tuni-a kong gen ama thupiakna khempeuh limtakin na zuih uhleh TOPA na Pasian un leitung minam dangte khempeuh sangin a lianzaw-in note hong bawl ding hi.

[7] Amaute gualnuamin numeite khatlekhat in, “Saul in a tulin that, David in a tul sawmin that,” kici uh hi. [8] Saul heh mahmah a, hih thugenna in amah lungkim lo sak hi. Amah in, “Amaute in David tungah a tul sawmin pia-in, kei tungah a tulin hong pia bek uh hi. Kumpi min puak cih simloh bang dang nei nawn ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. [9] Tua ni a kipan Saul in David encik hi.

[15] Amah in matutzawhna lianpi a neihlam Saul in a muh ciangin amah lamdang sa-in om hi. [16] Ahih hangin Israel-te khempeuh le Judah-te khempeuh in David it uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute makaihin amah kuankhia-in hong ciah hi.
[13] Pasian tawh khauhtakin i hih ding hi. Amah pen i galte hong sikcipsak ding pa ahi hi.
[6] TOPA in kei hong ompih hi. Bangmah ka kihta kei ding hi. Mihingte in kei, bang hong cihzo ding ahi uh hiam?
[17] Sik in sik mah hiamsak thei a, mi in midang pilsak thei hi.
[8] Leitang tungah amau guak a teng ding dong zahin midangte a dingin mun khempeuh a bei matengin inn khatlekhat, lo khatlekhat gawmin a la thuah tawntung mite in gimna ngah tahen.

[12] “Nang Khuavak’ ta, Zingsol, Babylon kumpipa aw, vantung panin nang bangci kiat na hi hiam? Minamte a niam koihpa ahi nangmah leilak dongah hong bangci kiphukpai ahi hiam? [13] Nang in na lungsim sungah, ‘Vantungah ka kahto ding hi. A sangna mun, Pasian’ aksite’ tung pekah ka kumpi tokhom ka koih ding a, leilu lam peka kikhopna mualtungah ka tu ding hi. [14] Meiite’ tung pekah ka kahto ding a, Sang Pen pa bangin ka kibawl ding hi,’ na ci hi.
[31] Ahih hangin TOPA a muang mite a tha uh dimkik ding a, muvanlai bangin kha tawh leengto-in, amaute tai napi-un tawl lo ding uh a, amaute lam pai napi-un gim lo ding uh hi.
[33] Thudang khempeuh sangin Pasian’ ukna le ama deihna na zuih theih nading uh thupi ngaihsut masazaw un. Tua hileh hih na kisapna dangte khempeuh uh zong hong piathuah veve ding hi.
[30] Ahi zongin tuhun laitakin a lian mi tampite tua hun ciangin a neu suak ding a, tuhun laitakin a neu tampite tua hun ciangin a lian hi ding uh hi.

[46] Kua lianpen ding ihi hiam, ci-in nungzuite lakah kiselna khat hong om hi. [47] Jesuh in amaute’ lungsim ngaihsutna a phawk ciangin naupang khat la-in a gei-ah omsak a, [48] a nungzuite kiangah, “Keima hangin hih naupang a limbawl mi peuhmah in kei hong limbawl hi a, kei hong limbawl mi peuhmah in kei hong sawl pa zong a limbawl ahi hi. Note khempeuh lakah a neupen pa a lianpen pa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[13] Lawmte’ tang ding sih ngamna sangin lawmte itna a lianzaw om nawn lo hi.
[10] Unau ki-itna lungsim nei unla, khatlekhat kizahtak bawl ding lamsang kidem un.

[24] Tai kidemna-ah mi khat bek in thaman a ngah ding hinapi-in a vekpi-un tai veve uh hi. Tua ahih manin thaman na ngahzawh nadingun na tai un. [25] Kimawlna sungah a kihel mi khempeuh in thu khempeuhah a pumpi uh uk ciat uh hi. Amaute pen a kisiathei pak a ngah nadingun a hanciam uh hi a, eite pen a kisia thei lo i ngah nadingin a hanciam ihi hi.
[12] Kote ahihleh tua bangin a kiliansak mahmah mite tawh a kikimin ka kingaihsun ngam buang kei ding uh hi. Amaute khatlekhat ki-en kakin thupi kisa mahmah uh ahih manin mihai taktak ahi uh hi.
[4] A kuamah peuh in ama gamtatna ciat entel henla, kisialh nading a om leh ama gamtatna siksanin kisial henla, midangte tawh ki-ettehin kisial kei hen.

[24] Tua hi a, Jesuh Khrih a zui mite in a leitung lungsim pianzia uh le a leitung lungsim deihna khempeuh uh a phiat khitsa ahi hi. [25] Kha Siangtho in eite hong nungtasak khinta ahih manin ama hong sawlna bangin eite a nungta ding ihi hi. [26] Kuamah kiphasak loin, khatlekhat kiphin loin, kuamah i kihaza kei ding hi.
[5] Kimawl kidemna-ah a kihel mi khatpeuh in kimawlna ngeina zui lopi-in gualzawh pahtawina ngah thei lo hi.

[7] Kidemna-ah ka hat tawpin ka hih khin a, a mong dongin ka tai khin a, upna thu khotakin lenin ka zokhin hi. [8] Thu a manin a khen Topa in tua Ni ciangin kei a hong piak ding thuman lukhu ahi gualzawhna thaman in tu-in kei hong ngak gige hi. Kei tung bekah a hong pia ding hi lo a, ama hong paikik ding itna tawh a ngakte khempeuh tungah zong a pia ding ahi hi.

[1] Tua hi a, eite in i kiim i pamah hih zahin a tam teci nei ihih ciangin eite a hong dongtangsak thei nate khempeuh le eite a hong gakcip mawhna le khialhnate khempeuh paikhia-in, i mai-ah a om tai nading lampi a mong dongin lungsim kiptakin tai ni. [2] Eite hong makai-in i upna a hong cingtaaksak Jesuh mitsuanin nei ni. Mailamah a ngah ding lungdamna hangin maizumna kihta loin singlamteh tungah sihna hong thuak a, tu-in Pasian tokhom taklamah a tu hi. [3] Tua zahta-in mawhnei mite’ langbawlna a thuaknate ngaihsun unla, note lungkia loin khauhtakin om un.
[36] Amah in note hong khal theih nadingin vantung panin ama aw note hong zasak hi. A mei lianpi leitungah note hong musak a, mei sung panin ama aw na za uh hi.
[5] Tua ahih manin mi khat in a tapa a khal bangin TOPA na Pasian un note hong khalna thu na lungsim uhah thei un.
[32] Solomon in Jerusalem-ah TOPA’ Biakinn a lam ciang dong amaute in kikhopna puanbuk ahi biakbuk mai-ah lasak na sem uh a, amaute in a nasep uh a hunhun a banbanin sem uh hi.
[3] TOPA aw, zingsang simin ka aw nong za a, zingsang simin nangma a dingin biakna bawlin kong ngak hi.
[23] TOPA in mi a lam pai nading lak a, ama lungkim bangin a gamta pa amah in a kipsak hi.

[3] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka thupalsatnate ka thei a, ka mawhnate khempeuh ka phawk ngitnget hi. [4] Nangma tungah khialin, nangma muhna-ah a sia ka gamta khin hi. Tua ahih ciangin na thugenna-ah nang na thutang a, thu na hong khenna-ah pauna ding bangmah om lo hi.
[9] Tangval khat in ama gamtatna a siangtho mahmah dingin bangci kep ding ahi hiam? Nangma thu zuihna tawh ama gamtatna siangthosak thei ding hi.
[34] Nangma thute kemin ka lungsim khempeuh tawh ka zuih theih nadingin thu theihtelna hong pia in.
[3] A hoihin a pil gamtat theih nading, thuman, thutang, a kilawmin a gamtat theih nading.
[12] Tua ciangin, “Bang hangin thu thei hoh lo a, hong kihilhna mang hoh lo ka hi hiam?
[23] Ama pumpi ki-uk zo lo ahih manin amah in sihlawh a, ama hailuatna in hankhuk sung a tun hi.
[32] Thahatna sangin lungduaina hoihzaw a, khuapi khat ukzawhna sangin eimah ki-ukzawhna hoihzaw hi.
[4] Lo khawh hunin a kho nuam lo thadahpa in tuk anlak hun ciangin bangmah nei lo ding hi.
[24] TOPA in mite’ gamtatna zia ding uk hi. Koici gamtat ding cih mihing in bangci theih ding ahi hiam?
[14] Ciangduai tawh sat le-uhcin nuntaklawh zaw ding uh hi.
[28] Ama lungsim a ki-uk zo lo mipa pen dalna kulhpi a nei lo khuapi tawh kibang hi.
[15] Ciangduai le tai-na in pilna guan a, a kikhahkhong ta in a nu maizumsak hi.
[17] Na ta thuhilhin tai lecin ama hangin na kipak ding a, na lung hong kimsak ding hi.
[15] Phalvak tungin zingtho a, annek ding teng limtakin bawlin a nasem numeite’ sep dingteng a vaihawmsak hi.
[1] Hih leitungah a piang thu khempeuh, Pasian in ama pian’ hun dinga a sehsa hunin a piansak ahi hi.
[30] Na tate uh thuhilhin ka sat hangin a mawkna suakzo ta hi. Amaute kibawlpha tuan lo uh hi. Humpinelkai hawk bangin na namsaute un na kamsangte uh a that khinzo uh hi.
[23] Ahih hangin na pu na pate un ka thu hong ngai lo uh a, a bil uh hong ngat lo uh hi. Ka thu hong mang lo uh a, ka hilhna a theih loh nadingun a lungsim uh a khauhsak uh hi.

[8] Daniel in kumpi innsunga an le leenggahzu tawh a pumpi a thanghuaisak loh nadingin a lungsim a khensat hi. Amah in innsungmang lianpen Ashpenaz kiangah tua bang an a kipiak loh nadingin a ngen zaw hi.
[16] Midangte in na gamtatna hoihte uh a muh ciangin vantungah a om na Pa uh min a phat theih nadingun mite mai-ah na gamtat hoihna uh khuavak bangin na kilangsak un.
[29] Tua ahih manin na mit taklam in na mawh nading hong piansak leh khelkhia inla paai in. Na pumpi bupin hell khuk sungah hong kikhul sangin na pumpi na khat pelem leh nang a dingin hoihzaw lai hi.
[48] Tua ahih manin vantungah a om na Pa uh a cingtaak mah bangin note zong lungsim citakin na cingtaak nading uh na hanciam un.

[22] “Mittang pen pumpi a dingin meivak tawh kibang hi. Na mit uh ciim leh na pumpi un hoihtakin khua mu thei hi. [23] Ahi zongin na mit uh maang leh na pumpi uh a dingin khua a mial hi. Tua ahih manin note’ sunga a om khuavak pen a mial hileh tua mialna pen nasia mahmah ding hi.

[8] “Na khut ahi a, na khe in ahi zongin hong khialhsak leh sattan inla paikhia in. Meikuang tawntung sungah khut kim khe kimin hong kikhiat sangin nuntakna sungah khut sam khe samin lut lecin nang a dingin hoihzaw ding hi. [9] Na mit in hong khialhsak leh khelkhia inla paikhia in. Mit kim nei-in hell khuk sungah hong kikhul sangin mit langkhat bek tawh nuntakna sungah lut lecin nang a dingin hoihzaw ding hi. [10] “Hih naupangnote khatpeuh na simmawhkhak loh nadingun kidawm un. Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Amaute a kem vantung mite pen vantungah ka Pa kiangah om tawntung uh hi.
[43] Tua ahih ciangin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Note pen Pasian hong ki-uksak nawn lo ding a, a kilawmin a gamta ding mite bek Pasian in uk ding hi.
[45] “A pil a citak nasem i cih a bangcite ahi hiam? A naseppih dangte ukin a hun manmanin amaute’ nekzah ding ciat an a pia dingin a topa in a seh a nasempa ahi hi.

[43] Tua ahih manin na khut in hong khialhsak leh sattan in. Mei a mih ngei lohna hell khuk sungah khut kim tawh na lut sangin khut langkhat bui-in nuntakna sungah lut lecin nang a dingin hoihzaw hi. [44] (Tua lai-ah thante si ngei lo a, a mei zong mit ngei lo hi.) [45] Na khe in hong khialhsak leh sattan in. Khe kim nei-in hell sungah hong kikhiat sangin khe langkhat bui-in nuntakna sungah lut lecin nang a dingin hoihzaw hi. [46] (Tua lai-ah thante si ngei lo a, a mei zong mit ngei lo hi.) [47] Na mit in hong khialhsak leh khelkhia in. Mit kim tawh hell khuk sungah hong kikhiat sangin mit langkhat taw-in Pasian’ Ukna sungah om lecin nang a dingin hoihzaw hi.
[42] Topa in, “A pil a citak nasempa i cih a bangcite ahi hiam? A naseppih dangte ukin a hun manmanin amaute’ nekzah ding ciat a pia dingin a topa in a seh nasempa ahi hi.
[16] Tua ahih manin Pasian mai le mite mai-ah lungsim kisuanna a om het lo dingin a tawntungin ka gamta hi.

[25] Ahi zongin Paul in thu gengenin, a hoihin a gamtat nading, pumpi ki-uk zawh nading, le hong tung ding Thukhenna Hunte a gen tohtoh ciangin, Feliks hong lau a, “Va paikik phot in. Hun ka ngah ciangin kong samkik ding hi,” ci-in a gen hi.

[12] Tua ahih ciangin na pumpi uh deihna na zuih loh nadingun na pumpi uh, mawhna na uksak nawn kei ding uh hi. [13] Mawhna gamtat nadingin na pumpi nate uh khat beek na zang nawn kei ding uh hi. Note pen misi hinapi-in a kihingkiksak mite bang na hih manun, a hoihin a hong zattheih nadingin na pumpi bup uh Pasian’ tungah na piazaw ding uh hi.

[14] Thukham pen i kha thu tawh kisai hi, ci-in i thei hi. Ahi zongin kei pen leitung pumpi tawh a nungta mi ka hi a, mawhna thu mangin a sal a suak ka hi hi. [15] Ka hihnopteng hihkha loin ka hih nop loh tengkeek mah hih zawsop ka hih manin keima gamtatna mahmah zong ka tel thei kei hi. [16] Ka hih nop lohteng ka hih veve ciangin Thukham a deihhuai khat hi, ci-in ka ngaihsutna hong langsak hi. [17] Tua ahih manin tua bangin a gamta taktak pen kei hi loin ka sunga om mawhna hizaw hi. [18] Ka leitung pumpi sungah a hoih na khat beek om lo hi, ci-in ka thei hi. Ka sungah a hoih gamtatnopna lungsim a om hangin ka hihzo kei hi. [19] A hoih ka gamtatnop teng gamta loin, ka hihnop loh siatnate ka gamta zawsop hi. [20] Ka gamtat nop lohteng ka gamtat veve ciangin tua a gamta pen kei hi nawn loin ka sunga om mawhna a gamta ahihna a hong kilang hi.

[5] Amau pumpi deihna bangin a nungtate, amau pumpi deihna in a lungsim uh a uk hi; Kha Siangtho deihna bangin a nungtate, Kha Siangtho in amau lungsim a uk hi. [6] I ngaihsutna, i pumpi deihna uksak lehang sihna tawh kizom hi; i ngaihsutna, Kha Siangtho uksak lehang nuntakna le nopsakna tawh a kizom hi. [7] Mi khatpeuh in ama pumpi deihna a ki-uksak ciangin Pasian’ thukhamte zui lo ahih manin Pasian’ gal suak a, a zuihnop hangin zong zui thei lo hi. [8] Amau pumpi deihna bangin a gamtate in Pasian lungdamsak thei lo uh hi.

[12] Tua ahih ciangin lawmte aw, i pumpi deihna bang zui-in gamtat ding a kiphamawh hi lo hi. [13] Na pumpi uh deihna zui-in na gamtat uhleh na si ding uh a, ahi zongin Kha Siangtho huhna tawh na mawh gamtatnate uh na sihsak uhleh na nungta ding uh hi.

[2] Leitung mihingte’ gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahphasak un. Tua hileh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkimsakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian’ deihna na phawk thei ding uh hi.

[13] Sun khuavak sunga om mite bangin a kilawmin gamta ni. Gualnopna le zukhamna, mawhna le thangtatna, kitotna le kihazatnate-in i hun beisak kei ni. [14] Kidal nadingin, Topa Jesuh Khrih’ hong piak galhiamte zang unla, na pumpi uh deihna bangin gamtat nading hun omsak nawn kei un.
[16] Tua ciangin note in hoih na sak uh thute, midangte in a sia-in a genkhak loh theih nadingun na gamta un.
[1] Upna lamah a thahat eite in upna zawngkhalte’ ginat lohna i thuakpih ding kilawm hi; eima ut bangin i gamta kei ding hi.

[16] Note pen Pasian’ biakinn na hihna uh le note sungah Pasian’ Kha Siangtho a teng ahih lamtak na theihsa uh ahi hi. [17] Mi khatpeuh in Pasian’ biakinn susia leh Pasian in tua mipa susia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ biakinn a siangtho hi a, note zong tua biakinn siangtho na hi uh hi.

[12] “Ka ut peuhpeuh ka hihtheih nading thu om hi,” a ci omkha ding hi. Ahi zongin na khempeuh hih ding kilawm lo hi. Kei zong ka ut khempeuh ka hih theih hangin tua bang gamtatna khat peuhpeuh’ sila ka suak nuam kei hi. [13] “An pen i gilpi a’ ding hi a, gilpi zong an a’ ding mah hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci zong omkha ding hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in tua tegel a beisak hun hong tung ding hi. Pumpi pen paktatna-in zat ding hi lo a, Topa’ na sepna-in zat ding hizaw hi. Topa in pumpi a’ ding na hong sem hi.

[19] Na pumpi uh, Pasian in a hong piak, note’ sungah a teng Kha Siangtho’ biakinn ahih lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam? Note’ pumpi, nomau’ neihsa hi lo a, Pasian a’ ahi hi. [20] Note pen Pasian in a hong leisa na hih manun na pumpi uh Pasian’ minthan nadingin na zang un.

[26] Tua ahih manin ngimna nei lopi-in a mawktai ka hi kei a, huihlak khawng a mawktuptup ka hi kei hi. [27] Kimawlna sungah midangte a kihel dingin a sam hinapi-in tua kimawlna-ah a kihel zo lo mi ka suahkhak loh nadingin ka pumpi seekin hoihtakin ka ki-uk hi.
[31] Tua ahih manin keimah in ka hong gennop thu in: Na hihna khempeuh uh, nekna dawnna-ah ahi zongin Pasian’ minthan nadingin na hih un.

[32] Pasian in eite ahi zelzul dingin a hong sam hi lo a, hoihtak nuamtakin a om dingin a hong sam ahih manin Pasian’ thu gen ding lawpna lungsim pen a gen ding pa a ki-ukzawh ding a kisam ahi hi. Pasian’ pawlpi mite khempeuh lakah a kizang ngeina ahih mah bangin, [33] Pasian in eite ahi zelzul dingin a hong sam hi lo a, hoihtak nuamtakin a om dingin a hong sam ahih manin Pasian’ thu gen ding lawpna lungsim pen a gen ding pa a ki-ukzawh ding a kisam ahi hi. Pasian’ pawlpi mite khempeuh lakah a kizang ngeina ahih mah bangin,
[40] Na khempeuh a kilawm a kituakin na hih un.
[1] Tua ahih manin ka hong it lawmte aw, pumpi le lungsim a ninsak theite khempeuh panin kisiansuahin, Pasian zahtakna tawh nungta-in siangtho sinsenin om ni.
[16] Note kiangah ka hong gen thu in: Kha Siangtho’ hong sawlna bangin gamta unla, na pumpi uh utna bangin gamta kei un.
[22] Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho’ sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna,

[1] Sanggamte aw, mi khatpeuh a gamta khial a om ciangin, Kha Siangtho’ deihna bangin a nungta note in tua a khial pa a manin a gamtatkik theih nadingin thunem zangin na huh un. Note in zong amah bangin ze-etna na tuahkhak loh nadingun na kikem un.
[16] Hih ka thugenna a zui mite a kipanin Pasian’ mite khempeuh tungah Pasian in nopsakna le hehpihna thupha hong pia tahen.
[10] Eite a hong bawlpa pen Pasian hi a, Jesuh Khrih tawh i kipawl ciangin i nuntakna-ah gamtat hoih a nei dingin a hong bawl ihi hi. Hih pen eite’ omzia dingin a na ngaihsut kholhsa ahi hi.
[1] Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ na ka sepna hangin thong a kia keimah in note’ nuntakzia dingin a hong deihna tawh a kilawm a kituakin na nuntak nadingun ka hong hanthawn hi.

[23] na lungsim uh le na ngaihsutna uh thaksuak sak un. [24] A thutang a siangtho ahihna thu, nuntakna mahmah panin a kilangsak, Pasian’ pianzia tawh kibangin a kibawl na ngeina thak uh bangin na nungta un.

[27] Dawimangpa in hong suksiat theih nading hun omsak kei un. [28] Guta ngeite in gu nawn loin, ama nuntak nading thuman takin thalawhin, mizawngte zong a huhtheih lai nadingin thatang tawh nasep ding kipan ta uh hen.
[16] Tuhun pen hun hoih lo hun ahih manin na hun neih khempeuh uh a hoih lamin zang un.
[1] Note, Khrih tawh kipawlin na nuntakna uh in note hong thahatsak hi. Kha Siangtho tawh kikhawlin, khatlekhat kihehpihin, dikna na kibawl uh hi.
[9] Keima genna le ka gamtatna panin thei-in na san uh thute, nomau pumpi mahmah tawh na zui un. Tua hileh nopsakna a hong piathei Pasian in note hong ompih ding hi.

[23] Hih bang gamtatnate pen a tungthamin i et ciangin limtakin biaknopna lungsim a piangsak ding, kiniamkhiatna a piangsak ding, pumpi ki-ukzawhna a piangsak ding tawh kibang hi. Ahi zongin a taktakin hihte khat beek in pumpi ki-ukzawhna piangsak zo lo hi.

[2] Tua ahih manin siate pen paubaanna a nei lo mi, zi khat bek a nei mi, lungsim hoih hithiat mi, thu a ngaihsun thei mi, a kilawm a kituakin a gamta mi, zin le leengla do a siam mi, thuhilh a siam mi,

[7] Pasian’ thu tawh a kituak lo, a haihuai tangthu phuahtawmte ngaihsutin na nei vet kei in. Pasian’ deihna tawh a kituakin na nuntak zawh nadingin na kisin in. [8] Pumpi kisekin kisinna manpha hi. Ahi zongin kha thu-ah kisekin kisinna pen tuhun laitak le a hong tung ding hunah nuntakna hong piathei ahih manin manphazaw lai hi, [9] ci-a kigen pen a man taktak thu hi a, umin sin dingin a kilawm thu ahi hi.
[7] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in eite tungah meidawina lungsim hong guan lo a, thahatna, ki-itna, pumpi ki-ukzawhna lungsim hong guan hizaw hi.
[5] Kimawl kidemna-ah a kihel mi khatpeuh in kimawlna ngeina zui lopi-in gualzawh pahtawina ngah thei lo hi.

[21] Mi khatpeuh a hoih lo na khempeuh panin kikemin a siangtho takin a om nakleh na hoih nam khempeuh a sem dingin a Topa tungah ki-apin, a Topa tungah a manpha suak ahih manin a thupi diakte-ah amah kizang ding hi.
[8] zinleleeng do a siam mi, thuhoih a deih mi, a pumpi a ki-ukzo mi, a thutang mi, a siangtho mi, le a kisekzo mi hi ding uh hi.
[6] Tua mah bangin khangnote zong amau pumpi a ki-ukzawh nadingun na hanthawn pha in.

[12] Eite in i lamet, a lian Pasian le eite hong Hon Jesuh Khrih a vangliatna hong kilatkik ding hun ngakin i om laitakin i biakna tawh a kituak lo thute le leitung nate deihna phiatin, lungsim hi hithiatin omin, thutangin, hih leitungah Pasian’ deihna bangin i nuntak nadingin tua hehpihna thu in eite hong hilh hi.
[14] I mawhna khempeuh panin hong honkhia ding le ama neihtuam i suahtheih nadingin Jesuh amahmah hong kipumpiak a, eite pen gamtat hoih gamtat ding a lawp mahmah ihi hi.

[5] Pasian in note, tate, hong ci-in hong hanthotna thu mangngilh khinta na hi uh hiam? Pasian in note kiangah, “Ka ta aw, Topa’ hong thuhilhna zangkhai ngaihsut kei inla, gim a hong piak ciangin lungkia kei in. [6] Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in a it mite thuhilh a, ta taktakin a ngaihsut mite a taii hi,” hong ci hi.
[2] Eite khempeuh a khialthei zelzelte vive ihi hi. Kampauna-ah a khial ngei lo mi a om leh a cingtaak mahmah hi a, a pumpi zong a ukzo mi ahi hi.
[17] A hoih a manin gamtat ding thei napi-in a gamta lote a khial ahi hi.
[15] Note a hong sampa a siangtho ahih mah bangin note zong na gamtatna khempeuh uhah na siangtho un.
[7] Na khempeuh a bei nading hun hong naita hi. Nomau pumpi ki-uktawm thei-in pilvang unla, hoihtakin thu a ngen thei-in om ta un.

[5] Hih thu hangin na upna ban uhah gamtat hoihna na behlap unla, na gamtat hoihna uh thutheihna tawh na behlap un; [6] na thutheihna uh pumpi ki-ukzawhna tawh na behlap unla, na pumpi ki-ukzawhna uh thuakzawhna tawh na behlap un; na thuakzawhna uh Pasian’ deih bangin gamtatna tawh na behlap unla, [7] Pasian’ deih bangin na gamtatna uh sanggam ki-itna tawh na behlap un; na sanggam ki-itna uh itna thukpi tawh na behlapzawh nadingun na hanciam un.
[6] Tua ahih manin Pasian tawh ka kipawl hi, ci napi-in khuamial tawh kisai gamtatnate i gamtat le i kampauna le i gamtatna tawh zuauthu a gen ihi hi.
[6] Pasian tawh ka kipawl hi, a ci mi khempeuh, Jesuh Khrih a gamtat bangin a gamtat ding ahi hi.
[18] Pasian’ tate in mawhna bawlbawl lo uh hi. Pasian’ Tapa in amaute kem a, Dawimangpa in amaute susia zo lo hi.
[19] Hih mite in pawl kikhenna piangsakin, amau pumpi deihna bangin gamta uh a, Kha Siangtho zong nei lo uh hi.
[19] Ka it mite thuhilhin ka taii hi. Tua ahih manin lungsim tak tawh na mawhna panun kisik kik un.

[17] “Na vengte uh inn na deihgawh kei ding uh hi. Na vengte uh zi hitaleh, ama nasempa hitaleh, ama nasemnu hitaleh, ama bawngtal hitaleh, ama la hitaleh, na vengte a’ ahi na khat peuhpeuh na deihgawh kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[12] Tua ciangin Samson in amaute kiangah, “Note’ mai-ah thuhaksa khat hong gen ning. Hih pawi ni sagih sungin a thu mukhia-in bang hiam cih nong gentheih uhleh saihadial puan silh sawmthum le pawipuan silh sawmthum note kong pia ding hi. [13] Ahih hangin bang hiam cih nong gentheih kei uhleh saihadial puan silh sawmthum le pawipuan silh sawmthum kei nong pia ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Na thuhaksa hong gen in, za dih ni,” a ci uh hi.
[1] Leitung le a tunga omte, leitung le a tunga tengte TOPA -a’ ahi hi.
[5] Na lungsim khempeuh tawh TOPA muang inla, nang’ theihna suang kei in.
[7] Nangmah a pilin kingaihsun tawm kei inla, TOPA zahtakin a sia peel in.
[4] Thadahna in zawnna hi a, thanuamna in hauhna hi.
[11] Ol takin hauhpakna oltak mahin kiamkik pah a, haksapi-in hauhtohna khangto semsem hi.
[27] A man loin sum ngahna in innsung lungkhamsak a, sumgolh a deih lote a nuntak sauvei nuam hi.
[33] Mite in bangbangin ai a san zongin, a piang ding thu pen TOPA’ deihna bangbek hizaw hi.
[5] Limtakin ngaihsunin geelgeelna pen hauhna lampi hi a, nawhsa-in lopthop hihna pen zawnna lampi ahi hi.
[25] Mi thadahpa in na sem nuam lo ahih manin amahmah a kithattawm ahi hi. [26] Mihoih lote in lungkim hun nei loin deih thuah tawntung uh a, mihoihte cingh-in piakhia tawntung uh hi.
[4] Hauhnop man bekin sum’ sila suak kei unla, a man loin gamtakha kei un.
[19] Nakpi takin lo a khopa hau mahmah a, bangmahin a kimang tum lo na a sempa zawng mahmah hi. [20] A citak mipa in thupha tampi ngah ding a, a hau baih nuam mipa in gim tuak pelmawh ding hi.
[22] A huaiham mi in a hauh nadingin huai mengmeng a, a tawpna-ah a zawn’ ding lamtak phawkkha lo hi.
[10] Sum deihna lungsim na neih leh lungkim hun cih na nei ngei kei ding hi. Na hauhnop hangin na deih khempeuh na ngah ngei kei ding hi. Hih pen a mawknapi ahi hi.
[8] Leitung a a om ngun le kham khempeuh keima-a’ ahi hi.

[15] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute khempeuh kiangah, “Hoihtakin kidawm unla, na huaiham loh nadingun kikem un. Bang hang hiam cih leh bangzahta-in mi khat a hauh hangin a neihsa tawh a nuntakna taktak kicing zo lo hi,” a ci hi.
[13] “To nih’ na a semkhawmzo nasem kuamah om lo hi. A to khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat beelin khat a simmawh ding hi. Pasian’ na le leitung sum na na semkhawmzo kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[14] Biakinn huangsung a lut ciangin bawng, tuu, le kawl vakhu zuakte mu a, sumkhekte zong a sumkhekna sabuai-ah a tu mu hi. [15] Amah in zong khauteep bawlin biakinn huangsung panin tuu le bawng a kipan ganhing khempeuh hawlkhia a, sumkhekte’ sabuai zong sawnpaih sakin a sum khempeuh a thehthang sak hi. [16] Tua ciangin kawl vakhu zuakte kiangah, “Na kawl vakhute uh hih lai panin paikhiatpih un. Ka Pa’ inn pen sumzuakna inn phualpi-in nei kei un,” a ci hi.

[33] Kuama neihsa, ngun, kham, le puante en’ dingin ka ngaihsun ngei kei hi. [34] Kei le ka kithuahpihte’ kisapna khempeuh ka ngahtheih nadingin keima khut mahmah tawh na ka sepna thu note in na thei uh hi. [35] Topa Jesuh mahmah in, ‘Ngahna sangin piak khiatna-ah lungdamna lianzaw hi,’ a cihna phawkkawmin nakpitakin nasepna tawh na khempeuhah a zawngkhalte huh ding hi hang, ci-in note kiangah kong lak khinzo hi,” ci-in a vaikhak hi.

[29] Siatna nam khempeuh ahi, hoih lohna, huaihamna, khatlekhat kisiatsak nopna, hazatna, mi thahna, kitotna, khemna, a sialam bekbek ngaihsutna, zuau genna, [30] mi gensiatna, Pasian muhdahna, midangte a heh theih a maizum theih nadingin gamtatna, kiphatsakna, kisialhna, thusia bawlna, nu le pate’ thu man lohna, [31] gamtatsiatna, ciampelna, midangte khual lo, hehpihna nei loin, a sia namkim a gamta uh hi. [32] Tua bangin a gamtate in sihna thuak ding hi, ci-in Pasian’ thukhenna thei napi-in, tua bangin amaute a gamtat uh banah, tua bangin a gamtate pakta-in a awi zawsop lai uh hi.

[2] Leitung mihingte’ gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahphasak un. Tua hileh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkimsakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian’ deihna na phawk thei ding uh hi.
[2] Nasem i cih mite pen a topa uh tungah citakin a thuman ding uh kisam hi.
[10] a gutate, a huaihamte, zukhamte, mi gensiate, ahih kei leh mi’ na a sutte khat beek, Pasian’ Ukna sungah lutthei het lo ding hi.

[12] “Ka ut peuhpeuh ka hihtheih nading thu om hi,” a ci omkha ding hi. Ahi zongin na khempeuh hih ding kilawm lo hi. Kei zong ka ut khempeuh ka hih theih hangin tua bang gamtatna khat peuhpeuh’ sila ka suak nuam kei hi.
[28] Guta ngeite in gu nawn loin, ama nuntak nading thuman takin thalawhin, mizawngte zong a huhtheih lai nadingin thatang tawh nasep ding kipan ta uh hen.
[3] Note pen Pasian’ mi na hih manun note lakah nulepa khialhna, a kilawm lo-a gamtatna, huaihamna cihte genin zong na nei vet kei un.

[5] Nulepa khialhna a gamta mi, a kilawm lo-a a gamta mi, le a huaiham (huaihamna zong milim biakna zahin sia hi) mite in Khrih Ukna le Pasian Ukna sungah bangmah ngah nei het lo ding ahihna uh teltakin thei ta un.
[4] Note’ phattuam nading bek ngaihsun kei unla, midangte’ phattuam nading ngaihsutsak zaw un.

[8] Sanggamte aw, a tawpna-ah ka hong gennop thu in, a hoih le a phattaak thute tawh na lungsim uh na kidimsak un. Tuate in: A man, a dik, a tang, a siangtho, a deihhuai, le a pahtakhuai thute ahi hi.
[6] Ama thu a mang lo mite tungah hih bang gamtatna hangin Pasian’ hehna hong tung ding hi.
[11] Tu ma-a ka hong gensa uh mah bangin kamtam nuam se loin hoihtakin om hithiatna, no tawh a kisai thu bek ngaihsutna, le note’ nuntak nading na na sep nading uh hanciamin nei un.
[22] a sia lamsang peuhmah pelh un.
[10] Note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-un, “Na a sem nuam lo mi peuhmah an nesak kei un,” ci-in ka hong gen uh hi.
[18] Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho in, “Buh a cil bawngtal muk na tuam kei in,” a cih banah, “Nasempa in a thaman a ngah ding a kilawm ahi hi,” na ci hi.

[9] Ahi zongin a haunuam mite in ze-etna a tuamtuam thuak a, duhhopna, huaihamna a haivai thute-ah awkcipin, haksatna le siatna a tuahlawh uh hi. [10] Sum deihluatna in siatna namkim piangsak hi. Mi pawlkhat in sum deihlua liang uh ahih manin a upna panun pialkhia-in gimna lungkhamna tampi a thuaklawh uh hi.
[5] Sum deihluatna tawh na kipelh nadingun na nuntakna uhah kikem unla, na neihzah uh tawh lungkim un. Pasian in, “Note ka hong nusia ngei kei ding a, ka hong tamasak ngei kei ding hi,” hong ci hi.
[14] Mi khatpeuh in ama deihna zui-in a gamtat ciangin mawhna a piangsak ahi hi. [15] Lungsim utna a gol semsem ciangin mawhna hong piang a, mawhna hong cingtaak ciangin sihna hong piang hi.
[10] Pasian’ piak na a zatsiamte bangin Pasian’ kiang panin na ngah uh nate, midangte’ phattuam nadingin na zang un.
[19] Amaute pen siatna a piangsak thei zongsatna lelin sila hinapi-un mite tungah suahtak nading thu a gen uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mite pen, a hong zo peuhpeuhte’ sila ihi hi.
[15] Tua ciangin amau’ mai-ah Joshua le Israel-te khempeuh kilelsak khem uh a, gamlak lamah a tai uh hi.

[11] Ka upate uh le ka gam sung uha a teng mite khempeuh in kote kiangah, ‘Na khualzin nading uh lam-an bawl unla, amaute a dawntuah dingin pai-in amaute kiangah, “Kote, na nasem ka hi uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin kote tawh thuciamna hong bawl un,” va ci un,’ hong ci uh hi. [12] Hih lai-ah ka anlum uh om hi. No kiangah a hong pai dingin kong dinkhiat ni uh, khualzin lam-an dingin ka inn panun ka guan laitakun lum lai hi. Ahih hangin tu-in en un, keu-in ap hi. [13] Hih leenggahzu umte ka thun laitakun a thak ahi hi. Tu-in en un, puakgawp ta hi. Hih ka puante uh le ka khedapte uh khual gamlapi zinna-in paatgawpta hi,” a ci uh hi.
[22] Joshua in amaute samin amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin kote’ nai hih lai-ah a teng hinapi-in, ‘Note’ kiang panin gamla mahmah ung,’ cihna tawh kote hong khem na hi uh hiam?

[7] Ahih hangin TOPA in Samuel kiangah, “A tungtham hitaleh a tun sanna hitaleh en kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah ka nolh hi. TOPA in mihingte’ muh bangin mu lo hi. Mihingte in a pualam a kilangte en a, ahih hangin TOPA in a lungsim en hi,” a ci hi.
[13] Tua ahih ciangin amaute’ mai-ah a gamtat kheelin, amaute’ muhna-ah a hai-in kibawl a, kulhkongkhakte tung kui gawpin, a khamul tungah a cilphuan kaisuksak hi.

[5] Jonadab in ama kiangah, “Na lupna tungah lum inla, a cina kineih in. Nangmah a veh dingin na pa hong pai ciangin ama kiangah, ‘Keimah in mu-in ama khut panin an ka nek theih nadingin ka sanggamnu Tamar hong paisakin annek ding hong piasak inla, ka muhna-ah an hong bawl sak in,’ ci in,” a ci hi. [6] Tua ahih ciangin Ammon lumin a cina kineih hi. Amah a en dingin kumpipa a pai ciangin Ammon in kumpipa kiangah, “Ama khut panin ka nek theih nadingin ka sanggamnu Tamar hong paisakin mohpheng nih khawng na bawlsak nading kong thum hi,” a ci hi.

[2] Tua ahih ciangin Joab in Tekoa-ah mi sawlin tua panin numei pil khat la-in ama kiangah, “Dahin a kap kineih inla, dahna lim puante silh in. Sathau nilh kei inla, misi hangin ni tampi a thum khin numei bangin gamta in.
[45] Keimah mai-etin gamdang mite ka kiangah hong pai uh hi. Amaute in ka thu a zak phetun, ka thu hong mang uh hi.

[5] Tua ciangin TOPA in Ahijah kiangah, “En in, a tapa tawh kisai nangma kiangah thu a dong dingin Jeroboam’ zi hong pai hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a tapa a ci na hi. Tua bang tua bangin tua nu tungah na gen ding hi,” a ci hi. Amah hong pai ciangin numei dang khatin kineih hi. [6] Ahih hangin Ahijah in amah kongkhak hong tun a kheging a zak ciangin, “Hong tum in Jeroboam’ zi aw, bang hangin midang khat kineih na hi hiam? Nang a dingin thugik khat kei tungah hong kipia hi.
[44] Ka thu a zak phetun amaute in hong mang pah uh a, gamdang mite in kei hong mai-et uh hi.
[4] Mikhialte tawh tukhawm loin, thusim neite tawh ka kipawl kei hi.
[4] Amah a zaliatna panin sukniam ding bekbek amaute in a sawm uh hi. Amaute in thuman lo-ah nuamsa mahmah uh hi. Amaute in a kampi uh tawh phat khem uh a, ahih hangin a sungtawng uhah samsiat uh hi.
[9] Nektawm ding nei lopi-in milian bangin omna sangin nuntakna ding na semin mi mawkmawk hihna hoihzaw hi.
[7] Mi pawlkhatte, zawng napi-in kihausak uh a, mi pawlkhatte, hau napi-in kizawngsak uh hi.
[24] Lawm pawlkhatte sauvei kimang lo a, lawm pawlkhatte sanggam sangin kipzaw hi.

[11] Thah dinga a kikaikhia mipa honkhia inla, sih nading mun a zuan mipa lehkaih kik in. [12] Ke’n theikha kei ing, na cihnop hangin lungsim a thei Pasian in theitel veve hi; nang hong encik Pasian in hong teltheihna phawk in. Mi khempeuh a gamtatna bangin a thukkik ding hi.
[28] Ahi zongin ke’n kong genin-ah: Mawhpih nopna lungsim tawh numei khat a en mi peuhmah in a lungsimah tua numei tawh a mawh ahi hi.
[24] “Kuamah, to nih’ sila hikhawm thei lo hi. Khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat tungah thumanin khat simmawhbawl ding hi. Note in Pasian’ na le leitung sum na na semkhawm zo kei ding uh hi.
[15] “Kamsang taktak a hilote na muh uh ciangin limtakin kikem un. Amaute in a tungthamah tuu lim hong pua-in, ahi zongin a sungtawng taktak uh ngia hangsan bang ahi uh hi.

[7] Na tungthamun mihoih a kineihkhem mite aw, Isaiah in note’ thu a genna man mahmah hi. Tua a genna-ah, [8] ‘Hih mite in a kampi bek uh tawh kei hong zahtak bawl uh a, ahi zongin a lungsim taktak uh kei tawh kigamla hi. [9] Mihingte’ bawltawm thukhamte, Pasian’ thukham zahin mite tungah hilh uh ahih manin kei hong biak hangun a kimanna om lo hi,’ ci hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[18] Ahi zongin Jesuh in amau’ gitloh geelna thei ahih manin, “Mihoih a kineihkhem mite aw, bang hangin kei hong thangsiah se na hi uh hiam?

[13] “Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Note in vantung ki-ukna sungah mite a lut theih loh nadingin kong na khakcip uh hi. Note lah na lutnuam kei uh a, a lutnuamte lah na lutsak kei uh hi. [14] “Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Meigong numeite tungah nuamtak sa-in a neihsa teng uh laksakin na zangmang uh a, mite in mihoih hong saktheih nading na deihna-un thu saupipi na ngen uh hi. Hih bangin na gamtatna uh hangin na gim thuak ding uh nasiazaw kan lai ding hi. [15] “Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Note in mi khat bek nangawn na ngah zawh nading uh na hanciamna un leitung tuitung lumletin khual na zin uh a, na ngahsunte uh zong note zah nihin a siahuai, hell khuk tung ding mi na suah uh hi.

[23] “Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Note in Pasian tungah lengmasel, masala, le kummin sing namtui a kipanin meh namtui nam khempeuh, sawm-ah-khat pia napi-in, thukham sungah a thupizaw ahi thutang, hehpihna, le thumante na don kei uh hi. Adangte nusia tuan loin hih thute na zuih ding uh ahi hi. [24] A makai ding hinapi-in, mittaw bangin bangmah tum loteng thupi ngaihsutin, a thupiteng na nusiakha uh a, tui tawh na dawnkhop khak loh nadingun thovai khaih napi-in kalaoh a nawmvalhkha tawh na kibang uh hi. [25] “Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Note in hai le kuangte a pualam na siangsak uh a, ahi zongin tuate sungah, thatanghat thu le huaihamna tawh mi-a’ na suh uh nate a om hi. [26] A mittaw Farisi mite aw, a pualam zong a siangtho a suahtheih nadingin hai le kuang sunga a om nate a siangtho hisak phot un. [27] “Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Note pen leikang tawh a kizut manin a pualam a hoih mahmah tawh kibang napi-in a sungah misi guh le a kihhuai nin nam khempeuh a omna hankhuk tawh na kibang uh hi. [28] Tua mah bangin note zong mite’ muhin mihoih mahmah bang napi-in na sung tawng taktak uhah mawhna le kineihkhemna bek a om hi.
[51] a topa in nakpitakin gim pia-in, mihoih a kineihkhemte’ gimthuak dingteng thuaksak ding a, amah kapin a hagawi ding hi.

[6] Jesuh in amaute dawng a, “A tungthama a hoihin a kilangkhem note’ thu, Isaiah in a genkholhna man mahmah hi. Ama genna-ah, ‘Pasian in hih bangin gen hi: Hih mite in a kampi bek uh tawh kei hong zahtakbawl uh a, a lungsim taktak uh kei tawh kigamla hi. [7] Mihingte’ bawltawm thukhamte, Pasian’ thukham zahin mite tungah hilh uh ahih manin, kei hong biak hangun a kimanna om lo hi,’ ci hi.

[40] Meigong numeite tungah nuamtaksa-in a neihsate laksakin zangmang uh a, mite in mihoih a saktheih nading uh a deihna hangun thu saupipi a ngen uh hi. Amau’ kineihkhemna tawh kizui-in a gimthuak ding uh lianzaw ding hi,” a ci hi.
[22] Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih kineihkhemte le kamsang kineihkhemte hong piang ding a, ahih zawhleh, a teelsa mite nangawn a khem nadingun lim le na lamdangte hong bawl ding uh hi.
[26] “Mi khempeuh in note hong pahtakbawl ciangin gimna a thuak ding na hi uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a pu a pate un zong tua bangmahin kamsang zuaute a pahtakbawl uh hi.

[20] Tua ahih manin a hunhoih ngakin vil gige uh a, ukna aana a neite’ khut sungah Jesuh a aptheih nadingun ama kampau tawh a mat nopna-un, lungsim takpi tawh thudong a va kineihkhem dingin mi pawlkhat thukan dingin a cial uh hi.

[47] Meigong numeite tungah nuamtaksa-in, khemin a neihsateng uh laksak uh a, mite in mihoih a sak nading uh a deihna-un thu saupipi a ngen uh hi. Amau’ kineihkhemna tawh kizui-in a gimthuak ding uh lianzaw ding hi,” a ci hi.

[16] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Va ciahin na pasal va sam inla, hih lai-ah hong paikik un,” a ci hi. [17] Numei in, “Pasal ka nei kei hi,” a cih ciangin Jesuh in, ” ‘Pasal ka nei kei hi,’ na cih pen man mahmah hi. [18] Pasal nga na nei khin ngei a, tu-a na ompih zong na pasal hi lo hi. Tua ahih manin na thugen man mahmah hi,” a ci hi.
[30] Teembaw panin teembaw hawlte taikhiat sawm uh ahih manin teembaw tung panin gunkuang khiasuk uh a, teembaw mailam panin a khawl nading sikkawipi a khiasuk ding kineih uh hi.
[9] Na ki-itnate uh lungsim takpi tawh hi sak unla, a siate mudahin a hoihte lenkip un.
[2] Thuhilh siamna nei-in, thusim khempeuh thei-in, na khempeuh thei-in, mualte kinsak zawh nading upna ka neih hangin itna ka neih kei leh ka kimanna bangmah om lo hi.

[12] Note in na hong thupi ngaihsut theih nadingun koleko a hong kiphattawm zel ka hi kei uh a, lungsimtawng hoih lo napi-in a puatham siamna hangin a kisial mite nial thei-in, kote’ hangin note na kisaktheih nading uh deihna hizaw hi.

[13] Amaute pen sawltak taktak hi loin, sawltak a kineihkhemte hi uh a, a nasepna uhah zong zuau-in, Khrih’ sawltak taktak a battheih nadingun a mel kiseel ahi uh hi. [14] Tua pen lamdangsak ding hi lo hi. Satan nangawn Pasian’ vantungmi tawh a kibangin kibawltawm thei hi.
[8] Mi khatpeuh in a beh a phung, a diakdiakin a innkuansung mite a vak nop kei leh a upna a nusia hita a, thu um lo mite sangin siazaw lai hi.
[24] Mi pawlkhatte’ khialhnate kimu pahpahin mawhsakna thuakpah uh a, pawlkhatte’ khialhna pen damdamin hong kinung theih hi.

[5] biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deih lo ding uh hi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in. [6] Tua bang mite pawlkhat, mite inn-ah va hawh khiankhianin, deihna nam tuamtuam le mawhna lungsim tawh a kidim numeite na thuzawh uh hi.
[13] migilote le thuthei kineihin mi khem theite zong siattat semsemin, amaute in mi khemkhemin, amaute mah in zong khemna a thuak ding mah uh ahi hi.
[22] Nomau kikhem tawmin thu zak bek tawh maisak kei unla, na zak bangun zui-in semzaw un.
[26] Tua ahih manin hu a diik lo, hu a sang lo pumpi pen a si ahih mah bangin sepna tawh a kizom lo upna zong a si ahi hi.
[17] Ahi zongin tunglam panin a kingah pilna a siangtho ahi hi. Mi tawh kilem thei-in dik a, mi tawh kikhawl thei a, hehpihna lungsim nei-in gamtat hoih a, mi lang-et lo a, kineihkhem cihte om lo hi.
[8] Pasian kiang nai un. Amah in zong hong nai ding hi. Mawhneite in na khut uh silsiang unla, a kineihkhemte in na lungsim uh siangsak un.
[8] Itna in mawhna tampi khuhcip thei ahih manin lungsim takpi tawh khatlekhat ki-it ding thupi ngaihsut pha pen un.

[8] Mawhna ka nei kei hi, i cih leh eite a kineihkhem ihi a, eite a thutak lo ihi hi. [9] Ahi zongin Pasian kiangah i mawhnate va pulak lehang, amah citakin thuman ahih manin, i mawhnate hong maisakin i hoih lohnate khempeuh hong siangsak ding hi.

[1] Ka it lawmte aw, kha ka nei a ci mi khempeuh’ thugen um kei unla, tua thute Pasian kiang pan mah ahi hiam, ci-in kantel un. Bang hang hiam cih leh leitungah kamsang a kineihkhem tampi hong om khinta hi.

[4] Ka it tate aw, note, Pasian’ mite na hi uh a, tua bang kamsang kineihkhemte a zokhin na hi uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung mite a panpih dawimangpa sangin note hong ompih Pasian vanglian zaw hi.

[6] Tua ahih manin mun khatah a tengkhawm dingin leitang in amau tegel vak zo lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ gan neihsate tam mahmah ahih manin amau tegel tengkhawm thei lo uh a, [7] Abram’ gancingte le Lot’ gancingte kitawng thei zel hi. Tua hun laitakin Kanaan mite le Perez mite tua gamah teng lai uh hi. [8] Tua ciangin Abram in Lot’ kiangah, “Nang le kei’ kikal, nang’ gancingte le kei’ gancingte’ kikalah kitotna omsak kei ni. Bang hang hiam cih leh eite beh khat ihi hi.

[16] “Tua hun laitakin na thukhente uh ka thuhilh a, ‘Na sanggamte uh thu neihte za unla, mi khat le a sanggampa ahi a, amah tawh a om khualmipa tawh ahi zongin thu a mantakin khen un. [17] Thukhenna-ah angvan na nei kei ding uh hi. A neu le a liante a kibangin a thu na ngai ding uh a, maitang zahtak tuam na nei kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh thukhenna pen Pasian-a’ ahi hi. Note a dingin a haksa lua thute kei kiangah nong paipih ding uh a, keimah in tua thu ka za ding hi,’ ka ci hi.
[3] Tua bangin kiphatsakna tawh pau nawn kei inla, na kamsung pan kihihsakna gingkhiasak kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA pen a thei Pasian hi a, amah in gamtatnate a tawi khai hi.
[2] Mihai pa in a hehna sihlawh a, muhdahna in sihna piangsak hi.
[3] Ahi zongin note tawh kam a kinial hi loin, Pasian tawh a kinial ka hi hi. Pasian tawh hih ka thu ka kinial nuam hi.
[3] bangmah-a kimang lo kampaute pau lo a, phattuamna om lo dingpi-in thu seello uh hi.
[4] Lau-in ling unla, mawhna peel un. Na lupna tung uhah lungngai phapha unla, om khikhe un.
[11] Pasian, thu a tangin a khen pa hi a, migilote tungah a heh den pa ahi hi.
[30] Nangma tungah siatna bangmah a hong bawl lo, mi khatpeuh tawh thu om lopi-in kimawk tot kei in.

[7] Mihaite thuhilh lecin hong maizumsak ding a, migilote thuhilh lecin hong sugawp ding hi. [8] Mihaite thuhilh kei in; hong mudah ding uh hi. Mipilte thuhilh in; hong it ding uh hi. [9] Mipilte thuhilh lecin pil semsemna-in nei ding a, thuman mite thuhilh lecin a thutheihna uh khang semsem ding hi.
[8] Mipilte in thuhilhna mang a, a hai paute in lungkhamna tuak hi.
[14] Mipilte in a pilna uh behlapin, mihaite a pau ciangin thusia tawh kizom pahpah hi.
[15] Mihaite pen amau mah thuman kisa tawntung a, mipilte in mi’ thugenna ngai nuam uh hi. [16] Mihaite in a hehna uh langsakpah uh a, mipilte in a hehna uh ipzo hi.
[10] Hilh ding ut lo, kihihsakna in kitotna bek piangsak thei a, hong kithuhilh ding utna pen a hoihzaw ahi hi.
[1] Kam nemin dawnna in hehna damsak a, kam khauh in hehna piangsak hi.
[18] Lungtomna in kitotna piangsak a, lungduaina in kilemna piangsak hi.
[28] Mihoihte in a kampau ding ngaihsun phot a, migilote’ paupakna pen thusia tawh kizom hi.
[7] TOPA’ deih bangin gamtatna pen galte nangawn lawma kaihzawhna ahi hi.
[18] Kisaktheihna in siatna hong tuaksak a, kiphatsakna in pukna hong piangsak hi.
[32] Thahatna sangin lungduaina hoihzaw a, khuapi khat ukzawhna sangin eimah ki-ukzawhna hoihzaw hi.
[14] Kitot i kipat ciangin tui lipi cinna phung kehsakkhak tawh kibang hi. Tua ahih manin a nasiat ma-in kitot khawlpak in.

[27] Thu a thei taktakte in gengen khol lo a, a paupau khol lote thumu taktak hizaw hi. [28] Mihaite pau loin om leh a pil mahin kingaihsun hi. Thungaihsun thei na hihna a kilat nadingin pau loin om khinkhian in.

[1] Midangte tawh a kipawlthei pha lote amah bek thupi a kisate hi a, midangte’ cih khempeuh man a sak khat beek om lo hi. [2] Mihaite in thu a teltheih zawhna ding uh kin lo uh a, pil si, a kicih theih nading deihna bek tawh thu gen uh hi.
[13] A thu za khin nai lopi-in dawnkikna pen haina le maizumna ahi hi.

[11] Pilna in mi lungduaisak a, mi’ hong hehsaknate kiphawkmawh bawlna in minthanna ahi hi. [12] Kumpipa’ hehna humpinelkai hawk bangin lauhuai a, ama pahtakna lopa tunga daitui taak bangin deihhuai hi. [13] Tapa hai pen a pa’ lungkhamna hi a, zi phunphun pen a theu thei lo guahciin tawh kibang hi.
[3] Kitot khak ding pelhna in pahtak ngahna hi a, mihaite bek kitot ding ut uh hi.
[9] Phun bek a thei zi tawh inn sungah tenkhop sangin innkhumzang kiu khatah tangten’ hoihzaw tham hi.
[19] A phun hat zi gilo tawh tenkhop sangin gam simthamah khat guak tangten’ hoihzaw hi.
[23] Kampau a ki-ipzote lungkhamna tawh kipelh hi.
[10] Mi kiphasakte hawlkhia lecin kitotna le kisimmawhna bei pah ding hi.
[9] Mihaite pil hopih kei un; amaute in a manphatna phawk thei lo uh hi.
[24] Phun bek a thei zi tawh inn sungah tenkhop sangin innkhumzang kiu khatah tangten’ hoihzaw tham hi.
[17] Eite tawh a kisai lo kitotna sunga kiphumna pen ui ommuang khat a bil-in i kaihsak tawh kibang hi.
[21] Meihol in mei-am ding piangsak a, sing in mei kuangsak a, migilo in kitotna piangsak hi.
[4] Mihaite’ thudotna dawngdawng lecin nang zong amau mah bangin a hai na hi hi. [5] Mihaite a pilin a kingaihsut khak loh nadingin amau’ haina tawh kizui-in dawng zaw in.
[15] Phun bekbek a thei zi pen theu hun mel a nei lo guahciin tawh kibang hi.
[11] Mihai pa a hehna bangin kam pau-in gamta gawp a, mipil pa ahihleh ki-ipin a hehna damsak hi.
[22] A heh pahpahte in kitotna piangsak a, a heh baihte khial thei tawntung hi.
[25] Midangte kihtakna in hong lunghimawhsak a, TOPA muanna in hong lungmuangsak hi.
[17] A pa a simmawh mipa, a nu’ thu a mang nuam lo mipa, va-ak in a mittang khelkhiat sakin musanete in a sa ne ding uh hi.
[33] Bawngnawi toktok lehang thawhbat hong suak a, mi khat’ nak tupsak lehang si hong luang a, mi phin lehang kitotna hong piang hi.

[9] Mi khat sangin mi nih hoihzaw hi; amau’ sepna thaman a tamzaw ngah uh hi. [10] Bang hang hiam cih leh khat cimawh leh a khat in huh a, mi khat guak pen cimawh zenzen leh a huh ding om lo ahih manin a dahhuai pha mahmah ahi hi.

[2] Thu ngaihsun masa-in pau inla, Pasian’ tungah thu mawk ciampak kei in. Vantungah Pasian om a, leitungah nang om na hih manin na pau ding a kilawm zahval pau kei in. [3] Lunghimawh semsem lecin na mang sia semsem ding a, tam pau semsem lecin na haina kilang semsem ding hi.
[9] Heh pahpah kei in; hehna a haihuai ahi hi.
[21] Mi’ gen khempeuh thudon kei in. Na nasempa’ hong samsiatna na zakha ding hi. [22] Nang zong midang na samsiat zelzelna teltakin na kithei hi.

[9] Amah a Bawlpa tawh a kido mipa, beelseek pa tawh a kilehdo lei beel in gimna ngah ta hen! Tungman in amah a sek pa kiangah, “Nang in bang bawl na hi hiam, na na bawl in khutlet nei lo hi,” ci-in a thu sel ngam ahi hiam?
[4] Note in a kitawng ding, a kilai ding, gitloh gamtatin, khuttum tawh a kitum ding bekin an na tang uh hi. Hih bang lelin antanna tawh na thungetna uh hong kingai ding ahi hiam?
[3] gamlapi pek panin TOPA ka kilang hi. Keimah in nang kong it tawntung a, tua ahih manin nang’ tungah kong thuman tawntung hi.
[3] Mi nih, thukimna om masa lopi-in lampi-ah tonkhawm thei uh ahi hiam?
[7] Jesuh in, “Lai Siangtho mahah, ‘Na Topa Pasian na ze-et kei in,’ ci-in gen hi lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.

[3] “Kha thu lamah zawngkhal a kisate sungah vantung ki-ukna thu om ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi. [4] Dahin a thum a tau mite Pasian in amaute hehnem ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi. [5] A lungnem mite in Pasian’ ciamsa leitang ngah ding uh ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi. [6] Pasian’ deihteng sep ding a hanciamte Pasian in lungkimna ngahsak ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi. [7] Midang a hehpih mite tungah Pasian in hehpihna pia ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.

[23] Tua ahih manin Pasian tungah biakna a pia dingin biakna tau mai-ah na om laitakin na sanggamte khat peuhpeuh na tungah a lungkim lohna thu na phawk leh, [24] Pasian na biak nading nate, a biakna tau mai-ah nusia photin, pai-in na sanggampa tawh va kilem phot inla, tua khit ciangin hong paikikin Pasian biakna pia in.

[37] Na gen peuhmah ahi ahihleh, ‘Hi,’ ci inla, ahi lo ahihleh, ‘Hilo,’ cihna tawh kicingsak in. Tua bang hi loin kiciamna kam na zat ciangin Dawimangpa tawh kizomin thuman lo na hih lamtak hong kilang hi.

[25] “Tua ahih ciangin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na nuntak nadingun bang ne-in bang dawn ding cih ahi a, na pumpi uh a dingin bang silh ding cih ahi zongin lunghimawh lua kei un. Nuntakna pen an sangin thupizaw a, pumpi pen puan sangin thupizaw hi lo ahi hiam?
[3] Bang hangin na lawmte’ mit sunga ninthem tang muhsak thei napi-in nangma mit sunga singluang tang phawk thei lo na hi hiam?
[37] Bang hang hiam cih leh nomau kampauna tawh kizui-in thu hong kikhen ding a, dik hi, cihna ahi a, mawh hi, cihna ahi zongin na ngah nadingun nomau kampau mah hong kibulphuh ding hi,” a ci hi.

[15] “Na sanggamte uh na tung uhah hong khialh leh pai-in no tegel bek theihin a khialhna va gen un. Na thu uh a hong man’ leh na sanggampa uh a ngahkik na hi uh hi. [16] Ahi zongin na thu uh a hong mannop kei leh, Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Mi nih ahih kei leh mi thum’ theihna bek tawh mawhsakna khat peuhpeuh man pan hi,’ a cih mah bangin midang khat ahi a, nih ahi zongin tonpih un. [17] Amah in tua mite’ thu a mannop kei leh pawlpite tungah a thu ko un. Pawlpite’ thu nangawn a mannop kei leh Gentail mite le siahdongte bangin na ngaihsun un. [18] “Note kiangah a taktakin kong genin-ah: Leitungah na kham peuhmah uh vantungah zong kikham ding a, leitungah na phal peuhmah uh vantungah zong kiphal ding hi. [19] Leitungah note nih thukimin na nget uh na khat peuhpeuh, vantungah a om ka Pa in hong pia ding hi.
[14] Nungzui dangte’ omna-ah a tunkik uh ciangin tua lai-ah mi tampi tak na om uh hi. Thukham hilh sia pawlkhatte le nungzuite thu na kisel uh hi.
[1] Tua ciangin Jesuh in a nungzuite kiangah, “Mite a puktheih nading ze-etna hong piang hamtang ding hi. Ahi zongin tua puk nading a piangsak mipa in gimna ngah ding hi.

[60] A nungzuite nangawn un hih thu a zak ciangun, “Hih thugen haksa lua hi. Kua in zuizo ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. [61] Ahi zongin Jesuh in hih thu-ah a nungzuite’ phunna thei ahih manin, “Hih ka thugenna in note hong lungkiasak ahi hiam? [62] Mihing Tapa ama omna ngei-ah a ciahto kik a mu hi le-uhcin bang na ci ding uh hiam? [63] Nuntakna a piathei pen Pasian’ Kha hi a, mihingte’ hihtheih bangmah om lo hi. Keima hong gen thute pen nuntakna a hong piathei tua Kha thu ahi hi. [64] Tua hinapi-in note pawlkhat in na um kei uh hi,” a ci hi. (Jesuh in a kipat cil pek a kipanin kuateng in ama thu um ding a, kuateng in amah lehpei ding cih thu thei khinzo hi.) [65] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Ka Pa in ahi thei dingin bawl kei leh ka kiangah kuamah hong pai thei lo ding hi, ka cihna thu pen hih thu hang mah ahi hi,” ci-in a genthuah lai hi. [66] Hih bangin a thugenna hangin a nung a zui a thungai mi tampi kileh kikin Jesuh zui nawn lo uh hi. [67] Tua ahih manin Jesuh in a nungzui sawm le nihte kiangah, “Note zong na ciahkik nuam mai uh hiam?” a cih ciangin [68] Simon Peter in, “Topa aw, ciah le ung kua kiang zuan mawk ding ka hi uh hiam? Nangmah in nuntak tawntung nading thu na nei hi. [69] Tu-in nang ka hong um uh a, Pasian kiang panin a hong pai a Siangtho Pa na hihna thu ka hong thei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. [70] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Note na sawm le nih mahun ka hong teel hinapi-in khat pen dawi na suakmawk uh hi,” a ci hi. [71] Sawm le nihte sung panin amah a lehpei ding ahih manin Simon Iskariot’ tapa Judas thu a genna ahi hi.

[36] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Keima ukna pen hih leitung gam hi lo hi. Keima ukna hih leitung gam hileh Jerusalem khua-a Jew mi uliante’ khut sungah hong kipiak loh nadingin ka nungzuite in a do ding uh hi. Tua ahih manin keima ukna pen hih leitung tawh kizom lo hi,” a ci hi.

[11] Thesalonika khuamite sangin Berea khuamite in mipi lungsim neizaw uh hi. Amaute in lawp mahmahna tawh Paul’ thugente ngai uh a, Paul’ thugente man taktak hiam ci-in a theih nadingun nisimin Lai Siangtho a sim uh hi.

[1] Tua ahih ciangin midangte’ thu a khen note pen kuakua hita le-uh cin na suakta tuan kei ding uh hi. Midangte na mawhsakna uh thute mah note zong gamta veve na hih manun, no zong a mawh mah na hi uh hi.
[1] Tua ahihleh Jew mite in Gentail mite sangin bang hamphatna neizaw a, vun ki-atna in bang phattuamna nei ahi hiam?
[9] Note sungah Pasian’ Kha Siangtho hong om nakleh nomau pumpi deihna bangin gamta loin Kha Siangtho deihna bangin na gamta ding uh hi. Khrih lungsim a nei lote Khrih tawh kipawl lo hi.

[1] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Pasian in eite tam veipi tak hong hehpih ahih manin ama lungkim nading le ama nasep nadingin nomau mahmah a hingtangin Pasian tungah na kipiak nadingun ka hong thum hi. Tua banga kipiakna pen Pasian biakna man taktak ahi hi. [2] Leitung mihingte’ gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahphasak un. Tua hileh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkimsakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian’ deihna na phawk thei ding uh hi.
[5] Tua mah bangin eite mi tampi ihih hangin pumkhat ihi a, pumpi nate bangin khatlekhat a kizom ciat ihi hi.

[17] Midangte’ gitlohnate thukkik kei unla, mi khempeuh in hoih hi, ci-in a ngaihsut ding bangin gamta un. [18] Ahih theih laiteng mi khempeuh tawh na kilem nadingun hanciam un. [19] Lawmte aw, na hehna uh kuama tungah thukkik kei unla, Pasian’ thukkik dingin koih lel un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho sungah, “Keimah in amaute tungah ka thuk ding a, midangte a gimsak bangun ka gimsak ding hi, Topa in ci hi,” ci-in kigelh hi.
[1] Upna neu mite pawlbawl unla, na ngaihsutna uh a kituah kei leh zong mawhsak kei un.
[19] Tua ahih ciangin mi tawh kilem theih nading le kha thu-ah khatlekhat thahatna i kipiak theih nading thute hanciam ciat ni.

[5] Note in lungsim kikhatin i Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pa ahi Pasian na phatkhawm theih nadingun Pasian in thuakzawhna le thahatna hong pia hen la, Jesuh Khrih deihna bangin gamta-in khatlekhat kithutuak takin hong omsak tahen.
[11] Bang hang hiam cih leh sanggamte aw, note lakah kitot kiselna a omna thu, Khloe’ innkuanpih mite in kei kiangah hong gen uh hi.

[14] Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho a nei lo mite in Pasian’ Kha Siangtho in a hong piak nate sang thei lo uh hi. Kha Siangtho a nei mite bek in theithei uh ahih manin amaute in tel thei lo uh a, amau a dingin a haihuai thu khat ahi lel hi.

[3] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ deihna bangin gamta loin, leitung lungsim deihna bangin gamta lai na hih manun upna sungah naungek bang ahi lai na hi uh hi. Note khatlekhat kihaza-in kitawng kiselin na om uh ciangin hih leitung mite mah a bang lel na hihna uh hong kilang hi.
[7] Note khatlekhat zum na kitut mahmah uh zong a gina het lo na hihna uh hong kilangsak hi. Bang hangin thuakzaw mai lo a, sum ngamzaw mai lo na hi uh hiam?
[8] Itna pen a tawntungin a kip ahi hi. Thuhilh siamna a om tei hangin tawlkhat sung bek kimangin, pau lamdang pautheih siamnate a om hangin bei ding a, thutheih siamna a om hangin maimang ding hi.

[26] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, ka hong gennop thu a tomin: Pasian bia dingin note na kikhop uh ciangin khat in la sak ding nei, khat in Pasian’ thu a gen ding nei, khat in pau lamdang tawh thugen ding nei, khat in tua a kigente a khiatna gentheih nading nei cih bangin na om ding uh hi. Hih a tuamtuamte khempeuh, pawlpi’ phattuam nading ahih ding kisam hi.

[3] Kote pen leitungah a teng mi ka hi mah uh hi; ahi zongin leitung lungsim ngimna tawh galdo ka hi kei uh hi. [4] Kote’ zat galdona hiam pen leitung galhiam lelte hi lo a, galte’ panmun phualpi a susiazo ding Pasian’ galhiam khauhte ahi hi. [5] Mite’ ngaihsutna a man lote ka thalnial gawpzo uh a, Pasian’ thu theih nading a khaktan thei nate ka susiagawp uh a, mi khempeuh’ ngaihsutna zo gawpin Khrih’ thu a mang dingin ka bawl uh hi.

[20] Bang hang hiam cih leh note kiangah ka hong tun ciangin note’ omzia ding ka deih bangin na om loh khak ding uh le note in keima maisuah na muhnopzia bangun na hong muh loh khak ding uh ka lunghimawh hi. Note lakah kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, mi zahpihna, mi gensiatna, kiphatsakna, le buaina a omkhak ding ka lunghimawh hi.

[22] Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho’ sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna, [23] dikna le pumpi ki-ukzawhna hi a, hih bangin a gamta mite, Thukham in bangmah cih thei lo hi.

[7] Pasian a kikhemzo dingin ngaihsunkha kei un. Mi khempeuh in ama vawh nam khaici mah ngahkik ding hi. [8] Mi khatpeuh in ama leitung pumpi deihna khaici a vawh leh sihna ngah ding a, Kha Siangtho deihna khaici a vawh leh Kha Siangtho tung panin nuntak tawntungna ngah ding hi.

[15] itna lungsim tawh thutak genin, lutang ahi Khrih tawh i kibat dongin i khangto ding hi.
