[16] Ama ukna mangin pumpi na a tuamtuamte a kituak takin kizom a, amaute limtakin a kizop dimdiamna hangin pumpi pen pumkhat a suak thei hi. Pumpi na a tuamtuamte in amau’ sep ding ciat hoihtakin a sep uh ciangin itna hangin pumpi khangin a cingtaak a suak thei hi.

[26] Na heh uh ciangin, tua hehna hangin khialkha kei unla, a tawntungin heh paisuak kei un. [27] Dawimangpa in hong suksiat theih nading hun omsak kei un. [28] Guta ngeite in gu nawn loin, ama nuntak nading thuman takin thalawhin, mizawngte zong a huhtheih lai nadingin thatang tawh nasep ding kipan ta uh hen. [29] Na kiho uh ciangin kamguh zang kei unla, na pauna uh a za mite in phattuamna a ngahtheih nadingin na-in a kimang kam hoihte bek na pau un.
[32] khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim nem tawh na kihozaw unla, Khrih’ hangin Pasian in note’ mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.
[6] Hih bang mawhnate i bawl hangin phamawh kei, ci-in a mawk gen mite’ khemsa-in ta kei un. Pasian thu mang loin hih bangin a gamta mite in Pasian’ hehna a thuak ding uh ahi hi.

[3] Huaihamna lungsim le kisialh nopna lungsim tawh bangmah gamta kei un. Kiniamkhiat ciat unla, midangte thupi ngaihsutzaw un. [4] Note’ phattuam nading bek ngaihsun kei unla, midangte’ phattuam nading ngaihsutsak zaw un.

[14] Na khempeuh phun lo, thu nial loin sem un. [15] Tua hileh a lungsim kawi, a hoih lo leitung mite lakah paubaanna a nei lo a siangtho, Pasian’ tate na hi ding uh a, nuntakna thu na genna uh hangin leitung mite lakah khuavak bangin na hoihna uh a kilang mite na hi ding uh hi. [16] Tua hileh a beisa hunah ka sepna le ka hanciamnate a mawkna suak lo ding ahih manin Khrih hong paikik ni ciangin kei ka kisial thei ding hi.
[2] Euodia le Sintikhe, Topa’ hangin a kilemkik ding uh ka thum nuam hi.

[7] Note pen hih bangin gamta-in a nungta ngeite na hi uh hi. [8] Ahi zongin tu-in hehna, thangpaihna, muhdahna, gensiatna, kam hoih lo pauna cihte nei nawn kei un. [9] Ngeina lui le gamtatna lui khempeuh a beisakkhin na hihna uh kithei-in khatlekhat tungah zuauthu kigen nawn kei unla,
[16] Khrih thu a cingtakin note lungsimah hong om hen la, pilna tawh khatlekhat thu kihilhin na kitai un. Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Thuciam Lui sunga late, la thakte, le biakna late na sa un.
[11] Tu ma-a ka hong gensa uh mah bangin kamtam nuam se loin hoihtakin om hithiatna, no tawh a kisai thu bek ngaihsutna, le note’ nuntak nading na na sep nading uh hanciamin nei un.

[2] Tua ahih manin siate pen paubaanna a nei lo mi, zi khat bek a nei mi, lungsim hoih hithiat mi, thu a ngaihsun thei mi, a kilawm a kituakin a gamta mi, zin le leengla do a siam mi, thuhilh a siam mi, [3] zu a kham lo mi, a ngongtat lo mi, lungsimnem mi, kitot a uk lo mi, sum a deihlua lo mite hi ding uh hi.

[3] Topa Jesuh Khrih thu tawh a kituak lo, i biakna paizia tawh a kilehngatin thu tuamdang a hilh mite pen, [4] a kiphasak mawkmawk hi uh a, bangmah a thei het lo ahi uh hi. Tua bang mite in thu kisel thu kinial cihte ut belin nei uh a, hazatna, lungsim kituah lohna, kizahkona, a sia lamin ki-upmawhnate piangsak uh a, [5] thuman thutak zui loin, a lungsim paizia uh a man nawn lo, biakna pen hauhtheih nading lampi bekin a ngaihsun mite in a tawntungin kitot kiselna a piangsak uh ahi hi.

[20] Timoti aw, nang tungah a hong kipia thute hoihtakin na zui in. Mi pawlkhatte in, “Thu theihna,” ci-in a ngaihsutkhak uh, Pasian’ thu tawh a kituak lo, thu kihai selnate na pelh in. [21] Mi pawlkhatte in tua bang pilna a nei-in kingaihsun uh a, upna thu bulpi khahsuahna-in a nei uh hi. Note khempeuh tungah Pasian’ dikna thupha hong tung tahen.

[14] Na mite thu kinialin a kitot loh nadingun Pasian’ mai-ah thupi takin na hilhkhol in. Tua bang thu kinialna in a za mite phattuamna ngahsak loin a siasak bek ahi hi. [15] Pasian’ thuman a mantakin hilhin, na nasepna-ah maizumna thuak loin, Pasian’ pahtakna na ngahtheih nadingin na siam tawpin hanciam in. [16] Pasian tawh mite a kigamlasak semsem thei thu ginalo, a haihuai thu kikup thu kiselnate na pelh in.

[23] Thu kihai seelna, thei lo pi-a thu kinialnate na pelh in. Tua bangte in kitotna a piansak lamtak na theihsa ahi hi. [24] Topa’ na a sem mite, kitot a hatte hi lo ding a, mi khempeuh tungah lungsim nemin, thugen siamin, thuakzawhna nei-in, [25] thunem tawh a langte’ hoih lohna a puahtheite hi ding hi. Tua bang hileh Pasian in amaute kisiksak thei ding a, thuman thutak hong thei-in,

[16] Pasian’ na a sem mite mi cingtaak hi-in, na hoih namkim a septheih nadingun Lai Siangtho pen Pasian’ lamlahna tawh a hong kipia hi a, thuman thutak hilh nading, a khialte taii nading, a man lote a manin puah nading, a manin nuntak theih nading thuhilh nadingin a manpha mahmah ahi hi. [17] Pasian’ na a sem mite mi cingtaak hi-in, na hoih namkim a septheih nadingun Lai Siangtho pen Pasian’ lamlahna tawh a hong kipia hi a, thuman thutak hilh nading, a khialte taii nading, a man lote a manin puah nading, a manin nuntak theih nading thuhilh nadingin a manpha mahmah ahi hi.
[2] hunhoih hunsia cih khen tuan loin Pasian’ thu hilh ding na kin ngaihsut nading, lungduaina tawh mite’ lungsim zo-in, mite taii-in, hanthawnin na hilh nadingin thu a hong pia ka hi hi.

[7] Nangma pumpi mahmah gamtat hoihna a kipan thu khempeuhah etteh hoih dingin na om in. Lungsim takpi tawh mite’ zahtaktheih dingin thu na hilh inla, [8] mite’ mawhmat theih loh ding kamhoihte na zang in. Tua hileh i langte in hong gensiat theih nading mu loin a mai uh zum lel ding hi.

[1] Na mite in hong uk kumpite le aana neite’ thu mangin, thuhoih khempeuh a sem dingin a kigingsa-in a om ding uh phawksak inla, [2] kuamah gensia loin, mite tawh kilemin kikhawl thei-in, lungsim nemin, mi khempeuh tungah a dik nading uh na gen in.
[9] Ahi zongin a haihuai thu kiselna, min kigual deudau khangsimna, kitotna, thukham kitotlawhna cihte na pelh in. Tuate a kimanna a om lo, a mawkna thu hi lel hi.

[19] Sanggamte aw, note in na theih ding uh ka deih thu in: Thu kigen khempeuh hoihtakin ngai pahpah un. Ahi zongin pau pahpah kei unla, heh pakpak kei un. [20] Mihingte’ hehna in Pasian’ sep ding thuhoihte khaktan hi.

[5] Tua mah bangin leii zong i pumpi na sung panin a neu mahmah khat hinapi-in thusia lianpipi piangsak zo hi. Gam khempeuh zong mei-ek neuno khat pan kipanin a kangtum thei hi. [6] Leii pen mei tawh kibang hi. I pumpi na sung panin a neuno khat hinapi-in i pumpi buppi a sia suahthei a, hell khuk sung panin a hong piang mei tawh i nuntakna buppi hong kangtumsak thei hi. [7] Mihingte in gamsa, vasa, a bokvak ganhing le tui sunga om ngasate a kipan ganhing khempeuh zualsakin ukzo uh hi. [8] Ahi zongin siattheih nading gukhal tawh a kidim, a omkhong thei lo leii pen zualsakin a ukzo kuamah om lo hi. [9] I leii tawh eite’ pa ahi Topa i phat thei a, Pasian tawh a kisunin a kibawl i mipihte zong tua i leii mah tawh i samsia thei hi. [10] Kam khat sung panin thupha le thusia pusuak khawm hi. Sanggamte aw, hih bang ahi ding hi het lo hi. [11] Tuinak khat panin tui lim le tui lim lo hong luangkhia khawm thei ahi hiam?
[17] Ahi zongin tunglam panin a kingah pilna a siangtho ahi hi. Mi tawh kilem thei-in dik a, mi tawh kikhawl thei a, hehpihna lungsim nei-in gamtat hoih a, mi lang-et lo a, kineihkhem cihte om lo hi.

[1] Note lakah a om kitotna le kilaina koi panin hong piang ahi hiam? Deihluatna lungsim na neih manun note’ pumsung a kitoktok niloh ahi hi. [2] Na na deih uh a, ahi zongin nei lo na hih manun mi na thatnuam uh hi. Nate deihna lungsim na nei uh a, ahi zongin ngah zo lo na hih manun kitawngin na kilailawh uh hi. Pasian kiangah na deih uh ngen lo na hih manun a ngah lo na hi uh hi. [3] Pasian kiangah na nget sun uh ciangin zong note’ nopsak nading bek ngenin, na ngaihsutna uh man lo ahih manin a ngah lo na hi uh hi.
[6] Lai Siangtho in, “Pasian in a kihisakte nial a, a kiniamkhiatte a hehpih hi,” a cih mah bangin Pasian’ hong hehpihna lianzaw hi.
[17] A hoih a manin gamtat ding thei napi-in a gamta lote a khial ahi hi.
[9] Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note tungah thu hong khenkhak loh nadingin khatlekhat na kiphunsan kei un. Thukhen ding pa hong nai mahmah ta a, hong tung dektak ta hi.

[15] Na lungsim sung uhah Khrih zahtakbawl unla, amah Topa-in nei un. Note’ lametna thu a hong dong a omkhak leh hoihtakin a genthei dingin kiging tawntung unla, ahi zongin lungnemna le zahtakna lim tawh gen un.
[14] Khrih nungzui hihna hangin mite’ kosiatna na thuak uhleh note sungah a minthang Kha Siangtho ahi Pasian’ Kha Siangtho hong om ahihna lim ahih manin a hampha mahmah na hi uh hi.
[18] Ka it tate aw, i kampi bek tawh ki-it loin, lungsim takpi tawh ki-itin i gamtatna tawh kilangsak ni.

[2] A thupiakte na zui uh hiam, na zui kei uh hiam cih a theih nadingin note hong niamkhiatin, na lungsim uhah bang om hiam cih a theih nadingin TOPA na Pasian un sehnel gamah hih kum sawmli sung note hong paipihna lampi khempeuh na ciamteh ding uh hi.

[29] “Keima mai-ah bangzahin Ahab a kiniamkhiatna na mu hiam? Keima mai-ah amah kiniamkhiat ahih manin ama hun sungin siatna ka tungsak kei ding hi. Ahih hangin a tapa’ hun sungin ama innkuan tungah siatna ka tungsak ding hi,” a ci hi.

[14] keima minin a kisam ka mite amau mahmah kiniamkhiatin, thu ngenin ka mai hong zong a, amau’ gitlohnate panin a kihei uhleh, keimah in vantung panin ka za ding a, amaute’ khialhna maisakin a leitang uh ka hoihsakkik ding hi.

[7] Amaute a kiniamkhiatna thu TOPA in a muh ciangin Shemaiah’ tungah TOPA’ thu hong tung hi: “Amaute kiniamkhiat ahih manin ka susia kei ding hi. Amaute ka suaktasak liailiai tei ding a, Shishak’ khut tawh Jerusalem tungah ka hehna a cingin ka tungsak kei ding hi.
[33] TOPA zahtakna pen pilna mah hi pah a, kiniamkhiatna in pahtawina hong ngahsak hi.
[11] Pilna in mi lungduaisak a, mi’ hong hehsaknate kiphawkmawh bawlna in minthanna ahi hi.
[6] Hong satte, ka nung ka dawh a, ka khamul-in a hong kai mite, ka paang ka dawh hi. Maizumna le cilphihna panin ka maitang ka hei kei hi.

[2] Hih nate khempeuh keima bawlsa ahih manin hih nate khempeuh keima-a’ ahi hi, TOPA in ci hi. Ahih hangin kiniamkhiatin, lungsim a kitamzan mipa, keima thu-ah lau-in a ling kelkel pa, keima deih mipa ahi hi.

[12] Tua ciangin amah in, “Daniel aw, lau kei in. Kiniamkhiat dingin na lungsim na khensat masak pen ni a kipan, tua thu na theihtheih nadingin Pasian in na thungetna a hong zazo hi. Na thungetna bang a hong pia dingin ka hong pai hi.

[8] Mun khempeuhah a om no mihingte aw, TOPA in a hoih nate hong gen khinzo hi. TOPA in note tung panin hong kalh thu in: Thuman thutang sem ding a, itna kip nei tawntungin, kiniamkhiatna tawh Pasian’ thu man’ ding ahi hi.

[3] Kiniamkhiatin, TOPA’ thupiakna a mang Judah gammi khempeuh aw, TOPA’ kiang zuan un. A manin gamta unla, kiniamkhiat un. Tua hileh TOPA’ hehna hong kilat ciangin, tua hehna hangin gimna panin na peng khathei ding uh hi.

[3] “Kha thu lamah zawngkhal a kisate sungah vantung ki-ukna thu om ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi. [4] Dahin a thum a tau mite Pasian in amaute hehnem ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi. [5] A lungnem mite in Pasian’ ciamsa leitang ngah ding uh ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.

[28] “Na semin vangik pua-in a gim mite khempeuh aw, ka kiangah hong pai ta un. Note tungah lungsim tawldamna ka hong pia ding hi. [29] Keima hakkol zamin kisuan unla, kei kiangah hong kisin dih un. Kei pen kiniamkhiatin nem hithiat ka hih manin ka kiangah na tawl uh a dam ding hi.

[3] “A man mahmahin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Note kikheelin naupang na bat kei uhleh vantung ki-ukna sungah na lut ngei kei ding uh hi. [4] Hih naupang bangin a kiniamkhiat mite, vantung ki-ukna sungah a lianpen hi ding hi.
[12] A kiliansakte khempeuh in niamkhiatna thuak ding uh a, a kiniamkhiatte khempeuh a lianin kibawl ding hi.

[34] Kua lianpen ihi hiam, ci-in lampi-ah amau khatlekhat kisel uh ahih manin kuamah in dawng ngam lo uh hi. [35] Tua ciangin Jesuh tu a, a kiangah nungzui sawm le nihte samin, “Mi khat peuhpeuh a lianpen a suahnop leh a neupen suak photin mi khempeuh’ nasem hi masa ding hi,” a ci hi.

[47] hong Hon Pasian’ hangin ka nuam mahmah hi. [48] Bang hang hiam cih leh a neu mahmah a nasemnu, keimah a hong phawk hi. Tu a kipanin a khangkhangin mi khempeuh in thupha ngah nu hong ci ding uh hi.
[11] Bang hang hiam cih leh a kiliansakte khempeuh in niamkhiatna thuak ding uh a, a kiniamkhiatte khempeuh a lianin kibawl ding hi,” a ci hi.

[12] Nipikal khatin ni nih sung an ka tang a, ka ngah khempeuh sung panin sawm-ah-khat nang tungah kong pia hi,’ a ci hi. [13] Ahi zongin siahdongpa pen a gamla simah ding a, vantung lamah zong dak ngam loin a dip humin kuncip a, ‘Pasian aw, kei mimawh mi khial pa hong hehpih in,’ ci-in a ngen hi. [14] Ke’n kong cihin-ah, hih mipa pen Pasian tawh a kilemsa-in a inn-ah ciah a, a khat pa pen tua bangin ciah lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a kiliansakte pen kiniamkhiatsuk ding a, a kiniamkhiatte pen a lianin kibawl ding hi,” a ci hi.

[26] Ahi zongin note lakah tua bang hi lo ding hi; a lianpen pa a neupen bangin om ding a, a makai pen pa a nungzui nunungpen bangin om ding hi. [27] Anne dingin sabuai-ah a tupa le an a piapa kua lianzaw ahi hiam? Anne dingin a tupa lianzaw mah hi. Ahi zongin kei pen note lakah anpia-in na a sempa bangin ka hong om hi.
[30] Amah lian semsem ding a, kei ka hih leh ka neu semsem ding hi.
[4] Pasian migi-in thu a diah hithiatna pen na kisikkik theih nading uh a deihna ahih lamtak phawkkha loin, a migitna, a lungduaina, a hong thuaknate neu ngaihsutkha na hi uh hiam?
[18] Note khatpeuh hih leitung ngeina-ah a pilin na kingaihsut uhleh a pil taktak na hih theih nadingun a hai na suak phot un.

[4] Itna neite a lungduai-in migi hi. Itna neite in hazatna lungsim nei loin, zong kisathei lo hi. [5] Itna neite a kilawm loin gamta lo, heh pakpak lo, mite’ mawhna ciamteh lo hi. [6] Thuman lote-ah lungdam ngei lo uh a, thumante bekah lungdam uh hi. [7] Itna neite lungkia cih om ngei lo hi; a upna, a lametna, lungduai takin a ngaknate uh a mawkna cih om ngei lo hi. [8] Itna pen a tawntungin a kip ahi hi. Thuhilh siamna a om tei hangin tawlkhat sung bek kimangin, pau lamdang pautheih siamnate a om hangin bei ding a, thutheih siamna a om hangin maimang ding hi.

[11] Note in kei a hong pakta ding hinapi-in hong pakta lo na hih manun note’ bawlin mihai bangin kisialin ka gamta hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen bangmahpi ka hihloh hangin sawltak thupi mahmahin na ngaihsutte uh sangin themkhat zong ka neuzaw tuan het kei hi. [12] Sawltak man taktak ka hihna lim a kilangsak nate, note lakah lungduai takin hong kisem a, lim, nalamdang, le na a tuamtuamte note lakah hong kibawl hi.

[22] Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho’ sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna, [23] dikna le pumpi ki-ukzawhna hi a, hih bangin a gamta mite, Thukham in bangmah cih thei lo hi.
[2] Kiniamkhiatin, thunemin, lungduai-in om tawntung un. Khatlekhat kihuhna tawh na ki-itna uh kilangsak un.

[3] Huaihamna lungsim le kisialh nopna lungsim tawh bangmah gamta kei un. Kiniamkhiat ciat unla, midangte thupi ngaihsutzaw un. [4] Note’ phattuam nading bek ngaihsun kei unla, midangte’ phattuam nading ngaihsutsak zaw un. [5] Note in Jesuh Khrih lungsim puakzia na nei un. Tua lungsim puak zia in: [6] Jesuh Khrih in Pasian’ pianzia nei napi-in, Pasian tawh a kizakim theihna dingin thatanghat thu a suang kei hi. [7] Amah kiniamkhiat tawm zaw a, nasem lim a hong puazaw hi. Mihing bangin amah hong kibawl a, mihing teekteek mah a hong sun hi. [8] Amah hong kiniamkhiat tawm a, singlamteh tung nangawnah sih ding a ut hi. [9] Hih thu hangin Pasian in a lianpenin amah koih a, min lian dang khempeuh sangin a min lianzaw-in a koih hi. [10] Tua ahih manin vantung, leitung, leinuai-a om mi khempeuh in Jesuh pahtawi-in khukdin ding uh a, [11] Jesuh Khrih in Topa ahi hi, ci-in taangko-in Pa Pasian a min thangsak ding uh hi.

[12] Pasian in note hong itin, hong teelin, ama mi siangthote hikhin na hih manun note pen hehpihna nei-in, migi-in, kiniamkhiatin, dikin, na lungduai ding uh ahi hi. [13] Note lakah khatlekhat a kilungkim lo na om uh ciangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh kimaisakin na kihuh ciat un. Topa in note’ mawhna hong maisak bangin note zong khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ding uh hi. [14] Hihte khempeuh banah, mi khempeuh kilem takin a hong om khawmsak thei ahi ki-itna na bulphuh un.
[11] Numeite in gamdai takin kiniamkhiatna tawh thu ngai-in a sin ding uh ahi hi.
[36] Pasian’ deihna bangin gamta-in, ama thuciam na ngahtheih nadingun lungduai-in thuakzawhna na kisam uh hi.
[6] Lai Siangtho in, “Pasian in a kihisakte nial a, a kiniamkhiatte a hehpih hi,” a cih mah bangin Pasian’ hong hehpihna lianzaw hi.
[10] Topa mai-ah kiniamkhiat un. Tua hileh amah in hong lian bawl ding hi.

[7] Hih bang thuaknate in a um takpi mah na hihna uh hong kilangsak hi. A siathei khamte nangawn, a hoih taktak mah ahi hiam, ci-in mite in mei tawh sin uh ahih manin, kham sangin a manphazaw note’ upna zong a kiptak mah ahi hiam, ci-in Pasian in hong sin ding mah ahi hi. Tua bangin na thuakzawh uhleh Khrih hong kilat Ni ciangin phatna, minthanna, le pahtawina na ngah ding uh hi.
[8] A tawpna-ah kong gennop thu in: Lungsim le ngaihsutna kikhat nei-in unau ki-itna lungsim nei unla, migi-in kiniamkhiat un.

[18] Khrih mahmah zong note a dingin si a, Pasian’ kiangah hong tunpih theih nadingin mihoih khat pen mihoih lote’ mawhna hangin khatvei a si hi. Mite in ama leitung pumpi that a, ahi zongin Pasian in kha nuntakna a pia hi. [19] Tua kha nuntakna tawh va pai-in thongkia-in a om khate kiangah thu a va hilh hi. [20] Noah in teembaw a bawl hun laitakin Pasian in lungduai takin ngak hinapi-in hih kha a nei mite pawlkhat in Pasian’ thu mang lo uh hi. Teembaw sungah a om mi giat bek, tui in a suaktasak hi. [21] Tui pen note a hong honkhia tuiphumna lim hi a, pumpi panin nin sawpkhiatna lim hi loin, Jesuh Khrih thawhkikna hangin lungsim siantho nadingin Pasian’ tungah kamciamna lim ahi hi. Tua Jesuh thawhkikna in note hong honkhia ahi hi. [22] Tu-in vantungah tua Khrih pai khin a, Pasian’ taklamah omin, vantung mite le ukna aana a neite khempeuh tungah a ukin a om hi.

[5] Tua mah bangin no khangnozaw deuhte in zong a khanghamte’ thu na mang un. Lai Siangtho in, “Pasian in a kiphasak mite nial a, a kiniamkhiat mite a hehpih hi,” a cih mah bangin na vekpi-un kiniamkhiatna puan bangin silhin, khatlekhat na na kisepsak un. [6] Pasian in ama hoihsak hun ciangin note hong laptoh theih nadingin a thahat Pasian’ khutnuai-ah kiniamkhiatin na om un.
[9] Tua ahih manin Topa in tua bang mihoihte a gimna uh panin suakta sakin, tua bang migilote Thukhen Ni hun dongin gimna pia-in a koihcip theih nading siamna a nei hi.

[3] Tua ahih ciangin, Kanaan leitangah Abram kum sawm a ten khit ciangin Abram’ zi Sarai in Egypt mi a sila numei Hagar la-in a pasal Abram’ tungah zi-in a pia hi. [4] Amah in Hagar luppih a, Hagar gai hi. Amah a gai lam a kitheih ciangin kiphasakin a tonu simmawh bawl hi.
[28] Nangmah in mi niamte na honkhia a, ahih hangin a kiphasakte na niamkhiat hi.

[10] Benhadad in ama kiangah mi sawlin, “Samaria leitang pen kei hong zui khempeuh’ khutkuak a dimzawh taak leh, pasian-te in kei hong dawm kei ta hen,” a ci hi. [11] Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in dawngin, “Ama kiangah gen un: ‘Gal a zawh khit ciangin galhiam a suahkhia pa bangin galsim dingin galhiam a kuah lai pa kiphasak kei hen,’ ci un,” a ci hi. [12] Bukte sungah kumpite tawh zu ne-in Benhadad a om laitakin hih thu a zak ciangin amah in a mite kiangah, “Panmun la un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in khuapi a simgawp dingin panmun a la uh hi.

[25] Ahih hangin a lungsim kiphasak ahih manin ama tungah phattuamna a kibawl zahin TOPA’ tungah Hezekiah in lungdam ko nuam lo hi. Tua ahih manin amah le Judah le Jerusalem tungah TOPA’ hehna hong tung hi.
[29] Pasian in mi kiphasakte niamkhiat a, mi niamte a hon hi.
[17] Mite in khialhna a bawl nawn lohna ding, mi kiphasakte a suahkhak loh nading, Pasian in a deihna hangin mite kiangah thu a gen hi.
[11] A kiphasak mite en inla, na hehna tawh amaute niamkhiat gawp in. [12] Mi kiphasakte en inla, amaute niamkhiat gawp in. Migilote khempeuh a omna mun munah tuancil in.
[27] Bang hang hiam cih leh mi niamte na honkhia a, ahih hangin mi kiphasakte na niamsak hi.
[29] Hi hi, a kiphasak mi khempeuh ama mai-ah kunsuk ding uh a, a sithei mihing khempeuh ama mai-ah kun ding uh hi.

[35] Lebanon taamtak sing bangin a sang pha mahmah migilo kiphasak khat keimah in ka mu hi. [36] Ama kiangah ka paikik a, amah na om nawn lo hi. Amah ka zonzon hangin kimuzo nawn lo hi. [37] Paubaang lo mi ciamteh inla, thutang mi en in; bang hang hiam cih leh gal a phuang lo mi a dingin nopna a om hi. [38] Ahih hangin thupalsatte kisusiamang khin ding a, migilote’ suanlekhakte kipuaseh ding hi.
[4] TOPA a muang a, mi kiphasakte lamah a kihei lo, pasian man lote lamah a pialkhia lo mi thupha ngah ahi hi.

[2] Pasian aw, ka thungetna hong za inla, ka kampaute hong ngai in. [3] Bang hang hiam cih leh mi kiphasakte in kei hong langpang uh a, mi helhhawtte in thah dingin hong zong uh hi. Amaute in Pasian thudon lo uh hi. [4] Pasian, kei hong huhpa hi a, TOPA, kei hong hupa ahi hi.

[4] A kiphasakte tungah, “Kiphasak kei un,” a gilote tungah, “Kihisak kei un. [5] Kihisak kei unla, kiphatsakna tawh kampau kei un,” ka ci hi. [6] Bang hang hiam cih leh vangliatna pen nisuahna lam ahi a, nitumna lam ahi a, gamlak pan ahi zongin a hong pai hi lo hi. [7] Mihing khat a sangsak, mihing khat a niamsak thukhen pa pen Pasian ahi hi.

[2] Bang hang hiam cih leh na galte in gamlumna piangsak uh a, nang hong mudahte kiphasak mahmah uh hi. [3] Amaute in khem siamna tawh na mite thangsiah uh a, amaute in na it mite langpangin thu kikum uh hi.
[2] Tho in, leitung thukhen pa aw, a kiphasak mite tungah amau’ ngah ding a kilawm gimna pia ta in.
[21] Nangmah in na thupiaknate panin a pialkhia, a kisamsiat, a kiphasakte na thuhilh hi.
[51] Mi kiphasakte in kei hong zahko gawp uh a, ahih hangin nangma thupiakna panin kei ka pial kei hi.
[69] Mi kiphasakte in kei’ thu, zuau vive gengen uh a, ahih hangin keimah in ka lungsim khempeuh tawh na thuhilhte ka zui hi.
[78] Mi kiphasakte zahhuaisak in. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in khemna tawh kei hong lumlet uh hi. Ke’n ahihleh na thuhilhte ka lungngaingai ding hi.
[85] Nangma thu a zui lo, mi kiphasakte in keimah hong siahna-in gum a to uh hi. [86] Nangma thupiakte khempeuh man taktak hi. Amaute in thuman lopi-in kei hong bawlsia uh hi. Kei hong huh in.
[122] Na nasempa a dingin nangmah hong kikham inla, mi kiphasakte hong nengniamsak kei in.

[3] Kote hong hehpih in. TOPA aw, kote hong hehpih in. Bang hang hiam cih leh kote in ka thuak zawh loh uh simmawhna ka thuak uh hi. [4] A ututin a gamta mite in kote a hong zahkona, a kiphasak mite in hong simmawh bawlna hangin ka gimthuakna uh sauvei lua khinta hi.
[6] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA lian mahmah napi-in amah in a neute don a, a kiphasakte ahihleh amah in gamlapi panin mu thei veve hi.

[4] TOPA aw, migilote’ khutsung panin kei hong cing inla, kei, sukpaih ding a hong sawm mi ngongtatte kiang panin kei hong kem in. [5] Mi kiphasakte in keimah hong siahna-in tehlop tung sim uh a, amaute in ngenthang zakin lam gei-ah thangzak tawh kei hong siah uh hi. [6] TOPA’ tungah hih bangin ka ci hi: Nang pen keima Pasian na hi hi; ka thumna awte hong ngai in, TOPA!
[13] TOPA zahtakna pen thusia muhdahna hi a, kiphatsakna le kihihsakna, gamtatsia le thuzuau ka mudah hi.

[2] Mi kiphasakte in minsiatna ngahpak ding ahih manin a hoihbekin om ding hoihzaw tham hi. [3] Midikte thumanin gamta uh a, migilote amau’ hoih lohna in susia hi. [4] Hauhna in sih nading panin hong hu thei lo a, thumanna in na sih ding hong hu thei hi.
[10] Hilh ding ut lo, kihihsakna in kitotna bek piangsak thei a, hong kithuhilh ding utna pen a hoihzaw ahi hi.
[3] Pau a ki-ipzo mi in a nuntakna a hu hi a, a mawk paupau mi pen amah a kisiasak tawm ahi hi.
[25] TOPA in mi kiphasakte’ inn phelkhiatsak a, meigongte’ neihsa hutpih hi.
[18] Kisaktheihna in siatna hong tuaksak a, kiphatsakna in pukna hong piangsak hi.
[11] Mi kiphasakte gim a kipiak ciangin mi mawkmawkte in pillawh uh a, mipilte a kihilh ciangin thutheihna-in nei uh hi.
[24] Mi kihisak i cihte pen kilian sakin a kiphasak mite ahi hi.
[10] Mi kiphasakte hawlkhia lecin kitotna le kisimmawhna bei pah ding hi.
[23] A kiphasakte in niamkhiatna thuak ding a, a kiniamkhiatte in pahtawina ngah ding hi.
[32] Kiphasakin na hai pau ngei a, thusia bawl ding na ngaihsut ngei khak leh limtakin thu ngaihsun pha in.

[11] Mite’ kiliatsakna pen kiniam koih ding a, mihingte’ kiphatsakna pen kiniamkhiat ding hi. Tua ni ciangin TOPA bek a lianin kikoih ding hi. [12] Bang hang hiam cih leh Vanglian TOPA in a kiphasak le a kiliansak khempeuh, a kisangsak le a sangte khempeuh; [13] a sang, a kilaamto, Lebanon mual taamtak kung khempeuh, Bashan mual tawsaw kung khempeuh; [14] a lian mual sang khempeuh le a sang mualneu khempeuh; [15] tausang khempeuh le a muanhuai kulhte khempeuh; [16] Tarshish teembaw khempeuh le teembaw hoih khempeuh a niamkoih hun ding ni khat a nei hi.
[5] Mite khatlekhat, mi khempeuh in a lawmte ciat, mi khempeuh in a vengte ciat, hihgawp ding uh hi. Khangnote pen uhamte tungah, mi ginalote pen miliante tungah kiphasak ding uh hi.

[16] TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: Jerusalem numeite kiphasakin ngawng doksa-in lam pai uh a, kiphatsakna tawh a mit uh hei pampamin hi tuihtuihin lam pai uh a, a khe uh gingsak sualsual ahih ciangun [17] Topa in Jerusalem numeite’ lutang meima sakin TOPA in amau’ lutang kolhsak ding hi.
[15] Mi khempeuh a niamin kikoih suk hi. A kiphasak mite kiniamkhiat suk hi.
[12] Topa in Zion Mual le Jerusalem khua-ah ama nasep dingteng a zawh khit ciangin Assiria kumpipa kiphasakin a kisialhna le a kiphatsakna hangin gim a pia ding hi.
[6] Tua ciangin Judah mite in, “Moab’ kiphatsakna thu i za khinta hi. Amah kiphasak mahmah hi. A kiliatsakna, a kiphatsakna, a kihihsakna, ama kisialhnate khempeuh a mawkna ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
[2] Bang hang hiam cih leh nang in khuapi ninbulomtang na suah a, a muanhuai khuapi a sia na suaksak hi. Mi kiphasakte’ kumpi inn pen khua bang nawn lo a, cikmah hunin kilamkik nawn lo ding hi.
[5] mun keuna-ah nisa mahmah tawh kibang hi. Nang in mi kiphasakte’ gamlumna na daisak hi. Meii liim in nisa a votsak bangin thukhual lo mite’ lasakna kitawpsak ta hi.
[5] Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a kiphasak mite niamkhiat suk hi. Amau’ tenna khuapi muanhuai suksiatsak a, a kulhpite denkhap sakin leivui a suah hi.
[4] Tua a kiphasak zukham makaite’ minthanna pen tuk tun ma-in a om theipal min tawh kibang ding a, mi khat in tua theigah a muh ciangin lo-in a nekpah bangin maimang lel ding hi.
[23] Nang in kua zahko-in kua a simmawh na hi hiam? Nang in kua’ tungah na aw sangsakin kiphasak na hi hiam? Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa, kei’ tungah a hong tuaci na hi hi.

[29] Moab’ kiphatsakna ka za khinzo a, kiphasak pha mahmah hi. Kiliansakin kisathei a, kuamah thusim loin mite a neu-et hi. [30] Ama hehna ka thei a, a kisialhna teng zuaupi hi-in, a sepna teng zong zuaupi mah ahi hi, TOPA in kong ci hi.
[49] Na sanggamnu’ mawhna pen: Amah le a tanute in nek ding tampi nei-in nuamsa mahmahin, daitakin om uh ahih manin amaute kiphasak uh a, a zawng a cimawhte don lo uh hi.

[10] “Tua ahih ciangin Topa PASIAN keimah in hih bangin ka ci hi. Tua sing in meiipi a bat dongin khangto a, ahi zongin a san semsemna tawh kizui-in kiphasak semsem hi. [11] Tua ahih manin tua singkung ka deih nawn kei hi. Gamdang kumpi khat’ khut sungah ka pia ding a, ama thuak dingin a kilawm bangin tua kumpipa in a bawl ding hi.
[20] Singkung sang mahmah na muh pen hong khangkhang a, khauh mahmah a, vantung dong banto a, leitungah a teng mi khempeuh in a mu thei uh hi.
[37] Tu-in keimah Nebukhadnezzar in Vantung Kumpipa phatin, zahtakin a min ka thangsak hi. Ama bawlna khempeuh a man hi. Amah a tawntungin thuman a, a kiphasakin a gamtate a neusak hi,” a ci hi.

[4] Tua tuutal in a ki tawh nitumna lam, saklam, le khanglam a si kawikawi ka mu hi. Ama ut bangin kiphasakin gamta ahih manin amah a khozo ding le a thahatna pan a suaktazo ding ganhing khat beek a om kei hi.
[6] Ahi zongin gam hoihna mun tungin na gil uh a vah ciangin na lungsim uh kiphasakin kei nong mangngilh uh hi.

[5] Hauhna pen zuaupi hi a, a huaiham mite kiphasakin omkhong thei lo uh a, hankhuk mah bangin, phazo, cih omsak thei lo uh a, lungkim hun cih nei thei lo uh hi. Tua ahih manin minam dangte a ban banin simin a uk uh hi.

[6] TOPA in hih bangin thu gen a, “A kiphasak mite ka nilkhia a, a gal panmunte uh ka susia hi. A kongzing lampite uh ka kinusiacipsak a, tua lampi kuamah in tawn nawn lo hi. A khuapi uh kisia gawpin kinusia a, a sungah kuamah om nawn lo hi.

[11] Tua hun ciangin ka mite in kei nong lehdona hangun maizumna ding bangmah om nawn lo ding hi. Note lak panin a kiphasak, a kihisak mite ka hawlkhia ding a, Jerusalem khua-a ka mual siangtho tungah kei nong lehdo nawn kei ding uh hi.
[6] Ashdod khuapi-ah minam dangte zong teng ding a, a kiphasak Filistia mite ka beisak ding hi.

[15] I muhna bang leh, mi kiphasakteng mah in thupha ngahin nuamsa uh hi. Mi gamtatsiate ahihleh citheibek loin, a gamtatsiatnate uh tawh Pasian ze-et napi-un bangmah tuak se lo uh hi,’ na ci uh hi,” a ci hi. [16] TOPA a zahtak mite khatlekhat tua bangin thu kigen uh a, amaute’ thugennate, TOPA in ngai-in za hi. TOPA in laibu khat nei a, amah zahtakin a thupi ngaihsut mite khempeuh tua sungah kiciamteh hi.

[1] Vanglian TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “En un, mi kiphasak khempeuh le migilo khempeuh, a zung a hiang cih om loin buhtu bangin a kattum ding hun hong tung ding hi. Tua ni ciangin khat zong suakta loin a vekpi-in kangtum khin ding uh hi.

[6] Pawi sungah a om uh ciangin uliante’ tutna dinga a kibawl munah tunuam se uh a, kikhopna inn sungah zong uliante tutna tutphah nuampente tungah a tunuam diak uh hi. [7] Mihon lakah mite in hopihin, ‘Sia aw,’ a cih ding uh a ut uh hi. [8] Ahi zongin note pen, ‘Sia,’ na kicih ding uh hi lo hi. Sia khat bek na nei uh a, no adangte khempeuh unau khat na hi uh hi.
[12] A kiliansakte khempeuh in niamkhiatna thuak ding uh a, a kiniamkhiatte khempeuh a lianin kibawl ding hi.
[39] Kikhopna inn sungah, uliante a dingin a kikoihcing tutphah nuamte tungah tunuam uh a, pawi sungah zong uliante’ tutna mun hoihte bekah a tunuam uh hi.

[21] Kumpipa in a thugen hun ding a ciamkholh ni a tun ciangin a kumpi puan silhin a kumpi tokhom tungah tu a, mite tungah thu a gen hi. [22] Mite in a thugen a zak uh ciangin, “Hih thugen pen mihing hi loin pasian ahi hi,” ci-in a awng uh hi. [23] Herod in mite, Pasian phatsak loin amah phatsak ahih manin thakhatin Topa’ vantungmi in Herod cinasak a, a hut in amah netumin a si hi.

[3] Pasian in kei tungah hehpihna hong piakkhongna hangin note tungah kong gennop thu in: Note tawh a kituakzah valin kilian ngaihsutzaw kha kei un. Pasian in note tungah upna hong piakzah tawh kizui-in kingaihsun bek zaw unla, a kilawm ciang khat bekin kingaihsun un. [4] I pumpi tungah zong na tampi i nei a, tua nate’ nasep a tuamtuam ahi hi. [5] Tua mah bangin eite mi tampi ihih hangin pumkhat ihi a, pumpi nate bangin khatlekhat a kizom ciat ihi hi.
[16] Mi deidan loin a kibangin en un. Kiphasak loin mineute tawh kikhawlthei unla, kipilsak se kei un.

[26] Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note hong sap laitakin na omzia uh ngaihsun un. Leitung mite’ hong muhna panin note a tamzaw, mipil na hi kei uh a, mi vanglian zong na hi kei uh a, mi thupi zong na hi kei uh hi. [27] Ahi zongin Pasian in mipilte a maizumsak nadingin mihaite hong teel a, mi thahatte a maizumsak nadingin mi thaneemte a hong teel hi. [28] Leitung mite in thupi a sakte uh a suksiat theih nadingin Pasian in leitung mite’ simmawh a niamte, bangmahin a ngaihsut loh uh mite a teel hi. [29] Tua ahih manin Pasian’ mai-ah mite a kisaktheih nading thu om lo hi.

[7] Ahi zongin hih a lamdang na tampite ka muhna hangin kisialin ka kisaktheih khak loh nadingin Satan’ sawltak bangin na a sem, keima pumpi sungah natna khat hong kipia ahih manin ka kisaktheih luat loh nadingin a hong kham hi.
[26] Kuamah kiphasak loin, khatlekhat kiphin loin, kuamah i kihaza kei ding hi.
[3] Mi khatpeuh, bangmah hi lo napi-in amah a kithupi ngaihsut mawkmawk leh amah le amah a kikhem ahi hi.
[6] Khristian a suaktungte zong hi lo ding hi. Tua bang mi thakte kiphasak thei a, Dawimangpa mah bangin thukhenna a thuak mite hikha thei ding hi.

[4] a kiphasak mawkmawk hi uh a, bangmah a thei het lo ahi uh hi. Tua bang mite in thu kisel thu kinial cihte ut belin nei uh a, hazatna, lungsim kituah lohna, kizahkona, a sia lamin ki-upmawhnate piangsak uh a, [5] thuman thutak zui loin, a lungsim paizia uh a man nawn lo, biakna pen hauhtheih nading lampi bekin a ngaihsun mite in a tawntungin kitot kiselna a piangsak uh ahi hi.

[2] Tuahun ciangin mite in amau angsung ding bek ngaihsunin, huaihamin, kisialin, kihisakin, mi zahko-in, nu le pate’ thu mang loin, lungdam theihna mel nei loin, biakna lungsim nei loin, [3] mi khual loin, hehpihna nei loin, mi gensia-in, ngongtatin, kihtakhuai-in, thuhoih deih loin, [4] ciampelin, thu khual loin, kiphasak gawpin, Pasian don loin pumpi nopsakna bek deihin, [5] biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deih lo ding uh hi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in.
[7] Pawlpi siate pen Pasian’ nasem ahih manin paubaanna a om lo, a kiphasak lo, zukham thei mi ahi lo, a ngongtat lo, a huaiham lo,
[15] Tua ahih manin Jesuh tungtawnin amah i biakna-in i kam tawh ama min pulakin Pasian phat tawntung ni.
[6] Lai Siangtho in, “Pasian in a kihisakte nial a, a kiniamkhiatte a hehpih hi,” a cih mah bangin Pasian’ hong hehpihna lianzaw hi.

[5] Tua mah bangin no khangnozaw deuhte in zong a khanghamte’ thu na mang un. Lai Siangtho in, “Pasian in a kiphasak mite nial a, a kiniamkhiat mite a hehpih hi,” a cih mah bangin na vekpi-un kiniamkhiatna puan bangin silhin, khatlekhat na na kisepsak un.

[10] Pasian’ thu nialin amau pumpi deihna zui-in a gamta mite gim pia phadiak hi. Hih sia man lote kiphasakin hangsan mahmah uh a, minthanna a nei vantung a omte zahtak hetloin gensia ngam uh hi. [11] Hih sia man lote sangin hatzaw-in a vanglianzaw vantung mite nangawn in Topa’ mai-ah minthanna a nei vantung mite gensia ngam lo, mawhsak ngam lo uh hi.

[18] Amaute kiphasakin haipau uh a, a khial gamtat mite sung panin a suakta khin liailiai zo mite, leitung pumpi deih bangin a gamtat nadingun a zol uh hi. [19] Amaute pen siatna a piangsak thei zongsatna lelin sila hinapi-un mite tungah suahtak nading thu a gen uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mite pen, a hong zo peuhpeuhte’ sila ihi hi.
[16] Hih mite a tawntungin phunin khatlekhat mawhna kizong uh a, amau pumpi deihna bangun gamta-in kiphasak uh a, phattuamna a ngah theih nadingun midangte a phat uh hi.

[7] Amah kisialin a kiphatsakna zah tawh a kizui-in dahna le lungkhamna thuaksak un. Amah in, ‘Kei kumpinu ka hi a, meigong numei lah ka hi kei a, dahna ka thuak ngei kei ding hi,’ ci ahih manin, [8] gimna in ni khatthu-in ban ding a, pulnatna, kahna, le kialpi in vatgawp ding hi. Ama tungah thu a khen Topa Pasian vanglian ahih manin mei tawh kihaltum ding hi,” a ci hi. [9] Amah tawh paktatin a kiphasak khawm leitung kumpite in tua khuapi a katna meikhu a muh uh ciangin dahin a kap ding uh hi. [10] Ama thuakna kihta-in a gamlapi-ah om ding uh a, “Hih a vanglian Babylon khuapi in a thuakna, bangzah takin lauhuai-in, bangzah takin nasia! Nai khat sung bekin hih zah gimna thuak!” ci ding uh hi.
[3] Pasian in, “Khuavak om hen,” ci hi; tua ciangin khuavak om pah hi.

[6] Pasian in, “Tuite’ laizangah van kuumpi om hen la, tua van kuumpi in tui le tui kikhensak hen,” ci hi. [7] Pasian in van kuumpi bawl a, van kuumpi tunga om tuite le van kuumpi nuai-a om tuite a khen hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.
[9] Pasian in, “Vantungte nuai-a om tuite mun khatah kikhawm hen la, lei keu kidawk hen,” ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.

[11] Pasian in, “Leitung in kung tuamtuamte piangsak hen la, tang a nei kungnote, a gah sungah tang a om singgah kungte, amau’ nam ciatin leitungah piangsak hen,” ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.
[15] leitung khua a vaksak dingin vantungah khuavak hi uh hen,” ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.

[20] Pasian in, “Tuite in a nungta ganhing honpite piangsak hen la, vantung kantanin leitungah vasate leeng ta hen,” ci hi. [21] Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in tuipi ganhing golpite le amau nam ciatin tuipi sungah tampi a pha, nuntakna a nei a gamtang thei ganhing namkim le kha a nei vasa khempeuh amau nam ciatin a piangsak hi. Pasian in tua pen hoih hi, ci-in a mu hi.
[24] Pasian in, “Nuntakna a nei ganhingte amau nam ciatin leitung in piangsak hen: Innsa, gamsa, le a bokvak ganhingte amau nam ciatin piang ta hen,” a ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.

[19] Tua ahih ciangin TOPA Pasian in gam sung ganhing khempeuh le huih lak vasa khempeuh lei tawh bawl a, mipa in tuate bang a ci hiam ci-in a theihna dingin mipa kiangah tuate a paipih hi. Nuntakna a nei khempeuhte pen mipa’ cih bangbang a min hi pahpah hi. [20] Mipa in ganhing namte khempeuh, huihlak vasate khempeuh le gam sung ganhing khempeuh min a vawh hi. Ahih hangin mipa a’ dinga a kilawm, amah a huh ding khat zong om lo hi.

[40] “Ahih hangin kei tungah khemna tawh hong gamtatnasa uh le kei hong demna uh hangin amaute gawt bawlin, amau’ galte’ leitangah amaute ka paipihna hangin, amau’ mawhna le a pu a pate uh mawhna pulakin a lungsim uh niamkhiatin, amaute in a mawhna a kipuahphat uhleh, [41] “Ahih hangin kei tungah khemna tawh hong gamtatnasa uh le kei hong demna uh hangin amaute gawt bawlin, amau’ galte’ leitangah amaute ka paipihna hangin, amau’ mawhna le a pu a pate uh mawhna pulakin a lungsim uh niamkhiatin, amaute in a mawhna a kipuahphat uhleh, [42] keimah in Jakob tawh ka thuciamna, Isaac tawh ka thuciamna, le Abraham tawh ka thuciamna ka phawk ding a, leitang zong ka phawk ding hi.

[21] Tua ciangin Saul in, “Ka gamta khial hi; hong ciahkik in, ka tapa David aw; bang hang hiam cih leh tuni-in kei hong suaktasak na hih manin na tungah siatna kong bawl nawn kei ding hi. Ka hai gamtatkha a, nakpitakin ka khial khin hi,” a ci hi.
[6] “Ka biak Pasian aw, ka mawhnate un ka lu dawn dong uh hong vuknelhin vantung dong banto ahih manin nangma lam kong et ding maizumin ka mai a san hi, ka Pasian aw.

[1] Ezra in tu-a bangin thu ngenin mawhna pulakin khitui naptui tawh Pasian’ biakinn mai-ah kunin a om laitakin Israel mi numei, pasal, naupang, mi tampi tak ama kiimah hong kikhawmin amaute khempeuh zong nakpitakin a kap uh hi. [2] Tua ciangin Elam-te beh sung panin Jehiel’ tapa Shekaniah hong pau-in Ezra kiangah, “Hih gam a teng gamdang numeite tenpihna tawh i Pasian tungah i khial hi. Ahi ta zongin Israel mite a dingin lametna omlai hi.

[11] Tua ahih ciangin tu-in na pu na pate uh Pasian ahi TOPA’ tungah na mawhna uh pulak unla, ama deihna bangin gamta-in hih gam a teng gamdang mite le gamdang mi ahi na zite uh tawh kikhenin tuam om un,” a ci hi.

[5] Ka thungetna-ah, “Aw vantung Pasian, TOPA, nang hong itin na thupiakna a zuite tungah thuciamna limtakin a zui, a lian a kihtakhuai Pasian aw, [6] Israel mi ahi na nasemte’ tangin sun le zanin kong thunget nilohna a ngai dingin na bil hong ngat inla, na mit hong hak in. Nangma tungah ko Israel mite ka khialhna uh, keimah le ka pu ka pate zong ka khialhna uh ahi ka mawhnate uh kong pulak uh hi. [7] Nangma tungah kong khialkhin uh a, na nasempa Moses tungah na piak ahi thupiaknate, thukhamte, le ngeina kipte ka zui kei uh hi.
[24] “Hong hilh thei le-uhcin, pau loin ka ompah ding hi. Ka khialhna hong theitelsak dih un.

[2] TOPA in mawhna a khuksak loh mi, a lungsim sungah khemna a om lo mi, thupha ngah ahi hi. [3] Ka mawhna ka pulak loh ciangin, sunthapai ka tautauna hangin ka pumpi a thaneem hi. [4] Sun le zan tawntung gim nong piakna ka thuak a, khuakhal nisa’ kat bangin ka thahatna a keucip hi. [5] Keima khialhnate nangma tungah kong pulak a, ka mawhna ka im kei hi. “Ka khialhnate khempeuh TOPA’ tungah ka pulak ding hi,” ka ci hi. Tua ciangin ka mawhna nin nong maisak hi.

[1] Pasian aw, nangma itna kip om bangin kei hong hehpih inla, na hehpihna lian om bangin ka thu palsatnate hong phiatkhiatsak in. [2] Ka khialhna panin hong silsiang kiuhkeuh inla, ka mawhna panin kei hong siangsak in. [3] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka thupalsatnate ka thei a, ka mawhnate khempeuh ka phawk ngitnget hi. [4] Nangma tungah khialin, nangma muhna-ah a sia ka gamta khin hi. Tua ahih ciangin na thugenna-ah nang na thutang a, thu na hong khenna-ah pauna ding bangmah om lo hi. [5] A khialsa mahin kei ka suak a, ka nu in a gil sungah hong paii tung a kipan a mawh sa ka hi hi.
[13] A khialhna a im mite a dau pai lo ding a, a mawhna pulakin a kikheel mite in hehpihna ngah ding uh hi.
[13] Na mawhna na phawk ding bek kisam hi. TOPA na Pasian na langpanna, singliim nuai khempeuhah gamdang pasian-te tawh na khialh kawikawina le ka thu nong man lohnate pulak in, TOPA in kong ci hi.

[4] TOPA ka Pasian’ kiangah thu ngenin ka mite’ mawhna ka pulak hi. Keimah in, “Topa Pasian aw, nang na lian a, ka hong zahtak uh hi. Nang na thuman a, na thuciamna le na thupiakna a mangte le a hong itte a tawntungin na it hi. [5] “Kote ka hih uhleh ka gilo uh a, mawh khinin ka khial khin uh hi. Na hong sawlna bang ka mang kei uh a, na thupiakna le na thukhamte ka taisan khin uh hi.

[1] Israel-te aw, note’ TOPA Pasian’ lamah kihei kik un. Na mawhna hangun note na puk khin uh hi. [2] TOPA’ lamah kihei unla, “Ka mawhna khempeuh uh hong maisak inla, kong thumna uh hong ngai in. Ka kampauna bangun kong gamta ding uh hi.

[6] Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa in leitungah mawhmaisak theih nading thu nei hi, ci-in na theih nadingun kong lak ding hi,” a cih khit ciangin khutlekhezaw mipa kiangah, “Tho in; na lupna pheek pua inla na inn-ah ciah in,” a ci hi. [7] Amah zong tho-in a inn-ah a ciahpah hi.

[19] Vantung ki-ukna sung lut nading tawhtangte, nangma tungah ka hong pia ding a, hih leitungah hoih lo na cihte, vantungah zong a hoih lo hi ding a, hih leitungah hoih hi na cihte, vantungah zong a hoih hi ding hi,” a ci hi.

[21] Jesuh in, “Note kiangah a mantak a kong genin-ah: Note in uplahna nei hetloin, upna taktak na neih nak-uhleh hih theikung tungah a piang bang na hih theih uh banah, hih mual kiang nangawnah, ‘Na omna pan paikhia-in tuipi sung kidenna in,’ ci le-uhcin na cih bangun piang ding hi.

[3] Gam sungah mi khat kiko a, ‘Topa’ pai nading lampi bawl unla, a tot ding lampi tangsak un,’ ci hi,” ci-in a kigelhna tawh hong kipankhia hi. [4] Tua mah bangin gam sungah Johan hong vak a, mawhna kisikin tui kiphum un; tua hileh na mawhna uh Pasian in hong maisak ding hi, ci-in thu a hilh hi.
[8] Simon Peter in hih thu a muh ciangin Jesuh’ mai-ah khukdin a, “Topa aw, kei mawhnei mi ka hih manin ka kiang panin paikhia in,” a ci hi.

[39] Amah tawh a kikhai khawm mi that pa khat in zong Jesuh zahko a, “Nang Khrih hi lo na hi hiam? Nangmah kihonkhia inla, tua ciangin kote zong hong honkhia in,” a ci hi. [40] Ahi zongin a khat pa in a lawmpa taii a, “Pasian nangawn kihta lo na hi hiam? I vekpi-in gim hong kipiakna kibangkim hi. [41] Ei tegel pen i gamtatna tawh kizui-in thu hong kikhen ahih manin ahi ding mah ahi hi. Ahi zongin amah in khialhna bangmah nei lo hi,” a cih khit ciangin [42] Jesuh kiangah, “Jesuh aw, Kumpi-in nong pai ciangin kei zong hong phawk in,” a ci hi. [43] Jesuh in ama kiangah, “A mantakin ke’n kong cihin-ah: Tuni-in Paradais-ah kei tawh na omkhawm ding hi,” a ci hi.
[30] Pasian in mihingte’ theih loh hun lai-a a gamtatnate uh phamawh a sak loh hangin, tu-in mun khempeuha om mi khempeuhte a gamtat siatna panun a kihei nadingun thu a hong pia khinzo hi.
[18] Thu a um midang tampi tak zong hong pai uh a, mipi’ zakin a gamtatnasate khempeuh uh hong pulak uh hi.

[9] Jesuh pen Topa hi, ci-in mite kiangah genin, Pasian in sihna panin amah hingkiksak zo hi, ci-in na lungsim sung uhah na up taktak uhleh hotkhiatna na ngah ding uh hi. [10] Bang hang hiam cih leh i lungsim ah i up taktakna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna kingah a, i kamin i genna hangin hotkhiatna a kingah ahi hi.
[12] Tua ahih manin a kuamah peuh in i gamtatna ciat Pasian’ mai-ah a va kigentel ciat ding ihi hi.

[1] Keimah in Khrih gamtatzia ka zuih mah bangin note in zong keima gamtatzia hong zui ta un. [2] Note in kei hong phawk tawntungin ka hong hilh thu khempeuh zui na hih manun ka hong phat mahmah hi. [3] Ahi zongin na theih ding uh ka deih thu in: Mi khempeuh’ lutang pen Khrih hi a, numei’ lutang pen pasal hi a, Khrih’ lutang pen Pasian ahihna thu ahi hi. [4] Pasal khatpeuh in mihon biakna sungah a lukhu lakhia lopi-in thungen ahi a, Pasian’ thugen ahi zongin a om leh Khrih’ min a daisak ahi hi. [5] Tua mah bangin mihon biakna sungah numei khatpeuh in a lu khuh lopi-in thungen ahi a, Pasian’ thugen ahi zongin a om leh a pasal’ min a daisak hi a, a lu a met numei mah tawh a kilamdanna a om lo ahi hi. [6] Numeite in a lu a khuh kei ding uhleh a sam uh met vet uh hen. Tua ahih manin numeite in a sam uh a met ding a zumhuai mahmah khat ahih mah bangin a lu uh khuh ta uh hen. [7] Pasalte pen Pasian’ lim le a minthanna a kilangsak ahih manin a lu uh a khuh ding uh kilawm lo hi. Ahi zongin numeite pen pasalte’ minthanna a kilangsak ahi hi. [8] Bang hang hiam cih leh numei tung panin pasal kipiangsak lo a, pasal tung panin numei kipiangsak zaw hi. [9] Numei hangin pasal a kipiangsak hi lo a, pasal hangin numei a kipiangsak hizaw hi. [10] Tua ahih ciangin a pasalte uh ukna nuai-ah a om ahihna a lah nadingun vantung mite’ muhna-ah numeite in a lu uh a khuh ding uh kilawm hi. [11] Ahi zongin Topa thu sunga i nuntakna-ah numeite pen pasal tawh loin a tangdinzo hi lo a, pasalte zong numei tawh kop loin a tangdinzo hi tuan lo hi. [12] Bang hang hiam cih leh numei pen pasal tung panin a kipiangsak hi a, pasal pen numei sung panin a suak ahi hi. Tua hi a, na khempeuh, Pasian kiang panin a hong pai ahi hi.

[20] Tua ahih manin tuhuna ka nuntakna zia pen kei hang hi nawn loin ka sungah a hong om Khrih hang ahi hi. Tua hi a, keimah hong itin, keima a dingin a nuntakna a hong pia Pasian’ Tapa ka muanna tawh tu laitakin a nungta ka hi hi.

[16] tawlnga loin note’ tangin Pasian’ tungah lungdamna ka na pulak tawntung hi. Ka thungetna-ah zong note ka hong phawk tawntung a, [17] i Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pasian ahi, a minthang Pa Pasian in note tungah Kha Siangtho hong pia-in, tua Kha Siangtho in note tungah lungpilna hong pia-in, note in Pasian na theih nadingun note tungah Pasian hong kilatsak nadingin thu ka hong ngetsak niloh hi.
[3] Pasian’ kampauna tawh leitung le vantung piang a, tu-a i muhtheih nate a om nai lopi panin hong piang hi, ci-in i upna bek mah tawh a thei ihi hi.
[6] Tua ahih manin kimuanna lungsim tawh hangtakin, “Topa, kei hong huhpa hi a, ka lau kei ding hi. Kua in bang hong cihzo ding ahi hiam?” ci ngam ni.

[7] Tua ahih manin Pasian’ thu na mang un. Dawimangpa na nial un. Nial le-uhcin no kiang panin taikhia ding hi. [8] Pasian kiang nai un. Amah in zong hong nai ding hi. Mawhneite in na khut uh silsiang unla, a kineihkhemte in na lungsim uh siangsak un. [9] Dahin, thumin, kap un. Na nuihnate uh kahna suaksak zaw unla, na lungdamnate uh maigumna suaksak zaw un. [10] Topa mai-ah kiniamkhiat un. Tua hileh amah in hong lian bawl ding hi.
[16] Tua ahih manin na ci uh a dam nadingin khatlekhat tungah na mawhna uh kipulakin thu na kingetsak ta un. Mihoihte’ thungetna in vang nei a, na lianpi semzo hi.

[8] Mawhna ka nei kei hi, i cih leh eite a kineihkhem ihi a, eite a thutak lo ihi hi. [9] Ahi zongin Pasian kiangah i mawhnate va pulak lehang, amah citakin thuman ahih manin, i mawhnate hong maisakin i hoih lohnate khempeuh hong siangsak ding hi. [10] Pasian in a mawh hi, hong ci ahih manin eite in ka mawh ngei kei hi, i cih leh Pasian pen zuaugen a suaksak ihi a, i sungah ama thu a om het lo ahi hi.

[14] Tua ciangin Moses tungah TOPA heh a, amah in, “Levi mi na sanggampa Aaron om hi lo ahi hiam? Amah in hoihtakin thu a gen theihna ka cian theih hi. En in, nangmah a dawn dingin amah hong paikhia a, amah in nang hong muh ciangin a lungsim sungah amah kipak ding hi. [15] Nangmah in ama kiangah thu na gen ding a, thute amah na theisak ding hi. Keimah in na thugenna uhah kong huh ding a, na hih ding uh kong hilh ding hi.

[24] Tua ahih ciangin Moses in a sungpa’ thu ngai-in ama gen khempeuh a hih hi. [25] Israel mi khempeuh sung panin Moses in mipil mi siamte teel a, mite a tul, a za, a sawmnga, a sawmte tungah a ukin mite’ lutangin amaute a bawl hi.
[8] Note nga in zakhat zo-in, note zakhat in tul sawm na zo ding uh hi. Note’ mai-ah namsau in na galte uh puksak ding hi.

[14] Kei guak in hih mite khempeuh ka sizo kei a, kei a dingin tavuan lianlua hi. [15] Hih bangin kei hong bawl ding na hih leh, ka gentheihna ka kimuh loh nadingin nong hehpih zawh leh, thakhatin hong thatzaw in,” a ci hi. [16] TOPA in Moses kiangah, “Mite’ upa le ulian hi ci-in na theih, Israel upate’ sung panin mi sawmsagih hong khopsakin, kikhopna bukah amaute paipih inla, tua lai-ah nang tawh dingkhawmsak in. [17] Keimah hong paisukin tua munah nang tawh i kiho ding a, keimah in nang’ sunga om kha pawlkhat la-in amaute’ sungah ka guang ding hi. Nang guak in na puak loh nadingin amaute in mite’ tavuan hong puakpih ding uh hi.

[15] Tua ciangin amah in, “En in, na sanggamnu a mipihte le a pasian-te kiangah ciahkik khin hi. Na sanggamnu’ nungah nang zong ciah in,” a ci hi. [16] Ahih hangin Ruth in, “Nang kong nusiat nading ahi a, nang zuihna panin ka ciahkik nading ahi zongin hong cici nawn kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh na paina-ah ka pai ding a, na giahna-ah ka giak ding hi. Na mite keima mite hi ding a, na Pasian keima Pasian hi ding hi. [17] Na sihna-ah si-in ka kivui ding hi. Sihna cih lohbuang thudang hangin kong nusiat taak leh TOPA in kei hong dawm kei ta hen,” a ci hi. [18] Tua ciangin Naomi in amah a zuih ding a lungsim a khentatna a muh ciangin bangmah ci nawn lo hi.

[9] Jeshua a tapate le a behte tawh, le Hodaviah-te beh Kadmiel le a tate in Henadad’ tapate le Levi mi a tapate uh le a behte uh tawh Pasian’ biakinn-ah nasemte tungah ukna tavuan a lakhawm uh hi. [10] Innlamte in TOPA’ biakinn a bul a phuh uh ciangin, Israel kumpipa David in a geelkholhsa bangin TOPA a phat dingin siampite in a puan uh silhin peengkul tawh, Asaf’ tapa Levi mite daltuah tawh a panmun ding uhah hong pang uh hi.
[6] Tua ahih ciangin kulh ka ciang uh a, nasep a kimciang bang kizo hi. Mite in utna lungsim tawh sem uh hi.

[1] En un, sanggamte pumkhat suakin a tut khawm uh ciangin bangzahin hoihin nuam ahi hiam? [2] Tua pen a puan ngawng tungah Aaron’ khamul kaisuk zui-in a lu tung panin a taaksuk, sathau manpha tawh kibang hi. [3] Tua pen Zion mualte tungah a kia, Hermon mual pana hong piang daitui tawh kibang hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in nuntak tawntungna thupha tua munah a pia hi.

[9] Mi khat sangin mi nih hoihzaw hi; amau’ sepna thaman a tamzaw ngah uh hi. [10] Bang hang hiam cih leh khat cimawh leh a khat in huh a, mi khat guak pen cimawh zenzen leh a huh ding om lo ahih manin a dahhuai pha mahmah ahi hi. [11] Khua a dam ciangin mi nih lumkhawm leh khua lum hi; khat guak bangci khualum theih ding ahi hiam? [12] Mi khat bek hileh zawhnop kisa a, nih pha leh kizo zo lo hi. Zang thum a kiheek khauhual bawhsat hak hi.
[3] Mi nih, thukimna om masa lopi-in lampi-ah tonkhawm thei uh ahi hiam?
[9] Kilem nading deihin a hanciam mite in Pasian’ tate cihna ngah ding uh ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.

[1] “Bang hang hiam cih leh vantung ki-ukna sung omzia pen a leenggah lo-ah na a sem ding a cial dingin zing tungin a kuankhia leenggah lo nei pa tawh kibang hi. [2] Ni tha ngeina ngun peek khat piak dingin a kithukim khit uh ciangin a leenggah lo-ah na a sem dingin pawlkhat a kuansak hi. [3] Zingsang nai kua hun ciangin mihon omna sumbukah pai leuleu a, mi pawlkhat bangmah sem loin a mawk om a muh ciangin, [4] ‘No zong leenggah lo-ah va kuan un; a kilawm zah khat ka hong pia ding hi,’ a cih ciangin pawlkhat a kuan uh hi. [5] Tua ciangin sun sawm le nih ciangin pawlkhat cial leuleu a, nitak nai thum ciangin pawlkhat a cial lai hi.

[3] mihing li in Jesuh kiangah khutlekhezaw mi khat a paipih dingin hong pua uh hi. [4] Ahi zongin mihonpi kinehlua ahih manin Jesuh kiangah paipih thei lo uh hi. Tua ahih manin Jesuh’ omna san inn tungkhum hongletin, a lupna pheek tawh a mipa a khaisuk uh hi.
[7] Jesuh in sawm le nihte sam a, amaute tungah dawi hawlkhiat nading vangliatna pia-in, amaute nih nihin a sawlkhia hi.
[1] Tua khit ciangin Jesuh in ama pai nading khua le mun khempeuhah nih nihin a na pai dingin mi sawmsagih seh a, ama mai-ah a mapaisak hi.

[34] Note tungah ka hong piak thak thu in: Note khatlekhat na ki-it ding uh ahi hi. Note ka hong it mah bangin note khatlekhat na ki-it un. [35] Note khatlekhat ki-it le-uhcin keima nungzuite na hihna uh mi khempeuh in hong thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[21] Pa aw, amaute khempeuh pumkhat a suahtheih nadingun ka hong ngetsak hi. Nangmah in kei na hong sawlna thu leitung mite in a uptheih nadingun ei tegel pawlkhat ihih mah bangin amaute zong eite tawh pawlkhat hong hi tahen.
[1] Pentekos ni hong tun ciangin Jesuh a um mi khempeuh mun khatah kikhawm uh hi.

[42] Amaute in sawltakte tung panin thu sinin amaute tawh kikhawl uh a, amaute tawh an nekhawmin, thu zong a ngenkhawm uh hi. [43] Sawltakte in lim le nalamdang tampi bawl uh a, mi khempeuh in lamdang sa mahmah uh hi. [44] Thu um khempeuh kikhawlin omkhawm uh a, a neihsate uh zong a neikhawm uh hi. [45] Amaute in a neih a lamteng uh zuak uh a, a sumte pen amau kisapna tawh kizui-in amaute lakah a hawm uh hi. [46] Nisimin biakinn-ah kikhawm uh a, a innte uhah an nekhawmin, lungdamna le kiniamkhiatna tawh a ne ciat uh hi. [47] Pasian phat uh a, khatlekhat thupha kideihsakin a om uh hi. Pasian in nisimin hotkhiatna a ngah mi kibehlapsak tawntung hi.
[24] A lawmte un hih thu a zak uh ciangin a vekpi-un lungsim kikhatin Pasian’ kiangah thu ngen uh a, “Van le lei, tuipi tuineu le a sunga om khempeuh a piangsak Topa aw,

[3] Pasian in kei tungah hehpihna hong piakkhongna hangin note tungah kong gennop thu in: Note tawh a kituakzah valin kilian ngaihsutzaw kha kei un. Pasian in note tungah upna hong piakzah tawh kizui-in kingaihsun bek zaw unla, a kilawm ciang khat bekin kingaihsun un. [4] I pumpi tungah zong na tampi i nei a, tua nate’ nasep a tuamtuam ahi hi. [5] Tua mah bangin eite mi tampi ihih hangin pumkhat ihi a, pumpi nate bangin khatlekhat a kizom ciat ihi hi. [6] Tua ahih manin Pasian in hehpihna hong piakkhongna tawh kizui-in i siamna a tuamtuamte zang ciat ni. I siamna pen Pasian’ thu gentheih nading siamna ahih leh i upna neihzah tawh kizui-in gen ni. [7] Nasep nading siamna a nei ihih leh na sem ni. Hilh nading siamna a nei ihih leh hilh ni. [8] Midangte hanthot theih nading siamna a nei ihih leh midangte hanthawn ni. Midangte hop theih nading a nei ihih leh citna taktak tawh hawm ni. Makaih theih nading siamna a nei ihih leh hoihtakin na sem ni. Midangte hehpih theih nading a nei ihih leh maitai takin hih ni. [9] Na ki-itnate uh lungsim takpi tawh hi sak unla, a siate mudahin a hoihte lenkip un. [10] Unau ki-itna lungsim nei unla, khatlekhat kizahtak bawl ding lamsang kidem un.

[5] Note in lungsim kikhatin i Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pa ahi Pasian na phatkhawm theih nadingun Pasian in thuakzawhna le thahatna hong pia hen la, Jesuh Khrih deihna bangin gamta-in khatlekhat kithutuak takin hong omsak tahen. [6] Note in lungsim kikhatin i Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pa ahi Pasian na phatkhawm theih nadingun Pasian in thuakzawhna le thahatna hong pia hen la, Jesuh Khrih deihna bangin gamta-in khatlekhat kithutuak takin hong omsak tahen.
[10] Sanggamte aw, note khatlekhat kithutuakin, pawl kikhenna omkha loin, na lungsim, na ngaihsutna uh le na ngimna uh na kikhatsak nadingun i Topa Jesuh Khrih min tawh ka hong thum hi.

[6] Keima nasep pen khaici vawh hi a, Apollos’ nasep pen tuibuah hi a, ahi zongin a khangsak pa ahihleh Pasian ahi hi. [7] Khaici vawh pa le tuibuak pa a thupi hi lo a, a khangsak Pasian a thupi hi bek hi. [8] Khaici vawh pa le tuibuak pa a kizakim ahi hi. Pasian in komau sepna tuak tawh kizui-in thaman hong pia ding hi. [9] Kote pen Pasian a dingin na a semkhawm mite ka hi uh a, note pen Pasian’ lo na hi uh hi. Note pen Pasian’ inn zong na hi uh hi.

[7] Mi khempeuh a dingin phattuamna a omtheih nadingin Kha Siangtho’ hong ompihna a nam tuamtuamin hong kilang hi. [8] Kha Siangtho in mi khat tungah thuthuk pilna hong guan a, tua Kha Siangtho mah in adang khat tungah thugen siamna hong guan hi.

[12] Pumpi pen khat bek hinapi-in na a tuamtuam a nei hi. Pumpi in na a tuamtuam tampi a neih hangin pumpi khat bek mah ahih veve mah bangin Khrih zong pumpi na a tuamtuam a nei pumpi khat ahi hi. [13] Jew mi ihi a, Gentail mi ihi zongin, sila ihi a, sila ahi lo ihi zongin, eite minam tuamtuam ihih hangin Kha Siangtho khat bek mah in Jesuh’ pumpi a suak dingin ama sungah hong phum a, eite khempeuh tungah a hong kipia pen tua a kibang Kha Siangtho khat bek mah ahi hi. [14] Pumpi in na khat bek nei loin nam tampi tak a nei hi. [15] Khe in, “Kei, khut hi lo ka hih manin pumpi tawh ka kizom kei hi,” a cihmawk hangin pumpi na khat ahihna a bei hi tuan lo hi. [16] Bil in, “Kei, mit hi lo ka hih manin pumpi tawh ka kizom kei hi,” a cihmawk hangin pumpi na ahihna a bei hi tuan lo hi. [17] Pumpi khempeuh mit suakkhin leh bang tawh khua za ding ahi hiam? Pumpi khempeuh bil suakkhin leh bang tawh a gimnam thei ding ahi hiam? [18] Ahi zongin tu-a i neih bang tektekin, Pasian in ama deih bangin pumpi na a tuamtuam a hong bawlsak hi. [19] A vekpi-in pumpi na nam khat bek hi khin leh a pumpi ding koi-ah om nawn ding ahi hiam? [20] Ahi zongin tu-a i neih bangin pumpi khat bek om a, na tampi a nei hi. [21] Tua ahih manin mit in khut kiangah, “Nang ka hong kisam kei hi,” ci thei lo a, lutang in zong khe kiangah, “Nang ka hong kisapna om lo hi,” ci thei lo hi. [22] Pumpi na a ginalo tawh a kibangte a kimanna lian mahmah zawsop a, [23] pumpi na bangmah gentaak lo i sakte pawl limtakin kep kul zawsop hi. I pumpi na hoih i sak khollohte pen, [24] pumpi na hoih i sakte i lim et ding a kisap kholloh bang hi loin, limkep diak peuh kulzaw se hi. Ahi zongin i pumpi na thupi i sak khollohte limtakin i kepdiak ding a kisamin i pumpi a na bawl se hi. [25] Tua ahih manin i pumpi nate khatlekhat kithutuak lo cih om loin a vekpi-in a kilemkim uh hi.
[24] Hih bangin um un, ci-in thatanghat thu tawh a hong gen ding ka hi kei uh hi. Note na upna uhah kipkhin na hih manun note’ lungdam nadingin note tawh na a semkhawm ka hi uh hi.

[14] Thu um lo mite tawh na na semkhawm kei un. Midik le mimawh bangci-in kipawlthei ding a, khuavak le khuamial bangci-in omkhawm thei ding ahi hiam? [15] Khrih le Dawimangpa bangci-in kithutuak thei ding a, thu um mi le thu um lo mi bangci-in a ngaihsutna uh kibang thei ding ahi hiam? [16] Pasian’ biakinn le lawkite’ milim bangci kilem theih ding ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in, “Ka mite lakah tengin amaute tawh ka omkhawm ding hi. Kei pen amaute’ Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute, keima mi ahi ding uh hi. [17] Tua ahih manin Vanglian Topa keimah in kong genin-ah: Amaute tawh kikhenin amaute kiang panin paikhia unla, a siang lo peuhmah sukha kei un. Tua hileh note ka hong ngai ding hi.
[28] Tua ahih manin Jew mi le Gentail mi, sila le sila ahi lo, numei le pasal cih bangin kideidanna om nawn lo a, note khempeuh Khrih tawh na kipawlna hangun pawlkhat hi-in, a kibangkim na hi uh hi.
[14] Bang hang hiam cih leh Thukham khempeuh thu khatin kigawm thei a, “Nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in,” cihna tawh kitomlak thei hi.
[2] Thu haksa na tuah uh ciangin khatlekhat na kihuh un. Tua hileh Khrih’ thukham a zui na hi uh hi.

[12] Note in na vun uh na at nadingun a hong hahbawl mite in mihoih ahihna uh kilangsak nuamin, a kimuthei nate a kisialhpih mite ahi uh hi. Singlamteh tungah Khrih a sihna thu hangin amaute in bawlsiatna a ngah loh nadingun a tuaci gamtat ahi uh hi.

[14] Khrih mahmah in Gentail mite le Jew mite pawlkhatin hong bawl ahih manin eite tungah nopsakna a hong piapa ahi hi. Hih minam nihte khenin gal a piangsak dalna pen Khrih in ama pumpi tawh a satkham hi. [15] Amah tawh kipawlna hangin minam nihte pawlkhat a suahtheih nadingin minam a dei Jew Thukham le a ngeinate khempeuh phiatin, eite pawlkhat hong suahin a hong kilemsak hi.

[3] Kha Siangtho kimakai sakin, khatlekhat kilemin pawlkhat na hihna uh na kipsak tawntung un. [4] A kibang lametna khat bek a ngahkhawm dingin Pasian in note hong sap mah bangin eite khempeuh pumkhat bek hi-in Kha Siangtho zong khat bek mah a neikhawm ihi hi. [5] Topa khat bek, upna khat bek, tuiphumna khat bek mah a zangkhawm ihi hi. [6] Mi khempeuh’ Pa ahi Pasian khat bek om a, mi khempeuh’ Topa hi-in, na khempeuh hih kimin, mun citengah a om hi.

[16] Ama ukna mangin pumpi na a tuamtuamte a kituak takin kizom a, amaute limtakin a kizop dimdiamna hangin pumpi pen pumkhat a suak thei hi. Pumpi na a tuamtuamte in amau’ sep ding ciat hoihtakin a sep uh ciangin itna hangin pumpi khangin a cingtaak a suak thei hi.

[11] Amah in mite tungah siamna a tuamtuam hong pia a, pawlkhatte sawltak nasep a sem ding, pawlkhatte kamsang nasep a sem ding, pawlkhatte thuhilh kawikawi nasep a sem ding, pawlkhatte pawlpi kem nasep a sem ding, le pawlkhatte laihilh nasep a sem dingin a hong seh hi. [12] Hih nasep a tuamtuamte khempeuh a sem dingin Pasian’ mi khempeuh kigingkhol sakin Khrih a dingin na semin Khrih pumpi a khansak theihna ding deihna ahi hi.
[32] khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim nem tawh na kihozaw unla, Khrih’ hangin Pasian in note’ mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.

[1] Note, Khrih tawh kipawlin na nuntakna uh in note hong thahatsak hi. Kha Siangtho tawh kikhawlin, khatlekhat kihehpihin, dikna na kibawl uh hi. [2] Tua ahih manin kei tawh ngaihsutna kibangin note khatlekhat ki-itin, khatlekhat lungsim kituakin na omna uh tawh keima lungdamna na hong cingtaaksak nadingun ka hong kun hi. [3] Huaihamna lungsim le kisialh nopna lungsim tawh bangmah gamta kei un. Kiniamkhiat ciat unla, midangte thupi ngaihsutzaw un. [4] Note’ phattuam nading bek ngaihsun kei unla, midangte’ phattuam nading ngaihsutsak zaw un.

[2] Euodia le Sintikhe, Topa’ hangin a kilemkik ding uh ka thum nuam hi. [11] Tua ahih manin tu laitakin na omzia uh mah bangin khatlekhat kihanthawnin na kihuh ciat ta un.

[24] Khatlekhat ki-itin a hoih nate i sep nadingin kihanthawn ciat ni. [25] Mi pawlkhatte in kikhop a pelh bang hi loin, eite in kikhop khawmnate pelh loin om ni. Topa’ hong pai ding Ni hong naina thu thei ihih manin khatlekhat kihanthawn semsemzaw ni.
[11] Gitlohna pelhin hoih gamtat uh hen la, mi tawh kilem ding hanciamin kilem theih nadingin hahkat ta uh hen.

[8] Itna in mawhna tampi khuhcip thei ahih manin lungsim takpi tawh khatlekhat ki-it ding thupi ngaihsut pha pen un. [9] Khatlekhat maitai takin zinleleeng na kido un. [10] Pasian’ piak na a zatsiamte bangin Pasian’ kiang panin na ngah uh nate, midangte’ phattuam nadingin na zang un.
[7] Ahi zongin amah, khuavak ahih mah bangin eite in zong khuavak gamtatnate i gamtat takpi leh eite pawlkhat ihi a, ama Tapa Jesuh’ sisan in i mawhna khempeuh panin eite hong siangsak hi.
[8] Tua ahih manin Pasian thuman nasepna-ah nasem khawm mite ihih theih nadingin ei Khristiante in hih bang mite i huh ding ahi hi.

Ama ngaihsutna khempeuhah, “Pasian om kei,” a ci hi.

[6] Mite in a hauhna uh muangin, tampi a neihna uh a kisaktheihpih hangun, [7] amah le amah a kitankhia tawmzo taktak, a nuntakna man ding Pasian’ tungah a piazo mi kuamah om lo hi. [8] Bang hang hiam cih leh a nuntakna tatna ding a man tam mahmah a, Leihawmpi mu ngei lo zah ding a hing tawntung dingin kitankhiazo ngei lo hi. [3] TOPA aw, migilote bang tanvei lungdam ding uh a, migilote bang tanvei lungnuamin omom lai ding ahi uh hiam? [4] Gamtatsiate bang tanvei kihisak lai ding uh a, a siat gamtatna uh bang tanvei kisialhpih lai ding ahi uh hiam?

[23] Kong thuhilhna hong ngai un; ka ngaihsutna kong gen ding a, ka theihna kong zasak ding hi. [30] Ka thugente na deih kei uh a, kong thuhilhna ngai nuam lo na hih manun, [31] na gamtatna bangun na thuak ding uh a, nomau’ gamtatna mah in note hong gimsak ding hi. [32] Bang hang hiam cih leh thu thei lote in pilna a don loh manun sihlawh uh a, mihaite in lunghihmawhna a neih loh manun siatlawh uh hi. [33] Ahi zongin ka thugenna a ngaite in lungnopna ngah ding uh a, launa nei loin nuamtakin om hithiat ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
