[7] Mi pawlkhatte, zawng napi-in kihausak uh a, mi pawlkhatte, hau napi-in kizawngsak uh hi.
[10] Hilh ding ut lo, kihihsakna in kitotna bek piangsak thei a, hong kithuhilh ding utna pen a hoihzaw ahi hi.
[14] Van leipa in van zuakpa kiangah, “Kiman kei, kiman kei,” cici khem a, a paikhiat khit ciangin sumdek siam mahmah ing, ci-in mi kiangah kisial hi.
[14] Bangmah a piak lohpi a kisialhpih pa pen guah a zusak tuan lo meiipi le huihpi nung tawh kibang lel hi.
[27] Khuaizu a tam lua nek ding a hoih loh bangin phat ding deihluatna a hoih lo ahi hi.

[1] Zing ciang hun ading kima-sialh kei in. Tuhun le tua hun kikalah a piang ding thu bangmah na thei kei hi. [2] Midangte in hong phat lohbuang nangmah kiphattawm kei in. Khual mite in hong phat lohbuang nangma kamin kiphattawm kei in.
[12] Topa in Zion Mual le Jerusalem khua-ah ama nasep dingteng a zawh khit ciangin Assiria kumpipa kiphasakin a kisialhna le a kiphatsakna hangin gim a pia ding hi.

[6] Kote khempeuh mawhnei mi ka hi khin uh a, ka gamtat hoih khempeuh uh zong puannin tawh kibanglai veve hi. Kote khempeuh singteh bangin ka vul uh a, ka mawhna hangun huih letkhiat nahthel keu ka bang uh hi.

[23] Tua ciangin TOPA in, “Mipilte in a pilna uh kisaktheihpih kei uh hen la, mi hatte in a hatna uh kisaktheihpih kei uh hen. Mihaute in zong a hauhna uh kisaktheihpih kei uh hen. [24] A kisatheite in, keimah, leitungah migitna, thuman le thutang a zang ka hihna le tuate sungah nuam a sapa ka hihna thu hong theihna uhah kisathei uh hen. TOPA in hih thu kong gen khin hi,” a ci hi.

[1] “Biakna tawh kizomin na hoih khat peuhpeuh na sep uh ciangin mite’ phat ding deihna tawh a kilang theithei dingin na sepkhak loh nadingun na kingaihsun un. Tua bangin gamta le-uhcin, vantungah a om na Pa uh kiang panin thaman na ngah kei ding uh hi. [2] “Tua ahih manin mi cimawhte tungah huhna na piak uh ciangin, mite in a phat ding uh a deihna tawh a kineihkhem mite in kikhopna innsung le kongzing lakah a kilang theithei-in a hih uh bangin na hih kei un. Tua bangin a hih mite in thaman a ngah khinta ahihna thu limtakin na phawk un.
[5] Amaute in a sepna khempeuh uh mite’ muhtheih dingin a hih se uh hi. Amaute in a talsuan le a banbulhte uh a gol pipi-in bawlin, a puanmongteep uh a sau theithei-in a bawl uh hi.

[14] Ke’n kong cihin-ah, hih mipa pen Pasian tawh a kilemsa-in a inn-ah ciah a, a khat pa pen tua bangin ciah lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a kiliansakte pen kiniamkhiatsuk ding a, a kiniamkhiatte pen a lianin kibawl ding hi,” a ci hi.
[30] mi gensiatna, Pasian muhdahna, midangte a heh theih a maizum theih nadingin gamtatna, kiphatsakna, kisialhna, thusia bawlna, nu le pate’ thu man lohna,
[27] Tua ahihleh mihingte in i kisialhpih ding bang om ahi hiam? Bangmah om lo hi. Bang bulphuh ding ihi hiam? Thukham zuihna bulphuh ding ihi hiam? Hi lo hi. I upna a bulphuh ding ihi hi.

[3] Pasian in kei tungah hehpihna hong piakkhongna hangin note tungah kong gennop thu in: Note tawh a kituakzah valin kilian ngaihsutzaw kha kei un. Pasian in note tungah upna hong piakzah tawh kizui-in kingaihsun bek zaw unla, a kilawm ciang khat bekin kingaihsun un.

[26] Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note hong sap laitakin na omzia uh ngaihsun un. Leitung mite’ hong muhna panin note a tamzaw, mipil na hi kei uh a, mi vanglian zong na hi kei uh a, mi thupi zong na hi kei uh hi. [27] Ahi zongin Pasian in mipilte a maizumsak nadingin mihaite hong teel a, mi thahatte a maizumsak nadingin mi thaneemte a hong teel hi. [28] Leitung mite in thupi a sakte uh a suksiat theih nadingin Pasian in leitung mite’ simmawh a niamte, bangmahin a ngaihsut loh uh mite a teel hi. [29] Tua ahih manin Pasian’ mai-ah mite a kisaktheih nading thu om lo hi. [30] Ahi zongin Pasian in Jesuh Khrih hangin note tungah nuntakna hong pia a, tua Jesuh Khrih pen eite’ pilna, Pasian tawh i kipawl theihna, Pasian’ mi siangtho suakin, hotkhiatna i ngah theihna ahi hi. [31] Tua ahih ciangin Lai Siangtho sungah, “A kisathei mite, Topa’ hang bekin kisathei ta hen,” ci-in na kigelh hi.
[7] Note in bang kisaktheihpih na hi uh hiam? Tu-a na neih khempeuh uh Pasian’ hong piak hi lo ahi hiam? Tua ahihleh hong kipiasa bek ahih manin a bang kisaktheihpih na hi uh hiam?

[1] Keimah in mihingte pau a tuamtuamte le vantung mite’ pau nangawn ka pautheih hangin itna ka neih kei leh a bil-aphuai zam le daltuah kitum tawh a kibang lel ka hi hi. [2] Thuhilh siamna nei-in, thusim khempeuh thei-in, na khempeuh thei-in, mualte kinsak zawh nading upna ka neih hangin itna ka neih kei leh ka kimanna bangmah om lo hi. [3] Ka neih khempeuh midangte tungah pia-in, Pasian’ nasepna hangin kihaltumna ka thuak ahi zongin itna ka neih kei leh ka phattuamna bangmah om lo hi. [4] Itna neite a lungduai-in migi hi. Itna neite in hazatna lungsim nei loin, zong kisathei lo hi. [5] Itna neite a kilawm loin gamta lo, heh pakpak lo, mite’ mawhna ciamteh lo hi.
[5] Hih bang sepzawh nadingin kote in siamna nei ung a ci hi loin, sepzawh nading siamna pen Pasian hong piak ahi hi.

[12] Note in na hong thupi ngaihsut theih nadingun koleko a hong kiphattawm zel ka hi kei uh a, lungsimtawng hoih lo napi-in a puatham siamna hangin a kisial mite nial thei-in, kote’ hangin note na kisaktheih nading uh deihna hizaw hi.

[14] Titus mai-ah note ka hong kisialhpih ngei a, note in ka kisialhna thu-ah kei na hong zahhuaisak kei uh hi. Note tungah thuman bekbek a hong gen ka hih mah bangun Titus tungah ka kisialhna uh zong a kisial khial ka hihlohna uh hong kilang hi.
[13] Ahi zongin kote ka kisialh nading uh kiciangtan a, note lakah na ka hong sep nadingun Pasian in a hong sehsaksa thu sung ciang bekah ka kisial thei uh hi.
[17] Lai Siangtho in, “Mi khat peuhpeuh a kisialh nop leh Topa’ nasepnate bek kisialhpih hen,” na ci hi.

[12] Tua sawltak dangte in, “Kote in zong amau’ sepzia mah bangin ka sem uh hi,” ci-in a kisialh theih loh nadingun tuhunin nasep thaman bangmah ka hong lak loh mah bangin mai lamah zong ka hong la kei ding hi.
[30] Ka kisialh leh zong ka ginat lohna hong kilangsak nate hangin ka kisial bek hi.

[4] Mite kiangah genkhiatsawn dingin a kiphal lo a lamdang mahmah thu a za hi. [5] Tua bang thu pen a kisialh taak mahmah thu hinapi-in ka kisialhpih kei hi. Kei a ginalo hinapi ama minthan nadingin Pasian in hong zang ahih manin tua thu pen a kisialh taak mahmah thu hinapi-in ka kisialhpih kei hi. Kei a ginalo hinapi ama minthan nadingin Pasian in hong zang ahih manin tua thu ka kisialhpih bek hi. [6] Hih ka muh thu pen thuman ahih manin a kisialhpih hita leng zong mihai ka hi kei hi. Ahi zongin mite in keima sepna le keima genna a muh a zak banah a valin hong thupi ngaihsutkhak ding uh ut lo ka hih manin hih thu ka kisialhpih nuam kei hi. [7] Ahi zongin hih a lamdang na tampite ka muhna hangin kisialin ka kisaktheih khak loh nadingin Satan’ sawltak bangin na a sem, keima pumpi sungah natna khat hong kipia ahih manin ka kisaktheih luat loh nadingin a hong kham hi. [8] Tua natna tawh ka kipelh theih nadingin Topa kiangah thumvei tak thu ka ngen hi. [9] Ahi zongin Topa in kei kiangah, “Na tha a nem ciangin keima vangliatna hat mahmah ahih manin nangma kisapna pen keima hehpihna hi bek hi,” ci-in hong dawng hi. Tua ahih manin keima sungah Khrih vangliatna hong omtheih nadingin lungdam takin ka thaneemna ka kisialhpih semsem hi.
[4] A kuamah peuh in ama gamtatna ciat entel henla, kisialh nading a om leh ama gamtatna siksanin kisial henla, midangte tawh ki-ettehin kisial kei hen.

[14] Ahi zongin keimah in ahihleh, singlamteh tungah i Topa Jesuh a sihna thu bek ka kisialhpih ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh singlamteh tungah ama sihna hangin kei a dingin leitung thute misi bang a, kei zong, leitung thu-ah misi mah ka bang hi.

[8] Note’ upna hangin Pasian’ hong hehpihna tawh hotkhiatna a ngah na hi uh hi. Note’ thalawhna hangin a ngah hi loin Pasian’ hong piakkhong ahi hi. [9] Note’ hanciamna tawh a ngah hi lo na hih manun na kisialh nading uh a thu om lo hi.
[29] Na kiho uh ciangin kamguh zang kei unla, na pauna uh a za mite in phattuamna a ngahtheih nadingin na-in a kimang kam hoihte bek na pau un.

[3] Huaihamna lungsim le kisialh nopna lungsim tawh bangmah gamta kei un. Kiniamkhiat ciat unla, midangte thupi ngaihsutzaw un. [4] Note’ phattuam nading bek ngaihsun kei unla, midangte’ phattuam nading ngaihsutsak zaw un.

[4] Bawlsiatna le gimna na thuakna khempeuh uhah na upna uh khahsuah loin thuakzo paisuak na hih manun midangte kiangah Pasian’ pawlpi ka na kisialhpih uh hi. [5] Tu-a na thuaknate uh hangin Pasian’ Ukna sungah a om dingin a kilawm mi suak na hih manun Pasian’ thukhenna a man ahihna hong kilangsak hi.

[17] Tuhuna a hau mite kisatheikha loin, a kip lo hauhnate muan le suanin neikha loin, eite in nuamtakin i zat theih dingin citna tawh a hong pia Pasian a muan a suan nadingun na hilh in. [18] A hoih nate semin, gamtat pha-in, citna lungsim nei-in midangte a hopnop nadingun na hilh in. [19] Tua hileh mai lamah amaute’ nuntak nading bulpi taktak ahi neihsate, amau a dingin a khol mite ahi ding uh hi.

[1] Nitawp ni hun pen a lauhuai hun ahih ding lamtak phawk in. [2] Tuahun ciangin mite in amau angsung ding bek ngaihsunin, huaihamin, kisialin, kihisakin, mi zahko-in, nu le pate’ thu mang loin, lungdam theihna mel nei loin, biakna lungsim nei loin, [3] mi khual loin, hehpihna nei loin, mi gensia-in, ngongtatin, kihtakhuai-in, thuhoih deih loin, [4] ciampelin, thu khual loin, kiphasak gawpin, Pasian don loin pumpi nopsakna bek deihin, [5] biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deih lo ding uh hi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in.

[12] Pasian’ thu nungta-in a gamtang hi a, langnih a hiam namsau sangin hiamzaw lai hi. Kha le lungsim, guh le taang kituahna, guh le guhngek dongin khenkhia thei hi. Mihingte’ lungsim ngimna le a ngaihsutnate zong theithei hi.
[5] Tua mah bangin leii zong i pumpi na sung panin a neu mahmah khat hinapi-in thusia lianpipi piangsak zo hi. Gam khempeuh zong mei-ek neuno khat pan kipanin a kangtum thei hi.

[14] Ahi zongin na lungsim uhah enna, gitlohna, le huaihamna a om leh a zuaugen na hi uh a, pil ing, ci-in kisialh nading bangmah om lo hi. [15] Tua bang pilnate vantung panin a hong pai hi lo a, leitung pilna, kha thu tawh a kisai lo, a dawivai ahi hi.

[13] Tuni ahih kei leh zing ciangin tua khua tua khua-ah va pai-in, kum khat bang va omin, sumbawlin a meet tampi va ngah ni, a ci mite aw, ka thugen hong ngai dih un. [14] Zing ciangin na nuntakna uh bangci ding cih nangawn na thei kei uh hi. Meiilum tawlkhat sung kaii-in a mangthang pak tawh a kibang lel na hi uh hi. [15] Note in, “Topa in hong thukimpih nakleh nungta-in tua bang tua bang i sem ding hi,” na cih ding uh hi bek hi. [16] Ahi zongin note kihisakin na kisial uh hi. Tua bangte hoih het lo hi.

[18] Amaute kiphasakin haipau uh a, a khial gamtat mite sung panin a suakta khin liailiai zo mite, leitung pumpi deih bangin a gamtat nadingun a zol uh hi. [19] Amaute pen siatna a piangsak thei zongsatna lelin sila hinapi-un mite tungah suahtak nading thu a gen uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mite pen, a hong zo peuhpeuhte’ sila ihi hi.
[16] Bang hang hiam cih leh pumpi deihna, mit tawh mu-in i deihte, le mite’ kisaktheihpih nate ahi leitung nate khempeuh pen Pa Pasian tawh a kizom thu hi lo a, leitung tawh a kizom thu ahi hi.
[16] Hih mite a tawntungin phunin khatlekhat mawhna kizong uh a, amau pumpi deihna bangun gamta-in kiphasak uh a, phattuamna a ngah theih nadingun midangte a phat uh hi.

[7] Amah kisialin a kiphatsakna zah tawh a kizui-in dahna le lungkhamna thuaksak un. Amah in, ‘Kei kumpinu ka hi a, meigong numei lah ka hi kei a, dahna ka thuak ngei kei ding hi,’ ci ahih manin, [8] gimna in ni khatthu-in ban ding a, pulnatna, kahna, le kialpi in vatgawp ding hi. Ama tungah thu a khen Topa Pasian vanglian ahih manin mei tawh kihaltum ding hi,” a ci hi. [9] Amah tawh paktatin a kiphasak khawm leitung kumpite in tua khuapi a katna meikhu a muh uh ciangin dahin a kap ding uh hi.

[14] keima minin a kisam ka mite amau mahmah kiniamkhiatin, thu ngenin ka mai hong zong a, amau’ gitlohnate panin a kihei uhleh, keimah in vantung panin ka za ding a, amaute’ khialhna maisakin a leitang uh ka hoihsakkik ding hi.
[13] A khialhna a im mite a dau pai lo ding a, a mawhna pulakin a kikheel mite in hehpihna ngah ding uh hi.

[15] Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa, Topa PASIAN in, “Kihei kikna le khawlna bek tawh note in suahtakna na ngah ding uh hi. Daitakin omna le muanna pen nomau’ thahatna hi ding hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin note na tuaci kei uh a,

[1] A honkhia zo lo dingin TOPA zawngkhal lo a, khua a za thei lo dingin a bil ngong lo hi. [2] Ahih hangin note’ mawhnate in note le na Pasian uh kikhenna hong piangsak a, amah in note’ aw hong zak theih loh nadingin na khialhnate un ama maitang liah hi.
[19] Nangma kiang panin ka paikhiat khit phetin ka kisikkik a, nong thuhilh khit ciangin dahin ka kun hi. Ka neu laitak a ka minsiatna teng pua niloh ka hih manin maizumin ka lung-am hi,’ a ci hi.

[21] “Migilo khat in a mawh bawlna khawlin ka thukham zui hen la, a hoih a manin gamta leh, tua mipa si lo ding a, pel loin nungta ding hi. [22] Ama mawhnasa khempeuh kimaisak ding a, amah a manin a gamtat manin nungta ding hi. [23] Migilo khat a si ka muh ciangin a lungdam dingin hong ngaihsun na hi uh hiam? Ka lung dam het lo hi. Amah hong kisikin a nuntak ding pen keima deih ahi zaw hi.
[8] Na kisik kikna uh a kilangsak ding gamtatna gamta unla,

[11] Na kisikkik khitna uh a kilat nadingin tui sungah note ka hong phum a, ahi zongin kei nungah a hong pai pa in Kha Siangtho le mei sungah note hong phum ding hi. Tua a hong pai ding pa pen kei sangin nakpitakin lianzaw a, ama khedap a tawisak ding nangawnin ka kilawmzo nai kei hi.
[17] Tua hun a kipan Jesuh in thuhilh ding kipan a, “Vantung ki-ukna hong naita ahih manin kisikin na omzia uh kheel un,” ci-in thu a hilh hi.

[32] Bang hang hiam cih leh note kiangah Tuiphumpa Johan hong pai-in thuman lampi hong lak napi-in na um kei uh a, ahi zongin siahdongte le numei paktatte in a um uh hi. Hih thu na theih khit uh ciang nangawnin na lungsim uh na kheel nuam tuan kei uh a, na um kei veve uh hi.
[15] “A hunhoih hong tungta a, Pasian’ Uk ding hun hong kipanta hi. Na mawhna uh kisikkik unla, hih Lungdamna Thuthak um un,” ci-in a hilh hi.

[8] Na kisikna uh a kilat nadingin gamta un. Note khatlekhat in, ‘Abraham’ suante ihi ngawn hi,’ mawkcih kei un. Ke’n kong cihin-ah, Pasian in hih suangte nangawn Abraham’ suanlekhakte-in bawl thei lel hi.

[31] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Cidamte in siavuan kisam lo uh a, cina mite bek in kisam uh hi. [32] Mite in a zahtak mihoihte a kisik nadingun a sam dingin hong pai ka hi kei a, mite in a pampaih mite a kisik nadingun a sam dingin a hong pai ka hi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[3] Hilo hi. Ke’n kong cihin-ah, na mawhna panun na kisik kei uhleh amaute mah bangin note zong na si ding uh hi.
[5] Hilo hi. Ke’n kong cihin-ah, na mawhna panun na kisikkik kei uh leh note zong amaute mah bangin na si ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[3] Note hoihtakin kingaihsun un. Na sanggampa uh no tungah hong khialh leh amah taii unla, a kisik leh a mawhna maisak un. [4] Nikhat sungin sagihvei ciang dong hong khialh hangin zong, a sagihvei mahin no kiangah hong pai-in, ‘Ka kisik hi,’ hong cih nakleh na maisak khin ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[46] amaute kiangah, “Khrih in sihna thuakin, a ni thum ni-in sihna panin hingkik ding a, [47] Jerusalem khua a kipan minam khempeuh tungah a mawhna uh kisikin a kimaisak nading thu, ama min tawh kihilh ding hi, ci-in kigelh hi. [48] Note pen hih thu khempeuh a thei teci na hi uh hi.

[37] Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a lungsim uh nakpitakin sukha a, Peter le sawltak dangte kiangah, “Sanggamte aw, bangci gamtat ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. [38] Tua ciangin Peter in amaute kiangah, “Na mawhna uh kisik unla, na mawhna uh hong kimaisak theih nadingin Jesuh Khrih min tawh tui kiphum ciat un. Tua hileh Pasian’ piakkhong Kha Siangtho na ngah ding uh hi.

[18] Ama Khrih in a thuak nading thu, Pasian in tanglai pekin kamsangte khempeuh tungtawnin genkhol a, tu-in hih bangin a thugen kholhna a hong tungsak ahi hi. [19] Tua ahih ciangin na mawhnate uh hong sawpsiangsak theih nading, Topa kiang panin a hong pai lungsim nopna hun na ngah theih nading uh le note a dingin a sehsa Jesuh Khrih a hong sawltheih nadingin na mawhna uh kisik unla, Pasian kiang zuan un.
[31] Israel mite kisik kikin Pasian in a mawhna uh a maisak theih nadingin Ukpi le Honpa-in tua Jesuh bawlin ama taklamah a tusak hi.
[18] Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin mawhsakna thu gen nawn lo uh a, “Gentail mite zong kisikin a nuntak theih nadingun Pasian in hunhoih pia hi,” ci-in Pasian a phat uh hi.

[30] Pasian in mihingte’ theih loh hun lai-a a gamtatnate uh phamawh a sak loh hangin, tu-in mun khempeuha om mi khempeuhte a gamtat siatna panun a kihei nadingun thu a hong pia khinzo hi. [31] Amah in leitung mi khempeuh thu a mantakin ama teel mipa a hong khensak nading ni a sehkhol khinzo hi. Tua a ngaihsutna a man taktak hi, ci-in mi khempeuh tungah a hong lah nadingin a teel mipa, sihna panin a hingkiksak zo hi,” ci-in thu a hilh hi.
[21] Jew mi le Gentail mite a mawhna panun Pasian’ lamah kihei-in i Topa Jesuh a up nadingun thu ka gen khinzo hi.

[4] Pasian migi-in thu a diah hithiatna pen na kisikkik theih nading uh a deihna ahih lamtak phawkkha loin, a migitna, a lungduaina, a hong thuaknate neu ngaihsutkha na hi uh hiam? [5] Lungsim khauhin na kisik nop lohna hangun Pasian’ hehna le a manin a thukhenna a hong kilat Ni ding ciangin na gimthuak ding uh a nasia semsem dingin a bawl na hi uh hi.

[9] Bang hang hiam cih leh tu-in ka lung a dam hi. Note ka hong dahsak khakna hangin a lungdam hi loin note na dahna hangun na ngaihsutna uh kheel thei na hih manun a nuam ka hi hi. Tua na dahna uh Pasian in a hoihlamin hong zang ahih manin note a dingin siatna a hong piangsak ka hi kei zaw uh hi.

[21] Note kiangah ka hong tun ciangin a beisa hunah note tampi tak thangtatin, numei tawh mawhna, hukna, lannate hangin na khialhnate uh na kisik loh manun keimah dahin kapin, note’ muhna-ah ka Pasian in kei hong maizumsak khak ding ka lunghimawh mahmah hi.

[9] Mi pawlkhatte’ ngaihsut bangin Topa in a kamciamna a hong tungsak hak hi zenzen lo hi. Note khat beek in siatna na thuakkhak ding uh deih loin na vekpi-un na kisik ding uh deih ahih manin hong pai nai lohna pen note hong khualna hizaw hi.
[9] Ahi zongin Pasian kiangah i mawhnate va pulak lehang, amah citakin thuman ahih manin, i mawhnate hong maisakin i hoih lohnate khempeuh hong siangsak ding hi.

[5] Tua ahih manin na lampialna uh phawkin, na mawhna uh panin kihei unla, na gamtat ngeisa bangun gamta kik un. Na mawhna panun kihei-in na kisikkik kei uhleh note kiangah hong pai-in na meivakna uh ka hong lakkhiatsak ding hi.

[14] Ahi zongin note ka hong mawhsak nading thu tawmkhat a om hi. Milim biakna ante nesakin, nulepa paktatna piangsak a, Israel mite mawhna a gamtasak Balak tungah thu a hilh Balaam’ thuhilhnate a um mi pawlkhat note lakah a om hi. [15] Tua mah bangin Nikolas pawlte’ thuhilhna a um mi pawlkhat zong note lak mahah a om hi. [16] Tua ahih manin na mawhna panun kisikkik un. Na kisik kei uhleh note kiangah kei hong pai baihin, ka kam panin a pusuak namsau tawh amaute ka do ding hi.

[3] Tua ahih manin note a hong kihilh na zaksa uh thute phawkkik unla, tua thute zui-in na mawhna panun kisik kik un. Khua na phawk kei uhleh note kiangah guta bangin ka hong pai ding a, ka hong tunlam nangawn na thei kei ding uh hi.

[27] Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ama lim bangin mihing piangsakin, Pasian’ lim bangin amah a piangsak hi. Amah in pasal le numei a piangsak hi. [28] Pasian in amaute thupha pia a, Pasian in amaute tungah, “Ci pha-in tampi pha unla, leitung dimin zo un. Tuipi ngasate tung, leitungah a gamtang, a nungtate khempeuh tungah ukna nei ta un,” a ci hi.
[18] Tua ciangin TOPA Pasian in, “Mipa amah guak a om ding hoih lo hi. Ama a’ ding a kituak a huh ding ka bawlsak ding hi,” ci hi.

[21] Tua ahih ciangin TOPA Pasian in mipa ihmut suak mahmah sak a, ama ihmut kalin a nakguhte khat la-in tua mun pen satak tawh a dimsak hi. [22] TOPA Pasian in mipa’ tung panin a lakkhiat nakguh pen numei khatin bawl a, mipa kiangah tua nu a paipih hi.
[24] Tua thu hangin pasal in a nu le a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm a, amau tegel pum khat a bang uh hi.
[6] Tua ahih ciangin singkung a hoihna, mi a pilsak dingin tua a gah a deihhuaina a muh ciangin, a singgah loin a ne hi. Amah in singgah kimkhat a pasal pia a, a pasal in zong a ne hi.
[8] Ganhing siangthote, a siang lo ganhingte, vasate, leitung a a bokvak peuhmah, [9] a nupa kopin Pasian in Noah a thupiaksa bangin teembaw sungah Noah tawh pai uh hi.
[1] Pasian in Noah le a tapate thupha pia a, amaute tungah, “Pung unla, tampi pha-in, leitung dim un.
[3] Ahih hangin zanin mang sungah Abimelek kiangah Pasian pai a, ama kiangah, “En in, na laksa numei’ hangin nang a si ding na hi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah, mi khat’ zi ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[3] Nangmah in amau’ lakah ka tenna Kanaan mite’ tanute lak panin ka tapa’ zi ding la loin, keima gam le ka behte kiangah va pai-in ka tapa Isaac’ zi ding na lak nadingin vantung le leitung Pasian ahi TOPA tawh nang kong kiciamsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
[2] Kithawi inla, na nu’ pa Bethuel’ inn, Paddanaram-ah pai in. Tua lai munah na nu’ sanggampa Laban’ tanute khat na zi dingin la in.
[12] Kei kiang panin moman le letsong tampi hong ngen un. Kei’ tunga nong nget zahzah uh kong pia ding hi. Zi dingin a numei hong pia hoh un,” ci thuah lai hi.
[8] Tua ciangin Judah in Onan kiangah, “Na sanggampa’ zi tawh lumkhawm inla, tua nu’ tungah pasal’ sanggamte’ tavuan sem inla, na sanggampa a dingin ta nei in,” a ci hi.
[10] Amah in zi dang khat a lakthuah leh, a zi masa’ annek, a puansilh, ahih kei leh lupkhop nading thuneihna khiam lo ding hi.

[16] “Mi khat in a kidong nai lo nungak khat zolin amah tawh a lupkhop leh, amah in tua nu’ man ding moman letsong pia ding a, ama zi suak ding hi. [17] A numei’ pa in ama tungah tua nu a piak nop kei leh zong, tua mipa in nungak moman letsong zah numei’ pa’ tungah sum pia veve ding hi.
[16] note in amau’ tanute na tapate uh a dingin la-in, amau’ pasian-te tawh paktatna a bawl a tanute in amau’ pasian-te tawh na tapate uh paktatsak kha ding uh hi.
[6] “Note kuamah in na kinaipih na behte uh mawhpih dingin na naih kei ding uh hi. Kei pen TOPA ka hi hi.
[14] Pasal khat in zi nei-in, a zi’ nu tawh zong a lakthuah leh, tua pen a kilawm lo ahi hi. Note lakah tua bang kilawm lohna a om loh nadingin tua pa le a nutate, mei tawh kihallum ding hi.

[19] “Note pen na nu’ sanggamnu ahih kei leh na pa’ sanggamnu tawh na mawh kei ding uh hi. Tua pen a nai behte tawh mawhna ahih manin amaute in amau’ mawhna pua ding uh hi. [20] Pasal khat, a pa’ sanggampa’ zi tawh a lupkhop leh, amah in a pa’ sanggampa a mindaisak ahi hi. Amaute in amau’ khialhna thuak ding uh a, ta nei loin si ding uh hi. [21] Pasal khat in a sanggampa’ zi a lak leh, tua pen nitna hi a, amah in a sanggampa a mindaisak ahi hi. Amaute in ta nei lo ding uh hi.

[7] Amaute in numei paktat ahih kei leh a kininsaksa numei tenpih lo ding uh a, a pasal in a maksa numei zong tenpih lo ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh siampipa pen ama Pasian a dingin siangtho hi.

[13] Amah in a zi dingin nungak la ding hi. [14] Meigong numei, a kimasa numei, a kininsaksa numei, numei paktat, hih bangte pawl tenpih lo ding a, amah in ama mite lak panin nungak khat zi-in la ding hi. [15] Tua pen ama mite lakah a tate a daisak loh nading ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah a siangthosakpa pen keimah TOPA ka hi hi, ci in,” a ci hi.
[14] Midangte khempeuh sangin note thupha hong kilim piakzaw ding hi. Note’ lak hitaleh na ganhingte uh lak hitaleh ah a nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a ciing om lo ding hi.

[15] “Mi khat in zi nih nei a, khat itin a khat mudah a, a it leh a muhdah a zi tegel in ta nei tuakin, tapa a neih cil pen a muhdah nu tawh a neih ahihleh, [16] a tapate tungah gamhluah dingin ama neihsa a hawm ciangin, a muhdah nu’ tapa cil sangin deihzawkna hangin a it nu’ tapa pen a ta cil-in bawl thei lo ding hi. [17] Ama neihsa khempeuh tanh nih piakna tawh a muhdah nu’ tapa a tacil mahin sang ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua pa pen ama sung panin a piang masa pen ahih manin tacil hihna za pen ama a’ ahi hi.

[13] “Mi khat in zi la-in, amah a luppih khit ciangin amah mudahin, [14] a zumhuai gamtatna tawh tua nu mawhsakin, ‘Keimah in hih numei ka la a, amah tawh ka lupkhop ciangin ama sungah nungakna lim ka mu kei hi,’ cihna tawh tua nu tungah minsia a tut leh, [15] tua numei’ nu le a pa in a tanu uh’ nungakna lim a kilatna puan lakhia-in upate kiang kongpi-ah paipih ding uh hi. [16] Numei’ pa in upate kiangah, ‘Hih mipa tungah a zi dingin ka tanu ka pia a, amah in deih nawn lo a, [17] “Na tanu’ sungah nungakna lim ka mu kei hi,” cihna tawh a zumhuai-in amah mawhsak hi. Ahi zongin hihte pen ka tanu’ nungakna a kilatna limte ahi hi,’ ci-in a puan lak ding hi. Amaute in khua upate mai-ah a puan phah ding uh hi. [18] Tua ciangin tua khua upate in tua mipa la-in sat ding uh hi. [19] Amaute in ngun shekel zakhat liausak ding uh a, a numei’ pa’ tungah tuate pia ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Israel nungak tungah minsia tun hi. Tua ciangin a numei pen ama zi mah hi ding a, a nuntak laiteng tua nu ma thei lo ding hi. [20] “Ahih hangin a mawhsakna thumanin, numei sungah nungakna lim a kimuh kei takpi leh, [21] amaute in a pa’ inn kongah a numei paipih ding uh a, ama khuapi pasalte in suang tawh amah denglum ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a pa’ inn sungah paktat gamtatna tawh Israel sungah haina tun hi. Tua bangin note’ lak panin siatna na siangsak ding uh hi.

[25] “Ahih hangin mi khat in a kidongsa nungak khat gamlakah tuakin, mipa in tua nu buanin a luppih leh, tua numei tawh a lum mipa bek kithat ding hi. [26] A numei’ tungah bangmah na hih kei ding uh hi. Numei’ tungah sih nading mawhna om lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih thu pen mi khat in a vengpa do-in a thah tawh kibang hi. [27] Hih mipa in gamlakah numei hih ahih manin, a kidongsa numei in huhna ngen dingin a kiko hangin amah a hon ding kuamah om lo hi. [28] “Mi khat in a kidong nai lo nungak khat tuakin, tua numei buanin luppih a, amau tegel a kimuh leh, [29] numei tawh a lum pa in nungak’ pa tungah ngun shekel sawmnga pia ding a, tua numei ama zi hi ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a numei va su khin hi. A nuntak laiteng tua numei ma thei lo ding hi. [30] “Mi khat in a pa’ zidangte tenpih lo ding a, a pa-a’ ahi numei tawh mawh lo ding hi.
[5] “Mi khat in zi a neih tungin galkapte tawh kuankhia lo ding a, nasep khat peuhpeuh zong kisawl lo ding hi. A laksa a zi tawh a lungdam khawm dingin inn-ah kum khat sung maang ding hi.
[12] Tua ciangin Kaleb in, “Kiriathsefer simin a lazo pa tungah a zi dingin ka tanu Aksah ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.

[21] vil un. Laamna-ah Shiloh nungakte a laam dingin hong pai uhleh, leenggui lote panin note in delhin mi khempeuh in na zi ding ciat uh Shiloh nungakte man unla, Benjamin gamah ciahpih un. [22] Amau’ pate ahi a, a sanggampate uh ahi zongin a lungkim lohna uh kote’ kiangah a gen dingin hong pai uh ciangin kote in amaute kiangah, ‘Kote tungah hehpihna tawh amaute hong pia un; bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh zi ding galsimna sungah ka ngahsakzo kei uh a, note zong a mawh na suahloh nadingun note in amaute tungah utna tawh na piaktawm uh ahi kei hi,’ ka ci ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi. [23] Benjamin mite zong tua bangmahin gamta uh a, amau mi a phazah tawh kituakin a laamte lak panin a zi dingun a la uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute pai-in a gamhluahna uhah ciahkik uh a, khuapite lamkikin a sungah a teng uh hi.

[15] Tua ciangin amah in, “En in, na sanggamnu a mipihte le a pasian-te kiangah ciahkik khin hi. Na sanggamnu’ nungah nang zong ciah in,” a ci hi. [16] Ahih hangin Ruth in, “Nang kong nusiat nading ahi a, nang zuihna panin ka ciahkik nading ahi zongin hong cici nawn kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh na paina-ah ka pai ding a, na giahna-ah ka giak ding hi. Na mite keima mite hi ding a, na Pasian keima Pasian hi ding hi. [17] Na sihna-ah si-in ka kivui ding hi. Sihna cih lohbuang thudang hangin kong nusiat taak leh TOPA in kei hong dawm kei ta hen,” a ci hi. [18] Tua ciangin Naomi in amah a zuih ding a lungsim a khentatna a muh ciangin bangmah ci nawn lo hi.
[5] Tua ciangin Boaz in, “Naomi’ tung panin a lo na lei ni a kipanin, a site’ gamh a site’ beh sungah a kiptheih nadingin a sipa’ zi Moab numei Ruth zong a lei na hi hi,” a ci hi.

[10] A site’ min ama sanggamte le a pianna a khuasung panin a maiman loh nadingin ama gamhluahna-ah a site’ min a kizop theih nadingin a si khin Mahlon’ zi, Moab numei Ruth zong ka zi dingin ka lei khin hi; note pen tuni-in teci na hi uh hi,” a ci hi.
[13] Tua ahih ciangin Boaz in Ruth la-in ama zi a suak hi. Amah in a zi luppih a, TOPA in tua nu gaisakin amah in tapa khat nei hi.

[25] Israel mite khatlekhat kiho-in, “Hih hong paikhia mipa na mu ngei uh hiam? Israel-te a to dingin hong paito takpi hi. Amah a that mipa tungah kumpipa in sum tampi pia-in, ama tanu zong pia ding a, a pa’ innkuante, Israel sungah aana nasep le siah khempeuh kipengsak ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

[17] Tua ciangin Saul in David kiangah, “Hih lai-ah ka tanu uzaw Merab om hi. Nang tungah zi dingin kong pia ding hi. Kei a dingin hang peuh inla, TOPA’ gal do in,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Saul in, “Keima khut sungah amah si loin Filistia-te’ khut sungah si hen,” ci-in ngaihsun hi.

[40] David’ nasemte Karmel-a Abigail’ kiang a tun ciangin amaute in tua nu kiangah, “David in ama zi dingin a la dingin kote nang kiangah hong sawl hi,” a ci uh hi. [41] Tua ciangin amah dingin lei-ah maikun a, “En un, na nasemnu uh ka topa’ nasemte’ khe a silsak ding nasem ahi hi,” a ci hi. [42] Tua ciangin Abigail kinawhin dingin la tungah tuang a, ama nasem numei nga in amah a kem hi. David’ kamtaite’ nung zui-in pai a, tua ciangin ama zi a suak hi.
[14] Tua ciangin David in Saul’ tapa Ishbosheth kiangah kamtaite sawlin, “Filistia-te’ vundawn za khatin ka leisa ka zi Mikhal hong pia in,” a ci hi.

[1] Tu-in Kumpi Solomon in gamdang numei tampi ngai hi. Faro’ tanu, le Moab mi, Ammon mi, Edom mi, Sidon mi, le Hit numeite, [2] TOPA in Israel mite tungah, “Amaute tawh na kiteng kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in amau’ pasian’ lamah na lungsim uh hong heikhia taktak ding uh hi,” a cih minamte’ lak pan lawm ngai a, Solomon in hih mite ngai-in pom hi. [3] Amah in kumpite’ tanu vive zi zasagih, le zineu zathum nei hi. A zite in ama lungsim heikhia uh hi. [4] Bang hang hiam cih leh Solomon a teek ciangin a zite in pasian dangte’ lamah ama lungsim heikhia uh a, ama pa David’ lungsim bangin ama lungsim TOPA’ tungah thuman bup taktak zo lo hi. [5] Bang hang hiam cih leh Sidon mite’ nusian Ashtoreth, le Ammon mite a’ ahi a kihhuai Milkom, Solomon in bia hi. [6] Tua ahih ciangin TOPA’ muhna-ah Solomon a sia gamta a, a pa David bangin TOPA zuibup lo hi.
[2] Siampi Jehoiada’ hunsung khempeuh TOPA’ mitah Joash a manin gamta hi. [3] Jehoiada in ama a dingin zi nih laksak a, amah in tapate le tanute a nei hi.
[10] Tua ciangin siampi Ezra dingto-in amaute kiangah, “Note in gamdang numeite zi-in la-in Israel mite’ mawhna na behlap uh hi.
[27] Tua ahih ciangin Solomon aw, nangma gamtatnate hong zui-in, gamdang numeite tenpihna tawh hih siatna lian khempeuh gamta-in i Pasian tungah hong zuautat ding ka hi uh hiam?” ka cisak hi.

[2] Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa’ nasemte in ama kiangah, “Kumpipa a dingin a melhoih nungak khangnote zongsak in. [3] Kumpi khua ahi Susa khuapi-a numeite’ omna-ah a melhoih nungak khangno khempeuh hong paipih nadingun na ukna gam tuamtuam khempeuhah uliante sawl in. Tua numeite pen numeite a uk, kumpipa’ innsungmang Hegai’ kep dingin ki-ap hen. Tua ciangin tua numeite tungah paknamtui tuamtuam kiguan’ hen. [4] Tua sung panin kumpipa’ deih bel nungak pen Vashti’ tangin kumpinu suak hen,” a ci uh hi. Kumpipa in hih ngaihsutna hoihsa a, tua bangin a gamta hi.

[16] Ama uk a kum sagihna, kha sawmna ahi Tebeth kha sungin kumpi innsung Kumpi Ahasueras’ kiangah Esther a kipaipih ciangin, [17] kumpipa in ama numei dangte khempeuh sangin itzaw a, a nungak dangte khempeuh sangin limbawl zaw hi. Tua hi a, kumpi lukhu amah khusakin Vashti’ tangin kumpinu a suaksak hi. [18] Tua ciangin kumpipa in Esther pahtawina-in ama uliante le a nasem khempeuh a dingin pawi lianpi khat a bawl hi. Amah in ama ukna gam khempeuhah tua ni nasep khawlin zum a khakna ding uh zong thu zasak kim a, kumpipa min tawh a kilawm a kituak letsongte zong a hawmkhia hi.

[15] Na zi’ tungah citak inla, amah bek itin nei in. [16] Pasal dang tawh va vakzau-in kongzing lakah va mawhkha ding hi. [17] Na zi pen nangma a’ ding bek hi a, midangte tawh na neihkhawm ding hi lo hi. [18] Tua ahih ciangin na zi tawh lungkim inla, na tenpih numei tawh lungdam in. [19] A it-huai a ngaihbaangin ngaihsun tawntung inla, ama ngaihbaanna tawh lungdamin, ama hong itna tawh lungkim in.

[24] mi’ zi tawh na mawh loh nadingin nang hong kemin, kam khum zangin a hong zol numei ginalote kiang panin nang hong hu ding hi. [25] Amau’ melhoihna iplahkha kei inla, amau’ hong zawlmitna khenglahkha kei in. [26] Bang hang hiam cih leh anlum khat tawh numei paktat khat kingahzo a, ahi zongin numei tawh mawhna in nuntakna bup siasak hi.
[4] Zi hoih pen a pasal’ minthanna le lungdamna hi a, a pasal a maizumsak zi pen a pasal a dingin a dam thei lo guhnatna tawh kibang hi.
[22] Zi a muzote na hoih a mu hi a, TOPA’ maipha a ngah ahi hi.
[14] Inn le neihsate pen pate’ tung panin a kiluah hi a, zi pil ahihleh TOPA bek in hong pia thei hi.
[19] A phun hat zi gilo tawh tenkhop sangin gam simthamah khat guak tangten’ hoihzaw hi.
[24] A hehbaih mite tawh kipawl kei unla, a lungtom mite tawh kikhawl kei un.
[27] Na nuntakna ding zong masa inla, na an nek ding a kicin ciang bekin na inn ding lamin zi le ta nei pan in.
[24] Phun bek a thei zi tawh inn sungah tenkhop sangin innkhumzang kiu khatah tangten’ hoihzaw tham hi.
[20] A citak lo zi hih bangin gamta hi: Midang tawh khialin tua ciangin kisilsiang a, “Khialhna bangmah gamta kei ing,” ci khem hi.
[10] Zi hoih pen suangmanpha sangin manphazaw pek a, ahi zongin zi hoih ngah ding haksa mahmah hi.

[30] Ngaihbaanna pen zuaupi hithei a, melhoihna zong maimang thei hi. Ahi zongin TOPA a zahtak numei a phattaak ahi hi. [31] A sepna khempeuh hangin amah phat un. Mi khempeuh in a zahtak dingin a kilawm ahi hi.
[9] Pasian in hih leitungah nang a hong piak, tomkha sung na nuntak laiteng, na it na zi tawh a nuam theithei-in om in. Leitung lungkhamna sungah na lawhtak, tua bek mah hi kha ding hi.

[4] Jerusalem nungakte aw, ko’ kingaihna nong suknawi loh nadingun kei tungah hong kiciam un. [5] Gamlak panin a lawmpa tawh khut kilensa-in a hong paikhia kua ahi hiam? Nangmah na pianna mun, na nu in hong neihna mun, epel kung nuai panin nang kong phong hi. [6] Kei simloh kuamah ngai kei inla, kei simloh kuamah kawi kei in. Itna zong sihna zahin thahat a, ngaihna zong sihna zahin khauh hi. Itna, mei bangin kuangkhia a, meikuang lianpen a suak hi. [7] Tui tampi nangawn tawh kisumit zo lo a, tui sungah i phumcip hangin mitzo tuan lo hi. Mi khat in a neihsa sum khempeuh tawh itna a lei dingin hong kithawi leh kinuihsan lel ding hi. [8] Sanggam numeino khat ka nei uh a, a nawite neu mahmah hi. Tangval khat in hong hel zenzen leh ka sanggamnu uh bangci huh ding ka hi uh hiam?

[1] Tua ni ciangin nupi sagih in papi khat neikhawm ding uh a, “Kote in komau’ an ciat ne-in, komau’ puan ciat mah ka silh ding uh hi. Kote pen, nangma zi cih min bek hong puasak in; ka minsiatna teng uh hong hum in,” ci ding uh hi.

[5] Bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah hong Bawlpa pen nang a dingin na pasal bang hi ding a, ama min pen Vanglian TOPA ahi hi. Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa pen nang hong honkhia pa hi a, amah pen leitung buppi’ Pasian a kici hi.
[5] Bang hang hiam cih leh tangval in nungak khat a tenpih mah bangin nang hong lam pa in nang hong tenpih ding a, zipi pa mothak nu tungah a lungdam mah bangin nang tungah na Pasian lungdam ding hi.

[9] Bang hang hiam cih leh Vanglian TOPA, Israel mite’ Pasian in hih bangin kong ci hi: En un, hih mun panin note’ muh teekteekin, note’ theih hunsung mahin gualnopna, lungdamna awte le zinei thakte, pasalnei thakte’ awte ka gingsak nawn kei ding hi.
[6] Zi pi unla tanu tapa nei un. Na tapate a’ ding mo la unla, na tanute uh mo kha un; tua hileh amau in zong tanu tapa hong nei ding uh hi. Kiam kei unla, pungzaw un.

[8] “Nang kong muhkhak kik ciangin pasal nei thei ding hun na hita hi. Na pum guakin a om kimlai, ka puan tawh kong khuh a, na zumhuaina-teng hong seelsakin, tenpih dingin kam kong ciam hi. Kong kamciamna tangtung sakin nang pen keima-a’ nong suak hi, Topa PASIAN in ci hi.

[2] TOPA in Hosea tungtawnin Israel-te tungah thu a na gen cil lai-in, amah in Hosea kiangah, “Hih gammite kei tungah citak loin pasian dangte bia uh ahih manin, nang zong hong tulpih lo ding numei paktat khat tenpih inla, tua nu tawh ta nei in,” a ci hi.

[19] Israel aw, nang, zi-in kong neikik ding a, nang tungah thuman thutangin kong gamta kik ding hi. Nang hong itin kong hehpih tawntung ding a, keima-a’ na hi tawntung ding hi. [20] Kei-a’ ahi tawntung dingin nang kong la ding hi. Tua ciangin TOPA ka hih lamtak nong thei ding hi.
[2] Tua ahih ciangin ngun shekel sawm le nga le mangbuhham seu sawm le nga tawh zi lei-in

[11] Judah mite citak loin, Pasian tungah a thuciamna uh palsat uh a, Israel mite’ lak le Jerusalem khua sungah siatna tampi gamta uh hi. TOPA in a it mahmah biakinn ninsak uh hi. TOPA ahi lo, pasian dang a bia numeite, zi-in la-in a tenpih uh hi. [12] Hih bangin a gamta mi peuhmah, a kua a kua hitaleh, TOPA in sugawp hen la, Vanglian TOPA tungah biakna a paipih ei minamte tawh hong kigawmsak nawn kei hen. [13] Note’ gamtatna adang khat omlai hi. Tua pen, note’ paipih biaknate hong sang nawn lo ahih manin TOPA’ biakna tau, khitui tawh na kawtsak uh a, kapin thumin na om uh hi. [14] Bang hangin hong sang lo hiam, na ci uh hi. Na khangnolai uha na tenpih na zite uh tungah na cihtak lohna uh amah in hong thei a, na zite uh tungah na cihtak tawntungna ding uh Pasian tungah thu ciamin, na zite uh zong na lawmnu mah uh hinapi-in amaute tawh na thuciamna uh na pelhna hang uh ahi hi. [15] Pasian in na zite uh tawh pumkhat, lungsim khat ahi dingin hong bawl hi lo ahi hiam? Hih bangin a hong bawlna pen bang a deihna ahi hiam? Pasian’ mi taktak ahi ding tate i neih theih nading ahi hi. Tua ahih manin na khangno lai-un na tenpih na zi uh tawh na thuciamna uh na palsatkhak loh nadingun kidawm un. [16] Vanglian TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Zi makna ka deih kei a, mi khatpeuh in a khangno lai-a a tenpih a zi tungah tua bang gitlohna a gamtatna ka mudah hi. Tua ahih ciangin hoihtakin kidawm unla, a citak dingin na zite uh tungah na thuciamna uh palsat kei un,” ci hi, a ci hi.

[32] Ahi zongin ke’n note kiangah kong genin-ah: Mi khat peuhmah in pasal dang tawh a mawhna hang lobuang, a zi a mak peuhmah a, a zi in pasal a neihkik leh mi tawh a mawh dingin a bawl a suak hi. Tua a kima numei a tenpihte, numei tawh a mawh mah ahi hi.

[4] Jesuh in, “Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘A kipat cil-in a Piangsak pa in numei le pasal a bawl hi,’ ci hi. [5] Tua ciangin, ‘Hih thu hangin pasal in a nu le a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm ding a, amau tegel pumkhat a bang ding uh hi,’ ci-in na kigelh hi. [6] Tua ahih manin amaute nih hi nawn loin khat ahi ta uh hi. Tua ahih manin Pasian in a gawmsa mite, kuamah in khen kei ta hen,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[9] Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Mi khatpeuh in midang tawh a zi a mawhna lobuang, a zi a mak a, numei dang tawh a ten leh numei tunga mawh ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[12] Ama kiangah, ‘Lawm aw, mo pawi siimna puan silhlopi-in hih lai-ah hong bangci luttheih na hi hiam?’ a cih ciangin tua mipa in a cih nading a thei kei hi.
[24] “Sia aw, Moses in, ‘Mi khat ta nei loin a sih leh tua a si mipa’ khang a kizop theih nadingin a naupa in a u’ zi luah ta hen,’ ci hi.

[27] Tua unau pasal sagihte a sih khit ciangin a numei zong a si hi. [28] Tua ahih manin tua unau pasal sagihte in tua nu tenpihkim uh ahih manin, thawhkik hun ciangin a koi pen’ zi hi ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. [29] Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Note in Lai Siangtho thu ahi a, Pasian’ vangliatna ahi zongin thei lo na hih manun na ngaihsunkhial uh hi. [30] Bang hang hiam cih leh misite a thawhkik uh ciangin vantungah a om vantung mite tawh kibang ding uh a, zinei pasalnei cih om lo ding hi.

[17] Bang hang hiam cih leh Herod in a nau Filip’ zi Herodias a tenpihna hangin Johan in Herod kiangah, “Na naupa’ zi na tenpih ding ngeina hi lo hi,” ci-in gen zelzel ahih manin Herodias a heh suak a, galkapte in Johan manin thong sungah a khiat nadingin Herod a vaihawmsak hi. [18] Bang hang hiam cih leh Herod in a nau Filip’ zi Herodias a tenpihna hangin Johan in Herod kiangah, “Na naupa’ zi na tenpih ding ngeina hi lo hi,” ci-in gen zelzel ahih manin Herodias a heh suak a, galkapte in Johan manin thong sungah a khiat nadingin Herod a vaihawmsak hi.

[6] Ahi zongin piancil lai-in, ‘Pasian in numei le pasal a bawl hi. [7] Tua ahih manin pasal in a nu le a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm ding a, [8] amau nihte pen pumkhat bang ahi ding uh hi,’ na kici hi. Tua ahih manin amaute nih hi nawn loin khat hita uh hi. [9] Tua ahih manin Pasian’ gawmsa mite, kuamah in khen kei ta hen,” a ci hi. [10] Innsungah a tumkhit uh ciangin nungzuite in hih thu tawh kisai Jesuh kiangah a dongkik uh hi. [11] Amah in, “A zi ma-a numei dang tawh a teng mi peuhmah a zi a palhngulh ahi hi. [12] A pasal ma-a pasal dang tawh a teng mi peuhmah in zong a pasal a palhngulh ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[21] A nau in a upa’ zi luah hi; amah zong ta nei loin si leuleu hi. A thumna pa, [22] le adangte khempeuh, a sagihna dong in tua nu tenpih uh a, ta nei lo vive mahin a si uh hi. A tawpna ciangin tua numei zong a si hi. [23] Tua ahihleh, hih unau pasal sagihte in hihnu tenpih kim ciat uh ahih manin, mi khempeuh a thawhkik ni ciangin a kua pen’ zi hi ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. [24] Jesuh in, “Na khial mahmah uh hi. Lai Siangtho ahi a, Pasian’ vangliatna ahi zongin na theih lohna hang uh ahi hi. [25] Sihna panin mite a thawhkik ciangin vantungah a om vantung mite mah bangin zinei pasalnei cih om lo ding uh hi.

[4] Josef zong David’ suante khat ahih manin Galilee gam sung Nazareth khua panin David’ suahna khua ahi Judea gam Bethlehem khua-ah a pai hi. [5] Tua bangin min sazian kikhumsak dingin a pai ciangin tenpih dingin zuthawl a piaksa a lawmnu Mary tawh a paikhawm uh hi. A lawmnu naupaii hi a,
[18] “Pasal khat in a zi ma-in numei dang a tenpih leh tua numei tawh a mawh hi a, a kima numei a tenpih pasal zong numei tawh a mawh mah ahi hi.
[28] “Sia aw, Moses in eite a dingin ngeina khat hong koihsak a, ‘Mi khat in ta nei loin a zi a sihsan leh, tua a sipa’ khang a kizop theihna dingin a naupa in tua meigongnu tenpih ta hen,’ ci hi.

[2] Gentehna-in, pasal nei numei khat pen a pasal a nuntak sungteng bek, tua thukham in a pasal tawh lencip hi. Ahi zongin a pasal a sih ciangin tua a pasal tawh a lencip thukham panin a suakta hi. [3] Tua ahih manin a pasal a nuntak hun sungin pasal dang tawh a lupkhop leh mi tawh a mawh kici hi. Ahi zongin a pasal a si hileh thukham tawh kisai-in a suakta hi a, pasal dang a tenpih hangin mi tawh a mawh hi lo hi.
[9] Na ki-itnate uh lungsim takpi tawh hi sak unla, a siate mudahin a hoihte lenkip un.

[16] Numei paktat tawh a pumpi a kizomsak pa pen tua numei tawh pumkhat sakhat a suak ahih lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho in, “Tua mi nihte pumkhat a suak ding uh hi,” na ci hi.

[1] Tu-in nong laigelhna uh thu tawh kisai-in: Pasal in zi nei kei leh hoihzaw lo ding ahi hiam, na ci uh hi. [2] Ahi zongin numei tawh paktatna tamlua ahih manin pasal in ama zi tuam nei hen la, numei in ama pasal tuam nei leh hoih hi. [3] Pasal in a zi a luppih dingin a kilawm zahin luppih ding a, a zi in zong a pasal a luppih dingin a kilawm zahin a luppih ding ahi hi. [4] Zi in ama pumpi a ut bangin zangthei nawn loin a pasal’ zat ding hi a, tua mah bangin a pasal in zong ama pumpi a ut bangin zangthei nawn loin a zi’ zat ding ahi hi. [5] Thungetna-in hun na zattheih nadingun tawlkhat sung tuam om ding thukim khawm masa lopi-in lupkhop ding kinialkha kei un. Tua bangin tawlkhat sung na tuam om khit uh ciangin note’ pumpi’ deihna hangin Satan’ ze-etna sungah na pukkhak loh nadingun a ngeina bangin lupkhop ding kipan kik un.
[8] Pasal nei nai lote le meigongte pen keimah bangin tanggawl om paisuak le-uh hoih ka sa hi.

[10] A neisate tungah, kei’ ngaihsutna hi lo, Topa’ ngaihsutna ka gennop thu in: Zi in a pasal ciahsan kei tahen. [11] A ciahsan leh zong pasal nei loin om paisuak hen. A om paisuakzawh kei leh a pasal ngei mah zuankik hen. Pasal in a zi ma kei tahen. [12] Adangte tungah, Topa’ cih hi lo, keima ngaihsutna ka gennop thu in: Mi khatpeuh in thu um lo mi khat zi-in a neih leh, pasal mahin neih ding a zi a lungkim ahih nakleh ma kei tahen. [13] Numei khat in thu um lo mi khat pasalin a neih leh, zi mahin neih ding a pasal a lungkim ahih nakleh ma tuan kei tahen. [14] Bang hang hiam cih leh thu um lo pasal pen a zi’ hangin thu um mi suakthei ding a, thu um lo zi pen a pasal’ hangin thu um mi suakthei ding hi. Tua bang hileh a tate uh thu um mi suakthei ding uh hi. Ahi zongin tua bang hi kei le-uh a tate uh thu um mi suakthei lo ding uh hi. [15] Ahi zongin thu um lo zi in ahi a, thu um lo pasal in ahi zongin kikhen ding a ut leh kikhen ta uh hen. Tua bang thute-ah thu um zi ahi a, thu um pasal ahi zongin a awk nading thu om lo hi. Pasian in nuamtakin a nungta dingin a hong sap ahi hi. [16] Thu um zi in, “Ka pasal honkhiazo kei ning,” bangci-in cithei ding a, thu um pasal in, “Ka zi honkhiazo kei ning,” bangci-in cithei zenzen ding ahi hiam?

[25] Tu-in a nungak lai a tangval laite thu tawh kisai-in: Topa kiang panin thu ngahna ka neih loh hangin Topa’ hehpihna tawh a muantaak ahi keima ngaihsutna ka hong gen ding hi. [26] Tu laitakin a om bangun om paisuak leh hoihzaw ding hi, cihna thu tawh kisai-in, tu laitak a lungkhamhuai thu ka ngaihsut ciangin tu laitakin a om bangun om paisuak leh hoihzaw mah dingin ka ngaihsun hi. [27] Ahi zongin zineite in kikhen ding ngaihsutin nei kei tahen. Nungak lai tangval laite in lawm zong kei tahen. [28] Ahi zongin pasal in zi a neih hangin a khial hi lo a, numei in zong pasal a neih hangin a khial hi lo hi. Ahi zongin zi nei, pasal neite in leitung lungkhamna tampi thuak uh ahih manin tuate tawh kipelhzaw le-uh hoih ka sa hi. [29] Sanggamte aw, tua bang ka cih ciangin a kiseh hun hong nai mahmah ta hi, ka cihnopna ahi hi. Tua ahih manin zi neite pen zi nei lo mah bangin kingaihsun uh hen la, [30] a dahte pen a dah lo mah bangin kingaihsun uh hen la, a lungdamte pen a lungdam lo mah bangin kingaihsun uh hen la, na a leite pen bangmah a nei lo mah bangin kingaihsun uh hen la, [31] leitung na nuamtakin a zangte pen a zang lo mah bangin kingaihsun ta uh hen. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih leitung pen sauveipi kip nawn lo ding hi. [32] Note, lunghihmawhna tawh na kipelh ding uh ka hong deihsak hi. Zi a nei lote in Topa a lungdamsak theih nadingun Topa’ thu bek kinin nei uh hi. [33] Ahi zongin zi neite in a zi a lungdamsak theih nadingun hih leitung vai kinin nei uh a, [34] a ngaihsutna uh khen nih pha hi. Pasal a nei lo numeite in a lungsim le a pumpi uh Topa a dingin zangnuam uh ahih manin Topa’ nasep bek kinin nei uh hi. Ahi zongin pasal a nei numeite in a pasal uh a lungdamsak theih nadingun hih leitung vai kinin nei uh hi. [35] Hih bangin ka hong gen ciangin note’ haksat nading deihna hi loin note’ hoih nading ka deihna ahi hi. Note a kilawm a kituakin gamta-in, lungsim le thatang siit nei loin Topa’ na na septheih nading uh ka hong deihsakna ahi hi. [36] Tenpih dingin lawm dongkhin napi-in kiten nawn loh ding a ngaihsunte’ thu panin: Tenpih kei leng a numei tungah a thuman lo hi ding cihna ahi a, zi a deihna lungsim a lianlua ahi a, tenpih ding mah hoih hi, ci-in ngaihsutna ahi zongin a neih leh a lungkimna bangun gamta-in tenpih uh hen. Tua thu-ah bangmah khialhna om lo hi. [37] Ahi zongin kuama sawl hi loin zi nei lo dingin a lungsimah khauhtakin khentatin, a lungsim ki-ukzo taktakin a ngaihsutsa ahih nakleh a neih loh hangin phamawh lo hi. [38] Tua ahih manin a neite zong hoih a, a nei loin a kikem zote hoihzaw lai hi. [39] Pasal a nei numei pen a pasal a nuntak laiteng suakta lo hi. A pasal a sih leh a deih peuhpeuh tawh kitengthei ding a, ahi zongin thu um mi bek tenpih ding hi. [40] Ahi zongin keima ngaihsutna-ah pasal a neihse sangin tuaci om leh lungdamzaw dingin ka um a, Pasian’ Kha Siangtho’ ngaihsutna mah zong hi-in ka um hi.
[5] Sawltak dangte, Topa’ naute, le Peter mah bangin ka khualzinna-ah thu um mi ka zi a tonpih thei ding ka hi hi.
[3] Ahi zongin na theih ding uh ka deih thu in: Mi khempeuh’ lutang pen Khrih hi a, numei’ lutang pen pasal hi a, Khrih’ lutang pen Pasian ahihna thu ahi hi.

[9] Numei hangin pasal a kipiangsak hi lo a, pasal hangin numei a kipiangsak hizaw hi. [10] Tua ahih ciangin a pasalte uh ukna nuai-ah a om ahihna a lah nadingun vantung mite’ muhna-ah numeite in a lu uh a khuh ding uh kilawm hi. [11] Ahi zongin Topa thu sunga i nuntakna-ah numeite pen pasal tawh loin a tangdinzo hi lo a, pasalte zong numei tawh kop loin a tangdinzo hi tuan lo hi. [12] Bang hang hiam cih leh numei pen pasal tung panin a kipiangsak hi a, pasal pen numei sung panin a suak ahi hi. Tua hi a, na khempeuh, Pasian kiang panin a hong pai ahi hi.
[2] Pasian in hong aam mahmah bangin note ka hong aam mahmah hi. Nungak le tangval nupa dingin a kigawm mah bangin khat bek ahi Khrih tawh a kigawm dingin nungak siangtho bang na hi uh hi.

[22] Zite aw, Topa’ thu na man’ uh mah bangin na pasalte uh thu na mang un. [23] Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih pen ama pumpi ahi pawlpi a honkhia pa hi-in, pawlpi tungah ukna thu a neih mah bangin pasal in a zi tungah ukna thu a nei ahi hi. [24] Pawlpi pen Khrih’ khutnuai ahih mah bangin zite zong thu khempeuhah a pasalte uh khutnuai hi ding uh hi. [25] Pasalte aw, Khrih in pawlpi itin a pumpi a piak mah bangin na zite uh na it un.
[28] Tua mah bangin pasalte in zong amau pumpi zah mah bangin a zite uh a it ding uh ahi hi. A zi a it mi pen amah a ki-it mi ahi hi.

[31] Tua ahih manin Lai Siangtho in, “Hih thu hangin pasal in a nu le a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm ding a, amau tegel khat a suak ding uh hi,” na ci hi. [32] Pasalte in amau pumpi zahin a zite uh itin, zite in zong amau pumpi zah mahin a pasalte uh a it ding uh ahih mah bangin, Lai Siangtho in hih bangin a gen ciangin a thukzaw khat, Khrih le pawlpi a ki-itna a gennopna ahi hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
[18] Zite aw, Khristiante gamtat dingin a kilawm ahih mah bangin na pasalte uh thu na mang un. [19] Pasalte aw, na zite uh it unla, amaute tungah ngongtat kei un.
[15] Ahi zongin numei in a kilawm a kituakin upna, itna le sianthona thu-ah kiptakin a om nakleh nausuah gimna sihpih lo ding hi.

[2] Tua ahih manin siate pen paubaanna a nei lo mi, zi khat bek a nei mi, lungsim hoih hithiat mi, thu a ngaihsun thei mi, a kilawm a kituakin a gamta mi, zin le leengla do a siam mi, thuhilh a siam mi,
[12] Upate pen zi khat bek a nei mi, a tate le a innkuansung hoihtakin a ukzote hi ding hi.

[3] Tua bang mite in zi neih le pasal neih ding le an pawlkhat nek ding hoih lo hi, ci uh hi. Ahi zongin thu umin, thuman thutak a thei mite in lungdamna ko-in a nek dingin Pasian in tua ante a bawl ahi hi.
[8] Mi khatpeuh in a beh a phung, a diakdiakin a innkuansung mite a vak nop kei leh a upna a nusia hita a, thu um lo mite sangin siazaw lai hi.
[14] Tua ahih manin, i langte’ hong gensiat nading a om loh nadingin, a khangno lai meigong numeite in pasal nei-in, ta nei-in, amau innkuansung ukin a om ding uh ka deihzaw hi.

[4] amaute sangin a nauzaw nupite in a pasalte uh le a tate uh a it nadingun a hilh ding, [5] thu ngaihsun thei, a gamtat siangtho, inn nasep a kizen, a migi, le a pasalte uh thu a mang thei mi ahih nadingun na gen in.

[11] Sarah a ta neihtheih ding hun beikhin napi-in ama tungah thuciam pa zuau lo ding, ci-in Abraham in upna a neihna hang mahin Sarah gai-in ta a nei ahi hi. [12] A cimang khinin a kingaihsun hih mi khat’ suanlekhakte pen vana aksi zah leh tuipi gei-a sehnel zahin a tam hi.

[4] Mi khempeuh in nupa thu thupi ngaihsut uh hen la, zite pen pasalte tungah citakin, pasalte zong a zite uh tungah citak uh hen. Pasian in a thangtat mite le nulepa mawhna a gamta mite tungah thu khen ding hi.

[1] Tua mah bangin zite aw, na pasalte uh Pasian thu um lo ahihkhak leh na gamtatna hangun Pasian thu a uptheih nadingun na pasalte uh thu na mang un. Kampau kul sese loin, [2] na gamtat hoihna uh a muh uh ciangin Pasian thu hong um ding uh hi. [3] Na hoih nadingun puatham kizepna ahi sambawlna, kham le suangmanpha tawh kizepna, puan hoihnono silhnate na bulphuh kei unla, [4] Pasian’ muhna-ah a manpha mahmah ahi lungsim puakzia, a tul thei lo sunglam hoihna na bulphuh zaw un. [5] A beisa hunah Pasian muangin thu um numeite in a pasalte uh thu mangin, tu-a bang danin a hoih nadingun a kibawl uh hi. [6] Sarah zong tu-a bangmahin gamta a, a pasal Abraham’ thu mangin, “Topa aw,” a ci hi. Note zong a hoihin gamta-in, bangmah launa nei loin na om nak-uhleh tu-in Sarah’ tanute na hita uh hi. [7] Tua mah bangin pasalte aw, note sangin na zite uh a thahat lo zawdeuh ahihna thu na phawk un. Note mah bangin Pasian’ piak nuntakna a ngahte ahih uh manin na zite uh zahtak bawl un. Tua hileh na thungetna uh bangmah in hong nawngkaisak lo ding hi.

[7] Tuuno’ zineih ding hun hong tungta a, a Lawmnu a kithawisa-in omkhin ahih manin lungdam kipakin amah phat ni. [8] Puan hoih mahmah, siangin a pak mahmahte, ama silh dingin kipia hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua puan hoih pen Pasian’ mi siangthote’ gamtatna mante ahi hi. [9] Tua ciangin vantungmi in keima kiangah, “Hih thu gelh in: Tuuno’ zineihna pawi-ah a kisam mite a hampha mahmah ahi hi,” hong cihkhit ciangin, “Hihte pen Pasian’ gen taktak kammal ahi hi,” hong cithuah lai hi.

[9] Tua ciangin gimna nunung sagihte a dimin a om hai sagih a tawi vantungmi sagihte sung panin khat kei kiangah hong pai-in thu hong gen a, “Hong pai in; Tuuno zi, a Mothak ka hong lak ding hi,” hong ci hi. [10] Tua laitakin Kha Siangtho tawh ka kidim a, tua vantungmi in mual sang mahmah khat dawnah hong paipih hi. Vantung Pasian kiang panin a hong paisuk Khuapi Siangtho ahi Jerusalem khua a hong lak hi. [11] Tua khuapi pen Pasian’ vang tawh tee ziazua a, Jasper suangmanpha bangin taang a, Kristal suangmanpha bangin siang kilkel hi. [12] A kulh sahin sang mahmah a, kulhkongpi sawm le nih nei-in, a kongpite-ah vantungmi sawm le nih om a, a kulhkongpite tungah Israel minam sawm le nihte’ min kigelh hi. [13] Nisuahna lamah kongpi thum, leilu lamah thum, leitaw lamah thum, nitumna lamah thum mah om hi. [14] Tua khuapikulh pen kulh tawphah suang sawm le nih tungah a kiciang hi a, tua suangtawphahte tungah Tuuno sawltak sawm le nihte’ min kigelh hi.
[21] vil un. Laamna-ah Shiloh nungakte a laam dingin hong pai uhleh, leenggui lote panin note in delhin mi khempeuh in na zi ding ciat uh Shiloh nungakte man unla, Benjamin gamah ciahpih un.
[15] Kumpipa’ inn-ah a tun ciangun lungdamna le nuamna tawh amaute kitumpih hi.
[5] “Biakpiakna tawh, kei tungah thuciamna a bawlte, ka mi citakte ka kiangah hong khawm un,” a ci hi.
[13] Theite zong min ta a, leenggah pak gim namtui zong kiza ta hi. Hong pai in, ngaihno aw, hong zui in, itluat aw.

[23] Tua ciangin khapi mial ding a, ni taang nawn lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Vanglian TOPA in Zion Mual tung le Jerusalem khua sungah uk ding a, ama upate’ mai-ah ama minthanna vang kilangsak ding hi.

[17] Tua hun a kipan Jesuh in thuhilh ding kipan a, “Vantung ki-ukna hong naita ahih manin kisikin na omzia uh kheel un,” ci-in thu a hilh hi.

[30] Anlak hun mateng a nam nihin tuaci om phot hen. Anlak hun ciangin anlate kiangah, “Tahumte bot masa unla, meikhukah khul dingin lomhen un. Ahi zongin taangte la-in ka ansal-ah hong sung un,” ka ci ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
[39] tahum tang a vawh gal pa pen Dawimangpa ahi hi. Anlak hun pen leitung bei nading hun hi a, anla nasemte pen vantung mite ahi hi.
[36] Ahi zongin a ni le a nai hun ding pen kuamah in thei lo hi. Vantungah a om vantung mite ahi a, Tapa nangawn in ahi zongin thei lo a, Pa Pasian bek in thei hi.

[40] Tua hun laitakin lo a kuankhawm mi nih, khat kila-in khat kinusia ding hi. [41] An a sukhawm numei nih, khat kila-in khat kinusia ding hi. [42] Tua ahih ciangin bang hunin na Topa uh hong pai ding cih thei lo na hih manun na pilvang un.

[1] “Tua hun ciangin vantung ki-ukna zia pen zinei thak pa a uap dingin a meivak uh tawh a pai nungak sawmte tawh kibang ding hi. [2] Nungak sawmte sung panin nga pil uh a, nga hai uh hi. [3] Tua a haite in a meivak sung uhah a tui thunthuah lopi-in pai uh a, [4] ahi zongin a pil nungak ngate in a dimtakin thunin a pai uh hi. [5] Zineipa hong tunghak ahih manin a vekpi-un lusu-in a ihmu uh hi.
[32] “Ahi zongin tua ni le tua nai hun ding kuamah in thei lo hi. Vantunga om vantung mite ahi a, Tapa ahi keimah in ahi zongin ka thei kei a, ka Pa bek in a thei hi.

[39] Ahi zongin na phawk ding uh thu khat om hi. Mi khat in guta pa’ hong pai ding hun theikhol leh a inn luhsak lo ding hi. [40] Tua mah bangin Mihing Tapa zong na upmawh loh uh hun laitakin hong pai ding ahih manin note zong a kigingsa-in om tawntung un,” a ci hi.
[26] Noah hunin up lohpi-in tuiciin a tun bangin Mihing Tapa zong uploh hun khatin hong tung ding hi.

[34] Ke’n kong cihin-ah, tuahun laitakin zanin lupna tungah a lumkhawm mi nih sung panin khat kila-in khat kinusia ding hi. [35] An a sukhawm numei nih, khat kila-in khat kinusia ding hi. [36] Lo a kuankhawm mi nih, khat kila-in khat kinusia ding hi,” a ci hi. [37] Tua ciangin a nungzuite in Jesuh kiangah, “Topa aw, koi laitakah tua thute hong piang ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot uh ciangin Jesuh in, “Sapul omna peuhah musane a om mah bangin mi omna peuhah hong piang ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[7] A sun a zanin ama tungah a thumthum ama mite’ thu a manin Pasian in khensak lo ding ahi hiam? Amaute a huh ding kizekaisak ding ahi hiam? [8] Ke’n kong cihin-ah, amaute’ thu a manin manlang takin khensak ding hi. Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin leitungah amah a um mi a mu ding hiam?” ci-in a genthuah hi.

[34] “Limtakin kidawm un. Thakhat thu-in tua Ni hong tung kha ding ahih manin zune anne le leitung nuntakna lunghimawhin thamang kei un. [35] Theihkholh lohin thang kisai bangin leitung mi khempeuh tungah hih thu hong piangvat ding hi. [36] Hih thupiang khempeuh thuakzawh nading thahatna na neih nading uh, le Mihing Tapa mai-ah na dintheih nadingun a tawntungin thu ngenin vil niloh un,” a ci hi.

[44] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Tu-a thupiang khempeuh pen note tawh kong omkhawm lai-a ka gengen thute mah ahi hi. Moses Thukham laibu sung, kamsangte laibu sung le Late sungah a kigelh thu khempeuh a tung ding ahi hi,” a ci hi. [45] Tua ciangin Lai Siangtho sung thu a theih nadingun a lungsim uh honsak a,

[1] Tua ciangin Jesuh in a nungzuite kiangah, “Note lunghimawh kei un. Pasian um unla, kei zong hong um un. [2] Note’ om nading mun a bawlkhol dingin a pai ding ka hi hi. Ka Pa’ inn sungah om nading mun tampi om hi. A om lo ding hileh hih bangin thu ka hong gen kei ding hi. [3] Kei va pai-in note’ om nading mun ka va bawlkholh khit ciangin keima omna munah note na hong om theih nadingun note a hong la dingin ka hong paikik ding hi.
[7] Jesuh in, “Ka Pa in ama thu tawh a sehsa hun le nite, cik ciangin hong tung ding cih thu note’ theih ding thu hi lo hi.

[9] Hih thu a genkhit ciangin amaute’ muhtangpi mahin vanah Jesuh kilato a, meiipi in liah ahih manin amah mu thei nawn lo uh hi. [10] Tua bangin Jesuh a kilaktoh ciangin amaute in vantung lam enenin a om laitakun amaute kiangah puanpak a silh mi nih hong dingvat a, [11] “Galilee mite aw, bang hangin vantung lam enin ding niloh na hi uh hiam? Note kiang panin vantungah a kilato hih Jesuh pen, vantungah a paitoh na muh uh bang teekteek mahin khatvei hong paisuk kik ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

[12] Tua ahih ciangin ka hong it sanggamte aw, note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-in ka thu na hong man’ tawntung uh mah bangin, tu-in note tawh ka hong omkhawm loh hun ciangin zong ka thu na hong man’ ding uh thupizaw lai hi. Pasian kihtakna le zahtakna tawh na maa uh nawt unla, amah in note hong hotkhiatna thu a cingtaak suaksak un.

[20] Ahi zongin eite ihih leh vantung gam mite ihi a, vantung panin a hong pai ding Topa Jesuh Khrih, eite’ Honpa, lawptakin a ngakte ihi hi. [21] Amah in na khempeuh ama khutnuai-ah koihna-in a zat vangliatna mah tawh a ginalo i leitung pumpi pen ama a’ mah bangin a minthang pumpi tawh hong kheelsak ding hi.

[9] Note kiangah ka hong pai lai-un kote na hong limbawlna thu uh, le a nungta a man Pasian’ thu zui-in a bia ding le, [10] a hong tung ding Pasian’ hehna panin eite a hong honkhia, sihna panin Pasian in a thawhsakkik a Tapa Jesuh, van panin a hong pai ding ngak dingin milim paisanin Pasian’ lamah na kiheina uh thute mi khempeuh in gen belin a nei uh hi.
[13] Tua hileh i Topa Jesuh a mi siangthote khempeuh tawh hong pai ciangin eite’ Pa ahi Pasian’ mai-ah kisuanna om hetloin lungsim siangtho takin na om thei ding uh hi.

[1] Ahi zongin sanggamte aw, hih thu hong pian ding hun tawh kisai kong gelh ding uh kisam lo hi. [2] Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa hong pai ding Ni pen zan a gutate bangin theihkholh lohin hong tung ding hi, ci-in note in teltakin na theihsa uh ahi hi. [3] Mite in, “Thu khempeuh a hoih laitak hi a, bangmah patauh nading om lo hi,” a cih laitakin thakhatthu-in amaute tungah siatna hong tungvat ding hi. Nausuah natna bangin gimna thuak ding uh a, kuamah suakta lo ding uh hi.

[23] Nopsakna a hong pia Pasian in na khempeuhah sianthona le kicinna hong pia hen la, na kha uh, na nuntakna uh, le na pumpi uh hoihtakin hong kem hen la, i Topa Jesuh Khrih hong pai ciangin mawhna khat zong a nei het lo dingin hong bawl tahen.

[1] Sanggamte aw, i Topa Jesuh Khrih hong pai nading thu le amah a dawn dingin eite i kikhop nading thu tawh kisai-in note kiangah kong thum nopna uh panin: [2] Topa’ hong pai ding ni hong tung khinta hi, ci-a thu kigenna hangin lunghimawhin lungmangin om kei un. Thuhilh khat peuhpeuh in hih bang thu hong genkha thei ding a, tua thu pen kote’ gen leh gelh hi, ci-in zong genkha ding uh hi. [3] Ahi zongin kuama khemsa-in ta kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh nakpitakin Pasian langpanna lianpi le hell khuksung a tung ding ahi A Gilopa hong kilat matengin tua Ni hong tung lo ding hi.
[14] I Topa Jesuh hong kilatkik Ni dongin paubaanna le mawhsakna om hetloin nang hong kipia thute na zui in.

[7] Kidemna-ah ka hat tawpin ka hih khin a, a mong dongin ka tai khin a, upna thu khotakin lenin ka zokhin hi. [8] Thu a manin a khen Topa in tua Ni ciangin kei a hong piak ding thuman lukhu ahi gualzawhna thaman in tu-in kei hong ngak gige hi. Kei tung bekah a hong pia ding hi lo a, ama hong paikik ding itna tawh a ngakte khempeuh tungah zong a pia ding ahi hi.

[7] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Topa hong pai matengin lungduai takin om un. Lo khote in zong a lo panun an a ngahtheih nadingun lungduai takin khuapi guah le tuk guah a ngakna thu thei un. [8] Note zong na lungduai un. Topa hong pai ding hun naita ahih manin na lungsim uh na thahatsak un. [9] Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note tungah thu hong khenkhak loh nadingin khatlekhat na kiphunsan kei un. Thukhen ding pa hong nai mahmah ta a, hong tung dektak ta hi.
[5] Note’ upna hangin nitawp ni ciangin na ngah ding uh hotkhiatna nomau-a’ ahihna a kilatsak nadingin Pasian in ama vangliatna tawh a hong kepsak ahi hi.
[7] Na khempeuh a bei nading hun hong naita hi. Nomau pumpi ki-uktawm thei-in pilvang unla, hoihtakin thu a ngen thei-in om ta un.
[4] Tuucing pipa hong pai ciangin a mual ngei lo minthanna lukhu a hong pia ding hi.

[8] Ahi zongin ka itte aw, na mangngilh loh ding uh ka deih thu in: Topa a dingin ni khat le kum khat, kum tulkhat le ni khat a kilamdan’ luatna om lo hi. [9] Mi pawlkhatte’ ngaihsut bangin Topa in a kamciamna a hong tungsak hak hi zenzen lo hi. Note khat beek in siatna na thuakkhak ding uh deih loin na vekpi-un na kisik ding uh deih ahih manin hong pai nai lohna pen note hong khualna hizaw hi. [10] Ahi zongin theihkholh lohpi-in guta bangin Topa hong pai ding Ni hong tung ding hi. Tua Ni ciangin nakpitakin a ging in vantungte maimang sakin, vantung nate mei in kangtumin maimang ding a, leitung le a tunga om na khempeuh a mangthang ding hi.
[9] Ahi zongin Pasian kiangah i mawhnate va pulak lehang, amah citakin thuman ahih manin, i mawhnate hong maisakin i hoih lohnate khempeuh hong siangsak ding hi.
[28] Ka itte aw, Khrih hong kilatkik ciangin lungmuang takin i omtheih nading le ama hong pai Ni ciangin i bukbuk loh nadingin amah tawh kiptakin kipawl ni.

[2] Ka lawm itte aw, eite’ pianzia ding taktak a telin hong kilat nai loh hangin tu-in Pasian’ tate ihi hi. Ahi zongin Khrih hong kilat ciangin ama pianzia ahi bang teekteekin mu ding ihih manin amah i bat nading thu teltakin i thei hi. [3] Khrih a siangtho mah bangin amah tawh kibat ding a lamen khempeuh in zong a nuntakna uh siangthosak ding hi.
[11] Keimah ka hong pai baih ding hi. Kuamah in, na ngah ding uh gualzawhna lukhu hong tuhkhak loh nadingun na neihsate uh hoihtakin na lenkip un.

[15] (“Na ngai un! Guta bangin kei ka hong pai hi. Mihon lakah guaktangin pai-in maizumna a ngahkhak loh nadingun a puante uh kemin, pilvang khuaphawkin a om mite a hampha ahi uh hi.”) [16] Tua khate in Hebru pau-in Armageddon a kici munah kumpite a kaikhawm uh hi. [17] A sagihna vantungmi in huihlakah a hai hong bung a, biakinn sung tokhom panin nakpitakin aw khat hong gingin, “Man khinta hi,” a ci hi. [18] Tua ciangin khua hong phia-in, a ging lianpi hong om a, van hong gingin nakpitakin zin hong ling hi. Zinling khempeuh lakah a husia pen ahih manin mihing a pianzawh hih bang zinling omngei nai lo hi. [19] Khuapi phelthum kisuah a, gam sunga om khuapi dang khempeuh kisia hi. Pasian in Babylon khuapi mangngilh lo a, ama hehna ahi leenggahzu a hai sung panin Babylon khuapi a dawnsak hi. [20] Tuikulh khempeuh mangthang a, mual khempeuh maimang hi. [21] Gial gol pipi, khat ciangin tawi sawmthum val a gik, van panin mite tungah hong kia hi. Tua gimna nasialua ahih manin tua gialte hangin mite in Pasian a samsia uh hi.
[7] Jesuh in, “Kei a hong pai baihta ding ka hi hi. Hih laibu sunga kigelh thu a zui mite mi hampha ahi hi,” a hong ci hi.
[12] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Kei ka hong pai baihta ding a, mi khempeuh a gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in a thaman ding uh ka hong puak ding hi.
[20] Hih thu khempeuh hong genin teci a pang mipa in, “Ka hong pai baih taktak ding hi,” hong ci hi. Na cih bangin hi ta peuh hen. Topa Jesuh aw, hong pai ta in!
[105] Nangma thu pen lam hong lak ding meivak hi a, ka paina lampi-ah khuavak ahi hi.
[29] Ka kammal pen mei tawh ahi a, suangtum a satnenzo sek tawh ahi zongin kibang hi lo ahi hiam, TOPA in kong ci hi.
[4] Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Anlum bek tawh mite nungta lo a, Pasian genkhiat thute tawh nungta zaw hi,’ ci-in kigelh hi lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.

[6] “Pasian’ Tapa taktak na hih le Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Pasian in nang a hong kem dingin a vantung mite hong sawl ding hi. Na khete le suang a kitahkhak loh nadingin vantung mite in a khut uh tawh nang hong dom ding hi,’ ci-in kigelh ahih manin, hih lai panin tuaksuk in,” a ci hi. [7] Jesuh in, “Lai Siangtho mahah, ‘Na Topa Pasian na ze-et kei in,’ ci-in gen hi lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
[10] Jesuh in, “Satan aw, taikhia in. Lai Siangtho in, ‘Na Topa Pasian bek bia inla, ama na bek sem in,’ ci hi lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.

[13] Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Ganhing tawh biak ding ka deih kei a, migitna ka deihzaw hi,’ ci-in a genna pen bang a cihnopna ahi hiam, va kan un. Mite in a zahtak mihoihte a sam dingin a hong pai ka hi kei a, mite in a pampaih mite a sam dingin a hong pai ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
[10] Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho in Johan’ thu a genna-ah, ‘Na pai nading lampi a hongkhol dingin nangma mai-ah ka kamtai pa ka sawl hi,’ ci-in Pasian in gen hi, ci-in kigelh hi.
[7] Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Ganhing tawh biak ding ka deih kei a, migitna ka deihzaw hi,’ a cihnopna thu teltakin thei le-uhcin a mawh lopi kimlai na mawhsak kei ding uh hi.

[16] Ahi zongin na thu uh a hong mannop kei leh, Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Mi nih ahih kei leh mi thum’ theihna bek tawh mawhsakna khat peuhpeuh man pan hi,’ a cih mah bangin midang khat ahi a, nih ahi zongin tonpih un.
[4] Jesuh in, “Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘A kipat cil-in a Piangsak pa in numei le pasal a bawl hi,’ ci hi.
[13] Amaute kiangah, “Pasian in Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Ka inn pen thungetna inn kici ding hi,’ ci napi-in, note in guktakna phualpi na suaksak uh hi,” a ci hi.

[16] Jesuh kiangah, “Hih naupangte’ otna na za hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. Jesuh in, “Ka za hi. Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Naungekte le naupangte’ kam tawh a cingtaak phatna na gen sak hi,’ a cihna thu sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.

[42] Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Innlamte in a nilkhiat suang pen innkiu suang bulpi suak khinta hi. Hih pen Topa’ bawl hi a, i muh ciangin lamdang i sa hi,’ ci-in a kigelhna sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?

[27] Tua unau pasal sagihte a sih khit ciangin a numei zong a si hi. [28] Tua ahih manin tua unau pasal sagihte in tua nu tenpihkim uh ahih manin, thawhkik hun ciangin a koi pen’ zi hi ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. [29] Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Note in Lai Siangtho thu ahi a, Pasian’ vangliatna ahi zongin thei lo na hih manun na ngaihsunkhial uh hi.

[24] Mihing Tapa ahihleh Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelhsa mah bangin a si ding ahi hi; ahi zongin Mihing Tapa a lehhek pa in gimna thuak ding hi. Tua mipa pen a piang vet lo hileh ama a dingin hoihzaw ding hi,” a ci hi.

[31] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Tuucingpa ka satlum ding a, a tuute kithehthang ding hi,’ ci-in a kigelh mah bangin note khempeuh in tu nitakin kei na hong taisanmang khin ding uh hi.
[54] Tua bangin kivaikhak hi zenzen leh Lai Siangtho in tu-a bangin a pian nading a gen pen bangci tuntheih ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
[56] Ahi zongin Lai Siangtho sungah kamsangte’ thugente a tuntheih nadingin hih bangin a hong gamta na hi uh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a nungzuite khempeuh in Jesuh nusia-in a taisan uh hi.
[2] Kamsang Isaiah Lai Siangtho sungah, “Nangma mai-ah ka kamtai pa ka sawl a, amah in na pai nading lampi a bawlkhol ding hi.
[12] Jesuh in, “Na khempeuh a bawlkhol dingin Elijah hong pai masa takpi hi. Mihing Tapa in gimna tampi thuakin simmawhna ngah ding hi, ci-in Lai Siangtho in gen hi lo ahi hiam?

[17] Tua ciangin mite kiangah thu hilh a, “Ka inn pen mi khempeuh a dingin thungetna inn kici ding hi,” ci-in Pasian in a genna thu Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh hi lo ahi hiam? Ahi zongin note in guta buluhte’ bukna mun na suaksak uh hi, ci-in thu a hilh hi.
[11] Hih thu Topa’ bawl hi a, i muh ciangin lamdang i sa hi,’ ci-in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
[24] Jesuh in, “Na khial mahmah uh hi. Lai Siangtho ahi a, Pasian’ vangliatna ahi zongin na theih lohna hang uh ahi hi.
[27] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “‘Tuucingpa ka satlum ding a, tuute a kithehthang ding hi,’ ci-in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin note in kei nong taisan ding uh hi.
[49] Nisim nisimin biakinn sungah thuhilhin note tawh ka omkhawm a, ahi zongin nong man kei uh hi. Ahi zongin hih thu pen Lai Siangtho sunga a kigelh thu a tun nading ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[28] (Hih bangin a hihna uh tawh, “Khialhna a nei mite tawh kisim khawm hi,” ci-in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh thu a tung ahi hi.)

[3] Tua ahih ciangin Jordan Gun kiim gam khempeuhah Johan pai kawikawi a, kamsang Isaiah in Lai Siangtho sungah a gelh mah bangin, “Na mawhna panun kisik unla tui kiphum un. Tua hileh Pasian in na mawhnate uh hong maisak ding hi,” ci-in thu a hilh hi.
[4] Jesuh in, “Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Anlum bek tawh mite nungta zo lo hi,’ ci-in kigelh hi lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
[8] Jesuh in, “Lai Siangtho in, ‘Topa Pasian na bia inla, ama na bek sem in,’ ci hi lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
[10] Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho in, ‘Pasian in nang a hong kem dingin a vantung mite hong sawl ding hi,’ ci-in a gen banah,
[12] Jesuh in, “Lai Siangtho in, ‘Topa na Pasian na ze-et kei in,’ ci hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[16] Tua ciangin ama khanna Nazareth khua-ah Jesuh pai a, Sabbath ni ciangin a paingei bangin kikhopna inn-ah a pai hi. Lai Siangtho a sim dingin amah ding a, [17] a nget bangin a sim dingin kamsang Isaiah Lai Siangtho bu a kipia hi. A laibu lemin a simnopna mun a zon ciangin a nuai-a bangin a kigelhna mun mu-in a sim hi. Tua munah,
[21] Tua ciangin amaute tungah thugen ding kipan a, “Note’ zakin a hong kisim Lai Siangtho thu, tuni-in a hong tung hi,” a ci hi.
[27] Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho in Johan thu a genna-ah, ‘Hih lai-ah ka kamtai pa om hi. Nangma lampi a hong dingin na mai-ah ka mapaisak ding hi, ci-in Pasian in gen hi,’ ci-in kigelh hi.
[14] Lingbulsum omna a tukna munte pen Pasian’ thu za napi-in a nuntakna sung uhah leitung lunghihmawhna, hauhna, le nopsaknate in depgawp ahih manin bangmah a suakkhia zo lote a cihnopna ahi hi.
[46] “‘Ka inn pen thungetna inn kici ding hi,’ ci-in Pasian in a genna thu Lai Siangtho sungah kigelh hi. Ahi zongin note in gutate’ bukna phualpi na suaksak uh hi,” ci-in amaute kiangah a gen hi.
[17] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute enin, “‘Innlamte in a nilkhiat suang pen innkiu suang bulpi suak khinta hi,’ ci-in Lai Siangtho in a gen pen bang a cihnopna ahi hiam?
[22] Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin, ‘Gim Piak Ni,’ ahi hi.
[37] Bang hangin hih bangin hong gen ka hi hiam cih leh, Lai Siangtho in, ‘Mawhneite lakah amah kihelsak hi,’ ci-in keima thu a genna pen hong tung ding hi,” a ci hi.
[27] Tua ciangin Jesuh in Lai Siangtho sungah ama thu a kigennate khempeuh, Moses laibu a kipanin kamsangte’ laibu khempeuh a khiatna a gen hi.
[32] Amau tegel in, “Lampi-ah i paikawmin Lai Siangtho khiatna hong gen laitakin i lungsim hong lawpsak mahmah hi mah lo ahi hiam?” a kici uh hi.
[1] A kipat cil-in Thu na om a, tua Thu, Pasian tawh na omkhawm a, tua Thu, Pasian ahi hi.
[4] Nuntakna a nei khempeuh in tua Thu tung panin a nuntakna uh ngah a, tua nuntakna in mi khempeuh tungah khuavak hong tunpih hi.

[14] Tua Thu mihing hong suakin kote lakah hong om a, itna nei-in citak mahmah ahih manin Pasian’ pianzia a neihna ka mu cian uh hi. Hih pianzia pen Pasian’ Tapa khat bek hihna tawh a neih pianzia ahi hi.
[17] Hih bangin a gamtatna hangin, “Nangma inn ka deihluatna in ka lungsim hong uklah sak hi,” ci-in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelhna thu, a nungzuite in a phawk uh hi.
[22] Tua ahih manin sihna panin amah a kithawhkiksak ciangin a nungzuite in Jesuh’ thugen phawkkik uh a, Lai Siangtho le Jesuh’ thugente a um uh hi.
[39] Nuntak tawntung ngahtheih nading lametna tawh Lai Siangtho sung na lim sim mahmah uh a, tua na sim uh Lai Siangtho in keima thu mah genin teci pang napi-in,
