[7] “Tuni,” cihna kammal na omlai ahih manin Pasian in nidang khat seh lai ahihna thu hong kilang hi. Lai Siangtho sungah, “Tuni-in Pasian’ aw na zak uhleh na lungsim uh khauhsak nawn kei un,” a cihna mun i mat khitsa mah bangin tuazawh kum tampi khit ciangin David tungtawnin thu hong genkik hi.

[12] Pasian’ thu nungta-in a gamtang hi a, langnih a hiam namsau sangin hiamzaw lai hi. Kha le lungsim, guh le taang kituahna, guh le guhngek dongin khenkhia thei hi. Mihingte’ lungsim ngimna le a ngaihsutnate zong theithei hi.

[8] Siampite’ lakna tawh kisai-in ahihleh a sithei mi mah ahi siampite in mite tung panin sawm-ah-khat a la uh hi. Ahi zongin Melkhizedek’ lakna tawh kisai-in ahihleh Lai Siangtho in a gen mah bangin a nungta tawntung mipa in sawm-ah-khat a la ahi hi.
[17] Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho in, “Melkhizedek nam bangin tawntung siampi na hi hi,” na ci hi.
[37] Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho sungah, “A sawt loin, a hong pai ding pa hong tung ding a, hong zekai nawn lo ding hi.

[5] A upna hang mahin Enok zong sihna tawh kipelh hi. Pasian in ama kiangah lato ahih manin kuamah in Enok mu nawn lo hi. Amah a kilaktoh ma-in Enok in Pasian’ lungkimna ngah hi, ci-in Lai Siangtho in a na gen hi.
[8] Lai Siangtho sungah, “Nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in,” ci-in a genna Topa’ Thukham zui le-uhcin a hoih hi pah hi.
[23] Lai Siangtho in, “Abraham in Pasian um a, a upna hangin Pasian in mihoihin a sang hi,” ci-in a genna thumanin tung takpi a, Abraham pen Pasian’ lawmpa kici hi.

[5] Lai Siangtho sungah, “Eite sungah a hong guat kha pen Pasian in ngai mahmah hi,” ci-in a kigelhna a mawkna-in a kigelh sa na hi uh hiam? [6] Lai Siangtho in, “Pasian in a kihisakte nial a, a kiniamkhiatte a hehpih hi,” a cih mah bangin Pasian’ hong hehpihna lianzaw hi.
[16] Lai Siangtho sungah zong, “Keimah siangtho ka hih manin note zong na siangtho un,” na kici hi.
[24] Tua ahih manin Lai Siangtho sungah, “Mihingte, lopa tawh kibang a, a minthannate uh lopa pak tawh kibang hi. Lopate vulin paakte pulh a,
[6] Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho sungah, “A manpha suang khat ka teelkhia a, innkiu suang dingin Zion-ah ka koih hi. Amah a umte, zahhuai ngei lo ding hi,” ci-in na kigen hi.
[10] Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho in, “Nuntak nuam deihin, hunhoih a zang nuamte in kamsia pau kei uh hen la, zuauthu gen kei ta uh hen.
[18] Lai Siangtho in, “Mi hoihte kihonkhia zo liailiai bek ahihleh Pasian a um lo mawhnei mite bang suak ding ahi hiam?” na ci hi.

[5] Tua mah bangin no khangnozaw deuhte in zong a khanghamte’ thu na mang un. Lai Siangtho in, “Pasian in a kiphasak mite nial a, a kiniamkhiat mite a hehpih hi,” a cih mah bangin na vekpi-un kiniamkhiatna puan bangin silhin, khatlekhat na na kisepsak un.
[20] Na phawk ding uh a thupi mahmah khat in: Lai Siangtho sunga om thugen kholhnate, kuamah in ama pilna tawh a khiatna gen thei lo hi.

[16] Lai a hong gelhna sungah a thugente tu-ate mah a gennuam ahi hi. A laigelhna sungah a telhak thu tampi om a, theihna kicing loin lungsim kip lo mi pawlkhatte in Lai Siangtho sung thu a ututun a kawihei uh bangin Paul’ thugente zong a man lopi-in khia uh ahih manin siatna a tuaklawh uh hi.

[4] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ thu a ngaihsun lo mi pawlkhat, eite lakah kuama phawk lohin hong lutsim uh a, amaute’ mawh gamtat ngamnate a seelna-un Pasian’ hehpihna thupha a lehlamin hei-in, eite in khat bek i neih i Mangpa le i Topa ahi Jesuh Khrih a nial uh hi. Hih bang mite’ gimthuak ding thu tanglai pekin Lai Siangtho in a gensa thu ahi hi.

[3] Hih laibu a sim mite mi hampha hi a, hih thu kigente ngai-in, hih laibu sungah a kigelh thu a zuite zong mi hampha mah ahi uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih thu kigente a tun ding hun hong naita hi.

[14] Amaute in lungsim takpi tawh kei tungah huhna hong ngen lo uh a, dawibia mite bang lelin a gamta uh hi. An le leenggahzu a nget uh ciangin zong lawkite bangin a ngen uh hi. Amaute in kei hong lehdo uh hi.

[17] Amaziah aw, tua bangin kampau na hih manin TOPA in nang kiangah, ‘Na zi pen khua sungah numei paktat suak ding a, gal sungah na tate si ding uh hi. Na gam kiphelkhamin midang tungah kipia ding a, lawkite’ gam sungah nang na si ding hi. Israel mite, galmatin kipaipih ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
[9] Lawki mite bangin biakinn sungah a lamte, khemna le thahna tawh a ngah uh vante tawh, a topa uh’ inn a dimsakte khempeuh, tua ni mahin gim ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
[51] “Na lungsim uh khauh mahmah a, lawki lungsim paii-in, Pasian’ thu-ah bilngong na bang uh hi. I pu i pate mah bangin Kha Siangtho thu na mang nuam kei uh hi.
[1] Note lakah numei tawh paktatna nasia mahmahin, lawkite nangawn a gamtat lohte na gamtatna uh hong kigen a, mi khat in ama nukik nangawn a luppihna thu ka za hi.

[10] Tua bang ka hong cih ciangin numei tawh a paktat, a huaiham, a guta, milim a bia lawkite tawh na kikhawl kei un, ka cihnopna hi lo hi. Tuate tawh kikhawl lo ding ci lehang, leitung panin paikhia un, cihna suak ding hi.
[1] Note khatlekhat thu na kineih uh ciangin Pasian’ mi siangthote khensakzaw loin lawki thukhente’ mai na kitun ngam uh hi.
[6] Tua hinapi, khatlekhat thu kineihin zum na kitun uh a, lawki thukhente na khensak tazen uh hi.
[20] Ka cihnopna pen, lawkite in gan a gawh uh ciangin dawi a biakna uh hi a, Pasian a biakna uh hi lo hi. Dawi biakna-ah note na kihel ding uh ka hong deih kei hi.
[2] Lawki na hih lai-un a pau thei lo milimte’ thu-in na gamta uh a, na lungsim uh tua milimte in hong zo mahmah hi.

[16] Pasian’ biakinn le lawkite’ milim bangci kilem theih ding ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in, “Ka mite lakah tengin amaute tawh ka omkhawm ding hi. Kei pen amaute’ Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute, keima mi ahi ding uh hi.
[16] Note in na mipihte lak uhah mi gensia-in vaksuk vakto loin, na vengpa uh a sih nadingin na langpang kei ding uh hi; kei pen TOPA ka hi hi.
[35] Samuel in ama sih ni dong Saul mukik lo a, ahih hangin Saul’ hangin Samuel a dah hi. Israel-te tungah kumpi-in Saul a koih manin TOPA kisik hi.

[1] TOPA in Samuel kiangah, “Israel-te tungah kumpi hihna panin amah ka nolhkhitna mu napi-in Saul’ hangin bang tanvei dah ding na hi hiam? Na sathau biingah sathau thun inla, pai in; Bethlehem mi Jessi kiangah kong sawl ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ama tapate lak panin keima-a’ ding kumpi khat ka la khin hi,” a ci hi.

[1] David le Saul a kiho khit a kipanin Saul’ tapa Jonathan in ama pumpi zahin David a it hi. [2] Saul in tua ni a kipanin ama kiangah David omsak a, a pa’ inn-ah ciahsak lo hi. [3] Jonathan in ama pumpi zahin David it ahih manin amah tawh thuciamna khat a bawl hi. [4] Jonathan in ama silhlai a puantualpi suahin David pia a, a galkidalna le a namsau nangawn le a thal le a kawnggak zong a pia hi.

[16] Tua ciangin Saul’ tapa Jonathan dingin David kiang Horesh-ah pai a, Pasian in hong huh ding hi, ci-in amah a hanthawn hi. [17] Amah in David kiangah, “Lau kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh ka pa Saul in nang hong sukhalo ding hi. Nang pen Israel-te tungah kumpi na hi ding a, kei pen nangma zom ka hi ding hi; ka pa Saul in zong hih thu thei hi,” a ci hi. [18] Tua ciangin amau tegel in TOPA’ mai-ah thuciamna bawl uh hi. Horesh-ah David om lai-in, Jonathan a inn-ah a ciah hi.
[17] Tua ciangin Saul le a tapa Jonathan’ hangin kah la phuakin David kap a, [18] amah in Judah mite tungah hih kah la a kihilh nading thu a pia hi. Tua la penJashar Laibusungah kigelh hi. Amah in:

[6] Tua ciangin Saul’ tapa Jonathan, a ta Mefibosheth David kiangah hong pai a, maipukin zahtakna a bawl hi. Tua ciangin David in, “Mefibosheth!” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “En in, na nasempa,” a ci hi. [7] Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, “Lau kei in; bang hang hiam cih le na pa Jonathan’ hangin nangma tungah migitna kong lak ding a, na pu Saul’ leitang khempeuh nangma tungah kong piakik ding hi. Tua ciangin nangmah in ka sabuai-ah an na ne tawntung ding hi,” a ci hi. [8] Tua ciangin amah in zahtakna bawlin, “A sisa ui tawh a kibang kei bang lel, nong hici bawl nadingin na nasempa bang ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. [9] Tua ciangin kumpipa in Saul’ nasempa Ziba samin ama kiangah, “Saul le a innkuan tawh a kizom khempeuh na topa’ tupa’ tungah ka pia khin hi. [10] Nang le na tapate le na nasemte in ama a dingin lo na kho ding uh a, na topa’ tupa in annek ding a neihtheih nadingin a piangte na tunpih ding uh hi. Ahih hangin na topa’ tupa Mefibosheth in keima sabuai-ah an ne tawntung ding hi,” a ci hi. Ziba in tapa sawm le nga le nasem sawmnih nei hi. [11] Tua ciangin Ziba in kumpipa kiangah, “Ka to kumpipa in nong thupiak khempeuh tawh kizui-in na nasempa in hih ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa’ tapate khat bangin Mefibosheth in David’ sabuai-ah an a ne hi.

[2] Tua ciangin David in, “Keima tungah a pa thuman takin hong gamtat bangin Nahash’ tapa Hanun’ tungah thuman takin ka gamta ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin David in a pa’ hangin amah a hehnem dingin a nasemte a sawl hi. David’ nasemte Ammon mite’ gamah va tung uh hi.

[20] Nang pen zan mah beka hong pai na hi hi. Koi lai munah kei pai ding cih thei lopi-in kote tawh a kawivak dingin nang hong bawl ding ka hi hiam? Ciahkik in, na sanggamte ciahpih in. TOPA in itna kip le thumanna nang’ tungah hong lak ta hen,” a ci hi. [21] Ahih hangin Ittai in kumpipa dawngin, “ TOPA nungta-in, ka to kumpipa zong nungta ahih mah bangin, sih nading ahi a, hin nading ahi zongin ka to kumpipa a omna peuhpeuhah na nasempa om ding hi,” a ci hi.

[36] En in, amau’ tapa tegel, Zadok’ tapa Ahimaaz le Abiathar’ tapa Jonathan, amaute tawh omkhawm hi. Na zak peuhpeuh amaute’ tungtawnin kei tungah nong puak ding hi,” a ci hi. [37] Tua ahih ciangin Jerusalem-ah Absalom a lut laitakin David’ lawmpa Hushai zong khuapi sungah a pai hi.

[2] Elijah in Elisha kiangah, “Hih lai-ah khawl in, kong thum hi; bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in Bethel ciang dong kei hong sawl hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin Elisha in, “ TOPA nungta a, nangmahmah na nuntak mah bangin, nang kong nusia ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute Bethel dongah paisuak uh hi.

[11] Job’ lawmte thum, Teman khuami Elifaz, Shuah gammi Bildad, le Naamah gammi Zofar-te in Job in a thuak gimna thu teng a zak uh ciangin a inn ciat panun amah a hehnem ding le a hanthawn dingin kituahin hong paikhawm uh hi. [12] Amaute in a gamla sim mun panin Job a muh tungun amah thei pah lo uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute a gingin kapkhia uh a, a puan uh balkekin a lu tung uh a tukik dingin leivui lawnto uh hi. [13] Tua ciangin leilakah sun sagih le zan sagih sung amah tawh tukhawm uh a, ama thuakna a nasiat mahmah lamtak mu uh ahih manin kuamah in kam khat beek a paupih ngam kei uh hi.
[14] “Pasian ka nusia a, ka nusia kei zongin, hih bang lungkham hunin lawm citak ka kisam hi. [15] No ka lawmte pen, lui tuikhang bang, a mangthang pak tui let bang,
[21] Mi khat in a lawmpa a’ ding a thumsak mah bangin mi khatpeuh in Pasian’ kiangah kei a dingin hong thuumsak leh ka ut hi.

[13] “Pasian in ka sanggamte hong taisansak a, kei hong theisate kiangah khualmi ka suak hi. [14] Ka behte le ka lawmte beimang khinta uh hi. [15] Ka inn-ah a hong tung ngei keima zinte in hong mangngilh ta a, ka na a sem numeite in khualmi bangin hong bawl uh a, amaute’ mai-ah midangpi khat ka suak hi. [16] Ka nasemte khatpeuh ka sap ciangin hong dawng nuam lo uh a, hong huhna ding uh ka thum ciang nangawnin hong thudon lo uh hi. [17] Ka zi nangawn in ka gimnam thuak zo lo a, ka sanggamte mahmah in zong hong naih nuam lo uh hi. [18] Naupang melmawl nangawn in kei hong simmawh uh a, kei hong muh uh ciangin hong nuihsan uh hi. [19] Ka lawm it pente nangawn in kei hong muhdah et uh a, ka it pente nangawn in kei hong langbawl uh hi. [20] Ka guh tungah ka vun kol dihdiahin om a, a nungta liailiai bekin kei a om ka hi hi. [21] Hong hehpih un! Hong hehpih un! Keima lawmte hi lo na hi uh hiam? Pasian in kei hong satpai ta hi. [22] Pasian’ hong bawlsiat bangin bang hangin no zong kei hong bawlsia ding na hi uh hiam? Nong gimsakna uh kicing ta hoh hi lo ahi hiam?
[4] Mikhialte tawh tukhawm loin, thusim neite tawh ka kipawl kei hi.
[3] Amau’ lungsim sungah siatna a om hinapi a vengte tawh kilemna thu a gen khem, siatna bawlte, migilote tawh kei hong lakhiakhawm kei in.
[11] Ka vengte khempeuh’ nuihsat ka suak a, ka vengte tungah a cikzethuai ka hi a, ka meltheih khempeuhte’ gimneih mi ka suak hi. Konglakah hong mute in kei hong peelin hong taisan uh hi.
[11] Ka gim thuakna-ah ka lawmte le ka kithuahpihte kidang koih uh a, keima behte nangawn kei kiang pan gamla om uh hi.
[6] Keimah a en dingin mi hong pai ciangin, kam mawkna a pau uh hi. A lungsim uhah siatna kaikhawm uh a, a paikhiat uh ciangin a genthang uh hi.
[9] Ka muan, ka lawm it pa, keima an a ne pa nangawn in a khetul tawh kei hong peek vial hi.

[12] Kei hong phin galte hi lo hi. Hi leh ka thuakzo ding hi. Kiphatsakna tawh kei hong bawlte, langpang mi hi lo hi. Hi leh ama kiang panin ka bu thei ding hi. [13] Ahih hangin ka kikimpih, ka kikholhpih, ka lawm theih mahmah, nangmah na hi hi. [14] Kam khum tawh i kihoho ngei a, Pasian’ inn sungah i kikhawl khawm ngei hi.
[21] Ama kampau, thawhbat sangin nelzaw a, ahi zongin a lung sungah muhdahna om hi. A kammalte sathau sangin nipzaw a, ahi zongin tuate pen namsau hiam mahmah tawh kibang hi.
[18] Kei hong itte le ka lawmte keimah nong pelhsak khin a, khuamial bekbek, keima kikholhpih ahi hi.
[1] En un, sanggamte pumkhat suakin a tut khawm uh ciangin bangzahin hoihin nuam ahi hiam?
[4] Mawh bawlnopna lungsim hong neisak kei inla, a gilo mite tawh hong kikhawlsak kei in. Amau’ anlimte hong duhgawh sak kei ta in.
[32] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in a sia-in a gamtate mudah a, thuman mite bek a pawlpih dingin a la hi.
[14] Migilote tawh kikhawl kei inla, amau’ gamtatnate zui kei in. [15] Amau’ gamtat bangin gamta peuhmah ke’n! Gitlohna peel in! Paisan inla, na maban sem in.
[13] Mi a gensiasiate tungah thusim kigen ngam lo a, a muanhuai mite’ tung bekah thusim kigen ngam hi.
[26] Midikte in a gamtatna uh tel et a, migilote a gamtatna un lam pialsak hi.
[20] Mipil tawh kikhawl lecin na pil ding a, mihai tawh kikhawl lecin gimna na thuak ding hi.
[7] TOPA’ deih bangin gamtatna pen galte nangawn lawma kaihzawhna ahi hi.
[28] Mihoih lote in kitotna piangsak a, mi gensiate in lawmta ki-it kimlai kimudahsak hi. [29] A ngongtat mite in a lawmte zol a, lungkhamna sung tunpih hi.
[9] Mi’ khialhna a maisakte midangte in itin lawm hau uh a, mi’ khialhna ciaptehna pen lawm taanna ahi hi.
[17] Lawm citak in a tawntungin hong it a, i sanggamte pen i lungkhamna a hong thuakpih dingin a piang ahi hi.
[24] Lawm pawlkhatte sauvei kimang lo a, lawm pawlkhatte sanggam sangin kipzaw hi.
[4] Mihaute in lawm mu thuahthuah a, mizawngte in a neihsun teng nangawn khahsuahsuah uh hi.

[6] A cingh mihau pa’ maipha ngah ding ki-ut ciat a, na a piak mi khempeuh ama lawm ahi hi. [7] Mi khempeuh in a sanggam zawng pa uh mudah ciat ahih manin a lawmte in a taisatna a thu lamdang hi lo hi.
[19] Mi a gensia kawikawite in thu im thei lo hi. Tua banga mi haipaute tawh kikhawl kei in.
[11] Kamsiamna in kumpipa’ lawm hong suaksak a, ahi zongin TOPA in lungsim takpi a deih hi.
[24] A hehbaih mite tawh kipawl kei unla, a lungtom mite tawh kikhawl kei un. [25] Amau’ hoih lohnate na zuihkhak loh nadingun na kidop kei uhleh note in zong na awklawh kha ding uh hi.
[1] Migilote eng kei inla, amaute tawh kikhawl kei in.
[17] Na vengte’ inn-ah hawh mun lua kei in. Hong cimtakin hong mudah kha ding hi.
[19] Haksat hunin a zuautat mi muanin neihkhakna pen hana, ahih kei leh khebai tawh kibang hi.
[26] Mihoih khat in mihoih lote’ gamtatna a zuihkhak ciangin hawktui nin, ahih kei leh tui uih tawh kibang hi.

[23] Tungtham beka kam khum pauna pen cimbeng kizut leibeel tawh kibang hi. [24] A simtat mi in a kampi bek tawh thuhoih gen a, a lungsimah zuauthu bek om hi. [25] A lungsimah a deihhuai lo thu sagih tak om ahih manin kam khum takin a pau manin umkha kei in.
[5] Itna i seel bawl sangin a langtangin taina hoihzaw hi. [6] I lawmte in hong liamsak hangin i hoihna ding a hong deihsakna hizaw hi. I galte in hong ngawng kawina pen hong lehbawlna ahi hi.

[9] Sathau namtui le paknamtui in lung nuamsak a, lawmte’ limbawlna in tha hatsak hi. [10] Na lawmte daangkoih kei inla, na pa’ lawmte dong nangawn lawm bawl in. Na lungkham ciangin na sanggampa va ko kei in. A gamla-ah a om i sanggampa sangin a nai-ah a om i vengpa kimangzaw hi.
[3] Pilna a deih mi in a pa lungdamsak a, numei paktat tawh a kikhawl mi in a neihsa teng lawnmang hi.

[9] Mi khat sangin mi nih hoihzaw hi; amau’ sepna thaman a tamzaw ngah uh hi. [10] Bang hang hiam cih leh khat cimawh leh a khat in huh a, mi khat guak pen cimawh zenzen leh a huh ding om lo ahih manin a dahhuai pha mahmah ahi hi. [11] Khua a dam ciangin mi nih lumkhawm leh khua lum hi; khat guak bangci khualum theih ding ahi hiam? [12] Mi khat bek hileh zawhnop kisa a, nih pha leh kizo zo lo hi. Zang thum a kiheek khauhual bawhsat hak hi.
[4] Mi khempeuh a inn vengte uh kidawm uh hen la, a sanggamte uh muang kei uh hen. Bang hang hiam cih leh sanggamte khem hat ciat uh a, inn vengte khempeuh zong gensiat hat ciat uh hi.
[3] Mi nih, thukimna om masa lopi-in lampi-ah tonkhawm thei uh ahi hiam?
[5] Na vengte’ thu upin nei kei inla, na lawmte zong muanin nei kei in. Na ang a lum na zi kiang nangawnah thu na gen ding kidawm in.

[29] Tua ahih manin na mit taklam in na mawh nading hong piansak leh khelkhia inla paai in. Na pumpi bupin hell khuk sungah hong kikhul sangin na pumpi na khat pelem leh nang a dingin hoihzaw lai hi. [30] Na taklam khut in na mawh nading hong piansak leh sattan inla paai in. Na pumpi bupin hell khuk sungah hong kikhul sangin na pumpi na khat pelem leh nang a dingin hoihzaw lai hi.
[16] Amaute’ gamtatna tawh amau’ pianzia na thei ding uh hi. Lingvom kung panin leenggah kilo ngei a, sialtalling kung panin theigah kilo ngei ahi hiam?
[20] Bang hang hiam cih leh keima minin mi nih le thum bek nangawn a kikhopna peuhpeuhah kei ka om hi,” a ci hi.
[37] “Keima hangin hih bang naupangno khat a limbawl mi in kei hong limbawl hi a, kei hong limbawl mi in kei hong limbawl hi loin kei hong sawl pa a limbawl ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[31] Note tungah a hong kibawl ding na deih uh bangin midangte tungah na bawl un.
[48] Ahi zongin Jesuh in ama kiangah, “Judas aw, napna tawh Mihing Tapa lehhek na hi hiam?” a na ci hi.
[5] Jesuh in Martha-te unau le Lazaras it mahmah hi. [6] Tua hinapi-in a cinat a zakkhit ciangin tua lai-ah ni nih taam lai veve hi.
[10] Unau ki-itna lungsim nei unla, khatlekhat kizahtak bawl ding lamsang kidem un.

[34] Note tungah ka hong piak thak thu in: Note khatlekhat na ki-it ding uh ahi hi. Note ka hong it mah bangin note khatlekhat na ki-it un. [35] Note khatlekhat ki-it le-uhcin keima nungzuite na hihna uh mi khempeuh in hong thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[1] Upna neu mite pawlbawl unla, na ngaihsutna uh a kituah kei leh zong mawhsak kei un.

[12] “Note tungah ka hong piak thu in: Note ka hong it zahin note khatlekhat na ki-it un. [13] Lawmte’ tang ding sih ngamna sangin lawmte itna a lianzaw om nawn lo hi. [14] Ka hong thupiak bangin na gamtat uhleh ka lawmte na hi uh hi. [15] Nasemte in a tote’ nasepna bangmah thei lo ahih manin note pen nasemte ka hong ci nawn kei ding hi. Ka Pa’ tung panin ka zak thu khempeuh note kiangah hong genkhin ka hih manin note, lawm, ka hong ci zaw ding hi.
[4] Amaute pen kei a dingin a si ngam uh ahi hi. Amaute tungah a lungdam kei guak bek zong hi loin, Gentail pawlpi mi khempeuh zong a lungdam ahi hi.
[17] Lawmte aw, note’ theihsa thute gensia langpangin, mite’ upna nawngkaisakin pawl a kikhensak mite kidawm un. Tua bang mite tawh kikhawl vet kei un.

[9] Lai ka hong gelhna sungah, numei tawh a paktat mite tawh na kikholh loh nading uh ka hong gen hi. [10] Tua bang ka hong cih ciangin numei tawh a paktat, a huaiham, a guta, milim a bia lawkite tawh na kikhawl kei un, ka cihnopna hi lo hi. Tuate tawh kikhawl lo ding ci lehang, leitung panin paikhia un, cihna suak ding hi. [11] Tua ka hong laigelhna sungah ka cihnopna pen, thu upna sungah unau khat hi hang, ci napi-in numei tawh a paktat, a huaiham, milim a bia, mi gensia, zukham, ahih kei leh a guta theite tawh kikhawl kei un, cihnopna ahi hi. Tua bang mite tawh an ne ding nangawnin zong na tukhawm kei un.

[14] Thu um lo mite tawh na na semkhawm kei un. Midik le mimawh bangci-in kipawlthei ding a, khuavak le khuamial bangci-in omkhawm thei ding ahi hiam? [15] Khrih le Dawimangpa bangci-in kithutuak thei ding a, thu um mi le thu um lo mi bangci-in a ngaihsutna uh kibang thei ding ahi hiam?
[24] A kuamah peuh in note’ angsung ding bek zong kei unla, midangte’ phattuam nading zongzaw un.
[33] Sanggamte aw, mi’ khemsa-in ta kei un. Kikholhpih hoih lote in mi siasak thei hi.

[1] Sanggamte aw, mi khatpeuh a gamta khial a om ciangin, Kha Siangtho’ deihna bangin a nungta note in tua a khial pa a manin a gamtatkik theih nadingin thunem zangin na huh un. Note in zong amah bangin ze-etna na tuahkhak loh nadingun na kikem un. [2] Thu haksa na tuah uh ciangin khatlekhat na kihuh un. Tua hileh Khrih’ thukham a zui na hi uh hi.

[1] Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ na ka sepna hangin thong a kia keimah in note’ nuntakzia dingin a hong deihna tawh a kilawm a kituakin na nuntak nadingun ka hong hanthawn hi. [2] Kiniamkhiatin, thunemin, lungduai-in om tawntung un. Khatlekhat kihuhna tawh na ki-itna uh kilangsak un. [3] Kha Siangtho kimakai sakin, khatlekhat kilemin pawlkhat na hihna uh na kipsak tawntung un. [4] A kibang lametna khat bek a ngahkhawm dingin Pasian in note hong sap mah bangin eite khempeuh pumkhat bek hi-in Kha Siangtho zong khat bek mah a neikhawm ihi hi. [5] Topa khat bek, upna khat bek, tuiphumna khat bek mah a zangkhawm ihi hi.
[6] Hih bang mawhnate i bawl hangin phamawh kei, ci-in a mawk gen mite’ khemsa-in ta kei un. Pasian thu mang loin hih bangin a gamta mite in Pasian’ hehna a thuak ding uh ahi hi.
[3] Note ka hong phawk simin ka biak Pasian tungah ka lungdamna ka ko hi.

[19] Note kiang panin thu ka zakna hangin ka lung a noptheih nadingin note kiangah Timoti ka hong paisak baih nadingin Topa Jesuh in hong huh ding hi, ci-in ka lamen hi. [20] Note ka hong lunghihmawh zahin amah bek mah in note hong lunghihmawhpih hi.

[13] Note lakah khatlekhat a kilungkim lo na om uh ciangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh kimaisakin na kihuh ciat un. Topa in note’ mawhna hong maisak bangin note zong khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ding uh hi. [14] Hihte khempeuh banah, mi khempeuh kilem takin a hong om khawmsak thei ahi ki-itna na bulphuh un.
[11] Tua ahih manin tu laitakin na omzia uh mah bangin khatlekhat kihanthawnin na kihuh ciat ta un.
[6] Sanggamte aw, i Topa Jesuh Khrih min tawh kong sawlnop uh thu panin: Note tungah ka hong hilhsa uh thute a zui lo, a thadah gamtat thu uppih mite tawh na kikhawl kei un.
[5] biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deih lo ding uh hi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in.
[16] Keimah kihut nading thu ka gen masak ni-in kuamah in hong koppih loin hong taisanmang uh hi. Tua thu hangin mawhsakna thuak kei beek uh hen!
[24] Khatlekhat ki-itin a hoih nate i sep nadingin kihanthawn ciat ni.
[23] Lai Siangtho in, “Abraham in Pasian um a, a upna hangin Pasian in mihoihin a sang hi,” ci-in a genna thumanin tung takpi a, Abraham pen Pasian’ lawmpa kici hi.
[7] Ka it lawmte aw, Pasian pen itna hong piankhiatna bulpi ahih manin eite khatlekhat ki-it ni. Itna a nei mi peuhmah, Pasian’ tate hi a, Pasian a thei uh hi.
[21] Khrih in eite tungah hong thupiakna in: Pasian a it mi in a Khristian mipihte zong it ding hi, cihna ahi hi.
[2] Ka lawm it Gaias aw, nang na ci damin na vai khempeuh zong na maa pai ding hi, ci-in ka lamen hi. Kha thu tawh kisai lamsangah zong bangmah lungkhamna om lo ding hi, ci-in ka thei hi.
[14] “Mi khat in a vengte’ gan khat peuhpeuh kawm a, a nei pa om loin a liam a, a si zongin, amah in a kicingin loh ding hi.

[25] “Note tawh a om, a zawng keima mite khat peuhpeuh tungah sum leitawi na piak uhleh, ama tungah sum leitawi a piapa bangin na om kei ding uh a, ama tung panin a meet na dok kei ding uh hi. [26] Khapna ahi na vengpa’ puan silh lai na lak ngei khak leh nitum ma-in ama tungah na pia kik ding hi.
[11] “Note na guta kei ding uh hi. A man loin na gamta kei ding uh a, khatlekhat tungah zuau na kigen kei ding uh hi.

[36] Na sanggampa uh no kiangah hong ten theih nadingin ama tung panin a meet a khang la kei unla, na Pasian uh zahtak un. [37] Note in ama tungah a meetin sum leitawi pia loin, ama tungah a meetin na an uh zong na pia kei ding uh hi.

[1] “Kum sagih a cin simin leiba maisakna na nei ding uh hi. [2] Maisak nading zia in: Leitawi a pia mi khempeuh in a vengte tungah leitawi a a piaksate maisak ding hi. TOPA’ maisakna thu kigen khin ahih manin a vengpa, a sanggampa’ tung pan kuamah in leiba siik nawn lo ding hi. [3] Gamdang mite’ tung pan na siik thei ding uh a, ahih hangin na sanggamte uh tung panin no-a’ hong bat peuhmah na maisak ding uh hi. [4] “Ahih hangin tuni-a kong gen hih thupiakna khempeuh zui-in TOPA note’ Pasian’ aw na ngaih nak-uhleh note’ lakah a zawng om lo ding hi (bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA na Pasian un na neih dingun gamhluahin hong piak leitang tungah TOPA in note thupha hong pia ding hi). [5] “Ahih hangin tuni-a kong gen hih thupiakna khempeuh zui-in TOPA note’ Pasian’ aw na ngaih nak-uhleh note’ lakah a zawng om lo ding hi (bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA na Pasian un na neih dingun gamhluahin hong piak leitang tungah TOPA in note thupha hong pia ding hi). [6] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA na Pasian un hong ciamsa bangin note thupha hong pia ding a, minam tampi tungah leitawi na pia ding uh a, ahih hangin note in lei na tawi kei ding uh hi. Minam tampite na uk ding uh a, ahih hangin amaute in note hong uk lo ding uh hi. [7] “ TOPA na Pasian un note hong piak gam sunga na khuate uh khat peuhpeuh sungah na sanggam khat uh note lakah a zawng a om leh na lungsim uh khauhsak loin, na sanggam zawng pa uh huh loin na om kei ding uh hi. [8] Ama tungah na cingh gamtat ding uh a, bangbang hitaleh ama kisap zah na leitawi ding uh hi.

[11] Bang hang hiam cih leh leitang tungah mizawng bei ngei lo ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin, ‘Gam sungah a om na sanggampa, na a kisam mite le mizawngte tungah na cingh mahmah ding uh hi,’ ci-in thu kong pia hi.

[19] “Na sanggampa tungah sumgum hitaleh, ankhing hitaleh, a meet ngaihsutna-in na khat peuhpeuh leitawi na pia kei ding uh hi. [20] Gamdang mi tungah a meetin leitawi na pia thei ding uh a, ahih hangin na sanggampa tungah a meetin leitawi na pia kei ding uh hi. Hihte pen a luah dingin na tumna uh gam sungah TOPA na Pasian un na sepna khempeuh uhah thupha hong piak theih nading ahi hi.

[12] Note’ leitangah ama hunin guah a zusak ding le na sepna khempeuh uh thupha a pia dingin TOPA in a na hoih kholna vantung note hong hon ding hi. Note in minam tampite tungah leitawi na pia ding uh a, ahih hangin note in leitawi na la kei ding uh hi. [13] Note in tuni-a kong thugente limtakin zuihna tawh TOPA na Pasian uh thupiaknate mangin, tuni-a no kong thupiakna kammalte panin, pasian dangte’ na semin a bia dingin na pial kei nak-uhleh, TOPA in a makai-in note hong bawl ding a, mi’ nung zui-in hong bawl lo ding hi. Tunglam bekah na kah ding uh a, na nuaikiat ngei kei ding uh hi.

[43] “Note lakah a om peemtate lian semsem ding uh a, note na neu semsem ding uh hi. [44] Amaute in note’ tungah leitawi hong pia ding uh a, note in amaute tungah leitawi na pia kei ding uh hi. Amaute a makai hi-in, note a nungzui na hi ding uh hi.

[17] Huhna a ngen dingin thumante a kiko ciangin TOPA in za a, a haksatna khempeuh panun amaute a honkhia hi. [18] Lungsim kitamzante kiangah TOPA hong om a, lungsim zangawpte a hon hi. [19] Thuman mi’ thuakna a tam mahmah hangin tuate khempeuh panin TOPA in amah a hon hi. [20] Amah in thuman mipa kem a, a guh khat zong kitan lo hi.
[21] Migilo in leitawi la a, lohkikzo nawn lo hi. Thuman mi ahihleh cingh-in mi a pia hi.

[25] Thuman mi a kinusiacip, a suanlekhakte ngen tawmin a kivak, ka neu lai a kipanin tu-a ka teek hun ciang dong ka mu ngei nai kei hi. [26] Amah in mi citpiak ngitngetin, mi tungah leitawi piakhia a, a suanlekhakte zong thupha ngah mi a suak hi.
[5] Cingh gamtatin mite tungah leitawi pia a, thutangin a gamta mite tungah thu a hoih hi.
[6] Na hihna khempeuhah amah phawk in. Tua hileh lampi man amah in hong lak ding hi.
[9] Na neihsa le na anpalte tawh TOPA zahtak in.
[27] Na hihzawh ding ahih nakleh midangte’ kitangsapna huh tawntung in. [28] Na vaihawmsak theihpah ding thute ahih nakleh , zing ciangin hong paikik in, ci-in a hun sotto kei in.

[1] Ka ta aw, na lawmte khatpeuh in sum leitawi a lak ciangin a lohzawh kei leh ama tangin a lohsak dingin kam na ciamkha hiam? [2] Na kampauna hangin nang hong kimanin, na thuciamna hangin na awkkha hiam? [3] Ka ta aw, tua bang na hih khak leh, tua mipa’ khut sungah a om na hi hi. Na suahtak theih nadingin manlangin a kiangah pai inla, hong khah nadingin ama kiangah thum in. [4] Ihmumu kei inla, om mawkmawk kei in. [5] Sabeng pa’ kiang panin a suahtak nadingin sakhi a tai bangin, thangah a awk vasa a kitom bangin na suahtak nadingin hanciam in. [6] Thadahpa aw, miksite kiangah pai inla, amau’ nuntakzia va en in. [7] Amaute in a uk ding le a makai ding kuamah nei lo napi-in, [8] khuakhal sungin a nek ding uh, tuk hun sungin kaikhawm khol uh hi.
[15] Midang khat’ leiba lohsak ding na kiciam leh na kisik ding hi. Tua bang thu-ah kihel kei lecin nang a dingin hoihzaw hi.
[24] Mi pawlkhat in sum zang ziahziah napi-in hau semsem uh a, mi pawlkhat cil mahmah napi, zawng semsem hi.
[11] Ol takin hauhpakna oltak mahin kiamkik pah a, haksapi-in hauhtohna khangto semsem hi.
[18] Thu a ngaihsun thei lo mihaite bek midang’ leiba lohsak dingin kipia ngam hi.
[7] Mihaute in mizawngte uk a, leitawi a late pen a piate’ sila a suak hi.
[26] Midangte’ leiba lohsak dingin kamciamin leiba tavuan lakha kei un. [27] A leiba lohsakzo kei le-uhcin na lupna nangawn uh hong kidawhkhiatsak ding hi.
[13] Mi khat in gamdang mi khat’ leiba a lohsak dingin kam a ciam leh a ciam bangin ama neihsa kilaksak takpi ding hi.
[23] Na tuuhonte hoihtakin thei inla, na bawnghonte hoihtakin kem in.
[8] A meet a pung lakna tawh a hau mipa pen mizawngte a hehpih mipa a dingin sum a zonsak hi lel hi.
[5] Na thuciamna bangin na tunsak kei ding le thu ciam vet kei zaw in.
[10] Sum deihna lungsim na neih leh lungkim hun cih na nei ngei kei ding hi. Na hauhnop hangin na deih khempeuh na ngah ngei kei ding hi. Hih pen a mawknapi ahi hi.

[7] Kuamah khem lo a, kuama na zong sut lo hi. Sum leitawi a lapa in khapna van a apte zong piakik hi. Gilkialte an vakin, puan nei lote puan guan hi. [8] A meet bekbek lunggulhna-in sum leitawi pia lo hi. Gamtatsiat ding ut lo a, mite’ thu a manin khensak hi. [9] Amah in ka thupiakte mangin, ka thukhamte hoihtakin zui hi. Tua bang mi pen mihoih ahih manin nungta ding hi, Topa PASIAN in ci hi.
[8] Leitung a a om ngun le kham khempeuh keima-a’ ahi hi.
[7] Midang a hehpih mite tungah Pasian in hehpihna pia ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.
[27] sumkholna-ah ka sum na koihsak lecin hoih ding hi. Tua hileh tu-a ka hong tunkik ciangin a bulpi le a meet ka ngahkhawm ding hi.
[26] A mantakin kong genin-ah: Na liau sum na piak khit dong matengin thong sung panin na suakta ngei kei ding hi.
[42] Mi khat peuhpeuh in na khat peuhpeuh hong nget leh na pia inla, nang kiang panin na a hong leitawi mite na pia in.
[24] “Kuamah, to nih’ sila hikhawm thei lo hi. Khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat tungah thumanin khat simmawhbawl ding hi. Note in Pasian’ na le leitung sum na na semkhawm zo kei ding uh hi.

[31] Tua ahih manin bang ne ding a, bang dawn ding a, bang silh ding ihi hiam, ci-in lunghimawh lua kei un. [32] (Gentail mite in lunghihmawh penin a neihte uh hih bangte ahi hi.) Hih nate khempeuh na kisap lamtak uh vantungah a om na Pa un a thei hi. [33] Thudang khempeuh sangin Pasian’ ukna le ama deihna na zuih theih nading uh thupi ngaihsut masazaw un. Tua hileh hih na kisapna dangte khempeuh uh zong hong piathuah veve ding hi.
[34] Kumpipa zong a heh suak ahih manin a leiba khempeuh a lohkhit matengin thong sungah a kikhum nadingin thu a pia hi.

[34] Ngahkik ding na lametna uh mite tung bekah leitawi na piak uhleh bang hangin thupha ngah ding na hi uh hiam? Mawhneite nangawn in zong a piakzah mah uh a ngahkik dingin khatlekhat kileitawi uh hi. [35] Tua bang lelin note na gamta kei ding uh hi. Na galte uh itin amaute tungah thupha bawl unla, lohkik ding lamen loin leitawi pia un. Tua hileh na thaman uh lian ding a, a Lianpen Pasian’ tate na hi ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh lungdamna mel a theithei lo mite le a huaiham mite tungah amah migi hi. [36] Tua ahih manin na Pa un hehpihna a neih bangin note in zong hehpihna lungsim nei ta un.
[28] Mi khatpeuh in inn lianpi khat lamding a sawm le, ka zozo ding hiam cih a theih nadingin a bei dingzah tuat masa hi.
[11] Hih leitung sumte-ah na cihtak kei uhleh kua in no tungah vantung sum hong ap ngam ding ahi hiam?
[30] Pasian in mihingte’ theih loh hun lai-a a gamtatnate uh phamawh a sak loh hangin, tu-in mun khempeuha om mi khempeuhte a gamtat siatna panun a kihei nadingun thu a hong pia khinzo hi.
[23] Bang hang hiam cih leh mawhna in thaman hong piak pen sihna hi a, ahi zongin i Topa Jesuh tawh i kipawl manin Pasian’ hong piakkhong pen nuntak tawntungna ahi hi.

[7] Tua ahih manin phiangsiah piak dingte tungah pia-in, mangmu piak dingte tungah pia-in, zahtak dingte zahtak bawlin, pahtawi dingte pahtawi ta un. [8] Khatlekhat ki-it ding cih lohbuang, kuama tungah leiba nei kei un. Midang a itte in Thukham deihna teng a zuikhin ahi hi.

[19] Na pumpi uh, Pasian in a hong piak, note’ sungah a teng Kha Siangtho’ biakinn ahih lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam? Note’ pumpi, nomau’ neihsa hi lo a, Pasian a’ ahi hi. [20] Note pen Pasian in a hong leisa na hih manun na pumpi uh Pasian’ minthan nadingin na zang un.
[23] Note pen Pasian’ hong leisa na hih manun mite’ sila suak kei un.
[3] Ka neih khempeuh midangte tungah pia-in, Pasian’ nasepna hangin kihaltumna ka thuak ahi zongin itna ka neih kei leh ka phattuamna bangmah om lo hi.
[2] Kei ka hong pai ciangin sumpi kaihkhop tawm a om loh nadingin na ngahna uh tawh kizui-in Nipi simin na tuamkoih unla, na na khol un.
[12] Piaknopna lungsim na neih nak-uhleh na neih lohnate uh siksan hi loin na neihna uh tawh kizui-in na piak uh Pasian in hong sang ding hi.

[7] Pasian in piaknopna lungsim tawh a pia mite bek deih ahih manin, a kuamah peuh in na lungsim sung uhah na ngaihsutsa zah ciat uh na pia unla, pia nuam lopipi le sawlzawh thu bek tawh na pia kei un.
[3] Huaihamna lungsim le kisialh nopna lungsim tawh bangmah gamta kei un. Kiniamkhiat ciat unla, midangte thupi ngaihsutzaw un.
[19] A na ka sep i Topa Pasian in ama hauhna tawh kizui-in Khrih Jesuh hangin note’ kitangsapna khempeuh hong pia ding hi.
[8] Mi khatpeuh in a beh a phung, a diakdiakin a innkuansung mite a vak nop kei leh a upna a nusia hita a, thu um lo mite sangin siazaw lai hi.
[10] Sum deihluatna in siatna namkim piangsak hi. Mi pawlkhat in sum deihlua liang uh ahih manin a upna panun pialkhia-in gimna lungkhamna tampi a thuaklawh uh hi.
[5] Sum deihluatna tawh na kipelh nadingun na nuntakna uhah kikem unla, na neihzah uh tawh lungkim un. Pasian in, “Note ka hong nusia ngei kei ding a, ka hong tamasak ngei kei ding hi,” hong ci hi.

[13] Tuni ahih kei leh zing ciangin tua khua tua khua-ah va pai-in, kum khat bang va omin, sumbawlin a meet tampi va ngah ni, a ci mite aw, ka thugen hong ngai dih un. [14] Zing ciangin na nuntakna uh bangci ding cih nangawn na thei kei uh hi. Meiilum tawlkhat sung kaii-in a mangthang pak tawh a kibang lel na hi uh hi.

[11] Bang hang hiam cih leh leitang tungah mizawng bei ngei lo ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin, ‘Gam sungah a om na sanggampa, na a kisam mite le mizawngte tungah na cingh mahmah ding uh hi,’ ci-in thu kong pia hi.
[9] “ TOPA na Pasian un note hong piak leitangah na tun uh ciangin, tua minamte’ gamtatna a kihhuaite zuih ding na kisin kei ding uh hi.

[6] Ahih hangin amaute in, “Kote hong uk dingin kumpi khat hong pia in,” a cih uh ciangin hih thu in Samuel lungkim losak hi. Samuel in TOPA’ kiangah thu ngen hi. [7] Tua ciangin TOPA in Samuel kiangah, “Amaute in nang kiangah hong gen thu khempeuh ngai in; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in nang hong nial hi lo a, amaute tungah kumpi hihna panin kei hong nial ahi uh hi. [8] Egypt panin amaute ka paikhiatpih a kipan tuni dongin amaute in kei hong nusia-in pasian dangte’ na semin, kei’ tungah hong bawlnate khempeuh mah bangin amaute in nang tungah zong hong bawl ahi uh hi. [9] Tua ahih ciangin tu-in amaute’ thu ngai in. Amaute limtakin hilhkholin, amaute’ tungah a uk ding kumpipa’ hih zia ding lak bek in,” a ci hi.

[14] keima minin a kisam ka mite amau mahmah kiniamkhiatin, thu ngenin ka mai hong zong a, amau’ gitlohnate panin a kihei uhleh, keimah in vantung panin ka za ding a, amaute’ khialhna maisakin a leitang uh ka hoihsakkik ding hi.
