[9] Bang hang hiam cih leh migilote kipuaseh ding a, ahih hangin TOPA a ngakte in leitung luah ding uh hi.
[5] No ama nasem, Abraham’ suanlekhak, Jakob’ tate, ama teel mite aw, ama sepsa a lamdang nate, ama nalamdang lahte, a genkhiat a thukhennate phawk ciat ta un!
[19] Kei pen hih leitungah peemta ka hi hi; kei’ kiang panin na thuphate seel kei in.

[11] Hih leitungah ka phawk dang thu khat in: A taihat mite in tai kidemna-ah zo tawntung lo a, galhang thahatte in gal zo tawntung lo hi. A pilte in an a kham ngah tawntung lo a, a pilte hau tawntung lo hi. Hih theih siamna a neite milian suak tawntung lo hi. Mi khempeuh tungah kamsiatna vive tung hi.
[2] Vantungte aw, na za un; leitung aw, na ngai in; bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in thu hong gen khinzo a, “Ka pattahsa ka tate in kei hong lehdo uh hi.

[19] Leitung a lingsakgawp dingin TOPA a kipat ciangin amah kihtakna le a lian ama minthanna panin suanghawm sung le leihawm sungah mite bu ding uh hi. [20] Amah pen leitung a lingsakgawp dingin a hong kipat hun ciangin TOPA kihtakna le a lian ama minthanna vang panin suanghawmpite sung le keenhawmte sungah a buk theih nadingun amau’ bawltawm ngun le kham milimte, buite le bakte a paih ding uh hi.

[7] “Thuman a thei, na lungsim sung uhah keima thu a vom mite aw, ka thu ngai un. Mihingte’ kosiatna kihta kei unla, amaute’ hong simmawhna hangin lungkia kei un. [8] Bang hang hiam cih leh nget in puan a nektum bangin amaute beimang ding a, lungno in samul puan a pehtum bangin amaute maimang ding uh hi. Ahih hangin keima khahkhiatna om tawntung ding a, khang tawntungin ka hotkhiatna kip ding hi,” a ci hi.

[13] “Note pen leitung mite a dingin ci tawh na kibang uh hi. Ahi zongin ci a alna bei leh i alsakkik theih nading lampi om nawn lo hi. A kizat nading bangmah om nawn lo a, mite’ tuatcilgawp dingin kipaai lel hi.
[16] Midangte in na gamtatna hoihte uh a muh ciangin vantungah a om na Pa uh min a phat theih nadingun mite mai-ah na gamtat hoihna uh khuavak bangin na kilangsak un.
[19] “Nget in ne-in a kekseu theihna, gutate in luhin a guktheihna hih leitungah na sum uh khol kei un.
[24] “Kuamah, to nih’ sila hikhawm thei lo hi. Khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat tungah thumanin khat simmawhbawl ding hi. Note in Pasian’ na le leitung sum na na semkhawm zo kei ding uh hi.
[16] “Ngiahon lakah tuu a kikhah bangin note hong sawlkhia ka hih manin gul bangin pilvang unla, vakhu bangin migi un.
[39] Hih leitung nuntakna a hon nuamte in a nuntakna taktak taanlawh ding a, keima hangin a nuntakna a taanlawhte in a nuntakna taktak a ngah ding uh hi.
[26] Mi khatpeuh in hih leitung khempeuh a ngah hangin a nuntakna bulpi suplawh leh bang phattuamna om ahi hiam? A nuntakna bang tawh leikik thei nawn ding ahi hiam?
[52] Tua ciangin Jesuh in ama kiangah, “Na namsau a paai-ah siatkik in. Namsau a zangte namsau mah tawh si ding hi.
[25] Mi khat in leitung khempeuh a ngah hangin a nuntakna bulpi suplawh leh bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam?

[9] “Note kiangah kong genin-ah, hih na leitung sum uh a bei ciangin tawntung nuntakna inn-ah hong kilutsak theih nadingin lawm zonna-in hih leitung sumte na zang un. [10] “A tawmno-ah a diktatte pen a tamah zong diktat uh a, a tawmno-ah a citak lote pen a tamah zong citak lo uh hi. [11] Hih leitung sumte-ah na cihtak kei uhleh kua in no tungah vantung sum hong ap ngam ding ahi hiam?
[1] A kipat cil-in Thu na om a, tua Thu, Pasian tawh na omkhawm a, tua Thu, Pasian ahi hi.
[9] Ama gen khuavak taktak pen zong leitungah hong tung khin a, mi khempeuh a taan khin hi. [10] Amah, leitungah om a, amah tawh leitung a kibawl hinapi-in leitung mite in amah na thei kha lo uh hi.
[16] Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawn loin a hin tawntung theih nadingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi.
[12] Tua khit ciangin Jesuh in mihonte kiangah a thugenna khatah, “Kei pen leitung khuavak ka hi hi. Kei hong zuite in khuavak nuntakna nei ding uh a, khuamial gamtatna nei lo ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[31] Tu-in leitung thukhen ding hun hong tungta a, hih leitung a ukpa kilawnkhia ding hi.
[46] Kei hong um mi khempeuh, khuamial sungah a om nawn loh nadingun leitung khuavak bangin ka hong pai hi.
[30] Tu-in hih leitung a ukpa hong tungta ahih manin note kiangah thu kong gen man nawn kei ding hi. Amah in keima tungah aana nei lo hi.

[18] “Leitung mite in note hong muhdah leh kei a hong mudah masa ahihna thu na thei un. [19] Hih leitung mite tawh a kipawl hi le-uhcin leitung mite in amau pawlte hong it ding hi. Ahi zongin hih leitung mite lak panin note ka hong teelkhia a, amaute tawh kipawl nawn lo na hih manun a hong mudah ahi uh hi. [20] ‘Sila pen a topa sangin lianzaw lo hi,’ ci-in ka hong thugenna phawk un. Amaute in kei hong bawlsiat uhleh note zong hong bawlsia ding hi. Ka thugente hong zuih uhleh note’ thugente zong hong zui ding hi. [21] Ahi zongin amaute in kei hong sawl pa thei lo uh ahih manin keima mi na hihna uh hangin amaute in hih bangin hong bawl ding uh ahi hi.
[11] hih leitung a ukpa pen thukhenna a thuakkhin ahihna thu zong lak ding hi.

[32] Note khempeuh kithehthangin na inn ciat uh zuanin kei bek na hong nusiat ding uh hun a hong tung ding hi bek loin tu-in a hong tung hita hi. Ahi zongin kei guak a hong kinusia hi lo a, Pa in kei hong ompih hi. [33] Keimah tawh na hong kipawlna uh hangin lungnopna na neihtheihna dingun hih thu a hong gen ka hi hi. Leitung gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Ahi zongin keimah in leitung nate zo khinta ka hih manin lungnuamin om un,” a ci hi.
[14] Amaute tungah na thu ka gen khin hi. Ahi zongin keimah bangin amaute zong hih leitung mite tawh kipawl lo uh ahih manin leitung mite in a mudah uh hi.

[36] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Keima ukna pen hih leitung gam hi lo hi. Keima ukna hih leitung gam hileh Jerusalem khua-a Jew mi uliante’ khut sungah hong kipiak loh nadingin ka nungzuite in a do ding uh hi. Tua ahih manin keima ukna pen hih leitung tawh kizom lo hi,” a ci hi.

[20] Pasian in leitung a piansak cil a kipanin a kimu thei lo ama pianzia ahi tawntung vanglianpa le Pasian ahihna thute ama bawlsa nate tung panin teltakin hong kilang hi. Tua ahih manin, “Thei kei ing,” ci-in paulap a zontheih nading uh om lo hi.

[12] Mi khat hangin leitungah mawhna hong om a, tua mawhna hangin sihna hong piang hi. Mi khempeuh mawh uh ahih manin tu-a bangzia-in mi khempeuh tungah sihna hong tung hi. [13] Thukham a om mapekin leitungah mawhna na omkhin a, thukham a om lohna munah Pasian in mawhna a ciaptehna laibu nei lo hi.
[5] I leitung lungsim tawh i nuntak laiteng, thukham hangin i hihnop semsem mawhnopnate i gamta a, tuate khempeuh sihna tawh a kizom ahi hi.
[18] Tuhuna i thuaknate pen Pasian in a hong piak ding minthanna tawh ka ngaihsut khawm ciangin gentham ka sa het kei hi.
[8] Tua ahih manin leitung ngeina tawh a suak tate pen Pasian’ ta hi lo a, Pasian’ thuciamna tawh kizui-a a suakte bek suanlekhak taktakin a kisim pan hizaw hi.

[2] Leitung mihingte’ gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahphasak un. Tua hileh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkimsakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian’ deihna na phawk thei ding uh hi.

[14] Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho a nei lo mite in Pasian’ Kha Siangtho in a hong piak nate sang thei lo uh hi. Kha Siangtho a nei mite bek in theithei uh ahih manin amaute in tel thei lo uh a, amau a dingin a haihuai thu khat ahi lel hi.
[32] Ahi zongin eite in hih leitung mite tawh mawhsakna i thuakkhawm loh nadingin Topa in eite hong thuhilhin gim hong pia hi.
[48] Leitung tawh a kipawl mite pen lei tawh a kibawl mite tawh a kibang hi a, vantung tawh a kipawl mite pen vantung panin a hong pai mipa tawh a kibang ahi hi.

[4] Tua bang mite pen hih leitung pasian gilote in a lungsim mit uh tawsak ahih manin um lo uh a, Pasian tawh a kibang teekteek Khrih minthanna hangin amaute tungah a hong taang lungdamna thu khuavak mu thei lo uh hi.

[10] Kote’ pum tung panin Jesuh’ nuntakna a kilat theih nadingin hih ka leitung pumpi nuntakna mahmah uhah zong Jesuh’ sihna bangmah ka thuak zelzel uh hi. [11] Tua ahih manin kote’ leitung pumpi-ah Jesuh Khrih nuntakna a kilat nadingin Jesuh hangin ka leitung nuntak sungun sih nading lauhuaina ka phukha tawntung uh hi.
[16] Tua thu hangin ka lungkia tuan kei uh hi. Kote’ leitung pumpi in damdamin muatlam ding a manawh ahi zongin ka kha nuntakna uh a nini-in thaksuak semsem hi.

[18] Bang hang hiam cih leh a kimuthei nate a mitsuan ka hi kei uh a, a kimu thei lo nate a mitsuan ka hi uh hi. A kimuthei nate tomno sung bek kimang a, a kimu thei lo nate a tawntungin a kip ahi hi.

[3] Kote pen leitungah a teng mi ka hi mah uh hi; ahi zongin leitung lungsim ngimna tawh galdo ka hi kei uh hi. [4] Kote’ zat galdona hiam pen leitung galhiam lelte hi lo a, galte’ panmun phualpi a susiazo ding Pasian’ galhiam khauhte ahi hi. [5] Mite’ ngaihsutna a man lote ka thalnial gawpzo uh a, Pasian’ thu theih nading a khaktan thei nate ka susiagawp uh a, mi khempeuh’ ngaihsutna zo gawpin Khrih’ thu a mang dingin ka bawl uh hi.
[4] A siahuai tuhun sung panin eite a hong suahtaksak nadingin eite’ Pa Pasian’ deihna tawh kizui-in i mawhna hangin tua Jesuh Khrih amahmah a hong kipiatawm ahi hi.

[17] Bang hang hiam cih leh ei’ pumpi ut bangin gamta lehang Kha Siangtho’ deihna tawh na kituak lo a, Kha Siangtho’ deihna bangin gamta lehang ei’ pumpi deihna tawh na kituak lo zel ahih manin hih nih tegel a kilangpang niloh na hi a, note’ ut bangin a gamta thei lo na hi uh hi.
[24] Tua hi a, Jesuh Khrih a zui mite in a leitung lungsim pianzia uh le a leitung lungsim deihna khempeuh uh a phiat khitsa ahi hi.

[14] Ahi zongin keimah in ahihleh, singlamteh tungah i Topa Jesuh a sihna thu bek ka kisialhpih ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh singlamteh tungah ama sihna hangin kei a dingin leitung thute misi bang a, kei zong, leitung thu-ah misi mah ka bang hi.
[2] Tuahun lai-in leitung gitloh gamtatnate na zui uh a, Pasian thu a um lo mite sungah tu laitakin na a sem, huihlak a ukte’ thu na mang uh hi.

[10] Tu a kipanin Topa tawh na kipawlna uh le ama vangliatna hangin na tha uh khauhsak ta un. [11] Dawimangpa’ hong hih nading khempeuh na dalzawh nadingun Pasian’ galvan namkim na zang un. [12] Eite’ do pen leitung mite hi lo a, vantung huihlakah a om ukna, aana a neite, hih leitung khuamial a uk a tuamtuamte ahi hi. [13] Tua ahih manin hun haksat hun hong tun ciangin galte’ hong suknateng khempeuh nangzo-in, a tawpna-ah a gualzo na hih theih nadingun Pasian’ galvan namkim na zang un.
[10] Tua ahih manin vantung, leitung, leinuai-a om mi khempeuh in Jesuh pahtawi-in khukdin ding uh a,
[20] Ahi zongin eite ihih leh vantung gam mite ihi a, vantung panin a hong pai ding Topa Jesuh Khrih, eite’ Honpa, lawptakin a ngakte ihi hi.

[8] Khrih thu tawh a kituak lopi-in, tangthu tuanthu ahi a, huihlak a ukte’ thu siksanin ahi zongin, bangmahin a kimang lo leitung pilna tawh mite’ khemsa-in sila na suahkhak loh nadingun kingaihsun un.

[1] Note pen Khrih tawh a thokik khinte na hih manun, Pasian’ taklam a kumpi tokhom tungah Khrih a tutna mun vantung thute ngaihsutin nei un. [2] Vantungah a om thute ngaihsutin nei unla, leitungah a om thute ngaihsutin nei kei un.

[12] Eite in i lamet, a lian Pasian le eite hong Hon Jesuh Khrih a vangliatna hong kilatkik ding hun ngakin i om laitakin i biakna tawh a kituak lo thute le leitung nate deihna phiatin, lungsim hi hithiatin omin, thutangin, hih leitungah Pasian’ deihna bangin i nuntak nadingin tua hehpihna thu in eite hong hilh hi.

[13] Hih mite khempeuh in amaute tungah piak dingin Pasian’ ciam thute ngah nai lo uh a, gamlapi-ah a omlai galmuhin hopih thei bek uh a, hih leitungah khualmi peemta hi lel hang, ci-in kitheihna tawh omin a upna mah uh tawh a si uh hi.

[16] Ahi zongin amaute’ lunggulh pen leitung sangin a hoihzaw vantung gam ahi hi. Pasian in amaute a dingin khuapi khat na vaihawmsak ahih manin, tua bang mite in amah pen ka Pasian uh hi, ci-in a gen ding uh Pasian in maizumna in na ngaihsun lo hi.

[1] Tua hi a, eite in i kiim i pamah hih zahin a tam teci nei ihih ciangin eite a hong dongtangsak thei nate khempeuh le eite a hong gakcip mawhna le khialhnate khempeuh paikhia-in, i mai-ah a om tai nading lampi a mong dongin lungsim kiptakin tai ni.
[15] Tua bang pilnate vantung panin a hong pai hi lo a, leitung pilna, kha thu tawh a kisai lo, a dawivai ahi hi.
[4] A citak lo mite aw, leitung tawh kipawlna pen Pasian tawh kigalneihna ahih lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam? Leitung tawh a kipawl mite pen Pasian tawh a kigalneih dingin a kibawlbawl ahi uh hi.
[11] Ka itte aw, hih leitungah gamdang mi, a peempak bangin kingaihsun unla, na kha nuntakna uh tawh a kilehngat pumpi’ deihnate na kikham un.
[20] I Topa le Honpa Jesuh Khrih theihna hangin leitung siatna sung panin suakta khin napi-un, leitung siatna-ah awk kikin a lelte pen, a masa a pianzia uh sangin a nunung a pianzia uh siahuaizaw hi.

[15] Hih leitung nate le Pasian tawh a kizom lo thute deihluatin nei kei un. Mi khatpeuh in hih leitung nate a deihluat leh amah in Pa Pasian it taktak thei lo hi. [16] Bang hang hiam cih leh pumpi deihna, mit tawh mu-in i deihte, le mite’ kisaktheihpih nate ahi leitung nate khempeuh pen Pa Pasian tawh a kizom thu hi lo a, leitung tawh a kizom thu ahi hi. [17] Leitung nate le leitung deihnate a beibei ding hita a, ahi zongin Pasian’ deihna bangin a gamta mite pen kip tawntung ding hi.
[13] Tua ahih manin lawmte aw, leitung mite in hong muhdah leh lamdang sa kei un.

[4] Ka it tate aw, note, Pasian’ mite na hi uh a, tua bang kamsang kineihkhemte a zokhin na hi uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung mite a panpih dawimangpa sangin note hong ompih Pasian vanglian zaw hi.

[4] Pasian’ ta ahite peuhmah in leitung nate zo uh a, i upna tawh leitung nate tungah a gualzo ihi hi. [5] Kuate in leitung nate zo ding ahi hiam i cih leh, Jesuh pen Pasian’ Tapa hi, ci-in a umte bek in zo ding uh hi.

[17] Gamtat khialhna khempeuh mawhna hi a, ahi zongin mawhna khempeuh in sihna ciang dong piangsak khin lo hi. [18] Pasian’ tate in mawhna bawlbawl lo uh hi. Pasian’ Tapa in amaute kem a, Dawimangpa in amaute susia zo lo hi. [19] Leitung midang khempeuh Dawimangpa’ khut sungah a om ahi zongin eite pen Pasian’ mi ihihna thu i thei hi.

[10] Na thuak ding uh haksatnate kihta kei un. Dawimangpa in note pawlkhat thong sungah hong khia-in hong ze-et ding hi. Gimna na thuak hun ding uh ni sawm sung bek hi ding hi. Na sih dongun kei tungah hong citak un. Tua hileh nuntakna lukhu ka hong pia ding hi.

[26] A gualzo, a tawp dongin keima deihna bangin a gamtazo mite tungah, keimah in ka Pa tung panin ka ngah vangliatnate mah ka pia ding hi. Minam dangte tungah ukna a neih nading uh aana ka pia ding a, leibeel satkhap bangin sik ciangkhut tawh minam dangte satgawp ding uh hi.
[1] Tua ciangin van thak khat le lei thak khat ka mu hi. Van masa le lei masa maimang khin a, tuipi zong om nawn lo hi.

[15] Note’ gamtatnate ka thei a, vot lah vot vet lo, sa lah sa vet loin na omna uh zong ka thei hi. A vot na hih kei uhleh a sa hi vet le-uhcin ka ut hi. [16] Ahi zongin note pen vot lah vot vet lo, sa lah sa vet loin a laklawhin om na hih manun ka kam sung panin ka hong siakhia ding hi.

[11] Pasian in, “Leitung in kung tuamtuamte piangsak hen la, tang a nei kungnote, a gah sungah tang a om singgah kungte, amau’ nam ciatin leitungah piangsak hen,” ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi. [12] Leitung in kung tuamtuamte piangkhiasak a, kungnote in amau’ nam ciatin tang piangsakin, singkung in a sungah tang a om gahte piangsakin, amau’ nam ciatciatin piangsak hi. Pasian in tua pen hoih hi, ci-in a mu hi.
[29] Pasian in, “En un, leitung maitang khempeuhah a om, tang a piangsak kungnote khempeuh le a gah sungah tang a om singkung khempeuh note tungah kong pia khinta hi. Tuate an-in na nei ding uh hi.
[2] Tua ciangin a sanggampa Abel nei leuleu hi. Tu-in Abel, tuu kem pa hi a, Kain, lo khopa ahi hi.
[22] Leitung a omlai tengin, lo pawi hun le anlak hun, a vot le a sa, khuakhal le phalbi, sun le zan bei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
[20] Noah pen lo kho masa pa hi a, amah in leenggui lo khat a bawl hi.
[28] Pasian in na tungah vantung daitui hong pia hen la, na lote hoihsak tahen. An le leenggahzu tampi hong pia tahen.
[7] Eite in lo lai-ah buhlom i hen a, keima buhlom tho-in ding tang hi. Tua kiimah note’ buhlom kikhawm a, keima buhlom mai-ah kun uh hi,” a ci hi.
[6] “Mei kuangin gam kang a, a kikhol an ahi a, a ding lai an ahi a, lo ahi zongin a kat leh, mei a kangsak pa in a cing takin loh ding hi.

[10] “Note in na leitang uhah kum guk sung khai tuhin a piangte na kaikhawm ding uh hi. [11] Ahih hangin a kum sagihna ciangin, nomau’ mi a zawngte in a nek theih nadingin leitang tawlngasakin, lokhulin na omsak ding uh a, gamlak ganhingte in mizawngte’ nek loh teng ne thei ding uh hi. Na leenggui lote uh le na oliv lote uh zong tua bangmahin na hih ding uh hi.

[1] TOPA in Moses le Aaron tungah, [2] “Israel mite kiangah hih bangin gen un: Hihte pen leitung a om ganhing khempeuh lak panin na nek theih ding uh a nungta ganhing ahi hi. [3] Ganhingte lak panin a khecin a ka, eknel a hai peuhmah na ne thei ding uh hi. [4] Ahi zongin eknel haite lak pan hitaleh khecin kate lak pan hitaleh, note in na nek theih loh dingte uh: Kalaoh in eknel a hai hangin a khecin ka lo ahih ciangin note a dingin a nin ahi hi. [5] Sakikh ganhing in eknel a hai hangin a khecin ka lo ahih ciangin note a dingin a nin ahi hi. [6] Bilpi in eknel a hai hangin a khecin ka lo ahih ciangin note a dingin a nin ahi hi. [7] Vok pen khecin ka ahih hangin eknel hai lo ahih ciangin note a dingin a nin ahi hi.

[19] “Note in ka thukhamte na zui ding uh hi. Note in na ganhingte uh a namdang tawh ta na neisak kei ding uh hi. Note in na lo uhah khaici nam nih na pawikhawm kei ding uh a, khau nam nih a kigan puan zong na silh kei ding uh hi.

[23] “Note, Kanaan gamah tungin nek dingin kung nam khempeuh na suan uh ciangin, note in amau’ gahte kum thum sung na ne kei ding uh hi. [24] A kum lina ciangin amau’ gah khempeuh siangtho-in, TOPA’ tungah phatna biakna hi ding hi. [25] Ahih hangin a kum ngana ciangin tuate pen note a dingin hong gah semsem nadingin tuate’ gah na ne thei ding uh hi; kei pen TOPA na Pasian uh ka hi hi.

[22] “Note in na leitang panun an na lak uh ciangin, na lonawl dongun la loin, an na lak khit uh ciangin a sangte zong na khawm kei ding uh a, mizawngte le khualmi a dingin tuate na nusia ding uh hi; kei pen TOPA na Pasian uh ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
[2] “Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note kong piak leitangah na tun uh ciangin, TOPA pahtawina-in leitang tawlngak hun na omsak ding uh hi.
[27] Amaute in Moses kiangah, “Kote nong sawlna leitangah ka va tung uh hi. Tua lai-ah bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin luang a, hih pen tua gam a gah ahi hi.
[10] Note in ne-in na gil uh vah ding a, note tungah gam hoih hong piakna hangin TOPA na Pasian uh na phat ding uh hi.

[13] “ TOPA na Pasian uh itin, na lungsim khempeuh uh le na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh ama na na sep nadingun tuni-a kong gen ama thupiaknate na zuih uhleh, [14] na an uh le na leenggahzu uh le na sathau uh na kaihkhop theih nadingun amah in guah masa le guah nunung, a hunin na leitang uh a dingin hong zusak ding hi. [15] Amah in na ganhingte uh a dingin na gam sung uhah lopa hong posak ding a, note in zong an ne-in na gil uh vah ding hi.

[9] “Na leenggui lo uhah khaici nam nih na vawh kei ding uh hi. Vawh le-uh cin na vawh uh an le na leenggui lo uhah a piang khempeuh a nin suak ding hi. [10] “Bawngtal khat le la khat tawh lo na khokhawm kei ding uh hi. [11] “Samul le khau a kigankhawm puan na silh kei ding uh hi.

[19] “Na lo-ah an la-in lo lai-ah anlom na mangngilh uh ciangin a tawm dingin na paikik kei ding uh hi. Tuate pen peemta, pa nei lo, le meigong numeite a’ ding ahi hi. Hih pen TOPA note’ Pasian in na khut uh tawh na sepna khempeuh uhah note thupha hong piak theih nading ahi hi. [20] Na oliv kungte uh na sat uh ciangin a hiangte na sat kikkik kei ding uh hi. Tuate pen peemta, pa nei lo, le meigong numeite a’ ding ahi hi. [21] Na leenggui lo panun leenggah na kaihkhop uh ciangin a sang na nung khop kik kei ding uh hi. Tuate pen peemta, pa nei lo, le meigong numeite a’ ding ahi hi.
[8] “ TOPA in note’ ansal tung le na hihna khempeuh uhah thupha hong puak ding hi. TOPA na Pasian un note hong piakna leitangah amah in note tungah thupha hong pia ding hi.

[12] Note’ leitangah ama hunin guah a zusak ding le na sepna khempeuh uh thupha a pia dingin TOPA in a na hoih kholna vantung note hong hon ding hi. Note in minam tampite tungah leitawi na pia ding uh a, ahih hangin note in leitawi na la kei ding uh hi.

[11] Tua ciangin Ofrah khua-ah TOPA’ vantungmi hong pai a, Abiezer mi Joash neihsa tawsaw nuai-ah hong tu hi. Tua laitakin Joash’ tapa Gideon in Midian mite’ muh loh dingin leenggah sukna-ah mangbuh cil simin na om hi.
[3] Tua ahih ciangin amah kuankhia-in pai a, anlate’ nung lo sungah ansangte a tawm hi. Elimelek-te innkuan Boaz’ lo-ah va kuankha hi.
[2] A numeite tawh na nasepna Boaz pen i tanau hi lo ahi hiam? Thei in, amah in tu nitakin ancilna-ah mangbuhham haih hi.

[19] Tua ahih ciangin tua lai panin amah paikhia a, ama neihsa a bawngtal kap sawm le nih tawh lo a kho Shafat’ tapa Elisha mu a, amah a sawm le nihna tawh a kho ahi hi. Elijah in ama gei nawkin ama tungah a puan lawn hi.

[8] Tua ahih ciangin tu-in note in hih leitang hoih nei-in note’ khit na tate uh tungah gamh-in na nusiat tawntung theih nadingun TOPA’ mai-ah kikhopna ahi Israel khempeuh’ muhna, le i Pasian’ zakna-ah TOPA na Pasian uh thupiaknate khempeuh zui-in zong un.

[15] Tua hun lai-in Judah gam sungah mite in Sabbath ni-in leenggah sukin, a khawhsate uh khawmin late tungah suanin, leenggah, thei, le van namkim, Sabbath ni-in Jerusalem-ah hong puakna ka mu hi. Tua ni-in na a zuakna uh hangin ka lungkim lohna amaute tungah ka gen hi.
[14] Kamtai khat Job kiangah hong tungin, “Bawngtalte in lo kho-in, tuate gei-ah late gamta uh hi.
[12] TOPA in a hoih nate eite tungah hong pia ding a, i leitang in hauhna piangsak ding hi.
[14] Nangmah in ganhingte a dingin lopa, mihing in leilak panin an a ngah theih nadingin a khawh ding ankungte,

[23] Na tuuhonte hoihtakin thei inla, na bawnghonte hoihtakin kem in. [24] Bang hang hiam cih leh neihsa kip tawntung lo a, hauhna pen a khangkhangin kizom suak lo hi. [25] Lopate ki-atmang khin a, ahi zongin a no hong selkik hi. Mualtungah a po lopa hing khempeuh ki-atin inn-ah kipua a, [26] tuute in na puan ding hong guan a, na keeltal mante lo ciing khat man tawh kikim hi. [27] Na keelnawite ahihleh na innkuan annek ding, le na nasem numeite’ nuntak nadingin kicing ding hi.
[19] Nakpi takin lo a khopa hau mahmah a, bangmahin a kimang tum lo na a sempa zawng mahmah hi.
[16] Amah in leitang hoih penpen zong a, a thalawhsa sum tawh a leenggui lo ding a lei hi.

[4] Huih le guah ngakin khuahun hoih dong a ngak mi in khaici tuh ngei lo ding a, an zong la ngei lo ding hi. [5] Nupi gai khat sungah nuntakna thak bangci kipat hiam, ci-in na theihzawh loh mah bangin na khempeuh a bawl Pasian’ nasepna na theizo ngei kei ding hi. [6] Zingsang a kipan khaici tuh inla, nitak dong mateng khawl kei in. A vekpi-in a po kim ding ahi a, a khat sia-in, a khat a po ding ahi zongin na theihkholh bangmah om lo hi.
[15] “I leengguite pak ta ahih manin ngiano hon in a suksiat ma-in tua ngiano honte man ni,” hong ci hi.

[2] Amah in lei to-in a suangte paikhia a, leenggui hoihte a suan hi. A laizangah tausang khat lam a, tua lo sungah leenggahsukna khuk khat a to hi. Amah in leenggah hoih a hong gah ding lamen a, ahih hangin gam leenggah hong gah mawk hi.
[6] Lokhulin ka bawl ding hi. Kipuah loin, kikho lo ding a, tua lo sungah lingkung le lingte a khang ding hi. Ama tungah meiite in zong guah a zuksak loh nadingin thu ka pia ding hi.

[5] An a la mi in ankung ding laite kaikhawmin ante a kilak khit ciangin leitang a hawm guakin a om tawh kibang ding a, mi khat in Refaim Kuam sungah ansang a kaihkhop khit ciangin lolai a hawm guakin a om tawh zong kibang ding hi.

[10] Nomau hong honkhia Pasian note in mangngilhin, nomau’ belh Suangpi phawk lo na hih manun note in biakna huan bawlin kung hoihte suan a, kung namdangte tawh pehin, [11] tuate na suan ni mahun thakhatin khang a, na tuh ni uh a zing ciang mahin a hong pak hangin note in a gah na lokha kei ding uh hi. Gimna le lungkhamna hong tun ni-in tuate maimang ding hi.

[24] Lokho pa in khaici tuhna ding a lo kho niloh ahi hiam? Amah in lei kalkhamin git niloh ahi hiam? [25] Amah in lei a zalhtam khit ciangin masala tang vawhin, kummin tang tuh a, mangbuhte a gualgualin tuhin, mangbuhham a omna ding sanah tuh a, mangbuhhamte a nawl hui-ah tuh hi lo ahi hiam? [26] Bang hang hiam cih leh amah a manin kihilh a, ama Pasian in amah hilh hi. [27] Masalate buhcilna tawh kicil lo a, kummin tangte tungah buhcilna pei kihual lo hi. Ahih hangin masalate ciangkang tawh kisatkhia a, kumminte molhtum tawh kisat hi. [28] Mi khatpeuh in antang cilvui ahi hiam? Hi lo hi; amah in cil paisuak ngitnget lo hi. A sakol tawh buhcilna pei a kihualsak ciangin amah in kitamvuisak lo hi. [29] Hih zong Vanglian TOPA’ kiang pan a hong pai thu ahi hi. Amah pen thu lamlahna-ah lamdang mahmah a, pilna-ah lian mahmah hi.
[23] Khaici na tuh nadingun amah in guah hong zusak ding a, lei panin a piang an hoih tampi tak hong pia ding hi. Tua ni ciangin gankhahna, mun zaina-ah na ganhingte un lopa ne ding uh hi.

[30] “Nang Hezekiah a dingin hih in lim hong hi ding hi: Tu kumin anli pote na ne ding uh a, a kum nihna ciangin tua bangmahin a pote na ne leuleu ding uh hi. A kum thumna ciangin khai tuhin an na la ding uh a, leenggui suanin a gah na ne ding uh hi.

[10] Bang hang hiam cih leh vantung panin guahtui le vuk hong pai-in, amaute ciahkik loin leitung kawtsakin, kungnote mengin selkhiasak a, khai vawhpa khaici pia-in a ne pa tungah an a piak mah bangin, [11] keima kam panin a paikhia ka thu zong tua mah bang ding hi. A hawmpi-in kei kiangah hong tungkik lo ding a, keima ngimnasa bangin tangtung sakin, amah ka sawlna thu tangtun ding hi.
[3] Judah gammite le Jerusalem khuamite tungah TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Na lote uh kal unla, ling lakah khai vawh kei un.

[12] Khai tuh bangin thuman tuhin, kei nong itna hangun a piang thuphate at un. Note’ TOPA keima lamah nong kihei ding uh a hun hita ahih manin lo thak lei kalkham un. Tua hileh kei hong pai-in note tungah thupha kong pia ding hi, ka ci hi.
[17] Guahtui om lo ahih manin khai kituhte khempeuh lei sungah keucip a, an khol ding bangmah om nawn lo ahih manin ansalte khempeuh a vekin kisia khinta hi.
[23] “Zion mite aw, kipak unla, TOPA na Pasian uh tungah lungdam ta un. Note in an na hauh theih nadingun nidanga bangin khuapi guah, tuk guah le phalbi guah, a hoihbekzah hong zusak hi.
[1] Topa PASIAN in hih bangin hong musak hi: Kumpipa’ gan an ding lopa a ki-at khit phet, selkik dingin a kisak laitakin TOPA in kauphe honpi a piangsak hi.

[3] Amah in minam tampite’ thu khensak ding a, Israel gam panin a gamla pekah a om, minam vangliante’ thu khensak ding hi. Amaute in a namsaute uh lokhawhna tu-in seek ding uh a, a teipite uh singhiang heuhna temkawi-in seek ding uh hi. Minam khatlekhat kido nawn lo ding uh a, galkidona theikha nawn lo ding uh hi. [4] A kuamah peuh lungnuamin a leenggui phung le a theikung nuai-ah tu hithiat ding a, kuamah in patausak nawn lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Vanglian TOPA mahmah in hih thu hong gen khinta hi.
[18] TOPA aw, nang tawh a kibang Pasian dang om lo a, a omlai na mite’ mawhna nangmah in na maisak hi. Nang na heh paisuak kei a, na itna kip nong lak hi.

[17] Theigahte a hut khin a, leengguite a gah kei zongin, oliv kungte gah lo a, lo-ah an a piang kei zongin, tuu khempeuh a si khin a, ganbuk khempeuh a hawm khin zongin, [18] TOPA Pasian pen hong honkhia pa ahih manin lungdamin ka kipak lai veve ding hi. [19] TOPA Pasian, keima thahatna ahi hi; sakhi khe bangin ka khe hong zaptelsak a, mun sangna-ah lungmuang takin kei hong paisak hi.
[33] “Singgah limci a gahtheih nadingin a kung a cidam phot ding kisam a, a kung gina kei leh a gah limci lo hi. Tua ahih manin singkung khat a pianzia pen a gahin hong kithei hi.

[3] Amah in thugentehna a tuamtuam zangin thu tampi hilhin a genin-ah: “Khaici vawhpa khaici vawh dingin a kuankhia hi. [4] Khaici a vawh ciangin pawlkhatte lo lai lam dungah tu a, vasate hong leengin a ne uh hi. [5] Pawlkhatte, suang a kitawphahna leidaina mun a tu hi. Lei thuk loin lum ahih manin a khaici popah hi. [6] Ahi zongin ni hong sat ciangin ankungte in zung thuk kha zo lo uh ahih manin tua ankungnote vulin a keu hi. [7] Pawlkhatte, lingbulsum a omna mun leilak tu a, lingbulsumte hong selin hong khang ahih manin ankungte a depgawp hi. [8] Ahi zongin pawlkhatte, lei hoihna mun tu-in hong khang hi. Pawlkhatte in a zah zakhat, pawlkhatte in a zah sawmguk, adangte in a zah sawmthum a gah hi,” ci-in a gen khit ciangin,
[9] Tu mahmahin sing a bulphuk dingin hei tawh kingimzo hi. Gah hoih a gah lo singkung khempeuh kiphukin meikhuk sungah kikhul ding hi,” a ci hi.

[6] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah thugentehna khat gen a, “Mi khat in a lolai-ah theikung khat a suansak hi. Theigah a lo dingin a pai ciangin bangmah na gah lo hi. [7] Tua ahih manin amah in a lokho pa kiangah, ‘A beisa kum thum sung theigah lo dingin ka pai zelzel a, ahi zongin gah lo hi. Tua ahih manin phuk in. Bang hangin lo sung mawk nawngkaisak ding ahi hiam?’ ci hi. [8] Tua ciangin lokho pa in, ‘Topa aw, tu kum sung zong hih bangmahin omsaklai phot in. A phung kimkot to-in eklei ka sung ding hi. [9] Kum kik ciangin hong gah leh a hoih hi pah ding hi. Ahi zongin hong gah kei veve leh i phuk ding hi,’ ci-in a dawng hi,” a ci hi.

[3] Tua ahih manin tuukong cing pa in a kong hon a, a tuute a min ciatin a sap ciangin a tuute in a thu mang a, amah in tuukulh panin a tuute a pusuah khiatpih hi. [4] A tuute khempeuh a pusuah khiat khit ciangin tuate mai-ah a cing pa pai a, a cing pa’ aw thei uh ahih manin tuute in amah a zui uh hi.

[17] A kiciing oliv kung a hiangte kisatkhia-in gamlak oliv hiangte tawh kipeh hi. No Gentail-te pen tua gamlak oliv hiangte tawh a kibang na hi uh a, Jew mite’ hamphatna teng a ngahkhawm na hi uh hi. [18] Tua ahih manin oliv hiang a kisatkhia tawh a kibang Jew mite simmawhbawl kha kei un. Note na kiphatsak theih nading uh a thu om lo hi. Note pen a hiang tawh a kibang lel na hi uh a, note in a zungpi a hingsak hi loin, a zungpi in note a hong hingsak ahi zaw hi.

[6] Keima nasep pen khaici vawh hi a, Apollos’ nasep pen tuibuah hi a, ahi zongin a khangsak pa ahihleh Pasian ahi hi. [7] Khaici vawh pa le tuibuak pa a thupi hi lo a, a khangsak Pasian a thupi hi bek hi. [8] Khaici vawh pa le tuibuak pa a kizakim ahi hi. Pasian in komau sepna tuak tawh kizui-in thaman hong pia ding hi. [9] Kote pen Pasian a dingin na a semkhawm mite ka hi uh a, note pen Pasian’ lo na hi uh hi. Note pen Pasian’ inn zong na hi uh hi.
[10] Hih bang a gen ciangin ei mihingte hong cihnopna hi a, eite a dingin a kigelh thu ahi hi. Lo a khopa le an a lapa in amau’ ngah dingin a kilawm an a ngah dingin lametna tawh nasem ahi uh hi.

[38] Ahi zongin Pasian in ama hoihsak bangin a kung ding na pia a, khaici nam tuamtuamte a’ ding kung nam tuamtuam a guan hi. [39] Tua mah bangin sa a nei nuntakna nam khempeuh zong a sa kibang kim lo hi. Mihing sa, ganhing sa, vasa sa, ngasa sa, cih bangin a nam tuamtuam a om hi.
[6] Note in na phawk ding uh thu panin: Khaici tawm a vawhte in tawm mah la ding a, tampi a vawhte in tampi mah la ding uh hi.
[6] Hahkat takin lo a khopa in anlak hun ciangin a tampen a ngah dingin a kilawm ahi hi.
[7] A tungah a kia guahtuite hupin, a kikhawhsak mite a dingin a kimang thei kungte a khangsak leitang pen Pasian in thupha a pia hi.
[16] Khatlekhat tungah thuhoih kibawlin na kihuh ding uh mangngilh kei un. Hih bang gamtatnate pen Pasian a lungkimsak thei biakna ahi hi.
[7] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Topa hong pai matengin lungduai takin om un. Lo khote in zong a lo panun an a ngahtheih nadingun lungduai takin khuapi guah le tuk guah a ngakna thu thei un.
[4] Tua tham loin amah in TOPA’ Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah na semin thu a ngen ding, lungdamna a ko ding, le Israel Pasian, TOPA a phat dingin Levi mite pawlkhat a seh hi.
[8] TOPA’ tungah lungdamna ko-in, ama min lo unla, ama septe khempeuh mite’ lakah kitheisak un!

[34] Amah hoih ahih manin TOPA’ tungah lungdamna ko un; bang hang hiam cih leh ama itna kip a tawntungin a kho hi! [35] “Kote hong khahkhia in, kote hong honkhia Pasian aw, minam dangte lak panin kote hong kaikhawm in. Na min siangtho tungah lungdam kong koh theih nading uh le, nangmah phatna-ah ka minthan nadingun kote hong hon in.

[17] Nangmah in lungsim entelin thumanna-ah na lungkimna ka thei hi, ka Pasian aw. Lungsim thumanna le citna tawh hih nate khempeuh kong pia khin a, tu-in nang tungah citna le lungdamna tawh a hong pia, hih lai-ah a om na mite ka muzo hi. [18] Ka pute uh Abraham, Isaac, le Israel Pasian, TOPA aw, na mite’ lungsim sungah tua bang ngimnate le ngaihsutnate omsak tawntung inla, amaute’ lungsim nangma lamah kai in.

[3] Israel mite khempeuh in meikuang hong paisukin TOPA’ minthanna vang biakinn tungah a om a muh uh ciangin suangphah tungah leilam maingatin kun uh a, Pasian bia-in TOPA’ tungah lungdamna ko-in, “ TOPA’ tungah lungdam koh ding hoih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ama itna kip tawntung hi,” a ci uh hi.

[43] Pasian in nakpitakin amaute lungdamsak ahih manin amaute in tua ni-in biakpiakna lian tampi pia-in lungdam uh a, numei naupangte zong lungdam uh hi. Tua hi a, Jerusalem khuasunga lungdamna awging gamlapi pek pan nangawnin kiza hi.
[46] Bang hang hiam cih leh David’ hun lai-in lasate a ukpi le phatna le lungdamkohna a makai-in Asaf om hi.
[17] Ke’n ahihleh, ama dikna om bangin TOPA’ tungah lungdamna ka lak ding a, a Sangpen TOPA’ min phatna la ka sak ding hi.
[1] Ka lungsim khempeuh tawh TOPA tungah lungdamna kong ko ding a, na bawl a lamdangte khempeuh ka gen ding hi. [2] Nangma hangin nuamin ka diang ding a, na min phatna ka sa ding hi, Sangpenpa aw.
[7] TOPA, ka hatna le ka lum hi a, amah ka muang hi. Tua ahih manin kei hong kihuh a, lungdamin ka diang a, ka lasakna tawh ama tungah lungdamna ka ko hi.

[12] TOPA ka Pasian aw, nangma tungah lungdamna ka hong koh tawntung theih nading, ka lungsim in nang hong phat theih nading, a dai om mawk loh nadingin ka thumna le ka taunate lamna tawh nong heisak a, dahna lim ahi ka puanhampi hong suahkhiat sakin nuamna na hong guan hi.
[4] TOPA sungah lungkim in; amah in na deihna hong pia ding hi.
[23] Biakpiak nadingin lungdam piakna hong paipih mi in kei a hong pahtawi ahi hi. Ka thu a mang mite khempeuh ka honkhia ding hi,” a ci hi.
[30] Lasakna tawh Pasian’ min ka phat ding a, lungdamna tawh amah ka pahtawi ding hi.

[1] Sangpenpa aw, TOPA tungah lungdamna lah ding, nangma min phatna la sak dingin kilawm a, zangsawm khausai lasakna le harp lasakna, laiza lasaknate tumin, zingsangin nangma itna kip, zanin na thumanna genkhiat dingin a kilawm ahi hi.

[1] Hong pai un, TOPA phat ni. Eite a hong hu, a hong honkhia pa tungah lungdamna la sa ni. [2] Ama omna-ah lungdamna ko-in pai ni. Phatna late, ama tungah lungdam takin sa ni. [3] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA, a lian Pasian hi a, pasian khempeuh tungah Kumpi lianpa ahi hi. [4] Amah in leitung khempeuh uk a, guam thuk pen panin mual sang pen dawn dongin amah in a uk hi. [5] Ama bawlsa tuipite uk a, ama bawlsa leitung zong amah in a uk hi. [6] Hong pai un, amah bia-in kun ni. Eite hong Bawl TOPA’ mai-ah khukdin ni.

[1] Gam khempeuh aw, TOPA’ tungah lungdamna aw gingsak un. [2] Lungdamna tawh TOPA’ na sem un. Ama omna-ah la sa kawmin hong pai un. [3] TOPA, Pasian ahihna thei un. Eite hong bawlpa amah hi a, eite ama a’ ihi hi. Eite ama mi ihi a, ama gankhahna sunga om a tuute ihi hi. [4] Lungdam kohna tawh ama kongpi-ah lut unla, amah phatna tawh ama huang sungah tum un. Ama tungah lungdam ko unla, ama min phat un. [5] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA hoih hi. Ama itna kipin kho tawntung a, ama thumanna a khang khangin kip hi.
[1] TOPA ka phat ding a, ka lungsim khempeuh tawh ama min siangtho ka phat ding hi. [2] TOPA ka phat ding a, ama migitna ka mangngilh kei ding hi.
[1] TOPA tungah lungdamna ko-in, ama min phat unla, ama sepnate khempeuh mite lakah kitheisak un.
[1] TOPA phat un. TOPA’ tungah lungdam ko un; bang hang hiam cih leh amah hoih a, ama itna kip tawntung hi.
[1] “ TOPA tungah lungdam ko un; bang hang hiam cih leh amah hoih a, ama itna kip tawntung!”
[22] Lungdam koh piaknate pia-in ama nasepnate lungdam la tawh amaute gensak un.

[29] Amah in huihpi daisak a, tuipi hualte a bei hi. [30] Tua ciangin, tua tuihualte a khawl manin amaute a lungdam uh hi. Amah in amaute’ utna khua-ah a paipih hi. [31] Ama itna kip le mihing tate tungah a lamdang a sepnate hangin amaute in TOPA tungah lungdamna ko ta uh hen. [32] Amaute in mihon kikhopna sungah amah pahtawi-in, upate’ kikhopna sungah amah phat ta uh hen.
[17] Lungdam koh biakpiakna nang tungah kong pia ding a, TOPA’ tungah thu kong ngen ding hi.

[1] TOPA’ tungah lungdamna ko un. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah hoih a, ama itna kip tawntung hi. [2] “Ama itna kip tawntung hi,” Israel-te in ci ta uh hen. [3] “Ama itna kip tawntung hi,” Aaron innkuante in ci ta uh hen. [4] “Ama itna kip tawntung hi,” amah a zahtakte in ci ta uh hen. [5] Ka cihmawhna-ah TOPA ka sam a, TOPA in hong dawngin mun tanzau-ah hong koih hi.
[21] Nangmah in kei hong dawngin, hong honkhia na hih manin nangma tungah ka lungdam hi.

[1] Amah hoih ahih manin TOPA tungah lungdamna ko un; bang hang hiam cih leh ama itna kip tawntung hi. [2] Lungdamna pen pasian-te’ Pasian’ tungah ko un; bang hang hiam cih leh ama itna kip tawntung hi. [3] Lungdamna pen topate’ Topa’ tungah ko un; bang hang hiam cih leh ama itna kip tawntung hi.
[1] TOPA aw, ka lungsim khempeuh tawh nangma tungah lungdamna kong ko a, pasian-te’ mai-ah nangmah phatna ka sa hi.

[1] Ka Pasian le ka Kumpipa aw, nangmah hong pahtawi-in a tawntungin nangma min kong phatphat ding hi. [2] Nisimin hong pahtawi-in a tawntungin nangma min kong phatphat ding hi. [3] TOPA lian hi; nakpitakin phat ding hi a, ama liatna ngaihsutzawh ding hi lo hi. [4] A khang a khangin nangma nasepnate kiphatphat ding a, a vanglian na bawlnate kigengen ding hi. [5] Na liatna le na minthanna a lamdang nangma sepnate ka lungngaingai ding hi.
[7] TOPA tungah lungdamkohna la sa unla, laiza lasakna tawh eite’ Pasian’ tungah la ngaih sa un.
[30] Ngaihbaanna pen zuaupi hithei a, melhoihna zong maimang thei hi. Ahi zongin TOPA a zahtak numei a phattaak ahi hi.
[1] Ni khat ni ciangin mite in, “ TOPA aw, kei tungah na heh hangin na hehna damta a, kei hong hehnem na hih manin nang tungah lungdamna kong ko ding hi.
[4] Ni khat ni ciangin mite in, “ TOPA’ tungah lungdam ko unla, ama hong huh ding ngen un. Minam khempeuh lakah ama septe kitheisak unla, ama min kiliansak hi, ci-in gen un.
[19] Tuate sung panin lungdamna la kisa ding a, gualnopna aw kiza ding hi. Amaute ka pungsak ding a, tawmkha bek hi lo ding uh hi. Amaute ka kipahtawisak ding a, ka neusak kei ding hi.

[11] Ahih hangin lungdamna aw le kipahna awte, zinei thakte le mothakte’ awte kiza kik ding hi. TOPA’ biakinn-ah mite hong pai-in lungdam kohna-in: ‘Vanglian TOPA’ tungah lungdamna ko un. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA hoih a, ama itna kip tawntung hi,’ ci-in a lasakna awte uh a kiza kik ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in kong cihin-ah, a masa-a mah bangin hih gam ka hausakkik ding hi.
[5] Lungdam kohna-in silngo sawh anlum va pia unla, utthu-a biakpiaknate va pia-in va kisial un. Hihte pawl pen note’ hihnop pawl ahi hi, TOPA in ci hi.
[9] Ahih hangin ke’n ahihleh lungdamna aw tawh biakna kong pia ding a, ka ciamsa thu ka tangtungsak ding hi. TOPA’ kiang pan hotkhiatna hong pai hi,” a ci hi.

[3] Haksatna i thuak laitak nangawnin i lungdam veve hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh haksatna in thuakzawh hatna piangsak a, [4] thuakzawh hatna in Pasian’ pahtakna hong ngahsak a, ama hong pahtakna in lametna lianpi hong neisak ahihna thu i thei hi.
[12] Lamet na neihna hangun lungdamin om tawntung unla, lungkhamna na thuak uh ciangin lungduai-in thu na ngen tawntung un.

[4] Jesuh Khrih hangin note tungah Pasian in hehpihna thupha hong pia ahih manin ka lungdamna thu, Pasian tungah ka ko tawntung hi. [5] Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih tawh na kipawlna hangun, thugen siamna le thu theihtel siamna a kipan siamna nam khempeuh na neikim uh hi.
[15] Hih thute khempeuh note a’ ding a kikhualna hi a, Pasian’ hehpihna in mi tam ban semsem leh mi a tam semsem mah in Pasian’ minthan nadingin lungdam ko-in thu ngen ding uh hi.

[11] Kote tungtawnin note’ huhna sumte a ngahna uh hangin mi tampi in Pasian a phattheih nadingin note na cit gamtatzawh tawntung nadingun Pasian in hong hausak tawntung ding hi. [12] Bang hang hiam cih leh note’ huhna sumte in Pasian’ mi a cimawhte’ dong a hu bek hi loin, Pasian’ tungah lungdamkoh nading zong a piangsak ahi hi.
[15] A manphatna a kigen zo lo Pasian’ hong piak hih thupha hangin Pasian tungah i lungdamna ko ciat ni.

[15] Note in Topa Jesuh na muanna thu uh le thu umte khempeuh na itna thu uh ka zak hun a kipanin, [16] tawlnga loin note’ tangin Pasian’ tungah lungdamna ka na pulak tawntung hi. Ka thungetna-ah zong note ka hong phawk tawntung a,

[3] Note pen Pasian’ mi na hih manun note lakah nulepa khialhna, a kilawm lo-a gamtatna, huaihamna cihte genin zong na nei vet kei un. [4] A kilawm lo-a kampauna, le ciamnuih hoih lo cihte zong na zang kei unla, Pasian tungah lungdamkohna kam na pauzaw un.
[20] I Topa Jesuh Khrih hangin thu khempeuhah Pa Pasian tungah lungdamna ko ta un.

[3] Note ka hong phawk simin ka biak Pasian tungah ka lungdamna ka ko hi. [4] Note in lungdamna thu na zak ni uh a kipanin tuni ciang dong, lungdamna thuhilh nasepna-ah kei na hong huhna uh hangin ka nuam mahmah a, note a dingin thu ka nget simin lungdam mahmahna tawh ka ngen tawntung hi.

[4] Topa sungah lungdam tawntung un, ka hong cihsa bangin tu-in zong lungdam un, ka hong ci kik hi. [5] Mi khempeuh tungah na dik un. Topa hong pai baih ta ding hi. [6] Thu khat peuhpeuhah lunghimawh lua kei unla, na kisap bangbang uh, lungdamna tawh Pasian kiangah na ngen un.

[11] Bangbangin om taleng a lungkim thei dingin a kisinsa ka hih manin hih bang ka hong gen ciangin ka kitangsapna a hong pulak nuam ka hi kei hi. [12] Cihmawhna le cihtheihna a sinsa ka hi hi. Tua ahih manin ka hau a ka zawng zongin, ka vah a ka kial zongin, koi mun koi mun hitaleh ah a lungkimthei dingin a kisinsa ka hi hi.

[11] Note in lungduai maitai takin thuakzo-in, khuavak gam sungah a om Pasian’ mite tawh nopsakna a ngahkhawm thei dingin a hong bawl i Pa tungah lungdamna na koh theih nadingun a minthang ama vangliatna in note tungah thahatna hong guan tahen. [12] Note in lungduai maitai takin thuakzo-in, khuavak gam sungah a om Pasian’ mite tawh nopsakna a ngahkhawm thei dingin a hong bawl i Pa tungah lungdamna na koh theih nadingun a minthang ama vangliatna in note tungah thahatna hong guan tahen.

[6] Note hong honpa dingin Topa Khrih na sansa uh ahih mah bangin amah tawh hoihtakin kipawlin nungta un. [7] Note tungah a hong kihilhsa bangin ama sungah zungthuk kha unla, ama deihna bangin nungta-in, na upna uhah khauh semsemin, lungdam takin om un.

[15] Note pumkhat suakin a lungdam khawm dingin Pasian in a hong sap ahih mah bangin Khrih hong piak nopsakna in note’ lungsim hong uk ta hen la, lungdamin om ta un. [16] Khrih thu a cingtakin note lungsimah hong om hen la, pilna tawh khatlekhat thu kihilhin na kitai un. Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Thuciam Lui sunga late, la thakte, le biakna late na sa un. [17] Na kampauna, na gamtatnate khempeuh uhah, Topa Jesuh hangin Pa Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Jesuh min paulamin na hih ding uh hi.
[2] Lungsim takpi tawh thu ngen tawntung unla, kidawm kawmin lungdamna tawh thu ngen un.

[16] Lungdam tawntungin, [17] thu ngen niloh unla, [18] bangbang hong piang taleh na lungdamna uh Pasian tungah ko tawntung un. Khrih Jesuh tawh kipawlin na nuntakna sung uhah hih bangzia-in na om ding uh Pasian in a hong deih ahi hi.
[1] A masa penin kong gennop thu in: Mi khempeuh a dingin Pasian tungah ngetna, thungetna, thumna le lungdamkohna na neih ding uh ahi hi.
[4] Pasian’ bawlsa na khempeuh a hoih hi a, nial loin, lungdamna pulakin san ding ahi hi. [5] Pasian’ thu le thungetna hang tawh tuate a hoih a suak ahi hi.
[4] Pasian’ mite khempeuh na itna thu le Topa Jesuh na upna thu na zakhin ka hih manin Pasian kiangah thu ka nget simin nangmah hong phawkin Pasian tungah lungdamna thu ka ko tawntung hi.

[3] I Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pa Pasian tungah lungdam ni. Ama hong hehpih mahmahna hangin sihna panin Jesuh Khrih a thawhkik sakna tawh eite tungah nuntakna thak a hong pia hi. Tua ahih manin i lametna kiam ngei lo a,
[12] “Amen! Eite’ Pasian in phatna, minthanna, pilna, lungdamkohna, pahtawina, vangliatna, le hatna a tawntungin nei ta hen! Amen,” a ci uh hi.
[17] “A beisa hun le tu hunah a om tawntung a Vanglian Topa Pasian aw, tu-in na vangliatna zangin uk ding hong kipan khin na hih manin nangma tungah ka nuamna uh ka hong ko uh hi.

[7] “Nang le nang’ khit cianga na suanlekhakte tungah Pasian hihna ding tawntung thuciam nadingin kei le nang’ khit cianga na suanlekhakte’ tungah amau’ khang tawntungin ka thuciamna ka kipsak ding hi. [8] Nangma tung le nang’ khit cianga na suanlekhakte tungah tawlkhat na omna Kanaan leitang khempeuh na neih tawntung dingun kong pia ding a, kei pen amaute’ Pasian ka hi ding hi,” a ci hi.

[19] Pasian in, “Hi lo hi. Na zi Sarah in nang a dingin tapa khat nei ding a, ama min Isaac na phuak ding hi. Ama khit cianga a suanlekhakte a dingin tawntung thuciam nadingin ka thuciamna amah tawh ka kipsak ding hi.

[14] Na suanlekhakte leilak leivui zah pha ding a, nitumna lam le nisuahna lam, leilu lam le leitaw lamah na kizelthang ding uh hi. Nang le na suanlekhakte thupha kong piak bangin leitung minam khempeuh in thupha a ngah nadingun hong ngen ding uh hi.

[8] “Judah aw, na sanggamte in nang hong phat ding hi. Na galte’ gawl na meek ding a, na sanggamte na mai-ah hong kun ding uh hi. [9] Judah pen humpinelkai tawh kibang a, a sa matsa a nek khit ciangin a kua-ah a ciahkik tawh kibang hi. Humpinelkai bangin kizia-in a lumsuk hi. Kua in amah phawng ngam ding hiam? [10] Judah in kumpi ciangkhut len tawntung ding a, a suan a khakte in zong ukna aana nei tawntung ding hi. Minam dangte in ama tungah siah puak ding a, zahtakna tawh ama mai-ah kun ding uh hi.
[7] Israel-te a’ ding hotkhiatna Zion panin hong tunna ding thu ka ngenngen hi. TOPA in ama mite tungah nopsakna a piakkik ciangin, ama mi Israel-te kipak mahmah ding uh hi.

[10] Tarshish kumpite le tuikulh neu-a kumpite in ama tungah siah pia uh hen la, Sheba le Seba kumpite in letsong puak ta uh hen. [11] Kumpi khempeuh ama mai-ah bok uh hen la, minam khempeuh in ama na sem ta uh hen.
[1] “ TOPA tungah lungdam ko un; bang hang hiam cih leh amah hoih a, ama itna kip tawntung!”
[14] Tua ahih ciangin Topa mahmah in note tungah lim khat hong pia ding hi. En un, nungak khat gai-in tapa khat nei ding a, ama min Immanuel kici ding hi.

[6] Bang hang hiam cih leh eite a dingin naungek khat hong suak a, eite’ tungah tapa khat hong kipia hi. Amah pen eite hong ukpa hi ding a, ama min pen “Lamdang Thulak pa, Vanglian Pasian, Tawntung Pa, Nopsakna Kumpi,” kici ding hi. [7] Tuhun a kipanin a tawntungin David kumpi tokhom tung le ama gam sungah thutang le thuman phutin, a lian semsem ama ukna le nopsakna in mong nei lo ding hi. Vanglian TOPA’ deih luatna in hih thu hong tungsak ding hi.
[1] Jessi’ phung sung panin a sel khat hong khangkhia ding a, a zungte panin a no khat hong khang ding hi.

[1] Israel mite aw, note hong hopihna TOPA’ kammal ngai dih un. [2] TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Gamdangte’ omdan ciing kei unla, vantung a lim lamdangte lunghihmawhna-in ngaihsun kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh gamdang mite in tuate a lunghihmawhpih uh hi. [3] Hih mite’ ngeinate a kimanna om lo hi. Gamlakah sing khat kiphuk a, khutsiampa in a hei tawh milimin a bawl hi. [4] Mite in tua pen kham le ngun tawh zem uh a, a kilakkhiat theih loh nadingin sik tawh a kilh uh hi. [5] A milimte uh, tangmai huanah vasate’ lau nadingin a kikhai milimte tawh kibangin pau thei lo uh a, lam pai thei lo uh ahih manin puak a kul hi. Tuate kihta kei un; siatna bawl thei lo uh a, phatna zong bangmah bawl thei lo uh hi,” a ci hi. [6] TOPA aw, nang tawh a kibang kuamah om lo hi. Nang na lian a, na min vanglian mahmah hi.

[5] “En un, TOPA in kong cihin-ah, keimah in David’ suan lak panin kumpi dingin a diktat mi khat ka khankhiatsak ni hong tung ding hi. Amah gam uk siam mahmah ding a, gam sungah thuman thutang tawh thu hong khen ding hi. [6] Ama hun hong tun ciangin Judah mite kihonkhia ding a, Israel mite lungmuang takin a teng ding uh hi. Amah a kilawh nadingin a min, ‘ TOPA, Eite’ Diktanna,’ ci-in a kiphuak ding hi.
[11] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in kong cihin-ah, mai lamah lametna note kong piakkik ding, na siatna ding uh hi loin na phattuamna ding uh geelna ka neihte kei bek in ka thei hi.
[15] TOPA in kong cihin-ah: “Ramah khua-ah aw khat kiza a, tauna le kah ngutngutna awging ahi hi. Rachel, a tate a dingin a kap hi. A tate om nawn lo ahih manin kinem zo lo hi,” a ci hi.
[1] Israel a neu lai-in ka it mahmah a, Egypt gam panin ka tapa ka samkhia hi.
[2] Bethlehem Efrathah khua aw, nang pen Judah gamah khua neupen khat na hi a, ahi zongin nang sung panin Israel-te a uk ding khat ka piangsak ding hi. Ama gui pen tangtawng pek tawh kizom hi.

[9] Zion mite aw, nakpitakin lungdam un. Jerusalem mite aw, lungdamin awng un. En un, na kumpipa uh hong pai hi. Amah, gualzawhna tawh hong pai hi. Ahi zongin kiniamkhiatna tawh hong pai a, sin nai loh lano tungah hong tuang hi.

[1] Abraham’ suan David, David’ suan Jesuh Khrih’ khang ciaptehna hih bang ahi hi. [2] Abraham ta Isaac, Isaac ta Jakob, Jakob ta Judah, le a sanggamte ahi uh hi. [3] Judah ta Perez le Zerah hi a, Tamar tawh a neih a ta ahi uh hi. Perez ta Hezron, Hezron ta Ram,

[18] Jesuh Khrih a hong suahna zia hih bang ahi hi. Mary pen Josef a dingin zuthawl piaksa hi a, ahi zongin a kiten taktak ma-un Kha Siangtho in amah a gaisakna thu Mary in a thei hi. [19] A lawmpa Josef pen a manin a gamta nuam mi khat ahih manin a lawmnu maizumsak nuam lo a, kuama theih lohin maksim dingin a ngaihsun hi. [20] Ahi zongin hih bangin thu a ngaihsut laitakin a mang sungah Topa’ vantungmi khat hong kilang a, “David suan Josef aw, Mary sunga nau pen Kha Siangtho in a gaisak ahih manin amah tenpih ngamlah kei in. [21] Amah in tapa khat hong nei ding a, tua tapa in ama mite a mawhna uh panin honkhia ding ahih manin ama min dingin Jesuh na phuak ding hi,” ci-in thu a gen hi. [22] Topa in kamsangpa tungtawnin a gensa thu a tun theih nadingin hih thute a piang ahi hi. Tua a genna-ah, [23] “Nungak khat gai-in tapa khat nei ding a, ama min dingin Emmanuel kiphuak ding hi,” ci hi. Emmanuel a khiatna in, eite tawh Pasian hong omkhawm hi, a cihna ahi hi. [24] Josef zong a khanlawh ciangin Topa’ vantungmi’ sawl bangin a zi a la hi. [25] Ahi zongin tua tapa a suah hun dongin a zi luppih lo a, a suah ciangin a min dingin Jesuh a phuak hi.

[1] Herod in Judea gamah kumpi a sep hun laitakin tua gam sung Bethlehem khua-ah Jesuh a suak hi. A suah khit phetin aksi thu lamsang a siam mi pawlkhat, nisuahna lam panin Jerusalem-ah hong tung uh a, [2] “Jew mite’ kumpi ding ahi naungek a hong suak pen koi lai-ah om ahi hiam? Nisuahna lam pan ama aksi hong suah ciangin ka mu uh a, amah a bia dingin a hong pai ka hi uh hi,” hong ci uh hi.

[6] Amaute in, “Kamsangpa in a lai gelhna sungah, ‘Judah gamah a om Bethlehem khua aw, ka mi Israel-te a uk dingin nangma sung panin ukpa khat hong piang ding ahih manin Judah gam a uk khuate lakah a neu na hi het kei hi,’ ci ahih manin Judea gam sung Bethlehem khua-ah suak ding hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.

[10] Tua aksi a muh uh ciangin a lungdamna uh kigen thei lo hi. [11] Inn sungah amaute lut uh a, naungek le a nu Mary a mu uh hi. Amaute khukdinin tua naungek a biak khit uh ciangin a vanpuakte uh suahkhia uh a, kham, saledi paknamtui, le myrrh paknamtuite, letsongin a pia uh hi. [12] Herod kiangah a kihilkik loh nadingun a mang sung uhah Pasian in hilh ahih manin, lampi dang tawnin a gam uhah a ciahkik uh hi. [13] Tua mipilte a ciah khit uh ciangin Josef’ mang sungah Topa’ vantungmi khat hong kilang a, “Kithawi-in naungek le a nu, Egypt gamah taipih in. Pai khia un, ci-in kong genkik matengin tua gamah va om un. Herod in naungek thah dingin hong zong ding hi,” a ci hi. [14] Josef zong kithawi pah a, Egypt gam a zuan dingin naungek le a nu tawh zanpi mahin ding khia uh a, [15] Herod a sih hun ciang dong tua gamah a va om uh hi. Kamsangpa tungtawnin Topa in, “Egypt gam panin ka Tapa ka samkhia hi,” ci-in a genna thu a tun nadingin hih bangin a piang ahi hi. [16] Nisuahna lam panin a hong pai mipilte in amah a khem lamtak Herod in a theih ciangin a heh suak mahmah hi. Tua mipilte tung panin aksi a kilat hun a dotna tawh kizui-in, Bethlehem khua le a kiima om naungek kum nih ciang le a nuaisiah khempeuh a that dingin a galkapte a sawl hi. [17] Hih bangin thu hong pian’ ciangin kamsangpa Jeremiah in, [18] “Nakpi taka kahna awging Ramah gam sungah kiza hi. Rachel in a tate kah a, a tate khempeuh si khin ahih manin a kah a tawp nadingin kikhem zo lo hi,” ci-in a genna thu a tun nading ahi hi.

[25] Ahi zongin Jesuh in amaute sam a, “Mi a uk Gentail-te in mite tungah aana nei uh a, mi a makai Gentail-te in thuneihna tawh a ukna thu na thei uh hi. [26] Ahi zongin note lakah tua bang hi lo ding hi. Note lakah a lian ahi dingte note’ nasem hi ding a, [27] note’ lakah a lianpen ahi dingte note’ sila hi ding hi. [28] Mihing Tapa zong nasem nei dingin hong pai hi loin mi dangte a’ ding na semin, mi tampi tat nading a si dingin a hong pai ahih mah bangin note zong a tuaci ding na hi uh hi,” a ci hi.
[14] Amah hong suah ciangin nang na lungdam mahmah ding a, midang tampite in zong hong lungdampih ding uh hi.

[26] Elizabeth a gaizawh kha guk a cin ciangin Pasian in Galilee gam Nazareth khua-ah vantungmi Gabriel a paisak hi. [27] Kumpi David’ suan Josef in zuthawl a piaksa Mary tungah thu a gen dingin a sawl ahi hi. [28] Vantung mi in Mary kiangah, “Na lungdam mahmah ding ahi hi. Topa in nang hong ompih a, thupha lianpi hong piazo hi,” a ci hi. [29] Mary in vantungmi’ thugen a zak ciangin, bang a cihnopna hi ding ahi hiam, ci-in lamdang a sa mahmah hi. [30] Tua ciangin vantungmi in, “Mary aw, lamdangsa-in lunghimawh kei in. Pasian’ maipha a ngah na hi hi. [31] Nang gai-in tapa khat na nei ding a, a min dingin Jesuh na phuak ding hi. [32] Amah milian hi ding a, A Lianpen Pasian’ Tapa kici ding hi. Topa Pasian in ama pu David mah bangin kumpi-in bawl ding a, [33] Jakob suanlekhakte’ kumpi hi paisuak ding a, ama ukna bei hun cih om ngei lo ding hi,” a ci hi. [34] Tua ciangin Mary in vantungmi kiangah, “Kei, pasal tawh a lumkhawm ngei nai lopi, hih thu bangci piantheih ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi. [35] Vantung mi in, “Nangma tungah Kha Siangtho hong tung ding a, nangma tungah Pasian’ vangliatna hong om ding hi. Tua ahih manin a hong suak ding a siangtho naungek pen Pasian’ Tapa kici ding hi.

[39] Tua khit a sawt loin Mary kithawi a, Judea mualtung gam a khua khatah a va paipah hi. [40] Zekhariah’ inn-ah lutin Elizabeth a hopih hi. [41] Elizabeth in Mary’ hopihna awging a zak ciangin a sunga a naupaii a hong diang hi. Elizabeth zong Kha Siangtho tawh hong kidim a, [42] nakpitakin kiko-in, “Numei khempeuh lakah thupha ngah pen nu na hi a, na neih ding naungek in thupha ngah ding hi. [43] Ka Topa’ nu kei kiangah hong hawh nadingin, bang hangin hih bang thu lian kei tungah hong tung ahi hiam? [44] Bang hang hiam cih leh nong hopihna awging ka zak phetin ka sunga naungek nuamin a diang hi. [45] Topa in nang tungah a hong gen thute hong tung taktak ding hi, ci-a upna pen nang a dingin a lungdamhuai mahmah ahi hi,” a ci hi. [46] Tua ciangin Mary in, “Ka lungsim in Topa phat a, [47] hong Hon Pasian’ hangin ka nuam mahmah hi.

[7] Zintun nading mun dang khempeuh mi dim khinta ahih manin ganbukah tung uh a, a tacil ahi ta pasal khat nei-in, puan tawh tunin gan annekna kuang sungah a sial hi. [8] Tua hun laitakin gamlakah a tuuhonte a giahpih tuucing pawlkhat a om uh hi. [9] Amaute kiangah Topa’ vantungmi khat hong kilang a, Topa’ minthanna vang in amaute hong taan ahih manin a lau mahmah uh hi. [10] Ahi zongin vantungmi in, “Lau kei un. Mi khempeuh a lungdamsak ding thuthak hoih khat note a’ ding ka hong puak hi. [11] Tuni-in David khuapi sungah, note a hong honkhia ding Khrih Topa a suak hi. [12] Amah na theih nading uh a lim hih bang hi ding hi: Puan tawh kitun naungek khat, gan annekna kuang sungah a kisial na mu ding uh hi,” a ci hi. [13] Tua khit phetin tua vantungmi tawh vantung mihonpite thakhatin hong omin Pasian phatna la sa uh a, [14] “Van a sang belna-ah a om Pasian’ min thang hen la, ama pahtak leitung mite tungah nopna om ta hen,” a ci uh hi. [15] Vantung mite vantungah a ciahkik khit uh ciangin tuucingte in, “Bethlehem khua-ah pai-in, Topa’ hong gen hih thupiang va en ni,” a kici uh hi. [16] Amaute nawhpai mahmah uh a, Mary le Josef le gan annekna kuang sungah a kisial naungek a mupah uh hi.

[14] Tua Thu mihing hong suakin kote lakah hong om a, itna nei-in citak mahmah ahih manin Pasian’ pianzia a neihna ka mu cian uh hi. Hih pianzia pen Pasian’ Tapa khat bek hihna tawh a neih pianzia ahi hi.
[16] Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawn loin a hin tawntung theih nadingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi.
[3] A Pa in ama khut sungah vangliatna khempeuh a piakna le Pasian in amah a sawl mah bangin tu-in Pasian kiangah a paikik ding ahihna thu zong a thei hi.

[27] Note tungah keima neih bang lungnopna ka hong pia ding hi. Tua ka hong piak ding lungnopna pen leitung mite in a piaktheih a kip lo lungnopnate pawl hi lo hi. Tua ahih manin lau kei unla, zong lungkham kei un.

[33] Keimah tawh na hong kipawlna uh hangin lungnopna na neihtheihna dingun hih thu a hong gen ka hi hi. Leitung gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Ahi zongin keimah in leitung nate zo khinta ka hih manin lungnuamin om un,” a ci hi.
[31] Israel mite kisik kikin Pasian in a mawhna uh a maisak theih nadingin Ukpi le Honpa-in tua Jesuh bawlin ama taklamah a tusak hi.

[35] Topa Jesuh mahmah in, ‘Ngahna sangin piak khiatna-ah lungdamna lianzaw hi,’ a cihna phawkkawmin nakpitakin nasepna tawh na khempeuhah a zawngkhalte huh ding hi hang, ci-in note kiangah kong lak khinzo hi,” ci-in a vaikhak hi.
[23] Bang hang hiam cih leh mawhna in thaman hong piak pen sihna hi a, ahi zongin i Topa Jesuh tawh i kipawl manin Pasian’ hong piakkhong pen nuntak tawntungna ahi hi.

[7] Pasian in piaknopna lungsim tawh a pia mite bek deih ahih manin, a kuamah peuh in na lungsim sung uhah na ngaihsutsa zah ciat uh na pia unla, pia nuam lopipi le sawlzawh thu bek tawh na pia kei un.
[15] A manphatna a kigen zo lo Pasian’ hong piak hih thupha hangin Pasian tungah i lungdamna ko ciat ni.

[4] Ahi zongin a hun a cin ciangin eite khempeuh Pasian’ tate i suahtheih nadingin Thukham nuai-ah a om mite a hong tankhia dingin Pasian in a Tapa hong paisak a, tua Tapa pen leitung ngeina bangin numei sung panin hong suakin, Jew Thukham sungah hong nungta hi. [5] Ahi zongin a hun a cin ciangin eite khempeuh Pasian’ tate i suahtheih nadingin Thukham nuai-ah a om mite a hong tankhia dingin Pasian in a Tapa hong paisak a, tua Tapa pen leitung ngeina bangin numei sung panin hong suakin, Jew Thukham sungah hong nungta hi.

[8] Amah hong kiniamkhiat tawm a, singlamteh tung nangawnah sih ding a ut hi. [9] Hih thu hangin Pasian in a lianpenin amah koih a, min lian dang khempeuh sangin a min lianzaw-in a koih hi. [10] Tua ahih manin vantung, leitung, leinuai-a om mi khempeuh in Jesuh pahtawi-in khukdin ding uh a,
[16] Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn, biakna pawite, Khadet pawi, le Sabbath ni tawh kisai-in kuamah in ngeina zuih ding bawl kei un.
[14] I Topa pen Judah suan sung panin a piang ahih manin Moses in siampi thu a na gen ciangin hih Judah minam genin na nei lo hi.
[11] Tu-in Pasian’ teci panna in: Pasian in ama Tapa tungtawnin eite tungah nuntak tawntungna a hong pia hi.
[26] Laban in, “A u’ ma-in a nauzaw piak ding ko’ gamah ngeina hi lo hi.

[8] Moses in, “Ama tungah na phunnate uh TOPA in a zakna hangin, TOPA in note’ tungah nitak an nek ding sa, zingsangin na kham tak uha na nek ding uh an hong piak ciangin - kote pen a bang hi mawk ka hi uh hiam? Note’ phunnate pen kote’ tung hi loin TOPA’ tung ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[6] Ama mai-ah TOPA pai-in, “TOPA, TOPA, hehpihna nei-in a dik Pasian; lungduai-in itna kip le thutakna tawh a dim;
[27] “Hih a gi lo mihonte in bang tanvei kei hong phunsan ding uh ahi hiam? Israel mite in kei hong phunsanna ka za khin hi.

[8] Amah in Samuel’ seh hun, ni sagih sung a ngak hi. Ahih hangin Gilgal-ah Samuel hong pai lo a, ama kiang panin mite kithehthang hi. [9] Tua ahih ciangin Saul in, “Meihal biakna le thunuama biakna hih lai kei kiangah hong paipih un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in meihal biakna a pia hi. [10] Meihal biakna a piak a man khit phetin Samuel hong tung a, amah a dawn ding le a hopih dingin Saul paikhia hi. [11] Samuel in, “Bang hih na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Saul in, “Kei kiang panin mite kithehthangin, a ni kiseh sungin nang lah hong tung lo a, Mikmash-ah Filistia-te a kikhopna ka muh ciangin [12] keimah in, ‘Tu-in Filistia-te keimah hong hih dingin Gilgal-ah hong paisuk ding uh a, keimah in TOPA’ maipha ka ngen nai kei hi,’ ka ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin kei mahmah kisawl tawmin meihal biakna ka pia hi,” a ci hi. [13] Tua ciangin Samuel in Saul kiangah, “Na hai gamtat hi; TOPA na Pasian’ hong thupiakna na zui kei hi; bang hang hiam cih le TOPA in Israel-te tungah kumpi dingin nang le na suanlekhakte a kipsaksuak ding ahi hi. [14] Ahih hangin tu-in na ukna kizomsuak lo ding a, TOPA in ama lungsim bangin mi khat zong khin hi. TOPA in nang hong thupiak zui lo na hih manin ama mite tungah ulian dingin TOPA in amah seh khin hi,” a ci hi.

[30] Kum tampi sung lungduaina tawh amaute na thuak a, na kamsangte tungtawnin amaute na hilh hi. Ahi zongin amaute in ngai nuam lo uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin gamdang mite’ khut sungah amaute na pia hi. [31] Ahi ta zongin na hehpihna lian hangin amaute beisak loin, zong na nusia kei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh dikna le hehpihna a nei na hi hi.
[5] Ama hehna tomno sung bek hi a, ama hong deihsakna pen khang tawntung ading ahi hi. Zan hun sungteng kahna omkha mah ding a, ahih hangin zing khuavak tawh nuamna hong tung hi.

[7] TOPA’ mai-ah khawl dide inla, lungduai takin ngak in. A hihna a daupai pa tung le siatna a bawlpa tungah kilungso tawmsak ke’n! [8] Hehna panin kikham inla, sinsona nusia in. Nangmah kilungso tawmsak ke’n; tua in siatna bekah a hong paipih hi. [9] Bang hang hiam cih leh migilote kipuaseh ding a, ahih hangin TOPA a ngakte in leitung luah ding uh hi. [10] Ahih hangin tawlkhat sungin migilo pa om nawn lo ding a, ama omna mun na lim zon mahmah hangin tua lai-ah amah na om lo ding hi. [11] Ahih hangin lungnemte in leitung luahin, genzawh lohin amaute nuamsa ding uh hi.
[1] TOPA lamenin ka ngak ngiungeu a, amah kei lam hong nga-in ka kikona aw hong za hi.
[10] “Om hithiat unla, Pasian ka hihna thei un. Minamte lakah keimah hong kisangsak a, leitung khempeuhah ka min hong kithangsak hi,” a ci hi.
[2] A hun ka sehsa ni ciangin thu a manin ka khen ding hi.
[38] Ahi zongin amah in hehpihna lungsim nei ahih manin amau’ khialhnate maisakin, amaute susia lo hi. Amah in a hehna ip zelzel a, a hehna khempeuh phongkhia lo hi.
[15] Ahih hangin Topa aw, nang pen a hehpih thei, a dik Pasian na hi a, heh hak mahmahin, itna kip le thumanna tawh a kidim na hi hi.
[8] TOPA dikin hehpihna tawh kidim a, heh hakin, a lian mahmah itna kip tawh a kidim hi.
[5] TOPA’ hong huh ding lawpna tawh ka ngak a, ama thugen ka muang hi. [6] Galvilte in zingsang hun ding a ngaklah sangin galvilte in phalvak hun ding a ngaklah sangin, TOPA ka ngaklah zaw hi.
[8] TOPA dikin hehpihna nei a, heh hak mahmahin itna kip lianpi a nei hi.
[17] A lungtom mite hai gamtat a, mipilte lungduai hi.
[29] A lungduaite mipil hi a, lungtomna pen haina kilatna ahi hi.
[18] Lungtomna in kitotna piangsak a, lungduaina in kilemna piangsak hi.
[32] Thahatna sangin lungduaina hoihzaw a, khuapi khat ukzawhna sangin eimah ki-ukzawhna hoihzaw hi.
[11] Pilna in mi lungduaisak a, mi’ hong hehsaknate kiphawkmawh bawlna in minthanna ahi hi.
[15] Lungduai a zolzolna tawh gam ukte kizo thei a, kam nemin pauna tawh aana neite kizo thei hi.
[8] Thu khatpeuh a kipatna sangin a tawpna hoihzaw a, kiphatsakna sangin lungduaina hoihzaw hi. [9] Heh pahpah kei in; hehna a haihuai ahi hi.

[18] Tua ahih ciangin note hong hehpih nuamin TOPA in hong ngak a, note tungah hehpihna hong lah ding amah kipakta hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA pen a thutang Pasian hi a, amah a muangte khempeuh thupha ngah ahi hi.

[14] Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: “Sauveipi sung bangmah hih loin ka om a, keimah le keimah kikhamcipin ka om hithiat hi. Tu-in ahihleh numei nausuak ding bangin ka kikokhia ding a, ka kam ka-in ka tungnak ding hi.
[9] Note khempeuh kong suksiat khak loh nadingin ka min ka ngaihsutna tawh ka hehna diahin, keimah hong kiphatna ka ngaihsutna-in note tungah ka ki-ip hi.

[15] Tua ciangin keimah in: TOPA aw, nang na thei hi. Hong phawk inla hong veh in. Kei a hong bawlsiate tungah phu hong laksak in. Ka galte tungah na lungduaina hangin kei’ sih nading piangsak kei in. Nangma hangin minsiatna a thuak ka hihlam hong thei in.

[22] TOPA in na hoih lohnate uh le na bawl uh kihhuainate hangin note hong thuakzo nawn lo hi. Tua ahih manin tuni mahmahin zong na gam uh gamlak suakkhin a, mite’ kihamsiatna suakin kuamah teng nawn lo hi.
[26] Tua ahih ciangin thuakzawhna tawh ngak kenkanzo lehang a hoihpen ahi hi. A hong hotkhiat ding amah ngak ni. [27] Na khangno lai-in thuakzawh hat ding kisin leteh hoihpen hi.
[17] “Ahi zongin amaute ka khasiat a, gamlakah amaute ka susia kei a, ka maimangsak kei hi.

[13] Na dah taktakna uh lungkhamna tawh langsak unla, na puante uh a balkek bek hi kei un,” hong ci hi. TOPA, note’ Pasian kiangah ciahkik un. Amah migi mahmahin hehpihna a nei hi a, a lungduai-in hong huh nuam tawntung a, gim hong pia loin hong maisak nuam tawntung hi.

[2] TOPA’ kiangah thu ngen a, “Kong thum hi, TOPA aw; ka gam sungah ka omlai pekin hici mah in teh, ci hi lo ka hi hiam? Hanciamin Tarshish khua-ah ka taisimna zong tua hang mah ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nang pen a hehpih thei Pasian, a hehhak, a migi mahmah, siatna tunsak ding a kisiknuam Pasian na hihna kong thei hi.
[19] Kote nong khasiat kik ding a, ka mawhnate uh hong sawpkhiat sakin, tuipi taw-ah nong paihsak ding hi.

[3] TOPA lungduai mahmah a, a vang zong lian mahmah a, ahih hangin mimawhte khahkhong ngei lo hi. A paina peuhpeuhah huihpi nungin pingpei kipei a, ama paina hanga leivui leeng meiipi kai tawh kibang hi.

[3] Hih thu a tunna ding hun hi pah nai lo ahih manin lai-in ciamteh in. Ahi zongin hong tung baihta ding a, kong lah khempeuh a manin hong tung ding hi. A tung hak tawh a kibangkha ahi zongin ngak keikai in. Ka seh hun a cin ciangin hong tung takpi ding a, zekai lua nawn lo ding hi.

[17] Thu na gengenna uh tawh TOPA na gimsak uh hi. Note in, “Bangci gimsak ka hi uh hiam?” na ci uh hi. “ TOPA in a sia-in a gamtate a hoihin ngaihsun a, zong itin amaute tungah lungkim takpi hi,” na cihna khawng uhleh, “Thutang a gen Pasian koi lai-ah om ahi hiam?” ci-in na dotnate uh tawh na gimsak uh hi.
[5] A lungnem mite in Pasian’ ciamsa leitang ngah ding uh ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.

[38] “Note in, ‘Mittang khat tang ding mittang khat, ha khat tang ding ha khat,’ ci-in a kigenna na zaksa uh ahi hi. [39] Ahi zongin note kiangah ke’n kong genin-ah: A gilote na thukkik kei un. Mi khatpeuh in na paang taklam hong bet leh a langkhat zong na dawh lai zaw in.

[26] Tua ahih manin a nasempa zong a mai-ah hong bokin thum a, ‘Topa aw, hong ngak lai in; a vekpi-in ka hong loh ding hi,’ ci-in a thum hi. [27] Kumpipa in khasiathuai sa ahih manin a leiba teng maisakin a khah hi. [28] “Ahi zongin tua nasempa a paikhiat ciangin ama sum ngun peek zakhat khawng a ba a naseppih dang khat tawh a kituak hi. Tua pa a gawlin manin, ‘Na leiba hong loh in,’ a ci hi. [29] A naseppih pa zong a mai-ah bokin hong thum a, ‘Hong ngak lai in; ka hong loh ding hi,’ a ci hi.

[13] “Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Note in vantung ki-ukna sungah mite a lut theih loh nadingin kong na khakcip uh hi. Note lah na lutnuam kei uh a, a lutnuamte lah na lutsak kei uh hi.
[42] Tua ahih ciangin bang hunin na Topa uh hong pai ding cih thei lo na hih manun na pilvang un.
[4] Amaute tawh a omkhawm laitakin amah in amaute kiangah, “Jerusalem khua panin paikhia kei unla, note kiangah ka hong gensa ka Pa’ hong kamciam thu na ngak un.

[3] Midangte a mawhna hangin thu khenin, no zong tua amau mawhnate mah na bawl veve uh ciangin Pasian’ thukhenna tawh kipelh tuan dingin ki-um peuhmah na hi uh hiam? [4] Pasian migi-in thu a diah hithiatna pen na kisikkik theih nading uh a deihna ahih lamtak phawkkha loin, a migitna, a lungduaina, a hong thuaknate neu ngaihsutkha na hi uh hiam? [5] Lungsim khauhin na kisik nop lohna hangun Pasian’ hehna le a manin a thukhenna a hong kilat Ni ding ciangin na gimthuak ding uh a nasia semsem dingin a bawl na hi uh hi. [6] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in mi khempeuh a gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in thukkik ding hi. [7] Pahtakna, minthanna, le hin tawntungna deihin a gamtat hoih tawntung mite tungah Pasian in nuntak tawntungna pia ding a,

[3] Haksatna i thuak laitak nangawnin i lungdam veve hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh haksatna in thuakzawh hatna piangsak a, [4] thuakzawh hatna in Pasian’ pahtakna hong ngahsak a, ama hong pahtakna in lametna lianpi hong neisak ahihna thu i thei hi.

[24] Hih bangin lamenin i upna in eite hong honkhia khin hi. Ahi zongin i lamet pen i muh ciangin tua pen lamet hi nawn lo hi. Kua in a muhsa nate lamen nawn ahi hiam? [25] I muh lohte i lamet ciangin lungduaitakin i ngak thei hi. [26] Tua ahih manin eite bangzahin ginalo hitalehang eite a hong huh dingin Kha Siangtho a hong pai hi. Eite in a kilawm bangin thunget ding nangawn i thei kei a, ahi zongin Kha Siangtho mah in tauna tawh eite a dingin a hong thumsak hi.

[22] Tua mah bangin Pasian in zong a beisa hunah siatna a thuak dingin a kilawm mite susia loin a ki-ipipna mite tungah a hehna le a vangliatna a lahtheih nading thu a neih mah bangin, [23] ama minthanna a lahtheih nadingin ama minthanna a ngah dingin a hong sehsa eite tungah zong ama hehpihna a hong piaktheih nading thu a nei hi.
[12] Lamet na neihna hangun lungdamin om tawntung unla, lungkhamna na thuak uh ciangin lungduai-in thu na ngen tawntung un.

[4] Lai Siangtho sungah a om thu khempeuh pen eite hilh nading, eite in lametna nei-in i thuakzawh nading, le i thahat theih nadingin a kigelh ahi hi. [5] Note in lungsim kikhatin i Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pa ahi Pasian na phatkhawm theih nadingun Pasian in thuakzawhna le thahatna hong pia hen la, Jesuh Khrih deihna bangin gamta-in khatlekhat kithutuak takin hong omsak tahen.

[5] Tua ahih manin a hun a tunma-in kuamah mawhsakin thu khen kei un. Topa hong pai ciangin a tawpna thukhenna hong om ding a, amah in thusimte hong pholakin, mihingte in a lungsim sung uhah a ipcip uh thute hong telkheh ding hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in amau’ ngah dingin a kilawm phatna, Pasian’ kiang panin a ngah ciat ding uh hi.

[4] Itna neite a lungduai-in migi hi. Itna neite in hazatna lungsim nei loin, zong kisathei lo hi. [5] Itna neite a kilawm loin gamta lo, heh pakpak lo, mite’ mawhna ciamteh lo hi. [6] Thuman lote-ah lungdam ngei lo uh a, thumante bekah lungdam uh hi. [7] Itna neite lungkia cih om ngei lo hi; a upna, a lametna, lungduai takin a ngaknate uh a mawkna cih om ngei lo hi.

[4] Tua ahih manin ka sepna khempeuh uhah Pasian’ nasemte ka hihna uh ka kilangsak uh a, lungduai takin gimna, haksatna, lungkhamnate ka thuak uh hi. [5] Kote hong kisatin, thongah hong kikhia-in, mihonpi in hong hihgawp uh hi; nakpitakin na semin, an ne lo, ihmu lo liangin ka om uh hi. [6] Siangtho takin nuntakna, thu theihna, lungduaina, migitna, Kha Siangtho’ huhna, itna taktak neihna,

[22] Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho’ sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna, [23] dikna le pumpi ki-ukzawhna hi a, hih bangin a gamta mite, Thukham in bangmah cih thei lo hi.
[9] Tua ahih manin na hoih sep ding cimtak kei ni. Lungkia loin i sep nakleh a hun ciangin thaman i ngah ding hi.

[1] Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ na ka sepna hangin thong a kia keimah in note’ nuntakzia dingin a hong deihna tawh a kilawm a kituakin na nuntak nadingun ka hong hanthawn hi. [2] Kiniamkhiatin, thunemin, lungduai-in om tawntung un. Khatlekhat kihuhna tawh na ki-itna uh kilangsak un.

[11] Note in lungduai maitai takin thuakzo-in, khuavak gam sungah a om Pasian’ mite tawh nopsakna a ngahkhawm thei dingin a hong bawl i Pa tungah lungdamna na koh theih nadingun a minthang ama vangliatna in note tungah thahatna hong guan tahen.
[12] Pasian in note hong itin, hong teelin, ama mi siangthote hikhin na hih manun note pen hehpihna nei-in, migi-in, kiniamkhiatin, dikin, na lungduai ding uh ahi hi.

[3] Bang hang hiam cih leh i Pa Pasian kiangah thu ka nget simun note’ upna hangin na nuntakziate uh, itna na neih manun nakpitakin na nasepnate uh le i Topa Jesuh Khrih hong paikik ding lametna na neih manun kiptakin na omnate uh ka phawk tawntung uh hi.

[4] Bawlsiatna le gimna na thuakna khempeuh uhah na upna uh khahsuah loin thuakzo paisuak na hih manun midangte kiangah Pasian’ pawlpi ka na kisialhpih uh hi. [5] Tu-a na thuaknate uh hangin Pasian’ Ukna sungah a om dingin a kilawm mi suak na hih manun Pasian’ thukhenna a man ahihna hong kilangsak hi.
[5] Pasian bangin itna nei-in Khrih thuak bangin na thuakzawh nadingun Topa in note lungsim hong bawlsak tahen.

[16] A mawhnei pha bel ka hihna thu hang mahin, nidang ciangin amah umin nuntak tawntungna a ngah ding mite’ etteh theih dingin Khrih Jesuh in a lungduaina cingtakin kei tungah hong lahtheih nadingin Pasian in kei a hong hehpih ahi hi.

[10] Sum deihluatna in siatna namkim piangsak hi. Mi pawlkhat in sum deihlua liang uh ahih manin a upna panun pialkhia-in gimna lungkhamna tampi a thuaklawh uh hi. [11] Ahi zongin Pasian’ mi ahi nangmah in tua thute khempeuh pelh inla, thuman thutak, Pasian’ deih bangin nuntakna, upna, itna, kipna, le lungnemna na neihzawh nadingin hanciam in.

[24] Topa’ na a sem mite, kitot a hatte hi lo ding a, mi khempeuh tungah lungsim nemin, thugen siamin, thuakzawhna nei-in, [25] thunem tawh a langte’ hoih lohna a puahtheite hi ding hi. Tua bang hileh Pasian in amaute kisiksak thei ding a, thuman thutak hong thei-in, [26] Dawimangpa in ama deihna bangin a gamta dingin a mat khit hangin ama thang panin amaute suakta khathei ding uh hi.
[10] Ahi zongin nangmah in ahihleh ka thuhilhna, ka gamtatna, le ka nuntakna-ah ka ngim ka tup thute na hong zui hi. Ka upna, ka lungduaina, itna ka neihna, ka lungkipna,

[2] Pasal khanghamte a kilawm a kituakin a omtheih nading, thu ngaihsun thei mi ahih nading, a kikemzo mite ahih theih nading, upna man a neihtheih nading, itna man a neihtheih nading uh le a manin lungkipin a thuakzawh nadingun na gen in.

[12] Note thadah loin upna le lungduaina a nei mite bangin, Pasian’ hong ciamsa thu na ngah nadingun ka hong deihsak uh hi. [13] Pasian in Abraham’ tungah thu a ciam ciangin a tunsak takpi ding bek thu a ciam hi. Thu a ciam ciangin zong amah sangin a lianzaw kuamah om nawn lo ahih manin ama min tawh thu ciam a, [14] “Nang thupha hong pia-in suanlekhak tampi a nei dingin ka hong ciam hi,” a ci hi. [15] Abraham in lungduai takin na ngak ahih manin Pasian’ thuciam a ngah hi.
[36] Pasian’ deihna bangin gamta-in, ama thuciam na ngahtheih nadingun lungduai-in thuakzawhna na kisam uh hi.

[3] Tua bangin na upna uh hong kize-etna na thuakzawh uh ciangin na kipna uh hong kilangsak ahihna thu na thei uh hi. [4] A kisam bangmah om loin a cingtaak na suahtheih nadingun na thuakna uh hangin a tawntungin na kip paisuak nadingun na ngaihsun un.

[19] Sanggamte aw, note in na theih ding uh ka deih thu in: Thu kigen khempeuh hoihtakin ngai pahpah un. Ahi zongin pau pahpah kei unla, heh pakpak kei un. [20] Mihingte’ hehna in Pasian’ sep ding thuhoihte khaktan hi.

[6] A thuman mite mawhsakin na that uh a, amaute in na thu uh hong nial zo lo uh hi. [7] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Topa hong pai matengin lungduai takin om un. Lo khote in zong a lo panun an a ngahtheih nadingun lungduai takin khuapi guah le tuk guah a ngakna thu thei un. [8] Note zong na lungduai un. Topa hong pai ding hun naita ahih manin na lungsim uh na thahatsak un. [9] Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note tungah thu hong khenkhak loh nadingin khatlekhat na kiphunsan kei un. Thukhen ding pa hong nai mahmah ta a, hong tung dektak ta hi. [10] Sanggamte aw, Topa’ min tawh thu a gen kamsangte na phawk un. Gimna a thuak laitakun lungduai-in a thuaknate uh na etteh un. [11] Tua bangin a thuak mite a hampha mahmah hi, i ci hi. Job in a thuakna-ah a lungduaina na thei uh a, Topa in dikna le hehpihna nei ahih manin a tawpna-ah Job tungah a piak thuphate na thei uh hi.

[20] Note na gamtat khialhna uh hangin hong kisat ciangin lungduai takin na thuak manun bangmah phattuamna om lo hi. Ahi zongin a manin gamta napi-in gimna na thuak uh ciangin lungduai takin na thuak uhleh Pasian in thupha hong pia ding hi. [21] Khrih mahmah in zong note a dingin thuakin, ama khekhap na zuihtheih nadingun etteh ding lim hong nusiat ahih manin hih bangin a thuak ding mahin Pasian in note a hong sam ahi hi.
[20] Noah in teembaw a bawl hun laitakin Pasian in lungduai takin ngak hinapi-in hih kha a nei mite pawlkhat in Pasian’ thu mang lo uh hi. Teembaw sungah a om mi giat bek, tui in a suaktasak hi.

[9] Mi pawlkhatte’ ngaihsut bangin Topa in a kamciamna a hong tungsak hak hi zenzen lo hi. Note khat beek in siatna na thuakkhak ding uh deih loin na vekpi-un na kisik ding uh deih ahih manin hong pai nai lohna pen note hong khualna hizaw hi.

[9] Note’ sanggam keimah Johan in Jesuh tawh kipawlna hangin note mah bangin bawlsiatna thuakin, Pasian’ Ukna sungah omin, lungduai takin a thuak mipa ka hi hi. Pasian’ thu le Jesuh’ hong gen thumante ka genna hangin Patmos a kici tuikulh-ah kei hong kikoih hi.

[2] “Note’ nasepna, na gimna uh le lungduai takin na thuakna uh, le migilote koihmawk loin, sawltak hi lo napi-in sawltak hi ung, a ci mite dongtelin sawltak ahihlohna uh na muhkhiatnate uh ka thei hi. [3] Note in lungduai takin thuakin, keima min hangin thuakzo-in, lungkia hetloin na omna uh ka thei hi.
[19] Note’ gamtatna, itna na neihna, upna na neihna, na nasepna, lungduai takin na thuakna uh, le a kipatcil lai sangin a nunung lamah na hoihzawknate uh ka thei hi.

[9] Jew mi hi lo napi-in Jew mi hi ung, ci-in zuau a gen Satan’ pawlte, note’ mai-ah hong paisakin na khephung uhah ka boksak ding a, note ka hong itna thu amaute ka theisak ding hi. [10] Note in lungduai takin na thuak nading uh ka hong thupiakna zui na hih manun leitung a a om mi khempeuh ze-et nadingin leitung bupah a hong tung ding lungkhamna panin kei zong note ka hong suaktasak ding hi.
[14] TOPA in note a dingin hong dosak ding a, note ahihleh na om hithiat ding uh hi bek hi,” a ci hi.
[7] A man lopi a mi mawhsak ding panin kikem unla, a dikpa le thuman pa that kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh a gilo mi ka khah kei ding hi.
