[1] TOPA pen tuucin bangin hong cing hi a, kisapna teng kicing ta hi. [2] Lo nona-ah hong lumsak a, tuidam kiangah hong paipih hi. [3] Thahatna thak kei hong guan hi. A hong ciamsa mah bangin-ah lampi manah kei hong kha hi. [4] TOPA aw, kei hong ompih na hih manin khuamial thukpi ka nawk hangin ka lau kei hi. Na molhtum le na ciangkhut in kei hong hu hi. [5] Keima galte’ muhna munah an nong lui hi. Thupi takin nong pahtawi a, keima hai zong dimlet ta hi. [1] TOPA, ka khuavak le hong honpa ahi hi. Kua kihta ding ka hi hiam? TOPA, kei a dingin munmuanhuai ahi hi. Bang laupih ding ka hi hiam?

[20] TOPA i ngak hi; amah pen eite hong huhpa le i lum ahi hi. [21] Ama min siangtho eite in muang ihih manin ama sungah i lungdam hi. [22] TOPA aw, nang kong lamet uh mah bangin kote’ tungah na itna kip hong omsak in.
[4] Keimah in TOPA ka zong a, amah in kei hong dawngin, ka launa khempeuh panin kei hong honkhia hi.

Amah muang in; amah in hong sem ding hi. [6] Amah in nangma dikna khuavak bangin, nangma thumanna nitaang bangin hong langsak ding hi. [7] TOPA’ mai-ah khawl dide inla, lungduai takin ngak in. A hihna a daupai pa tung le siatna a bawlpa tungah kilungso tawmsak ke’n!
[5] Bang hangin khakunkun a, lunghimawh niloh ka hi hiam? Pasian’ sungah lametna nei ning; bang hang hiam cih leh kei a hong huh ka Pasian ka phatkik ngawn ding hi.

[1] Pasian, i belh leh i thahatna hi a, haksat hunin a hong huh pahpah pa ahi hi. [2] Tua ahih ciangin, leitung kikhinin, mualte tuipi sung a kidenna zongin, a tuite ging zuazua-in phuan zuazua a, hih ginna hangin mual liante a ling zongin, i lau kei ding hi. [3] Tua ahih ciangin, leitung kikhinin, mualte tuipi sung a kidenna zongin, a tuite ging zuazua-in phuan zuazua a, hih ginna hangin mual liante a ling zongin, i lau kei ding hi.

[11] lunghihmawhna khat zong nei hetloin Pasian ka muang hi. Mihing lellelte in kei, bang hong cihzo ding ahi uh hiam?

[5] Amah bek ka muan ahih manin, daitakin Pasian bek ka ngak hi.

[8] Vanglian TOPA Pasian aw, na khempeuhah na thutak a, nangmah bangin a vanglian kua om ahi hiam, TOPA aw. [9] Nang in tuipi khang na uk a, a tuihualte a san ciangin na daisak hi.

[1] Sangpenpa’ liahna sung, Vanglianpa’ liim sungah a om mi khempeuh in [2] TOPA’ tungah, “Ka bukna le ka munkip muanhuai, ka muan ka Pasian na hi hi,” ci ding uh hi. [3] Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in thangsiah pa’ thangzak le a lauhuai pulnatna panin nang hong honkhia ding hi. [4] Amah in a khate tawh nang hong tuam ding a, ama khate’ nuai-ah bukna ding na mu ding hi. Ama thumanna in nang hong dalin hong hu ding hi. [5] Nangmah in zan a lauhuaina, sun-a thaltang leengte, khuamial lakah a vak khiankhian pulnatna, sun nitaang a suksiatnate na kihta kei ding hi. [6] Nangmah in zan a lauhuaina, sun-a thaltang leengte, khuamial lakah a vak khiankhian pulnatna, sun nitaang a suksiatnate na kihta kei ding hi. [7] Na kiangah mi tulkhat, na kimkotah mi tul sawm, hong tukin a sih hangin bangmah na ci kei ding hi.

[13] Tua ciangin amaute in a lungkhamna uhah TOPA ko uh a, amau’ cihmawhna panin amah in a honkhia hi. [14] Amah in khuamial sung le a zing sung panin amaute lakhia a, amau a kihennate a botsat hi. [15] Ama itna kip le mihing tate tungah a lamdang a nasepnate hangin amaute in TOPA tungah lungdamna ko ta uh hen.
[29] Amah in huihpi daisak a, tuipi hualte a bei hi. [30] Tua ciangin, tua tuihualte a khawl manin amaute a lungdam uh hi. Amah in amaute’ utna khua-ah a paipih hi.
[28] Dahna in kei hong vukcip hi. Nangma thu omsa bangin kei hong thakhauhsak in.

[1] Keimah in mualtung lam ka ento hi. Keimah huhna koi lai pan hong pai ding ahi hiam? [2] Van le lei a bawl TOPA’ kiang panin keimah huhna hong pai hi. Sakol tung tuangin manlang takin i tai ding hi,” ci na hih uh ciangin note na taikhia ding uh hi. “Sakol zaptel tungah i tuang ding hi,” ci na hih uh ciangin note hong delh mite zong zaptel ding hi.

[18] Tua ahih ciangin note hong hehpih nuamin TOPA in hong ngak a, note tungah hehpihna hong lah ding amah kipakta hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA pen a thutang Pasian hi a, amah a muangte khempeuh thupha ngah ahi hi.

Na min tawh kong sam khinzo a, nang pen kei-a’ na hi hi. [2] Tuite na kantan ciangin nang kong ompih ding a, gunte na kantan ciangin tui in hong tuum lo ding hi. [11] Amaute in lungkhamna tuipi a phutkhak uh ciangin keimah in tuihualte ka vatmai ding a, Nail gun tuithukte kangcip ding hi. Assiria mite ka niamkhiat ding a, Egypt in a vangliatna taan ding hi.

[25] “Tua ahih ciangin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na nuntak nadingun bang ne-in bang dawn ding cih ahi a, na pumpi uh a dingin bang silh ding cih ahi zongin lunghimawh lua kei un. [26] “Vanah a leeng vasate ngaihsun dih un: Amaute in khai tuh lo, an zong la lo, sal sungah zong khol lo napi-in vantungah a om na Pa un tuate a nek ding uh tasamsak lo hi. Tua vasate sangin note manphazaw thampek hi lo na hi uh hiam? [27] Na lunghihmawh manun kua in na khan uh kum bangzah sotto thei na hi uh hiam?

[31] Tua ahih manin bang ne ding a, bang dawn ding a, bang silh ding ihi hiam, ci-in lunghimawh lua kei un. [32] (Gentail mite in lunghihmawh penin a neihte uh hih bangte ahi hi.) Hih nate khempeuh na kisap lamtak uh vantungah a om na Pa un a thei hi. [33] Thudang khempeuh sangin Pasian’ ukna le ama deihna na zuih theih nading uh thupi ngaihsut masazaw un. Tua hileh hih na kisapna dangte khempeuh uh zong hong piathuah veve ding hi. [34] “Tua ahih manin zing ciang huna ding ma lungkham masa kei un. Zing ciang thu ding ama thu-in omsak lel un. [28] “Na semin vangik pua-in a gim mite khempeuh aw, ka kiangah hong pai ta un. Note tungah lungsim tawldamna ka hong pia ding hi. [29] Keima hakkol zamin kisuan unla, kei kiangah hong kisin dih un. [4] Ama hangin kahna hun a bei ciangin Josef in Faro’ innkuante kiangah, “Tu-in note’ mai-ah maipha ka ngah leh Faro’ kiangah thu nong va gensak ding uh kong thum hi.

[12] Nisuahna pen nitumna panin a gamlat mah bangin i mawhna hangin gimnate eite’ kiang panin gamlapi-ah a nilkhia hi.
[4] Ahih hangin nangmah hong kizahtak theih nadingin nangmah in mawhna na maisak hi.
