[9] Mi’ khialhna a maisakte midangte in itin lawm hau uh a, mi’ khialhna ciaptehna pen lawm taanna ahi hi.

[18] TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Tu-in hong pai unla, thu kikumkhawm ni. Na mawhnate uh puansan a bat hangin vuk bangin hong ngo ding hi. Na mawhnate uh si bangin a san hangin tuumul bangin hong kang ding hi.

[25] Na thupalsatnate hong paihkhiatsak pa pen keimah ka hi a, kei ka hih manin na khialhnate ka ciamteh kei ding hi. [26] “Thuman na hihna hong laktel inla, thu kikum khawm ni. Na dikna a kilat nadingin na thu hong sungkhia in.

[7] Migilo in ama gitlohna nusia hen la, thuman lo mi in ama ngaihsutna nusia hen. Amah in a hehpih theih nadingin TOPA eite’ Pasian’ kiangah amah paisak un. Bang hang hiam cih leh a mawhna maisiangsak ding hi.
[9] Nang pen hehpihna tawh kidimin mawhna na maisak a, ahih hangin kote in nang ka hong langpan’ uh hi.
[4] Tua ciangin TOPA in, “Ka mite tungah heh nawn lo ka hih manin ka kiangah ka mite ka samkik ding a, lungsim takpi tawh amaute ka it ding hi.

[18] TOPA aw, nang tawh a kibang Pasian dang om lo a, a omlai na mite’ mawhna nangmah in na maisak hi. Nang na heh paisuak kei a, na itna kip nong lak hi. [19] Kote nong khasiat kik ding a, ka mawhnate uh hong sawpkhiat sakin, tuipi taw-ah nong paihsak ding hi.

[23] Tua ahih manin Pasian tungah biakna a pia dingin biakna tau mai-ah na om laitakin na sanggamte khat peuhpeuh na tungah a lungkim lohna thu na phawk leh, [24] Pasian na biak nading nate, a biakna tau mai-ah nusia photin, pai-in na sanggampa tawh va kilem phot inla, tua khit ciangin hong paikikin Pasian biakna pia in.
[12] Kote tungah a hong mawhte mawh maisakna ka neih bangun ko’ mawhna zong hong maisak in.

[14] Note in midangte’ hong mawhna na maisak uhleh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note’ mawhna hong maisak ding hi. [15] Ahi zongin note in midangte’ hong mawhna na maisak kei uhleh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note’ mawhna hong maisak lo ding hi.

[2] Mi pawlkhat in khutlekhezaw mi khat, a lupna pheek tawh hong pua-in Jesuh kiang a hong tunpih uh hi. Jesuh in amaute’ upna a muh ciangin a cina mipa kiangah, “Ka ta aw, na lungsim kinuamsak in; na mawhna hong kimaisak khinta hi,” a ci hi.

[21] Tua ciangin Peter in Jesuh va naih a, “Topa aw, ka sanggamte khatpeuh ka tungah hong khialh ciangin bangzah vei maisak ding ka hi hiam? Sagihvei dongtak maisak ding ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin [22] Jesuh in, “Sagihvei ciangbek maisak in kong ci kei hi. Sawm sagih mun sagihvei maisak in kong ci hi.

[32] Tua ciangin kumpipa in tua nasempa sam a, ‘A gilo nasempa aw, kei kiangah hong thum na hih manin na leiba khempeuh ka hong maisak hi. [33] Nang ka hong hehpih mah bangin na naseppih pa zong na hehpih ding kilawm hi lo ahi hiam?’ a ci hi. [34] Kumpipa zong a heh suak ahih manin a leiba khempeuh a lohkhit matengin thong sungah a kikhum nadingin thu a pia hi. [35] “Tua mah bangin note in zong na lungsim uhah na sanggamte uh mawhna na maisaknop kei uhleh vantungah a om ka Pa in note tungah zong tua bangmahin a hong bawl ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[28] Mi tampite’ mawhna a mai nadingin a luangkhia, Pasian’ thuciamna a kipsak, ka sisan ahi hi.
[5] Jesuh in hih mite’ up mahmahna thu a muh ciangin khutlekhezaw mipa kiangah, “Ka ta aw, na mawhnate hong kimaisak hi,” a ci hi.
[25] Thungen dingin na din uh ciangin midang tungah na hehna uh a om khat peuhpeuh maisak un; tua hileh vantungah a om na Pa un note’ mawhna hong maisak ding hi.
[20] Jesuh in amaute’ upna a muh ciangin a mipa kiangah, “Lawm aw, na mawhnate hong kimaisak khinta hi,” a ci hi.

[37] “Midangte’ thu khen kei un. Tua hileh no tungah zong Pasian in thu hong khen lo ding hi. Midangte mawhsak kei un. Tua hileh Pasian in note zong hong mawhsak lo ding hi. Midangte’ mawhna maisak un. Tua hi leh Pasian in note’ mawhna zong hong maisak ding hi.

[47] Tua ahih ciangin nang kiangah kong genin-ah, ama mawhna tampi tak a omte kimaisak khin ahih manin amah in a itna nakpitakin a lak hi. Ahi zongin tawmno bek a kimaisakte in a itna uh tawmno bek mahin a lak uh hi,” a ci hi.
[4] Kote tungah a hong mawhte mawh maisakna ka neih bangun ko’ mawhna zong hong maisak in. Ze-etna lian hong thuaksak ke’n,’ ci-in na ngen ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[3] Note hoihtakin kingaihsun un. Na sanggampa uh no tungah hong khialh leh amah taii unla, a kisik leh a mawhna maisak un. [4] Nikhat sungin sagihvei ciang dong hong khialh hangin zong, a sagihvei mahin no kiangah hong pai-in, ‘Ka kisik hi,’ hong cih nakleh na maisak khin ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[33] “Lutang Guh,” a kicihna mun a tun uh ciangin singlamteh tungah Jesuh kilhcip uh a, tua mi that mi nihte zong, Jesuh’ taklamah khat, a veilamah khat kilhcip uh hi. [34] Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Pa aw, amaute in bang hih ihi hiam cih thei lo uh ahih manin a mawhna uh na maisak in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amau’ ngah ding ciat a theih nadingun ai sanin a puante a hawm uh hi.
[7] Amaute in Jesuh kiangah dong teitei uh ahih manin amah zong dingin amaute kiangah, “Note lakah mawhna a nei het lo pa in deng masa un,” a cih khit ciangin,

[22] Tua khit ciangin amaute lamah a hu sang a, “Kha Siangtho na sang un. [23] Mite’ mawhna na maisak uhleh amaute’ mawhna a mai hi ding a, na maisak kei uhleh amaute’ mawhna a mai lo hi ding hi,” a ci hi.

[38] Tua ciangin Peter in amaute kiangah, “Na mawhna uh kisik unla, na mawhna uh hong kimaisak theih nadingin Jesuh Khrih min tawh tui kiphum ciat un. Tua hileh Pasian’ piakkhong Kha Siangtho na ngah ding uh hi.

[19] Tua ahih ciangin na mawhnate uh hong sawpsiangsak theih nading, Topa kiang panin a hong pai lungsim nopna hun na ngah theih nading uh le note a dingin a sehsa Jesuh Khrih a hong sawltheih nadingin na mawhna uh kisik unla, Pasian kiang zuan un.

[56] “En un! Vantung kihong a, Pasian’ taklamah Mihing Tapa a ding ka mu hi,” a ci hi. [57] Ahi zongin amaute in a bil uh humsanin nakpitakin kiko-in Stefen bawhhuan uh a, [58] khua pualamah kaikhia-in suang gol pipi a khiat uh hi. Hih thu-ah teci pangin Stefen a deng mite in a puantungsilh uh suahin Saul a kici tangval khat kiangah lawnin a kemsak uh hi. [59] Tua bangin suang a khiat thuahthuah laitakun Stefen in thu ngen a, “Topa Jesuh aw, ka kha hong la in,” a ci hi. [60] Tua ciangin amah kunin nakpitakin kiko a, “Topa aw, hih mite’ mawhna na maisak in,” a cih khit ciangin a si ta hi.
[43] Amah a um mite khempeuh in ama min hangin a mawhna uh a mai nading thu, kamsangte khempeuh in zong gen belin a neih khat uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[38] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, hih Jesuh hangin mawhmaisakna thu note tungah hong kihilh ahihna teltakin na theih ding uh ahi hi. [39] Tua tham loin Jesuh a um mite khempeuh pen Moses Thukham in a suahtaksak zawh loh mawhna khempeuh panin a suakta ahihna thu na theih ding uh ahi hi.

[20] Tua ahih ciangin Lai Siangtho sungah, “Na galte uh a gil a kial leh an na pia un. A dang a taak leh tui na pia un. Tua bangin na gamtat uhleh amaute’ maizum nadingin a bawl na hi uh hi,” ci-in a kigelh bangin gamtazaw un.

[4] Itna neite a lungduai-in migi hi. Itna neite in hazatna lungsim nei loin, zong kisathei lo hi. [5] Itna neite a kilawm loin gamta lo, heh pakpak lo, mite’ mawhna ciamteh lo hi. [6] Thuman lote-ah lungdam ngei lo uh a, thumante bekah lungdam uh hi.

[5] Mi khatpeuh in heh nading a piansak ciangin kei bek a hong hehsak hi loin note khempeuh zong a hong hehsak ahi hi. Tua ahih manin tua bang mi tungah khauhtat lua nawn kei un. [6] Note’ gimpiaknasa pen kicing khinzo ka sa hi. [7] Tua ahih manin a mawhna maisak ta unla hehnemzaw un. Tua hikeileh dahlua-in siatlawh kha ding hi. [8] Amah na itkik ding uh ka hong thumna thu zong amah na theisak un.
[11] Mawhna maisak kei lehang Satan in nuamtaksa-in eite tungah hong gualzo kha ding ahih manin mawhna a maisak ihi hi. Satan’ nasepna zia a thei lo ihi kei hi.
[7] Khrih hong sihna hangin eite in suahtakna ngahin, i mawhnate hong kimaisak ahi hi. Tuazah dongin Pasian’ hong hehpihna thu bangzah takin lian ahi hiam?
[26] Na heh uh ciangin, tua hehna hangin khialkha kei unla, a tawntungin heh paisuak kei un.

[31] Kimuhdahna, hehna, thangpaihna, kitotna, kikona, kilungsim neihna khempeuh beisak unla, [32] khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim nem tawh na kihozaw unla, Khrih’ hangin Pasian in note’ mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.
[14] tua a Tapa in eite hong khahkhia a, i mawhna hong kimaisak khinta hi.

[13] A beisa hunah na mawhna uh hangin kha thu tawh kisai-in misi na hi uh a, Gentail mi na hih manun Thukham nei lote na hi uh hi. Ahi zongin Khrih hangin Pasian in note hong hingsak a, i mawhna khempeuh hong maisak khinta hi.

[13] Note lakah khatlekhat a kilungkim lo na om uh ciangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh kimaisakin na kihuh ciat un. Topa in note’ mawhna hong maisak bangin note zong khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ding uh hi. [14] Hihte khempeuh banah, mi khempeuh kilem takin a hong om khawmsak thei ahi ki-itna na bulphuh un.
[12] A mawhna a khialhna uhah amaute ka hehpih ding a, tua bangte phawkin ka nei nawn kei ding hi,” na ci hi.
[17] “Amaute’ mawhna le a gitloh gamtatnate uh ka ciamteh nawn kei ding hi,” ci hi, ci-in a na gen hi.

[9] Hong bawlsiate siatna tawh thukkik loin hong samsia mite samsia kik kei unla, Pasian in note a hong sap lai-in thupha a hong piak dingin hong ciamsa ahih manin, hong siat bawlte thupha tawh na thukzaw un.
[9] Ahi zongin Pasian kiangah i mawhnate va pulak lehang, amah citakin thuman ahih manin, i mawhnate hong maisakin i hoih lohnate khempeuh hong siangsak ding hi.

[1] Ka itte aw, note na khialhkhak loh nading uh ka deihna-in hih lai a hong gelh ka hi hi. Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh a khialh ciangin eite a dingin Pa Pasian kiangah a hong thumsak dingin a thuman Jesuh Khrih i nei hi. [2] Tua Jesuh hangin eite’ mawhna hong kimaisak a, eite a’ ding bek hi loin leitung mi khempeuh’ mawhna zong a mai nading ahi hi.
[12] Ka tate aw, Khrih hangin note’ mawhna hong kimaisak ahih manin lai a hong gelh ka hi hi.

[5] Mi khatpeuh in hong thah le ama tungah sihna dan ka pia ding hi. A hong that ganhing peuhmah ka that ding a, a mipihte a that mi peuhmah gim ka pia ding hi. [6] Mi a that peuhmahte pen, midangte in amah that ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in ama lim bangin mi bawl hi.

[18] Nang le na kianga om mite in na zawngkhal lawh ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua nasep nang a dingin gik lua hi. Nang bek in na sem khinzo kei hi. [19] Tu-in ka thu hong ngai in; thu kong lak ding hi. Pasian in nang hong ompih tahen. Nang pen Pasian’ mai-ah mite’ tangin pai-in, amau’ thute Pasian’ kiangah na gen ding hi. [20] Nangmah in ngeina kipte le thukhennate amaute na hilh ding a, amau’ lam pai nading le amau’ sep dingte amaute na theisak ding hi. [21] Tua tham loin, mi khempeuh lak panin Pasian a zahtak mi, a muanhuai mi le sumgolh a mudah mi, mi siamte na teelkhia ding hi. Tua bang mite pen a tul, a za, a sawmnga, a sawmte tungah a uk dingin na koih ding hi. [22] Mite’ thu amaute khensak tawntung in. Amaute in thu liante bek nang kiangah hong puak ding uh a, ahi zongin thu neute amau mah in khen tawm ding uh hi. Tua hileh nang a dingin baih zaw ding a, amaute in na vangik hong puakpih ding uh hi. [23] Hih bangin hih lecin Pasian in thahatna hong pia ding a, nangmah in na sem paisuakzo ding hi. Tua tham loin hih mite khempeuh zong amau’ omna-ah lungnuam takin ciah thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi. [24] Tua ahih ciangin Moses in a sungpa’ thu ngai-in ama gen khempeuh a hih hi. [25] Israel mi khempeuh sung panin Moses in mipil mi siamte teel a, mite a tul, a za, a sawmnga, a sawmte tungah a ukin mite’ lutangin amaute a bawl hi. [26] Amaute in mite tungah a tawntungin thu khen uh hi. Amaute in thu haksate bek Moses tungah puak uh a, ahi zongin thuneute amaute in khen tawm uh hi.
[7] Tua ahih ciangin Moses hong pai-in upate sam a, TOPA in amah a thupiak hih thute khempeuh amaute’ mai-ah a sung hi.
[15] “Note in thukhenna-ah thu a tang loin na khen kei ding uh hi. Mizawngte langgen loin, a liante’ thu zui loin, thumanna tawh na vengte uh thu na khen ding uh hi.
[13] Na minam uh tawh a kizui-in a pil, thuthei, thuphawksa mite teel unla, note’ lutangin amaute ka koih ding hi,’ kong ci hi.

[17] Thukhenna-ah angvan na nei kei ding uh hi. A neu le a liante a kibangin a thu na ngai ding uh a, maitang zahtak tuam na nei kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh thukhenna pen Pasian-a’ ahi hi. Note a dingin a haksa lua thute kei kiangah nong paipih ding uh a, keimah in tua thu ka za ding hi,’ ka ci hi.

[18] “Na minam uh tawh kizui-in TOPA na Pasian un note hong piakna khuate-ah thukhente le uliante na koih ding uh a, amaute in a manin mite tungah thu khen ding uh hi. [19] Thutang na heikhia kei ding uh a, angvan tuam na nei kei ding uh hi. Sumgolh in mipilte’ mit tawsakin thumante’ thu heikhia ahih manin sumgolh na la kei ding uh hi. [20] Note nungta-in TOPA na Pasian un hong piak leitang na luah theih nadingun a thuman bekbekin na gamta ding uh hi.

[14] “ TOPA na Pasian un note hong piak leitangah tungin, note in tua leitang nei-in a tungah na ten uh ciangin, ‘Eite’ kimkota om minamte khempeuh mah bangin eite’ tungah kumpi khat i koih ding hi,’ na ci nuam kha ding uh hi. [15] TOPA note’ Pasian in a teel mipa note’ tungah kumpi-in na koih thei takpi ding uh hi. Ahi zongin na mipihte bek uh lak panin kumpi-in mi khat na koih ding uh a, na sanggam uh ahi lo gamdang mi khat no’ tungah na koih thei kei ding uh hi.

[18] Ama kumpi tokhom tungah a tut ciangin Levi siampite’ kep hih thukhamte ama a dingin laibu khat sungah gelh ding hi. [19] Hih thukham sunga thute le hih ngeinate kemin zuihna tawh TOPA a Pasian zahtak ding a theih nading, a mipihte tungah ama lungsim a kiliatsak loh nading, thupiaknate them khat zong a pelh loh nading, le Israel-te sung ahi ama kumpi gam sungah amah le a tate saupi a om theih nadingin amah in a nuntak sung tawntung tua sunga thute sim ding hi. [20] Hih thukham sunga thute le hih ngeinate kemin zuihna tawh TOPA a Pasian zahtak ding a theih nading, a mipihte tungah ama lungsim a kiliatsak loh nading, thupiaknate them khat zong a pelh loh nading, le Israel-te sung ahi ama kumpi gam sungah amah le a tate saupi a om theih nadingin amah in a nuntak sung tawntung tua sunga thute sim ding hi.
[17] “Peemta’ thu ahi a, pa nei lo mi’ thu ahi zongin tuate a’ ding thutang na heisak kei ding uh a, meigong numei’ puan zong khapna-in na laksak kei ding uh hi.
[23] Gideon in amaute kiangah, “Note kong uk kei ding a, ka tapa in zong note hong uk lo ding hi. TOPA in note hong uk ding hi,” a ci hi.

[6] Ahih hangin amaute in, “Kote hong uk dingin kumpi khat hong pia in,” a cih uh ciangin hih thu in Samuel lungkim losak hi. Samuel in TOPA’ kiangah thu ngen hi. [7] Tua ciangin TOPA in Samuel kiangah, “Amaute in nang kiangah hong gen thu khempeuh ngai in; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in nang hong nial hi lo a, amaute tungah kumpi hihna panin kei hong nial ahi uh hi.

[21] Samuel in mite’ thugen khempeuh a zak khit ciangin TOPA’ kiangah tua thute a genkik hi. [22] Tua ciangin TOPA in Samuel kiangah, “Amaute’ thu ngai inla, amaute-a’ dingin kumpi khat koih in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Samuel in Israel mite kiangah, “Mi khempeuh na khuapi ciat uhah ciah un,” a ci hi.

[27] Ahih hangin bangmah a man lo mi pawlkhat in, “Hih mipa in eite hong bangci hotkhiat zawh ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Amaute in amah simmawhin ama kiangah letsong puak lo uh hi. Ahih hangin amah in tua mite bangmah cih lo hi.

[12] Tua ciangin note a sim dingin Ammon kumpipa Nahash hong kuanna na muh uh ciangin, TOPA na Pasian uh na kumpi uh hi napi-in note in kei kiangah, ‘Kumpi khat in kote hong uk ding hi,’ na ci uh hi. [13] “Tu-in note’ teelsa, note’ nget kumpipa en un; TOPA in note’ tungah kumpi khat koih khinta hi. [14] Note in TOPA zahtakin ama na sem a, ama aw ngai-in TOPA’ thupiakna na langpan’ kei uh a, note a hong uk kumpipa le na Pasian uh na zuih uhleh thu hong nuam ding hi. [15] Ahih hangin note in TOPA’ aw ngai loin TOPA’ thupiakna na langpan’ uhleh TOPA in note le na kumpipa uh hong langpan’ ding hi.

[13] Tua ciangin Samuel in Saul kiangah, “Na hai gamtat hi; TOPA na Pasian’ hong thupiakna na zui kei hi; bang hang hiam cih le TOPA in Israel-te tungah kumpi dingin nang le na suanlekhakte a kipsaksuak ding ahi hi. [14] Ahih hangin tu-in na ukna kizomsuak lo ding a, TOPA in ama lungsim bangin mi khat zong khin hi. TOPA in nang hong thupiak zui lo na hih manin ama mite tungah ulian dingin TOPA in amah seh khin hi,” a ci hi.

[11] “Kumpi-in Saul ka koih ka kisik hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah pen keimah zuihna panin kihei kik a, ka thupiaknate sem lo hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Samuel heh hi; zan tawntung TOPA’ tungah kiko hi.
[17] Tua ciangin Samuel in, “Nang na kineu ngaihsut hun a om hangin, tu-in nang pen Israel minamte’ lutang hi lo na hi hiam? TOPA in Israel-te tungah kumpi-in nang sathau hong nilh hi.
[15] Tua ahih ciangin David in Israel-te khempeuh uk a, a mite khempeuh tungah thutang le thuman a zang hi.
[28] Tua ciangin Israel mi khempeuh in kumpipa’ piak thukhenna za uh hi. Thutang a sem dingin ama tungah Pasian in pilna pia hi, ci-in phawk uh ahih manin amaute in kumpipa lamdangsa-in a om uh hi.

[9] Nang tungah lungdamin Israel kumpi tokhom tungah nang a hong koih TOPA na Pasian in thupha ngah ta hen! TOPA in Israel it tawntung ahih manin nangmah in thutang le thuman na sepkhiat theih nadingin amah in kumpi-in nang hong bawl hi,” a ci hi.
[2] Siampi Jehoiada in amah thuhilh ahih manin Joash in ama uk hun sung tawntung TOPA’ muhna-ah a man gamta hi.

[3] Tua ahih ciangin Israel upate khempeuh kumpipa kiang Hebron-ah hong pai uh hi. Tua ciangin David in TOPA’ mai Hebron-ah amaute tawh thuciamna khat bawl a, Samuel’ tungtawnin TOPA’ thugen bangin amaute in Israel kumpi-in David sathau a nilh uh hi.
[25] Tua ciangin TOPA in Israel mi khempeuh muhna-ah Solomon tungah minthanna lianpi pia a, Israel sungah ama ma-in kumpi khat peuhpeuh tungah a kipia ngei nai lo kumpi minliatna a guan hi.

[6] “ TOPA, ka pu ka pate uh Pasian aw, nang, vantungah Pasian hi lo na hi hiam? Minamte’ kumpi gam khempeuh tungah nang a uk hi lo na hi hiam? Na khut sungah vangliatna le thahatna om a, kuamah in nang hong nang zo lo hi.
[13] Tua ciangin kumpipa in upadi siam a mipilte thu dong hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh upadi le biakna lam thutheite khempeuh thu dot pen kumpipa’ zat ngei khat ahi hi.
[7] TOPA ahihleh kumpi za-ah tu ngitnget a, thukhen nadingin a tokhom a bawl hi. [8] Leitung mite’ thu a mantakin khen a, a kilawm bangin mite’ thu a khen hi.
[28] Bang hang hiam cih leh ukna pen TOPA a’ hi a, minamte tungah amah in a uk hi.
[2] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA, a Sangpenpa, dipkuathuai a, leitung khempeuh a uk kumpi lian khat ahi hi.
[1] No gam ukte aw, a manin thu na khen uh hiam? Note in mi khempeuh’ thu a tangin na khen uh hiam?
[7] Ama thahatna tawh a uk ngitnget pa, ama mit tawh minamte a encik ngitnget pa, mi lehdote in langpan’ kei uh hen.
[4] Mite’ thu a manin khenin, leitung minamte khempeuh lamlakin makai na hih manin, minamte nuamin lungdamna la hong sak ta uh hen.
[20] Sihna ding ngeina a bawl, a gilo gam ukte, nang tawh kipawl ding ahi hiam?

[15] Kumpite in a gammite a ukna ding, mi ukte in ngeina man a zat theih nadingin keimah in ka huh hi. [16] Leitung a om mi ukte khempeuh in keima huhna bek tawh ukzo uh a, milian mi thupite in keima huhna bek tawh vaihawmzo uh hi.
[12] Thumanin gamtatna bek in kumpi kipsak ahih manin a sia-a gamtat ding kumpite ut lo uh hi.
[2] Kumpipa’ hehna pen a lauhuai mahmah humpinelkai hawk bang hi a, kumpipa a hehsak khate in sihlawh uh hi.
[1] TOPA’ khut sungah kumpipa om a, lo sunga tuilak bangin a deihna peuhah hei kawikawi thei hi.
[29] A nasepna-ah a siam mahmah mi na theikha uh hiam? Amah in mi mawkmawkte’ na sem lo ding a, kumpite’ na sem ding hi.
[2] Pasian in thu a ip manin a min thang a, kumpite in thu a genkhiat manin minthang uh hi.
[5] Kumpipa kiang pan migilote nilkhia lehang thumanin ama ukna kip thei bek hi.
[2] Gam sung mite a hoih loh ciangin a banbanin gam uk kumpi tampi nei uh a, ahi zongin mipil thungaihsun theite in gam sung thahatsakin kipsak uh hi.
[28] Migilote a liat ciangin midangte bucip uh a, amaute a zakiat ciangin midikte in ukkik ding hi.
[2] Midikte in gam a uk ciangin gammite lungdam uh a, migilote in a uk ciangin a gammite thum uh hi.
[4] Thumanin a gamta kumpi in a gam kipsak a, sum bek a ngaihsun kumpi in a gam siasak hi.
[14] Kumpipa in mizawngte’ thu a manin khensak leh a ukna kip tawntung ding hi.
[18] Pasian’ lamlahna a kizuih lohna gamah gam sung mite phengtat gawp uh hi. Pasian’ thukham a zui mite ahihleh a lungdam uh hi.

[4] Lemuel aw, ka thugen hong ngai in. Kumpite in zu nek huai lo a, mi ukte in khamtheihzu a duh ding hi lo hi. [5] Zu ne le-uh, thukham mangngilh uh a, thukham hei-in mizawngte gim pia khathei uh hi.
[19] Khuapi a uk mihing sawm sangin pilna in mi khat hatsak zaw hi.

[2] TOPA’ kha in ama tungah ama mite a ukna ding pilna, thutheihna, le siamna pia ding hi. Amah in TOPA’ deihna thei-in TOPA zahtak ding hi. [3] Amah in TOPA’ nasep nuamsa ding hi. Amah in a tungtham bek muhna tawh thu khen lo ding a, kam lengsawn bek zakna tawh thu khentat lo ding hi. [4] Thumanna tawh mizawngte’ thu khenin, lungsim nem mite’ thu ahi bangin khensak ding hi. Ama kam panin a thupiakna tawh leitung mite gim kipia ding a, a muk panin a thugenna tawh migilote si ding uh hi. [5] Amah in thuman le thutak tawh ama mite uk ding hi.
[1] En un, ni khat ni ciangin thuman takin kumpi khat in hong uk ding a, uliante in thutang tawh hong uk ding uh hi.
[22] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA pen eite’ thukhen, TOPA pen eite hong ukpa, TOPA pen eite’ kumpi ahi hi. Amah in eite hong honkhia ding hi.
[15] “‘Ka thu a hong mang makaite ka hong pia ding a, amaute in pilna le siamna tawh note hong uk ding uh hi.

[25] “A gilo, a siangtho lo, Israel gam uk migilo pa aw, nang’ hun zong hong tungta a, gim na tuah ding ni hita hi. [26] Topa PASIAN in hih bangin ci hi: Na kumpi lukhu le na dialkhip lakhia in. Nidang bang nawn lo ding hi. Mineute hong lian ding a, miliante hong neuta ding hi.
[20] “Pasian’ min kiphat tawntung ta hen; amah pilin a vanglian hi. [21] Amah in hun le khuahunte kheel a, kumpite koihin lah a lakhia hi. Amah in mite tungah pilna le theihna a pia hi.

[37] Kumpipa aw, kumpi khempeuh lak pan nang a lianpen na hi hi. Vantung Pasian in kumpi-in nang hong koih a, vangliatna, thahatna, le zahtakna a hong pia hi. [38] Amah in mi’ tenna leitungteng, ganhingteng le vasate a uk dingin nang a hong koih hi. Tua kham lutang pen nangmah na hi hi.

[44] Tua kumpite a maan laitakun vantung Pasian in a bei thei ngei lo ding kumpi gam a hong phut ding hi. Tua kumpi gam kuamah in zo zo lo ding a, tua gam in gamdang khempeuhte zogawpin a kip tawntung ding hi.

[17] Hih pen a vil, a patau vantungmi’ thukhenna ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin mun khempeuhah a om mi khempeuhte in, a Lian Pasian in mite’ kumpi gamah vai a hawm hi, cih a thei ding uh hi. Amah in a teel peuhpeuh a neupente nangawn kumpi a suaksak thei ding hi,’ a ci hi.

[32] Mite lak pan hong kihawlkhia ding a, gamsate tawh na tengkhawm ding hi. Bawngtal bangin kum sagih sung lopa na ne ding hi. Tua ciangin, Pasian in mihingte’ kumpi gam uk a, a teel mi peuhpeuh kumpi a suaksak thei hi, na ci ding hi,” a ci hi.

[18] A Lianpen Pasian in na pa Nebukhadnezzar kumpi lianin koih a, zahtakna le vangliatna a pia hi. [19] Amah lianlua mahmah ahih manin gam khempeuh, nam khempeuh, pau khempeuhte in kihta-in a ling uh hi. Mi khatpeuh a thahnop leh that a, a nuntaksaknop leh a nungtasak hi. A ut leh mi khatpeuh pahtawi-in, a ut leh a daisak thei hi. [20] Ahih hangin amah a lung khauhin kiphasak a, gilo lua ahih manin a kumpi tokhom panin kilakhia a, a minthanna a taan hi. [21] Mihingte lak panin amah kihawlkhia a, ganhing lungsim a nei hi. Gam sakolte tawh tengkhawmin, bawngtal bangin lopa ne a, daitui dal ding nei loin a pualamah a lum hi. A tawpkhakna-ah a Lianpen Pasian in mihingte’ kumpi gamte uk a, a teel peuhpeuh kumpi suak hi, ci-in a phawk thei hi.

[1] Darias in gam sung khempeuh a uksawn dingin gam ukpi za le sawmnih dingin a ngaihsun hi. [2] Tua ahih ciangin amah in tua gam ukpite tungah a vaihawmpi ding le kumpi deih bang a sem dingin Daniel le adang mi nih a teel hi. [3] Gam ukpi dangte le vaihawmpi dangte sangin Daniel nasep siamzaw diak se hi. Tua bangin siamzaw diak se ahih manin kumpipa in gam buppi ukin koih ding a ngaihsun hi.
[18] Ahih hangin a Lianpen Pasian’ mite in kumpi za ngah ding uh a, a tawntungin a nei paisuak ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.

[27] “Hih leitung kumpi gam, vangliatna, le liatna khempeuh a Lianpen Pasian’ mite tungah a kipia ding hi. Amau’ kumpi za cikmah hunin bei ngei lo ding a, leitung ukna za a nei khempeuhte in a thu uh mangin amaute’ na a sem ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.
[8] Keimah in hih a khial Israel kumpi gam ka encik a, hih leitung panin amaute ka susia ding hi. Ahi zongin a vekpi-un susiamang loin pawlkhat ka sitlai ding hi.

[1] Israel a uk makaite aw, hih thu ngai un: Note in thutang thuman a deih dingin a kilawm hinapi-in, [2] thuhoih deih loin thusia na deih zawsop uh hi. Note in mite’ vun na hing hawkkhiat uh a, a guh uh na hing kheuh uh hi. [3] Ka mite’ sa na netum uh hi. A vun uh hawkin, a guh uh na satkham uh a, beel-a meh huan ding bangin na satnen gawp uh hi. [4] TOPA’ tungah huhna ngenin na kiko hun uh hong tung ding a, ahi zongin amah in note hong dawng lo ding hi. Note gamtatsia na hih manun, na ngetna uh hong ngai lo ding hi.

[13] Amah pen TOPA’ biakinn a lam ding pa hi a, kumpite’ ngah theih minliatna ngahin, ama mite uk ding hi. Ama kumpi tokhom gei-ah siampi khat om ding a, kithutuakin, kilemin na semkhawm ding uh hi,” ci hi,’ va ci in.

[10] Galkidona leengte Israel gam pan beisakin, sakol galkapte, Judah gam pan ka lakhia ding a, galdona a kizang thalte kisusia ding hi. Na kumpipa un minam dangte lakah kilemna thu gen ding a, amah in tuipi mong khat pan tuipi mong khat dong, Eufratis Gunpi panin leimong dongin a uk ding hi.

[17] Tua ahih ciangin Rom kumpipa Sisar tungah siah i piak ding kilawm hiam, na ngaihsutna nong gen nadingin ka deih uh hi,” a ci uh hi. [18] Ahi zongin Jesuh in amau’ gitloh geelna thei ahih manin, “Mihoih a kineihkhem mite aw, bang hangin kei hong thangsiah se na hi uh hiam? [19] Siahin na piak ding uh sum hong lak dih un,” a cih ciangin sumtang peek khat hong paipih uh hi. [20] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Hih sum tungah kua lim le kua min om ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin [21] amaute in, “Sisar’ lim le a min kigelh hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Sisar’ nate Sisar’ tungah na pia unla, Pasian’ nate Pasian’ tungah na pia un,” a ci hi.

[24] A gengen hangin bangmah phattuamna om loin buaina piangzaw kha ding, ci-in Pilat in a theih ciangin, tui la-in mihonpi’ muhin a khut sil a, “Hih mipa a sihna thu-ah kei ka kihel kei hi. Note in thei ta un,” a ci hi.
[24] Gam khat peuhpeuh phelnih kisuahin kido le-uh tua gam kip lo ding hi.

[42] Ahi zongin Jesuh in amaute samin, “Leitung mi a ukte in mite tungah aana nei-in, mi a makaite in thuneihna tawh a ukna thu na thei uh hi. [43] Ahi zongin note lakah tua bangin hi lo ding hi. Note lakah a lian nuam khat peuhpeuh, adangte khempeuh’ nasem hi ding a, [44] a makai ahi nuam khat peuhpeuh, adangte khempeuh’ sila hi ding hi.
[10] A hong tung ding i pu David’ ukna, Pasian in thupha pia ta hen! Pasian phat un!” ci-in a awng uh hi.

[14] Galkap pawlkhatte in zong ama kiangah, “Kote, bangci gamtat ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dot uh ciangin, “Zawhthawh thu tawh ahi a, a man lopi-in mawhsakna tawh ahi zongin kuama sum sut kei unla, na khasum ngahzah uh tawh lungkim un,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[44] Ke’n kong cihin-ah, a neihsa khempeuh a uk dingin a topa in tua nasempa koih takpi ding hi. [45] Ahi zongin tua nasempa in a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka topa hong ciahkik hak ding hi,’ ci-in ngaihsunin a naseppih numei le pasalte satgawp hen la, zukham ankhamin ommawk leh, [46] tua nasem pa’ topa pen ama upmawh loh ni, a theihkholh loh hunin hong tung ding hi. A topa in nakpitakin amah gim pia ding a, a thumang lo mite tawh a kibangin a thuaksak khawm ding hi.
[27] Tu-in, kumpi dingin kei a hong deih lo ka galte pen hih lai-ah hong paipih unla, keima muhna-ah that un,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
[25] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Tua ahihleh, Kumpipa a’ teng Kumpipa tungah na pia unla, Pasian a’ teng Pasian’ tungah na pia un,” a ci hi.

[36] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Keima ukna pen hih leitung gam hi lo hi. Keima ukna hih leitung gam hileh Jerusalem khua-a Jew mi uliante’ khut sungah hong kipiak loh nadingin ka nungzuite in a do ding uh hi. Tua ahih manin keima ukna pen hih leitung tawh kizom lo hi,” a ci hi.

[26] Topa le ama Khrih a do dingin leitung kumpite kithawi uh a, gam ukte kikaikhawm uh hi,’ ci hi. [27] A cih mah bangin Herod le Pontias Pilat in hih khuapi sung teek mahah Gentail mite le Israel mite tawh kikupna nei uh a, nangmah in Khrih dingin na bawl, a siangtho na Nasempa Jesuh thah dingin a vaihawm uh hi.
[29] Ahi zongin Peter le sawltak dangte in, “Mite’ thu sangin Pasian’ thu ka mangzaw ding uh hi.

[17] “Pasian in Abraham tungah a thuciamna a tunsak ding a nai kuan ciangin Egypt gamah ei mite tampi tak na pha ta uh hi. [18] A tawpna-ah Josef a thei lo kumpi dang khat, Egypt gam sung a uk dingin hong kipan hi. [19] I mipihte na khemgawpin na khelbawl a, a ta ngeekte uh a sih nadingin inn panin mun dangah a koihkhia sak hi.

[22] Pasian in kumpi dingin Saul a zat nawn loh ciangin amaute’ kumpi dingin David a semsak hi. Pasian in David’ thu genin, ‘Ka sawl khempeuh a sem ding, ka deih bang mi khat, Jessi’ tapa David ka mukhin hi,’ a cihsa thu ahi hi.

[11] Thukham palsatin sihna thuak nading thu khat peuhpeuh a gamta hi leng, suahtak nading thu ka gen het kei ding hi. Hih amaute’ hong mawhzonnate a man lo ahihleh zong kuamah in amaute’ khut sungah hong ap zo lo ding uh hi. Gam uk kumpipa tungah a zu ka khan hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[17] Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho sungah Pasian in Faro kiangah, “Ka vangliatna lah nading le leitung khempeuhah ka min a kitheih nadingin kong zatnop manin kumpi a hong suaksak ka hi hi,” ci hi.

[1] A kuamah peuh in hong ukte’ thu na mang ciat un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ thukimpih lohin kuamah in ukna thu nei lo hi; ukna thu nei i cih mite pen Pasian’ koih mite ahi hi. [2] Tua ahih manin ukna thuneite a nialte pen Pasian’ koihsa mite a nial suak a, tua bang mite in thukhenna a thuak ding uh hi. [3] Bang hang hiam cih leh gam uk mite pen a gamtat hoih mite’ kihtak ding hi lo a, mi tatsiate’ kihtak ding hi bek hi. Ukna thu a neite kihta loin na omnop uhleh a hoihin gamta un. Tua hileh amaute in note hong pakta-in hong phat ding uh hi. [4] Ukna thuneite pen note’ hoih nadingin Pasian’ nasemte ahi uh hi. Ahi zongin a sia-in na gamtat uhleh gim hong pia taktak ding uh ahih manin na lau ding uh ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute pen Pasian’ nasemte hi a, a sia-in a gamta mite tungah Pasian’ hehna bangin gim a pia dingte ahi uh hi. [5] Tua ahih manin Pasian’ gimpiak ding kihtakna hang bek hi loin, ahi ding thu mah hi, ci-a theihna tawh ukna thu a neite’ thu na man’ ding uh ahi hi. [6] Ukna thu a neite in amau’ sep dingteng a kimtakin a sep uh ciangin Pasian a dingin na a semte hi uh ahih manin tua thu hang mahin zong mangmu a pia na hi uh hi. [7] Tua ahih manin phiangsiah piak dingte tungah pia-in, mangmu piak dingte tungah pia-in, zahtak dingte zahtak bawlin, pahtawi dingte pahtawi ta un.

[1] Note khatlekhat thu na kineih uh ciangin Pasian’ mi siangthote khensakzaw loin lawki thukhente’ mai na kitun ngam uh hi. [2] Pasian’ mite in leitung mite’ thu a khensakzaw ding ahihlam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Note pen leitung mite’ thu a khensak ding na hih uh ciangin tua bang thu neute khen thei lo lawmlawm na hi uh hiam? [3] Eite pen vantung mite’ thu nangawn a khensak ding ihih lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam? Tua ahih manin hih leitung a no’ thu neuneute leltak na khentheih zawk kan ding uh ahi hi.

[12] Sanggamte aw, Topa in note lam a hong lak ding le a hong makai dingin a seh, note lakah na a hong sem mite, a kilawm a kituakin zahtakbawl un. [13] Amau’ nasepna hangin amaute nakpitakin itbawlin zahtak un. Note khatlekhat kilem takin na om un.

[1] A masa penin kong gennop thu in: Mi khempeuh a dingin Pasian tungah ngetna, thungetna, thumna le lungdamkohna na neih ding uh ahi hi. [2] Eite nuamtakin omthei-in, biakna lungsim nei-in a kilawm takin i nuntak theih nadingin kumpite le uliante a dingin thu na ngetsak un.
[1] Na mite in hong uk kumpite le aana neite’ thu mangin, thuhoih khempeuh a sem dingin a kigingsa-in a om ding uh phawksak inla,

[17] Na makaite uh thu na mang unla, a genna uh bangin na gamta un. Pasian kiangah amaute in a nasepnate uh a pulak ding uh ahih manin tawlnga loin note hong lunghimawh tawntung uh hi. Amaute’ thu mang le-uhcin a nasepna uhah lungdam mahmah ding uh a, mang kei le-uhcin dah pipi-in na sem ding uh hi. Dah pipi-in a nasepna uh note a dingin zong phattuamna a om tuan hi lo hi. [18] Kote a dingin thu hong ngetsak niloh un. A tawntungin na a manin sepnopna lungsim nei ka hih manun ka lungsim uhah kisuanna om loin siang mahmah hi.

[13] Topa’ hangin leitung ukna aana neite’ thu na mang un. Kumpipa’ thu ahi a, [14] a gamtat siate gim pia-in, a gamtat hoihte a pahtawi dingin kumpipa in a sawl thuneite khempeuh’ thu ahi zongin na mang un. [15] Bang hang hiam cih leh thu thei loin a mot paupau mihaite, na gamtat hoihna un a daihsak ding, Pasian’ deihna ahi hi.
[17] Mi khempeuh zahtak bawlin thu uppih mite na it unla, Pasian zahtak bawlin kumpipa zong na zahtak un.

[5] thuman takin teci a pang, sihna panin a kithokiksak Tapa upa, leitung kumpite tungah ukna aana a nei Jesuh Khrih kiang panin note tungah hehpihna le nopsakna thupha hong tung tahen. Tua Jesuh Khrih in eite hong it a, ama sihna tawh i mawhna panin eite hong suaktasak a, [6] ama Pa Pasian’ na a sem dingin siampi le kumpi za-ah a hong koih hi. Tua Jesuh in minthanna le vangliatna nei tawntung tahen. Amen.
[10] Pasian’ na a sem dingin siampi za le kumpi za na pia a, amaute in leitung ukin a om ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
[5] Tua ciangin tua numei in leitung minam khempeuh sik ciangkhut tawh a uk ding ta pasal khat hong nei hi. Ahi zongin tua naungek pen thakhatin kilakhia-in Pasian a tutna a tokhomah a kipaipih hi.

[1] Tua laitakin tuipi sung panin ganhing khat a hong pusuak ka mu hi. Tua ganhing in ki sawm le lutang sagih nei a, a ki sawmte tungah lukhu khat ciat om a, a lutang sagihte tungah min hoih lo khat ciat a kigelh hi. [2] Tua ka muh ganhing pen kamkei tawh kibang a, a khete vom khe tawh kibang a, a kam pen humpinelkai kam tawh a kibang hi. Gulpi in tua ganhing tungah ama vangliatna, ama tokhom, le aana lianpi a pia hi.

[12] Ki sawmte pen gam uk dingin a hong kipan nai lo kumpi sawm hi a, ahi zongin a ganhing tawh kumpi aana a neikhawm dingin nai khat sung bek a hun kipia ding hi. [13] Hih mi sawmte in ngimna khat nei uh a, vangliatna le aana a neihteng uh a ganhing tungah a pia uh hi. [14] Amaute in Tuuno a sim ding uh hi. Ahi zongin Tuuno pen kumpite’ Kumpi, topate’ Topa ahih manin, amah le ama sap, a teel, citakin amah a zuite in tua kumpi sawmte a zogawp ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.

[15] Minam dangte a zawhgawp nading namsau hiam khat a kam sung panin a pusuak hi. Amah in sik ciangkhut tawh minam dangte ukin, a Vanglian Pasian’ heh mahmahna tawh leenggah cilna-ah leengtui a sukkhia ding hi.
[27] Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ama lim bangin mihing piangsakin, Pasian’ lim bangin amah a piangsak hi. Amah in pasal le numei a piangsak hi.

[5] Leitungah mihing a gitlohna a liatna le mihing lungsim ngaihsutna peuhmah a sia ahih ngitngetna thu TOPA in mu hi. [6] Leitungah mihing a bawl pen TOPA khial kisa a, tua thu in ama lungsim dahsak hi. [7] Tua ahih ciangin TOPA in, “Ka piansaksa mihing, ganhing, a bokvak ganhingte le huih lak vasate, leitung panin ka phiatkhia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih le amaute ka bawl ka khial hi,” a ci hi. [8] Ahih hangin Noah in TOPA’ maipha mu hi. [9] Noah’ tangthu hih bang ahi hi. Noah a thuman mi khat hi a, ama khangah paubaang lo hi. Noah pen Pasian tawh kikhawl hi.

[7] Ahih hangin TOPA in Samuel kiangah, “A tungtham hitaleh a tun sanna hitaleh en kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah ka nolh hi. TOPA in mihingte’ muh bangin mu lo hi. Mihingte in a pualam a kilangte en a, ahih hangin TOPA in a lungsim en hi,” a ci hi.

[25] Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “A nungta naupang khen nih suah unla, khat tungah alang pia-in, adang khat tungah alang pia un,” a ci hi. [26] Tua ciangin a tapa a nungta numei in a lungsimah a tapa khasiat ahih manin kumpipa kiangah, “Aw ka topa aw, a nungta naupang amah piazaw in; bangbang hitaleh amah that kei in,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin a khat in, “Hih pen kei ka hi a, amah in ahi zongin tang thei lo ding hi; hong hawmsak un,” a ci hi. [27] Tua ciangin kumpipa in dawngin, “A masa numei tungah naupang hing pia un; bangbang hitaleh that kei un; amah pen a nu ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[13] “Migilote a hehin nitum uh a, gimna a thuak ciang nangawnun ama huh ding ngen lo uh hi.
[5] A khialsa mahin kei ka suak a, ka nu in a gil sungah hong paii tung a kipan a mawh sa ka hi hi.

[10] Pasian aw, keima sungah lungsim siangtho hong piangsak inla, a thak a man ngaihsutna ka sungah hong guan in. [11] Nangma omna panin kei hong paaikhia kei inla, keima kiang panin na kha siangtho lakhia kei in. [12] Nong hotkhiatna hangin hong lungdamsakkik inla, utna lungsim tawh keimah hong huh ta in.
[10] Kote’ nuntak sung kum sawmsagih bang hi a, cidam le-ung kum sawmgiat bang hithei hi. Ahih hangin tua hunsung nangawn gimna le haksatna hi a, tua hunte bei pakin kote ka maimang uh hi.
[12] Ka galdona uhah kote hong huh in. Bang hang hiam cih leh mihing’ huhna a mawkna hi.

[13] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka pumpi na khempeuh na hong piangsak a, ka nu’ gil sungah keimah nong khuituah hi. [14] Kihtak dingin a kilawm na hih manin nang ka hong phat hi. Na nasepnate lamdang mahmah! Nangmah in kei nong lim theih mahmah hi. [15] A thukna sung mun simthamah kei hong kikhuituahin hong kibawl laitakin, ka guh ka taang, na mai-ah kiliah lo hi. [16] A kipiangsak nai lo keima pumpi nate na mit in a mu hi. Ka pumpi nate khat beek a om ma, ka ni zah ding a kiciangtan laitakin, tuate khempeuh na laibu sungah kigelh khin hi.
[24] Kei sungah siattheihna a omkha hiam hong en inla, tawntung lampi-ah kei hong kha in.
[3] Huhna a hong pia thei lo uliante ahi a, mi mawkmawkte ahi zongin muang kei un. [4] A husanna a bei ciangin lei-ah ciahkik uh a, tua ni mahmahin a ngaihsutnate uh beita hi.
[18] Mi a mudahte bek in zuauthu gen a, mi a gensiate mihai ahi hi.
[15] Mihaite pen amau mah thuman kisa tawntung a, mipilte in mi’ thugenna ngai nuam uh hi. [16] Mihaite in a hehna uh langsakpah uh a, mipilte in a hehna uh ipzo hi.
[1] Kam nemin dawnna in hehna damsak a, kam khauh in hehna piangsak hi.
[3] Mi pawlkhat in amau’ haitatna hangin gimna a ngah hinapi-in TOPA ngawhin mawk heh uh hi.
[7] Mi khempeuh in a sanggam zawng pa uh mudah ciat ahih manin a lawmte in a taisatna a thu lamdang hi lo hi.

[5] Mihingte’ ngaihsutna pen a thuk sunga om tui tawh kibang a, thuthuk mu theite bek in suahkhia thei hi. [6] Mi khempeuh pen mi citakin kigen kim uh hi; ahi zongin a citak takpi ding mi kimuzo ding ahi hiam? [7] Mi khat thumanin a hoihin a nuntak leh ama suanlekhakte mi hampha ahi uh hi.
[9] “Ka lungsim siangtho hi; mawhna ka nei het kei hi,” a ci thei ding mi kua om ahi hiam?
[11] Naupangte nangawn mi citak mihoih ahihna a gamtatna panun kimukhia thei hi.
[19] Mi a gensia kawikawite in thu im thei lo hi. Tua banga mi haipaute tawh kikhawl kei in.

[6] A cil tentan mite’ an neksak kei unla, a anlimte uh duhgawhkha kei un. [7] “Ne ne un,” hong cih hangin a cih takpi hi lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh na dangtawng a hong sun samzang nekkhak tawh kibang ding hi.
[8] Thusia lamsang a deih mite thusia bawl mi kici hi. [9] Mihaite’ vaihawmna in khialhna bek piangsak lel a, mi a simmawh theite midangte in mudah uh hi.
[14] Mi khat in a kituak lopi-in midang khat limbawl lualiang leh amah in a sia lamin na ngaihsun zaw hi.
[17] Sik in sik mah hiamsak thei a, mi in midang pilsak thei hi.
[19] Tui sung en leeng eima maitang i muh bangin i lungsim en leeng eima pianzia kilang hi.

[8] Zuauna le khemna ka zat loh nadingin hong huh inla, a haulua lo, a zawnglua loin hong bawl inla, ka khamkhop zah lian bek an hong pia in. [9] Haulua leng nang hong nialin, “ TOPA i cih kua ahi hiam?” kong ci kha ding a, zawnglua leuleu leng mi’ na guksakin ka Pasian’ min kong daisak khazel ding hi. [10] Sila khat a topa kiangah gensia kei in; amah in nang hong gensia-in gimna na thuakkha ding hi. [11] A pate samsia-in a min a daisak, a nute a phat lo mi pawlkhat om hi.
[20] A citak lo zi hih bangin gamta hi: Midang tawh khialin tua ciangin kisilsiang a, “Khialhna bangmah gamta kei ing,” ci khem hi.

[22] Mi khat in hih leitungah lunghimawhin thatang sanin na a sepna-ah bang phattuamna ngah ahi hiam? [23] Sepna bawlna khempeuhah lungkhamna le sinkhamna bekbek hi a, zan nangawnin a ihmut mawhpih hi. Hih pen a mawknapi taktak ahi hi. [24] Mihing khat in a nasepna thamanin an ne tui dawnin nuamsa-in a om sangin a hoihzaw bangmah dang om lo hi. Ahi zongin tua nangawn zong, Pasian’ hang ahihna ka phawk hi. [25] Pasian kihel loin kua in an ne-in nuamsa thei ding ahi hiam? [26] Pasian in amah a lungdamsakte tungah pilna, theihna, le lungdamna pia a, ahi zongin a hehpihhuai mimawhte ahihleh a sep bek sisakin, amau’ thalawhsa khempeuh amah a lungdamsakte tungah a piaksak hi. Hih pen a mawknapi taktak, huihpi nungdelh bang bek ahi hi.

[11] Amah in na khempeuh amau’ hun ciat tawh a kituak dingin a bawl hi. Amah in mailam thu theihnopna lungsim eite tungah hong guan a, ahi zongin ama sepnate a cing a theihzawhna ding hong guan lo hi.

[1] Tua ciangin leitungah thuman loin a kigamtatnate khempeuh ka ngaihsun kik leuleu hi. Nenniamna a thuak mite kap uh a, ahi zongin kuamah in amaute hehnem lo uh hi. A nengniam mite thahat lua uh ahih manin kuamah in thuk ngam lo hi. [2] A hinglai mite sangin a si khinsa mite hamphazaw ka sa hi. [3] Mihing a hong piang nai lo, hih leitung gitlohna teng a mu nai lote hamphazaw lai sawnsawn uh hi. [4] Mi khatlekhat, hauhnop mana kidemna hangin nakpi taka na kisem ahihna ka mu hi. Hih zong a mawknapi hi a, huihpi nungdelh mah tawh kibang bek hi. [5] Mihaite in na sem loin a khut zepin om uh a, a tawpna-ah gilkialin sihlawh uh hi. [6] Nakpi takin na sem a, a mawknapi ahi ding, khut nih dim sangin lungsim nuamin khut khat dim neihna hoihzaw hi. [7] Nuntakna sungah a mawknapi ahi thudang khat ka mu leuleu hi.
[10] Sum deihna lungsim na neih leh lungkim hun cih na nei ngei kei ding hi. Na hauhnop hangin na deih khempeuh na ngah ngei kei ding hi. Hih pen a mawknapi ahi hi.

[1] A manpha paknamtui sangin minpha hoihzaw a, i suah ni sangin i sih ni hoihzaw hi. [2] Pawisimna sangin sigalna hoihzaw hi. Sih ding bek a ngak ahihna mihing khempeuh in a phawk ding uh kilawm hi. [3] Nuihna sangin dahna hoihzaw hi; na mai hong gumsak zahin na thu theihna hong khangsak hi. [4] Mipilte dahna lakah omtual a, mihaite nopna lakah omtual hi. [5] Mihaite in pahtawina la hong sak sangin mipilte’ hong taina hoihzaw hi. [6] Mihaite’ nuihna pen meikuang sunga selkeu kikhul a puak zaizai tawh kibang a, khiatna nei lo, a mawknapi ahi hi. [7] Mipil khat in midangte a khem ciangin mihai bangin a gamta ahi hi. Sumgolh lakna in a lapa’ gamtat hoihna siasak hi. [8] Thu khatpeuh a kipatna sangin a tawpna hoihzaw a, kiphatsakna sangin lungduaina hoihzaw hi. [9] Heh pahpah kei in; hehna a haihuai ahi hi. [10] “Bang hangin nidang lai-in hih sangin hoihzaw tham ahi hiam?” ci-in dong kei in. Tua bangte pil thudotna hi lo hi. [11] Pilna pen hauhna zahin hoih a, mihingte a dingin phattuamna ahi hi. [12] Sum in hong lungmuansak bangin pilna in zong hong lungmuangsak hi. Pilna a manphatna, a pilte a nuntaksak theihna ahi hi. [13] Pasian’ sepsate ngaihsun dih in. Pasian in a kawi-a a bawlsate kua in mamsakkik thei ahi hiam? [14] Nopna na ngah laitakin lungdam in; haksatna na tuah ciangin hih thu ngaihsun in: Lungdamna le lungkhamna hong piapa pen Pasian hi a, mai lamah bang piang ding cih kuamah in thei lo hi. [15] Ka nuntakna a mawknapi hi a, ahi zongin ka nuntak sungin thu khempeuh ka thei hi. Mi khat hoih napi-in si a, mi khat siahuai napi-in a khansau hi. [16] Tua ahih ciangin hoihlua kei inla, lah sia lua kei in. Bang hangin nang kisiasak tawm ding na hi hiam? [17] Gilo lua, hau lua kei in. Bang hangin khansih laizang ding na hi hiam? [18] A nih tuakin lenkip in. Pasian na zahtak nakleh khat peuhpeuh na zuihna-ah na maa vang ding hi. [19] Khuapi a uk mihing sawm sangin pilna in mi khat hatsak zaw hi. [20] A manin a gamta, a khial ngei het lo, leitungah mi khat zong om het lo hi. [21] Mi’ gen khempeuh thudon kei in. Na nasempa’ hong samsiatna na zakha ding hi. [22] Nang zong midang na samsiat zelzelna teltakin na kithei hi. [23] Hihte khempeuh ka pilna tawh ka ze-et a, pil ding ka hahkat hangin kei’ batzawh ding hi lo hi. [24] Mihing nuntakna kua in theikhia zo ding ahi hiam? Eite a dingin thuk lua a, telhak lua hi. [25] Keimah in pilna siamna ka theih nading, pilna mu-in thupiangte a hang ka theih nadingin nakpitakin hanciamin ka lungsim ka pia a, haina a hoih lohna le a haihuaina ka theikhia hi. [26] Sihna sangin numei a siahuai zawkna ka theikhia hi. Ama hong piak itna in thang bangin hong tepcip a, ama hong kawina khut in sikkhau bangin hong hencip hi. Pasian’ deihna bangin a gamtate in tua bang numei pelhthei a, ahi zongin a mawh nuamte a thangah a awk uh hi. [27] Thugen siampa in hih bangin ci hi: Thu ka kan ciangin, a banbanin thu ka phawkkhia hi. [28] A thudang ka zonzon hangin bangmah ka muzo nawnkei hi. Pasal tulkhat sung pan khat bang bek a pil a omkhak theihna, ahi zongin numei lakah a pil cih bang a om lohna keimah in ka phawkkhia hi. [29] Keima theihkhiat thu in: Pasian in eite a thuman dingin hong bawl hinapi-in, eite in paulap tuamtuam zongin, i kikai-awksak hi.
[5] A hing laite in a si ding ahihlam uh thei a, a sisate in bangmah thei nawn lo uh hi. A sisate in thaman bangmah nei nawn lo uh a, amaute kiphawkkha nawn lo hi.

[11] Hih leitungah ka phawk dang thu khat in: A taihat mite in tai kidemna-ah zo tawntung lo a, galhang thahatte in gal zo tawntung lo hi. A pilte in an a kham ngah tawntung lo a, a pilte hau tawntung lo hi. Hih theih siamna a neite milian suak tawntung lo hi. Mi khempeuh tungah kamsiatna vive tung hi.
[13] Thugen a kipat ciangun bangtumlo teng tawh kipan pah malam uh a, gitloh vai teng tawh a thugen a khum lel uh hi.
[8] Bang hang hiam cih leh keima ngaihsutnate nomau’ ngaihsutna bang hi lo a, keima paiziate nomau’ paizia bang hi lo hi, TOPA in ci hi.
[15] Thuman om lo lua ahih manin siatna a pelh mipa pen mihai-in kingaihsun zawsop hi. TOPA in hih thu mu a, thutang om lo ahih manin amah lungkim lo hi.

[6] Kote khempeuh mawhnei mi ka hi khin uh a, ka gamtat hoih khempeuh uh zong puannin tawh kibanglai veve hi. Kote khempeuh singteh bangin ka vul uh a, ka mawhna hangun huih letkhiat nahthel keu ka bang uh hi.
[23] TOPA aw, mihing’ omdan ama uk theih ahih lohna ka theita a, ama kalsuanna ding ama geeltheih hi lo hi.

[9] “Na khempeuh lakah lungsim a khem hatpen hi a, a kisia pha mahmah ahi hi. Kua in lungsim theizo ding ahi hiam? [10] Keimah TOPA in mi khempeuh’ nuntakzia le a gamtatna tawh kizui-in a piakhia dingin ngaihsutna ka entel a, lungsim ka sittel hi,” a ci hi.
[2] Mite in thuciamna bawl napi-in a thuciamte uh palsat uh hi. Zuau genin, mi thatin, guta-in, nulepa mawhna bawl uh hi. A sia khat khit a sia khat a banbanin gamta-in a mawhna uh behlaplap uh hi.
[2] Note in mite’ kiat nadingin Shittim-ah gum a thukpi-in na to uh hi; hih thu hangin note kong thuhilh ding hi.
[4] Amaute a kampi bek uh hi a, a kampi bekun thu genin thuciamna a bawl uh hi. Lolai-a tu-ma-kuakte sungah gunei kiak a po mah bangin thusia neihna hong khang hi.

[5] Na vengte’ thu upin nei kei inla, na lawmte zong muanin nei kei in. Na ang a lum na zi kiang nangawnah thu na gen ding kidawm in. [6] Tuhun ciangin tapate in a pate haibawl a, tanute in a nute langpan’ uh a, mote in a teeknu uh langneih uh hi. Mi khat a dingin ama innkuanpihte mah a gal a suak mawk hi.

[21] Bang hang hiam cih leh na sum omna uhah na lungsim uh om tawntung ding hi. [22] “Mittang pen pumpi a dingin meivak tawh kibang hi. Na mit uh ciim leh na pumpi un hoihtakin khua mu thei hi. [23] Ahi zongin na mit uh maang leh na pumpi uh a dingin khua a mial hi. Tua ahih manin note’ sunga a om khuavak pen a mial hileh tua mialna pen nasia mahmah ding hi.

[16] “Ahi zongin tuhun mite bang tawh genteh ding ka hi hiam cih leh: Mihon omna lamkabomah a tu naupang a kimawlte tawh kibang uh hi. Naupang honkhat in a lawmte kiangah, [17] ‘Lam nading khuang kong tumsak uh hangin na lam nuam kei uh a, kah la ka sak uh hangin lah na kap nuam tuan kei uh hi,’ a kicite tawh a kibang uh hi.
[8] ‘Hih mite in a kampi bek uh tawh kei hong zahtak bawl uh a, ahi zongin a lungsim taktak uh kei tawh kigamla hi.

[18] Ahi zongin kam sung panin a pusuakte pen lungsim panin hong kipankhia hi a, hihte in mi ninsakthei hi. [19] Bang hang hiam cih leh lungsim panin mi thahnopna, mi zi tawh mawhnopna, nungak tawh mawhnopna, guktakna, zuau genna, mi gensiatna, le ngaihsut hoih lo a tuamtuam hong piangkhia hi. [20] Hih bang nate in mi ninsak a, khut sil loin annekna in mi ninsak lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[26] Ahi zongin Jesuh in amaute enin, “Mihingte’ hihzawh ding hi lo mah hi; ahi zongin Pasian in na khempeuh hihthei hi,” a ci hi.
[41] Ze-etna-ah na puk khak loh nadingun thu ngen un. Lungsim in ze-etna nang nuam napi-in pumpi in nangzo lo hi,” a ci hi.

[3] A lehhek pa Judas in Jesuh a si dingin thu a kikhenna a muh ciangin kisikkik ahih manin siampi liante le upate kiangah a ngun peek sawmthumte va paipih kik a, [4] “Mawhna a nei lo mipa a si dingin lehhek kha ka hih manin ka mawh hi,” a va ci hi. Ahi zongin amaute in, “Kote tawh bang kisai nawn ding ahi hiam? Nangma tavuan ahi hi,” a na cihsan uh hi.

[20] Mihingte sung panin a pusuak khiate in mihing ninsak hi. [21] Bang hang hiam cih leh mihingte’ lungsim sung panin nungak-tangval mawhnopna, guktakna, mi thahna, zilepasal neisate tawh mawhnopna, [22] huaihamna, gitlohna, khemna, gamtat hoih lohna, enna, mi gensiatna, kisialhna, le haitatna a piangsakthei ngaihsutna hoih lote khempeuh, [23] mihingte sung panin pusuakin mite ninsak ahihlam thei lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
[24] Tua ciangin Jesuh in a thugen zomlai a, “Ke’n kong cihin-ah, kamsang a kuamah peuh ama khua-ah kipakta ngei lo hi.

[45] Mihoih pa in a lungsim sunga thuhoih omteng hong suahkhia a, migilo pa in a lungsim sunga a gitlohna teng hong suahkhia hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mite pen amau’ lungsim sunga a om bangbang a hong paukhia uh ahi hi.

[14] Jesuh in a pau thei lo mi khat sung panin dawi hawlkhia a, dawi a paikhiat khit ciangin a mipa pauthei a, mite in lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi. [15] Ahi zongin mi pawlkhat in, “Dawimangpa Beelzebul in dawi hawlkhiat theih nading vangliatna ama tungah a pia ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.

[7] “Note khatpeuh in na lo uh hong khawhsak ahi a, na tuu uh a hong cinsak ahi zongin nasem khat nei le-uhcin, inn-ah a hong tun ciangin, ‘Hong pai inla na an ne pah in,’ na ci uh hiam? [8] Na ci kei uh hi. Ama kiangah, ‘Ka nitak-an ding hong bawl inla, na puan silhin ka annek sungteng hong vil in. Ka man khit ciangin na ne thei ding hi,’ na cizaw uh hi. [9] Tua bangin a sawlteng a sepna hangin a nasempa tungah, ‘Ka nuam mahmah hi,’ ci tuan lo hi. [10] Tua mah bangin note in zong hong kisawlteng na sepkhit uh ciangin, ‘Nasem mawkmawkte mah ihi a, i tavuanteng bek mah a sem khin ihi hi,’ na ci uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[11] A khua le a tui-ah va pai a, ahi zongin a khuapih a tuipihte in ama thugen na ngai lo uh hi.

[19] Tua bangin mawhsak thukhenna a thuakna uh a hang in: Leitungah khuavak hong tungkhin napi-in a gamtatna uh hoih lo ahih manin leitung mite in khuavak sangin khuamial deihzaw uh hi. [20] A gamtat hoih lo mite in a siatna uh a kilatkhak ding ut lo uh ahih manin khuavak deih lo uh a, khuavakah pai nuam lo uh hi. [21] Ahi zongin thumanin a gamta mite ahihleh a gamtatnate uh Pasian’ deihna tawh kituak hi, ci-in a kilatsak theih nadingun khuavak sungah a pai uh hi.
[48] Jesuh in ama kiangah, “Note in lim le nalamdang lian ka bawl na muh kei uhleh Topa ka hihna thu na hong um kei ding uh hi,” a cih ciangin
[63] Nuntakna a piathei pen Pasian’ Kha hi a, mihingte’ hihtheih bangmah om lo hi. Keima hong gen thute pen nuntakna a hong piathei tua Kha thu ahi hi.
[15] Thu a thei lopi-in kei na hong mawhsak uh hi; ahi zongin ke’n kuamah ka mawhsak kei hi.

[44] Note pen na pa uh Dawimangpa’ tate na hi uh a, na pa uh deihna bangin a gamta nuam na hi uh hi. A kipat a kipanin na pa uh mi that hi a, thuman gen ngei lo ahih manin thuman tawh kipawl thei lo hi. Amah pen zuauna khempeuh a pianna a zuaugen pa ahih manin zuau a gen ciangin ama ngeina hi lel hi.
[12] “Ka hong gen ding tampi tak omlai hi; ahi zongin hong gen lai leng note a dingin tamlua ding hi.
[21] Numei in a ta a suahhun a tun ciangin na sa ahih manin a dah hi. Ahi zongin a ta a suahkhit ciangin leitungah naungek khat a piangsak khin ahihna hangin lungdamin a natna teng a mangngilh ta hi.

[1] Ikonium khua a tun uh ciangin Paul le Barnabas zong Jew mite kikhopna inn-ah pai uh a, amaute’ thuhilhna hangin Jew mi le Gentail mi tampi tak in Pasian thu um uh hi. [2] Ahi zongin thu um lo Jew mite in Gentail mite holhthawh uh a, thu um mite a mudahsak uh hi.
[18] Mihingte in a mawhna le a gitlohna hangun Pasian’ thuman seelcip uh ahih manin van panin a hehna hong kilang sakin a gimpiakna dingzia hong kilangsak hi.

[24] Mihingte tua zahta-in hailua uh ahih manin amau ututin a gamtat theih nadingun Pasian in khahkhong vet a, a zumhuai mahmahpi-in a gamta uh hi. [25] Amaute in a man ahi Pasian’ thu um nuam lo uh a, a tawntungin phat dingin a kilawm a Piangsak pa bia loin, Pasian’ bawlsa nate bia-in a zui uh hi. Tu-a bangin hi takpi uh hi.

[28] Mite in a man ahi Pasian’ thu ngaihsutin nei nuam lo uh ahih manin amaute’ ngaihsut hoih lo bangin a gamtat theih nadingun Pasian in a khahkhia hi. Tua ahih manin a gamtat dingun a kilawm lopipi-in a gamta uh hi.

[14] Gentail mite in thukham a neih loh uh hangin amau’ ngaihsut tawmna tawh thukham’ deihna bang a gamtat uh ciangin tua thukham’ deihna a zui uh hi a, thukham a neih loh uh hangin a gamtat dingun a kilawm amau mahmah in a thei tawm uh ahi hi. [15] Amau’ lungsim sungah thukham’ deihnate omkhin ahihna thu a gamtatna un hong kilangsak hi. Amau mahmah zong khat veivei hoih kisa, khat veivei sia kisa uh ahih manin, amau’ lungsim sungah thukham’ deihnate theihna omkhin ahihna thu, hih amau’ kiphawk tawmna lungsim in nakpitakin hong kitelsak hi.
[10] Lai Siangtho sungah zong, “Pasian’ muhna-ah mi man kuamah om lo a, [11] a man a thei kuamah om lo a, Pasian tawh kipawl ding a hanciam kuamah om lo hi.
[23] Mi khempeuh mawh ciat uh a, a hong honkhia Pasian tawh kigamla uh hi.

[12] Mi khat hangin leitungah mawhna hong om a, tua mawhna hangin sihna hong piang hi. Mi khempeuh mawh uh ahih manin tu-a bangzia-in mi khempeuh tungah sihna hong tung hi. [13] Thukham a om mapekin leitungah mawhna na omkhin a, thukham a om lohna munah Pasian in mawhna a ciaptehna laibu nei lo hi. [14] Ahi zongin Adam hun a kipan Moses hun dongin sihna in mite uk a, Adam in Pasian’ thupiak a man loh manin a khialh bangin a khial nai lo mite nangawn sihna khutnuai mah hi veve uh hi. Adam pen a hong pai lai ding mipa’ lim ahi hi. [15] Ahi zongin Pasian’ hong piak letsong pen Adam’ mawhna tawh kibang lo ahih manin tua tegel tehkak theih ding hi lo hi. Tua mi khat a khialhna hangin mi tampi a sihna pen a man mah ahi hi. Ahi zongin Pasian’ hong itna le hong hehpihna nakpitakin lianzaw lai a, mi khat ahi tua Jesuh Khrih’ hehpihna hangin mi tampi tak tungah hong kipia letsong lian mahmah hi. [16] Pasian’ letsong le mi khat’ mawhna a hatna zia kilamdang hi. Khialhna khat a om khit ciangin, “Mawh hi,” ci-in thukhenna kipia a, ahi zongin khialhna tampi tak a om khit ciangin a kilawm lopi mahin, “Dik hi,” cihna piakkhong thupha a om hi. [17] Mi khat bek’ mawhna hangin sihna in hong uk ahihleh mi khat mah ahi Jesuh Khrih hangin nakpitakin a lian Pasian’ hehpihna le mihoih-a sanna a ngah mite nungta-in thahatzaw kan ding uh hi. [18] Tua hi a, khialhna khat in mi khempeuh tungah thukhenna tungsak ahih mah bangin gamtatna hoih khat mah in mi khempeuh khahin nungtasak hi. [19] Mi khat in thu a man loh manin mi tampi mimawh a suahsak mah bangin mi khat in thu a manna hangin mi tampi in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna a ngah ding uh ahi hi.

[17] Tua ahih manin tua bangin a gamta taktak pen kei hi loin ka sunga om mawhna hizaw hi. [18] Ka leitung pumpi sungah a hoih na khat beek om lo hi, ci-in ka thei hi. Ka sungah a hoih gamtatnopna lungsim a om hangin ka hihzo kei hi. [19] A hoih ka gamtatnop teng gamta loin, ka hihnop loh siatnate ka gamta zawsop hi. [20] Ka gamtat nop lohteng ka gamtat veve ciangin tua a gamta pen kei hi nawn loin ka sunga om mawhna a gamta ahihna a hong kilang hi. [21] Tua ahih ciangin a hoih gamta nuam hinapi-in a sia bekbek a gamtakha ka hihna ka thei hi. [22] Ka lungsim tawng taktakah Pasian’ thukham hoih ka sa hi. [23] Ahi zongin kei’ deih loh thudang khat in ka lungsimah na hong sem hi. Tua ka sunga na hong sem pen in mawhna thu-ah kei hong mancip hi.

[2] Leitung mihingte’ gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahphasak un. Tua hileh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkimsakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian’ deihna na phawk thei ding uh hi.
[18] Tua bang mite in i Topa Khrih’ na a sem hi loin, gilpi vai bek a sem uh ahi hi. Amaute in mite phatin kamkhum nono zang uh ahih manin mihoih pawlkhat a khemzo uh hi.

[14] Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho a nei lo mite in Pasian’ Kha Siangtho in a hong piak nate sang thei lo uh hi. Kha Siangtho a nei mite bek in theithei uh ahih manin amaute in tel thei lo uh a, amau a dingin a haihuai thu khat ahi lel hi.

[16] Note pen Pasian’ biakinn na hihna uh le note sungah Pasian’ Kha Siangtho a teng ahih lamtak na theihsa uh ahi hi. [17] Mi khatpeuh in Pasian’ biakinn susia leh Pasian in tua mipa susia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ biakinn a siangtho hi a, note zong tua biakinn siangtho na hi uh hi.
[14] I pianpih ngeina mahmahah zong pasalte in sam sau a khawi pen amau a dingin a zumhuai thu ahihna,
[11] Naupang ka hih hun lai-in naupang mah bangin kampau-in, thu ngaihsunin, ka gamta hi. Ahi zongin tu-in khangham ka hih manin naupang vaite ka zang nawn kei hi.
[16] Tua thu hangin ka lungkia tuan kei uh hi. Kote’ leitung pumpi in damdamin muatlam ding a manawh ahi zongin ka kha nuntakna uh a nini-in thaksuak semsem hi.

[11] Note in kei a hong pakta ding hinapi-in hong pakta lo na hih manun note’ bawlin mihai bangin kisialin ka gamta hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen bangmahpi ka hihloh hangin sawltak thupi mahmahin na ngaihsutte uh sangin themkhat zong ka neuzaw tuan het kei hi. [12] Sawltak man taktak ka hihna lim a kilangsak nate, note lakah lungduai takin hong kisem a, lim, nalamdang, le na a tuamtuamte note lakah hong kibawl hi.

[19] Tu-in mihing pianzia hong kitel a, tuate pen: Numei tawh mawhna, thangtatna, lanluat mana khialhna, [20] milim biakna, mi bumna, kilangbawlna, kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, kikhenna, pawltuam lungsim neihna, [21] enna, zukhamna le biakna pawi-ah zukhamna a kipan adangdangte ahi hi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian’ Ukna sungah omkha het lo ding hi.
[3] Mi khatpeuh, bangmah hi lo napi-in amah a kithupi ngaihsut mawkmawk leh amah le amah a kikhem ahi hi.

[7] Pasian a kikhemzo dingin ngaihsunkha kei un. Mi khempeuh in ama vawh nam khaici mah ngahkik ding hi. [8] Mi khatpeuh in ama leitung pumpi deihna khaici a vawh leh sihna ngah ding a, Kha Siangtho deihna khaici a vawh leh Kha Siangtho tung panin nuntak tawntungna ngah ding hi. [9] Tua ahih manin na hoih sep ding cimtak kei ni. Lungkia loin i sep nakleh a hun ciangin thaman i ngah ding hi. [10] Tua ahih ciangin hunhoih i ngah simin midangte tungah a hoihin i gamta ding a, a diakdiakin thu upna sungah i innkuanpihte khempeuh tungah i hoih gamtat ding i phawk ding hi.

[3] A taktakin eite khempeuh zong amaute mah i bang ngei a, i pianpih lungsim zui-in nungta-in, i pumpi le i lungsim deihna bangin i gamta hi. Tua ahih manin eite khempeuh zong Pasian’ hehna hangin gim a thuak dingte ihi hi.
[18] a ngaihsutnate uh khuamial tawh kibang hi. Amaute’ lungsim khauhin bangmah thei het lo uh ahih manin Pasian’ hong piak nuntakna neikha het lo uh hi.

[5] Bang hang hiam cih leh note kiangah Lungdamna Thu ka hong hilh lai-un kam bek tawh a hong gen hi loin, Kha Siangtho’ vangliatna le Lungdamna Thu a man taktak hi, ci-in theihna tawh a hong pai ka hi uh hi. Note kiangah ka om laitakun note’ phattuam nadingin ka sep ka bawlna khempeuh uh na thei uh hi.

[6] Pasian biakna hangin a neihsateng tawh a lungkim mite pen biakna in mihau a suaksak takpi mah ahi hi. [7] A taktakin ci lehang, leitungah mihingin i suah laitakin sumlepai tawh i suak kei a, i sih ciangin zong leitung panin bangmah i keng thei tuan kei hi. [8] Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn, nikten puansilh i neih nakleh a phazo ahi hi. [9] Ahi zongin a haunuam mite in ze-etna a tuamtuam thuak a, duhhopna, huaihamna a haivai thute-ah awkcipin, haksatna le siatna a tuahlawh uh hi. [10] Sum deihluatna in siatna namkim piangsak hi. Mi pawlkhat in sum deihlua liang uh ahih manin a upna panun pialkhia-in gimna lungkhamna tampi a thuaklawh uh hi.
[6] Tua bang mite pawlkhat, mite inn-ah va hawh khiankhianin, deihna nam tuamtuam le mawhna lungsim tawh a kidim numeite na thuzawh uh hi.

[3] Mite in thuman a ngaih nop loh hun, amaute’ deihna bek a zuihnop hun, amaute’ zaknop thute bek a gen ding sia a cial thuahthuah hun hong tung ding hi. [4] Amaute in thuman thutak ngainuam nawn loin tangthu phuahtawm peuh ngaihsutpi-in nei ding uh hi.
[15] Lungsim siangthote a dingin na khempeuh a siang hi a, ahi zongin thu um lote a lungsim ngaihsutnate uh siakhin ahih manin amaute a dingin a siang bangmah om lo hi.

[3] Bang hang hiam cih leh eite zong nidangin haitatin, thumang loin, vakvai-in, duhna deihna a tuamtuamte thuaklahin, thusia le enna lungsim tawh a gamtate, mite in hong mudahin, eite khatlekhat zong a kimudah ngeite ihi hi.
[7] Leitungah mihingin Jesuh a omlai-in sihna panin amah a honkhia thei ding Pasian tungah thu ngenin khitui naptui tawh thumin na kiko hi.

[9] Tua banah, i leitung pate in gim hong pia a, zong i zahtak lai hi. Tua ahihleh kha thu tawh kisai-ah i Pa’ thu mang phazaw-in i nuntak ding kisam hi. [10] I leitung pate in amau’ hoihsak bangin nuntak tomno sung ngaihsutna-in hong thuhilhin gim hong pia a, ahi zongin Pasian in amah tawh kibangin siangtho-in i omtheih nadingin eite hong khualna-in hong thuhilhin gim hong pia hi. [11] Thuhilhna tawh gim hong kipiak ciangin nuam kisa hetloin na kisa mahmah sam a, ahi zongin tua thuhilhna a mangzote in thuman nuntakna hangin nopsakna thaman a nung ngah uh hi.

[13] Mi khat peuhpeuh in tua bang ze-etna a thuak ciangin, “Pasian in kei hong ze-et hi,” ci-in ngaihsun kei hen. Siatna in Pasian ze-et ngei lo a, mite a siat nadingin Pasian in zong ze-et ngei lo hi. [14] Mi khatpeuh in ama deihna zui-in a gamtat ciangin mawhna a piangsak ahi hi. [15] Lungsim utna a gol semsem ciangin mawhna hong piang a, mawhna hong cingtaak ciangin sihna hong piang hi.
[26] Mi khatpeuh in Khristian ka hi hi, ci napi-in kampau a kidopzawh kei leh amahmah a kikhemtawm hi lel a, ama biakna neih a mawkna ahi hi.

[5] Sanggamte aw, hoihtakin na ngai un. Pasian a it mite tungah piak dingin a ciam vantung gam a ngah ding le upna thu-ah mihau a suak dingin Pasian in leitung mizawngte a teel hinapi-in, [6] note in mizawngte na simmawhbawl uh hi. Note hong bawlsia-in thukhen zum hong tun pahpahte, mihaute hizaw uh hi. [7] Pasian in note a hong phuah min hoih a gensiate, mihaute mah ahi uh hi.

[5] Tua mah bangin leii zong i pumpi na sung panin a neu mahmah khat hinapi-in thusia lianpipi piangsak zo hi. Gam khempeuh zong mei-ek neuno khat pan kipanin a kangtum thei hi. [6] Leii pen mei tawh kibang hi. I pumpi na sung panin a neuno khat hinapi-in i pumpi buppi a sia suahthei a, hell khuk sung panin a hong piang mei tawh i nuntakna buppi hong kangtumsak thei hi. [7] Mihingte in gamsa, vasa, a bokvak ganhing le tui sunga om ngasate a kipan ganhing khempeuh zualsakin ukzo uh hi. [8] Ahi zongin siattheih nading gukhal tawh a kidim, a omkhong thei lo leii pen zualsakin a ukzo kuamah om lo hi. [9] I leii tawh eite’ pa ahi Topa i phat thei a, Pasian tawh a kisunin a kibawl i mipihte zong tua i leii mah tawh i samsia thei hi. [10] Kam khat sung panin thupha le thusia pusuak khawm hi. Sanggamte aw, hih bang ahi ding hi het lo hi. [11] Tuinak khat panin tui lim le tui lim lo hong luangkhia khawm thei ahi hiam? [12] Sanggamte aw, theikung in oliv hong gahthei a, leenggui in theipum hong gahthei ahi hiam? Tui-al in tuilim piangsak ngei lo hi. [13] Note lakah pilin thuthei a kisa a om leh kiniamkhiatin pilin, nuntak hoih le gamtat hoih tawh a lahkhiat ding ahi hi.
[16] Enna le huaihamna a om nakleh buaina le siatna nam khempeuh tawh kizom pahpah hi.

[1] Note lakah a om kitotna le kilaina koi panin hong piang ahi hiam? Deihluatna lungsim na neih manun note’ pumsung a kitoktok niloh ahi hi. [2] Na na deih uh a, ahi zongin nei lo na hih manun mi na thatnuam uh hi. Nate deihna lungsim na nei uh a, ahi zongin ngah zo lo na hih manun kitawngin na kilailawh uh hi. Pasian kiangah na deih uh ngen lo na hih manun a ngah lo na hi uh hi.
[2] Tua bang hinapi-in mi tampi tak in amau’ gamtat hoih lohna zui ding uh a, tua bangin amau gamtatna hangin mite in thuman lampi gensia ding uh hi.

[16] Lai a hong gelhna sungah a thugente tu-ate mah a gennuam ahi hi. A laigelhna sungah a telhak thu tampi om a, theihna kicing loin lungsim kip lo mi pawlkhatte in Lai Siangtho sung thu a ututun a kawihei uh bangin Paul’ thugente zong a man lopi-in khia uh ahih manin siatna a tuaklawh uh hi.

[2] Ka lawm itte aw, eite’ pianzia ding taktak a telin hong kilat nai loh hangin tu-in Pasian’ tate ihi hi. Ahi zongin Khrih hong kilat ciangin ama pianzia ahi bang teekteekin mu ding ihih manin amah i bat nading thu teltakin i thei hi.
[19] Hih mite in pawl kikhenna piangsakin, amau pumpi deihna bangin gamta uh a, Kha Siangtho zong nei lo uh hi.
[19] Laban a tuumul met dingin a paikhia hi a, Rachel in a pa’ innsung pasian-te na gu hi.

[3] “Keimah longal pasian dang na bia kei ding uh hi. [4] “A kiseek milim hitaleh, tunga vantung hitaleh, nuai-a leisung hitaleh, leinuai-a om tui sungah hitaleh a om na khat peuhpeuh a sun khat peuhpeuh note a dingin na bawl kei ding uh hi. [5] Tuate’ mai-ah na kun kei ding uh a, tuate na bia kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah note’ TOPA Pasian, a aam Pasian ka hi a, kei hong mudahte’ tungah pate’ mawhna tate’ tungah khang thum khang lina dongin thuk-in, [6] ahih hangin kei hong itin ka thupiakte a zui mi a tul tampite tungah itna kip a lak pa ka hi hi.
[13] Note’ tunga kong gente khempeuh thudon un; pasian dangte’ min genin nei kei unla, na kam sung panun zong tua bangte kizasak kei un.
[6] Amaute zingsangin tho baih uh a, meihal biakna pia-in thunuama biakna zong a paipih uh hi. Pawi an ne-in mite tu uh a, zu khamin numei pasal kisawk ngeingai uh hi.
[7] Tua ahih ciangin amaute in a biak uh keeldawite a dingin amau’ biakpiaknate go nawn lo ding uh hi. Hih pen amau’ khang tawntungin amaute’ tungah ngeina kip khat hi ding hi.
[4] “Milimte lamah kihei kei unla, note in a kisungtawm pasian-te nomau a dingin bawl kei un; kei pen TOPA na Pasian uh ka hi hi.

[1] “Note in nomau a dingin a mai-ah na kun dingun milim bawl loin, a kiseek milim hitaleh biakna song hitaleh na dingsak kei ding uh a, na gam sung uhah suang milim na phut kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen TOPA na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
[30] Keimah in mual dawna na biaknate uh susia-in, na paknamtui biakna taute uh phukin, note’ milim’ siluang hawmte tungah na luanghawmte uh ka pai ding a, keimah in note kong kih ding hi.
[15] “Tua ahih ciangin note hoihtakin kidawm un. Horeb-ah mei sung panin TOPA in note’ tungah thu hong gen ni-in bangmah mu lo na hih manun,

[25] A kiseek amau’ pasian milimte mei tawh na hal ding uh hi. Tua nate-ah na awk khak loh nadingun amaute’ tunga a om kham le ngun deihgawh loin, note a dingin na la kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua pen TOPA na Pasian uh tungah a kihhuai ahi hi. [26] Note’ inn sungah a kihhuai nate na tumpih kei ding uh a, tua nate tawh kibangin samsiat a thuak mi na kisuaksak kei ding uh hi. Note in tua nate mudah mahmahin na kih ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua nate a kisamsia na ahi hi.

[15] “‘ TOPA a dingin a kihhuai ahi, khutsiampa’ khut tawh a kibawl, a kiseek ahi a, a kisung ahi zongin milim bawlin, mun simthamah a koih mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in dawngin, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
[17] A muhdahhuai amau’ na, singlesuang a kibawl, ngunlekham a kibawl, amaute’ lakah a om a milimte uh na mu khin uh hi.

[16] Amaute pen pasian dangte tawh ama hazat theih nadingin gamta uh a, a kihhuai gamtatnate tawh amaute in amah hehsak uh hi. [17] Amaute in pasian ahi lo dawite, amau’ theih ngei loh pasian-te, hong suak nunung pasian thakte, na pu na pate un a theih ngei loh pasian-te’ tungah biakna a pia uh hi.
[14] Pai unla note’ teel pasian-te tungah ko un. Na lungkham hunun amaute kihonkhia sak un,” a ci hi.

[2] Kiriathjearim-ah Thuciamna Singkuang a om a kipan, hun saupi, kum sawmnih bang pha a, Israel mite khempeuh in TOPA ngai-in thuum uh hi. [3] Tua ciangin Samuel in Israel mite khempeuh kiangah, “Na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh TOPA’ lamah a kiheikik na hih uhleh note’ lak panin gamdang pasian-te le Ashtaroth nusian milim koihkhia-in TOPA’ lamah na lungsim uh ngat unla, amah bek bia un. Tua hileh amah in Filistia-te’ khutsung panin note hong honkhia ding hi,” a ci hi.

[23] Bang hang hiam cih leh lehdona pen aisan mawhna bangmah hi a, lungkhauhna pen mawhna le milim biakna mah a bang ahi hi. Nangmah in TOPA’ thu nial khin na hih manin, amah in zong kumpi hihna pan nang hong nolh khin hi,” a ci hi.
[26] TOPA in Israel mite’ mai-ah a hawlkhiat Amor mite mah bangin milimte zui-in a kihhuai mahmahin a gamta hi.
[12] TOPA in amaute tungah, “Note in na hih kei ding uh hi,” a cih milimte’ na sem uh hi.

[15] Amaute in ama thukhamte, le a pu a pate uh tawh a bawl a thuciamna, le amaute tungah a piak hilhkholhnate simmawh uh hi. Amaute in a mawkna milimte zui-in a mawkna suak uh a, amaute tawh kibangin gamta kei un ci-in TOPA in a thupiak tawh kisai-in, amaute in amau’ kiima om minamte zui uh hi. [16] Amaute in TOPA a Pasian uh thupiakte khempeuh nusia-in amau a dingin a kisung bawngno lim nih bawl uh hi. Amaute in Asherah milim khat bawl uh a, vantung a om nate khempeuh bia-in Baal milim na sem uh hi. [17] Amaute in biakna-in a tanute uh le a tapate uh halin vankahna le aisanna zang uh a, TOPA’ muhna-ah a sia a gamta dingin kipia tawmin amah hehsak uh hi. [18] Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite tungah TOPA heh a, ama muhna panin amaute hemkhia hi. Kuamah dang om nawn loin Judah gammi bek omlai hi.

[41] Tua ahih ciangin hih minamte in TOPA bia uh a, a kiseek amau’ milimte’ na zong semkawm uh hi. A tate uh le a tate uh’ tate zong tua bangmahin gamta uh hi. A pu a pate uh gamtat bangin a suan a khakte uh tuni dongin gamta uh hi.

[3] Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a pa Hezekiah’ suksiatsa mualtung a biaknate lamkik hi. Tua ciangin amah in Baal a dingin biakna taute phut a, Israel kumpi Ahab’ bawl bangin Asherah milim khat bawl a, vantung a om nate khempeuh bia-in tuate’ na a sem hi.
[21] Amah in a pa’ khekhap khempeuh tawn a, a pa in a na a sepsak milimte’ na mah semin tuate a bia hi.

[24] Tua tham loin TOPA’ biakinn sungah siampi Hilkiah in a muh laibu sungah a kigelh thukham kammalte amah in a kipsak theih nadingin Judah gam sung le Jerusalem-a om vankahte, aisante, innsung pasian-te, milimte, le a kihhuai nate khempeuh Josiah in a hemkhia hi.
[9] Tua ciangin amaute in ama nate hawkkhia-in a lutang le a galhiam la uh a, a milimte uh le mite kiangah hih thuthak a ko dingin Filistia gam sung khempeuhah kamtaite a sawl uh hi.

[25] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA lian mahmah a, nakpitakin phat ding ahi hi; pasian khempeuh sangin lamdang sakzawk ding ahi hi. [26] Bang hang hiam cih leh minam dangte’ pasian-te milim hi lel a, ahih hangin TOPA ahihleh vantungte a bawlpa ahi hi.
[18] Tua ahih ciangin amaute in a pu a pate uh Pasian, TOPA’ biakinn nusia uh a, Asherah milimte le milim dangte’ na sem uh hi. Hih amau’ mawhna hangin Judah le Jerusalem tungah hehna hong tung hi.

[23] Bang hang hiam cih leh amah a zo Damaskas-te’ pasian-te tungah biakna pia-in, “Syria kumpite’ pasian-te in amaute huh ahih manin amaute in kei hong huh theih nadingun amau’ tungah biakna ka pia ding hi,” ci hi. Ahih hangin tua pasian-te pen amah le a mipihte khempeuh’ siatna ahi hi.
[4] Pasian dang a teelte in amau’ dahna khangsak hi. Amau’ si theh biaknate ke’n bawlpih loin, amau’ pasian-te ka biakpih kei ding hi.
[6] Mawkna milim a thupi ngaihsutte na mudah hi; ahih hangin keimah in TOPA ka hong muang hi.
[1] Thu vaihawm kikhopna sungah Pasian in ama panmun hong len a, amah in pasian-te’ lakah thu a khen hi.
[18] TOPA a kici min nei nangmah bek leitung khempeuhah a Sangpenpa na hihna amaute theisak in.
[5] Bang hang hiam cih leh minam dangte’ pasian khempeuh milim hi lel a, ahih hangin TOPA ahihleh vantungte a bawlpa ahi hi.

[36] Amau a dingin thangzak ahi amau’ milimte a biakpih uh hi. [37] Amaute in a tapate uh le a tanute uh dawi biakna-in a nei uh hi. [38] Amaute in Kanaan gam milimte a biakna-un mawhna nei lo a tanute uh le a tapate uh that uh a, hih mi thahna hangin gam sung a nin a suak hi.

[4] Amau’ milimte pen ngun le kham hi lel a, mihingte’ khut tawh a kibawl ahi hi. [5] Amaute in kam nei napi-in pau thei lo uh a, mit nei napi-in khua mu thei lo uh hi. [6] Amaute in bil nei napi-in khua za lo uh a, nak nei napi-in a nam thei lo uh hi. [7] Amaute in khut nei napi-in lawng thei lo uh a, khe nei napi-in pai thei lo uh hi. Amaute in aw gingsak thei lo uh hi. [8] Tuate a bawlte le tuate a muangte khempeuh pen tuate mah tawh kibang uh hi.

[15] Minam dangte’ pasian-te pen mihingte’ khut tawh a kibawl, ngun le kham ahi hi. [16] Amaute in kam nei napi, pau thei lo uh hi. Amaute in mit nei napi, khua mu thei lo uh hi. [17] Amaute in bil nei napi, khua za thei lo uh hi. Amaute’ kam sungah naksuk naktoh theihna nei lo uh hi. [18] Milim a bawl mite pen milim mah bangsak in. Milim a muang khempeuhte zong tua milimte mah bangsak in.
[8] Amaute in amau khut tawh a bawlsa uh biakna taute don lo ding uh a, amau’ bawlsa Asherah milimte hitaleh paknamtui halna biakna taute hitaleh muanin nei nawn lo ding uh hi.
