Milim a bawlpa in sungin, khamseek pa khat in tua milim kham tawh zut a, tua milim a dingin ngun khainiangte a sunsak hi. [20] Ngun le kham a nei zo lo mipa in biakna-in a zat dingin a muat lo ding sing teel a, a taang thei lo milim khat ama a dingin a bawlsak dingin khutsiam mi khat a zong hi.
[8] “Kei pen TOPA ka hi a, TOPA pen keima min ahi hi. Pasian dang’ tungah keima-a’ tawh a kibang minthanna ka pia kei a, a kisui milimte zong keimah hong kiphatnate pawl ka ngahsak kei hi.
[17] A kisui milimte muangin, a kisung milimte kiangah, ‘Note, komau’ pasian-te na hi uh hi,’ a ci mite kinolh ding a, maizum mahmahin ki-omsak ding hi.

[9] Milim a bawl mite khempeuh a mawkna hi a, amau’ deih milimte in phattuamna piangsak lo hi. Milim a biate in khua mu thei loin, thu theithei lo a, amaute in maizumna a thuak uh hi. [10] Bangmahin a kimang lo pasian kua in bawl a, milim kua in sung ahi hiam? [11] Milim a bia mite khempeuh in maizumna ngah ding uh hi. Milim a bawl khutsiamte pen mi hilel uh hi. Amaute khempeuh kikhawm sakin dingsak un. Amaute nakpitakin kilausak ding a, a vekpi-un maizumin kikoih khawm ding hi.

[15] Tua ciangin tua kung pen mi khat a dingin mei sing a suak hi. Amah in tua sing kimkhat la-in khua lum nadingin mei-in cih a, amah in mei tawhin moh a em hi. Amah in pasian khat zong bawlin bia a, amah in milim khat bawlin tua milim mai-ah a kun hi. [16] Amah in a sing kimkhat meikhukah cih hi. Adang kimkhat tawh an ne a, amah in sa hangin a gil vah hi. Amah in mei awi-in, “Ah, ka khua lumta, mei mu khin ing,” ci hi. [17] Amah in a vallai teng, ama milim pasian khatin a bawl hi. Tua milim mai-ah kunin a bia hi. Amah in tua milim tungah thu ngen a, “Nang pen keima pasian na hih ciangin kei hong honkhia in,” ci hi. [18] Amaute in bangmah thei lo a, amaute in bangmah khentel thei lo uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in bangmah a muh theih loh nadingun amah in a mit uh humsakin, bangmah a theih loh nadingun a lungsim uh khaksak hi. [19] A kimkhat meikhukah cihin, a aam tungah moh zong ka em a, sa hangin ka ne khinzo hi. A omlai teng a kihhuai-in bawl buang ding ka hi hiam? Sing bek khat mai-ah kun buang ding ka hi hiam, a ci ding, thu a ngaihsun, theihna le thumuhna a nei khat beek om lo hi. [20] Amah pen vut a nete tawh kibang lel hi. A lungsim haina in amah lam pialpih khin a, amah le amah kihonkhia thei loin, “Ka khut sungah ka tawi milim pen a zumhuai hi lo ahi hiam?” cih zong phawk thei lo hi.
[20] “Minamte sung panin a suaktalai note aw, nomau kikaikhawmin hong pai unla, hong nai un! Sing milim a pua kawikawi mite in theihna nei lo uh a, a honkhia thei lo pasian tungah thu ngenngen uh hi.

[6] Sumbawm panin khamte uang zatin tawitehna tawh ngunte a tehkhiate in kham seekpa cial uh a, amah in tua nate pen pasian-in a seeksak hi. Tua ciangin amaute kunin tua milim a bia uh hi. [7] Amaute in tua pasian pen a liangko tung uhah ngato-in pua uh a, ama omna ding munah a koih uh hi. Tua a koihna-ah a milim om niloh hi. Ama omna panin kinkhia thei lo hi. Mi khatpeuh in amah sam le amah in dawng thei lo a, ama lungkhamna panin zong a honkhia thei kei hi.
[6] Kuam sunga om suangmaite na la uh a, tua suangmaite na bia uh hi. Tuate tungah tui tawh biakpiakna sungin, an tawh biakpiakna na paipih uh hi. Hih thute’ hangin kei lungdam ding ka hi hiam?

[13] Nang cimawhin na kiko ciangin na milim kaihkhopte kihonsak in! Huih in amaute mutkhia-in, husanna in amaute seemkhia ding hi. Ahih hangin kei hong beel mi in leitang ngah ding a, ka mual siangtho a luah ding hi.
[16] Ka mite in kei hong taisan uh ahih manin a mawhna uh hangin amau’ tungah thu ka khen ding hi; pasian dangte tungah meihal biakna pia uh a, a khut uh tawh a bawlsa uh milimte a bia uh hi.

[18] Naupangte in sing tomin, a pate un mei tawh uh a, nupite in a nusian uh vantung kumpinu a’ ding moh bawlna ding annel meek uh a, kei hong hehsak nadingun, pasian dangte’ dawn dingin leenggahzu tawh biakna a pia tazen uh hi.

[2] Amaute in a it uh, a na a sepsak uh, a delh uh, a zon uhleh a biak uh ahi ni le kha le vana om nate khempeuh mai-ah a kiphokhia ding hi. Tua guhte kikhawm nawn lo ding a, kiphum nawn lo ding hi. Leilak a ek kinusia bang ahi lel ding hi.

[19] Ngai un, gam sung mun khempeuhah ka mite’ tanute kap uh a, “Zion khua-ah TOPA om nawn lo ahi hiam? A kumpipa uh om nawn lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. TOPA in dawngkik a, “Bang hangin milim bawltawmte le a gamdang milimte uh tawh kei hong hehsak ahi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

[2] TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Gamdangte’ omdan ciing kei unla, vantung a lim lamdangte lunghihmawhna-in ngaihsun kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh gamdang mite in tuate a lunghihmawhpih uh hi. [3] Hih mite’ ngeinate a kimanna om lo hi. Gamlakah sing khat kiphuk a, khutsiampa in a hei tawh milimin a bawl hi. [4] Mite in tua pen kham le ngun tawh zem uh a, a kilakkhiat theih loh nadingin sik tawh a kilh uh hi. [5] A milimte uh, tangmai huanah vasate’ lau nadingin a kikhai milimte tawh kibangin pau thei lo uh a, lam pai thei lo uh ahih manin puak a kul hi. Tuate kihta kei un; siatna bawl thei lo uh a, phatna zong bangmah bawl thei lo uh hi,” a ci hi.

[12] Tua ciangin Judah mite le Jerusalem khuamite in meihal biakna tawh a biak uh a pasian-te uh’ kiangah pai-in a va thum ding uh hi. Ahih hangin hih gimna hong tun ciangin a honkhia thei tuan kei ding uh hi.

[27] Na kihhuainate, na angkawmna, na hukna le gamlak mualtungah numei paktat bangin milim pasian peuh na biak kawikawinate ka muzo hi. Jerusalem aw, gimna ngah ta in. Na siantho nadingin bang tanvei sawt ding ahi hiam, a ci hi.

[18] Amaute’ khialhna le a mawhnate uh a zah nihin ka thuk ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a muhthadahhuai siluang hawmte tawh a kibang milimte tawh ka gam a ninsak uh a, kihhuaina tawh ka gamh a dimsak uh hi,” hong ci hi.
[20] Mi in ama pasian ding bawltawm thei ahi hiam? Tuate pasian hi lo hi,” hong ci ding uh hi.

[13] Jerusalem khua-a innte le Judah kumpite’ innte a kipan, innkhum zangah vantung a aksite khempeuh tungah paknamtui hal biakna a kipiakna innte le pasian dangte tungah dawn ding biakna a kibuakna innte khempeuh a vekin Tofeth mun bangin a nin a suak ding hi, ci hi, va ci in,” hong ci hi.

[35] Hinnom Kuam-ah a tapate le a tanute uh tawh Molek pasian a biak nadingun Baal a’ ding biakna tau sangte a bawl uh hi. Hih a kihhuai na semin, Judah mite mawhna a bawlsak nadingun amaute ka sawl kei a, zong ka ngaihsunkha ngei beek kei hi.
[35] Moab gam mualsang tungah biakna pia a, milim pasian-te tungah paknamtui a hal mite, TOPA in kong cihin-ah, tua bang ka hihsak nawn kei ding hi.
[17] Mi khempeuh hai-in pilna nei lo hi khin uh a, kham seekte khempeuh in a milim uh a maizumlawh uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a milim uh zuau hi lel a, nak thei lo hi.
[52] Tua ahih manin en un, TOPA in kong cihin-ah, Babylon khua-ah a om a milimte uh tungah thu ka khen ni hun hong tung ding a, gam sung khempeuhah a liamte a tau ding uh hi.

[9] salin a om ding uh hi. Tua bangin salin a omna uh mun panin, amau’ lungsim cihtak lohna uh hangin kei hong nusiatna uh le keimah sangin milim a deihzawkna uh hangin a maizum nadingun gim a pia ding ka hih lamtak thei-in kei hong phawk ding uh hi. Amau’ gitlohna le a haitatnasate uh hangin amau mahmah kimudahtawm ding uh hi.

[13] Milimte’ lak le biakna tau kiimah si luanghawm kithehthang ding a, mual sang tungteng, mual dawnzangteng, singniim nuai citeng, tawsaw kung lian nuai khempeuh, le milim biakna-in paknamtui a halna uh mun khempeuhah si luanghawm om ziazua kawikawi ding hi. Tua ciangin TOPA ka hih lamtak mi khempeuh in hong thei ding uh hi.

[19] TOPA’ hehna amau’ tungah a tun ni ciangin, a ngun a khamte un amaute suahtak thei lo ahih manin, a ngun a khamte uh nin bangin kongzing lakah paai ding uh hi. A gilkial uh ciangin zong an bangin tuate ne thei lo uh hi. Ngun le khamte in mawhna sungah amaute tumpihzaw hi.

[3] “Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, hih mite in milim bia uh a, milim in mawhna sungah amaute tunpih hi. Amaute’ thu theihnopte a gen dingin hong um uh ahi uh hiam? [4] Tua ahih ciangin Topa PASIAN ahi keimah in amaute tungah ka gen hih thute gen in: Milim bia-in mawhna sungah milimte kitunsak a, tua khit ciangin kamsangte tungah thu a dong dingin a hong pai Israel mi peuhmah in keima thudawnna kam ngah ding uh hi. Tua thudawnna pen a milim tampite uh in a zak dingun a kilawm dawnna hi ding hi.

[20] “Tua ciangin kei tawh na neih na tanute le tapate la-in milim biakna-in haltum dingin na pia hi. Kei tungah na cihtak lohna thuneu lua sa a, [21] milim biak nadingin ka tate piathuah lai na hi hiam?
[36] Topa PASIAN in hih bangin ci hi: Nang in na puante suahkhia-in, numei paktat bangin na pumpi, na lunggulh mite le na milimte tungah kipia-in, milim biakna-in na tate that na hih manin

[6] Amah in Israel mite’ milim biakte biakpih lo a, milim biakna pia lo ding, ci-in a kikhamna munah milim biakna sate zong ne lo hi. Midangte’ zi zong luppih dingin zol lo a, numei in nin a neih laitakin zong luppih lo hi.

[8] Ahi zongin amaute in kei hong demin, ka thugen hong ngai lo uh hi. A muhdahhuai a milimte uh paikhia tuan lo uh a, Egypt pasian-te zong nusia lo uh hi. Tua hi a, ka heh mahmahna teng Egypt gam sungah thuaksakgawp ning, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
[24] Hih bangin kiciamna ka bawlna pen, amaute in ka thupiaknate nialin, ka thukhamte zui lo uh a, ka Sabbath-te siasak uh hi. Tua banah a pu a pate un a biak milimte mah a biakna hang uh ahi hi.

[31] Tuni ciang dongin note in a kipia ngei letsongte mah puakin, tua milimte mah biakna-in na tate uh na hal uh ciangin noleno a kininsaktawm na hi uh hi. Tua bangin na gamtat khit uh ciangin no Israel mite, kei kiangah thu a dong dingin nong pai lai uh hi. Kei pen a nungta Topa PASIAN ka hih mah bangin, note’ thudotin ka om het kei taktak ding hi.
[7] Amah pen Assiria uliante khempeuh tawh a mawhsa khat hi a, ama huk luatna hangin Assiria milimte nangawn va bia hi.
[30] nangma tungah hih bangteng hong tungsak hi. Minam dangte tawh na paktat a, a milimte uh tawh na kininsak hi.

[25] Galsung a a site lak mahah Elam lum a, ama kimkotah a galkapte’ han om hi. Amaute, Pasian a thei loin, gal sungah si uh hi. A hin lai-un mite a lausak ngeite hi uh a, ahi zongin tu-in amaute si-in mindai-in om uh a, galsung a site mah tawh a kibangin gimna a thuak uh hi.
[18] Tua ahih manin gam sungah amaute’ mi thahna le a milimte uh tawh gam sungteng a nitsakna hangun ka hehnateng ka thuaksak hi.

[3] Tua ahih ciangin tua mangliante khempeuh milim ap nadingin milim mai-ah a ding uh hi. [4] Tua ciangin nakpitakin taangkona khat kibawl a, “Minam tuamtuamte le paunam tuamtuamte khempeuh aw! [5] Peengkul ging na za ding uh a, tua khit ciangin tamngaite, laiza lasakna gingte, harp lasakna gingte, gawsemte, le tumtheih a tuamtuamte a hong kitum ciangin Kumpi Nebukhadnezzar’ koih kham milim mai-ah kunin na bia ding uh hi. [6] A kun lo, a bia lo peuhmah thakhat thu-in mei phualpi sungah kikhul pah ding hi,” a ci hi. [7] Tua mah bangin minam kimte, minam tuamtuamte le paunam tuamtuamte khempeuh in tumtheih gingte a zak phetun kunsukin Kumpi Nebukhadnezzar’ kham milim koih a bia uh hi.
[18] Kumpipa aw, a hong hotkhiat kei zenzen leh zong, na pasian lah ka bia tuan kei ding uh a, na kham milim mai-ah zong ka kun kei ding uh hi, ci-in theita in,” a ci uh hi.

[23] Vantung Topa’ langah na pang hi. A biakinnpi hai le kuangte la-in sabuai tungah nangmah tawh, na miliante tawh a zineute le na zite uh tawh zunekna-in na zang uh hi. Theihna a nei lo, a mu thei lo, khua a za thei lo ngun, kham, sumngo, sik, sing, le suang tawh a kibawl pasian-te’ min na phat uh hi. Na nuntakna le na hihna khempeuh a hong uk Pasian na zahtak kei hi.
[38] Tua pasian-te sangin kulhpi a dal pasian a thupisim zaw ding hi. Amah in kham, ngun, suangmanpha, le a thupi letsongte, a pu a pate’ biak ngei loh pasian kiangah a pia ding hi.

[2] TOPA in Hosea tungtawnin Israel-te tungah thu a na gen cil lai-in, amah in Hosea kiangah, “Hih gammite kei tungah citak loin pasian dangte bia uh ahih manin, nang zong hong tulpih lo ding numei paktat khat tenpih inla, tua nu tawh ta nei in,” a ci hi.

[1] TOPA in kei kiangah thu hong genkik a, “Lawm a ngai khinsa, pasal tawh a lumkhawmsa numei khat tawh va kingai in. Israel mite, pasian dangte kiangah pai uh a, leenggahphehkeu tawh a va biak uh hangin, amaute ka it lai veve mah bangin tua numei va it in,” hong ci hi. [2] Tua ahih ciangin ngun shekel sawm le nga le mangbuhham seu sawm le nga tawh zi lei-in [3] ama kiangah, “Sauveipi sung keima zi bangin na om ding a, midang tawh na paktat nawn kei ding hi. Midang tawh na lupkhop loh mah bangin kei nangawn tawh zong i lumkhawm kei ding hi,” ka ci hi. [4] Hih pen kumpi ahi a, makai ahi zongin, biakpiakna le biakpiakna khuampite ahi zongin, siampi puanpi le milim pasian-te nei loin hun saupi sung Israel mite om ding a cihna ahi hi. [5] Tua khit ciangin Israel mite in TOPA amau’ Pasian le a kumpipa uh David lamah hong kiheikik ding uh hi. Tua hun ciangin amaute in TOPA zahtakin, ama letsongte a ngah ding uh hi.
[12] Ka mite in aisanin singthem peuh thudotin nei uh a, amau’ thu theihnopte, ciangkang peuh in gen tazen hi. Amaute in kei hong taisan uh a, a paktat numei bangin pasian dangte a zuan uh hi.

[5] Samaria khuapi mite in a biak kham bawngno ka deih kei hi. Tua a bia mite tungah ka heh hi. Amaute in mihoih a suahna ding uh bang tanvei ngak lai ding ahi uh hiam? [6] Israel sunga om mi khat in tua milim bawl a, tua milim pen Pasian hi lo hi. Samaria mite in a biak milim kisuzan ding hi. [7] Paunak-ah, Huih a tuhte in huih ngahkik ding a, a vui om lo an kung in annek ding piangsak lo hi, kici hi. A vui om lo an kung panin an kingah mah taleh zong gamdang mite in netum ding hi.

[10] TOPA in hih bangin gen hi: Israel kong muh cil-in hoih mahmah a, sehnel gam sunga a gah a zun kiuhkeuh leenggah tawh kibang hi. Na pu na pate uh ka muh cil-in hoih mahmah a, a hun ciangin a min a zun sitset theigah muh tawh kibang hi. Ahi zongin Baalpeor a tun uh ciangin amaute in Baal milim bia pah uh ahih manin, amau’ biak milimte ka muhdah zahin amaute nangawn ka mudah pah hi.
[2] Ahi zongin limsap semsem leng gamla pai semsem hi. Ka mite in Baal tungah biakna pia uh a, milim biakna-in paknamtui a hal uh hi.

[1] Efraim-te beh in thu a gen ciangin a dangte lau uh a, Israel minam beh dangte in Efraim-te beh tung et uh hi. Ahi zongin Baal milim biakna hangin amaute khial uh hi; tua thu hangin si ding uh hi. [2] Tua hinapi-in amaute khialthuah semsem uh a, a biak ding uh milim a bawl uh hi. Amau’ ngunte milimin bawl uh a, a hoihtakin khutsiamte a bawlsak uh hi. Tua ciangin, “Hihte tungah biakna pia un,” a ci uh hi. Mihing in milim bia-in nam tazen uh hi.

[8] Israel mite in milim biakha nawn lo ding uh hi. Amaute’ thungetna pia-in amaute ka kem ding hi. Amaute, a hing tawntung singkung kep bangin ka kem ding hi; amaute’ thupha ngah khempeuh keima kiang pan ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[8] Kimanna a nei lo milim a biate in nangmah hong taisan uh hi.

[7] A milim manphate khempeuh kisuzan gawp ding a, mei tawh kisusia ding hi. Pasian’ tungah a thuman lohna hangun mihingte in hih milimte nei uh ahih manin, a thuman lohna uh tawh kizui-in tu-in thuakkik ding uh hi, ci hi.
[13] Note’ biak milimte le na biakna songte uh ka susia gawp ding a, note’ bawlsa nate na bia nawn kei ding uh hi.

[16] Bang hang hiam cih leh Kumpi Omri’ gamtatna zui-in, ama tapa Kumpi Ahab’ sep khempeuh na sem uh a, amau’ gamtat khempeuh na zui uh hi. Tua ahih manin note kong susia ding hi. Minam dangte in note hong nuihsanin, amaute’ simmawhna na thuak ding uh hi.

[18] Milim, banga kimang ahi hiam? Mihingte’ bawltawm na khat hi lel a, thuman hong gen thei lo hi. Tua bangin a pau thei beek lo pasian a bawlpa in muanin a neih bang phatuam ahi hiam? [19] Sing khatpeuh a kibawl na khat kiangah, “Khanglo in,” ci-in, a pau thei lo suangtum kiangah, “Tho in,” ci na hih manun gimna na ngah ding uh hi. Hih bang milim in note hong hilh thei ding ahi hiam? Ngun le kham tawh limtakin a kizut hangin a sungah nuntakna om lo hi.

[5] Innkhum zangah kahto-in, ni, kha, le aksi a bia mi khempeuh ka susia ding a, keimah hong bia-in, keima tungah thuman ding gen napi-in, Milkom pasian’ min tawh a kiciam teiteite zong, ka susia ding hi.

[2] Mihingte in milim peuh thudotin nei uh a, a thu ngahte uh zuauthu le a mawkna hi lel hi. Mang khiathei-a kineite in lam lakkhial uh a, amau’ hehnepnate a mawknapi hi lel hi. Tua ahih manin tuu bangin mite mangthang uh a, makai a neih loh manun gimna a ngah uh hi.

[11] Judah mite citak loin, Pasian tungah a thuciamna uh palsat uh a, Israel mite’ lak le Jerusalem khua sungah siatna tampi gamta uh hi. TOPA in a it mahmah biakinn ninsak uh hi. TOPA ahi lo, pasian dang a bia numeite, zi-in la-in a tenpih uh hi. [12] Hih bangin a gamta mi peuhmah, a kua a kua hitaleh, TOPA in sugawp hen la, Vanglian TOPA tungah biakna a paipih ei minamte tawh hong kigawmsak nawn kei hen.

[8] Tua ciangin Dawimangpa in mual sang mahmah khatah Jesuh paipihto a, leitung kumpi gam khempeuh le a hoihna teng a lah khit ciangin, [9] “Ka mai-ah kunin kei hong bia lecin hihte khempeuh nangma tungah kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi. [10] Jesuh in, “Satan aw, taikhia in. Lai Siangtho in, ‘Na Topa Pasian bek bia inla, ama na bek sem in,’ ci hi lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.

[8] ‘Hih mite in a kampi bek uh tawh kei hong zahtak bawl uh a, ahi zongin a lungsim taktak uh kei tawh kigamla hi. [9] Mihingte’ bawltawm thukhamte, Pasian’ thukham zahin mite tungah hilh uh ahih manin kei hong biak hangun a kimanna om lo hi,’ ci hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[13] “To nih’ na a semkhawmzo nasem kuamah om lo hi. A to khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat beelin khat a simmawh ding hi. Pasian’ na le leitung sum na na semkhawmzo kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[29] Tua a kisam thute in: Milim biakna-in a kipiasa an khat peuhpeuh na nek loh nading uh, sasi na nek loh nading uh, a si luangkhiasak loin a kigawlmek sa khat peuhpeuh na nek loh nading uh, le numei tawh khialhna panin na kikep nading uh ahi hi. Hih thute hoihtakin zui le-uhcin note a dingin hoih ding hi. Na cidam ta un,” ci-in kigelh hi.
[29] Eite pen Pasian’ tate ihih manin, mihing khutsiamte in bawlin a zep ngunte, khamte, suang milimte tawh a kibang dingin Pasian i ngaihsun kei ding hi.

[22] Amaute pil a kisak mahmah uh hangin a hai mahmah uh ahi hi. [23] A hing tawntung Pasian bia loin, mi, vasa, ganhing, ahih kei leh a bokvak ganhingte tawh a kibang limte a bia zawsop uh hi. [24] Mihingte tua zahta-in hailua uh ahih manin amau ututin a gamtat theih nadingun Pasian in khahkhong vet a, a zumhuai mahmahpi-in a gamta uh hi. [25] Amaute in a man ahi Pasian’ thu um nuam lo uh a, a tawntungin phat dingin a kilawm a Piangsak pa bia loin, Pasian’ bawlsa nate bia-in a zui uh hi. Tu-a bangin hi takpi uh hi.

[9] Migilote, Pasian’ Ukna sungah a lut hetloh nading thu na thei uh hi. Note kihaibawl kei un. Numei tawh a paktatte, milim biate, mi zi ahih kei leh mi pasal tawh a mawhte, pasal le pasal a khialte,
[7] amaute pawlkhat in a biak bangin milim i bia kei ding hi. Lai Siangtho in, “Anne zune dingin mite tu uh a, tua khit ciangin a lam dingin a ding uh hi,” na ci hi.
[14] Tua ahih manin lawm itte aw, milim biakna pelh un.

[18] Israel mite’ thu ngaihsun dih un. Biakna sa a ne khempeuh pen biakna tau tungah Pasian biakna thu-ah a kipawl hi lo ahi uh hiam? [19] Hih bang ka cih ciangin bang ka cihnopna ahi hiam? Milim ahi a, milim biakna sa ahi zongin thupi hi, a cinuam ka hi kei hi. [20] Ka cihnopna pen, lawkite in gan a gawh uh ciangin dawi a biakna uh hi a, Pasian a biakna uh hi lo hi. Dawi biakna-ah note na kihel ding uh ka hong deih kei hi. [21] Note in Topa tawh nekkhawmna hai sung pan le dawi tawh nekkhawmna hai sung panin na dawnkhawm thei kei ding uh hi. Topa tawh nekkhawmna an leh dawi tawh nekkhawmna an zong na nekhawm thei kei ding uh hi.
[2] Lawki na hih lai-un a pau thei lo milimte’ thu-in na gamta uh a, na lungsim uh tua milimte in hong zo mahmah hi.
[8] A beisa hunah Pasian thei lo na hih manun Pasian ahi lo vangliatna a neite’ sila-in na om uh hi.

[19] Tu-in mihing pianzia hong kitel a, tuate pen: Numei tawh mawhna, thangtatna, lanluat mana khialhna, [20] milim biakna, mi bumna, kilangbawlna, kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, kikhenna, pawltuam lungsim neihna, [21] enna, zukhamna le biakna pawi-ah zukhamna a kipan adangdangte ahi hi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian’ Ukna sungah omkha het lo ding hi.
[5] Tua ahih manin nulepa mawhna, a kilawm lo gamtatna, hukna lanna, a hoih lo lunggulhna, le milim biakna nam khat ahih manin huaihamna ahi note sungah a om leitung lungsimte na sisak un.
[4] Tu-in note in dawibiate pawlpih nawn loin ut utin na phengtat loh uh ciangin lamdangsa-in note hong kosia uh hi.
[21] Ka itte aw, milim na biakkhak loh nadingun na kidawm un.

[14] Ahi zongin note ka hong mawhsak nading thu tawmkhat a om hi. Milim biakna ante nesakin, nulepa paktatna piangsak a, Israel mite mawhna a gamtasak Balak tungah thu a hilh Balaam’ thuhilhnate a um mi pawlkhat note lakah a om hi.

[20] Ahi zongin note ka hong mawhsak nading thu khat om hi. Kamsang numei ka hi, ci-in thu a gen Jezebel na nial kei uh hi. Ama thuhilhna hangin ka nasemte in numei-pasal paktatna gamta-in milim biakna ante a ne uh hi. [21] Tua numei a kisikkik nading hun ka piak hangin a paktatna panin kihei nuam lo hi. [22] Tua ahih manin tu-in tua numei tawh a paktatna uh panin a kisikkik kei uhleh tua numei le amah tawh a paktat mi khempeuh, lupna ngaksakin nakpitakin gimna ka thuaksak ding hi.

[20] Hih gimna tawh a si lo midangte pen amau’ gamtatnasa panin kikhelkik nuam lo uh hi. Dawi a biaknate uh, khua a mu thei lo, khua a za thei lo, lam a pai thei lo ngun, kham, sumngo, suang, le sing a kibawl milim a biakte uh khawl tuan lo uh hi.

[14] Ganhing masa omna-ah nalamdang bawltheih nading thu ngah ahih manin a nalamdang bawlna tawh leitungah a om mi khempeuh khem a, namsau tawh a si ding zahin a kisat liamsa hinapi a nungta lai ganhing pahtawi nading milim khat a bawl nadingun a gen hi.
[8] Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, le zuaugente om nading mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[14] Khuapi kulhkongpi sungah a luttheih nading le nuntakna singgah a nektheih nadingun a puan uh a siangin a sawp mite, mi hampha ahi uh hi. [15] Ahi zongin a lampial mite, aisan mite, a paktat mite, mi thatte, milim biate, le zuaugen nuamsa-in zuau a gengen mite, khuapi pualamah a om uh hi.

[28] Pasian in amaute thupha pia a, Pasian in amaute tungah, “Ci pha-in tampi pha unla, leitung dimin zo un. Tuipi ngasate tung, leitungah a gamtang, a nungtate khempeuh tungah ukna nei ta un,” a ci hi.
[1] Tu-in mipa in ama zi Eve luppih a, amah gai-in Kain nei a, “ TOPA’ huhna tawh mi khat ka ngah khin hi,” ci hi.
[6] Mi a that peuhmahte pen, midangte in amah that ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in ama lim bangin mi bawl hi.

[21] Isaac in TOPA’ tungah a zi a dingin thu ngen hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah ciing hi. TOPA in ama thungetna pia a, a zi Rebekah gai hi. [22] Ama sungah a naute kilaigawp hi. Amah in, “Hih bang ahihleh bang hangin nungta se ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin TOPA kiangah thukan dingin amah pai hi.
[24] Tua zawh kha thum ciangin Judah tungah, “Na monu Tamar paktatin gamta hi. Tua tham loin paktatna tawh naupaii hi,” ci-in kigen hi. Judah in, “Amah paikhiatpih un; amah kihaltum hen,” a ci hi.
[13] “Mi na that kei ding uh hi.

[22] “Mite kitawngin numei naupaii khat liamsak a, tatolhin; ahi zongin siatna in a zuihbeh kei nakleh, tua nu’ pasal in ama tunga a cihzah tawh kituakin tua numei a liamsak mi kigam ding a, thukhente’ khenna bangin amah liau ding hi.

[27] Amah in a tui a dawnsak khit ciangin, tua nu amahmah kininsakin a pasal tungah thuman loin gamta ahihleh, tua tuisia pen ama sungah tumin nasak velval ding a, a pumpi pawmin a pheipi teem ding a, tua numei pen mite lakah hamsiatna-in kizang ding hi. [28] Ahih hangin amahmah a kininsak hi loin a siang ahihleh, tua nu suakta-in ta nei thei ding hi.
[12] A nu’ sung panin a suahkhiat ciangin a pum phel langkhat a bei misi bangin Miriam hisak kei in,” a ci hi.
[17] “‘Mi na that kei ding uh hi.
[14] Ahi zongin, hih bangin gamtatna tawh TOPA thusim peuhmah lo na hih manin nang’ sung panin a hong piang naungek si ding hi,” a ci hi.

[16] Tua hun laitakin Menahem in Tappuah le a sunga teng khempeuh le Tirzah pan a kipan a gam sungteng a luh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in ama a dingin a kongpite uh hong lo uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in luhin, a sunga om numei naupaii khempeuh a phelkham hi.
[3] Amaute in ama kiangah, “Hezekiah in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Tuni pen lungkham ni, hong kitai ni, mindai ni ahi hi. Naungekte a suah hun tung a, amaute hinkhiatna ding thatang om lo hi.
[21] Tua ciangin amah in, “Ka nu sung panin guaktangin ka suak a, guaktang mahin ka ciahkik ding hi. TOPA in hong pia a, TOPA mah in hong lakik hi. TOPA’ min kiphat ta hen,” a ci hi.
[3] “Ka suah ni, le ‘Pasal naungek khat kipaii hi,’ a kicih zan beimang hen!
[16] Bang hangin a hun cing lo-a suakte bang, khuavak a mu man loin a si naungekte bangin hong kiseelcip hoh lo ahi hiam?
[15] Kei a hong piangsak Pasian mah in keima nasemte zong a piangsak ahi hi.

[8] “Nangma khut tawh kei hong lomin na hong piangsak a, tu-in nangma khut mah in kei hong lehsuksiat hi. [9] Leivui pana kei nong bawlna hong phawkkik in. Leivui mahin hong dengvui kik takpi ding na hi hiam? [10] Kei ka pian nadingin ka pa’ tungah tha na guan a, ka nu’ sungah kei nong khangsak hi. [11] Guh le thaguite tawh ka pumpi ding nong bawl a, sazang le vun tawh tua guhte nong tuamsak hi. [12] Kei, nuntakna hong pia-in, nong it tawntung a, nangma hong kepna hangin kei ka nungta hi.

[9] Ahih hangin nang pen gil sung panin kei a hong suaksakpa na hi a, ka nu’ ang sungah a muanhuai-in keimah na hong kem hi. [10] Ka suah tung a kipan nangma tungah kong tung a, ka nu in hong paii lai a kipan keima Pasian na hi hi.
[5] A khialsa mahin kei ka suak a, ka nu in a gil sungah hong paii tung a kipan a mawh sa ka hi hi.
[3] En un, tate pen TOPA’ tung pana letsong hi a, tapate pen ama hong piak thupha ahi hi.

[13] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka pumpi na khempeuh na hong piangsak a, ka nu’ gil sungah keimah nong khuituah hi. [14] Kihtak dingin a kilawm na hih manin nang ka hong phat hi. Na nasepnate lamdang mahmah! Nangmah in kei nong lim theih mahmah hi. [15] A thukna sung mun simthamah kei hong kikhuituahin hong kibawl laitakin, ka guh ka taang, na mai-ah kiliah lo hi. [16] A kipiangsak nai lo keima pumpi nate na mit in a mu hi. Ka pumpi nate khat beek a om ma, ka ni zah ding a kiciangtan laitakin, tuate khempeuh na laibu sungah kigelh khin hi.

[11] Thah dinga a kikaikhia mipa honkhia inla, sih nading mun a zuan mipa lehkaih kik in. [12] Ke’n theikha kei ing, na cihnop hangin lungsim a thei Pasian in theitel veve hi; nang hong encik Pasian in hong teltheihna phawk in. Mi khempeuh a gamtatna bangin a thukkik ding hi.
[8] Thu a gen thei lo mite a dingin thu gensak inla, a huh ding a om lo mite panpih in.
[5] Nupi gai khat sungah nuntakna thak bangci kipat hiam, ci-in na theihzawh loh mah bangin na khempeuh a bawl Pasian’ nasepna na theizo ngei kei ding hi.
[2] Nangmah a hong bawl, gil sung panin nang a hong piangsak, nang a hong huh ding TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: Ka nasempa Jakob aw, ka teelsa Israel aw, lau kei in.
[24] Gil sung panin nangmah a hong piangsak, nangmah hong Honpa, TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Keimah in na khempeuh bawlin, keimah guak in vantungte zalin, kuama seppih lohin leitung ka zal hi.
[1] Tuipi gei-a om gamte aw, ka thu ngai un. Gamlapi-a om mihingte aw, ka thu ngai un. Ka suah ma-in TOPA in kei hong teel a, ka nu sungah ka om lai-in amah in keima min hong pulak khin hi.

[15] Ahih hangin TOPA in, “Ama sung panin a suak a tapa a hehpih lo ding zahin nupi khat in ama nawi a teep naungek mangngilh thei ding ahi hiam? Hihte nangawn in mangngilhkha thei ding a, ahi zongin keimah in kong mangngilh kei ding hi.
[5] “Gil sungah kong bawl ma-in nang kong thei khinzo hi. Na suah ma-in nang kong teelkhia khinzo a, minam dangte tungah kamsang dingin kong koih khinzo hi,” hong ci hi.
[17] Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in ka nu’ gil sungah kei hong that lo hi. Hong that hileh ka nu’ gil sung ka han suakpah ding hi.
[14] TOPA aw, hih mite tungah na piak ding bang hong ngen ding ka hi hiam? Amaute tatolhsak inla, a nawizu uh kangsak in.
[3] Jakob in a nu sung nangawn pek panin a sanggampa sawk pah a, a khangham ciangin zong Pasian tawh kilai hi.
[16] Israel-te in a Pasian uh lehdo uh ahih manin a mawhna uh thuak ding uh hi. Gal sungah amaute si ding uh a, a naungekte uh lei kidenna ding a, a nupi naupaiite uh kikuikham ding hi, a ci hi.
[15] Topa’ muhna-ah amah milian khat hi ding hi. Amah in leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin ne lo ding hi. A suah phet a kipanin Kha Siangtho tawh kidim ding hi.
[36] Na behnu Elizabeth zong thei in. A ciing hi, kici napi-in a teek mahmah zawh nungin naupaii a, tu-in a naupaii zawh kha guk pha ta hi.

[41] Elizabeth in Mary’ hopihna awging a zak ciangin a sunga a naupaii a hong diang hi. Elizabeth zong Kha Siangtho tawh hong kidim a, [42] nakpitakin kiko-in, “Numei khempeuh lakah thupha ngah pen nu na hi a, na neih ding naungek in thupha ngah ding hi. [43] Ka Topa’ nu kei kiangah hong hawh nadingin, bang hangin hih bang thu lian kei tungah hong tung ahi hiam? [44] Bang hang hiam cih leh nong hopihna awging ka zak phetin ka sunga naungek nuamin a diang hi.
[29] Bang hang hiam cih leh mite in, ‘Ta a nei ngei lo, naungek nawi a teepsak ngei lo numei ciingte mi hampha mahmah ahi hi,’ a cih hun hong tung ding hi.
[21] Numei in a ta a suahhun a tun ciangin na sa ahih manin a dah hi. Ahi zongin a ta a suahkhit ciangin leitungah naungek khat a piangsak khin ahihna hangin lungdamin a natna teng a mangngilh ta hi.
[19] I mipihte na khemgawpin na khelbawl a, a ta ngeekte uh a sih nadingin inn panin mun dangah a koihkhia sak hi.
[18] Mihingte in a mawhna le a gitlohna hangun Pasian’ thuman seelcip uh ahih manin van panin a hehna hong kilang sakin a gimpiakna dingzia hong kilangsak hi.

[28] Mite in a man ahi Pasian’ thu ngaihsutin nei nuam lo uh ahih manin amaute’ ngaihsut hoih lo bangin a gamtat theih nadingun Pasian in a khahkhia hi. Tua ahih manin a gamtat dingun a kilawm lopipi-in a gamta uh hi. [29] Siatna nam khempeuh ahi, hoih lohna, huaihamna, khatlekhat kisiatsak nopna, hazatna, mi thahna, kitotna, khemna, a sialam bekbek ngaihsutna, zuau genna,

[15] Ahi zongin Pasian in a hong hehpihna tawh ka suahma pekin kei hong teelin ama na a sem dingin hong sam khin hi. Keimah in ama Tapa hanga lungdamna thu, Gentail mite lakah ka hilhtheih nadingin kei tungah a Tapa hong kilatsak hun laitakin kuama kiangah thu dongin ka pai kei a,
[2] Tua numei naupaii hi a, nausuah natna tungta ahih manin na sa-in a kiko hi.

[28] Pasian in amaute thupha pia a, Pasian in amaute tungah, “Ci pha-in tampi pha unla, leitung dimin zo un. Tuipi ngasate tung, leitungah a gamtang, a nungtate khempeuh tungah ukna nei ta un,” a ci hi.

[19] Im kei ning. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in Abraham’ tunga a ciamsa thu a tunsak theih nadingin ama khita a tate le a innkuanpihte in thuman le thutangin nasepna tawh TOPA’ thupiakte a zuih theih nadingun a hilh dingin amah ka teel khin hi,” a ci hi.
[1] Rachel in Jakob tawh ta a neih lohna a kimuh ciangin, amah in a sanggamnu eng hi. Amah in Jakob kiangah, “Ta hong pia in, tua ahih kei leh si ning!” a ci hi.
[5] Esau khuadak to-in nupite le naupangte a muh ciangin amah in, “Nang tawh a om hihte kua ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Jakob in, “Pasian in hehpihna tawh na nasempa a piak tate ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[21] Naudomte in Pasian zahtak uh ahih manin amah in amaute tungah suanlekhak a pia hi.

[5] Tuate’ mai-ah na kun kei ding uh a, tuate na bia kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah note’ TOPA Pasian, a aam Pasian ka hi a, kei hong mudahte’ tungah pate’ mawhna tate’ tungah khang thum khang lina dongin thuk-in,
[12] “ TOPA na Pasian un note hong piak leitang tungah na khan uh a sau theih nadingin na nu le na pa uh zahtak un.
[7] Na tate uh tungah limtakin na hilh ding uh a, na innsung uhah na tut uh ciang, lampi-ah na pai uh ciang, na lup ciang uh le na thawh ciangun tua thute na gengen ding uh hi.
[19] Na tate uh tungah na hilh ding uh a, na innsung uhah na lut laitak, lampi-ah na pai laitak, na lup ciang uhleh na thawh ciangun tuate genin na nei ding uh hi.
[4] “Note’ sung pana piangte, le na leitang uh pana piangte, le na ganhing uh pana piang, na bawngte uh pungin na tuuhonte uh tungah thupha om ding hi.
[29] “ TOPA i Pasian in hong lahkhiat loh thusim om a, ahih hangin hih thukham sunga om thute khempeuh i zuih theih nadingin hong lakkhia a, eite le i suan i khakte’ zuih tawntung ding ahi hi.

[5] Amah in Hannah a it hangin TOPA in amah ta neisak lo ahih manin Hannah tungah tanh khat bek a pia hi. [6] TOPA in amah ta neisak lo ahih manin amah a el a zipih in amah nakpitakin phin zel, hehsak zel hi. [7] Tua ahih ciangin a kumkumin tua bangin hi den uh hi. TOPA’ inn-ah a paitoh simin Peninnah in Hannah phin zel hi. Tua ahih ciangin Hannah kapin an ne lo hi. [8] Tua ciangin ama pasal Elkanah in, “Hannah aw, bang hangin kap na hi hiam? Bang hangin an ne lo na hi hiam? Bang hangin na lungsim dah ahi hiam? Kei pen tapa sawm sangin nang a dingin hoihzaw hi lo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. [9] Amaute in Shiloh-ah an a nek khit uh ciangin khatvei Hannah ding khia-in biakinn-ah thungen dingin a pai hi. Tua hun laitakin TOPA’ biakinn kongkhak khuam pangah siampi Eli na tu hi. [10] Tua nu nakpitakin lungkhamin TOPA’ tungah thu ngenin nakpitakin a kap hi. [11] Amah in thuciamna khat bawlin, “Vanglian TOPA aw, nangmah in na nasemnu’ gimna nong et takpi a, keimah hong phawkin na nasemnu hong mangngilh loin na nasemnu tungah tapa khat nong piak leh, TOPA’ tungah a khan tawntungin amah kong pia ding a, ama lu-ah mulkiatna kitah lo ding hi,” a ci hi. [12] TOPA’ mai-ah thungenin a om laitakin Eli in tua nu’ kam na en hi. [13] Hannah a lungsimah pau hi. A mukte bek lingin a awging kiza lo ahih ciangin Eli in tua numei zukhamin ngaihsun hi. [14] Tua ahih ciangin Eli in ama kiangah, “Bang tanvei zu kham ding na hi hiam? Na leenggahzu nek khawl in,” a ci hi. [15] Ahih hangin Hannah in dawngin, “Hilo hi, ka topa aw; kei pen nakpitakin a lungkham numei ka hi hi. Leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin ka ne kei a, TOPA’ mai-ah ka lungsim a sungkhia ka hi hi. [16] Lungkhamna le gimna tawh a pau ka hih manin numei ginalo bangin na nasemnu hong ngaihsun kei in, a ci hi. [17] Tua ciangin Eli in dawngin, “Nuam takin pai in. Israel-te’ Pasian in ama tungah na ngetsa thu hong pia hi,” a ci hi. [18] Tua ciangin numei in, “Nangma mitah na nasemnu maipha hong musak in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin tua numei pai-in an ne a, dahmai pua nawn lo hi. [19] Amaute zingsangin tho baihin biakinn-ah TOPA a biak khit uh ciangin amaute’ khua Ramah-a a inn uhah a ciahkik uh hi. Tua ciangin Elkanah in a zi Hannah luppih a, TOPA in tua nu’ thungetna a pia hi. [20] A hun ciangin Hannah gai-in tapa khat nei a, a min Samuel a phuak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “ TOPA’ tung panin amah ka nget ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[27] Hih naupang ka ngen hi. TOPA in ama tungah keima ngetna hong pia hi.
[18] Samuel pen saihadial siampipuan silhin TOPA’ mai-ah na a sem naupang khat ahi hi.
[26] Tu-in naupang Samuel a pumpi khangin TOPA le mite’ maipha a ngahtoto hi.
[7] Tu-in, TOPA ka Pasian aw, kei pen naupangno khat hinapi-in ka pa David’ munah kumpi-in na nasempa nong koih hi. Bangci gamtatin bangci nasep ding cih ka theih khat zong om lo hi.
[2] naungekte le naupangte’ kam tawh nangmah phatna la kisa hi. Gal na neih manin galte le langpangte na daihsakna dingin panmunkip na bawl khin hi.
[10] Ka suah tung a kipan nangma tungah kong tung a, ka nu in hong paii lai a kipan keima Pasian na hi hi.
[1] TOPA phat un. TOPA zahtakin a thupiaknate nuam a sa mahmah mi, thupha ngah mi ahi hi. [2] Ama suanlekhakte leitungah vanglian ding a, a lungsim thutang mite’ suanlekhakte thupha kipia ding hi.
[9] Amah in tasel numei tungah ta guan a, ta a nei nu a lungdamin a bawl hi. TOPA phat un.
[3] En un, tate pen TOPA’ tung pana letsong hi a, tapate pen ama hong piak thupha ahi hi. [4] Mi khat in a khangno lai-in a neih tate pen galhang pa’ khutsunga a om a thaltangte tawh kibang hi.
[8] Ka ta aw, na pa’ hong thuhilhna hoihtakin zui inla, na nu’ hong thugente ngai in. [9] Tua thuhilhnate in na gamtat hong hoihsak ding a, kizepna lukhu le kizepna khi bangin hong etlawmsak ding hi.
[22] Midikte in a tu a tate’ luah ding gamh nei uh a, mawhneite’ neihsate ahihleh midikte a’ ding hi lel hi.
[24] A ta a tai nuam lote a ta mudah hi a, a ta a itte in limtakin thuhilhin a tai hi.
[5] A pa’ hilhna a ngai nuam lote mihai hi a, hilhna a mang nuamte mipil ahi hi.
[6] Tute pen puteekte a dingin minthanna lukhu hi a, tate pen pate’ minthanna ahi hi.
[18] Thu hong mantheih lai-in na ta thuhilh in; na hilh kei leh a siatna ding a deih na hi hi.
[26] A pa nawtgawpin a nu a notkhia tapa pen zumna le mindaina a piangsak tapa ahi hi. [27] Thuhilhna a mang nuam lo tapa pen pilna a thei kha lo ding tapa ahi hi.
[11] Naupangte nangawn mi citak mihoih ahihna a gamtatna panun kimukhia thei hi.
[6] Naupang khat a neulai-in lampi man tawnsak lecin a teek dongin lampial nawn lo ding hi.
[15] Naupangte a hai gamtat a ngeina hi a, deihtakin pangbetna in mihoih suaksak thei hi.
[13] Naupangte sat ding lunghiang kei un; satna hangin si lo ding hi. [14] Ciangduai tawh sat le-uhcin nuntaklawh zaw ding uh hi.
[22] Nangma pianna na pa’ thu ngai inla, na nu a teek ciangin simmawh bawl kei in.
[24] Ta hoih a nei pa a lung dam ding a, ta pil a nei pa a ta’ tungah lungkim ding hi.

[17] Na galte in gimna a ngah ciangin lungdam kei inla, a puk ciangin kipak kei in. [18] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in hong thei-in nang tungah lungkim lo ding a, na galte tungah heh nawn loin gim pia lo kha ding hi.
[15] Ciangduai le tai-na in pilna guan a, a kikhahkhong ta in a nu maizumsak hi.
[18] En un, TOPA in kei hong piak ka tate le keima pumpi pen Zion Mual tungah a teng Vanglian TOPA’ tung panin Israel mite’ sungah lim le kihilna ka hi uh hi.
[13] “ TOPA in na tapate khempeuh hoihtakin hilh ding a, na tapate daupai mahmah ding uh hi.

[4] TOPA in kei hong hopih a, [5] “Gil sungah kong bawl ma-in nang kong thei khinzo hi. Na suah ma-in nang kong teelkhia khinzo a, minam dangte tungah kamsang dingin kong koih khinzo hi,” hong ci hi. [6] Tua ciangin keimah in, “Ah, Topa PASIAN aw, kei thugen ka siam kei a, naupang khat ka hi lel hi,” ka ci hi. [7] Ahih hangin TOPA in, “‘Naupang khat ka hi lel hi,’ ci kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh kong puakna khempeuhte kiangah na pai ding a, kong sawl peuhpeuh na gen ding hi. [8] Amaute kihta kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah a hong hu dingin ka hong ompih hi, TOPA in kong ci hi,” hong ci hi. [9] Tua ciangin TOPA in a khut tawh hong zam phei-in ka muk hong lawnsakin hong hopih hi. “En in, ka thute na kam sungah kong koih khinzo hi.
[21] Bang hang hiam cih leh tawlet vang panin sihna hong lut a, kumpipa’ inn sungah zong sihna hong lut hi. Kongzing a naupangte vatmang a, sumbuk a tangvalte vatlum hi.

[15] Pasian in na zite uh tawh pumkhat, lungsim khat ahi dingin hong bawl hi lo ahi hiam? Hih bangin a hong bawlna pen bang a deihna ahi hiam? Pasian’ mi taktak ahi ding tate i neih theih nading ahi hi. Tua ahih manin na khangno lai-un na tenpih na zi uh tawh na thuciamna uh na palsatkhak loh nadingun kidawm un.

[2] Jesuh in naupang khat samin amaute mai-ah dingsak a, [3] “A man mahmahin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Note kikheelin naupang na bat kei uhleh vantung ki-ukna sungah na lut ngei kei ding uh hi. [4] Hih naupang bangin a kiniamkhiat mite, vantung ki-ukna sungah a lianpen hi ding hi.
[10] “Hih naupangnote khatpeuh na simmawhkhak loh nadingun kidawm un. Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Amaute a kem vantung mite pen vantungah ka Pa kiangah om tawntung uh hi.
[14] Tua mah bangin vantungah a om na Pa un hih naupangnote khat zong a sih ding a deih kei hi.

[13] Tua ciangin mi pawlkhat in a naupangte uh tungah Jesuh in a khut nga-in thu a ngetsak nading deihin a naupangte uh a hong paipih uh hi. Ahi zongin a nungzuite in tua mite na taii uh hi. [14] Jesuh in, “Vantung ki-ukna pen naupangte tawh a kibang mite a’ ding ahih manin, tua naupangte ka kiangah hong paipihsak unla, khaktan kei un,” a ci hi. [15] Tua ciangin Jesuh in naupangnote tungah a khut nga-in thupha a piak khit ciangin a paikhia hi.

[36] Tua ciangin Jesuh in naupang khat la a, amaute laizangah paipihin a ang-ah tawi a, [37] “Keima hangin hih bang naupangno khat a limbawl mi in kei hong limbawl hi a, kei hong limbawl mi in kei hong limbawl hi loin kei hong sawl pa a limbawl ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[42] Jesuh in, “Mi khatpeuh in kei hong um hih naupangno khat a khialsak ding ahihleh a ngawngah an gawina suang lianpi khat kikhihin tuipi sungah kikhia leh ama a dingin hoihzaw thampek hi.

[13] Mi pawlkhat in a naupangte uh Jesuh in a lawnsak ding deih uh ahih manin hong paipih uh a, ahi zongin a nungzuite in na kham uh hi. [14] Jesuh in tua thu a phawk ciangin a heh suak a, a nungzuite kiangah, “Naupangte kham kei unla, ka kiangah hong paisak un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ Ukna sungah hih bang mite a om ahi hi. [15] Hih naupangno khat’ man’ bangin Pasian’ Ukna a mang lo mi peuhmah Pasian’ Ukna sungah om lo ding ahihna thei un,” a ci hi. [16] Tua ciangin naupangnote la-in a ang-ah tawi a, a tung uhah a khut nga-in thupha a pia hi.
[40] Tua naupang hong khangin hong thahat hi. Lungpilna tawh kidim a, Pasian in thupha a pia hi.
[52] Jesuh a pumpi le a pilna khang a, ama gamtatna in Pasian le mite a lungkimsak semsem hi.
[2] Hih naupangno khat a khialh nading a piansak sangin a ngawngah an gawina suang lianpi khat khihin tuipi sungah kikhia leh ama a dingin hoihzaw thampek ding hi.

[15] Jesuh in thupha a piaksak ding a deihna-un mi pawlkhat in a naupangnote nangawn uh Jesuh kiangah hong paipih uh hi. A nungzuite in hih thu a theih uh ciangin amaute na taii uh hi. [16] Ahi zongin Jesuh in naupangnote sam a, “Naupangte hong pai ding khaktan kei un; ka kiangah hong paisak un. Bang hang hiam cih leh naupang a bang mite pen Pasian’ Ukna sungah om thei bek hi. [17] Ke’n kong cihin-ah, naupang bangin Pasian’ Ukna a mang lo peuhmah Pasian’ Ukna sungah om thei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.

[1] Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu na man ding uh Khristian ngeina hi a, ahi ding mah ahi hi. [2] Thupiakna a lian khat in, “Na nu le na pa zahtak in,” cihna hi a, khapna thu tawh kizom pahin, “Zahtak lecin nang a dingin thu hong hoihin, leitungah na khan a sau ding hi,” na ci pah hi. [3] Thupiakna a lian khat in, “Na nu le na pa zahtak in,” cihna hi a, khapna thu tawh kizom pahin, “Zahtak lecin nang a dingin thu hong hoihin, leitungah na khan a sau ding hi,” na ci pah hi. [4] Pate aw, na tate uh a hehtheih nadingin bawl kei unla, Khristiante ngeina tawh kituakin taii-in hilhin pantah un.
[20] Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu man’ tawntung ding pen na Khristian nasep uh ahi hi. Tua bang thumanna in Pasian lungdamsak hi.
[15] Ahi zongin numei in a kilawm a kituakin upna, itna le sianthona thu-ah kiptakin a om nakleh nausuah gimna sihpih lo ding hi.
[14] Tua ahih manin, i langte’ hong gensiat nading a om loh nadingin, a khangno lai meigong numeite in pasal nei-in, ta nei-in, amau innkuansung ukin a om ding uh ka deihzaw hi.
[2] Naungek suakcilte na bang unla, note khangto-in hotkhiatna na ngahtheih nadingun kha thu tawh kisai nawizu siangtho duh belin na nei tawntung un.
[4] Tate bangin ka hong neih mite a mantakin a gamtatna uh ka zakna hangin ka lungdamna sangin adang lungdamna lianzaw bangmah om lo hi.

[18] Tua ciangin Jerusalem kumpipa Melkhizedek in an le leenggahzu hong pusuah hi. Amah pen Sang Pen Pasian’ siampi zong ahi hi. [19] Amah in thupha pia a, “Vantung le leitung a bawl, Sang Pen Pasian in Abram thupha pia hen! [20] Na galte na khut sungah a hong pia Sang Pen Pasian in thupha ngah hen,” a ci hi. Abram in na khempeuh sawm-ah-khat ama tungah a pia hi.

[13] Note’ omna inn tunga sisan pen note a dingin lim hi ding hi. Sisan ka muh ciangin note kong paisan ding a, Egypt leitang ka vatgawp ciangin note hong susia ding gimna note’ tungah hong tung lo ding hi. [14] “Hih pen note a dingin phawkna ni hi ding a, note in TOPA’ tungah pawi bawlna ni-in na nei ding uh hi. Na khang tawntungun note in biakna ngeina kip khatin na nei tawntung ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[3] Mite, an bek tawh nungta loin TOPA’ kamsung panin a pusuak thu khempeuh tawh nungta hi, ci-in note hong theihsak nadingin, amah in note hong niamkhiatin hong gilkialsak a, note hitaleh na pu na pate uh hitaleh in a theih ngei loh manna tawh hong vak hi.

[5] Ahih hangin eite’ khialhna hangin amah kiliamsak a, eite’ mawhna hangin amah kisatnim hi. Ama gim thuakna hangin nopna i ngah a, ama liamna hangin damna i ngah hi. [6] Eite khempeuh in tuu bangin lam i khial khin a, eite khempeuh eimau san ciatah i pai khin hi. TOPA in eite khempeuh’ mawhnate ama tungah a suan hi.
[28] “Sapul omna peuhah musane kikaikhawm ding hi.”

[22] Tua bangin an a nek laitakun Jesuh in anlum la-in lungdamna a kohkhit ciangin balnenin a nungzuite tungah pia a, “Ne un; hih pen keima pumpi ahi hi,” a ci hi. [23] Tua ciangin hai la a, lungdamna a kohkhit ciangin a nungzuite tungah pia a, tua hai panin a dawnkim uh hi. [24] Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, “Hih pen mi tampite a dingin a luang, thuciamna thak a kipsak keima sisan ahi hi.

[19] Tua ciangin anlum la-in Pasian tungah lungdamna a kohkhit ciangin amaute tungah pia a, “Hih pen note a dingin a hong kipia keima pumpi ahi hi. Keimah nong phawk nadingun na ne un,” a ci hi. [20] Tua mah bangin an a nekkhit uh ciangin amaute tungah hai pia a, “Hih leenggahzu pen note a dingin a luangkhia, Pasian’ thuciamna thak a kipsak ka sisan ahi hi.

[34] “Topa hingkik khin takpi hi. Simon kiangah na kilak khinzo hi,” ci-in a kigengen laitak uh a tuak uh hi. [35] Tua ciangin tua mi nihte in zong a lam pai laitak uha thupiang teng le anlum a balnen ciangin Topa ahih lamtak a theihnate uh a gen uh hi.
[30] Amaute tawh an ne dingin a tut ciangin Jesuh in anlum la a, Pasian tungah lungdamna a kohkhit ciangin balnenin amaute a pia hi.
[14] ahi zongin keima piak ding tui a dawn khempeuh dangtak kik nawn lo ding uh hi. Tua ka piak tui a dawnte sungah nuntakna tuinak piang ding a, a nungtasak paisuak ding hi,” a ci hi.
[35] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Kei pen nuntakna an ka hi hi. Ka kiangah hong paite gilkial ngei nawn lo ding a, kei hong umte dangtak ngei nawn lo ding hi.

[47] A mantakin kong genin-ah, kei hong umte bek in nuntak tawntungna ngah hi. [48] Kei pen nuntakna an ka hi hi. [49] Na pu na pate un gam sungah manna ne uh a, a vekpi-un si veve uh hi. [50] Ahi zongin vantung panin a hong pai an a ne mi peuhmah si lo ding hi. [51] Kei pen vantung panin a hong paisuk nuntakna an ka hi hi. Tua an a ne mi peuhmah nungta tawntung ding hi. Leitung mite a nuntak nadingin ka piak ding an pen keima sa ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[53] Tua ahih manin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “A mantakin kong genin-ah, Mihing Tapa’ sa na nek kei uh a, a sisan na dawn kei uhleh note sungah nuntakna om lo ding hi. [54] Ka sa ne-in ka si a dawnte a nungta tawntung hi a, nitawp ni ciangin ka hingsak ding hi. [55] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka sa, an taktak hi a, ka sisan, dawn ding tui taktak ahi hi. [56] Ka sa ne-in ka si a dawnte pen kei tawh pumkhat ka hi uh hi. [57] A nungta Pa Pasian in kei hong sawl ahih manin ama hangin ka nuntak mah bangin keima sa a ne mite zong keima hang mahin nungta ding hi. [58] Tua ahih manin kei pen vantung panin a hong pai an ka hi a, na pu na pate un ne-in a sih veve-na ante tawh kibang lo hi. Hih kei’ hong piak an a nete ahihleh nungta tawntung ding hi,” a ci hi.
[25] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Keimah in a sisa mite thosakin a hingsak thei pa ka hi hi. Kei hong um mi peuhmah a sih hangin nungta ding hi.

[26] Jesuh in, “Anlum, meh sungah diahin ka piak ding pa ahi hi,” a cih khit ciangin a anlum diahin Simon Iskariot’ tapa Judas a pia hi. [27] Judas in tua an a nek khit phetin ama sungah Satan hong lutpah hi. Tua ahih manin Jesuh in ama kiangah, “Na hih ding peuhpeuh hihpak in,” a ci hi.
[7] Sani nitakin an nekhawm dingin ka kikhawm uh a, a zing ciangin a ding khia ding ahih manin Paul in a thuhilh zankim ciang dong a zomsuak hi.
[11] Tua ciangin inn dawl tungnungah kahto kikin anlum balnenin thu um mite tawh a nekhawm hi. Zingsang khuavak dong amaute tawh thu kikum uh a, tua ciangin a ding khia hi.

[16] Nekkhawm bawlna-ah leenggahzu hangin Pasian tungah lungdamna ko-in i dawn ciangin Khrih sisan hangin thuphate eite in zong a ngahkhawm cihna hi lo ahi hiam? I balnen anlum i nek ciangin zong Khrih pumpi hangin thuphate mah a ngahkhawm cihna hi lo ahi hiam? [17] Anlum khat bek hi a, eite mi tampi hinapi-in tua lum khat bek mah nekhawm ihih manin eite pumkhat bek mah ihi hi.

[20] Nekkhawmna a bawl dingin note na kikhop uh ciangin Topa’ Nekkhawmna a ne dingin na pai kei uh hi. [21] Bang hang hiam cih leh nekkhawmna ne dingin na pai uh ciangin pawlkhatte amau’ an tawh na tung masa-in ne pah uh ahih manin, pawlkhatte a kham mahmahin na om uh hangin pawlkhatte gilkialin a om uh hi.

[23] Bang hang hiam cih leh note kiangah ka hong gen thu pen Topa kiang panin ka ngah thu hi a, tua thu in: Topa Jesuh a kilehhek ding nitakin anlum la-in, [24] Pasian tungah lungdam a kohkhit ciangin balnen a, “Hih pen note a dingin a hong kipia keima pumpi ahi hi. Kei na hong phawk nadingun na ne un,” ci hi. [25] Tua mah bangin nitak an a nekkhit uh ciangin hai la a, “Hih hai sunga om leenggahzu pen keima sisan tawh a kikipsak Pasian’ thuciamna thak ahi hi. Hih bangin na dawn simun, kei na hong phawk nadingun na dawn un,” ci hi. [26] Bang hang hiam cih leh hih bangin anlum ne-in hai sung panin leenggahzu na dawn simun, Topa a hong paikik matengin ama sihna thu a gengen na hi uh hi. [27] Tua ahih manin a kilawm lopi-in Topa’ anlum ne-in, a hai panin leenggahzu a dawn mi peuhmah pen Topa’ pumpi le a sisan a mindaisak hi-in a mawh ahi uh hi. [28] Tua ahih manin a kuamah peuh ki-entel masa phot uh hen la, tua khit ciangin Topa’ anlum ne-in a hai panin leenggahzu dawn pan tahen. [29] Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ pumpi a khiatna thei lopi-in anlum ne-in hai panin leenggahzu a dawn mi pen amahmah mawhsak thukhenna a kipiatawm ahi hi. [30] Tua bang mawhna hangin note tampi tak cina-in na zawngkhal uh a, pawlkhat zong na si uh hi. [31] Eite hoihtakin ki-entel masa peuh lehang Pasian’ mawhsak thukhenna i thuak kei ding hi. [32] Ahi zongin eite in hih leitung mite tawh mawhsakna i thuakkhawm loh nadingin Topa in eite hong thuhilhin gim hong pia hi. [33] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, nekkhawm ne dingin na kikhop uh ciangin kingakkim dimdiam un. [34] Tua bangin na kikhop uh ciangin Pasian’ thukhenna na thuakkhak loh nadingun a gilkial na om uhleh zong na inn uhah an ne masa un. Thu dangdangte ahihleh ka hong pai ciangin ka hong gen ding hi.
[29] Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ pumpi a khiatna thei lopi-in anlum ne-in hai panin leenggahzu a dawn mi pen amahmah mawhsak thukhenna a kipiatawm ahi hi.
[33] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, nekkhawm ne dingin na kikhop uh ciangin kingakkim dimdiam un.

[18] Khrih mahmah zong note a dingin si a, Pasian’ kiangah hong tunpih theih nadingin mihoih khat pen mihoih lote’ mawhna hangin khatvei a si hi. Mite in ama leitung pumpi that a, ahi zongin Pasian in kha nuntakna a pia hi.

[27] Tua ciangin amaute ciktui sawm le nih le nisuh kung sawmsagih a omna mun Elim tung uh a, tui gei tua munah amaute in giahphual a sat uh hi.

[36] Tua ciangin a kipsaknate le a khawkte tungah a mun awng zah ciat tawh kizui-in amah in kherub-te, humpinelkaite, le nisuh kungte gelhin a kimkotah pakkual a bawl hi.
[5] Amah in taaksan tawh innpi kawm dapin kham hoih tawh zut a, tua tungah nisuh le khainiang a bawl hi.

Amaute puan silhsak uh a, khedap kaihte pia-in anletui vak uh a, sathau nilh uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute lakah a tha ginalote la tungah pua uh a, nisuh khuapi ahi Jerikho khua amau’ behte kiangah paipih uh hi. Tua ciangin Samaria-ah amaute ciahkik uh hi.
[12] Nisuh kung bangin thuman mi palh a, Lebanon mualtung a om taamtak kung bangin a khang hi.
[7] Tuum kung bangin na etlawm a, na nawite pen, nisuh gah a bawk pha mahmah tawh a kibang hi.
[16] Hih inndei neute’ kawm a pualam pangah tawlet neu om a, inndei kikal-a om kawm tungah zong a vang neu om hi. Lampi omna lampang, inndei kikal-a kawmte tungah nisuh kung lim kibawl hi.

[22] A inndei golzaw, a tawlette, le nisuh kung lim a kibawlte pen nisuahna lam kongpi-a omte mah tawh kibangin kikim hi. Hih lai-ah zong kongpi lampi tun nadingin kahlei dawl sagih om a, a nawlnung a om a inndei golzaw pen in a tual lam maingat hi.
[26] Tua kongpi lampi tun nadingin kahlei cial sagih mah om a, a inndei golzaw pen a nawlnung mahah omin a tual lam a nga hi. Lampi omna lampang, kawm sungnungte’ tungah nisuh kung lim mah kibawl hi.
[31] A inndei golzaw pen tual puanung lam a nga hi. Lampi pang tuak a kawmte tungah nisuh kung lim kibawl a, hih kongpi lampi tun nadingin kahlei cial giat a om hi.
[34] A inndei golzaw pen a tual puanung lam nga hi. Lampi pang tuakah a om kawmte tungah nisuh kung lim kibawl a, hih kongpi lampi tunna dingin kahlei cial giat a om hi.
[37] A inndei golzaw pen a tual puanung lam nga hi. Lampi pang tuakah a om kawmte tungah nisuh kung lim kibawl a, hih kongpi lampi tunna dingin kahlei cial giat a om hi.

[18] nisuh kungte le kherub limte vive ahi hi. A masa-in nisuh kung, tua ciangin kherub, nisuh kung, kherub cih bangin a kimkot khempeuhah kihelhto dimdiam hi. Tua kherub-te in maitang nih ciat nei uh hi. [19] A mihing maitang pen a pangkhat lama om nisuh kung lam nga a, a humpinelkai maitang pen a pang langkhat lama om nisuh kung lam a nga hi. A biakinnsung kimkotah hih bangin kibawl a,

[25] Biakinnsung kawmte tungah a kibawl mah bangin hih biakinn deipi sung lutna-a kongkhakte tungah zong nisuh kung le kherub mah a kibawl hi. Kongkhak pualam, innsung lutna ding inndei sanah singpeek tawh liimsun khat a kibawl hi. [26] Hih inndeipi sung kawmte tungah a pualam a kihui tawlette om a, nisuh kungte tawh zepna zong a kibawl hi.
[12] Leengguite keu a, theikungte vuai ta hi. Mang kawlsingte, nisuhte, epel kungte a kipan singkung khempeuh keumang khin hi. Mihingte a lungdamna dingteng zong a maimang ta hi.
[8] Mihon tampite in ama pai nading lampi-ah a puante uh na phah uh a, adangte in nisuh hiangte satin lampi-ah a na phah uh hi.

[13] Tua ahih manin amah a dawn dingin Jerusalem panin mihonpi paikhia-in nisuh hiangte tawikawmin, “Pasian phat un! Pasian in Topa’ min tawh hong pai pa thupha pia ta hen! Pasian in Israel Kumpipa thupha pia ta hen!” ci-in a kiko uh hi.

[9] Tua khit ciangin ka khuadak leh mi namkim, pau namkim panin kuama sim zawh loh dingin a tam mahmah mihonpite, tokhom mai le Tuuno mai-ah ding uh a, puanpak silhin a khut uhah nisuh hiang a tawi uh ka mu hi.

[4] Ahih hangin amaute’ lup ma-in Sodom khua mite, a moi a hamin mi khempeuh in a inn umcih uh hi. [5] Amaute in Lot sam uh a, “Tu nitak a nang kiangah hong tung mite koi-ah om ahi hiam? Amau’ taw ka luk theih nadingun ko kiangah amaute hong paikhiatpih in,” a ci uh hi. [6] Lot, kongkhak pua-ah mite kiangah pai-in kong lehkhak a, [7] “Ka sanggamte aw, tua banga na gitloh gamtat loh nading uh kong thum hi.

[8] Tua ciangin Judah in Onan kiangah, “Na sanggampa’ zi tawh lumkhawm inla, tua nu’ tungah pasal’ sanggamte’ tavuan sem inla, na sanggampa a dingin ta nei in,” a ci hi. [9] Ahih hangin Onan in tate pen ama a’ ahih loh ding thei hi. Tua ahih ciangin a sanggampa’ zi tawh a lupkhawm ciangin a sanggampa’ tungah ta pia kha ding ahih manin a natui leilakah buasak hi. [10] Ama gamtatna TOPA’ muhna-ah lungkimhuai lo a, TOPA in amah zong a that hi.

[7] Tawlkhat khit ciangin a topa’ zi in Josef zawl mit a, “Kei tawh hong lumkhawm in,” a ci hi. [8] Ahih hangin amah in nialin a topa’ zi kiangah, “En in, kei hong nei ahih manin ka topa in inn sungah bangmah lunghihmawhna nei lo a, ama neih khempeuh ka khut sungah hong koih khin hi. [9] Hih inn sungah kei sangin amah lianzaw lo hi. Nang, ama zi na hih manin, nang lobuang kei kiang panin amah in a kep tuam bangmah om lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin bangci-in hih gitlohna lianpi bawlin Pasian’ tungah khial ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
[14] “Nulepa mawhna na bawl kei ding uh hi.

[17] “Na vengte uh inn na deihgawh kei ding uh hi. Na vengte uh zi hitaleh, ama nasempa hitaleh, ama nasemnu hitaleh, ama bawngtal hitaleh, ama la hitaleh, na vengte a’ ahi na khat peuhpeuh na deihgawh kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[19] “Ganhing tawh a mawh peuhmah kithat ding hi.

[16] “Mi khat in a natui a teh leh, amah in a pumpi khempeuh tui sungah sil ding a, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi. [17] A tungah a natui a tukna puan le savun peuhmah tui tawh kisawp ding a, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi. [18] Pasal le numei a lupkhawm khit ciangin, amau tegel tui sungah kisil ding uh a, a nitak mateng a nin hi ding uh hi.

[6] “Note kuamah in na kinaipih na behte uh mawhpih dingin na naih kei ding uh hi. Kei pen TOPA ka hi hi. [7] Na nu mawhpihna tawh na pa’ tungah maizumna na tun kei ding hi. Amah pen na nu ahih manin na mawhpih kei ding hi. [8] Nangmah in na pa’ zi dangte zong na mawhpih kei ding hi. Tua pen na pa’ mindai nading ahi hi. [9] Nangmah in na sanggamnu, na pa’ tanu, ahih kei leh na nu’ tanu, inn-a suak hitaleh gam a suak hitaleh na mawhpih kei ding hi. [10] Nangmah in na tapa’ tanu ahih kei leh na tanu’ tanu na mawhpih kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ mindaina pen nangma mindaina mah ahi hi. [11] Na pa’ zi’ tanu, na pa’ tanu pen na sanggamnu ahih manin na mawhpih kei ding hi. [12] Na ni na mawhpih kei ding hi; tua nu pen na pa’ sanggam numei ahi hi. [13] Na nu’ sanggamnu na mawhpih kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah pen na nu tawh a kinai beh numei ahi hi. [14] Na pa’ sanggampa’ tungah mindaina na tun kei ding hi; tua pen ama zi na naih kei ding hi, cihnopna ahi hi; tua nu pen nangma innlak nu ahi hi. [15] Na monu na mawhpih kei ding hi; tua nu pen na tapa’ zi ahi hi; amah na mawhpih kei ding hi. [16] Na sanggampa’ zi na mawhpih kei ding hi; tua pen na sanggampa’ mindai nading ahi hi. [17] Na luppih numei khat’ tanu na mawhpih kei ding a, tua numei’ tapa’ tanu hitaleh tua numei’ tanu’ tanu hitaleh, luppih dingin na la kei ding hi. Amaute pen nangmah tawh a kinai beh numeite ahi uh hi. Tua bang gamtatna pen a siahuai ahi hi. [18] Nangmah in a sanggamnu a hingsuan dingin numei khat zi-in na la kei ding a, a sanggamnu a hing laipi-in amah na luppih kei ding hi.

[22] Numei khat tawh lupkhop bangin pasal khat tawh na lumkhawm kei ding hi; tua pen a kihhuai ahi hi. [23] Ganhing khatpeuh tawh mawhin tua tawh na kininsak kei ding a, numei khatpeuh in zong ganhing khatpeuh tawh a mawh dingin kipia lo ding hi; tua pen ngeina hi lo hi.

[20] “Sila ahi numei, midang khat in zuthawl a piaksa, kitankhia nai loin amah suahtakna a kipia nai lo nu, pasal dang khat in a lupkhoppih leh, thukanna kinei ding hi. Amaute kithat lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua nu sila hi lai hi.
[29] “Na tanu uh biakinn sungah paktat dinga piakna tawh siasak kei un. Tua bang hileh pasian dangte biakna sungah na tung ding uh a, gam sung khempeuh, mawhna tawh a kidim suak kha ding hi.

[10] “Pasal khatpeuh a vengpa’ zi tawh a mawh leh, tua a khial pa le a khialnu kithat khawm ding hi. [11] A pa’ zi tawh a lumkhawm mipa in a pa a mindaisak a suak hi. Amau tegel kithat ding hi. Amau’ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi. [12] Pasal khat a monu tawh a lupkhop leh, amau tegel kithat ding hi; amaute in si kinailua mi tawh khialhna a bawl uh ahi hi. Amau’ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi. [13] Pasal khat in numei khat tawh lupkhop bangin pasal dang khat tawh a lupkhop leh, amau tegel kihhuaina a gamta khin uh ahih manin amaute kithat ding a, amau’ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi. [14] Pasal khat in zi nei-in, a zi’ nu tawh zong a lakthuah leh, tua pen a kilawm lo ahi hi. Note lakah tua bang kilawm lohna a om loh nadingin tua pa le a nutate, mei tawh kihallum ding hi. [15] Pasal khatpeuh ganhing khat tawh a mawh leh amah le a ganhing kithat ding hi. [16] Numei khat in ganhing khat naihin tua tawh a mawh leh, note in a numei le a ganhing na that ding uh hi; amau’ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi. [17] “Pasal khat in ama sanggamnu, ahih kei leh a nu’ tanu tenpihin a lupkhawm uhleh, tua pen a zumhuai hi a, amau’ mipihte’ omna panin amaute kihawlkhia ding hi. Ama sanggamnu tawh mawh ahih manin tua pa in ama mawhna pua ding hi.
[9] Siampipa khat peuhpeuh’ tanu in paktatna tawh amah le amah a kidaisak leh, ama pa a daisak ahi hi. Tua nu mei tawh kihallum ding hi.

[19] Tua ciangin siampipa in amah kiciamsakin, ‘Na pasal’ ukna nuai-ah na om sungin, kuamah in nang hong luppih loin, nitna lamah a kihel lo na hih leh, hih tuisia panin suakta in. [20] Ahih hangin na pasal’ ukna nuai-ah om napi-in nangmah vakvai a, nang le nang kininsakin, na pasal ahi lo midang khat in nang hong luppih leh, [21] (siampipa in tua numei kiciamsak ding a, tua nu kiangah) TOPA in na pheipi teemsakin na pumpi a pawmsak ciangin, na mite lakah hamsia le kiciamna-a zat dingin TOPA in nang hong bawlin, [22] hih tuisia in na gil sung zui hen la, na pumpi pawmsakin na pheipi teemsak hen,’ ci ding hi. Tua ciangin numei in, ‘Amen, Amen,’ ci ding hi.

[27] Amah in a tui a dawnsak khit ciangin, tua nu amahmah kininsakin a pasal tungah thuman loin gamta ahihleh, tua tuisia pen ama sungah tumin nasak velval ding a, a pumpi pawmin a pheipi teem ding a, tua numei pen mite lakah hamsiatna-in kizang ding hi. [28] Ahih hangin amahmah a kininsak hi loin a siang ahihleh, tua nu suakta-in ta nei thei ding hi.

[1] Shittim-ah Israel mite a om laitakin Moab gam numeite tawh paktat ding kipan uh hi. [2] Hih numeite in amau’ pasian biakpiakna pawi-ah Israel mite sam uh a, amaute in a pawi an nekpihin, amau’ pasian-te’ mai-ah kun uh hi. [3] Tua ahih ciangin Peor-a Baal tawh Israel mite va kizomtawm hi. Israel mite tungah TOPA heh mahmah a,
[17] Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, a khangnote lakah pasal peuhmah that unla, pasal tawh a lumkhawmsa numei peuhmah zong that un.

[28] “Mi khat in a kidong nai lo nungak khat tuakin, tua numei buanin luppih a, amau tegel a kimuh leh, [29] numei tawh a lum pa in nungak’ pa tungah ngun shekel sawmnga pia ding a, tua numei ama zi hi ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a numei va su khin hi. A nuntak laiteng tua numei ma thei lo ding hi.

[17] “Israel ta numeite biakinn sunga a paktat pawlin om lo ding uh a, Israel tapate zong a paktat pawlin om lo ding uh hi. [18] A paktat nu a kiguaihna sum ahi a, a paktat pa a kiguaihna sum ahi zongin thuciamna khat peuhpeuh piakna-in TOPA note’ Pasian’ inn sungah na paipih kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih tegel pen TOPA note’ Pasian’ tungah a kihhuai ahi hi.

[20] “‘Amah in a pa’ tungah maizumna tun ahih manin, a pa’ zidang tawh a lumkhawm mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi. [21] “‘Ganhing khat peuhpeuh tawh nulepa mawhna a bawl mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi. [22] “‘A nu’ tanu, a pa’ tanu, ahih kei leh a sanggamnu tawh a lumkhawm mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi. [23] “‘A sungnu tawh a lumkhawm mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.

[10] Tua ahih ciangin mihonte in a galhangte uh mihing tul sawm le tulnih tua lai-ah sawl uh a, “Pai unla Jabeshgilead-a tengte namsau tawh va vatgawp unla, nupite le naupang neute zong hih un. [11] Hih bangin na hih ding uh hi: Pasal khempeuh le pasal tawh a lumkhawmsa numei khempeuh na sumai ding uh hi,” ci-in thu pia uh hi. [12] Amaute in Jabeshgilead-a teng mite lakah pasal tawh a lumkhawm nai lo nungakno zali mu uh a, Kanaan gam a om Shiloh giahphual ah tuate hong paipih uh hi.

[4] Tua ahih ciangin David in kamtaite sawlin tua nu samsak hi. Tua nu ama kiangah hong pai a, amah in tua nu luppih hi. (Tua nu a khasim nitna panin a kisiansuah tung ahi hi.) Tua ciangin ama inn-ah a ciah hi.

[10] Tua ciangin Ammon in Tamar kiangah, “Na khut tung panin ka nek theih nadingin inndei sungah an hong paipih in,” a ci hi. Tamar in a bawlsa mohphengte la-in inndei sung a sanggampa Ammon kiangah paipih hi. [11] Ahih hangin amah in a nek dingin ama kiang nai-ah a paipih ciangin, amah in tua numei lenin ama kiangah, “Hong pai in; kei tawh hong lum in ka sanggamnu aw,” a ci hi. [12] Amah in dawngin, “Hilo hi, ka sanggampa aw, kei hong thatang hih kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel sungah tua bangin kigamta lo hi. Hih bangin hai gamtat lua kei in.
[24] biakna phualte-ah numei-pasal paktat pawlte zong om uh hi. TOPA in Israel mite’ mai-ah a hawlkhiat minam dangte’ gamtatna a kihhuai khempeuh bangin amaute gamta uh hi.
[1] “Lunggulhna tawh nungak khatpeuh ka et ngei loh nading, kiciamna ka bawlkhin hi.

[9] Tangval khat in ama gamtatna a siangtho mahmah dingin bangci kep ding ahi hiam? Nangma thu zuihna tawh ama gamtatna siangthosak thei ding hi. [10] Ka lungsim khempeuh tawh nang ka hong zong hi. Na thupiaknate panin kei hong pialsak kei in. [11] Nangma tungah kong khialh loh nadingin ka lungsim sungah nangma thu ka khol hi.

[16] A pasal tungah citak loin a pasal a nusia, Pasian’ mai-ah a kiciamna a mangngilh, kam khum mahmah tawh nangmah zol ding a hanciam, numei paktatte panin hong cing ding hi. [17] A pasal tungah citak loin a pasal a nusia, Pasian’ mai-ah a kiciamna a mangngilh, kam khum mahmah tawh nangmah zol ding a hanciam, numei paktatte panin hong cing ding hi. [18] Tua nu’ inn-ah pai lecin sihna lampi a zui na hi a, misite gam a zuan na hi hi. [19] Tua bang numei tawh mawhna a bawl mite in nuntak nuam neikik ngei lo uh hi. [20] Tua ahih manin mihoihte’ gamtat bangin na gamta ding a, thuman mite’ gamtatna na zui ding hi. [21] Bang hang hiam cih leh mi thuman, miginate, hih i leitungah tengin om ding uh a, [22] ahi zongin Pasian in leitung panin migilote lawnkhia-in, singkung zungbawh bangin mawhneite botkhia ding hi.

[3] Numei paktatte’ kampau khuaizu bangin khum mahmahin a thugente uh a neel dakdak hangin, [4] a tawpna-ah lungkhamna le natna simloh nangma tungah bangmah dang hong guan lo hi. [5] Amah in sihna gamah nang hong paipih ding a, ama tot lampi pen sihna mun tunna lampi ahi hi. [6] Nuntakna lampi-ah amah om lo a, nang na phawk loh hangin amah lam pialin a vakvai ahi hi.

[15] Na zi’ tungah citak inla, amah bek itin nei in. [16] Pasal dang tawh va vakzau-in kongzing lakah va mawhkha ding hi. [17] Na zi pen nangma a’ ding bek hi a, midangte tawh na neihkhawm ding hi lo hi. [18] Tua ahih ciangin na zi tawh lungkim inla, na tenpih numei tawh lungdam in.

[20] Ka ta aw, bang hangin numei dang lunggulh ding a, numei dangte’ ngaihbaanna iplah ding na hi hiam? [21] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in na gamtatna khempeuh hong mu a, na paina khempeuhah nang hong en kawikawi hi. [22] Migilo pa’ mawhna thangzak bang hi a, ama mawhna thang sung mahah amah a awk hi. [23] Ama pumpi ki-uk zo lo ahih manin amah in sihlawh a, ama hailuatna in hankhuk sung a tun hi.

[27] Na ang sungah meikuang pom lecin na puan kang loin om ding ahi hiam? [28] Mei-am tungtawnin pai lecin na khe kang loin om ding ahi hiam? [29] Tua mah bangin mi’ zi tawh a mawhte in gimna thuak ding uh a, tua bang a gamta peuhmah in gimna thuak ding uh hi. [30] A gilkial a cimawh mi khat in na a guk ciangin, midangte in mawhsak lua lo napi, [31] amah kiman leh a zah sagihin kilohsak a, a neih khempeuh a piak kul hi. [32] Ahi zongin numei tawh a mawhte pen thu ngaihsun thei lo mi hi a, amau le amau a kisusiatawm ahi uh hi. [33] Mawhna a bawl mi in satgawpna thuak ding a, a min sia-in mindai paisuak ding hi.

[5] Tua hileh midangte’ zi tungah na khialhkhak loh nading, kam khum tawh a hong zol numei ginalote tawh na khialhkhak loh nadingin hong hu ding hi. [6] Khatvei, ka omna inn-ah, ka tawlet panin ka khuadak a, [7] bangmah a phawk nai lo tangval honkhat lakah, tangval thu thei lo khat, ka lim muhkha hi. [8] Lamdungah amah a vak laitakin, tua bang numei paktat a omna inn gei khatah va paikha a, [9] tua hun pen nitak nitum khit zawh, khuamui hun laitak ahi hi. [10] Tua numei in numei paktatte’ puansilh ngeite a silh kawmin ngimna khat tawh tua tangval na dawntuah hi. [11] Tua numei pen maizumna mel thei loin a hang mahmah hi a, lamdung tengah vak tawntung hi. [12] Mihon omna van zuakna phual, lamdung citeng, kongkiu khatpeuhah mi ngakin om niloh hi. [13] Tua numei in tangvalpa thakhatin kawi-in tawp a, na maitai bawl mahmahin ama kiangah,

[25] Tua bang numeite’ zolna mang kei unla, tua bangte tawh khialkha kei un. [26] Tua bang numei in mi tampi tak siasakin, simzawh loh ding mi tampi’ sihna a piangsak hi. [27] Tua bang numei zuihna pen sihna gam zuatna hi a, sih baihna ding lampi zuatna ahi hi.
[22] Thu a ngaihsun thei lo numei melhoih pen vokpi muk a om kham nakbah tawh kibang lel hi.
[17] A noptat nuamte zawng uh a, zu ne-in sathau namtui a nilhte hau lo uh hi.
[9] Pasian in hih leitungah nang a hong piak, tomkha sung na nuntak laiteng, na it na zi tawh a nuam theithei-in om in. Leitung lungkhamna sungah na lawhtak, tua bek mah hi kha ding hi.

[14] Ahih hangin Jerusalem khuasunga om kamsangte’ sungah a mulkimhuaizaw na khat ke’n ka mu hi. Angkawmin zuauthu gen uh a, mite a gitlohna uh pan a kikhel loh nadingin mi hoih lote a hanthawn zawlai uh hi. A vekpi-un kei’ muhna-ah Sodom khuamite tawh kibang khin ka sa a, Gomorrah khuamite tawh zong kilamdang lo uh hi.
[17] Nang kong piaksa kham le ngun kibawl kizepnate, pasal limin na bawl a, tuate tawh paktatna na gamta hi.
[11] Pawlkhat in midangte’ zi tawh nulepa mawhna bawl uh a, pawlkhat in a mote mawhpihin, pawlkhat in a sanggamnu ahi a pa’ tanu mawhpih hi.

[27] “‘Mi zi tungah na mawh kei ding hi,’ ci-in a kigenna thu na zaksa uh ahi hi. [28] Ahi zongin ke’n kong genin-ah: Mawhpih nopna lungsim tawh numei khat a en mi peuhmah in a lungsimah tua numei tawh a mawh ahi hi.

[19] Bang hang hiam cih leh lungsim panin mi thahnopna, mi zi tawh mawhnopna, nungak tawh mawhnopna, guktakna, zuau genna, mi gensiatna, le ngaihsut hoih lo a tuamtuam hong piangkhia hi. [20] Hih bang nate in mi ninsak a, khut sil loin annekna in mi ninsak lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[9] Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Mi khatpeuh in midang tawh a zi a mawhna lobuang, a zi a mak a, numei dang tawh a ten leh numei tunga mawh ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[18] Amah in, “Bang thukhamte ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin Jesuh in, “Mi that kei in; numei tungah mawh kei in; mi neihsa gu kei in; zuauthu gen kei in;

[20] Mihingte sung panin a pusuak khiate in mihing ninsak hi. [21] Bang hang hiam cih leh mihingte’ lungsim sung panin nungak-tangval mawhnopna, guktakna, mi thahna, zilepasal neisate tawh mawhnopna, [22] huaihamna, gitlohna, khemna, gamtat hoih lohna, enna, mi gensiatna, kisialhna, le haitatna a piangsakthei ngaihsutna hoih lote khempeuh, [23] mihingte sung panin pusuakin mite ninsak ahihlam thei lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
[2] Farisi mi pawlkhat hong pai uh a, amah a mawhsak theih nading uh a deihna-in, “Mi khat in a zi a mathei ding mah ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.

[7] Amaute in Jesuh kiangah dong teitei uh ahih manin amah zong dingin amaute kiangah, “Note lakah mawhna a nei het lo pa in deng masa un,” a cih khit ciangin, [8] kunin leilak a gelh leuleu hi. [9] Ahi zongin hih kammal a zak uh ciangin amaute a khangham pen panin khat khatin paikhia uh a, a tawpna-ah Jesuh le a mai-ah a ding numei bek a omlai hi. [10] Tua ciangin Jesuh khuadakto-in numei kiangah, “Numei aw, amaute koilai tungkhin uh ahi hiam? Nang mawhsakin thu hong khen ding kuamah om nawn lo ahi hiam?” a cih ciangin [11] numei in, “Topa aw, kuamah in thu hong khen lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Kei zong nang tungah thu kong khen kei hi. Ciah inla, mawhna bawl nawn kei in,” a ci hi.)
[34] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “A mantakin ci lehang mawhna a bawl mi peuhmah mawhna’ sila ahi uh hi.

[20] milim biakna-a kizang an khempeuh a siang lo suak ahih manin a nek loh nading uh, numei tawh khialhnate panin a kikep nading uh, a si luangkhiasak loin a kigawlmek sate, le sasi khat peuhpeuh a nekloh nadingun lai i gelhzawk ding hoih ka sa hi.

[29] Tua a kisam thute in: Milim biakna-in a kipiasa an khat peuhpeuh na nek loh nading uh, sasi na nek loh nading uh, a si luangkhiasak loin a kigawlmek sa khat peuhpeuh na nek loh nading uh, le numei tawh khialhna panin na kikep nading uh ahi hi. Hih thute hoihtakin zui le-uhcin note a dingin hoih ding hi. Na cidam ta un,” ci-in kigelh hi.

[24] Mihingte tua zahta-in hailua uh ahih manin amau ututin a gamtat theih nadingun Pasian in khahkhong vet a, a zumhuai mahmahpi-in a gamta uh hi. [25] Amaute in a man ahi Pasian’ thu um nuam lo uh a, a tawntungin phat dingin a kilawm a Piangsak pa bia loin, Pasian’ bawlsa nate bia-in a zui uh hi. Tu-a bangin hi takpi uh hi. [26] Tua ahih manin amau utna bangin a zumhuaipi-in a gamtat theih nadingun Pasian in a khahkhong hi. A numeite un pasal tawh lupkhop ngeina zang loin a numeipihte mah uh lunggulhin lumkhawm uh a, [27] a pasalte uh zong numei tawh lumkhawm loin pasalte mah lunggulhin lumkhawm uh a, a zumhuaipi-in a gamta uh hi. Tua ahih manin amaute’ gamtatsiatna tawh kituakin Pasian in gim a pia hi. [28] Mite in a man ahi Pasian’ thu ngaihsutin nei nuam lo uh ahih manin amaute’ ngaihsut hoih lo bangin a gamtat theih nadingun Pasian in a khahkhia hi. Tua ahih manin a gamtat dingun a kilawm lopipi-in a gamta uh hi.
[32] Tua bangin a gamtate in sihna thuak ding hi, ci-in Pasian’ thukhenna thei napi-in, tua bangin amaute a gamtat uh banah, tua bangin a gamtate pakta-in a awi zawsop lai uh hi.

[3] Tua ahih manin a pasal a nuntak hun sungin pasal dang tawh a lupkhop leh mi tawh a mawh kici hi. Ahi zongin a pasal a si hileh thukham tawh kisai-in a suakta hi a, pasal dang a tenpih hangin mi tawh a mawh hi lo hi.

[9] Thukham sungah, “Nulepa mawhna bawl kei in, mi that kei in, guta kei in, hazatna lungsim nei kei in,” cihna le adang khempeuhte pen, “Nang na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in,” cihna thu in huam khinmang hi.

[11] Tuhun pen bang hun hita ahi hiam, ci-in theita na hih manun tu-a bangin na gamtat ding uh ahi hi. Tu-in note in khua phawkin na khanlawh ding uh hun hita hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Jesuh Khrih i up cil lai hun sangin tu-in Pasian in leitung haksatna panin eite hong hotkhiat ding hun hong naizaw hi. [12] Zan khuamial bei dektak a, sun khuavak hong tung dektak ta hi. Khuamial sunga gamtatnate khawlin khuavak sunga nazatte zam ta ni. [13] Sun khuavak sunga om mite bangin a kilawmin gamta ni. Gualnopna le zukhamna, mawhna le thangtatna, kitotna le kihazatnate-in i hun beisak kei ni. [14] Kidal nadingin, Topa Jesuh Khrih’ hong piak galhiamte zang unla, na pumpi uh deihna bangin gamtat nading hun omsak nawn kei un.

[1] Note lakah numei tawh paktatna nasia mahmahin, lawkite nangawn a gamtat lohte na gamtatna uh hong kigen a, mi khat in ama nukik nangawn a luppihna thu ka za hi. [2] Tua bang kimlai bangci kisaktheih ding na hi uh hiam? Note na dah mahmah ding uh hizaw a, tua bang mite pen note lak panin na hepkhiat ding uh ahi hi.

[9] Lai ka hong gelhna sungah, numei tawh a paktat mite tawh na kikholh loh nading uh ka hong gen hi. [10] Tua bang ka hong cih ciangin numei tawh a paktat, a huaiham, a guta, milim a bia lawkite tawh na kikhawl kei un, ka cihnopna hi lo hi. Tuate tawh kikhawl lo ding ci lehang, leitung panin paikhia un, cihna suak ding hi. [11] Tua ka hong laigelhna sungah ka cihnopna pen, thu upna sungah unau khat hi hang, ci napi-in numei tawh a paktat, a huaiham, milim a bia, mi gensia, zukham, ahih kei leh a guta theite tawh kikhawl kei un, cihnopna ahi hi. Tua bang mite tawh an ne ding nangawnin zong na tukhawm kei un.

[9] Migilote, Pasian’ Ukna sungah a lut hetloh nading thu na thei uh hi. Note kihaibawl kei un. Numei tawh a paktatte, milim biate, mi zi ahih kei leh mi pasal tawh a mawhte, pasal le pasal a khialte, [10] a gutate, a huaihamte, zukhamte, mi gensiate, ahih kei leh mi’ na a sutte khat beek, Pasian’ Ukna sungah lutthei het lo ding hi.

[13] “An pen i gilpi a’ ding hi a, gilpi zong an a’ ding mah hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci zong omkha ding hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in tua tegel a beisak hun hong tung ding hi. Pumpi pen paktatna-in zat ding hi lo a, Topa’ na sepna-in zat ding hizaw hi. Topa in pumpi a’ ding na hong sem hi. [14] Pasian in sihna panin Topa thokiksak hi. Tua mah bangin eite zong ama vangliatna tawh hong thokiksak ding hi. [15] Na pumpi uh, Khrih pumpi nate khat ahih lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam? Khrih pumpi nate khat la-in numei tawh paktatte’ pumpi nate khat suaksak ding ihi hiam? Tua cih ngei ding hi peuhmah lo hi. [16] Numei paktat tawh a pumpi a kizomsak pa pen tua numei tawh pumkhat sakhat a suak ahih lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho in, “Tua mi nihte pumkhat a suak ding uh hi,” na ci hi. [17] Ahi zongin Topa tawh a kizomte pen kha thu tawh kisai-in amah tawh pumkhat ahi uh hi. [18] Numei tawh mawhna na pelh un. Mi khat in a bawl mawhna tuamtuamte in ama pumpi sukha lo hi, a ci om hi. Ahi zongin numei tawh a mawhte, ama pumpi tungah a khial ahi hi. [19] Na pumpi uh, Pasian in a hong piak, note’ sungah a teng Kha Siangtho’ biakinn ahih lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam? Note’ pumpi, nomau’ neihsa hi lo a, Pasian a’ ahi hi. [20] Note pen Pasian in a hong leisa na hih manun na pumpi uh Pasian’ minthan nadingin na zang un.

[1] Tu-in nong laigelhna uh thu tawh kisai-in: Pasal in zi nei kei leh hoihzaw lo ding ahi hiam, na ci uh hi. [2] Ahi zongin numei tawh paktatna tamlua ahih manin pasal in ama zi tuam nei hen la, numei in ama pasal tuam nei leh hoih hi. [3] Pasal in a zi a luppih dingin a kilawm zahin luppih ding a, a zi in zong a pasal a luppih dingin a kilawm zahin a luppih ding ahi hi. [4] Zi in ama pumpi a ut bangin zangthei nawn loin a pasal’ zat ding hi a, tua mah bangin a pasal in zong ama pumpi a ut bangin zangthei nawn loin a zi’ zat ding ahi hi. [5] Thungetna-in hun na zattheih nadingun tawlkhat sung tuam om ding thukim khawm masa lopi-in lupkhop ding kinialkha kei un. Tua bangin tawlkhat sung na tuam om khit uh ciangin note’ pumpi’ deihna hangin Satan’ ze-etna sungah na pukkhak loh nadingun a ngeina bangin lupkhop ding kipan kik un.
[8] Amaute pawlkhat bangin numei tawh paktatna i gamta kei ding hi. Nikhat thu-in mi tul sawmnih le tulthum a si uh hi.

[13] Na tuah uh ze-etnate khempeuh pen mite’ tuah ngeingeite mah ahi hi. Pasian in citakin a thuciamna lenkip ahih manin note’ thuak zawh loh ding ze-etna hong tuaksak lo ding hi. Ze-etna na tuah hun uh ciangin zong na thuakzawh nading uh thahatna hong guan ding ahih manin na suahtak zawh nading uh lampi hong honsak ding hi.

[21] Note kiangah ka hong tun ciangin a beisa hunah note tampi tak thangtatin, numei tawh mawhna, hukna, lannate hangin na khialhnate uh na kisik loh manun keimah dahin kapin, note’ muhna-ah ka Pasian in kei hong maizumsak khak ding ka lunghimawh mahmah hi.

[18] Kha Siangtho’ deihna bangin na gamtat uhleh Thukham khutnuai-ah na om nawn kei uh hi. [19] Tu-in mihing pianzia hong kitel a, tuate pen: Numei tawh mawhna, thangtatna, lanluat mana khialhna, [20] milim biakna, mi bumna, kilangbawlna, kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, kikhenna, pawltuam lungsim neihna, [21] enna, zukhamna le biakna pawi-ah zukhamna a kipan adangdangte ahi hi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian’ Ukna sungah omkha het lo ding hi.
[19] Amaute in maizumna mel thei nawn lo uh a, siatna sung tungin, a ututun a kilawm lopipi-in gamta uh hi.
