[3] Note pen Pasian’ mi na hih manun note lakah nulepa khialhna, a kilawm lo-a gamtatna, huaihamna cihte genin zong na nei vet kei un.

[5] Nulepa khialhna a gamta mi, a kilawm lo-a a gamta mi, le a huaiham (huaihamna zong milim biakna zahin sia hi) mite in Khrih Ukna le Pasian Ukna sungah bangmah ngah nei het lo ding ahihna uh teltakin thei ta un.
[11] Khuamial gamtatna, bangmahin a kimang lo nasepnate su vet kei unla, tua bang gamtatnate a hoih lohna pholak zaw un.

[4] Note’ nuntakna taktak Khrih ahih manin amah hong kilat ciangin note zong amah tawh hong kilang khawmin amah tawh na minthang khawm ding uh hi. [5] Tua ahih manin nulepa mawhna, a kilawm lo gamtatna, hukna lanna, a hoih lo lunggulhna, le milim biakna nam khat ahih manin huaihamna ahi note sungah a om leitung lungsimte na sisak un.

[3] Note a siangtho-in nungta-in numei tunga mawhna tawh na kipelh siangtho nading uh Pasian in hong deih hi. [4] Pasian a thei lo dawibiate in kilunggulhna hang bek tawh a pumpi uh a zat bang hi loin, note in a kilawm a siangtho-in na pumpi uh bangci zat ding cih thu na theih ding uh hong deih hi. [5] Pasian a thei lo dawibiate in kilunggulhna hang bek tawh a pumpi uh a zat bang hi loin, note in a kilawm a siangtho-in na pumpi uh bangci zat ding cih thu na theih ding uh hong deih hi. [6] Hih bang thute-ah kuamah in Khrih sungah na sanggamte uh tungah na khialh loh nading uh le na khasiatsak loh nading uh hong deih hi. Pasian in hih bangin a gamta mite gim pia ding hi, ci-in khauhtakin note kiangah ka hong genkhol khinzo uh hi. [7] Eite a thanghuai gamtat dingin Pasian in a hong sam hi lo a, a siangtho-in a nungta dingin a hong sam ahi hi.

[10] nulepa mawhna a gamtate, palepa mawhna a bawlte, mi a gute, zuauthu a gente, mite’ siat nading thu a gente, le thuman tawh a kilehbulhin a gamta mite a dingin thukham a kibawl ahi hi. [11] Thuman ka cih pen thupha tawh kidimin a minthang Pasian in ka hilh dingin kei tungah a hong piak Lungdamna Thu ahi hi.
[6] Ahi zongin a pumpi uh deihna zui-in a gamta meigong numeite pen a pumpi uh a nuntak hangin kha thu-ah a sikhin ahi uh hi.
[22] Tua ahih manin khangno lunggulhna hoih lote pelh inla, lungsim takpi tawh Topa tungah huhna a ngen mite tawh thuman thutak, upna, itna, kilemna na neihtheih nadingun hanciam khawm un.

[5] biakna thu a puathamteng zui napi-in biakna hangin vangliatna thu a omte deih lo ding uh hi. Tua bangin a gamta mite na pelh in. [6] Tua bang mite pawlkhat, mite inn-ah va hawh khiankhianin, deihna nam tuamtuam le mawhna lungsim tawh a kidim numeite na thuzawh uh hi.

[12] A hoih takpi mah hiam, ci-in sinna a thuak ciangin a nangzote a hampha mahmah ahi hi. Tua bangin a nangzote in, amah a itte tungah Pasian in a piak dingin a ciam nuntakna lukhu a ngah ding uh hi. [13] Mi khat peuhpeuh in tua bang ze-etna a thuak ciangin, “Pasian in kei hong ze-et hi,” ci-in ngaihsun kei hen. Siatna in Pasian ze-et ngei lo a, mite a siat nadingin Pasian in zong ze-et ngei lo hi. [14] Mi khatpeuh in ama deihna zui-in a gamtat ciangin mawhna a piangsak ahi hi. [15] Lungsim utna a gol semsem ciangin mawhna hong piang a, mawhna hong cingtaak ciangin sihna hong piang hi.

[15] Note a hong sampa a siangtho ahih mah bangin note zong na gamtatna khempeuh uhah na siangtho un. [16] Lai Siangtho sungah zong, “Keimah siangtho ka hih manin note zong na siangtho un,” na kici hi.
[11] Ka itte aw, hih leitungah gamdang mi, a peempak bangin kingaihsun unla, na kha nuntakna uh tawh a kilehngat pumpi’ deihnate na kikham un.

[13] Topa’ hangin leitung ukna aana neite’ thu na mang un. Kumpipa’ thu ahi a, [14] a gamtat siate gim pia-in, a gamtat hoihte a pahtawi dingin kumpipa in a sawl thuneite khempeuh’ thu ahi zongin na mang un.

[1] Khrih in ama pumpi-in thuak ahih manin note in zong tua bang lungsim mah nei-in na kithakhauhsak ding uh ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh pumpi-in a thuak mite peuhmah, mawhna tawh kisawhkha nawn lo uh hi. [2] Tua ahih manin tu a kipanin na leitung nuntak sung uh mihingte’ deihna bangin gamta loin Pasian’ deihna bangin na gamtat ding uh ahi hi. [3] A beisa hunah dawibiate’ gamtat bangin a hoihkhop khat na gamta khinta uh a, a kilawm loin gamtatna, hukna lanna, zunekna, uangtatna, zukham luatna le a muhdahhuai milim biakna-in na hun uh na beisak uh hi.
[9] Ahi zongin Pasian kiangah i mawhnate va pulak lehang, amah citakin thuman ahih manin, i mawhnate hong maisakin i hoih lohnate khempeuh hong siangsak ding hi.
[16] Bang hang hiam cih leh pumpi deihna, mit tawh mu-in i deihte, le mite’ kisaktheihpih nate ahi leitung nate khempeuh pen Pa Pasian tawh a kizom thu hi lo a, leitung tawh a kizom thu ahi hi.

[7] Sodom khua le Gomorrah khua le a kiima om khuapi mite zong tua vantung mite mah bangin gamta uh a, numei tawh mawhnopna bek tham loin pasal le pasal kilunggulhna ciang dong nei uh ahih manin midangte’ etteh dingin tawntung meikuang a thuak uh hi. [8] Tua mite mah bangin hih mite zong thumu-in kinei-in amau pumpi thanghuaisak uh a, Pasian’ thu nialin tunglam a om minthanna a neite a simmawhbawl uh hi.

[14] Ahi zongin note ka hong mawhsak nading thu tawmkhat a om hi. Milim biakna ante nesakin, nulepa paktatna piangsak a, Israel mite mawhna a gamtasak Balak tungah thu a hilh Balaam’ thuhilhnate a um mi pawlkhat note lakah a om hi. [15] Tua mah bangin Nikolas pawlte’ thuhilhna a um mi pawlkhat zong note lak mahah a om hi. [16] Tua ahih manin na mawhna panun kisikkik un. Na kisik kei uhleh note kiangah kei hong pai baihin, ka kam panin a pusuak namsau tawh amaute ka do ding hi.

[20] Ahi zongin note ka hong mawhsak nading thu khat om hi. Kamsang numei ka hi, ci-in thu a gen Jezebel na nial kei uh hi. Ama thuhilhna hangin ka nasemte in numei-pasal paktatna gamta-in milim biakna ante a ne uh hi. [21] Tua numei a kisikkik nading hun ka piak hangin a paktatna panin kihei nuam lo hi. [22] Tua ahih manin tu-in tua numei tawh a paktatna uh panin a kisikkik kei uhleh tua numei le amah tawh a paktat mi khempeuh, lupna ngaksakin nakpitakin gimna ka thuaksak ding hi. [23] Tua numei’ thu a zui mi khempeuh ka that ding hi. Tua hileh, mihingte’ ngaihsutna le lungsim a kantel pa ka hihna thu pawlpi khempeuh in thei ding uh hi. Note’ gamtatna ciat tawh kizui-in ka hong thukkik ding hi.
[8] Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, le zuaugente om nading mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[14] Khuapi kulhkongpi sungah a luttheih nading le nuntakna singgah a nektheih nadingun a puan uh a siangin a sawp mite, mi hampha ahi uh hi. [15] Ahi zongin a lampial mite, aisan mite, a paktat mite, mi thatte, milim biate, le zuaugen nuamsa-in zuau a gengen mite, khuapi pualamah a om uh hi.

[44] Kei pen TOPA na Pasian uh ka hi hi. Tua ahih ciangin note ki-ap unla, kei siangtho ka hih manin note zong siangtho un. Leitungah a bokvak a hontat ganhing khat peuhpeuh tawh note na kininsak tawm kei ding uh hi. [45] Bang hang hiam cih leh note’ Pasian ahi dingin Egypt gam panin note a hong pai khiatpih pa pen keimah TOPA ka hi hi. Tua ahih ciangin kei siangtho ka hih manin note na siangtho ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[2] “Israel mihonte khempeuh kiangah hih bangin gen in: Note na siangtho ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA note’ Pasian keimah ka siangtho hi.
[7] Tua ahih ciangin note ki-ap unla siangtho un; bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen TOPA na Pasian uh ka hi hi.

[10] “Na mit un a muhsa nate na nuntak sungun mangngilh kha-in, na lungsim panun paikhia kha ding ahih manin limtakin ngaihsunin hoihtakin kikem un. Horeb-a TOPA na Pasian uh mai-ah na din ni-un TOPA in kei kiangah, ‘Leitungah a nuntak laiteng uh amaute in kei hong kihtakna ding le amaute in a tate uh a hilhsawn theih nadingun keimah in amaute tungah ka thute ka zaksak theih nadingin ka kiangah mite hong khawm in,’ hong cihna thu, na tate uh le na tate uh tate’ tungah kitheisak un.

[12] Jordan galkhatah a luah dingin na paina uh gamah na nuntak laitengun amaute in a thu za-in TOPA na Pasian uh zahtak ding a theih nading, le hih thukham thute khempeuh limtakin a sep theih nading, le hih thu a thei nai lo amau’ tate in TOPA na Pasian uh zahtak ding a theih nadingun, numei, pasal, le naupangte, le na khuapite uh sunga om peemtate, mi khempeuh khawm un,” a ci hi.

[19] Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Kei hong zui un; nga mat bangin pawl tampi a ngah thei mi kong suaksak ding hi,” ci hi. [20] Amau tegel in zong a ngente uh nusia-in Jesuh a zui pah uh hi. [21] Tua lai panin a paikhiat khit uh ciangin Zebedi tapa James le Johan-te unau, a pa uh tawh gunkuang sungah ngen puahin a om mu leuleu a, amau tegel zong a sam hi. [22] Amau tegel in zong gunkuang le a pa uh nusia-in Jesuh a zui pah uh hi.

[14] “Note pen leitung mite a dingin khuavak tawh na kibang uh hi. Mual dawnah a om khua kiseelcip thei lo hi. [15] Mei a vak khit ciangin kuamah in lawh khuhlo hi. Meivakna mun sangah koihzaw a, innsung khempeuh a taangsak hi. [16] Midangte in na gamtatna hoihte uh a muh ciangin vantungah a om na Pa uh min a phat theih nadingun mite mai-ah na gamtat hoihna uh khuavak bangin na kilangsak un.

[21] Tua ciangin amah a zui midang khat in, “Topa aw, kei hong ciahsak inla, ka pa hong vuisak masa in,” a cih leh [22] Jesuh in, “Nangmah in kei hong zui inla, misi bang ahi mite in misite a vui dingun nusiat in,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[9] Tua lai mun panin Jesuh a paikhiat ciangin siahdongpa Matthai a zumah tu-in a om mu a, “Hong zui in,” a cih leh amah zong dingin a zuipah hi.
[24] “A siapa sangin a sang naupangte lianzaw ngei lo a, a topa sangin a silate lianzaw ngei lo hi.
[32] “Keima mi ahihna thu mite’ theihin a genkhia mite, kei zong vantungah ka Pa’ mai-ah keima mi ahihna thu ka gen ding hi.
[37] “Kei sangin a nu a pa a itzawte kei tawh kilawm lo a, kei sangin a tapa a tanu a itzawte kei tawh kilawm lo hi.

[24] Tua ciangin Jesuh in a nungzuite kiangah, “Mi khatpeuh ka nungzui a suahnop leh, ama deihna bangin gamta nawn loin, a singlamteh kisuanin hong zui ding hi. [25] Hih a leitung nuntakna a hu nuamte in a nuntakna bulpi nangawn tawh suplawh ding a, keima hangin hih a leitung nuntakna a suplawhte in a nuntakna bulpi huzo ding hi.

[21] Jesuh in, “Mi cingtaak na hihnop leh pai-in na neihsate va zuak inla, na sum khotte, mizawngte tungah va pia lecin, vantungah sum na hau ding hi. Tua ciangin hong pai inla kei hong zui in,” a ci hi.

[26] Ahi zongin note lakah tua bang hi lo ding hi. Note lakah a lian ahi dingte note’ nasem hi ding a, [27] note’ lakah a lianpen ahi dingte note’ sila hi ding hi. [28] Mihing Tapa zong nasem nei dingin hong pai hi loin mi dangte a’ ding na semin, mi tampi tat nading a si dingin a hong pai ahih mah bangin note zong a tuaci ding na hi uh hi,” a ci hi.

[16] Nungzui sawm le khatte zong, Jesuh in a gensa bangin Galilee gam a mualtungah a pai uh hi. [17] Amaute in Jesuh a muh uh ciangin bia uh a, ahi zongin pawlkhat in umzo taktak lo uh hi. [18] Tua ciangin amaute mai-ah Jesuh hong pai a, “Leitungah ahi a, vantungah ahi zongin vangliatna khempeuh kei tungah hong kipia khinta hi. [19] Tua ahih ciangin note pai unla, midang khempeuh, keima nungzui mi suaksakin, Pa min, Tapa min, le Kha Siangtho min tawh tui sungah na phum un. [20] Tua ciangin note tungah ka hong gen thute khempeuh a zuih nadingun na hilh un. Hun bei dongin note a hong ompih tawntung ding ka hihna thu phawk ta un,” a ci hi.

[16] Galilee Tuili gei tawnin Jesuh a pai laitakin, Simon le a nau Andru, ngabengte ahih manun, ngen tawh nga khuhin a om a mu hi. [17] Jesuh in amau tegel kiangah, “Kei hong zui un; nga mat bangin mi tampi a huaite kong suaksak ding hi,” a ci hi. [18] Amau tegel in zong a ngen uh nusia-in Jesuh a zuipah uh hi. [19] Tawmkhat a pai khit ciangin Zebedi’ tapa James le a nau Johan zong, a gunkuang tung uhah a ngen uh khui-in a om a mu leuleu hi. [20] Jesuh in amaute a muh phetin sampah a, amau tegel in zong a pa uh Zebedi le a thacialte uh nusia-in Jesuh’ nung a zui uh hi.
[14] Tua bangin a paina-ah Alfeas tapa Levi, a siahdonna zumah tu-in a om a mu hi. Jesuh in ama kiangah, “Kei hong zui in,” a ci hi. Levi zong dingin Jesuh’ nung a zuipah hi.

[13] Tua lai panin a mualtung lamah Jesuh paito a, mi a deihteng ama kiangah a sam hi. Tua a sap mite ama kiangah hong pai uh a, [14] amah in mi sawm le nih teelin, sawltakte, ci-in min a phuah hi. Jesuh in, “Kei tawh a kikhawl dingin noteng ka hong teel hi. Thu a hilh dingin zong ka hong sawl ding a, [15] dawi hawlkhiat nading vangliatna na nei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[8] Amaute kiangah, “Ciangkhut simloh, na khualzinna uhah bangmah keng kei un. An ahi a, ip ahi a, sum ahi zongin keng kei un.
[34] Tua ciangin Jesuh in mihonpite le a nungzuite ama kiangah sam a, “Mi khatpeuh ka nungzui a suahnop leh ama deihna bangin gamta nawn loin a singlamteh kisuanin hong zui ding hi.

[21] Tua ciangin Jesuh in itna tawh tua mipa enin, “Na khat bek na kisam lai hi. Pai inla, na neih khempeuh na zuak khit ciangin mizawngte tungah na sumkhotte va pia in. Tua hileh vantungah sum na hau ding hi. Tua khit ciangin ka nung hong zui in,” a ci hi.
[16] Amah in Israel mi tampi tak, amau’ Topa Pasian’ kiangah tunpihkik ding hi.
[11] Tui gei-ah a gunkuangte uh a tunpih khit uh ciangin a na khempeuh uh nusia-in Jesuh a zui uh hi.

[12] Ni khat, thungen dingin mualtungah Jesuh pai a, zan tawntung Pasian kiangah thu ngenin a om hi. [13] Khua a vak ciangin a nungzuite sam a, amaute sung panin sawm le nih teelkhia-in sawltakte ci-in min a phuak hi.
[40] Sang naupang khat a siapa sangin lianzaw ngei lo hi; a sin ding khempeuh a theihkhit ciangin a siapa tawh kikim pan bek ding hi.”
[23] Tua ciangin Jesuh in a nungzuite le mi khempeuh kiangah, “Mi khatpeuh in kei hong zuihnop leh ama deihna bangin gamta nawn loin nisimin a singlamteh pua-in hong zui ding hi.

[57] Lampi-ah a pai laitakun mi khat in Jesuh kiangah, “Na paina khempeuhah kong zui ding hi,” a ci hi. [58] Jesuh in, “Ngiate in lup nading kua nei uh a, vasate in zong giah nading bu nei uh hi. Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa in a luptheih nading mun koimahah nei lo hi,” a ci hi. [59] Tua ciangin Jesuh in midang khat kiangah, “Kei hong zui in,” a ci hi. Ahi zongin amah in, “Topa aw, kei hong ciahsak inla, ka pa hong vuisak masa in,” a ci hi. [60] Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Misi bang ahi mite in misite na vui tahen. Nang ahihleh va pai inla Pasian’ Ukna thu va hilh in,” a ci hi. [61] Tua ciangin midang khat in, “Topa aw, nang ka hong zui ding hi. Ahi zongin ka inn-ate, mangpha hong khasak masa in,” a ci hi. [62] Jesuh in ama kiangah, “Bawng lokhawhna lenkawmin a nunglam a en mi pen Pasian’ Ukna tawh kituak lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[19] Tu-in thei un. Gulpi le momaite na sikgawp nading uh le na galte uh na zawh nadingun note tungah vangliatna ka hong piazo a, amaute in note bangmah hong cih zo lo ding uh hi.
[12] Bang hang hiam cih leh a hun a tun ciangin Kha Siangtho in na gen dingteng uh hong hilh ding hi,” a ci hi.

[25] Mi tampi tak in Jesuh hong zui uh a, Jesuh zong kihei-in amaute kiangah, [26] “Kei kiangah a hong pai mite peuhmah in a nu le a pa, a zi le a ta, a sanggam numeite le a sanggam pasalte, le ama pumpi mahmah a nial ngam kei leh keima nungzui suak thei lo ding hi. [27] Ama singlamteh mah puatawmin ka nung hong zui lote, keima nungzui hi thei lo hi.
[33] Tua mah bangin mi khat in a neih khempeuh a piakkhiat ngam kei leh keima nungzui suak thei lo ding hi.

[22] Jesuh in hih thu a zak ciangin ama kiangah, “Na khat na kisam lai hi. Na neihsa khempeuh zuak inla, mizawngte tungah na sum khotte pia in. Tua hileh vantungah na hau ding hi. Tua khit ciangin ka nung hong zui in,” a ci hi.

[39] Jesuh in, “Hong pai unla, ka omna mun hong mu un,” a na ci hi. Amau tegel in zong Jesuh va zui uh a, a omna mun a va mu uh hi. Tua hun pen nitak nai li hun pawl ahih manin ama kiangah a giak uh hi.
[43] A zing ciangin Jesuh in Galilee gamah pai ding ngaihsun hi. Filip tawh kituak a, ama kiangah, “Hong zui in,” a ci hi.
[45] Kamsangte in a lai gelhna uhah, ‘Pasian in mi khempeuh a hilh ding hi,’ na ci uh hi. Tua ahih manin Pa kiang panin thu za-in a thei mi khempeuh ka kiangah a hong pai ahi hi.

[67] Tua ahih manin Jesuh in a nungzui sawm le nihte kiangah, “Note zong na ciahkik nuam mai uh hiam?” a cih ciangin [68] Simon Peter in, “Topa aw, ciah le ung kua kiang zuan mawk ding ka hi uh hiam? Nangmah in nuntak tawntung nading thu na nei hi. [69] Tu-in nang ka hong um uh a, Pasian kiang panin a hong pai a Siangtho Pa na hihna thu ka hong thei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. [70] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Note na sawm le nih mahun ka hong teel hinapi-in khat pen dawi na suakmawk uh hi,” a ci hi. [71] Sawm le nihte sung panin amah a lehpei ding ahih manin Simon Iskariot’ tapa Judas thu a genna ahi hi.

[31] Tua ahih manin amah a um Jew mite kiangah Jesuh in, “Ka thuhilhnate na zuih paisuak nak-uhleh ka nungzui taktakte na hi ding uh hi. [32] Tua ciangin thuman na thei ding uh a, tua thuman in note hong suaktasak ding hi,” a cih leh
[27] Keima tuute in ka aw za-in thei uh ahih manin kei hong zui uh hi.

[25] Tua ahih manin hih leitung nuntakna a itte in a nuntakna taktak taanlawh ding a, hih leitung nuntakna a it lote in nuntakna taktak nei tawntung ding hi. [26] Ka nasemte keima omna-ah a omtheih nadingin ka na a sem nuam peuhmah in kei hong zui ding uh a, ka Pa in ka na a sem mite a pahtawi ding hi,” a ci hi.

[12] Jesuh in amaute’ khe a silsak khit ciangin a puan silhkik a, annek sabuai-ah a tutnasa mun hong zuanin, “Tu-a note tungah ka hong gamtatna thu na thei uh hiam? [13] Note in kei pen Siapa, le Topa, na hong ci uh hi. Na hong cih uh mah bangin a man ka hi hi. [14] Note’ Topa le Siapa in na khe uh hong silsak ka hih leh note khatlekhat na kisilsak kan ding uh kilawm hi. [15] Note tungah ka hong gamtat bangin note na gamtat theih nadingun a lim a hong lak ka hi hi. [16] A mantakin ci lehang, sila pen a topa sangin lianzaw ngei lo a, a kisawlpa zong a sawl pa sangin lianzaw ngei lo hi. [17] Hih thu thei-in na zuih uhleh na lung uh nuam mahmah ding hi.

[34] Note tungah ka hong piak thak thu in: Note khatlekhat na ki-it ding uh ahi hi. Note ka hong it mah bangin note khatlekhat na ki-it un. [35] Note khatlekhat ki-it le-uhcin keima nungzuite na hihna uh mi khempeuh in hong thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[21] Keima thupiakte sangin a zuite in keimah hong it ahi uh hi. Kei hong it mite pen ka Pa in zong it ding a, keimah in zong itin amaute tungah ka kilang ding hi,” a ci hi.

[26] Ahi zongin Pa in keima tangin a hong sawl ding Huhpa Kha Siangtho a hong tun ciangin note tungah thu khempeuh hong hilh ding a, note tungah ka hong gensa thu khempeuh zong hong phawksakkik ding hi.

[8] Gah tampi gah le-uhcin ka Pa’ minthanna a kilangsak na hi ding uh a, keima nungzui na hihna uh kilang ding hi. [9] Ka Pa in kei hong it zahin note hong it ka hih manin keima hong itna sungah om un. [10] Ka Pa’ hong thupiakte zui-in ama itna sungah ka om mah bangin note in zong ka thupiaknate na hong zuih uhleh ka itna sungah a om na hi ding uh hi. [11] Note hangin kei ka lungdam theih nading le note’ lungdamna a cingtaak a suahtheih nadingin hih thute a hong gen ka hi hi. [12] “Note tungah ka hong piak thu in: Note ka hong it zahin note khatlekhat na ki-it un. [13] Lawmte’ tang ding sih ngamna sangin lawmte itna a lianzaw om nawn lo hi. [14] Ka hong thupiak bangin na gamtat uhleh ka lawmte na hi uh hi.

[13] Tua ahih manin thuman hong lak ding Kha Siangtho hong tun ciangin thu khempeuh a manin hong hilh ding hi. Ama ngaihsuttawm thu hong gen ding hi lo a, ama tungah a kigen thute le a hong tung ding thute a hong gen ding ahi hi.

[15] An a nekkhit uh ciangin Jesuh in Simon Peter kiangah, “Johan’ tapa Simon aw, hih adang khempeuhte’ hong it sangin kei na hong nak itzaw hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin amah in, “Topa aw, ka hong itzaw hi. Nang ka hong itna na thei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. [16] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Ka tuunote na kem in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Jesuh in a nihveina dong leuleu a, “Johan’ tapa Simon aw, kei na hong it hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Topa aw, nang ka hong it a, ka hong itna thu na thei hi,” a cih ciangin, “Ka tuute na kem in,” a ci leuleu hi.

[8] Ahi zongin note tungah Kha Siangtho hong tun ciangin vangliatna tawh na kidim ding uh a, Jerusalem khuasung, Judea gam sung, Samaria gam sung, le leimong dongin note in keima thu na gen ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[1] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Pasian in eite tam veipi tak hong hehpih ahih manin ama lungkim nading le ama nasep nadingin nomau mahmah a hingtangin Pasian tungah na kipiak nadingun ka hong thum hi. Tua banga kipiakna pen Pasian biakna man taktak ahi hi. [2] Leitung mihingte’ gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahphasak un. Tua hileh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkimsakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian’ deihna na phawk thei ding uh hi.

[7] Ama a’ ding bekin kuamah nungta lo a, ama a’ ding bekin kuamah si lo hi. [8] I nuntak leh Topa a dingin a nungta ihi a, i sih leh zong Topa a’ ding mahin a si ihi hi. Tua ahih manin i si a, i hing zongin Topa a’ ihi hi.

[13] Tua ahih manin hih bangin thu ka hong gen uh ciangin zong, mihingte’ hong hilh pilna kamte a zang hi loin, Kha Siangtho a nei mite tungah kha tawh kisai thu ka gen uh ciangin Kha Siangtho in a hong hilh kammalte zangin a gen ka hi uh hi.
[1] Kote pen Khrih’ nasem, le Pasian’ thusim a zeekte-in nong ngaihsut ding uh ahi hi.

[6] Sanggamte aw, note a’ ding ka ngaihsutna-in hih thu khempeuh Apollos le keima pumpi tungah ka zat uh thu ahi hi. “A khengvalin gamta kei un,” cihna thu na theih nadingun ko tegel, etteh dingin ka hong zang hi. Note in mi khatpeuh kisaktheihpihin mi khatpeuh na simmawhbawl kei ding uh hi.
[1] Keimah in Khrih gamtatzia ka zuih mah bangin note in zong keima gamtatzia hong zui ta un.

[15] Ama hangin a nungtate, amau a dingin nungta nawn loin, amau’ hangin si-in a kihingkik sakpa a dingin a nuntak theih nadingun mi khempeuh a dingin amah a hong si hi. [16] Tua ahih manin kote in mihingte’ ngeina zia tawh kuamah ka en nawn kei uh hi. Khrih mahmah zong mihing lungsim ngaihsutna zia tawh ka et ngei uh hangin tu-in tua bangin ka ngaihsun nawn kei uh hi. [17] Tua ahih manin mi khatpeuh, Khrih tawh a kipawl ciangin mi thak suak a, a mi lui ngeina bei-in a mi thak ngeina a neita ahi hi.

[20] Tua ahih ciangin kote pen Khrih tangin nasem ka hi uh a, Pasian in kote zangin note tungah thu a hong gen ahi hi. Pasian tawh kilemin pawlkhatin na om nadingun Khrih tangin a hong thum ka hi uh hi.

[5] Kote hong kisatin, thongah hong kikhia-in, mihonpi in hong hihgawp uh hi; nakpitakin na semin, an ne lo, ihmu lo liangin ka om uh hi. [6] Siangtho takin nuntakna, thu theihna, lungduaina, migitna, Kha Siangtho’ huhna, itna taktak neihna, [7] thuman genna, le Pasian’ nasemte ka hihna uh, Pasian’ vang tawh ka kilangsak uh hi. Kote in kihut nading le galsim nadingin hiamin thuman ka zang uh hi. [8] Kote hong kipahtawi-in hong kimindaisak zel a, hong kisimmawh bawlin zong hong kiphat zel hi. Thuman gen hinapi-in zuaugen bangin hong kingaihsun a, [9] mi khempeuh in hong theih hinapi-in theih loh mi bangin hong kibawl a, nong theih uh mah bangin kote a nungta hinapi-in misi bangin hong kingaihsun hi. [10] Dahna ka thuak uh hangin ka lungdam uh a, kote a zawng tawh kibang napi-in mi tampi ka hausak uh a, bangmah a nei het lo tawh kibang napi-in a taktakin ka neih loh uh bangmah om lo hi.

[18] Kha Siangtho’ deihna bangin na gamtat uhleh Thukham khutnuai-ah na om nawn kei uh hi. [19] Tu-in mihing pianzia hong kitel a, tuate pen: Numei tawh mawhna, thangtatna, lanluat mana khialhna, [20] milim biakna, mi bumna, kilangbawlna, kitotna, hazatna, hehna, huaihamna, kikhenna, pawltuam lungsim neihna, [21] enna, zukhamna le biakna pawi-ah zukhamna a kipan adangdangte ahi hi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian’ Ukna sungah omkha het lo ding hi. [22] Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho’ sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna, [23] dikna le pumpi ki-ukzawhna hi a, hih bangin a gamta mite, Thukham in bangmah cih thei lo hi. [24] Tua hi a, Jesuh Khrih a zui mite in a leitung lungsim pianzia uh le a leitung lungsim deihna khempeuh uh a phiat khitsa ahi hi. [25] Kha Siangtho in eite hong nungtasak khinta ahih manin ama hong sawlna bangin eite a nungta ding ihi hi. [26] Kuamah kiphasak loin, khatlekhat kiphin loin, kuamah i kihaza kei ding hi.
[4] Ama mai-ah eite pen paubaanna a nei lo, mi siangthote ahi ding le Khrih hangin ama mite ahi dingin leitung a pianma pek nangawnin Pasian in a hong teelsa ihi hi.

[17] i Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pasian ahi, a minthang Pa Pasian in note tungah Kha Siangtho hong pia-in, tua Kha Siangtho in note tungah lungpilna hong pia-in, note in Pasian na theih nadingun note tungah Pasian hong kilatsak nadingin thu ka hong ngetsak niloh hi.

[11] Amah in mite tungah siamna a tuamtuam hong pia a, pawlkhatte sawltak nasep a sem ding, pawlkhatte kamsang nasep a sem ding, pawlkhatte thuhilh kawikawi nasep a sem ding, pawlkhatte pawlpi kem nasep a sem ding, le pawlkhatte laihilh nasep a sem dingin a hong seh hi.

[8] Note pen khuamial sungah a omngei hinapi-in, Topa’ mi na suahkhit uh ciangin khuavak sungah a om hita na hih uh manin khuavak sungah a om mite bangin na gamta un. [9] Bang hang hiam cih leh khuavak sunga omna in a hoih, a man, a thutakte hong piangsak hi. [10] Bangteng in Topa lungkimsak ahi hiam, ci-in kan un. [11] Khuamial gamtatna, bangmahin a kimang lo nasepnate su vet kei unla, tua bang gamtatnate a hoih lohna pholak zaw un. [12] Kuama theih lohin a simthamin a hihte uh gen ding nangawnin zong zumhuai lua hi. [13] Na khat peuhpeuh khuavakah pusuah lehang a pianzia man taktak hong kilang hi.
[9] Keima genna le ka gamtatna panin thei-in na san uh thute, nomau pumpi mahmah tawh na zui un. Tua hileh nopsakna a hong piathei Pasian in note hong ompih ding hi.
[28] Tua ahih manin a milip tungah Khrih’ thu ka hilh uh a, Khrih tawh a kipawlna uh hangin a milipin a khangcingin Pasian’ omna-ah ka tunpih theih nadingun a milip tungah hilhin ka genkhol uh hi.
[12] Pasian in note hong itin, hong teelin, ama mi siangthote hikhin na hih manun note pen hehpihna nei-in, migi-in, kiniamkhiatin, dikin, na lungduai ding uh ahi hi.
[24] Topa in note tungah thaman a hong piak ding lamtak phawk gige un. Tua bangin na sepna uhah Khrih Topa’ na a semsem na hi uh hi.

[8] Note hong it mahmah ka hih manun Pasian kiang panin a hong pai Lungdamna Thu bek hong gen loin, kote’ nuntakna mahmah zong note a dingin a pia ngamin ka om uh hi. Tua ahih manin kote’ hong muhna-ah note a manpha mahmah na hi uh hi.
[7] Kote’ gamtatzia bangin a gamta ding na hihna uh teltakin na thei uh hi. Note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-un ka thadah om kei uh hi.
[5] Hih bangin thupiakna pen, upna taktak le kisuanna om hetloin lungsim siangtho taktak tawh ngaihsutna panin a hong piangkhia ki-itna a khantheih nading deihna ahi hi.

[4] Meigong numei khatpeuh in tate ahi a, tute ahi zongin a neih leh innkuan sungah biakna tawh kisai-in tavuan a neihna uh hilh inla, a nu a pa, a pu a pite a huh nadingun gen in. Hih bang gamtatna pen Pasian’ muhna-ah a hoih thu ahi hi.

[2] Mi tampite’ theihin ka thuhilh, na zaksa thu khempeuh, midangte a hilhsawn thei dingin a citak mite tungah hoihtakin a zuih dingun na hilh in. [3] Khrih Jesuh’ galkap hoih hihna tawh thuak dingin a kisam khempeuh na na thuak in. [4] Galkap a semlai mipa in ama tungah a om bupa a lungkimsak theih nadingin na sem ahih manin tualsung mite’ nasep tawh thuahkhawm lo hi.
[14] I mite ommawk loin, thu kisam a phamawhte huh thei-in, na hoih na phate a septheih nadingun na hilh in.

[17] Na makaite uh thu na mang unla, a genna uh bangin na gamta un. Pasian kiangah amaute in a nasepnate uh a pulak ding uh ahih manin tawlnga loin note hong lunghimawh tawntung uh hi. Amaute’ thu mang le-uhcin a nasepna uhah lungdam mahmah ding uh a, mang kei le-uhcin dah pipi-in na sem ding uh hi. Dah pipi-in a nasepna uh note a dingin zong phattuamna a om tuan hi lo hi.

[12] Vantung panin a hong kisawl Kha Siangtho’ vangliatna tawh thu a gen thupuakte’ tung panin na zak uh Thute mah kamsangte in a gen laitakun, tua a thugente uh amaute a’ ding hi loin note a’ ding ahihna thu, Pasian in tua kamsangte tungah a na genzo hi. Vantung mite nangawn in hih thute a theihtelnop khat uh ahi hi. [13] Tua ahih manin na lungsim uh ki-ukin a kigingsa-in om unla, Jesuh Khrih hong kilat ni ciangin na ngah ding uh hehpihna thupha ngaihsutin nei un. [14] Pasian’ thu na mang unla, na theih nai loh uh hun lai-in na gamtat ngei uh bangin na gamta nawn kei un. [15] Note a hong sampa a siangtho ahih mah bangin note zong na gamtatna khempeuh uhah na siangtho un. [16] Lai Siangtho sungah zong, “Keimah siangtho ka hih manin note zong na siangtho un,” na kici hi.

[9] Ahi zongin note pen Pasian in a hong teelkhiat minam, Kumpi siampi pawl, a siangtho minam, Pasian’ mite na hi uh a, khuamial sung panin a lamdang mahmah ama khuavak sungah a hong samkhia pa’ nasepna a lamdangte a genkhia dingin Pasian in a hong teel mite na hi uh hi. [10] Nidangin Pasian’ mi na hihloh uh hangin tu-in ama mi na hi uh a, nidangin Pasian’ hehpihna na theih loh uh hangin tu-in ama hehpihna na ngah uh hi.
[21] Khrih mahmah in zong note a dingin thuakin, ama khekhap na zuihtheih nadingun etteh ding lim hong nusiat ahih manin hih bangin a thuak ding mahin Pasian in note a hong sam ahi hi.
[3] Eite in ama thupiaknate i zuih leh amah a thei taktak ihihna hong kilang hi.
[6] Pasian tawh ka kipawl hi, a ci mi khempeuh, Jesuh Khrih a gamtat bangin a gamtat ding ahi hi.
[22] Ama thupiaknate zui-in ama lungkim nadingin gamta ihih manin ama kiang panin i nget peuhpeuh i ngah hi.
[3] Pasian i it ciangin ama thupiakte a zui ihi hi. Eite a dingin ama thupiakte zuih ding a haksa lua hi lo hi.

[4] Hih mite in numei tawh paktatna gamta ngei nai lo uh a, paubaanna a nei lote ahi uh hi. Amaute in Tuuno a paina peuhpeuhah zui uh a, midang khempeuh sung panin a kitankhiasa, Pasian le Tuuno tungah a kipia masa mite ahi uh hi.

[26] Tua ciangin Pasian in, “Eima lim, eimah hong sunin mihing bawl ni. Tuipi ngasate tung, huihlak vasate tung, ganhingte tung, le leitung a a bokvakte khempeuh tungah ukna neisak ni,” a ci hi. [27] Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ama lim bangin mihing piangsakin, Pasian’ lim bangin amah a piangsak hi. Amah in pasal le numei a piangsak hi. [28] Pasian in amaute thupha pia a, Pasian in amaute tungah, “Ci pha-in tampi pha unla, leitung dimin zo un. Tuipi ngasate tung, leitungah a gamtang, a nungtate khempeuh tungah ukna nei ta un,” a ci hi.
[16] Ahi zongin leitung khempeuhah keima min a kipulak theih nadingin note tungah ka vangliatna lah ding deihna-in kong nungtasak lai hi.
[12] “ TOPA na Pasian un note hong piak leitang tungah na khan uh a sau theih nadingin na nu le na pa uh zahtak un.
[4] TOPA aw, na zia na tong a thei-in hong bawl inla, na lampite hong hilh in.
[1] TOPA in inn lampih kei leh innlamte’ sepna a mawkna ahi hi. TOPA in khuapi hutpih kei leh khuapi cingte’ cinna a mawkna ahi hi.
[8] TOPA in kei a dingin a ngaihsutte hong tungsak ding hi. TOPA aw, na itna kip tawntung hi. Na sepsa na maban hong tun ta in.

[1] Jerusalem khua sungah kumpi a sem, David’ tapa, Thugen Siampa’ thugente: [2] Thugen Siampa in hih bangin ci hi: A mawknapi, a mawknapi, na khempeuh a mawknapi. [3] Gimpi-a nisa thuakin nasepna-ah mihing in bang noptuam ngah ahi hiam? [4] Khang khat bei-in khang khat hong tung a, ahi zongin leitung kibangbang niloh hi. [5] Ni hong suakin ni tum a, a suakkik dingin tum zel hi. [6] Leitaw lamah huih nungin leilu lamah nung leuleu a, a zuih ngeina teng mah zui-in nungnung niloh hi. [7] Lui khempeuh tuipi-ah luangsuk a, ahi zongin tuipi dim nai lo hi. Tuipi tuite a khu-in leengin tuinakah guahin zu a, a nak panin hong luangsuk kik zel hi. [8] Na khempeuh lunggimhuai a, kuama genzawh ding hi lo hi. Mit in a muh cim thei lo a, bil in a zak cim thei lo hi. [9] A omsa mah bangin hong piang kik ding a, a kisemsa bangin hong kisem kik ding hi. Leitungah a thak na khat beek om lo hi. [10] Hih pen a thak ahi hi, a kici thei ding khat beek om lo hi. Eite’ khan ma-in a omsa vive ahi hi. [11] A beisa nate kiphawkkha nawn lo a, hong tung lai ding thute zong a khangkikte in phawk nawn lo ding hi. [12] Thugen Siampa kei pen Jerusalem khua-ah Israel kumpipa ka hi ngei hi. [13] Hih leitungah a kisem na khempeuh entelin a thu kan ding ka ngaihsun hi. Pasian in tua bang nasep ei tungah hong guat pen a nuam het lo nasep khat ahi hi. [14] Leitungah a kisem khempeuh ka mu khin a, tuate khempeuh a mawknapi na hi a, huihpi nung tawh kibang lel hi. [15] A kawisate kimamsak thei lo a, a om lopi a omin kiseh thei lo hi. [16] “Pilna sangpi ka nei a, keima mai-ah Jerusalem a uk dangte khempeuh sangin ka pilzaw hi. Pilna le theihna a kici khempeuh ka thei loh om lo hi,” ka ci hi. [17] Pilna le haina, theihna le mawlna, a kilamdanna ka zong hi. Ahi zongin tua bang ka hahkatna zong a mawknapi ahihlam ka phawk hi. [18] Pil semsem lehang kilunghimawh semsem a, tam thei semsem lehang hong gimsak semsem zawsop hi.
[1] Hih leitungah a piang thu khempeuh, Pasian in ama pian’ hun dinga a sehsa hunin a piansak ahi hi.

[13] Hih thute khempeuh banah gen ding thu khat bek om hi. Mihing hong kipiansakna a thu bulpi pen in: Pasian zahtakna le a thupiakte manna ahi hi. [14] A pha hitaleh a sia hitaleh a simthamin i hih simte nangawn i hihna khempeuhah Pasian in thu hong khen ding hi.

[4] Ahih hangin keimah in, “Na ka sem a, ahi zongin a kimanna om lo hi. Ka thatang khempeuh ka beisak a, ahi zongin bangmah ka tangtun kei hi. Ahi zongin TOPA in a manin na hong sem ding, ci-in ka muang a, ka sep thaman hong pia ding hi, ci-in ka um hi,” ka ci hi.
[11] keima kam panin a paikhia ka thu zong tua mah bang ding hi. A hawmpi-in kei kiangah hong tungkik lo ding a, keima ngimnasa bangin tangtung sakin, amah ka sawlna thu tangtun ding hi.
[5] “Gil sungah kong bawl ma-in nang kong thei khinzo hi. Na suah ma-in nang kong teelkhia khinzo a, minam dangte tungah kamsang dingin kong koih khinzo hi,” hong ci hi.

[11] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in kong cihin-ah, mai lamah lametna note kong piakkik ding, na siatna ding uh hi loin na phattuamna ding uh geelna ka neihte kei bek in ka thei hi. [12] Tua hun ciangin note in kei hong samin, hong pai-in thu nong ngen ding uh a, ke’n zong kong dawng ding hi. [13] Note in kei nong zong ding uh a, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh nong zon uh ciangin nong mu ding uh hi.

[8] Mun khempeuhah a om no mihingte aw, TOPA in a hoih nate hong gen khinzo hi. TOPA in note tung panin hong kalh thu in: Thuman thutang sem ding a, itna kip nei tawntungin, kiniamkhiatna tawh Pasian’ thu man’ ding ahi hi.

[13] “Note pen leitung mite a dingin ci tawh na kibang uh hi. Ahi zongin ci a alna bei leh i alsakkik theih nading lampi om nawn lo hi. A kizat nading bangmah om nawn lo a, mite’ tuatcilgawp dingin kipaai lel hi. [14] “Note pen leitung mite a dingin khuavak tawh na kibang uh hi. Mual dawnah a om khua kiseelcip thei lo hi.

[45] Tua hileh vantungah a om na Pa uh tate na hi thei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in mihoihte le misiate tungah a kibangin ni taangsak khawm a, a gamtat phate le a gamtat siate tungah zong a kibang mahin guah zusak khawm hi.

[25] “Tua ahih ciangin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na nuntak nadingun bang ne-in bang dawn ding cih ahi a, na pumpi uh a dingin bang silh ding cih ahi zongin lunghimawh lua kei un. Nuntakna pen an sangin thupizaw a, pumpi pen puan sangin thupizaw hi lo ahi hiam? [26] “Vanah a leeng vasate ngaihsun dih un: Amaute in khai tuh lo, an zong la lo, sal sungah zong khol lo napi-in vantungah a om na Pa un tuate a nek ding uh tasamsak lo hi. Tua vasate sangin note manphazaw thampek hi lo na hi uh hiam? [27] Na lunghihmawh manun kua in na khan uh kum bangzah sotto thei na hi uh hiam? [28] Bang hangin puansilh ding lunghimawh na hi uh hiam? Gamlak a om paakte a nuntakzia ngaihsun dih un: Amaute in amau a dingin na lah sem lo, khau zong kheek lo napi-in, [29] a hau mahmah Solomon nangawn a hoihpenin a kizep ciangin zong hih paakte banzo nai lo lai hi. [30] Tua ahih ciangin tuni-in hingin, a zing ciang mahin meikhukah a kikhultum lel hih gamlak lopate Pasian in puansilh guan ahihleh note hong lim guatzaw ding ahih manin na upna uh a neu mahmah ahi hi. [31] Tua ahih manin bang ne ding a, bang dawn ding a, bang silh ding ihi hiam, ci-in lunghimawh lua kei un. [32] (Gentail mite in lunghihmawh penin a neihte uh hih bangte ahi hi.) Hih nate khempeuh na kisap lamtak uh vantungah a om na Pa un a thei hi. [33] Thudang khempeuh sangin Pasian’ ukna le ama deihna na zuih theih nading uh thupi ngaihsut masazaw un. Tua hileh hih na kisapna dangte khempeuh uh zong hong piathuah veve ding hi.
[50] Vantungah a om ka Pa’ deihna bangin a gamta mi peuhmah ka sanggam pasal, ka sanggam numei, ka nu ahi uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[25] Hih a leitung nuntakna a hu nuamte in a nuntakna bulpi nangawn tawh suplawh ding a, keima hangin hih a leitung nuntakna a suplawhte in a nuntakna bulpi huzo ding hi.

[19] Tua ahih ciangin note pai unla, midang khempeuh, keima nungzui mi suaksakin, Pa min, Tapa min, le Kha Siangtho min tawh tui sungah na phum un. [20] Tua ciangin note tungah ka hong gen thute khempeuh a zuih nadingun na hilh un. Hun bei dongin note a hong ompih tawntung ding ka hihna thu phawk ta un,” a ci hi.
[35] Hih a leitung nuntakna a hu nuamte in a nuntakna bulpi nangawn tawh suplawh ding a, keima hang le lungdamna thu hangin a nuntakna a suplawhte in a nuntakna bulpi huzo ding hi.

[30] Na Topa Pasian uh, na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na pilna khempeuh, le na thahatna khempeuh uh tawh na it un, a cihna ahi hi. [31] A nihna in: Nangma pumpi na it bangin na vengte na it in, cihna ahi hi. Hih tegel sangin thukham a lianzaw a dang om nawn lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[25] Mi khat in leitung khempeuh a ngah hangin a nuntakna bulpi suplawh leh bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam?

[15] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute khempeuh kiangah, “Hoihtakin kidawm unla, na huaiham loh nadingun kikem un. Bang hang hiam cih leh bangzahta-in mi khat a hauh hangin a neihsa tawh a nuntakna taktak kicing zo lo hi,” a ci hi.
[4] Nuntakna a nei khempeuh in tua Thu tung panin a nuntakna uh ngah a, tua nuntakna in mi khempeuh tungah khuavak hong tunpih hi.

[26] Mihing khat tung panin leitung minam khempeuh hong piangsakin, leitung khempeuhah a omsak hi. Amah in mihingte a piansakma pekin, mihingte’ nuntak tanvei ding le a ten nading uh mun a sehsa ahi hi. [27] Hih bangin a hihna pen mite in amah zongin a muhtheih nading uh a deihna ahi hi. Ahi zongin eite kiang panin Pasian gamla om het lo hi. [28] Mi khat in, ‘Pasian hangin eite piangin, hingin i gamtang hi,’ ci-in gen a, note sung panin laphuah siampa khat in zong, ‘Eite zong ama tate ihi hi,’ na na ci hi.

[24] Ahi zongin Topa Jesuh in kei sep dingin a hong piak, Pasian hehpihna hangin Lungdamna Thu, mite kiangah gen ding nasep ka tangtut zawh nakleh kei nuntakna-ah bangbang hong piang taleh a thupi-in ka ngaihsun kei hi.
[28] Ama deihna bang a sem dingin Pasian in a hong sap, amah a it eite a dingin na khempeuh a hoihlamin piangsak hi, ci-in i thei hi.
[15] Na pumpi uh, Khrih pumpi nate khat ahih lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam? Khrih pumpi nate khat la-in numei tawh paktatte’ pumpi nate khat suaksak ding ihi hiam? Tua cih ngei ding hi peuhmah lo hi.
[31] Tua ahih manin keimah in ka hong gennop thu in: Na hihna khempeuh uh, nekna dawnna-ah ahi zongin Pasian’ minthan nadingin na hih un.

[13] Sanggamte aw, note ahihleh a suakta mi ahi dingin Pasian in a hong sap ahi hi. Ahi zongin tua suahtakna pen na pumpi uh ut bangbangin gamtat theih nadingin paulam zonna-in nei kei unla, itna tawh khatlekhat kikhualna-in zangzaw un. [14] Bang hang hiam cih leh Thukham khempeuh thu khatin kigawm thei a, “Nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in,” cihna tawh kitomlak thei hi.
[5] Pasian in Jesuh Khrih hangin ama mite ahi dingin eite a hong bawl ding a sehkholhsa hi a, tua bangin a hong bawl ding pen ama tupna le a utna ahi hi.

[11] Na khempeuh, Pasian’ ngaihsutna le a geelsa bangin a piang hi. A cil pek a kipanin a ngaihsutsa thu tawh kizui-in Khrih tawh i kipawlna hangin Pasian’ tate ihih nadingin Pasian mah in a hong sehsa ihi hi.
[10] Eite a hong bawlpa pen Pasian hi a, Jesuh Khrih tawh i kipawl ciangin i nuntakna-ah gamtat hoih a nei dingin a hong bawl ihi hi. Hih pen eite’ omzia dingin a na ngaihsut kholhsa ahi hi.

[6] Thu khat peuhpeuhah lunghimawh lua kei unla, na kisap bangbang uh, lungdamna tawh Pasian kiangah na ngen un. [7] Mihingte in a theihtel zawh loh Pasian’ hong piak lungsim nopna in, Khrih Jesuh tawh na kipawlna uh hangin note hong lungnuamsak ding hi.
[12] Pasian in note hong itin, hong teelin, ama mi siangthote hikhin na hih manun note pen hehpihna nei-in, migi-in, kiniamkhiatin, dikin, na lungduai ding uh ahi hi.

[23] Mite’ nasem bangin kingaihsun loin, Pasian’ nasem bangin kingaihsun unla, na sep peuhpeuh uh lungsim takpi tawh lawpin sem un. [24] Topa in note tungah thaman a hong piak ding lamtak phawk gige un. Tua bangin na sepna uhah Khrih Topa’ na a semsem na hi uh hi.

[16] Pasian’ na a sem mite mi cingtaak hi-in, na hoih namkim a septheih nadingun Lai Siangtho pen Pasian’ lamlahna tawh a hong kipia hi a, thuman thutak hilh nading, a khialte taii nading, a man lote a manin puah nading, a manin nuntak theih nading thuhilh nadingin a manpha mahmah ahi hi.
[18] Ama piansakte khempeuh lakah eite a masa pen i suahtheih nadingin thuman thutak zangin ama utthu tawh eite a hong piangsak tawm ahi hi.
[24] Tua ahih manin Lai Siangtho sungah, “Mihingte, lopa tawh kibang a, a minthannate uh lopa pak tawh kibang hi. Lopate vulin paakte pulh a,

[9] Ahi zongin note pen Pasian in a hong teelkhiat minam, Kumpi siampi pawl, a siangtho minam, Pasian’ mite na hi uh a, khuamial sung panin a lamdang mahmah ama khuavak sungah a hong samkhia pa’ nasepna a lamdangte a genkhia dingin Pasian in a hong teel mite na hi uh hi.
[14] A hoihin na gamtat manun gimna na thuak uhleh zong Pasian in thupha hong pia ding hi. Mite kihta kei unla, lunghihmawh ngaihsut kei un.

[10] Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, Pasian in note hong sapna le hong teelna-ah a kip taktak na hih nadingun hahkat mahmah un. Tua bangin hahkat le-uhcin na puk ngei kei ding uh hi. [11] Tua hileh eite’ Topa le Honpa Jesuh Khrih Uk tawntungna sungah nuamtakin na lut thei ding uh hi.

[11] “Kote’ Topa Pasian aw, nangmah in na khempeuh piangsakin, nangma deihna bangin na khempeuh omin, na khempeuh kipiangsak ahih manin, minthanna, pahtawina, le vangliatna na ngah tawntung dingin a kilawm hi,” a ci uh hi.

[1] Hih thute khit ciangin Pasian in Abraham ze-et a, ama kiangah, “Abraham,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Hiah om ing,” a ci hi. [2] Amah in, “Na it, na tapa neihsun Isaac, la inla Moriah gamah pai in. Tua lai mun a nang kiangah kong gen ding mual khat tungah meihal biakpiakna-in amah hong pia in,” a ci hi. [3] Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin Abraham tho baih a, a la tutphah vawhin, ama nasem tangval nih le a tapa Isaac a paipih hi. Amah in meihal biakpiak nadingin sing ek a, ama tunga Pasian’ gensa munah a pai hi. [4] A ni thum ni ciangin Abraham khuadak to-in a gamla-ah tua mun a mu hi.
[29] “ TOPA i Pasian in hong lahkhiat loh thusim om a, ahih hangin hih thukham sunga om thute khempeuh i zuih theih nadingin hong lakkhia a, eite le i suan i khakte’ zuih tawntung ding ahi hi.

[8] Hih thukham laibu na mangngilh ngei kei ding hi. A sunga kigelh thute khempeuh tawh kizui-in na gamtat theih nadingin sunlezanin na lungngaingai ding hi. Tua hileh na maa vang ding a, na nasep tangtung ding hi.
[4] TOPA aw, kei hong ompih na hih manin khuamial thukpi ka nawk hangin ka lau kei hi. Na molhtum le na ciangkhut in kei hong hu hi.
[4] TOPA sungah lungkim in; amah in na deihna hong pia ding hi. [5] TOPA tungah na vai teng ap in. Amah muang in; amah in hong sem ding hi.
[23] TOPA in mi a lam pai nading lak a, ama lungkim bangin a gamta pa amah in a kipsak hi.
[8] Nangma deih bang hihna-ah nuam ka sa hi, ka Pasian aw. Nangma thukham ka lung sungah om hi,” ka ci hi.

[10] “Om hithiat unla, Pasian ka hihna thei un. Minamte lakah keimah hong kisangsak a, leitung khempeuhah ka min hong kithangsak hi,” a ci hi. [11] Vanglian TOPA, eite tawh hong omkhawm a, Jakob’ Pasian, eima belh ahi hi.

[14] Lungdam biakpiakna Pasian tungah pia unla, Sangpenpa tungah na thuciamnate uh bawl un. [15] Haksat hun ciangin keima tungah hong ko un. Note kong honkhia ding a, note in keima min nong thangsak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[23] Biakpiak nadingin lungdam piakna hong paipih mi in kei a hong pahtawi ahi hi. Ka thu a mang mite khempeuh ka honkhia ding hi,” a ci hi.
[12] Nong hotkhiatna hangin hong lungdamsakkik inla, utna lungsim tawh keimah hong huh ta in.
[2] Leitungah nangma deihna, minam khempeuhte lakah na vanglian hotkhiatna kithei tahen.
[12] Tua ahih ciangin pilna lungsim ka ngah theih nadingun ka nuntak hun uh a tomlam ka theih nadingun hong hilh in.
[105] Nangma thu pen lam hong lak ding meivak hi a, ka paina lampi-ah khuavak ahi hi.
[8] TOPA in kei a dingin a ngaihsutte hong tungsak ding hi. TOPA aw, na itna kip tawntung hi. Na sepsa na maban hong tun ta in.
[10] Keima Pasian na hih manin nangma deih bangin a gamta dingin kei hong hilh in. Kei hong hehpih inla, lam phei-ah hong kha in.
[5] Na lungsim khempeuh tawh TOPA muang inla, nang’ theihna suang kei in. [6] Na hihna khempeuhah amah phawk in. Tua hileh lampi man amah in hong lak ding hi.
[18] Tua ahih ciangin na zi tawh lungkim inla, na tenpih numei tawh lungdam in. [19] A it-huai a ngaihbaangin ngaihsun tawntung inla, ama ngaihbaanna tawh lungdamin, ama hong itna tawh lungkim in.
[14] Thulamlak ding a nei lo mihingte kipuk uh a, thulamlak tampi neihna pen lungmuanna ahi hi.
[1] Mite in bangbang a geel zongin TOPA’ deihna bang bekin a piang ding hizaw hi.
[4] TOPA in na khempeuh ngimna nei-in bawl a, migilote nangawn siatna a thuak dingin a bawl ahi hi.
[9] Mihing in thu geel a, ahi zongin TOPA’ deihna bangin kisemkhia hi.
[33] Mite in bangbangin ai a san zongin, a piang ding thu pen TOPA’ deihna bangbek hizaw hi.
[21] Mihing’ ngaihsutna-ah thu tampi om a, ahi zongin TOPA’ deihna tawh a kituakte bek kimang ding hi.

[11] Amah in na khempeuh amau’ hun ciat tawh a kituak dingin a bawl hi. Amah in mailam thu theihnopna lungsim eite tungah hong guan a, ahi zongin ama sepnate a cing a theihzawhna ding hong guan lo hi.

[16] Tuipi sungah lampi bawlin, tui lianpi sungah pai nading sul bawl a, leeng le sakolte, galkapte le galhangte Egypt gam pan paikhiatpihin, a tho thei nawn lo dingin amaute a lumcipsak, amaute pen meivak khau kisumit bangin a mitsak TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: [17] Tuipi sungah lampi bawlin, tui lianpi sungah pai nading sul bawl a, leeng le sakolte, galkapte le galhangte Egypt gam pan paikhiatpihin, a tho thei nawn lo dingin amaute a lumcipsak, amaute pen meivak khau kisumit bangin a mitsak TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: [18] “Masa lama nate ciamteh kei unla, a beisa hun nate ngaihsun kei un. [19] Tu-in a thak na khat ka bawl a, tu-in hong piangkhia hi. Note in thei lo na hi uh hiam? Gamlakah lam lianpi khat ka bawl ding a, sehnel gam sungah gunte ka luangsak ding hi.
[10] A kipat cil-in a tawpna ding thu ka pulak a, tanglai pek panin a piang nai lo nate genin, ‘Ka thugen kip ding a, ka ngimna khempeuh ka tungsak ding hi,’ ka ci hi.

[8] Bang hang hiam cih leh keima ngaihsutnate nomau’ ngaihsutna bang hi lo a, keima paiziate nomau’ paizia bang hi lo hi, TOPA in ci hi. [9] Vantung pen leitung sangin a sanzawk mah bangin, keima paiziate zong, nomau paizia sangin sangzaw a, ka ngaihsutnate zong, nomau ngaihsutna sangin a sangzaw ahi hi. [10] Bang hang hiam cih leh vantung panin guahtui le vuk hong pai-in, amaute ciahkik loin leitung kawtsakin, kungnote mengin selkhiasak a, khai vawhpa khaici pia-in a ne pa tungah an a piak mah bangin, [11] keima kam panin a paikhia ka thu zong tua mah bang ding hi. A hawmpi-in kei kiangah hong tungkik lo ding a, keima ngimnasa bangin tangtung sakin, amah ka sawlna thu tangtun ding hi.

[11] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in kong cihin-ah, mai lamah lametna note kong piakkik ding, na siatna ding uh hi loin na phattuamna ding uh geelna ka neihte kei bek in ka thei hi. [12] Tua hun ciangin note in kei hong samin, hong pai-in thu nong ngen ding uh a, ke’n zong kong dawng ding hi. [13] Note in kei nong zong ding uh a, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh nong zon uh ciangin nong mu ding uh hi.
[37] Topa’ deihna bang bekin na khempeuh a piang ahi hi.

[20] “Pasian’ min kiphat tawntung ta hen; amah pilin a vanglian hi. [21] Amah in hun le khuahunte kheel a, kumpite koihin lah a lakhia hi. Amah in mite tungah pilna le theihna a pia hi. [22] Amah in thuthukpite le thusimte a lakkhia hi. Amah in khuamial sunga kiseelte thei a, khuavak in amah a umcih hi. [23] Nang pen ka pu ka pate’ Pasian na hi a, ka hong phat a, ka hong zahtak hi. Nangmah in pilna le thahatna na hong piazo hi. Ka thungetna nong za a, kumpipa kianga ka gen ding thu nong lakzo hi,” a ci hi.

[6] Ka mite in kei hong phawk lo uh ahih manin ka susia ding hi. No siampite in kei hong phawknuam loin, ka thuhilhnate nial na hih manun ka siampi dingin kong deih nawn kei a, na tate uh zong siampi-in ka zang kei ding hi.

[3] Hih thu a tunna ding hun hi pah nai lo ahih manin lai-in ciamteh in. Ahi zongin hong tung baihta ding a, kong lah khempeuh a manin hong tung ding hi. A tung hak tawh a kibangkha ahi zongin ngak keikai in. Ka seh hun a cin ciangin hong tung takpi ding a, zekai lua nawn lo ding hi.
[14] Tuipi, tui tawh a kidim mah bangin TOPA’ minthanna theihna tawh leitung kidim ding hi.
[6] Pasian’ deihteng sep ding a hanciamte Pasian in lungkimna ngahsak ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.
[10] Pasian’ deihna bangin a gamtat manin bawlsiatna a thuak mite vantung ki-ukna sungah a omte ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.
[48] Tua ahih manin vantungah a om na Pa uh a cingtaak mah bangin note zong lungsim citakin na cingtaak nading uh na hanciam un.

[1] “Biakna tawh kizomin na hoih khat peuhpeuh na sep uh ciangin mite’ phat ding deihna tawh a kilang theithei dingin na sepkhak loh nadingun na kingaihsun un. Tua bangin gamta le-uhcin, vantungah a om na Pa uh kiang panin thaman na ngah kei ding uh hi. [2] “Tua ahih manin mi cimawhte tungah huhna na piak uh ciangin, mite in a phat ding uh a deihna tawh a kineihkhem mite in kikhopna innsung le kongzing lakah a kilang theithei-in a hih uh bangin na hih kei un. Tua bangin a hih mite in thaman a ngah khinta ahihna thu limtakin na phawk un. [3] Ahi zongin note in mi cimawhte citna tawh na huh uh ciangin na lawm naihuai pente uh nangawn in hong theih loh nadingun pia unla, [4] kuamah theisak kei un. Tua hileh kuama muh lohin na gamtatna uh a mu na Pa un note tungah thaman hong pia ding hi.
[10] Na ukna hun hong tung hen la, vantung bangin leitungah zong na deih bangin kigamta hen.

[14] Note in midangte’ hong mawhna na maisak uhleh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note’ mawhna hong maisak ding hi. [15] Ahi zongin note in midangte’ hong mawhna na maisak kei uhleh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note’ mawhna hong maisak lo ding hi.

[19] “Nget in ne-in a kekseu theihna, gutate in luhin a guktheihna hih leitungah na sum uh khol kei un. [20] Nget in a nek theih lohna, a kekseu theih lohna, gutate in luhin a guk theih lohna mun vantungah note a dingin kholzaw un. [21] Bang hang hiam cih leh na sum omna uhah na lungsim uh om tawntung ding hi.

[33] Thudang khempeuh sangin Pasian’ ukna le ama deihna na zuih theih nading uh thupi ngaihsut masazaw un. Tua hileh hih na kisapna dangte khempeuh uh zong hong piathuah veve ding hi. [34] “Tua ahih manin zing ciang huna ding ma lungkham masa kei un. Zing ciang thu ding ama thu-in omsak lel un. Tuni thu pen tuni thu mah tawh beisak unla, lungkham ding behlap se kei un.

[21] “Kei kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa aw,’ hong ci mi khempeuh, vantung ki-ukna sungah lutthei kim lo ding uh a, vantungah a om ka Pa’ deihna bangin a gamtateng bek lutthei ding uh hi. [22] Tua ni ciangin mi tampi in kei kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa aw, nangma min tawh thu hilhin, nangma min tawh dawite hawlkhia-in, nangma min tawh nalamdang lian tampi bawl hi lo ka hi uh hiam?’ hong ci ding uh hi. [23] Tua ciangin keimah in amaute kiangah, ‘Note ka hong thei ngei kei hi. Siatna a gamta mite aw, kei kiang panin kihemkhia un,’ ka ci ding hi.

[1] “Bang hang hiam cih leh vantung ki-ukna sung omzia pen a leenggah lo-ah na a sem ding a cial dingin zing tungin a kuankhia leenggah lo nei pa tawh kibang hi. [2] Ni tha ngeina ngun peek khat piak dingin a kithukim khit uh ciangin a leenggah lo-ah na a sem dingin pawlkhat a kuansak hi. [3] Zingsang nai kua hun ciangin mihon omna sumbukah pai leuleu a, mi pawlkhat bangmah sem loin a mawk om a muh ciangin, [4] ‘No zong leenggah lo-ah va kuan un; a kilawm zah khat ka hong pia ding hi,’ a cih ciangin pawlkhat a kuan uh hi. [5] Tua ciangin sun sawm le nih ciangin pawlkhat cial leuleu a, nitak nai thum ciangin pawlkhat a cial lai hi. [6] Nitak nai nga ciangin mihon omna sumbukah a pai leh mi pawlkhat a mawk om mu ahih manin, ‘Bang hangin bangmah sem loin sunthapai mawk om na hi uh hiam?’ ci-in a dot ciangin

[39] tawmkhat pai lai-in leilakah bokin thu ngen a, “Pa aw, ahi thei ding ahihleh hih thuak nading tawh hong kipelhsak in. Ahi zongin kei’ deihna bang hi loin nangma deihna bang hizaw ta hen,” a ci hi.
[19] Tua ahih ciangin note pai unla, midang khempeuh, keima nungzui mi suaksakin, Pa min, Tapa min, le Kha Siangtho min tawh tui sungah na phum un.
[35] Pasian’ deihna bangin a gamta mi khempeuh ka nu le ka sanggamte ahi uh hi,” a ci hi.
[36] “Pa aw, na khempeuh na hihthei hi. Hih ka thuak ding gimna tawh hong kipelhsak in. Ahi zongin kei’ deihna bang hi loin nangma deihna bang hizaw hen,” a ci hi.
[46] “Bang hangin, ‘Topa aw, Topa aw,’ hong ci napi-in ka hong gente zui lo na hi uh hiam?
[23] Tua ciangin Jesuh in a nungzuite le mi khempeuh kiangah, “Mi khatpeuh in kei hong zuihnop leh ama deihna bangin gamta nawn loin nisimin a singlamteh pua-in hong zui ding hi.
[42] “Pa aw, nangma ngaihsutna bang ahihkhak leh hih ka thuak ding gimna tawh hong kipelhsak in. Ahi zongin kei deihna bang hi loin nangma deihna bang hi ta hen,” a ci hi.
[13] Tua bangin Pasian’ tate suahna pen leitung ngeina nute pate sung panin suahna tawh hi loin Pasian sung panin suahna ahi hi.

[14] Moses in gamlak khuam tungah sumngo gul a khai mah bangin Mihing Tapa zong hong kikhai ding a, [15] amah a um mi khempeuh nungta tawntung ding hi. [16] Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawn loin a hin tawntung theih nadingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi. [17] Pasian in leitungah a Tapa hong sawlna pen mawhsakna thukhen dingin a hong paisak hi loin, leitung mite a honkhia dingin a hong paisak hizaw hi.

[34] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Keimah hong sawl pa’ deihna bangin na semin, sep dingin hong piak nasep zawhna pen ka nuntakna an ahi hi. [35] Note in na paunak uhah, ‘Khai tuh khit kha li ciangin anlak hun hi,’ na ci uh hi. Tu-in note khuadakin lote en un. An khempeuh min khinta a, lak ding bek in sam hi. [36] Khaituh pa le anla pa a lungdam khawm theih nadingin anla pa thaman a kipiak mah bangin anla pa in zong a nungta tawntung dingin mi a khawm ding hi. [37] Tua ahih manin, ‘Khat in khai tuhin, adang khat in a an la,’ ci-in paunak a om pen thuman mahmah hi. [38] Tua ahih manin note in na khawh loh uh lo-ah an a la dingin ka hong sawl hi. Midang in tua lo na kho a, note in a lak bek a si na hi uh hi,” a ci hi.
[30] “Keima thu guak tawh ka hihtheih bangmah om lo hi. Pasian’ hong genna bang bekin thu ka khen hi. Keima ut bangin sem loin kei hong sawl pa’ deih bangin sem ka hih manin ka thukhenna thuman hi.

[28] Tua ciangin amaute in, “Tua ahihleh Pasian ka lungkimsak theih nadingun bangci gamtat ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dot uh ciangin [29] Jesuh in, “Pasian in a hong sawl pa um le-uhcin Pasian a lungkim nadingin a gamta na hi uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[38] Bang hang hiam cih leh keima ut bangin a sem ding hi loin kei hong sawl pa’ deihna bangin a sem dingin vantung panin a hong pai ka hi hi. [39] Kei hong sawl pa’ deihna in: Ka khut sungah a hong piak mi khempeuh khat zong khahsuah loin nitawp ni ciangin ka hinsakkik ding ahi hi. [40] Tua ahih manin Tapa mu-in a um mi khempeuh in nuntak tawntungna ngahin, nitawp ni ciangin ka hinsak ding, ka Pa in hong deih ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[17] Pasian’ deihna bangin a gamta nuam mi peuhmah in, ka thugente pen Pasian’ kiang panin a hong pai thu a gen ka hihna leh keima thu bek tawh a gen ka hihna khenthei ding uh hi.
[31] Pasian in thukham a palsat mite’ thu ngai lo a, amah bia-in, ama deih bangin a gamta mite’ thu ngai hi, ci-in ko ka thei uh hi.
[27] Keima tuute in ka aw za-in thei uh ahih manin kei hong zui uh hi.
[14] Keima min paulamin na hong nget nak-uhleh ka hong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
[5] Pa aw, leitung a kipiansak ma-in nang tawh i neihkhawm na pianzia mah tu-in nangma omna munah hong pia ta in.

[22] Pasian in kumpi dingin Saul a zat nawn loh ciangin amaute’ kumpi dingin David a semsak hi. Pasian in David’ thu genin, ‘Ka sawl khempeuh a sem ding, ka deih bang mi khat, Jessi’ tapa David ka mukhin hi,’ a cihsa thu ahi hi.

[26] Mihing khat tung panin leitung minam khempeuh hong piangsakin, leitung khempeuhah a omsak hi. Amah in mihingte a piansakma pekin, mihingte’ nuntak tanvei ding le a ten nading uh mun a sehsa ahi hi. [27] Hih bangin a hihna pen mite in amah zongin a muhtheih nading uh a deihna ahi hi. Ahi zongin eite kiang panin Pasian gamla om het lo hi.
[9] Ama Tapa hangin Lungdamna Thu ka lungsim khempeuh tawh hilhin a na ka sep Pasian in hih ka thugente a man taktak ahihna thu hong thei hi.
[14] Pasian’ Kha Siangtho in a makaih mite, Pasian’ tate ahi uh hi.
[20] Pasian’ bawlsate, amau utthu tawh hi loin siatna a thuak dingin Pasian mahmah in a ngaihsutsa ahi hi. Ahi zongin lametna omlai hi.

[26] Tua ahih manin eite bangzahin ginalo hitalehang eite a hong huh dingin Kha Siangtho a hong pai hi. Eite in a kilawm bangin thunget ding nangawn i thei kei a, ahi zongin Kha Siangtho mah in tauna tawh eite a dingin a hong thumsak hi. [27] Kha Siangtho in Pasian’ deihna tawh kizui-in Pasian’ mite a dingin hong thumsak ahih manin mihingte’ lungsimtawng thu a thei Pasian in Kha Siangtho’ ngaihsutna a thei hi. [28] Ama deihna bang a sem dingin Pasian in a hong sap, amah a it eite a dingin na khempeuh a hoihlamin piangsak hi, ci-in i thei hi.
[16] Tua ahih ciangin mite’ utna le sepna tawh kisai lo a, Pasian’ hehpihna bek tawh kisaizaw hi.

[1] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Pasian in eite tam veipi tak hong hehpih ahih manin ama lungkim nading le ama nasep nadingin nomau mahmah a hingtangin Pasian tungah na kipiak nadingun ka hong thum hi. Tua banga kipiakna pen Pasian biakna man taktak ahi hi. [2] Leitung mihingte’ gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahphasak un. Tua hileh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkimsakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian’ deihna na phawk thei ding uh hi.

[30] Lawmte aw, kei a dingin Pasian kiangah thu na hong ngetsak nadingun i Topa Jesuh Khrih i upna hang le Kha Siangtho in a hong piak itna tawh a hong thum ka hi hi. [31] Judea gam sunga a om thu um lo mite in kei hong gimsakkhak loh nading le Jerusalem khua-a a om Pasian mite a dingin nasepnate lungdam takin a hong santheih nadingun thu hong ngetsak un. [32] Tua bangin thu hong ngetsak le-uhcin, Pasian’ deihna ahih nakleh note kiangah lungdam takin ka hong tung ding a, note tawh nuamtakin i kimu ding hi. [33] Nopsakna a hong pia Pasian in note khempeuh hong ompih tahen. Amen.

[1] Khrih Jesuh’ sawltak dingin Pasian in a hong teel keimah Paul le thu upna sungah i sanggam Sosthenes in, [2] Jesuh Khrih tawh kipawlna hangin Pasian’ mi suakin, Pasian’ mi siangtho cihna a ngah, Korin khua-a om Pasian’ pawlpi mite le eite’ Topa bek hi loin, amaute’ Topa zong ahi, i Topa Jesuh Khrih tungah thu a ngen, mun khempeuhah a om mite tungah lai ka hong khak uh hi. [3] I Pa Pasian le Topa Jesuh Khrih in note tungah dikna le nopsakna thupha hong tungsak tahen.

[3] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ deihna bangin gamta loin, leitung lungsim deihna bangin gamta lai na hih manun upna sungah naungek bang ahi lai na hi uh hi. Note khatlekhat kihaza-in kitawng kiselin na om uh ciangin hih leitung mite mah a bang lel na hihna uh hong kilang hi.

[10] A neisate tungah, kei’ ngaihsutna hi lo, Topa’ ngaihsutna ka gennop thu in: Zi in a pasal ciahsan kei tahen. [11] A ciahsan leh zong pasal nei loin om paisuak hen. A om paisuakzawh kei leh a pasal ngei mah zuankik hen. Pasal in a zi ma kei tahen.
[13] Tu laitakin a omlai thu thumte pen upna, lametna, le itna hi a, tua thumte sung panin itna mah a thu lianpen ahi hi.

[17] Tua ahih manin mi khatpeuh, Khrih tawh a kipawl ciangin mi thak suak a, a mi lui ngeina bei-in a mi thak ngeina a neita ahi hi. [18] Hih thu khempeuh Pasian’ vaihawm hi a, eite pen Pasian’ gal hinapi-in Khrih hangin amah tawh a kilem mi hong hisak a, kote tungah tua kilem nading nasep hong pia hi. [19] Tua ahih manin kote’ thugen bulpi in: Pasian in mite’ mawhnate ngaihsun nawn loin, Khrih hangin leitung mi khempeuh le amah a kilemin hong bawl a, tua kilemna thu a gen dingin kote hong seh hi. [20] Tua ahih ciangin kote pen Khrih tangin nasem ka hi uh a, Pasian in kote zangin note tungah thu a hong gen ahi hi. Pasian tawh kilemin pawlkhatin na om nadingun Khrih tangin a hong thum ka hi uh hi.

[1] Sanggamte aw, Masedonia gam pawpite-ah Pasian’ hehpihna hangin a piang thute ka hong theisak nuam uh hi. [2] Amaute in haksatna a tuamtuam phukha-in nakpitakin ze-etna thuakin, amaute zawng mahmah hita se le-uh lungdam mahmah uh ahih manin piakna lamsangah cingh thei mahmah uh hi. [3] Amaute in amau ngahna tawh kituak bekin a pia hi loin, a piak zawhzah dingun a kilawm sangin a tamzaw a piakna uh ka thei taktak uh hi. Kuama sawl hi loin amau lungsimah a uttawmna uh tawh, [4] Judea gam a Pasian mite, ko zong hong huh sak un, ci-in hong thumthum uh hi. [5] Hih bangin a gamtatna uh kote’ lamet sangin sangzaw pek hi. Amaute pen Topa tungah kipia masa uh a, tua ciangin Pasian’ deihna bangin kote tungah zong a hong kipia uh ahi hi. [6] Tua mah bangin Titus in zong hih bang nasep nading hong pat khit ahih mah bangin midang huh nading na sepnate uh note lakah hong zawhpih vet dingin ka hanthawn uh hi.
[4] A siahuai tuhun sung panin eite a hong suahtaksak nadingin eite’ Pa Pasian’ deihna tawh kizui-in i mawhna hangin tua Jesuh Khrih amahmah a hong kipiatawm ahi hi.
[24] Tua hi a, Jesuh Khrih a zui mite in a leitung lungsim pianzia uh le a leitung lungsim deihna khempeuh uh a phiat khitsa ahi hi.

[1] Pasian’ sawlna tawh Jesuh Khrih’ sawltak ahi keimah Paul in, Efesa khua-ah a om thu um mite tungah lai ka hong khak hi. [2] Eite’ Pa Pasian le Topa Jesuh Khrih in note tungah dikna le nopsakna thupha hong tungsak tahen. [3] Khrih tawh eite i kipawlna hangin vantung gam panin kha tawh kisai letsong namkim hong pia ahih manin eite’ Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pa ahi Pasian tungah i lungdamna ko ciat ni. [4] Ama mai-ah eite pen paubaanna a nei lo, mi siangthote ahi ding le Khrih hangin ama mite ahi dingin leitung a pianma pek nangawnin Pasian in a hong teelsa ihi hi. [5] Pasian in Jesuh Khrih hangin ama mite ahi dingin eite a hong bawl ding a sehkholhsa hi a, tua bangin a hong bawl ding pen ama tupna le a utna ahi hi. [6] Ama it Tapa hangin hih bangin letsong hong pia ahih manin ama hong hehpihna hangin Pasian phat ni.

[11] Na khempeuh, Pasian’ ngaihsutna le a geelsa bangin a piang hi. A cil pek a kipanin a ngaihsutsa thu tawh kizui-in Khrih tawh i kipawlna hangin Pasian’ tate ihih nadingin Pasian mah in a hong sehsa ihi hi.
[10] Eite a hong bawlpa pen Pasian hi a, Jesuh Khrih tawh i kipawl ciangin i nuntakna-ah gamtat hoih a nei dingin a hong bawl ihi hi. Hih pen eite’ omzia dingin a na ngaihsut kholhsa ahi hi.
[20] Eite a dingin na a hong sepsak, eite’ ngetzah val, le i ngaihsut zawh loh zah dongin a vangliatna tawh tampi tak a hong hihsak thei
[26] Na heh uh ciangin, tua hehna hangin khialkha kei unla, a tawntungin heh paisuak kei un.
[10] Bangteng in Topa lungkimsak ahi hiam, ci-in kan un.

[15] Tua ahih ciangin hoihtakin kingaihsunin gamta unla, mihaite bang hi loin mipilte bangin gamta un. [16] Tuhun pen hun hoih lo hun ahih manin na hun neih khempeuh uh a hoih lamin zang un. [17] Tua ahih manin hai ommawk kei unla, Topa in bang a sem dingin hong deih ahi hiam, ci-in kan un. [18] Zu in mi siasak thei ahih manin zu ne kei unla, Kha Siangtho tawh a kidimin omzaw un. [19] La a tuamtuamte genin sakna tawh Topa’ thu gen belin nei unla, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh Topa phatna la sa un. [20] I Topa Jesuh Khrih hangin thu khempeuhah Pa Pasian tungah lungdamna ko ta un.

[5] Silate aw, launa le linna tawh na leitung tote uh thu mang unla, Khrih’ na na sep uh mah bangin lungsim takpi tawh na na sepsak un. [6] A hong pahtak ding uh deihna tawh amaute’ muhsung bekin tuaci gamtat kei unla, Khrih’ sila na hihna hangun Pasian’ hong deih bangin lungsim takpi tawh na sem un. [7] Mihingte’ na a sem bang lelin kingaihsun loin Topa’ na a sem bangin kingaihsun unla, thanopna tawh sem un.

[12] Tua ahih ciangin ka hong it sanggamte aw, note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-in ka thu na hong man’ tawntung uh mah bangin, tu-in note tawh ka hong omkhawm loh hun ciangin zong ka thu na hong man’ ding uh thupizaw lai hi. Pasian kihtakna le zahtakna tawh na maa uh nawt unla, amah in note hong hotkhiatna thu a cingtaak suaksak un. [13] Bang hang hiam cih leh note in utna lungsim na neih nading uh le ama deihna na zuihzawh nadingun note sungah Pasian in a tawntungin na a hong sem ahi hi. [14] Na khempeuh phun lo, thu nial loin sem un. [15] Tua hileh a lungsim kawi, a hoih lo leitung mite lakah paubaanna a nei lo a siangtho, Pasian’ tate na hi ding uh a, nuntakna thu na genna uh hangin leitung mite lakah khuavak bangin na hoihna uh a kilang mite na hi ding uh hi. [16] Tua hileh a beisa hunah ka sepna le ka hanciamnate a mawkna suak lo ding ahih manin Khrih hong paikik ni ciangin kei ka kisial thei ding hi.

[6] Thu khat peuhpeuhah lunghimawh lua kei unla, na kisap bangbang uh, lungdamna tawh Pasian kiangah na ngen un. [7] Mihingte in a theihtel zawh loh Pasian’ hong piak lungsim nopna in, Khrih Jesuh tawh na kipawlna uh hangin note hong lungnuamsak ding hi. [8] Sanggamte aw, a tawpna-ah ka hong gennop thu in, a hoih le a phattaak thute tawh na lungsim uh na kidimsak un. Tuate in: A man, a dik, a tang, a siangtho, a deihhuai, le a pahtakhuai thute ahi hi. [9] Keima genna le ka gamtatna panin thei-in na san uh thute, nomau pumpi mahmah tawh na zui un. Tua hileh nopsakna a hong piathei Pasian in note hong ompih ding hi. [10] Topa’ hangin ka lungdamna lian mahmah hi. Hun sauveipi khit ciangin kei na hong phawkna uh na hong langsakkik thei uh hi. Kei hong kin loin omngei uh teh, a ci ka hi kei a, na hong kinna uh na hong lah nading uh hun om thei lo, ka cihna ahi hi. [11] Bangbangin om taleng a lungkim thei dingin a kisinsa ka hih manin hih bang ka hong gen ciangin ka kitangsapna a hong pulak nuam ka hi kei hi. [12] Cihmawhna le cihtheihna a sinsa ka hi hi. Tua ahih manin ka hau a ka zawng zongin, ka vah a ka kial zongin, koi mun koi mun hitaleh ah a lungkimthei dingin a kisinsa ka hi hi. [13] Khrih in a hong piak vangliatna tawh hihte khempeuh nawkzawh nading thahatna a nei ka hi hi.
[19] A na ka sep i Topa Pasian in ama hauhna tawh kizui-in Khrih Jesuh hangin note’ kitangsapna khempeuh hong pia ding hi.

[1] Pasian’ deihna tawh Jesuh Khrih’ sawltak dingin a hong kiseh keimah Paul le i sanggam Timoti in, [2] Kolose khua-ah a om Pasian’ mi ahi, Khrih sungah kiptakin a om sanggamte tungah lai ka hong khak uh hi. I Pa Pasian in note tungah dikna le nopsakna thupha hong tungsak tahen.

[9] Tua bangin note’ thu ka zak uh hun a kipanin Pasian kiangah thu ka hong ngetsak uh a, kha thu tawh kisai pilna le theihtelnate nei-in, Pasian’ deihna na theihtheih nadingun ka hong ngetsak uh hi. [10] Tua bang hileh Topa’ deihna bangin nungta-in, amah a lungkimsak ding thute bek na sem tawntung ding uh a, na gamtatnate uh a hoih bekbek hong hi-in, Pasian’ thu na theihna uh hong khang semsem ding hi.
[17] Na kampauna, na gamtatnate khempeuh uhah, Topa Jesuh hangin Pa Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Jesuh min paulamin na hih ding uh hi.
[12] Jesuh Khrih nasem, note’ makai Epafras in zong hong hopih hi. Pasian’ deihna bangin note nungta-in, lungsim khanghamin kiptakin na omtheih nadingun amah in thu hong ngetsak tawntung hi.
[8] Ahi zongin eite pen khuavak gamtatna a nei sun khuavak mi ihih manin pilvang ni. Awmdal bangin upna le itna bulhin, siklukhu bangin i lamet hotkhiatna khu ni.

[16] Lungdam tawntungin, [17] thu ngen niloh unla, [18] bangbang hong piang taleh na lungdamna uh Pasian tungah ko tawntung un. Khrih Jesuh tawh kipawlin na nuntakna sung uhah hih bangzia-in na om ding uh Pasian in a hong deih ahi hi. [19] Kha Siangtho nasepna dongtangsak kei unla,

[1] A masa penin kong gennop thu in: Mi khempeuh a dingin Pasian tungah ngetna, thungetna, thumna le lungdamkohna na neih ding uh ahi hi. [2] Eite nuamtakin omthei-in, biakna lungsim nei-in a kilawm takin i nuntak theih nadingin kumpite le uliante a dingin thu na ngetsak un. [3] Hih bang gamtatnate pen eite hong Hon Pasian’ muhna-ah a hoih a kilawm thu ahi hi. [4] Mi khempeuh in hotkhiatna ngahin, thuman a theihkim ding Pasian in deih hi.
[7] Pasian’ thu tawh a kituak lo, a haihuai tangthu phuahtawmte ngaihsutin na nei vet kei in. Pasian’ deihna tawh a kituakin na nuntak zawh nadingin na kisin in.

[1] Khrih Jesuh tawh i kipawlna hangin hong kipia ding nuntakna thu a gen dingin Pasian’ deihna tawh Khrih Jesuh’ sawltak nasep a sem dingin a hong kisawl keimah Paul in [2] Ka it ka ta Timoti tungah lai ka hong khak hi. Pa Pasian le i Topa Khrih Jesuh in dikna, hehpihna, le nopsakna thupha nang tungah hong tungsak tahen.
[7] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in eite tungah meidawina lungsim hong guan lo a, thahatna, ki-itna, pumpi ki-ukzawhna lungsim hong guan hizaw hi.

[9] Eite’ sepzawhna hang hi loin ama ngimnasa bang leh a dikna hangin Pasian in eite hong honkhia-in ama mi dingin a hong sam hi. Pasian in leitung a pianma pekin Khrih Jesuh tungtawnin tua dikna a hong piak hi a,

[1] Tua ahih manin i zaksa thuman thutakte i khahsuahkhak loh nadingin kiptak khotakin i letkip ding kisam hi. [2] Vantung mite in hong gen thute thuman hi a, tua thu a palsatte in a kilawm bangin gim thuak ding uh hi. [3] Tua ahih manin a thupi mahmah hih hotkhiatna thudon loin i om leh suahtakna om thei ngei lo ding hi. A masa-in Topa mahmah in hotkhiatna thu hong pulak a, tua thu a za mite in thuman ahihna thu eite tungah hong gen leuleu uh hi. [4] Amaute’ thugenna banah Pasian in vangliatna lim, le nalamdang a tuamtuamte bawlna tawh hong genbeh lai hi. Tua banah ama hoihsak bangin Pasian in Kha Siangtho zong hong hawm lai hi.

[10] Pasian’ deihna bangin Jesuh Khrih gamta a, a tawntungin a kimang paisuak dingin ama pumpi biakna-in khatvei a kipiakna hangin eite khempeuh i mawhna panin a siang ihi hi. [11] Jew siampite nisimin a nasepna uh munah dingin a kibang biakpiakna mah pia niloh uh a, ahi zongin tua a piak uh biakpiaknate in mawhna maisak thei lo hi.
[36] Pasian’ deihna bangin gamta-in, ama thuciam na ngahtheih nadingun lungduai-in thuakzawhna na kisam uh hi.
[16] Khatlekhat tungah thuhoih kibawlin na kihuh ding uh mangngilh kei un. Hih bang gamtatnate pen Pasian a lungkimsak thei biakna ahi hi.

[20] Ama sihna hangin Tuucing Lianpa suakin, a sisan tawh tawntung thuciamna a kipsak i Topa Jesuh pen sihna panin a thokiksak, eite tungah nopsakna a hong pia Pasian in, [21] ama deihna bangin na na septheih nadingun a kisam thuhoihte khempeuh note tungah hong guanin, ama lungkimna bangin i gamtat theih nadingin Jesuh Khrih hangin eite sungah na hong sem hen la, Khrih in a tawntungin minthanna ngah paisuak tahen. Amen.
[5] Pilna kisam na om uhleh Pasian kiangah ngen un. Mi khempeuh tungah Pasian dikin cingh mahmah ahih manin hong pia ding hi.

[13] Tuni ahih kei leh zing ciangin tua khua tua khua-ah va pai-in, kum khat bang va omin, sumbawlin a meet tampi va ngah ni, a ci mite aw, ka thugen hong ngai dih un. [14] Zing ciangin na nuntakna uh bangci ding cih nangawn na thei kei uh hi. Meiilum tawlkhat sung kaii-in a mangthang pak tawh a kibang lel na hi uh hi. [15] Note in, “Topa in hong thukimpih nakleh nungta-in tua bang tua bang i sem ding hi,” na cih ding uh hi bek hi. [16] Ahi zongin note kihisakin na kisial uh hi. Tua bangte hoih het lo hi. [17] A hoih a manin gamtat ding thei napi-in a gamta lote a khial ahi hi.

[13] Topa’ hangin leitung ukna aana neite’ thu na mang un. Kumpipa’ thu ahi a, [14] a gamtat siate gim pia-in, a gamtat hoihte a pahtawi dingin kumpipa in a sawl thuneite khempeuh’ thu ahi zongin na mang un. [15] Bang hang hiam cih leh thu thei loin a mot paupau mihaite, na gamtat hoihna un a daihsak ding, Pasian’ deihna ahi hi. [16] Sila ahi lo mi bangin gamta unla, ahi zongin gitloh gamtat nadingin na suahtakna uh zang loin Pasian’ sila bangin na gamtazaw un.
[17] Gamtatsia-in i om sangin Pasian’ deihna ahih nakleh i gamtat hoihna hangin gimna i thuak hoihzaw hi.

[1] Khrih in ama pumpi-in thuak ahih manin note in zong tua bang lungsim mah nei-in na kithakhauhsak ding uh ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh pumpi-in a thuak mite peuhmah, mawhna tawh kisawhkha nawn lo uh hi. [2] Tua ahih manin tu a kipanin na leitung nuntak sung uh mihingte’ deihna bangin gamta loin Pasian’ deihna bangin na gamtat ding uh ahi hi. [3] A beisa hunah dawibiate’ gamtat bangin a hoihkhop khat na gamta khinta uh a, a kilawm loin gamtatna, hukna lanna, zunekna, uangtatna, zukham luatna le a muhdahhuai milim biakna-in na hun uh na beisak uh hi.

[10] Pasian’ piak na a zatsiamte bangin Pasian’ kiang panin na ngah uh nate, midangte’ phattuam nadingin na zang un. [11] Minthanna le vangliatna a nei tawntung Pasian in Jesuh Khrih hangin thu khempeuhah phatna a ngah theih nadingin thuhilhte in Pasian’ thu na hilh unla, na a semte in Pasian’ piak thahatna tawh na sem un. Amen. [12] Ka itte aw, note’ upna hong kize-etna-in gimna haksate na thuak manun a thu lamdangpi-in ngaihsun kei unla, na lungkham ngaihsut kei un. [13] Tua bangin Khrih tawh thuakkhawm le-uhcin ama minthanna hong kilat ciangin note lungdam mahmah ding na hih manun, tua banga na thuakna uhah na lungdamzaw un. [14] Khrih nungzui hihna hangin mite’ kosiatna na thuak uhleh note sungah a minthang Kha Siangtho ahi Pasian’ Kha Siangtho hong om ahihna lim ahih manin a hampha mahmah na hi uh hi. [15] Ahi zongin mi thahna, guktakna, gamtat khialhna, le thusia bawlna hangin gimna a thuakte na hikha kei un. [16] Ahi zongin Khristian hihna hangin gimna na thuak uhleh kuamah in maizum ngaihsut kei unla, Khrih min hangin na thuak manun Pasian tungah na lungdam un.
[19] Tua ahih ciangin Pasian’ deihna bangin gimna a thuak mite gamtat hoihin, a kamciam a tangtungsak tawntung hong Piangsak pa muangin ama khut sungah a ki-ap ding uh ahi hi.
[7] Pasian’ deih bangin na gamtatna uh sanggam ki-itna tawh na behlap un; na sanggam ki-itna uh itna thukpi tawh na behlapzawh nadingun na hanciam un.

[9] Mi pawlkhatte’ ngaihsut bangin Topa in a kamciamna a hong tungsak hak hi zenzen lo hi. Note khat beek in siatna na thuakkhak ding uh deih loin na vekpi-un na kisik ding uh deih ahih manin hong pai nai lohna pen note hong khualna hizaw hi.
[9] Ahi zongin Pasian kiangah i mawhnate va pulak lehang, amah citakin thuman ahih manin, i mawhnate hong maisakin i hoih lohnate khempeuh hong siangsak ding hi.

[16] Bang hang hiam cih leh pumpi deihna, mit tawh mu-in i deihte, le mite’ kisaktheihpih nate ahi leitung nate khempeuh pen Pa Pasian tawh a kizom thu hi lo a, leitung tawh a kizom thu ahi hi. [17] Leitung nate le leitung deihnate a beibei ding hita a, ahi zongin Pasian’ deihna bangin a gamta mite pen kip tawntung ding hi.

[2] Ka lawm itte aw, eite’ pianzia ding taktak a telin hong kilat nai loh hangin tu-in Pasian’ tate ihi hi. Ahi zongin Khrih hong kilat ciangin ama pianzia ahi bang teekteekin mu ding ihih manin amah i bat nading thu teltakin i thei hi.
[10] Hih pen Pasian tate le Dawimangpa’ tate a kilamdanna ahi hi. A manin gamta loin, a Khristian mipihte a it lo mi peuhmah, Pasian’ tate hi lo uh hi.
[15] Note’ gamtatnate ka thei a, vot lah vot vet lo, sa lah sa vet loin na omna uh zong ka thei hi. A vot na hih kei uhleh a sa hi vet le-uhcin ka ut hi.
[18] TOPA in uk tawntung ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
[31] Vantung kipak hen la, leitung lungdam ta hen; minam khempeuhte lakah, “ TOPA maang hi!” amaute in ci ta uh hen.

[11] TOPA aw, liatna, vangliatna, minthanna, gualzawhna, le min liatnate nangma a’ ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh vantung le leitungah a om khempeuh zong nangma a’ ahi hi. TOPA aw, kumpi gam nangma a’ hi a, tuate khempeuh tungah nang a lutangin hong kisangsak hi. [12] Hauhna le minphatna nangma kiang pan hong pai a, nangmah in na khempeuh tungah na uk hi. Na khut sungah vangliatna le minthanna om a, liatsakna ding le thakhauhsakna ding na khut sungah om hi.
[7] TOPA ahihleh kumpi za-ah tu ngitnget a, thukhen nadingin a tokhom a bawl hi. [8] Leitung mite’ thu a mantakin khen a, a kilawm bangin mite’ thu a khen hi.
[10] Hih a minthang Kumpipa kua ahi hiam? Vanglian TOPA, minthang Kumpipa ahi hi.
[6] Na kumpi tokhom siangtho kip tawntung hi. Na kumpi ciangkhut thumanna ciangkhut hi a,
[7] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian pen leitung khempeuhte’ kumpi ahi hi. La sakna tawh amah phat un! [8] Pasian in minamte uk a, a tokhom siangtho tungah Pasian tu hi.

[1] TOPA in uk a, vangliatna kumpi puan kisilhsak hi. TOPA, kumpi puan kisilhsak a, thahatna tawh amah kidim hi. Leitung kikipsak a, kiling ngei lo ding hi. [2] Tanglai pek panin na tokhom a kipsa hi a, nang pen a tawntung a om na hi hi.
[19] TOPA in vantungah ama tokhom phutkhin a, amah in mun khempeuh a uk hi.
[16] Vantung pen TOPA a’ hi a, ahih hangin leitung pen mihingte tungah hong pia khin hi.

[11] Amaute in na kumpi gam a minthanna thu gengenin na vangliatna thu sutsut ding uh a, [12] a vanglian nangma sepnate le na kumpi gam a hoihna, a minthannate mi khempeuh tungah kitheisak ding uh hi. [13] Nangma kumpi gam pen a kip tawntung kumpi gam hi a, nangma ukna khang tawntungin a kip hi. A thuciamna khempeuhah TOPA thutak mahmah a, a gamtatna khempeuhah zong hehpihna a nei ahi hi.

[2] Nidang ciangin TOPA’ inn a omna mual pen mual liante lakah a sangpenin kikipsak ding a, mual neute tungah kisangsak ding hi. Tua lai-ah minam khempeuh pai muamua ding uh a, [3] mi tampite hong pai-in, “Hong pai un, amah in ama zialetongte hong hilh theih nading le ama lampite i zuih theih nadingin Jakob’ Pasian’ inn, TOPA’ mualah paito ni,” a ci ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in Zion panin thu hong gen ding a, Jerusalem khua panin TOPA’ thuhilhna hong paikhia ding hi. [4] Amah in minamte khatlekhat kikalah thu khenin, mi tampite’ thu khensak ding hi. Amaute in a namsaute uh lokhawhna tu, a teipite uh singhiang heuhna temkawi-in a seek ding uh hi. Minam khat le minam khat kido nawn lo ding uh a, galdo dingin kithawi nawn lo ding uh hi.

[6] Keivom pen tuuno tawh omkhawm ding a, kamkei gialbem pen keelno tawh lumkhawm ding hi. Bawngno le humpinelkai le ganhing thaute omkhawm ding uh a, naupangno khat nangawn in tuate hawlzo ding hi. [7] Bawngpi le vompi in an nekhawm ding uh a, amau’ note lumkhawm ding uh hi. Humpinelkai in bawngtal mah bangin buhkung ne ding hi. [8] Nawine naungek, gul gilo’ kua vangah kimawl ding a, nawine nawn lo naupang in gul gunei’ bu a sawk hangin a gul in tu lo ding hi. [9] Ka mual siangtho buppi tungah amaute khatlekhat kiliamsak lo ding uh a, kisusia lo ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tuite in tuipi omna a tuamcip mah bangin leitungah TOPA’ thu theihna kidim ding hi.
