[1] En un, ni khat ni ciangin thuman takin kumpi khat in hong uk ding a, uliante in thutang tawh hong uk ding uh hi.
[22] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA pen eite’ thukhen, TOPA pen eite hong ukpa, TOPA pen eite’ kumpi ahi hi. Amah in eite hong honkhia ding hi.
[16] “Vanglian TOPA, Israel-te’ Pasian, Kherub-te tunga a tupa aw, nangmah bek, leitung kumpi gam khempeuhte’ Pasian na hi hi. Nangmah in vantung le leitung na bawl khin hi.

[18] Vantungte a piangsak pa (amah Pasian!) Leitung piangsakin a bawl pa (a kipsak pa; a awngthawl dingin bawl loin, ten nadingin leitung a piangsak pa!) TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Kei pen TOPA ka hi a, kuamah dang om lo hi.

[4] “Ka mite aw, ka thugen hong ngai un. Minamte tungah thu ka hilh a, keima thukham in amaute tungah khuavak tun ding hi. [5] Manlangin hong pai-in amaute ka honkhia ding hi. Ka gualzawh ding hun hong naita hi. Keimah in minamte ka uk ding hi. Tuipi gei-a gamte in kei hong muang uh a, amaute in keima hotkhiat ding hong ngak uh hi.

[7] Thuhoih hong puak, kilemna thu a genzak, thuhoih thupha a hong puak, hotkhiatna thu a genzak, Zion tungah, “Na Pasian in uk hi,” ci-in mualte kantanin thu hong gen kamtai pa bangzahin hoih ahi hiam?

[17] Tua hun ciangin Jerusalem khua pen TOPA’ kumpi tokhom kici ding a, Jerusalem khua TOPA’ omna-ah gam khempeuh hong kikhawmin, amaute in amau’ mawhnopna lungsim uh a zui tentan nawn kei ding uh hi.

[44] Tua kumpite a maan laitakun vantung Pasian in a bei thei ngei lo ding kumpi gam a hong phut ding hi. Tua kumpi gam kuamah in zo zo lo ding a, tua gam in gamdang khempeuhte zogawpin a kip tawntung ding hi.

[14] Amah in vangliatna, minthanna, le kumpi za ngah ahih manin minam kimte, minam tuamtuamte, paunam tuamtuamte khempeuh in ama na a sem ding uh ahi hi. Amah in a tawntungin uk ding a, a kumpi gam a bei ngei kei ding hi.
[11] Tua ciangin inn tawh kibangin a siasa David ukna gam keimah in ka puahkik ding a, a vang teng hu-in, a sia teng ka puahkik ding a, a nidanga a ngeina lui mah uh ka bangsakkik ding hi.

[1] Mailam hunah TOPA’ biakinn a omna mual, a sangpen mual hong suak ding a, minam tampi in hong zuan ding uh hi. [2] Minam tampite hong pai-in, “Israel mite’ Pasian’ biakinn, TOPA’ mualah va paito ni. Tua lai-ah ama deihna hong hilh ding a, ama deihna bangin i gamta ding hi,” ci ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Zion panin thuhilhna hong gingkhia a, Jerusalem panin TOPA’ thu hong paikhia hi. [3] Amah in minam tampite’ thu khensak ding a, Israel gam panin a gamla pekah a om, minam vangliante’ thu khensak ding hi. Amaute in a namsaute uh lokhawhna tu-in seek ding uh a, a teipite uh singhiang heuhna temkawi-in seek ding uh hi. Minam khatlekhat kido nawn lo ding uh a, galkidona theikha nawn lo ding uh hi.
[9] Tua ciangin TOPA pen leitung khempeuh’ kumpi suak ding a, mi khempeuh in amah bek thei-in bia ding uh hi.
[2] “Vantung ki-ukna hun hong naita ahih manin na mawhnate uh kisik kik un,” a ci hi.

[16] Khuamial sunga a teng mite in khuavak lianpi mu ding uh hi. Sihna gam khuamial sungah a teng mite tungah khuavak hong taang ding hi,” ci hi. [17] Tua hun a kipan Jesuh in thuhilh ding kipan a, “Vantung ki-ukna hong naita ahih manin kisikin na omzia uh kheel un,” ci-in thu a hilh hi.
[3] “Kha thu lamah zawngkhal a kisate sungah vantung ki-ukna thu om ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.
[10] Pasian’ deihna bangin a gamtat manin bawlsiatna a thuak mite vantung ki-ukna sungah a omte ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.

[19] Tua ahih manin hih thukhamte lakpan a neupente khat bek nangawn zuikha loin, midangte in zong a zuih loh nadingin a gen mite pen vantung ki-ukna sungah mi neupen hi ding uh hi. Ahi zongin hih thukhamte zui-in, midangte in zong a zuih nadingin a hilh mite pen vantung ki-ukna sungah milian hi ding uh hi. [20] Tua ahih manin Pasian’ deihna bangin gamtat nading thu-ah Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite sangin na cihtakzawk uhleh vantung ki-ukna sungah a om thei bek ding na hi uh hi.
[10] Na ukna hun hong tung hen la, vantung bangin leitungah zong na deih bangin kigamta hen.
[33] Thudang khempeuh sangin Pasian’ ukna le ama deihna na zuih theih nading uh thupi ngaihsut masazaw un. Tua hileh hih na kisapna dangte khempeuh uh zong hong piathuah veve ding hi.

[11] Note mihoih lo hinapi-in na tate uh tungah na hoih piak ding ngaihsun thei na hih uhleh vantungah a om na Pa un a ngen mite tungah na hoihte hong piazaw mahmah ding hi lo ahi hiam? [12] Tua ahih manin note tungah hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah na bawl un. Moses Thukhamte le kamsangte’ thuhilhnate pen hih mah a deihna ahi hi.

[21] “Kei kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa aw,’ hong ci mi khempeuh, vantung ki-ukna sungah lutthei kim lo ding uh a, vantungah a om ka Pa’ deihna bangin a gamtateng bek lutthei ding uh hi. [22] Tua ni ciangin mi tampi in kei kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa aw, nangma min tawh thu hilhin, nangma min tawh dawite hawlkhia-in, nangma min tawh nalamdang lian tampi bawl hi lo ka hi uh hiam?’ hong ci ding uh hi. [23] Tua ciangin keimah in amaute kiangah, ‘Note ka hong thei ngei kei hi. Siatna a gamta mite aw, kei kiang panin kihemkhia un,’ ka ci ding hi.
[11] Nisuahna le nitumna panin mi tampi tak hong pai-in vantung ki-ukna sungah Abraham, Isaac, le Jakob-te tawh an ne-in sabuai-ah tukhawm ding uh hi.
[35] Tua bangin khuapite le khuaneute-ah Jesuh pai kawikawi a, a kikhopna uh innte-ah thu hilhin, Pasian’ ukna hangin a lungdamhuai thute gen a, natna nam khempeuh a damsak hi.
[7] Na paina peuh uhah, ‘Vantung ki-ukna hong naita hi,’ ci-in thu va hilh un.

[11] Leitung mi khempeuh sung pan Tuiphumpa Johan a lianpen ahi hi. Ahi zongin vantung ki-ukna sungah a neupen i cihte nangawn Johan sangin lianzaw lai hi. [12] Tuiphumpa Johan’ thuhilh hun a kipan tu ciang dong, mite in vantung ki-ukna thu hong kituhteh gawp uh a, thahatthu hong ciam uh hi.
[28] Note’ ngaihsut bang hi loin, Pasian’ Kha in dawi hawlkhiat nading vangliatna kei tungah hong pia ahih manin note lakah Pasian’ ukna hun hong kipan khin ahihna hong kilang hi.
[11] Jesuh in, “Vantung ki-ukna tawh kisai thusim note tungah hong kihilh a, ahi zongin amaute tungah kihilh lo hi.

[31] Tua ciangin Jesuh in thugentehna dang khat gen leuleu a, “Vantung ki-ukna pen bang tawh kibang hiam cih leh, mi khat in a lo sungah a vawh ankam tang tawh kibang hi. [32] Khaici khempeuh lak panin ankam tang a neupen ahi hi. Ahi zongin a khankhit ciangin ankung lakah a golpen suak ahih manin vasate in a hiang tungah bu a tomtheihna zah ding ciang hong suak thei hi,” a ci hi. [33] Tua ciangin thugentehna khat mah gen leuleu a, “Vantung ki-ukna pen bang tawh kibang hiam cih leh, nupi khat in annel seu thum dim meek manin silngo sawh a, a vekpi-in silngo in zelin a pawmsak tawh kibang hi,” a ci hi.

[38] Lolai pen leitung hi a, taangci hoih i cih pen Pasian’ ukna sungah a om mite ahi uh hi. Tahumte pen Gilopa tawh a kipawl mite hi a, [39] tahum tang a vawh gal pa pen Dawimangpa ahi hi. Anlak hun pen leitung bei nading hun hi a, anla nasemte pen vantung mite ahi hi.

[44] “Vantung ki-ukna pen lolai-ah a kiseel sum tawh kibang hi. Mi khat in a muh ciangin limtakin a seelpha hi. Amah lungdam mahmahin a inn-ah ciahpah a, a neih khempeuh a zuak khit ciangin tua lo a lei hi. [45] “Vantung ki-ukna pen sumbawlpa in a zon kep hoihpente tawh zong kibang hi. [46] Sumbawlpa in a manpha diak pawl kep khat a muh ciangin ciahpahin a neih khempeuh a zuak khit ciangin tua kep a lei hi. [47] “Vantung ki-ukna pen tui sungah kipaai-in ngasa namkim a awkna ngen tawh zong kibang hi. [48] Ngasa tampi tak a awk ciangin ngabengte in tui gei-ah a ngen uh kaikhia-in tusuk uh a, nektheih ding ngasate, paipel sungah guangin, nektheih loh ding ngasate, a lawnkhia uh hi.

[19] Vantung ki-ukna sung lut nading tawhtangte, nangma tungah ka hong pia ding a, hih leitungah hoih lo na cihte, vantungah zong a hoih lo hi ding a, hih leitungah hoih hi na cihte, vantungah zong a hoih hi ding hi,” a ci hi.

[3] “A man mahmahin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Note kikheelin naupang na bat kei uhleh vantung ki-ukna sungah na lut ngei kei ding uh hi. [4] Hih naupang bangin a kiniamkhiat mite, vantung ki-ukna sungah a lianpen hi ding hi.
[14] Jesuh in, “Vantung ki-ukna pen naupangte tawh a kibang mite a’ ding ahih manin, tua naupangte ka kiangah hong paipihsak unla, khaktan kei un,” a ci hi.
[1] “Bang hang hiam cih leh vantung ki-ukna sung omzia pen a leenggah lo-ah na a sem ding a cial dingin zing tungin a kuankhia leenggah lo nei pa tawh kibang hi.

[28] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Note in bangci ngaihsut na hi uh hiam? Mi khat in tapa nih nei hi. A ta uzaw kiangah, ‘Ka ta aw, tuni-in leenggah lo-ah va kuan in,’ ci-in a sawl ciangin [29] amah in, ‘Kuan nuam kei ing,’ ci napi-in a lungsim kikheelin a kuankik hi. [30] Tua ciangin a ta nauzaw kiangah tua mah bangin va ci a, ‘Pa aw, va kuan mah ning,’ ci napi-in a kuan kei hi. [31] Hih tapa nihte sung panin a koi bel pen a pa’ deih bangin gamta ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “A ta uzaw a ta hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Note kiangah a mantak a kong genin-ah: Pasian’ ukna sungah note sangin siahdongte le numei paktatte lut masazaw ding hi. [32] Bang hang hiam cih leh note kiangah Tuiphumpa Johan hong pai-in thuman lampi hong lak napi-in na um kei uh a, ahi zongin siahdongte le numei paktatte in a um uh hi. Hih thu na theih khit uh ciang nangawnin na lungsim uh na kheel nuam tuan kei uh a, na um kei veve uh hi.

[2] “Vantung ki-ukna zia pen a tapa a dingin mo pawi a bawl kumpipa’ gamtatzia tawh kibang hi. [3] Mopawi siim dingin a khohsa mite a sam dingin a nasemte sawl a, ahi zongin kuamah pai lo hi. [4] Tua ciangin nasem dangte sawl leuleu a, ‘Ka khohsaksa mite kiangah hih bangin va gen un: Ka bawngtalte le ka bawngno thaute kigo khin a, nitak an a minsa-in a om banah, na khempeuh a mansa-in om khinta hi. Mopawi an ne dingin hong pai ta un, ci hi, ci-in va gen un,’ a ci hi. [5] Ahi zongin a khohsa mite in na thusim lo uh a, pawlkhat in lo na kuansanin, pawlkhat in a sumbukah na paisanin, [6] adangte in a nasemte manin a na satgawp khit uh ciangin a na that uh hi. [7] Kumpipa zong heh mahmah a, a galkapte kuansakin tua mi thatte a thahsak khit ciangin a khua a haltumsak hi. [8] Tua ciangin a nasemte kiangah, ‘Mopawi an a baihsa-in om a, ahi zongin ka sap mite a ne dingin a kilawm lo mi a suak uh hi. [9] Tua ahih manin lamlianpi-ah va pai unla, mi na muh zahzah uh hong sam un,’ a ci hi. [10] Nasemte zong lamlianpi-ah va pai uh a, mihoih mi hoih lo ci loin a muh khempeuh uh va kaikhawm uh ahih manin mo pawi bawlna innsung dimin leengla hong om hi. [11] “Kumpipa, a leenglate a en dingin a hong lut ciangin mo pawi siimna puan a silhlo mi khat a mu hi. [12] Ama kiangah, ‘Lawm aw, mo pawi siimna puan silhlopi-in hih lai-ah hong bangci luttheih na hi hiam?’ a cih ciangin tua mipa in a cih nading a thei kei hi. [13] Tua ciangin kumpipa in a nasemte kiangah, ‘A khut a khe hen unla, pualam khuamialna lakah lawnkhia un; tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding hi,’ a ci hi. [14] “Bang hang hiam cih leh mi tampi a kisap hangin tawm bek a kiteel hi,” a ci hi.

[13] “Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Note in vantung ki-ukna sungah mite a lut theih loh nadingin kong na khakcip uh hi. Note lah na lutnuam kei uh a, a lutnuamte lah na lutsak kei uh hi.
[14] Tua ciangin mi khempeuh tungah teci ahi dingin Pasian’ hong ukna hangin a lungdamhuai thu, leitung khempeuhah kihilh ding hi. Tua khit ciangin beina hong tung ding hi.

[1] “Tua hun ciangin vantung ki-ukna zia pen zinei thak pa a uap dingin a meivak uh tawh a pai nungak sawmte tawh kibang ding hi. [2] Nungak sawmte sung panin nga pil uh a, nga hai uh hi. [3] Tua a haite in a meivak sung uhah a tui thunthuah lopi-in pai uh a, [4] ahi zongin a pil nungak ngate in a dimtakin thunin a pai uh hi.
[34] Tua ciangin Kumpipa in a taklamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Ka Pa in thupha a piak mite aw, hong pai ta un. Leitung piancil a kipanin note a dingin a kibawlkholsa gamnuam hong luah un.
[29] Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Ka Pa’ Ukna sungah note tawh leenggahzu thak ka dawnkik ni matengin leenggahzu ka dawnkik nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
[15] “A hunhoih hong tungta a, Pasian’ Uk ding hun hong kipanta hi. Na mawhna uh kisikkik unla, hih Lungdamna Thuthak um un,” ci-in a hilh hi.

[26] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Pasian’ Ukna pen mi khat in a lolai-ah a vawh khaici tawh kibang hi. [27] Khaici vawhpa zanin ihmu a, zingsangin tho-in sunin a nasep ngeiteng a sem hi. Tua kikal sungin a khaici na po-in na khang a, ahi zongin tua a khantheihna zia amah in a thu thei lo hi. [28] Leitang in ama thu-in na khangsaktawm a, a masa-in a tehno, tua ciangin a kung, tua ciangin a tak a om dongin na khangsak hi. [29] An a min ciangin anlak ding hun ahih manin amah in a phiaukawi tawh an at ding a kipan hi,” a ci hi. [30] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Pasian’ Ukna bang tawh kibang ci ding a, i gentel nadingin bang thugentehna zang ding ihi hiam? [31] Leitung a om khaici khempeuh lakah a neu penpen ankam tang tawh kibang hi. Mi khat in tua ankam tang lei-ah vawh a, [32] tawlkhat khit ciangin hong po-in hong khangto a, khaikung khempeuh lakah a golpen pawl hong suak hi. A kung golin a hiangte zaai ahih manin ama liim sung a hiang kawmah vasate in bu a tom uh hi,” a ci hi.
[1] Tua ciangin Jesuh in a thugen zomlai a, “Hih lai-a a om mi pawlkhatte a sih ma-in vanglianpi tawh Pasian’ Ukna hong tung taktak ding ahihna thu phawk un,” a ci hi.
[14] Jesuh in tua thu a phawk ciangin a heh suak a, a nungzuite kiangah, “Naupangte kham kei unla, ka kiangah hong paisak un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ Ukna sungah hih bang mite a om ahi hi.

[23] Jesuh in a kiima om a nungzuite enin amaute kiangah, “Pasian’ Ukna sungah mihaute a lut ding uh bangzah takin haksa ahi hiam?” a ci hi. [24] Nungzuite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lamdangsa uh a, ahi zongin Jesuh in a thugen zomlai-in, “Tate aw, Pasian’ Ukna sungah lut ding bangzah takin haksa ahi hiam? [25] Pasian’ ukna sungah mihau khat a lut ding sangin phim bilvang sungah kalaoh khat a lut ding baihzaw lai hi,” a ci hi.
[34] Jesuh in hih mipa’ thugenzia hoihsa ahih manin, “Pasian’ Ukna sungah a om dektak mahmah na hi hi,” a ci hi. Tua khit a kipanin Jesuh kiangah kuamah in thu dong ngam nawn lo uh hi.
[25] Pasian’ Ukna sungah leenggahzu thak ka dawnkik ni matengin leenggahzu a dawn nawn lo ding ka hihna thu limtakin thei un,” a ci hi.
[43] mite in a zahtak, ulian vaihawmte lakah a kihel, Pasian’ Uk ding hun zong a lamen, Arimathea khuami Josef, hangtakin Pilat kiangah hong pai-in Jesuh’ luang a hong ngen hi.
[33] Jakob suanlekhakte’ kumpi hi paisuak ding a, ama ukna bei hun cih om ngei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
[43] Ahi zongin amah in, “Pasian’ Ukna hangin Lungdamna Thu a hilh ding mahin a hong kisawl ahih manin khua dangte-ah zong ka va hilh ding hi,” a ci hi.
[20] Tua ciangin Jesuh in a nungzuite en a, “No mizawngte Pasian’ Ukna sungah om na hih manun thupha ngah mi na hi uh hi.
[1] Tuazawh tawlkhat khit ciangin khuapite le khuaneute-ah a ban banin Jesuh pai a, Pasian’ Ukna hangin Lungdamna Thu hilhin a vak kawikawi hi. Tua a vak kawikawina-ah nungzui sawm le nihte,
[2] Tua ciangin Pasian’ Ukna thu a hilh ding le cinatnate a damsak dingin kuankhia sakin
[27] Ke’n kong cihin-ah, hih lai-ah a om mi pawlkhatte in Pasian’ Ukna a muh khit uh matengin si lo ding uh ahihna phawk un,” a ci hi.
[9] tua khuasunga cinate damsak un. A khuamite kiangah, ‘Pasian’ Uk nading hun note a dingin hong naita hi,’ ci-in gen un.
[2] Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Hih bangin na ngen ding uh hi: ‘Pa aw, na min siangtho kizahtak hen la, na Ukna hun hong tung tahen.
[20] Note’ ngaihsut bang hi loin, ke’n Pasian’ vangliatna tawh dawite hawlkhia ka hih manin, note kiangah Pasian’ Ukna hun hong tungta ahihna phawk un.
[32] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Tuuhon tawmnote aw, lau-in lunghimawh kei un. Na Pa un ama Ukna sungah ukna thu a nei dingin a hong sehsa ahi hi.

[18] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Pasian’ Ukna bang tawh kibang a, bang tawh genteh ding ka hi hiam cih leh: [19] Mi khat in a lo-ah a vawh ankam tang khat tawh kibang hi. Tua ankam tang hong khangin kung golpi hong suak a, vasate in a hiang tungah bu a tom thei uh hi,” a ci hi. [20] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Pasian’ Ukna bang tawh genteh leuleu ding ka hi hiam cih leh: [21] Nupi khat in annel lom sungah a sawh silngo tawh kibang hi. Tua silngo in a annel lom khempeuh a pawmsak hi,” a ci hi.

[28] Pasian’ Ukna sungah Abraham, Isaac, Jakob, le kamsangte khempeuh a omna mu napi-in, note a pualamah hong kihawlkhiat ciangin tua huna na kahna uh le na ha gawina uh bangzah takin nasia ding ahi hiam? [29] Nisuahna le nitumna, leilu le leitaw lam panin mite hong pai-in Pasian’ Ukna sung sabuai kiimah tukhawm ding uh hi.
[15] An ne-a a tutpih mite khat in hih thu a zak ciangin Jesuh kiangah, “Pasian’ Ukna sungah an ne-a a tu mite bangzahin mi hampha ahi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

[16] “Tuiphumpa Johan’ hun ciang dong Moses Thukham le kamsangte’ thugente pen zuih belin kinei a, ahi zongin Pasian’ Ukna hangin Lungdamna Thu a kihilh hun a kipanin hih thu-ah mi khempeuh hong kituhteh uh hi.

[20] Khatvei Farisi mite pawlkhat in, cik ciangin Pasian’ Ukna hun hong tung ding ahi hiam, ci-in Jesuh dong uh a, Jesuh in, “Pasian’ Ukna pen mit tawh muhtheihin hong tung lo ding hi. [21] Hih lai-ah om hi, hua lai-ah om hi, cih bangin kuama gentheih hi lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note lakah Pasian’ Ukna hong om khinzo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[15] Jesuh in thupha a piaksak ding a deihna-un mi pawlkhat in a naupangnote nangawn uh Jesuh kiangah hong paipih uh hi. A nungzuite in hih thu a theih uh ciangin amaute na taii uh hi. [16] Ahi zongin Jesuh in naupangnote sam a, “Naupangte hong pai ding khaktan kei un; ka kiangah hong paisak un. Bang hang hiam cih leh naupang a bang mite pen Pasian’ Ukna sungah om thei bek hi. [17] Ke’n kong cihin-ah, naupang bangin Pasian’ Ukna a mang lo peuhmah Pasian’ Ukna sungah om thei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.

[11] Jesuh pen Jerusalem khua a tung dektak hi a, Pasian’ Ukna hun hong tung kuanta ding hi, ci-in mite in zong ngaihsun uh ahih manin, mite in ama thugen a na ngaih laitakun Jesuh in amaute kiangah thugentehna khat genthuah lai a, [12] “Khatvei, ulian khat om a, kumpi za a lakkhit ciangin a ciahkik dingin gamlapi gamah a pai dingin a ding khia hi.
[18] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ Ukna hun hong tun mateng, tu a kipanin leenggahzu ka dawn nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.

[50] Tua laitakin Josef a kici mi khat om a, Judea gam sunga om Arimathea khuami ahi hi. Amah pen mihoih, a zahtakhuai mi khat hi a, Pasian’ Uk ding hun lamenin a ngakngak mi khat ahi hi. Amah pen ulian thuvaihawm sunga kihel hi a, ahi zongin a lawmte’ vaihawmna leh a nasepnate uh thukimpih lo hi. [51] Tua laitakin Josef a kici mi khat om a, Judea gam sunga om Arimathea khuami ahi hi. Amah pen mihoih, a zahtakhuai mi khat hi a, Pasian’ Uk ding hun lamenin a ngakngak mi khat ahi hi. Amah pen ulian thuvaihawm sunga kihel hi a, ahi zongin a lawmte’ vaihawmna leh a nasepnate uh thukimpih lo hi.

[3] Jesuh in, “A mantakin kong genin-ah, mi khatpeuh a suahkik kei leh Pasian’ Ukna sungah lut thei lo ding hi,” a ci hi. [4] Tua ciangin Nikodemas in, “Mi khat a teek khit ciangin bangci suahkik thei ding ahi hiam? A nu’ sungah lutkikin suakkik thei ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin [5] Jesuh in, “A mantakin kong genin-ah, mi khatpeuh tui le Kha Siangtho tawh a suahkik kei leh Pasian’ Ukna sungah lut thei lo ding hi.

[25] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Keimah in a sisa mite thosakin a hingsak thei pa ka hi hi. Kei hong um mi peuhmah a sih hangin nungta ding hi. [26] A nungta a kei hong um mite si ngei nawn lo ding hi. Hih thu na um hiam?” a cih ciangin,

[36] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Keima ukna pen hih leitung gam hi lo hi. Keima ukna hih leitung gam hileh Jerusalem khua-a Jew mi uliante’ khut sungah hong kipiak loh nadingin ka nungzuite in a do ding uh hi. Tua ahih manin keima ukna pen hih leitung tawh kizom lo hi,” a ci hi.
[3] Ama sih khitzawh ni sawmli sung amaute tungah tam veipi kilang a, amah a nungta taktak ahihna teltakin a kithei ahi hi. Amaute in amah mu uh a, Pasian’ Ukna thu amaute tungah a gen hi.
[12] Ahi zongin Pasian’ Ukna Lungdamna Thu le Jesuh Khrih thu, Filip’ gente a up uh ciangin, numei pasal a um khempeuh tui a kiphum uh hi.
[22] Thu um mite a upna uhah citakin a om nadingun hanthawnin tha pia uh a, “Pasian’ Ukna sungah i omtheih nadingin haksatna tampi thuak ding hi hang,” ci-in a hilh uh hi.
[8] Tua ciangin Paul in kikhopna inn sungah hangtakin kha thum sung thu hilh a, mite in Pasian’ Ukna thu a upzawh nadingun nakpitakin a gen hi.
[25] “A beisa hunah Pasian’ Ukna thu a hilhin note lakah kong vak kawikawi a, ahi zongin tu-in kuamah in nong muhkik nawn loh ding uh ka thei hi.

[23] Tua ahih manin Paul tawh a kimuh nading uh a ni khat seh uh a, tua a kiciam ni-un Paul a zintunna munah Jew mite tampi tak a kikhawm uh hi. Paul in zingsang a kipan nitak dongin amaute tungah Pasian’ Ukna thu gentel a, Jesuh’ thu man hi, ci-in a uptheih nadingun Moses Thukham le kamsangte’ laigelhte siksanin a gen hi.
[31] Amah in Pasian’ Ukna thu le Topa Jesuh Khrih’ thu, hangtakin a ututin genin a hilh hi.
[17] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ Ukna pen nekledawn tawh a kisai thu hi lo a, Kha Siangtho hangin i ngah Pasian’ deih bangin gamtatna, kilemna, lungdamna, cihte hizaw hi.

[9] Migilote, Pasian’ Ukna sungah a lut hetloh nading thu na thei uh hi. Note kihaibawl kei un. Numei tawh a paktatte, milim biate, mi zi ahih kei leh mi pasal tawh a mawhte, pasal le pasal a khialte, [10] a gutate, a huaihamte, zukhamte, mi gensiate, ahih kei leh mi’ na a sutte khat beek, Pasian’ Ukna sungah lutthei het lo ding hi.
[50] Sanggamte aw, note kiangah ka hong gennop thu in: Pasian’ Ukna sungah hih leitung silesa pumpi lut thei lo ding a, a siathei pumpi pen a siathei lo pumpi suak thei lo ding hi.
[19] Tu-in mihing pianzia hong kitel a, tuate pen: Numei tawh mawhna, thangtatna, lanluat mana khialhna,

[21] enna, zukhamna le biakna pawi-ah zukhamna a kipan adangdangte ahi hi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian’ Ukna sungah omkha het lo ding hi.
[13] Amah in khuamial vangliatna panin eite hong honkhia-in, a lungmuanhuaina mun, a it a Tapa’ ukna sungah hong koih a, [14] tua a Tapa in eite hong khahkhia a, i mawhna hong kimaisak khinta hi.
[5] Tu-a na thuaknate uh hangin Pasian’ Ukna sungah a om dingin a kilawm mi suak na hih manun Pasian’ thukhenna a man ahihna hong kilangsak hi.
[21] Keimah zong gualzo-in ka Pa’ tokhomah ka tutkhawm uh mah bangin a gualzote khempeuh zong kei tawh ka tokhom tungah hong tutkhawm theih nadingun thu ka pia ding hi.
[10] Pasian’ na a sem dingin siampi za le kumpi za na pia a, amaute in leitung ukin a om ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
[5] Topa Pasian pen amaute’ khuavak hi-in, a tawntungin amaute in uk paisuak ding uh ahih manin khuamial hun cih om nawn lo ding a, khua a vaksak ding meivak le nitaang cihte kisam lo ding uh hi.
[1] Hih thute khit ciangin mang sungah TOPA’ thu Abram’ tungah hong tung a, “Abram aw, lau kei in. Keimah in lauhuaina panin nang ka hong hu ding a, na thaman lian mahmah ding hi,” a ci hi.
[14] TOPA in note a dingin hong dosak ding a, note ahihleh na om hithiat ding uh hi bek hi,” a ci hi.
[7] Tua ahih ciangin note ki-ap unla siangtho un; bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen TOPA na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
[6] Thahat unla, hang un. Lau kei unla, amaute kihta kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh note tawh hong pai pa pen TOPA na Pasian uh ahi hi. Note hong cimawhsak lo ding a, hong nusia lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
[5] Na nuntak sung tawntung kuamah in na mai hong khak zo lo ding hi. Moses tawh ka om mah bangin nang tawh zong kong om ding hi. Nang kong tamasak kei ding a, kong nusia kei ding hi.
[9] Thu hong pia khin hi lo ka hi hiam? Thahat inla hang in. Lau kei inla lungkia kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh na paina peuhpeuhah TOPA na Pasian nang tawh hong om hi,” a ci hi.
[17] “Pasian in a taii mite mi nuamsa hizaw ahih manin, Vanglianpa’ taiina thupi san in.
[2] TOPA pen keima suangpi, ka munkip muanhuai, kei a hong honkhia pa, ka Pasian, ka suangpi, ka belh pa, ka lum, ka kihotkhiatna ki, ka munkip ahi hi.
[24] Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a thuak mi’ gimna simmawh bawl lo a, zong kihbawl lo hi. Ama kiang pan a mai seello a, ama tungah a koh ciangin, amah in a za hi.

[4] TOPA’ tung panin na khat ka ngen khin a, tua ngenin ka zon ding pen: TOPA’ inn sungah ka khan tawntungin om ding, TOPA’ hoihna et ding le ama biakinn sungah thu dot dingte ahi hi. [5] Bang hang hiam cih leh haksat hun ciangin amah in a buk sungah kei hong seel ding hi. A puanbuk khuhna nuai-ah kei hong seel ding a, a sangna suang tungah kei hong koih ding hi.
[14] TOPA muang in. Thakhauh inla, na lungsim hangsakin, TOPA muang in.
[5] Ama hehna tomno sung bek hi a, ama hong deihsakna pen khang tawntung ading ahi hi. Zan hun sungteng kahna omkha mah ding a, ahih hangin zing khuavak tawh nuamna hong tung hi.
[8] TOPA tawh kikhawl phot unla, ama hoihna thei un! Amah a beel mite mi lungdam ahi uh hi.
[18] Lungsim kitamzante kiangah TOPA hong om a, lungsim zangawpte a hon hi.

[3] TOPA muang inla, gamtat hoih in. Gam nuamah teng inla, thumanin om in. [4] TOPA sungah lungkim in; amah in na deihna hong pia ding hi. [5] TOPA tungah na vai teng ap in. Amah muang in; amah in hong sem ding hi. [6] Amah in nangma dikna khuavak bangin, nangma thumanna nitaang bangin hong langsak ding hi.

[1] TOPA lamenin ka ngak ngiungeu a, amah kei lam hong nga-in ka kikona aw hong za hi. [2] Dahna dum sung, buannawng panin kei hong kaikhia-in suangpi tungah ka khete nga a, ka khesikna mun a muanhuaisak hi.
[17] Kei ahihleh zawngin ka cimawh a, ahih hangin TOPA in kei hong mangngilh lo hi. Nang pen kei hong huhpa le hong honkhia pa na hi hi. Zekai kei in, ka Pasian aw.
[1] Pasian, i belh leh i thahatna hi a, haksat hunin a hong huh pahpah pa ahi hi.

[14] Hih pen eima Pasian hi a, a tawntungin eima Pasian hi, ci-in khangkikte tungah na gen theih nadingun Zion kiimvelin pai-in, a tausang phazah sim unla, a kulh phungmai a hoih mahmahte ngaihsunin, a phualpi muanhuaite va nawk kim un. Amah pen a tawntungin lam hong lak ding pa ahi hi.
[22] TOPA tungah na vangik nga in, amah in hong huh ding hi. Amah in mi thumante kilingsak ngei lo ding hi.
[20] Eite’ Pasian pen hong honkhia Pasian hi a, sihna pan a hong suaktasak Topa PASIAN ahi hi.
[26] Ka lungsim le ka pumpi zawngkhal kha ding a, ahih hangin Pasian pen ka lungsim hatna le keima a’ hi tawntung ding hi.

[3] Amah in ka khe taalsak lo ding a, kei hong kem pa lusu lo ding hi. [4] En un, Israel a kem pa lusu lo a, zong ihmu lo hi. [5] TOPA in nang hong cing ding a, nangmah a hong hu dingin na kiangah hong om hi. [6] Sunin ni in nang hong gimsak lo ding a, zanin kha in zong nang hong sukha lo ding hi. [7] TOPA in siatna khempeuh panin nang hong hu ding a, amah in a muanhuai-in nang hong kem ding hi. [8] TOPA in tua kipan a tawntungin na vaksuk na vaktohna-ah nang hong kem ding hi.
[16] Nangmah in na khut na hong a, nuntak husanna a nei khempeuhte’ deihna a kicingin na pia hi.
[29] Hih zong Vanglian TOPA’ kiang pan a hong pai thu ahi hi. Amah pen thu lamlahna-ah lamdang mahmah a, pilna-ah lian mahmah hi.
[31] Ahih hangin TOPA a muang mite a tha uh dimkik ding a, muvanlai bangin kha tawh leengto-in, amaute tai napi-un tawl lo ding uh a, amaute lam pai napi-un gim lo ding uh hi.
[10] nang hong ompih ka hih manin lau kei in. Na Pasian ka hih manin lungkia kei in. Nang hong thakhauhsakin ka hong huh ding a, nang hong huhin ka hong honkhia ding hi.
[13] Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah TOPA na Pasian in na khut taklam ka len hi. “Lau kei in, nangmah kong huh ding hi,” nang tungah a hong ci pa keimah ka hi hi.

[1] Ahih hangin Jakob aw, nangmah hong piangsak pa, Israel aw, nangmah hong bawlpa, TOPA in tu-in hih bang ci hi: “Hong honkhia khin ka hih manin lau kei in. Na min tawh kong sam khinzo a, nang pen kei-a’ na hi hi. [2] Tuite na kantan ciangin nang kong ompih ding a, gunte na kantan ciangin tui in hong tuum lo ding hi. Mei kantanin na pai ciangin na kang kei ding a, meikuangte in nang hong kangtum lo ding hi.
[19] Tu-in a thak na khat ka bawl a, tu-in hong piangkhia hi. Note in thei lo na hi uh hiam? Gamlakah lam lianpi khat ka bawl ding a, sehnel gam sungah gunte ka luangsak ding hi.

[15] Ahih hangin TOPA in, “Ama sung panin a suak a tapa a hehpih lo ding zahin nupi khat in ama nawi a teep naungek mangngilh thei ding ahi hiam? Hihte nangawn in mangngilhkha thei ding a, ahi zongin keimah in kong mangngilh kei ding hi.
[4] A lunggim mite ka thahatsak theih nadingin Topa PASIAN in ka gen ding thu hong hilh khin hi. Ama hong hilhnate a ngai dingin zingsang simin lawpna hong guan hi.

[4] Lau kei in, maizumna na thuak kei ding hi. Cihna ding thei loin om kei in; maizumin nang hong kikoih lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh na khangno lai-in na zulhtatna le na meigonna hangin hong kikonate na phawkkha nawn kei ding hi.

[1] A honkhia zo lo dingin TOPA zawngkhal lo a, khua a za thei lo dingin a bil ngong lo hi. [2] Ahih hangin note’ mawhnate in note le na Pasian uh kikhenna hong piangsak a, amah in note’ aw hong zak theih loh nadingin na khialhnate un ama maitang liah hi.
[11] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in kong cihin-ah, mai lamah lametna note kong piakkik ding, na siatna ding uh hi loin na phattuamna ding uh geelna ka neihte kei bek in ka thei hi.
[16] TOPA in kong cihin-ah: “Kap nawn kei unla, na khitui uh nul un. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in kong cihin-ah, na nasep thaman uh na ngah uh hi. Amaute galte’ gam panin hong ciahkik ding uh hi.
[22] A bei thei lo TOPA’ hong itna le a hehpihna a kizom paisuak hi a, [23] zing nisuak bangin thaksuak tawntung a, ni a hong suah pelmawh mah tawh a kibang ahi hi.
[2] Bethlehem Efrathah khua aw, nang pen Judah gamah khua neupen khat na hi a, ahi zongin nang sung panin Israel-te a uk ding khat ka piangsak ding hi. Ama gui pen tangtawng pek tawh kizom hi.
[7] TOPA hoih hi; lungkham hunin a mite huh a, amah a beel mite limtakin a kem hi.
[6] “Kei, TOPA ka hi a, lungsim a kheel lo mi ka hi hi. No Jakob suanlekhakte aw, a siacimit na hi nai kei uh hi.
[3] Keimah in na kong sep ni ciangin note in migilote nuaisiahin leivui bangin na tuancil ding uh hi.
[8] Lungsim takpi tawh Pasian a zong mite in Pasian mu ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.

[29] Gitta nih ciangin mat khatin kizuak lel hi lo ahi hiam? Tua hinapi-in na Pa uh’ thukim lohin tua gittate khat nangawn lei-ah mawkkiat lo hi. [30] Note ahihleh na lu tung uha na sammal phazah nangawn uh hong kiciamtehsak hi. [31] Tua ahih manin lau kei un. Gitta tampi sangin note na manphazaw uh hi.
[28] “Na semin vangik pua-in a gim mite khempeuh aw, ka kiangah hong pai ta un. Note tungah lungsim tawldamna ka hong pia ding hi.
[32] Pasian in, ‘Kei pen Abraham’ Pasian, Isaac’ Pasian, Jakob’ Pasian ka hi hi,’ ci hi. Pasian pen a si mite’ Pasian hi loin a nungta mite’ Pasian ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[1] A kipat cil-in Thu na om a, tua Thu, Pasian tawh na omkhawm a, tua Thu, Pasian ahi hi. [2] Tua hi a, a kipat cil a kipanin Thu le Pasian na omkhawm hi. [3] Pasian in Thu tawh na khempeuh piangsak a, a kipiangsak na khempeuh, Thu tawh loin a kipiangsak khat beek om lo hi. [4] Nuntakna a nei khempeuh in tua Thu tung panin a nuntakna uh ngah a, tua nuntakna in mi khempeuh tungah khuavak hong tunpih hi.
[18] Kuamah in Pasian mu ngei lo hi. Pasian tawh a kinai pen, Pasian mah ahi Tapa khat bek in Pasian hong kilangsak hi.
[24] Pasian pen Kha ahi hi; amah a biate in tua Kha’ lamlahna le thuman taktak tawh a bia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[20] Pasian in leitung a piansak cil a kipanin a kimu thei lo ama pianzia ahi tawntung vanglianpa le Pasian ahihna thute ama bawlsa nate tung panin teltakin hong kilang hi. Tua ahih manin, “Thei kei ing,” ci-in paulap a zontheih nading uh om lo hi.
[18] Tuhuna i thuaknate pen Pasian in a hong piak ding minthanna tawh ka ngaihsut khawm ciangin gentham ka sa het kei hi.
[28] Ama deihna bang a sem dingin Pasian in a hong sap, amah a it eite a dingin na khempeuh a hoihlamin piangsak hi, ci-in i thei hi.
[31] Hih teng bang ahih khit ciangin bang gen ding om nawn ahi hiam? Pasian in eite hong koppih peuh leh kua in eite hong zozo ding ahi hiam?
[13] Kha Siangtho’ huhna tawh note’ lametna a khan semsem theih nadingin, lametna a hong piathei Pasian in, amah na upna uh hangin lungdamna le nopsakna tawh note hong kidimsak tahen.

[12] Dal limlang sunga et bangin tu laitakin a kitel pha loin i mu milmial a, ahi zongin mai lamah maitang kituahin i mu ding hi. Tu laitakin i theihnate kicing lo a, ahi zongin mai lamah Pasian in eite hong theih mah bangin a kicing takin amah i thei ding hi.

[3] Eite’ Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pa ahi, hehpihna a nei Pa, i kisapna khempeuhah a hong huh Pasian in thupha ngah tahen. [4] Amah in kote’ haksatna khempeuhah hong huh ahih manin, kote in zong Pasian’ tung panin ka ngah uh tua huhna mah zangin haksatna a nam tuamtuam a thuakte ka huhsawn thei leuleu uh hi.

[17] Tuhun laitakin tomno sung lungkhamna ka thuakte uh in ka thuakna uh sangin nakpitakin a lianzaw tawntung minthanna sung hong tunpih ding hi. [18] Bang hang hiam cih leh a kimuthei nate a mitsuan ka hi kei uh a, a kimu thei lo nate a mitsuan ka hi uh hi. A kimuthei nate tomno sung bek kimang a, a kimu thei lo nate a tawntungin a kip ahi hi.
[4] Kote’ zat galdona hiam pen leitung galhiam lelte hi lo a, galte’ panmun phualpi a susiazo ding Pasian’ galhiam khauhte ahi hi.

[20] Eite a dingin na a hong sepsak, eite’ ngetzah val, le i ngaihsut zawh loh zah dongin a vangliatna tawh tampi tak a hong hihsak thei [21] eite’ Pasian pen, pawlpi mite khempeuh le Khrih Jesuh tawh a kipawl mi khempeuh in a khang khangin a tawntungin phat ciat ta uh hen. Amen.
[13] Khrih in a hong piak vangliatna tawh hihte khempeuh nawkzawh nading thahatna a nei ka hi hi.

[13] Sanggamte aw, lametna a nei lo mite bangin na dahluat loh nadingun a sisa mite’ omzia ding thu na theih ding uh ka deih hi. [14] Jesuh si-in thokik hi, ci-in i up mah bangin Pasian in Jesuh hong paipih kik ciangin amah umin a si mite zong hong tonpih ding hi, ci-in i um hi.

[16] Tua i Pasian bek mah a si thei lo hi a, khuavak pha mahmah sungah om ahih manin kuamah in a kiang neh thei lo hi. Kuamah in amah mu ngei lo a, zong mu thei lo hi. A tawntungin amah kipahtawi hen la, vanglian tawntung tahen. Amen.

[12] Pasian’ thu nungta-in a gamtang hi a, langnih a hiam namsau sangin hiamzaw lai hi. Kha le lungsim, guh le taang kituahna, guh le guhngek dongin khenkhia thei hi. Mihingte’ lungsim ngimna le a ngaihsutnate zong theithei hi. [13] Pasian’ mai-ah seelcip theih ding bangmah om lo hi. Eite khempeuh i dinna ding pa’ mai-ah a kipiangsak na khempeuh a kiliah a ki-im thei om loin kimu sinsen hi.
[29] Bang hang hiam cih leh eite’ Pasian pen a kangtum thei meikuang tawh a kibang ahi hi.
[19] Pasian khat bek om hi, ci-in na um hi. Tua pen hoih mahmah hi. Dawite nangawn in zong tua bangin umin lau-in ling deldel uh hi.

[12] Thukham a pia pa le thu a khen pa pen Pasian bek hi a, amah bek in hong honkhiazo a, hong susiazo hi. Tua ahih manin bang hangin na mipihte uh gensia-in thu a khenthei dingin kingaihsun zenzen na hi uh hiam?

[15] Note a hong sampa a siangtho ahih mah bangin note zong na gamtatna khempeuh uhah na siangtho un. [16] Lai Siangtho sungah zong, “Keimah siangtho ka hih manin note zong na siangtho un,” na kici hi.
[7] Pasian in note hong kem ahih manin na lungkhamnate khempeuh uh ama kiang tunpih un.

[14] Pate aw, note tungah lai ka hong gelhna pen a kipat cil a kipanin a na om pa na theihna hang uh ahi hi. Tangvalte aw, note tungah lai ka hong gelhna pen note na lungsim uh thahatin, Pasian’ thu zui-in, Dawimangpa zokhin na hihna hang uh ahi hi.
[7] A gualzo mi khempeuh in kei tung panin a ngah ding thu in: Kei pen amaute’ Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute keima ta ahi ding uh hi.
[6] Tua ciangin amah in, “Kei pen na pa’ Pasian, Abraham’ Pasian, Isaac’ Pasian, le Jakob’ Pasian ka hi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Moses in Pasian a muh ding lau ahih manin a maitang a hum hi.
[14] Pasian in Moses kiangah, “ KEIMAH ka hi hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Pasian in, “Israel mite tungah hih thu genin, ‘ KEIMAH a kici pa in note kiangah kei hong sawl hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.

[5] Tuate’ mai-ah na kun kei ding uh a, tuate na bia kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah note’ TOPA Pasian, a aam Pasian ka hi a, kei hong mudahte’ tungah pate’ mawhna tate’ tungah khang thum khang lina dongin thuk-in, [6] ahih hangin kei hong itin ka thupiakte a zui mi a tul tampite tungah itna kip a lak pa ka hi hi.

[10] Ahi zongin a ni sagih ni pen TOPA note’ Pasian’ Sabbath ni ahi hi. Tua ni-in note, na tapate, na tanute, na nasempate, na nasemnute, na ganhing uh ahi a, peemtate in ahi zongin na bangmah na sem kei ding uh hi.

[6] Ama mai-ah TOPA pai-in, “TOPA, TOPA, hehpihna nei-in a dik Pasian; lungduai-in itna kip le thutakna tawh a dim; [7] mi tul tampite a dingin itna kip a nei; mawhna, thu palsatna le khialhna maisakin; ahih hangin bangbang hitaleh mawhna a khahkhong ngei lo; pate’ mawhna tate’ tung le tute’ tung, khang thum khang lina dongin a thukpa,” ci-in a pulak hi.
[4] Note in keima biakna ngeina kipte semin ka thukhamte lenin tuate na zui ding uh hi. Kei pen TOPA na Pasian uh ka hi hi.

[18] Tu-in, nang tungah hong thum ing. Nangmah in thu ciamin, ‘ TOPA heh hak a, a itna kip lianin, mawhna le thu palsatna maisak a, ahih hangin a mawhte siangsak ngei loin, pate’ mawhna tate tungah, khang thum khang lina dongin thuk hi,’ na cih mah bangin TOPA’ vangliatna liansak in. [19] A lian nangma itna kip tawh a kizui le Egypt panin tuhun dong hih mite na maisaksa tawh kizui-in hih mite’ mawhna maisak in, kong thum hi,” a ci hi.
[9] Tua ahih ciangin TOPA na Pasian uh amah bek ahi Pasian hi a, amah itin a thupiakna a zuite tungah khang tulkhat dongin thuciamna le itna kip lenin a thuman Pasian,

[15] “Tuni-in na teel dingun note’ mai-ah nuntakna le a hoih na, sihna le siatna ka koih khinzo hi. [16] TOPA na Pasian uh itna, ama lampite totna, ama thupiaknate le ama thukhamte le ama ngeina kipte zuihna tawh, tuni-a no tungah kong gen ahi TOPA na Pasian uh thupiaknate na man’ uhleh, note nungta-in tampi na pha ding uh a, a luah dingin note na lutna uh leitang tungah TOPA na Pasian un note thupha hong pia ding hi.
[39] ‘Tu-in thei un, keimah a kici pa pen kei ka hi a, kei simloh pasian dang kuamah om lo hi. Ka that a, ka nungtasak hi. Ka liamsak a, ka damsak hi. Ka khutsung pan a honkhiazo kuamah om lo hi.
[26] “Israel aw, nangmah huh dingin vantungah a tuang a liatna tawh vanpi-ah a om, Pasian tawh a kibang kuamah dang om lo hi.

[7] Ahih hangin TOPA in Samuel kiangah, “A tungtham hitaleh a tun sanna hitaleh en kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah ka nolh hi. TOPA in mihingte’ muh bangin mu lo hi. Mihingte in a pualam a kilangte en a, ahih hangin TOPA in a lungsim en hi,” a ci hi.

[7] “Ahi zongin gamsate va dong un, hong hilh ding uh hi. Vasate va dong un, hong hilh ding uh hi. [8] Leitung ganhingte va dong un, hong hilh ding uh hi. Tui sung ngasate zong va dong un, hong hilh ding uh hi. [9] Pasian’ khut in amaute a bawlna thu a vekpi-un thei kim uh hi lo ahi hiam? [10] A piansaksate’ nuntakna Pasian mah in a uk ahi hi. Mihing khempeuhte’ nuntakna ama khut sungah om hi.
[41] Va-akte a gilkialin leng kawikawi-in, a note in an duhin kei tungah hong nget ciangun, tua va-akte an a piapa kua ahi hiam?
[12] Mite a kibawlphat kik kei leh, Pasian in a thalkhau sui zo a, a namsau taat ding hi.
[6] TOPA’ thuciamnate, a siangtho thuciamna hi a, meikhuk sungah sagihvei a kisiangsak ngun tawh kibang hi.
[28] Nangmah in keima mei nong vaksak a, TOPA ka Pasian in ka khuamial na vaksak hi.
[30] Hih Pasian - a thu kicing a, TOPA’ kamciamna a manna kilang hi. Amah a belte khempeuh a dingin kidalna lum ahi hi.

[1] Vantung in Pasian’ minthanna gen a, vanpi in ama nasepna taangko hi. [2] Nisimin thu gengen a, zan simin theihtelna pulaklak hi. [3] Pauna le kammal om lo a, amau’ aw kiza lo hi. [4] Ahih hangin a aw uh leitung khempeuhah kizel a, a kammal uh leimong dongah a tung hi. Amau’ sungah ni a’ ding omna khat bawl khin a, [5] a innsung pan a hong pusuak zi pi tangval tawh ahi zongin, lungtaii takin tai ding a kipan mi thahat khat tawh ahi zongin a kibang hi. [6] Ama suahna van mong pan hi a, mong khat dongin pai a, ama satna panin a kiliah thei bangmah om lo hi. [7] TOPA’ thu kicing a, nuntakna a thaksuaksak hi. TOPA’ teci panna hi takpi a, mi pillote pilsak hi. [8] TOPA’ thuhilhte man a, lungsim nuamsak hi. TOPA’ thupiakna siang a, mitte vaksak hi. [9] TOPA a kizahtakna siang a, kip tawntung hi. TOPA’ ngeina kipte thuman a, a vekin kituakin man kim hi. [10] Kham sangin ahi zongin kham hoihpen sang ahi zongin tuate deihhuaizaw a, khuaizu le khuailuzu taakte sangin zong khumzaw lai hi. [11] Tua tham loin tuate’ hangin a nasem pa in thuphawkna ngah a, tuate zuihna-ah noptuamna lian a om hi. [12] Ahih hangin kua in ama khialhnate mukhia theitawm ahi hiam? Theih loh manin khialhna panin kei hong siangsak hi. [13] Mawh kaltangnate panin zong na nasempa hong kem inla, tuate keima tungah hong uksak kei in! Tua ciangin kei ka kawkbaang kei ding a, mawhna liante panin ka siang ding hi. [14] TOPA, ka belh suangpi le keimah hong tankhia pa aw, ka kammal le ka lungsim ngaihsutnate nangma muhna-ah a sanhuai suaksak ta in!
[5] Ama hehna tomno sung bek hi a, ama hong deihsakna pen khang tawntung ading ahi hi. Zan hun sungteng kahna omkha mah ding a, ahih hangin zing khuavak tawh nuamna hong tung hi.
[5] TOPA ka Pasian aw, na sep a lamdangte le ko a dingin na ngaihsutnate tampi tak na phasak a, kuamah dang tawh tehtheih na hi kei hi. Tuate pulakin gen ding hi leng, genkhit zawh ding hi lo hi.
[8] Mite aw, amah muang tawntung unla, na lungkhamna teng uh ama tungah gen un. Pasian, eite’ bukna ahi hi.
[14] Thuman le thutang tawh na ukna za na phut a, itna kip le thuman tawh na khempeuh na sem hi.
[5] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA hoih hi. Ama itna kipin kho tawntung a, ama thumanna a khang khangin kip hi.

[10] Amah in eite’ khialhna tawh a kituakin eite tungah hong bawl lo a, eite’ mawhna tawh a kituakin hong thukkik lo hi. [11] Vantung pen leitung panin a san mah bangin amah a zahtakte’ tungah ama itna kip lianin sang mahmah hi. [12] Nisuahna pen nitumna panin a gamlat mah bangin i mawhna hangin gimnate eite’ kiang panin gamlapi-ah a nilkhia hi. [13] Pa in tate a hehpih bangin TOPA in amah a zahtakte hong hehpih hi.
[19] TOPA in vantungah ama tokhom phutkhin a, amah in mun khempeuh a uk hi.
[89] TOPA aw, vantungah nangma thu kip tawntung hi.

[6] A vanglian nangma bawlnate mite in taangko ding uh a, nangma vangliatna mah kei zong ka pulak ding hi. [7] Amaute in nangma liatna, na minthanna genkhia-in nangma thumanna nakpitakin sa ding uh hi. [8] TOPA dikin hehpihna nei a, heh hak mahmahin itna kip lianpi a nei hi.

[1] TOPA phat un. Vantung panin TOPA phat unla, a sangna panin amah phat un. [2] Ama vantungmi khempeuh aw, amah phat un. Ama mihonte khempeuh aw, amah phat un. [3] Ni le kha aw, amah phat un. A taang aksi khempeuh aw, amah phat un. [4] Van sangpente le vantung a om tuite aw, amah phat un. [5] TOPA’ min amaute phatsak un. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in thu pia a, amaute a piang hi. [6] Amaute a tawntung a om dingin amah in kipsak a, a palsat loh ding uh thupiakna amah in a bawl hi. [7] Leitung panin TOPA phat un, no gulpi liante le tuipi thuk khempeuh, [8] mei le gial, tuikhal le vuk, ama thupiakna a mang huihpi! [9] Amah phat un, no mual liante le mual neute khempeuh, gah a nei singkungte le taamtak singkung khempeuh! [10] Gamsate le innsate khempeuh, a bokvak ganhingte le a leeng vasate khempeuh! [11] No leitung kumpite le mihing khempeuh, leitung uliante le thukhente khempeuh! [12] Nungakte le tangvalte, teeksiate le naupangte aw, amah phat un. [13] TOPA’ min phat un. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah bek a minlian hi a, ama minthanna pen leitung le vantung sangin sangzaw lai hi. [14] Amah in ama mite thahatsak a, ama mi siangthote khempeuh, ama mai-ah a om Israel-te khempeuh in amah phat uh hi. TOPA phat un.

[16] TOPA in a muhdah, a khahkhong ngei loh ding, thu guk, tua zah bek hi lo, thu sagih tak om a, tuate pen [17] kihihsakna, zuauthu genna, mawhnei lo mi thahna, [18] thusia bawl ding ngaihsutna, gamtatsiat ding a manlangte, [19] zuauthu gen teci man lote, le kitotna a piangsakte ahi hi.
[27] Amah in vantung bawlin tuipi kimkotah vanpi mong ding a bawl laitak,
[2] Pasian in thu a ip manin a min thang a, kumpite in thu a genkhiat manin minthang uh hi.

[5] “Pasian in a thugen khempeuh a manna laktel a, amah a belte a dingin kidalna lum ahi hi. [6] Ama gen lohpi behlapsak kei in; na tua cih leh amah in nang hong tai-in zuau thugen na hihna hong kilang ding hi,” a ci hi.

[11] Amah in na khempeuh amau’ hun ciat tawh a kituak dingin a bawl hi. Amah in mailam thu theihnopna lungsim eite tungah hong guan a, ahi zongin ama sepnate a cing a theihzawhna ding hong guan lo hi.
[3] Amaute khatlekhat kisamin: “Vanglian TOPA, siangtho, siangtho, siangtho; leitung khempeuh ama minthanna tawh kidim,” ci-in awng uh hi.

[28] Thei nai lo a, za nai lo na hi hiam? TOPA pen tawntung Pasian hi a, leitung mong khempeuh dong a Piangsak pa ahi hi. Amah gim lo a, zong tawl lo hi. Ama thu theihtelna kigen zo lo hi. [29] Amah in a gim mi tungah vangliatna pia a, thahatna a nei lo mi a thahatna khangsak hi. [30] Khangnote nangawn gimin tawl ding a, khanglai mite a tha uh bei ding hi. [31] Ahih hangin TOPA a muang mite a tha uh dimkik ding a, muvanlai bangin kha tawh leengto-in, amaute tai napi-un tawl lo ding uh a, amaute lam pai napi-un gim lo ding uh hi.
[10] nang hong ompih ka hih manin lau kei in. Na Pasian ka hih manin lungkia kei in. Nang hong thakhauhsakin ka hong huh ding a, nang hong huhin ka hong honkhia ding hi.

[1] Ahih hangin Jakob aw, nangmah hong piangsak pa, Israel aw, nangmah hong bawlpa, TOPA in tu-in hih bang ci hi: “Hong honkhia khin ka hih manin lau kei in. Na min tawh kong sam khinzo a, nang pen kei-a’ na hi hi. [2] Tuite na kantan ciangin nang kong ompih ding a, gunte na kantan ciangin tui in hong tuum lo ding hi. Mei kantanin na pai ciangin na kang kei ding a, meikuangte in nang hong kangtum lo ding hi. [3] Bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen TOPA na Pasian, Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa, nangmah hong honpa ka hi hi. Nangmah tat nadingin Egypt ka pia a, nangmah khek nadingin Ethiopia le Seba ka pia hi.

[11] “Kei, keimah pen TOPA ka hi a, kei simloh honpa dang om lo hi. [12] Note lakah pasian dang a om ma-in honkhia-in, pulakin, ka genkhol hi. Tua ahih ciangin note pen keima teci na hi uh hi,” TOPA in ci hi. [13] “Kei pen Pasian ka hi a, a kipat cil a kipanin zong kei pen Amah ka hi hi. Keima khutsung panin a lakhiazo kuamah om lo hi. Keima sepnate, a kua in hong khaktanzo ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
[22] “Leitung mi khempeuhte aw, kei lamah hong kihei unla hotkhiatna ngah un! Bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen Pasian ka hi a, kuamah dang om lo hi.

[15] Bang hang hiam cih leh a sang, a lian, a nungta tawntung Pa, ama min Siangtho ahipa in hih bangin ci hi: “Kei pen a sangna mun le a siangtho munah ka om a, a kiniamkhiat mite’ lungsim le a kisik mite’ lungsim a thakhauhsakkik dingin kisikna le kiniamkhiatna lungsim a neite tawh zong kei ka omkhawm hi.
[12] Pasian in ama vangliatna tawh leitung bawl a, ama pilna tawh leitung piangsakin, ama siamna tawh vantung a zal hi.
[23] “Kei pen mun khat bekah a om Pasian ka hi hiam? Mun khempeuhah a om Pasian hi lo ka hi hiam, TOPA in kong ci hi.
[3] Kei nong sap leh kong dawngkik ding a, na theih ngei nai loh a ki-imcip thu lianpite kong gen ding hi.
[9] Nang pen hehpihna tawh kidimin mawhna na maisak a, ahih hangin kote in nang ka hong langpan’ uh hi.

[11] “Keimah in leitungah kialpi kong tunsak hun hong tung ding hi. Tua kialpi pen anletui duhna kialpi hi lo ding a, TOPA’ thu zaknop mahmahna kialpi hi ding hi. Topa PASIAN ahi keimah in hih thu kong gen khin hi. [12] Mihingte, leilu pan leitaw dong, TOPA’ thu kanin vak kawikawi ding uh a, ahi zongin mu zo lo ding uh hi.

[18] TOPA aw, nang tawh a kibang Pasian dang om lo a, a omlai na mite’ mawhna nangmah in na maisak hi. Nang na heh paisuak kei a, na itna kip nong lak hi. [19] Kote nong khasiat kik ding a, ka mawhnate uh hong sawpkhiat sakin, tuipi taw-ah nong paihsak ding hi.
[2] TOPA Pasian in amah a demte koihkhong lo a, amah a langpangte gim pia-in a galte thukkik hi.

[6] Tua ciangin vantungmi in kei kiangah, “ TOPA in Zerubbabel tungah hih bangin thu gen hi: Galkap tam neihna hang hi lo, nangma vangliatna hang zong hi lo, keima tung panin na ngah vangliatna bek tawh na ma na tunzo ding hi.
[6] “Kei, TOPA ka hi a, lungsim a kheel lo mi ka hi hi. No Jakob suanlekhakte aw, a siacimit na hi nai kei uh hi.

[16] TOPA a zahtak mite khatlekhat tua bangin thu kigen uh a, amaute’ thugennate, TOPA in ngai-in za hi. TOPA in laibu khat nei a, amah zahtakin a thupi ngaihsut mite khempeuh tua sungah kiciamteh hi. [17] Vanglian TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Tua a kiciamteh mite pen keima mite hi ding uh hi. Keimah in na ka sep ni ciangin amaute pen keima neihtuam taktak mite hi ding uh hi. Pa in ama thu a mang a tapa a hehpih mah bangin kei zong amaute ka hehpih ding hi. [18] Tua ciangin midikte le migilote, le keima na hong semte le hong sem lote a kilamdanna na mukik ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[48] Tua ahih manin vantungah a om na Pa uh a cingtaak mah bangin note zong lungsim citakin na cingtaak nading uh na hanciam un.
[29] Gitta nih ciangin mat khatin kizuak lel hi lo ahi hiam? Tua hinapi-in na Pa uh’ thukim lohin tua gittate khat nangawn lei-ah mawkkiat lo hi.
[27] “Ka Pa in kei tungah na khempeuh hong pia khin hi. Pa simloh Tapa a thei kuamah om lo a, Tapa le Tapa in a theihsaknop mite simloh, pa a thei kuamah om lo hi.

[17] Kam sungah a tumsukte pen gil sung tawnin tua panin paikhiasuak hi lo ahi hiam? [18] Ahi zongin kam sung panin a pusuakte pen lungsim panin hong kipankhia hi a, hihte in mi ninsakthei hi. [19] Bang hang hiam cih leh lungsim panin mi thahnopna, mi zi tawh mawhnopna, nungak tawh mawhnopna, guktakna, zuau genna, mi gensiatna, le ngaihsut hoih lo a tuamtuam hong piangkhia hi. [20] Hih bang nate in mi ninsak a, khut sil loin annekna in mi ninsak lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[35] Amaute sung panin Thukham hilh siate khat in Jesuh a thangsiahna-in thu hong dong a, [36] “Sia aw, thukham khempeuh sung panin bang thukham lianpen ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. [37] Jesuh in, “Na Topa Pasian na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, le na pilna khempeuh tawh na it ding hi, cihna ahi hi. [38] Hih pen a masapen, a lianpen thukham ahi hi. [39] A nihna pen a masa mah tawh kibang a, nangma pumpi na it bangin na vengte na it in, cihna ahi hi. [40] Hih thukham nihte tung panin thukham dang khempeuh le kamsangte’ thuhilhna khempeuh a hong meengkhia ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[31] “Mihing Tapa a vantung mite tawh Kumpi-in hong paikhawm uh ciangin a kumpi tokhom tungah hong tu ding hi. [32] Ama mai-ah leitung minam khempeuh hong kikhawm ding hi. Gancing pa in tuu le keelte a khen mah bangin mi khempeuh khen nihin hong koih ding hi. [33] Tuu a bang mite a taklamah koihin, keel a bang mite a veilamah koih ding hi. [34] Tua ciangin Kumpipa in a taklamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Ka Pa in thupha a piak mite aw, hong pai ta un. Leitung piancil a kipanin note a dingin a kibawlkholsa gamnuam hong luah un. [35] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka gilkial laitakin an nong pia uh a, ka dangtak laitakin tui nong pia uh a, khualmi ka hih laitakin zin nong do uh a, [36] puan nei loin ka om laitakin puan nong guan uh a, ka cinat laitakin nong veh uh a, ka thongkiat laitakin nong hawh uh hi,’ a ci ding hi. [37] Tua ciangin mihoihte in, ‘Topa aw, cikin na gilkial hong mu-in an hong pia a, cikin na dangtak hong mu-in tui hong pia ka hi uh hiam? [38] Cikin khualmi na hih laitakin hong mu-in zin hong do a, cikin puan nei lo na hih laitakin hong mu-in puan hong guan ka hi uh hiam? [39] Cikin cina na hih laitakin hong mu-in hong veh a, cikin thongkia na hih laitakin hong mu-in hong hawh ka hi uh hiam?’ a ci ding uh hi. [40] Tua ciangin Kumpipa in amaute kiangah, ‘Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Hih ka sanggamte a neupen khat nangawn na limbawl uh ciangin kei tungah a hong bawl na hi uh hi,’ ci-in a dawng ding hi. [41] “Tua ciangin a veilamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Pasian in a samsiat mite aw, keima kiang panin paikhia unla, Dawimangpa le a nungzuite a dingin a kibawl meikuang tawntung sungah pai un. [42] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka gilkial laitakin an nong pia kei uh a, ka dangtak laitakin tui nong pia kei uh a, [43] khualmi ka hih laitakin zin nong do kei uh a, puan ka neih loh laitakin puan nong guan kei uh a, ka cinat laitakin nong veh kei uh a, ka thongkiat laitakin nong hawh kei uh hi,’ a ci ding hi.

[21] Jesuh, gunkuang tuangin a galkah khit ciangin, tuili gei ama kiangah mi tampi tak hong kikhawm leuleu uh hi. [22] Tua laitakin kikhopna inn a uk, Jairas a kici mi khat hong pai a, Jesuh a muh ciangin a khe phungah bokin, [23] “Ka tanu si dektak ta hi. Amah a cidam kikin a nuntak theih nadingin hong pai inla, ama tungah na khut hong ngaksak in,” ci-in a thum hi. [24] Jesuh zong, tua mipa tawh a paikhia khawm hi. Mi tampi tak in zong zui uh ahih manin Jesuh a nehcip uh hi. [25] Tuate lakah, kum sawm le nih sung tawntung siluang natna a nei numei khat a om hi. [26] Siavuan tampi in amah bawl a, a sum neih khempeuh zangkhin napi-in noptuamzaw loin gim semsemzaw hi. [27] Tua numei in Jesuh’ thu za ahih manin mihonte kawmah Jesuh’ nung a zui hi. [28] Tua nu in, “A puan mong nangawn va lawngkha leng, dam ning,” ci-in a ngaihsun hi. [29] A va lawnkhit phetin a siluang khawlpah a, ama sunga a natna a damlam a kiphawk hi. [30] Jesuh in ama sung panin a vangliatna a paikhiatlam phawkpah ahih manin mihonpite lakah khuadakin, “Kua in ka puan hong lawng na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. [31] A nungzuite in, “Mihonpite in nang hong nehcihlam na thei hi. Bang hangin kua in hong lawng na hi uh hiam, ci mawk na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi. [32] Ahi zongin amah a lawngte a theih nadingin Jesuh khuadak kawikawi lai hi. [33] Tua numei in ama tunga thupiang thei ahih manin laukawm lingkawmin hong pai-in a khephungah hong bok a, a thupiang khempeuh ahi bangbangin a hong gen hi. [34] Jesuh in zong tua nu kiangah, “Ka tanu aw, na upna in nang hong damsakzo hi. Cidamsuak inla, lungnuam takin va ciah in,” a ci hi.
[37] Tua ahih manin Pasian in a bawl theih loh khat zong om lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[35] Tua bang lelin note na gamta kei ding uh hi. Na galte uh itin amaute tungah thupha bawl unla, lohkik ding lamen loin leitawi pia un. Tua hileh na thaman uh lian ding a, a Lianpen Pasian’ tate na hi ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh lungdamna mel a theithei lo mite le a huaiham mite tungah amah migi hi. [36] Tua ahih manin na Pa un hehpihna a neih bangin note in zong hehpihna lungsim nei ta un.

[16] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah thugentehna khat gen a, “Mi hau pa khat’ lo-ah an tampi a piang hi. [17] Tua ciangin amah in a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka an khempeuh ka koih nading mun kicing lo ahih manin bangcih ding ka hi hiam? [18] Tua ahih manin hih bangin ka gamta ding hi: Ka ansalte phelin a lianzaw ansalte ka lam ding a, tuate sungah ka ante le ka neih khempeuh ka seng ding hi. [19] Tua ciangin keimah in: Mi hampha mahmah ka hi hi. Kum tampi sung ka khom ding annek tuidawn le na hoih tampi ka nei hi. An ne, zu ne-in, a nuam theithei-in ka om hithiat ding hi,’ ci hi. [20] Ahi zongin Pasian in ama kiangah, ‘Mihai pa aw, tuzan mahmahin na si ding hi. Hih na neihsa teng kua’n zang nawn ding ahi hiam?’ ci hi,” a ci hi. [21] Tua ciangin Jesuh in a thugen a khupna-in, “Tua mah bangin amau a’ ding bekin a kholcipte pen Pasian’ muhna panin mihau hi lo uh hi,” a ci hi.

[15] Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Mite in note a man penin hong ngaihsut theih nadingin na om uh a, ahi zongin Pasian in na lungsimtawng uh a hong thei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mihingte in a manpha mahmahin a ngaihsutte pen Pasian in bangmahin sim lo hi.

[19] “Khatvei, mihau mahmah khat om a, nisimin puan manpha nono silhin, anlim nono ne-in a om hi. [20] Tua ciangin a pumtangin meima a vei, Lazaras a kici mizawng khat zong, mihau pa’ kongbiangah hong kikoih a, [21] mihau pa’ sabuai tung panin a kia annengte nenuamin a ngak hi. Tua bangin a om laitakin uite hong pai-in a meima hong liahliah sak uh hi. [22] Tua ciangin mizawng pa hong si a, vantung a Abraham kiangah a om dingin vantung mite in a paipih uh hi. Mihau pa zong hong si leuleu-in a kivui hi. [23] Ahi zongin hell khuk sungah gimna thuakin a om hi. A khuadak leh, gamlapi mun khatah Abraham le Lazaras a omkhawm a galmuh hi. [24] Tua ahih manin nakpitakin kiko a, ‘Pa Abraham aw, kei hong hehpih in. Meiphual sungah omin nakpitakin gimna thuak ka hih manin Lazaras in a khutme dawn tui diahin ka leii hong votsak nadingin hong sawl in,’ a ci hi. [25] Ahi zongin Abraham in, ‘Ka ta aw, leitungah na nuntak laitakun nang nopsakna namkim na ngah laitakin Lazaras in haksatna namkim a thuak hi. Ahi zongin tu-in amah in hih lai-ah nopsakna a ngah laitakin nangmah in haksatna a thuak na hi hi. [26] Tua tham loin, i kikalah kuam thukpi khat om a, hih lai panin nang kiangah hong pai nuamte kuamah pai zo lo a, nangma omna panin hih lai-ah zong kuamah hong pai zo lo hi,’ ci-in a dawng hi. [27] Tua ciangin mihau pa in, ‘Pa aw, tua bang ahihleh zong, ka inn uhah Lazaras nong sawlsak nadingin ka hong thum hi. [28] Inn-ah nau pasal nga ka nei lai a, ke’n gim ka thuakna hih lai munah hong tunkhak loh teitei nadingun kei’ gamtat bangin a gamtat loh nadingun hong hilhsak hen,’ a ci hi. [29] Ahi zongin Abraham in, ‘Na sanggamte a hilh dingin Moses le kamsangte om uh ahih manin tuate’ thugen na ngai ta uh hen,’ a ci hi. [30] Tua ciangin mihau pa in, ‘Pa Abraham aw, tua nong gen zong a kicing khin hi mah hi. Ahi zongin a sisa mi khat hingkikin amaute kiangah va paikik leh a mawhna panun ka naute kisik hamtang ding uh hi,’ a ci hi. [31] Ahi zongin Abraham in, ‘Amaute in Moses le kamsangte’ thu a mannop kei uhleh, mi khat hong hingkikin amaute kiangah a va gen hangin umsakzo tuan lo ding hi,’ ci-in a dawng hi,” a ci hi.
[19] Jesuh in, “Bang hangin kei midik hong ci na hi hiam? Pasian simloh kuamah a diktatzo om lo hi.

[1] Nipi ni zingsang tungin numeite in a bawlsa uh paknamtui tawi-in hanah va pai uh hi. [2] Han phual a tun uh ciangin hankhuk hukna suang a kilikkhia mu uh ahih manin [3] a sungah tumpah uh a, ahi zongin Topa Jesuh’ luang na om lo hi. [4] Amaute in lamdangsa-in a om laitakun amaute gei-ah puanpak a silh mi nih hong dingvat uh hi. [5] Numeite lau mahmah uh ahih manin lei lam nga-in kuncip uh hi. Tua mi nihte in, “Bang hangin misite lakah mihing zong na hi uh hiam? [6] Hih lai-ah om nawn lo hi; kithosak zo hi. Galilee gamah a om lai-in note kiangah thu hong genin, [7] ‘Mawhnei mite’ khut sungah Mihing Tapa kipia ding a, singlamteh tungah kithatin, a ni thum ni-in hingkik ding hi,’ a cih thute phawk un,” a ci uh hi. [8] Tua ciangin amaute in Jesuh’ thugente phawkkik uh a, [9] han panin ciahkikin, nungzui sawm le khatte le midangte kiangah hih thute a gen uh hi. [10] Sawltakte kiangah hih thu a gen numeite pen Magdala khuami Mary, Joanna, James’ nu Mary, le numei dangte ahi uh hi. [11] Ahi zongin hih numeite’ thugen pen thu phuahtawm bangin ngaihsun uh a, um lo uh hi. [12] Ahi zongin Peter dingin hanah va tai a, han sung a etsuk ciangin a kitunna puan bek na om hi. Tua ciangin amah in zong tua thupiang lamdangsa-in inn-ah a ciahkik hi. [13] Tua ni mahin, Jesuh’ thu a zui mi nih, Jerusalem khua panin tai sagih bang a gamla Emmaus kici khua-ah a pai uh hi.
[1] A kipat cil-in Thu na om a, tua Thu, Pasian tawh na omkhawm a, tua Thu, Pasian ahi hi.

[14] Tua Thu mihing hong suakin kote lakah hong om a, itna nei-in citak mahmah ahih manin Pasian’ pianzia a neihna ka mu cian uh hi. Hih pianzia pen Pasian’ Tapa khat bek hihna tawh a neih pianzia ahi hi.

[16] Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawn loin a hin tawntung theih nadingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi. [17] Pasian in leitungah a Tapa hong sawlna pen mawhsakna thukhen dingin a hong paisak hi loin, leitung mite a honkhia dingin a hong paisak hizaw hi.
[24] Pasian pen Kha ahi hi; amah a biate in tua Kha’ lamlahna le thuman taktak tawh a bia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[24] “A mantakin kong genin-ah: Ka thugennate za-in kei hong sawl pa a um khempeuh a nungta paisuak ding hita hi. Mawhsak thukhenna ngah nawn loin, sihna panin a hingkik ta ahi hi.
[6] Jesuh in ama kiangah, “Keimah in Lampi ka hi a, Thuman, le Nuntakna zong ka hi hi. Kei hong suang loin Pa kiangah kuamah tung thei lo ding hi.

[26] Ahi zongin Pa in keima tangin a hong sawl ding Huhpa Kha Siangtho a hong tun ciangin note tungah thu khempeuh hong hilh ding a, note tungah ka hong gensa thu khempeuh zong hong phawksakkik ding hi.
[3] Nang bek a man Pasian na hihna thu le nangmah in na hong sawl Jesuh Khrih hong theihna pen amaute a dingin nuntak tawntung ngah nading lampi ahi hi.
[24] Pa aw, leitung a pianma pekin kei na hong itna hangin na hong piak pianzia a mu dingin keimah na hong piak mite zong ka omna-ah a hong pai theih nading ka deihsak hi.

[1] Tua hun sungteng Saul in Topa’ thu a um mite thah dingin a hanciamna zomlai hi. Siampi lianpen pa kiangah pai a, [2] Topa’ thu a zui mi numei pasal a muh peuhpeuh manin Jerusalem khua-ah a ciahpih theih nadingin Damaskas khua-a Jew mi kikhopna inn ukte kiangah a lah dingin lai a ngen hi. [3] Damaskas khua a zuan dingin pai a, a tun dektak ciangin thakhat thu-in van panin ama kimkotah a hong taangzaih khat a om hi. [4] Saul, leilakah puksuk a, tua laitakin awging khat in ama kiangah, “Saul, Saul aw, bang hangin kei hong bawlsia na hi hiam?” a ci hi. [5] Saul in, “Topa aw, kua na hi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Nangmah in na hong bawlsiat Jesuh ka hi hi. [6] Ahi zongin tho-in khuapi sungah lut in; tua lai panin na gamtatna dingteng hong kigen ding hi,” a ci hi. [7] Saul tawh a tonkhawm mite in a awging a zak uh hangin kuamah mu lo uh ahih manin lamdangsa lua-in pau thei lo liangin a om uh hi. [8] Saul zong leilak panin thoto a, a mit a hah hangin khua mu thei lo hi. Tua ahih manin a kikholhpihte in a khutin lenin Damaskas khua-ah a paipih uh hi. [9] Ni thum sung khua mu thei loin, anletui zong a ne kei hi.

[34] Tua ciangin Peter a kam ka-in thu hilh ding kipan a, “Pasian in kuamah angvan’ tuam nei loin, [35] kua mi kua mi hitaleh amah zahtakin a manin a gamta mi khempeuh a sanna thu teltakin ka thei hi.

[20] Pasian in leitung a piansak cil a kipanin a kimu thei lo ama pianzia ahi tawntung vanglianpa le Pasian ahihna thute ama bawlsa nate tung panin teltakin hong kilang hi. Tua ahih manin, “Thei kei ing,” ci-in paulap a zontheih nading uh om lo hi.
[4] Pasian migi-in thu a diah hithiatna pen na kisikkik theih nading uh a deihna ahih lamtak phawkkha loin, a migitna, a lungduaina, a hong thuaknate neu ngaihsutkha na hi uh hiam?

[12] Tua ahih ciangin Thukham mahmah hitaleh thupiaknate hitaleh hoihin man a, siangtho hi. [13] Tua ahihleh a hoih na khat in kei’ sih nading hong piangsak ahi hiam? Hi lo hi. Tua sihna pen mawhna’ nasepna hi a, mawhna pianzia bangci bang taktak hiam, cih a kitheih nadingin a hoih na khat zangin kei tungah sihna a hong piangsak ahi hi. Tua ahih manin thukham a om manin mawhna a siahuai mahmah ahihna hong kilangzaw kan lai hi. [14] Thukham pen i kha thu tawh kisai hi, ci-in i thei hi. Ahi zongin kei pen leitung pumpi tawh a nungta mi ka hi a, mawhna thu mangin a sal a suak ka hi hi.

[5] Tua mah bangin tuhunin zong Pasian in ama hehpihna tawh a teelsa mi tawmkhat omlai hi. [6] A teelna ah mite’ nasepna bulphuhin a teel hi loin ama dikna hangin a teel hizaw hi. Pasian in mihingte’ nasepna bulphuhin a teel hileh Pasian’ dikna pen dikna kici thei lo ding hi. [7] A thu omzia taktak hih bang ahi hi. Israel mi a tamzaw in a hanciamciam uh ngah lo uh hi. Pasian’ teel mi tawmkhat bek in ngah uh a, adangte in Pasian’ sapna thudon lo uh hi.

[33] Tua ahih manin Pasian’ hong hehpihna nakliat mahmah a, a pilna le a thu theihnate nakthuk mahmah hi. Ama thukhennate kua’ gentheih ding hi lo a, a nasepna ziate kua’ telzawh ding hi lo hi. [34] Tua ahih manin Lai Siangtho in, “Kua in Topa’ lungsim thei ding a, kua in ngaihsutna va pia thei ding ahi hiam? [35] Amah in hong thukkik theih nadingin kuamah in ama tungah thupha va bawl ngei lo hi,” na ci hi. [36] Bang hang hiam cih leh na khempeuh ama piansak hi a, na khempeuh ama hang le ama minthan nading bekin a om ahi hi. Mi khempeuh in Pasian phat tawntung ta hen! Amen.
[11] Lai Siangtho sungah, “Kei pen a nungta ka hih mah bangin ka mai-ah mi khempeuh hong kun ding a, Pasian ka hihna thu mi khempeuh in pulak taktak ding uh hi, Topa in ci hi,” ci-in a kigelh hi.
[25] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ haina pen mite’ pilna sangin sangzaw lai a, Pasian’ thaneemna pen mite’ hatna sangin hatzaw lai hi.
[20] Ahi zongin Pasian in Abraham tungah thuciamna a bawl laitakin kuamah sawlsawn nei loin amah bek in a piak ahi hi.
[7] Pasian a kikhemzo dingin ngaihsunkha kei un. Mi khempeuh in ama vawh nam khaici mah ngahkik ding hi.

[13] Na tuah uh ze-etnate khempeuh pen mite’ tuah ngeingeite mah ahi hi. Pasian in citakin a thuciamna lenkip ahih manin note’ thuak zawh loh ding ze-etna hong tuaksak lo ding hi. Ze-etna na tuah hun uh ciangin zong na thuakzawh nading uh thahatna hong guan ding ahih manin na suahtak zawh nading uh lampi hong honsak ding hi.

[28] Khrih’ khutnuai-ah na khempeuh a kikoih ciangin ama khutnuai-ah na khempeuh a koihsak Pasian’ khutnuai-ah Tapa mahmah zong om ding a, Pasian pen na khempeuh le a kuamah peuh tungah a lianpen hi ding hi.

[4] Tua bang hinapi-in Pasian’ hong hehpihna le eite hong itna lian mahmah ahih manin, [5] i mawhna hangin kha thu tawh kisai-in misi ihih laitakin Khrih tawh eite hong nungtasak hi. Pasian’ hehpihna hangin hotkhiatna a ngah thei ihi hi.

[8] Note’ upna hangin Pasian’ hong hehpihna tawh hotkhiatna a ngah na hi uh hi. Note’ thalawhna hangin a ngah hi loin Pasian’ hong piakkhong ahi hi. [9] Note’ hanciamna tawh a ngah hi lo na hih manun na kisialh nading uh a thu om lo hi.
[19] Khrih hong itna a kicing takin theihkhit zawh loh ding ahi ta zongin note in thei-in, Pasian thu a cingin na theih nadingun thu ka hong ngetsak hi.
[24] A thutang a siangtho ahihna thu, nuntakna mahmah panin a kilangsak, Pasian’ pianzia tawh kibangin a kibawl na ngeina thak uh bangin na nungta un.
[7] Mihingte in a theihtel zawh loh Pasian’ hong piak lungsim nopna in, Khrih Jesuh tawh na kipawlna uh hangin note hong lungnuamsak ding hi.

[5] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian khat bek om a, Pasian le mite a hong kilemsakkik thei Khrih Jesuh khat bek om hi. [6] Mi khempeuh a tankhia dingin tua Jesuh hong kipiatawm a, a hun lian laitakin a hong kipiakna pen Pasian in mi khempeuh a hotkhiat nopna thu a kilatna ahi hi.
[15] Kumpite’ Kumpi, topate’ Topa, thupha ngahin amah bek a lianpen ahi Pasian in hun a sak khatpeuh ciangin Jesuh hong kilangsakkik ding hi.
[2] Ahi zongin tuhun nunung ciangin leitung vantung na khempeuh a bawlin a zat, a tawpna-ah na khempeuh a luah dingin a seh a Tapa zangin eite tungah thu hong gen hi.

[1] Tu-in i gennop thu pen hih bang ahi hi: Vantungah Pasian’ tokhom taklamah a tu tua bang Siampi Lianpen khat a nei ihi hi. [2] Amah in, mite’ bawl ahi lo, Topa mahmah in a bawl a taktak puanbuk ahi a Siangtho Pen mun sungah siampi lianpen nasep a sem ahi hi.
[29] Bang hang hiam cih leh eite’ Pasian pen a kangtum thei meikuang tawh a kibang ahi hi.
[17] A hoih thu le na khempeuh, Pasian kiang panin hong pai hi a, vantung khuavak a Piangsak pa ahih manin amah kikheel ngei lo a, amah a kihei manin khua zong mial tuan lo hi.
[20] Mihingte’ hehna in Pasian’ sep ding thuhoihte khaktan hi.
[27] Pa Pasian in a siangtho biakna citakin a ngaihsut thu in: Tagahte le meigong numeite a haksatna uhah hoihtakin kemin, leitung siatnate tawh kisawhkha loin siangtho takin omna ahi hi.

[5] Lai Siangtho sungah, “Eite sungah a hong guat kha pen Pasian in ngai mahmah hi,” ci-in a kigelhna a mawkna-in a kigelh sa na hi uh hiam? [6] Lai Siangtho in, “Pasian in a kihisakte nial a, a kiniamkhiatte a hehpih hi,” a cih mah bangin Pasian’ hong hehpihna lianzaw hi.
[8] Pasian kiang nai un. Amah in zong hong nai ding hi. Mawhneite in na khut uh silsiang unla, a kineihkhemte in na lungsim uh siangsak un.
[15] Note a hong sampa a siangtho ahih mah bangin note zong na gamtatna khempeuh uhah na siangtho un.
[6] Pasian in ama hoihsak hun ciangin note hong laptoh theih nadingin a thahat Pasian’ khutnuai-ah kiniamkhiatin na om un.

[9] Mi pawlkhatte’ ngaihsut bangin Topa in a kamciamna a hong tungsak hak hi zenzen lo hi. Note khat beek in siatna na thuakkhak ding uh deih loin na vekpi-un na kisik ding uh deih ahih manin hong pai nai lohna pen note hong khualna hizaw hi.
[5] Ama kiang panin za-in note tungah ka hong gen uh thu in: Pasian, khuavak hi a, khuamial tawh kizopna themkhat zong nei het lo hi.
[14] Pa Pasian in leitung mite a honkhia dingin a Tapa a hong paisakna thu kote in thei-in midang kiangah genbelin ka nei uh hi.

[8] Pasian pen ki-itna ahih manin itna a nei lo mite in Pasian thei lo uh hi. [9] Pasian in eite hong itna hong bangci lah hiam cih leh: Ama hangin eite in nuntakna i ngahtheih nadingin a Tapa neihsun Pasian in leitungah a hong paisak hi. [10] Hih ka gen itna pen eite in Pasian i itna thu hi lo a, Pasian in eite hong itin, i mawhna a maitheih nadingin a Tapa a hong paisakna thu ahi hi. [11] Ka it lawmte aw, Pasian in tua zahta-in eite hong it ahihleh eite zong khatlekhat i ki-it ding a kilawm ahi hi.

[13] Tua meivakte lakah, puantualpi khat silhin a awm-ah kham kibawl awmgak a gak, mi tawh a kibang khat ka mu hi. [14] A samte tuumul bangin kangin, khuavak bangin pak a, a mittangte meikuang a bang hi. [15] A khete, pumbukah a kihalsan sumngo bang a, a awging ahihleh tuipi ging a bang hi. [16] A taklam khutah aksi sagih tawi-in, a kam sung panin langnih a hiam namsau khat hong pusuak a, a maitang sun nitaang a bang hi. [17] Amah ka muh ciangin misi bangin ama khe phungah ka puk hi. Ahi zongin amah in ka tungah a taklam khut hong nga a, “Lau kei in; kei pen a kipatna le a tawpna ka hi a, [18] a nungta mipa zong ka hi hi. Kei ka si ngei hi. Ahi zongin tu-in hong en in, a nungta tawntung ka hi hi. Sihna le misite omna gam keima khutnuai ahi uh hi.

[8] Tua ganhing lite in kha guk ciat nei-in, tua a khate’ sunglam le a pualamah mittang a dimtakin om a, a sun a zan tawlnga loin la sa uh a, “A beisa, tuhun, le a tawntungin a om Vanglian Topa Pasian, siangtho hi, siangtho hi, siangtho hi,” a ci uh hi.

[13] Tua ciangin vantung, leitung, leinuai, tuipi sung le mun khempeuhah a om nuntakna a nei khempeuh inla a sakna uh ka za a, amaute in, “Tokhom tungah a tupa le Tuuno in phatna, pahtawina, minthanna le vangliatna, ngah tawntung ta hen,” a ci uh hi.
[16] “Keimah Jesuh in pawlpite a dingin hih thute nang kiangah a hong gen dingin ka vantungmi ka hong sawl hi. Kei pen David’ zung le a suan ahi, zingsol ka hi hi,” a hong ci hi.

[18] Keimah Johan in hih laibu sungah a kigelh thu a za mi khempeuh ka hong hilhkholh nopna panin: A thu a behlap na om uhleh Pasian in zong hih laibu sungah a kigelh gimnate note tungah hong behlap ding a, [19] hih laibu sungah a kigelh thute a hemkhia na om uhleh Pasian in zong hih laibu sungah a kigelh nuntakna singgah le Khuapi Siangtho sungah na ngah ding uh hamphatnate note kiang panin hong hepkhiatsak ding hi.
[9] Kilem nading deihin a hanciam mite in Pasian’ tate cihna ngah ding uh ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.

[43] “Note in, ‘Na vengte uh na it unla, na galte uh na mudah un,’ ci-in a kigenna thu na zaksa uh ahi hi. [44] Ahi zongin ke’n note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong bawlsiate a dingin thu na ngetsak un. [45] Tua hileh vantungah a om na Pa uh tate na hi thei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in mihoihte le misiate tungah a kibangin ni taangsak khawm a, a gamtat phate le a gamtat siate tungah zong a kibang mahin guah zusak khawm hi.
[36] Amaute pen vantungmi tawh kibang uh a, sithei nawn lo uh hi. Sihna panin a thokik khinte ahih manin amaute pen Pasian’ tate ahi uh hi.

[12] Tua bang hitaseleh ama thu ngai-in amah a um mite khempeuh tungah Pasian’ tate suahtheih nading thu a pia hi. [13] Tua bangin Pasian’ tate suahna pen leitung ngeina nute pate sung panin suahna tawh hi loin Pasian sung panin suahna ahi hi. [14] Tua Thu mihing hong suakin kote lakah hong om a, itna nei-in citak mahmah ahih manin Pasian’ pianzia a neihna ka mu cian uh hi. Hih pianzia pen Pasian’ Tapa khat bek hihna tawh a neih pianzia ahi hi.

[28] Mi khat in, ‘Pasian hangin eite piangin, hingin i gamtang hi,’ ci-in gen a, note sung panin laphuah siampa khat in zong, ‘Eite zong ama tate ihi hi,’ na na ci hi. [29] Eite pen Pasian’ tate ihih manin, mihing khutsiamte in bawlin a zep ngunte, khamte, suang milimte tawh a kibang dingin Pasian i ngaihsun kei ding hi.
[4] I Pa’ vangliatna tawh sihna panin Khrih a kithawhkiksak mah bangin eite zong nuntakna thak i nuntak theih nadingin tui i kiphum ciangin amah tawh kiphum khawmin a sikhawm ihi hi.

[14] Pasian’ Kha Siangtho in a makaih mite, Pasian’ tate ahi uh hi. [15] Note tungah Pasian in a hong piak a Kha Siangtho in note na lau nadingun sila-in a hong bawl hi lo a, Kha Siangtho in Pasian’ tate a hong suaksak ahi zaw hi. Tua Kha Siangtho mah in Pasian pen, “Pa aw, Pa aw,” hong ci theisak hi. [16] Eite, Pasian’ tate ihihna thu eima lungsim bek in a gen hi loin Pasian’ Kha Siangtho in zong hong genpih hi.

[18] Tuhuna i thuaknate pen Pasian in a hong piak ding minthanna tawh ka ngaihsut khawm ciangin gentham ka sa het kei hi. [19] Pasian’ bawlsa khempeuh in Pasian’ tate a hong kilahkhiat hun ding lawp mahmahin a ngak uh hi.

[4] Ahi zongin a hun a cin ciangin eite khempeuh Pasian’ tate i suahtheih nadingin Thukham nuai-ah a om mite a hong tankhia dingin Pasian in a Tapa hong paisak a, tua Tapa pen leitung ngeina bangin numei sung panin hong suakin, Jew Thukham sungah hong nungta hi.
[27] Dawimangpa in hong suksiat theih nading hun omsak kei un.
[1] Note pen Pasian in a hong it a tate na hih manun amah tawh na kibat nadingun hanciam un.

[3] Note pen Pasian’ mi na hih manun note lakah nulepa khialhna, a kilawm lo-a gamtatna, huaihamna cihte genin zong na nei vet kei un. [4] A kilawm lo-a kampauna, le ciamnuih hoih lo cihte zong na zang kei unla, Pasian tungah lungdamkohna kam na pauzaw un.

[8] Note pen khuamial sungah a omngei hinapi-in, Topa’ mi na suahkhit uh ciangin khuavak sungah a om hita na hih uh manin khuavak sungah a om mite bangin na gamta un. [9] Bang hang hiam cih leh khuavak sunga omna in a hoih, a man, a thutakte hong piangsak hi.
[11] Mawhna panin mite a siangthosakpa le sianthosakna a ngah mite in, Pa, a kibang a neikhawm uh hi. Tua hi a, Jesuh in mite, “Sanggam,” a cih ding zum ngaihsut lo ahih manin,

[5] Pasian in note, tate, hong ci-in hong hanthotna thu mangngilh khinta na hi uh hiam? Pasian in note kiangah, “Ka ta aw, Topa’ hong thuhilhna zangkhai ngaihsut kei inla, gim a hong piak ciangin lungkia kei in. [6] Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in a it mite thuhilh a, ta taktakin a ngaihsut mite a taii hi,” hong ci hi.
[7] Tua ahih manin Pasian’ thu na mang un. Dawimangpa na nial un. Nial le-uhcin no kiang panin taikhia ding hi.

[9] Ahi zongin note pen Pasian in a hong teelkhiat minam, Kumpi siampi pawl, a siangtho minam, Pasian’ mite na hi uh a, khuamial sung panin a lamdang mahmah ama khuavak sungah a hong samkhia pa’ nasepna a lamdangte a genkhia dingin Pasian in a hong teel mite na hi uh hi. [10] Nidangin Pasian’ mi na hihloh uh hangin tu-in ama mi na hi uh a, nidangin Pasian’ hehpihna na theih loh uh hangin tu-in ama hehpihna na ngah uh hi.

[5] Ahi zongin ama thu a zui mite pen Pasian a itna a kicingtaak taktak mi ahi hi. Hih bangin i gamtat leh Pasian tawh a kipawl taktak ihihna i thei hi. [6] Pasian tawh ka kipawl hi, a ci mi khempeuh, Jesuh Khrih a gamtat bangin a gamtat ding ahi hi.
[29] Khrih, thuman hi, ci-in na theih uh mah bangin a manin a gamta mi khempeuh zong Pasian’ tate hi, ci-in na theih ding uh ahi hi.

[2] Ka lawm itte aw, eite’ pianzia ding taktak a telin hong kilat nai loh hangin tu-in Pasian’ tate ihi hi. Ahi zongin Khrih hong kilat ciangin ama pianzia ahi bang teekteekin mu ding ihih manin amah i bat nading thu teltakin i thei hi.

[9] Pasian’ tate in mawhna bawlbawl lo uh hi. Pasian’ tate hi a, Pasian’ lungsim paii uh ahih manin mawhna zong bawl nuam lo uh hi. [10] Hih pen Pasian tate le Dawimangpa’ tate a kilamdanna ahi hi. A manin gamta loin, a Khristian mipihte a it lo mi peuhmah, Pasian’ tate hi lo uh hi.

[18] Pasian’ tate in mawhna bawlbawl lo uh hi. Pasian’ Tapa in amaute kem a, Dawimangpa in amaute susia zo lo hi. [19] Leitung midang khempeuh Dawimangpa’ khut sungah a om ahi zongin eite pen Pasian’ mi ihihna thu i thei hi.
[7] A gualzo mi khempeuh in kei tung panin a ngah ding thu in: Kei pen amaute’ Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute keima ta ahi ding uh hi.

[16] Tua ciangin numei kiangah, “Naupaiina-ah na gimna nakpitakin ka khangsak ding a, na a sapipi-in nau na nei ding hi. Ahi zongin na pasal mah na deih ding a, amah in nang tungah hong uk ding hi,” a ci hi. [17] Tua ciangin mipa kiangah, “Nang in na zi’ thu mangin, ‘Nang in na ne kei ding hi,’ ci-in nang kong thupiak singgah ne na hih ciangin, nangma hangin leitang in samsiatna ngah hi. Na nuntak tawntung gimpi-in na semin na annek ding na zong ding hi. [18] Ling le kiakte, nang a dingin hong pokhiasak ding a, nang in gamlak kungte na ne ding hi. [19] Lei-ah na ciahkik matengin khua-ul kai-in na na sep ciang bekin an na ne ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh lei sung panin nang hong kipiangsak a, nang, leivui na hih manin, leivui mah na suakkik ding hi,” a ci hi.

[10] TOPA in, “Bang hangin hici gamtat na hi hiam? Na sanggampa’ sisan, leilak panin kei tungah hong kiko hi. [11] Na sanggampa’ sisan a hup dingin a kam a ka leitang tungah tu-in nang hong kisamsiat hi. [12] Lo na khawh ciangin nang a dingin an hong piangsak nawn lo ding hi. Nang pen a galtai, leitung a a vakvai na hi ding hi,” a ci hi.

[1] Leitungah mite tam dingin hong kipanin, amau’ sung panin tanute hong suah ciangin, [2] vana om mite in leitung mite’ tanute hoihsa uh ahih manin a deih bangun amaute zi-in a la uh hi. [3] Tua ciangin TOPA in, “Mihingte sungah ka Kha om paisuak nawn lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mihingte a mawh hi khinta a, kum za le kum sawmnih sung kisik nading hun kipia lai bek ding hi,” a ci hi. [4] Vana om mite in leitung mihing tanute luppihin, amaute in ta a neih hun laitak hitaleh tua khit hitaleh, amau’ suanlekhak Nefilim a kici mite leitungah om hi. Hih mite pen tang lai-a mi thahat, mi minthangte ahi uh hi. [5] Leitungah mihing a gitlohna a liatna le mihing lungsim ngaihsutna peuhmah a sia ahih ngitngetna thu TOPA in mu hi. [6] Leitungah mihing a bawl pen TOPA khial kisa a, tua thu in ama lungsim dahsak hi. [7] Tua ahih ciangin TOPA in, “Ka piansaksa mihing, ganhing, a bokvak ganhingte le huih lak vasate, leitung panin ka phiatkhia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih le amaute ka bawl ka khial hi,” a ci hi.

[20] Tua ciangin Noah in TOPA a’ ding biakna tau khat lam a, a siangtho ganhing khempeuh le a siangtho vasa khempeuh lak pan khat ciat la-in, biakna tau tungah meihal biakna a pia hi. [21] TOPA in a namtui gimnam a zak ciangin, a lungsim sungah, “Mihing’ gamtatna hangin leitang ka samsia kik ngei nawn kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mihing’ lungsim ngaihsutna pen a tangval lai panin a gi lo hi mawk hi. Tu-a ka hih bangin nuntakna a nei khempeuh zong ka susia ngei nawn kei ding hi. [22] Leitung a omlai tengin, lo pawi hun le anlak hun, a vot le a sa, khuakhal le phalbi, sun le zan bei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
