[5] Tuate’ mai-ah na kun kei ding uh a, tuate na bia kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah note’ TOPA Pasian, a aam Pasian ka hi a, kei hong mudahte’ tungah pate’ mawhna tate’ tungah khang thum khang lina dongin thuk-in,

[1] TOPA in Moses kiangah, [2] “Israel mite kiangah hih bangin gen in: Israel mite khat peuhpeuh hitaleh Israel sunga a peem khualmite hitaleh, a tate khat peuhpeuh Molek pasian tungah a pia mipa kithat ding a, mihonte in suang tawh denglum ding uh hi.

[14] “Ahih hangin note in ka thu ngai loin, hih thupiaknate khempeuh na hih kei uh a, [15] ka thukhamte nialin, ka biakna ngeina kipte kih a, ka thupiaknate khempeuh sem loin, ka thuciamna na palsat uhleh, [16] keimah in note tungah hih bangin kong hih ding hi: Note’ tungah hong tung dingin keimah in thakhatthu a dipkuatna, zawngkhalna, le mite siasakin nuntakna a kiamsak ding cisa natna kong tungsak ding hi. Note’ lopawi zong a mawkna hi ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh na galte un tuate ne ding hi.

[9] Amaute’ mai-ah kun loin, amau’ na na sem kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh keimah TOPA note’ Pasian, a aam Pasian ka hi a, kei hong mudahte’ tungah a pate’ mawhna a tate’ tungah khang thum khang lina dongin thuk-in,

[3] Tua ahih ciangin, a kangtum thei mei bangin note’ mai-ah a pai pa pen TOPA na Pasian uh ahihna thu tuni-in thei un. Amah in note’ mai-ah amaute susia-in, amaute zogawp ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin TOPA in note tungah hong ciamsa bangin amaute hawlkhia-in manlangin na siamangsak ding uh hi.
[2] a mawh pa satna thuak dinga kilawm ahihleh, thukhen pa in amah lumsuksakin a khialhna zahin ama muhin satsak ding hi.

[15] “Ahih hangin note in TOPA na Pasian uh thu mang loin, tuni-a kong gen ama thupiaknate le ama thukhamte khempeuh limtakin na zuih kei uhleh, hih samsiatna khempeuh note tungah hong tung ding a, note hong ban ding hi.

[17] Tua hun ciangin amaute tungah ka sin so-in, amaute nusia-in ka mai ka seel ding a, amaute beimang ding uh hi. Tua ni ciangin amaute in, ‘Eite’ lakah i Pasian a om loh manin hih siatnate i tungah hong tung hi lo ahi hiam?’ a cih theih nadingun amaute tungah siatna le gimna tampi tung ding hi. [18] Amaute, pasian dangte lamah kihei uh ahih manin amau’ gamtatnasa siatnate khempeuh hangin tua hun ciangin ka mai ka seel taktak ding hi.

[11] Israel mite khial a, amaute in ka thupiak thuciamna palsat khin uh hi. Amaute in a ki-ap nate pawlkhat la uh a, amaute in gu-in zuauthu gen uh a, amau’ van lakah tua nate koih uh hi. [12] Tua thu hangin Israel mite in a galte uh nang zo lo uh hi. Amaute pen suksiat ding mi na suak khin uh ahih manin a galte uh mai-ah nungkik uh hi. Note’ lak panin a ki-ap nate na suksiat kei uhleh note tawh kong omkhawm nawn kei ding hi.
[13] Tua ahih ciangin Saul a thuman lohna hangin a si hi. Amah in TOPA’ thupiakna a zuih lohna, le vankah khat thu dongin a lamlah ding a zonna,
[33] Tua ciangin gamlak singte in lungdamna tawh TOPA’ mai-ah la sa ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh leitung thu khen dingin amah hong pai hi.
[23] vantung panin za-in gamta inla, na nasemte thu khenin, a mawh mi a gamtatna ama lu tung mahah tusakin thuk inla, a thuman mi a thumanna tawh kizui-in thaman piakna tawh langsak in.
[8] Leitung mite’ thu a mantakin khen a, a kilawm bangin mite’ thu a khen hi.
[8] Kote’ TOPA Pasian aw, nang in amaute na dawng hi. Amau’ mawhna hangin gim na piak tei hangin amau’ mawhnate a maisak nuam Pasian na hihna amaute’ tungah na kilangsak hi.

[8] TOPA dikin hehpihna tawh kidim a, heh hakin, a lian mahmah itna kip tawh a kidim hi. [9] Amah in a tawntungin hong taii ngitnget lo ding a, amah heh paisuak lo ding hi. [10] Amah in eite’ khialhna tawh a kituakin eite tungah hong bawl lo a, eite’ mawhna tawh a kituakin hong thukkik lo hi. [11] Vantung pen leitung panin a san mah bangin amah a zahtakte’ tungah ama itna kip lianin sang mahmah hi.

[19] Thumanin gamtat ding a hanciamte nungta ding a, a sia-in a gamta teiteite si ding uh hi. [20] TOPA in lungsim gilote mudah a, a manin a gamtate tungah a lungkim hi. [21] Migilote in gim a thuak hamtang nading, midikte gimna tawh a kipelhna ding teltakin thei in.
[31] Mihoihte hih leitungah thaman kipia ahihleh migilo le mawhneite gimna kipiazaw kan ding hi.
[11] Leitung mite a tatsiatna hangun gim ka pia ding a, migilote a mawhna hangun gim ka thuaksak ding hi. Mi kihisakte’ kiphatsakna beisiang sakin, a kisatheite’ kiliatsakna ka niamkhiat ding hi.

[9] Ka lungsim khempeuh tawh zanin nang kong deih a, zingsang khuavak ciangin lungsim tak tawh nang kong zong hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung le a mite tungah thu na khen ciangin leitung a a teng mite in thuman i cih bang hiam, cih a phawk ding uh hi.

[21] Bang hang hiam cih leh en un, amau’ mawhna hangin leitungah a teng mite gim a pia dingin ama omna panin TOPA hong paikhia a, leitung in ama tunga a kithat mite lakkhia ding a, a kithat ama mite sincip nawn lo ding hi.
[18] Amau’ gamtatna bangin amah in thukkik ding a, amah a langpangte gim pia ding hi. Ama galte a thukkik ding hi. A gamla pekah a om tuipi gei-a gamte zong a thukkik ding hi.

[14] Na gamtatna tawh kizui-in gimna ka hong pia ding hi, TOPA in kong ci hi. Tulaka sing hoihte tawh a kilam na kumpi innte uh mei tawh kihal ding a, a kimkot khempeuh ka kangtumsak ding hi,” a ci hi.

[31] A awging, leimong dongah kithawn ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh gamte’ langkhatah TOPA pang hi. Amah in mi khempeuh thu sit ding a, namsau tawh migilote a thatlum ding hi, TOPA in ci hi,’ na ci ding hi.

[29] Tua ni ciangin amaute in: “‘Pate in leenggah thuk ne uh a, a tate uh’ ha a kim hi,’ a kici paunak a zang nawn kei ding uh hi. [30] Mi khempeuh amau’ mawhna ciat uh hang bekin a si ding uh hi. Leenggah thuk a nete’ ha bek a kim ding hi.

[18] Migilo pa khat pen si ding hi, ci-in kong gen ciangin, amah kikheelin a nuntak theih nadingin thu na hilhkholh kei leh, tua mipa pen mawhnei mahin si ding a, ahi zongin ama sihna thu ahihleh nang kong ngawh ding hi. [19] Migilo khat hilhkhol napi-in a mawh bawlna a tawp kei leh, a mawhnei mahin si ding a, ahi zongin nangma nuntakna suakta ding hi.

[1] TOPA in kei tungah thu hong gen leuleu a, [2] “Israel gam sungah mite in zat belin a neih paunak, ‘A pate in leenggah thuk ne a, a tate’ ha kim,’ cihna pen bang a cihnopna ahi hiam? [3] Kei pen a nungta Topa PASIAN ka hih mah bangin kong genin-ah: Israel gam sungah hih paunak na zang nawn kei ding uh hi. [4] Mi khempeuh keima a’ hi a, pate ahi a, tate ahi zongin keima-a’ ahi hi. A mawh mipa bek si ding hi.

[23] Tua ciangin kei tungah hong khialhna uh hangin Israel mite sal suak uh a, amaute nungngatin, a galte uh khut sungah pia-in gal sungah a vekun a sisak ka hihna, [24] le amaute’ nitna le a gitlohna uh tawh kituakin amaute tungah bawlin, amaute a nungngat ka hihna thu, minam dangte in thei ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.

[12] TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Tu mahmah nangawnin lungsim tak tawh kisik kikin, an tangin, kapin, thumna tawh kei kiangah hong paikik un. [13] Na dah taktakna uh lungkhamna tawh langsak unla, na puante uh a balkek bek hi kei un,” hong ci hi. TOPA, note’ Pasian kiangah ciahkik un. Amah migi mahmahin hehpihna a nei hi a, a lungduai-in hong huh nuam tawntung a, gim hong pia loin hong maisak nuam tawntung hi.
[14] Amau’ khialhna hangin Israel gim ka piak ni ciangin, Bethel-a biakna taute zong ka susia ding a, biakna tau kite kitanin leilakah kia ding hi.

[15] Bang hang hiam cih leh minam kimte tungah ka thukhenna ding ni a naizo hi. Nang bawl bangin nangma tungah hong kibawl ding hi. Na hih bangin na lu bukah hong tukik ding hi. [16] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka mual siangtho tungah na thuak mah bangun, na kiim na pama om minamte khempeuh in zong ka gimpiakna a thuak ding uh hi. Thuak tawntung ding uh a, maimang ding uh hi.

[12] “Tua laitakin Jerusalem khuasung meivak tawh ka zong ding a, thuphawk loin, a ngeina bangun omcip a, ‘ TOPA in a pha hitaleh a sia hitaleh bangmah bawl ngei lo hi,’ a ci mite, gim ka pia ding hi.
[10] Tu mahmahin sing a bulphuk dingin hei tawh kingim zo hi. Tua ahih manin gah hoih a gah lo sing khempeuh kiphukin meikhuk sungah kikhul ding hi.

[22] Ahi zongin ke’n note kiangah kong genin-ah: A sanggampa tungah a heh mi in thukhenna thuakkha thei ding hi. A sanggampa kiangah, ‘Bangmah a kimang lo,’ ci-in a ko bawl mi in uliante mai-ah thusitna thuak thei ding a, a sanggampa kiangah, ‘Mi hai,’ ci-in a simmawh mi in hell meikuang sungah khulna thuak thei ding hi.

[1] “Pasian in note hong mawhsak loh nadingin midangte va mawhsaksak nawn kei un. [2] Bang hang hiam cih leh midangte’ thu na khenzia uh tawh kizui-in note tungah hong khen ding a, midangte tungah na zat uh ngeina mah note tungah hong zang ding hi. [3] Bang hangin na lawmte’ mit sunga ninthem tang muhsak thei napi-in nangma mit sunga singluang tang phawk thei lo na hi hiam? [4] Nangma mit sungah singluang a tang kimlai, bangci-in na lawmte kiangah, ‘Na mit sunga ninthem tang hong lakkhiatsak ning,’ ci thei ding na hi hiam? [5] No a kineihkhem mite aw, note’ mit sunga singluang tang lakhia masa le-uhcin, na lawmte uh mit sunga ninthem tang na lakkhiat theihna dingun hoihtakin khua na mu thei pan ding uh hi.
[19] Gah limci a gah lo singkungte kiphukin meikhuk sungah kikhul hi.
[15] Thukhen ni ciangin tua khuamite’ thuakna sangin Sodom khua le Gomorrah khuamite’ thuakna olzaw lai ding ahihna thu hoihtakin phawk un.
[28] Pumpi a thah khit ciangin kha a that thei lote na kihta kei un. Hell khuk sungah pumpi le kha a nihin a susia thei pa na kihtazaw un.
[24] Tua ahih manin thukhen ni ciangin note’ thuakna sangin Sodom khuamite’ thuakna baihzaw lai ding ahihna thu phawk ta un,” a ci hi.

[36] Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Thukhen ni ciangin mi khempeuh in phattuamna a om lo a kampaunate uh khempeuh bangin thusitna a thuak ding uh hi. [37] Bang hang hiam cih leh nomau kampauna tawh kizui-in thu hong kikhen ding a, dik hi, cihna ahi a, mawh hi, cihna ahi zongin na ngah nadingun nomau kampau mah hong kibulphuh ding hi,” a ci hi.
[40] Tahumte kikaikhawmin meikhuk sungah a kikhultum mah bangin leitung bei hun ciangin tua bangmahin kihih ding hi.

[14] “Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Meigong numeite tungah nuamtak sa-in a neihsa teng uh laksakin na zangmang uh a, mite in mihoih hong saktheih nading na deihna-un thu saupipi na ngen uh hi. Hih bangin na gamtatna uh hangin na gim thuak ding uh nasiazaw kan lai ding hi.
[33] Gul a bang mite’ suanlekhak mite aw, hell khuk tun nading thukhenna panin a suakta dingin bangci-in kilamen thei na hi uh hiam?

[43] khualmi ka hih laitakin zin nong do kei uh a, puan ka neih loh laitakin puan nong guan kei uh a, ka cinat laitakin nong veh kei uh a, ka thongkiat laitakin nong hawh kei uh hi,’ a ci ding hi. [44] Tua ciangin amaute in zong, ‘Topa aw, cikin na gilkial hong mu a, cikin na dangtak hong mu a, cikin khualmi na hih hong mu a, cikin na puan neih loh hong mu a, cikin na cinat hong mu a, cikin na thongkiat hong mu a, cikin kote in nang hong huh nuam lo ka hi uh hiam?’ a ci ding uh hi. [45] Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Hih mite a neupen khat nangawn na huh loh uh ciangin kei a hong huh lo na hi uh hi,’ ci-in a dawng ding hi. [46] Tua ahih ciangin tawntung gimthuakna sungah amaute pai ding uh a, mihoihte ahihleh nuntak tawntungna sungah lut ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[40] Meigong numeite tungah nuamtaksa-in a neihsate laksakin zangmang uh a, mite in mihoih a saktheih nading uh a deihna hangun thu saupipi a ngen uh hi. Amau’ kineihkhemna tawh kizui-in a gimthuak ding uh lianzaw ding hi,” a ci hi.
[9] Tu mahmahin sing a bulphuk dingin hei tawh kingimzo hi. Gah hoih a gah lo singkung khempeuh kiphukin meikhuk sungah kikhul ding hi,” a ci hi.

[51] Abel a kithah a kipan biakna tau le siangtho mun kikalah a kithat Zekhariah a sihna ciang dong, tua mi thahna hangin gimna a thuak ding uh hi. Ke’n kong cihin-ah, hih thute khempeuh hangin tuhuna mite gim hong kipia taktak ding hi.
[5] Kuate kihta ding na hi uh hiam cih leh, mite in a thah khitsa mipa pen hell khuk sungah a khiathuah theilai Pasian na kihta un.

[46] tua nasem pa’ topa pen ama upmawh loh ni, a theihkholh loh hunin hong tung ding hi. A topa in nakpitakin amah gim pia ding a, a thumang lo mite tawh a kibangin a thuaksak khawm ding hi. [47] A topa’ deihna thei napi-in a topa’ deih bangin a gamta nuam lo nasem pa pen nakpitakin kisat ding hi. [48] Ahi zongin a topa’ deihna a theih lohna hangin satthuak nading a gamtakha nasem pa pen kidamsat zawdeuh ding hi. Tampi a kipiakna pa tung pan tampi kikal ding a, a tamzaw a ki-apna pa tung pan a tamzaw kikal ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[3] Hilo hi. Ke’n kong cihin-ah, na mawhna panun na kisik kei uhleh amaute mah bangin note zong na si ding uh hi.
[5] Hilo hi. Ke’n kong cihin-ah, na mawhna panun na kisikkik kei uh leh note zong amaute mah bangin na si ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[34] “Jerusalem, Jerusalem aw, kamsangte na that a, Pasian’ hong sawl kamtaite na denglum hi. Akpi in a kha tawh a note a huai mah bangin na mite ka huainuam tawntung a, ahi zongin na ut kei hi. [35] Tu-in na innte kinusiacip ding hi. ‘Topa min tawh a hong pai mipa, Pasian in thupha pia ta hen,’ na cih hun hong tun matengin kei nong mu nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.

[16] Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawn loin a hin tawntung theih nadingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi. [17] Pasian in leitungah a Tapa hong sawlna pen mawhsakna thukhen dingin a hong paisak hi loin, leitung mite a honkhia dingin a hong paisak hizaw hi.
[24] “A mantakin kong genin-ah: Ka thugennate za-in kei hong sawl pa a um khempeuh a nungta paisuak ding hita hi. Mawhsak thukhenna ngah nawn loin, sihna panin a hingkik ta ahi hi.

[28] Hih thu ka hong gen ciangin lamdangsa kei un. Han sungah a om misi khempeuh in ama aw za-in, [29] han sung panin a hong paikhiat uh hun hong tung ding hi. A gamtat hoih mite pen a nungta tawntung dingin hong thokik ding uh a, a gamtat siate ahihleh mawhsak thukhenna a thuak dingin hong thokik ding uh hi.
[16] Mi mawhsakin thu a khen hita mah leng zong, a thukhen pen kei bek hi loin kei a hong sawl Pa Pasian le keimah in a khenkhawm ka hih manun ka thukhennate a man taktak ahi hi.
[24] Kei pen, ‘Kei ka hihlam na hong up kei uhleh na mawhna uh a sihpih ding na hih manun, na mawhna uh na sihpih ding uh hi,’ ci-in ka hong genna pen hih thu hang ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[47] Ka thugenna za napi-in a zui lo mite tungah thu ka khen kei ding hi. Leitung mite mawhsakin thukhen dingin a hong pai ka hi kei a, a honkhia dingin a hong pai ka hizaw hi. [48] Kei hong nialin ka thugen a sang lo mite in thukhen ding khat nei uh hi. Nitawp ni ciangin keima thugente pen amaute’ thukhen ding ahi hi.
[8] Amah hong tun ciangin leitung mite tungah mawhna thu, thuman thu leh thukhenna thu laktel ding hi.

[30] Pasian in mihingte’ theih loh hun lai-a a gamtatnate uh phamawh a sak loh hangin, tu-in mun khempeuha om mi khempeuhte a gamtat siatna panun a kihei nadingun thu a hong pia khinzo hi. [31] Amah in leitung mi khempeuh thu a mantakin ama teel mipa a hong khensak nading ni a sehkhol khinzo hi. Tua a ngaihsutna a man taktak hi, ci-in mi khempeuh tungah a hong lah nadingin a teel mipa, sihna panin a hingkiksak zo hi,” ci-in thu a hilh hi.
[32] Tua bangin a gamtate in sihna thuak ding hi, ci-in Pasian’ thukhenna thei napi-in, tua bangin amaute a gamtat uh banah, tua bangin a gamtate pakta-in a awi zawsop lai uh hi.

[1] Tua ahih ciangin midangte’ thu a khen note pen kuakua hita le-uh cin na suakta tuan kei ding uh hi. Midangte na mawhsakna uh thute mah note zong gamta veve na hih manun, no zong a mawh mah na hi uh hi. [2] Tua bang mawhna a gamtate, Pasian in gim a piak pen a man mah ahihna i thei ciat hi. [3] Midangte a mawhna hangin thu khenin, no zong tua amau mawhnate mah na bawl veve uh ciangin Pasian’ thukhenna tawh kipelh tuan dingin ki-um peuhmah na hi uh hiam? [4] Pasian migi-in thu a diah hithiatna pen na kisikkik theih nading uh a deihna ahih lamtak phawkkha loin, a migitna, a lungduaina, a hong thuaknate neu ngaihsutkha na hi uh hiam? [5] Lungsim khauhin na kisik nop lohna hangun Pasian’ hehna le a manin a thukhenna a hong kilat Ni ding ciangin na gimthuak ding uh a nasia semsem dingin a bawl na hi uh hi. [6] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in mi khempeuh a gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in thukkik ding hi. [7] Pahtakna, minthanna, le hin tawntungna deihin a gamtat hoih tawntung mite tungah Pasian in nuntak tawntungna pia ding a, [8] ahi zongin ama deihna bek zui-in, a gamtat dingin a kilawm bangin gamta loin, a man loin a gamta mite tungah Pasian in ama hehna hangin gimna tungsak ding hi.

[11] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in kuamah deidan loin mi khempeuh tungah a kibangin thu a khen hi. [12] Moses Thukham a nei lo Gentail mite a khialh uh ciangin thukham nei lopi mahin siatna thuak uh a, Moses Thukham a nei Jew mite a khialh uh ciangin tua thukham tawh kizui-in amaute tungah thu kikhen hi.
[16] Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in mihingte lungsim sunga a ngaihsutnate uh, Jesuh Khrih thu a khensak Ni ciangin, tu-a ka hong gen bang teekteekin a hong piang ding ahi hi.

[5] Pasian a manin gamta ahihna eite’ gamtat khialhna in kilangsak semsem ahih ciangin eite in bang gen ding nei nawn ihi hiam? Pasian in eite gim a hong piak ciangin a thuman lo ahi hiam? (Hih bangin thu ka gen ciangin leitung mihingte’ kammal zat ngeite a zang ka hi hi.) [6] Gim hong piakna-ah a thuman lo hi het lo hi. A thuman lo hi zenzen leh bangci-in leitung mi khempeuh’ thu khenthei ding ahi hiam? [7] Keima zuautatna in Pasian a thumanna kilangsakin a min thangsak semsem ahihleh bang hangin mawhnei-in kei hong kiseh lailai ahi hiam? [8] Thupha a pian nadingin gamtat sia gamta ni, ci ding ihi hiam? Mi pawlkhatte in tu-a bang teek mahin gen hi, ci-in hong mawhsak uh a, ka heh theihtheih nadingin kam a pau se uh hi. Tua bang mite in amau thuak dingin a kilawm gimna a thuak ding uh hi.
[19] Tua ahih manin kuamah in paulap a zon theih loh nading le mi khempeuh in Pasian’ thukhenna a thuak theih nadingin Thukham a nei mite khempeuh in tua Thukham a zuih ding uh ahihna thu i thei hi.
[15] Thukham in Pasian’ heh nading piangsak hi. Ahi zongin thukham om kei leh thukham zui lo cih zong om thei lo hi.
[9] Ama sihna hangin tu-in Pasian tawh kipawlthei ihih manin Pasian’ hehna hangin gimna panin zong hong suaktasak zaw kan lai ding hi.

[16] Pasian’ letsong le mi khat’ mawhna a hatna zia kilamdang hi. Khialhna khat a om khit ciangin, “Mawh hi,” ci-in thukhenna kipia a, ahi zongin khialhna tampi tak a om khit ciangin a kilawm lopi mahin, “Dik hi,” cihna piakkhong thupha a om hi.
[1] Ahi zongin tu-in ahihleh Khrih Jesuh tawh kipawlin a nungta mite pen mawhna thukhenna tawh kipelh hi.

[33] Pasian in mawh lo hi, ci-in a gen khitsa ahih manin, Pasian’ teelsa mite tungah kua in mawhna guanthei nawn ding ahi hiam? [34] Tua ahih manin kua in amaute tungah thu khenthei nawn ding ahi hiam? Eite a dingin a hong thumsak pa pen Pasian’ taklamah a tu, a sih khit ciangin sihna panin a kihingkiksak Khrih Jesuh hi lo ahi hiam?
[33] Tua ahih manin Pasian’ hong hehpihna nakliat mahmah a, a pilna le a thu theihnate nakthuk mahmah hi. Ama thukhennate kua’ gentheih ding hi lo a, a nasepna ziate kua’ telzawh ding hi lo hi.

[19] Lawmte aw, na hehna uh kuama tungah thukkik kei unla, Pasian’ thukkik dingin koih lel un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho sungah, “Keimah in amaute tungah ka thuk ding a, midangte a gimsak bangun ka gimsak ding hi, Topa in ci hi,” ci-in kigelh hi.

[4] Ukna thuneite pen note’ hoih nadingin Pasian’ nasemte ahi uh hi. Ahi zongin a sia-in na gamtat uhleh gim hong pia taktak ding uh ahih manin na lau ding uh ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute pen Pasian’ nasemte hi a, a sia-in a gamta mite tungah Pasian’ hehna bangin gim a pia dingte ahi uh hi.

[10] Tua ahihleh bang hangin na Khristianpihte uh tungah thu khen a, bang hangin simmawhbawl thei na hi uh hiam? Thukhenna a thuak dingin Pasian’ mai-ah eite khempeuh a ding ciat ding ihi hi. [11] Lai Siangtho sungah, “Kei pen a nungta ka hih mah bangin ka mai-ah mi khempeuh hong kun ding a, Pasian ka hihna thu mi khempeuh in pulak taktak ding uh hi, Topa in ci hi,” ci-in a kigelh hi. [12] Tua ahih manin a kuamah peuh in i gamtatna ciat Pasian’ mai-ah a va kigentel ciat ding ihi hi.

[21] Midangte in a puklawh theih annekna, zunekna, le na khat peuhpeuh i kikep ding a man pen ahi hi. [22] Hih thu-ah no’ upna le no’ ngaihsutnate, Pasian tawh note’ kikal thu hisak un. Amau lungsim sungah man a sak bangun a gamta zote pen a lung uh nuam mahmah hi. [23] Ahi zongin lunghimawh pipi-in a ne a om leh, a upna uh tawh kizui-in a gamta hi lo uh ahih manin Pasian in tua bang mite a mawhsak ding hi. I upna bangin gamtat lohna peuhpeuh mawhna ahi hi.

[13] Tua a kilam nate mei tawh a kize-et ding Ni hong tung ding a, tua nasepnate a bangci hiam, ci-in mei in ze-et ding ahih manin a lam mite’ nasep ciat hong kilang ding hi. [14] Mi khat in tua khuamte tungah a lam nate bangmah a cihzawh kei leh a nasep thaman a ngah ding hi. [15] Ahi zongin mi khat in a lam nate a kattum leh amah a sum hi ding hi. Tua nate a lam pa ahihleh meikat nading panin a suakta bang keekin a suakta bek ding hi.

[5] Tua ahih manin a hun a tunma-in kuamah mawhsakin thu khen kei un. Topa hong pai ciangin a tawpna thukhenna hong om ding a, amah in thusimte hong pholakin, mihingte in a lungsim sung uhah a ipcip uh thute hong telkheh ding hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in amau’ ngah dingin a kilawm phatna, Pasian’ kiang panin a ngah ciat ding uh hi.

[12] Tua bang a pualam mite mawhsakin thu ka khen ding kei’ nasep hi lo hi. Pasian in amaute’ thu khen ngawn ding hi. Ahi zongin note in na pawlpih uh mite tungah thu na khen ding uh ahi hi. Lai Siangtho in, “Note lak panin migilo pa na lakhia un,” na ci hi. [13] Tua bang a pualam mite mawhsakin thu ka khen ding kei’ nasep hi lo hi. Pasian in amaute’ thu khen ngawn ding hi. Ahi zongin note in na pawlpih uh mite tungah thu na khen ding uh ahi hi. Lai Siangtho in, “Note lak panin migilo pa na lakhia un,” na ci hi.

[31] Eite hoihtakin ki-entel masa peuh lehang Pasian’ mawhsak thukhenna i thuak kei ding hi. [32] Ahi zongin eite in hih leitung mite tawh mawhsakna i thuakkhawm loh nadingin Topa in eite hong thuhilhin gim hong pia hi.

[10] Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih mai-ah thusitna a thuak dingin eite khempeuh a kilak ding ihi a, leitung i pumpi-in i omlai-in i gamtatna tawh kizui-in eite tawh a kituak ciatin a sia ahi a, a pha ahi zongin a ngah ciat ding ihi hi.
[8] Mi khatpeuh in ama leitung pumpi deihna khaici a vawh leh sihna ngah ding a, Kha Siangtho deihna khaici a vawh leh Kha Siangtho tung panin nuntak tawntungna ngah ding hi.

[3] A taktakin eite khempeuh zong amaute mah i bang ngei a, i pianpih lungsim zui-in nungta-in, i pumpi le i lungsim deihna bangin i gamta hi. Tua ahih manin eite khempeuh zong Pasian’ hehna hangin gim a thuak dingte ihi hi.
[6] Hih bang mawhnate i bawl hangin phamawh kei, ci-in a mawk gen mite’ khemsa-in ta kei un. Pasian thu mang loin hih bangin a gamta mite in Pasian’ hehna a thuak ding uh ahi hi.

[18] Singlamteh tungah Khrih a sihna thu tawh a kilehngatin a nungta mi tampi tak a omna thu, a beisa hunah tamveipi ka hong genkhin a, tu-in zong khitui tawh ka hong genpha kikkik hi. [19] Amaute in amau pumpi deihnate Pasian zahin ngaihsun uh a, a maizum nading uh thute-ah kisial zawsopin, leitung nate bek ngaihsutin nei uh ahih manin Hell khuksung a tung ding uh ahi hi.
[6] Ama thu a mang lo mite tungah hih bang gamtatna hangin Pasian’ hehna hong tung ding hi.
[9] Pasian in ama hehna a thuak dingin eite a hong teel hi lo a, i Topa Jesuh Khrih hangin hotkhiatna a ngah dingin a hong teel ahi hi.

[6] Pasian in a manin na sem ding ahih manin note a hong gimsak mite tungah Pasian in gimna pia ding a, [7] tu-a gimna a thuak note le kote tungah zong nopsakna hong pia ding hi. Vantung panin Topa Jesuh le a vanglian a vantung mite, meikuang tawh hong kilat ciangin, [8] Pasian a thei lo mite, le i Topa Jesuh tawh kisai Lungdamna Thu a um lo mite tungah gimna a tungsak ding hi.

[9] Satan’ vangliatna tawh A Gilopa hong pai-in, lim le nalamdang a tuamtuamte hong bawl ding a, [10] gitloh khemna a nam tuamtuam zangin, siatna a thuak ding mite a khem ding hi. Tua bang mite in a suahtak nadingun thuman sang nuam lo, deih lo uh ahih manin siatna a tuak uh ahi hi. [11] Tua ahih manin Pasian in amaute lakah nasem dingin zuau thahatna paisak ahih manin amaute in a man lo thu um uh hi. [12] Tua ahih manin thuman um loin, mawhna sungah nuam a sa khempeuh in mawhsak thukhenna thuak ding uh hi.
[1] Pasian’ mai, le a hingte hitaleh a site hitaleh mi khempeuh’ thu a khen ding Khrih Jesuh’ mai-ah nakpitakin ka hong hanthawn hi. Amah Kumpi-in hong paikikin ukna hong kipan ding ahih manin,

[27] Mi khempeuh khatvei si-in, tua khit ciangin Pasian’ thukhenna a thuak ding ahih mah bangin, [28] mi tampite’ mawhna a thuak dingin Khrih zong khatvei bek a kipia hi. A nihveina hong kilatkik ciangin mawhna thu tawh kisai nasem ding hi nawn loin, lawptakin amah a ngak mite a honkhia ding ahi hi.

[26] Thuman thutak i theih khit ciangin mawhna i bawl hamtang lai leh i mawhna a kimaisak nadingin biakpiakna dang om nawn lo a, [27] a kihtakhuai thukhenna le Pasian’ thu a nial mite a kangtum ding meikuangpi bek omlai hi.
[23] vantungah a min a kikhum Pasian’ ta upate a kikhopna, mi khempeuhte’ thu a khen Pasian’ kiang, a cingtaakin a kibawl midikte’ kha a omna,

[4] Mi khempeuh in nupa thu thupi ngaihsut uh hen la, zite pen pasalte tungah citakin, pasalte zong a zite uh tungah citak uh hen. Pasian in a thangtat mite le nulepa mawhna a gamta mite tungah thu khen ding hi.

[12] Tua ahih manin mi a khahkhia thei thukham tawh kizui-in thukhenna a thuak ding mi bangin kampau-in na gamta un. [13] Bang hang hiam cih leh hehpihna lungsim a nei lote tungah Pasian in thu a khen ciangin hehpih lo ding a, hehpihna lungsim a neite tungah Pasian in thu a khen ciangin a hehpihna in zozaw ding hi.
[1] Sanggamte aw, mite tungah thu a hilh eite pen midangte sangin a khauhzaw-in thu hong kikhen ding ahih manin note tampi sia na suaknuam se kei un.
[4] A citak lo mite aw, leitung tawh kipawlna pen Pasian tawh kigalneihna ahih lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam? Leitung tawh a kipawl mite pen Pasian tawh a kigalneih dingin a kibawlbawl ahi uh hi.

[12] Thukham a pia pa le thu a khen pa pen Pasian bek hi a, amah bek in hong honkhiazo a, hong susiazo hi. Tua ahih manin bang hangin na mipihte uh gensia-in thu a khenthei dingin kingaihsun zenzen na hi uh hiam?
[9] Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note tungah thu hong khenkhak loh nadingin khatlekhat na kiphunsan kei un. Thukhen ding pa hong nai mahmah ta a, hong tung dektak ta hi.
[1] Tua ahih manin gitlohna, zuauna, kineihkhemna, huaihamna, le kigensiatnate na omsak nawn kei un.
[23] Amah a kizahko ciangin na ko thuk lo hi. Gimna a thuak ciangin na tawnggawp lo a, a manin thu a khen Pasian muanin a na nei hi.

[5] Ahi zongin amaute in a site le a hingte’ thu a khen dingin a om Pasian’ mai-ah thudotna thuak ding uh hi. [6] Tua thu hang mahin, midang khempeuh thu a khen mah bangin a leitung nuntakna uhah Pasian in thu a khen khit tei hangin kha nuntakna-ah Pasian mah bangin a nuntak theih nadingun mi sisate kiangah Khrih in Lungdamna Thu a hilh ahi hi.
[17] Tu-in thukhen kipat hun ding hong tungta-in Pasian’ mi eite tungah hong kipan ahihleh Pasian kiang panin hong pai Lungdamna Thu a um lo mite a dingin bangzahin lungkhamhuai ding ahi hiam?
[4] Bang hang hiam cih leh vantung mite nangawn in khialhna a neih ciangin Pasian in khahkhong loin hell khuk sungah khia a, Thukhen Ni hun dong ngakin khuamial sungah kol bulhsa-in a omsak hi.

[7] Ngeina bangin a gamta lo mite in Lot a lungkhamsakna panun Pasian in mihoih Lot a honkhia hi. [8] Tua mihoih pa, amaute lakah teng a, nisimin amaute’ gamtat hoih lohnate za-in mu tawntung ahih manin lunggim mahmah hi. [9] Tua ahih manin Topa in tua bang mihoihte a gimna uh panin suakta sakin, tua bang migilote Thukhen Ni hun dongin gimna pia-in a koihcip theih nading siamna a nei hi.

[16] Lai a hong gelhna sungah a thugente tu-ate mah a gennuam ahi hi. A laigelhna sungah a telhak thu tampi om a, theihna kicing loin lungsim kip lo mi pawlkhatte in Lai Siangtho sung thu a ututun a kawihei uh bangin Paul’ thugente zong a man lopi-in khia uh ahih manin siatna a tuaklawh uh hi.

[17] Thukhen Ni ciangin kisuanna nei hetloin i omtheih nadingin eite in a cingtaak itna a nei ihi hi. Khrih mah bangin hih leitung i nuntakna-ah nungta-in gamta ihih manin tua bang kisuanna a nei lo ding ihi hi.
[6] Amau’ aana neih huamsung bekah om loin a omna panun a paikhia vantung mite zong leinuai khuamial sungah sikkol kibulhin amau’ thu a kikhen ding Ni lianpi ngakin Pasian in a koihcip hi.
[15] Pasian’ deihna bangin a gamtat lohna hang uh le kam hoih lopipi zangin Pasian a gensiatnate uh hangin Pasian’ deihna bangin a gamta lo mite tungah thu khenin mawhsakna pia ding hi,” na ci hi.

[10] Amaute nakpitakin kiko uh a, “A thuman, a siangtho, a Vanglian Topa aw, leitungah a omlai, kote a hong that mite tungah cik ciangin thu khenin, kote hong thahna hangin cik ciangin phu la ding na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

[18] Na hehna hong kilat hun hong tungta a, misite thukhen nading hun hong tungta ahih manin minam dangte heh mahmah uh hi. Nangma nasem kamsangte, a lian a neu, nang hong kihta mi khempeuhte thaman na piak ding hun hi ta a, leitung a susia mite na suksiat ding hun hi ta hi,” a ci uh hi.
[7] Amah nakpitakin kiko a, “Amah in mihingte thu a khen ding hun hong tungta ahih manin Pasian kihta unla amah phat un. Van le lei, tuinak le tuipite a bawlpa hong bia ta un,” a ci hi.
[7] Ganhing lite sung panin khat in a nungta tawntung Pasian’ hehna a dim hai sagih, vantungmi sagihte kiangah a pia hi.
[1] Tua ciangin biakinn panin awging khat in vantungmi sagihte kiangah, “Leitungah va pai unla, hai sungah a om Pasian’ hehnate va sungkhia un,” ci-in awging lianpi tawh a genna ka za hi.

[20] Vantung aw, ama siatna hangin lungdam in. Mi siangthote, sawltakte, le kamsangte aw, note tungah hong gamtatna hangin Pasian in ama tungah thukhenna pia khinta ahih manin lungdam ta un,” a ci uh hi.

[12] A lian a neu misite tua tokhom mai-ah dingin laibute a kilem ka mu hi. Tua ciangin a nungta mite a kigelhna laibu a dang khat zong a kilem ka mu hi. Amaute’ gamtatna tua laibute sungah a kigelhna tawh kizui-in misite tungah thu a kikhen hi. [13] Tuipi sungah a om misite, tuipi in hong pusuah a, Sihna le Misite’ Gam in zong amau sungah a om misite hong pusuah uh hi. Tua ciangin a vekpi-in amaute’ gamtatnasa tawh kizui-in thu a kikhen hi. [14] Tua ciangin Sihna le Misite’ Gam, meiphualpi sungah a kilawn hi. Hih meiphualpi pen sihna nihna ahi hi. [15] A nungta mite a kigelhna laibu sungah a min a om lo peuhmah meiphualpi sungah kilawn hi.
[8] Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, le zuaugente om nading mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[27] Ahi zongin a siang lo, a hoih loin a gamta mi, zuau a gen mite kuamah lut thei lo ding uh a, a nungta mite a kigelhna Tuuno laibu sungah a min a omte bek tua khuapi sungah lutthei ding uh hi.
[12] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Kei ka hong pai baihta ding a, mi khempeuh a gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in a thaman ding uh ka hong puak ding hi.
[22] Noah zong tua bangmahin gamta a, Pasian’ thupiak khempeuh a hih hi.
[14] TOPA in note a dingin hong dosak ding a, note ahihleh na om hithiat ding uh hi bek hi,” a ci hi.
[12] “Israel-te aw, tu-in, TOPA na Pasian uh zahtak ding, ama lampite tot ding, amah it ding, na lungsim khempeuh uh le na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh TOPA note’ Pasian’ na sep ding,

[47] Hih a tampi nate khempeuh om napi-in note in lungdamna le lungsim kipahna tawh TOPA note’ Pasian’ na sem lo na hih manun, [48] TOPA in note’ langah a hong sawl ding na galte uh’ na, gilkialna le dangtakna, pum guakin omna, le na khempeuh kitangsapna tawh, na sem ding uh hi. Na galte un note hong suksiat matengin note’ ngawngah sik hakkol hong thuah ding uh hi.

[5] TOPA’ nasem Moses in note hong piak thupiakna le thukham ahi, TOPA na Pasian uh it ding, ama lampi khempeuh zuih ding, ama thupiakte zuih ding, amah belh ding, le na lungsim khempeuh uh le na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh ama na na sep ding uh limtakin ngaihsun un,” a ci hi.

[15] TOPA’ na na sepnop kei uhleh, Gun galkhat a a na na sepsak uh na pu na pate uh pasian ahi a, note’ tenna gam Amor mite’ pasian ahi zongin, a na na sepsak ding peuhpeuh uh tuni-in teel un. Ahih hangin kei le ka innkuanpihte in ahihleh TOPA’ na ka sem ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[24] TOPA zahtak unla, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh citakin ama na sem un; bang hang hiam cih leh note a dingin amah in na lian hong bawlsaksate ngaihsun un.

[22] Tua ciangin Zadok’ tapa Ahimaaz in Joab kiangah, “Bangbang piang taleh kei zong Kush mipa’ nungah hong taisak in,” a ci kik hi. Joab in, “Lungdamna thu puakna hangin thaman ngah lo ding cih thei napi-in, ka tapa aw, bang hangin tai ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi. [23] Amah in, “Bangbang piang taleh ka tai ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Joab in ama kiangah, “Tai in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Ahimaaz zanglei lam tawnin tai a, Kush mipa makhelh hi.
[9] Amaute in TOPA’ thukham laibu kengin Judah gam sungah hilh uh hi. Judah khuapi khempeuhah amaute pai kawikawi-in mite lakah a hilh uh hi.
[11] Ka tate aw, TOPA in ama omna-ah a ding ding, ama na a sem ding, le ama nasemte hi-in ama tungah paknamtui a hal dingin note hong teel khin ahih manin tu-in mawk om kei un,” a ci hi.
[4] Kipan in; nangma nasep ding ahi hi; kote in kong huh ding uh hi. Hang inla sem in,” a ci hi.

[11] Launa tawh TOPA’ na sem unla, linna tawh a khe nam un; tua hikeileh amah sinso-in lamkalah na siamang ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah heh pakpak hi. Amah a bel khempeuh mi nuamsate ahi hi.

[9] Hotkhiatna hangin lungdam thu mihonpi lakah ka gen ding hi. TOPA aw, lungdam thugen ka khawl ngei kei ding hi. [10] Nangma hotkhiatna thu ka im kei a, na thumanna le na hotkhiatna ka gen khin hi. Na itna kip le na thumanna mihonpi tungah ka im kei hi.
[24] Keima siatna ding a zongte kizahhuaisak khin a, minsia khinzo ahih manun thuman tawh na hong huhna sunthapai-in ka gengen ding hi.
[28] Ahih hangin kei a dingin Pasian’ kiangah om ding a hoih ahi hi. Na sepnate khempeuh ka gentheih nadingin Topa PASIAN ka hong bel hi.
[1] TOPA tungah lungdamna ko-in, ama min phat unla, ama sepnate khempeuh mite lakah kitheisak un.
[6] Kap kawmin kuankhia-in a tuh ding khaici a pua mi lungdamin kikona tawh buhlomte pua-in hong ciah ding hi.
[11] Thah dinga a kikaikhia mipa honkhia inla, sih nading mun a zuan mipa lehkaih kik in.

[8] Tua ciangin, “Kua sawl ding a, eite a dingin kua va pai ding ahi hiam?” Topa’ cihna aw ka za hi. Tua ciangin ke’n, “Hih lai-ah kei om ing! Kei hong sawl in,” ka ci hi. [9] Tua ciangin amah in, “Pai inla, hih mite tungah, ‘Zaza napi tel lo; mumu napi thei lo,’ va ci in.
[4] Ni khat ni ciangin mite in, “ TOPA’ tungah lungdam ko unla, ama hong huh ding ngen un. Minam khempeuh lakah ama septe kitheisak unla, ama min kiliansak hi, ci-in gen un.
[13] TOPA in, “En un; ka nasempa a dau pai-in, amah a lianin kikoihin kilaamto ding a, sang mahmah ding hi.
[6] Tua ciangin keimah in, “Ah, Topa PASIAN aw, kei thugen ka siam kei a, naupang khat ka hi lel hi,” ka ci hi.

[9] Keimah in, “Ama thu ka gen kei ding a, ama min ka lo kei ding hi,” ci mah leng zong, ama thu ka lungsim sungah mei bangin hong kuang a, ka guh ka tang sungah kikhumcip ahih manin ka ki-ipipna-in ka gimlua a, gen loin ka om thei kei hi.
[17] “Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, Israel minamte’ galvil pa dingin nang kong koih hi. Nangma tungah ka hong gen hilhkholhnate khempeuh amaute tungah na gensawn ding hi.
[7] “Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, tu-in Israel minam khempeuhte’ galvil pa dingin nang kong koih hi. Nang tungah kong piak hilhkholhna khempeuh amaute tungah na gensawn ding hi.
[1] TOPA in Amittai’ tapa Jonah tungah, [2] “Kithawi inla, a lian mahmah Nineveh khuapi-ah va pai-in thu va hilh in; bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ gitlohna thu ka za khinzo hi,” a ci hi.

[17] Vanglian TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Tua a kiciamteh mite pen keima mite hi ding uh hi. Keimah in na ka sep ni ciangin amaute pen keima neihtuam taktak mite hi ding uh hi. Pa in ama thu a mang a tapa a hehpih mah bangin kei zong amaute ka hehpih ding hi. [18] Tua ciangin midikte le migilote, le keima na hong semte le hong sem lote a kilamdanna na mukik ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[15] Mei a vak khit ciangin kuamah in lawh khuhlo hi. Meivakna mun sangah koihzaw a, innsung khempeuh a taangsak hi. [16] Midangte in na gamtatna hoihte uh a muh ciangin vantungah a om na Pa uh min a phat theih nadingun mite mai-ah na gamtat hoihna uh khuavak bangin na kilangsak un.
[24] “Kuamah, to nih’ sila hikhawm thei lo hi. Khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat tungah thumanin khat simmawhbawl ding hi. Note in Pasian’ na le leitung sum na na semkhawm zo kei ding uh hi.

[36] Mihonte a muh ciangin, a cing nei lo tuuhon bangin gimna ngahin lungkhamin om uh ahih manin hehpihhuai a sa hi. [37] Tua ahih manin a nungzuite kiangah, “Anlak ding tampi om napi-in anlak na a sem ding mi tawmbek a om hi. [38] Tua ahih manin ama an a la dingin an nei Topa in nasem tampi hong sawl nadingin thu ngen un,” a ci hi.

[5] Jesuh in hih mi sawm le nihte sawl a, “Gentail mite gam sung ahi a, Samaria mite khua sungah ahi zongin lut kei un. [6] Tuu bangin a mangthang Israel mite lakah va paizaw un. [7] Na paina peuh uhah, ‘Vantung ki-ukna hong naita hi,’ ci-in thu va hilh un. [8] Cinate damsakin, misite hingsakin, miphakte damsakin, dawite va hawlkhia un. Man piak kul loin hih vangliatna na ngah uh bangin hih vangliatna na zatna uhah zong man va ngen kei un. [9] Kham ahi a, ngun ahi a, sumngo ahi zongin sum peuhmah na ip sung uhah keng kei un. [10] Khualzinna-ah an ngenin puak nading ip ahi a, khedap ahi a, ciangkhut ahi zongin keng kei unla, puanak zong a val kengthuah kei un. Nasem mite pen amau sapnateng mite in a piak ding a ngeina ahi hi. [11] “Khuapi ahi a, khuaneu ahi zongin khua khat peuhpeuh na tun uh ciangin tua khua sungah note zin hong tungsak nuam kua om ahi hiam, ci-in zong unla, na muh uh ciangin tuate’ inn-ah tungin, tua khua na nusiat mateng uh tua lai mahah omsuak pah un. [12] Inn khat peuhpeuhah na lut uh ciangin a mite hopihin thupha na pia un. [13] Tua na hopihna uh innsunga mite in note hong tunsaknop leh na hopihna thupha uh amaute tungah kip ding a, ahi zongin hong tunsaknop kei uhleh na hopihna thupha uh na dokkik ding uh hi. [14] Inn khat peuhpeuh in ahi a, khua khat peuhpeuh in ahi zongin note hong tunsaknop kei a, na thugen uh hong ngaihnop kei leh tua lai panin paikhia unla, na khe uha leivui bangte sinkhiat un.

[19] Tua bangin thusitna a thuak dingin hong kipaipih ciangin, bang gen ding ihi hiam, ci-in lunghimawh kei un. A hun a tun ciangin na gen ding teng uh hong kihilh ding hi. [20] Thu na gen uh ciangin note’ gen hi loin, na Pa uh’ Kha Siangtho in note tungtawnin thu a gen ding ahi hi.
[1] Jesuh in a nungzui sawm le nihte a vaikhakna a man khit ciangin tua kiimnai-a om khuate-ah thuhilh ding le thugen dingin tua mun panin a paikhia hi.
[14] “Bang hang hiam cih leh mi tampi a kisap hangin tawm bek a kiteel hi,” a ci hi.

[18] Tua ciangin amaute mai-ah Jesuh hong pai a, “Leitungah ahi a, vantungah ahi zongin vangliatna khempeuh kei tungah hong kipia khinta hi. [19] Tua ahih ciangin note pai unla, midang khempeuh, keima nungzui mi suaksakin, Pa min, Tapa min, le Kha Siangtho min tawh tui sungah na phum un. [20] Tua ciangin note tungah ka hong gen thute khempeuh a zuih nadingun na hilh un. Hun bei dongin note a hong ompih tawntung ding ka hihna thu phawk ta un,” a ci hi.

[14] amah in mi sawm le nih teelin, sawltakte, ci-in min a phuah hi. Jesuh in, “Kei tawh a kikhawl dingin noteng ka hong teel hi. Thu a hilh dingin zong ka hong sawl ding a, [15] dawi hawlkhiat nading vangliatna na nei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[11] Note hong kimanin, thusitna a thuak dingin thukhen zumah hong kipaipih ciangin bang gen ding ihi hiam, ci-in ma lunghihmawh kei un. A thugen ding pen note hi loin Kha Siangtho ahih manin a hun tak ciangin na gen dingun a hong kisawl peuhpeuh na gen un.

[14] (Tua khit ciangin a tawpna-ah, an a nek laitakun nungzui sawm le khatte mahmah kiangah a kilang hi. A kithawhkiksak khit ciangin amah a mu mite’ thugen um lo uh ahih manin a lungkhauhna uh le a up lohna hangun amaute a taii hi. [15] Tua khit ciangin amaute tungah, “Leitung khempeuhah note pai kawikawi unla, mi khempeuh tungah Lungdamna Thu na hilh ta un.
[23] Nasep a kipat ciangin Jesuh ama khan kum sawmthum bang a pha hi. Mite in ama pa Josef hi, ci-in a ngaihsun uh hi. Josef’ pa Heli,

[18] “Gimna a thuak mite tungah Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin Topa in kei hong sehkhin ahih manin keima sungah Topa’ kha hong om hi. Salin a kimante tungah suahtakna thu a gen ding, mittawte in khua a muhkik theih nading, a kinengniamte a suaktasak ding le [19] Topa in a mite a hotkhiat ding kum a pulak dingin kei hong sawl hi,” ci-in a kigelh hi.

[12] Ni khat, thungen dingin mualtungah Jesuh pai a, zan tawntung Pasian kiangah thu ngenin a om hi. [13] Khua a vak ciangin a nungzuite sam a, amaute sung panin sawm le nih teelkhia-in sawltakte ci-in min a phuak hi. [14] Tuate in: Simon (Peter ci-in min a phuah pa) le a naupa Andru, James le a nau Johan, Filip, Bartholomew, [15] Matthai, Thomas, Alfeas’ tapa James, Simon (gam khual pa), [16] James’ tapa Judas, le Jesuh a lehhek pa Iskariot’ tapa Judas ahi uh hi.
[39] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah thugentehna khat zong gen a, “Mittaw khat in mittaw dang khat lam paipih thei lo hi. Paipih zenzen leh a nih tuakun hawkguamah kiakhawm ding uh hi.

[2] Tua ciangin Pasian’ Ukna thu a hilh ding le cinatnate a damsak dingin kuankhia sakin [3] amaute kiangah, “Tu-a na khualzinna uhah bangmah keng kei un. Ciangkhut ahi a, ip ahi a, an ahi a, sum ahi zongin keng kei unla, puan-ak zong a valin kengthuah kei un. [4] Khua khatpeuhah na lut uh ciangin tua khua panin na paikhiat matengun a inn-ah hong tungsakte’ inn mahah om paisuak un. [5] A inn uhah a hong tunsak nop lohna khua peuhpeuh panin na paikhiat uh ciangin amaute hilhkholhna-in na khe uha leivui bangte sinsan un,” ci-in a vaikhak hi. [6] Nungzuite zong kuankhia uh a, khua khempeuhah pai-in Lungdamna Thu hilh uh a, a paina khempeuh uhah cinate a damsak uh hi.
[2] Amaute kiangah, “Anlak ding tam mahmah a, ahi zongin mi tawm bek in anlak na sem uh hi. Tua ahih manin an nei pa in a ante a la dingin mi hong sawl nadingin thu ngen un.
[10] Ahi zongin khua khat peuhpeuhah na lut uh ciangin note hong tunsaknop kei leh a khuasung kongzingah pai unla,
[8] “Note kiangah kong cihin-ah, keima mi ahihna mi’ theihin a genkhiate, Mihing Tapa in zong Pasian’ vantung mite’ mai-ah, keima mi hi, ci-in genkhia ding a,

[11] Thusitna a thuak dingin kikhopna inn-ah ahi a, hausa zumah ahi zongin hong paipih uh ciangin bang gen ding a, bangci kihut ding ka hi hiam, ci-in lunghimawh kei un. [12] Bang hang hiam cih leh a hun a tun ciangin Kha Siangtho in na gen dingteng uh hong hilh ding hi,” a ci hi.
[7] Tua mah bangin kisikkik ding a kisam lo mihoih sawmkua le kuate tungah lungdamna sangin mawhnei mi khat a kisikna hangin vantungah lungdamna lianzaw ding hi,” a ci hi.
[10] Bang hang hiam cih leh a mangthangte a zong ding le a honkhia dingin Mihing Tapa a hong pai ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[47] Jerusalem khua a kipan minam khempeuh tungah a mawhna uh kisikin a kimaisak nading thu, ama min tawh kihilh ding hi, ci-in kigelh hi.
[17] Pasian in leitungah a Tapa hong sawlna pen mawhsakna thukhen dingin a hong paisak hi loin, leitung mite a honkhia dingin a hong paisak hizaw hi.

[35] Note in na paunak uhah, ‘Khai tuh khit kha li ciangin anlak hun hi,’ na ci uh hi. Tu-in note khuadakin lote en un. An khempeuh min khinta a, lak ding bek in sam hi. [36] Khaituh pa le anla pa a lungdam khawm theih nadingin anla pa thaman a kipiak mah bangin anla pa in zong a nungta tawntung dingin mi a khawm ding hi.
[24] “A mantakin kong genin-ah: Ka thugennate za-in kei hong sawl pa a um khempeuh a nungta paisuak ding hita hi. Mawhsak thukhenna ngah nawn loin, sihna panin a hingkik ta ahi hi.
[44] Kei hong sawl Pa in a kaih loh mite ka kiangah hong pai thei lo ding a, ka kiangah hong pai mite nitawp ni ciangin ka hingsak ding hi.
[26] Ka nasemte keima omna-ah a omtheih nadingin ka na a sem nuam peuhmah in kei hong zui ding uh a, ka Pa in ka na a sem mite a pahtawi ding hi,” a ci hi.

[26] “Ahi zongin Thuman a hong lak ding Huhpa ahi Kha Siangtho ka Pa kiang panin ka hong sawl ding hi. Amah hong tun ciangin keima thu hong gen ding hi. [27] A kipat cil a kipanin kei tawh omkhawm na hih manun note in zong keima thu na gen ding uh hi.

[8] Ahi zongin note tungah Kha Siangtho hong tun ciangin vangliatna tawh na kidim ding uh a, Jerusalem khuasung, Judea gam sung, Samaria gam sung, le leimong dongin note in keima thu na gen ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[21] “Tua ahih ciangin Topa Jesuh’ thawhkikna thu teci pangin a hong genpih dingin Judas tangin mi khat i lak ding kisam hi. Tua mipa pen Johan’ tuiphum kipat hun a kipanin Jesuh vanah a kilaktoh hun ciang dong, Jesuh’ nasepna khempeuhah eite tawh a omkhawm mi khat ahih ding kisam hi,” a ci hi.
[20] Tua ahih manin kote in ka muhsa uh le ka zaksa uh thute gen loin ka om thei kei ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.

[19] Ahi zongin tua zanin Topa’ vantungmi khat in thong kongkhakte hong a, sawltakte a paikhiatpih khit ciangin amaute kiangah, [20] “Biakinn-ah pai unla, hih nuntak thakna thu mite kiangah va gen un,” ci-in a vaikhak hi.

[1] Tua khit ciangin thu um mi hong tam tektek a, Jew mite le Grik pau a zang Jew mite kikalah kiphunsanna thu hong om hi. Grik pau a zang Jew mite in, “Annek tuidawn, sumlepai hawmna-ah ka meigong numeite uh hong kipiaksak lo hi,” ci-in lungkim lo uh hi. [2] Tua ahih manin sawltak sawm le nihte in thu um mi khempeuh samin kaikhawm uh a, “Kote in Pasian’ thu hilh ding don man lo liangin annek tuidawn sumlepai vai-ah kong manlah ding uh kilawm lo hi. [3] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, note lak panin pilna le Kha Siangtho a nei mihing sagih hong kitengkhia unla, hih thute a vaihawm dingin i koih ding hi. [4] Tua hileh kote in ka hun khempeuh uh thungetna le thuhilhna-in kong zang thei ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
[4] Tua bangin a kithehthang mite pai kawikawi-in thu a hilh uh hi. [5] Filip zong Samaria gam khuapi-ah pai-in Khrih thu a hilh hi.
[12] Ahi zongin Pasian’ Ukna Lungdamna Thu le Jesuh Khrih thu, Filip’ gente a up uh ciangin, numei pasal a um khempeuh tui a kiphum uh hi.

[26] Topa’ vantungmi khat in Filip kiangah, “Kithawi inla, Jerusalem khua panin Gaza khua paina lampi zuan dingin leitaw lam manawhin pai in,” a ci hi. (Tua lampi tu-in kizang pha nawn lo hi.) [27] Filip zong kithawi-in a pai hi. Lampi-ah Ethiopia mi mang lian khat tawh kituak hi. Tua mangpa pen Ethiopia kumpinu Kandeis khutnuai-a mang lian khat hi a, kumpinu neihsa khempeuh a ukpa ahi hi. Jerusalem khua-ah Pasian bia dingin a va pai hi a, [28] inn zuan dingin leeng sungah a tuan kawmin kamsang Isaiah laibu a sim hi. [29] Tua laitakin Kha Siangtho in Filip kiangah, “Pai inla tua leeng mai-ah va om in,” ci-in a sawl hi.

[10] Tua laitakin Damaskas khua-ah Ananias min nei thu um mi khat a om hi. Amah in maang mu a, a maang sungah Topa in, “Ananias aw,” ci-in a sam hi. Ananias in, “Topa aw, ka om hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. [11] Tua ciangin Topa in Ananias kiangah, “Kithawi-in Kongzing Tang gei-a Judas inn-ah va pai inla, Tarsas khuami Saul min nei mi khat va kan in. Tua Saul in thu ngen a,
[15] Ahi zongin Topa in Ananias kiangah, “Gentail mite, kumpite, le Israel mite tungah keima min a kitheisak ding, keima na a sem dingin teelkhin ka hih manin ama kiangah va pai in.

[19] Tua bangin Peter in a maang muh lungngaingai-in a om laitakin Kha Siangtho in, “En in, mihing thum in nang hong zong uh hi. [20] Amaute nang kiangah a hong pai dingin ka hong sawl ahih manin kithawi-in kumsuk inla, lunghiang loin amaute zuipah in,” a ci hi.

[12] Lunghiang loin amaute ka zuihpah nadingin Kha Siangtho in kei tungah hong gen khinzo hi. Joppa khua panin hih i sanggam gukte in zong Sisaria khua-ah hong zui uh a, ka vekpi-un Kornelias inn-ah ka lut uh hi.

[19] Stefen a kithah huna bawlsiatna hangin thu um mite tampi kithehthang uh hi. Mi pawlkhatte Foenisia gam, Saipras gam, le Antiok khua ciang dong tung uh a, Jew mite kiang bekah Pasian’ thu a hilh uh hi. [20] Ahi zongin Saipras gammi le Sairin khuami thu um mi pawlkhatte Antiok khua-ah pai uh a, Topa Jesuh hanga Lungdamna Thu, Gentail mite kiangah zong a gen uh hi. [21] Topa in nakpitakin amaute huh ahih manin mi tampi in thu umin Topa lamah a kihei uh hi. [22] Jerusalem-a om pawlpite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Antiok khua-ah Barnabas a paisak uh hi. [23] Barnabas a tun ciangin Pasian in amaute thupha a piakna mu-in lungdam mahmah a, amaute citakin a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh Topa tungah a thuman nadingun a hanthawn hi. [24] Barnabas pen mihoih mahmah, upna nei-in, Kha Siangtho tawh a kidim mi khat ahi hi. Mi tampi in Pasian a um uh hi.
[2] Amaute in an tangin Pasian bia-in a om laitakun Kha Siangtho in amaute kiangah, “Keima na a sem dingin ka sapsa ahih manin kei a dingin Barnabas le Saul hong piakhia un,” a ci hi.

[47] Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kote kiangah thu hong pia khinzo a, ‘Leitung mi khempeuh in hotkhiatna a ngahtheih nadingin Gentail mite’ khuavak ahi dingin ka hong koih hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci uh hi.

[50] Ahi zongin Jew mite in tua khuasung uliante le Gentail mi numei citheite holhthawh uh a, Paul le Barnabas bawlsiat ding kipanin, tua gam panin a taikhia sak uh hi. [51] Sawltakte in zong a khe uha leivui bangte sinkhiat sanin Ikonium khua-ah a pai uh hi.

[27] Antiok khua a tun uh ciangin amaute in pawlpi mite khawm uh a, a khualzinna uhah Pasian in na a seppihna khempeuh le Gentail mite in zong thu a uptheih nadingun Pasian in lam a honsaknate khempeuh a gen uh hi.

[6] Asia gam sungah thu a hilh ding uh Kha Siangtho in phal lo ahih manin Frigia le Galatia gam sungtengah a zin uh hi. [7] Mysia gamgi a tun uh ciangin Bithynia gam sungah lut dingin kithawi uh a, ahi zongin tua gamah a pai ding uh Jesuh’ Kha Siangtho in phal lo hi. [8] Tua ahih manin Mysia gam nawkin pai uh a, Troas khua-ah a tung uh hi. [9] Troas khua-ah a tunni zanin Paul in maang mu a, Masedonia gammi khat in ama kiangah, “Masedonia gamah hong pai inla, kote hong huh in,” ci-in a thum hi. [10] Paul in maang a muhkhit phetin, tua lai-a om mite kiangah Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin Pasian in eite hong sam hi, ci-in ngaihsun ka hih manun Masedonia gamah a pai dingin ka kithawi pah uh hi.

[9] Zan khat, Paul in maang mu a, a maang sungah Topa in, “Lau kei in. Lungkia kei inla, na thugen zom in. [10] Hih khua sungah keima mi tampi om a, nang hong ompih ka hih manin kuamah in nang bangmah hong cih lo ding hi,” a ci hi. [11] Tua ahih manin tua khua-ah kum khat le alang sung omlai-in mite kiangah Pasian thu a hilh hi.

[18] Efesa pawlpi upate hong tun ciangin Paul in amaute kiangah, “Asia gam sung kong tun ni a kipanin note tawh ka om sungteng ka nasepna khempeuh note in na thei uh hi. [19] Jew mite in kei hong thahsawmna hangin kiniamkhiatna le khitui naptui tawh haksapi-in Topa’ na ka sem hi. [20] Mihon lak ahi a, note’ inn sungah ahi zongin ka hong thuhilhna khempeuhah note’ phattuam nading a om khempeuh siit nei loin kong gen khin hi. [21] Jew mi le Gentail mite a mawhna panun Pasian’ lamah kihei-in i Topa Jesuh a up nadingun thu ka gen khinzo hi.

[24] Ahi zongin Topa Jesuh in kei sep dingin a hong piak, Pasian hehpihna hangin Lungdamna Thu, mite kiangah gen ding nasep ka tangtut zawh nakleh kei nuntakna-ah bangbang hong piang taleh a thupi-in ka ngaihsun kei hi.
[8] A zing ciangin ding leuleu-in Sisaria khua ka tung uh a, Pasian thu a hilh Filip’ inn-ah tungin tua lai-ah ka taam uh hi. Tua pa pen Jerusalem khua-a a kiteel mi sagihte sungah a kihel ahi hi.

[14] Tua ciangin amah in, ‘I pu i pate’ Pasian in ama deihna a thei ding, a thuman a Nasempa a mu ding, le ama kam mahmah tawh a thugen a za dingin nang hong teel khinzo hi. [15] Tua ahih manin na muhsa le na zaksa thu khempeuh, mi khempeuh tungah genin teci a pang ding na hi hi.
[31] Amah in Pasian’ Ukna thu le Topa Jesuh Khrih’ thu, hangtakin a ututin genin a hilh hi.
[1] Pasian kiang panin a hong pai Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin Pasian’ teelna tawh sawltak ahi, Jesuh Khrih’ sila keimah Paul in lai ka hong khak hi.
[5] Minam khempeuh in ama thu umin a zuihtheih nadingun Khrih hangin sawltak nasep sep theih nading hamphatna thu Pasian in Khrih’ na sep nadingin kote a hong pia hi.
[9] Ama Tapa hangin Lungdamna Thu ka lungsim khempeuh tawh hilhin a na ka sep Pasian in hih ka thugente a man taktak ahihna thu hong thei hi.
[14] Nuntakna sang mite le nuntakna niam mite, mipilte le mihaite, a kuamah peuh ka huh ding ka tavuan ahih manin, [15] Rom khua-a a om note tungah zong Lungdamna Thu hilh ding ka lawp mahmah hi.
[28] Ama deihna bang a sem dingin Pasian in a hong sap, amah a it eite a dingin na khempeuh a hoihlamin piangsak hi, ci-in i thei hi.

[1] Kei, Khrih tawh kipawl ka hih manin zuauthu ka gen thei kei hi. Kha Siangtho lamlahna tawh, ka lungsim kitheihna-ah zuau gen hetloin a mantakin ka gen thu in: [2] Leitung silesa ah ka mipihte a dingin nakpitakin dahin ka lunggimna a khang hi. [3] Hi thei ding hileh amaute’ hoih nadingin keimah in Pasian’ samsiatna thuakin Khrih tawh kikhen nading ciang dong nangawnin amaute ka huhnuam hi.

[13] Lai Siangtho in zong, “Topa tungah huhna a ngen khempeuhte in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh hi,” ci hi. [14] Ahi zongin a up loh pa uh tungah kua in thu ngen thei ding ahi hiam? Ama thu za ngei kei leh kua in a thu um thei ding ahi hiam? Ama thu kigen kei leh kua in za thei ding ahi hiam? [15] A gen dingin kisawl kei leh kua in a thu gen thei ding ahi hiam? Tua ahih manin Lai Siangtho sungah, “Lungdamna thu a hilh dingin a hong pai mite hangin kinuam mahmah hi,” ci-in kigelh hi. [16] Ahi zongin Isaiah in, “Topa aw, ka thugente uh kua in um ahi hiam?” a cih mah bangin Lungdamna Thu a za mi khempeuh in um kim lo uh hi. [17] Tua ahih ciangin zakna panin upna hong piangthei a, Khrih thu up nading pen hilhna panin hong piangthei pan hi.
[6] Tua ahih manin Pasian in hehpihna hong piakkhongna tawh kizui-in i siamna a tuamtuamte zang ciat ni. I siamna pen Pasian’ thu gentheih nading siamna ahih leh i upna neihzah tawh kizui-in gen ni.
[11] Thadah kei unla, nakpitakin na sem un. Lawp mahmahna lungsim tawh Topa’ na sem un.

[4] Ukna thuneite pen note’ hoih nadingin Pasian’ nasemte ahi uh hi. Ahi zongin a sia-in na gamtat uhleh gim hong pia taktak ding uh ahih manin na lau ding uh ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute pen Pasian’ nasemte hi a, a sia-in a gamta mite tungah Pasian’ hehna bangin gim a pia dingte ahi uh hi.

[16] Gentail mite tungah na a sem dingin Khrih Jesuh sawltak hih theih nading hamphatna lianpi Pasian in kei a hong piakna hang ahi hi. Gentail mite pen Kha Siangtho in Pasian’ tungah a piak, ama santheih biakpiaknate a suahtheih nadingin Pasian kiang panin a hong pai Lungdamna Thu ka hilhna-ah siampi bangin na ka sem hi. [17] Tua ahih manin Khrih tawh kikopin Pasian a’ ding na ka sepna-ah kei ka kisathei mahmah hi. [18] Kha Siangtho’ vangliatna tawh lim le na lamdangte zangin, Gentail mite in Pasian thu a zuihtheih nadingun Khrih in ka thatang le ka kam ka muk a zatna thute bekah hangtakin genin ka telkheh ding hi. Tua ahih manin Jerusalem khua panin Illyrikam gam ciang dong ka zinna khempeuhah Jesuh Khrih hangin Lungdamna Thu ka hilh khinzo hi. [19] Kha Siangtho’ vangliatna tawh lim le na lamdangte zangin, Gentail mite in Pasian thu a zuihtheih nadingun Khrih in ka thatang le ka kam ka muk a zatna thute bekah hangtakin genin ka telkheh ding hi. Tua ahih manin Jerusalem khua panin Illyrikam gam ciang dong ka zinna khempeuhah Jesuh Khrih hangin Lungdamna Thu ka hilh khinzo hi. [20] A tawntungin keima tup thu in: Mi khatpeuh in a patsa nasep maban, oltakin zomin a sem mi ka suahkhak loh nadingin Khrih thu a kizak ngei nai lohna munte bekah Lungdamna Thu hilh ding keima utna ahi hi.
[31] Judea gam sunga a om thu um lo mite in kei hong gimsakkhak loh nading le Jerusalem khua-a a om Pasian mite a dingin nasepnate lungdam takin a hong santheih nadingun thu hong ngetsak un.

[17] Khrih in tuiphum nasep a sem dingin kei hong sawl lo a, Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin a hong sawl bek ahi hi. Ka thuhilhna-ah zong thugen siamna le pilna a nei ka hi kei hi. Tua bang hi kei hen la, pilna le gen siamna a nei hi leng, Khrih in singlamteh tunga a thuakna thu in vangliatna a neihna hang kisa lo kha ding hi. [18] Bang hang hiam cih leh sihna a thuak mite a dingin singlamteh tungah Khrih sihna thu pen a haihuai thu ahi hi. Ahi zongin hotkhiatna a ngah eite a dingin Pasian’ vangliatna ahi hi.

[26] Sanggamte aw, Pasian in note hong sap laitakin na omzia uh ngaihsun un. Leitung mite’ hong muhna panin note a tamzaw, mipil na hi kei uh a, mi vanglian zong na hi kei uh a, mi thupi zong na hi kei uh hi. [27] Ahi zongin Pasian in mipilte a maizumsak nadingin mihaite hong teel a, mi thahatte a maizumsak nadingin mi thaneemte a hong teel hi. [28] Leitung mite in thupi a sakte uh a suksiat theih nadingin Pasian in leitung mite’ simmawh a niamte, bangmahin a ngaihsut loh uh mite a teel hi.

[1] Sanggamte aw, Pasian’ thu hilhin note kiangah kong pai lai-in, mipilte’ zat kam thukpipi le pilna kamte ka zang kei hi. [2] Bang hang hiam cih leh note kiangah ka om laitakin singlamteh tungah Jesuh Khrih a sihna thu simloh thudang peuhmah ngaihsut loh dingin ka ngaihsutsa ahi hi. [3] Tua ahih manin note kiangah kong pai lai-in thaneemin, launa tawh ka ling a, [4] thu ka hong hilh ciangin zong leitung mipilte’ zat kammalte le siamnate ka zang kei a, Pasian’ Kha Siangtho vangliatna tawh thu ka hong hilh hi. [5] Tua ahih manin note’ thu upna pen mihingte’ pilna hang hi loin, Pasian’ vangliatna hangin a um na hi uh hi.

[5] A taktakin ci lehang, Apollos i cihte, Paul i cihte, bangpi hi zenzen ka hi uh hiam? Note in thu na uptheih nadingun Pasian’ nasemte ka hi lel uh hi. Topa in kote’ sep dingin a hong piak nasep tuak a sem ka hi lel uh hi. [6] Keima nasep pen khaici vawh hi a, Apollos’ nasep pen tuibuah hi a, ahi zongin a khangsak pa ahihleh Pasian ahi hi. [7] Khaici vawh pa le tuibuak pa a thupi hi lo a, a khangsak Pasian a thupi hi bek hi.

[13] Biakinn-ah nasem dingin a kicial mite in biakinn mah panin an ngah uh a, biakna tau-ah na a semte in biakna sa mah a ngahna uh thei lo na hi uh hiam? [14] Tua mah bangin lungdamna thu a hilhte in tua nasepna mah panin nuntakna a ngah nading uh Topa’ thupiak ahi hi.

[16] Lungdamna thu ka hilh hangin kisialh nading thu bangmah om lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua thu a hilh ding mahin a hong kisawl ahi hi. Tua ahih manin lungdamna thu hilh kei leng kei a dingin a dahhuai mahmah ahi hi. [17] Keima utthu tawh a sem hi leng sep thaman ka lamen ding hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in a sem dingin hong sawl ahih manin ka sep ding nasep a sem ka hi hi. [18] Tua ahihleh ka sep thaman bang ahi hiam? Ka thaman pen, lungdamna thu tawh kisai ka sepna-ah thaman ngen loin, a khongin Lungdamna Thu hilh ding hamphatna ka neihna ahi hi. [19] Kei pen kuama khutnuai mi hi loin a suakta mi hinapi-in, mi a tam theithei ka ngahzawh nadingin mi khempeuh’ khutnuai mi-in ka kibawl hi. [20] Jew mite lakah na ka sep ciangin amaute ka ngahzawh nadingin Jew mite khat mah bangin ka gamta a, Moses Thukham ka zuih ding a kisap loh hangin a zuite ka ngahzawh nadingin amaute lakah na ka sep ciangin amaute mah bangin ka gamta hi. [21] Tua mah bangin Jew mite’ Thukham in a huam loh Gentail mite lakah na ka sep ciangin amaute ka ngahzawh nadingin Gentail mite bangmahin ka gamta hi. Hih bangin ka gen ciangin Pasian’ thukham a zui lo, cihna hi loin Khrih’ thukham zui-in a gamta ka hi hi. [22] Upna neu mite lakah na ka sep ciangin amaute ka ngahzawh nadingin amaute mah bangin ka gamta hi. Tua ahih manin ahih theihna lam peuhpeuhah mite ka ngahzawh nadingin mi khempeuh’ ngeina ka zui hi. [23] Hih bangin ka gamtatna pen amaute tungah Lungdamna Thu ka tuttheih nading le keima nasep hoihtakin ka septheih nading ka deihna ahi hi.
[3] Ahi zongin Pasian’ thu a hilhte pen mite tungah thugen hi a, mite tungah huhna, hanthotna, le hehnepna a pia ahi hi.
[9] Hong langpang tampi a om tei hangin limtakin na septheih nading lam tampi tak a om hi.

[15] Sanggamte aw, Stefanas-te innkuan pen Akhaia gam sunga thu um masa pente ahihna le Pasian’ mite a dingin nasem dingin a kipia mite ahihna thu na thei uh hi. [16] Tua bang mite le amaute tawh tua bangmahin na a semkhawm mite’ thu na man nadingun ka hong thum hi.

[12] Khrih hangin lungdamna thu a hilh dingin Troas khua ka tun ciangin tua lai-ah nasep theih nadingin Topa in lampi hong honsakna thu ka mu hi. [13] Ahi zongin tua lai-ah i sanggampa Titus na om lo ahih manin ka lungsim om thei nawn lo hi. Tua ahih manin tua lai-a om mite nusia-in Masedonia gamah ka paisuak hi. [14] Ahi zongin Pasian tungah lungdam mahmah nading thu a om hi. Khrih tawh ka kipawlna hangun gualzawhna tawh Khrih a paina khempeuhah Pasian in kote hong zuisak hi. Mun khempeuhah paknamtui a kizelh bangin Khrih thu theihna a kizelsak dingin Pasian in kote hong zang hi.
[1] Pasian in hong hehpihna tawh hih nasep hong pia ahih manin ka thaneem hetkei uh hi.

[3] Lungdamna thu ka hilhte uh kitel lo ahihleh zong siatna a thuak mite a’ ding bekin a kitel lo hi ding hi. [4] Tua bang mite pen hih leitung pasian gilote in a lungsim mit uh tawsak ahih manin um lo uh a, Pasian tawh a kibang teekteek Khrih minthanna hangin amaute tungah a hong taang lungdamna thu khuavak mu thei lo uh hi. [5] Bang hang hiam cih leh kote’ hilh thu pen komau’ thu hi lo a, Khrih Jesuh pen Topa ahi hi, ci-in a hilh ka hi uh a, kote pen Khrih hangin nomau’ na a semte ka hi uh hi.

[11] Pasian zahtak nading thu ka lungsim uhah om tawntung ahih manin mite ka zolzawh nadingun ka hanciam uh hi. Pasian in kote’ lungsim teltakin hong thei a, note in zong na lungsim uhah kei hong thei dingin ka hong um hi.

[3] Ka nasepna uhah mite in mawhna hong zon ding uh ut lo ka hih manun kuamah ka nawngkaisak khak loh nadingun ka hanciam uh hi. [4] Tua ahih manin ka sepna khempeuh uhah Pasian’ nasemte ka hihna uh ka kilangsak uh a, lungduai takin gimna, haksatna, lungkhamnate ka thuak uh hi.

[14] Tu-in kong hawh nading pen a thumvei nading hita a, note’ gim nadingin bangmah ka hong ngen het kei ding hi. Keima deih pen note’ sumlepaite hi loin note mahmah na hi uh hi. A taktakin ci lehang, tate in nu le pate a huh ding hi lo a, nu le pate in tate a huh ding hizaw hi. [15] Note ka hong huhtheih nadingin lungdamtakin ka neih khempeuh kong piaknop banah keima pumpi mahmah zong ka hong kipia nuam hi. Tuazah takin ka hong itna pen it lohna tengin hong nei zawsop ding na hi uh hiam? [16] Sumlepai vai-in note themkhat zong ka hong gimsak hetlohna na theihsa uh ahi hi. Ahi zongin mi pawlkhatte in, kei pen ngian zangin khemna tawh a lamdang khatah sum tamzaw ka ngah nading a vaihawmin hong gen uh hi. [17] Note kiangah ka hong paisak mite tungtawnin note kiang panin keima hamphat nading bang la ka hi hiam?

[19] Note mai-ah ka mawhna uh a kiphelphel bang khatin na hong ngaihsut khak uhleh tua bang hi lo hi. Lawmte aw, ka hihna khempeuh uh note’ phattuam nading ka deihna uh tawh Khrih in kote’ gen ding a hong deih bangin Pasian’ mai-ah thu genin nasem ka hi uh hi.

[1] Mihingte’ hong sehna le hong sawlna tawh sawltak na a sem hi loin, Jesuh Khrih le sihna panin tua Jesuh a thosakkik Pasian’ hong sawlna tawh sawltak na a sem keimah Paul in Galati gam a om pawlpi tuamtuamte tungah lai ka hong khak hi.

[10] Hih bangin thu ka gen ciangin mite’ hong pahtak theih nading a zong tawh kibang na hong sa uh hiam? Mite’ pahtak ding a ut ka hi kei a, Pasian’ hong pahtak ding a hanciam ka hi hi. Mihingte’ hong pahtak theih nadingin a gamta hi zenzen leng, Khrih’ nasem ka hi kei ding hi.

[7] Amaute in genthuah ding a neih gen loh, Jew mite tungah lungdamna thu hilh ding nasep, Pasian in Peter tungah a piak mah bangin, Gentail mite tungah lungdamna thu hilh nading nasep, Pasian in kei tungah a hong piakna thu a muzaw uh hi. [8] Bang hang hiam cih leh Jew mite lakah sawltak nasep a sem dingin Peter a koih mah bangin Gentail mite lakah sawltak nasep a sem dingin Pasian in kei a hong koih hi. [9] Makai a kinei James, Peter, le Johan-te in Gentail mite lakah nasem dingin Pasian in kei hong sehna thu thei uh ahih manin, Pasian sungah nasemkhawm khat ihi hi, cih hong lahna uh limin kei le Barnabas tawh khut kiletna hong bawl uh hi. Kei le Barnabas in Gentail mite lakah na semin amaute in Jew mite lakah na a sep nading uh thukimna ka nei uh hi.
[6] Pasian thu hilhna a za mipa in ama neih na hoihte khempeuh zong, amah a hilh pa tawh zangkhawm tahen.
[7] Tua lungdamna thuhilh a sem dingin Pasian in a tuam vilvelin ama vangliatna tawh kei a hong seh hi.
[17] Tua ahih manin hai ommawk kei unla, Topa in bang a sem dingin hong deih ahi hiam, ci-in kan un.

[5] Silate aw, launa le linna tawh na leitung tote uh thu mang unla, Khrih’ na na sep uh mah bangin lungsim takpi tawh na na sepsak un. [6] A hong pahtak ding uh deihna tawh amaute’ muhsung bekin tuaci gamtat kei unla, Khrih’ sila na hihna hangun Pasian’ hong deih bangin lungsim takpi tawh na sem un. [7] Mihingte’ na a sem bang lelin kingaihsun loin Topa’ na a sem bangin kingaihsun unla, thanopna tawh sem un.

[19] Thu ka hilhtheih hun ding ciangin lungdamna thusim hangtakin ka hilhkhiat theih nadingin Pasian in ka thugen ding hong hilh nadingin kei a dingin zong thu na ngetsak ta un. [20] Pasian’ thu genin taangmi ka sepna hang mahin sikkhau khihna thuakin thongkia ka hih manin ka hilh dingin a kilawm bangin hangtakin ka gen ngam nadingin thu hong ngetsak ta un. [21] Ka septe le ka omzia khempeuh na theih nadingun Topa thu sungah i sanggam, thuman takin na a sem Tikhikas in note kiangah thu khempeuh a cingin hong gen ding hi.

[17] Pawlkhatte in ahihleh lungsim hoih tawh hi loin ka thongkiatna-ah na ka sak semsem theih nadingin kei hong demna-in Khrih thu a hilh uh hi. [18] Ahi zongin phamawh ka sa kei hi. Lungsim hoih tawh a kihilh a, lungsimkhem tawh a kihilh ahi zongin, bangbang hitaseleh Khrih’ thu gen uh ahih nungsang, kei ka lungdam hi.

[21] Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih a’ ding bekin a nungta ka hi a, si taleng zong kei a dingin hoihzaw semsem lai hi. [22] Leitung pumpi nungta lai hi leng na a manpha tampi semthei ding ka hih manin, sih ding le hin ding ka teelsawn ding ka thei kei hi. [23] Hih thu nih khentat hak ka sa mahmah hi. Kei a dingin hoihzaw thampek ahih manin leitung pumpi si-in Khrih tawh omkhawm ding ka ut hi.

[29] Khrih nasepna-ah note in pumpi tawh na hong huhkim theih loh manun note’ tangin amah in kei a hong huh manin a nuntakna hong pia-in sihlawh dektak hi. Tua ahih manin hih bang mite na zahtakbawl mahmah unla, Topa’ nasem taktak hi, ci-in lungdam takin na limbawl un. [30] Khrih nasepna-ah note in pumpi tawh na hong huhkim theih loh manun note’ tangin amah in kei a hong huh manin a nuntakna hong pia-in sihlawh dektak hi. Tua ahih manin hih bang mite na zahtakbawl mahmah unla, Topa’ nasem taktak hi, ci-in lungdam takin na limbawl un.

[23] Ahi zongin note in lungdamna thu na zak cil lai-un na neih uh lametna panin ling hetloin, bulkip nei-in citakin na om paisuak ding uh ahi hi. Tua lungdamna thu mah keimah Paul in hilhin ka sepbel hi a, leitung mun khempeuhah a kihilh lungdamna thu mah ahi hi.

[27] Pasian in mi khempeuh a dingin a koihcing hih a thupi a deihhuai a thusim pen ama mite tungah pholak ding a sawm ahi hi. Tua thusim in: Khrih tawh a kipawlte in Pasian tawh minthanna ngahkhawm ding hi, cihna ahi hi. [28] Tua ahih manin a milip tungah Khrih’ thu ka hilh uh a, Khrih tawh a kipawlna uh hangin a milipin a khangcingin Pasian’ omna-ah ka tunpih theih nadingun a milip tungah hilhin ka genkhol uh hi.

[23] Mite’ nasem bangin kingaihsun loin, Pasian’ nasem bangin kingaihsun unla, na sep peuhpeuh uh lungsim takpi tawh lawpin sem un. [24] Topa in note tungah thaman a hong piak ding lamtak phawk gige un. Tua bangin na sepna uhah Khrih Topa’ na a semsem na hi uh hi.
[2] Lungsim takpi tawh thu ngen tawntung unla, kidawm kawmin lungdamna tawh thu ngen un.
[17] Tua ciangin Arkhippas kiangah, “Pasian a dingin nasepna nang tungah hong kipia pen hoihtakin na zo in,” ci-in na gen un.

[5] Bang hang hiam cih leh note kiangah Lungdamna Thu ka hong hilh lai-un kam bek tawh a hong gen hi loin, Kha Siangtho’ vangliatna le Lungdamna Thu a man taktak hi, ci-in theihna tawh a hong pai ka hi uh hi. Note kiangah ka om laitakun note’ phattuam nadingin ka sep ka bawlna khempeuh uh na thei uh hi.

[9] Note kiangah ka hong pai lai-un kote na hong limbawlna thu uh, le a nungta a man Pasian’ thu zui-in a bia ding le, [10] a hong tung ding Pasian’ hehna panin eite a hong honkhia, sihna panin Pasian in a thawhsakkik a Tapa Jesuh, van panin a hong pai ding ngak dingin milim paisanin Pasian’ lamah na kiheina uh thute mi khempeuh in gen belin a nei uh hi.

[12] Sanggamte aw, Topa in note lam a hong lak ding le a hong makai dingin a seh, note lakah na a hong sem mite, a kilawm a kituakin zahtakbawl un. [13] Amau’ nasepna hangin amaute nakpitakin itbawlin zahtak un. Note khatlekhat kilem takin na om un.

[14] Topa Jesuh Khrih tawh minthanna na ngahkhawm theih nadingun note tungah ka hong hilh uh Lungdamna Thu tawh hih nopsakna ah Pasian in note a hong sam ahi hi. [15] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, kam tawh ahi a, lai tawh ahi zongin ka hong hilh uh thumante limtakin zui unla, kiptakin om un.
[12] Hih bangin na sepzawh nadingin thatang hatna a hong pia i Topa Khrih Jesuh tungah ka lungdam hi. Ama nasem dingin kei hong muangin hong seh ahih manin ka nuam hi.
[7] Hih ka gen thu pen zuau ahi lo, thu taktak a gen ka hi a, Gentail mite lakah upna thu le hih thuman a gen dingin sawltak na semin thu a hilh dingin kei a hong kisawl ahi hi.
[11] Hih a thak Lungdamna Thu hilhin a taangko ding le sawltak na a sem dingin kei a hong kikoih ahi hi.

[2] Mi tampite’ theihin ka thuhilh, na zaksa thu khempeuh, midangte a hilhsawn thei dingin a citak mite tungah hoihtakin a zuih dingun na hilh in. [3] Khrih Jesuh’ galkap hoih hihna tawh thuak dingin a kisam khempeuh na na thuak in. [4] Galkap a semlai mipa in ama tungah a om bupa a lungkimsak theih nadingin na sem ahih manin tualsung mite’ nasep tawh thuahkhawm lo hi.

[8] Lungdamna Thu ka hilhna sungah ka gen mah bangin David’ suan, sihna panin a kithosak Jesuh Khrih na na phawk in. [9] Ama hangin a kingah Lungdamna Thu ka hilh manin gimna ka thuak a, mithat bangin sikkol hong kibulh hi. Pasian’ thu ahihleh sikkol kibulh thei lo hi.
[15] Pasian’ thuman a mantakin hilhin, na nasepna-ah maizumna thuak loin, Pasian’ pahtakna na ngahtheih nadingin na siam tawpin hanciam in.

[21] Mi khatpeuh a hoih lo na khempeuh panin kikemin a siangtho takin a om nakleh na hoih nam khempeuh a sem dingin a Topa tungah ki-apin, a Topa tungah a manpha suak ahih manin a thupi diakte-ah amah kizang ding hi.

[24] Topa’ na a sem mite, kitot a hatte hi lo ding a, mi khempeuh tungah lungsim nemin, thugen siamin, thuakzawhna nei-in, [25] thunem tawh a langte’ hoih lohna a puahtheite hi ding hi. Tua bang hileh Pasian in amaute kisiksak thei ding a, thuman thutak hong thei-in, [26] Dawimangpa in ama deihna bangin a gamta dingin a mat khit hangin ama thang panin amaute suakta khathei ding uh hi.

[16] Pasian’ na a sem mite mi cingtaak hi-in, na hoih namkim a septheih nadingun Lai Siangtho pen Pasian’ lamlahna tawh a hong kipia hi a, thuman thutak hilh nading, a khialte taii nading, a man lote a manin puah nading, a manin nuntak theih nading thuhilh nadingin a manpha mahmah ahi hi.

[2] hunhoih hunsia cih khen tuan loin Pasian’ thu hilh ding na kin ngaihsut nading, lungduaina tawh mite’ lungsim zo-in, mite taii-in, hanthawnin na hilh nadingin thu a hong pia ka hi hi. [3] Mite in thuman a ngaih nop loh hun, amaute’ deihna bek a zuihnop hun, amaute’ zaknop thute bek a gen ding sia a cial thuahthuah hun hong tung ding hi. [4] Amaute in thuman thutak ngainuam nawn loin tangthu phuahtawm peuh ngaihsutpi-in nei ding uh hi. [5] Ahi zongin nang na hih leh thu khempeuhah na lungsim ki-ukin haksatnate na thuak inla, Pasian’ thugen nasep semin, na nasepna-ah maa na tun in.

[2] Vantung mite in hong gen thute thuman hi a, tua thu a palsatte in a kilawm bangin gim thuak ding uh hi. [3] Tua ahih manin a thupi mahmah hih hotkhiatna thudon loin i om leh suahtakna om thei ngei lo ding hi. A masa-in Topa mahmah in hotkhiatna thu hong pulak a, tua thu a za mite in thuman ahihna thu eite tungah hong gen leuleu uh hi.

[16] Ahi zongin amaute’ lunggulh pen leitung sangin a hoihzaw vantung gam ahi hi. Pasian in amaute a dingin khuapi khat na vaihawmsak ahih manin, tua bang mite in amah pen ka Pasian uh hi, ci-in a gen ding uh Pasian in maizumna in na ngaihsun lo hi.
[7] Note tungah Pasian’ thu a hong gen, nidanga na makai masate uh phawk un. Amaute’ nuntakna le a sihna ziate uh ngaihsun unla, amaute’ upna bang na neih nadingun hanciam un.
[1] Pasian le Topa Jesuh Khrih sila keimah James in Leitung mun khempeuhah kithehthangin a om minam sawm le nihte tungah hopihna lai ka hong gelh hi.
[20] tua bangin a khial mite lam manah a tunpihkik mipa in a khial mite a sih nading panin honkhia-in, mawhna tampi a mai nadingin na a sempa ahihna thu na phawk un.

[12] Vantung panin a hong kisawl Kha Siangtho’ vangliatna tawh thu a gen thupuakte’ tung panin na zak uh Thute mah kamsangte in a gen laitakun, tua a thugente uh amaute a’ ding hi loin note a’ ding ahihna thu, Pasian in tua kamsangte tungah a na genzo hi. Vantung mite nangawn in hih thute a theihtelnop khat uh ahi hi.

[15] Na lungsim sung uhah Khrih zahtakbawl unla, amah Topa-in nei un. Note’ lametna thu a hong dong a omkhak leh hoihtakin a genthei dingin kiging tawntung unla, ahi zongin lungnemna le zahtakna lim tawh gen un.

[18] Khrih mahmah zong note a dingin si a, Pasian’ kiangah hong tunpih theih nadingin mihoih khat pen mihoih lote’ mawhna hangin khatvei a si hi. Mite in ama leitung pumpi that a, ahi zongin Pasian in kha nuntakna a pia hi. [19] Tua kha nuntakna tawh va pai-in thongkia-in a om khate kiangah thu a va hilh hi.

[9] Mi pawlkhatte’ ngaihsut bangin Topa in a kamciamna a hong tungsak hak hi zenzen lo hi. Note khat beek in siatna na thuakkhak ding uh deih loin na vekpi-un na kisik ding uh deih ahih manin hong pai nai lohna pen note hong khualna hizaw hi.
[23] meiphual sung panin dawhkhiat bangin midangte na honkhia un. Mi pawlkhatte’ mawhna-ah note zong na siatkhak loh nadingun kidop kawmna tawh na huh unla, amau’ gamtat hoih lo mawhnate na mudah un.

[8] Note’ nasepnate ka thei hi. Na tha uh a hat loh hangin ka thu zui-in kei tungah na hong cihtakna uh ka thei hi. Tua ahih manin kuamah in a khak zawh loh ding kong, note’ mai-ah honsa-in ka koih hi.
[4] Tua laizial phelin a sung a en dingin a kilawm kuamah kimu lo ahih manin nakpitakin ka kap hi.

[14] “Ka thei kei hi, topa aw. Nangmah in na theizaw ding hi,” ka ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in keima kiangah, “Hih mite pen bawlsiatna lianpi thuakin a hong suakta mite ahi uh hi. Amaute in a puan uh sawpsiangin Tuuno sisan tawh a paaksak uh ahi hi. [15] Tua ahih manin Pasian’ tokhom mai-ah amaute ding uh a, sun le zanin a biakinn sungah ama na sem uh hi. Tokhom tungah a tupa in amaute ompihin a hu ding hi.
[3] Ka teci nihte puanhampi silhin ka paisak ding a, amaute in ni tulkhat zanih sawmguk sung Pasian’ thu a gen ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.

[10] Tua ciangin vantungah nakpitakin awging khat ka za a, “Tu-in Pasian in hong honkhia khinta a, kumpi vangliatna a neihna hong lakkhia khinta a, ama Khrih in aana a neihna thu lakkhia khinta hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a sun a zanin eite’ Pasian’ mai-ah dingin i sanggamte mawhsakna a gen tawntungpa, tu-in vantung panin kilawnkhia khinta hi. [11] I sanggamte in Tuuno sisan le thuman a genna uh tawh amah na zo uh a, a nuntakna nangawn uh na pia ngam uh hi.

[15] Biakinn sung panin vantungmi khat hong paikhia a, meiipi tungah a tu mipa nakpitakin samin, “Leitung mite lak dingin min mahmah a, a lak hun hong tungta ahih manin na phiaukawi tawh at in,” a ci hi.

[11] Abraham in, “Hih lai munah Pasian zahtakna om het lo hi. Ka zi’ hangin amaute in kei hong that ding hi, ci-in ngaihsun kha ka hih manin hih bangin a gamta ka hi hi. [12] Tua tham loin a taktakin amah ka sanggamnu mah ahi hi. Pa kikhat, nu tuam ka hi uh a, amah ka tenpih ahi hi.
[21] Naudomte in Pasian zahtak uh ahih manin amah in amaute tungah suanlekhak a pia hi.
[31] Israel mite in Egypt mite’ tungah TOPA’ bawl nasepna lianpi mu uh a, mite in TOPA a zahtak uh hi. Amaute in TOPA le ama nasem Moses a um uh hi.

[18] Tu-in mite khempeuh in vangingte, peengkul aw, le mual meikhu thu a theihtel uh ciangin, lau-in a ling uh hi. Amaute a gamla-ah ding uh a, [19] Moses kiangah, “Nangmah in kote kiangah thu hong gen in; kote in ka ngai ding uh hi. Ahi zongin kote si kha ding ka hih uh ciangin ko tungah Pasian hong gensak kei in,” a ci uh hi. [20] Moses in mite kiangah, “Lau kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh note khialkha loin amah na kihtak theih nadingun note’ tungah a laktel dingin Pasian hong pai ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[14] Note in bilngongte phuisam loin, mittawte’ mai-ah a puk theih nading na na koih kei ding uh a, note in na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uh hi; kei pen TOPA ka hi hi.
[17] Note khatlekhat kikhem loin na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen TOPA ka hi hi.
[29] Amaute le a suan a khakte uh a nopsak tawntung theih nadingun keimah zahtak ding le ka thupiak khempeuh zuih ding hih bang ngaihsutna nei tawntung le-uh ka deih ahi hi.
[13] TOPA na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uh hi. Ama na bek na sem ding uh a, ama min tawh na kiciam ding uh hi.
[24] Tuhuna bangin i nuntak theih nadingin amah in eite’ hoih tawntung ding a deihna-in, TOPA i Pasian zahtakin hih thukhamte khempeuh i zuih ding TOPA in thu hong pia hi.

[12] “Israel-te aw, tu-in, TOPA na Pasian uh zahtak ding, ama lampite tot ding, amah it ding, na lungsim khempeuh uh le na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh TOPA note’ Pasian’ na sep ding, [13] le nomau’ hoih nadingin tuni-a kong gen thupiaknate le TOPA’ thukhamte zuih ding cih simloh, TOPA na Pasian un note’ tung panin bang dang hong kal ahi hiam?
[20] TOPA note’ Pasian na zahtak ding uh a, ama na semin, amah beelin, ama min tawh na kiciam ding uh hi.

[19] Hih thukham sunga thute le hih ngeinate kemin zuihna tawh TOPA a Pasian zahtak ding a theih nading, a mipihte tungah ama lungsim a kiliatsak loh nading, thupiaknate them khat zong a pelh loh nading, le Israel-te sung ahi ama kumpi gam sungah amah le a tate saupi a om theih nadingin amah in a nuntak sung tawntung tua sunga thute sim ding hi.

[12] Jordan galkhatah a luah dingin na paina uh gamah na nuntak laitengun amaute in a thu za-in TOPA na Pasian uh zahtak ding a theih nading, le hih thukham thute khempeuh limtakin a sep theih nading, le hih thu a thei nai lo amau’ tate in TOPA na Pasian uh zahtak ding a theih nadingun, numei, pasal, le naupangte, le na khuapite uh sunga om peemtate, mi khempeuh khawm un,” a ci hi. [13] Jordan galkhatah a luah dingin na paina uh gamah na nuntak laitengun amaute in a thu za-in TOPA na Pasian uh zahtak ding a theih nading, le hih thukham thute khempeuh limtakin a sep theih nading, le hih thu a thei nai lo amau’ tate in TOPA na Pasian uh zahtak ding a theih nadingun, numei, pasal, le naupangte, le na khuapite uh sunga om peemtate, mi khempeuh khawm un,” a ci hi.
[24] TOPA vanglian mahmah hi, ci-in leitung mi khempeuh in a theih nading le TOPA na Pasian uh na zahtak tawntung theih nading uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.
