[14] “Tua ahih ciangin tu-in TOPA zahtak unla, lungsim tak le thumanna tawh ama na sem un. Na pu na pate un Gun gal le Egypt gam sungah a biak uh pasian-te koihkhia unla, TOPA’ na sem un.
[14] Note in TOPA zahtakin ama na sem a, ama aw ngai-in TOPA’ thupiakna na langpan’ kei uh a, note a hong uk kumpipa le na Pasian uh na zuih uhleh thu hong nuam ding hi.
[24] TOPA zahtak unla, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh citakin ama na sem un; bang hang hiam cih leh note a dingin amah in na lian hong bawlsaksate ngaihsun un.

[3] Israel Pasian kampau khin a, Israel a hupa in kei kiangah hong ci khin hi: Mi khat in mite tungah thutang takin ukin Pasian zahtakna tawh limtakin a uk ciangin [4] amah pen amaute tungah zingsang khuavak bangin taang ziazua a, meii kaai loh ni zingsang a ni taangkhia, leilak panin lopate a selsak guahtui tawh kibang hi.
[10] Tua ciangin Judah gam kimkotah a om kumpi gam khempeuh tungah TOPA kihtakna om a, amaute in Jehoshafat do ngam nawn lo uh hi.

[7] Tu-in note in TOPA zahtak unla, na hihnate uhah kingaihsun un. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA i Pasian in thuman heikhiatna, mi deidanna, le sumgolh laknate deih lo hi,” a ci hi. [8] Tua tham loin, TOPA a dingin thukhenna a pia ding le thuneite a khensak dingin Levi mite le siampite le Israel mi beh lutangte pawlkhat, Jehoshafat in Jerusalem-ah a seh hi. Amaute in Jerusalem-ah a phual ding uh nei uh hi. [9] Tua ciangin amah in amaute thuhilh a, “ TOPA zahtakna, cihtakna, le na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh hih bangin na hih ding uh hi:
[29] TOPA in Israel-te’ galte a dosakna thu a zak uh ciangin kumpi gamte khempeuh in TOPA a kihta uh hi.

[11] Keima hong thungetna le nangma min a zahtak nuam na nasemte’ thungetna na bil hong ngat in. Tu-in kei tungah maavanna hong pia inla, kei tungah hih kumpipa hong migitna ding lungsim hong guan in,” ka ci hi. Tua hun laitakin kei pen kumpipa’ an a piapa ka hi hi.
[9] Tua ciangin keimah in, “Note’ gamtatna hoih lo hi. I gal ahi minam dangte’ zahkona i ngah loh nadingin i Pasian zahtakna tawh na gamtat ding uh kilawm hi.
[1] Uz gamah Job kici min nei mi khat a om hi. Tua mipa a paubaang lo, a thutang, Pasian a zahtak mi khat hi a, amah in gamtat hoih lo peuhmah peel hi.

[8] Tua ciangin TOPA in Satan kiangah, “Ka nasem Job na phawkkha hiam? A paubaang lo, a thutang, Pasian zahtakin gamtat hoih lo a peel amah tawh a kibang midang leitungah na mu kei ding hi,” a ci hi. [9] Tua ciangin Satan in TOPA dawngin, “Job in Pasian hong mawk zahtak ahi hiam?

[3] Tua ciangin TOPA in Satan kiangah, “Ka nasem Job na phawk hiam? A paubaang lo, a thutang, Pasian zahtakin gamtat hoih lo a peel, amah tawh a kibang midang leitungah om lo hi. Thu om lopi-in amah susia dingin kei nong kam pausak a, ahi zongin ama hoihna bangmah hem tuan lo hi,” a ci hi.
[28] “Tua ciangin amah in mihingte tungah thu genin, ‘Topa zahtakna, pilna hi a, siatna pelhna pen thutheihna hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.

[11] Launa tawh TOPA’ na sem unla, linna tawh a khe nam un; tua hikeileh amah sinso-in lamkalah na siamang ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah heh pakpak hi. Amah a bel khempeuh mi nuamsate ahi hi.

[1] TOPA aw, na biakinn sungah kua om ding ahi hiam? Na mual siangtho tungah kua teng ding ahi hiam? [2] Paubaang loin gamta-in, a manin na sem a, lungsim tak a gen mi, [3] mi gensia loin, a lawmte tungah siatna bawl lo a, a vengte a mawhsak lo mi, [4] migilote thusim lo a, ahi zongin TOPA a zahtakte a pahtawi mi, ama natna ding nangawnah a ciampel lo mi,
[9] TOPA a kizahtakna siang a, kip tawntung hi. TOPA’ ngeina kipte thuman a, a vekin kituakin man kim hi.
[23] TOPA a zahtak mi khempeuh aw, amah phat un. Jakob’ suan mi khempeuh aw, amah minthangsak un. Israel mi khempeuh aw, amah lamdang sa un.

[12] TOPA a zahtak mi kua ahi hiam? Ama lampi zuih ding Pasian’ hilhna a ngah mi ahi hi. [13] Amah nuamsa tawntung ding a, a tate in leitang nei ding uh hi. [14] TOPA tawh kilawmtatna pen amah a zahtakte a’ ding hi a, a thuciamna amau tungah kitheithangsak hi.
[19] Nang hong zahtakte a dingin na koihsa na hoihte, nang hong beelte a dingin mite’ muhna-ah na bawl, nangma hoihna kicing a, mi khempeuh in thei uh hi.

[8] Leitung khempeuh in TOPA zahtak uh hen la, leitung a tengte khempeuh, amah lamdangsakna tawh ding ta uh hen! [9] Bang hang hiam cih leh amah pau a, leitung hong piang hi; amah in thu pia a, na khempeuh hong om hi.

[18] Amah a zahtakte, a itna kip lametna a neite, sihna panin honkhia-in, kialpi hun sungin amaute a hinkep theih nadingin TOPA in amaute en tawntung hi. [19] Amah a zahtakte, a itna kip lametna a neite, sihna panin honkhia-in, kialpi hun sungin amaute a hinkep theih nadingin TOPA in amaute en tawntung hi.

[7] Amah a zahtakte’ kiimah TOPA’ vantungmi in giahphual sat a, amaute a honkhia hi. [8] TOPA tawh kikhawl phot unla, ama hoihna thei un! Amah a beel mite mi lungdam ahi uh hi. [9] Ama mi siangthote aw, TOPA zahtak un; bang hang hiam cih leh amah a zahtak mite in kitangsapna nei lo hi. [10] Humpinelkai khanglaite in kisapna le gilkialna thuak a, ahih hangin TOPA a zongte in na hoih a kisap uh om lo hi. [11] Tate aw, hong pai unla hong ngai un; TOPA zahtakna thu ka hong hilh ding hi.
[1] Mawhna in migilo pa’ lungsim tawngah thu gen a, amah in Pasian zahtakna nei het lo hi. [2] Bang hang hiam cih leh ama mawhna kidawkkhia lo a, muhdahna thuak lo ahih manin amah kimawkphat tawm hi.
[3] Eima Pasian phatna la thak keimah hong hilh hi. Mi tampite in hih thu mu-in amah zahtak ding uh a, amaute khempeuh in TOPA muang ding uh hi.

[18] Amah in ka galsimna sungah kei hong kem ding a, a muanhuai munah kei hong koih ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah a hong do dingin mi tampi tak kigual deudau uh hi. [19] Tanglai pek panin kumpi-in a kikoih Pasian in za-in amaute niamkhiat ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in thukham zui lo uh a, Pasian zahtak lo uh hi.

[4] Thalte panin kihemin a kikaihkhop nadingun nang hong zahtakte a dingin dial khat na koih khin hi. [5] Nangma it mite a suahtak theih nadingin na khut taklam tawh gualzawhna pia inla, kote’ ngetna hong pia in.

[7] Ahih hangin nang na kihtakhuai mahmah hi. Na heh khit phot ciangin nangma mai-ah kua ding ngam nawn ding ahi hiam? [8] Vantung panin thukhenna na genkhia hi. Gimna a thuak leitung mi khempeuh a hon dingin thukhen dingin Pasian a kipat ciangin leitung lau mahmahin tang hetloin a om khikhe hi.
[9] I gam sungah minthanna a om theih nadingin amah a zahtakte a dingin ama hong hotkhiatna hong om takpi hi.
[11] TOPA aw, nang tungah hong thumanin nangma lampi ka zuih theih nadingin kei hong hilh inla, nangma min a zahtakte tawh keima lungsim pumkhat hong bangsak in.

[6] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA pen vantung a kua tawh kitehthei ding ahi hiam? Mi siangthote’ kikhopna sungah a kizahtak Pasian, a kiima omte khempeuh tungah lianin a zahtakhuai TOPA pen van mite’ lakah kua pen tawh kibang ahi hiam? [7] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA pen vantung a kua tawh kitehthei ding ahi hiam? Mi siangthote’ kikhopna sungah a kizahtak Pasian, a kiima omte khempeuh tungah lianin a zahtakhuai TOPA pen van mite’ lakah kua pen tawh kibang ahi hiam?
[11] Nang hong kizahtak nadingin na sinsona’ vangliatna kua in thei a, na hehna’ husiatna kua in thei ahi hiam?

[4] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA lian a, nakpitakin phat ding ahi hi; pasian dangte khempeuh sangin amah zahtak zawk ding ahi hi. [5] Bang hang hiam cih leh minam dangte’ pasian khempeuh milim hi lel a, ahih hangin TOPA ahihleh vantungte a bawlpa ahi hi.
[11] Vantung pen leitung panin a san mah bangin amah a zahtakte’ tungah ama itna kip lianin sang mahmah hi.

[17] Ahih hangin TOPA’ itna kip pen amah a zahtak mite tungah a tawntung pan a tawntung dongin kip ngitnget a, ama thumanna pen ama thuciamna zui-in a thupiak bangin sep ding a phawk mite tungah a khang khangin a kip tawntung hi. [18] Ahih hangin TOPA’ itna kip pen amah a zahtak mite tungah a tawntung pan a tawntung dongin kip ngitnget a, ama thumanna pen ama thuciamna zui-in a thupiak bangin sep ding a phawk mite tungah a khang khangin a kip tawntung hi.
[5] Amah in amah a zahtakte an pia a, a thuciamna a phawk tawntung hi.
[10] TOPA zahtakna pen pilna kipatna ahi hi. Ama thupiak a zuite khempeuh tungah thukhen siamna a pia hi. Amah phat tawntung ding ahi hi.
[1] TOPA phat un. TOPA zahtakin a thupiaknate nuam a sa mahmah mi, thupha ngah mi ahi hi. [2] Ama suanlekhakte leitungah vanglian ding a, a lungsim thutang mite’ suanlekhakte thupha kipia ding hi.

[11] TOPA a zahtakte aw, TOPA muang un. Amah pen note hong huhpa le hong hupa ahi hi. [12] TOPA in eite hong phawk a, thupha hong pia ding hi. Amah in Israel mite, thupha hong pia ding a, amah in Aaron innkuante thupha hong pia ding hi. [13] Amah in TOPA a zahtakte a lian a neu-in thupha hong pia ding hi.
[120] Nang kong zahtakna hangin ka khuasikmul suak a, na thukhennate ka zahtak hi.

[1] TOPA zahtakin ama thu a zui mi khempeuh thupha ngah mi ahi hi. [2] Na khut tawh na sep thaman na ne ding a, na lungdamin na maavang ding hi. [3] Nangma inn sungah na zi, a gah pha mahmah leenggui tawh kibang ding a, na sabuai kiimah a tu na tate, oliv no dawng hilhhelh tawh kibang ding uh hi. [4] En un, TOPA a zahtak mi tua bangin thupha kipia ding hi. [5] TOPA in Zion panin nang thupha hong pia hen la, na nuntak sung tawntung Jerusalem’ nopsakna mu ta in.
[3] TOPA aw, nangmah in mawhneite ciamteh lecin, TOPA aw, kua in thuakzo ding ahi hiam? [4] Ahih hangin nangmah hong kizahtak theih nadingin nangmah in mawhna na maisak hi.
[19] Amah a zahtakte’ deihna a kicingin tungsak a, amaute’ kikona zong za-in amaute a honkhia hi. [20] TOPA in amah a itte khempeuh kem a, ahih hangin migilo khempeuh amah in susia ding hi.
[10] Ama lungkimna le amah in nuam a saknate pen sakol thahatna le galhangte’ hang hi lo hi. [11] Amah a zahtak mite le ama itna kip a muangte tungah TOPA a lungkim hi.
[7] TOPA zahtakna in pilna kipatna hi a, mihaite in pilna le thuhilhna don lo uh hi.

[29] Note in pilna na deih kei uh a, TOPA na zahtak nuam kei uh hi. [30] Ka thugente na deih kei uh a, kong thuhilhna ngai nuam lo na hih manun, [31] na gamtatna bangun na thuak ding uh a, nomau’ gamtatna mah in note hong gimsak ding hi.

[2] Pilna thute limtakin ngai inla, na theihtel zawh nadingin hanciam in. [3] Thu theih nading hanciam takpi inla, thu muhna ding hahkat takpi in. [4] Ngun, ahih kei leh a kiseel sum manpha zon bangin, hahkatin pilna zong in. [5] Tua hileh, TOPA zahtakna thu na thei ding a, Pasian na theitel ding hi. [6] Bang hang hiam cih leh pilna a piapa pen TOPA hi a, amah pen pilna le siamna a hilh pa ahi hi.
[7] Nangmah a pilin kingaihsun tawm kei inla, TOPA zahtakin a sia peel in. [8] Tua hileh nang a dingin damna zatui tawh kibang ding a, na meimate hong damsakin na natnate hong daisak ding hi.
[13] TOPA zahtakna pen thusia muhdahna hi a, kiphatsakna le kihihsakna, gamtatsia le thuzuau ka mudah hi.
[10] TOPA zahtakna pen pilna kipatna hi a, Siangtho Pa theihna pen thumuhna ahi hi.
[27] TOPA zahtakna in khan sausak a, migilote khansih hi.
[2] Thumanin a gamta mite in TOPA zahtak uh a, a sia-in a gamta mite in TOPA simmawh uh hi.
[26] TOPA a zahtak mi in lungmuanna nei a, a tate’ belhtheih ding mi kician ahi hi. [27] TOPA zahtakna pen nuntakna tuinak tawh kibang a, sihna thang tawh hong kipelhsak hi.
[16] Hau napi-in lungkham sangin zawng napi-in TOPA zahtakna hoihzaw tham hi.
[33] TOPA zahtakna pen pilna mah hi pah a, kiniamkhiatna in pahtawina hong ngahsak hi.
[6] Thumanna le cihtakna mawhmai ngahna hi a, TOPA zahtakna siatna tawh kipelhna ahi hi.
[23] TOPA a zahtakte a khansau a, lungkim takin nuamsa-in om uh a, siatna bangmah tuak kha lo uh hi.
[4] Kiniamkhiat-a TOPA zahtakna thaman in hauhna, minthanna, le khansauna ahi hi.
[17] Mawhnei mite engkha kei inla, TOPA zahtakna zom paisuak in. [18] Tua bang hi lecin lametna om a, cithei-in na khansau ding hi.
[21] Ka ta aw, TOPA le kumpipa zahtak khawm inla, amau a langpangte tawh kipawlkha kei in.
[14] TOPA a zahtak tawntungte pen mi nuamsa hi a, a lungkhauh mite in lungkhamna tuak ding uh hi.
[30] Ngaihbaanna pen zuaupi hithei a, melhoihna zong maimang thei hi. Ahi zongin TOPA a zahtak numei a phattaak ahi hi.
[14] Pasian’ sep khempeuh a kip tawntung ding ahihna ka thei hi. I behlap theih ding om lo a, i paihkhiat ding zong om lo hi. Amah i zahtak theih nadingin Pasian in tua bang ding mahin a bawl ahi hi.
[18] A nih tuakin lenkip in. Pasian na zahtak nakleh khat peuhpeuh na zuihna-ah na maa vang ding hi.

[12] Mawhnei khat in zavei dong siatna bawl napi-in a khansau veve hi. Ahi zongin “Pasian a zahtakte a dingin thu khempeuh nuam ding hi. [13] Migilote a dingin thu nuam lo ding a, amaute in Pasian zahtak lo uh ahih manin a nuntak hun uh niliim bangin beipak ding a, khansih ding uh hi,” kici hi.
[13] Hih thute khempeuh banah gen ding thu khat bek om hi. Mihing hong kipiansakna a thu bulpi pen in: Pasian zahtakna le a thupiakte manna ahi hi.

[12] “Hih mite’ vaihawmna pawlpih kei un. Amau’ kihtakte kihta kei unla, lau kei un. [13] Ahih hangin Vanglian TOPA pen a siangtho-in na ngaihsun ding uh hi. Amah pen note’ zahtak pa le note’ kihtak pa na hisak ding uh hi.

[2] TOPA’ kha in ama tungah ama mite a ukna ding pilna, thutheihna, le siamna pia ding hi. Amah in TOPA’ deihna thei-in TOPA zahtak ding hi. [3] Amah in TOPA’ nasep nuamsa ding hi. Amah in a tungtham bek muhna tawh thu khen lo ding a, kam lengsawn bek zakna tawh thu khentat lo ding hi.
[10] TOPA kihta a, a nasempa’ thu a mangte khempeuh khuamial sungah na pai hangun TOPA muang unla, Pasian suanin nei un.
[19] Tua ahih ciangin nisuahna le nitumna kikalah a om mi khempeuh in amah zahtakin, a vangliatna kihta ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh huihpi nung bang, tuipi khang bangin amah hong pai ding hi.

[19] “Tua hinapi, Judah kumpipa Hezekiah le Judah mi khempeuhte in amah that zenzen uh ahi hiam? Kumpipa in TOPA zahtakin, TOPA’ pahtak ding a nget ciangin TOPA in zong amau’ tungah siatna tunsak dingin a gensa khelkikzaw hi lo ahi hiam? Ahih hangin eite in eite’ tungah siatna lianpi khat i tungsak dektak hi,” a ci uh hi.

[39] Amaute’ hoihna ding le amaute’ nunga a tu a tate uh a hoih nadingin a tawntungin kei hong zahtak nadingun a lungsim uh kikhat sakin, a nuntak dan uh zong ka kikhatsak ding hi. [40] Amaute tungah a tawntungin hoihna ka bawl den nadingin amaute tawh tawntung thuciamna khat ka bawl ding hi. Kei kiang panin a kiheikhiat loh nadingun amaute sungah kei hong zahtakna ding uh lungsim ka guan ding hi.

[26] Ka gam sunga om mi khempeuh in Daniel’ Pasian kihta-in a zahtak nadingun thu ka pia hi. “Bang hang hiam cih leh amah a nungta Pasian hi a, a tawntungin a uk ding hi. Ama gam kisia ngei lo ding a, a vangliatna a bei ngei kei ding hi.
[15] Tua ciangin Jonah domto-in tuipi sungah a khiat uhleh tuipi a dai pah hi. [16] Tua ciangin tua mite in TOPA kihta mahmah uh a, TOPA’ tungah biakna pia-in thuciamna a bawl uh hi.
[7] Tua ahih manin ka mite in kei hong zahtakin ka thuhilhna ngai ding uh a, mangngilh lo ding uh hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi. Ahi zongin a gamtatsiat ngei bangun gamtalai veve uh hi,” a ci hi.

[6] Vanglian TOPA in siampite tungah hih bangin hong ci hi: “Tapa in a pa zahtak a, nasempa in a topa kihta hi. Kei pen na pa uh hinapi, bang hangin hong zahtak lo a, na topa uh hinapi, bang hangin hong kihta lo na hi uh hiam? No siampite in kei hong simmawh napi-in, ‘Bang hong ci simmawh ka hi uh hiam?’ na cilai uh hi.

[14] A tuuhon lakah tuutal cidam nei napi-in, a kamciamsa bangin kei tungah hong piak ciangin, a sitbaang ganhing a hong pia mi khempeuh in samsiatna thuak tahen. Bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen a lian mahmah Kumpipa ka hi a, minam khempeuh in kei hong zahtak uh hi,” a ci hi.

[5] Vanglian TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Note tungah thukhen dingin ka hong pai ding hi; ai tawite, numei tawh a mawhte, a man lopi a teci pangte, numeite’ thaman piakna-ah khemna a zangte; meigong, tagah, le gamdang mite a zawhthawh bawlte, le kei hong zahtak lo mi khempeuhte’ langkhatah thakhatin teci pangin thu ka khen ding hi.

[16] TOPA a zahtak mite khatlekhat tua bangin thu kigen uh a, amaute’ thugennate, TOPA in ngai-in za hi. TOPA in laibu khat nei a, amah zahtakin a thupi ngaihsut mite khempeuh tua sungah kiciamteh hi. [17] Vanglian TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Tua a kiciamteh mite pen keima mite hi ding uh hi. Keimah in na ka sep ni ciangin amaute pen keima neihtuam taktak mite hi ding uh hi. Pa in ama thu a mang a tapa a hehpih mah bangin kei zong amaute ka hehpih ding hi.
[28] Pumpi a thah khit ciangin kha a that thei lote na kihta kei un. Hell khuk sungah pumpi le kha a nihin a susia thei pa na kihtazaw un.
[50] amah a zahtak mite tungah a khangkhangin hehpihna a lak hi.

[4] “Lawmte aw, note kiangah kong genin-ah, pumpi a thahkhit ciangin a siazaw a hihthei nawn lote na kihta kei un. [5] Kuate kihta ding na hi uh hiam cih leh, mite in a thah khitsa mipa pen hell khuk sungah a khiathuah theilai Pasian na kihta un.
[40] Ahi zongin a khat pa in a lawmpa taii a, “Pasian nangawn kihta lo na hi hiam? I vekpi-in gim hong kipiakna kibangkim hi.
[32] ‘Kei pen na pu na pate uh ahi Abraham, Isaac, le Jakob-te’ Pasian ka hi hi,’ a na ci hi. Moses zong lau-in linggawp a, en ngam lo hi.

[31] Tua ahih manin Judea gam, Galilee gam, le Samaria gam sunga om pawlpite in bawlsiatna thuak nawn loin nuamtakin om uh a, Topa zahtakna tawh gamta uh ahih manin Kha Siangtho huhna tawh a mi khangin a kibehlap uh hi.

[34] Tua ciangin Peter a kam ka-in thu hilh ding kipan a, “Pasian in kuamah angvan’ tuam nei loin, [35] kua mi kua mi hitaleh amah zahtakin a manin a gamta mi khempeuh a sanna thu teltakin ka thei hi.

[22] Hih thu-ah Pasian a migit mahmahna le a khauh mahmahna i mu hi. A khial mite tungah khauh mahmah a, ama migitna a kizop paisuak theih nadingin na up paisuak nak-uhleh note tungah hong migi mahmah hi. Ahi zongin na zop paisuak kei uhleh note zong hong kisatkhia ding hi.

[4] Ukna thuneite pen note’ hoih nadingin Pasian’ nasemte ahi uh hi. Ahi zongin a sia-in na gamtat uhleh gim hong pia taktak ding uh ahih manin na lau ding uh ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute pen Pasian’ nasemte hi a, a sia-in a gamta mite tungah Pasian’ hehna bangin gim a pia dingte ahi uh hi.

[11] Pasian zahtak nading thu ka lungsim uhah om tawntung ahih manin mite ka zolzawh nadingun ka hanciam uh hi. Pasian in kote’ lungsim teltakin hong thei a, note in zong na lungsim uhah kei hong thei dingin ka hong um hi.
[1] Tua ahih manin ka hong it lawmte aw, pumpi le lungsim a ninsak theite khempeuh panin kisiansuahin, Pasian zahtakna tawh nungta-in siangtho sinsenin om ni.
[21] Khrih na zahtakna uh hangin na thu uh na kimang tuak un.

[12] Tua ahih ciangin ka hong it sanggamte aw, note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-in ka thu na hong man’ tawntung uh mah bangin, tu-in note tawh ka hong omkhawm loh hun ciangin zong ka thu na hong man’ ding uh thupizaw lai hi. Pasian kihtakna le zahtakna tawh na maa uh nawt unla, amah in note hong hotkhiatna thu a cingtaak suaksak un.

[26] Thuman thutak i theih khit ciangin mawhna i bawl hamtang lai leh i mawhna a kimaisak nadingin biakpiakna dang om nawn lo a, [27] a kihtakhuai thukhenna le Pasian’ thu a nial mite a kangtum ding meikuangpi bek omlai hi.
[28] Tua ahih manin a kilingsak zo lo Pasian’ gam i ngah manin lungdamin, zahtakna le lamdangsakna tawh Pasian’ lungkimna bangin amah bia ni.
[17] Mi khempeuh amau gamtatna tawh kizui-in a kibang kimin thu a khen Pasian kiangah thu na nget uh ciangin, “Pa aw,” ci na hih manun hih leitungah na om laiteng uh amah zahtakin om un.
[17] Mi khempeuh zahtak bawlin thu uppih mite na it unla, Pasian zahtak bawlin kumpipa zong na zahtak un.

[15] Na lungsim sung uhah Khrih zahtakbawl unla, amah Topa-in nei un. Note’ lametna thu a hong dong a omkhak leh hoihtakin a genthei dingin kiging tawntung unla, ahi zongin lungnemna le zahtakna lim tawh gen un.

[18] Na hehna hong kilat hun hong tungta a, misite thukhen nading hun hong tungta ahih manin minam dangte heh mahmah uh hi. Nangma nasem kamsangte, a lian a neu, nang hong kihta mi khempeuhte thaman na piak ding hun hi ta a, leitung a susia mite na suksiat ding hun hi ta hi,” a ci uh hi.

[6] Tua ciangin leitungah a teng mi namkim, pau namkim a zang mite tungah a tawntungin Lungdam nading Thu gen ding a nei vantungmi khat vankim lai-ah a leeng ka mu hi. [7] Amah nakpitakin kiko a, “Amah in mihingte thu a khen ding hun hong tungta ahih manin Pasian kihta unla amah phat un. Van le lei, tuinak le tuipite a bawlpa hong bia ta un,” a ci hi.

[4] Topa aw, nang, kua in hong kihta lo ding a, na liatna hong phat lo ding ahi hiam? Nang bek na siangtho hi. Thumanin na sepnate mi khempeuh in mu uh ahih manin minam khempeuh nang kiangah hong pai-in, na mai-ah hong bia ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
[5] Tua ciangin tokhom panin aw khat hong ging a, “Amah a kihta a lian a neu mite, le ama nasem khempeuhte aw, eite’ Pasian phat un,” a ci hi.
[8] Naupang khang a, nawi tawh hong kikhen ta hi. Isaac nawi tawh a kikhen ni ciangin Abraham in pawi lianpi khat bawl hi.

[28] Amaute in, “Nang tawh TOPA a omna teltakin ka mu uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin, kote in nang hong sukha loin, nang’ tungah bangmah hong hih loin, a hoihin gamta-in lungnuam takin kong sawl khiat mah bangun kote’ tungah nang in siatna nong bawl loh nadingin nang le kote’ kikalah kiciamna khat om hen la, nang tawh thuciamna khat bawl ni, a ci hi ung. Nang pen tu-in TOPA’ thupha piak na hi hi,” a ci uh hi. [29] Amaute in, “Nang tawh TOPA a omna teltakin ka mu uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin, kote in nang hong sukha loin, nang’ tungah bangmah hong hih loin, a hoihin gamta-in lungnuam takin kong sawl khiat mah bangun kote’ tungah nang in siatna nong bawl loh nadingin nang le kote’ kikalah kiciamna khat om hen la, nang tawh thuciamna khat bawl ni, a ci hi ung. Nang pen tu-in TOPA’ thupha piak na hi hi,” a ci uh hi. [30] Tua ahih ciangin amah in amaute a dingin pawi khat bawl a, amaute in pawi an ne-in a dawn uh hi. [31] Zingsangin amaute tho baih uh a, khatlekhat kiciamna a bawl uh hi. Isaac in amaute a lampi ding uhah kha a, ama kiang panin amaute lungnuam takin a paikhia uh hi.
[22] Tua ahih ciangin Laban in tua mun a mi khempeuh kaikhawmin pawi khat a bawl hi.
[54] Jakob in mualtungah biakpiakna pia-in an ne dingin a behte a sam hi. Amaute in an ne uh a, zan tawntung mualtungah a om uh hi.

[9] Moses in, “Ka khangnote uh le ka khanghamte uh tawh ka paikhawm ding uh hi. Ka tapate uh, ka tanute uh, ka tuuhonte uh, le ka bawnghonte uh tawh ka pai ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA a dingin pawi khat ka kham ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[11] Hih bang zia-in na ne ding uh hi: Na kawng uh gakin, na khedap uh na khe uhah bulhin, na ciangkhut uh na khut uhah na tawi ding uh a, na nawh nek ding uh hi. Tua pen TOPA’ Paisan Pawi ahi hi. [12] “Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in tua zanin Egypt gam ka nawk ding a, Egypt leitang tungah mihing hitaleh ganhing hitaleh tacil khempeuh ka vatlum ding a, Egypt pasian-te khempeuh tungah thu ka khen ding hi. Kei pen TOPA ka hi hi. [13] Note’ omna inn tunga sisan pen note a dingin lim hi ding hi. Sisan ka muh ciangin note kong paisan ding a, Egypt leitang ka vatgawp ciangin note hong susia ding gimna note’ tungah hong tung lo ding hi. [14] “Hih pen note a dingin phawkna ni hi ding a, note in TOPA’ tungah pawi bawlna ni-in na nei ding uh hi. Na khang tawntungun note in biakna ngeina kip khatin na nei tawntung ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[17] Note in silngo sawh loh anlum pawi na bawl ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih ni teekteekin Egypt leitang panin na mihonte uh ka paikhiatpih hi. Tua ahih ciangin note in na khan tawntungun hih ni pen biakna ngeina kip khatin na nei tawntung ding uh hi.
[21] Tua ciangin Moses in Israel upate khempeuh samin amaute kiangah, “Nomau a dingin na innkuan uh tawh a kituakin tuunote teel unla, Paisan Pawi bawl nading tuuno go un.

[27] note in, ‘ TOPA’ Paisanna hangin biakpiakna ahi hi. Amah in eite’ innkuante hong khawi-in Egypt mite a thah lai-in Egypt gam sungah Israel innkuante paisan hi,’ na ci ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Mite in a lu uh kunin Pasian a bia uh hi.
[43] TOPA in Moses le Aaron kiangah, “Hih Paisan Pawi pen biakna ngeina kip khat hi ding a, gamdangmi kuamah in ne lo ding hi.

[48] Khualmi khat note kiangah hong peem a, TOPA a dingin Paisan Pawi a bawl leh, ama mipih pasal khempeuh a vun ki-atsak un. Tua khit ciangin amah a nai-ah hong pai-in bawl thei ding a, amah pen gammi khat tawh kibang ding hi. Ahih hangin vun ki-at lo mi kuamah in ne lo ding hi.

[3] Moses in mite tungah, “Salsuahna Egypt gam panin na paikhiat uh hih ni phawk un. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in vangliatna tawh hih mun panin note hong paikhiatpih hi. Silngo sawh anlum kine lo ding hi.
[18] “Numei aisan nu na hingkhawi kei ding uh hi.

[14] “Kum khatin thumvei, keima a dingin pawi na bawl ding uh hi. [15] Silngo sawh loh anlum pawi na bawl ding uh hi. Keimah in note kong thupiak bangin Abib kha sung a kisehsa hun ciangin ni sagih sung silngo sawh loh anlum na ne ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua kha sungin Egypt panin note na paikhia uh hi. Khut hawmguak tawh keima mai-ah kuamah hong kilak lo ding hi. [16] “Note in lo-a na tuh uh, na nasepna uh a gah masa, anlak pawi na bawl ding uh hi. Note in lo panin na nasepna uh a gah na kaihkhop uh kum bei ciangin an kaihkhopna pawi na bawl ding uh hi.

[18] “Silngo sawh loh anlum pawi na bawl ding uh hi. Abib kha, a kisehsa hun sungteng, nang kong thupiak mah bangin ni sagih sung silngo sawh loh anlum na ne ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Abib kha sungin Egypt panin note na paikhia uh hi.

[22] “Nipikalte’ pawi, mangbuh a tung masa pawi, le kum bei ciangin an kaihkhop pawi na bawl ding uh hi. [23] “Pasal khempeuh Israel Pasian, TOPA Pasian’ mai-ah kum khatin thumvei kilak ding uh hi. [24] Bang hang hiam cih leh note’ mai-ah minam dangte ka hawlkhia ding a, na gamgite uh nomau a dingin ka keek ding hi. TOPA na Pasian uh’ mai-ah kum khatin thumvei a kilak dingin na paitoh sungun na leitang uh mi khat peuhpeuh in a hong deihgawh khak ding lunghihmawhna om lo ding hi. [25] “Note in silngo tawh keimah biakpiakna si na pia khawm kei ding uh a, Paisan Pawi biakpiakna zong zingsang dong na omsak kei ding uh hi.

[1] TOPA in Moses kiangah, [2] “Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note in a siangtho biak kikhopnate hi, ci-in na gen ding uh keimah TOPA’ pawi a kisehte hih bang ahi hi. [3] Ni guk sungin nasep kizo ding a, ahih hangin a ni sagih ni pen a thupi tawlngakna Sabbath, a siangtho kikhopna ahi hi. Note in tua ni-in na na sem kei ding uh hi. Tua pen note’ tenna khempeuhah TOPA a dingin Sabbath ahi hi. [4] “Hihte pen amaute a dingin a kiseh hunin note in na gen ding uh ahi TOPA’ pawi a kisehte, a siangtho biak kikhopnate ahi hi. [5] “A kha masa, a ni sawm le li nitak pen TOPA’ Paisan Pawi ahi hi. [6] Tua kha mah, a ni sawm le nga ni pen TOPA’ tungah silngo sawh loh anlum pawi ahi hi. Ni sagih sung note in silngo sawh loh anlum na ne ding uh hi. [7] A ni masa ni-in note in a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uh a, thatang nasep na sem kei ding uh hi. [8] Ahih hangin note in TOPA’ tungah meihal biakna ni sagih sung na pia ding uh hi. A ni sagih ni pen a siangtho kikhopna ni hi ding a, thatang nasep na sem kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[34] “Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Hih kha sagihna a ni sawm le nga ni a kipan ni sagih sung pen TOPA a’ ding buk pawi ahi hi.

[39] “Note in leitang a piangte na kaihkhop khit uh, kha sagihna, a ni sawm le nga ni a kipan ni sagih sung TOPA’ pawi na bawl ding uh hi. A ni masa ni pen a thupi tawlngakna khat hi a, a ni giat ni zong a thupi tawlngakna khat mah hi ding hi.
[41] Note in tua pen kum simin ni sagih sung pawi-in na nei ding uh a, note’ khang tawntungin ngeina khat hi tawntung ding hi. Note in kha sagihna sungah na bawl ding uh hi.

[2] “A kiseh hunin Paisan Pawi, Israel mite khamsak in. [3] A kiseh hun, tu kha ni sawm le li ni nitakin a thukhamte le a ngeina kip omte bangin na kham ding uh hi,” a ci hi. [4] Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Paisan Pawi a kham nadingun Moses in Israel mite tungah a gen hi. [5] Amaute in a kha masa, a ni sawm le li ni nitakin Sinai sehnel gamah Paisan Pawi kham uh a, TOPA in Moses a thupiak bangin Israel mite a gamta uh hi. [6] Misi luang a lawnna uh hangin a nin mi pawlkhat om uh a, tua ni-in amaute in Paisan Pawi kham thei lo uh ahih manin Moses le Aaron’ mai-ah pai uh hi.
[16] “Kha masa a ni sawm le ni li ni pen TOPA’ Paisan Pawi ni ahi hi.
[26] “Na nipikal pawi hunun TOPA’ tungah an thak tawh biakna na piak hun uh anpal piak ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uh hi. Tua ni-in leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh a,
[12] “A kha sagihna ni sawm le ni nga ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat nei-in tua ni-in leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh a, TOPA a dingin ni sagih sung pawi na kham ding uh hi.
[3] A kha masa, tua kha ni sawm le ni nga ni-in Rameses panin amaute ding khia uh hi. Paisan Pawi masa ni khit a zing ciangin Egypt mite khempeuh’ muhna-ah gualzawhna tawh Israel mite paikhia uh a,

[1] “Abib kha tang unla, TOPA na Pasian uh a dingin Paisan Pawi bawl un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Abib kha sungin TOPA na Pasian un Egypt gam panin zanin note hong paikhiatpih hi. [2] Tuuhon pan ahi a, bawnghon pan ahi zongin TOPA in ama min om nadingin a teelna munah Paisan Pawi biakpiakna TOPA na Pasian uh tungah na pia ding uh hi. [3] Silngo sawh anlum tawh na ne kei ding uh a, ni sagih sung silngo sawh loh anlum, gimna anlum tawh na ne ding uh hi. Egypt gam panin nawhsa-in na taikhia uh hi. Egypt gam panin na taikhiat uh hun na nuntak sung tawntung uh na phawk theih nading uh ahi hi. [4] Na gam sung khempeuh uhah ni sagih sung note lakah silngo kimu lo ding hi. A ni masa nitakin biakpiakna-ah na piak uh sa khat peuhpeuh zong a zingsang dong zan tawntung na omsak kei ding uh hi. [5] “ TOPA na Pasian un note hong piak khua khempeuhah Paisan Pawi biakpiakna na pia thei kei ding uh hi. [6] TOPA na Pasian un ama min om nadingin a teelna mun bekah ni a tum khit nitak, Egypt panin na paikhiat uh hunin Paisan Pawi biakpiakna na pia ding uh hi. [7] TOPA na Pasian un a teelna munah huanin na ne ding uh a, zingsang ciangin na puanbukte uhah na ciah thei ding uh hi. [8] Ni guk sung silngo sawh loh anlum na ne ding uh a, a ni sagih ni-in TOPA na Pasian uh a dingin a thupi kikhopna khat na nei ding uh hi. Tua ni-in na na sem kei ding uh hi. [9] “An na lak masak ni uh a kipanin nipikal sagih na simto ding uh hi. [10] Tua ciangin TOPA na Pasian un note thupha hong piakna tawh kizui-in na piak ding uh ahi note’ khutsung panin utthu-a piakna tawh TOPA na Pasian uh tungah nipikal pawi na bawl ding uh hi. [11] TOPA na Pasian uh mai, ama min om nadingin TOPA na Pasian un a teelna munah, note a kipan na tanute le na tapate, na nasem numeite le na nasem pasalte, na khua sunga om Levi mite, peemtate, pa nei lote, le note lakah a om meigong numeite tawh na lungdam khawm ding uh hi. [12] Egypt-ah sila na hihna uh na phawk ding uh a, hih thukhamte zuih ding limtakin na ngaihsun ding uh hi. [13] “Na ancilna uh le na leenggah sukna panun an na kaihkhop uh ciangin ni sagih sung buk pawi na bawl ding uh hi. [14] Tua pawi sungah nang a kipan na tanute le na tapate, na nasem numeite le na nasem pasalte, Levi mite, peemtate, pa nei lote, le na khua sunga om meigong numeite tawh na lungdam khawm ding uh hi. [15] TOPA in a teelna munah ni sagih sung TOPA na Pasian uh tungah pawi na bawl ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note na lungdam khawm theih nadingun na khawhsa uh le na khut uh tawh na sepna khempeuh uhah TOPA na Pasian un note thupha hong pia ding hi. [16] “Amah in a teelna mun, TOPA na Pasian uh mai-ah pasal khempeuh kum khatin thumvei, silngo sawh loh anlum pawi, nipikal pawi, le buk pawi-ah kilaak ding uh hi. Amaute khut hawmguakin TOPA’ mai-ah kilak lo ding uh hi. TOPA na Pasian un note thupha hong piaknasa tawh kizui-in mi khempeuh in ama hih theih bang ciatin pia ding uh hi.

[10] Israel mite Gilgal-a giahphual ah a om sungun tua kha a ni sawm le li ni nitakin Jerikho zanglei-ah Paisan Pawi a bawl uh hi. [11] Paisan Pawi khit a zing ciang ni teekteekin amaute in tua gam a piang silngo sawh loh moh le ankan a ne uh hi.
[10] Tua ciangin numei kiangah a pa paisuk a, Samson in zong tua lai-ah pawi khat a kham hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tangvalte’ hih ngei ahi hi.

[23] Tu-in Filistia uliante a pasian uh Dagon tungah biakna lianpi khat a pia ding le a gualnuam dingin kikhawm uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “I pasian in i khut sungah i gal pa Samson hong piazo hi,” a ci uh hi.

[36] Tua ciangin Nabal kiangah Abigail hong tungkik hi. Kumpipa’ pawi tawh kibangin amah in a inn sungah pawi na kham hi. Nabal lungnuam mahmah hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in zu kham mahmah hi. Tua ahih ciangin zingsang khuavak mateng ama kiangah bangmah gen peuhmah lo hi.

[25] Bang hang hiam cih leh tuni-in amah paisuk khinin, bawngtalte, ganno thaute, le tuute, tampi tak biakna-in pia a, kumpipa’ tapate khempeuh, galkapte a ukpa Joab, le siampi Abiathar sam hi. Amaute in ama a’ ding pawi bawl uh a, ‘Kumpi Adonijah a khansau hen!’ ci uh hi.

[15] Tua ciangin Solomon khanglo a, hih pen a mang na hi hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem-ah amah pai a, TOPA’ Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah amah dingin meihal biaknate le thunuama biaknate pia-in, a nasemte khempeuh a dingin pawi khat a kham hi.

[21] Tua ciangin kumpipa in mi khempeuh thu pia a, “Hih thuciamna laibu sungah a kigelh mah bangin TOPA na Pasian uh pahtawina-in Paisan Pawi bawl un,” a ci hi. [22] Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel-te thu a khen thukhente’ hun a kipan hitaleh, Israel kumpite ahih kei leh Judah kumpite’ hun sung khempeuh tua bang Paisan Pawi kibawl ngei lo hi. [23] Ahih hangin Kumpi Josiah’ uk kum sawm le giatna kumin Jerusalem-ah TOPA a dingin Paisan Pawi kibawl hi. [24] Tua tham loin TOPA’ biakinn sungah siampi Hilkiah in a muh laibu sungah a kigelh thukham kammalte amah in a kipsak theih nadingin Judah gam sung le Jerusalem-a om vankahte, aisante, innsung pasian-te, milimte, le a kihhuai nate khempeuh Josiah in a hemkhia hi.

[8] Tua hun laitakin Solomon le amah tawh a om Israel khempeuh mihon tampi in Hamath lutna panin Egypt lui ciang dongah ni sagih sung pawi a kham uh hi. [9] Tua ciangin a ni giat ni-in amaute in a thukhupna khat nei uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in biakinn apna ni sagih sung pawi kham uh a, tua pawi ni sagih sung kibawl hi. [10] A kha sagihna a ni thum ni-in, TOPA in David le Solomon, le ama mi Israel tungah a hoih a bawlna hangin amah in lungdamna le kipakna tawh a inn uhah mite a ciahsak hi.

[1] Israel Pasian, TOPA’ Paisan Pawi a bawl dingin Jerusalem-a TOPA’ biakinn-ah hong pai nadingun Hezekiah in Israel mi khempeuh le Judah mite kiangah mi sawl a, Efraim mite le Manasseh mite tungah zong laikhakte a gelh hi. [2] Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa le a uliante le Jerusalem-a a kikhawm khempeuh in Paisan Pawi a kha nihna sungin bawl ding kikum khin uh hi.

[5] Tua ahih ciangin mite hong pai-in Israel Pasian, TOPA a dingin Jerusalem-ah Paisan Pawi a bawl nadingun Beersheba panin Dan ciang dong Israel sung khempeuhah taangkona khat a bawlna ding uh thukhensatna khat bawl uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh bawl dinga a kigen bangin amaute in a lianpi-in bawl ngei lo uh hi.
[13] Tua ciangin a kha nihna sungin silngo sawh loh anlum pawi a bawl dingin Jerusalem-ah mihon tampi tak hong pai uh hi.

[15] Tua ciangin amaute in a kha nihna a ni sawm le li ni-in Paisan Pawi tuuno go uh hi. Tua ciangin biakna vai-in a siangtho nai lo siampite le Levi mite nakpitakin maizum uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amau mah kisiansuahin TOPA’ biakinn sungah meihal biaknate hong paipih uh hi. [16] Pasian’ mipa Moses’ thukham bangin amaute in amau’ panmun ngei hong la uh a, siampite in Levi mite’ khut tung panin a ngah uh sisan theh uh hi. [17] Bang hang hiam cih leh a kikhawm lakah amau mah a kisiansuah nai lo tampi om uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin TOPA’ tungah a siangtho-in a kibawl nadingun a nin khempeuh a dingin Levi mite in Paisan Pawi tuuno a gawh ding uh kisam hi. [18] Bang hang hiam cih leh mi tampi tak, Efraim, Manasseh, Issakhar, le Zebulun sung pan, amau mah kisiansuah nai lo uh a, ahi zongin ngeina lopi-in amaute in Paisan Pawi ne uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Hezekiah in amaute a dingin thu ngenin, “Ka pute ka pate uh’ Pasian a dik TOPA aw, [19] biakinn sianthona ngeina om bangin lungsim tak tawh nang hong biate khempeuh’ mawhna maisak in,” a ci hi. [20] Tua ciangin TOPA in Hezekiah’ thungetna pia-in mite’ mawhna maisak a, gimna ngahsak lo hi.
[23] Tua ciangin adang ni sagih sung mah tua pawi a bawlthuah lai ding uh a kikhawm khempeuh thukim uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in lungdamna tawh adang ni sagih sung mah bawlthuah uh hi.
[1] Josiah in TOPA a dingin Jerusalem-ah Paisan Pawi bawl hi. Amaute in a kha masa a ni sawm le li ni-in Paisan Pawi tuuno go uh hi.

[6] Tua ciangin Paisan Pawi bawlna ganhing go-in nomau mah kisiansuah unla, Moses’ tungtawnin TOPA’ thugen bangin na sanggamte uh a dingin kithawi un,” a ci hi. [7] Tua ciangin Josiah in tua lai-a a om mi khempeuhte a dingin Paisan Pawi piakna-in a ganhon panin mi nautangte tungah tuunote le keelnote tul sawmthum ciang dong, le bawngtal tulthum a pia hi. Hihte pen kumpipa’ neihsa sung pan a kipia ahi hi. [8] Tua ciangin ama uliante in zong utna lungsim tawh mite tung, siampite tung, le Levi mite tungah a pia uh hi. Pasian’ biakinn-ah ulianpite ahi Hilkiah, Zekhariah, le Jehiel-te in siampite tungah Paisan Pawi bawl nadingin tuuno le keelno tulnih le zaguk, le bawngtal zathum a pia uh hi. [9] Levi mi ukpite Konaniah, Shemaiah, le a sanggam Nethanel, Hashabiah, Jeiel le Jozabad-te in Paisan Pawi piak nadingin Levi mite tungah tuuno le keelno tulnga, le bawngtal zanga a pia uh hi. [10] Nasepna ding a kithawi khit uh ciangin, siampite amau’ munah ding uh a, kumpipa’ thupiakna bangin Levi mite amau’ khen sungah om uh hi. [11] Tua ciangin amaute in Paisan tuuno go uh a, Levi mite in a vun a hawk laitakun siampite in amau’ tung panin a ngah uh sisan a theh uh hi. [12] Tua ciangin amaute in, Moses laibu sungah a kigelh bangin TOPA’ tungah piak dingin mi nautang sungah a innkuan a pawlpawl tawh kizui-in a hawm theih nadingun meihal biaknate a tuamkoih uh hi. Tua bangin amaute in bawngtalte zong a hih uh hi. [13] Tua ciangin amaute in biakna ngeina kip tawh kizui-in Paisan tuuno sa mei-ah a hang uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in beel sung, beelpi sung, le sikbeel daite sungah a siangtho piaknate huan uh a, mi nautang khempeuh kiangah tuate manlang takin a puak uh hi.

[16] Tua ahih ciangin Kumpi Josiah’ thupiakna bangin Paisan Pawi bawlna ding le TOPA’ biakna tau tungah meihal biaknate piak nadingin tua ni-in TOPA’ nasepna ding khempeuh a kithawi uh hi. [17] Tua lai-ah a om Israel mite in tua hunin Paisan Pawi, le Silngo Sawh loh Anlum Pawi ni sagih sung a bawl uh hi. [18] Kamsang Samuel huna kipan Israel sungah tua bang Paisan Pawi kibawl ngei lo hi. Josiah le siampite le Levi mite, le tua lai-ah a om Judah le Israel mi khempeuh, le Jerusalem-a a teng mite in a bawl Paisan Pawi tawh a kibang, Israel kumpite kuamah in bawl ngei lo hi. [19] Josiah’ uk a kum sawm le giatna kumin hih Paisan Pawi kibawl hi.
[4] Tua ciangin amaute in a kikipsaksa bangin buk pawi bawl uh a, nisimin zat dingin a kisehsa zah bangin meihal biakna nisimin a pia uh hi.

[18] Tua ciangin Moses laibu sungah a kigelh bangin Jerusalem-a Pasian’ nasep nadingin siampite amau’ panmun ngei-ah pangsak uh a, Levi mite amau’ nasepna ngei-ah a semsakkik uh hi. [19] A kha masa a ni sawm le li ni-in sal a suaksa a hong ciahkik mite in Paisan Pawi a bawl uh hi. [20] Siampite le Levi mite a vekpi-un kisiansuah khin uh a, a vekpi-un zehsiang khin uh hi. Tua hi a, amaute in sal suaksa a hong ciahkik khempeuh a’ ding, a siampipihte uh le amau mahmah a dingin Paisan tuuno a go uh hi. [21] Salsuahna panin a hong ciahkik Israel-te le Israel Pasian, TOPA a bia dingin tua gam a midang tengte le a nitna uh pan amau le amau a kihemkhia tawm mite khempeuh in tua Paisan Pawi an a ne uh hi. [22] Tua hi a, amaute in lungdamna tawh ni sagih sung silngo sawh loh anlum pawi a bawl uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ lungdamna ding a om theih nadingin TOPA in Assiria kumpipa’ lungsim amau’ tungah a nuam dingin a bawlsak hi. Tua ahih manin Israel Pasian ahi Pasian’ biakinn a sepna uhah kumpipa in amaute a huh hi.

[14] Tua ciangin, a kha sagihna pawi hun sungin sawlbuk sungah Israel mite a omna ding thu, le amaute in a khuapi khempeuh uh le Jerusalem-ah taangko-in, “A kigensa bangin sawlbuk lam nadingin gamlakah pai unla oliv hiangte, gamlak oliv hiangte, mui sing hiangte, le a teh tam singhiang dangte va sat un,” ci-in a gen ding uh, Moses tungtawnin TOPA in a thupiakna pen thukham sungah a kigelh lam a mu uh hi.
[4] Ama tapate in inn khat panin inn khatah a ban banin pawi bawlin pai kawikawi uh a, tua pawi a siim dingin a sanggam numei thumte uh zong a sam kawikawi uh hi.
[1] Kitawng kawmkawmin pawipi sungah an nekna sangin lungnuam takin mohkeu themkhat nekna hoihzaw hi.
[14] Note’ Khadet nite le na pawite uh ka mudah hi. Tuate pen kei a dingin vangikpi khat suakkhin a, tuate khempeuh ka puakna-in ka gim hi.

[29] Ahi zongin no Pasian’ mite in ahihleh biakna pawi a kikham ni zan a bangin la na sa ding uh hi. Israel-te a hu TOPA’ biakinn-ah a pai dingin tamngai aw ginna zui-in a kuankhiate bangin na lungdam ding uh hi.
[21] “A kha masa a ni sawm le li ni-in Paisan Pawi na kipan ding uh a, mi khempeuh in ni sagih sung silngo sawh loh anlum na ne ding uh hi.
[1] Kumpi a suah ciangin Belshazzar in pawi lianpi khat bawl a, a mi liante tulkhat samin amaute tawh zu a ne uh hi.

[21] Na biakna pawite uh mudahin ka deih kei a, na biak kikhopnate uhah ka lung a kim kei hi. [22] Meihal biakna le an tawh biakna nong paipih uh hangin tuate kong sang kei ding hi. Thunuama biakpiak nadingin na hong paipih uh a thau mahmah ganhingte zong et-in ka nei vet kei ding hi. [23] La sa-in na gamlumnate uh khawl un; na lasakna uh a gingte ka za nuam kei hi. [24] Thutang, tui bangin luangkhiasak unla, thuman, a kang ngei lo tui bangin luangsak un.

[15] En un, mualtungah kamtai pa hong tai a, gualzawhna ding thupha hong gen ding ahi hi. Judah mite aw, pawi bawl unla, Pasian’ tungah na ciam bangun gamta un. Bang hang hiam cih leh migilote kisusiacip khin a, na gam uh hong simkik nawn lo ding hi.

[16] Tua bangin galte a kizawhgawp khit ciangin, galte sung panin a nungtalai mite in Vanglian TOPA, kumpi ahihna hangin a bia ding le ama gualzawhna pawi a bawl dingin kumsimin Jerusalem-ah pai tawntung ding uh hi. [17] Minam khat peuhpeuh, Vanglian TOPA ahi kumpipa a bia dingin Jerusalem-ah a painop kei leh amau’ gam sungah guah zu lo ding hi. [18] Tua gualzawhna pawi a bawl dingin Egypt mite a painop kei leh, tua bangin a pai nuam lo minamte’ thuak ding gimnate mah, amau’ tungah a tung ding hi. [19] Gualzawhna pawi a bawl dingin a pai nuam lo Egypt mite le minam dang khempeuhte tungah a tung ding gimna pen tu-a bang ahi hi.
[6] Ahi zongin Herod’ suah ni pawi bawl hun hong tun ciangin mihonte mai-ah Herodias’ tanu hong laam ciangin Herod lungdam mahmah ahih manin,

[1] Jesuh in amaute kiangah thugentehna dang khat zangin thu hilh a, [2] “Vantung ki-ukna zia pen a tapa a dingin mo pawi a bawl kumpipa’ gamtatzia tawh kibang hi. [3] Mopawi siim dingin a khohsa mite a sam dingin a nasemte sawl a, ahi zongin kuamah pai lo hi. [4] Tua ciangin nasem dangte sawl leuleu a, ‘Ka khohsaksa mite kiangah hih bangin va gen un: Ka bawngtalte le ka bawngno thaute kigo khin a, nitak an a minsa-in a om banah, na khempeuh a mansa-in om khinta hi. Mopawi an ne dingin hong pai ta un, ci hi, ci-in va gen un,’ a ci hi. [5] Ahi zongin a khohsa mite in na thusim lo uh a, pawlkhat in lo na kuansanin, pawlkhat in a sumbukah na paisanin, [6] adangte in a nasemte manin a na satgawp khit uh ciangin a na that uh hi. [7] Kumpipa zong heh mahmah a, a galkapte kuansakin tua mi thatte a thahsak khit ciangin a khua a haltumsak hi. [8] Tua ciangin a nasemte kiangah, ‘Mopawi an a baihsa-in om a, ahi zongin ka sap mite a ne dingin a kilawm lo mi a suak uh hi. [9] Tua ahih manin lamlianpi-ah va pai unla, mi na muh zahzah uh hong sam un,’ a ci hi. [10] Nasemte zong lamlianpi-ah va pai uh a, mihoih mi hoih lo ci loin a muh khempeuh uh va kaikhawm uh ahih manin mo pawi bawlna innsung dimin leengla hong om hi. [11] “Kumpipa, a leenglate a en dingin a hong lut ciangin mo pawi siimna puan a silhlo mi khat a mu hi. [12] Ama kiangah, ‘Lawm aw, mo pawi siimna puan silhlopi-in hih lai-ah hong bangci luttheih na hi hiam?’ a cih ciangin tua mipa in a cih nading a thei kei hi.

[17] Silngo Sawh loh Anlum Pawi a kipat ni-in nungzuite in Jesuh kiangah, “Paisan Pawi annek ding koilai takah hong bawlsak le ung deih na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. [18] Jesuh in, “Jerusalem khua sungah va pai unla, tua mipa kiangah, ‘Siapa in, “Ka hun hong naita hi. Na inn-ah ka nungzuite tawh Paisan Pawi an ka hong ne ding uh hi,” ci hi,’ va ci un,” a ci hi.
[15] Paisan Pawi hun simin Rom gam ukpa in mihonte’ deih thongkia mi khat a khah a ngeina ahi hi.

[21] Ahi zongin a tawpna-ah Herodias in hunhoih ngah hi. Herod a suah ni hun a tun ciangin kumpi uliante, galkapmangte, le Galilee gam sunga om ulian khempeuh a dingin pawi a kham hi. [22] Tua pawi bawlna sungah Herodias’ tanu hong pai-in hong laam a, Herod le a leenglate khempeuh lungdam mahmah uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in, “Bang deih na hiam; na deih peuhpeuh kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
[39] Kikhopna inn sungah, uliante a dingin a kikoihcing tutphah nuamte tungah tunuam uh a, pawi sungah zong uliante’ tutna mun hoihte bekah a tunuam uh hi.
[6] Paisan Pawi hun simin mite in Pilat tungah a nget peuhpeuh mi khat, thong panin a khah a ngeina ahi hi.
[41] Kumsimin Jerusalem khua-a Paisan Pawi a kibawlna-ah Jesuh’ nu le pa a pai zel uh ahi hi.
[29] Tua ciangin Levi in ama inn-ah Jesuh vakna annek pawipi bawl a, annekna sabuai-ah siahdong dang tampite le midangte zong tawh a tukhawm uh hi.

[13] Tua bangin anvakna pawi na bawl ciangin mizawngte, khezawte, khebaite, le mittawte sam in. [14] Amaute in nang hong thukkik zo lo ding uh ahih manin nang a dingin a lungdamhuai hong hi ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh sihna panin mihoihte a thawhkik hun ciangin Pasian in nang tungah hong thukkik ding hi,” a ci hi.

[8] Tua ciangin Jesuh in tua ahih kei leh zong, “Numei khat in sum peek sawm a neih sung panin khat mansuah leh bangcih ding ahi hiam? Meivak vakin, a innsung teng phiatin, a muh matengin mun khempeuh limtakin zong ding hi. [9] A muh ciangin a lawmte le a vengte samin amaute kiangah, ‘Ka sum mansuahsa mukik ka hih manin ka nuam mahmah hi. Lungdamna pawi bawl ni,’ ci ding hi. [10] Tua mah bangin mawhnei mi khat a kisikkikna hangin Pasian’ vantung mite lungdam mahmah uh hi,” a ci hi.

[22] Ahi zongin a pa in a nasemte sam a, ‘Hong manlang un. Puan hoihpen hong la unla silhsak un. A khutme-ah zungbuh butsak unla, a khe-ah khedap zong bulhsak un. [23] Tua ciangin i bawngno limcipen hong go unla, lungdam pawi bawl ni. [24] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka tapa a sisa hong nungta a, ka tapa a mangsa hong tungkik hi,’ a ci hi. Tua ahih manin lungdamna pawi bawl a kipan uh hi.

[29] A tapa uzaw in, ‘Tu a beisa hunsung khempeuh, nasemte khat bangin nangma a dingin na ka sem a, na thu zong kong nial ngei het kei hi. Tua hinapi, kei bang hong pia ngei na hi hiam? Ka lawmte tawh pawi ka bawl nadingin keel khat nangawn nong pia kei hi.
[32] Tu-in na naupa a sisa hong hingkik a, a mangsa hong tungkik ahih manin lungdamin pawi i bawl ding ahi hi,’ ci-in a pa in a dawng hi,” a ci hi.

[46] “Thukham hilh siate na batkhak loh nadingun kidawm un. Amaute in puantualpi silhnuam uh a, mihon lakah a kizahtak hopih ding deihin, kikhopna innsung le pawi lakah a om uh ciangin uliante’ tutna mun hoihte bekah tunuam uh hi.
[1] Tu-in Paisan Pawi a kici Silngo Sawh loh Anlum Pawi hun hong naita hi.
[8] Jesuh in Peter le Johan kiangah, “Va pai unla, eite’ Paisan Pawi annek ding va vaihawm un,” ci-in a sawl hi.

[11] a innteek pa kiangah, ‘Siapa in: Ka nungzuite tawh Paisan Pawi an ka nektheih nading uh inndei koi lai hiam, ci hi,’ ci-in va dong un. [12] Amah in a baihsa-in a na kikoihsa inndei tungnung a zai khat hong lak ding hi. Tua lai-ah a kisam khempeuh a baihsa-in na koih un,” a ci hi. [13] Amau tegel zong pai uh a, Jesuh’ gensa bang teekteekin va mu uh a, tua lai-ah Paisan Pawi annek ding a bawl uh hi. [14] A hun a tun ciangin Jesuh zong sawltakte tawh sabuai-ah a tu hi. [15] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Sihna ka thuakma-in note tawh hih Paisan Pawi an i nekkhop ding ka ut mahmah khat ahi hi. [16] A mantakin kong genin-ah, Pasian’ Ukna sungah a cingtaak Paisan Pawi hun hong tun mateng, Paisan Pawi an ka ne ngei nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
[17] (Paisan Pawi hun simin Pilat in amaute’ deih thongkia khat a khah ding ahi hi.)

[1] Tua zawh ni nih khit ciangin Galilee gam Kana khua-ah mo pawi om a, Jesuh’ nu zong tua pawi-ah a om hi. [2] Jesuh le a nungzuite zong tua pawi-ah a kisam hi. [3] Leenggahzu a bei ciangin Jesuh’ nu in, “Leenggahzu om nawn lo hi,” ci-in Jesuh kiangah a gen hi. [4] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Nu aw, bang hangin na lunghihmawhna hong ko zenzen na hi hiam? Keima hun tung nai lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[13] Jew mite’ Paisan Pawi hun hong naita ahih manin Jerusalem khua-ah Jesuh a pai hi.
[23] Paisan Pawi hun laitakin Jerusalem khua sungah Jesuh a om sungin Jesuh in vangliatna tawh nalamdang a bawlte mu uh ahih manin mi tampi in amah a um uh hi.
[45] Paisan Pawi hun laitakin Jerusalem-ah Galilee mite va pai-in, tua pawi sungah Jesuh’ septe khempeuh mu khin uh ahih manin, Jesuh a tun ciangin Galilee mite in na limbawl mahmah uh hi.
[4] Jew mite’ Paisan Pawi hun nai mahmah ta hi.
[22] Jerusalem-ah Biakinn Apkikna Pawi bawl hun hong tung a, phalbi hunsung ahi hi.
[55] Jew mite’ Paisan Pawi hun hong nai ciangin, tua pawi kipatma hun sungin biakna vai-in kisiansuahna a bawl dingin gam sung khuate panin Jerusalem khuapi-ah mi tampi hong pai uh hi.

[1] Tu-in Paisan Pawi hun ding ni khat bek in sam a, Jesuh in hih leitung nusia-in a Pa kiangah a pai ding hun a tunna thu a thei hi. Hih leitungah a om ama mite it mahmah ahih manin a hih theihna zah ciang tawh a itna a lak hi.

[28] Tua ciangin Kaiafas’ inn panin gam ukpa Pilat’ omna kumpi inn-ah Jesuh a paipih uh hi. Tua hun pen zingsang tung ahi hi. Jew mite ahihleh Paisan Pawi annekna sungah kihel nuam uh ahih manin biakna vai-in a siang a suahtheih nadingun kumpi inn huang sungah lut lo uh hi.
[14] Tua ni pen Paisan Pawi hun ding Kigin’ ni hi a, sunkim laitak hun ahi hi. Pilat in Jew mihonte kiangah, “Hih lai-ah na Kumpipa uh om!” a cih ciangin
[4] Peter a kimat khit ciangin thongah kikoih a, galkap li ciat a om galkap pawl lite in a cin dingin ki-ap hi. Herod in Paisan Pawi a ven’ ciangin mipi mai-ah Peter thu sit dingin a ngaihsut ahi hi.

[7] Note na siangtho theih nadingun mawhna silngo luite na paikhia un. Tua hileh silngo sawh loh annel lom thak na hi ding uh a, zong ahi takpi mah na hi uh hi. Bang hang hiam ci leh i Paisan Pawi hun hong tungta a, eite’ Paisan Tuuno ahi Khrih kigo khinzo ta hi. [8] Tua ahih ciangin mawhna le gitlohna ahi silngo lui a kisawh anlum tawh Paisan Pawi bawl loin, silngo a kisawh lo, sianthona le thutakna tawh bawlzaw ni.
[16] Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn, biakna pawite, Khadet pawi, le Sabbath ni tawh kisai-in kuamah in ngeina zuih ding bawl kei un.
[28] Mi That Vantungmi in Israel mite ta upa pen khempeuh a thahkhak loh nadingin Paisan Pawi kipiangsakin, inntual kongtungzawl khempeuh sisan a kizutna zong upna hang mah ahi hi.

[10] Teci a pang tua kamsang nihte in leitung mite tungah gimna nakpitakin tungsak uh ahih manin hih mi nihte a sihna hangin lungdamin pawi bawl ding uh a, a nuamna uh hangin khatlekhat letsong kipia ding uh hi.

[7] Tuuno’ zineih ding hun hong tungta a, a Lawmnu a kithawisa-in omkhin ahih manin lungdam kipakin amah phat ni. [8] Puan hoih mahmah, siangin a pak mahmahte, ama silh dingin kipia hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua puan hoih pen Pasian’ mi siangthote’ gamtatna mante ahi hi. [9] Tua ciangin vantungmi in keima kiangah, “Hih thu gelh in: Tuuno’ zineihna pawi-ah a kisam mite a hampha mahmah ahi hi,” hong cihkhit ciangin, “Hihte pen Pasian’ gen taktak kammal ahi hi,” hong cithuah lai hi.

[28] “Tua khit ciangin mi khempeuh tungah ka kha ka sung ding a, na puteekte un mang manin na tangvalte un maang mu ding uh hi. [29] Tua hun ciangin nasem numei le nasem pasalte tung nangawnah ka kha ka sung ding hi.

[16] Keimah in Pa kiangah ka ngen ding a, note tawh a omkhawm tawntung dingin Thuman a hong lak Kha Siangtho, note hong Huhpa ding a hong pia ding hi. [17] Leitung mite in tua Kha Siangtho mu thei lo, theithei lo uh ahih manin sang thei lo ding uh hi. Ahi zongin note sungah tua Kha Siangtho hong om ding ahih manin note in na thei ding uh hi.

[25] “Note tawh ka hong omkhawm hun sungin hih thute a hong gen ka hi hi. [26] Ahi zongin Pa in keima tangin a hong sawl ding Huhpa Kha Siangtho a hong tun ciangin note tungah thu khempeuh hong hilh ding a, note tungah ka hong gensa thu khempeuh zong hong phawksakkik ding hi.

[1] Lawm Theofilas aw, Lai ka hong gelh masakna sungah Jesuh in nasep a kipat tung a kipanin vantungah amah a kilaktoh hun ciang dong, a thuhilhna le a septe khempeuh cingtakin ka gelh hi. Ama sawltak dingin a teelsa mite, Kha Siangtho tungtawnin thu a vaikhak khit ciangin vantungah amah kilato hi.

[8] Ahi zongin note tungah Kha Siangtho hong tun ciangin vangliatna tawh na kidim ding uh a, Jerusalem khuasung, Judea gam sung, Samaria gam sung, le leimong dongin note in keima thu na gen ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[1] Pentekos ni hong tun ciangin Jesuh a um mi khempeuh mun khatah kikhawm uh hi. [2] Tua laitakin huihpi nung bangin huging khat hong tungvat a, amaute’ kikhopna innsung khempeuh hong dim hi. [3] Tua ciangin leii tawh a kibang meikuang bang pian amaute lakah hong kithehthang a, tuate in mi khempeuh sukha kim hi. [4] Amaute khempeuh Kha Siangtho tawh kidim uh a, tua Kha in minam dangte’ pau tawh amaute a pau theisak hi. [5] Tua laitakin biakna pawi siim dingin gam tuamtuam panin a hong pai Jew mi biakna hahkat mi tampi tak, Jerusalem khua sungah a om uh hi. [6] Hih huging a zak uh ciangin mihon tampi tak hong kikhawm uh a, hih Jesuh a um mite’ thugen pen amau’ pau ciatin za uh ahih manin lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi. [7] Amaute in hih thu lamdangsa mahmah uh ahih manin, “Hih thugen mite pen Galilee mi vive hi lo ahi hiam? [8] Tua hinapi-in bang hangin amaute’ thugen pen eima pau ciatin za ihi hiam? [9] Eite pen Parthia gam, Media gam, Elam gam, Mesopotamia gam, Judea gam, Kappadosia gam, Pontas gam, Asia gam, [10] Frigia gam, Pamfilia gam, Egypt gam, le Sairin khuapi gei-a om Libya gamte pan ihi a, pawlkhatte Rom gam pan ihi hi. [11] Jew mite le Gentail mi Jew biakna a zuite ihi a, pawlkhatte pen Krete gam le Arabia gam pan ihi hi. Tua bang hinapi-in, Pasian’ sep na lamdang liante a kigenna eima pau ciatin i za hi,” a ci uh hi.

[38] Tua ciangin Peter in amaute kiangah, “Na mawhna uh kisik unla, na mawhna uh hong kimaisak theih nadingin Jesuh Khrih min tawh tui kiphum ciat un. Tua hileh Pasian’ piakkhong Kha Siangtho na ngah ding uh hi.
[15] Tua thu gen dingin ka kipat laitakin eite in Kha Siangtho i ngah cil huna mah bangin amaute tungah Kha Siangtho hong tung hi.

[1] Korin khua-ah Apollos a om laitakin Paul khual hong zinin Efesa khua hong tung hi. Tua khua-ah thu um mi pawlkhat tawh kimu a, [2] “Thu na up uh ciangin Kha Siangtho na ngah uh hiam?” ci-in a dot leh, “Kha Siangtho a omlam nangawn ka za nai kei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. [3] Tua ciangin Paul in, “Tua ahihleh na kituiphumna dan uh bangci bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Tuiphumpa Johan’ thugen bang pawl ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. [4] Tua ciangin Paul in, “Johan’ hilh tuiphumna pen mawhna a kisik mite a’ ding ahi hi. Amah in Israel mite kiangah, ‘Keima nunga hong pai ding pa Jesuh um un,’ ci-in gen hi,” a ci hi. [5] Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Topa Jesuh’ minin tui a kiphum uh hi. [6] Paul in amaute tungah a khut a ngakkhit ciangin amaute tungah Kha Siangtho hong tung hi. Amaute in pau lamdang hong paupah uh a, Pasian’ thu zong a gen uh hi.
[16] Paul in Jerusalem khua-ah Pentekos Pawi hun lapnuam ahih manin Asia gam sungah ban man dingin ngaihsun lo a, Efesa khua-ah taam sawm lo hi.

[30] Bangmahin a kimang lo hih nasempa ahihleh pualam khuamialna lakah lawnkhia un. Tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding hi,’ ci hi.

[34] Tua ciangin Jesuh in mihonpite le a nungzuite ama kiangah sam a, “Mi khatpeuh ka nungzui a suahnop leh ama deihna bangin gamta nawn loin a singlamteh kisuanin hong zui ding hi. [35] Hih a leitung nuntakna a hu nuamte in a nuntakna bulpi nangawn tawh suplawh ding a, keima hang le lungdamna thu hangin a nuntakna a suplawhte in a nuntakna bulpi huzo ding hi. [36] Mi khatpeuh in hih leitung khempeuh a ngah hangin a nuntakna bulpi suplawh leh bang phattuamna om ahi hiam?

[28] Mi khatpeuh in inn lianpi khat lamding a sawm le, ka zozo ding hiam cih a theih nadingin a bei dingzah tuat masa hi. [29] Tua bangin tuat masa kei leh tua inn a khuampite a phuhkhit ciangin zawh lohpi-in khawl ding a, tua inn a kizo lo a mu mite khempeuh in amah nuihsan ding uh hi. [30] ‘Hih mipa in inn lamding kipan napi-in zozo lo hi,’ ci ding uh hi. [31] Galkap tul sawm a nei kumpi khat in galkap tul sawmnih tawh a hong kuan kumpi khat do dingin a kithawi leh, tua kumpipa a dozo ding mahin i hat takpi hiam ci-in ngaihsun masa ding hi. [32] A zozo ding ahih vet kei leh, tua kumpipa a hong tun ma, a gamla-ah a om lai-in, ama kiangah kamtaite sawl ding a, kilem nading thu gensak ding hi.

[6] Tua ciangin amah in, “Na gunkuang taklam pang uhah na ngen uh paai le-uhcin na man ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Amaute in zong a ngen uh paai uh a, ngasa tam awk lua ahih manin a ngen uh a kaizo kei uh hi.
[31] Hih teng bang ahih khit ciangin bang gen ding om nawn ahi hiam? Pasian in eite hong koppih peuh leh kua in eite hong zozo ding ahi hiam?

[15] Tua ahih ciangin hoihtakin kingaihsunin gamta unla, mihaite bang hi loin mipilte bangin gamta un. [16] Tuhun pen hun hoih lo hun ahih manin na hun neih khempeuh uh a hoih lamin zang un. [17] Tua ahih manin hai ommawk kei unla, Topa in bang a sem dingin hong deih ahi hiam, ci-in kan un.
[7] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in eite tungah meidawina lungsim hong guan lo a, thahatna, ki-itna, pumpi ki-ukzawhna lungsim hong guan hizaw hi.
[35] Tua ahih manin thaman lianpi a hong ngahsak thei na lungsim hanna uh na khahsuah kei un.

[5] Sum deihluatna tawh na kipelh nadingun na nuntakna uhah kikem unla, na neihzah uh tawh lungkim un. Pasian in, “Note ka hong nusia ngei kei ding a, ka hong tamasak ngei kei ding hi,” hong ci hi. [6] Tua ahih manin kimuanna lungsim tawh hangtakin, “Topa, kei hong huhpa hi a, ka lau kei ding hi. Kua in bang hong cihzo ding ahi hiam?” ci ngam ni.

[13] Tuni ahih kei leh zing ciangin tua khua tua khua-ah va pai-in, kum khat bang va omin, sumbawlin a meet tampi va ngah ni, a ci mite aw, ka thugen hong ngai dih un. [14] Zing ciangin na nuntakna uh bangci ding cih nangawn na thei kei uh hi. Meiilum tawlkhat sung kaii-in a mangthang pak tawh a kibang lel na hi uh hi. [15] Note in, “Topa in hong thukimpih nakleh nungta-in tua bang tua bang i sem ding hi,” na cih ding uh hi bek hi.
[8] Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, le zuaugente om nading mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[22] “Note in na leitang panun an na lak uh ciangin, na lonawl dongun la loin, an na lak khit uh ciangin a sangte zong na khawm kei ding uh a, mizawngte le khualmi a dingin tuate na nusia ding uh hi; kei pen TOPA na Pasian uh ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
[10] Citna tawh amah na pia ding uh a, amah na piak uh ciangin lungsim neihna na nei kei ding uh hi. TOPA na Pasian un na sepna na hihna khempeuh uhah hih thu hangin note thupha hong pia ding hi.
[63] Solomon in thunuama biakna-in TOPA’ tungah bawngtal tul sawmnih le tulnih le tuu tul zakhat le tul sawmnih a pia hi. Tua bangin kumpipa le Israel mi khempeuh in TOPA’ biakinn a ap uh hi.

[7] Tua gam sungah guah zu lo ahih manin tawlkhat khit ciangin a lui a kang hi. [8] Tua ciangin Elijah kiangah TOPA’ thu hong tung a, [9] “Ding inla, Sidon mite’ khua Zarefath-ah pai-in tua lai-ah om in. Tua lai-ah nangmah a hong vak dingin meigongnu khat thu ka piazo hi,” a ci hi. [10] Tua ahih ciangin amah dingin Zarefath-ah a pai hi. Khuapi kulhkongpi a tun ciangin, meigongnu khat in sing na tom hi. Amah in tua nu samin, “Ka dawn theih nadingin beel khat sungah tui tawm hong paipih in,” a ci hi. [11] Tua nu in paipih dingin a kisak laitakin, amah in tua nu samin, “Anlum neu khat hong tawi kawm in,” a ci hi. [12] Tua ciangin amah in, “ TOPA na Pasian a nungta ahih mah bangin emsa bangmah ka nei kei a, beel sungah annel khutdim khat le um sungah sathau tawmno khat bek om hi. Tu-in keimah le ka tapa a dingin tuate bawlin kote in ka nek theih nadingun singkang nih khawng a tom ka hi a, tua ciangin a si ta ding ka hi uh hi,” a ci hi. [13] Tua ciangin Elijah in ama kiangah, “Lunghimawh kei in; pai inla na gensa bangin an hong bawl in. Kei a dingin mohneu khat hong bawlsak masa-in kei kiangah hong paipih inla, tua khit ciangin nang le na tapa a’ ding bawl in. [14] Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel Pasian, TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: ‘ TOPA in leitungah guah a zuksak ni matengin beel sunga annel bei lo ding a, um sunga sathau zong kiam ngei lo ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi. [15] Tua ciangin amah pai-in Elijah’ gensa bangin hih hi. Tua nu, le amah, le tua nu’ innkuan in ni tampi sung ne uh hi. [16] Elijah’ tungtawnin TOPA’ thugen bangin beel sunga annel bei lo a, um sunga sathau zong kiam ngei lo hi.

[4] Tua ciangin Israel upate khempeuh hong pai uh a, Levi mite in Thuciamna Singkuang la uh hi. [5] Tua ciangin amaute in Thuciamna Singkuang, le kikhopna buk, le puanbuk sunga om a siangtho umlebeel khempeuh puato uh a, siampite le Levi mite in tuate puato uh hi. [6] Tua ciangin Kumpi Solomon le ama mai-ah a kikhawm Israel-te khempeuh Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah om uh a, biakna-in tuu le bawngtal tampi tak pia uh ahih manin a phazah kisim zo lo hi.
[24] Mi pawlkhat in sum zang ziahziah napi-in hau semsem uh a, mi pawlkhat cil mahmah napi, zawng semsem hi.
[6] A cingh mihau pa’ maipha ngah ding ki-ut ciat a, na a piak mi khempeuh ama lawm ahi hi.
[17] Mizawngte tungah a piate in TOPA’ tungah a pia hi a, TOPA in a cingin amaute tungah lohkik ding hi.
[21] Na galte a gil a kial leh an pia inla, a dang a tak leh tui pia in. [22] Tua hileh amau’ maizum nadingin a bawl na hi a, TOPA in nang tungah thaman hong pia ding hi.
[27] Mizawng a huhte cimawh ngei lo ding a, huhna a pia nuam lote in samsiatna ngah ding hi.
[13] Bangmahin a kimang lo piaknate hong paipih nawn kei un. Paknamtui halna ka kih hi. Khadet ni, Sabbath ni, le thupi takin na kikhopnate uh mawhna tawh kidim ahih manin ke’n ka thuakzo kei hi.

[11] Inn sungah amaute lut uh a, naungek le a nu Mary a mu uh hi. Amaute khukdinin tua naungek a biak khit uh ciangin a vanpuakte uh suahkhia uh a, kham, saledi paknamtui, le myrrh paknamtuite, letsongin a pia uh hi.
[42] Mi khat peuhpeuh in na khat peuhpeuh hong nget leh na pia inla, nang kiang panin na a hong leitawi mite na pia in.

[1] “Biakna tawh kizomin na hoih khat peuhpeuh na sep uh ciangin mite’ phat ding deihna tawh a kilang theithei dingin na sepkhak loh nadingun na kingaihsun un. Tua bangin gamta le-uhcin, vantungah a om na Pa uh kiang panin thaman na ngah kei ding uh hi. [2] “Tua ahih manin mi cimawhte tungah huhna na piak uh ciangin, mite in a phat ding uh a deihna tawh a kineihkhem mite in kikhopna innsung le kongzing lakah a kilang theithei-in a hih uh bangin na hih kei un. Tua bangin a hih mite in thaman a ngah khinta ahihna thu limtakin na phawk un. [3] Ahi zongin note in mi cimawhte citna tawh na huh uh ciangin na lawm naihuai pente uh nangawn in hong theih loh nadingun pia unla, [4] kuamah theisak kei un. Tua hileh kuama muh lohin na gamtatna uh a mu na Pa un note tungah thaman hong pia ding hi.

[19] “Nget in ne-in a kekseu theihna, gutate in luhin a guktheihna hih leitungah na sum uh khol kei un. [20] Nget in a nek theih lohna, a kekseu theih lohna, gutate in luhin a guk theih lohna mun vantungah note a dingin kholzaw un. [21] Bang hang hiam cih leh na sum omna uhah na lungsim uh om tawntung ding hi.

[21] Jesuh in, “Mi cingtaak na hihnop leh pai-in na neihsate va zuak inla, na sum khotte, mizawngte tungah va pia lecin, vantungah sum na hau ding hi. Tua ciangin hong pai inla kei hong zui in,” a ci hi.

[34] Tua ciangin Kumpipa in a taklamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Ka Pa in thupha a piak mite aw, hong pai ta un. Leitung piancil a kipanin note a dingin a kibawlkholsa gamnuam hong luah un. [35] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka gilkial laitakin an nong pia uh a, ka dangtak laitakin tui nong pia uh a, khualmi ka hih laitakin zin nong do uh a, [36] puan nei loin ka om laitakin puan nong guan uh a, ka cinat laitakin nong veh uh a, ka thongkiat laitakin nong hawh uh hi,’ a ci ding hi. [37] Tua ciangin mihoihte in, ‘Topa aw, cikin na gilkial hong mu-in an hong pia a, cikin na dangtak hong mu-in tui hong pia ka hi uh hiam? [38] Cikin khualmi na hih laitakin hong mu-in zin hong do a, cikin puan nei lo na hih laitakin hong mu-in puan hong guan ka hi uh hiam? [39] Cikin cina na hih laitakin hong mu-in hong veh a, cikin thongkia na hih laitakin hong mu-in hong hawh ka hi uh hiam?’ a ci ding uh hi. [40] Tua ciangin Kumpipa in amaute kiangah, ‘Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Hih ka sanggamte a neupen khat nangawn na limbawl uh ciangin kei tungah a hong bawl na hi uh hi,’ ci-in a dawng ding hi. [41] “Tua ciangin a veilamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Pasian in a samsiat mite aw, keima kiang panin paikhia unla, Dawimangpa le a nungzuite a dingin a kibawl meikuang tawntung sungah pai un. [42] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka gilkial laitakin an nong pia kei uh a, ka dangtak laitakin tui nong pia kei uh a, [43] khualmi ka hih laitakin zin nong do kei uh a, puan ka neih loh laitakin puan nong guan kei uh a, ka cinat laitakin nong veh kei uh a, ka thongkiat laitakin nong hawh kei uh hi,’ a ci ding hi. [44] Tua ciangin amaute in zong, ‘Topa aw, cikin na gilkial hong mu a, cikin na dangtak hong mu a, cikin khualmi na hih hong mu a, cikin na puan neih loh hong mu a, cikin na cinat hong mu a, cikin na thongkiat hong mu a, cikin kote in nang hong huh nuam lo ka hi uh hiam?’ a ci ding uh hi. [45] Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Hih mite a neupen khat nangawn na huh loh uh ciangin kei a hong huh lo na hi uh hi,’ ci-in a dawng ding hi. [46] Tua ahih ciangin tawntung gimthuakna sungah amaute pai ding uh a, mihoihte ahihleh nuntak tawntungna sungah lut ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[30] Na Topa Pasian uh, na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na pilna khempeuh, le na thahatna khempeuh uh tawh na it un, a cihna ahi hi.

[41] Biakinn sumpi khiatna kuang gei-ah Jesuh tu a, mihonte in sumpi a khiat laitakun a en hi. A haute in tampipi hong khia uh hi. [42] A zawng meigong numei khat zong hong pai a, sumnen tang nih hong khia hi. [43] Tua ciangin a nungzuite sam a, “Adangte khempeuh sangin hih mizawng meigongnu in tam khia zaw hi. [44] Bang hang hiam cih leh adangte in a neihval a lamval sung panun a khia uh ahi hi; ahi zongin amah zawng mahmah napi-in ama kivak nading nangawn siit loin a neih khempeuh a khiakhin ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[38] Midangte tungah pia un. Tua hileh Pasian in note tungah zong hong pia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh midangte na piakna uh tawh kizui-in a henhen, a tahtah, a dimletin Pasian in note tungah hong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.

[33] Na neihsa uh zuak unla, mizawngte tungah tua sumte na pia un. Note a dingin a sia thei lo sumkholna na bawl unla, gutate in a luh zawh lohna, leikha in zong a nek zawh lohna, cikmahin a kiam ngei hetloh nading mun vantungah na sumte uh na khol un.

[13] Tua bangin anvakna pawi na bawl ciangin mizawngte, khezawte, khebaite, le mittawte sam in. [14] Amaute in nang hong thukkik zo lo ding uh ahih manin nang a dingin a lungdamhuai hong hi ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh sihna panin mihoihte a thawhkik hun ciangin Pasian in nang tungah hong thukkik ding hi,” a ci hi.
[10] “A tawmno-ah a diktatte pen a tamah zong diktat uh a, a tawmno-ah a citak lote pen a tamah zong citak lo uh hi.

[1] Jesuh a khuadak leh mihaute in biakinn sumkuang sungah a letsong uh a khiatna, [2] le a zawng meigong khat in zong sumnen tang nih a khiat a mu hi. [3] Tua ciangin amah in, “Ke’n kong cihin-ah, hih a zawng meigongnu in a dangte khempeuh sangin tamzaw a khia hi. [4] Bang hang hiam cih leh adangte in a zatval uh sumte a khia uh ahi hi. Ahi zongin hih numei a zawng mahmah hinapi-in a nuntak nading khempeuh a khia khin ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[35] Topa Jesuh mahmah in, ‘Ngahna sangin piak khiatna-ah lungdamna lianzaw hi,’ a cihna phawkkawmin nakpitakin nasepna tawh na khempeuhah a zawngkhalte huh ding hi hang, ci-in note kiangah kong lak khinzo hi,” ci-in a vaikhak hi.
[14] Nuntakna sang mite le nuntakna niam mite, mipilte le mihaite, a kuamah peuh ka huh ding ka tavuan ahih manin,

[6] Tua ahih manin Pasian in hehpihna hong piakkhongna tawh kizui-in i siamna a tuamtuamte zang ciat ni. I siamna pen Pasian’ thu gentheih nading siamna ahih leh i upna neihzah tawh kizui-in gen ni. [7] Nasep nading siamna a nei ihih leh na sem ni. Hilh nading siamna a nei ihih leh hilh ni. [8] Midangte hanthot theih nading siamna a nei ihih leh midangte hanthawn ni. Midangte hop theih nading a nei ihih leh citna taktak tawh hawm ni. Makaih theih nading siamna a nei ihih leh hoihtakin na sem ni. Midangte hehpih theih nading a nei ihih leh maitai takin hih ni.
[13] Na Khristian pihte uh a kisapna bangin na neihsate uh na hawm unla, zin le leengla do a siam mite na hita un.
[3] Ka neih khempeuh midangte tungah pia-in, Pasian’ nasepna hangin kihaltumna ka thuak ahi zongin itna ka neih kei leh ka phattuamna bangmah om lo hi.
[12] Piaknopna lungsim na neih nak-uhleh na neih lohnate uh siksan hi loin na neihna uh tawh kizui-in na piak uh Pasian in hong sang ding hi.

[6] Note in na phawk ding uh thu panin: Khaici tawm a vawhte in tawm mah la ding a, tampi a vawhte in tampi mah la ding uh hi. [7] Pasian in piaknopna lungsim tawh a pia mite bek deih ahih manin, a kuamah peuh in na lungsim sung uhah na ngaihsutsa zah ciat uh na pia unla, pia nuam lopipi le sawlzawh thu bek tawh na pia kei un.

[15] Note ka hong huhtheih nadingin lungdamtakin ka neih khempeuh kong piaknop banah keima pumpi mahmah zong ka hong kipia nuam hi. Tuazah takin ka hong itna pen it lohna tengin hong nei zawsop ding na hi uh hiam?
[10] Kote in amaute lakah a om mizawngte ka phawk ding uh hong kal bek a, tua lah kei zong ngaihsut penin ka neihsa thu mah ahi hi.
[4] Note’ phattuam nading bek ngaihsun kei unla, midangte’ phattuam nading ngaihsutsak zaw un.
[14] Sanggamte aw, a thadah mite hilh unla, a meidawite hanthawnin, a zawngkhal mite huh unla, hih bang mite ngongbawl kei un.
[8] Mi khatpeuh in a beh a phung, a diakdiakin a innkuansung mite a vak nop kei leh a upna a nusia hita a, thu um lo mite sangin siazaw lai hi.

[17] Tuhuna a hau mite kisatheikha loin, a kip lo hauhnate muan le suanin neikha loin, eite in nuamtakin i zat theih dingin citna tawh a hong pia Pasian a muan a suan nadingun na hilh in. [18] A hoih nate semin, gamtat pha-in, citna lungsim nei-in midangte a hopnop nadingun na hilh in. [19] Tua hileh mai lamah amaute’ nuntak nading bulpi taktak ahi neihsate, amau a dingin a khol mite ahi ding uh hi.

[10] Pasian, a man loin gamta ngei lo ahih manin na Khristianpihte uh a beisa hunah na huhna uh le tu dongin na huh laina uh tawh ama a dingin na nasepna uh le amah na itna uh na lahnate uh hong mangngilh het lo ding hi.
[16] Khatlekhat tungah thuhoih kibawlin na kihuh ding uh mangngilh kei un. Hih bang gamtatnate pen Pasian a lungkimsak thei biakna ahi hi.
[17] A hoih thu le na khempeuh, Pasian kiang panin hong pai hi a, vantung khuavak a Piangsak pa ahih manin amah kikheel ngei lo a, amah a kihei manin khua zong mial tuan lo hi.
[27] Pa Pasian in a siangtho biakna citakin a ngaihsut thu in: Tagahte le meigong numeite a haksatna uhah hoihtakin kemin, leitung siatnate tawh kisawhkha loin siangtho takin omna ahi hi.

[15] Gentehna-in, na mipih khat peuhpeuh uh annek tuidawn, nikten’ puansilh nei loin haksapi-in om hen la, [16] note khat peuhpeuh in, ama pumpi kisapna bangmah pia lopi-in, “Khualum gilvah takin om in,” ci mawk lel le-uhcin bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam? [17] Tua ahih ciangin gamtatna in a zui lo upna guak pen a si ahi hi. [18] Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh in, “Mi khat in upna nei a, adang khat in gamtatna nei hi,” ci zenzen leh, gamtatna in a zui lo upna hong lak dih in; keimah in ahihleh ka upna ka gamtatna tawh ka hong lak ding hi, ka ci ding hi.
[10] Pasian’ piak na a zatsiamte bangin Pasian’ kiang panin na ngah uh nate, midangte’ phattuam nadingin na zang un.
[17] Mi khat hau mahmah hen la, a Khristian mipih a cimawhte mu napi-in huhna bangmah pianuam hetkei leh, bang hangin amah in Pasian ka it hi, ci thei ding ahi hiam?

[26] Tua ciangin Pasian in, “Eima lim, eimah hong sunin mihing bawl ni. Tuipi ngasate tung, huihlak vasate tung, ganhingte tung, le leitung a a bokvakte khempeuh tungah ukna neisak ni,” a ci hi. [27] Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ama lim bangin mihing piangsakin, Pasian’ lim bangin amah a piangsak hi. Amah in pasal le numei a piangsak hi.
[6] Mi a that peuhmahte pen, midangte in amah that ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in ama lim bangin mi bawl hi.
[10] Amah in zi dang khat a lakthuah leh, a zi masa’ annek, a puansilh, ahih kei leh lupkhop nading thuneihna khiam lo ding hi.

[14] Note in bilngongte phuisam loin, mittawte’ mai-ah a puk theih nading na na koih kei ding uh a, note in na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uh hi; kei pen TOPA ka hi hi. [15] “Note in thukhenna-ah thu a tang loin na khen kei ding uh hi. Mizawngte langgen loin, a liante’ thu zui loin, thumanna tawh na vengte uh thu na khen ding uh hi.

[33] “Na gam sung uhah note lakah khualmi khat hong peem leh, ama tungah a man loin na gamta kei ding uh hi. [34] Note lakah a hong peem khualmite tualsung mi mah bangin na ngaihsun ding uh a, nomau mah bangin amaute na it ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh note pen Egypt gam sungah khualmi na hi ngei uh hi; kei pen TOPA na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
[39] “Na gei-a om na sanggampa zawngin, nangma tungah amahmah hong kizuak leh, sila bangin na na semsak kei ding hi.
[15] Mihonpi a dingin ngeina khat om ding a, note le note’ lakah hong peem mi a dingin tawntung ngeina khat na khang tawntungun om ding hi. TOPA’ mai-ah note le peemta mite na kibang ding uh hi.

[16] “Tua hun laitakin na thukhente uh ka thuhilh a, ‘Na sanggamte uh thu neihte za unla, mi khat le a sanggampa ahi a, amah tawh a om khualmipa tawh ahi zongin thu a mantakin khen un. [17] Thukhenna-ah angvan na nei kei ding uh hi. A neu le a liante a kibangin a thu na ngai ding uh a, maitang zahtak tuam na nei kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh thukhenna pen Pasian-a’ ahi hi. Note a dingin a haksa lua thute kei kiangah nong paipih ding uh a, keimah in tua thu ka za ding hi,’ ka ci hi.
[30] “Mi khat in a pa’ zidangte tenpih lo ding a, a pa-a’ ahi numei tawh mawh lo ding hi.
[4] “Bawng in an a cil laitakin a muk na tuam kei ding uh hi.
[20] “‘Amah in a pa’ tungah maizumna tun ahih manin, a pa’ zidang tawh a lumkhawm mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
