[18] TOPA aw, nang tawh a kibang Pasian dang om lo a, a omlai na mite’ mawhna nangmah in na maisak hi. Nang na heh paisuak kei a, na itna kip nong lak hi.
[9] Kilem nading deihin a hanciam mite in Pasian’ tate cihna ngah ding uh ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.
[16] Midangte in na gamtatna hoihte uh a muh ciangin vantungah a om na Pa uh min a phat theih nadingun mite mai-ah na gamtat hoihna uh khuavak bangin na kilangsak un.

[25] Nangma tungah mi khatpeuh lungkim loin zumah hong khiat leh, zum na tun ma-un hun om lai-in na kilem pak nadingin hanciam in. Tua hikeileh zum na tun uh ciangin thukhente khutsung na tung ding a, thukhente in palikte khut sungah hong apin, palikte in thong sungah hong khum ding hi.

[37] Na gen peuhmah ahi ahihleh, ‘Hi,’ ci inla, ahi lo ahihleh, ‘Hilo,’ cihna tawh kicingsak in. Tua bang hi loin kiciamna kam na zat ciangin Dawimangpa tawh kizomin thuman lo na hih lamtak hong kilang hi.
[48] Tua ahih manin vantungah a om na Pa uh a cingtaak mah bangin note zong lungsim citakin na cingtaak nading uh na hanciam un.
[6] “Uite tungah a siangtho nate pia kei un. Pia le-uhcin hong pet zawsop ding hi. Vokte mai-ah na suangmanphate uh lot kei un. Lot le-uh cin sikcip lel ding uh hi.
[15] “Na sanggamte uh na tung uhah hong khialh leh pai-in no tegel bek theihin a khialhna va gen un. Na thu uh a hong man’ leh na sanggampa uh a ngahkik na hi uh hi.
[80] Tua naungek a pumpi le a lungsim siamna hong khang a, Israel mite lakah a kilaak hun matengin sehnel gam sungah a om hi.
[40] Tua naupang hong khangin hong thahat hi. Lungpilna tawh kidim a, Pasian in thupha a pia hi.
[52] Jesuh a pumpi le a pilna khang a, ama gamtatna in Pasian le mite a lungkimsak semsem hi.
[28] No hong phuisamte thupha na pia unla, no hong bawlsiate a’ ding thu na ngetsak un.

[45] Mihoih pa in a lungsim sunga thuhoih omteng hong suahkhia a, migilo pa in a lungsim sunga a gitlohna teng hong suahkhia hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mite pen amau’ lungsim sunga a om bangbang a hong paukhia uh ahi hi.
[6] Mihing sung panin a suakte mihing mah hi bek a, Kha tawh a suakte pen kha mi ahi hi. [7] Tua ahih manin, ‘Na suahkik ding ahi hi,’ ka hong cihna hangin lamdangsa kei in.

[11] Thesalonika khuamite sangin Berea khuamite in mipi lungsim neizaw uh hi. Amaute in lawp mahmahna tawh Paul’ thugente ngai uh a, Paul’ thugente man taktak hiam ci-in a theih nadingun nisimin Lai Siangtho a sim uh hi.
[16] Tua ahih manin Pasian mai le mite mai-ah lungsim kisuanna a om het lo dingin a tawntungin ka gamta hi.
[14] Nuntakna sang mite le nuntakna niam mite, mipilte le mihaite, a kuamah peuh ka huh ding ka tavuan ahih manin, [15] Rom khua-a a om note tungah zong Lungdamna Thu hilh ding ka lawp mahmah hi.

[3] Haksatna i thuak laitak nangawnin i lungdam veve hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh haksatna in thuakzawh hatna piangsak a, [4] thuakzawh hatna in Pasian’ pahtakna hong ngahsak a, ama hong pahtakna in lametna lianpi hong neisak ahihna thu i thei hi.
[6] I ngaihsutna, i pumpi deihna uksak lehang sihna tawh kizom hi; i ngaihsutna, Kha Siangtho uksak lehang nuntakna le nopsakna tawh a kizom hi.
[28] Ama deihna bang a sem dingin Pasian in a hong sap, amah a it eite a dingin na khempeuh a hoihlamin piangsak hi, ci-in i thei hi.

[2] Leitung mihingte’ gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahphasak un. Tua hileh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkimsakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian’ deihna na phawk thei ding uh hi.

[14] No a hong bawlsia mite, Pasian in thupha a piak nadingin thu ngetsak unla, tua bang mite samsia loin thupha piazaw un. [15] A lungdam mite lungdampih unla, a dah mite dahpih un. [16] Mi deidan loin a kibangin en un. Kiphasak loin mineute tawh kikhawlthei unla, kipilsak se kei un. [17] Midangte’ gitlohnate thukkik kei unla, mi khempeuh in hoih hi, ci-in a ngaihsut ding bangin gamta un. [18] Ahih theih laiteng mi khempeuh tawh na kilem nadingun hanciam un. [19] Lawmte aw, na hehna uh kuama tungah thukkik kei unla, Pasian’ thukkik dingin koih lel un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho sungah, “Keimah in amaute tungah ka thuk ding a, midangte a gimsak bangun ka gimsak ding hi, Topa in ci hi,” ci-in kigelh hi. [20] Tua ahih ciangin Lai Siangtho sungah, “Na galte uh a gil a kial leh an na pia un. A dang a taak leh tui na pia un. Tua bangin na gamtat uhleh amaute’ maizum nadingin a bawl na hi uh hi,” ci-in a kigelh bangin gamtazaw un. [21] Tua ahih manin gitlohna kizosak kei unla, a pha gamtatna tawh gitlohnate a zo na hi ta un.
[12] Tua ahih manin a kuamah peuh in i gamtatna ciat Pasian’ mai-ah a va kigentel ciat ding ihi hi.
[6] Ahi zongin kha thu lamah a khangham mite tungah pilna thu ka gen hi. Tua ka gen pilna pen tu-in a maimang kuankuanta ding hih leitung mite’ pilna le vangliatna thu hi lo hi.

[3] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ deihna bangin gamta loin, leitung lungsim deihna bangin gamta lai na hih manun upna sungah naungek bang ahi lai na hi uh hi. Note khatlekhat kihaza-in kitawng kiselin na om uh ciangin hih leitung mite mah a bang lel na hihna uh hong kilang hi.

[1] Note khatlekhat thu na kineih uh ciangin Pasian’ mi siangthote khensakzaw loin lawki thukhente’ mai na kitun ngam uh hi. [2] Pasian’ mite in leitung mite’ thu a khensakzaw ding ahihlam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Note pen leitung mite’ thu a khensak ding na hih uh ciangin tua bang thu neute khen thei lo lawmlawm na hi uh hiam? [3] Eite pen vantung mite’ thu nangawn a khensak ding ihih lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam? Tua ahih manin hih leitung a no’ thu neuneute leltak na khentheih zawk kan ding uh ahi hi. [4] Tua bang hinapi-in hih bang thu themthem hong pian ciangin pawlpi sungah bangmahin a kisim lo mite’ mai kitun ding na hi uh hiam? [5] Note a dingin zumhuai mahmah hi. Note khatlekhat na kithuneihnate uh a khenthei ding note lakah mipil khat beek om buang ding hi. [6] Tua hinapi, khatlekhat thu kineihin zum na kitun uh a, lawki thukhente na khensak tazen uh hi. [7] Note khatlekhat zum na kitut mahmah uh zong a gina het lo na hihna uh hong kilangsak hi. Bang hangin thuakzaw mai lo a, sum ngamzaw mai lo na hi uh hiam? [8] Note khatlekhat kisu-in, khatlekhat na kisut zawsop uh a, na sanggamte teekteek nangawn uh tawh thu na nei uh hi.
[11] Naupang ka hih hun lai-in naupang mah bangin kampau-in, thu ngaihsunin, ka gamta hi. Ahi zongin tu-in khangham ka hih manin naupang vaite ka zang nawn kei hi.
[20] Sanggamte aw, na thu ngaihsutnate uhah naupang bang kei un. Gitlohna lamah naupang bang unla, ahi zongin thu ngaihsutna-ah a khangham hi ta un.

[32] Pasian in eite ahi zelzul dingin a hong sam hi lo a, hoihtak nuamtakin a om dingin a hong sam ahih manin Pasian’ thu gen ding lawpna lungsim pen a gen ding pa a ki-ukzawh ding a kisam ahi hi. Pasian’ pawlpi mite khempeuh lakah a kizang ngeina ahih mah bangin, [33] Pasian in eite ahi zelzul dingin a hong sam hi lo a, hoihtak nuamtakin a om dingin a hong sam ahih manin Pasian’ thu gen ding lawpna lungsim pen a gen ding pa a ki-ukzawh ding a kisam ahi hi. Pasian’ pawlpi mite khempeuh lakah a kizang ngeina ahih mah bangin,
[40] Na khempeuh a kilawm a kituakin na hih un.
[16] Tua thu hangin ka lungkia tuan kei uh hi. Kote’ leitung pumpi in damdamin muatlam ding a manawh ahi zongin ka kha nuntakna uh a nini-in thaksuak semsem hi.
[3] Ka nasepna uhah mite in mawhna hong zon ding uh ut lo ka hih manun kuamah ka nawngkaisak khak loh nadingun ka hanciam uh hi.
[6] Siangtho takin nuntakna, thu theihna, lungduaina, migitna, Kha Siangtho’ huhna, itna taktak neihna,

[20] Tua ahih manin tuhuna ka nuntakna zia pen kei hang hi nawn loin ka sungah a hong om Khrih hang ahi hi. Tua hi a, keimah hong itin, keima a dingin a nuntakna a hong pia Pasian’ Tapa ka muanna tawh tu laitakin a nungta ka hi hi.
[3] Tua mah bangin eite zong kha thu-ah i neulai hun sungteng huihlak a uk vangneite’ khutnuai-ah a om ihi hi.

[22] Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho’ sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna, [23] dikna le pumpi ki-ukzawhna hi a, hih bangin a gamta mite, Thukham in bangmah cih thei lo hi.

[1] Sanggamte aw, mi khatpeuh a gamta khial a om ciangin, Kha Siangtho’ deihna bangin a nungta note in tua a khial pa a manin a gamtatkik theih nadingin thunem zangin na huh un. Note in zong amah bangin ze-etna na tuahkhak loh nadingun na kikem un. [2] Thu haksa na tuah uh ciangin khatlekhat na kihuh un. Tua hileh Khrih’ thukham a zui na hi uh hi.
[10] Eite a hong bawlpa pen Pasian hi a, Jesuh Khrih tawh i kipawl ciangin i nuntakna-ah gamtat hoih a nei dingin a hong bawl ihi hi. Hih pen eite’ omzia dingin a na ngaihsut kholhsa ahi hi.

[12] Hih nasep a tuamtuamte khempeuh a sem dingin Pasian’ mi khempeuh kigingkhol sakin Khrih a dingin na semin Khrih pumpi a khansak theihna ding deihna ahi hi. [13] Tua hileh Pasian’ Tapa i theihna le i thu upna-ah kithukhatin, eite a khangcing suakin, Khrih’ cingtaakna ciang i banto ding hi. [14] Tuahun ciangin thu upna lamah naupang ihi nawn kei ding a, mite khemin a khialsak theite’ mutna hangin i suk hoi i to hoi nawn kei ding a, [15] itna lungsim tawh thutak genin, lutang ahi Khrih tawh i kibat dongin i khangto ding hi. [16] Ama ukna mangin pumpi na a tuamtuamte a kituak takin kizom a, amaute limtakin a kizop dimdiamna hangin pumpi pen pumkhat a suak thei hi. Pumpi na a tuamtuamte in amau’ sep ding ciat hoihtakin a sep uh ciangin itna hangin pumpi khangin a cingtaak a suak thei hi.

[22] Zuauna lungsim in a suksiat khitsa, nidangin na nuntakna ngei uh ahi na pianlui uh paikhia unla, [23] na lungsim uh le na ngaihsutna uh thaksuak sak un. [24] A thutang a siangtho ahihna thu, nuntakna mahmah panin a kilangsak, Pasian’ pianzia tawh kibangin a kibawl na ngeina thak uh bangin na nungta un.

[26] Na heh uh ciangin, tua hehna hangin khialkha kei unla, a tawntungin heh paisuak kei un. [27] Dawimangpa in hong suksiat theih nading hun omsak kei un. [28] Guta ngeite in gu nawn loin, ama nuntak nading thuman takin thalawhin, mizawngte zong a huhtheih lai nadingin thatang tawh nasep ding kipan ta uh hen. [29] Na kiho uh ciangin kamguh zang kei unla, na pauna uh a za mite in phattuamna a ngahtheih nadingin na-in a kimang kam hoihte bek na pau un.
[15] Tua ahih ciangin hoihtakin kingaihsunin gamta unla, mihaite bang hi loin mipilte bangin gamta un.
[6] Note sungah hih nasep hoih a hong pankhia Pasian in Jesuh Khrih hong paikik hun ciang dong, mi cingtaak na hih nadingun hong huh ding hi, ci-in teltakin ka thei hi.

[9] Note a’ ding deihsakna tawh thu ka hong ngetsak thu in: Note’ lungsimah itna khang semsemin, a sia le a pha a mantakin khenthei-in a hoihpen na teeltheih nading uh ahi hi. [10] Tua hileh Khrih hong paikik ni ciangin paubaanna om loin a siangtho na hi ding uh hi. [11] Jesuh Khrih in note mihoih a hong suahsak theihna le mite in Pasian pahtawi-in a phattheihna thu, note’ gamtat hoih in midangte tungah kilangsak ding hi.

[12] Tua ahih ciangin ka hong it sanggamte aw, note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-in ka thu na hong man’ tawntung uh mah bangin, tu-in note tawh ka hong omkhawm loh hun ciangin zong ka thu na hong man’ ding uh thupizaw lai hi. Pasian kihtakna le zahtakna tawh na maa uh nawt unla, amah in note hong hotkhiatna thu a cingtaak suaksak un.

[29] Khrih nasepna-ah note in pumpi tawh na hong huhkim theih loh manun note’ tangin amah in kei a hong huh manin a nuntakna hong pia-in sihlawh dektak hi. Tua ahih manin hih bang mite na zahtakbawl mahmah unla, Topa’ nasem taktak hi, ci-in lungdam takin na limbawl un. [30] Khrih nasepna-ah note in pumpi tawh na hong huhkim theih loh manun note’ tangin amah in kei a hong huh manin a nuntakna hong pia-in sihlawh dektak hi. Tua ahih manin hih bang mite na zahtakbawl mahmah unla, Topa’ nasem taktak hi, ci-in lungdam takin na limbawl un.

[12] Ahi zongin ka utna tungkhin ing, cingtaak khinta ing, a ci ka hi kei hi. Khrih Jesuh in kei a dingin a hong sepsak hamphatnate kimtakin ka ngahtheih nadingin a hanciam lai ka hi hi. [13] Sanggamte aw, tua hamphatna a ngah khinin ka kingaihsun kei hi. Tua ahih manin a beisa thute mangngilh bawlin mainawtin ka hanciam a, [14] Khrih Jesuh nasepna tawh vantung nuntakna-ah Pasian’ hong sapna ahi hamphatna ka ngahtheih nadingin, a kung lam zuanin tangtakin ka tai hi. [15] Kha thu-ah a khangham eite in hih bang lungsim pua ciat ni. Hih bang lungsim a nei lo i omkhak leh zong, Pasian in a kitel takin hong kilangsak ding hi.

[8] Sanggamte aw, a tawpna-ah ka hong gennop thu in, a hoih le a phattaak thute tawh na lungsim uh na kidimsak un. Tuate in: A man, a dik, a tang, a siangtho, a deihhuai, le a pahtakhuai thute ahi hi.

[11] Bangbangin om taleng a lungkim thei dingin a kisinsa ka hih manin hih bang ka hong gen ciangin ka kitangsapna a hong pulak nuam ka hi kei hi. [12] Cihmawhna le cihtheihna a sinsa ka hi hi. Tua ahih manin ka hau a ka zawng zongin, ka vah a ka kial zongin, koi mun koi mun hitaleh ah a lungkimthei dingin a kisinsa ka hi hi. [13] Khrih in a hong piak vangliatna tawh hihte khempeuh nawkzawh nading thahatna a nei ka hi hi.

[2] Note, lungsim hanna tawh kidimin, thu a man taktakin na theihna hangun lungkip takin omin, itna tawh pumkhat na suahtheih nading uh ka deihna ahi hi. Tua hileh Pasian’ thusim ahi Khrih mahmah na thei ding uh hi.

[6] Note hong honpa dingin Topa Khrih na sansa uh ahih mah bangin amah tawh hoihtakin kipawlin nungta un. [7] Note tungah a hong kihilhsa bangin ama sungah zungthuk kha unla, ama deihna bangin nungta-in, na upna uhah khauh semsemin, lungdam takin om un. [8] Khrih thu tawh a kituak lopi-in, tangthu tuanthu ahi a, huihlak a ukte’ thu siksanin ahi zongin, bangmahin a kimang lo leitung pilna tawh mite’ khemsa-in sila na suahkhak loh nadingun kingaihsun un.
[12] Pasian in note hong itin, hong teelin, ama mi siangthote hikhin na hih manun note pen hehpihna nei-in, migi-in, kiniamkhiatin, dikin, na lungduai ding uh ahi hi.
[23] Mite’ nasem bangin kingaihsun loin, Pasian’ nasem bangin kingaihsun unla, na sep peuhpeuh uh lungsim takpi tawh lawpin sem un.

[5] A pualam mite tungah a kilawm a kituakin gamta unla, hunhoih na ngah khempeuh uh na valkhongsak ngei kei un. [6] Kam na pau uh ciangin mi’ zaknop, mi’ ngaihnop dingin na pau un. Tua hileh na kihopih uh mite khempeuh a dingin phattuamna a nei kam a pau na hi ding uh hi.
[12] Jesuh Khrih nasem, note’ makai Epafras in zong hong hopih hi. Pasian’ deihna bangin note nungta-in, lungsim khanghamin kiptakin na omtheih nadingun amah in thu hong ngetsak tawntung hi.
[11] Tu ma-a ka hong gensa uh mah bangin kamtam nuam se loin hoihtakin om hithiatna, no tawh a kisai thu bek ngaihsutna, le note’ nuntak nading na na sep nading uh hanciamin nei un.

[3] Sanggamte aw, note’ upna nakpitakin khang a, note khatlekhat na ki-itna uh lian semsem ahih manin Pasian tungah lungdamna koh ding a kilawm ahih mah bangin, note hangin ama tungah lungdamna ka ko tawntung uh hi.
[12] Tu-in tua bang mite in kuamah nawngkaisak nawn loin man manin na sem hiathiatin amau’ nuntak nadingun na a sep nadingun Topa Jesuh Khrih min tawh hanthawnin thu ka hong pia uh hi.

[1] Nang sangin a uzaw mite taiibawl kei inla, na pa bangin ngaihsunin hanthawn in. Nang sangin a nauzawte na nau bangin bawl in. [2] Nang sangin a uzaw numeite na nu bangin bawl inla, nang sangin a nauzaw numeite, lungsim siangtho tak tawh na nau numei bangin bawl in. [3] Meigong taktak ahi numeite zahtakbawl in.

[20] Timoti aw, nang tungah a hong kipia thute hoihtakin na zui in. Mi pawlkhatte in, “Thu theihna,” ci-in a ngaihsutkhak uh, Pasian’ thu tawh a kituak lo, thu kihai selnate na pelh in. [21] Mi pawlkhatte in tua bang pilna a nei-in kingaihsun uh a, upna thu bulpi khahsuahna-in a nei uh hi. Note khempeuh tungah Pasian’ dikna thupha hong tung tahen.

[23] Thu kihai seelna, thei lo pi-a thu kinialnate na pelh in. Tua bangte in kitotna a piansak lamtak na theihsa ahi hi. [24] Topa’ na a sem mite, kitot a hatte hi lo ding a, mi khempeuh tungah lungsim nemin, thugen siamin, thuakzawhna nei-in, [25] thunem tawh a langte’ hoih lohna a puahtheite hi ding hi. Tua bang hileh Pasian in amaute kisiksak thei ding a, thuman thutak hong thei-in,

[16] Pasian’ na a sem mite mi cingtaak hi-in, na hoih namkim a septheih nadingun Lai Siangtho pen Pasian’ lamlahna tawh a hong kipia hi a, thuman thutak hilh nading, a khialte taii nading, a man lote a manin puah nading, a manin nuntak theih nading thuhilh nadingin a manpha mahmah ahi hi. [17] Pasian’ na a sem mite mi cingtaak hi-in, na hoih namkim a septheih nadingun Lai Siangtho pen Pasian’ lamlahna tawh a hong kipia hi a, thuman thutak hilh nading, a khialte taii nading, a man lote a manin puah nading, a manin nuntak theih nading thuhilh nadingin a manpha mahmah ahi hi.

[2] Pasal khanghamte a kilawm a kituakin a omtheih nading, thu ngaihsun thei mi ahih nading, a kikemzo mite ahih theih nading, upna man a neihtheih nading, itna man a neihtheih nading uh le a manin lungkipin a thuakzawh nadingun na gen in. [3] Tua mah bangin mite in Pasian’ thu a gensiatkhak loh nadingun numei khanghamte zong a gamtat a khuahek uh a zahtakhuai ahih nading, mi gensiate ahih loh nading, zunek kiphamawhte ahih loh nading, thuhoih thupha hilhin, [4] amaute sangin a nauzaw nupite in a pasalte uh le a tate uh a it nadingun a hilh ding, [5] thu ngaihsun thei, a gamtat siangtho, inn nasep a kizen, a migi, le a pasalte uh thu a mang thei mi ahih nadingun na gen in.

[2] kuamah gensia loin, mite tawh kilemin kikhawl thei-in, lungsim nemin, mi khempeuh tungah a dik nading uh na gen in. [3] Bang hang hiam cih leh eite zong nidangin haitatin, thumang loin, vakvai-in, duhna deihna a tuamtuamte thuaklahin, thusia le enna lungsim tawh a gamtate, mite in hong mudahin, eite khatlekhat zong a kimudah ngeite ihi hi. [4] Ahi zongin eite hong Honpa ahi Pasian’ itna le a migitna thu hong kilat ciangin, [5] amah in eite hong honkhia hi. Eite in na hoih i sepzawhna hangin hong honkhia hi loin eite tungah suahtakna le nuntakna thak a hong pia Kha Siangtho in hong sawpsiangna hangin a hong hehpihna tawh a hong honkhia ahi hi. [6] Pasian in eite hong Hon Jesuh Khrih hangin eite tungah a kicing takin Kha Siangtho hong pia ahih manin, [7] ama hong hehpihna hangin Pasian tawh kilemin i lamet nuntak tawntungna a ngah thei ihi hi.
[1] Tua ahih manin i zaksa thuman thutakte i khahsuahkhak loh nadingin kiptak khotakin i letkip ding kisam hi.

[12] Tu-in note pen midang a hilh dingin sia na suahtheih ding uh hun hikhin napi-in note mahmah pen Pasian’ thu a bulpite hilh ding na kisam lai uh hi. Antak nethei nai loin nawi bek a nethei lai na hi uh hi. [13] Nawi bek a ne laite pen naungek ahih manin a man le a man lo thu bangmah phawkthei nai lo uh hi. [14] Ahi zongin antak i cih pen a sia le a pha a khenthei, a lim le a lim lo a khentheita, a khangham khinsa mite a’ ding ahi hi.

[1] Tua ahih manin Khrih thu a kipat cilna lelte nusia-in a thuthuk zawte ngaihsutin nei ni. Bangmahin a kimang lo nasepnate nusiat ding, Pasian upna thu, [2] tuiphumna le khut ngakna thu, misite thawhkikna le tawntung gimthuakna, cih thute genpha sansan nawn kei ni. [3] Eite in mainawt ni. Pasian in hong thukimpih ahih nakleh i mainawt ding ahi hi. [4] A tawpkik khinsate a kisik kik nadingin kibawl zo lo hi. Pasian’ khuavak sungah amaute om khinin, vantung nopna ciam khinin, Kha Siangtho ngah khinin,

[1] Tua hi a, eite in i kiim i pamah hih zahin a tam teci nei ihih ciangin eite a hong dongtangsak thei nate khempeuh le eite a hong gakcip mawhna le khialhnate khempeuh paikhia-in, i mai-ah a om tai nading lampi a mong dongin lungsim kiptakin tai ni. [2] Eite hong makai-in i upna a hong cingtaaksak Jesuh mitsuanin nei ni. Mailamah a ngah ding lungdamna hangin maizumna kihta loin singlamteh tungah sihna hong thuak a, tu-in Pasian tokhom taklamah a tu hi.

[6] Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in a it mite thuhilh a, ta taktakin a ngaihsut mite a taii hi,” hong ci hi. [7] Pasian’ hong thuhilhna na thuak ding mah uh ahi hi. Pasian in note ta-in hong ngaihsun ahih manin a thuak na hi uh hi. Pate’ thuhilhna le taiina a thuak lo ta kuamah om lo hi. [8] Tate’ thuak bangin thuhilhna le taiina thuak loin hong kikoih mawk leh ta taktak hi loin zawlta na hi lel ding uh hi.

[12] Tua ahih ciangin a zaw nuangnuang na khutte uh le a no dakdak na khukte uh khauhsak un. [13] Bai luangluangin a paite, na guh na taang uh a kipelh loh nadingin lampi tang zui-in na pai un. [14] Mi khempeuh tawh na kilem theih nading uh hanciam un. Nuntak siangtho lo tawh kuamah in Topa mu zo lo ding ahih manin nuntak siangtho na nungta un. [15] Pasian’ hehpihna a ngahlah na hihkhak loh nadingun na kidawm un. Zungkha a nei singkung hong khangin mi tampi gimsakin a siatsak bangin mite a siasak na hihkhak loh nadingun na kidawm un.

[2] Sanggamte aw, thuhaksa a tuamtuam na thuak uh ciangin lungdam nadingin na ngaihsun zaw un. [3] Tua bangin na upna uh hong kize-etna na thuakzawh uh ciangin na kipna uh hong kilangsak ahihna thu na thei uh hi. [4] A kisam bangmah om loin a cingtaak na suahtheih nadingun na thuakna uh hangin a tawntungin na kip paisuak nadingun na ngaihsun un.
[19] Sanggamte aw, note in na theih ding uh ka deih thu in: Thu kigen khempeuh hoihtakin ngai pahpah un. Ahi zongin pau pahpah kei unla, heh pakpak kei un.

[25] Ahi zongin mite a suaktasak thei thukham cingtaak hoihtakin a et khit ciangin a thu ngai-in a mangngilh pah hi loin, hoihtakin ngaihsun tawntungin a zuite pen a sepna khempeuh uhah Pasian in thupha a pia ding hi. [26] Mi khatpeuh in Khristian ka hi hi, ci napi-in kampau a kidopzawh kei leh amahmah a kikhemtawm hi lel a, ama biakna neih a mawkna ahi hi.
[2] Eite khempeuh a khialthei zelzelte vive ihi hi. Kampauna-ah a khial ngei lo mi a om leh a cingtaak mahmah hi a, a pumpi zong a ukzo mi ahi hi.
[16] Enna le huaihamna a om nakleh buaina le siatna nam khempeuh tawh kizom pahpah hi.

[12] Hih thute khempeuh banah, sanggamte aw, thu khat peuhpeuh na gen uh ciangin kiciam se kei un. Vantung ahi a, na khat peuhpeuh tawh ahi zongin kiciam kei un. Pasian’ thukhenna na thuakkhak loh nadingun a hite, “Hi,” ci lel unla, a hilote, “Hilo,” na ci lel un.

[20] Note na gamtat khialhna uh hangin hong kisat ciangin lungduai takin na thuak manun bangmah phattuamna om lo hi. Ahi zongin a manin gamta napi-in gimna na thuak uh ciangin lungduai takin na thuak uhleh Pasian in thupha hong pia ding hi.

[13] Note in a hoih gamtat ding utin hanciam le-uhcin kua in hong bawlsia ding ahi hiam? [14] A hoihin na gamtat manun gimna na thuak uhleh zong Pasian in thupha hong pia ding hi. Mite kihta kei unla, lunghihmawh ngaihsut kei un.

[5] Tua mah bangin no khangnozaw deuhte in zong a khanghamte’ thu na mang un. Lai Siangtho in, “Pasian in a kiphasak mite nial a, a kiniamkhiat mite a hehpih hi,” a cih mah bangin na vekpi-un kiniamkhiatna puan bangin silhin, khatlekhat na na kisepsak un.
[18] Hehpihna thu le i Topa le Honpa Jesuh Khrih theihna thu-ah na khangto semsem zaw un. Tuhun a kipanin a tawntungin amah in minthanna ngah paisuak tahen. Amen.

[9] Tua ahih ciangin keimah in a sia le a pha ka theihtheih nadingin na mite uk nading thu theihtelna lungsim na nasempa hong pia in. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih a lian a tam na mite kua in ukzo ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
[28] Tua ciangin Israel mi khempeuh in kumpipa’ piak thukhenna za uh hi. Thutang a sem dingin ama tungah Pasian in pilna pia hi, ci-in phawk uh ahih manin amaute in kumpipa lamdangsa-in a om uh hi.

[11] Pasian in Solomon dawngin, “Hih thu na lungsim sungah om a, nangmah in neihsate, hauhna, pahtawina, ahih kei leh nang hong mudahte’ nuntakna hong ngen loin, a tungah kumpi-in nang kong koihna ka mite na uk theih nadingin nang a’ ding pilna le theihna hong ngen na hih manin, [12] pilna le theihna nangma tungah hong kipia hi. Nang’ ma-a kumpite kuamah in a neih ngei loh, nang’ khit-ate kuamah in zong tua bang a neih loh ding hauhnate, neihnate, le pahtawina zong, nangma tungah kong pia thuah ding hi,” a ci hi.
[12] “Khanghamte in pilna nei a, nuntak saute in thu theitel uh hi.
[28] “Tua ciangin amah in mihingte tungah thu genin, ‘Topa zahtakna, pilna hi a, siatna pelhna pen thutheihna hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
[8] Ahi zongin mihingte tungah a hong tung pilna pen Vanglian Pasian’ kha in a hong piak ahi hi.

[4] Leitung ka bawl laitakin nang om na hi hiam? Thei kisa na hih leh tua thu hong gen in. [5] Bangcia-in golsak ding cih kua in seh ahi hiam? Kua in a golna ding zah khau khai ahi hiam? Hihte khempeuh thei kisa na hi hiam? [6] Leitung a pua khuampite bang tungah kiphut ahi hiam? Kua in leitung a bulpi phut ahi hiam? [7] Tua ni-in zingsang aksite in la sa khawm uh a, Pasian’ tapate lungdamin a kiko uh hi.
[30] Thuman mi’ kam in pilna gen a, a leii in thutang gen hi.
[12] Tua ahih ciangin pilna lungsim ka ngah theih nadingun ka nuntak hun uh a tomlam ka theih nadingun hong hilh in.
[10] TOPA zahtakna pen pilna kipatna ahi hi. Ama thupiak a zuite khempeuh tungah thukhen siamna a pia hi. Amah phat tawntung ding ahi hi.
[97] Na thu deih mahmah ing. Sun tawntungin ka lungngaihngaih ahi hi. [98] Na thupiakna in ka langte khempeuh sangin a pilzaw-in hong bawl hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua pen kei tawh omkhawm den hi.
[7] TOPA zahtakna in pilna kipatna hi a, mihaite in pilna le thuhilhna don lo uh hi.
[32] Bang hang hiam cih leh thu thei lote in pilna a don loh manun sihlawh uh a, mihaite in lunghihmawhna a neih loh manun siatlawh uh hi.

[2] Pilna thute limtakin ngai inla, na theihtel zawh nadingin hanciam in. [3] Thu theih nading hanciam takpi inla, thu muhna ding hahkat takpi in. [4] Ngun, ahih kei leh a kiseel sum manpha zon bangin, hahkatin pilna zong in. [5] Tua hileh, TOPA zahtakna thu na thei ding a, Pasian na theitel ding hi. [6] Bang hang hiam cih leh pilna a piapa pen TOPA hi a, amah pen pilna le siamna a hilh pa ahi hi. [7] Pasian in thuman mite pilna guan a, midikte a hu hi.
[7] Nangmah a pilin kingaihsun tawm kei inla, TOPA zahtakin a sia peel in.
[13] Pilna nei-in thu a thei mipa, a lungdam mi ahi hi. [14] Pilna nei leeng ngun sangin hoihzaw a, kham sangin zong manpha zaw hi.
[21] Ka ta aw, pilna le thu ngaihsut theihna len tawntung inla, cikmah ciangin khahsuah ngei kei in.

[6] Pilna nusia kei in; tua hileh siatna panin nang hong hu ding hi. Pilna deih in; tua hileh lungmuang takin na om nadingin hong kem ding hi. [7] Pilna na ngahna ding a thupi masa pen hi a, na neih khempeuh na beilawh zongin na zon ding ahi hi.

[33] Hong kihilhnate zui-in pilna ngah unla, thudon loin ommawk kei un. [34] Ka thugenna a ngai, nisimin ka kong gei-ah omin, ka inn-ah a ngak mipa in lungdamna ngah ding hi. [35] Kei hong mu mi in nuntakna a mu hi a, TOPA’ mai-ah maipha ngah ahi hi. [36] Ahi zongin kei hong mu lo mi, amahmah a kisusia hi a, kei hong mudah peuhmah, a si nuam ahi hi,” hong ci hi.

[10] TOPA zahtakna pen pilna kipatna hi a, Siangtho Pa theihna pen thumuhna ahi hi. [11] Pilna in na khang hong khan ding a, na nuntakna hong sausak ding hi. [12] Pil lecin nangma phattuamna ding hi a, pilna don kei lecin nangma supna ding ahi hi.
[1] Hihte pen Solomon’ paunakte ahi hi: Ta pil in a pa lungdamsak a, ta hai in a nu dahsak hi.
[8] Mipilte in thuhilhna mang a, a hai paute in lungkhamna tuak hi.
[13] Thungaihsun theite’ kam sungah pilna om a, mihaite’ nungzangah ciangduai kinga hi.
[1] Pilna a deihte, kithuhilh ding ut uh a, kitai ding ut lohna pen haina ahi hi.
[15] Mihaite pen amau mah thuman kisa tawntung a, mipilte in mi’ thugenna ngai nuam uh hi. [16] Mihaite in a hehna uh langsakpah uh a, mipilte in a hehna uh ipzo hi.
[1] Ta pil in a pa’ hilhna mang a, a kihisak mi in a khial min pua nuam lo hi.
[10] Hilh ding ut lo, kihihsakna in kitotna bek piangsak thei a, hong kithuhilh ding utna pen a hoihzaw ahi hi.
[16] Thungaihsun theite pilna tawh gamta a, mihaite in a haina taangko hi.
[20] Mipil tawh kikhawl lecin na pil ding a, mihai tawh kikhawl lecin gimna na thuak ding hi.
[1] Numei pilte in innsung nuntakna khangsak a, numei haite in innsung susia hi.
[8] Thungaihsun theite a pilna in lampi man musak a, mihaite a haina in lam khialsak hi. [9] Mihaite in a khialh hangun phamawh sa lo uh a, mipilte a khialh ciangun mawhmaisak ding deih uh hi.
[16] Mipilte kidawmin siatna panin kihem a, mihaite in thu ngaihsun masa loin gamta pahpah hi. [17] A lungtom mite hai gamtat a, mipilte lungduai hi.
[29] A lungduaite mipil hi a, lungtomna pen haina kilatna ahi hi.
[5] A pa’ hilhna a ngai nuam lote mihai hi a, hilhna a mang nuamte mipil ahi hi.
[12] A kihisak mite in kithuhilhna ngai nuam lo uh a, mipilte kiangah thu dong ngei lo uh hi.
[33] TOPA zahtakna pen pilna mah hi pah a, kiniamkhiatna in pahtawina hong ngahsak hi.
[16] Kham sangin pilna hoihzaw a, ngun sangin thutheihna deihhuai zaw hi.
[28] Mihaite pau loin om leh a pil mahin kingaihsun hi. Thungaihsun thei na hihna a kilat nadingin pau loin om khinkhian in.
[2] Mihaite in thu a teltheih zawhna ding uh kin lo uh a, pil si, a kicih theih nading deihna bek tawh thu gen uh hi.
[15] Thungaihsun theite in a pilna uh behlap a, pilna a ngah nadingun mipilte in a bil uh tawh limtakin ngai uh hi.
[2] Thuthei lopi-in lawpluatna hoih lo a, mawk nawhtatna in lungkhamna piangsak thei hi.
[8] Pilna a zongpa in ama phattuamna ding a zong hi a, thu a thei mipa’ sepna maavang ding hi.
[11] Pilna in mi lungduaisak a, mi’ hong hehsaknate kiphawkmawh bawlna in minthanna ahi hi.
[20] Thu kigente ngai-in hong kihilhte mang lecin mai lamah na pil ding hi.
[27] Thuhilhna a mang nuam lo tapa pen pilna a thei kha lo ding tapa ahi hi.
[15] Pilna tawh kam na pau theih leh kham le suang manpha sangin a manphazaw a nei na hi hi.
[11] Mi kiphasakte gim a kipiak ciangin mi mawkmawkte in pillawh uh a, mipilte a kihilh ciangin thutheihna-in nei uh hi.
[20] Mipil pa’ inn sungah neihlelam a dimin om a, ahi zongin mihai pa in a ngahzahzah zangkhia pah hi.
[3] Mipilte in a lauhuai thu mu thei-in pelh uh a, mi mawkmawkte in phusuakin thuak uh hi.
[29] A nasepna-ah a siam mahmah mi na theikha uh hiam? Amah in mi mawkmawkte’ na sem lo ding a, kumpite’ na sem ding hi.

[3] Pilna tawh inn kilam a, ngaihsut siamna tawh inn kip hi. [4] Thungaihsut theihna inn sungah a hoih a manpha nate a dimtakin om hi. [5] Thahatna sangin pilna hoihzaw a, thakhauhna sangin thutheihna hoihzaw hi.
[17] Sik in sik mah hiamsak thei a, mi in midang pilsak thei hi.
[26] Ei le ei kimuanna haina hi a, mipilte’ hilhna zuihna pen lungmuanna ahi hi.
[3] Pilna a deih mi in a pa lungdamsak a, numei paktat tawh a kikhawl mi in a neihsa teng lawnmang hi.
[11] Mihai pa a hehna bangin kam pau-in gamta gawp a, mipil pa ahihleh ki-ipin a hehna damsak hi.
[15] Ciangduai le tai-na in pilna guan a, a kikhahkhong ta in a nu maizumsak hi.
[18] Pil semsem lehang kilunghimawh semsem a, tam thei semsem lehang hong gimsak semsem zawsop hi.

[26] Pasian in amah a lungdamsakte tungah pilna, theihna, le lungdamna pia a, ahi zongin a hehpihhuai mimawhte ahihleh a sep bek sisakin, amau’ thalawhsa khempeuh amah a lungdamsakte tungah a piaksak hi. Hih pen a mawknapi taktak, huihpi nungdelh bang bek ahi hi.
[9] Heh pahpah kei in; hehna a haihuai ahi hi. [10] “Bang hangin nidang lai-in hih sangin hoihzaw tham ahi hiam?” ci-in dong kei in. Tua bangte pil thudotna hi lo hi.
[12] Sum in hong lungmuansak bangin pilna in zong hong lungmuangsak hi. Pilna a manphatna, a pilte a nuntaksak theihna ahi hi.
[19] Khuapi a uk mihing sawm sangin pilna in mi khat hatsak zaw hi.
[29] Hih zong Vanglian TOPA’ kiang pan a hong pai thu ahi hi. Amah pen thu lamlahna-ah lamdang mahmah a, pilna-ah lian mahmah hi.

[14] Tua ahih ciangin en un, hih mite tungah a tumdang le a lamdang ahi a lamdang nate ka bawlkik ding hi. Amau’ mipilte’ pilna kisia ding a, amau’ thu mutheite’ thu muhtel theihna kiseel ding hi,” a ci hi.
[28] Thei nai lo a, za nai lo na hi hiam? TOPA pen tawntung Pasian hi a, leitung mong khempeuh dong a Piangsak pa ahi hi. Amah gim lo a, zong tawl lo hi. Ama thu theihtelna kigen zo lo hi.
[8] Bang hang hiam cih leh keima ngaihsutnate nomau’ ngaihsutna bang hi lo a, keima paiziate nomau’ paizia bang hi lo hi, TOPA in ci hi.

[23] Nang pen ka pu ka pate’ Pasian na hi a, ka hong phat a, ka hong zahtak hi. Nangmah in pilna le thahatna na hong piazo hi. Ka thungetna nong za a, kumpipa kianga ka gen ding thu nong lakzo hi,” a ci hi.
[3] A pilte ahih uhleh vantung khuavak tawh a taangkhawm ding uh hi. A pha-in gamtat ding mi tampi a hilhte pen aksi bangin a taang tawntung ding uh hi.

[10] Mi tampite kisiansuahin a hoih le a hoih lo a kikhentel ding uh hi. Migilote in bangmah theitel thei lo uh ahih manin a gilo semsem ding uh hi. Ahih hangin mipilte in theihtel theihna a nei ding uh hi.
[24] “Ka thuhilhna za-in a zui mi khempeuhte pen suang tungah a inn a lam mipil pa tawh kibang ding hi.

[19] Mihing Tapa hong pai leuleu a, zune anne-in a om ciangin, ‘Zuhai anhai pa; siahdongte le midangte in a kikholhpih nop loh mite tawh a kikhawlpa,’ ci leuleu uh hi. Ahi zongin Pasian’ pilna a man taktakna thu a gah panin hong kilang hi,” a ci hi.
[45] “A pil a citak nasem i cih a bangcite ahi hiam? A naseppih dangte ukin a hun manmanin amaute’ nekzah ding ciat an a pia dingin a topa in a seh a nasempa ahi hi.
[32] Tua ciangin thuman na thei ding uh a, tua thuman in note hong suaktasak ding hi,” a cih leh

[11] Thesalonika khuamite sangin Berea khuamite in mipi lungsim neizaw uh hi. Amaute in lawp mahmahna tawh Paul’ thugente ngai uh a, Paul’ thugente man taktak hiam ci-in a theih nadingun nisimin Lai Siangtho a sim uh hi.

[21] Amaute in Pasian thei napi-in a zahtak dingun a kilawm bangin zahtak loin, a tungah a lungdam dingun a kilawm bangin lungdam lo uh hi. Amaute in thuhoih ngaihsun nuam lo uh a, a ngaihsutnate uh a mawknapi a suak hi. [22] Amaute pil a kisak mahmah uh hangin a hai mahmah uh ahi hi.

[18] Bang hang hiam cih leh sihna a thuak mite a dingin singlamteh tungah Khrih sihna thu pen a haihuai thu ahi hi. Ahi zongin hotkhiatna a ngah eite a dingin Pasian’ vangliatna ahi hi. [19] Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho sungah, “Mipilte’ pilna ka susia ding a, miteite’ teina ka heikhiatsak ding hi,” ci-in kigelh hi. [20] Tua ahih manin tuhuna mipilte, miteite, le thusel a siamte, bangin kimang ahi hiam? Hih leitung pilna pen haina a suahsak khitna kilang khinzo hi. [21] Pasian in ama pilna hong zang a, mihingte in amau’ pilna tawh pasian a theih zawh loh nadingun a bawl hi. Tua ahih manin mite in, “A haihuai thu,” ci-in a ngaihsut uh i thuhilhna a umte, Pasian in hotkhiatna a piazaw hi. [22] A uptheih nadingun Jew mite in nalamdang kal uh a, Grik mite in pilna a thupisak uh hi. [23] Ahi zongin kote in singlamteh tungah a kikhai Khrih’ thu ka hilh uh a, tua thu pen Jew mite a dingin a hehhuai thu hi a, Gentail mite a dingin a haihuai thu ahi hi. [24] Ahi zongin Pasian in a hong sap ei Jew mite le Gentail mite a dingin Khrih pen Pasian’ vangliatna le Pasian’ pilna ahi hi. [25] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ haina pen mite’ pilna sangin sangzaw lai a, Pasian’ thaneemna pen mite’ hatna sangin hatzaw lai hi.
[27] Ahi zongin Pasian in mipilte a maizumsak nadingin mihaite hong teel a, mi thahatte a maizumsak nadingin mi thaneemte a hong teel hi.

[30] Ahi zongin Pasian in Jesuh Khrih hangin note tungah nuntakna hong pia a, tua Jesuh Khrih pen eite’ pilna, Pasian tawh i kipawl theihna, Pasian’ mi siangtho suakin, hotkhiatna i ngah theihna ahi hi.

[5] Tua ahih manin note’ thu upna pen mihingte’ pilna hang hi loin, Pasian’ vangliatna hangin a um na hi uh hi. [6] Ahi zongin kha thu lamah a khangham mite tungah pilna thu ka gen hi. Tua ka gen pilna pen tu-in a maimang kuankuanta ding hih leitung mite’ pilna le vangliatna thu hi lo hi. [7] Tua ka gen pilna thu pen mite’ theih lo dingin Pasian in a ipcip Pasian’ pilna thusim hi a, eite’ minthan nadingin leitung pianma pekin Pasian in a na koihsa thu ahi hi. [8] Hih leitung a uk mite kuamah in hih pilna thu thei lo uh hi. Thei hi le-uh, a minthang Topa pen singlamteh tungah na that lo ding uh hi.
[15] Kha Siangtho a nei mite in na khempeuh theithei uh a, ahi zongin leitung mite in bangmah thei lo uh ahih manin a lungmang uh hi.

[18] Note khatpeuh hih leitung ngeina-ah a pilin na kingaihsut uhleh a pil taktak na hih theih nadingun a hai na suak phot un. [19] Hih leitung mite in pilna hi, ci-in a ngaihsutte, Pasian a dingin a haihuai thu ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho in, “Mipilte amau’ ngian mahah awksak hi,” a na ci hi.
[15] Tua ahih ciangin hoihtakin kingaihsunin gamta unla, mihaite bang hi loin mipilte bangin gamta un. [16] Tuhun pen hun hoih lo hun ahih manin na hun neih khempeuh uh a hoih lamin zang un.

[2] Note, lungsim hanna tawh kidimin, thu a man taktakin na theihna hangun lungkip takin omin, itna tawh pumkhat na suahtheih nading uh ka deihna ahi hi. Tua hileh Pasian’ thusim ahi Khrih mahmah na thei ding uh hi. [3] Khrih pen Pasian’ pilna le a thuthuk khempeuh a kitheihtheih nading ahi hi.
[5] Pilna kisam na om uhleh Pasian kiangah ngen un. Mi khempeuh tungah Pasian dikin cingh mahmah ahih manin hong pia ding hi.

[13] Note lakah pilin thuthei a kisa a om leh kiniamkhiatin pilin, nuntak hoih le gamtat hoih tawh a lahkhiat ding ahi hi. [14] Ahi zongin na lungsim uhah enna, gitlohna, le huaihamna a om leh a zuaugen na hi uh a, pil ing, ci-in kisialh nading bangmah om lo hi. [15] Tua bang pilnate vantung panin a hong pai hi lo a, leitung pilna, kha thu tawh a kisai lo, a dawivai ahi hi.
[17] Ahi zongin tunglam panin a kingah pilna a siangtho ahi hi. Mi tawh kilem thei-in dik a, mi tawh kikhawl thei a, hehpihna lungsim nei-in gamtat hoih a, mi lang-et lo a, kineihkhem cihte om lo hi.

[4] Ahih hangin gulpi in numei kiangah, “Na si kei ding uh hi. [6] Tua ahih ciangin singkung a hoihna, mi a pilsak dingin tua a gah a deihhuaina a muh ciangin, a singgah loin a ne hi. Amah in singgah kimkhat a pasal pia a, a pasal in zong a ne hi.

[2] “Thei in; Judah minam Hur’ tapa ahi Uri’ tapa Bezalel a minin ka sam khin hi. [3] Lim hoihte a geel ding; kham, ngun, sumngo tawh na a bawl ding; siamna nam khempeuhah nasep nading; bulh ding suangte seekna le singzep nasep a sem dingin vangliatna, siamna, pilna, theihna, le khutsiam nasep khempeuh tawh amah ka kidimsak hi. [4] Lim hoihte a geel ding; kham, ngun, sumngo tawh na a bawl ding; siamna nam khempeuhah nasep nading; bulh ding suangte seekna le singzep nasep a sem dingin vangliatna, siamna, pilna, theihna, le khutsiam nasep khempeuh tawh amah ka kidimsak hi. [5] Lim hoihte a geel ding; kham, ngun, sumngo tawh na a bawl ding; siamna nam khempeuhah nasep nading; bulh ding suangte seekna le singzep nasep a sem dingin vangliatna, siamna, pilna, theihna, le khutsiam nasep khempeuh tawh amah ka kidimsak hi.

[10] Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt panin nong paikhiat lai-un TOPA in note’ mai-ah San Tuipi a kansakna, le Jordan galkhat a om na suksiatmang uh Amor mite’ kumpi nihte ahi Sihon le Og tungah na bawlna uh ka za khin uh hi. [11] Tua thu ka zak phetun ka lungsim uh bei a, note’ hangin mite’ lungsimah hanna bei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA na Pasian uh, tunga om vantung le nuai-a om leitungah Pasian ahi hi. [12] Tua ahih ciangin tu-in note tungah kong dik gamtat bangin note zong ko innkuan-ah nong dik gamtat nading uh TOPA’ min tawh kei tungah hong kiciam unla, a man taktak lim khat kei hong pia un. [13] Ka nu, ka pa, ka sanggamnute, ka sanggampate, le amaute tawh a kizomte khempeuh hong hon unla, sihna panin kote hong suaktasak un,” a ci hi. [14] Mite in ama tungah, “Nang’ tangin kote ka si ngam uh hi. Hih ko’ thu na genkhiat kei nakleh , TOPA in kote tungah hih leitang hong piak ciangin nang tungah dikna le thumanna tawh kong gamta ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

[12] Tua ciangin a lai sungah genthuah lai a, “ TOPA a dingin biakinn khat, le ama a dingin kumpi inn khat a lam ding, thutheihna le thutelna tawh a kidim mipil, David tungah a pia, van le lei a bawl Israel TOPA Pasian in thupha ngah tahen.
[9] A kamkaih tawh uk lohin a phamawh, thutheihna a nei lo, sakol le la bang kei in.

[1] Mihai in a lungsim sungah, “Pasian om lo hi,” ci-in ngaihsun hi. Amaute sia uh hi. A kihhuai-in gamta uh a, a hoihin a gamta kuamah om lo hi. [2] A pil, Pasian a zong mi a om uh hiam, cih a theih nadingin Pasian in vantung panin mihingte hong ensuk hi.
[66] Na thupiakte um ka hih manin thu khentel theihna le theihsiamna hong hilh in.
[23] Na lungsim ngaihsutnate nuntakna nak hi a, na neihsa a manpha pen bangin na kep ding ahi hi.

[10] Mi tampite kisiansuahin a hoih le a hoih lo a kikhentel ding uh hi. Migilote in bangmah theitel thei lo uh ahih manin a gilo semsem ding uh hi. Ahih hangin mipilte in theihtel theihna a nei ding uh hi.

[16] “Ngiahon lakah tuu a kikhah bangin note hong sawlkhia ka hih manin gul bangin pilvang unla, vakhu bangin migi un. [17] Mi pawlkhatte in note hong manin zumah hong paipih ding uh a, amaute’ kikhopna inn sungah hong satgawp ding uh ahih manin hoihtakin kidawm un.
[42] Tua ahih ciangin bang hunin na Topa uh hong pai ding cih thei lo na hih manun na pilvang un.
[31] Galkap tul sawm a nei kumpi khat in galkap tul sawmnih tawh a hong kuan kumpi khat do dingin a kithawi leh, tua kumpipa a dozo ding mahin i hat takpi hiam ci-in ngaihsun masa ding hi.
[8] Ahi zongin keimah in, ‘Topa aw, tuate go-in ka ne het kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a ninin a kingaihsun an peuhmah ka kam ka tun ngei kei hi,’ ka ci hi.

[20] Pasian in leitung a piansak cil a kipanin a kimu thei lo ama pianzia ahi tawntung vanglianpa le Pasian ahihna thute ama bawlsa nate tung panin teltakin hong kilang hi. Tua ahih manin, “Thei kei ing,” ci-in paulap a zontheih nading uh om lo hi.

[14] Gentail mite in thukham a neih loh uh hangin amau’ ngaihsut tawmna tawh thukham’ deihna bang a gamtat uh ciangin tua thukham’ deihna a zui uh hi a, thukham a neih loh uh hangin a gamtat dingun a kilawm amau mahmah in a thei tawm uh ahi hi. [15] Amau’ lungsim sungah thukham’ deihnate omkhin ahihna thu a gamtatna un hong kilangsak hi. Amau mahmah zong khat veivei hoih kisa, khat veivei sia kisa uh ahih manin, amau’ lungsim sungah thukham’ deihnate theihna omkhin ahihna thu, hih amau’ kiphawk tawmna lungsim in nakpitakin hong kitelsak hi.
[12] Eite’ ngah lungsim pen leitung mite’ lungsim hi lo a, Pasian in eite tungah a hong piak na khempeuh i theih nadingin Pasian’ hong piak Kha Siangtho lungsim ahi hi.
[33] Sanggamte aw, mi’ khemsa-in ta kei un. Kikholhpih hoih lote in mi siasak thei hi.

[17] i Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pasian ahi, a minthang Pa Pasian in note tungah Kha Siangtho hong pia-in, tua Kha Siangtho in note tungah lungpilna hong pia-in, note in Pasian na theih nadingun note tungah Pasian hong kilatsak nadingin thu ka hong ngetsak niloh hi.
[15] Tua ahih ciangin hoihtakin kingaihsunin gamta unla, mihaite bang hi loin mipilte bangin gamta un. [16] Tuhun pen hun hoih lo hun ahih manin na hun neih khempeuh uh a hoih lamin zang un.

[2] Note, lungsim hanna tawh kidimin, thu a man taktakin na theihna hangun lungkip takin omin, itna tawh pumkhat na suahtheih nading uh ka deihna ahi hi. Tua hileh Pasian’ thusim ahi Khrih mahmah na thei ding uh hi. [3] Khrih pen Pasian’ pilna le a thuthuk khempeuh a kitheihtheih nading ahi hi.

[8] Khrih thu tawh a kituak lopi-in, tangthu tuanthu ahi a, huihlak a ukte’ thu siksanin ahi zongin, bangmahin a kimang lo leitung pilna tawh mite’ khemsa-in sila na suahkhak loh nadingun kingaihsun un.
[6] Tua ahih ciangin midangte bangin eite mawk om hithiat loin khua phawkin pilvang ni.

[2] Thu um mi to-in a nei silate in upna sungah sanggam khat hi hang, ci-in ngaihsutna tawh a tote uh zahtakbawl loin omkha kei uh hen. Amaute’ nasepna hangin hamphatna a ngah mite pen thu um mi le a it uh mite ahih manin a hoihzaw-in a sepsak ding uh a kilawmzaw ahi hi. Tu-a ka hong gen ding thute mi khempeuh tungah hilhin gen in.
[7] Tua bang numeite in thu a zakzak uh hangin a man le a man lo khen thei lo uh ahih manin thuman thutak thei zo lo uh hi.
[26] Mailamah a thaman ding mukhol thei ahih manin Egypt gam sunga hauhna le nopsaknate khempeuh sangin Khrih hangin simmawhna thuak taakzaw tham hi, ci-in a ngaihsun hi.
