[7] Na khempeuh a bei nading hun hong naita hi. Nomau pumpi ki-uktawm thei-in pilvang unla, hoihtakin thu a ngen thei-in om ta un.

[8] Note pilvangin khua phawk un. Na gal uh ahi Dawimangpa, humpinelkai bangin a nektheih ding zongin vak kawikawi hi. [9] Leitungah thu um dang khempeuh in zong note’ thuak mah bangin a thuak ahihna thu thei unla, na upna uhah kipin Dawimangpa na nial un.
[7] Ka it tate aw, mite’ khemsa-in ta kei un. Khrih a thuman ahih mah bangin a manin a gamtate khempeuh a thuman ahi hi.

[2] Ni sagih ma-in Pasian in a nasepte zo khinta a, ama hihsa nasep khempeuh panin ni sagih ni-in a tawlnga hi. [3] Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ni sagih ni thupha pia-in siangthosak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh piansak nasepna ama nasep khempeuh panin tua ni-in Pasian a tawlnga hi.

[23] amah in amaute kiangah, “ TOPA’ hong thupiak hih bang ahi hi: ‘Zing ciang pen a thupi-a tawlngak ni, TOPA a dingin sabbath siangtho ni ahi hi. Na em dingte uh emin, na huan dingte uh huan unla, a omlai teng zingsang ciang dong koih un,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.

[25] Moses in, “Tuni-in ne un; tuni pen TOPA a dingin Sabbath ahi hi. Tuni-in a pualamah na mu kei ding uh hi. [26] Note in ni guk sung na khawm ding uh a, ahi zongin sabbath ni ahi a ni sagih ni-in bangmah om lo ding hi,” a ci hi.

[29] Thei un! TOPA in note’ tungah sabbath hong piazo hi. Tua ahih ciangin ni guk ni-in amah in note tungah ni nih khom ding an hong pia hi. Note na milipun nomau’ omna ciatah om un. A ni sagih ni-in ama omna panin kuamah paikhia kei hen,” a ci hi.

[8] “Sabbath ni a siangtho-a zat ding phawk un. [9] Ni guk sung nomau’ na semin na nasep ding khempeuh uh na hih ding uh hi. [10] Ahi zongin a ni sagih ni pen TOPA note’ Pasian’ Sabbath ni ahi hi. Tua ni-in note, na tapate, na tanute, na nasempate, na nasemnute, na ganhing uh ahi a, peemtate in ahi zongin na bangmah na sem kei ding uh hi. [11] Bang hang hiam cih leh a ni guk sung tengin TOPA in van le lei, tuipi le tuate sunga om khempeuh bawl a, a ni sagih ni tawlnga hi. Tua ahih ciangin TOPA in Sabbath ni thupha pia-in siangthosak hi.

[13] “Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: ‘Keima Sabbath ni-in note na tawlnga ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih pen TOPA ahi keimah in note a hong siangthosak ka hihna na theih nadingun na khang tawntungun keimah le note’ kikalah lim khat hi ding hi. [14] Sabbath ni-in note na tawlnga ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note a dingin a siangtho ahi hi. Tua ni-in a tawlnga lo mi peuhmah kithat ding a, tua ni-in na a sem mi peuhmah ama mite’ kiang panin kikhenkhia ding hi. [15] Ni guk sungin nasep kizo ding hi. Ahih hangin a ni sagih ni pen a thupi-a tawlngakna Sabbath ni hi a, TOPA’ tungah siangtho hi. Sabbath ni-in nasep khat peuhpeuh a sem mi peuhmah kithat ding hi. [16] Tua ahih ciangin a tawntung thuciamna-in amau’ khang tawntungin Sabbath tangin, Israel mite in Sabbath kem ding uh hi. [17] Ni guk sung teng TOPA in van le lei bawlin, a ni sagih ni-in amah tawlnga a, a tha dimsakkik hi. Keimah le Israel mite’ kikalah hih Sabbath ni pen lim khat hi tawntung ding hi, ci hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
[21] “Ni guk sung na na sem ding uh a, ahi zongin a ni sagih ni-in na tawlnga ding uh hi. Lokhawh hun le anlak hun sungin zong na tawlnga ding uh hi.
[2] Ni guk sungin nasep kiman ding a, ahih hangin a ni sagih ni-in thupi-a tawlngakna Sabbath siangtho TOPA’ tungah na nei ding uh hi. Tua ni-in na khat peuhpeuh a sem peuhmah kithat ding hi.
[31] Tua pen note a dingin a thupi tawlngakna Sabbath hi a, an na tang ding uh hi. Tua pen a tawntung a thukham ahi hi.
[3] Note a kuamah peuh in na nu le na pa uh zahtakin, note in ka Sabbath-te na tang ding uh hi; kei pen TOPA na Pasian uh ka hi hi.

[3] Ni guk sungin nasep kizo ding a, ahih hangin a ni sagih ni pen a thupi tawlngakna Sabbath, a siangtho kikhopna ahi hi. Note in tua ni-in na na sem kei ding uh hi. Tua pen note’ tenna khempeuhah TOPA a dingin Sabbath ahi hi.
[11] Note hong kisan’ theih nadingin amah in TOPA’ mai-ah anlom vei ding a, Sabbath ni a zing ciangin siampipa in tua anlom vei ding hi.

[15] “Note in Sabbath khit a zing ciang, vei-a biakna anlom na paipih ni uh a kipan nipikal sagih bit dong a ni na simto ding uh hi. [16] A Sabbath sagihna khit a zing ciang dong ni sawmnga dong na simto ding uh a, tua ciangin note in TOPA’ tungah an thak tawh biakna na paipih ding uh hi.

[26] TOPA in Moses kiangah, [27] “Hih a kha sagihna ni sawm ni pen kilemna ni ahi hi. Tua pen note a dingin a siangtho kikhop hun hi ding a, note in an tangin, TOPA’ tungah meihal biakna na pia ding uh hi. [28] Note in tua ni-in na na sem kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua pen TOPA note’ Pasian’ mai-ah note a dingin kilemna bawl nadingin kilemna bawl ni ahi hi. [29] Bang hang hiam cih leh tua ni-in bang khat peuhpeuh a nekha mi peuhmah ama mite kiang panin kihawlkhia ding hi. [30] Tua ni-in na khat peuhpeuh a sem mi peuhmah keimah in ama mite lak panin ka that ding hi. [31] Note in na na sem kei ding uh hi. Tua pen na khang tawntungun na tenna khempeuh uhah ngeina khat hi tawntung ding hi. [32] Tua pen note a dingin a thupi tawlngakna Sabbath ni hi ding a, an na tang ding uh hi. Tua kha ni kua nitak a kipan, a nitak panin a nitak kik dong note in na Sabbath uh na tang ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[38] Note in TOPA’ tungah na piak uh TOPA’ Sabbath-te, note’ letsongte, thuciamna hangin na biaknate khempeuh uh le utthu-a na biaknate khempeuh uh banah piak ding ahi hi.
[8] Sabbath ni simin Aaron in a tawntung thuciamna-in Israel mite tang dingin TOPA’ mai-ah a ngeina bangin koih tawntung ding hi.
[4] Ahih hangin a kum sagihna-ah leitang ading a thupi tawlngakna sabbath, TOPA pahtawina sabbath om ding hi. Note in na lo uh na pawi kei ding uh a, na leenggui lo uh na hah kei ding uh hi.
[2] Note in ka sabbath-te tangin keimah hong kibiakna mun na zahtak ding uh hi; kei pen TOPA ka hi hi.

[34] Tua ciangin na galte uh leitangah na om tanvei uh, gamkhingin a om sungteng, leitang in tawlngak hun a ngah hi ding hi. Leitang tawlnga-in, a sabbath-te a tang hi ding hi. [35] Ama tungah na ten laitakun na ngahsak loh uh tawlngakna ahi a sabbath-te, gamkhingin a om sungteng a tawlnga hi ding hi.

[43] Ahih hangin amaute in leitang nusia-in, amaute om loin gamkhingin a om sungteng leitang in a sabbath-te na ngah ding hi. Amaute in ka biakna ngeina kipte nialin, ka thukhamte mudah uh ahih manin, a mawhna uh a kipuahphat ding uh kisam hi.

[32] Israel mite gamlakah a om sungun, Sabbath ni-in sing a tom mi khat mu uh hi. [33] Sing a tom laitak a mu mite in Aaron le Moses , le mihonte khempeuh kiangah amah paipih uh hi. [34] Amah bang kicih ding ci-in teltakin kigen lo ahih manin amaute in khumcip uh hi. [35] TOPA in Moses kiangah, “Tua mipa kithat ding hi. Mihonte khempeuh in giahphual pua-ah suang tawh amah deng ding uh hi,” a ci hi. [36] Mihonte khempeuh in giahphual pua-ah amah paipih uh a, TOPA in Moses a thupiak bangin suang tawh amah a denglum uh hi.
[9] “Sabbath ni-in a sitbaang lo, kum khat a pha tuuno nih le an tawh biakna-in sathau tawh a kibawl annel lawh nih le a leenggahzu tawh biakna hi ding hi.

[12] “‘ TOPA note’ Pasian in hong thupiak bangin na sianthosak nadingun Sabbath ni tang un. [13] Ni guk sung na semin na nasep ding khempeuh uh na hih ding uh hi. [14] Ahih hangin a ni sagih ni pen TOPA note’ Pasian’ Sabbath ni ahi hi. Tua ni-in note bangin na nasem numei le na nasem pasalte uh a tawlngak theih nadingin note, na tapate, na tanute, na nasemnute, na nasempate, na bawngtal, na la, na ganhing khat peuhpeuh uh le na huang sung uha om zinte in na khat peuhpeuh sem lo ding uh hi. [15] Egypt-ah nasem na hihna uh le tua lai panin TOPA na Pasian un a vangliatna khut le a thahatna tawh hong paikhiatpihna na phawk ding uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Sabbath ni na tan’ ding uh TOPA note’ Pasian in thu hong pia hi.
[23] Tua ciangin amah in, “Bang hangin tuni-in ama kiangah pai ding na hi hiam? Khadet ni ahi a, Sabbath ni ahi zongin hi lo hi,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Hong hoih na ding hi,” a ci hi.

[5] Tua ciangin amah in amaute thu pia a, “Note hih bangin na gamta ding uh hi: Sabbath ni-in nasep pengin kumpipa inn a cing no seh thum ah sehkhatte in [6] (adang seh thum ah sehkhatte Sur kulhkongpi-ah omin adang seh thum ah sehkhatte a cingte’ nung kulhkongpi-ah om hi) kumpi inn na cing ding uh hi. [7] Tua ciangin Sabbath ni-in na semin TOPA’ biakinn a cing no a khennihte in [8] na khutsung uhah na hiam ciat uh tawh kumpi Joash na cing ding uh hi. Note kiang nai-ah a hong pai peuhpeuh kithat ding hi. Kumpipa a paikhiat ciang le a sungtum ciangin amah na cing ding uh hi,” a ci hi. [9] A ukte in siampi Jehoiada’ thupiak khempeuh bangin hih uh a, Sabbath ni-in nasep a sem dingte tawh Sabbath ni-in ama mi nasep a peng dingte hong paipih ciat uh a, siampi Jehoiada kiangah hong tung uh hi.
[18] Tua ciangin Assiria kumpipa a mai-et nadingin amah in Sabbath ni-in zat dingin a sungah a kikoih tutna khuhna le kumpipa’ lutna a puanung, TOPA’ biakinn panin a lakhia hi.
[32] Kohath mi amau’ behte pawlkhat in zong Sabbath simin koih ding Ompihna Anlum uk uh hi.
[31] a mal zah a kisam bangin Sabbath nite, Khadet nite, le pawi nite-in TOPA tungah meihal biakna a kipiak peuhpeuh ciangin a tawntungin TOPA’ mai-ah om ding uh hi.

[4] En in, Israel-te a dingin a tawntung a ding a kikipsaksa bangin, ama mai-ah a namtui nate ahi paknamtui halna ding, le Ompihna Anlum piak tawntungna ding, le Sabbath nite, Khadet nite, le TOPA kote’ Pasian a dingin a kisehsa pawi nite-in zing le nitakin meihal biaknate piak nadingin TOPA ka Pasian’ minin biakinn khat lamin ama tungah a ap ding ka hi hi.

[12] Tua ciangin Sabbath nite, Khadet nite, le kum simin a kinei pawi thum - silngo sawh loh anlum pawi, nipikal pawi, le biakbuk pawite a dingin Moses’ thupiakna tawh kizui-in nisimin piakna nasep ding a kisam ahih mah bangin innliim mai-a a lam TOPA’ biakna tau tungah Solomon in meihal biakna TOPA tungah a pia hi.
[4] Note in hih bangin na hih ding uh hi: Sabbath ni-in nasep a peng no siampite le Levi mite sung panin seh thum ah seh khat kulhkongpi cingte na hi ding uh a,

[8] Siampi Jehoiada’ thupiak khempeuh bangin Levi mite le Judah mi khempeuh gamta uh hi. Amaute in amau’ mi ciat Sabbath ni-in na a sem ding mite tawh Sabbath ni-in nasep a peng ding mite hong paipih uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Jehoiada in nasep a peng ding siampite ciahsak lo hi.

[3] Kumpipa in ama neihsa sung panin a piakte pen meihal biakna ding ahi hi. TOPA’ thukham sungah a kigelh mah bangin zing le nitak a meihal biaknate, Sabbath nite, Khadet nite, le a kiseh pawite a dingin meihal biaknate ahi hi.

[21] Tua sungin Israel leitang in a sabbath-te a kicingin na tang hi. Kamsang Jeremiah tungtawnin TOPA’ thugen a tun nadingin kum sawmsagih a cin nadingin leitang a kinusiat sung khempeuh leitang in sabbath tawlngakna a nei ahi hi.
[14] na nasempa Moses tungtawnin amaute tungah na Sabbath siangtho na theisak a, thupiaknate, ngeinate, le thukhamte na pia hi.

[31] Hih mite in Sabbath ni-in van ahi a, an ahi zongin hong zuak leh Sabbath ni le ni siangtho khat peuhpeuh ni-in i lei kei ding hi. Kum sagihna-a an piangte nusia-in tua kumin leiba khempeuh i maisak ding hi. [32] Eite’ Pasian’ biakinn-ah nasepna ding ahi Ompihna Anlum, a manmanin an tawh biakna, a manmanin meihal biakna, Sabbath ni, Khadet ni, a kiseh pawite, biakna letsongte, le Israel mite’ tangin a kibawlsak ahi kilemna bawl nadingin mawhna hanga biaknate, le i Pasian’ biakinn-ah sep ding a kisam dangte khempeuhah zat dingin kum simin shekel khat seh thum ah khat piak ding ka kiciam uh hi.

[15] Tua hun lai-in Judah gam sungah mite in Sabbath ni-in leenggah sukin, a khawhsate uh khawmin late tungah suanin, leenggah, thei, le van namkim, Sabbath ni-in Jerusalem-ah hong puakna ka mu hi. Tua ni-in na a zuakna uh hangin ka lungkim lohna amaute tungah ka gen hi. [16] Jerusalem khuasunga teng Taia khuamite in zong ngasa le van namkim hong paipihin Judah mite tung le Jerusalem khua sungah Sabbath ni-in zuak uh hi. [17] Tua ciangin Judah uliante tungah lungkim loin amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin hih bangin hoih lohna gamta-in Sabbath ni ninsak ngam na hi uh hiam? [18] Na pu na pate uh tu-a bang teekin a gamtat manin eite tung le hih khuapi tungah hih bang siatna khempeuh hong tung hi lo ahi hiam? Tua hinapi-in note in Sabbath ni nitsakna tawh Israel tungah hehna tamzaw na tungsak uh hi,” ka ci hi. [19] Tua hi a, Sabbath ni ding khuamial ciangin kongpite a kikhakna ding ka sawl a, Sabbath bei khit mateng a kihon loh nadingin thu ka pia hi. Tua ciangin, Sabbath ni-in khua sungah van hong kilutpih lohna dingin kongpite a cing dingin ka nasemte pawlkhat ka koih hi. [20] Tua ahih manin sumbukte le na nam tuamtuam a zuakte, khatvei nihvei khawng Jerusalem khua pualamah giak uh hi. [21] Ahi zongin amaute hilhkholin amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin kulh gei-ah giak na hi uh hiam? Nong giah kik uhleh note tungah thu kong bawl ding hi,” ka ci hi. Tua hun a kipanin Sabbath ni-in amaute hong pai nawn lo uh hi. [22] Tua ciangin Sabbath ni a siangtho-in a omsak theih nadingun amaute kisiansuah tawmin kongpite hong cin nadingun Levi mite ka sawl hi. Ka Pasian aw, hih thu-ah zong hong phawk inla, na itna tawh kizui-in siatna panin kei hong pengsak in.
[13] Bangmahin a kimang lo piaknate hong paipih nawn kei un. Paknamtui halna ka kih hi. Khadet ni, Sabbath ni, le thupi takin na kikhopnate uh mawhna tawh kidim ahih manin ke’n ka thuakzo kei hi.

[2] Hih banga a gamta mite, hih thu a lenkip mihingte, Sabbath tangin a siasak lote, siatna bawlna ding panin hoihtakin a kikemte, thupha ngah mi ahi hi,” a ci hi. [3] TOPA pawlin a beel gamdang mipa in, “ TOPA in ama mite kiang panin kei hong khenkhia taktak ding hi,” ci kei hen. A kiget mipa in, “En un, kei pen Pasian’ mite lakah a kihel thei ding ka hi kei hi,” ci kei hen. [4] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Keima Sabbath nite tangin, kei hong lungdamsak thei nate teel a, ka thuciamna a lenkip a kiget mite tungah [5] ka innsung le ka huang sungah tanu le tapate sangin a hoihzaw phawkna le min ka pia ding a, a mang ngei nawn lo ding a kip tawntung min amaute tungah ka pia ding hi. [6] “Ama na a sem ding, TOPA’ min a it ding, ama nasem a suak dingin TOPA pawlin amah a beel gamdang mite, Sabbath ni tangin a siasak lo, ka thuciamna hoihtakin a lenkip mi peuhmah,

[13] Note in Sabbath siangtho sakin, keima ni siangtho ni-in na nasepna panun khawlin Sabbath ni pen deihhuai sa-in, TOPA’ ni siangtho pen pahtawihuai na cih uh a, note in pahtawi-in note’ deih bang zui loin, note’ ut bang hi loin motpau loin na om uhleh,
[21] TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: Na nuntak nop lai uhleh kidawm unla, Sabbath ni-in van pua kei un. Jerusalem khua kongpite-ah bangmah hong lutpih kei un.
[24] “‘Ahih hangin TOPA in kong cihin-ah, note in ka thu nong ngaih uh a, Sabbath ni-in hih khua kongpite-ah bangmah hong lutpih loin, Sabbath ni siangthosakin, na na sep kei uhleh,

[27] Ahih hangin ka thu nong ngaih kei uh a, Sabbath ni siangthosak loin, Jerusalem khua kongpite-ah van pua-in nong lutpih uhleh, tua kongpite ka hal ding hi. A mei in Jerusalem khua kumpi innte lawhin kangtum ding a, a mei a kiphelhzo kei ding hi,’ va ci in,” hong ci hi.
[6] Amah in biakna Biakinnpi a zan gawpsak hi. Amah in biakna ni siangtho nite le Sabbath nite a beisak hi. Kumpite le siampite in a nasia ama hehna a thuakkhawm uh hi.
[5] Amah in kei kiangah, “Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, leilu lamah khuadak in,” hong ci hi. Kei zong ka khuadak leh, kongpi kianga biakna tau kiangah, Pasian’ hehsuahna milim ka mu hi.

[12] TOPA ahi keimah in amaute pen mi siangtho-in ka bawlna thu a phawk nadingun kote’ kikalah thukimna limin Sabbath tan’ ding thu ka pia hi. [13] Ahi zongin Israel mite in gamlak nangawnah kei hong dem uh a, a zui peuhpeuh in nuntakna a ngahna ding uh ahi keima thukhamte le ka thupiaknate a nial uh hi. Ka Sabbath-te zong nakpitakin siasak uh hi. Tua ahih manin amaute a maiman nadingin ka hehnateng gamlakah a thuaksakgawp dingin ka kithawi hi.

[16] Tua bangin kiciamna ka bawlna pen, amaute in ka thupiaknate nialin, ka thukhamte zui lo uh a, ka Sabbath-te siasak uh hi. Amaute in kei hong biak ding uh sangin milim biak ding utzaw uh ahihna hang ahi hi.

[20] Kei pen TOPA ahi note’ Pasian ka hihna na phawkna ding uh le note tawh i bawlsa thukimna lim dingin Sabbath-te na siangthosak un,’ ka ci hi. [21] “Ahi zongin a tate nangawn un kei hong dem uh hi. A zuite in nuntakna a ngahna ding ahi ka thukhamte palsatin ka thupiaknate mang lo uh a, Sabbath-te siasak uh hi. Tua ahih manin, ka hehnateng gamlakah thuaksak gawpin, amaute a sumai dingin ka kithawi hi.
[24] Hih bangin kiciamna ka bawlna pen, amaute in ka thupiaknate nialin, ka thukhamte zui lo uh a, ka Sabbath-te siasak uh hi. Tua banah a pu a pate un a biak milimte mah a biakna hang uh ahi hi.
[8] Mun siangthote zong zahtakna mel kinei loin, Sabbath-te zong kitang lo hi.

[26] A siampite un ka thukham palsatin, a siangtho biakna nate ninsak uh hi. A siangtho biakna nate le a mawkmawk nate khenna mel nei lo uh a, a tate uh tungah a siang le a nin a kilamdanna zong hilh lo uh hi. Sabbath-te zong donin nei lo uh hi. Tuate khempeuh hangin Israel mite in kei hong zahtak lo uh hi.
[38] Amaute’ gamtatna tu-a bangteng bek hi lo lai hi. Ka biakinn ninsak uh a, ka Sabbath-te zong palsat lai uh hi.
[24] Thunei khat peuhpeuh a om ciangin, keima ngeina omsa tawh kizui-in thu khen ding uh hi. A kiseh pawite a ngeina omsa bangin bawl ding uh a, Sabbath-te siangthosak ding uh hi.

[17] Gam uk ulianpa in biakna-in piak ding ganhingte, an tawh biakna-in zat dingte, le pawi khempeuh, Khadet ni, Sabbath nite-in Israel mibuppite a dingin tuiphih biaknate a piak ding ama nasep ahi hi. Israel mite’ mawhna a maitheih nadingin mawhna hanga biakna, an tawh biakna, meihal biakna, le thunuama biakpiakna-in a zat dingte khempeuh amah in a si ding ahi hi.

[1] “Topa PASIAN in hih bangin ci hi: Nisuahna lama om, tual sungnung kongpi pen nasep ni guk sung kikhakcip ding a, ahi zongin Sabbath ni le Khadet ni-in kihong ding hi. [2] Siampite in meihal biakna le thunuama biakna a piak laitakun, gam uk ulianpa pen tual puanung lam panin inndei lianpi kongpi-ah pai-in kongpi khuamte gei-ah ding ding a, tua kongpi-ah bia-in tua khit ciangin pusuak kik ding hi. Nitak mateng tua kongpi kikhak lo ding hi. [3] Sabbath ni le Khadet nisimin mi khempeuh in zong tua kongpi mai-ah TOPA bia-in kun ding uh hi. [4] Gam uk ulianpa in Sabbath ni-in meihal biak nadingin paubaanna a om lo tuuno guk le tuutal khat pia ding hi.

[12] Gam uk ulianpa in ama utthu-in biakpiakna, meihal biakna ahi a, thunuama biakna ahi zongin khat peuhpeuh a piak ciangin, ama lut nadingin nisuahna lama om tual sungnung kongpi kihonsak ding hi. Amah in Sabbath ni-in biakpiakna a bawl mah bangin pia ding hi. Amah a ciahkik khit ciangin a kongpi kikhak ding hi.

[1] Tua zawh a sawt loin Sabbath ni khatin mangbuh lo nawkin Jesuh a pai hi. A nungzuite a gil uh kial ahih manin mangbuhvuite zutin a ne uh hi. [2] Farisi mite in a muh uh ciangin Jesuh kiangah, “En in, Sabbath ni-in i hih dingin a kilawm lo gamtatna na nungzuite gamta uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
[5] Tua ahih kei leh zong siampite in Sabbath sim mahin biakinn sungah Sabbath thukham khial napi-in mawhsakna a ngah tuan lohna thu uh, Moses Thukham sungah sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?
[8] Bang hang hiam cih leh Mihing Tapa pen Sabbath ni a ukpa ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[10] Tua lai-ah a khut langkhat a zaw mi khat a na om hi. Jesuh gamta khial hi, ci-in a mawhna a zong nuam mi pawlkhat tua lai-ah om uh ahih manin tua mite in Jesuh kiangah, “Sabbath ni-in cina damsak ding a kilawm mah ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. [11] Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Note khatpeuh in tuu khat nei unla, Sabbath ni-in dum sungah tua tuu kia leh, tua tuu va lenin kaikhiato ding hi lo na hi uh hiam? [12] Mi pen tuu sangin nakpitakin manphazaw ahih manin Sabbath ni-in a hoih sep ding a kilawm ahi hi,” ci-in a dawn khit ciangin [13] a mipa kiangah, “Na khut zan in,” a ci hi. A mipa in zong a khut zanpah a, midangte mah bangin hoihtakin a damkik hi.
[9] Mihingte’ bawltawm thukhamte, Pasian’ thukham zahin mite tungah hilh uh ahih manin kei hong biak hangun a kimanna om lo hi,’ ci hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[20] Tua galtai hun pen phalbi laitak le Sabbath ni ahih khak loh nadingin thu na ngen un. [21] Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung piancil a kipan tuhun dong, cikmahin tua bang haksatna a om ngei lo, nidang ciangin zong a om ngei nawn lo ding, tua hun laitakin hong tung ding hi.
[62] A zing ciang, Sabbath ni-in Pilat kiangah siampi liante le Farisi mite hong pai uh a,
[1] Sabbath ni khit, Nipi ni zingsang khua hong vak kuan ciangin Magdala khuami Mary le adang Mary, daihawh dingin a va pai uh hi.
[21] Tua ciangin Kapernaum khua tung uh a, a Sabbath ni-in kikhopna inn sungah Jesuh pai-in thu hilh ding a kipan hi.

[23] Khatvei, Sabbath ni khatin Jesuh le a nungzuite, mangbuh lo nawkin a pai uh hi. A paikawmun a nungzuite in mangbuhvui a zut uh hi. [24] Tua ahih ciangin Farisi mite in Jesuh kiangah, “Bang hangin Sabbath ni-in gamtat loh dingpi, na nungzuite gamta uh ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

[27] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Sabbath ni, mihingte’ phattuam nadingin a kibawl hi a, mihing pen Sabbath ni a phattuam nadingin a kibawl hi lo hi. [28] Tua ahih ciangin Mihing Tapa pen Sabbath ni nangawn a ukpa ahi hi,” ci-in a thugen a khum hi.

[2] Jesuh gamtakhial hi, ci-in a mawhsak nuam mi pawlkhat tua lai-ah om uh a, Sabbath ni-in hih mipa a damsakkha hiam, ci-in vil gige uh hi. [3] Jesuh in khutzaw mipa kiangah, “Hih a mai lamah hong ding in,” a ci hi. [4] Tua ciangin mite kiangah, “Sabbath ni-in bang i hih ding i Thukham in hong deih ahi hiam? Huh ding maw, gimsak ding; mi khat a nuntakna hot ding maw, thah ding; koi hong deihzaw ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Ahih hangin kuamah in dawng lo hi.

[2] A Sabbath ni ciangin kikhopna inn-ah thu a hilh hi. Ama thuhilh a za mi tampite in lamdangsa-in, “Hih pa in hih thute koi panin a ngah ahi hiam? Hih pa tungah a kipia pilna a bang pilna ahi hiam? Bangci-in nalamdang hici bawltheih ahi hiam?
[42] Tua ni pen Sabbath ni ma, Kigin’ ni ahih manin nitak lam ciangin,
[1] Sabbath ni a bei khit ciangin Magdala khuami Mary, James nu Mary, le Salome-te in Jesuh’ luang a va zut nadingun paknamtui a va lei uh hi.
[16] Tua ciangin ama khanna Nazareth khua-ah Jesuh pai a, Sabbath ni ciangin a paingei bangin kikhopna inn-ah a pai hi. Lai Siangtho a sim dingin amah ding a,

[1] Sabbath ni khatin mangbuh lo nawkin Jesuh le a nungzuite a pai uh hi. A nungzuite in mangbuhvuite zut uh a, a khutsung uhah nuai-in a ne uh hi. [2] Amaute lakah a om Farisi mite pawlkhat in, “Sabbath ni-in i hih dingin a kilawm lo gamtatna bang hangin gamta na hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.

[5] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Mihing Tapa pen Sabbath ni a Ukpa ahi hi,” ci-in a thugen a khum hi. [6] Sabbath a ni dang khatin kikhopna inn khatah Jesuh pai-in thu a hilh hi. A khut taklam a zaw mi khat tua lai-ah na om hi. [7] Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite pawlkhat in Jesuh a mawhsak theih nading uh thu zong nuam uh ahih manin, Sabbath ni-in hih mipa a damsak hiam, ci-in na encik gige uh hi. [8] Ahi zongin Jesuh in amau’ ngaihsutna thei ahih manin a khutzaw mipa kiangah, “Ding inla, mihonte mai hih lai munah hong pai in,” a ci hi. A mipa zong hong pai-in mihon mai-ah a hong ding hi. [9] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Note tungah thu khat kong dong nuam hi. Sabbath ni-in a pha bawl ding le a sia bawl ding koi kilawmzaw a, mi khat’ nuntakna suahtaksak ding le siatsak ding koi hoihzaw ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
[10] Sabbath ni khatin Jesuh in kikhopna inn khat sungah thu hilhin a om hi.

[14] Ahi zongin Jesuh in Sabbath ni-in cina a damsakna hangin kikhopna inn ukpa a heh suak a, mite kiangah, “Na a kisep theih nading hun ni guk sung om hi. Tua hun sungin hong pai-in kidamsak unla, ahi zongin Sabbath ni-in hong pai kei un,” a ci hi. [15] Tua ciangin Topa in amah dawng a, “No a kineihkhem mite aw, note in Sabbath ni mahin zong na bawngte uh ahi a, na late uh ahi zongin a buk panin na khihna khaute uh sutin, tui pia dingin paipih hi lo na hi uh hiam? [16] Tua mah bangin Satan in Abraham’ suante khat ahi hih numei pen kum sawm le giat sung hencip hi. Hih a kihencipna panin Sabbath ni-in hih numei khahkhiat ding kilawm hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

[1] Sabbath ni khatin Farisi mi upa khat’ inn-ah an ne dingin Jesuh pai a, mite in amah encik uh hi. [2] Tua laitakin a khut le a khe a bawk mi khat Jesuh kiangah hong pai a, [3] Jesuh in zong Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite kiangah, “Sabbath ni-in cina damsak ding i Thukham in hong hiam, khak hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. [4] Ahi zongin kuamah in dawng loin omcip uh hi. Jesuh in zong tua mipa samin a damsak khit ciangin a ciahsak hi. [5] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Note khatpeuh’ tapa ahi a, na bawngtal uh ahi zongin tuikhuk thukpi sungah Sabbath ni-in kia leh, Sabbath ni hinapi-in kaikhia veve ding hi lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

[54] Tua ni pen nipi zawh ni nga ni hi a, Sabbath ni hong hi dektak ta hi. [55] Galilee gam panin a hong zui numeite in zong a kivuina-ah zui uh ahih manin a hanphual le a luang kisialzia khempeuh zong a mu uh hi. [56] Tua ciangin amaute ciah uh a, Jesuh’ luang a nuh dingun paknamtui le sathau a bawlkhol uh hi. Thukham zui-in Sabbath ni tawlnga-in a om uh hi.

[9] tua cina pa thakhatin dampah a, a lupna pheek la-in a paipah hi. Tua ni pen Sabbath ni hi citciat ahih manin, [10] Jerusalem khuasunga om Jew mi uliante in cina damkik pa kiangah, “Tuni pen Sabbath ni ahih manin lupna pheek na puak ding ngeina hi lo hi,” a cih uh ciangin [11] amah in, “Kei hong damsak pa in, ‘Na lupna pheek la inla pai in,’ hong ci hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[16] Tua ahih manin Jesuh in Sabbath ni-in cina a damsakna hangin amaute in Jesuh bawlsiat ding a kipan uh hi. [17] Ahi zongin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Ka Pa in tuni dongin na sem tawntung ahih manin kei zong ka sep ding mah ahi hi,” a ci hi. [18] Hih bangin ama kampauna hangin amaute in Jesuh thatnuam semsem uh hi. Amah in Sabbath thukham a palsat bek hi loin, Pasian nangawn ka Pa ci ahih manin Pasian tawh a kikimin kiseh hi, ci-in a mawhsak uh hi.

[21] Jesuh in, “Sabbath ni-in cina damsakna nalamdang khat ka bawlna hangin lamdang na sa mahmah uh hi. [22] Moses in na tapate uh vun na at ding uh thu hong pia a, (a taktakin Moses thupiak mapekin na pu na pate un a palsat thu ahi hi) vun at ni ding le Sabbath ni a kituahkhak ciangin a vun na at veve uh hi. [23] Moses thupiakna a kipelh loh nadingin Sabbath ni-in vun at na hih uhleh Sabbath ni-in mi khat ka damsak manin bang hangin kei tungah heh na hi uh hiam?

[14] Jesuh in buan bawlin a mit a vaksak ni pen Sabbath ni ahi hi. [15] Farisi mite in tua mipa in khua a muhtheih kikna zia thu dong leuleu uh hi. Amah in, “Tua mipa in ka mitah buan hong nuh a, ka mai ka phiat leh khua ka mu theikik hi,” a ci hi. [16] Farisi mi pawlkhat in, “Amah in Sabbath ni tang lo ahih manin Pasian kiang panin hong pai mi hi lo ding hi,” a ci uh hi. Ahi zongin pawlkhatte in, “A gamta khial mi in bang hangin hih bangin nalamdang bawlthei ding ahi hiam?” ci leuleu ahih manin mite’ ngaihsutna kituak lo hi.

[31] Tua ni pen Kigin’ ni hi a, a zing ciang Sabbath ni thupi diak ahih manin tua ni-in singlamteh tungah a luangte a omlai ding deih lo uh ahih ciangin Jerusalem khua-a Jew mi uliante, Pilat kiangah va pai-in a khete uh kuaitanin a luangte a lakkhiat nadingun a ngen uh hi.

[41] Jesuh, singlamteh tungah a kithahna mun tawh kinai-ah huan khat om a, tua huan sungah kuamah a kivui ngei nai lohna hankhuk thak khat a om hi. [42] Tua ni pen Kigin’ ni hi a, Jew mite’ Sabbath ni hong naita ahih manin, tua hankhuk a nai ahihna hangin nawhsa thu-in tua lai munah Jesuh a vui uh hi.
[14] Ahi zongin Perga khua panin amaute paisuak uh a, Pisidia gam Antiok khua a tung uh hi. Sabbath ni-in kikhopna inn-ah pai-in a tu uh hi.

[27] Jerusalem khua-a a teng mite le a makaite un Jesuh pen Honpa ahih lamtak na thei lo uh a, Sabbath nisimin a kisim niloh kamsangte’ thu zong na tel lo uh hi. Amaute in Jesuh na mawhsak uh ahih manin kamsangte’ thugente a manin hong tung hi.

[42] Kikhopna inn panin Paul le Barnabas a ciah ding uh ciangin, Sabbath ni kik ciangin hih thute mah hong gen lai un, ci-in mite in a vaikhak uh hi. [43] Kikhopna inn panin a ciahkhiat uh ciangin Jew mi tampite le Jew biakna a zui Gentail mi tampite in Paul le Barnabas zui uh a, amau tegel in zong tua mite hanthawnin, Pasian’ hehpihna suangin kiptakin a om nadingun a gen uh hi. [44] A Sabbath ni kik ciangin Pasian’ thu a ngai dingin a khuazang phialun hong kikhawm uh hi.
[21] Bang hang hiam cih leh Sabbath nisimin kikhopna innte-ah Moses Thukhamte kisim ngitnget a, khua khempeuhah Moses thugente mah hilh belin kinei hi,” a ci hi.
[13] A Sabbath ni ciangin Jew mite’ thungetna mun om ding hi, ci-in ka upna uh khua pualama gun gei-ah ka pai uh a, tua lai-ah tu-in a kikhawm numeite tungah thu ka hilh uh hi.

[2] A pai ngei zel mah bangin Paul zong kikhopna inn-ah pai a, Sabbath ni thum sung Lai Siangtho siksanin mite tawh thu kikum a, [3] Khrih in sihna thuakin, sihna panin a thawhkik ding a kisam ahi hi, ci-in a laktel hi. Tu-a note kiangah kong pulak Khrih pen Lai Siangtho sunga kigen Khrih ahi hi, ci-in Paul in a gen hi.
[4] Sabbath ni simin kikhopna inn-ah limtakin thu gen a, Jew mi le Grik mite in thu a up nadingun a hanciam hi.
[7] Sani nitakin an nekhawm dingin ka kikhawm uh a, a zing ciangin a ding khia ding ahih manin Paul in a thuhilh zankim ciang dong a zomsuak hi.

[9] Ahi zongin note in tu-in Pasian meltheih khinin, tua ahih kei leh Pasian in note hong meltheih khinta ahih manin, a bang hangin bangmah a hih zo lo, a ginalo tua bangte lamah kiheikik nuam a, sila va suakkik nuam na hi uh hiam? [10] Note in nite, khate, hunte, kumte a kipan pawi tuamtuamte limtakin tan ding na hah ngaihsut mahmah uh hi. [11] Tua ahih manin note a dingin ka nasepna khempeuh a mawkna a suahkhak ding ka hong lunghihmawhsak mahmah hi.
[16] Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn, biakna pawite, Khadet pawi, le Sabbath ni tawh kisai-in kuamah in ngeina zuih ding bawl kei un.
[4] Lai Siangtho mun khatah, “A ni sagih ni-in a nasepna khempeuh panin Pasian tawlnga hi,” ci-in ni sagihna thu tawh kisai na gen hi.

[9] Tua ahih manin tu-a thu om zia-ah ci lehang ni sagih ni-in Pasian a tawlngak mah bangin Pasian’ mite a tawlngak nading omlai hi. [10] Bang hang hiam cih leh a nasepna panin Pasian a tawlngak mah bangin va pai-in Pasian tawh a tawlngate khempeuh zong a nasepna panun khawl ding uh hi.

[14] Tua ciangin TOPA Pasian in gulpi kiangah, “Nang, hih bangin gamta khin na hih manin, ganhing khempeuhte le gamlak ganhing khempeuhte sangin samsiatna na ngahzaw hi. Na gilpi-in lam na pai ding a, na nuntak sung tawntungin leivui na ne ding hi. [15] Nang le numei kikal na suanlekhakte le ama suanlekhakte kikalah kilangneihna ka omsak ding hi. Amah in na lutang hong sunim ding a, nang in ama khetul na sunim ding hi,” a ci hi.

[17] Tua ciangin mipa kiangah, “Nang in na zi’ thu mangin, ‘Nang in na ne kei ding hi,’ ci-in nang kong thupiak singgah ne na hih ciangin, nangma hangin leitang in samsiatna ngah hi. Na nuntak tawntung gimpi-in na semin na annek ding na zong ding hi.
[11] Na sanggampa’ sisan a hup dingin a kam a ka leitang tungah tu-in nang hong kisamsiat hi.

[21] TOPA in a namtui gimnam a zak ciangin, a lungsim sungah, “Mihing’ gamtatna hangin leitang ka samsia kik ngei nawn kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mihing’ lungsim ngaihsutna pen a tangval lai panin a gi lo hi mawk hi. Tu-a ka hih bangin nuntakna a nei khempeuh zong ka susia ngei nawn kei ding hi.
[25] amah in, “Kanaan in samsiatna ngah ta hen la, a sanggamte’ sila hi tahen.
[3] Nang thupha hong piate thupha ka pia ding a, nang hong samsiate ka samsia ding hi. Nang’ thupha ngah bangin thupha a ngah nadingun leitung midang khempeuh in hong ngen ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[12] Ka pa in kei hong lawngkha leh, amah in ka khemna hong thei ding a, kei’ tungah thupha hi loin samsiatna hong tung zawsop ding hi,” a ci hi. [13] A nu in ama kiangah, “Nangma thuak ding samsiatna kei tungah hong tung ta hen, ka ta aw; ka thu hong mang peuh inla, pai-in keelnote kei’ kiangah hong puak in,” a ci hi.

[29] Mite in nangma na hong sem hen la, minamte na mai-ah hong kun ta uh hen. Na sanggamte’ tungah topa hi inla, na sanggamte’ suanlekhakte, na mai-ah hong kun uh hen. Nang hong samsia peuhmah in samsiatna ngah hen la, thupha hong pia peuhmah in thupha ngah ta hen,” a ci hi.
[7] Amau’ sinsona lauhuai a, amau’ hehna kihtakhuai hi. Samsiatna ngah ta uh hen! Jakob suante sungah amaute ka khenthang ding a, Israel sungah amaute ka thehthang ding hi.

[5] Tuate’ mai-ah na kun kei ding uh a, tuate na bia kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah note’ TOPA Pasian, a aam Pasian ka hi a, kei hong mudahte’ tungah pate’ mawhna tate’ tungah khang thum khang lina dongin thuk-in, [6] ahih hangin kei hong itin ka thupiakte a zui mi a tul tampite tungah itna kip a lak pa ka hi hi. [7] “ TOPA note’ Pasian’ min a sia lamin na zang kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in ama min a zang khialte gim pia ding hi.

[15] “Ama pa hitaleh ama nu hitaleh a sat peuhmah kithat ding hi. [16] “Zuak ding ahi a, sila-in neih ding ahi zongin mi a gu mi peuhmah kithat ding hi. [17] “Ama pa hitaleh ama nu hitaleh a samsia mi peuhmah kithat ding hi.
[28] “Thukhente na simmawh kei ding uh a, na mite uh a ukpa zong na samsia kei ding uh hi.
[12] Note in a man lopi-in keima min tawh na kiciam kei ding uh a, tua bangin na Pasian uh’ min na daisak kei ding uh hi; kei pen TOPA ka hi hi.
[14] Note in bilngongte phuisam loin, mittawte’ mai-ah a puk theih nading na na koih kei ding uh a, note in na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uh hi; kei pen TOPA ka hi hi.
[9] “Bang hang hiam cih leh a nu ahih kei leh a pa a samsia mi peuhmah kithat ding hi. Amah in a nu ahih kei leh a pa samsia khin a, ama sihna amahmah ngawh ding ahi hi.
[11] Israel numei’ tapa in Min Siangtho gensia-in samsia hi. Amaute in Moses kiangah amah paipih uh hi. Ama nu’ min pen Shelomith hi a, Dan minam, Dibri’ tanu ahi hi.

[14] “A samsia mipa pen giahphual pualamah paipih in. Ama samsiat a za mi khempeuh ama lu tungah amau’ khut ngasak inla, mihonte khempeuh amah denglumsak in. [15] Tua ciangin Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Ama Pasian a samsia mi peuhmah in ama khialhna thuak ding hi.

[23] Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Israel mite tungah hih thu a gen hi. Amaute in a samsia mipa giahphual pualamah paipih uh a, suang tawh a denglum uh hi. TOPA in Moses a thupiak bangin Israel mite in a hih uh hi.

[6] Tu-in hong pai inla, amaute hat lua uh ahih manin hih mite hong samsiatsak in. Tua hileh amaute zo-in hih gam panin ka hawlkhiazo kha ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh thupha na piak mi in thupha ngahin, na samsiat mi in siatna a ngahna ka thei hi,” cisak hi.

[11] ‘En in, Egypt panin mihon khat hong paikhia a, lei maitang teng dim uh hi. Tu-in hong pai inla, amaute hong samsiatsak in. Tua hileh amaute do-in ka hawlkhiazo kha ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi. [12] Pasian in Balaam kiangah, “Amaute na zui kei ding hi. Tua mite thupha a kipia ahih manin na samsia kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
[17] bang hang hiam cih leh minphatna lianpi nang kong pia ding a, kei’ tunga nong gen peuhpeuh ka hih ding hi. Hong pai inla, hih mite hong samsiatsak in,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.
[8] Pasian’ samsiat loh mite bangci samsiat ding ka hi hiam? TOPA’ mawhsak loh mite bangci mawhsak ding ka hi hiam?

[11] Tua ciangin Balak in Balaam kiangah, “Kei bang hong cih na hi hiam? Ka galte a samsia dingin nang kong sam a, ahi zongin amaute bangmah cih loin, amaute thupha na pia zawsop hi,” a ci hi. [12] Amah in, “ TOPA in ka gen dingin hong sawl thu, don lo ding ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi. [13] Tua ciangin Balak in ama kiangah, “Amaute na muh theih nading mun dangah kei hong zui in. Amaute a madawk teng bek na mu ding a, a vekpi-in na mu kei ding hi. Tua ciangin tua lai panin amaute nong samsiatsak ding hi,” a ci hi.

[25] Tua ciangin Balak in Balaam kiangah, “Amaute samsia peuhmah kei inla, thupha zong pia peuhmah kei in,” a ci hi. [26] Ahih hangin Balaam in Balak kiangah, ” TOPA’ cih khempeuh keimah in ka hih ding hi,’ hong ci hi lo ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi. [27] Balak in Balaam kiangah, “Tu-in hong pai in; mun dangah kong paipih ding hi. Tua lai panin amaute nong samsiatsak nading Pasian in hong lungkimpih kha ding hi,” a ci hi.

[9] Amaute bok a, humpinelkai pa bangin lumsuk uh hi. Humpinelkaipi bangin lumsuk uh hi. Kua in amaute phong ngam ding ahi hiam? Note thupha hong piate in thupha ngah hen la, note hong samsiate in samsiatna ngah ta hen,” a ci hi. [10] Balaam’ tungah Balak heh mahmah a, amah in a khut le a khut a tuum hi. Balak in Balaam kiangah, “Ka galte a samsia dingin nang kong sam hi. En in, nang in amaute thumvei tak thupha na pia khinzo hi.
[11] “ TOPA note’ Pasian’ min a sia lamin na zang kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in ama min a sia lamin a zang mi a mawh lo hi, ci lo ding hi.

[26] Note’ inn sungah a kihhuai nate na tumpih kei ding uh a, tua nate tawh kibangin samsiat a thuak mi na kisuaksak kei ding uh hi. Note in tua nate mudah mahmahin na kih ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua nate a kisamsia na ahi hi.

[4] Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt panin na paikhiat lai-un lampi-ah anletui tawh amaute in note hong dawn lo uh a, note hong samsia dingin Mesopotamia gam Pethor khua panin Beor’ tapa Balaam cial uh hi. [5] Ahih hangin TOPA na Pasian un Balaam’ thu ngai lo hi. TOPA na Pasian un note hong it ahih manin, TOPA na Pasian un samsiatna pen note a dingin thupha-in hong heisakzaw hi.

[15] “Ahih hangin note in TOPA na Pasian uh thu mang loin, tuni-a kong gen ama thupiaknate le ama thukhamte khempeuh limtakin na zuih kei uhleh, hih samsiatna khempeuh note tungah hong tung ding a, note hong ban ding hi. [16] “Khuapi sungah hong kisamsia ding a, lo-ah zong hong kisamsia ding hi. [17] “Na lawhte uh le na annel mekna kuangte un zong samsiatna ngah ding hi. [18] “Note’ sung pana piangte le na leitang uh pana piangte, na bawngte uh le na tuuhon note uh in zong samsiatna ngah ding hi. [19] “Na sep na bawlna khempeuh uhah hamsia na ngah ding uh hi. [20] “Note in TOPA na nusiat uh a, na gamtatsiat uhleh, note sia-in na sihmang khit matengun TOPA in note tungah samsiatna, buaina, cihmawhnate hong tungsak ding hi.

[35] TOPA in note na kidamsakkik theih loh ding uh a nasia mahmah meimatumte tawh na khukte uh le na khete uh meimasak gawpin, na khenuai panun na luzang dong uhah na thuak ding uh hi. [36] “Note le na pu na pate un a theih ngei loh minam khat kiangah TOPA in note le note tungah na koih uh na kumpipa uh hong tunpih ding a, tua lai-ah singlesuang tawh a kibawl pasian dangte’ na na sem ding uh hi. [37] TOPA in note hong paikhiatpihna mite lakah a cikzethuai, paunak, le gentehna na suak ding uh hi. [38] “Khaici tampi lo-ah na tuh ding uh a, ahi zongin tawmno bek na khawm ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kauphe in nemang ding hi. [39] Note in leenggah lo zuanin na puah ding uh a, ahih hangin leenggahzu dawn loin, leenggah zong na ne kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh lung in tuate ne ding hi. [40] Na gam sung khempeuh uhah oliv kung na nei ding uh a, ahih hangin a thau tawh note na kizut kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh na oliv gahte uh pulh ding hi. [41] Tanute le tapate na nei ding uh a, ahih hangin amaute pen nomau a’ hi lo ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute galmat suak ding uh hi. [42] Na singte khempeuh uh le, na leitang panun a piang khempeuh kauphete in tang ding uh hi.

[45] “Amah in note hong piak thupiaknate le thukhamte zui loin, TOPA na Pasian uh thu mang lo na hih manun, note na sih matengun hih samsiatnate khempeuh note’ tungah hong tungin, note hong delhin hong pha ding uh hi.

[20] TOPA in amah maisak lo ding a, TOPA’ hehna le hazatna meikhu bangin tua mipa’ langkhatah khuzaw-in, hih laibu sunga kigelh samsiatnate ama tungah tu ding a, TOPA in a mun khempeuh panin ama min phiat ding hi. [21] TOPA in hih thukham laibu sunga a kigelh thuciam samsiatnate khempeuh tawh kizui-in gimna a thuak dingin Israel minamte khempeuh lak panin amah tengkhia ding hi.
[27] Tua ahih ciangin a mite tungah TOPA heh mahmah a, hih laibu sunga om samsiatnate khempeuh hih leitungah tungsak hi.
[1] “Note’ mai-ah ka koih, na teel ding thu thupha le samsiatna, hih nate khempeuh note tungah hong tungin, TOPA in note hong hawlkhiatna minamte lakah hih thute phawk kikin,
[7] TOPA na Pasian un hih samsiatnate khempeuh, no hong bawlsia na galte uh le na langte uh tungah tungsak ding hi.

[19] Tuni-in note’ langkhatah teci a pang dingin vantung le leitung ka sam a, note’ mai-ah na teel dingun nuntakna le sihna, thupha le samsiatna ka koih hi. Tua ahih ciangin note le na suanlekhakte uh na hintheih nadingun nuntakna teel unla,

[26] Tua hun laitakin Joshua in amaute tungah thuciamna khat koih a, “Mi khat kipanin hih Jerikho khuapi a lamkik pa in TOPA’ mai-ah samsiatna thuak tahen. A tacil luang khaamin tua khuapi bulpi phut ding a, a tapa neupen luang khaamin a kulhkongpite phut ding hi,” a ci hi.
[34] Tua khit ciangin amah in thukham laibu sunga a kigelh bangbangin thukham kammal khempeuh, thupha le samsiatnate a sim hi.
[23] Tu-in note hong kisamsia a, note pawlkhat a tawntungin sila, ka Pasian uh inn-a dingin sing suite le tui tawite na hi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[9] Tua ciangin Moab kumpipa, Zippor’ tapa Balak hong khangin Israel mite hong do hi. Amah in mi sawlin note hong samsia dingin Beor’ tapa Balaam a samsak hi.
[23] “ TOPA’ vantungmi in, ‘Meroz khua samsia in, a sunga teng mite nasia takin samsia in. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA a huh dingin a thahatpa dona-ah TOPA a huh dingin hong kuan lo uh hi,’ a ci hi.
[57] Pasian in Shekhem mite khempeuh’ gitlohna hangin Jerubbaal’ tapa Jotham’ samsiatna bangin amau’ tungah gimna a tungsak hi.

[2] Amah in a nu kiangah, “Ngun pek tul le zakhat hong kiguksak lai-in a gu pa na samsiatna thu ka za hi. A ngunte pen keima guk hi a, tu-in hih lai-ah tuate om hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a nu in, “Ka tapa aw, TOPA in thupha hong pia ta hen,” a ci hi.
[18] Ahi zongin amau’ zi dingin i tanute i pia thei kei hi,” a ci uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite kiciam khinin, “Benjamin-te tungah zi a pia mipa in samsiatna ngah ta hen,” a ci uh hi.

[24] Israel mite tua ni-in lungkham uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Saul in mite tungah kiciamna khat koih a, “Tu nitak mateng le ka galte ka thukzawh matengin an a ne pa in samsiatna ngah ta hen,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin mite khat beek in an ciam lo uh hi.
[28] Tua ciangin mite khat in, “Na pa in kiciamna khat tawh nakpitakin mite thuhilh a, ‘Tuni-in an a ne mipa in samsiatna ngah ta hen,’ ci hi,” a ci hi. Mite gim mahmah uh hi.
[43] Tua ciangin Filistia-pa in David kiangah, “Ui hong sa a, ciangkang tawh sat hong sawm na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Filistia-pa in a pasian-te’ min tawh David samsia hi.

[19] Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka to kumpipa in a nasempa’ thu za in. Keimah a do dingin nang hong toksuah pa pen TOPA ahihleh amah in biakna hong sang ta hen; ahih hangin mihing ahihleh amaute in TOPA’ mai-ah samsiatna ngah tahen. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, ‘Pai in; pasian dangte’ na sem in,’ ci-in TOPA’ gamh ka ngah loh nadingin tuni-in kei hong hawlkhia uh hi.

[5] Bahurim-ah Kumpi David a tun ciangin Saul’ innsung innkuan mi, Gera’ tapa Shimei min nei mi khat hong paikhia a, a paikawmin David samsia tawntung hi. [6] Amah in Kumpi David le a nasemte khempeuh suang tawh deng hi. Mi khempeuh le mi thahatte khempeuh David’ taklam le veilamah om uh hi. [7] Shimei in a samsiat kawmin, “Pai mang, pai mang, nang mi that pa, bangmah man lo mipa! [8] Ama tangin na uk Saul’ innkuante na thahna hangin TOPA in nangma tungah hong thuk hi. TOPA in na tapa Absalom’ tungah kumpi gam pia khinta hi. Thei in, na siatna nangma lu tungah hong tu hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nang pen mi that pa na hi hi,” a ci hi. [9] Tua ciangin a nu Zeruiah ahi Abishai in kumpipa kiangah, “Bang hangin hih uisi a banglel mi khat in ka to kumpipa samsia ding ahi hiam? Hong kuansak inla a lu hong tankhiasak in,” a ci hi. [10] Ahih hangin kumpipa in, “No Zeruiah tapate aw, note tawh bang kisai ahi hiam? TOPA in ama kiangah, ‘David samsia in,’ a cihna hangin hong samsia ahihleh, ‘Bang hangin tuaci hih na hi hiam?’ kua in ci ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi. [11] Tua ciangin David in Abishai le a nasemte khempeuh kiangah, “En un, keima tapa mahmah in kei thah dingin hong zong hi; hih Benjamin mi in bangzahin tu-in hong zongzaw kan ding ahi hiam! Ama thu-in omsak un, amah hong samsiasak un; bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in amah a sawl hi kha ding hi. [12] TOPA in ka thuakna hong enin, tuni-a kei hong samsiatna hangin TOPA in a hoih tawh kei hong thuk kha ding hi,” a ci hi. [13] Tua ahih ciangin ama galkhat mualpangah Shimei pai a, a paikawmin samsia-in suang tawh amah dengin leivui a theh laitakin David le a mite lampi-ah pai uh hi.
[21] Tua ciangin a nu Zeruiah ahi Abishai hong paukhia a, “Amah in TOPA’ sathau nilh pa samsia ahih manin hih thu hangin Shimei thah ding hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

[8] Mahanaim ah ka pai lai-in a nasia samsiatna tawh kei a hong samsia, Bahurim panin a hong pai Benjamin mi Gera’ tapa Shimei zong nang tawh om hi. Ahih hangin Jordan-ah keimah a dawn dingin hong pai ciangin ama tungah TOPA tawh kiciamin, ‘Namsau tawh nang kong that kei ding hi,’ ka ci hi.
[10] Ama mai-ah mi ginalo nih koihin ama langkhatah mawhna zong sakin, ‘Nang in Pasian le kumpipa na samsia hi,’ cisak un. Tua ciangin amah lakhia unla denglum un,” a ci hi.

[13] Tua ciangin mi ginalo nihte hong pai-in ama mai-ah tu uh hi. Tua ciangin mi ginalo nihte in mite’ omin Naboth’ mawhna zong uh a, “Naboth in Pasian le kumpipa samsia hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in khuapi pualamah amah paipih uh a, suang tawh amah denglum uh hi.
[24] Tua ciangin amah a kiimah khuadak a, amah in amaute a muh ciangin TOPA’ min tawh amaute a samsia hi. Tua ciangin gamlak panin vompi nih hong pai-in naupang sawm le nih balnen hi.
[34] Tua ciangin amaute sungtumin an ne-in tui a dawn uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Tu-in a kisamsia hih numei tawm unla, phum un. Bangbang ahi ta zongin amah kumpipa’ tanu hibuang hi,” a ci hi.

[19] amaute gamkhing le samsiat a ngahte a suah nadingin hih mun le a tungah a teng mite tungah ka kampauna na zak ciangin na lungsim kisikin TOPA’ mai-ah nangmahmah kiniamkhiatin, na puante balkekin ka mai-ah na kahna thu, keimah in zong ka za hi, TOPA in ci hi.
[24] TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: En un, Judah kumpipa mai-ah a kisim laibu sunga kigelh samsiatnate khempeuh ahi siatna, hih mun le a tungah a teng mi khempeuh tungah ka tungsak ding hi.
[2] bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in anletui tawh Israel mite na dawn lo uh a, amaute a samsia dingin Balaam cial zawsop uh hi. Ahi zongin i Pasian in tua samsiatna thupha-in hong heisak hi.

[25] Amaute taigawpin ka samsia a, pawlkhat satin a sam uh ka bawhsak gawp hi. Tua ciangin Pasian’ min tawh amaute ka kiciamsak a, “Note in amau’ tapate’ zi dingin na tanute uh na pia kei ding uh a, na tapate uh zi ding ahi a, nomau’ zi dingin ahi zongin amaute’ tanu na la kei ding uh hi.

[5] Tua banga a pawi bawl uh gual khat a kikhit ciangin Job in a tapate samin amaute siansuah a, zingsangin tho baihin a ta phazah tawh kizui-in meihal biakna a pia hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Job in, “Ka tate khialin, a lungsim sung uhah Pasian samsia khathei ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Tu-a bangin Job in hih tawntung hi.
[11] Ahi zongin na khut zanin ama neihsa khempeuh suksak lecin na maitang mahmahah nang hong samsia pah ding hi,” a ci hi.
[5] Tu-in na khut zan inla, ama sa le a guh suksak lecin nangma maitang mahah pel loin nang hong samsia ding hi,” a ci hi.
[9] Tua ciangin a zi in, “Na upna khiam tuan lo ding na hi hiam? Pasian samsia inla sisuk mai in,” a ci hi.
[1] Hih bang teng khit ciangin Job in thugen hong kipan a, mihingin a pian’ ni a samsia hi.
[8] Phuisamna tawh awle a khiim thei, a mitphial tawh tuipi ganhing a hencip thei mite in tua zan samsia tahen.
[18] “Tua bang migilo peuhpeuh tuikhang in taai a, ama neih leitangte Pasian in samsia a, tua leenggui lote-ah nasemin kikuan nawn lo hi.
[30] A sih ding uh deihna tawh ka samsia ngei kei hi.
[3] Bang hang hiam cih leh migilo in a lungsim deihna kisaktheihpih a, ngahna dingah a huaiham pa in TOPA phuisamin a taisan hi.
[7] Ama kampaute pen hamsia, khemna, le netniamna tawh kidim a, siatna le man lohna bekbek thugenin a nei tawntung hi.
[13] Siatna ding panin na leii kem inla, zuau genna panin na muk kem in. [14] Siatna panin kihemkhia inla, a hoih bawl in. Kilemna ding hanciam inla, na phak mateng delh in.
[3] Ama kammalte pen siatna le khemna vive hi a, pil gamtatna le hoih gamtatna bei khinta hi.
[22] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA’ thupha piakte in leitung luah ding uh a, ahih hangin a samsiatte kipuaseh ding hi.
[1] “Ka leii tawh ka khialhloh nadingin ka gamtatna ka kikem ding a, ka omna-ah migilote a omlaiteng ka kam ka kham ding hi,” ka ci hi.
[12] Amau’ kama a mawhna a muk uh tawh a pauna hangin, amau’ kiphatsakna-ah amau mah awksak in. Amaute in hamsiatna zangin zuauthu a genna hangun,
[4] Amah a zaliatna panin sukniam ding bekbek amaute in a sawm uh hi. Amaute in thuman lo-ah nuamsa mahmah uh hi. Amaute in a kampi uh tawh phat khem uh a, ahih hangin a sungtawng uhah samsiat uh hi.

[17] Amah in mi samsiat nuam a sa hi. Ama tungah samsiatnate tungsak in. Amah in thupha pia nuam lo hi. Kuamah in amah thupha pia kei tahen. [18] Amah pen puansilh bangin samsiatna kingeina seh hi. Tua a samsiatnate ama pumpi sungah tui bangin a guhte sungah sathau bangin lutin kizel tahen. [19] Tua samsiatnate pen ama kituamna puan tawh kibang hen la, nisimin amah a kigakna a kawnggak tawh kibang tahen.
[28] Amaute in kei hong samsiat hangin nangmah in kei thupha nong pia ding hi. Ka langte zahhuaisak inla, na nasempa keimah hong kipsak ta in.
[21] Nangmah in na thupiaknate panin a pialkhia, a kisamsiat, a kiphasakte na thuhilh hi.
[33] TOPA in migilote’ innsung samsia a, thuman mite’ innsung thupha a pia hi.
[31] Midikte in pilna thu gen uh a, thu hoih lo a gente’ leii ki-attan ding hi. [32] Midikte in a gen ding uh thuhoih thei a, migilote in thusia bekbek gengen uh hi.
[26] An man khan ding ngakna-in a zuak nuam lote kisamsia a, leinop hunin a zuakpahte kiphat hi.
[18] Ngaihsun lo-a kampauna in tem hiam bangin mi liamsak thei a, mipilte’ kampauna in tua bang liamna damsak thei hi.
[1] Kam nemin dawnna in hehna damsak a, kam khauh in hehna piangsak hi.
[21] Kampauna in sihna ahi a, hinna ahi zongin piangsak thei a, i kampauna bangin a piangte san loh phamawh hi.
[20] Na nu le na pa na samsiat leh khuamial sunga om meivak kisumit na bang ding hi.
[23] Kampau a ki-ipzote lungkhamna tawh kipelh hi.
[24] Mimawh kimlai a diksak thukhen pa leitung a mi khempeuh in mudahin phuisam ding hi.
[27] Mizawng a huhte cimawh ngei lo ding a, huhna a pia nuam lote in samsiatna ngah ding hi.
[24] Guktakna sungah a kipawl mipa ama a dingin thusia zongpa ahi hi. A guktakna pulak leh amah gim kipia ding a, genkhia kei leh lah Pasian in samsia veve ding hi.
[11] A pate samsia-in a min a daisak, a nute a phat lo mi pawlkhat om hi.

[6] Khialkha ing, ci-in Pasian’ siampipa’ mai-ah na gen ding kisam kha ding ahih manin na kampauna hangin khialkha kei in. Tua bangin gamta khial lecin nangma tungah Pasian heh ding a, na sepsa khempeuh hong suksiatsak ding hi.
[21] Mi’ gen khempeuh thudon kei in. Na nasempa’ hong samsiatna na zakha ding hi. [22] Nang zong midang na samsiat zelzelna teltakin na kithei hi.
[20] Na lungsim nangawnah kumpipa gensia kei in. Kuama zak lohna mun na lupna tung nangawnah mihaute samsia kei in. Thopi in na thugen teng na puakkha ding hi.
[8] Leitang tungah amau guak a teng ding dong zahin midangte a dingin mun khempeuh a bei matengin inn khatlekhat, lo khatlekhat gawmin a la thuah tawntung mite in gimna ngah tahen.
[6] Tua ahih ciangin TOPA in leitung samsiatin susia a, a tunga a teng mite in amau’ mawhna hangun a thuak uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin leitungah a teng mite tawm semsem hi.

[10] Bang hang hiam cih leh mun khempeuhah angkawmte a dim hi. TOPA’ hamsiatna hangin gam sung tengah kahna dim a, gamlak lonona munte a keu mang hi. Amaute gamtatsia uh a, a vangliatna uh a man lopi-in a zang uh hi.
[10] “ TOPA’ na citakin a sem lopa in kamsiatna thuak tahen. Thah nadingin a namsau a dok lopa in hamsiatna thuak tahen.
[65] Amaute phuisam inla, a cimawh dingin hawlkhia in.
[4] Mi khempeuh keima a’ hi a, pate ahi a, tate ahi zongin keima-a’ ahi hi. A mawh mipa bek si ding hi.

[11] Israel-te khempeuh in na gensa thute le na thukhamte khempeuh a palsat khinzo uh hi. Na tungah khialhna ka hong bawl manun, na nasem Moses’ thukham sunga kigelh bangin kote’ tungah samsiatna a hong tung hi.

[4] Vanglian TOPA in hih samsiatna a khahkhiatna ding thu gen a, guta mite khempeuh le a man loin ka min tawh thuciam mite khempeuh’ inn sungah lut ding hi. Tua bang mite’ inn sungah a tawntungin hamsiatna omin, amaute a kipan a sing a suang, a vekpi-in sumai ding hi,” hong ci hi.

[14] A tuuhon lakah tuutal cidam nei napi-in, a kamciamsa bangin kei tungah hong piak ciangin, a sitbaang ganhing a hong pia mi khempeuh in samsiatna thuak tahen. Bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen a lian mahmah Kumpipa ka hi a, minam khempeuh in kei hong zahtak uh hi,” a ci hi.

[2] Na gamtatna uh tawh kei nong zahtak ding uh hi. Ka thugente ngai loin, thupi takin na lak kei uhleh note tungah samsiatna ka hong tungsak ding a, siampi hihna tawh na ngah uh thuphate tungah samsiatna ka tungsak ding hi. A taktakin ci lehang, note in ka thupiaknate thupi lak lo na hih manun na thupha ngahte uh tungah samsiatna ka tungsakzo hi.
[9] Na minam bupun keima neihsa hong guksak na hih manun note khempeuh tungah samsiatna hong tung hi.

[9] ‘Abraham’ suante ihi ngawn hi,’ cihna lungsim nei mawk kei un. Ke’n kong cihin-ah, Pasian in hih suangte nangawn Abraham’ suanlekhakte-in a bawl thei hi lel hi. [10] Tu mahmahin sing a bulphuk dingin hei tawh kingim zo hi. Tua ahih manin gah hoih a gah lo sing khempeuh kiphukin meikhuk sungah kikhul ding hi. [11] Na kisikkik khitna uh a kilat nadingin tui sungah note ka hong phum a, ahi zongin kei nungah a hong pai pa in Kha Siangtho le mei sungah note hong phum ding hi. Tua a hong pai ding pa pen kei sangin nakpitakin lianzaw a, ama khedap a tawisak ding nangawnin ka kilawmzo nai kei hi. [12] Amah in a khutah anzapna tawi-in a ante zap a, a taksate khawmin a ansal sungah koih ding a, a ansite ahihleh a mit ngei lo mei sungah a khul ding hi,” ci-in thu a hilh hi.

[22] Ahi zongin ke’n note kiangah kong genin-ah: A sanggampa tungah a heh mi in thukhenna thuakkha thei ding hi. A sanggampa kiangah, ‘Bangmah a kimang lo,’ ci-in a ko bawl mi in uliante mai-ah thusitna thuak thei ding a, a sanggampa kiangah, ‘Mi hai,’ ci-in a simmawh mi in hell meikuang sungah khulna thuak thei ding hi.

[30] Kei hong pawlpih lo peuhmah keima lang hi uh a, kei hong kaihkhoppih lo peuhmah a thehthang ahi uh hi. [31] Tua ahih manin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Mihingte’ kampau khialhna le gamtat khialhnate kimaisak thei ding a, ahi zongin Kha Siangtho langpangin a gensiate kimaisak lo ding hi. [32] Mihing Tapa langpangin a gensiate a mawhna uh kimaisak thei ding a, ahi zongin Kha Siangtho langpangin a gensiate pen tuhun a kipan a tawntungin a mawhna uh kimaisak lo ding hi.

[36] Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Thukhen ni ciangin mi khempeuh in phattuamna a om lo a kampaunate uh khempeuh bangin thusitna a thuak ding uh hi. [37] Bang hang hiam cih leh nomau kampauna tawh kizui-in thu hong kikhen ding a, dik hi, cihna ahi a, mawh hi, cihna ahi zongin na ngah nadingun nomau kampau mah hong kibulphuh ding hi,” a ci hi.
[12] A kiliansakte khempeuh in niamkhiatna thuak ding uh a, a kiniamkhiatte khempeuh a lianin kibawl ding hi.
[41] “Tua ciangin a veilamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Pasian in a samsiat mite aw, keima kiang panin paikhia unla, Dawimangpa le a nungzuite a dingin a kibawl meikuang tawntung sungah pai un.
[29] Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho langpangin thu a gente in mawhna kip sukha uh ahih manin a mawhna uh kimaisak ngei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
[10] Moses in, ‘Na nu le na pa zahtak un. A nu a pa a samsiate kithat hen,’ ci hi.
[21] Peter in a thu phawk ahih manin, “Sia aw, na theikung samsiat a sita hi,” a ci hi.
[28] No hong phuisamte thupha na pia unla, no hong bawlsiate a’ ding thu na ngetsak un.

[45] Mihoih pa in a lungsim sunga thuhoih omteng hong suahkhia a, migilo pa in a lungsim sunga a gitlohna teng hong suahkhia hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mite pen amau’ lungsim sunga a om bangbang a hong paukhia uh ahi hi.
[49] Hih mihonte in ahihleh Moses Thukham thei lo uh ahih manin Pasian’ samsiatna a thuak dingte hi lel uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

[13] A kam uh tawh mi that uh a, a kam uh tawh zuauthu gen uh a, a kampaute uh gulgu tawh kibang hi. [14] A kam uh tawh mi samsia uh a, gitlohna bek tawh a kidim uh hi. [15] Mi that pakpak uh a, [16] a paina khempeuh uhah lungkhamna a piangsak uh hi. [17] Nopna a pian nadingin gamta ngei lo uh a, [18] Pasian zahtak ding ngaihsutin nei lo uh hi,” ci-in a kigelh hi.
[3] Hi thei ding hileh amaute’ hoih nadingin keimah in Pasian’ samsiatna thuakin Khrih tawh kikhen nading ciang dong nangawnin amaute ka huhnuam hi.
[14] No a hong bawlsia mite, Pasian in thupha a piak nadingin thu ngetsak unla, tua bang mite samsia loin thupha piazaw un.
[12] Kote’ nektawm ding ka thatang mahmah uh tawh nakpitakin ka sem uh hi. Hong kisamsiat ciangin thupha ka lehpiak uh a, hong kibawlsiat ciangin ka gumthuak uh hi.

[3] Tua ahih manin Kha Siangtho in lam a lah mite in, “Jesuh in samsiatna ngah ta hen,” a cih lohna, le Kha Siangtho in lamlak kei leh kuamah in, “Jesuh pen Topa hi,” a cih theih loh nading thu na theih ding uh ahi hi.
[22] Topa a it lo mi peuhmah in samsiatna ngah tahen. I Topa hong pai tahen.

[10] Hih thu tawh kisai-in Lai Siangtho in, “Thukham laibu sunga kigelh khempeuh a vekpi-in a zuikhin tawntung lote in Pasian’ samsiatna thuak hi,” ci ahih manin Thukham a suangte pen samsiatna a ngah mite ahi uh hi.

[13] Lai Siangtho in, “Sing tungah a kikhai mi peuhmah Pasian’ samsiat mi ahi hi,” na ci ahih manin eite a dingin Khrih in samsiatna a thuak manin Thukham zuihlahna hangin samsiatna panin eite a hong tankhia ahi hi.

[26] Na heh uh ciangin, tua hehna hangin khialkha kei unla, a tawntungin heh paisuak kei un. [27] Dawimangpa in hong suksiat theih nading hun omsak kei un. [28] Guta ngeite in gu nawn loin, ama nuntak nading thuman takin thalawhin, mizawngte zong a huhtheih lai nadingin thatang tawh nasep ding kipan ta uh hen. [29] Na kiho uh ciangin kamguh zang kei unla, na pauna uh a za mite in phattuamna a ngahtheih nadingin na-in a kimang kam hoihte bek na pau un.
[4] A kilawm lo-a kampauna, le ciamnuih hoih lo cihte zong na zang kei unla, Pasian tungah lungdamkohna kam na pauzaw un.

[14] Na khempeuh phun lo, thu nial loin sem un. [15] Tua hileh a lungsim kawi, a hoih lo leitung mite lakah paubaanna a nei lo a siangtho, Pasian’ tate na hi ding uh a, nuntakna thu na genna uh hangin leitung mite lakah khuavak bangin na hoihna uh a kilang mite na hi ding uh hi.
[8] Ahi zongin tu-in hehna, thangpaihna, muhdahna, gensiatna, kam hoih lo pauna cihte nei nawn kei un.
[8] mite’ mawhmat theih loh ding kamhoihte na zang in. Tua hileh i langte in hong gensiat theih nading mu loin a mai uh zum lel ding hi.
[2] kuamah gensia loin, mite tawh kilemin kikhawl thei-in, lungsim nemin, mi khempeuh tungah a dik nading uh na gen in.
[8] Ahi zongin tua leitang in lingkungte le sialtalling kungte hong posak leh Pasian in samsia-in, mei tawh kihaltum ding hi.
[26] Mi khatpeuh in Khristian ka hi hi, ci napi-in kampau a kidopzawh kei leh amahmah a kikhemtawm hi lel a, ama biakna neih a mawkna ahi hi.
[9] I leii tawh eite’ pa ahi Topa i phat thei a, Pasian tawh a kisunin a kibawl i mipihte zong tua i leii mah tawh i samsia thei hi.

[12] Hih thute khempeuh banah, sanggamte aw, thu khat peuhpeuh na gen uh ciangin kiciam se kei un. Vantung ahi a, na khat peuhpeuh tawh ahi zongin kiciam kei un. Pasian’ thukhenna na thuakkhak loh nadingun a hite, “Hi,” ci lel unla, a hilote, “Hilo,” na ci lel un.

[9] Hong bawlsiate siatna tawh thukkik loin hong samsia mite samsia kik kei unla, Pasian in note a hong sap lai-in thupha a hong piak dingin hong ciamsa ahih manin, hong siat bawlte thupha tawh na thukzaw un. [10] Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho in, “Nuntak nuam deihin, hunhoih a zang nuamte in kamsia pau kei uh hen la, zuauthu gen kei ta uh hen.
[14] Khrih nungzui hihna hangin mite’ kosiatna na thuak uhleh note sungah a minthang Kha Siangtho ahi Pasian’ Kha Siangtho hong om ahihna lim ahih manin a hampha mahmah na hi uh hi.

[14] Numei bekbek etnopin nei uh a, a mawhnopna lungsim uh kam thei lo hi. Upna cingtaak lo mite zol belin nei uh a, huaihamna lungsim bekbek a nei uh hi. Tua bang mite, Pasian’ samsiat mite ahi uh hi.
[6] Tua ahih manin Pasian, ama min, a omna mun, le vantungah a omte khempeuh samsia-in a ko gawpgawp hi.
[9] Nisa in mite kanggawp ahih manin mite in hih gimna tawh kisai-ah thu a nei Pasian a samsia uh hi. Ahi zongin a mawhna uh panin kisikin Pasian a phat ding uh ut lo uh hi.
[11] a meimate uh na a sak manun vantung Pasian a samsia uh hi. Ahi zongin a gamtat siatna uh panin kisik nuam lo uh hi.
[21] Gial gol pipi, khat ciangin tawi sawmthum val a gik, van panin mite tungah hong kia hi. Tua gimna nasialua ahih manin tua gialte hangin mite in Pasian a samsia uh hi.
[3] Pasian’ samsiatna a ngah peuhpeuh tua khua sungah om lo hi. Tua khuapi sungah Pasian le Tuuno’ tokhom om ding a, ama nasemte in amah a bia ding uh hi.
[13] Tu-in kum khat sungin Solomon tungah a tung kham a gihna talen zaguk le sawmguk le guk hi a,
[13] Adonikam suante - zaguk sawmguk le guk ahi hi.

[44] Tua kumpite a maan laitakun vantung Pasian in a bei thei ngei lo ding kumpi gam a hong phut ding hi. Tua kumpi gam kuamah in zo zo lo ding a, tua gam in gamdang khempeuhte zogawpin a kip tawntung ding hi.

[23] Hih bangin hilhtelna kei a hong kipia hi: “Sapi lina pen leitung a hong om ding kumpi gam lina ding hi a, kumpi gamdangte tawh kilamdang mahmah ding hi. Amah in leitung buppi valhtum ding a, tuancil gawpin a sukham ding hi. [24] “Ki sawmte pen tua kumpi gam sung panin a hong piang ding kumpi sawmte ahi uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpi dang khat hong piang leuleu ding a, amah in a omsate tawh a kilamdang mahmahin kumpi thum a nuaisiah ding hi. [25] “Amah in a Lianpen Pasian langpangin thu gen ding a, Pasian’ mite a bawlsia ding hi. Amah in amaute’ biakna tawh kipawl thukhamte le pawi bawlna hunte kheelsak ding hanciam ding a, ama khut sungah kum thum le alang sung Pasian’ mite a om ding uh hi.

[3] Ka khuadaktoh leh gun gei-ah tuutal khat a dingin a om ka mu hi. Amah in a sau mahmah ki nih nei a, a ki po nunung pen a po masa sangin a sauzaw hi. [4] Tua tuutal in a ki tawh nitumna lam, saklam, le khanglam a si kawikawi ka mu hi. Ama ut bangin kiphasakin gamta ahih manin amah a khozo ding le a thahatna pan a suaktazo ding ganhing khat beek a om kei hi. [5] A bangci hi ding hiam, ci-in ngaihsun thei loin ka om laitakin nitumna lam panin keeltal khat a hong tai veva hi. Hat lua mahmah ahih manin a khe in lei a sukha kei hi. A mit tegel kikalah a tuampian ki lamdang khat a nei hi. [6] Ki nih a nei gun gei-a a ding ka muh tuutal kiang a hong phak ciangin a thaneih zahin a si hi. [7] Hehlua mahmah ahih manin tua tuutal laigawp a, a ki tegel a suktansak hi. Tuutal in nang zo lo ahih manin lei kidenna a, a huhzo ding kuamah a om kei hi. [8] Tua keeltal a thahatna hong khangto semsem a, ahih hangin a thahat pen laitakin a ki a kitan hi. Tua a ki pona munah a lamdang ki li hong poto kik a, mun tuamtuam a kawk hi. [9] Tua ki lite lak pan khat’ tungah ki neu dang khat hong po a, khanglam, nisuahna lam, le Thuciamna Gam lamah a vangliatna a lak hi. [10] Vantung galkapte nangawn a dozo zah dong dingin a thahatna hong khangto a, aksi pawlkhatte leitungah lawnkhia-in, a tuancilgawp hi. [11] Amah in vantung galkap kumpipa nangawn do-in, ama tunga kipia tawntung biakpiaknate nangawn khawlsakin, biakinnpi biaknate a beisak hi. [12] Nisim biakpiaknate ah mawhna dim a, biakna man pen leilakah a kipaikhia hi. A sepna peuhpeuhah tua ki thahat mahmah hi. [13] Vantung mi khat in adang vantungmi khat kiangah thu a dot ka za a, “Hih maangmuhna bang tanvei sawt ding a, a muhdahhuai mawhna in nisim biakpiakna bang tanvei khaktan ding ahi hiam? Vantung galkapte le biakinnpi bang tanvei kituancil ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi. [14] Amah in, “Zingsang le nitak biakpiakna tulnih le zathum vei a cin khit ciangin biakinnpi kipuahkik ding hi,” a ci hi. [15] Keimah Daniel in maangmuhna a khatna thei nuamin ka hanciam hi. Thakhat thu-in mihing mel tawh a kibang khat ka mai-ah a hong ding hi. [16] Ulai gungal panin mihing’ aw khat hong ging a, “Gabriel aw, a muh nate ama kiangah a khiatna hilh in,” a cihna ka za hi. [17] Gabriel hong pai-in ka kiangah hong ding a, laulua mahmah ka hih manin leitungah ka puk hi. Amah in, “Leitung mi aw, a khiatna thei in. Maangmuhna pen hun beina ding lahna ahi hi,” ci-in ka kiangah a hong gen hi. [18] Amah in thu a hong gen laitakin sibupin leilakah ka tuk hi. Ahih hangin amah in hong domto-in a hong dingsak hi. [19] Amah in, “Pasian’ hehna hangin thupiang dingte ka hong lak ding hi. Na maangmuh pen hun beina ding lahna ahi hi. [20] Na muh ki nih a nei tuutal pen Media le Persia gam kumpite a cihnopna ahi hi. [21] Keeltal pen Grik kumpi gam hi a, a mit kikal-a a po ki pen kumpi masa pen a cihnopna ahi hi. [22] Ki po masa pen a kitan khit ciangin a nunga hong po ki lite pen tua gam panin kumpi gam li hong piang ding a cihnopna ahi hi. Ahih hangin tua gamte ahihleh a masa pen kumpi gam zahin a thahat kei ding uh hi. [23] “Tua kumpi gamte a bei ding hun a nai ciangin gilo lua mahmah ding uh ahih manin gim a kipia ding hi. Tua ciangin ama thu bek thu a sa, mawhna pawlpawl tawh a kidim, zuauphuah hat kumpi khat a hong om ding hi. [24] Amah thahat mahmah ding a, ahih hangin ama thahatna ahi kei ding hi. Amah in a dipkuathuai siatna piangsak ding a, a hihna khempeuhah a thahat mahmah ding hi. Amah in mi thahatte le Pasian’ mite a susia ding hi. [25] A lungsim daplan lua ahih manin zuauphuah siamna tawh a hih khempeuh a tangtun ding hi. Amah kiliansak lua-in theihkholh lohin mi tampi susia-in, a lianpen kumpite’ kumpipa nangawn a langpan’ ding hi. Ahih hangin mihing thahatna kizang loin amah a kisusia ding hi.

[37] Kumpipa in a pu a pate’ biak pasian le numeite in a it pasian a thusim kei ding hi. Pasian a kici peuhmah khat beek a thusim kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tuate sangin amah a lianzaw-in a kingaihsun hi.
[6] A nai, a gamla-ah galkidona thu na za ding uh hi. Hihte a piang mah ding hi a, ahi zongin a bei nading hi nai lo ahih manin patau kei un.

[36] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Keima ukna pen hih leitung gam hi lo hi. Keima ukna hih leitung gam hileh Jerusalem khua-a Jew mi uliante’ khut sungah hong kipiak loh nadingin ka nungzuite in a do ding uh hi. Tua ahih manin keima ukna pen hih leitung tawh kizom lo hi,” a ci hi.

[4] Tua A Gilopa in mite’ biak pasian a kici khempeuh le na khempeuh nialgawp ding hi. Tuate khempeuh sangin a lianzaw-in a kingaihsut banah, Pasian ka hi hi, ci-in Pasian’ biakinn sung mahmahah pai-in va tu ding hi.
[8] A khamcip pa a kilakkhiat khit ciangin A Gilopa hong kilang ding a, Topa Jesuh hong pai ciangin tua A Gilopa mutlum ding a, vanglian minthangin hong kilatna tawh a maimangsak ding hi.
[15] Thuman lampi nusia-in gammang uh a, a man loin gamtatna tawh sum a ngah nuam Beor’ tapa Balaam’ gamtat bangin gamta uh hi.
[7] Amaute in Pasian’ thu genin a teci panna a zawhkhit uh ciangin kuahawm thukpi sung panin a hong paikhia ganhing in tua teci pangte simin zogawpin that ding a,

[2] Tua ka muh ganhing pen kamkei tawh kibang a, a khete vom khe tawh kibang a, a kam pen humpinelkai kam tawh a kibang hi. Gulpi in tua ganhing tungah ama vangliatna, ama tokhom, le aana lianpi a pia hi.
[5] Tua ganhing, kiphatsakna le kam khel nono a pautheih nading le kha sawm le nih sung aana a zattheih nadingin thu kipia hi.
[8] Tua ahih manin a kigo Tuuno laibu sungah a nungta ding mite’ min, leitung pianma pekin a kikhumna-ah a kihel lo leitung mi khempeuh in tua ganhing bia ding uh hi.

[11] Tua ciangin leisung panin a hong pusuak ganhing adang khat ka mu hi. Tua ganhing in tuu bangin ki nih nei a, a kampau zia pen gulpi kampau tawh kibang hi. [12] Tua ganhing masa a omna mahah ganhing masa’ aana khempeuh zang a, a liamma a damsa tua ganhing masa pen leitung le a tunga om mi khempeuh, aana tawh a biasak hi. [13] Tua ganhing nihna in nalamdang lianpipi bawl a, mi khempeuhte’ muhin van panin leitungah meikuang nangawn a kiasak thei hi. [14] Ganhing masa omna-ah nalamdang bawltheih nading thu ngah ahih manin a nalamdang bawlna tawh leitungah a om mi khempeuh khem a, namsau tawh a si ding zahin a kisat liamsa hinapi a nungta lai ganhing pahtawi nading milim khat a bawl nadingun a gen hi. [15] Tua ganhing nihna in ganhing masa lim dingin a kibawl milim sungah a hu a muap ciangin hong pauthei a, tua milim a bia lo khempeuh a thahtheih nadingin thu a ngah hi. [16] Tua ganhing in a lian a neu, a hau a zawng, sila le sila ahi lo, mi khempeuh in a taklam khut tung uh ahih kei leh a taltang uhah ciaptehna a neih nadingun thu a pia hi. [17] Tua ahih manin tua ganhing min ahih kei leh a min tangin a nambat ciaptehna a tungah a nei lo mi peuhmah, vanlei vanzuakin paikhia thei lo uh hi. [18] Hih thu-ah pilna kisam hi. Hih nambat pen 666 hi a, mihing khat min tangin a ding hi a, mipil mitei peuhpeuhte in hih ganhing nambat a cihnopna thei ding uh hi.
[12] Pasian’ thupiakna zui-in Jesuh tungah a citak Pasian’ mite a dingin thuakzawhna kisam hi.

[8] Tua na muh ganhing nidangin a om hangin tu-in om nawn lo hi. Ahi zongin tu-in kuahawm thukpi panin hong pusuakin sihna a thuak dingin paikhia ding hi. Tua ganhing nidangin omngei a, tu-in om nawn lo napi-in khatvei hong kilangkik ding ahih manin, a nungta mite’ min a kikhumna laibu sungah leitung pianma-in a kigelh nai lo, tu laitakin leitungah a om mite in tua ganhing a et uh ciangin lamdangsa ding uh hi.

[20] Tua ciangin a ganhing le tua ganhing omna-ah nalamdang a bawl kamsang zuau pa kiman khawm hi. Ganhing ciaptehna a neite le ganhing lim a biate pen tua na lamdangte tawh a kikhem ahi hi. Ganhing le kamsang zuau pa, a nihun kat kikhulna meiphualpi sungah a hingtangun kilawn hi.

[4] Tua ciangin tokhom tungah a tu mi pawlkhat ka mu a, tua mite tungah thukhen nading aana a kipia ahi hi. Jesuh thu a genna le Pasian thu hangin a kithat mite’ kha zong ka mu hi. Tua mite in ganhing ahi a, a lim ahi zongin bia lo uh hi; a taltang uhah ahi a, a khut tung uhah ahi zongin ganhing ciaptehna nei lo uh hi. Amaute hong hingkik uh a, Khrih tawh kum tulkhat sung ukna aana a neikhawm uh hi.
[18] Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin Jakob tho baih a, amah in lukhamin a zat suang la-in khuamin phut a, a tungah sathau a sung hi.
[6] meivakte a’ ding sathau, nilh sathau ding le paknamtui dingin a namtui nate,
[20] “Meivak a kuangin a om tawntung theih nadingin mei a vak ding oliv gah a kisuzan, sathau siangtho, Israel mite in nang kiangah hong paipih nadingun thu na pia ding hi.
[41] Amaute in keima tungah siampi na a sep theih nadingun na sanggampa Aaron le a tapate na silhsak ding a, amaute sathau nilhin, nasem dingin kipsakin, na siangthosak ding hi.
[7] Nangmah in nilh sathau la-in, ama lu tungah sungin amah na nilh ding hi.
[29] “Aaron’ biakna puan siangthote pen ama sih khit ciangin a tapate’ tungah kipia ding a, amaute sathau kinilhin a kikipsak nading ahi hi.

[22] Tua tham loin, TOPA in Moses kiangah, [23] “A hoihpen a namtui nate la in. Myrrh paknamtui shekel zanga le a namtui thaksing tuazah lang, shekel zanih le sawmnga a gik, le a khum a namtui paknamtui zanih le sawmnga, [24] biakinn shekel tawh kituakin thaksing nam khat zanga, le oliv thau bung khat, [25] nangmah in paknamtui bawlte’ bawl mah bangin a siangtho sathau nilh dingin hihte na gawm ding a, tua pen a siangtho sathau nilh hi ding hi. [26] Nangmah in tua tawh kikhopna buk le thuciamna singkuang, [27] sabuai le a nazat khempeuh, meivakkhuam le a nazatte le paknamtui biakna tau, [28] meihal biakna tau a nazat khempeuh tawh, kuang le a ngakna na zut ding hi. [29] Tuate a siangtho pen ahih theih nadingin na siangthosak ding a, tuate a lawng peuhmah a siangtho suak ding hi. [30] Amaute in keima tungah siampi na hong sep theih nadingun Aaron le a tapate nangmah in sathau nilhin amaute na siangthosak ding hi. [31] Nangmah in Israel mite kiangah, ‘Hih pen na khang tawntungun a siangtho keima sathau nilh hi ding hi. [32] Mi mawkmawkte’ pumpi tungah tua sathau kisung lo ding a, tua bangin a kigawm sathau dang na bawl kei ding uh hi. Tua pen a siangtho hi a, note a dingin a siangtho hi ding hi.
[8] meivak a’ ding sathau, nilh sathau le a paknamtui dingin a namtui nate,
[28] meivak ding, nilh sathau ding, le paknamtui dingin a namtui nate le sathau hong paipih uh hi.

[9] “Tua ciangin sathau la-in, biakbuk le a sunga om khempeuh na nuh ding a, biakbuk le a inn sungvan khempeuh na ap ding hi. Tua ciangin a siangtho biakna van a suak ding hi. [10] Nangmah in meihal biakna tau le a nazat khempeuh zong sathau nuhin biakna tau na ap ding a, tua biakna tau a siangtho pen hi ding hi.

[3] a khial pa pen sathau a kinilh siampipa ahih a, mite tungah tua bangin mawhna hong tut leh, ama gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin a sitbaang lo bawngtalno khat TOPA’ mai-ah khialhna hanga biakna-in amah piasak un.
[5] Tua ciangin sathau a kinilh siampipa in a bawngtal si tawmkhat la-in, kikhopna bukah paipih ding hi.

[10] Tua ciangin Moses in nilh sathau la-in, biakbuk le a sunga om khempeuh nuhin tuate a ap hi.

[32] A pa’ tanga siampi dingin sathau a kinilh a ki-ap siampipa in kilemna bawlin, a siangtho saihadial puante silh ding hi.
[3] sathau a kinilh siampi, siampi za-ah na a sem dingin a kikipsak, Aaron’ tapate’ minte ahi hi.
[40] Na gam sung khempeuh uhah oliv kung na nei ding uh a, ahih hangin a thau tawh note na kizut kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh na oliv gahte uh pulh ding hi.
[3] Tua ahih ciangin kisilin sathau kinuh inla, na puan hoihpente silhin ancilna-ah paisuk in. Ahih hangin a nek a dawn a man mateng ama kiangah na pailam kitheisak kei in.

[2] Leitung kumpite le gam ukte in TOPA le ama sathau nilh pa langpangin vaihawm uh a,

[1] Tua ciangin biakinn lutna kongkhakah hong paipih kik hi. Biakinn kongkhak sangkil nuai panin tui luang a, biakinn ngatna nisuahna lamah luang sukin, biakna tau leitaw lampang tawn suk hi. [8] Cinate damsakin, misite hingsakin, miphakte damsakin, dawite va hawlkhia un. Man piak kul loin hih vangliatna na ngah uh bangin hih vangliatna na zatna uhah zong man va ngen kei un.

[6] Bethany khua-a miphak ahi ngei Simon inn-ah Jesuh a om laitakin, [7] numei khat in a manpha mahmah sathau namtui suangngo thawl a dim khat hong tawi-in Jesuh kiangah hong pai a, Jesuh an ne-in a tut laitakin a lu tungah a buaksuk hi. [11] Mizawngte pen note tawh hong omkhawm tawntung ding a, ahi zongin note tawh kei ka hong omkhawm tawntung kei ding hi. [13] Note kiangah a mantak a kong genin-ah: Keima hangin a piang ding lungdamna thu a kigenna leitung khempeuhah hih numei kiphawkin a gamtatnate kigengen ding hi,” a ci hi.
[13] Dawi tampi hawlkhia uh a, cina mi tampi sathau zutin a damsak uh hi.
[8] Amah in ka luang a kivui nadingin paknamtui a hong ma nuhkhol hi a, a hihtheih zahzah ciang a hih khinta ahi hi.

[38] Jesuh’ nungah tu-in kap a, a khitui tawh Jesuh’ khete kawtsakin a sam tawh nulsak a, a khete namin a sathau puak a nuh hi.
