[17] Khrih in tuiphum nasep a sem dingin kei hong sawl lo a, Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin a hong sawl bek ahi hi. Ka thuhilhna-ah zong thugen siamna le pilna a nei ka hi kei hi. Tua bang hi kei hen la, pilna le gen siamna a nei hi leng, Khrih in singlamteh tunga a thuakna thu in vangliatna a neihna hang kisa lo kha ding hi.

[21] Khrih sungah kote le note a hong kipsak pa, le nasem dingin kote a hong sawl pa pen Pasian ahi hi. [22] Amah in eite pen ama a’ ihihna ciaptehna eite tungah hong bawl a, ama a’ ihihna le eite tungah a hong piak ding na khempeuh a hong pia takpi ding ahihna a kitel nadingin eite’ lungsim sungah Kha Siangtho a hong mapiak hi.

[11] Amah in mite tungah siamna a tuamtuam hong pia a, pawlkhatte sawltak nasep a sem ding, pawlkhatte kamsang nasep a sem ding, pawlkhatte thuhilh kawikawi nasep a sem ding, pawlkhatte pawlpi kem nasep a sem ding, le pawlkhatte laihilh nasep a sem dingin a hong seh hi. [12] Hih nasep a tuamtuamte khempeuh a sem dingin Pasian’ mi khempeuh kigingkhol sakin Khrih a dingin na semin Khrih pumpi a khansak theihna ding deihna ahi hi.

[14] A cina na om uhleh pawlpi upate sam un. Amaute in thu hong ngetsakin Topa min tawh sathau hong zut ding uh hi. [15] Upna tawh thu a kinget ciangin Topa in cinate noptuamsakin, damsak ding a, mawhna nei ahihleh zong a mawhna maisak ding hi. [16] Tua ahih manin na ci uh a dam nadingin khatlekhat tungah na mawhna uh kipulakin thu na kingetsak ta un. Mihoihte’ thungetna in vang nei a, na lianpi semzo hi.
[20] Ahi zongin Khrih in note tungah Kha Siangtho hong piakhin ahih manin note khempeuh in a man na thei uh hi.

[27] Khrih in note tungah ama Kha Siangtho hong piakhin a, tua Kha Siangtho na neih laiteng uh kuamah in note hong hilh ding kisam nawn lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Kha Siangtho in note tungah thu khempeuh hong hilh a, tua a hong hilh thute a man vive hi a, zuauthu khat zong om lo hi. Tua ahih manin Kha Siangtho’ hilhnate zui unla, Khrih sungah kiptakin om un.
[20] Na galte na khut sungah a hong pia Sang Pen Pasian in thupha ngah hen,” a ci hi. Abram in na khempeuh sawm-ah-khat ama tungah a pia hi.

[20] Tua ciangin Jakob in thuciamna khat bawlin, “Pasian in kei hong ompih a, hih ka paina lampi-ah kei hong kep a, nek ding an le silh ding puan hong piak a, [21] lungnuam takin ka pa’ inn-ah ka ciahkik leh, TOPA pen keima Pasian hi ding a, [22] khuamin ka phuhsa hih suang pen Pasian’ inn hi ding hi. Keima tungah nangmah in nong piak khempeuh sawm-ah-khat nang’ tungah kong pia kik ding hi,” a ci hi.

[30] “Leitang panin a piang khempeuh khaici hitaleh singgah hitaleh sawm-ah-khat TOPA a’ hi a, TOPA a dingin siangtho hi. [31] Mi khatpeuh in sawm-ah-khat a piak na khat peuhpeuh a tat nop leh, amah in tua banah nga-ah khat behlap ding hi. [32] Bawnghon leh tuulekeel hon sawm-ah-khat khempeuh le a cing pa’ ciangkhut nuai-a a pai ganhing khempeuh sawm-ah-khat peuhmah TOPA a dingin a siangtho hi ding hi.

[21] “Kikhopna buk sungah amaute’ nasepna thaman dingin Israel sunga sawm-ah-khat khempeuh, Levi mite’ tungah gamh-in ka pia hi. [22] Amaute in khialhna thuakin si kha ding uh ahih manin, tu a kipanin kikhopna buk sungah Israel midangte pai-in tua sawm-ah-khat nekpih lo ding uh hi. [23] Ahih hangin Levi mite in kikhopna buk nasep sem ding uh a, amaute in a tavuan uh pua ding uh hi. Tua pen amau’ khang tawntungin ngeina kip hi ding a, amaute in Israel mite’ lakah luah nei lo ding uh hi. [24] Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in biakna-in TOPA’ tungah a piak uh Israel mite’ sawm-ah-khat pen Levi mite tungah luah dingin ka pia khin hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite lakah amaute in luah a neih loh ding uh ka gensa ahi hi,” a ci hi. [25] TOPA in Moses kiangah, [26] “Levi mite kiangah hih bangin na gen lai ding hi: ‘Note’ luah dingin amaute’ tung panin kong piak sawm-ah-khat, Israel mite’ tung panin na lak uh ciangin, tua sung panin TOPA’ tungah biakna, sawm-ah-khat sung pan sawm-ah-khat na pia sawn ding uh hi. [27] Tua na biaknate uh, ancilna pana an le leenggah sukna pana kipia mah bangin note-a’ in kiciamteh ding hi. [28] Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite’ tung panin na ngah uh sawm-ah-khat khempeuh tung panin TOPA’ tungah biakna na pia ding uh hi. Tua bangin siampi Aaron’ tungah TOPA a kibiakna na pia ding uh hi. [29] Note tungah hong kipia letsong lakah a limci pen, a siangtho pen paipihin TOPA a’ ding biakna khempeuh na pia ding uh hi,’ ci-in gen in. [30] Tua ahih ciangin amaute kiangah, ‘Tuate sung panin a limci pen teng na piak khit uh ciangin, a omlai teng Levi mite a dingin ancilna panin a piangte le leenggah sukna panin a piangte a kipia mah bangin kiciamteh ding hi. [31] Nang le na innkuanpihte in mun khat peuhpeuhah na ne thei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua pen kikhopna buk sungah note’ nasepna thaman ahi hi. [32] Tua sung panin a limci pen na piak nak-uhleh tua thu hangin mawhsakna na thuak kei ding uh hi. Israel mite’ na a siangthote na ninsak kei ding uh hi. Na nitsak uhleh na si ding uh hi,’ ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.

[5] TOPA na Pasian un na minam khempeuh uh sung panin ama min koih nadingin teelin, ama omna dinga a bawlna mun na zong ding uh hi. [6] Tua lai-ah na pai ding uh a, na meihal biaknate uh le na biakpiaknate uh, note in na piak uh sawm-ah-khat le na piak thuahte uh, thuciamna biakpiakna, utthu-a na piakna, na bawnghon tacilte uh le na tuuhon tacilte uh tua lai-ah na paipih ding uh hi. [7] TOPA na Pasian uh mai tua lai munah na ne ding uh a, TOPA na Pasian un note thupha hong piakna hangin na hihna khempeuh uhah note le na innkuanpihte na lungdam ding uh hi. [8] “Tua hun ciangin mi khempeuh in ama hoihsak bangin a gamtat ngei ciat bangin na gamta nawn kei ding uh hi. [9] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA na Pasian un note hong piak tawlngakna le luahna-ah na tung nai kei uh hi. [10] Ahih hangin Jordan galkhatah pai-in, TOPA na Pasian un luah dingin note hong piak leitangah tengin, nuamtakin na nuntak theih nadingun na kiim uha na langte khempeuh uh kiang panin tawlngakna hong piak ciangin, [11] TOPA na Pasian un ama min om nading munin a teelna munah note kong sawl khempeuh na paipih ding uh hi. Na meihal biaknate uh le na biakpiaknate uh, note in na piak uh sawm-ah-khat le na piak thuahte uh le TOPA’ tungah na ciam uh na thuciam piaknate uh na paipih ding uh hi.

[22] “A kum kumin na lo uhah a piang, na khaici panun a piang khempeuh sawm-ah-khat na pia ding uh hi. [23] TOPA na Pasian uh na zahtak tawntung nading uh na theih nadingun, ama min a ten nadingin a teelna mun TOPA note’ Pasian’ mai-ah na an uh, na leenggahzu uh, na sathau uh sawm-ah-khat, le na bawnghon uh le na tuuhon tacilte uh na ne ding uh hi. [24] TOPA na Pasian un a min koih nadingin a teelna mun pen, TOPA na Pasian un no thupha hong piak ciangin note kiang panin gamla lua a, no a dingin lam a sau luat manin sawm-ah-khat na paipih zawh kei uhleh, [25] tuate sum na suah ding uh a, a sumte tunin, TOPA na Pasian un a teelna munah na pai ding uh a, [26] na deih peuhpeuh uh bawng ahi a, tuu ahi a, leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin, na duh peuhpeuh uh leina-in a sum na zang ding uh hi. TOPA na Pasian uh mai tua lai munah na ne ding uh a, note le na innkuanpihte uh na lungdam ding uh hi. [27] “Note bangin amaute in tanh le luah nei lo ahih manin na khuasung uha om Levi mite na mangngilh kei ding uh hi. [28] “Kum thum simin tua kum-a note’ anpiang sawm-ah-khat khempeuh hong paikhiatpihin na khuasung uhah na khol ding uh hi. [29] TOPA na Pasian un na sepnate khempeuh uhah thupha hong piak theih nadingin, note tawh kibangin amaute in tanh ahi a, luah ahi zongin nei lo uh ahih manin note’ khua sunga om Levi mite, peemtate, pa nei lote, leh meigong numeite hong pai-in tua ante ne-in a gilvah ding uh hi.

[12] “Sawm-ah-khat piak kum ahi, a kum thumna kumin, amaute in na khuapite uh sungah an ne-in, gilvahin a om theih nadingun Levi mite, peemtate, pa nei lote, le meigong numeite tungah na piak uh, na khawhsa uh sawm-ah-khat na piak khit uh ciangin, [13] TOPA note’ Pasian’ mai-ah, ‘Ka innsung panin a siangtho dingteng ka tuamkoih khin hi. Tua tham loin kei nong sawlna bangin na thupiaknate khempeuh tawh kizui-in Levi mite, peemtate, pa nei lote, le meigong numeite tungah ka pia khin hi. Hih tungtangah na thupiakna khat zong ka khial kei a, ka mangngilh zong om lo hi. [14] Dahin ka kah sungin zong sawm-ah-khat ka ne kei a, ka nit sungin zong ka khenkhia kei a, misite tungah zong ka pia kei hi. TOPA ka Pasian’ thu ka mang a, kei nong thupiakna khempeuh bangin ka hih khin hi. [15] Vantung, nangma omna a siangtho panin hong ensuk inla, kote’ pulepate tungah bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin a luanna gam na ciam mah bangin, nangma mi Israel-te le na hong piaksa leitang thupha hong pia in,’ na ci ding uh hi.

[5] Tua thupiakna a kitheihthang phetin Israel mite in anpalte, leenggahzu, le lo-a piang khempeuh tampi tak hong pia uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in na khempeuh sung pan sawm-ah-khat ahi tampi tak hong paipih uh hi. [6] Tua ciangin Judah khuapite sungah a teng Israel mite le Judah mite in zong bawng le tuu sawm-ah-khat le TOPA a Pasian uh tungah a kipiasa a ki-ap nate hong paipih uh a, a lom a lomin a koih uh hi. [7] A kha thumna sungin amaute in tua a lomte cian ding kipan uh a, a kha sagihna sungin a mansiang uh hi. [8] Hezekiah le uliante hong pai-in a lomte a muh uh ciangin amaute in TOPA le ama mi Israel-te thupha a pia uh hi. [9] Tua ciangin Hezekiah in a lomte’ thu, siampite le Levi mite a dong hi. [10] Zadok’ suan ahi siampi lianpen pa Azariah in amah dawngin, “Amaute in amau’ piakte uh TOPA’ biakinn sungah paipih ding hong kipat uh a kipan kote in an ka ne uh a, a kicing nei-in tampi vallai hi. TOPA in ama mite thupha pia ahih manin hih na tampi a omlai i nei hi,” a ci hi. [11] Tua ciangin amaute in TOPA’ biakinn sungah inndeite a bawlna ding uh Hezekiah in thu pia a, amaute in zong a deite a bawl uh hi. [12] Tua ciangin amaute in a piaknate, sawm-ah-khat le a ki-ap nate cihtakna tawh hong paipih uh hi. Tuate a en ulian pen pa Levi mi Konaniah hi a, a sanggampa Shimei pen amah a huhpa ahi hi.

[36] Thukham sunga kigelh mah bangin i Pasian’ biakinn-ah a om, i Pasian’ biakinn sungah na a sem siampite kiangah zong tapa upa pente le bawngte’ tacilte, le ganhonte’ tacilte, le tuuhonte’ tacilte paipih ding, [37] le annel lom meek masak pen siampite tungah puak ding, le gah nei sing khempeuh panin a gah masa, sathau le leenggahzu thakte khempeuh i Pasian’ biakinn sung vankoihna-ah puak ding, le lokhawhna khuaneute khempeuhah sawm-ah-khat a kaikhawmte pen Levi mite ahih manin leitang panin sawm-ah-khat khempeuh Levi mite kiangah puak ding ka kiciam uh hi. [38] Levi mite in sawm-ah-khat a khop uh ciangin Aaron’ suan siampite tawh hih khawm ding uh hi. Tua ciangin Levi mite in i Pasian’ biakinn sunga vankoihna a kilawm mun inndeite-ah sawm-ah-khat a ngah uh sung pan sawm-ah-khat puaksawn ding uh hi. [39] Bang hang hiam cih leh biakinn umlebeelte a kikoihna inndeite le na a sem siampite, kongcingte le lasate a giahna inndeite-ah Israel mite le Levi mite in a kipia ante, leenggahzu le sathaute a paipih ding uh ahi hi. Eite’ Pasian’ biakinn kinloin i om kei ding hi.

[44] Tua ciangin khuapite’ kiimah lo omte panin a golna le a neuna tawh kizui-in siampite le Levi mite a dingin thukham sunga om bangin a kaihkhop ding uh a kipia nate, anpalte, le sawm-ah-khatte a koihna ding uh vankoihna innte a uk dingin mi kiseh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh siampite le Levi mite’ nasepna hangin Judah mi khempeuh lungdam mahmah uh hi.

[5] Levi mite, lasate, le kongcingte tungah piak dingin a kisawl an tawh biakna, paknamtui, umlebeelte, sawm-ah-khat a kipia an, leenggahzu, le sathau, le siampite a dingin a kipia nate a koihna ngei uh inndei lianpi khat, Tobiah a dingin bawlsak hi. [6] Babylon kumpipa Artakzaksis in a uk kum sawmthum le nihna kumin ama kiangah pai ka hih manin hih thu a pian’ laitakin Jerusalem-ah ka om kei hi. Tawlkhat khit ciangin kumpipa kiangah a khuan ka ngen a, [7] Jerusalem-ah ka ciahkik hi. Tua ciangin Tobiah a dingin Pasian’ biakinn huang sungah inndei khat a vaihawmsakna thu, Eliashib’ gamtat hoih lohna ka phawkkhia hi. [8] Hih thu-ah lungkim het lo ka hih manin inndei sung panin Tobiah’ van teng ka lawnkhia hi. [9] Tua ciangin tua inndei a siansakna ding uh, le Pasian’ biakinn-a umlebeelte, an tawh biakna le paknamtui a koihkik nadingun thu ka pia hi. [10] Levi mite’ ngah dingte amau’ tungah kipia lo ahih manin Levi mite le lasate in a nasep ngeite uh nusia-in a lote uhah na a sepna uh zong ka phawkkhia hi. [11] Tua ahih ciangin uliante tungah ka lungkim kei a, “Bang hangin Pasian’ biakinn kinusiacip ahi hiam?” ka ci hi. Tua hi a, amaute kaikhawm kikin amau’ sepna ngei mun ciatah ka pangsakkik hi. [12] Tua ciangin Judah mite khempeuh in an, leenggahzu, le sathau sung pan sawm-ah-khat hong paipihin vankoihna innte-ah hong tun uh hi.
[1] Leitung le a tunga omte, leitung le a tunga tengte TOPA -a’ ahi hi.

[4] Israel mite aw, Bethel-a mun siangtho-ah va pai unla, tua lai-ah khialhna va bawl un. Gilgal-ah va pai unla, va khial semsem un. Zingsang simin biakna va pia unla, ni thum simin sawm-ah-khat pia un.

[8] Keimah in note kong dotnop thu pen, mi khatpeuh in Pasian’ na guksak ding kilawm ahi hiam? Kilawm lo hinapi-in note in nong guksak uh hi. Ahi zongin note in, ‘Bang hong guksak ka hi uh hiam?’ na ci uh hi. Sawm-ah-khat piakna le biakpiaknate ah nong guksak uh hi. [9] Na minam bupun keima neihsa hong guksak na hih manun note khempeuh tungah samsiatna hong tung hi. [10] Ka biakinn-ah an a om theih nadingin sawm-ah-khat a kimin hong paipih un. Kei hong ze-et un; vantung kongkhakte hongin, note a dingin na hoih tampi kong piakna na mu ding uh hi. [11] Lo panin a piang na ante uh, kauphe ka nesak nawn kei ding a, na leenggui uh gahpha mahmah ding hi. [12] Tua ciangin na gam uh, ten nadingin a hoih mahmah leitang hong suak ding ahih manin, minam dang khempeuh in note pen a nuamsa minam hong ci ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[21] amaute in, “Sisar’ lim le a min kigelh hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Sisar’ nate Sisar’ tungah na pia unla, Pasian’ nate Pasian’ tungah na pia un,” a ci hi.

[23] “Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Note in Pasian tungah lengmasel, masala, le kummin sing namtui a kipanin meh namtui nam khempeuh, sawm-ah-khat pia napi-in, thukham sungah a thupizaw ahi thutang, hehpihna, le thumante na don kei uh hi. Adangte nusia tuan loin hih thute na zuih ding uh ahi hi.

[41] Biakinn sumpi khiatna kuang gei-ah Jesuh tu a, mihonte in sumpi a khiat laitakun a en hi. A haute in tampipi hong khia uh hi. [42] A zawng meigong numei khat zong hong pai a, sumnen tang nih hong khia hi. [43] Tua ciangin a nungzuite sam a, “Adangte khempeuh sangin hih mizawng meigongnu in tam khia zaw hi. [44] Bang hang hiam cih leh adangte in a neihval a lamval sung panun a khia uh ahi hi; ahi zongin amah zawng mahmah napi-in ama kivak nading nangawn siit loin a neih khempeuh a khiakhin ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[42] “No Farisi mite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Note in Pasian tungah lengmasel, thuambuak a kipan anteh theipuam dongin sawm-ah-khat pia napi-in, mite tungah thuman ding le Pasian it ding na donkha kei uh hi. Hihte khempeuh na hihkim ding uh hi a, paihkhiat na neih ding uh hi lo hi.
[10] “A tawmno-ah a diktatte pen a tamah zong diktat uh a, a tawmno-ah a citak lote pen a tamah zong citak lo uh hi.
[12] Nipikal khatin ni nih sung an ka tang a, ka ngah khempeuh sung panin sawm-ah-khat nang tungah kong pia hi,’ a ci hi.

[1] Jesuh a khuadak leh mihaute in biakinn sumkuang sungah a letsong uh a khiatna, [2] le a zawng meigong khat in zong sumnen tang nih a khiat a mu hi. [3] Tua ciangin amah in, “Ke’n kong cihin-ah, hih a zawng meigongnu in a dangte khempeuh sangin tamzaw a khia hi. [4] Bang hang hiam cih leh adangte in a zatval uh sumte a khia uh ahi hi. Ahi zongin hih numei a zawng mahmah hinapi-in a nuntak nading khempeuh a khia khin ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[14] Tua mah bangin lungdamna thu a hilhte in tua nasepna mah panin nuntakna a ngah nading uh Topa’ thupiak ahi hi.
[11] Tawlkhat sung bek a kimang na in minthanna nei ahihleh a kip tawntung na in minthanna lianzaw nei kan ding hi.
[29] Khrih tawh na kipawl nak-uhleh Abraham’ suante na hita uh a, Pasian’ hong khap thute a ngah ding na hi uh hi.

[4] Tua ahih manin bangzah takin milian ahihna thu na thei uh hi. I pupi Abraham nangawn in zong gal sungah a ngah nate sung panin ama tungah sawm-ah-khat na pia hi. [5] Levi suanlekhak sung panin siampi a sem mite pen Abraham’ suanlekhak mah hinapi-in, amau mipih Israel-te tung panin sawm-ah-khat a lak nadingun Thukham a na kibawl hi. [6] Ahi zongin Melkhizedek ahihleh Levi’ suanlekhak hi lo napi-in Abraham’ tung panin sawm-ah-khat na la-in thuciamna a ngah mipa zong thupha a na pia lai hi. [7] A lianzawte in a neuzawte thupha a na piakna pen a man thu hi a, sel theih ding hi lo hi. [8] Siampite’ lakna tawh kisai-in ahihleh a sithei mi mah ahi siampite in mite tung panin sawm-ah-khat a la uh hi. Ahi zongin Melkhizedek’ lakna tawh kisai-in ahihleh Lai Siangtho in a gen mah bangin a nungta tawntung mipa in sawm-ah-khat a la ahi hi. [9] Abraham in Melkhizedek tungah sawm-ah-khat a piak ciangin ama suan Levi in zong ama pupi Abraham tungtawnin a pia mah kici thei hi.
[12] Tua ahih ciangin tu-in pai in. Keimah in na thugenna-ah kong huh ding a, na thugen ding nang kong hilh ding hi,” a ci hi.
[34] TOPA in amah le Dan minam Ahisamak’ tapa Oholiab tungah midangte hilh siamna pia khin hi.
[11] TOPA in Moses tungtawnin amaute’ tunga a gensa thukhamte khempeuh note in Israel mite a hilh ding na hi uh hi,” a ci hi.

[9] “Na mit un a muhsa nate na nuntak sungun mangngilh kha-in, na lungsim panun paikhia kha ding ahih manin limtakin ngaihsunin hoihtakin kikem un. Horeb-a TOPA na Pasian uh mai-ah na din ni-un TOPA in kei kiangah, ‘Leitungah a nuntak laiteng uh amaute in kei hong kihtakna ding le amaute in a tate uh a hilhsawn theih nadingun keimah in amaute tungah ka thute ka zaksak theih nadingin ka kiangah mite hong khawm in,’ hong cihna thu, na tate uh le na tate uh tate’ tungah kitheisak un. [10] “Na mit un a muhsa nate na nuntak sungun mangngilh kha-in, na lungsim panun paikhia kha ding ahih manin limtakin ngaihsunin hoihtakin kikem un. Horeb-a TOPA na Pasian uh mai-ah na din ni-un TOPA in kei kiangah, ‘Leitungah a nuntak laiteng uh amaute in kei hong kihtakna ding le amaute in a tate uh a hilhsawn theih nadingun keimah in amaute tungah ka thute ka zaksak theih nadingin ka kiangah mite hong khawm in,’ hong cihna thu, na tate uh le na tate uh tate’ tungah kitheisak un.

[4] “Israel-te aw, za un: TOPA i Pasian, TOPA khat bek ahi hi. [5] TOPA note’ Pasian, na lungsim khempeuh uh, na nuntakna khempeuh uh, le na thahatna khempeuh uh tawh na it ding uh hi. [6] Tuni-a no kong piak hih thute na lungsim uhah om ding hi. [7] Na tate uh tungah limtakin na hilh ding uh a, na innsung uhah na tut uh ciang, lampi-ah na pai uh ciang, na lup ciang uh le na thawh ciangun tua thute na gengen ding uh hi.
[19] Na tate uh tungah na hilh ding uh a, na innsung uhah na lut laitak, lampi-ah na pai laitak, na lup ciang uhleh na thawh ciangun tuate genin na nei ding uh hi.

[1] “Note lakah kamsang khat ahi a, mangman khat ahi zongin hong khangin, lim ahi a, nalamdang ahi zongin hong lak a, [2] ama hong gen lim ahi a, nalamdang ahi zongin hong tungin, na theih ngei loh uh, ‘Adang pasian-te’ nung zui-in amaute va bia ni,’ hong cih leh, [3] tua kamsangpa’ thu ahi a, mangman pa’ thu ahi zongin na ngai kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA note’ Pasian na lungsim khempeuh uh le na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh na it uh hiam cih a kitheih nadingin TOPA na Pasian un no hong ze-etna ahi hi.
[18] “‘Mittaw pa lam a lakkhial mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.

[2] Ka thuhilhte guahmal bangin zu-in, ka thugente daitui bangin kia hen la, lo ngeek tunga guah phin leh ankung tunga guahzu bang tahen. [3] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA’ min ka phat ding hi. Eite’ Pasian a liatna gen un!
[2] Siampi Jehoiada in amah thuhilh ahih manin Joash in ama uk hun sung tawntung TOPA’ muhna-ah a man gamta hi.
[8] Amaute in Pasian’ thukham laibu sung panin a kitel takin sim uh a, a cihnopna a kitelin gen uh a, tua a kisim thute a tel nadingun a hilh uh hi.
[8] Na pai nading lampi lakin ka hong hilh ding a, ka mit tawh hong enin thu kong hilh ding hi.
[11] Tate aw, hong pai unla hong ngai un; TOPA zahtakna thu ka hong hilh ding hi.

[5] Amaute pen Pasian tungah a lungsim thuman lo, lungsim kip a nei lo khangmi, lungsim khauhin a lehdo khangmi, amau’ pulepate tawh kibang loin, amaute in Pasian sungah amau’ lametna koihin, Pasian’ nasepnate mangngilh loin, ama thupiakte zui-in, a suak nai lo naupangte, a hong piangkik khang thakte in a thu thei-in, amaute ding khia-in amau’ tuletate tungah a thu a gentheih nadingin, amah in, i pate in a tate a hilhsawn dinga a sawl ahi, Israel sungah thukham khat koihin, Jakob sungah tecipanna khat a koih hi. [6] Amaute pen Pasian tungah a lungsim thuman lo, lungsim kip a nei lo khangmi, lungsim khauhin a lehdo khangmi, amau’ pulepate tawh kibang loin, amaute in Pasian sungah amau’ lametna koihin, Pasian’ nasepnate mangngilh loin, ama thupiakte zui-in, a suak nai lo naupangte, a hong piangkik khang thakte in a thu thei-in, amaute ding khia-in amau’ tuletate tungah a thu a gentheih nadingin, amah in, i pate in a tate a hilhsawn dinga a sawl ahi, Israel sungah thukham khat koihin, Jakob sungah tecipanna khat a koih hi.
[99] Ka siate khempeuh sangin thu ka telzaw hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh na teci pannate ka ngaihsunsun hi.

[2] Mite in pilna le thuhoihte a phawk theih nading, khiatna thuk a nei kammalte a theih theih nading. [3] A hoihin a pil gamtat theih nading, thuman, thutang, a kilawmin a gamtat theih nading. [4] Thuthei nai lote in a theih nading, khangnote in pilna le thu ngaihsut theihna a ngahna ding.
[2] Bang hang hiam cih leh kong hilh thute thuhoih ahi hi. Kong hilhte khempeuh limtakin ciamteh un.
[13] Hong kihilhnate lencip inla, khahsuah kei in. Na nuntakna ding ahih manin limtakin zui in.

[12] Tua ciangin, “Bang hangin thu thei hoh lo a, hong kihilhna mang hoh lo ka hi hiam? [13] Kei hong hilh siate’ thu ka mang nuam kei a, amau’ hong hilhnate ka don keikha hi. [14] Tua ahih manin tu-in ka cimawh vat a, mi’ mai-ah ka min a sia hi,” na ci ciat ding uh hi.
[10] Ngun sangin kong thuhilhnate deihzaw unla, kham hoihpen sangin thutheihna deihzaw un.
[33] Hong kihilhnate zui-in pilna ngah unla, thudon loin ommawk kei un.
[14] Thulamlak ding a nei lo mihingte kipuk uh a, thulamlak tampi neihna pen lungmuanna ahi hi.
[10] Hilh ding ut lo, kihihsakna in kitotna bek piangsak thei a, hong kithuhilh ding utna pen a hoihzaw ahi hi.
[13] Thu kihilh ding ut lohna pen siat ding utna hi a, thu kihilhna zuihna pen lungnopna ahi hi.
[24] A ta a tai nuam lote a ta mudah hi a, a ta a itte in limtakin thuhilhin a tai hi.
[12] A kihisak mite in kithuhilhna ngai nuam lo uh a, mipilte kiangah thu dong ngei lo uh hi.
[20] Thu kigente ngai-in hong kihilhte mang lecin mai lamah na pil ding hi.
[6] Naupang khat a neulai-in lampi man tawnsak lecin a teek dongin lampial nawn lo ding hi.
[23] Mi khat tai-in thuhilh lecin tungthama phatna sangin a tawpna-ah lungdamzaw ding hi.

[12] Ka ta aw, na phawk ding thudang khat omlai hi. Lai gelhin a bu-a bawlna in bei hun nei thei lo a, lai tam sin luatna in pumpi gimsak hi. [13] Hih thute khempeuh banah gen ding thu khat bek om hi. Mihing hong kipiansakna a thu bulpi pen in: Pasian zahtakna le a thupiakte manna ahi hi. [14] A pha hitaleh a sia hitaleh a simthamin i hih simte nangawn i hihna khempeuhah Pasian in thu hong khen ding hi.
[20] Topa in note tungah cihmawhna le gimna hong tunsak hangin amahmah in note hong hilh ding a, note in amah na mu ding uh hi.
[4] A lunggim mite ka thahatsak theih nadingin Topa PASIAN in ka gen ding thu hong hilh khin hi. Ama hong hilhnate a ngai dingin zingsang simin lawpna hong guan hi.
[13] “ TOPA in na tapate khempeuh hoihtakin hilh ding a, na tapate daupai mahmah ding uh hi.

[33] Ahih hangin TOPA in kong cihin-ah, tua hun hong tun ciangin Israel minamte tawh hih bangin thuciamna ka bawl ding hi: Amaute’ sungah ka thukham ka koih ding a, amaute’ lungtang tungah ka gelh ding hi. Kei pen amaute’ Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute pen keima mite ahi ding uh hi. [34] Kuamah in midangte le a sanggamte uh kiangah, ‘ TOPA thei in,’ ci-in a kihilh nawn kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in kong cihin-ah, amaute in a neupen panin a lianpen dongin, a vekpi-un kei a hong thei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ khialhnate ka maisak ding a, amaute’ mawhnate zong phawkin ka nei nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.

[18] Migilo pa khat pen si ding hi, ci-in kong gen ciangin, amah kikheelin a nuntak theih nadingin thu na hilhkholh kei leh, tua mipa pen mawhnei mahin si ding a, ahi zongin ama sihna thu ahihleh nang kong ngawh ding hi.
[23] “Amaute in ka mite tungah, biakna na a siangtho le a mawkmawk nate, le a nin le a siang nate a kilamdanna hilh ding uh hi.
[3] A pilte ahih uhleh vantung khuavak tawh a taangkhawm ding uh hi. A pha-in gamtat ding mi tampi a hilhte pen aksi bangin a taang tawntung ding uh hi.

[16] Bang hang hiam cih leh Kumpi Omri’ gamtatna zui-in, ama tapa Kumpi Ahab’ sep khempeuh na sem uh a, amau’ gamtat khempeuh na zui uh hi. Tua ahih manin note kong susia ding hi. Minam dangte in note hong nuihsanin, amaute’ simmawhna na thuak ding uh hi.

[4] Tua ciangin Levi’ suanlekhakte ahi siampite tawh ka thuciamna a kip nawn lo ahihna thu, hih thu kong genna-ah na thei ding uh hi. [5] “Amaute a nuntakna ding le a nopsakna ding thu ka ciam a, amaute in kei hong zahtak theih nadingun hih ka thuciamte khempeuh ka pia hi. Amaute in kei hong zahtakin hong kihta takpi uh hi. [6] Amaute in thuman taktakte mah hilhin gen uh a, amaute’ kam panin zuauthu gingkhia lo hi. Ka deihna bangin amaute gamta uh a, a khial ding mi tampite, thuman lamah a paisak uh hi. [7] Siampite’ nasep pen Pasian a manin theih nading a hilh ding uh ahi hi. Amaute pen, Vanglian TOPA’ kamtaite ahih manun, mite in keima deihna a theih nadingun amaute’ tungah thu a dot ding uh ahi hi.

[19] Tua ahih manin hih thukhamte lakpan a neupente khat bek nangawn zuikha loin, midangte in zong a zuih loh nadingin a gen mite pen vantung ki-ukna sungah mi neupen hi ding uh hi. Ahi zongin hih thukhamte zui-in, midangte in zong a zuih nadingin a hilh mite pen vantung ki-ukna sungah milian hi ding uh hi.

[15] “Kamsang taktak a hilote na muh uh ciangin limtakin kikem un. Amaute in a tungthamah tuu lim hong pua-in, ahi zongin a sungtawng taktak uh ngia hangsan bang ahi uh hi. [16] Amaute’ gamtatna tawh amau’ pianzia na thei ding uh hi. Lingvom kung panin leenggah kilo ngei a, sialtalling kung panin theigah kilo ngei ahi hiam?

[22] Tua ni ciangin mi tampi in kei kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa aw, nangma min tawh thu hilhin, nangma min tawh dawite hawlkhia-in, nangma min tawh nalamdang lian tampi bawl hi lo ka hi uh hiam?’ hong ci ding uh hi. [23] Tua ciangin keimah in amaute kiangah, ‘Note ka hong thei ngei kei hi. Siatna a gamta mite aw, kei kiang panin kihemkhia un,’ ka ci ding hi.

[7] Na paina peuh uhah, ‘Vantung ki-ukna hong naita hi,’ ci-in thu va hilh un. [8] Cinate damsakin, misite hingsakin, miphakte damsakin, dawite va hawlkhia un. Man piak kul loin hih vangliatna na ngah uh bangin hih vangliatna na zatna uhah zong man va ngen kei un.
[24] “A siapa sangin a sang naupangte lianzaw ngei lo a, a topa sangin a silate lianzaw ngei lo hi.

[3] Jesuh in, “Bang hangin note in na pupa ngeina uh zui-in, Pasian’ thupiakna palsat zawsop na hi uh hiam? [4] Pasian in, ‘Na nu le na pa na zahtak in,’ ci a, tua banah, ‘A nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a gensiate in thahna thuak ding hi,’ ci lai hi. [5] Ahi zongin note in, ‘Mi khatpeuh in a nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a huh theih nading na khat peuhpeuh a neih leh, tua na pen Pasian a’ ding hi, ci peuh leh, a nu le a pa piak kul nawn lo hi,’ ci-in thu na hilh uh hi.

[6] Pawi sungah a om uh ciangin uliante’ tutna dinga a kibawl munah tunuam se uh a, kikhopna inn sungah zong uliante tutna tutphah nuampente tungah a tunuam diak uh hi. [7] Mihon lakah mite in hopihin, ‘Sia aw,’ a cih ding uh a ut uh hi. [8] Ahi zongin note pen, ‘Sia,’ na kicih ding uh hi lo hi. Sia khat bek na nei uh a, no adangte khempeuh unau khat na hi uh hi.

[19] Tua ahih ciangin note pai unla, midang khempeuh, keima nungzui mi suaksakin, Pa min, Tapa min, le Kha Siangtho min tawh tui sungah na phum un. [20] Tua ciangin note tungah ka hong gen thute khempeuh a zuih nadingun na hilh un. Hun bei dongin note a hong ompih tawntung ding ka hihna thu phawk ta un,” a ci hi.

[14] Amaute in, “Sia aw, nangmah in thutang genin, midangte’ pau ding phamawh na sak lohna, uliante’ maitang zahtak tuan loin, Pasian in mite a gamtat dingin a deihna thute tangtakin na hilhna ka thei uh hi. Tua ahih manin Rom Kumpipa Sisar tungah siah i piak ding kilawm ahi hiam, kilawm lo ahi hiam?
[38] Jesuh in a thuhilhna-ah, “Thukham hilh sia pawlkhatte na bat khak loh nadingun na kidawm un. Amaute in puantualpi silhnuam uh a, mite lakah mite in a zahtak hopih ding a deih uh hi.
[37] Tua ahih manin Pasian in a bawl theih loh khat zong om lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[45] Amah a muh zawh loh uh ciangin Jerusalem-ah kileh kikin a zong uh hi. [46] A ciahzawh uh a ni thum ni ciangin biakinn sungah amah mu uh a, siate lakah tu-in a thugen uh ngai-in, thu zong dong zelin a om a mu uh hi.
[40] Sang naupang khat a siapa sangin lianzaw ngei lo hi; a sin ding khempeuh a theihkhit ciangin a siapa tawh kikim pan bek ding hi.”

[52] No Thukham hilh siate in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Note in pilna ngah theih nading konghonna tawhtang nei napi-in a sungah note na lut tuan kei uh a, a tum dingin a paite zong lah na khaktan uh hi,” a ci hi.
[12] Bang hang hiam cih leh a hun a tun ciangin Kha Siangtho in na gen dingteng uh hong hilh ding hi,” a ci hi.

[46] “Thukham hilh siate na batkhak loh nadingun kidawm un. Amaute in puantualpi silhnuam uh a, mihon lakah a kizahtak hopih ding deihin, kikhopna innsung le pawi lakah a om uh ciangin uliante’ tutna mun hoihte bekah tunuam uh hi.

[2] Khatvei zan khuamial laitakin Jesuh kiangah va pai a, “Sia aw, mi khat peuhpeuh Pasian in ompih lo hileh hih na lamdangte kuamah in bawl thei lo ding ahih manin nang pen Pasian’ hong sawl siapa na hihna ka hong thei uh hi,” a ci hi.
[10] Jesuh in, “Israel mite’ sia hinapi-in hih thu theithei lo na hi hiam?
[45] Kamsangte in a lai gelhna uhah, ‘Pasian in mi khempeuh a hilh ding hi,’ na ci uh hi. Tua ahih manin Pa kiang panin thu za-in a thei mi khempeuh ka kiangah a hong pai ahi hi.
[34] Tua ciangin amaute in, “Mawhna bulomtang sung panin suakin a khangkhia mipa in kote tungah thu hong hilhsawm na hi hiam?” ci-in tua mittaw ngei pa a hawlkhia uh hi.

[13] Note in kei pen Siapa, le Topa, na hong ci uh hi. Na hong cih uh mah bangin a man ka hi hi. [14] Note’ Topa le Siapa in na khe uh hong silsak ka hih leh note khatlekhat na kisilsak kan ding uh kilawm hi.

[26] Ahi zongin Pa in keima tangin a hong sawl ding Huhpa Kha Siangtho a hong tun ciangin note tungah thu khempeuh hong hilh ding a, note tungah ka hong gensa thu khempeuh zong hong phawksakkik ding hi.
[42] Amaute in sawltakte tung panin thu sinin amaute tawh kikhawl uh a, amaute tawh an nekhawmin, thu zong a ngenkhawm uh hi.
[2] Hih sawltak nihte in misite thokik ding hi, cih a lahtel nadingun sihna panin Jesuh thokik hi, ci-in mite kiangah thu hilh uh ahih manin nawngkai a sa uh hi.

[21] Ama gen mah bangin sawltakte zong zingsang ciangin biakinn-ah pai-in thuhilh ding a kipan uh hi. Siampi lianpen pa le ama kikholhpihte in ulian kikhopna a cingtaak khat a omtheih nadingin Jew mi upa khempeuh a kikhop nadingun a sam uh hi. Tua khit ciangin thong panin sawltakte va kai-in uliante mai-ah a hong paipih nadingun palikte a sawl uh hi.
[42] Nisimin biakinn sung le mite inn-ah thu hilh uh a, Jesuh, Khrih hi, cih Lungdamna Thu a gengen uh hi.

[26] Saul a muh ciangin Antiok khua-ah a paipih hi. Kum khat sung tawntung tua lai-a om pawlpi mite tawh amau tegel omkhawm uh a, mi tampi tak thu a hilh uh hi. Thu um mite pen Khristian ci-in min a kiphuah masakna mun in Antiok khua ahi hi.

[34] Ahi zongin Antiok khua-ah Paul le Barnabas taam lai uh a, midang tampite tawh kopin Topa’ thu a hilh uh hi. [35] Ahi zongin Antiok khua-ah Paul le Barnabas taam lai uh a, midang tampite tawh kopin Topa’ thu a hilh uh hi. [36] Tawlkhat khit ciangin Paul in Barnabas kiangah, “Topa’ thu i hilhnasa khua tuamtuama i sanggamte kiangah va hawhkikin bang a cici uh hiam cih va en ni,” a ci hi.

[11] Thesalonika khuamite sangin Berea khuamite in mipi lungsim neizaw uh hi. Amaute in lawp mahmahna tawh Paul’ thugente ngai uh a, Paul’ thugente man taktak hiam ci-in a theih nadingun nisimin Lai Siangtho a sim uh hi.
[11] Tua ahih manin tua khua-ah kum khat le alang sung omlai-in mite kiangah Pasian thu a hilh hi.
[7] Sani nitakin an nekhawm dingin ka kikhawm uh a, a zing ciangin a ding khia ding ahih manin Paul in a thuhilh zankim ciang dong a zomsuak hi.
[20] Mihon lak ahi a, note’ inn sungah ahi zongin ka hong thuhilhna khempeuhah note’ phattuam nading a om khempeuh siit nei loin kong gen khin hi.
[27] Bang hang hiam cih leh note tungah Pasian’ thu kong gen loh khat zong om nawn lo hi.
[31] Amah in Pasian’ Ukna thu le Topa Jesuh Khrih’ thu, hangtakin a ututin genin a hilh hi.

[18] Thukham thei na hih manun Pasian’ deihnate na thei uh a, a man le a man lo na khenthei uh hi. [19] Mittawte lam a lak ding, khuamial sunga om mite khuavak a musak ding, [20] mihaite a hilh ding, naupangte a hilh dingte ihi a, thukham sunga om thu khempeuh thei-in i gen khempeuh man mahmah hi, ci-in na kimuang uh hi. [21] Midangte a hilh note in, nomau mah kihilh lo ding na hi uh hiam? “Guta kei un,” ci-in mi hilh napi-in nomau mahmah guta hi lo na hi uh hiam? [22] “Numei tawh mawh kei un,” ci-in mi hilh napi-in nomau mahmah mawh hi lo na hi uh hiam? Milimte mudah napi-in milim biakna inn sunga nate gu hi lo na hi uh hiam? [23] Note in thukham kisaktheihpih napi-in thukham palsatin Pasian’ min na daisak uh hi.

[7] Nasep nading siamna a nei ihih leh na sem ni. Hilh nading siamna a nei ihih leh hilh ni. [8] Midangte hanthot theih nading siamna a nei ihih leh midangte hanthawn ni. Midangte hop theih nading a nei ihih leh citna taktak tawh hawm ni. Makaih theih nading siamna a nei ihih leh hoihtakin na sem ni. Midangte hehpih theih nading a nei ihih leh maitai takin hih ni.
[14] Thu upna sungah sanggamte aw, note mihoih hi-in, bangci gamtat ding cih thei-in, khatlekhat zong a kihilhthei dingin kong muang mahmah hi.

[17] Lawmte aw, note’ theihsa thute gensia langpangin, mite’ upna nawngkaisakin pawl a kikhensak mite kidawm un. Tua bang mite tawh kikhawl vet kei un. [18] Tua bang mite in i Topa Khrih’ na a sem hi loin, gilpi vai bek a sem uh ahi hi. Amaute in mite phatin kamkhum nono zang uh ahih manin mihoih pawlkhat a khemzo uh hi.

[28] Tua ahih manin Pasian in pawlpi sungah mi khempeuh ama panmun ciat dingah a hong bulh hi. A masa-in sawltakte, a nihna-ah kamsangte, a thumna-ah laihilhte, tua ciangin nalamdang bawltheite, cina damsak theite, midang a huhtheite, thu vaihawm a siamte, le pau lamdang a pau theite ahi uh hi. [29] A vekpi-un sawltak hi lo a, a vekpi-un kamsang zong hi lo uh hi. A vekpi-un laihilh, thuhilh hi lo uh a, a vekpi-un nalamdang zong bawl lo uh hi.
[8] Itna pen a tawntungin a kip ahi hi. Thuhilh siamna a om tei hangin tawlkhat sung bek kimangin, pau lamdang pautheih siamnate a om hangin bei ding a, thutheih siamna a om hangin maimang ding hi.
[3] Ahi zongin Pasian’ thu a hilhte pen mite tungah thugen hi a, mite tungah huhna, hanthotna, le hehnepna a pia ahi hi.

[29] Pasian thu gen ding a neite sung panin nih le thum bang bek in a banbanin gen ding uh a, adangte in limtakin na tel ngaih ding uh hi. [30] A kikhawm mite sung panin mi khatpeuh in Pasian thu gen ding hong neih leh tua a thugen lai pa khawl phot ding hi. [31] Na vekpi-un a thu thei-in thahatna na ngahtheih nadingun no thugen ding a neite khempeuh in khatkhatin thu na ban gen ding uh hi.
[13] Amaute pen sawltak taktak hi loin, sawltak a kineihkhemte hi uh a, a nasepna uhah zong zuau-in, Khrih’ sawltak taktak a battheih nadingun a mel kiseel ahi uh hi.
[8] Note tungah ka hong hilhsa uh lungdamna thu tawh a kilehngatin, kote a kipan vantungmi dongin thudang a hong hilh a om leh tua a hong hilh mipa hell khuk sungah tung ta hen!
[11] Antiok khua-ah Peter hong hawh sungin a gamtat khialhna hangin thu uppih mite lak mahah amah ka taii hi.
[6] Pasian thu hilhna a za mipa in ama neih na hoihte khempeuh zong, amah a hilh pa tawh zangkhawm tahen.
[19] Khrih hong itna a kicing takin theihkhit zawh loh ding ahi ta zongin note in thei-in, Pasian thu a cingin na theih nadingun thu ka hong ngetsak hi.

[11] Amah in mite tungah siamna a tuamtuam hong pia a, pawlkhatte sawltak nasep a sem ding, pawlkhatte kamsang nasep a sem ding, pawlkhatte thuhilh kawikawi nasep a sem ding, pawlkhatte pawlpi kem nasep a sem ding, le pawlkhatte laihilh nasep a sem dingin a hong seh hi. [12] Hih nasep a tuamtuamte khempeuh a sem dingin Pasian’ mi khempeuh kigingkhol sakin Khrih a dingin na semin Khrih pumpi a khansak theihna ding deihna ahi hi.
[15] itna lungsim tawh thutak genin, lutang ahi Khrih tawh i kibat dongin i khangto ding hi.
[4] Pate aw, na tate uh a hehtheih nadingin bawl kei unla, Khristiante ngeina tawh kituakin taii-in hilhin pantah un.
[16] Khrih thu a cingtakin note lungsimah hong om hen la, pilna tawh khatlekhat thu kihilhin na kitai un. Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Thuciam Lui sunga late, la thakte, le biakna late na sa un.

[1] Tu-in sanggamte aw, Pasian’ deihna le ama lungkim nadingin bangci nuntak ding cih thu kote kiang panin na theihsa uh thute tawh kizui-in na nuntaksa uh ahih mah bangin a kicingzaw semsemin na nuntak nadingun i Topa Jesuh min tawh hong thumin ka hong hanthawn uh hi. [2] Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa Jesuh min tawh ka hong thuhilhnate uh na theihsa uh ahi hi.
[9] Ahi zongin thu uppih mite it ding tawh kisai-in bangmah gelh ding na kisam nawn kei uh hi. Khatlekhat na ki-it nading uh Pasian in note tungah hong hilh khinzo hi.

[12] Sanggamte aw, Topa in note lam a hong lak ding le a hong makai dingin a seh, note lakah na a hong sem mite, a kilawm a kituakin zahtakbawl un. [13] Amau’ nasepna hangin amaute nakpitakin itbawlin zahtak un. Note khatlekhat kilem takin na om un. [14] Sanggamte aw, a thadah mite hilh unla, a meidawite hanthawnin, a zawngkhal mite huh unla, hih bang mite ngongbawl kei un.
[20] thuhilhnate simmawhbawl kei un.
[15] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, kam tawh ahi a, lai tawh ahi zongin ka hong hilh uh thumante limtakin zui unla, kiptakin om un.

[7] Thei kisa ngelin a gen kankan uh thute le amau kampauna mahmah zong bang gen ka hi hiam cih a thei het lo hinapi-in amaute pen Pasian’ thukhamte a hilh dingin utzaw lai uh hi. [8] Thukham pen a kizat nading a kilawm ciang ah zangthei lehang a hoih thu khat hi, ci-in i thei hi.
[7] Hih ka gen thu pen zuau ahi lo, thu taktak a gen ka hi a, Gentail mite lakah upna thu le hih thuman a gen dingin sawltak na semin thu a hilh dingin kei a hong kisawl ahi hi.
[11] Numeite in gamdai takin kiniamkhiatna tawh thu ngai-in a sin ding uh ahi hi. [12] Numeite in pasalte tungah aana nei-in thu a hilh ding ka phalkei hi. Gamdai takin a om ding uh ahi hi.

[2] Tua ahih manin siate pen paubaanna a nei lo mi, zi khat bek a nei mi, lungsim hoih hithiat mi, thu a ngaihsun thei mi, a kilawm a kituakin a gamta mi, zin le leengla do a siam mi, thuhilh a siam mi,
[2] Tua bang zuau thuhilhnate pen zuau genin mi a khem, sik emsa tawh tatgawp bangin a lungsim un a hoih le a hoih lo a khenthei nawn lote’ kam panin hong gingkhia ding hi.
[6] Nang in na zuihsa upna thu le thuhilhna man na zuih kawmin hih ka hong thugente, i sanggamte kiangah na gen nakleh Khrih Jesuh’ nasem a hoih khat na hi ding hi.
[11] Ka hong gensa thute na hilhsawn in.

[13] Kei ka hong pai matengin mipi mai-ah Lai Siangtho simna, a khiatna genna, le hanthotnate-ah tavuan na la in. [14] Kamsangte’ thugennate le upate in na tungah a khut uh nga-in thu hong ngetsakna ahi nangma hihtheih siamnate na valkhongsak kei in.
[16] Na gamtatna le na thuhilhnate-ah hoihtakin kidawmin om lecin nangmah a kipan na thugen a za mite a dingin phattuamna om ding ahih manin na nasepna-ah hoihtakin om in.
[17] Pawlpi sungah ukna le makaihna siamin, thuhilh le thugen hahkat tawh a thuah upate pen thaman a zah nih piak dingin kilawm hi.

[3] Topa Jesuh Khrih thu tawh a kituak lo, i biakna paizia tawh a kilehngatin thu tuamdang a hilh mite pen, [4] a kiphasak mawkmawk hi uh a, bangmah a thei het lo ahi uh hi. Tua bang mite in thu kisel thu kinial cihte ut belin nei uh a, hazatna, lungsim kituah lohna, kizahkona, a sia lamin ki-upmawhnate piangsak uh a, [5] thuman thutak zui loin, a lungsim paizia uh a man nawn lo, biakna pen hauhtheih nading lampi bekin a ngaihsun mite in a tawntungin kitot kiselna a piangsak uh ahi hi.
[11] Hih a thak Lungdamna Thu hilhin a taangko ding le sawltak na a sem dingin kei a hong kikoih ahi hi.
[2] Mi tampite’ theihin ka thuhilh, na zaksa thu khempeuh, midangte a hilhsawn thei dingin a citak mite tungah hoihtakin a zuih dingun na hilh in.

[14] Na mite thu kinialin a kitot loh nadingun Pasian’ mai-ah thupi takin na hilhkhol in. Tua bang thu kinialna in a za mite phattuamna ngahsak loin a siasak bek ahi hi. [15] Pasian’ thuman a mantakin hilhin, na nasepna-ah maizumna thuak loin, Pasian’ pahtakna na ngahtheih nadingin na siam tawpin hanciam in.

[14] Ahi zongin nang na hih leh na theihsa na upsa thute ah kip paisuak in. Nang tungah thu hong hilhte kua mi ahi hiam cih na theihsa hi a, [15] Khrih Jesuh upna hangin hotkhiatna a hong ngahsak thei ding pilna a hong pia Lai Siangtho pen na neutung a kipanin a theisa na hihna thu zong na theihsa thu mah ahi hi. [16] Pasian’ na a sem mite mi cingtaak hi-in, na hoih namkim a septheih nadingun Lai Siangtho pen Pasian’ lamlahna tawh a hong kipia hi a, thuman thutak hilh nading, a khialte taii nading, a man lote a manin puah nading, a manin nuntak theih nading thuhilh nadingin a manpha mahmah ahi hi. [17] Pasian’ na a sem mite mi cingtaak hi-in, na hoih namkim a septheih nadingun Lai Siangtho pen Pasian’ lamlahna tawh a hong kipia hi a, thuman thutak hilh nading, a khialte taii nading, a man lote a manin puah nading, a manin nuntak theih nading thuhilh nadingin a manpha mahmah ahi hi.

[1] Pasian’ mai, le a hingte hitaleh a site hitaleh mi khempeuh’ thu a khen ding Khrih Jesuh’ mai-ah nakpitakin ka hong hanthawn hi. Amah Kumpi-in hong paikikin ukna hong kipan ding ahih manin, [2] hunhoih hunsia cih khen tuan loin Pasian’ thu hilh ding na kin ngaihsut nading, lungduaina tawh mite’ lungsim zo-in, mite taii-in, hanthawnin na hilh nadingin thu a hong pia ka hi hi. [3] Mite in thuman a ngaih nop loh hun, amaute’ deihna bek a zuihnop hun, amaute’ zaknop thute bek a gen ding sia a cial thuahthuah hun hong tung ding hi. [4] Amaute in thuman thutak ngainuam nawn loin tangthu phuahtawm peuh ngaihsutpi-in nei ding uh hi. [5] Ahi zongin nang na hih leh thu khempeuhah na lungsim ki-ukin haksatnate na thuak inla, Pasian’ thugen nasep semin, na nasepna-ah maa na tun in.
[7] Pawlpi siate pen Pasian’ nasem ahih manin paubaanna a om lo, a kiphasak lo, zukham thei mi ahi lo, a ngongtat lo, a huaiham lo,

[9] Upna bulpi tawh a kituak thute limtakin lenkip ding uh hi. Tua hileh thuhilhna man tawh midangte hanthawn thei ding uh a, thuman a nial mite’ khialhna zong laktel thei ding uh hi. [10] Bang hang hiam cih leh thu a mang lo, thu a mawk gengen, mi a khem thei, a diakdiakin Jew ngeina bangin vun-at nading thu a gen tampi tak a om uh hi. [11] Sum ngahtheih nading bekin a kilawm lopi-in thu hilhin biakna innkuan buppi nawngkaisak uh ahih manin thu a gen nawn loh nadingun khaktan ding ahi hi.

[1] Ahi zongin nangmah in upna man tawh a kituak thu na hilh in. [2] Pasal khanghamte a kilawm a kituakin a omtheih nading, thu ngaihsun thei mi ahih nading, a kikemzo mite ahih theih nading, upna man a neihtheih nading, itna man a neihtheih nading uh le a manin lungkipin a thuakzawh nadingun na gen in. [3] Tua mah bangin mite in Pasian’ thu a gensiatkhak loh nadingun numei khanghamte zong a gamtat a khuahek uh a zahtakhuai ahih nading, mi gensiate ahih loh nading, zunek kiphamawhte ahih loh nading, thuhoih thupha hilhin, [4] amaute sangin a nauzaw nupite in a pasalte uh le a tate uh a it nadingun a hilh ding, [5] thu ngaihsun thei, a gamtat siangtho, inn nasep a kizen, a migi, le a pasalte uh thu a mang thei mi ahih nadingun na gen in. [6] Tua mah bangin khangnote zong amau pumpi a ki-ukzawh nadingun na hanthawn pha in. [7] Nangma pumpi mahmah gamtat hoihna a kipan thu khempeuhah etteh hoih dingin na om in. Lungsim takpi tawh mite’ zahtaktheih dingin thu na hilh inla, [8] mite’ mawhmat theih loh ding kamhoihte na zang in. Tua hileh i langte in hong gensiat theih nading mu loin a mai uh zum lel ding hi. [9] Silate in zong a tote uh thu mangin, thu khempeuhah a tote uh a lungkimsak nading, a tote uh thu seelloin, [10] a guktak loh nading, a tawntungin hoih gamtatin a cihtakna uh a kilatsak nadingun na hanthawn in. Tua hileh eite hong Hon Pasian’ thu a hoihna a kilangsakte ahi ding uh ahi hi. [11] Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh in hotkhiatna a ngahtheih nadingun Pasian in ama hehpihna hong lak khinzo hi. [12] Eite in i lamet, a lian Pasian le eite hong Hon Jesuh Khrih a vangliatna hong kilatkik ding hun ngakin i om laitakin i biakna tawh a kituak lo thute le leitung nate deihna phiatin, lungsim hi hithiatin omin, thutangin, hih leitungah Pasian’ deihna bangin i nuntak nadingin tua hehpihna thu in eite hong hilh hi.

[12] Tu-in note pen midang a hilh dingin sia na suahtheih ding uh hun hikhin napi-in note mahmah pen Pasian’ thu a bulpite hilh ding na kisam lai uh hi. Antak nethei nai loin nawi bek a nethei lai na hi uh hi.

[10] Ahi zongin tu-in Israel mite tawh ka bawl ding thuciamna hih bang ahi hi. Amaute sungah ka thukham ka guang ding a, amaute lungtang tungah gelhin, amaute’ Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute pen keima mi ahi ding uh hi. [11] A neupen pan a lianpen dongin mi khempeuh in hong thei ding uh ahih manin ‘Topa thei in,’ ci-in a ulenau le a mipihte kiangah kuamah in a hilh ding kisam nawn lo ding hi.

[9] Tua banah, i leitung pate in gim hong pia a, zong i zahtak lai hi. Tua ahihleh kha thu tawh kisai-ah i Pa’ thu mang phazaw-in i nuntak ding kisam hi. [10] I leitung pate in amau’ hoihsak bangin nuntak tomno sung ngaihsutna-in hong thuhilhin gim hong pia a, ahi zongin Pasian in amah tawh kibangin siangtho-in i omtheih nadingin eite hong khualna-in hong thuhilhin gim hong pia hi. [11] Thuhilhna tawh gim hong kipiak ciangin nuam kisa hetloin na kisa mahmah sam a, ahi zongin tua thuhilhna a mangzote in thuman nuntakna hangin nopsakna thaman a nung ngah uh hi.
[1] Sanggamte aw, mite tungah thu a hilh eite pen midangte sangin a khauhzaw-in thu hong kikhen ding ahih manin note tampi sia na suaknuam se kei un.

[15] Na lungsim sung uhah Khrih zahtakbawl unla, amah Topa-in nei un. Note’ lametna thu a hong dong a omkhak leh hoihtakin a genthei dingin kiging tawntung unla, ahi zongin lungnemna le zahtakna lim tawh gen un.

[18] Khrih mahmah zong note a dingin si a, Pasian’ kiangah hong tunpih theih nadingin mihoih khat pen mihoih lote’ mawhna hangin khatvei a si hi. Mite in ama leitung pumpi that a, ahi zongin Pasian in kha nuntakna a pia hi. [19] Tua kha nuntakna tawh va pai-in thongkia-in a om khate kiangah thu a va hilh hi.

[10] Pasian’ piak na a zatsiamte bangin Pasian’ kiang panin na ngah uh nate, midangte’ phattuam nadingin na zang un. [11] Minthanna le vangliatna a nei tawntung Pasian in Jesuh Khrih hangin thu khempeuhah phatna a ngah theih nadingin thuhilhte in Pasian’ thu na hilh unla, na a semte in Pasian’ piak thahatna tawh na sem un. Amen.

[2] Pasian in note’ khut sungah a hong piak tuuhonte hoihtakin na cing unla, ut lo pipi hi loin, Pasian’ hong deih bangin utna lungsim takpi tawh na cing un. Sum ngahnopna bek tawh a sem hi loin utna lungsim tawh a semte na hi un. [3] Note’ kep dingin a hong kipia tuute, aana neihna tawh a cing hi loin tuute’ etteh dingin a gamtate na hi un.

[1] Mite lakah kamsang man lo a omngei mah bangin note lakah sia man lo hong om ding hi. Siatna a piangsak thei thuhilhna a man lo hong lutpih simin, amaute mahmah a tankhia Topa nangawn nial ding uh hi. Tua ahih manin thakhat thu-in siatna thuaklawh ding uh hi. [2] Tua bang hinapi-in mi tampi tak in amau’ gamtat hoih lohna zui ding uh a, tua bangin amau gamtatna hangin mite in thuman lampi gensia ding uh hi. [3] Hih sia man lote in a huaiham manun note kiang panin sum a ngahtheih nadingun phuahtawm thu hong gen ding uh hi. Ahi zongin sawtpek a kipanin amaute’ thu a Khen ding pa a kigingsa-in om niloh a, amaute a Susia ding pa in en gige hi. [4] Bang hang hiam cih leh vantung mite nangawn in khialhna a neih ciangin Pasian in khahkhong loin hell khuk sungah khia a, Thukhen Ni hun dong ngakin khuamial sungah kol bulhsa-in a omsak hi.

[16] Lai a hong gelhna sungah a thugente tu-ate mah a gennuam ahi hi. A laigelhna sungah a telhak thu tampi om a, theihna kicing loin lungsim kip lo mi pawlkhatte in Lai Siangtho sung thu a ututun a kawihei uh bangin Paul’ thugente zong a man lopi-in khia uh ahih manin siatna a tuaklawh uh hi.

[27] Khrih in note tungah ama Kha Siangtho hong piakhin a, tua Kha Siangtho na neih laiteng uh kuamah in note hong hilh ding kisam nawn lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Kha Siangtho in note tungah thu khempeuh hong hilh a, tua a hong hilh thute a man vive hi a, zuauthu khat zong om lo hi. Tua ahih manin Kha Siangtho’ hilhnate zui unla, Khrih sungah kiptakin om un.
[14] Pa Pasian in leitung mite a honkhia dingin a Tapa a hong paisakna thu kote in thei-in midang kiangah genbelin ka nei uh hi.

[14] Ahi zongin note ka hong mawhsak nading thu tawmkhat a om hi. Milim biakna ante nesakin, nulepa paktatna piangsak a, Israel mite mawhna a gamtasak Balak tungah thu a hilh Balaam’ thuhilhnate a um mi pawlkhat note lakah a om hi.

[28] “Kum thum simin tua kum-a note’ anpiang sawm-ah-khat khempeuh hong paikhiatpihin na khuasung uhah na khol ding uh hi. [29] TOPA na Pasian un na sepnate khempeuh uhah thupha hong piak theih nadingin, note tawh kibangin amaute in tanh ahi a, luah ahi zongin nei lo uh ahih manin note’ khua sunga om Levi mite, peemtate, pa nei lote, leh meigong numeite hong pai-in tua ante ne-in a gilvah ding uh hi.

[10] Tua ahih ciangin Samuel in ama tung panin kumpi khat a ngen mite kiangah TOPA’ thugen khempeuh a gen hi. [11] Amah in, “Note hong uk ding kumpipa’ hih zia dingte in: Amah in na tapate uh la-in a leengte-ah na semin a sakol nasem ding, le a leengte mai-ah a tai dingin seh ding hi. [12] Tua ciangin amah in ama a dingin a tul-a uk le a sawmnga a ukte, le pawlkhatte a lo kho-in a an a la ding, le a galsung nazatte le a leeng nate a bawl dingin seh ding hi. [13] Amah in na tanute uh paknamtui bawl ding, anhuan ding, le an em dingin la ding hi. [14] Amah in na lote uh, na leenggui lote uh, le na oliv lote uh sung panin a limcipen teng la-in ama nasemte tungah pia ding hi. [15] Amah in na an le na leenggahte uh sawm-ah-khat la-in ama uliante le ama nasemte tungah pia ding hi. [16] Amah in na nasem numeite uh, na nasem pasalte uh, na bawngte, uh le na late uh a gina pen teng la-in ama na a sem dingin koih ding hi.

[25] Israel mite khatlekhat kiho-in, “Hih hong paikhia mipa na mu ngei uh hiam? Israel-te a to dingin hong paito takpi hi. Amah a that mipa tungah kumpipa in sum tampi pia-in, ama tanu zong pia ding a, a pa’ innkuante, Israel sungah aana nasep le siah khempeuh kipengsak ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

[6] Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in amau’ ukpi Jehoiada samin ama kiangah, “ TOPA’ nasem Moses in TOPA’ ompihna puanbuk-a dingin Israel mihonte tung panin a khon mangmu bang hangin Judah le Jerusalem panin Levi mite khawmsak lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

[3] Pawlkhatte in kial tun huhau-in an lei nadingin a lote, a leenggah lote, le a innte uh a piakna hong gen uh hi. [4] Pawlkhatte in kumpipa tungah siah piak dingin a lote uh le a leenggui lote uh khamin a piakna uh hong gen uh hi.
[1] Kumpipa Ahasueras in a ukna gam leitung le tuikulh tunga tengte tung panin siah kai hi.

[11] Note in mizawngte tuancilin, a an neihteng khempeuh uh laksak na hih manun, suangseek inn na lam hangun tua suang inn sungah na tengkha kei ding uh a, leenggui lo hoih na neih hangun a leenggahzu na dawnkha kei ding uh hi.
[46] Tua ahih manin no hong itte bek na it uhleh Pasian in bang thaman hong pia zenzen ding ahi hiam? Siahdongte nangawn in amau a itte it thei uh hi.

[9] Tua lai mun panin Jesuh a paikhiat ciangin siahdongpa Matthai a zumah tu-in a om mu a, “Hong zui in,” a cih leh amah zong dingin a zuipah hi. [10] Jesuh in Matthai’ inn-ah nitak an a nek laitakin siahdong dangte le thukham a khial midang tampite in zong Jesuh le a nungzuite tawh an a nekhawm uh hi. [11] Farisi mite in hih thu a muh uh ciangin Jesuh nungzuite kiangah, “Bang hangin na siapa un siahdongte le thukham khialte tawh an nekhawm ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. [12] Jesuh in hih thu a zak ciangin, “Cidamte in siavuan kisam lo uh a, cina mite bek in kisam uh hi.

[19] Mihing Tapa hong pai leuleu a, zune anne-in a om ciangin, ‘Zuhai anhai pa; siahdongte le midangte in a kikholhpih nop loh mite tawh a kikhawlpa,’ ci leuleu uh hi. Ahi zongin Pasian’ pilna a man taktakna thu a gah panin hong kilang hi,” a ci hi.

[24] Kapernaum khua-ah a tun uh ciangin biakinn siahdongte in Peter kiangah, “Na siapa in biakinn siah hamu a piak ngei mah ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot uh ciangin, [25] “A piak ngei mah ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Innsungah Peter a lut ciangin Jesuh in na paupih masa zaw a, “Simon aw, nang na bangci ngaihsut hiam? Leitung kumpite in kuate tung panin siah kai ahi uh hiam? Amau tate tung panin siah kai ahi uh hiam, tua ahih kei leh midangte tung panin kai ahi uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin [26] Peter in, “Midangte tung panin siah a kai uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Tua ahihleh siah piak ding panin a tate a peng ahi hi. [27] Ahi zongin amau’ nasepna a nawngkaisak i suahkhak loh nadingin tuili-ah nga siahna sikkawi va khia inla, a awk masa penpen hong kaikhia in. Tua a ngasa kam sung en lecin dangka tang peek khat na om ding hi. Tua sum la inla, ei tegel a dingin biakinn siah va pia in,” a ci hi.
[17] Amah in tua mite’ thu a mannop kei leh pawlpite tungah a thu ko un. Pawlpite’ thu nangawn a mannop kei leh Gentail mite le siahdongte bangin na ngaihsun un.

[28] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Note in bangci ngaihsut na hi uh hiam? Mi khat in tapa nih nei hi. A ta uzaw kiangah, ‘Ka ta aw, tuni-in leenggah lo-ah va kuan in,’ ci-in a sawl ciangin [29] amah in, ‘Kuan nuam kei ing,’ ci napi-in a lungsim kikheelin a kuankik hi. [30] Tua ciangin a ta nauzaw kiangah tua mah bangin va ci a, ‘Pa aw, va kuan mah ning,’ ci napi-in a kuan kei hi. [31] Hih tapa nihte sung panin a koi bel pen a pa’ deih bangin gamta ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “A ta uzaw a ta hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Note kiangah a mantak a kong genin-ah: Pasian’ ukna sungah note sangin siahdongte le numei paktatte lut masazaw ding hi. [32] Bang hang hiam cih leh note kiangah Tuiphumpa Johan hong pai-in thuman lampi hong lak napi-in na um kei uh a, ahi zongin siahdongte le numei paktatte in a um uh hi. Hih thu na theih khit uh ciang nangawnin na lungsim uh na kheel nuam tuan kei uh a, na um kei veve uh hi.

[17] Tua ahih ciangin Rom kumpipa Sisar tungah siah i piak ding kilawm hiam, na ngaihsutna nong gen nadingin ka deih uh hi,” a ci uh hi. [18] Ahi zongin Jesuh in amau’ gitloh geelna thei ahih manin, “Mihoih a kineihkhem mite aw, bang hangin kei hong thangsiah se na hi uh hiam? [19] Siahin na piak ding uh sum hong lak dih un,” a cih ciangin sumtang peek khat hong paipih uh hi. [20] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Hih sum tungah kua lim le kua min om ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin [21] amaute in, “Sisar’ lim le a min kigelh hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Sisar’ nate Sisar’ tungah na pia unla, Pasian’ nate Pasian’ tungah na pia un,” a ci hi.

[13] Tua ciangin Galilee Tuili gei-ah Jesuh a paikik hi. Ama kiangah mihonpi hong pai uh a, Jesuh in tua mihonte thu a hilh hi. [14] Tua bangin a paina-ah Alfeas tapa Levi, a siahdonna zumah tu-in a om a mu hi. Jesuh in ama kiangah, “Kei hong zui in,” a ci hi. Levi zong dingin Jesuh’ nung a zuipah hi. [15] Tua nung ciangin Jesuh in Levi’ inn-ah an a va ne hi. Siahdong mi tampi le thukham a khial mi tampite in Jesuh zui uh a, amaute tampi in Jesuh le a nungzuite tawh an a nekhawm uh hi. [16] Hih thukham khialte le siahdongte tawh Jesuh in an a nekkhopna Farisi mite sung panin Thukham hilh siate pawlkhat in a muh uh ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “Bang hangin hih bang mite tawh an nekhawm ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. [17] Jesuh in hih thu a zak ciangin amaute kiangah, “Cidamte in siavuan kisam lo uh a, cina mite bek in kisam uh hi. Mite in a zahtak mihoihte a kisik nadingun a sam dingin a hong pai ka hi kei a, mite in a pampaih mite a kisik nadingun a sam dingin a hong pai ka hi hi,” a ci hi.

[16] Amaute in zong dangka peek khat hong paipih uh a, tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Hih dangka tunga om kua’ lim hi a, kua’ min ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Rom Kumpipa Sisar’ lim le a min ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. [17] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Tua ahihleh, Sisar’ neihsate Sisar’ tungah pia unla, Pasian’ neihsate Pasian’ tungah pia un,” a ci hi. Tua ama thudawnna hangin lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.

[11] Johan in, “Puanak nih a nei mipa in a nei lote hawm unla, annek ding a neite in a nei lote hawm un,” ci-in a dawng hi. [12] Siahdongte pawlkhat zong tui a kiphum dingin hong pai-in Johan kiangah, “Sia aw, bangci gamtat ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. [13] Amah in, “Na don’ dingun a kilawm zahval na dong kei un,” ci-in a dawng hi. [14] Galkap pawlkhatte in zong ama kiangah, “Kote, bangci gamtat ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dot uh ciangin, “Zawhthawh thu tawh ahi a, a man lopi-in mawhsakna tawh ahi zongin kuama sum sut kei unla, na khasum ngahzah uh tawh lungkim un,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[27] Tua khit ciangin Jesuh paikhia a, siahdongpa Levi, a zumah a tu a mu hi. Jesuh in, “Kei hong zui in,” a ci hi. [28] Levi zong dingpah a, a na khempeuh nusia-in Jesuh a zui hi. [29] Tua ciangin Levi in ama inn-ah Jesuh vakna annek pawipi bawl a, annekna sabuai-ah siahdong dang tampite le midangte zong tawh a tukhawm uh hi. [30] Farisi mite le amau sung panin Thukham hilh siate, nungzuite tungah phun uh a, “Bang hangin siahdongte le thukham khial mite tawh an nekhawm na hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi. [31] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Cidamte in siavuan kisam lo uh a, cina mite bek in kisam uh hi.
[29] Siahdongte le midangte khempeuh in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Pasian’ deihna zui-in Johan’ khut sungah tui a kiphum uh hi.
[34] Mihing Tapa hong pai leuleu a, zune anne-in a om ciangin, ‘Zuhai, anhai pa, siahdongte le midangte in a kikholhpih nop loh mite tawh a kikhawlpa,’ ci leuleu uh hi.
[17] Bang hang hiam cih leh, thusimin a kikoih peuhmah, khatvei teitei thulang a suak lo ding, a kiselcip peuhmah, khatvei teitei a kipholak lo ding, bangmah om lo hi.

[1] Khatvei, Jesuh’ thugen a ngai dingin siahdongte le mawhneite tampi tak a hong pai uh hi. [2] Farisi mite le Thukham hilh siate phun uh a, “Hih mipa, mawhneite tawh kikhawlin an nangawn nekhawm hi,” a ci uh hi. [3] Tua ahih manin Jesuh in amaute kiangah thugentehna khat gen a, [4] “Note sung panin khatpeuh in tuu zakhat nei-in, tua sung panin khat mansuah leh bangcih ding ahi hiam? Lopa ne-in a gamta tuu sawmkua le kuate nusia-in, a muh matengin tua a mang tuu khat a zong dingin kuankhia ding hi.

[11] Farisi mipa dingin thu ngen a, ‘Pasian aw, kei pen midangte bangin a huaiham, a thuman lo, numei tungah a mawh mi ka hi kei hi; hua lai-a siahdongpa bang hi lo ka hih manin nangma tungah ka nuamna kong pulak hi. [12] Nipikal khatin ni nih sung an ka tang a, ka ngah khempeuh sung panin sawm-ah-khat nang tungah kong pia hi,’ a ci hi. [13] Ahi zongin siahdongpa pen a gamla simah ding a, vantung lamah zong dak ngam loin a dip humin kuncip a, ‘Pasian aw, kei mimawh mi khial pa hong hehpih in,’ ci-in a ngen hi. [14] Ke’n kong cihin-ah, hih mipa pen Pasian tawh a kilemsa-in a inn-ah ciah a, a khat pa pen tua bangin ciah lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a kiliansakte pen kiniamkhiatsuk ding a, a kiniamkhiatte pen a lianin kibawl ding hi,” a ci hi.

[1] Jerikho khua-ah Jesuh lut a, a paisuak dingin khuasung a nawk laitakin, [2] Zakkhias a kici siahdong ukpa khat na om a, amah mihau khat ahi hi. [3] Amah in Jesuh kua hiam cih a muh nadingin hanciam hi; ahi zongin amah mi tuntom khat ahih manin mihon lakah a mu zo kei hi. [4] Tua ahih manin amah na matai a, Jesuh a muhtheih nadingin a tot nading lampi gei-a theithek kung tungah a na kah hi. [5] Jesuh, tua mun a tun ciangin khuadak to-in ama kiangah, “Zakkhias aw, manlangin hong kumsuk in. Na inn-ah tuzan kong taam ding hi,” a ci hi.

[22] Rom Kumpipa Sisar’ tungah siah i piak ding a kilawm mah ahi hiam, kilawm lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. [23] Ahi zongin Jesuh in amau’ ngianbawlna thei ahih manin, [24] “Sum peek khat hong lak dih un. Hih sum tunga om lim le min kua-a’ ahi hiam?” a cih ciangin, “Kumpipa’ lim le min hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. [25] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Tua ahihleh, Kumpipa a’ teng Kumpipa tungah na pia unla, Pasian a’ teng Pasian’ tungah na pia un,” a ci hi. [26] Ama kampauna tawh mihon lak panin a mat nadingun thu om thei lo ahih manin ama thudawnna hangin lamdangsa-in a om khikhe uh hi.
