[9] Siampite’ hih ngeizel bangin biakna tau tungah, paknamtui kua in hal ding, ci-in ai a kisan ciangin Zekhariah in a ngah hi. Tua ahih manin Topa’ biakinn sungah amah lut a, [10] amah in paknamtui halin a om laitakin mihonpi dangte a pualamah thungenin na om uh hi. [11] Tua laitakin Topa’ vantungmi khat ama kiangah hong kilang a, paknamtui a kihalna biakna tau taklam pangah a ding hi. [12] Zekhariah in vantungmi a muh ciangin lamdangsa mahmah a, a lau mahmah hi. [13] Ahi zongin vantungmi in ama kiangah, “Zekhariah aw, lau kei in. Pasian in na thungetna hong zakhin a, na zi Elizabeth in tapa khat a nei ding hi. A min dingin Johan na phuak ding hi.

[14] Tua ciangin Jesuh in ama kiangah, “Hih thu kuamah dang kiangah gen kei in. Siampipa kiangah paisuakpah inla kivelsak in. Tua ciangin na damna thu a kilat nadingin Moses thupiak mah bangin biakna pia in,” ci-in thu a pia hi.

[2] Siampi liante le Thukham hilh siate in mihonpite kihta uh ahih manin kuama theih lohin Jesuh a kithah theih nading lampi a zong uh hi. [3] Tua ciangin sawm le nihte sung panin Iskariot tapa Judas sungah Satan hong lut hi. [4] Tua ahih manin Judas va paikhia a, siampi liante le biakinncing palikmangte tawh va kiho uh a, amaute’ khut sungah Jesuh a piaktheihna dingzia a kikum uh hi. [5] Amaute na nuam mahmah uh a, sum tawh guaih dingin thuciam a na pia uh hi. [6] Judas zong thukim a, mihonte’ theih lohin amaute’ khut sungah Jesuh a piaktheih nading lampi zon ding a kipan pah hi.

[66] Khua a vak ciangin upate, siampi liante, le Thukham hilh siate hong kikhawm uh a, uliante mai-ah Jesuh hong kipaipih hi. [67] Amaute in, “Khrih na hi hiam, hong gen in,” ci-in a dot uh ciangin Jesuh in, “Kong gen hangin nong um kei ding uh a, [68] thu kong dot hangin zong nong dawng kei ding uh hi. [69] Ahi zongin tu a kipanin a Vanglian Pasian’ taklamah Mihing Tapa tu ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[15] Simon Peter le a nungzui dang khat in zong Jesuh a zui uh hi. Hih a nungzui dang khat pa le siampi lianpen pa kithei uh ahih manin siampi lianpen pa’ inntual dongah Jesuh tawh a lutkhawm hi. [16] Ahi zongin Peter ahihleh kong pualamah a khawl hi. Tua ahih manin siampi lianpen pa tawh a kithei nungzui dang khat pa zong va pai kikin kongcing numei a hopih khit ciangin Peter zong a tumpih hi. [17] Kongcing numei in Peter kiangah, “Hih mipa’ nungzuite khat hi lo na hi hiam?” a cih leh, “Ka hi kei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. [18] Khua dam mahmah ahih manin nasemte le palikte in meihol cih a, tua mei awi-in a kiimah ding uh ahih manin Peter zong va pai-in mei awi-in amaute tawh a dingkhawm hi. [19] Siampi lianpen pa Annas in Jesuh kiangah ama nungzuite thu le a thuhilhna tawh kisai thu a dong hi.

[15] amaute in, “That in, that in, singlamteh tungah that in,” ci-in a kiko uh hi. Pilat in, “Na Kumpipa uh that mawk ding ka hi hiam?” a cih ciangin siampi liante in, “Rom gam khempeuh a uk Kumpipa simloh kumpi dang ka nei kei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. [16] Tua ahih ciangin singlamteh tungah thah dingin amaute’ khut sungah Jesuh a pia ta hi.
[26] Eite khempeuh i gitlohna panin kikheelin thupha a hong piaktheih nadingin Pasian in a Nasem dingin Jesuh teelin, eite kiangah a hong sawl masa ahi hi,” ci-in thu a gen hi.

[21] Ama gen mah bangin sawltakte zong zingsang ciangin biakinn-ah pai-in thuhilh ding a kipan uh hi. Siampi lianpen pa le ama kikholhpihte in ulian kikhopna a cingtaak khat a omtheih nadingin Jew mi upa khempeuh a kikhop nadingun a sam uh hi. Tua khit ciangin thong panin sawltakte va kai-in uliante mai-ah a hong paipih nadingun palikte a sawl uh hi. [22] Ahi zongin thongah palikte a va tun uh ciangin sawltakte na om lo hi. Tua ahih manin uliante kiangah kileh kikin, [23] “Thongah ka tun uh ciangin a kongkhakte limtak mahin tawh kikalh a, thongcingte in zong kongpi-ah limtak mahin a na cing ka mu uh hi. Ahi zongin thong kong ka hon uh ciangin a sungah kuamah na om lo hi,” ci-in a zasak uh hi. [24] Biakinn ukpa le siampi liante in hih thu a zak uh ciangin hih sawltakte a bangci thu hi ding hiam, ci-in lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi. [25] Tua laitakin mi khat hong pai-in amaute kiangah, “Thong sungah na khum uh mite in tu mahmahin biakinn sungah thuhilhin om uh hi,” ci-in a hong gen hi. [26] Tua ciangin biakinn ukpa le a mite va pai-in sawltakte hong paipih kik uh hi. Mihonte in suang tawh amaute a dengawp khak ding lau uh ahih manin sawltakte ngongbawl loin thudam tawh a paipih uh hi. [27] Tua ciangin uliante mai-ah sawltakte dingsak uh a, siampi lianpen pa in sawltakte kiangah thu genin, [28] “Hih mipa’ min tawh thu na hilh nawn loh nadingun khauhtakin thu kong pia uh hi. Tu-in na gamtatnasate uh thei un. Jerusalem khuasung khempeuhah thu na genthang uh a, ama sihna pen kote nong ngawh nuam uh hi,” a ci hi.
[7] Tua bangin Pasian’ thu kizelin hong khang semsem hi. Jerusalem khua sungah thu um mi tampi tak hong kibehlap a, siampi tampi tak in zong Lungdamna Thu a hong um uh hi.

[5] Hih ka thugente a man ahihna thu, siampi lianpen pa le upa khempeuh in hong genthei ding uh hi. Damaskas khua-a om i Jew mipihte ka lah dingin amaute in lai hong pia uh ahih manin, upate in gim a piaktheih nadingun tua khua-a om thu um mite manin sikkhau khihin Jerusalem khua-ah a ciahpih dingin ka va pai hi.

[30] Jew mite in bang hangin Paul mawhsak ahi uh hiam, ci-in teltakin galkap mangpa in theinuam ahih manin a zing ciangin Paul a khihsakna sikkhaute sutsak a, siampi liante le upate thu kikupna a nei dingin a samsak hi. Tua ciangin Paul paikhiatpihin uliante mai-ah a dingsak hi.
[5] Paul in, “Lawmte aw, siampi lianpen pa ahihlam ka thei kei hi. Lai Siangtho in, ‘Na mite uh a ukpa na gensia kei ding uh hi,’ ci hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[17] Tua ahih manin mihingte’ mawhna a kimaisak theih nadingin Pasian’ na a sepna-ah mite a dingin hehpihna le cihtakna tawh Siampi Lianpen a suahtheih nadingin a sanggamte tawh a kibangin mihing lim a hong puak ding a kisam ahi hi.

[1] Tua ahih manin Pasian’ sapna a ngah mi siangthote aw, eite’ upna thu tawh kisai-ah Siampi Lianpen a sem dingin Pasian’ sawltak Jesuh’ thu ngaihsun dih un. [2] Pasian’ inn sungah na a sepna-ah Moses a cihtak mah bangin hih siampi nasep a sem dingin a seh Pasian’ tungah Jesuh a citak hi.

[14] Tua ahih manin eite in Pasian’ omna vantung a va tung khinsa, Siampi Lianpen ahi Pasian’ Tapa Jesuh neikhin ihih manin i sansa upna thu kiptakin len ni. [15] Eite’ neih Siampi Lianpen pa in i ginat lohna-ah eite a hong hehpih thei lo ding hi lo hi; eite mah bangin ze-etna khempeuh a thuak hi a, ahi zongin mawhna a bawl lo ahi hi.

[1] Siampi lianpen ahi peuhpeuh mipa pen a mite’ mawhna hangin Pasian’ tungah biakna le letsong a piaksak dingin ama mipihte lak panin kiteelin nasep a kiguan’ ahi hi. [2] Amah zong lam tampi-ah a ginalo thei mi mah ahih manin thu thei lo mite le a khial mite tungah lungnem takin na sem thei hi. [3] Amah zong miginalo mi mah ahih manin mite’ mawhna hangin biakna a pia hi bek loin ama mawhna mahmah hangin zong biakna a pia ahi hi. [4] Tua bangin pahtawina a nei siampi lianpen nasep pen a sem dingte amau utthu tawh a kisehtawm mawk hi lo hi; siampi lianpen a sem dingin amahmah a kisehtawm hi lo a, Aaron a kisap mah bangin Pasian in amah a seh ahi hi. [5] Tua mah bangin Khrih zong, amahmah in siampi lianpen nasep a semtawm mawk hi loin Pasian in ama kiangah, “Nang, ka Tapa na hi hi. Tuni-in na Pa ka suak hi,” na ci hi. [6] Mun dang khatah zong, “Melkhizedek siampi gui zui-in a tawntungin siampi na hi ding hi,” na ci lai hi. [7] Leitungah mihingin Jesuh a omlai-in sihna panin amah a honkhia thei ding Pasian tungah thu ngenin khitui naptui tawh thumin na kiko hi. [8] Amah, Pasian’ Tapa hinapi-in a thuakna tawh thumang ahih theih nading a na kisin hi. [9] Tua bangin a cingtaak mi a suahkhit ciangin ama thu a mang mite khempeuh a dingin tawntung hotkhiatna a kipatna hong suak a, [10] Melkhizedek gui zui-in siampi lianpen dingin Pasian in a bawl hi.
[20] Tua lai munah eite’ tangin Jesuh na ma tun khinta a, siampi Melkhizedek gui zui-in a om tawntung ding siampi lianpen a suak hi.

[1] Abraham in a galsimna ah kumpite thatin gualzo-in a hong ciah ciangin A Lianpen Pasian’ siampi ahih banah Jerusalem khua kumpi zong ahi Melkhizedek in Abraham na dawnin thupha a pia hi. [2] Abraham in a na ngah khempeuh sung panin Melkhizedek tungah sawm-ah-khat a pia hi. Melkhizedek min a khiatna in, “Thuman Kumpi,” a cihna hi phot a, tua banah Jerusalem khua kumpi zong hi lai ahih manin ama min pen, “Kilemna Kumpi,” cihna zong ahi hi. [3] Melkhizedek’ pa le a nu a kipanin a suahna thu, a sihna thu, le a khang tangthu peuhmah a kiciamtehna om lo ahih manin Pasian’ Tapa tawh a kibang hi a, siampi mah hi tawntung paisuak hi. [4] Tua ahih manin bangzah takin milian ahihna thu na thei uh hi. I pupi Abraham nangawn in zong gal sungah a ngah nate sung panin ama tungah sawm-ah-khat na pia hi. [5] Levi suanlekhak sung panin siampi a sem mite pen Abraham’ suanlekhak mah hinapi-in, amau mipih Israel-te tung panin sawm-ah-khat a lak nadingun Thukham a na kibawl hi.

[11] Israel mite in Levi’ suanlekhak siampite tungtawnin Thukham ngah uh hi. Levi’ suanlekhak siampite’ nasepna kicingtaak hileh Melkhizedek siampi nam zui-in siampi namdang a pian ding kisam nawn lo ding a, Aaron gui zui-in siampi omsa a kimangpah ding ahi hi. [12] Siampi nam kikheel ahih manin a thukham zong a kikheel ding kisam hi. [13] Hih bang thute a kigenna i Topa pen a namtuam khat hi a, ama phung sung panin biakna tau-ah siampi na a sem khat beek om lo hi. [14] I Topa pen Judah suan sung panin a piang ahih manin Moses in siampi thu a na gen ciangin hih Judah minam genin na nei lo hi. [15] Melkhizedek tawh a kibang siampi namtuam khat hong pian’ ciangin hih thu hong kitelpha semsem hi. [16] Amah pen mihingte’ bawl ngeina zui-in siampi a suak hi lo a, a si thei lo nuntak tawntungna vang tawh siampi a suak ahi hi. [17] Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho in, “Melkhizedek nam bangin tawntung siampi na hi hi,” na ci hi.

[20] Tua banah Pasian’ kiciamna zong hong omlai hi. Midangte siampi-in a kibawl laitakin tua bang kiciamna na om lo hi. [21] Ahi zongin Pasian in Jesuh kiangah, “Topa in a lungsim a kheel loh nading limtakin kiciam khin a, ‘Nang, tawntung siampi na hi hi,’” na ci ahih manin kiciamna tawh Jesuh siampi a na suak ahi hi. [22] Hih bangin a kilamdang diakin a kibawlna in Jesuh pen kiciamna hoihzaw ahihna thu hong kilangsak hi. [23] A kilamdanna a dang khat in: Siampi dangte pen sithei-in a nasep zom paisuak thei lo ahih manin a mi malin tampi pha uh hi. [24] Ahi zongin Jesuh nungta tawntung ahih manin midang tungah a nasep ki-ap nawn loin amahmah in siampi nasep sem paisuak hi. [25] Tua hi a, mite a dingin a thumsak thei dingin amah nungta tawntung ahih manin ama tungtawnin Pasian kiang a zuante khempeuh, tu a kipanin a tawntungin a honkhia thei ahi hi. [26] Tua bangin a siangtho, paubaanna a nei lo, vantungah a lian penin a kikoih Siampi Lianpen Jesuh i neih a hoih mahmah ahi hi. [27] Siampi lianpen dangte in nisimin amau’ mawhna hangin biakna pia masa-in, tua ciangin midangte’ mawhna hangin a piak niloh bang hi loin, amah khatvei bek a kipiakna tawh a tawntung adingin a kimang paisuak ahi hi. [28] Moses Thukham in siampi lianpen a sem dingin cingtaakna a nei thei lo mihing mah na seh a, ahi zongin tua Thukham nungah a hong piang Pasian’ thuciamna in a tawntungin a cingtaakin a kibawl Tapa, Siampi Lianpen dingin kiciamna tawh a na seh hi.

[1] Tu-in i gennop thu pen hih bang ahi hi: Vantungah Pasian’ tokhom taklamah a tu tua bang Siampi Lianpen khat a nei ihi hi. [2] Amah in, mite’ bawl ahi lo, Topa mahmah in a bawl a taktak puanbuk ahi a Siangtho Pen mun sungah siampi lianpen nasep a sem ahi hi. [3] Pasian tungah letsong a tuamtuamte a pia ding le ganhing tawh biakna a pia dingin siampi lianpen a sem peuhpeuhte a kiseh ahih mah bangin eite’ Siampi Lianpen pa in zong bangkhat teitei a piak ding kisam hi. [4] Jew Thukham tawh kizui-in Pasian tungah letsongte a pia ding siampite om khinta ahih manin leitungah Jesuh a omlai hileh siampi hithei het lo ding hi. [5] Leitung a siampite’ sepsepte pen vantungah a om thu, a limin a sem uh ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Moses in Puanbuk lam ding a kipat ciangin Pasian in, “Mual tungah i om lai-in a lim ding khempeuh kong lah bang teekteekin a kihih nadingin na thei in,” na ci hi. [6] Tua ahih manin Pasian le mite kikalah Jesuh in a bawl thuciamna pen na a hoihzaw piak nading thuciamna ahih mah bangin Jesuh tungah a kipia siampi nasep pen siampi dang khempeuhte’ sep sangin a lianzaw ahi hi.
[6] Hih bang tengin a kibawl khit ciangin a dei puanung sungah nisim a nasep uh a sem dingin siampite a lut hi.

[25] Kum simin Siangtho Pen Munah Jew Siampi Lianpente amau’ sisan ahi lo, ganhing sisan tawh a pai zelzel bangun amah va pai themthum lo hi. [26] Tua bangin va pai zelzel hileh leitung piancil a kipanin a va thuak zelzel ding ahi hi. Ahi zongin amah biakna-in a va kipiakna hangin a kimang paisuak a suahtheih nadingin mawh maisak nadingin hun bei kuan ciangin amah khatvei a va kipia hi.

[9] Ahi zongin note pen Pasian in a hong teelkhiat minam, Kumpi siampi pawl, a siangtho minam, Pasian’ mite na hi uh a, khuamial sung panin a lamdang mahmah ama khuavak sungah a hong samkhia pa’ nasepna a lamdangte a genkhia dingin Pasian in a hong teel mite na hi uh hi.
[6] ama Pa Pasian’ na a sem dingin siampi le kumpi za-ah a hong koih hi. Tua Jesuh in minthanna le vangliatna nei tawntung tahen. Amen.
[10] Pasian’ na a sem dingin siampi za le kumpi za na pia a, amaute in leitung ukin a om ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

[6] Hih thawhkikna masa sungah a kihel mite pen Pasian’ mi siangtho hi a, a hampha mahmah ahi uh hi. Nihvei sihna in tua bang mite bangmah cihzo nawn lo ding a, amaute pen Pasian le Khrih’ siampite hi ding uh a, amah tawh kum tulkhat sung ukna aana nei ding uh hi.

[18] Tua ciangin Jerusalem kumpipa Melkhizedek in an le leenggahzu hong pusuah hi. Amah pen Sang Pen Pasian’ siampi zong ahi hi. [19] Amah in thupha pia a, “Vantung le leitung a bawl, Sang Pen Pasian in Abram thupha pia hen! [20] Na galte na khut sungah a hong pia Sang Pen Pasian in thupha ngah hen,” a ci hi. Abram in na khempeuh sawm-ah-khat ama tungah a pia hi.

[31] “A dum, a dupsan, a ausan, a kopin a kikhuk khau hoih kigan tawh dalna puan khat na bawl ding a, hoihtakin a kibawl kherub-te tawh kizem ding hi. [32] Ngun tawh kibawl bullen lite tungah a om, kham kibawl vankhaina nei-in, kham tawh a kizut singkha khuampi lite tungah na khai ding hi. [33] A kilhnate-ah dalna puan khai sukin, dalna puan sung tua lai munah thuciamna singkuang na koih ding a, dalna puan in siangtho pen mun panin siangtho mun khen ding hi.
[6] Nangmah tawh ka kituah nading mun, thuciamna tunga a om hehpihna tokhom mai, thuciamna singkuang kiangah a om dalna puan mai-ah biakna tau na koih ding hi.

[35] Amaute in a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute le a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoih tawh dalna puan a bawl uh hi. Hoihtakin a kibawl kherub-te tawh amaute in tua dalna puan a zem uh hi. [36] Tua puan a dingin amaute in singkha khuampi li bawl uh a, kham tawh tua khuampite a zut uh hi. A vankhainate pen kham hi a, tua khuamte a dingin ngun bullen li a sung uh hi.
[3] Tua buk sungah thuciamna singkuang na koih ding a, dalna puan tawh singkuang na dal ding hi.
[21] Biakbuk sungah singkuang paipihin, kongpuankhai dalna puan khai a, thuciamna singkuang a dal hi.

[2] TOPA in Moses kiangah, “Thuciamna singkuang tunga om hehpihna tokhom mai, dalna puan sunglam a siangtho munah a hunlopi-in hong pai nawn loh nadingin na sanggampa Aaron kiangah gen in. A hunlopi-in hong pai leh amah si ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua mun pen hehpihna tokhom tunga meii sungah kei ka kilatna mun ahi hi.

[16] Amah in tua bangin Israel mite’ nitna hang, amau’ thu palsatna hang, le amau’ khialhna khempeuh hangin siangtho mun adingin kilemna bawl ding hi. Amah in amau’ nitna sungah amau tawh a omkhawm kikhopna buk a dingin tua mah bangin a bawl ding hi. [17] Siangtho munah kilemna bawl dingin amah tumin ama a’ ding, a innkuanpihte a’ ding, le Israel mihonte khempeuh a dingin kilemna a bawl khit hong paikhiat matengin kikhopna buk sungah kuamah om lo ding hi.
[16] Amah in sual panin innsun dong inn nunglam pi sawmthum taamtak peekte tawh lam a, amah in siangtho pen mun, biakinn sungnung dingin a inn sungah a bawl hi.
[19] Amah in TOPA’ Thuciamna Singkuang koih nadingin a sungtawng penah biakinn sungnung a bawl hi.

[31] Biakinn sungnung lut nadingin amah in oliv sing kongkhak peekte a bawl hi; a bangtung zawl le kongkhak khuamte in kiu nga piangsak hi. [32] Amah in kherub-te, nisuh kungte, le pakpalh lim kibawlte tawh oliv sing kongkhak peek nihte a tuam hi; amah in tuate kham tawh zut a, kherub-te le nisuh kungte tungah kham a theh hi.

[3] Israel upate khempeuh hong pai uh a, siampite in Thuciamna Singkuang la-in Biakinn-ah paipih uh hi. [4] Tua ciangin amaute in kikhopna buk, le puanbuk sunga om a siangtho nazatte khempeuh a paipih uh hi. Siampite le Levi mite in tuate paipihto uh hi. [5] Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah a kikhawm Kumpi Solomon le Israel mihonte khempeuh in biakna-in tuu le bawngtalte tampi tak pia uh ahih manin tuate a phazah kisim zo lo hi. [6] Tua ciangin siampite in a kherub-te’ kha nuai, siangthopen mun sung, biakinn sungnung lama ama munah TOPA’ Thuciamna Singkuang paipih uh hi. [7] Kherub-te in Thuciamna Singkuang omna mun tungah a kha uh zak ahih manin Thuciamna Singkuang le a zawlte tungah kherub-te in khuhna piangsak uh hi. [8] A zawlte sau mahmah ahih manin biakinn sungnung mai siangtho mun panin a zawl mongte kimu a, ahih hangin a pualam panin kimu thei lo hi. Tuni dongin tua san takah tuate om hi. [9] Tua Thuciamna Singkuang sungah, Egypt gam panin a paikhiat lai-un TOPA in Israel mite tawh thuciamna a bawlna Horeb-ah Moses in suangpek nih a koih simloh bangmah dang om lo hi.

[8] Tua ciangin amah in siangtho pen mun bawl hi. A dung pen a vai tawh kizui-in pi sawmthum hi a, a vai zong pi sawmthum mah ahi hi. Amah in kham hoih talen zaguk tawh a zut hi. [9] A kilhnate a gihna kham shekel sawmnga ahi hi. Tua ciangin amah in a inn dawl tungnungte kham tawh a zut hi. [10] Amah in siangtho pen mun sungah sing kherub nih bawlin kham tawh tuate zut hi.
[14] Tua ciangin amah in a dum, a ausan, le a dupsan puante, le saihadial puan tawh a dalna puan bawl a, tua tungah kherub-te a bawl hi.

[7] Tua ahih ciangin siampite in kherub-te’ kha nuai, siangtho pen mun sung, biakinn sungnung sung ama munah TOPA’ Thuciamna Singkuang a paipih uh hi. [8] Kherub-te in Thuciamna Singkuang tungah a khate uh zak uh ahih manin kherub-te pen Thuciamna Singkuang le a zawlte tungah khuhna khat a suak uh hi. [9] A zawlte sau ahih manin siangtho mun panin biakinn sungnung mai-ah a mongte kidawk a, ahih hangin a pualam panin kimu thei lo hi; tuni dongin tua lai-ah tuate om hi.
[2] Siangtho pen mun lamah ka khutte hong laamto a, nangma kiangah huhna kong nget mah bangin kong thumna aw hong za in.
[4] Tua inndei sungnung a teh ciangin a dung a vai pi sawmthum le li tuak a pha hi. Tua ciangin amah in kei kiangah, “Hih lai pen Siangtho Pen Mun ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
[3] Hih biakna leitang siangtho sung panin siangtho pen mun le biakinn mun dingin a saulam tai sawm, a zailam tai li kisehkhia ding hi.
[51] Tua laitakin biakinn sung deina puan, a lu panin a taw dongin kikekin phelnih a suak hi. Zin zong lingin suangtumpite kitam hi.
[69] Ahi zongin tu a kipanin a Vanglian Pasian’ taklamah Mihing Tapa tu ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[45] tua hun sungin biakinn sung dalna puan kikekin phelnih a suak hi.
[2] Khrih in eite a hong it manin Pasian in eite’ mawhna hong maisak theih nadingin a namtui biakna-in Pasian kiangah a kipiak mah bangin note zong itna tawh na gamta un.
[1] Note pen Khrih tawh a thokik khinte na hih manun, Pasian’ taklam a kumpi tokhom tungah Khrih a tutna mun vantung thute ngaihsutin nei un.

[1] A beisa hunah Pasian in kamsangte zangin i pupite tungah a lam tuamtuam tawh a khen khenin thu na gen ngeizo hi. [2] Ahi zongin tuhun nunung ciangin leitung vantung na khempeuh a bawlin a zat, a tawpna-ah na khempeuh a luah dingin a seh a Tapa zangin eite tungah thu hong gen hi. [3] Tua Tapa in Pasian’ minthanna vang hong taangkhiasak a, Pasian’ lim taktak mah hong pua-in, ama kampauna tawh leitung vantung buppi pai-in a kip hi. Mihingte a mawhna panun a siansak khit ciangin Vanglian pipa Pasian’ taklam, vantungah a tu hi.

[17] Tua ahih manin mihingte’ mawhna a kimaisak theih nadingin Pasian’ na a sepna-ah mite a dingin hehpihna le cihtakna tawh Siampi Lianpen a suahtheih nadingin a sanggamte tawh a kibangin mihing lim a hong puak ding a kisam ahi hi.
[2] Pasian’ inn sungah na a sepna-ah Moses a cihtak mah bangin hih siampi nasep a sem dingin a seh Pasian’ tungah Jesuh a citak hi.

[14] Tua ahih manin eite in Pasian’ omna vantung a va tung khinsa, Siampi Lianpen ahi Pasian’ Tapa Jesuh neikhin ihih manin i sansa upna thu kiptakin len ni. [15] Eite’ neih Siampi Lianpen pa in i ginat lohna-ah eite a hong hehpih thei lo ding hi lo hi; eite mah bangin ze-etna khempeuh a thuak hi a, ahi zongin mawhna a bawl lo ahi hi.

[1] Siampi lianpen ahi peuhpeuh mipa pen a mite’ mawhna hangin Pasian’ tungah biakna le letsong a piaksak dingin ama mipihte lak panin kiteelin nasep a kiguan’ ahi hi. [2] Amah zong lam tampi-ah a ginalo thei mi mah ahih manin thu thei lo mite le a khial mite tungah lungnem takin na sem thei hi. [3] Amah zong miginalo mi mah ahih manin mite’ mawhna hangin biakna a pia hi bek loin ama mawhna mahmah hangin zong biakna a pia ahi hi. [4] Tua bangin pahtawina a nei siampi lianpen nasep pen a sem dingte amau utthu tawh a kisehtawm mawk hi lo hi; siampi lianpen a sem dingin amahmah a kisehtawm hi lo a, Aaron a kisap mah bangin Pasian in amah a seh ahi hi. [5] Tua mah bangin Khrih zong, amahmah in siampi lianpen nasep a semtawm mawk hi loin Pasian in ama kiangah, “Nang, ka Tapa na hi hi. Tuni-in na Pa ka suak hi,” na ci hi. [6] Mun dang khatah zong, “Melkhizedek siampi gui zui-in a tawntungin siampi na hi ding hi,” na ci lai hi. [7] Leitungah mihingin Jesuh a omlai-in sihna panin amah a honkhia thei ding Pasian tungah thu ngenin khitui naptui tawh thumin na kiko hi. [8] Amah, Pasian’ Tapa hinapi-in a thuakna tawh thumang ahih theih nading a na kisin hi. [9] Tua bangin a cingtaak mi a suahkhit ciangin ama thu a mang mite khempeuh a dingin tawntung hotkhiatna a kipatna hong suak a, [10] Melkhizedek gui zui-in siampi lianpen dingin Pasian in a bawl hi.

[19] I lungsim a hong kipsak dingin tu-a bang lametna a nei ihi hi. Tua i lametna kician mahmah a, vantung biakinn siangtho tawngnung sung ciang dong tung khinta hi. [20] Tua lai munah eite’ tangin Jesuh na ma tun khinta a, siampi Melkhizedek gui zui-in a om tawntung ding siampi lianpen a suak hi.

[1] Abraham in a galsimna ah kumpite thatin gualzo-in a hong ciah ciangin A Lianpen Pasian’ siampi ahih banah Jerusalem khua kumpi zong ahi Melkhizedek in Abraham na dawnin thupha a pia hi. [2] Abraham in a na ngah khempeuh sung panin Melkhizedek tungah sawm-ah-khat a pia hi. Melkhizedek min a khiatna in, “Thuman Kumpi,” a cihna hi phot a, tua banah Jerusalem khua kumpi zong hi lai ahih manin ama min pen, “Kilemna Kumpi,” cihna zong ahi hi. [3] Melkhizedek’ pa le a nu a kipanin a suahna thu, a sihna thu, le a khang tangthu peuhmah a kiciamtehna om lo ahih manin Pasian’ Tapa tawh a kibang hi a, siampi mah hi tawntung paisuak hi.

[23] A kilamdanna a dang khat in: Siampi dangte pen sithei-in a nasep zom paisuak thei lo ahih manin a mi malin tampi pha uh hi. [24] Ahi zongin Jesuh nungta tawntung ahih manin midang tungah a nasep ki-ap nawn loin amahmah in siampi nasep sem paisuak hi. [25] Tua hi a, mite a dingin a thumsak thei dingin amah nungta tawntung ahih manin ama tungtawnin Pasian kiang a zuante khempeuh, tu a kipanin a tawntungin a honkhia thei ahi hi. [26] Tua bangin a siangtho, paubaanna a nei lo, vantungah a lian penin a kikoih Siampi Lianpen Jesuh i neih a hoih mahmah ahi hi.

[1] Tu-in i gennop thu pen hih bang ahi hi: Vantungah Pasian’ tokhom taklamah a tu tua bang Siampi Lianpen khat a nei ihi hi. [2] Amah in, mite’ bawl ahi lo, Topa mahmah in a bawl a taktak puanbuk ahi a Siangtho Pen mun sungah siampi lianpen nasep a sem ahi hi.

[6] Tua ahih manin Pasian le mite kikalah Jesuh in a bawl thuciamna pen na a hoihzaw piak nading thuciamna ahih mah bangin Jesuh tungah a kipia siampi nasep pen siampi dang khempeuhte’ sep sangin a lianzaw ahi hi.

[3] Tua Siangtho Mun a kideina zomah Siangtho Pen Mun a kici a dei dang khat om leuleu hi. [4] Tua sungah paknamtui hal nading kham kibawl biakna tau le kham tawh a kizut Thuciamna Singkuang om hi. Tua Thuciamna Singkuang sungah manna anlum a kikoihna kham beel, tehno nei-in a hing Aaron’ ciangkhut le thukhamte a kigelhna suangpek nihte kikoih hi.

[7] Ahi zongin a dei sungnung sungah Siampi Lianpen pa bek kum khatin khatvei pai a, theih loh man a, amah le mite’ khialhna hangin ganhing sisan tawh biakpiakna a bawl hi. [8] A puanung inndei a om laiteng a sungnung ahi, a Siangtho Pen Mun a kihong nai lo ahihna thu Kha Siangtho in hong kilangsak hi.

[11] Ahi zongin tu-in a hoihzaw thu a sem ding Siampi Lianpen Khrih hong tung khinta a, ama lutna biakbuk pen a kipiangsak tawm, khut tawh a kibawl biakbuk hi loin a lianzaw, a cingtaakzaw mun ahi hi. [12] Siangtho Pen Mun ah a tawntungin a kimang dingin khatvei bek Khrih a va lut ciangin biakpiak nadingin keel sisan le bawngno sisante va keng loin ama sisan va keng a, eite a dingin tawntung hotkhiatna a hong ngahsak hi. [13] Keel sisan, bawngtal sisan, le bawngla kihaltum vute, biakna vai-in a siang lo mite tungah a kitheh ciangin biakna vai-in mite’ pum tung siangthosak thei ahihleh, [14] tawntung Kha Siangtho hangin Pasian tungah a cingtaak biakpiak nadingin Khrih in a piak ama sisan in na tam semkhia zozaw ding a, a nungta Pasian’ na i septheih nadingin bangmahin a kimang lo nasepna panin ama sisan in i lungsim hong siangsak ding hi.

[11] Jew siampite nisimin a nasepna uh munah dingin a kibang biakpiakna mah pia niloh uh a, ahi zongin tua a piak uh biakpiaknate in mawhna maisak thei lo hi. [12] Ahi zongin Khrih in mawhna hangin khatvei a piakkhit ciangin a tawntung a dingin kimang ahih manin Pasian’ taklam ah tu hithiat a, [13] Pasian in ama khenuai-ah a galte khempeuh a koihsak nading hun ngakin a om hi. [14] Mawhna panin a sianthosak mite, khatvei bek biakpiakna a bawlna tawh siangtho paisuaksak hi.

[19] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Jesuh hong sihna hangin Siangtho Pen Munah ut utin luttheih nading thu i neita hi. [20] Ama pumpi mahmah ahi dalna puan tawnin nuntakna lampi-ah i pai theih nadingin amah in lampi thak hong honsak hi. [21] Pasian’ innsung a uk siampi lianpen zong i nei hi. [22] Tua ahih manin mawhna thu-ah kisuanna lungsim om nawn loin, tui siangtho tawh i pumpi a kisawpsa-in muanna le lungsim takpi tawh Pasian kiang zuan ni.

[2] Eite hong makai-in i upna a hong cingtaaksak Jesuh mitsuanin nei ni. Mailamah a ngah ding lungdamna hangin maizumna kihta loin singlamteh tungah sihna hong thuak a, tu-in Pasian tokhom taklamah a tu hi.

[18] Na pu na pate uh nuntakzia, bangmahin a kimang lo nuntakna panin a hong suahtaksak nadingin Pasian in note’ man dingin a piak pen a man a kiam thei ngun le khamte bang hi lo a, [19] tuuno bangin paubaanna a om lo, a manpha mahmah Khrih, biakna-in a hong kipiakna tawh Pasian in note a hong suaktasak ahi hi.
[22] Tu-in vantungah tua Khrih pai khin a, Pasian’ taklamah omin, vantung mite le ukna aana a neite khempeuh tungah a ukin a om hi.
[15] Nang na hih leh, nuamtakin na pu na pate kiang na zuan ding a, khan kicingin hong kivui ding hi.
[8] a hu tawpna sang a, a teek, kum tampi a pha, a khanghamin si a, ama mite tawh kivui khawm hi.
[50] Hor Mual tungah na sanggampa Aaron si-in a mite kiangah a kigawm bangin, na kahtohna mualtungah si inla, na mite kiangah pai-in kigawm in.
[6] TOPA in thatin hingsakkik a, amah in Leinuai-ah paipih sukin thotosak hi.
[3] Tu-in Samuel si khin a, Israel-te khempeuh ama hangin kapin, ama khuapi Ramah-ah vui uh hi. Saul in vankahte le aisante a gam sung panin beisak hi.
[22] Tua ciangin TOPA in Elijah’ aw ngai hi; naupang hong nak kikin a hingkik hi.
[35] Tua ciangin Jehu si a, amaute in Samaria-ah amah a vui uh hi. Tua ciangin ama tapa Jehoahaz in ama tangin a uk hi.
[20] Tua ciangin Ahaz si a, David khuapi sungah a pate tawh kivui hi. Tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Hezekiah in a uk hi.
[9] Tua ciangin Jotham si a, David khuapi sungah amaute in amah a vui uh hi. Tua ciangin a tapa Ahaz in ama tangin a uk hi.
[10] Ahi zongin mi si a, amah maimang pah hi. Amah a beina tungta a, koi-ah om nawn ahi hiam?
[12] Ahi zongin vanpi a omlaiteng, misite thokik ngei lo ding a, a ihmutna panun khanglo ngei lo, gamtang ngei lo ding uh hi.

[25] “Ahi zongin a tawpna-ah kei hong panpih ding a nungta tawntung khat vantungah a omna thu ka thei hi. [26] Natna in ka vun a nektum khit hangin, hih ka pumpi mahmah tawh Pasian ka mu ding hi. [27] Keima mit teekteek tawh amah ka mu ding a, amah in kei hong khualmi et lo ding hi. “Ka lungsim hanna a bei hi.
[17] Misite’ gam khuamial kongkhakpi, mi khatpeuh in nang hong lak ngei ahi hiam?
[5] Bang hang hiam cih leh misite omna gam sungah nangmah phawk theih nading bangmah om lo ahih manin, Leinuai panin kua in nang hong phat thei ding ahi hiam?
[9] Tua ahih ciangin lungdamin ka kipak a, lungmuangin ka om hi. [10] Bang hang hiam cih leh Leinuai nong zuansak kei a, na mihoih pa Leihawmpi na musak kei hi.
[15] Ahih hangin Pasian in Leinuai’ vangliatna panin kei hong honkhia ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in kei hong sang ding hi.

[10] A sisate a dingin nalamdang a bawl na hi hiam? Nangmah a phat dingin mi a si khinsate hong tho ding ahi hiam? [11] Han sungah na itna kip kigen ding a, siatna munah nangma thumannate kigen ding ahi hiam? [12] Khuamialna sungah na na lamdangte kithei a, mangngilhna gam sungah na hotkhiat huhna kithei ahi hiam?
[10] Kote’ nuntak sung kum sawmsagih bang hi a, cidam le-ung kum sawmgiat bang hithei hi. Ahih hangin tua hunsung nangawn gimna le haksatna hi a, tua hunte bei pakin kote ka maimang uh hi.

[15] Eite ihih leh i nuntakna pen lopa tawh kibang a, lolai-ah a po paakte bangin a palh hi. [16] Bang hang hiam cih leh huih in amah semin beimang a, tua mun in amah thei nawn lo hi. [17] Ahih hangin TOPA’ itna kip pen amah a zahtak mite tungah a tawntung pan a tawntung dongin kip ngitnget a, ama thumanna pen ama thuciamna zui-in a thupiak bangin sep ding a phawk mite tungah a khang khangin a kip tawntung hi.
[17] Misite ahi a, gamdaihna sungah a pai peuhpeuhte in ahi zongin TOPA phat lo uh hi. [18] Ahih hangin eite in tu a kipanin a tawntungin TOPA i phat ngitnget ding hi. TOPA phat un.
[8] Vantungah kahto leng tua lai-ah nang na om ding a, Leinuai misite’ gamah lupna bawlta leng zong tua lai-ah zong nang na om veve ding hi.
[4] A husanna a bei ciangin lei-ah ciahkik uh a, tua ni mahmahin a ngaihsutnate uh beita hi.

[19] A tawpna-ah ci lehang, mihingte le ganhingte in a tuah ding uh kibang a, ganhing mah bangin mihing zong a si ahi hi. Mihing le ganhing in a kibangin nuntakna hu nei a, mihing le ganhing nuntakna a kimanna bangmah om lo ahih manin, mihing pen ganhing sangin a hoihzawkna bangmah om tuan lo hi. [20] A nih tuakun mun khatah tung khawm ding uh a, leivui panin a piang uh ahih mah bangin leivui mah suakkik ding uh hi. [21] Mihingte’ kha vanah kahto-in ganhingte’ kha lei-ah lutsuk hi, cih a thei zong kuamah om lo hi.

[5] A hing laite in a si ding ahihlam uh thei a, a sisate in bangmah thei nawn lo uh hi. A sisate in thaman bangmah nei nawn lo uh a, amaute kiphawkkha nawn lo hi. [6] Amau a dingin itna, muhdahna, hanciamna cihte om nawn lo a, leitung a om nate khat beek theikha kik nawn lo ding uh hi.
[10] Na mai-ah sep ding a om khempeuh, na tha neihzah tawh sem in. Bang hang hiam cih leh na zuat ding sihna gam sungah nasepna le thungaihsutna, pilna le theihna cihte om lo hi.
[7] I pumpi, lei suakkik ding a, i nuntakna a hong pia Pasian’ kiangah i kha ciahkik ta ding hi.
[14] Tua ahih ciangin Leinuai in a duhna khangsakin bangmah tawh a kiteh thei lo zahin a kam ka beba a, Jerusalem’ hoihna teng, a mipite, a mihonte, ama sunga a lungdam mite, a nawmvalh hi.

[6] Keivom pen tuuno tawh omkhawm ding a, kamkei gialbem pen keelno tawh lumkhawm ding hi. Bawngno le humpinelkai le ganhing thaute omkhawm ding uh a, naupangno khat nangawn in tuate hawlzo ding hi. [7] Bawngpi le vompi in an nekhawm ding uh a, amau’ note lumkhawm ding uh hi. Humpinelkai in bawngtal mah bangin buhkung ne ding hi. [8] Nawine naungek, gul gilo’ kua vangah kimawl ding a, nawine nawn lo naupang in gul gunei’ bu a sawk hangin a gul in tu lo ding hi. [9] Ka mual siangtho buppi tungah amaute khatlekhat kiliamsak lo ding uh a, kisusia lo ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tuite in tuipi omna a tuamcip mah bangin leitungah TOPA’ thu theihna kidim ding hi.

[9] “Nang na paisuk ciangin a hong dawntuah dingin Leinuai-a misite kihanthawn a, nangmah a hong hopih dingin leitungah a lian ngei misi uliante kipusuak sak hi. A minamte’ kumpite khempeuh amau’ kumpi tokhom panin hong ding uh hi. [10] Amaute in nang hong hopihin, ‘Nang zong kote mah bangin na thahat kei hi. Kote mah na bangta hi,’ hong ci ding uh hi. [11] Nangma harp lasakna awte, nangma liatna khempeuh Leinuai-ah kipaipih suk hi. Thante pen nangma delhphah hi a, thante pen nangma silh ahi hi.

[19] Nangma mi a sisate hingkik ding uh a, amau’ pumpi thokik ding hi. Han sungah a lum mite aw, tho-in lungdamin la sa un! Bang hang hiam cih leh zing daitui in leitung a nosakkik bangin sawtpi-a a sisa mite TOPA in hingkiksak ding hi.
[18] Tua ciangin sihna tawh na thuciamna uh kiphiat ding a, Leinuai tawh na thukimna uh kip lo ding hi. A tuumcip ding tuiciin in a hong nawk ciangin note hong sugawp ding hi.

[18] Bang hang hiam cih leh Leinuai-ah a om mite in nangma tungah lungdamna hong ko thei lo a, a sisa mite in nang hong phat thei lo uh hi. Gum sunga a paisukte in nangma thumanna hong muang thei lo uh hi.
[21] Egypt mite a panpih galhang pente in misite’ gam Leinuai panin amaute na dawn ding uh a, ‘Pasian a thei lo, galsung a si mite hong paisuk uh a, hih lai-ah lumta uh hi,’ ci-in kiko ding uh hi.

[11] Tua ciangin PASIAN in kei kiangah, “Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, Israel mite pen hih guhte tawh kibang uh hi. Amaute in, ‘I keucip a, i lamet ding bangmah om nawn loin i nuntakna guipi beita hi,’ ci uh hi. [12] Tua ahih ciangin ka mi Israel-te tungah thu gen inla, Topa PASIAN in hih bangin ci hi, ci-in gen in: Ka mite aw, tu-in note’ hankhuk kong honsak ding a, note hong paikhiatpihin, Israel gam kong tunpihkik ding hi. [13] Note na kiphumna uh hankhuk hong honsakin kong paikhiatpih ciangin TOPA ka hihna thu nong thei ding uh hi. [14] Note sungah keima nuntakna hu kong guan ding a, note hong hingsakkikin, na gam uhah kong tengsakkik ding hi. Tua ciangin TOPA ka hihna thu nong thei ding uh hi. Hih bangin kong hihna ding thu ka kiciamzo a, ka kiciam bangin kong hih ding hi. TOPA ahi keimah in hih thu ka gen khinzo hi, ci-in gen in,” hong ci hi.
[2] A sisa mi tampite in nuntakna a ngahkik ding uh hi. Pawlkhatte nungta tawntung ding uh a, pawlkhatte in a tawntung zumna le minsiatna a ngah ding uh hi.
[13] Nang Daniel na hih leh a tawp dong muanhuai takin om in. Tua ciangin na si ding a, ahi zongin hun a bei ciangin thaman a sang dingin na hingkik ding hi,” a hong ci hi.

[11] Nisuahna le nitumna panin mi tampi tak hong pai-in vantung ki-ukna sungah Abraham, Isaac, le Jakob-te tawh an ne-in sabuai-ah tukhawm ding uh hi. [12] Ahi zongin vantung ki-ukna sungah a om dingin a kingaihsun Israel mite ahihleh pualam khuamialna-ah kilawnkhia ding a, tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[28] Pumpi a thah khit ciangin kha a that thei lote na kihta kei un. Hell khuk sungah pumpi le kha a nihin a susia thei pa na kihtazaw un.

[41] Mihing Tapa in a vantung mite hong sawl ding a, ama ukna sungah a om migilote le mi a mawh nadingin a bawl mi khempeuh kaikhawmin [42] meikhukpi sungah tua bang mite lawn ding uh a, tua lai-ah amaute kapin a hagawi ding uh hi.
[50] meikhukpi sungah tua migilote a khul ding uh hi. Tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding uh hi.

[29] Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Note in Lai Siangtho thu ahi a, Pasian’ vangliatna ahi zongin thei lo na hih manun na ngaihsunkhial uh hi. [30] Bang hang hiam cih leh misite a thawhkik uh ciangin vantungah a om vantung mite tawh kibang ding uh a, zinei pasalnei cih om lo ding hi. [31] Misite thawhkikna thu tawh kisai-in note tungah a gen thute sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam? [32] Pasian in, ‘Kei pen Abraham’ Pasian, Isaac’ Pasian, Jakob’ Pasian ka hi hi,’ ci hi. Pasian pen a si mite’ Pasian hi loin a nungta mite’ Pasian ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[32] Ama mai-ah leitung minam khempeuh hong kikhawm ding hi. Gancing pa in tuu le keelte a khen mah bangin mi khempeuh khen nihin hong koih ding hi. [33] Tuu a bang mite a taklamah koihin, keel a bang mite a veilamah koih ding hi. [34] Tua ciangin Kumpipa in a taklamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Ka Pa in thupha a piak mite aw, hong pai ta un. Leitung piancil a kipanin note a dingin a kibawlkholsa gamnuam hong luah un.
[29] Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Ka Pa’ Ukna sungah note tawh leenggahzu thak ka dawnkik ni matengin leenggahzu ka dawnkik nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
[52] Hankhukte zong kihong a, Pasian’ mi a sisa tampite zong kithokiksak hi.
[39] Amah sungtumin, “Bang hangin hici gamlum na hi uh hiam? Bang hangin kap na hi uh hiam? Numeino a si hi lo hi; a ihmu hibek hi,” a ci hi.
[52] Tua lai-a om mi khempeuh, tua numeino’ sihna hangin kapin, thumin na om uh hi. Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Kap nawn kei un, amah a si hi lo hi; a ihmu bek ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[28] Pasian’ Ukna sungah Abraham, Isaac, Jakob, le kamsangte khempeuh a omna mu napi-in, note a pualamah hong kihawlkhiat ciangin tua huna na kahna uh le na ha gawina uh bangzah takin nasia ding ahi hiam?

[22] Tua ciangin mizawng pa hong si a, vantung a Abraham kiangah a om dingin vantung mite in a paipih uh hi. Mihau pa zong hong si leuleu-in a kivui hi. [23] Ahi zongin hell khuk sungah gimna thuakin a om hi. A khuadak leh, gamlapi mun khatah Abraham le Lazaras a omkhawm a galmuh hi.

[34] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Tu huna hih leitung mite in numei le pasal kitenna nei uh hi. [35] Ahi zongin sihna panin thokikin a hong tung ding hunah a nungta dingin a kilawm mite in kitenna cihte nei lo uh hi. [36] Amaute pen vantungmi tawh kibang uh a, sithei nawn lo uh hi. Sihna panin a thokik khinte ahih manin amaute pen Pasian’ tate ahi uh hi. [37] Tua tham loin Moses in zong misite a thawhkikna thu teltakin hong lak hi. Sawlpang kuang thu a genna munah Topa pen, ‘Abraham Pasian, Isaac Pasian, Jakob Pasian,’ ci-in a na gen hi. [38] Amaute khempeuh hing uh ahih manin, Pasian pen mihingte’ Pasian hi a, misite’ Pasian hi lo hi, a cihnopna ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[43] Jesuh in ama kiangah, “A mantakin ke’n kong cihin-ah: Tuni-in Paradais-ah kei tawh na omkhawm ding hi,” a ci hi.
[5] Numeite lau mahmah uh ahih manin lei lam nga-in kuncip uh hi. Tua mi nihte in, “Bang hangin misite lakah mihing zong na hi uh hiam?

[19] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Bang thu ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin amaute in, “Nazareth khuami Jesuh tunga thupiang ahi hi. Amah pen kamsang khat hi a, Pasian le mite khempeuh in a thugen le a nasepna-ah vang a nei mahmah khatin a ngaihsut uh ahi hi. [20] Ahi zongin ka siampi liante uh le ka uliante un sihna thukhenna a thuak dingin Pilat tungah ap uh a, singlamteh tungah kithat hi. [21] Amah pen Israel mite a honkhia ding pa hi, ci-in ka lamet uh ahi hi. Tua bang hinapi-in hih thuteng hong piang a, tu-in a thu pianzawh a ni thumna hita hi. [22] Ko pawlte’ sung panin numei pawlkhat in lamdang ka sak uh thu hong gen uh hi. Amaute, tu zingsang tungin hanah va pai uh a, [23] ahi zongin ama luang na om nawn lo hi. Tua ciangin amaute hong ciahkik uh a, vantung mite a muhna uh le tua vantung mite in Jesuh a hinkik khitna thu a gennate uh hong gensawn uh hi. [24] Tua ciangin ka lawmte uh pawlkhat zong hanah va pai uh a, numeite’ gen bang teekteekin va mu uh a, ahi zongin Jesuh mu lo uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[36] Tua ahih manin Tapa a um mi peuhmah nungta tawntung ding a, Tapa’ thu a mang lote in nuntak mu lo ding a, amaute tungah Pasian heh tawntung ding hi,” a ci hi.

[24] “A mantakin kong genin-ah: Ka thugennate za-in kei hong sawl pa a um khempeuh a nungta paisuak ding hita hi. Mawhsak thukhenna ngah nawn loin, sihna panin a hingkik ta ahi hi. [25] A taktakin ci lehang: A si mite in Pasian’ Tapa’ aw a zak hun uh hong tung ding hi bek loin tu-in a hun hong tungkhin hita a, ama aw a za mi khempeuh nungta ding uh hi.

[28] Hih thu ka hong gen ciangin lamdangsa kei un. Han sungah a om misi khempeuh in ama aw za-in, [29] han sung panin a hong paikhiat uh hun hong tung ding hi. A gamtat hoih mite pen a nungta tawntung dingin hong thokik ding uh a, a gamtat siate ahihleh mawhsak thukhenna a thuak dingin hong thokik ding uh hi.

[17] Ka nuntakkik theih nadingin si ngam ka hih manin ka Pa in kei hong it hi. [18] Kuamah in ka nuntakna hong laksak thei lo a, keima utthu tawh ka piak hizaw hi. Ka nuntakna piakkhiat theih nading le lakkik theih nading thu ka Pa in kei tungah a hong piak ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[11] a nungzuite kiangah, “I lawmpa Lazaras ihmu zo hi. Ahi zongin amah a phong dingin ka pai ding hi,” a ci hi.

[23] Jesuh in, “Na u hong thokik ding hi,” a cih leh [24] Martha in, “Nitawp ni-a thawhkik ni ciangin hong thawhkik ding ka thei hi,” a ci hi. [25] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Keimah in a sisa mite thosakin a hingsak thei pa ka hi hi. Kei hong um mi peuhmah a sih hangin nungta ding hi.

[43] a cih khit ciangin nakpitakin kiko-in, “Lazaras aw, hong pusuak in,” a ci hi. [44] Tua ciangin a misi pa a khut a khe dial tawh kituamin, a maitang puan tawh a kitunsa-in hong pusuak hi. Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “A dial le a puante phelkhia un,” a ci hi.

[2] Note’ om nading mun a bawlkhol dingin a pai ding ka hi hi. Ka Pa’ inn sungah om nading mun tampi om hi. A om lo ding hileh hih bangin thu ka hong gen kei ding hi. [3] Kei va pai-in note’ om nading mun ka va bawlkholh khit ciangin keima omna munah note na hong om theih nadingun note a hong la dingin ka hong paikik ding hi.

[22] Note zong tua mah tawh na kibang ding uh hi. Note zong tu-in na dah uh hangin note tawh kimukik ding ihih manin na lung uh dam mahmah ding a, tua na lungdamna uh kuamah in hong beisak thei lo ding hi.
[24] Ahi zongin Pasian in misite lak panin amah hingkiksak a, sihna in amah lencip zo lo ahih manin sihna hanga gimna panin amah a suaktasak hi.

[5] Ananias in hih thu a zak phetin thakhatin si-in puksukpah a, hih thu a za mi khempeuh a lau mahmah uh hi. [6] Tua ciangin tangvalte hong kipanin puan tawh a luang tun uh a, puakhia-in a va vui uh hi.
[10] Amah zong thakhat thu-in si-in Peter khe kiangah a puksuk hi. Tua ciangin tangvalte hong lut uh a, a sih khitlam a muh uh ciangin puakhia-in a pasal’ gei-ah a phum uh hi.

[1] Hih Stefen thahna thu-ah Saul in zong thukimpih hi. Tua ni a kipanin Jerusalem khua-a om pawlpite in nakpitakin bawlsiatna thuak ding kipan uh hi. Sawltakte simloh, thu um midang khempeuh, Judea gam le Samaria gamah kithehthang gawp uh hi. [2] Thu um mi pawlkhat in Stefen vui uh a, nakpitakin dahin a kap uh hi.
[36] David in ama hun lai-in Pasian’ deihna bangin na sem a, a sih ciangin a pu a pate gei mahah kisialin muatna a thuak hi.
[15] Amaute’ up le lamet mah bangin, Pasian in miphate le misiate a kibangin sihna panin hingkiksak khawm ding hi, ci-in umin ka lamen hi.
[16] Bang hang hiam cih leh misite a kihingkiksak lo ding hileh Khrih zong kihingkiksak lo ding hi.

[42] Misite a thawhkikna zong hihte mah tawh kibang hi. A kiphum pen a muat thei hi a, a thokik pen a muat thei lo ahi hi. [43] A kiphum laitakin hat loin melsia a, a kithawhkiksak ciangin thahatin a melhoih hi. [44] A kiphum laitakin leitung pumpi hi a, a kithawhkiksak ciangin kha pumpi ahi hi. Leitung pumpi a om mah bangin kha pumpi zong a om ding ahi hi.

[1] Bang hang hiam cih leh hih ka tenna ka leitung pumpi uh a sih ciangin mihingte bawl ahi lo, Pasian in a kip tawntung dingin kote a dingin a hong bawlsak inn, vantungah a nei ding ka hihna uh ka thei uh hi. [2] Tu laitakin ka vantung inn uhah ka omnopna uh lianlua mahmah ahih manin ngaklahin ka khuisasa uh hi. [3] Vantung inn-ah ka om uh ciangin pumpi nei loin guak om ding ka hi kei uh hi. [4] Hih leitung pumpi tawh ka om uh laitakin lungkhamin ka khuisasa uh hi. Hih ka leitung pumpi uh ka nusiat nopna hang uh hi loin a sithei pumpi pen a sithei nawn lo pumpi tawh a kilaih theih nadingin ka vantung pumpi uh ka deihna hang uh ahi hi. [5] Hih kikheel nading a hong vaihawmsak pa pen Pasian hi a, kote a hong piak dingte khempeuh hong pia taktak ding cih a lahna-in kote tungah ama Kha Siangtho a hong pia hi.

[10] Jesuh Khrih thei-in, ama thawhkik bangin thokikin, kei zong sihna panin hong hingsakkik ding hi, ci-in ka lametna hangin ama thuak bangin thuakin, sihna-ah zong amah tawh ka kibat ding ka utpi pen ahi hi. [11] Jesuh Khrih thei-in, ama thawhkik bangin thokikin, kei zong sihna panin hong hingsakkik ding hi, ci-in ka lametna hangin ama thuak bangin thuakin, sihna-ah zong amah tawh ka kibat ding ka utpi pen ahi hi.
[14] Jesuh si-in thokik hi, ci-in i up mah bangin Pasian in Jesuh hong paipih kik ciangin amah umin a si mite zong hong tonpih ding hi, ci-in i um hi.
[27] Mi khempeuh khatvei si-in, tua khit ciangin Pasian’ thukhenna a thuak ding ahih mah bangin,
[15] Tua ahih manin ka sih khit ciangin hih thute na phawkkik kik theih nadingun ka hihtheih zahin ka hanciam ding hi.
[12] Pasian’ Tapa tawh a kipawl peuhmah in nuntak tawntungna nei a, Pasian’ Tapa tawh a kipawl lote in nuntak tawntungna nei lo uh hi, cihna ahi hi.
[18] a nungta mipa zong ka hi hi. Kei ka si ngei hi. Ahi zongin tu-in hong en in, a nungta tawntung ka hi hi. Sihna le misite omna gam keima khutnuai ahi uh hi.
[11] Tua ahih manin zak nading bil a neite in Kha Siangtho in pawlpite kiangah a gen thute na za un. A gualzo mite, nihvei sihna in gimsakkha nawn lo ding hi.

[9] Ciamtehna ngana a hon ciangin Pasian’ thu a genna hang le Pasian’ thu citakin teci a panna uh hangin a kithat mite’ kha, biakna tau nuai-ah a om ka mu hi. [10] Amaute nakpitakin kiko uh a, “A thuman, a siangtho, a Vanglian Topa aw, leitungah a omlai, kote a hong that mite tungah cik ciangin thu khenin, kote hong thahna hangin cik ciangin phu la ding na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi. [11] Tua ciangin amaute tungah puantualpi a kang khat ciat kipia a, amaute a kithah mah bangin a kithat lai ding a naseppihte uh le a sanggamte uh a kim matengin tawlkhat sung a tawlngak lai nading uh kigen hi.
[11] Amaute a kibawlsiatna mei, khu tawntung a, ganhing le a lim bia-in, a min kigelhna a nei mi peuhmah in a sun a zanin tatsat loin gimna thuak paisuak uh hi,” a ci hi.

[4] Tua ciangin tokhom tungah a tu mi pawlkhat ka mu a, tua mite tungah thukhen nading aana a kipia ahi hi. Jesuh thu a genna le Pasian thu hangin a kithat mite’ kha zong ka mu hi. Tua mite in ganhing ahi a, a lim ahi zongin bia lo uh hi; a taltang uhah ahi a, a khut tung uhah ahi zongin ganhing ciaptehna nei lo uh hi. Amaute hong hingkik uh a, Khrih tawh kum tulkhat sung ukna aana a neikhawm uh hi. [5] Kum tulkhat a cin mateng a si dangte hingkik lo uh hi. Hih pen sihna panin thawhkikna a masa ahi hi. [6] Hih thawhkikna masa sungah a kihel mite pen Pasian’ mi siangtho hi a, a hampha mahmah ahi uh hi. Nihvei sihna in tua bang mite bangmah cihzo nawn lo ding a, amaute pen Pasian le Khrih’ siampite hi ding uh a, amah tawh kum tulkhat sung ukna aana nei ding uh hi.

[10] Amaute a khem Satan pen ganhing le kamsang zuau pa a omna mun, kat a kikhulna meiphualpi sungah kilawn a, a sun a zanin tua lai munah amaute in gimna a thuak tawntung ding uh ahi hi. [11] Tua ciangin tokhom kang a lian khat le a tungah a tupa ka mu hi. Ama omna panin lei le van lengkhiamang a, a tunna mel uh kithei lo hi. [12] A lian a neu misite tua tokhom mai-ah dingin laibute a kilem ka mu hi. Tua ciangin a nungta mite a kigelhna laibu a dang khat zong a kilem ka mu hi. Amaute’ gamtatna tua laibute sungah a kigelhna tawh kizui-in misite tungah thu a kikhen hi. [13] Tuipi sungah a om misite, tuipi in hong pusuah a, Sihna le Misite’ Gam in zong amau sungah a om misite hong pusuah uh hi. Tua ciangin a vekpi-in amaute’ gamtatnasa tawh kizui-in thu a kikhen hi. [14] Tua ciangin Sihna le Misite’ Gam, meiphualpi sungah a kilawn hi. Hih meiphualpi pen sihna nihna ahi hi. [15] A nungta mite a kigelhna laibu sungah a min a om lo peuhmah meiphualpi sungah kilawn hi.
[4] Amaute’ mit panin khitui khempeuh nulsak ding hi. Thu luisate maimang khinta ahih manin sihna, dahna, le na sa-a kahna cihte om nawn lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
[8] Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, le zuaugente om nading mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[19] Lei-ah na ciahkik matengin khua-ul kai-in na na sep ciang bekin an na ne ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh lei sung panin nang hong kipiangsak a, nang, leivui na hih manin, leivui mah na suakkik ding hi,” a ci hi.
[15] “Tuni-in na teel dingun note’ mai-ah nuntakna le a hoih na, sihna le siatna ka koih khinzo hi.

[26] Natna in ka vun a nektum khit hangin, hih ka pumpi mahmah tawh Pasian ka mu ding hi.
[15] Kei ka hih leh, thumanna tawh na maitang ka en ding a, ka khanlawh ciangin nangma mel muhna tawh ka lungkim ding hi.
[4] “ TOPA aw, ka mong le ka hun a kisehzah hong theisak inla, ka nuntakna a beipak hun ding hong theisak in!” ka ci hi.

[5] Pa nei lote’ pa le meigong numeite a hupa pen, a siangtho mahmah ama omna-ah a om Pasian ahi hi. [6] Pasian in a cimawhte a tenna ding innlelo guan a, thongkia mite nopsakna munah a tunpih hi. Ahih hangin mi lehdote ahihleh keugaw gamah teng uh hi.
[26] Ka lungsim le ka pumpi zawngkhal kha ding a, ahih hangin Pasian pen ka lungsim hatna le keima a’ hi tawntung ding hi.

[29] Na maitang na seel ciangin amaute khasia uh hi. Amau’ husanna na lakkhiat ciangin amaute si-in amau’ pianna leivui-ah a ciahkik uh hi.
[17] Misite ahi a, gamdaihna sungah a pai peuhpeuhte in ahi zongin TOPA phat lo uh hi.

[19] Thumanin gamtat ding a hanciamte nungta ding a, a sia-in a gamta teiteite si ding uh hi.
[12] Mihingte in thuman lampi hi, ci-in a ngaihsutte pen sihna lampi hikha thei hi.

[19] Nangma mi a sisate hingkik ding uh a, amau’ pumpi thokik ding hi. Han sungah a lum mite aw, tho-in lungdamin la sa un! Bang hang hiam cih leh zing daitui in leitung a nosakkik bangin sawtpi-a a sisa mite TOPA in hingkiksak ding hi.

[8] Ahi zongin eite mawhna nei ihih laitakin eite a dingin Khrih hong si ahih manin Pasian in eite hong it mahmahna thu hong lak khin hi. [9] Ama sihna hangin tu-in Pasian tawh kipawlthei ihih manin Pasian’ hehna hangin gimna panin zong hong suaktasak zaw kan lai ding hi. [10] Pasian tawh eite i kilangneih laitakin ama Tapa’ sihna hangin amah tawh hong kilemsak ahihleh tu-in Pasian tawh kipawl khinta ihih manin Khrih nuntakna in eite hong honkhiazo zaw kan ding hi lo ahi hiam? [11] Tuateng bek hi lo lai a, Pasian tawh hong kilemsak i Topa Jesuh Khrih hangin Pasian tungah i nuam mahmah hi. [12] Mi khat hangin leitungah mawhna hong om a, tua mawhna hangin sihna hong piang hi. Mi khempeuh mawh uh ahih manin tu-a bangzia-in mi khempeuh tungah sihna hong tung hi.
[17] Mi khat bek’ mawhna hangin sihna in hong uk ahihleh mi khat mah ahi Jesuh Khrih hangin nakpitakin a lian Pasian’ hehpihna le mihoih-a sanna a ngah mite nungta-in thahatzaw kan ding uh hi.

[3] Khrih Jesuh tawh i kipawl theih nadingin ama sungah a kiphum eite pen ama sihna mahah zong a sikhawm ihihlam thei lo na hi uh hiam? [4] I Pa’ vangliatna tawh sihna panin Khrih a kithawhkiksak mah bangin eite zong nuntakna thak i nuntak theih nadingin tui i kiphum ciangin amah tawh kiphum khawmin a sikhawm ihi hi.

[16] Mi khatpeuh’ thu a mang dingin ama khut sungah na kipiak uh ciangin a thu na mante uh’ sila na hi uh hi. Mawhna na bawl uhleh sihna a thuak ding na hi uh a, thumangin na om uhleh Pasian tawh pawlkhat a suak ding na hi uh hi.
[23] Bang hang hiam cih leh mawhna in thaman hong piak pen sihna hi a, ahi zongin i Topa Jesuh tawh i kipawl manin Pasian’ hong piakkhong pen nuntak tawntungna ahi hi.
[2] Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih Jesuh tawh a hong kipawlsak Kha Siangtho in mawhna le sihna a piangsak thukham panin kei hong suaktasak khinta hi.
[6] I ngaihsutna, i pumpi deihna uksak lehang sihna tawh kizom hi; i ngaihsutna, Kha Siangtho uksak lehang nuntakna le nopsakna tawh a kizom hi.
[13] Na pumpi uh deihna zui-in na gamtat uhleh na si ding uh a, ahi zongin Kha Siangtho huhna tawh na mawh gamtatnate uh na sihsak uhleh na nungta ding uh hi.
[38] Bangmah in ama hong itna tawh hong kikhensakzo het lo ding hi, ci-in ka thei hi. Sihna, nuntakna, vantung mite, vantung vangliatnate, tuhun nate le a hong tung ding nate,
[8] I nuntak leh Topa a dingin a nungta ihi a, i sih leh zong Topa a’ ding mahin a si ihi hi. Tua ahih manin i si a, i hing zongin Topa a’ ihi hi.
[25] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in a galte khempeuh zo-in a khenuai-ah a koihkhit hun dong mateng Khrih in uk ding hi. [26] A tawpna-ah suksiat ding a gal nunung pen in sihna ahi hi.

[42] Misite a thawhkikna zong hihte mah tawh kibang hi. A kiphum pen a muat thei hi a, a thokik pen a muat thei lo ahi hi. [43] A kiphum laitakin hat loin melsia a, a kithawhkiksak ciangin thahatin a melhoih hi. [44] A kiphum laitakin leitung pumpi hi a, a kithawhkiksak ciangin kha pumpi ahi hi. Leitung pumpi a om mah bangin kha pumpi zong a om ding ahi hi.

[51] Kuamah kim in a theih loh thusim khat na ngai un. Eite khempeuh a si khin ding ihi kei a, thakhatthu-in a kikhelvat ding ihi hi. [52] Peengkul nunung hong gin’ ciangin mitphiat kikal sungin i kikhelpak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh peengkul hong gin’ ciangin misite a sithei nawn lo dingin hong tho ding a, i vekpi-in i kikheel ding hi. [53] A muatthei pumpi pen a muat thei lo pumpi-in hong kikheel ding a, a sithei pumpi pen a sithei lo pumpi-in hong kikheel ding hi. [54] A muatthei pen a muat thei lo hong suakin, a sithei pen a sithei lo hong suah ciangin Lai Siangtho thu hong tung taktak ding hi. Lai Siangtho in, “Sihna maimangin gualzawhna in khuplet hi. [55] Sihna aw, na gualzawhna koi-ah om a, midangte na suksiat zawh nading na thahatna koi-ah omta ahi hiam?” na ci hi. [56] Sihna a pianna mawhna hang hi a, mawhna a kitheihna Thukham hang ahi hi.

[16] Tua thu hangin ka lungkia tuan kei uh hi. Kote’ leitung pumpi in damdamin muatlam ding a manawh ahi zongin ka kha nuntakna uh a nini-in thaksuak semsem hi. [17] Tuhun laitakin tomno sung lungkhamna ka thuakte uh in ka thuakna uh sangin nakpitakin a lianzaw tawntung minthanna sung hong tunpih ding hi.

[1] Bang hang hiam cih leh hih ka tenna ka leitung pumpi uh a sih ciangin mihingte bawl ahi lo, Pasian in a kip tawntung dingin kote a dingin a hong bawlsak inn, vantungah a nei ding ka hihna uh ka thei uh hi.
[8] Lungmuang takin a ki-om hithiat hi a, hih leitung pumpi nusia-in Topa tawh omkhawm ding a ki-utzaw ahi hi.

[10] Tua na dahna uh hotkhiatna ngahtheih nadingin na lungsim uh na kheel nadingun Pasian in hong zang ahih manin dah nading bangmah om lo hi. Ahi zongin hih leitung dahna lelte in ahihleh sihna piangsak hi.
[21] Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih a’ ding bekin a nungta ka hi a, si taleng zong kei a dingin hoihzaw semsem lai hi.

[10] Jesuh Khrih thei-in, ama thawhkik bangin thokikin, kei zong sihna panin hong hingsakkik ding hi, ci-in ka lametna hangin ama thuak bangin thuakin, sihna-ah zong amah tawh ka kibat ding ka utpi pen ahi hi.

[13] Sanggamte aw, lametna a nei lo mite bangin na dahluat loh nadingun a sisa mite’ omzia ding thu na theih ding uh ka deih hi. [14] Jesuh si-in thokik hi, ci-in i up mah bangin Pasian in Jesuh hong paipih kik ciangin amah umin a si mite zong hong tonpih ding hi, ci-in i um hi. [15] Topa’ thugen note kiangah ka hong gen uh thu in: Topa hong paikik ni ciangin a nungta lai eite pen a sisa mite tawh i kimuh ma-in Topa tawh i kimu kei ding hi. [16] Pasian’ thupiakna awging lianpi, vantungmi mangpa’ thugenna, le Pasian’ peengkul hong ging ding a, vantung panin Topa mahmah hong paisuk ding hi. [17] Tua ciangin tua hun laitakin a nungta lai eite pen vankim lai-ah Topa a dawn dingin amah a um a sisa mite tawh hong kilakhawm ding a, Topa tawh i omkhawm tawntung ding hi, cihna ahi hi. [18] Tua ahih ciangin note khatlekhat hih thu tawh na kihehnem un.
[14] Tate a cih mite pen leitung cilesa a nei mite ahih manin, ama sihna hangin sihna a uk Dawimangpa a sukgawp theih nadingin Jesuh in mihing pianzia mah hong nei phot hi.

[9] Ahi zongin Pasian’ hehpihna hangin mi khempeuh a dingin Jesuh a sih theih nadingin tawlkhat sung vantung mite sangin a neuzaw-in a kibawlna i mu a, sihna a thuakna hangin minthanna le pahtawina a ngahna thu i thei hi.
[7] Leitungah mihingin Jesuh a omlai-in sihna panin amah a honkhia thei ding Pasian tungah thu ngenin khitui naptui tawh thumin na kiko hi.

[8] Siampite’ lakna tawh kisai-in ahihleh a sithei mi mah ahi siampite in mite tung panin sawm-ah-khat a la uh hi. Ahi zongin Melkhizedek’ lakna tawh kisai-in ahihleh Lai Siangtho in a gen mah bangin a nungta tawntung mipa in sawm-ah-khat a la ahi hi.

[14] tawntung Kha Siangtho hangin Pasian tungah a cingtaak biakpiak nadingin Khrih in a piak ama sisan in na tam semkhia zozaw ding a, a nungta Pasian’ na i septheih nadingin bangmahin a kimang lo nasepna panin ama sisan in i lungsim hong siangsak ding hi. [15] Thuciamna masa in a huamkhak mite, a mawhna panun a suahtak theih nading uh ngeina om pen a si suak khinta ahih manin, Pasian’ sap mite in a ciamsa tawntung thupha a ngahtheih nadingun Khrih in thuciamna thak a hong vaihawm ahi hi.
[27] Mi khempeuh khatvei si-in, tua khit ciangin Pasian’ thukhenna a thuak ding ahih mah bangin,
[14] Eite a dingin hih leitungah a kip khuapi om lo ahih manin a hong piang lai ding khuapi a zong ihi hi.

[3] I Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pa Pasian tungah lungdam ni. Ama hong hehpih mahmahna hangin sihna panin Jesuh Khrih a thawhkik sakna tawh eite tungah nuntakna thak a hong pia hi. Tua ahih manin i lametna kiam ngei lo a, [4] Pasian in ama mite a dingin a koih thuphate i ngah nadingin lamenin i om hi. Tua thuphate sia ngei lo, nin ngei lo, mual ngei loin a om tawntungna vantungah note a dingin a hong koihsak hi. [5] Note’ upna hangin nitawp ni ciangin na ngah ding uh hotkhiatna nomau-a’ ahihna a kilatsak nadingin Pasian in ama vangliatna tawh a hong kepsak ahi hi. [6] Tua ahih manin tu laitakin mite’ bawlsiatna a tuamtuam na thuak manun tawlkhat na lungkham uh ahi zongin hih bang thuakna hangin lungdamzaw un. [7] Hih bang thuaknate in a um takpi mah na hihna uh hong kilangsak hi. A siathei khamte nangawn, a hoih taktak mah ahi hiam, ci-in mite in mei tawh sin uh ahih manin, kham sangin a manphazaw note’ upna zong a kiptak mah ahi hiam, ci-in Pasian in hong sin ding mah ahi hi. Tua bangin na thuakzawh uhleh Khrih hong kilat Ni ciangin phatna, minthanna, le pahtawina na ngah ding uh hi. [8] Amah mu ngei lo napi-in na it uh a, amah mu ngei lo napi-in a thu umin kama genzawh loh zah dongin nakpitakin na lungdam uh hi. [9] Tua bangin na upna uh hangin kha thu-ah hotkhiatna a ngah na hi uh hi.

[18] Khrih mahmah zong note a dingin si a, Pasian’ kiangah hong tunpih theih nadingin mihoih khat pen mihoih lote’ mawhna hangin khatvei a si hi. Mite in ama leitung pumpi that a, ahi zongin Pasian in kha nuntakna a pia hi.
[14] I Topa Jesuh Khrih in teltakin hong genkhin ahih manin hih leitung pumpi ka nusiat baih nading thu ka thei hi.

[2] Ka lawm itte aw, eite’ pianzia ding taktak a telin hong kilat nai loh hangin tu-in Pasian’ tate ihi hi. Ahi zongin Khrih hong kilat ciangin ama pianzia ahi bang teekteekin mu ding ihih manin amah i bat nading thu teltakin i thei hi.

[17] Amah ka muh ciangin misi bangin ama khe phungah ka puk hi. Ahi zongin amah in ka tungah a taklam khut hong nga a, “Lau kei in; kei pen a kipatna le a tawpna ka hi a, [18] a nungta mipa zong ka hi hi. Kei ka si ngei hi. Ahi zongin tu-in hong en in, a nungta tawntung ka hi hi. Sihna le misite omna gam keima khutnuai ahi uh hi.

[10] Na thuak ding uh haksatnate kihta kei un. Dawimangpa in note pawlkhat thong sungah hong khia-in hong ze-et ding hi. Gimna na thuak hun ding uh ni sawm sung bek hi ding hi. Na sih dongun kei tungah hong citak un. Tua hileh nuntakna lukhu ka hong pia ding hi.
[11] I sanggamte in Tuuno sisan le thuman a genna uh tawh amah na zo uh a, a nuntakna nangawn uh na pia ngam uh hi.

[13] Tua ciangin vantung panin awging khat ka za a, “Tu a kipanin Topa thu-ah a si mite mi hampha mahmah ahi hi, cihna gelh in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Kha Siangtho in, “Hi takpi hi. Amaute’ nasepna thaman in amaute zui ding ahih manin a nasep gimna panun tawlnga-in nuamsa-in om ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[6] Hih thawhkikna masa sungah a kihel mite pen Pasian’ mi siangtho hi a, a hampha mahmah ahi uh hi. Nihvei sihna in tua bang mite bangmah cihzo nawn lo ding a, amaute pen Pasian le Khrih’ siampite hi ding uh a, amah tawh kum tulkhat sung ukna aana nei ding uh hi.
[14] Tua ciangin Sihna le Misite’ Gam, meiphualpi sungah a kilawn hi. Hih meiphualpi pen sihna nihna ahi hi.
[4] Amaute’ mit panin khitui khempeuh nulsak ding hi. Thu luisate maimang khinta ahih manin sihna, dahna, le na sa-a kahna cihte om nawn lo ding hi,” a ci hi.

[1] “Tu-in hihte pen amaute’ tungah na piak ding biakna ngeina kipte ahi hi. [2] Hebru mi sila khat na lei uh ciangin, amah in kum guk sung na hong sepsak ding a, a kum sagihna ciangin bangmah hong pia loin a suakta-in paikhia ding hi. [3] Amah guakin hong pai ahihleh amah guak mahin paikhia ding a, zi neisa-in hong pai ahihleh amah tawh a zi zong paikhia ding hi.
[16] “Zuak ding ahi a, sila-in neih ding ahi zongin mi a gu mi peuhmah kithat ding hi.

[20] “Mi khat in molhtum khat tawh ama sila ahi pasal hitaleh numei hitaleh satin a phualah a sih pah leh, amah gim kipia ding hi. [21] Ahih hangin ni khat ahi a, ni nih ahi zongin sila a nuntak leh, amah gim piak ding hi lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh sila pen ama neihsa ahih manin sila a sih ciangin amah a sumh khin ahi hi.

[26] “Mi khat in ama sila ahi pasal hitaleh numei hitaleh a mit satin a suksiatkhak leh amah in tua mit’ hangin sila suaktasakin paikhiasak ding hi. [27] Amah in a sila ahi pasal hitaleh numei hitaleh a ha a tupkhiat leh, amah in tua ha’ hangin sila suaktasakin paikhiasak ding hi.

[20] “Sila ahi numei, midang khat in zuthawl a piaksa, kitankhia nai loin amah suahtakna a kipia nai lo nu, pasal dang khat in a lupkhoppih leh, thukanna kinei ding hi. Amaute kithat lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua nu sila hi lai hi.
[11] Ahih hangin siampipa khat in ama a dingin sum tawh sila khat a lei leh, tua a sila in ne thei ding hi. Ama inn sungah a suak mite in ama an ne thei ding uh hi.

[10] Note in a kum sawmngana siangthosakin, gam sunga a teng mi khempeuh tungah suahtakna thu na zasak ding uh hi. Note in nomau’ neihsa ciat ngahkikin, sila-in a kizuak mite nomau’ innkuanpihte ciat kiangah na ciahkik uh ciangin note a dingin jubilee hi ding hi.

[39] “Na gei-a om na sanggampa zawngin, nangma tungah amahmah hong kizuak leh, sila bangin na na semsak kei ding hi. [40] Amah pen a kicial nasem le peemta bangin nang kiangah om ding hi. Amah in jubilee kum mateng nangma na hong sem ding a, [41] tua ciangin nang kiang panin amah le ama kiangah a om a tate paikhia ding a, ama innkuan zuan kikin, a pate’ neihsa ngahkik ding hi. [42] Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute pen Egypt gam panin ka paikhiatpih keima nasemte hi a, amaute sila-in kizuak lo ding hi. [43] Note in hih gawpgawpna tawh amah na uk kei ding uh a, na Pasian uh na zahtak ding uh hi. [44] Note in na neih theih ding uh sila numei le sila pasalte hih bang ahi hi: Na kimkot uha om minam dangte lak panin sila numei le sila pasal na lei thei ding uh hi. [45] Note in na gam sung uhah a suak, note lakah a hong peem khualmite leh note tawh a om amau’ innkuante lak panin zong na lei thei ding uh a, amaute pen nomau a’ hi thei ding uh hi. [46] Note in amaute pen note’ khit ciangin na tapate uh tungah amau’ neih tawntung dingin a luah dingin na pia thei ding uh hi. Note in sila-in amaute na nei thei ding uh a, ahih hangin na sanggam uh Israel mite khatlekhat hih gawpgawpna tawh na ki-uk kei ding uh hi.

[12] “Na sanggampa, Hebru pasal khat ahi a, Hebru numei khat ahi zongin nang tungah hong kizuak leh, amah in nangma na kum guk sung hong sem ding a, a kum sagihna ciangin nang kiang panin a suakta-in na paikhiasak ding hi. [13] Na kiang panin a suakta-in na paikhiatsak ciangin khuthawm guakin na paisak kei ding hi. [14] Na tuuhon lak, na ancilna le na leenggah sukna panin citna tawh tampi na pia ding a, TOPA na Pasian in nang thupha hong piak zahin amah na pia ding hi.

[15] “A topa’ kiang panin no kiangah a hong tai sila, a topa kiang mahah na apkik kei ding uh hi. [16] Na khuapite uh lak panin ama teelna mun, ama lungkim penna, note lakah note tawh amah hong teng ding a, amah na nengniam kei ding uh hi.

[7] “Mi khat in Israel mi a sanggamte khat gu-in, amah in sila bangin a bawl ahi a, a zuak ahi zongin a kimuh leh, tua guta pa kithat ding hi. Tua bangin note’ lak panin siatna na siangsak ding uh hi.

[68] Note na zin kik ngei nawn kei ding uh hi, ci-in kong ciam khualzinna, Egypt gamah teembaw tawh TOPA in note hong paipih kik ding hi. Tua lai-ah sila numei le sila pasal dingin na galte uh tungah na kizuak ding uh a, ahih hangin kuamah in note hong lei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
[30] Zebulun minamte in Kitron-a teng mite ahi a, Nahalol a teng mite ahi zongin hawlkhia lo a, Kanaan mite amaute lakah tengin aana tawh nasemte a suak uh hi.
[9] Filistia mite aw, hang unla, pasal bangin gamta un. Tua hikeileh amaute, note’ sila hong hih mah bangin Hebru mite’ sila na suak ding uh hi. Pasal lungsim nei-in do un,” a ci uh hi.

[11] Amaute in Egypt mi khat gamlakah mu uh a, David kiangah amah paipih uh hi. Amaute in an pia uh a, amah in ne hi. Amaute in tui dawn ding zong a pia uh hi. [12] Theimoh khat le leenggahkeu bawk nih zong a pia uh hi. Amah in tuate a nek khit ciangin a tha hong dimkik hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh an ahi a, tui ahi zongin sun thum le zan thum ne lo dawn loin om hi. [13] Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, “Nang kuate na hi hiam? Koi pan na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Kei pen Amalek-te khat’ nasem, Egypt mi tangval khat ka hi hi. Tuma ni thum lai-in ka ci na ahih manin ka topa in hong nusia hi. [14] Kote in Khereth mite’ Negeb gam le Judah-te’ gam sung le Kaleb mite’ Negeb gam ka sim uh a, mei tawh Ziklag ka hal uh hi,” a ci hi. [15] Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, “Hih mite kiangah nong paipih suk nuam ding hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Nangmah in kei nong thahlohna ding ahi a, ka topa’ khut sungah nong apkik loh nading ahi zongin Pasian’ min tawh kei tungah hong kiciam peuh lecin hih mihonte kiangah nang kong paipihsuk ding hi,” a ci hi.

[1] Tu-in kamsang honte sung pan mi khat’ zi Elisha’ tungah kiko-in, “Na nasem ka pasal si hi. Na nasempa in TOPA a zahtakna na thei hi. Ahih hangin ka tapate nih sila dingin a la dingin a leibatna pa hong pai hi,” a ci hi.

[9] Kote pen sal ka hi takpi uh hi; ahi zongin ka salsuahna uhah ka Pasian un nong nusia kei a, kote’ Pasian’ biakinn puahkikin ka dinsakkik theih nading uh le Judah le Jerusalem-ah kidalna kulh ka neih theih nadingun kipat thakna na hong piak theih nadingin Persia kumpite ko tungah a thunuam dingin nong bawlsak hi.
[2] A pil silapa in a topa’ ta hai tungah aana nei-in a topa’ gamh pawlkhat a luah hi.
[10] Mihaite a nop lua-in a nuntak ding kilawm lo a, silate in miliante a uk ding kilawm lo zaw lai hi.
[16] Hauhnop manin mihaute letsong pia leeng kizawnlawh a, hauhnop manin mizawngte’ neihsa laksak lehang zong kihauhlawh tuan lo hi.
[10] Sila khat a topa kiangah gensia kei in; amah in nang hong gensia-in gimna na thuakkha ding hi.

[1] TOPA in Jakob hehpihin Israel teelkik ding a, amaute pen a gam uhah koihkik ding hi. Khual mite in amaute pawlin Jakob innkuan bel ding uh hi. [2] Israel mite in amaute manin amau’ gamah ciahpih ding uh a, TOPA’ gam sungah amaute pen sila numei sila pasal dingin nei ding uh hi. Amaute a man ngei mite pen tu-in amaute in lehmat ding uh a, amaute a nengniam ngei mite tungah tu-in ukna nei ding uh hi. [3] A haksa nasep hong kisepsakna, gimna le lungkhamna panin TOPA in note tungah tawldamna hong piak ciangin, [4] Babylon kumpipa tungah hih zahkona kam na zang ding uh a, “Kumpi gilo pa pukta a, amah in kuamah nengniamzo nawn lo ding! [5] Tawlnga loin mihingte satna-in a kizang, hehna tawh minamte ukin nakpitakin a bawlsia, migilote’ ciangkhut le gam ukte’ kumpi ciangkhut, TOPA in kuaitan khinta hi.

[1] Gimna a thuak mite tungah thuhoih a puak dingin TOPA in kei hong teelin hong sawl ahih manin keima sungah Topa PASIAN’ kha hong om hi. Lungsim kitamzante a damsak ding, salin a kimante tungah suahtakna thu a gen ding, a kikhum mite a dingin thong kong a hong ding,

[8] Zedekiah kumpipa in numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin Hebru mipih silate khahkhia-in, kuamah in a Jew mipihte sila-in khawi thei lo ding hi, ci-in suahtakna ding thu zasak a, Jerusalem khua-a mi khempeuh tawh thuciamna a bawl hi. [9] Zedekiah kumpipa in numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin Hebru mipih silate khahkhia-in, kuamah in a Jew mipihte sila-in khawi thei lo ding hi, ci-in suahtakna ding thu zasak a, Jerusalem khua-a mi khempeuh tawh thuciamna a bawl hi.

[2] Minam dang khempeuh kaikhawmin Jehoshafat Kuam-ah ka paipih ding hi. Ka mihingte tungah a bawlnasa uh hangin tua munah amaute thu ka khen ding hi. Amaute in Israel mite, gam dangah thehthang uh a, ka gam sung teng phelhawm mangkhin uh hi. [3] A galmatte uh kua in ngah ding, ci-in ai san uh a, zu le numei lei nadingin numeino le naupangnote sila-in a zuak uh hi.
[6] Khedap bu khat man dingin mizawngte sila-in i zuak nuam a, i mangbuh hoih lote sum tampi i khawng nuam hi,” na ci uh hi.
[12] Lametna a om no salte aw, ciahkik unla, a muanhuai mahmah na mun ngei uh zuankik un. Note’ thuaknasa a zah nihin thupha ka hong piakna ding tuni-in note kiangah ka hong gen hi.
[24] “Kuamah, to nih’ sila hikhawm thei lo hi. Khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat tungah thumanin khat simmawhbawl ding hi. Note in Pasian’ na le leitung sum na na semkhawm zo kei ding uh hi.

[25] Ahi zongin Jesuh in amaute sam a, “Mi a uk Gentail-te in mite tungah aana nei uh a, mi a makai Gentail-te in thuneihna tawh a ukna thu na thei uh hi. [26] Ahi zongin note lakah tua bang hi lo ding hi. Note lakah a lian ahi dingte note’ nasem hi ding a, [27] note’ lakah a lianpen ahi dingte note’ sila hi ding hi. [28] Mihing Tapa zong nasem nei dingin hong pai hi loin mi dangte a’ ding na semin, mi tampi tat nading a si dingin a hong pai ahih mah bangin note zong a tuaci ding na hi uh hi,” a ci hi.

[45] “A pil a citak nasem i cih a bangcite ahi hiam? A naseppih dangte ukin a hun manmanin amaute’ nekzah ding ciat an a pia dingin a topa in a seh a nasempa ahi hi. [46] A topa hong ciah ciangin ama sawl bangin na semin a om a muhpa pen mi hampha mahmah khat ahi hi. [47] Ke’n kong genin-ah, ama neihsa khempeuh a uk dingin a topa in tua nasempa a koih ding hi. [48] Ahi zongin tua nasempa nasem hoih lo hi hen la, a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka topa hong ciahhak ding hi,’ ci-in, [49] a naseppih a lawmte satgawp hen la, zukham thei mite tawh anne zune-in na om leh, [50] a topa tung dingin a uploh ni hun khatpeuhin a topa hong tung ding a, [51] a topa in nakpitakin gim pia-in, mihoih a kineihkhemte’ gimthuak dingteng thuaksak ding a, amah kapin a hagawi ding hi.

[14] “Inn panin khualzin dingin a paikhia mipa tawh zong kibang hi. Amah in a nasemte samin, a neihsateng a nasemte’ kep dingin a ap hi. [15] Amau’ siamna tawh kizui-in khat tungah tulnga, khat tungah tulnih, khat tungah tulkhat a ap khit ciangin a zinkhia hi. [16] Tul nga a ngah pa in sum bawlna-in zangpah a, a meet tulnga mah a ngahthuah hi. [17] Tul nih a ngah pa in zong a meet tulnih mah a ngahthuah hi. [18] Ahi zongin tulkhat a ngah pa in leisung to-in a topa’ sum a seelcip hi. [19] “Hun sawtpi khit ciangin tua nasemte’ topa hong ciahkik a, a nasemte tawh a sum thu a siangsak uh hi. [20] Tul nga a ngah pa in a dang tulnga mah hong tawithuahin, ‘Topa aw, kei tungah tulnga nong ap hi. Hih lai-ah tulnga mah ka meetsak hi,’ hong cih ciangin

[42] Ahi zongin Jesuh in amaute samin, “Leitung mi a ukte in mite tungah aana nei-in, mi a makaite in thuneihna tawh a ukna thu na thei uh hi. [43] Ahi zongin note lakah tua bangin hi lo ding hi. Note lakah a lian nuam khat peuhpeuh, adangte khempeuh’ nasem hi ding a, [44] a makai ahi nuam khat peuhpeuh, adangte khempeuh’ sila hi ding hi. [45] Bang hang hiam cih leh Mihing Tapa zong, midangte ama na a semsak dingin a hong pai hi lo hi. Midangte’ na a sem ding le mi tampi a tatkhiat nading ama nuntakna a pia dingin a hong pai ahi zaw hi,” a ci hi.

[18] “Gimna a thuak mite tungah Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin Topa in kei hong sehkhin ahih manin keima sungah Topa’ kha hong om hi. Salin a kimante tungah suahtakna thu a gen ding, mittawte in khua a muhkik theih nading, a kinengniamte a suaktasak ding le

[42] Topa in, “A pil a citak nasempa i cih a bangcite ahi hiam? A naseppih dangte ukin a hun manmanin amaute’ nekzah ding ciat a pia dingin a topa in a seh nasempa ahi hi. [43] A topa hong ciah ciangin hih ama sawl bangin a sem a muh nasempa pen mi hampha mahmah ahi hi. [44] Ke’n kong cihin-ah, a neihsa khempeuh a uk dingin a topa in tua nasempa koih takpi ding hi. [45] Ahi zongin tua nasempa in a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka topa hong ciahkik hak ding hi,’ ci-in ngaihsunin a naseppih numei le pasalte satgawp hen la, zukham ankhamin ommawk leh, [46] tua nasem pa’ topa pen ama upmawh loh ni, a theihkholh loh hunin hong tung ding hi. A topa in nakpitakin amah gim pia ding a, a thumang lo mite tawh a kibangin a thuaksak khawm ding hi.
[13] “To nih’ na a semkhawmzo nasem kuamah om lo hi. A to khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat beelin khat a simmawh ding hi. Pasian’ na le leitung sum na na semkhawmzo kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[12] “Khatvei, ulian khat om a, kumpi za a lakkhit ciangin a ciahkik dingin gamlapi gamah a pai dingin a ding khia hi. [13] A dinkhiat ma-in ama nasem mihing sawmte sam a, amaute tungah sum zakhat ciat pia-in, ‘Ka om loh sungin hih sumte tawh na siam bang bangun sum na bawl ciat un,’ ci-in a vaikhak hi. [14] Ahi zongin ama gammite in hih ulianpa mudah uh ahih manin ama nungah kamtai sawl uh a, ‘Ka kumpi dingun nang kong deih kei uh hi,’ cisak uh hi. [15] “Ahi zongin hih ulianpa kumpi za ngahsa-in hong tunkik ciangin, sum a ap a nasemte in bangzah ciat a na meetsak uh hiam ci-in a theih nadingin a kiangah a nasemte hong pai nadingun thu a pia hi. [16] A nasem khat hong pai masa a, ‘Topa aw, nong sum piak zakhat tawh tulkhat ka meetsak hi,’ hong ci hi. [17] Amah in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi; nang pen nasem gina na hi hi. Thuneu-ah citak na hih manin khuapi sawm na uk ding hi,’ a ci hi.

[31] Tua ahih manin amah a um Jew mite kiangah Jesuh in, “Ka thuhilhnate na zuih paisuak nak-uhleh ka nungzui taktakte na hi ding uh hi. [32] Tua ciangin thuman na thei ding uh a, tua thuman in note hong suaktasak ding hi,” a cih leh [33] amaute in, “Kote Abraham’ suanlekhakte ka hi uh a, cikmahin kuama salin ka om ngei kei uh hi. Tua ahih manin bang hangin, ‘Note suakta ding,’ hong cithei na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi. [34] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “A mantakin ci lehang mawhna a bawl mi peuhmah mawhna’ sila ahi uh hi. [35] Silate pen innkuan mite tawh omkhawm paisuak lo a, tapa ahihleh om paisuak hi. [36] Tua ahih manin Tapa in note hong khah le a suakta takpi na hi uh hi.
[16] A mantakin ci lehang, sila pen a topa sangin lianzaw ngei lo a, a kisawlpa zong a sawl pa sangin lianzaw ngei lo hi.

[15] Nasemte in a tote’ nasepna bangmah thei lo ahih manin note pen nasemte ka hong ci nawn kei ding hi. Ka Pa’ tung panin ka zak thu khempeuh note kiangah hong genkhin ka hih manin note, lawm, ka hong ci zaw ding hi.
[1] Pasian kiang panin a hong pai Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin Pasian’ teelna tawh sawltak ahi, Jesuh Khrih’ sila keimah Paul in lai ka hong khak hi.

[16] Mi khatpeuh’ thu a mang dingin ama khut sungah na kipiak uh ciangin a thu na mante uh’ sila na hi uh hi. Mawhna na bawl uhleh sihna a thuak ding na hi uh a, thumangin na om uhleh Pasian tawh pawlkhat a suak ding na hi uh hi.

[14] Thukham pen i kha thu tawh kisai hi, ci-in i thei hi. Ahi zongin kei pen leitung pumpi tawh a nungta mi ka hi a, mawhna thu mangin a sal a suak ka hi hi. [15] Ka hihnopteng hihkha loin ka hih nop loh tengkeek mah hih zawsop ka hih manin keima gamtatna mahmah zong ka tel thei kei hi. [16] Ka hih nop lohteng ka hih veve ciangin Thukham a deihhuai khat hi, ci-in ka ngaihsutna hong langsak hi. [17] Tua ahih manin tua bangin a gamta taktak pen kei hi loin ka sunga om mawhna hizaw hi.

[15] Note tungah Pasian in a hong piak a Kha Siangtho in note na lau nadingun sila-in a hong bawl hi lo a, Kha Siangtho in Pasian’ tate a hong suaksak ahi zaw hi. Tua Kha Siangtho mah in Pasian pen, “Pa aw, Pa aw,” hong ci theisak hi.

[21] Sila ahi mi khat Pasian in a sap leh phamawh lo hi; sila mahin ki-om thei veve hi. Ahi zongin suahtak theih nading lampi a om leh tua hunhoih hamphatna zang tahen. [22] Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in a sap sila ahi mi pen Topa a dingin mi suakta hi a, tua mah bangin Khrih in a sap a suakta mi pen Khrih a dingin sila ahi hi. [23] Note pen Pasian’ hong leisa na hih manun mite’ sila suak kei un.
[19] Kei pen kuama khutnuai mi hi loin a suakta mi hinapi-in, mi a tam theithei ka ngahzawh nadingin mi khempeuh’ khutnuai mi-in ka kibawl hi.
[5] Bang hang hiam cih leh kote’ hilh thu pen komau’ thu hi lo a, Khrih Jesuh pen Topa ahi hi, ci-in a hilh ka hi uh a, kote pen Khrih hangin nomau’ na a semte ka hi uh hi.

[27] Khrih sungah a kiphum note in Khrih’ pianzia a nei khinta na hi uh hi. [28] Tua ahih manin Jew mi le Gentail mi, sila le sila ahi lo, numei le pasal cih bangin kideidanna om nawn lo a, note khempeuh Khrih tawh na kipawlna hangun pawlkhat hi-in, a kibangkim na hi uh hi. [29] Khrih tawh na kipawl nak-uhleh Abraham’ suante na hita uh a, Pasian’ hong khap thute a ngah ding na hi uh hi.

[1] Ahi zongin gamhluah ding tapa in a pa’ neihsa khempeuh a luah ding hinapi-in a neulai hun sungteng silate mah bangin bangmah thu nei lo hi. [2] A pa in ama gamhluah dingteng a piakma, a neulai hun sungteng, midang in tua naupang kemin a vai ding a hawmsak hi. [3] Tua mah bangin eite zong kha thu-ah i neulai hun sungteng huihlak a uk vangneite’ khutnuai-ah a om ihi hi. [4] Ahi zongin a hun a cin ciangin eite khempeuh Pasian’ tate i suahtheih nadingin Thukham nuai-ah a om mite a hong tankhia dingin Pasian in a Tapa hong paisak a, tua Tapa pen leitung ngeina bangin numei sung panin hong suakin, Jew Thukham sungah hong nungta hi. [5] Ahi zongin a hun a cin ciangin eite khempeuh Pasian’ tate i suahtheih nadingin Thukham nuai-ah a om mite a hong tankhia dingin Pasian in a Tapa hong paisak a, tua Tapa pen leitung ngeina bangin numei sung panin hong suakin, Jew Thukham sungah hong nungta hi. [6] Note pen ama tate na hihna uh a hong lah nadingin Pasian in ama Tapa’ Kha Siangtho, eite sungah hong tumsak a, tua Kha Siangtho in Pasian pen, “Pa aw, pa aw,” hong cisak hi. [7] Tua ahih manin note pen sila hi nawn loin Pasian’ tate na hih manun Pasian in ama tate a dingin a koih khempeuh, note tungah hong pia ding hi.

[22] Lai Siangtho sungah hih bangin na kigelh hi: Abraham in tapa nih nei a, khat pen a zi’ silanu tawh a neih a tapa hi a, a khat pen a zi tawh a neih a tapa ahi hi. [23] Silanu tawh a neih a tapa pen leitung ngeina bangin a suak mawkmawk hi a, ahi zongin a zi tawh a neih a tapa pen Pasian’ thuciamna tawh kizui-in a suak ahi hi.
