[24] Hihte pen gentehna lim ahi hi. Hih nupi nihte pen thuciamna nam nih a lahna ahi hi. Sila a suak tate a hingkhia nu Hagar hi a, Sinai Mual tunga kipia thuciamna a lahnopna ahi hi.

[30] Ahi zongin Lai Siangtho sungah, “Sila numei’ tapa in sila ahi lo numei’ tapa tawh gamh luahkhawm thei lo ding ahih manin, sila numei le a tapa hawlkhia in,” na kici hi. [31] Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, eite pen sila numei’ tate ihi kei a, sila ahi lo numei’ tate ihi hi.
[1] Khrih in eite hong khahkhiat khitna hangin mi suaktate hi khinta ihih manin tua suahtakna thu-ah kipin om unla, sila va suakkik nawn kei un.

[13] Sanggamte aw, note ahihleh a suakta mi ahi dingin Pasian in a hong sap ahi hi. Ahi zongin tua suahtakna pen na pumpi uh ut bangbangin gamtat theih nadingin paulam zonna-in nei kei unla, itna tawh khatlekhat kikhualna-in zangzaw un.

[5] Silate aw, launa le linna tawh na leitung tote uh thu mang unla, Khrih’ na na sep uh mah bangin lungsim takpi tawh na na sepsak un. [6] A hong pahtak ding uh deihna tawh amaute’ muhsung bekin tuaci gamtat kei unla, Khrih’ sila na hihna hangun Pasian’ hong deih bangin lungsim takpi tawh na sem un. [7] Mihingte’ na a sem bang lelin kingaihsun loin Topa’ na a sem bangin kingaihsun unla, thanopna tawh sem un. [8] Salte ahi a, sal ahi lote ahi zongin na hoih a sem mi khempeuh, Topa in thaman a piak ding lamtak na thei un. [9] Tote aw, silate in note hong bawl mah bangin note in zong amaute limbawl unla, tawn’ gawpgawpnate zang nawn kei un. Note le na silate uh vantung panin To khat khutnuai-ah a om na hihna uh le tua Topa in kuamah maitang zahtak tuam nei loin a kibangin mi khempeuh thu a khen ahihna thu na phawk ta un. [10] Tu a kipanin Topa tawh na kipawlna uh le ama vangliatna hangin na tha uh khauhsak ta un.

[22] Silate aw, thu khempeuhah na leitung topa uh thu na mang un. Amau’ hong pahtak ding deihna tawh a hong muh sung bekin a hoihtatte hi kei unla, Topa na zahtakna uh hangin lungsim tak tawh gamta un. [23] Mite’ nasem bangin kingaihsun loin, Pasian’ nasem bangin kingaihsun unla, na sep peuhpeuh uh lungsim takpi tawh lawpin sem un. [24] Topa in note tungah thaman a hong piak ding lamtak phawk gige un. Tua bangin na sepna uhah Khrih Topa’ na a semsem na hi uh hi.
[1] Tote aw, note in zong vantungah To khat na neihna uh phawk unla, na silate uh a kilawm a kituakin bawl un.
[18] Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho in, “Buh a cil bawngtal muk na tuam kei in,” a cih banah, “Nasempa in a thaman a ngah ding a kilawm ahi hi,” na ci hi.

[1] Kuamah in Pasian’ min le i thuhilhnate hong gensiatsak lohna dingin sila khempeuh in a tote uh zahtakbawl ta uh hen. [2] Thu um mi to-in a nei silate in upna sungah sanggam khat hi hang, ci-in ngaihsutna tawh a tote uh zahtakbawl loin omkha kei uh hen. Amaute’ nasepna hangin hamphatna a ngah mite pen thu um mi le a it uh mite ahih manin a hoihzaw-in a sepsak ding uh a kilawmzaw ahi hi. Tu-a ka hong gen ding thute mi khempeuh tungah hilhin gen in.

[9] Silate in zong a tote uh thu mangin, thu khempeuhah a tote uh a lungkimsak nading, a tote uh thu seelloin, [10] a guktak loh nading, a tawntungin hoih gamtatin a cihtakna uh a kilatsak nadingun na hanthawn in. Tua hileh eite hong Hon Pasian’ thu a hoihna a kilangsakte ahi ding uh ahi hi.

[14] Tate a cih mite pen leitung cilesa a nei mite ahih manin, ama sihna hangin sihna a uk Dawimangpa a sukgawp theih nadingin Jesuh in mihing pianzia mah hong nei phot hi. [15] Tua ahih manin sihna a kihtak manin sal bangin a om mite amah in hong suaktasak hi.
[1] Pasian le Topa Jesuh Khrih sila keimah James in Leitung mun khempeuhah kithehthangin a om minam sawm le nihte tungah hopihna lai ka hong gelh hi.

[16] Sila ahi lo mi bangin gamta unla, ahi zongin gitloh gamtat nadingin na suahtakna uh zang loin Pasian’ sila bangin na gamtazaw un. [17] Mi khempeuh zahtak bawlin thu uppih mite na it unla, Pasian zahtak bawlin kumpipa zong na zahtak un. [18] Nasemte aw, na tote uh thu na mang un. A thudik a migi na tote bek uh a zahtak hi loin a gilo na tote uh thu zong na mang un.
[19] Amaute pen siatna a piangsak thei zongsatna lelin sila hinapi-un mite tungah suahtak nading thu a gen uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mite pen, a hong zo peuhpeuhte’ sila ihi hi.
[16] Tua ganhing in a lian a neu, a hau a zawng, sila le sila ahi lo, mi khempeuh in a taklam khut tung uh ahih kei leh a taltang uhah ciaptehna a neih nadingun thu a pia hi.
[33] “Na gam sung uhah note lakah khualmi khat hong peem leh, ama tungah a man loin na gamta kei ding uh hi.
[32] TOPA’ vantungmi in ama kiangah, “Bang hangin na la thumvei dong sat na hi hiam? En in, hih na khualzinna-ah lungkim lo ka hih manin nang hong pang dingin kong kuankhia hi.
[6] TOPA in amah ta neisak lo ahih manin amah a el a zipih in amah nakpitakin phin zel, hehsak zel hi.

[11] Ama zomah Harar mi Agee’ tapa Shammah ahi hi. Besan a dimna mun Lehi-ah Filistia-te kikaikhawm uh a, Filistia-te’ kiang panin mite tai uh hi. [12] Ahih hangin amah in tua munah panmun la-in hu a, Filistia-te that a, TOPA in gualzawhna lianpi a piangsak hi.

[23] Amah tua lai panin Bethel-ah paito hi. Lampi-ah a paitoh laitakin khuapi panin naupangneu pawlkhat hong paikhia-in amah zahko uh a, “Paito in, nang lukolh pa” a ci uh hi. [24] Tua ciangin amah a kiimah khuadak a, amah in amaute a muh ciangin TOPA’ min tawh amaute a samsia hi. Tua ciangin gamlak panin vompi nih hong pai-in naupang sawm le nih balnen hi.
[1] Sanballat in kote’ kulh cianna thu a zak ciangin lungkim loin heh mahmah a, ko Jew mite hong zahko hi.

[12] Nopna a neih theih nadingin nuntakna le khansau a deih kua ahi hiam? [13] Siatna ding panin na leii kem inla, zuau genna panin na muk kem in. [14] Siatna panin kihemkhia inla, a hoih bawl in. Kilemna ding hanciam inla, na phak mateng delh in.

[17] TOPA aw, bang tanvei hong enkhong ding na hi hiam? Amau’ hong sukgawpna panin keimah hong honkhia inla, humpinelkaite kiang panin kei hong hon in. [18] Tua ciangin mihon kikhopna lian sungah nangma tungah lungdamna ka hong ko ding a, mihonpite lak panin nang ka hong phat ding hi. [19] A man lopi a ka gal a hite kei tungah lungdamsak kei inla, thu om lopi a kei hong mudahte, mitheek kipiasak kei in. [20] Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in kilemna thu gen lo uh a, daitakin a om mite langpangin, khemna thu ngaihsun uh hi. [21] Amaute in kei hong kamkat beba uh a, amaute in, “Ha, Ha! Mu khin hang ei!” ci uh hi. [22] TOPA aw, na mu khin hi; dai ommawk ke’n! TOPA aw, kei kiang panin gamla om ke’n! [23] Ka Topa, ka Pasian aw, ka thu hong thei inla, kei a dingin nangmah hong kisosuah tawm in! [24] Ka TOPA, ka Pasian aw, na thumanna tawh a kituakin keima thutanna hong langsak inla, keima gimna-ah amaute lungdamsak ke’n! [25] Amau le amau tungah, “Ha, i tuptup tung ei!” kicisak kei in. “Amah nawmvalhtum khin hang,” amaute cisak kei in. [26] Kei’ kamsiatna-ah a lungdamte maizumsak inla, zahhuaigawp sak in! Kei tungah a hong kiliansakte maizumna le mindaina thuaksak in! [27] Kei thutang ka hihna lahkhiat ding a deihte lungdamin awngin, kipaaksak inla, “A nasempa’ hoihna-ah a lungkim TOPA lian hi,” cici sak in. [28] Tua ciangin na thumanna le nangmah phatna sunthapai-in ka gengen ding hi.
[4] A ginalo mite le a cimawh mite hon unla, migilote’ khutsung panin amaute honkhia un,” a ci hi.

[16] TOPA in a muhdah, a khahkhong ngei loh ding, thu guk, tua zah bek hi lo, thu sagih tak om a, tuate pen [17] kihihsakna, zuauthu genna, mawhnei lo mi thahna, [18] thusia bawl ding ngaihsutna, gamtatsiat ding a manlangte, [19] zuauthu gen teci man lote, le kitotna a piangsakte ahi hi.
[12] Muhdahna in kitotna piangsak a, itna in mawhna khempeuh maisak hi.
[18] Ngaihsun lo-a kampauna in tem hiam bangin mi liamsak thei a, mipilte’ kampauna in tua bang liamna damsak thei hi.
[6] Mi a simmawh theite in pilna a zon uh hangin ngah zo lo uh a, thungaihsun theite in olno takin ngah thei uh hi.
[31] Mizawngte bawlsiatna pen a piangsak Pasian simmawhna hi a, mizawngte tungah citna pen Pasian zahtakna ahi hi.
[1] Kam nemin dawnna in hehna damsak a, kam khauh in hehna piangsak hi.
[5] A zawngte a simmawh pa in amah a Piangsak pa a simmawh hi a, midangte’ tuahsiatna-ah a lungdam mipa in gim thuak hamtang ding hi.
[9] Mi’ khialhna a maisakte midangte in itin lawm hau uh a, mi’ khialhna ciaptehna pen lawm taanna ahi hi.
[14] Kitot i kipat ciangin tui lipi cinna phung kehsakkhak tawh kibang hi. Tua ahih manin a nasiat ma-in kitot khawlpak in.
[21] Kampauna in sihna ahi a, hinna ahi zongin piangsak thei a, i kampauna bangin a piangte san loh phamawh hi.
[10] Mi kiphasakte hawlkhia lecin kitotna le kisimmawhna bei pah ding hi.

[11] Nangma tungah a heh mite khempeuh maizumna kithuaksakin kikoihkhong ding hi. Nangmah hong dem mite a mawkna suakin siatna thuak ding uh hi. [12] Nangmah hong langpangte na zon hangin amaute na mu nawn kei ding hi. Nangmah hong dote pen bangmah hi het lo ding uh hi. [13] Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah TOPA na Pasian in na khut taklam ka len hi. “Lau kei in, nangmah kong huh ding hi,” nang tungah a hong ci pa keimah ka hi hi.

[12] TOPA in, “Kei, keimah pen note hong hehnem pa ka hi hi. Lopa sangin sauvei a nungta zaw tuan lo, mihing lellelte, bang hangin kihta na hi uh hiam? [13] Vantungte zalin, lei bulpite a koih, note a hong bawl TOPA hong mangngilh khinta na hi uh hiam? Note susia dingin a kithawi, no a hong nengniamte’ hehna, bang hangin kihta-in lau tawntung na hi uh hiam? Amaute’ hehna in note hong susiazo het lo ding hi.
[14] Thuman le thutang in nang hong thahatsak ding hi. Nenniamna tawh na kigamla ding a, nang na lau kei ding hi. Kihtakna tawh na kigamla ding a, nangma nai-ah tuate hong pai lo ding hi.
[11] “Midangte in keima hangin a man lopi-in hong simmawhin hong bawlsia a, a nam tuamtuamin hong gensiat uh ciangin thupha ngah mi na hi uh hi.

[22] Ahi zongin ke’n note kiangah kong genin-ah: A sanggampa tungah a heh mi in thukhenna thuakkha thei ding hi. A sanggampa kiangah, ‘Bangmah a kimang lo,’ ci-in a ko bawl mi in uliante mai-ah thusitna thuak thei ding a, a sanggampa kiangah, ‘Mi hai,’ ci-in a simmawh mi in hell meikuang sungah khulna thuak thei ding hi.

[38] “Note in, ‘Mittang khat tang ding mittang khat, ha khat tang ding ha khat,’ ci-in a kigenna na zaksa uh ahi hi. [39] Ahi zongin note kiangah ke’n kong genin-ah: A gilote na thukkik kei un. Mi khatpeuh in na paang taklam hong bet leh a langkhat zong na dawh lai zaw in. [40] Mi khatpeuh in na puansungsilh a ngahnop manin zumah hong khia-in hong laksak leh na puantungsilh zong na piathuah lai in. [41] Galkapte khatpeuh in tai khat sung a van pua dingin hong sawl leh a valin tai khat sung mah na puaksak lai in. [42] Mi khat peuhpeuh in na khat peuhpeuh hong nget leh na pia inla, nang kiang panin na a hong leitawi mite na pia in. [43] “Note in, ‘Na vengte uh na it unla, na galte uh na mudah un,’ ci-in a kigenna thu na zaksa uh ahi hi. [44] Ahi zongin ke’n note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong bawlsiate a dingin thu na ngetsak un. [45] Tua hileh vantungah a om na Pa uh tate na hi thei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in mihoihte le misiate tungah a kibangin ni taangsak khawm a, a gamtat phate le a gamtat siate tungah zong a kibang mahin guah zusak khawm hi. [46] Tua ahih manin no hong itte bek na it uhleh Pasian in bang thaman hong pia zenzen ding ahi hiam? Siahdongte nangawn in amau a itte it thei uh hi. [47] Na lawmte bek uh hopihin thupha na piak uhleh mi mawkmawkte sangin na hoihzawkna uh bang om ahi hiam? Gentail mite nangawn in tua bang ciang lel hih thei uh hi. [48] Tua ahih manin vantungah a om na Pa uh a cingtaak mah bangin note zong lungsim citakin na cingtaak nading uh na hanciam un.

[1] “Pasian in note hong mawhsak loh nadingin midangte va mawhsaksak nawn kei un. [2] Bang hang hiam cih leh midangte’ thu na khenzia uh tawh kizui-in note tungah hong khen ding a, midangte tungah na zat uh ngeina mah note tungah hong zang ding hi. [3] Bang hangin na lawmte’ mit sunga ninthem tang muhsak thei napi-in nangma mit sunga singluang tang phawk thei lo na hi hiam? [4] Nangma mit sungah singluang a tang kimlai, bangci-in na lawmte kiangah, ‘Na mit sunga ninthem tang hong lakkhiatsak ning,’ ci thei ding na hi hiam? [5] No a kineihkhem mite aw, note’ mit sunga singluang tang lakhia masa le-uhcin, na lawmte uh mit sunga ninthem tang na lakkhiat theihna dingun hoihtakin khua na mu thei pan ding uh hi.
[12] Tua ahih manin note tungah hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah na bawl un. Moses Thukhamte le kamsangte’ thuhilhnate pen hih mah a deihna ahi hi.
[42] Jesuh in, “Mi khatpeuh in kei hong um hih naupangno khat a khialsak ding ahihleh a ngawngah an gawina suang lianpi khat kikhihin tuipi sungah kikhia leh ama a dingin hoihzaw thampek hi.
[31] A nihna in: Nangma pumpi na it bangin na vengte na it in, cihna ahi hi. Hih tegel sangin thukham a lianzaw a dang om nawn lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[27] “Ahi zongin ka thugen a za note kiangah kong cihin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong mudah mite tungah a pha na bawl un. [28] No hong phuisamte thupha na pia unla, no hong bawlsiate a’ ding thu na ngetsak un. [29] Na paang langkhat a hong bengte, a langkhat zong na dawhlai un. Na puantungsilh uh a hong sutte tungah, na puansungsilh uh zong na piathuah lai un. [30] A hong ngente peuhmah na pia unla, na na uh a hong laksakte tung panin lakik kei un. [31] Note tungah a hong kibawl ding na deih uh bangin midangte tungah na bawl un.
[7] Amaute in Jesuh kiangah dong teitei uh ahih manin amah zong dingin amaute kiangah, “Note lakah mawhna a nei het lo pa in deng masa un,” a cih khit ciangin,
[12] “Note tungah ka hong piak thu in: Note ka hong it zahin note khatlekhat na ki-it un.

[33] Keimah tawh na hong kipawlna uh hangin lungnopna na neihtheihna dingun hih thu a hong gen ka hi hi. Leitung gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Ahi zongin keimah in leitung nate zo khinta ka hih manin lungnuamin om un,” a ci hi.

[22] Hih bangin Jesuh a pau ciangin biakinncing palikte khat in Jesuh beeng a, “Bang hangin hih bangin siampi lianpen pa tungah kampau ngam na hi hiam?” a ci hi. [23] Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “A man loin kampau khial ka hih leh ka khialhna hong lak in. Ka thugen a man ahih manin bang hangin hong beeng zenzen na hi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.

[1] Tua ahih ciangin midangte’ thu a khen note pen kuakua hita le-uh cin na suakta tuan kei ding uh hi. Midangte na mawhsakna uh thute mah note zong gamta veve na hih manun, no zong a mawh mah na hi uh hi.

[35] Tua ahih manin bangin Khrih’ itna tawh hong kikhensakzo ding ahi hiam? Haksatna, lungkhamna, bawlsiatna, gilkialna, zawnna, lauhuaina, sihnate khat peuhpeuh in hong khenzo ding ahi hiam? [36] Lai Siangtho sungah zong, “Note hangin sunthapai-in siat nading lauhuaina ka thuak uh a, gawh ding tuu bangin a hong kibawl hi,” ci-in a kigelh hi. [37] Eite a hong it pa’ hangin hih thu khempeuhah a gualzo pente ihi hi.

[2] Leitung mihingte’ gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahphasak un. Tua hileh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkimsakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian’ deihna na phawk thei ding uh hi.
[14] No a hong bawlsia mite, Pasian in thupha a piak nadingin thu ngetsak unla, tua bang mite samsia loin thupha piazaw un.

[17] Midangte’ gitlohnate thukkik kei unla, mi khempeuh in hoih hi, ci-in a ngaihsut ding bangin gamta un. [18] Ahih theih laiteng mi khempeuh tawh na kilem nadingun hanciam un. [19] Lawmte aw, na hehna uh kuama tungah thukkik kei unla, Pasian’ thukkik dingin koih lel un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho sungah, “Keimah in amaute tungah ka thuk ding a, midangte a gimsak bangun ka gimsak ding hi, Topa in ci hi,” ci-in kigelh hi. [20] Tua ahih ciangin Lai Siangtho sungah, “Na galte uh a gil a kial leh an na pia un. A dang a taak leh tui na pia un. Tua bangin na gamtat uhleh amaute’ maizum nadingin a bawl na hi uh hi,” ci-in a kigelh bangin gamtazaw un.
[7] Tua ahih ciangin Khrih in note hong san mah bangin midangte in Pasian a phattheih nadingun note khatlekhat na kisang un.
[3] Note na hi uh a, leitung mite in ahi zongin kei tungah mawhna hong zongin thu nong khen uh hangin bangmah phamawh ka sa kei hi. Kei mahmah zong kimawhsakin thu ka kikhen kei hi.
[14] Na sepna khempeuh uhah ki-itna tawh na gamta un.
[29] Na kiho uh ciangin kamguh zang kei unla, na pauna uh a za mite in phattuamna a ngahtheih nadingin na-in a kimang kam hoihte bek na pau un.
[6] Hih bang mawhnate i bawl hangin phamawh kei, ci-in a mawk gen mite’ khemsa-in ta kei un. Pasian thu mang loin hih bangin a gamta mite in Pasian’ hehna a thuak ding uh ahi hi.
[3] Huaihamna lungsim le kisialh nopna lungsim tawh bangmah gamta kei un. Kiniamkhiat ciat unla, midangte thupi ngaihsutzaw un.

[1] Nitawp ni hun pen a lauhuai hun ahih ding lamtak phawk in. [2] Tuahun ciangin mite in amau angsung ding bek ngaihsunin, huaihamin, kisialin, kihisakin, mi zahko-in, nu le pate’ thu mang loin, lungdam theihna mel nei loin, biakna lungsim nei loin, [3] mi khual loin, hehpihna nei loin, mi gensia-in, ngongtatin, kihtakhuai-in, thuhoih deih loin, [4] ciampelin, thu khual loin, kiphasak gawpin, Pasian don loin pumpi nopsakna bek deihin,

[8] A tawpna-ah kong gennop thu in: Lungsim le ngaihsutna kikhat nei-in unau ki-itna lungsim nei unla, migi-in kiniamkhiat un. [9] Hong bawlsiate siatna tawh thukkik loin hong samsia mite samsia kik kei unla, Pasian in note a hong sap lai-in thupha a hong piak dingin hong ciamsa ahih manin, hong siat bawlte thupha tawh na thukzaw un.
[13] Note in a hoih gamtat ding utin hanciam le-uhcin kua in hong bawlsia ding ahi hiam?
[9] Mi khatpeuh in khuavak gamtatna ka gamta hi, ci napi-in a Khristian mipihte a muhdah leh khuamial gamtatna mah a gamta lai ahi hi.
[15] A Khristian mipih a mudah mi peuhmah mi that hi a, mi thatte in nuntak tawntungna a neih lohna thu na thei uh hi.

[12] A lian a neu misite tua tokhom mai-ah dingin laibute a kilem ka mu hi. Tua ciangin a nungta mite a kigelhna laibu a dang khat zong a kilem ka mu hi. Amaute’ gamtatna tua laibute sungah a kigelhna tawh kizui-in misite tungah thu a kikhen hi.
[4] Amaute’ mit panin khitui khempeuh nulsak ding hi. Thu luisate maimang khinta ahih manin sihna, dahna, le na sa-a kahna cihte om nawn lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
[8] Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, le zuaugente om nading mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[12] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Kei ka hong pai baihta ding a, mi khempeuh a gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in a thaman ding uh ka hong puak ding hi.
[25] “Note tawh a om, a zawng keima mite khat peuhpeuh tungah sum leitawi na piak uhleh, ama tungah sum leitawi a piapa bangin na om kei ding uh a, ama tung panin a meet na dok kei ding uh hi.

[7] “ TOPA na Pasian un note hong piak gam sunga na khuate uh khat peuhpeuh sungah na sanggam khat uh note lakah a zawng a om leh na lungsim uh khauhsak loin, na sanggam zawng pa uh huh loin na om kei ding uh hi.
[19] “Na sanggampa tungah sumgum hitaleh, ankhing hitaleh, a meet ngaihsutna-in na khat peuhpeuh leitawi na pia kei ding uh hi.
[17] “‘A vengpa’ gisuang a botkhia mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.

[12] Note’ leitangah ama hunin guah a zusak ding le na sepna khempeuh uh thupha a pia dingin TOPA in a na hoih kholna vantung note hong hon ding hi. Note in minam tampite tungah leitawi na pia ding uh a, ahih hangin note in leitawi na la kei ding uh hi.
[7] TOPA in zawngsakin hausak a, amah in niamkhiat sukin, zong sangtosak hi.

[11] Pasian in Solomon dawngin, “Hih thu na lungsim sungah om a, nangmah in neihsate, hauhna, pahtawina, ahih kei leh nang hong mudahte’ nuntakna hong ngen loin, a tungah kumpi-in nang kong koihna ka mite na uk theih nadingin nang a’ ding pilna le theihna hong ngen na hih manin, [12] pilna le theihna nangma tungah hong kipia hi. Nang’ ma-a kumpite kuamah in a neih ngei loh, nang’ khit-ate kuamah in zong tua bang a neih loh ding hauhnate, neihnate, le pahtawina zong, nangma tungah kong pia thuah ding hi,” a ci hi.
[16] Migilote’ hauhna sangin thuman mite in tawmno khat bek a neihna hoihzaw lai hi. [17] Bang hang hiam cih leh migilote’ thahatna kipaih khiatsak ding a, ahih hangin TOPA in mihoihte a huh hi.
[9] Na neihsa le na anpalte tawh TOPA zahtak in.
[4] Thadahna in zawnna hi a, thanuamna in hauhna hi.
[24] Mi pawlkhat in sum zang ziahziah napi-in hau semsem uh a, mi pawlkhat cil mahmah napi, zawng semsem hi. [25] A cingh mite hau semsem ding a, midang a huhte in huhna mah ngahkik ding hi.
[28] Tuk lai-a singteh tam bangin midikte’ hauhna khang ding a, phalbi lai-a singteh pulh bangin hauhna a suangte kiam ding uh hi.
[22] Midikte in a tu a tate’ luah ding gamh nei uh a, mawhneite’ neihsate ahihleh midikte a’ ding hi lel hi.
[4] Bawngtal om kei leh lo panin an tawm bek kila a, bawngtal tha tawh an a kihau ahi hi.
[8] Thuman loin hauhna sangin thumanin tawmno neihna a hoihzaw ahi hi.
[16] Kham sangin pilna hoihzaw a, ngun sangin thutheihna deihhuai zaw hi.
[16] Mihai pa in thu ngaihsun thei lo ahih manin pilna zonna ding sum tampi a zat hangin a phattuamna om lo hi.
[4] Mihaute in lawm mu thuahthuah a, mizawngte in a neihsun teng nangawn khahsuahsuah uh hi.
[7] Mi khempeuh in a sanggam zawng pa uh mudah ciat ahih manin a lawmte in a taisatna a thu lamdang hi lo hi.
[23] TOPA a zahtakte a khansau a, lungkim takin nuamsa-in om uh a, siatna bangmah tuak kha lo uh hi.
[10] Tawisuang nam nih le piciang nam nih zangin mi khemna pen TOPA in a deih lohna kibang hi.
[21] A baih lamin hauhpakna pen a tawpna-ah phattuamna om lo hi.
[6] Zuaugenna tawh hauhnate beimang pak a, sihna khuk sung hong tunpih hi.
[20] Mipil pa’ inn sungah neihlelam a dimin om a, ahi zongin mihai pa in a ngahzahzah zangkhia pah hi.
[1] Hauhna sangin min hoihna deihhuai zaw a, kham le ngun sangin mi’ hong thusimna deihhuai zaw hi.
[2] A hau a zawng a kilamdanna om lo a, a nih tuakun TOPA’ bawlsa ahi uh hi.
[7] Mihaute in mizawngte uk a, leitawi a late pen a piate’ sila a suak hi.
[16] Hauhnop manin mihaute letsong pia leeng kizawnlawh a, hauhnop manin mizawngte’ neihsa laksak lehang zong kihauhlawh tuan lo hi.
[4] Hauhnop man bekin sum’ sila suak kei unla, a man loin gamtakha kei un. [5] Na ngahsa uh sumte mitphiat kalin beimang thei a, muvanlai bangin thakhatin leengmang thei hi.
[23] Na tuuhonte hoihtakin thei inla, na bawnghonte hoihtakin kem in. [24] Bang hang hiam cih leh neihsa kip tawntung lo a, hauhna pen a khangkhangin kizom suak lo hi.
[20] A citak mipa in thupha tampi ngah ding a, a hau baih nuam mipa in gim tuak pelmawh ding hi.

[10] Sum deihna lungsim na neih leh lungkim hun cih na nei ngei kei ding hi. Na hauhnop hangin na deih khempeuh na ngah ngei kei ding hi. Hih pen a mawknapi ahi hi. [11] Hau semsem lecin na vak ding mi tam semsem a, a hau zaw hi’ng, ci-a na theih bek cih simloh bangmah phattuamna na ngah kei hi. [12] Na a sem mipa pen a nek ding nei taleh nei ta kei leh lungnuam takin ihmu thei a, a haute ahihleh lungnuam takin ihmu thei lo uh hi. [13] A hoih het lo na khat hih leitungah ka mu hi: Mite amau’ lunggim nadingin hau uh hi. [14] Na a sep khialh manun a neihsa teng uh suplawh uh a, a tu a tate’ luah ding bangmah om nawn lo hi. [15] I nute’ sung panin bangmah nei loin guaktangin i suah mah bangin guaktang mahin i ciahkik hi. I sepsate i ciahpihkik theih bangmah om lo hi.
[12] Sum in hong lungmuansak bangin pilna in zong hong lungmuangsak hi. Pilna a manphatna, a pilte a nuntaksak theihna ahi hi.
[1] Sumbawl nadingin na sumte zang in. Ni khat ni peuh teh a meet na ngah ding hi.
[7] Tui tampi nangawn tawh kisumit zo lo a, tui sungah i phumcip hangin mitzo tuan lo hi. Mi khat in a neihsa sum khempeuh tawh itna a lei dingin hong kithawi leh kinuihsan lel ding hi.
[11] Thuman lopi tawh a hau mi pen ama tui lopi a keuhsak dingin a opsim vasa tawh kibang hi. A khanlai-in a neihsa teng taan ding a, a tawpna-ah mihaipi a suak ding hi.

[5] Note in na lungsim sung uhah, “I ante i zuak theih nadingin zumkhak hun bei ding i ngaklah hi. I mangbuhte i zuaktheih nadingin cik ciangin Sabbath ni bei ding ahi hiam? I antehna seu neuseekin sum tampi i ngen nuam a, tawikhaina man lo zangin a hong leite i khem nuam hi. [6] Khedap bu khat man dingin mizawngte sila-in i zuak nuam a, i mangbuh hoih lote sum tampi i khawng nuam hi,” na ci uh hi. [7] TOPA, Israel Pasian kiciam a, “Na gamtatsiatnate uh ka mangngilh ngei kei ding hi.

[12] Tua ciangin kei zong amaute kiangah, “Hoih na sak uhleh ka tuucin thaman hong pia un. Hoih na sak kei uhleh lah tang lel un,” ka ci hi. Tua ciangin ka thaman dingin ngun shekel sawmthum hong pia uh hi. [13] Tua ciangin TOPA in kei kiangah, “Biakinn sumkoihna sungah tuate koih in,” hong ci hi. Tua ciangin kei zong, kei tawh kituakin tam a sak mahmah uh tua dangka sawmthum la-in biakinn sumkoihna sungah ka koih hi.
[21] Bang hang hiam cih leh na sum omna uhah na lungsim uh om tawntung ding hi.
[24] “Kuamah, to nih’ sila hikhawm thei lo hi. Khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat tungah thumanin khat simmawhbawl ding hi. Note in Pasian’ na le leitung sum na na semkhawm zo kei ding uh hi.

[8] Cinate damsakin, misite hingsakin, miphakte damsakin, dawite va hawlkhia un. Man piak kul loin hih vangliatna na ngah uh bangin hih vangliatna na zatna uhah zong man va ngen kei un. [9] Kham ahi a, ngun ahi a, sumngo ahi zongin sum peuhmah na ip sung uhah keng kei un. [10] Khualzinna-ah an ngenin puak nading ip ahi a, khedap ahi a, ciangkhut ahi zongin keng kei unla, puanak zong a val kengthuah kei un. Nasem mite pen amau sapnateng mite in a piak ding a ngeina ahi hi.

[22] Lingbulsum omna leilakah a tu khaicite pen Pasian’ thu za napi-in amau nuntakna sung uhah leitung lunghihmawhna le hauh nopnate in Pasian’ thu vuknelh ahih manin bangmah a suakkhia zo lote a cihnopna ahi hi.

[44] “Vantung ki-ukna pen lolai-ah a kiseel sum tawh kibang hi. Mi khat in a muh ciangin limtakin a seelpha hi. Amah lungdam mahmahin a inn-ah ciahpah a, a neih khempeuh a zuak khit ciangin tua lo a lei hi.

[21] Jesuh in, “Mi cingtaak na hihnop leh pai-in na neihsate va zuak inla, na sum khotte, mizawngte tungah va pia lecin, vantungah sum na hau ding hi. Tua ciangin hong pai inla kei hong zui in,” a ci hi.
[15] Keima sum pen keima ut bangin ka zattheih ding hi lo ahi hiam? Tua ahih kei leh kei ka cit manin na heh suak ahi hiam?’ a ci hi.

[12] Tua ciangin Pasian biakna innpi huang sungah Jesuh lut a, tua sungah van zuak van lei-a a om mi khempeuh a hawlkhia hi. Sumkhek nasemin a om mite’ sabuai le vakhu zuakte’ tutnate a lumletsak gawp hi. [13] Amaute kiangah, “Pasian in Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Ka inn pen thungetna inn kici ding hi,’ ci napi-in, note in guktakna phualpi na suaksak uh hi,” a ci hi.
[21] amaute in, “Sisar’ lim le a min kigelh hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Sisar’ nate Sisar’ tungah na pia unla, Pasian’ nate Pasian’ tungah na pia un,” a ci hi.

[14] “Inn panin khualzin dingin a paikhia mipa tawh zong kibang hi. Amah in a nasemte samin, a neihsateng a nasemte’ kep dingin a ap hi. [15] Amau’ siamna tawh kizui-in khat tungah tulnga, khat tungah tulnih, khat tungah tulkhat a ap khit ciangin a zinkhia hi. [16] Tul nga a ngah pa in sum bawlna-in zangpah a, a meet tulnga mah a ngahthuah hi. [17] Tul nih a ngah pa in zong a meet tulnih mah a ngahthuah hi. [18] Ahi zongin tulkhat a ngah pa in leisung to-in a topa’ sum a seelcip hi. [19] “Hun sawtpi khit ciangin tua nasemte’ topa hong ciahkik a, a nasemte tawh a sum thu a siangsak uh hi. [20] Tul nga a ngah pa in a dang tulnga mah hong tawithuahin, ‘Topa aw, kei tungah tulnga nong ap hi. Hih lai-ah tulnga mah ka meetsak hi,’ hong cih ciangin [21] a topa in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi; a hoih a citak nasempa aw, a tawmno na zekna-ah siam na hih manin a tampi tak ka hong zeksak ding hi. Hong pai in; kei tawh nuamsa khawm ni,’ a ci hi. [22] Tua ciangin tulnih a ngah pa zong hong pai-in, ‘Topa aw, kei tungah tulnih nong ap hi. Hih lai-ah tulnih mah ka na meetsak hi,’ hong cih ciangin [23] a topa in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi; a hoih a citak nasempa aw, a tawmno na zekna-ah siam na hih manin a tampi tak ka hong zeksak ding hi. Hong pai in; kei tawh nuamsa khawm ni,’ a ci hi. [24] Tul khat a ngah pa zong hong pai-in, ‘Topa aw, nang pen na sep loh na bawl lohnapi-ah na a deih, mi genhak mahmah na hihna ka hong thei hi. [25] Tua ahih manin ka hong kihta a, lei sungah na sum tulkhat ka seel hi. Tu-in hih lai-ah na sumzah mah om hi,’ a hong cih ciangin [26] a topa in, ‘A hoih lo, a thadah nasempa aw, ka sep loh ka bawl lohnapi-ah ka deihlam hong thei na hih leh, [27] sumkholna-ah ka sum na koihsak lecin hoih ding hi. Tua hileh tu-a ka hong tunkik ciangin a bulpi le a meet ka ngahkhawm ding hi. [28] Tua ahih manin ama tung panin a tulkhat laksak unla, tul sawm a nei pa tungah piathuah un. [29] Bang hang hiam cih leh a neisate kipiathuah ding a, hau semsem ding hi. Ahi zongin a nei lote tung panin a neihsa sunsun nangawn kilaksak ding hi. [30] Bangmahin a kimang lo hih nasempa ahihleh pualam khuamialna lakah lawnkhia un. Tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding hi,’ ci hi.
[6] Ahi zongin siampite in tua ngun peekte tawm uh a, “Hih sumte pen mi thah nadingin a kipia sum ahih manin biakinn sumkholna-ah koih dingin kilawm lo hi,” a ci uh hi.

[16] Amaute in zong dangka peek khat hong paipih uh a, tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Hih dangka tunga om kua’ lim hi a, kua’ min ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Rom Kumpipa Sisar’ lim le a min ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.

[41] Biakinn sumpi khiatna kuang gei-ah Jesuh tu a, mihonte in sumpi a khiat laitakun a en hi. A haute in tampipi hong khia uh hi. [42] A zawng meigong numei khat zong hong pai a, sumnen tang nih hong khia hi. [43] Tua ciangin a nungzuite sam a, “Adangte khempeuh sangin hih mizawng meigongnu in tam khia zaw hi. [44] Bang hang hiam cih leh adangte in a neihval a lamval sung panun a khia uh ahi hi; ahi zongin amah zawng mahmah napi-in ama kivak nading nangawn siit loin a neih khempeuh a khiakhin ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[14] Galkap pawlkhatte in zong ama kiangah, “Kote, bangci gamtat ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dot uh ciangin, “Zawhthawh thu tawh ahi a, a man lopi-in mawhsakna tawh ahi zongin kuama sum sut kei unla, na khasum ngahzah uh tawh lungkim un,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[25] Mi khat in leitung khempeuh a ngah hangin a nuntakna bulpi suplawh leh bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam?

[15] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute khempeuh kiangah, “Hoihtakin kidawm unla, na huaiham loh nadingun kikem un. Bang hang hiam cih leh bangzahta-in mi khat a hauh hangin a neihsa tawh a nuntakna taktak kicing zo lo hi,” a ci hi.

[33] Na neihsa uh zuak unla, mizawngte tungah tua sumte na pia un. Note a dingin a sia thei lo sumkholna na bawl unla, gutate in a luh zawh lohna, leikha in zong a nek zawh lohna, cikmahin a kiam ngei hetloh nading mun vantungah na sumte uh na khol un.
[11] Hih leitung sumte-ah na cihtak kei uhleh kua in no tungah vantung sum hong ap ngam ding ahi hiam?

[13] “To nih’ na a semkhawmzo nasem kuamah om lo hi. A to khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat beelin khat a simmawh ding hi. Pasian’ na le leitung sum na na semkhawmzo kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi. [14] Sum a deih phadiak Farisi mite in hih thute a zak uh ciangin Jesuh a nuihsan uh hi. [15] Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Mite in note a man penin hong ngaihsut theih nadingin na om uh a, ahi zongin Pasian in na lungsimtawng uh a hong thei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mihingte in a manpha mahmahin a ngaihsutte pen Pasian in bangmahin sim lo hi.

[34] Inn ahi a, lo ahi zongin a neite in zuak uh a, a sum ngahte uh sawltakte kiangah a ap uh hi. Mi khempeuh tungah a kisapna bang ciat un a sumte hawm uh ahih manin amaute lakah sum kitangsam kuamah om lo uh hi.

[1] Tua khit ciangin thu um mi hong tam tektek a, Jew mite le Grik pau a zang Jew mite kikalah kiphunsanna thu hong om hi. Grik pau a zang Jew mite in, “Annek tuidawn, sumlepai hawmna-ah ka meigong numeite uh hong kipiaksak lo hi,” ci-in lungkim lo uh hi. [2] Tua ahih manin sawltak sawm le nihte in thu um mi khempeuh samin kaikhawm uh a, “Kote in Pasian’ thu hilh ding don man lo liangin annek tuidawn sumlepai vai-ah kong manlah ding uh kilawm lo hi.
[20] Ahi zongin Peter in, “Pasian’ piakkhong na pen sum tawh lei theih dingin ngaihsun na hih manin na sumteng tawh sikhawm in.

[14] Tu-in kong hawh nading pen a thumvei nading hita a, note’ gim nadingin bangmah ka hong ngen het kei ding hi. Keima deih pen note’ sumlepaite hi loin note mahmah na hi uh hi. A taktakin ci lehang, tate in nu le pate a huh ding hi lo a, nu le pate in tate a huh ding hizaw hi. [15] Note ka hong huhtheih nadingin lungdamtakin ka neih khempeuh kong piaknop banah keima pumpi mahmah zong ka hong kipia nuam hi. Tuazah takin ka hong itna pen it lohna tengin hong nei zawsop ding na hi uh hiam? [16] Sumlepai vai-in note themkhat zong ka hong gimsak hetlohna na theihsa uh ahi hi. Ahi zongin mi pawlkhatte in, kei pen ngian zangin khemna tawh a lamdang khatah sum tamzaw ka ngah nading a vaihawmin hong gen uh hi. [17] Note kiangah ka hong paisak mite tungtawnin note kiang panin keima hamphat nading bang la ka hi hiam?
[16] Tuhun pen hun hoih lo hun ahih manin na hun neih khempeuh uh a hoih lamin zang un.

[5] thuman thutak zui loin, a lungsim paizia uh a man nawn lo, biakna pen hauhtheih nading lampi bekin a ngaihsun mite in a tawntungin kitot kiselna a piangsak uh ahi hi. [6] Pasian biakna hangin a neihsateng tawh a lungkim mite pen biakna in mihau a suaksak takpi mah ahi hi. [7] A taktakin ci lehang, leitungah mihingin i suah laitakin sumlepai tawh i suak kei a, i sih ciangin zong leitung panin bangmah i keng thei tuan kei hi. [8] Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn, nikten puansilh i neih nakleh a phazo ahi hi. [9] Ahi zongin a haunuam mite in ze-etna a tuamtuam thuak a, duhhopna, huaihamna a haivai thute-ah awkcipin, haksatna le siatna a tuahlawh uh hi. [10] Sum deihluatna in siatna namkim piangsak hi. Mi pawlkhat in sum deihlua liang uh ahih manin a upna panun pialkhia-in gimna lungkhamna tampi a thuaklawh uh hi.

[17] Tuhuna a hau mite kisatheikha loin, a kip lo hauhnate muan le suanin neikha loin, eite in nuamtakin i zat theih dingin citna tawh a hong pia Pasian a muan a suan nadingun na hilh in. [18] A hoih nate semin, gamtat pha-in, citna lungsim nei-in midangte a hopnop nadingun na hilh in. [19] Tua hileh mai lamah amaute’ nuntak nading bulpi taktak ahi neihsate, amau a dingin a khol mite ahi ding uh hi.

[16] Mi khat in a sih khit ciangin a gamhluah dingin a deih pa lai-in ciamtehin a koih leh a laibawl pa a sih phot ding kisam hi. [17] A laibawl pa a hin laiteng tua lai kizang thei lo a, a sih khit ciangin kizang thei bek hi.
[5] Sum deihluatna tawh na kipelh nadingun na nuntakna uhah kikem unla, na neihzah uh tawh lungkim un. Pasian in, “Note ka hong nusia ngei kei ding a, ka hong tamasak ngei kei ding hi,” hong ci hi.

[1] A haute aw, tu-in ka thugen hong ngai dih un. Note tungah a hong tung ding lungkhamna hangin kapin thum un. [2] Na neihsate uh muattumta a, na puante uh nget in netum khinta hi. [3] Na ngun le na khamte uh kekseu khinta hi. Hih kekseuna pen note langah teci suak a, mei in a kattum bangin na sa uh hong netum ding hi. Hih a hun nunung ciangin tu-a bangin a piang dingin neihsa a khol na hi uh hi. [4] Na lo uh a hong khawhsakte a thaman pia lo na hih manun tu-in amaute’ phunna za un. Anla dingin na sawl uh mite’ phunna Vanglian Topa in za khinta hi. [5] Hih leitung na nuntak sungun uang nekin na noptat mahmah uh hi. Note hong kigawh hun ding kiginna-in a kithausak phitphet na hi uh hi. [6] A thuman mite mawhsakin na that uh a, amaute in na thu uh hong nial zo lo uh hi.

[2] Pasian in note’ khut sungah a hong piak tuuhonte hoihtakin na cing unla, ut lo pipi hi loin, Pasian’ hong deih bangin utna lungsim takpi tawh na cing un. Sum ngahnopna bek tawh a sem hi loin utna lungsim tawh a semte na hi un. [3] Note’ kep dingin a hong kipia tuute, aana neihna tawh a cing hi loin tuute’ etteh dingin a gamtate na hi un.
[15] Hih leitung nate le Pasian tawh a kizom lo thute deihluatin nei kei un. Mi khatpeuh in hih leitung nate a deihluat leh amah in Pa Pasian it taktak thei lo hi.
[17] Mi khat hau mahmah hen la, a Khristian mipih a cimawhte mu napi-in huhna bangmah pianuam hetkei leh, bang hangin amah in Pasian ka it hi, ci thei ding ahi hiam?
[17] Note a zawng, a mittaw, puansilh ding a nei lo, a hehpihhuai, a lungkhamhuai na hih lamtak uh thei loin, kote hau-in ka cithei uh a, bangmah kisapna ka nei kei uh hi, na ci uh hi.
[30] Amah in, “Keimah in hih tuikhuk ka tawhna thu-ah nang in keima a dingin teci na hih theih nadingin nangmah in ka khutsung panin hih tuununo sagihte na la ding hi,” a ci hi.
[44] Tu-in hong pai in, nang le kei in thuciamna khat bawl ni; suangcian khat bawlin nang le kei’ kikalah teci hisak ni,” a ci hi.

[48] Laban in, “Hih suangcian pen tuni-in nang le kei’ kikalah teci ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in, Galeed, ci-in min phuak a, [49] a khuam pen Mizpah, ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Laban in, “Eite khatlekhat i tuam om ciangin TOPA in nang le kei’ kikalah hong encik tahen. [50] Ka tanute na bawl siat a, ka tanute’ banah zi na lak beh leh, eite tawh kuamah a om loh hangin nang le kei’ kikalah, Pasian, teci ahihna phawk in,” a ci hi. [51] Tua ciangin Laban in Jakob’ kiangah, “Nang le kei’ kikalah ka phuhsa hih suangcian mu in. [52] Siatna a bawl dingin keimah in hih suangcian khengin nang kiangah kong pai loh nading, nang zong hih suangcian le khuam khengin kei kiangah nong pai loh nadingin hih suangcian le suangkhuam, teci ahi hi.
[16] “Na vengte uh langkhatah a man loin teci na pang kei ding uh hi.

[1] “Thuman lo na genkhia kei ding uh hi. Elna tawh teci pang dingin migilo pa tawh na kipawl kei ding uh hi. [2] Siatna a bawl dingin mihon na zui kei ding uh hi. Thutang a hei khia dingin mihonpi nung zui-in thu neihna-ah teci na pang kei ding uh hi.
[1] “Mi khatpeuh teci pang dingin a kisap ciangin a muhsa a theihsa thute gen loin a ip leh, amah in tua mawhna pua ding hi.

[13] pasal khat in tua nu luppihin, a pasal in tua thu a theih kei a, tua nu kininsak napi-in kuamah in phawk loin, a khialh laitakin tua nu kiman lo ahih manin a langah a pang ding teci a om loh hangin,
[30] Khatpeuh in mi khat a thah leh, tecite’ genna siksanin mi that pa kithat ding hi. Ahih hangin teci khat bek’ teci panna siksanin kuamah kithat lo ding hi.

[26] Jordan galkhat luah dingin na paina leitang uhah na siat maimang baih nadingun note’ langkhatah teci pang dingin tuni-in van le lei ka sam hi. Tua leitang tungah note sauvei na hing kei ding uh a, na siamaimang ding uh hi.
[20] “‘Na vengte uh langkhatah zong a man loin teci na pang kei ding uh hi.

[6] Teci nih ahih kei leh thum bang genna tawh a si ding pa kithat ding a, teci khat bek thugenna tawh mi kithat lo ding hi. [7] A that dingin tecite masa ding a, tua khit ciangin midang khempeuh in hih ding uh hi. Tua bangin note’ sung panin hoih lohna na siangsak ding uh hi.

[15] “Mi khat in a hihkhak mawhna lian ahi a, khialhna khat peuhpeuh a gamtatna-ah ahi zongin tua mipa’ langah teci khat guak kicing lo ding a, teci nih ahih kei leh teci thum bang thugenna tawh mawhsakna kikipsak bek ding hi. [16] Elna lungsim a nei teci khat in mi khat gamta khial hi, ci-in a mawhsak leh, [17] thuneite a langnih tuakin, tuahun laitak a siampite le thukhente’ mai, TOPA’ mai-ah pai ding uh hi. [18] Thukhente in limtakin kan ding uh a, teci pa pen zuau teci hi-in, a man lopi-in a sanggampa a mawhsak ahihleh,
[7] amaute in teci pangin, ‘Kote in hih mipa ka that kei uh a, a kithahlam zong ka thei kei uh hi.

[19] Tuni-in note’ langkhatah teci a pang dingin vantung le leitung ka sam a, note’ mai-ah na teel dingun nuntakna le sihna, thupha le samsiatna ka koih hi. Tua ahih ciangin note le na suanlekhakte uh na hintheih nadingun nuntakna teel unla,

[19] “Tua ahih ciangin hih lai gelh inla, Israel mite hilh in. Hih la, kei a dingin Israel mite’ langkhatah teci a suah theih nadingin amaute tungah hilh in. [20] Bang hang hiam cih leh a pu a pate uh tungah piak dinga ka kiciamna, bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin a luanna gamah amaute tunpih khinin, amaute in ne-in khamin a thau khit uh ciangin, pasian dangte a bia dingin kihei-in kei hong simmawhin ka thuciamna siasak ding uh hi. [21] Siatna le haksatnate amaute tungah a tun ciangin hih la, teci-in amaute’ langkhatah pang ding hi (bang hang hiam cih leh a suanlekhakte un mangngilh lo ding uh hi); bang hang hiam cih leh piak dingin ka kiciam leitangah amaute ka paipih ma-in, amau’ vaihawm kholh a ngimnate uh ka thei hi,” a ci hi.

[26] “Hih Thukham laibu la unla, note’ langkhatah teci dingin a om theih nadingin TOPA na Pasian uh Thuciamna Singkuang gei-ah koih un. [27] Bang hang hiam cih leh a lehdo mite le a lungkhauh thei mite na hihna uh ka thei hi. En un, note tawh kei a nungta khawm laipi mahin, tuni-in TOPA na lehdo khin uh hi. Ka sih khit ciangin bangzah takin lehdozaw lai ding na hi uh hiam! [28] Hih thute amaute’ bilah genin, amau’ langkhatah teci a pang dingin vantung le leitung ka sap theih nadingin na minam upate uh le na uliante khempeuh uh kei kiangah hong khawm un.

[26] Tua ahih ciangin kote in, ‘Meihal biakna ahi a, biakpiakna ding ahi zongin hi loin, ama omna-ah ka meihal biaknate uh le ka biakpiaknate uh le thunuama ka piaknate uh tawh TOPA’ na ka sepna uh kote le note’ kikal le ko’ khit ciangin i suanlekhakte kikalah teci dingin bawl ni. Tua bang hikeileh hong tung ding hunte-ah na tate un ko’ tate tungah, “ TOPA’ sungah no’ tanh bangmah om lo hi,” ci kha ding uh hi,’ ka ci uh hi.

[28] Tua ahih ciangin hong tung ding hunte-ah kote tung ahi a, kote’ suanlekhakte’ tungah ahi zongin hih bangin hong kicih leh, ‘Meihal biak nading ahi a, biakpiak nading ahi zongin hi loin note le kote kikalah teci dingin ka pu ka pate un a bawl TOPA’ biakna tau lim en un,’ i ci ding hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun uh hi.
[34] Reuben mite le Gad mite in a biakna tau uh min dingin “Teci” a phuak uh hi. “Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA pen Pasian ahihna thu eite’ kikalah teci ahi hi,” amaute in ci uh hi.
[22] Tua ciangin Joshua in mite kiangah, “Ama na a sem dingin TOPA na teel khitna uhah note a dingin note mah teci na hi uh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, “Kote, teci ka hi uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

[27] Tua ciangin Joshua in mi khempeuh kiangah, “En un, hih suangtum pen eite’ langkhatah teci hi ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in eite tungah hong thugen khempeuh hih suangtum in za khin hi. Tua ahih ciangin note, na Pasian uh tungah a man loin na gamtat loh nadingun hih suangtum pen note’ langkhatah teci hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
[10] Gilead upate in Jefthah kiangah, “ TOPA pen eite’ kikalah teci hi ding hi. Na cih bangin ka gamta ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

[9] Tua ciangin Boaz in upate le mi khempeuh kiangah, “Tuni-in note pen Naomi’ tung panin Elimelek le Khilion le Mahlon’ neihsa khempeuh ka lei khitna thu teci na hi uh hi. [10] A site’ min ama sanggamte le a pianna a khuasung panin a maiman loh nadingin ama gamhluahna-ah a site’ min a kizop theih nadingin a si khin Mahlon’ zi, Moab numei Ruth zong ka zi dingin ka lei khin hi; note pen tuni-in teci na hi uh hi,” a ci hi. [11] Tua ciangin kulhkongpi-a om mite khempeuh le upate in, “Kote, teci ka hi uh hi. TOPA in Israel-te’ pianna Rachel le Leah bangin na innkuan sunga hong pai numei bawl tahen. Efrathah-ah na dau pai hen la, Bethlehem-ah na min thang tahen.

[5] Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Note in kei tungah bangmah na muh lohna thu uh TOPA pen note’ langkhatah teci hi a, ama sathau nilh pa zong tuni-in teci ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, “Hi mah hi; TOPA, i teci ahi hi,” a ci uh hi. [6] Tua ciangin Samuel in mite kiangah, “Moses le Aaron teelin Egypt gam panin na pu na pate uh a paikhiatpih TOPA, teci ahi hi.

[12] Tua ciangin Jonathan in David kiangah, “Israel-te’ Pasian, TOPA, teci hi ta hen! Zing ciang tubang hun ahi a, a ni thum ni-in ahi zongin, ka pa’ ngaihsutna tawng ka kankhiat khit ciangin, nangma tungah a lungsim a hoih leh, nang kiangah mi hong sawlin hong pulak lo ding ka hi hiam?

[18] Ulian ngate’ uk Filistia mite khuakulh tawh a ki-um khuapite le a ki-um lo khuaneute a dingin a khua phazah tawh kizui-in kham simbengte zong ahi hi. TOPA’ Thuciamna Singkuang a koihna gei uha suangtumpi pen Bethshemesh khuami Joshua’ lo-ah tuni dongin teci ahi hi.
[12] Tua ciangin Samuel in suangtum khat la-in Mizpah le Jeshanah kikalah phut a, a min Ebenezer a phuak hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Hih pen TOPA in eite hong huhna teci ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[16] Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, “Nangma mawhna nangma lu tungah tung ta hen; bang hang hiam cih leh nangma kampau in nang’ langkhatah teci pangin, ‘ TOPA’ sathau nilh pa ka that khin hi,’ na ci hi,” a ci hi.

[12] Tua ciangin amah in kumpipa’ tapa paikhiatpihin, ama lu tungah kumpi lukhu khusak a, kumpi hihna tecipanna lai amah a pia hi. Tua ciangin amaute in amah kumpi hi, ci-in taangko-in amah sathau a nilh uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in a khut uh bengin, “Kumpipa khansau hen!” a ci uh hi.

[19] Amah in a lungsim khempeuh tawh na thupiaknate, na teci pannate, le na thukhamte kemin a vekpi-in sem a, keimah in ka vaihawmsa biakinn lianpi amah in a lam theih nadingin ka tapa Solomon tungah utna lungsim guan in,” a ci hi.
[19] Ahi zongin TOPA’ lamah amaute a paipih kik dingin amah in amaute lakah kamsangte a puak hi. Hihte in amau’ langkhatah teci pang a, ahih hangin amaute in don lo uh hi.

[31] Tua ciangin kumpipa ama munah dingin, hih laibu sungah a kigelh thuciamna kammalte a sem dingin a lungsim khempeuh le a nuntakna khempeuh tawh TOPA’ nung a zuihna ding le ama thupiaknate, ama tecipannate, le a thukhamte a zuihna ding, TOPA’ mai-ah thuciamna khat a bawl hi.
[17] Kei a hong langpang dingin teci na nei tawntung a, keima tungah na hehna hong khang semsem a, kei nong sukna ding thuthak na mu tawntung hi.
[27] Vantungte in hih mipa’ mawhna pholak uh a, leitung in ama langah teci a pang hi.
[7] TOPA’ thu kicing a, nuntakna a thaksuaksak hi. TOPA’ teci panna hi takpi a, mi pillote pilsak hi.
[12] Ka langte’ deihna bangin kei hong nusia kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh teci man lote ka langah pang khin a, amaute in zuau genin kei hong tawng niloh uh hi.
[11] Mi a el tecite hong kipan uh a, ka theih loh thute kei hong dong uh hi.
[7] “Ka mite aw, ngai un; thu ka hong gen ding hi. Israel-te aw, note’ langkhatah teci ka pang ding hi. Kei pen Pasian ka hi a, nomau’ Pasian ka hi hi.

[5] Amaute pen Pasian tungah a lungsim thuman lo, lungsim kip a nei lo khangmi, lungsim khauhin a lehdo khangmi, amau’ pulepate tawh kibang loin, amaute in Pasian sungah amau’ lametna koihin, Pasian’ nasepnate mangngilh loin, ama thupiakte zui-in, a suak nai lo naupangte, a hong piangkik khang thakte in a thu thei-in, amaute ding khia-in amau’ tuletate tungah a thu a gentheih nadingin, amah in, i pate in a tate a hilhsawn dinga a sawl ahi, Israel sungah thukham khat koihin, Jakob sungah tecipanna khat a koih hi.
[7] Amah in meii khuampi sung pan amaute tungah thu gen a, ama teci pannate le amah in amaute tungah a thukham piakte amaute in a zui uh hi.
[79] Na teci pannate a theih nadingun nang hong zahtakte kei’ lamah hong kiheisak in.
[88] Na kam pana na teci pannate ka zuih theih nadingin na itna kip tawh kei hong hingsak in.
[95] Migilote in keimah a hong that dingin hong buk uh hi. Ahih hangin na teci pannate ke’n ka lungngaingai ding hi.
[99] Ka siate khempeuh sangin thu ka telzaw hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh na teci pannate ka ngaihsunsun hi.
[119] Leitung a migilote khempeuh sik-ek bangin na ngaihsun hi. Tua ahih ciangin na teci pannate ka deih hi.
[144] Na teci pannate a tawntungin thuman hi. Thu theihtelna hong guan in; tua hileh ka nungta ding hi.
[12] Na tate in, amau’ tungah ka hilh ding ka thuciamna le ka teci pannate a zuih nak-uhleh, amau’ tate zong na kumpi tokhom tungah tu paisuak ding uh hi,” na ci hi.
[19] zuauthu gen teci man lote, le kitotna a piangsakte ahi hi.
[17] Thuman mite in thu taktak mah gen uh a, zuau tecite in khemna thu bek gen uh hi.
[5] A citak teci in thuman bekbek gen tawntung a, a ginalo teci in zuau bekbek gen tawntung hi.
[25] Thutak a gen teci in nuntakna huzo a, zuauthu a gen teci in mi lehhek hi.
[5] Thuman gen lo teci in gim tuak pelmawh ding a, zuaugen mi suakta lo ding hi.
[9] Thuman lo teci in gim tuak pelmawh ding a, zuaugen mi in sihna thuak ding hi.
[28] Mi a susia nuam teci in thuman gen nuam lo a, migilote in gitloh tatna nuamsa uh hi.
[28] A man lo tecite mangthang ding uh a, thuman tecite’ kam kizaza ding hi.
[28] Thu kician om lopi-in na vengpa’ langkhatah teci pang kei inla, amau’ siat nadingin zuauthu gen kei in.
[18] A lawmte’ langkhatah teci man lo a pang mi pen molhtum, namsau, ahih kei leh thal hiam tawh kibang hi.

[9] Amau’ maiput in amau’ langah teci pang hi. Sodom bangin amaute a langtangin gamta uh a, amaute in im lo uh hi. Amaute in gimna ngah ta hen! Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in amau’ tung mahah siatna kitun uh hi.
[2] Hih thu a thei dingin a muanhuai teci, siampi ahi Uriah le Jeberekhiah’ tapa Zekhariah ka nei hi, hong ci hi.
[20] Tua ciangin note in, “ TOPA in note hong hilh thute ngai un. Aisante’ thu ngai kei un. Amaute’ hong gen thute a kimanna om lo hi,” ci-in dawng un.

[20] Tua pen Vanglian TOPA a dingin Egypt gam sungah lim le teci hi ding hi. A nengniam mite’ bawlsiatna hangin TOPA tungah amaute a kiko ciangin, amah in amaute kiangah honpa khat sawl ding a, amaute hu-in khahkhia ding hi.
[8] Tu-in pai inla, hong tung lai ding hunte-ah teci ahi ngitnget dingin amaute’ mai-ah suangpek tungah gelh inla, laibu khat sungah at in.

[9] Minamte khempeuh kikaikhawmsak unla, mihingte kikhawmsak un. Amaute’ lak panin kua in hih thu hong genkhia thei-in, a beisa huna nate kua in laktel thei ahi hiam? Amau’ dikna a langsak dingin a tecite uh hong paipihsak unla, amaute a thu zasakin, man mah hi, cisak un. [10] “Note pen keima teci na hi uh hi,” TOPA in ci a, “Kei pen Amah ka hihna thu, nangmah in thei-in keimah nong upna ding, nong theihtel nadingin kong teelsa ka nasempa na hi hi. Kei’ ma-in pasian om lo a, kei’ khitah zong kuamah om lo ding hi.
[12] Note lakah pasian dang a om ma-in honkhia-in, pulakin, ka genkhol hi. Tua ahih ciangin note pen keima teci na hi uh hi,” TOPA in ci hi.

[8] Lau kei unla, kihta kei un. Tanglai pek panin note kiangah hong genin hong pulak khin hi lo ka hi hiam? Note khempeuh keima teci na hi uh hi. Kei simloh pasian dang om ahi hiam? Suangpi dang om lo hi. Khat beek ka thei kei hi,” a ci hi.
[4] David pen mite tungah teci ding, mite a makai ding le a ukpa dingin ka koih hi.
[12] Bang hang hiam cih leh nangma tungah kote’ thupalsatna tampi tak pha a, ka mawhnate un kote’ langah teci hong pang hi. Kote’ thupalsatnate, ka mawhnate uh ka thei uh hi.

[23] Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute, Israel gamah hai gamtat uh hi: A innvengte’ zite mawhpih uh a, thu ka piak lohpi ka min tawh zuauthu a gen uh hi. Keimah TOPA in ka mu a, teci ka hi hi, hong ci hi,” ci-in ka gelh hi.
[10] Israel mite’ kiphatsakna in amau’ langkhatah teci pang hi. Ahi zongin hih thu khempeuhah zong, amau’ TOPA Pasian ahi kei’ lamah hong kihei tuan lo uh a, kei hong zong lo uh hi.
[2] No minam khempeuhte aw, hih thu za un: Leitungah a teng mi khempeuhte aw, hih thu ngai un: Note’ langkhatah TOPA Pasian in teci pang a, a vantung biakinn panin thu hong gen hi.
[17] Khatlekhat kisiatsakna ding vaihawm kei unla, a man lopi-in teci pangin kiciam kei un. Zuauna, thuman lohna, le kibawlsiatnate ka deih kei hi,” hong ci hi.

[5] Vanglian TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Note tungah thukhen dingin ka hong pai ding hi; ai tawite, numei tawh a mawhte, a man lopi a teci pangte, numeite’ thaman piakna-ah khemna a zangte; meigong, tagah, le gamdang mite a zawhthawh bawlte, le kei hong zahtak lo mi khempeuhte’ langkhatah thakhatin teci pangin thu ka khen ding hi.

[16] Ahi zongin na thu uh a hong mannop kei leh, Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Mi nih ahih kei leh mi thum’ theihna bek tawh mawhsakna khat peuhpeuh man pan hi,’ a cih mah bangin midang khat ahi a, nih ahi zongin tonpih un.
[14] Tua ciangin mi khempeuh tungah teci ahi dingin Pasian’ hong ukna hangin a lungdamhuai thu, leitung khempeuhah kihilh ding hi. Tua khit ciangin beina hong tung ding hi.

[59] Siampi liante le uliante in Jesuh a thahtheih nadingun zuau teci a pang ding mi a zong uh hi. [60] Teci tampi in hong gen hangin thahtheih nading zuau teci pang ding kimu lo hi. A tawpna ciangin mi nih in thu hong gen a,
[48] Tua ahih manin na pu na pate uh gamtatnate a thukimpih, a tecite na hi uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in kamsangte thatin, note in a han na bawl uh hi.
[48] Note pen hih thu khempeuh a thei teci na hi uh hi.

[32] Johan in hih mipa thu teci na pang a, “Vantung panin vakhu bangin Kha hong paisukin ama tungah a om ka mu hi. [33] Keimah in amah ka theih nai loh hangin, tui sungah mite a phum dingin kei a hong sawl Pasian in, ‘A tungah Kha hong paisukin a omna mipa pen Kha Siangtho sungah mite a phum ding pa ahi hi,’ ci-in hong genkhol hi. [34] Tua ahih manin hih mipa pen Pasian’ Tapa hi, ci-in thei ka hih manin teci ka pang hi,” a ci hi.
[11] A mantakin kong genin-ah, kote in ka theihsa uh thu bek genin, ka muhsa uh thu bek teci a pang ka hi uh a, ahi zongin note kuamah in ka thugente uh nong um nuam kei uh hi.

[31] “Keima thu tawh kisai-ah kei mahmah in teci pang leng kuamah in a thumanin sang thei lo ding hi. [32] Tua ahih manin keima a’ ding teci a pang ding mi khat om a, keima thu genin teci a panna thuman hi, ci-in ka thei hi. [33] Note in Johan kiangah thu a dong dingin mi na sawl uh a, amah in note kiangah a thuman hong genzo hi. [34] Keimah in mihingte’ teci panna a kisam ka hi kei a, note in hotkhiatna na ngahtheih nadingun note a’ ding ngaihsutna tawh hih thuteng a hong gen ka hizaw hi. [35] Johan pen meivak bangin kuangin a taang hi a, ama khuavak sungah tawlkhat nuamsa-in om ding na ut uh hi. [36] Ahi zongin Johan’ teci panna sangin a lianzaw teci khat ka nei a, tua in: Ka Pa in sep dingin a hong piak tu-a ka sep thute in kei a dingin teci a pang hi a, Pa in kei a hong sawl taktak ahihna hong kilangsak hi. [37] Tua ban panin kei a hong sawl Pasian in zong keima a dingin teci a pang hi. Note in Pasian’ sawl pa’ thu um lo na hih manun Pasian’ aw lah za ngei lo, a maitang lah mu ngei lo, na lungsim uhah zong ama thu a ciing lo na hi uh hi. [38] Tua ban panin kei a hong sawl Pasian in zong keima a dingin teci a pang hi. Note in Pasian’ sawl pa’ thu um lo na hih manun Pasian’ aw lah za ngei lo, a maitang lah mu ngei lo, na lungsim uhah zong ama thu a ciing lo na hi uh hi. [39] Nuntak tawntung ngahtheih nading lametna tawh Lai Siangtho sung na lim sim mahmah uh a, tua na sim uh Lai Siangtho in keima thu mah genin teci pang napi-in, [40] na nuntak theih nadingun kei kiangah nong painuam kei veve uh hi.

[17] Na Thukham sung uhah zong, ‘Thu khat peuhpeuhah mi nih in a manna teci pangin a gen leh a genna uh thuman hi,’ ci-in na kigelh ahih mah bangin, [18] keima a’ ding teci ka pang a, kei hong sawl Pa Pasian in zong keima a dingin teci a pang hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[21] “Tua ahih ciangin Topa Jesuh’ thawhkikna thu teci pangin a hong genpih dingin Judas tangin mi khat i lak ding kisam hi. Tua mipa pen Johan’ tuiphum kipat hun a kipanin Jesuh vanah a kilaktoh hun ciang dong, Jesuh’ nasepna khempeuhah eite tawh a omkhawm mi khat ahih ding kisam hi,” a ci hi.
[32] Pasian in sihna panin hih Jesuh hingkiksak a, kote khempeuh pen hih thu a thei teci vive ka hi uh hi.
[15] Tua ahih ciangin mite tungah nuntakna a piapa na that uh a, ahi zongin sihna panin Pasian in amah hingkiksak hi. Ko tegel pen hih thu a thei teci ka hi uh hi.
[33] Topa Jesuh’ thawhkikna thu, sawltakte in vangliatna tawh teci pang uh a, Pasian in amaute khempeuh tungah thupha tampi a pia hi.

[32] Hih thute thei-in teci a pangte pen ko sawltakte bek hi loin Kha Siangtho tawh zong ka hi uh a, tua Kha Siangtho pen amah a um mite tungah Pasian in a khongin a piak ahi hi,” ci-in a dawngkik uh hi.
[58] khua pualamah kaikhia-in suang gol pipi a khiat uh hi. Hih thu-ah teci pangin Stefen a deng mite in a puantungsilh uh suahin Saul a kici tangval khat kiangah lawnin a kemsak uh hi.

[39] Amah in Jerusalem khua le Jew mite omna mundang khempeuhah a septe khempeuh a thei tecite ka hi uh hi. Jew mite in sing tungah amah khai-in a that uh hi. [40] Ahi zongin Pasian in a ni thum ni-in amah hingkik sakin hong kilangsakkik hi. [41] Mi khempeuh tungah kilangsak loin, a thei teci dingin Pasian in a hong teelsa kote bek tungah hong kilangsak hi. Sihna panin a hinkik khit ciangin kote in amah tawh an nekhawm tui dawnkhawmin ka om uh hi. [42] Kote in mite kiangah thu ka hilh nading uh le mihing le misite tungah thu a khen dingin Pasian in amah a sehna thu teci a pang dingin a hong sawl hi.
[15] Tua ahih manin na muhsa le na zaksa thu khempeuh, mi khempeuh tungah genin teci a pang ding na hi hi.
[11] Tua zanin Paul kiangah Topa hong ding a, “Hang takin om in. Hih Jerusalem khua sungah keima thu genin teci na pan’ mah bangin Rom khuapi-ah zong keima thu genin teci na pang ding hi,” a ci hi.
[21] Ahi zongin tu-in thukham zuihna hang hi loin thudang khat hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theih nading lampi hong kilangzo a, Thukham le kamsangte in zong hih thu-ah teci a pang uh hi.
[2] Amaute in Pasian a kin mahmah lamtak uh thei-in teci-in ka pang ngam hi. Ahi zongin amaute in a man lampi tawh kin kha lo uh hi.
[15] Tua bek zong hi lo lai-in, misite a kihingkiksak lo ding hileh Pasian in Khrih hingkiksak hi, ci-in teci pang ka hih manun, mite kiangah Pasian’ thu a man lopi-in a gen ka suak ding uh hi.
[23] Note kiangah kong pai lohna pen note ka hong dopna hizaw hi. Hih thu hong theihpih ka teci pen Pasian ahi hi.
[28] Moses Thukham a zui lote pen mi nih le thum in mawh mah hi, ci-in teci a pan’ khit nakleh kihehpih hetloin sihna kithuaksak hi.

[1] Tua hi a, eite in i kiim i pamah hih zahin a tam teci nei ihih ciangin eite a hong dongtangsak thei nate khempeuh le eite a hong gakcip mawhna le khialhnate khempeuh paikhia-in, i mai-ah a om tai nading lampi a mong dongin lungsim kiptakin tai ni.

[3] Na ngun le na khamte uh kekseu khinta hi. Hih kekseuna pen note langah teci suak a, mei in a kattum bangin na sa uh hong netum ding hi. Hih a hun nunung ciangin tu-a bangin a piang dingin neihsa a khol na hi uh hi.

[12] Thu upna sungah mi citakin ka ngaihsut Silas’ huhna tawh hih lai tomno gelhin amah ka hong puasak hi. Hih thute pen Pasian’ hong hehpihna taktak hi, ci-in teci pangin note ka hong hanthawn hi. Tua ahih manin hih thute-ah kipin om un.

[1] Leitung piancil lai pek a kipanin a omsa ahi nuntakna a piathei Thu tawh kisai, note kiangah ka hong gelh uh hi. Kote mahmah in ama thugen ka za uh a, ka mit mahmah uh tawh amah mu-in, limtakin ka ettel uh hi a, ka khut mahmah uh tawh ka lawn’ uh ahi hi. [2] Hih nuntakna pen a kimuthei a hong suah ciangin kote mahmah in ka mu uh hi. Tua ahih manin kote tungah a hong kilak, Pa Pasian tawh a omkhawm tua nuntak tawntungna pen genbelin nei-in, note tungah zong a hong gen ka hi uh hi. [3] Pa Pasian le a Tapa Jesuh Khrih tawh kote pawlkhatin ka om uh mah bangin note zong kote tawh pawlkhat nong suahtheih nading uh deihna-in ka muhsa uh le ka zaksa uh thute a hong gen ka hi uh hi.

[6] Hih Jesuh Khrih pen tui tawh kiphumna le a sisan luangin sihna tawh a hong pai hi a, tui bek tawh a hong pai hi loin tui le sisan tawh a hong pai ahi hi. Kha mahmah in hih thu a manna teci a pang hi. Kha pen thuman gen ahi hi. [7] Hih thu-ah teci a pang thum om a, [8] tuate pen Kha, tui, le sisan ahi uh hi. Hih thumte’ teci panna kibang kim hi. [9] Mihingte’ teci panna sangthei ihih leh Pasian’ teci panna i santheih ding thupizaw hi. Pasian in ama Tapa’ thu tu-a bangin teci hong pang hi. [10] Tua ahih manin Pasian’ Tapa a um mi peuhmah in Pasian’ teci panna a sang ahi hi. Ahi zongin Pasian’ thugen a um lo mi peuhmah in ama Tapa thu teci pangin a gennate a um lo uh ahih manin Pasian pen zuaugen a suaksak ahi uh hi. [11] Tu-in Pasian’ teci panna in: Pasian in ama Tapa tungtawnin eite tungah nuntak tawntungna a hong pia hi.

[5] thuman takin teci a pang, sihna panin a kithokiksak Tapa upa, leitung kumpite tungah ukna aana a nei Jesuh Khrih kiang panin note tungah hehpihna le nopsakna thupha hong tung tahen. Tua Jesuh Khrih in eite hong it a, ama sihna tawh i mawhna panin eite hong suaktasak a,

[13] Satan in a kumpi tokhom a phuhna munah a om na hih lamtak uh ka thei hi. Keima thu citakin teci a pang cinten Antipas, Satan’ omna munah a kithah hun laitak nangawnin kei na hong upna uh na khahsuah kei uh hi.
[14] “Laodisia khua pawlpi vantungmi kiangah lai gelh inla, thuman le citakin teci a pang, Pasian’ piansakte khempeuh a kipatna ahi Amen’ thugen in:
[9] Ciamtehna ngana a hon ciangin Pasian’ thu a genna hang le Pasian’ thu citakin teci a panna uh hangin a kithat mite’ kha, biakna tau nuai-ah a om ka mu hi.

[3] Ka teci nihte puanhampi silhin ka paisak ding a, amaute in ni tulkhat zanih sawmguk sung Pasian’ thu a gen ding uh hi,” hong ci hi. [4] Tua teci nihte pen leitung Topa mai-ah a om oliv kung nihte le meivakna nihte ahi uh hi.
[7] Amaute in Pasian’ thu genin a teci panna a zawhkhit uh ciangin kuahawm thukpi sung panin a hong paikhia ganhing in tua teci pangte simin zogawpin that ding a,

[10] Teci a pang tua kamsang nihte in leitung mite tungah gimna nakpitakin tungsak uh ahih manin hih mi nihte a sihna hangin lungdamin pawi bawl ding uh a, a nuamna uh hangin khatlekhat letsong kipia ding uh hi. [11] Ahi zongin ni thum le ni lang a cinkhit ciangin amaute sungah Pasian kiang panin nuntakna hu lutin, amaute a khe-un hong ding uh ahih manin a mute khempeuh nakpitakin lau mahmah uh hi. [12] Tua ciangin tua teci pang nihte in, “Hih lai-ah hong pai un,” ci-in vantung panin a kisapna awging a za uh hi. Tua ahih manin a galte uh’ muhin vantung meiipi sungah paito uh hi.
[20] Hih thu khempeuh hong genin teci a pang mipa in, “Ka hong pai baih taktak ding hi,” hong ci hi. Na cih bangin hi ta peuh hen. Topa Jesuh aw, hong pai ta in!

[17] “Na vengte uh inn na deihgawh kei ding uh hi. Na vengte uh zi hitaleh, ama nasempa hitaleh, ama nasemnu hitaleh, ama bawngtal hitaleh, ama la hitaleh, na vengte a’ ahi na khat peuhpeuh na deihgawh kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[1] TOPA pen tuucin bangin hong cing hi a, kisapna teng kicing ta hi. [2] Lo nona-ah hong lumsak a, tuidam kiangah hong paipih hi. [3] Thahatna thak kei hong guan hi. A hong ciamsa mah bangin-ah lampi manah kei hong kha hi. [4] TOPA aw, kei hong ompih na hih manin khuamial thukpi ka nawk hangin ka lau kei hi. Na molhtum le na ciangkhut in kei hong hu hi. [5] Keima galte’ muhna munah an nong lui hi. Thupi takin nong pahtawi a, keima hai zong dimlet ta hi. [6] Na hoihna le nong itna in ka khantawnin a hong zuih ding tel takin-ah ka thei ta a, a tawntungin na inn sungah ka om ding hi.

[2] Ahih hangin kei ka hih leh ka khe kisuipuk dektak a, ka khe taal dektak hi. [3] Bang hang hiam cih leh migilote’ daupaina ka muh ciangin mi kihisakte ka eng hi. [4] Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in nat velvalna bangmah thuak lo uh a, a pumpi uh cidamin zol hilhial hi. [5] Amaute in midangte bangin haksatna thuak lo uh a, amaute in midangte bangin gimna ngah lo uh hi. [6] Tua ahih ciangin amaute in khainiang bangin kiphatsakna ok uh a, puan bangin ngongtatna silh uh hi.

[5] Mi ciimsate ciimsak semsemin, mi pilsate pilsak semsemin, [6] paunakte le thugentehnate hoihtakin thei-in, mipilte’ kampau leh a thugente uh a theih nading ahi hi. [30] Lungnopna in pumpi cidamsak a, hazatna pen guh a muatsak natna ahi hi.
[17] Sik in sik mah hiamsak thei a, mi in midang pilsak thei hi.
[22] Mihingte muanin nei nawn kei un. Amaute leltak banga simtham ding ahi hiam?

[1] “Bang hang hiam cih leh vantung ki-ukna sung omzia pen a leenggah lo-ah na a sem ding a cial dingin zing tungin a kuankhia leenggah lo nei pa tawh kibang hi. [2] Ni tha ngeina ngun peek khat piak dingin a kithukim khit uh ciangin a leenggah lo-ah na a sem dingin pawlkhat a kuansak hi. [3] Zingsang nai kua hun ciangin mihon omna sumbukah pai leuleu a, mi pawlkhat bangmah sem loin a mawk om a muh ciangin, [4] ‘No zong leenggah lo-ah va kuan un; a kilawm zah khat ka hong pia ding hi,’ a cih ciangin pawlkhat a kuan uh hi. [5] Tua ciangin sun sawm le nih ciangin pawlkhat cial leuleu a, nitak nai thum ciangin pawlkhat a cial lai hi. [6] Nitak nai nga ciangin mihon omna sumbukah a pai leh mi pawlkhat a mawk om mu ahih manin, ‘Bang hangin bangmah sem loin sunthapai mawk om na hi uh hiam?’ ci-in a dot ciangin

[14] “Inn panin khualzin dingin a paikhia mipa tawh zong kibang hi. Amah in a nasemte samin, a neihsateng a nasemte’ kep dingin a ap hi. [15] Amau’ siamna tawh kizui-in khat tungah tulnga, khat tungah tulnih, khat tungah tulkhat a ap khit ciangin a zinkhia hi. [16] Tul nga a ngah pa in sum bawlna-in zangpah a, a meet tulnga mah a ngahthuah hi. [17] Tul nih a ngah pa in zong a meet tulnih mah a ngahthuah hi. [18] Ahi zongin tulkhat a ngah pa in leisung to-in a topa’ sum a seelcip hi. [19] “Hun sawtpi khit ciangin tua nasemte’ topa hong ciahkik a, a nasemte tawh a sum thu a siangsak uh hi. [20] Tul nga a ngah pa in a dang tulnga mah hong tawithuahin, ‘Topa aw, kei tungah tulnga nong ap hi. Hih lai-ah tulnga mah ka meetsak hi,’ hong cih ciangin [21] a topa in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi; a hoih a citak nasempa aw, a tawmno na zekna-ah siam na hih manin a tampi tak ka hong zeksak ding hi. Hong pai in; kei tawh nuamsa khawm ni,’ a ci hi. [22] Tua ciangin tulnih a ngah pa zong hong pai-in, ‘Topa aw, kei tungah tulnih nong ap hi. Hih lai-ah tulnih mah ka na meetsak hi,’ hong cih ciangin [23] a topa in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi; a hoih a citak nasempa aw, a tawmno na zekna-ah siam na hih manin a tampi tak ka hong zeksak ding hi. Hong pai in; kei tawh nuamsa khawm ni,’ a ci hi. [24] Tul khat a ngah pa zong hong pai-in, ‘Topa aw, nang pen na sep loh na bawl lohnapi-ah na a deih, mi genhak mahmah na hihna ka hong thei hi. [25] Tua ahih manin ka hong kihta a, lei sungah na sum tulkhat ka seel hi. Tu-in hih lai-ah na sumzah mah om hi,’ a hong cih ciangin [26] a topa in, ‘A hoih lo, a thadah nasempa aw, ka sep loh ka bawl lohnapi-ah ka deihlam hong thei na hih leh, [27] sumkholna-ah ka sum na koihsak lecin hoih ding hi. Tua hileh tu-a ka hong tunkik ciangin a bulpi le a meet ka ngahkhawm ding hi. [28] Tua ahih manin ama tung panin a tulkhat laksak unla, tul sawm a nei pa tungah piathuah un. [29] Bang hang hiam cih leh a neisate kipiathuah ding a, hau semsem ding hi. Ahi zongin a nei lote tung panin a neihsa sunsun nangawn kilaksak ding hi. [30] Bangmahin a kimang lo hih nasempa ahihleh pualam khuamialna lakah lawnkhia un. Tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding hi,’ ci hi.

[46] Kua lianpen ding ihi hiam, ci-in nungzuite lakah kiselna khat hong om hi. [47] Jesuh in amaute’ lungsim ngaihsutna a phawk ciangin naupang khat la-in a gei-ah omsak a, [48] a nungzuite kiangah, “Keima hangin hih naupang a limbawl mi peuhmah in kei hong limbawl hi a, kei hong limbawl mi peuhmah in kei hong sawl pa zong a limbawl ahi hi. Note khempeuh lakah a neupen pa a lianpen pa ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[9] Amaute hoih kisa mahmahin, midang khempeuh a simmawhbawl mite tungah Jesuh in zong thugentehna khat gen a, [10] “Thungen dingin biakinn-ah mi nih a pai uh hi. Khat pen Farisi mi hi a, a khat pen siahdongpa ahi hi. [11] Farisi mipa dingin thu ngen a, ‘Pasian aw, kei pen midangte bangin a huaiham, a thuman lo, numei tungah a mawh mi ka hi kei hi; hua lai-a siahdongpa bang hi lo ka hih manin nangma tungah ka nuamna kong pulak hi. [12] Nipikal khatin ni nih sung an ka tang a, ka ngah khempeuh sung panin sawm-ah-khat nang tungah kong pia hi,’ a ci hi. [13] Ahi zongin siahdongpa pen a gamla simah ding a, vantung lamah zong dak ngam loin a dip humin kuncip a, ‘Pasian aw, kei mimawh mi khial pa hong hehpih in,’ ci-in a ngen hi. [14] Ke’n kong cihin-ah, hih mipa pen Pasian tawh a kilemsa-in a inn-ah ciah a, a khat pa pen tua bangin ciah lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a kiliansakte pen kiniamkhiatsuk ding a, a kiniamkhiatte pen a lianin kibawl ding hi,” a ci hi.

[24] Nungzuite lakah kua a lianpenin kingaihsun ding, ci-in kiselna thu hong piang hi. [25] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Gentail mi hih leitung kumpite in a mite uh tungah ukna aana zang uh a, tua bangin mi a uk Gentail-te in amaute pen, ‘Mite’ nopsak nadingin nasemte,’ a kicih ding deih lai uh hi. [26] Ahi zongin note lakah tua bang hi lo ding hi; a lianpen pa a neupen bangin om ding a, a makai pen pa a nungzui nunungpen bangin om ding hi. [27] Anne dingin sabuai-ah a tupa le an a piapa kua lianzaw ahi hiam? Anne dingin a tupa lianzaw mah hi. Ahi zongin kei pen note lakah anpia-in na a sempa bangin ka hong om hi.

[15] An a nekkhit uh ciangin Jesuh in Simon Peter kiangah, “Johan’ tapa Simon aw, hih adang khempeuhte’ hong it sangin kei na hong nak itzaw hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin amah in, “Topa aw, ka hong itzaw hi. Nang ka hong itna na thei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[24] Ahi zongin Topa Jesuh in kei sep dingin a hong piak, Pasian hehpihna hangin Lungdamna Thu, mite kiangah gen ding nasep ka tangtut zawh nakleh kei nuntakna-ah bangbang hong piang taleh a thupi-in ka ngaihsun kei hi.

[35] Topa Jesuh mahmah in, ‘Ngahna sangin piak khiatna-ah lungdamna lianzaw hi,’ a cihna phawkkawmin nakpitakin nasepna tawh na khempeuhah a zawngkhalte huh ding hi hang, ci-in note kiangah kong lak khinzo hi,” ci-in a vaikhak hi.

[2] Leitung mihingte’ gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahphasak un. Tua hileh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkimsakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian’ deihna na phawk thei ding uh hi. [3] Pasian in kei tungah hehpihna hong piakkhongna hangin note tungah kong gennop thu in: Note tawh a kituakzah valin kilian ngaihsutzaw kha kei un. Pasian in note tungah upna hong piakzah tawh kizui-in kingaihsun bek zaw unla, a kilawm ciang khat bekin kingaihsun un.

[3] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ deihna bangin gamta loin, leitung lungsim deihna bangin gamta lai na hih manun upna sungah naungek bang ahi lai na hi uh hi. Note khatlekhat kihaza-in kitawng kiselin na om uh ciangin hih leitung mite mah a bang lel na hihna uh hong kilang hi.

[15] Khrih thu hong hilh ding mi a tul a za-in na nei uh ahi zongin pa-a na neih ding uh kei bek a om ka hihna thu na phawk un. Bang hang hiam cih leh note kiangah lungdamna thu ka hong hilhna hangin Jesuh Khrih sungah nomau’ pa ka suak hi.

[13] Na tuah uh ze-etnate khempeuh pen mite’ tuah ngeingeite mah ahi hi. Pasian in citakin a thuciamna lenkip ahih manin note’ thuak zawh loh ding ze-etna hong tuaksak lo ding hi. Ze-etna na tuah hun uh ciangin zong na thuakzawh nading uh thahatna hong guan ding ahih manin na suahtak zawh nading uh lampi hong honsak ding hi.
[1] Keimah in Khrih gamtatzia ka zuih mah bangin note in zong keima gamtatzia hong zui ta un.
[12] Kote ahihleh tua bangin a kiliansak mahmah mite tawh a kikimin ka kingaihsun ngam buang kei ding uh hi. Amaute khatlekhat ki-en kakin thupi kisa mahmah uh ahih manin mihai taktak ahi uh hi.

[11] Note in kei a hong pakta ding hinapi-in hong pakta lo na hih manun note’ bawlin mihai bangin kisialin ka gamta hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen bangmahpi ka hihloh hangin sawltak thupi mahmahin na ngaihsutte uh sangin themkhat zong ka neuzaw tuan het kei hi. [12] Sawltak man taktak ka hihna lim a kilangsak nate, note lakah lungduai takin hong kisem a, lim, nalamdang, le na a tuamtuamte note lakah hong kibawl hi.

[10] Hih bangin thu ka gen ciangin mite’ hong pahtak theih nading a zong tawh kibang na hong sa uh hiam? Mite’ pahtak ding a ut ka hi kei a, Pasian’ hong pahtak ding a hanciam ka hi hi. Mihingte’ hong pahtak theih nadingin a gamta hi zenzen leng, Khrih’ nasem ka hi kei ding hi.

[20] Tua ahih manin tuhuna ka nuntakna zia pen kei hang hi nawn loin ka sungah a hong om Khrih hang ahi hi. Tua hi a, keimah hong itin, keima a dingin a nuntakna a hong pia Pasian’ Tapa ka muanna tawh tu laitakin a nungta ka hi hi.
[4] A kuamah peuh in ama gamtatna ciat entel henla, kisialh nading a om leh ama gamtatna siksanin kisial henla, midangte tawh ki-ettehin kisial kei hen.

[14] Ahi zongin keimah in ahihleh, singlamteh tungah i Topa Jesuh a sihna thu bek ka kisialhpih ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh singlamteh tungah ama sihna hangin kei a dingin leitung thute misi bang a, kei zong, leitung thu-ah misi mah ka bang hi.
[23] Mite’ nasem bangin kingaihsun loin, Pasian’ nasem bangin kingaihsun unla, na sep peuhpeuh uh lungsim takpi tawh lawpin sem un.

[11] Tu ma-a ka hong gensa uh mah bangin kamtam nuam se loin hoihtakin om hithiatna, no tawh a kisai thu bek ngaihsutna, le note’ nuntak nading na na sep nading uh hanciamin nei un. [12] Tua bangin gamta le-uhcin thu um lo mite in note hong zahtak ding uh a, mite’ neihsa na duhgawh kei ding uh hi.
[7] A taktakin ci lehang, leitungah mihingin i suah laitakin sumlepai tawh i suak kei a, i sih ciangin zong leitung panin bangmah i keng thei tuan kei hi.

[12] Tua ahih manin mi a khahkhia thei thukham tawh kizui-in thukhenna a thuak ding mi bangin kampau-in na gamta un. [13] Bang hang hiam cih leh hehpihna lungsim a nei lote tungah Pasian in thu a khen ciangin hehpih lo ding a, hehpihna lungsim a neite tungah Pasian in thu a khen ciangin a hehpihna in zozaw ding hi.
[16] Enna le huaihamna a om nakleh buaina le siatna nam khempeuh tawh kizom pahpah hi.
[15] Hih leitung nate le Pasian tawh a kizom lo thute deihluatin nei kei un. Mi khatpeuh in hih leitung nate a deihluat leh amah in Pa Pasian it taktak thei lo hi.
[19] Hih mite in pawl kikhenna piangsakin, amau pumpi deihna bangin gamta uh a, Kha Siangtho zong nei lo uh hi.
[19] A zuau dingin Pasian pen mihing hi lo a, a kisik dingin mihing’ tapa hi lo hi. Amah in gen khin hi; a gen bangin hih lo ding ahi hiam? Amah in ci khin hi; a cih bangin tungsak lo ding ahi hiam?

[6] Thahat unla, hang un. Lau kei unla, amaute kihta kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh note tawh hong pai pa pen TOPA na Pasian uh ahi hi. Note hong cimawhsak lo ding a, hong nusia lo ding hi,” a ci hi. [7] Tua ciangin Moses in Joshua samin, Israel-te khempeuh muhin ama kiangah, “Thahat inla hang in. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute tungah piak dingin TOPA in amau’ pute pate tungah a ciamsa leitangah hih mite tawh na pai ding a, nangmah in tua leitang amaute na ngahsak ding hi. [8] Na mai-ah a pai pa pen TOPA ahi hi. Amah in nang hong ompih ding a, nang hong cimawhsak loin, zong hong nusia lo ding hi. Lau kei inla, lungkia kei in,” a ci hi.

[3] ka Pasian, ka kihutna, ka bukna pa, lum bangin kei a hong dal, ka munmuanhuai le ka belh, keimah hong honkhia pa hi a, ngong hihna panin hong hon hi. [4] A phat taak TOPA ka sam a, ka galte kiang panin kei hong kihon hi.

[20] Tua ciangin David in a tapa Solomon kiangah, “Thakhauhin hang inla sem in. Lau kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA Pasian, keima Pasian nangawn nang tawh hong om hi. TOPA’ biakinn sung nasepna khempeuh a kizawh matengin amah in nang hong tamasak lo ding a, hong nusia lo ding hi.
[13] Pasian a mangngilhte tua bangmah ahi hi. Pasian a don lo mite’ lametna a bei ta ahi hi.
[15] Pasian in kei hong that mah taleh zong, phamawh ka sa kei hi. Ahi zongin ama mai-ah ka thu ka gen veve ding hi.

[7] “A kiphuk khinsa singkung nangawn in lametna nei buang a, a bul sel kikin nungtakik thei hi. [8] Lei sungah a zungte teek a, a bulsum a si zongin, [9] guahtui ngahin, singkungno-in hong selkik hi.
[17] TOPA aw, lungnemte’ deihna na ngai ding hi. A lungsim uh na hatsak ding a, na bil na ngat ding hi.
[9] Tua ahih ciangin lungdamin ka kipak a, lungmuangin ka om hi.

[1] TOPA pen tuucin bangin hong cing hi a, kisapna teng kicing ta hi. [2] Lo nona-ah hong lumsak a, tuidam kiangah hong paipih hi. [3] Thahatna thak kei hong guan hi. A hong ciamsa mah bangin-ah lampi manah kei hong kha hi. [4] TOPA aw, kei hong ompih na hih manin khuamial thukpi ka nawk hangin ka lau kei hi. Na molhtum le na ciangkhut in kei hong hu hi. [5] Keima galte’ muhna munah an nong lui hi. Thupi takin nong pahtawi a, keima hai zong dimlet ta hi. [6] Na hoihna le nong itna in ka khantawnin a hong zuih ding tel takin-ah ka thei ta a, a tawntungin na inn sungah ka om ding hi.

[4] TOPA’ tung panin na khat ka ngen khin a, tua ngenin ka zon ding pen: TOPA’ inn sungah ka khan tawntungin om ding, TOPA’ hoihna et ding le ama biakinn sungah thu dot dingte ahi hi. [5] Bang hang hiam cih leh haksat hun ciangin amah in a buk sungah kei hong seel ding hi. A puanbuk khuhna nuai-ah kei hong seel ding a, a sangna suang tungah kei hong koih ding hi.
[14] TOPA muang in. Thakhauh inla, na lungsim hangsakin, TOPA muang in.

[1] Ama khialhna kimaisak a, ama mawhna a kiselcipsak mi, thupha ngah ahi hi. [2] TOPA in mawhna a khuksak loh mi, a lungsim sungah khemna a om lo mi, thupha ngah ahi hi. [3] Ka mawhna ka pulak loh ciangin, sunthapai ka tautauna hangin ka pumpi a thaneem hi. [4] Sun le zan tawntung gim nong piakna ka thuak a, khuakhal nisa’ kat bangin ka thahatna a keucip hi. [5] Keima khialhnate nangma tungah kong pulak a, ka mawhna ka im kei hi. “Ka khialhnate khempeuh TOPA’ tungah ka pulak ding hi,” ka ci hi. Tua ciangin ka mawhna nin nong maisak hi.
[24] TOPA a ngak mi khempeuh aw, na tha uh khauhsak unla, na lungsim uh hangsak ta un!
[18] Amah a zahtakte, a itna kip lametna a neite, sihna panin honkhia-in, kialpi hun sungin amaute a hinkep theih nadingin TOPA in amaute en tawntung hi.
[22] TOPA aw, nang kong lamet uh mah bangin kote’ tungah na itna kip hong omsak in.

[3] TOPA muang inla, gamtat hoih in. Gam nuamah teng inla, thumanin om in. [4] TOPA sungah lungkim in; amah in na deihna hong pia ding hi. [5] TOPA tungah na vai teng ap in. Amah muang in; amah in hong sem ding hi. [6] Amah in nangma dikna khuavak bangin, nangma thumanna nitaang bangin hong langsak ding hi. [7] TOPA’ mai-ah khawl dide inla, lungduai takin ngak in. A hihna a daupai pa tung le siatna a bawlpa tungah kilungso tawmsak ke’n!
[15] Ahih hangin TOPA aw, nangmah ka hong muang hi. TOPA ka Pasian aw, a hong dawng ding pa nangmah na hi hi.
[7] Tu-in Topa aw, ke’n, bang ngaklai ding ka hi hiam? Keima lametna nangma sung bekah om hi.

[9] Hotkhiatna hangin lungdam thu mihonpi lakah ka gen ding hi. TOPA aw, lungdam thugen ka khawl ngei kei ding hi. [10] Nangma hotkhiatna thu ka im kei a, na thumanna le na hotkhiatna ka gen khin hi. Na itna kip le na thumanna mihonpi tungah ka im kei hi.
[11] Bang hangin khakunkun a, lunghimawh niloh ka hi hiam? Pasian’ sungah lametna nei ning; bang hang hiam cih leh kei a hong huh ka Pasian ka phatkik ngawn ding hi.
[5] Bang hangin khakunkun a, lunghimawh niloh ka hi hiam? Pasian sungah lametna nei ning; bang hang hiam cih leh kei a hong huh ka Pasian ka phatkik ngawn ding hi.
[1] Pasian, i belh leh i thahatna hi a, haksat hunin a hong huh pahpah pa ahi hi.
[5] Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa PASIAN aw, ka neu lai a kipanin ka hong lamet, ka hong muan na hi hi, TOPA aw.
[14] Ahih hangin ke’n, nang kong lamen ding a, nangmah kong phat semsem lai ding hi.
[18] TOPA aw, “Ka khe taal,” ci-in ka ngaihsut ciangin na itna kip in kei hong kaito hi. [19] Ka lungsim ngaihsutna a tam mahmah ciangin kei na hong hehnem a, na hong lungdamsak hi.
[49] Keimah nong lametsakna ahi na nasempa’ tungah na thuciamna hong phawk in.
[74] Nangma thuciamna muang ka hih manin nang hong zahtakte in kei hong mu-in lungdam ding uh hi.
[81] Na hong hotkhiat ding ka ngakngakna-in ka tha bei ta a, nangma thu muangin ka lamen hi.
[114] Nang pen keima bukna mun le kei hong hupa na hi hi. Na thuciamna ka muang hi.
[116] Kei ka nuntak theih nadingin na thuciamna tawh kizui-in kei hong huh inla, ka lametna-ah kei hong zahhuaisak kei in.
[166] TOPA aw, nong hotkhiat ding ka ngak a, na thupiakte ka sem hi.
[7] TOPA in siatna khempeuh panin nang hong hu ding a, amah in a muanhuai-in nang hong kem ding hi. [8] TOPA in tua kipan a tawntungin na vaksuk na vaktohna-ah nang hong kem ding hi.
