[5] TOPA’ hong huh ding lawpna tawh ka ngak a, ama thugen ka muang hi.
[7] Israel aw, TOPA muang in. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA’ itna kip tawntungin, hong honkhia nuam tawntung hi.

[7] Haksatna tuamtuamte ka thuak ciangin kei nong kem hi. A heh ka galte, kei’ tangin nong dosak a, na thahatna tawh kei na hong honkhia hi. [8] TOPA in kei a dingin a ngaihsutte hong tungsak ding hi. TOPA aw, na itna kip tawntung hi. Na sepsa na maban hong tun ta in.
[5] Jakob’ Pasian pen amah huhpa hi-in, ama TOPA Pasian a muang mipa mi lungdam ahi hi.
[28] Mihoihte’ lametna lungdamna hi a, migilote’ lametna a hawmpi ahi hi.
[12] Lamet tun lohna in lungsim cinasak a, deihna tangtunna pen lungdamna ahi hi.
[32] Migilo pa ama tatsiatna in puksak a, mihoih pa ama hoihtatna in hu hi.
[18] Tua bang hi lecin lametna om a, cithei-in na khansau ding hi.
[10] Haksatna na tuah ciangin na lung a kiat leh a ginalo mi na hi hi.
[14] Pilna pen i nuntakna-ah khuaizu tawh kibang a, pilna nei lecin mai lamah lametna om a, na khan hong sausak ding hi.
[17] Gimna lianpi ka thuakna pen keima lungnopna hong suak ding hi. Lauhuaina khempeuh panin kei nong honkhia a, ka mawhna khempeuh na hong maisak hi.
[31] Ahih hangin TOPA a muang mite a tha uh dimkik ding a, muvanlai bangin kha tawh leengto-in, amaute tai napi-un tawl lo ding uh a, amaute lam pai napi-un gim lo ding uh hi.
[10] nang hong ompih ka hih manin lau kei in. Na Pasian ka hih manin lungkia kei in. Nang hong thakhauhsakin ka hong huh ding a, nang hong huhin ka hong honkhia ding hi.
[13] Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah TOPA na Pasian in na khut taklam ka len hi. “Lau kei in, nangmah kong huh ding hi,” nang tungah a hong ci pa keimah ka hi hi.
[4] Amah in leitungah thutang thu a phuh khit matengin lungsi lo, lungkia lo ding hi. Tuipi gei-a om gamte in ama thu ngak uh hi.

[1] Ahih hangin Jakob aw, nangmah hong piangsak pa, Israel aw, nangmah hong bawlpa, TOPA in tu-in hih bang ci hi: “Hong honkhia khin ka hih manin lau kei in. Na min tawh kong sam khinzo a, nang pen kei-a’ na hi hi. [2] Tuite na kantan ciangin nang kong ompih ding a, gunte na kantan ciangin tui in hong tuum lo ding hi. Mei kantanin na pai ciangin na kang kei ding a, meikuangte in nang hong kangtum lo ding hi. [3] Bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen TOPA na Pasian, Israel-te’ Siangtho Pa, nangmah hong honpa ka hi hi. Nangmah tat nadingin Egypt ka pia a, nangmah khek nadingin Ethiopia le Seba ka pia hi.

[7] Migilo in ama gitlohna nusia hen la, thuman lo mi in ama ngaihsutna nusia hen. Amah in a hehpih theih nadingin TOPA eite’ Pasian’ kiangah amah paisak un. Bang hang hiam cih leh a mawhna maisiangsak ding hi.

[1] Gimna a thuak mite tungah thuhoih a puak dingin TOPA in kei hong teelin hong sawl ahih manin keima sungah Topa PASIAN’ kha hong om hi. Lungsim kitamzante a damsak ding, salin a kimante tungah suahtakna thu a gen ding, a kikhum mite a dingin thong kong a hong ding,
[8] Ahi zongin TOPA aw, nang pen kote’ Pa na hi hi. Kote pen tungman bang hi-in, nang pen beelseek pa bang na hi a, kote khempeuh nangma bawl mite ka hi uh hi.
[7] “ TOPA muangin amah a beel mi in thupha a ngah ahi hi.
[11] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in kong cihin-ah, mai lamah lametna note kong piakkik ding, na siatna ding uh hi loin na phattuamna ding uh geelna ka neihte kei bek in ka thei hi.

[16] TOPA in kong cihin-ah: “Kap nawn kei unla, na khitui uh nul un. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in kong cihin-ah, na nasep thaman uh na ngah uh hi. Amaute galte’ gam panin hong ciahkik ding uh hi. [17] Na mailam uh a dingin lametna a om hi, TOPA in kong ci hi. Na tate uh zong na gam mah uhah hong ciahkik ding uh hi.

[21] Ahi zongin ka phawk giugiau thu khat in lametna khat hong nei theisak hi. [22] A bei thei lo TOPA’ hong itna le a hehpihna a kizom paisuak hi a, [23] zing nisuak bangin thaksuak tawntung a, ni a hong suah pelmawh mah tawh a kibang ahi hi.
[16] Zion Mual panin TOPA hong hawksuk a, Jerusalem panin hong awngkek a, vanpi le leipi a ling damdam hi. Ahi zongin TOPA pen ama mite’ belh pa hi a, Israel mite a hu ding hi.
[17] TOPA na Pasian un note hong ompih a, ama vangliatna in hong gualzosak hi. Note tungah TOPA lungkim ding a, ama hong itna tawh hong thakbawl ding hi. Note’ hangin TOPA lungdamin la sa ding a,
[12] Lametna a om no salte aw, ciahkik unla, a muanhuai mahmah na mun ngei uh zuankik un. Note’ thuaknasa a zah nihin thupha ka hong piakna ding tuni-in note kiangah ka hong gen hi.
[23] Ahi zongin na mit uh maang leh na pumpi uh a dingin khua a mial hi. Tua ahih manin note’ sunga a om khuavak pen a mial hileh tua mialna pen nasia mahmah ding hi.
[28] “Na semin vangik pua-in a gim mite khempeuh aw, ka kiangah hong pai ta un. Note tungah lungsim tawldamna ka hong pia ding hi.

[35] Tua laitakin kikhopna inn ukpa’ inn panin kamtaite hong tung uh a, “Na tanu si khinta hi. Bang hangin Siapa mawk gimsak nawn ding na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi. [36] Ahi zongin Jesuh in amau thu kigen don loin kikhopna inn ukpa kiangah, “Lunghimawh kei in; upna nei peuh in,” a ci hi.
[23] Jesuh in, “Bang hangin na hihtheih leh, ci na hi hiam? A umte a dingin na khempeuh hithei hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
[37] Tua ahih manin Pasian in a bawl theih loh khat zong om lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[1] Tua ciangin Jesuh in a nungzuite kiangah, “Note lunghimawh kei un. Pasian um unla, kei zong hong um un.

[13] Jesuh in, “Hih tui a dawn khempeuh dangtak kik ding uh a, [14] ahi zongin keima piak ding tui a dawn khempeuh dangtak kik nawn lo ding uh hi. Tua ka piak tui a dawnte sungah nuntakna tuinak piang ding a, a nungtasak paisuak ding hi,” a ci hi.
[6] Jesuh in ama kiangah, “Keimah in Lampi ka hi a, Thuman, le Nuntakna zong ka hi hi. Kei hong suang loin Pa kiangah kuamah tung thei lo ding hi.
[18] “Note a cimawh dingin ka hong nusia kei ding hi. Note kiangah ka hong paikik ding hi.

[33] Keimah tawh na hong kipawlna uh hangin lungnopna na neihtheihna dingun hih thu a hong gen ka hi hi. Leitung gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Ahi zongin keimah in leitung nate zo khinta ka hih manin lungnuamin om un,” a ci hi.

[13] Uliante in Peter le Johan a han’ mahmahna thu le amaute pilna sang a nei lo mi mawkmawk ahihna thu a theih uh ciangin lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi. Tua ciangin Jesuh tawh a kikhawl khin ngeite ahihna uh a phawk uh hi.

[6] Paul in tua uliante lakah Saddusi mi le Farisi mi a omlam a muh ciangin amaute kiangah, “Lawmte aw, kei pen Farisi mite’ suan ahi Farisi mi ka hi hi. Mi site hingkik ding hi, ci-in lamenin upna ka neih manin hih lai-ah thusitna ka thuak hi,” a ci hi.

[14] Ahi zongin nangma kiangah kong pulaknop thu in: Amaute in man lo hi, a cih uh tua Thu zui-in kote’ pu le pate’ Pasian ka bia hi. Moses’ Thukham laibu sunga a kigelh thu khempeuh le kamsangte’ laibu sunga a kigelhte khempeuh zong ka um hi. [15] Amaute’ up le lamet mah bangin, Pasian in miphate le misiate a kibangin sihna panin hingkiksak khawm ding hi, ci-in umin ka lamen hi.

[18] Lai Siangtho sungah, “Na suanlekhakte aksi zahin tam ding hi,” ci-in a kigelh mah bangin tua bang a piantheih nading lametna a om nai lopi mahin Abraham in umin lamen ahih manin minam tampite’ pupi a suak hi.

[1] Tu-in upna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl khinta ihih manin i Topa Jesuh Khrih hangin Pasian tawh a kilemkik ta ihi hi. [2] Ama hangin upna tawh tu-a i omna Pasian hehpihna sungah a tung ihi a, Pasian tawh minthanna ngahkhawm ding, ci-in lamen ihih manin i lung a dam hi. [3] Haksatna i thuak laitak nangawnin i lungdam veve hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh haksatna in thuakzawh hatna piangsak a, [4] thuakzawh hatna in Pasian’ pahtakna hong ngahsak a, ama hong pahtakna in lametna lianpi hong neisak ahihna thu i thei hi. [5] Pasian in eite tungah a hong piak a Kha Siangtho tawh eite sungah ama itna hong guang ahih manin hih lametna in eite hong lungkiasak ngei lo hi.

[24] Hih bangin lamenin i upna in eite hong honkhia khin hi. Ahi zongin i lamet pen i muh ciangin tua pen lamet hi nawn lo hi. Kua in a muhsa nate lamen nawn ahi hiam? [25] I muh lohte i lamet ciangin lungduaitakin i ngak thei hi.

[35] Tua ahih manin bangin Khrih’ itna tawh hong kikhensakzo ding ahi hiam? Haksatna, lungkhamna, bawlsiatna, gilkialna, zawnna, lauhuaina, sihnate khat peuhpeuh in hong khenzo ding ahi hiam? [36] Lai Siangtho sungah zong, “Note hangin sunthapai-in siat nading lauhuaina ka thuak uh a, gawh ding tuu bangin a hong kibawl hi,” ci-in a kigelh hi. [37] Eite a hong it pa’ hangin hih thu khempeuhah a gualzo pente ihi hi.
[12] Lamet na neihna hangun lungdamin om tawntung unla, lungkhamna na thuak uh ciangin lungduai-in thu na ngen tawntung un.
[4] Lai Siangtho sungah a om thu khempeuh pen eite hilh nading, eite in lametna nei-in i thuakzawh nading, le i thahat theih nadingin a kigelh ahi hi.
[13] Kha Siangtho’ huhna tawh note’ lametna a khan semsem theih nadingin, lametna a hong piathei Pasian in, amah na upna uh hangin lungdamna le nopsakna tawh note hong kidimsak tahen.

[9] Tua ahih manin Lai Siangtho sungah, “Kuamah in a muh ngei loh, a zak ngei loh, piangthei dingin zong a ngaihsut loh uh thu pen Pasian in amah a it mite a dingin a bawlkholh saksa ahi hi,” ci-in na kigelh hi.
[13] Tu laitakin a omlai thu thumte pen upna, lametna, le itna hi a, tua thumte sung panin itna mah a thu lianpen ahi hi.
[19] Khrih hangin i lamet thu pen hih i leitung nuntak sung thu ding bek hi takpi leh leitung midang khempeuhte sangin a hehpihhuai zaw ihi ding hi.
[12] Hih bang lametna nei ka hih manun hangtakin a om ka hi uh hi.

[16] Tua thu hangin ka lungkia tuan kei uh hi. Kote’ leitung pumpi in damdamin muatlam ding a manawh ahi zongin ka kha nuntakna uh a nini-in thaksuak semsem hi. [17] Tuhun laitakin tomno sung lungkhamna ka thuakte uh in ka thuakna uh sangin nakpitakin a lianzaw tawntung minthanna sung hong tunpih ding hi. [18] Bang hang hiam cih leh a kimuthei nate a mitsuan ka hi kei uh a, a kimu thei lo nate a mitsuan ka hi uh hi. A kimuthei nate tomno sung bek kimang a, a kimu thei lo nate a tawntungin a kip ahi hi.

[10] Tua na dahna uh hotkhiatna ngahtheih nadingin na lungsim uh na kheel nadingun Pasian in hong zang ahih manin dah nading bangmah om lo hi. Ahi zongin hih leitung dahna lelte in ahihleh sihna piangsak hi.
[10] Kei ka thaneem mahmah laitakin a thahat mahmah suak ka hih manin Khrih hangin ka thaneemna, simmawh ka thuakna, haksatna, bawlsiatna le lungkhamna ka thuaknate tawh ka lung a kim mahmah hi.
[5] Kote ahihleh Pasian in amah tawh a kipawlthei dingin hong bawl ding hi, ci-in lamenin, kote’ upna hangin Kha Siangtho’ vangliatna tawh hong piang ding hi, ci-in a om ka hi uh hi.
[9] Tua ahih manin na hoih sep ding cimtak kei ni. Lungkia loin i sep nakleh a hun ciangin thaman i ngah ding hi.

[18] Note bang dingin hong sam a, a mite tungah a hong ciam thupha lamdangte bangzah takin lian a, thu um ahi eite sungah na a hong sem vangliatna bangzah takin lian ahi hiam, cih na muhtheih nadingun note’ lungsim mit hong vaksak nadingin thu ka na ngen hi. Eite sungah na a hong sem vangliatna pen sihna panin Khrih hingsakin, vantung gamah zong, ama taklamah a tutsak nadingin a zat vangliatna mah ahi hi.
[4] A kibang lametna khat bek a ngahkhawm dingin Pasian in note hong sap mah bangin eite khempeuh pumkhat bek hi-in Kha Siangtho zong khat bek mah a neikhawm ihi hi.
[17] Siklukhu khuk bangin hotkhiatna nei unla, Kha Siangtho in a hong piak Pasian’ thu pen namsau zat bangin na zang un.

[20] Ka si a, ka hing zongin, a diak diakin tu a kipanin a tawntungin midangte in Khrih phat theih nading lungsim hanna a neih theih nadingun ka lungsim le ka pumpi tawh keima tavuan ka lelh hetloh nading pen ka deihdeih, ka lametet bulpi ahi hi.

[8] Sanggamte aw, a tawpna-ah ka hong gennop thu in, a hoih le a phattaak thute tawh na lungsim uh na kidimsak un. Tuate in: A man, a dik, a tang, a siangtho, a deihhuai, le a pahtakhuai thute ahi hi.
[13] Khrih in a hong piak vangliatna tawh hihte khempeuh nawkzawh nading thahatna a nei ka hi hi.
[5] Thu dang na zakma un, lungdamna thuman taktak na zak uh ciangin lametna na nei uh hi. Note a dingin vantungah a hong kikoihsak tua lametna hangin note in muanna le itna a nei na hi uh hi.

[23] Ahi zongin note in lungdamna thu na zak cil lai-un na neih uh lametna panin ling hetloin, bulkip nei-in citakin na om paisuak ding uh ahi hi. Tua lungdamna thu mah keimah Paul in hilhin ka sepbel hi a, leitung mun khempeuhah a kihilh lungdamna thu mah ahi hi.

[27] Pasian in mi khempeuh a dingin a koihcing hih a thupi a deihhuai a thusim pen ama mite tungah pholak ding a sawm ahi hi. Tua thusim in: Khrih tawh a kipawlte in Pasian tawh minthanna ngahkhawm ding hi, cihna ahi hi.

[3] Bang hang hiam cih leh i Pa Pasian kiangah thu ka nget simun note’ upna hangin na nuntakziate uh, itna na neih manun nakpitakin na nasepnate uh le i Topa Jesuh Khrih hong paikik ding lametna na neih manun kiptakin na omnate uh ka phawk tawntung uh hi.
[16] I Topa Jesuh Khrih mahmah leh, eite hong itin, a hong hehpihna tawh thakhauhna le lametna a hong pia tawntung eite’ Pa Pasian in
[13] Sanggamte aw, lametna a nei lo mite bangin na dahluat loh nadingun a sisa mite’ omzia ding thu na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
[8] Ahi zongin eite pen khuavak gamtatna a nei sun khuavak mi ihih manin pilvang ni. Awmdal bangin upna le itna bulhin, siklukhu bangin i lamet hotkhiatna khu ni.
[1] Eite a hong Hon Pasian le eite’ lamet Khrih Jesuh’ thupiakna tawh Khrih Jesuh’ sawltak ahi keimah Paul in,
[10] A diakdiakin ei thu umte in mi khempeuh a Honkhia, a nungta Pasian muangin lamen ihih manin nakpitakin hanciamin na a sem ihi hi.
[7] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in eite tungah meidawina lungsim hong guan lo a, thahatna, ki-itna, pumpi ki-ukzawhna lungsim hong guan hizaw hi.

[13] Eite in i lamet, a lian Pasian le eite hong Hon Jesuh Khrih a vangliatna hong kilatkik ding hun ngakin i om laitakin i biakna tawh a kituak lo thute le leitung nate deihna phiatin, lungsim hi hithiatin omin, thutangin, hih leitungah Pasian’ deihna bangin i nuntak nadingin tua hehpihna thu in eite hong hilh hi.
[7] ama hong hehpihna hangin Pasian tawh kilemin i lamet nuntak tawntungna a ngah thei ihi hi.
[6] Ahi zongin Khrih pen Pasian’ innsung a uk Tapa ahihna tawh a citak ahi hi. I lametna thu tawh kisai-in lungsim hanna le muanna tawh i omsuak nakleh eite pen Pasian’ inn ihi hi.
[16] Tua ahih manin a kisap hunin, eite a hong huh dingin hehpihna le dikna thupha i ngahtheih nadingin, kimuanna lungsim tawh hehpihna tokhom va zuan ciat ni.
[11] Note khat ciat’ lametna thu hong tun taktak theih nadingin a tawp dongin lawpin na thanop paisuak nading uh ka hong deihsak pha uh hi.

[18] Tua hi a, a kikheel thei lo thu nih kithuap ahih manin Pasian in zuau gen thei lo ding hi. Tua hi a, amah a beel eite in eite mai-ah hong kikoih lametna thu kiptakin i letcip nadingin i tha hong nuamsak hi. [19] I lungsim a hong kipsak dingin tu-a bang lametna a nei ihi hi. Tua i lametna kician mahmah a, vantung biakinn siangtho tawngnung sung ciang dong tung khinta hi.
[23] Pasian in piak dingin a hong ciam thu muangngam ihih manin i lametna thu kiptakin len ni.
[1] Upna nei i cih ciangin i muhtheih nai loh i lamette ngah takpi ding, ci-in muanna lungsim neihna ahi hi.

[12] A hoih takpi mah hiam, ci-in sinna a thuak ciangin a nangzote a hampha mahmah ahi hi. Tua bangin a nangzote in, amah a itte tungah Pasian in a piak dingin a ciam nuntakna lukhu a ngah ding uh hi.

[3] I Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pa Pasian tungah lungdam ni. Ama hong hehpih mahmahna hangin sihna panin Jesuh Khrih a thawhkik sakna tawh eite tungah nuntakna thak a hong pia hi. Tua ahih manin i lametna kiam ngei lo a,
[13] Tua ahih manin na lungsim uh ki-ukin a kigingsa-in om unla, Jesuh Khrih hong kilat ni ciangin na ngah ding uh hehpihna thupha ngaihsutin nei un.
[21] Sihna panin amah hingkiksakin minthanna a pia Pasian, ama hangin muang thei na hih uh manin, na up na muan na lamet uh Pasian ahi hi.

[15] Na lungsim sung uhah Khrih zahtakbawl unla, amah Topa-in nei un. Note’ lametna thu a hong dong a omkhak leh hoihtakin a genthei dingin kiging tawntung unla, ahi zongin lungnemna le zahtakna lim tawh gen un.
[3] Khrih a siangtho mah bangin amah tawh kibat ding a lamen khempeuh in zong a nuntakna uh siangthosak ding hi.

[18] Itna nei lehang launa om lo a, itna cingtaak nei peuh lehang launa beimangta hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh launa i cih pen gimthuak ding kihtakna hi a, gimthuak ding a laute pen itna cingtaak a nei lote ahi hi.

[10] Na thuak ding uh haksatnate kihta kei un. Dawimangpa in note pawlkhat thong sungah hong khia-in hong ze-et ding hi. Gimna na thuak hun ding uh ni sawm sung bek hi ding hi. Na sih dongun kei tungah hong citak un. Tua hileh nuntakna lukhu ka hong pia ding hi.

[19] Nangma mi a sisate hingkik ding uh a, amau’ pumpi thokik ding hi. Han sungah a lum mite aw, tho-in lungdamin la sa un! Bang hang hiam cih leh zing daitui in leitung a nosakkik bangin sawtpi-a a sisa mite TOPA in hingkiksak ding hi.

[3] Amah in kei kiangah, “Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, hih misi guhte a nungtakik thei ding hiam?” ci-in hong dong hi. Kei zong, “Topa PASIAN aw, hih thu nang bek in na thei ding hi,” ci-in ka dawng hi. [4] Tua ciangin amah in, “Hih guhte tungah thu hilh inla, hih guhkeute in TOPA’ thu a ngaih nadingun gen in. [5] Topa PASIAN ahi keimah in amaute tungah ka gen thu hih bangin gen in: Note sungah hu kong guan ding a, note kong nungtasakkik ding hi. [6] Thagui le sazang kong guan ding a, vun tawh kong tuam ding hi. Tua ciangin na sung uhah hu hong guan in kong nungtasakkik ding hi. Tua ciangin TOPA ka hihna nong thei ding uh hi, ci-in gen in,” hong ci hi. [7] Tua ahih ciangin hong sawl bangin thu ka gen hi. Tua bangin thu ka gen laitakin a kigawi zuazua a ging ka za a, tua guhte khatlekhat kizomkik uh hi. [8] Tua bangin ka et laitakin thagui le sazang in tua guhte tuam a, tua ciangin a vun in zong hong tuam hi. Ahi zongin tua pumpite sungah hintheihna hu om nai lo hi. [9] Tua ciangin amah in kei kiangah, “Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, huihte tungah thu gen inla, hih a sisa pumpite sungah hu sangin a hingkiksak dingin mun khempeuh panin hong pai un, ci-in Topa PASIAN in thu hong pia hi, ci-in gen in,” hong ci hi. [10] Tua ahih ciangin hong sawl bangin ka gen hi. Tua pumpite sungah hintheihna hu hong lut a, tua ciangin amaute hingin a khe-un hong ding uh hi. Galkap honpi khat zah pha-in tam mahmah uh hi. [11] Tua ciangin PASIAN in kei kiangah, “Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, Israel mite pen hih guhte tawh kibang uh hi. Amaute in, ‘I keucip a, i lamet ding bangmah om nawn loin i nuntakna guipi beita hi,’ ci uh hi. [12] Tua ahih ciangin ka mi Israel-te tungah thu gen inla, Topa PASIAN in hih bangin ci hi, ci-in gen in: Ka mite aw, tu-in note’ hankhuk kong honsak ding a, note hong paikhiatpihin, Israel gam kong tunpihkik ding hi. [13] Note na kiphumna uh hankhuk hong honsakin kong paikhiatpih ciangin TOPA ka hihna thu nong thei ding uh hi. [14] Note sungah keima nuntakna hu kong guan ding a, note hong hingsakkikin, na gam uhah kong tengsakkik ding hi. Tua ciangin TOPA ka hihna thu nong thei ding uh hi. Hih bangin kong hihna ding thu ka kiciamzo a, ka kiciam bangin kong hih ding hi. TOPA ahi keimah in hih thu ka gen khinzo hi, ci-in gen in,” hong ci hi.
[2] A sisa mi tampite in nuntakna a ngahkik ding uh hi. Pawlkhatte nungta tawntung ding uh a, pawlkhatte in a tawntung zumna le minsiatna a ngah ding uh hi.

[27] Tua unau pasal sagihte a sih khit ciangin a numei zong a si hi. [28] Tua ahih manin tua unau pasal sagihte in tua nu tenpihkim uh ahih manin, thawhkik hun ciangin a koi pen’ zi hi ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. [29] Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Note in Lai Siangtho thu ahi a, Pasian’ vangliatna ahi zongin thei lo na hih manun na ngaihsunkhial uh hi.
[52] Hankhukte zong kihong a, Pasian’ mi a sisa tampite zong kithokiksak hi.

[18] Tua ciangin, thawhkikna om lo hi, a ci Saddusi mi pawlkhat hong pai leuleu uh a, [19] “Sia aw, ‘Mi khat in ta nei loin a zi a sihsan leh tua a si mipa’ khang a kizop theih nadingin a naupa in tua meigongnu tenpih ding hi,’ ci-in Moses in eite a dingin ngeina a koih hi. [20] Khatvei, unau pasal sagih om uh hi. A u pen in zi nei a, ta nei loin a si hi. [21] A nau in a upa’ zi luah hi; amah zong ta nei loin si leuleu hi. A thumna pa, [22] le adangte khempeuh, a sagihna dong in tua nu tenpih uh a, ta nei lo vive mahin a si uh hi. A tawpna ciangin tua numei zong a si hi. [23] Tua ahihleh, hih unau pasal sagihte in hihnu tenpih kim ciat uh ahih manin, mi khempeuh a thawhkik ni ciangin a kua pen’ zi hi ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. [24] Jesuh in, “Na khial mahmah uh hi. Lai Siangtho ahi a, Pasian’ vangliatna ahi zongin na theih lohna hang uh ahi hi. [25] Sihna panin mite a thawhkik ciangin vantungah a om vantung mite mah bangin zinei pasalnei cih om lo ding uh hi. [26] Thawhkikna thu tawh kisai-in ci lehang, Moses’ laigelhna sung sawlpang kuang thu a genna munah Pasian in Moses kiangah, ‘Kei pen Abraham’ Pasian, Isaac’ Pasian, Jakob’ Pasian ka hi hi,’ a cihna mun sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam? [27] Tua bang a cih ciangin Pasian pen misite’ Pasian hi loin mihingte’ Pasian hi, a ci nuam ahi hi. Tua ahih manin na ngaihsun khial mahmah uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[28] Hih thu ka hong gen ciangin lamdangsa kei un. Han sungah a om misi khempeuh in ama aw za-in, [29] han sung panin a hong paikhiat uh hun hong tung ding hi. A gamtat hoih mite pen a nungta tawntung dingin hong thokik ding uh a, a gamtat siate ahihleh mawhsak thukhenna a thuak dingin hong thokik ding uh hi.

[39] Kei hong sawl pa’ deihna in: Ka khut sungah a hong piak mi khempeuh khat zong khahsuah loin nitawp ni ciangin ka hinsakkik ding ahi hi. [40] Tua ahih manin Tapa mu-in a um mi khempeuh in nuntak tawntungna ngahin, nitawp ni ciangin ka hinsak ding, ka Pa in hong deih ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[53] Tua ahih manin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “A mantakin kong genin-ah, Mihing Tapa’ sa na nek kei uh a, a sisan na dawn kei uhleh note sungah nuntakna om lo ding hi. [54] Ka sa ne-in ka si a dawnte a nungta tawntung hi a, nitawp ni ciangin ka hingsak ding hi. [55] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka sa, an taktak hi a, ka sisan, dawn ding tui taktak ahi hi.

[20] Ahi zongin a thuman taktak ci lehang, a sisa mite zong hingkik takpi ding hi cih a kitel theih nadingin sihna panin Khrih kihingkiksak khinzo hi. [21] Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khat hangin sihna a om mah bangin mi khat hang mahin misite zong hinkikna om hi. [22] Bang hang hiam cih leh Adam tawh a kizop manin mi khempeuh si a, tua mah bangin Khrih tawh a kizom khempeuh zong kihingkiksak ding hi. [23] Ahi zongin tua hinkikna pen ama hun tawh kizui-in a banbanin hi ding hi. A masa penin Khrih hi a, Khrih hong paikik ciangin ama pawlte khempeuh hingkik ding hi.

[42] Misite a thawhkikna zong hihte mah tawh kibang hi. A kiphum pen a muat thei hi a, a thokik pen a muat thei lo ahi hi. [43] A kiphum laitakin hat loin melsia a, a kithawhkiksak ciangin thahatin a melhoih hi. [44] A kiphum laitakin leitung pumpi hi a, a kithawhkiksak ciangin kha pumpi ahi hi. Leitung pumpi a om mah bangin kha pumpi zong a om ding ahi hi.

[52] Peengkul nunung hong gin’ ciangin mitphiat kikal sungin i kikhelpak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh peengkul hong gin’ ciangin misite a sithei nawn lo dingin hong tho ding a, i vekpi-in i kikheel ding hi.

[14] Jesuh si-in thokik hi, ci-in i up mah bangin Pasian in Jesuh hong paipih kik ciangin amah umin a si mite zong hong tonpih ding hi, ci-in i um hi. [15] Topa’ thugen note kiangah ka hong gen uh thu in: Topa hong paikik ni ciangin a nungta lai eite pen a sisa mite tawh i kimuh ma-in Topa tawh i kimu kei ding hi. [16] Pasian’ thupiakna awging lianpi, vantungmi mangpa’ thugenna, le Pasian’ peengkul hong ging ding a, vantung panin Topa mahmah hong paisuk ding hi. [17] Tua ciangin tua hun laitakin a nungta lai eite pen vankim lai-ah Topa a dawn dingin amah a um a sisa mite tawh hong kilakhawm ding a, Topa tawh i omkhawm tawntung ding hi, cihna ahi hi. [18] Tua ahih ciangin note khatlekhat hih thu tawh na kihehnem un.
[27] Mi khempeuh khatvei si-in, tua khit ciangin Pasian’ thukhenna a thuak ding ahih mah bangin,

[21] Tui pen note a hong honkhia tuiphumna lim hi a, pumpi panin nin sawpkhiatna lim hi loin, Jesuh Khrih thawhkikna hangin lungsim siantho nadingin Pasian’ tungah kamciamna lim ahi hi. Tua Jesuh thawhkikna in note hong honkhia ahi hi. [22] Tu-in vantungah tua Khrih pai khin a, Pasian’ taklamah omin, vantung mite le ukna aana a neite khempeuh tungah a ukin a om hi.

[4] Tua ciangin tokhom tungah a tu mi pawlkhat ka mu a, tua mite tungah thukhen nading aana a kipia ahi hi. Jesuh thu a genna le Pasian thu hangin a kithat mite’ kha zong ka mu hi. Tua mite in ganhing ahi a, a lim ahi zongin bia lo uh hi; a taltang uhah ahi a, a khut tung uhah ahi zongin ganhing ciaptehna nei lo uh hi. Amaute hong hingkik uh a, Khrih tawh kum tulkhat sung ukna aana a neikhawm uh hi. [5] Kum tulkhat a cin mateng a si dangte hingkik lo uh hi. Hih pen sihna panin thawhkikna a masa ahi hi. [6] Hih thawhkikna masa sungah a kihel mite pen Pasian’ mi siangtho hi a, a hampha mahmah ahi uh hi. Nihvei sihna in tua bang mite bangmah cihzo nawn lo ding a, amaute pen Pasian le Khrih’ siampite hi ding uh a, amah tawh kum tulkhat sung ukna aana nei ding uh hi.
[13] Tuipi sungah a om misite, tuipi in hong pusuah a, Sihna le Misite’ Gam in zong amau sungah a om misite hong pusuah uh hi. Tua ciangin a vekpi-in amaute’ gamtatnasa tawh kizui-in thu a kikhen hi.

[16] Tua ciangin numei kiangah, “Naupaiina-ah na gimna nakpitakin ka khangsak ding a, na a sapipi-in nau na nei ding hi. Ahi zongin na pasal mah na deih ding a, amah in nang tungah hong uk ding hi,” a ci hi.
[35] “Note in thukhenna, a sau tehna, a tam tehnate-ah a man loin na gamta kei ding uh hi.
[11] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in kong cihin-ah, mai lamah lametna note kong piakkik ding, na siatna ding uh hi loin na phattuamna ding uh geelna ka neihte kei bek in ka thei hi.

[11] “Midangte in keima hangin a man lopi-in hong simmawhin hong bawlsia a, a nam tuamtuamin hong gensiat uh ciangin thupha ngah mi na hi uh hi. [12] Note a dingin vantungah thaman lianpi hong kikoih kholhsak ahih manin tua bang na tuah uh ciangin nuamin na lungdam un. Note’ hun ma-a kamsangte zong tua bangmahin a na kibawlsia ngei ahi hi.
[24] “Kuamah, to nih’ sila hikhawm thei lo hi. Khat mudahin khat it ding a, khat tungah thumanin khat simmawhbawl ding hi. Note in Pasian’ na le leitung sum na na semkhawm zo kei ding uh hi.
[10] “A tawmno-ah a diktatte pen a tamah zong diktat uh a, a tawmno-ah a citak lote pen a tamah zong citak lo uh hi.
[29] Ahi zongin Peter le sawltak dangte in, “Mite’ thu sangin Pasian’ thu ka mangzaw ding uh hi.

[1] A kuamah peuh in hong ukte’ thu na mang ciat un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ thukimpih lohin kuamah in ukna thu nei lo hi; ukna thu nei i cih mite pen Pasian’ koih mite ahi hi. [2] Tua ahih manin ukna thuneite a nialte pen Pasian’ koihsa mite a nial suak a, tua bang mite in thukhenna a thuak ding uh hi.

[5] Silate aw, launa le linna tawh na leitung tote uh thu mang unla, Khrih’ na na sep uh mah bangin lungsim takpi tawh na na sepsak un. [6] A hong pahtak ding uh deihna tawh amaute’ muhsung bekin tuaci gamtat kei unla, Khrih’ sila na hihna hangun Pasian’ hong deih bangin lungsim takpi tawh na sem un. [7] Mihingte’ na a sem bang lelin kingaihsun loin Topa’ na a sem bangin kingaihsun unla, thanopna tawh sem un. [8] Salte ahi a, sal ahi lote ahi zongin na hoih a sem mi khempeuh, Topa in thaman a piak ding lamtak na thei un. [9] Tote aw, silate in note hong bawl mah bangin note in zong amaute limbawl unla, tawn’ gawpgawpnate zang nawn kei un. Note le na silate uh vantung panin To khat khutnuai-ah a om na hihna uh le tua Topa in kuamah maitang zahtak tuam nei loin a kibangin mi khempeuh thu a khen ahihna thu na phawk ta un.

[23] Mite’ nasem bangin kingaihsun loin, Pasian’ nasem bangin kingaihsun unla, na sep peuhpeuh uh lungsim takpi tawh lawpin sem un. [24] Topa in note tungah thaman a hong piak ding lamtak phawk gige un. Tua bangin na sepna uhah Khrih Topa’ na a semsem na hi uh hi. [25] A man loin a gamtate in ahihleh a gamtatna bangun thuak ding uh hi. Pasian in kuamah deidan loin amau’ gamtatna bang ciatin thu a khen ahi hi.

[16] Lungdam tawntungin, [17] thu ngen niloh unla, [18] bangbang hong piang taleh na lungdamna uh Pasian tungah ko tawntung un. Khrih Jesuh tawh kipawlin na nuntakna sung uhah hih bangzia-in na om ding uh Pasian in a hong deih ahi hi.

[10] Pasian, a man loin gamta ngei lo ahih manin na Khristianpihte uh a beisa hunah na huhna uh le tu dongin na huh laina uh tawh ama a dingin na nasepna uh le amah na itna uh na lahnate uh hong mangngilh het lo ding hi.

[2] Sanggamte aw, thuhaksa a tuamtuam na thuak uh ciangin lungdam nadingin na ngaihsun zaw un. [3] Tua bangin na upna uh hong kize-etna na thuakzawh uh ciangin na kipna uh hong kilangsak ahihna thu na thei uh hi. [4] A kisam bangmah om loin a cingtaak na suahtheih nadingun na thuakna uh hangin a tawntungin na kip paisuak nadingun na ngaihsun un.

[12] A hoih takpi mah hiam, ci-in sinna a thuak ciangin a nangzote a hampha mahmah ahi hi. Tua bangin a nangzote in, amah a itte tungah Pasian in a piak dingin a ciam nuntakna lukhu a ngah ding uh hi.
[17] A hoih a manin gamtat ding thei napi-in a gamta lote a khial ahi hi.
[4] Na lo uh a hong khawhsakte a thaman pia lo na hih manun tu-in amaute’ phunna za un. Anla dingin na sawl uh mite’ phunna Vanglian Topa in za khinta hi.

[19] Pasian’ thu na ngaihsutna uh tawh a kilawm lopi mahin gimna na thuak uhleh na thuakna uh hangin Pasian in thupha hong pia ding hi. [20] Note na gamtat khialhna uh hangin hong kisat ciangin lungduai takin na thuak manun bangmah phattuamna om lo hi. Ahi zongin a manin gamta napi-in gimna na thuak uh ciangin lungduai takin na thuak uhleh Pasian in thupha hong pia ding hi. [21] Khrih mahmah in zong note a dingin thuakin, ama khekhap na zuihtheih nadingun etteh ding lim hong nusiat ahih manin hih bangin a thuak ding mahin Pasian in note a hong sam ahi hi. [22] Khialhna bangmah gamta lo a, zuau a gen lam zong kiza ngei lo hi.

[7] Tua mah bangin pasalte aw, note sangin na zite uh a thahat lo zawdeuh ahihna thu na phawk un. Note mah bangin Pasian’ piak nuntakna a ngahte ahih uh manin na zite uh zahtak bawl un. Tua hileh na thungetna uh bangmah in hong nawngkaisak lo ding hi.
[2] Tua bang hinapi-in mi tampi tak in amau’ gamtat hoih lohna zui ding uh a, tua bangin amau gamtatna hangin mite in thuman lampi gensia ding uh hi.
[14] Thulamlak ding a nei lo mihingte kipuk uh a, thulamlak tampi neihna pen lungmuanna ahi hi.
[25] Lunghihmawhna in lungkhamna piangsak a, kampau hoih in mi lungdamsak hi.
[30] Maitaina in lung nuamsak a, thuhoih zakna in lung damsak hi.
[11] A kilawm hunin kammal khat paukhiatna pen ngun pek tunga kham pek khat a kisuang tawh kibang hi.
[25] A dangtak mipa in tuivot lim a sak bangin gamlapi-a om lawmte’ kiang panin thuzak nuam kisa hi.
[21] Mi’ gen khempeuh thudon kei in. Na nasempa’ hong samsiatna na zakha ding hi.
[11] Sehnel gam le a khuapite, Kedar mite’ tenna khuaneute a aw uh sangkhai sak un. Sela gam a teng mite lungdamna tawh la sasak unla, mual dawn panin amaute awngsak un.

[7] Thuhoih hong puak, kilemna thu a genzak, thuhoih thupha a hong puak, hotkhiatna thu a genzak, Zion tungah, “Na Pasian in uk hi,” ci-in mualte kantanin thu hong gen kamtai pa bangzahin hoih ahi hiam?
[1] Tua ciangin mite in, “I zak thu kua in um thei ding ahi hiam? Hih bang thu-ah TOPA’ vangliatna khut kua in bangci muh theih ding ahi hiam?

[1] A lian mahmah Theofilas aw: Eite lakah a piang ngeisa thu a kigente, mi tampi in amau siamna zah ciat tawh lai-in a gelh uh hi. [2] A kipat cil a kipanin amau’ mit mahmah tawh a mu mite in hong gente uh a gelh uh ahi hi. [3] Kei zong, hih thute khempeuh a kipat cil a kipanin limtakin kantel khin ka hih manin, a thu a kizomzomin nang a dingin hong gelhsak leng hoih ding hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi. [4] Nang tungah a hong kigensa thute khempeuh a man taktak na theih nading deihsakna tawh ka hong gelh ahi hi.
[34] Na mittang uh note’ pumpi a dingin meivak tawh kibang hi. Na mit uh ciim leh na pumpi khempeuh un hoihtakin mu thei a, na mit uh maang leh na pumpi uh a dingin khuamial ahi hi.
[29] Ahi zongin Abraham in, ‘Na sanggamte a hilh dingin Moses le kamsangte om uh ahih manin tuate’ thugen na ngai ta uh hen,’ a ci hi.
[16] Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawn loin a hin tawntung theih nadingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi.

[16] Ahi zongin Isaiah in, “Topa aw, ka thugente uh kua in um ahi hiam?” a cih mah bangin Lungdamna Thu a za mi khempeuh in um kim lo uh hi. [17] Tua ahih ciangin zakna panin upna hong piangthei a, Khrih thu up nading pen hilhna panin hong piangthei pan hi.
[33] Sanggamte aw, mi’ khemsa-in ta kei un. Kikholhpih hoih lote in mi siasak thei hi.
[29] Na kiho uh ciangin kamguh zang kei unla, na pauna uh a za mite in phattuamna a ngahtheih nadingin na-in a kimang kam hoihte bek na pau un.
[3] Note pen Pasian’ mi na hih manun note lakah nulepa khialhna, a kilawm lo-a gamtatna, huaihamna cihte genin zong na nei vet kei un.

[19] La a tuamtuamte genin sakna tawh Topa’ thu gen belin nei unla, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh Topa phatna la sa un. [20] I Topa Jesuh Khrih hangin thu khempeuhah Pa Pasian tungah lungdamna ko ta un.
[21] Thu khempeuh entel pha unla, a hoihte kemin, [22] a sia lamsang peuhmah pelh un.
[11] Ka hong gensa thute na hilhsawn in.
[7] Tua bang numeite in thu a zakzak uh hangin a man le a man lo khen thei lo uh ahih manin thuman thutak thei zo lo uh hi.
[19] Sanggamte aw, note in na theih ding uh ka deih thu in: Thu kigen khempeuh hoihtakin ngai pahpah un. Ahi zongin pau pahpah kei unla, heh pakpak kei un.
[5] Tua mah bangin leii zong i pumpi na sung panin a neu mahmah khat hinapi-in thusia lianpipi piangsak zo hi. Gam khempeuh zong mei-ek neuno khat pan kipanin a kangtum thei hi.

[3] “Keimah longal pasian dang na bia kei ding uh hi. [4] “A kiseek milim hitaleh, tunga vantung hitaleh, nuai-a leisung hitaleh, leinuai-a om tui sungah hitaleh a om na khat peuhpeuh a sun khat peuhpeuh note a dingin na bawl kei ding uh hi. [5] Tuate’ mai-ah na kun kei ding uh a, tuate na bia kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah note’ TOPA Pasian, a aam Pasian ka hi a, kei hong mudahte’ tungah pate’ mawhna tate’ tungah khang thum khang lina dongin thuk-in, [6] ahih hangin kei hong itin ka thupiakte a zui mi a tul tampite tungah itna kip a lak pa ka hi hi. [7] “ TOPA note’ Pasian’ min a sia lamin na zang kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in ama min a zang khialte gim pia ding hi. [8] “Sabbath ni a siangtho-a zat ding phawk un. [9] Ni guk sung nomau’ na semin na nasep ding khempeuh uh na hih ding uh hi. [10] Ahi zongin a ni sagih ni pen TOPA note’ Pasian’ Sabbath ni ahi hi. Tua ni-in note, na tapate, na tanute, na nasempate, na nasemnute, na ganhing uh ahi a, peemtate in ahi zongin na bangmah na sem kei ding uh hi. [11] Bang hang hiam cih leh a ni guk sung tengin TOPA in van le lei, tuipi le tuate sunga om khempeuh bawl a, a ni sagih ni tawlnga hi. Tua ahih ciangin TOPA in Sabbath ni thupha pia-in siangthosak hi. [12] “ TOPA na Pasian un note hong piak leitang tungah na khan uh a sau theih nadingin na nu le na pa uh zahtak un. [13] “Mi na that kei ding uh hi. [14] “Nulepa mawhna na bawl kei ding uh hi. [15] “Na na gu kei ding uh hi. [16] “Na vengte uh langkhatah a man loin teci na pang kei ding uh hi. [17] “Na vengte uh inn na deihgawh kei ding uh hi. Na vengte uh zi hitaleh, ama nasempa hitaleh, ama nasemnu hitaleh, ama bawngtal hitaleh, ama la hitaleh, na vengte a’ ahi na khat peuhpeuh na deihgawh kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[12] TOPA in Moses kiangah, “Keima kiang mualtungah hong paito inla, tua lai-ah ngak in. Amaute a kihilh nadingin keima gelhsa, thukham le thupiakna tawh, suangpek nang tungah kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
[18] Sinai Mual tungah thugenna a man khit ciangin Pasian’ khut tawh a kigelh suangpek ahi thuciamna suangpek nihte, amah in Moses a pia hi.
[28] Tua lai-ah sun sawmli le zan sawmli sung TOPA tawh Moses om a, tua hun sungteng anletui a ne kei hi. Amah in suangpek tungah thuciamna kammalte ahi thupiak sawmte a gelh hi.
[17] “Hih lo ding, ci-in TOPA’ thupiakte khat peuhpeuh, mi khatpeuh in hihin a khialh leh, a theih lohna hang hitaleh zong, amah a mawh hi veve-in, ama mawhna mah pua ding hi.
[31] “Tua ahih ciangin note in ka thupiaknate zui-in tuate na sem ding uh hi; kei pen TOPA ka hi hi.
[3] A kiseh hun, tu kha ni sawm le li ni nitakin a thukhamte le a ngeina kip omte bangin na kham ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[13] Thupiak Sawmte ahi note’ hih dinga hong thupiak ama thuciamna note’ tungah hong gen a, amah in suangpek nih tungah tuate a gelh hi.

[40] Tua ahih ciangin note le note’ khita na tate uh tungah thu hong nuamin, TOPA na Pasian un a tawntung a hong piak gam sungah na khan uh na sausak theih nadingun tuni-a no kiangah kong gen ahi ama thukhamte le a thupiakte na zui ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[1] Moses in Israel-te khempeuh samin amaute kiangah, “Israel-te aw, tuni-a note’ zakin kong gen thukhamte le ngeina kipte ngai unla, note in thei-in limtakin zuih ding na ngaihsun ding uh hi.

[6] “‘Kei pen salsuahna Egypt leitang panin note a hong paikhiatpih TOPA na Pasian uh ka hi hi. [7] “‘Keimah longal pasian dang na nei kei ding uh hi. [8] “‘A kiseek milim hitaleh, tunga vantung hitaleh, nuai-a leitung hitaleh, leinuai-a om tui sung hitaleh ah a om na khat peuhpeuh a sun khat peuhpeuh note a dingin na bawl kei ding uh hi. [9] Amaute’ mai-ah kun loin, amau’ na na sem kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh keimah TOPA note’ Pasian, a aam Pasian ka hi a, kei hong mudahte’ tungah a pate’ mawhna a tate’ tungah khang thum khang lina dongin thuk-in, [10] ahih hangin kei hong itin ka thupiakte a zui mi a tul tampite’ tungah itna kip a lak pa ka hi hi. [11] “ TOPA note’ Pasian’ min a sia lamin na zang kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in ama min a sia lamin a zang mi a mawh lo hi, ci lo ding hi. [12] “‘ TOPA note’ Pasian in hong thupiak bangin na sianthosak nadingun Sabbath ni tang un. [13] Ni guk sung na semin na nasep ding khempeuh uh na hih ding uh hi. [14] Ahih hangin a ni sagih ni pen TOPA note’ Pasian’ Sabbath ni ahi hi. Tua ni-in note bangin na nasem numei le na nasem pasalte uh a tawlngak theih nadingin note, na tapate, na tanute, na nasemnute, na nasempate, na bawngtal, na la, na ganhing khat peuhpeuh uh le na huang sung uha om zinte in na khat peuhpeuh sem lo ding uh hi. [15] Egypt-ah nasem na hihna uh le tua lai panin TOPA na Pasian un a vangliatna khut le a thahatna tawh hong paikhiatpihna na phawk ding uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Sabbath ni na tan’ ding uh TOPA note’ Pasian in thu hong pia hi. [16] “‘ TOPA note’ Pasian in hong piak leitang tungah na khan uh sau-in na nopsak theih nadingun TOPA note’ Pasian in hong thupiak bangin na nu na pa uh zahtak un. [17] “‘Mi na that kei ding uh hi. [18] “‘Nulepa mawhna zong na bawl kei ding uh hi. [19] “‘Na na gu kei ding uh hi. [20] “‘Na vengte uh langkhatah zong a man loin teci na pang kei ding uh hi. [21] “‘Na vengte uh zi zong na deihgawh kei ding uh hi. Na vengte’ inn, a lo, a nasempa, a nasemnu, a bawngtal, a la, ahih kei leh na vengte’ na khat peuhpeuh na deihgawh kei ding uh hi,’ ci hi.
[5] TOPA note’ Pasian, na lungsim khempeuh uh, na nuntakna khempeuh uh, le na thahatna khempeuh uh tawh na it ding uh hi.
[8] Tua hun laitakin TOPA in, tuni dongin ama na a sem ding le ama min tawh thupha a pia dingin TOPA’ mai-ah dingin, TOPA’ thuciamna singkuang a pua dingin Levi minamte a tuam koih hi.

[12] “Israel-te aw, tu-in, TOPA na Pasian uh zahtak ding, ama lampite tot ding, amah it ding, na lungsim khempeuh uh le na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh TOPA note’ Pasian’ na sep ding, [13] le nomau’ hoih nadingin tuni-a kong gen thupiaknate le TOPA’ thukhamte zuih ding cih simloh, TOPA na Pasian un note’ tung panin bang dang hong kal ahi hiam?

[26] “En un, tuni-in na mai uhah thupha khat le hamsia khat ka koih hi. [27] Tuni-a kong gen, TOPA na Pasian uh thupiaknate na zuih uhleh thupha hi a, [28] TOPA na Pasian uh thupiaknate mang loin, na theih nai loh uh pasian dangte’ nungzui dingin tuni-a no kong thupiakna panin na kiheikhiat uh le hamsia ahi hi.
[1] “Note in TOPA na Pasian uh thu mangin, tuni-a kong gen ama thupiakna khempeuh limtakin na zuih uhleh TOPA na Pasian un leitung minam dangte khempeuh sangin a lianzaw-in note hong bawl ding hi.
[29] “ TOPA i Pasian in hong lahkhiat loh thusim om a, ahih hangin hih thukham sunga om thute khempeuh i zuih theih nadingin hong lakkhia a, eite le i suan i khakte’ zuih tawntung ding ahi hi.

[8] Hih thukham laibu na mangngilh ngei kei ding hi. A sunga kigelh thute khempeuh tawh kizui-in na gamtat theih nadingin sunlezanin na lungngaingai ding hi. Tua hileh na maa vang ding a, na nasep tangtung ding hi.
[27] Siatna panin kikem inla, gamtat hoih in; tua hileh na khantawnin, na kip paisuak ding hi.
[31] A lungsim sungah ama Pasian’ thukham om a, a gamtatna khempeuhah lampial het lo hi.
[8] Nangma deih bang hihna-ah nuam ka sa hi, ka Pasian aw. Nangma thukham ka lung sungah om hi,” ka ci hi.

[15] Eite ihih leh i nuntakna pen lopa tawh kibang a, lolai-ah a po paakte bangin a palh hi. [16] Bang hang hiam cih leh huih in amah semin beimang a, tua mun in amah thei nawn lo hi. [17] Ahih hangin TOPA’ itna kip pen amah a zahtak mite tungah a tawntung pan a tawntung dongin kip ngitnget a, ama thumanna pen ama thuciamna zui-in a thupiak bangin sep ding a phawk mite tungah a khang khangin a kip tawntung hi. [18] Ahih hangin TOPA’ itna kip pen amah a zahtak mite tungah a tawntung pan a tawntung dongin kip ngitnget a, ama thumanna pen ama thuciamna zui-in a thupiak bangin sep ding a phawk mite tungah a khang khangin a kip tawntung hi.
[1] TOPA phat un. TOPA zahtakin a thupiaknate nuam a sa mahmah mi, thupha ngah mi ahi hi.

[1] Amau’ gamtatna-ah paubaan om loin TOPA’ ngeina sungah a gamtate thupha ngah ahi hi. [2] Ama thuhilhnate zui-in, a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh amah zongin, khialhna zong bawl loin, ama lampi a zuite, thupha ngah ahi hi. [3] Ama thuhilhnate zui-in, a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh amah zongin, khialhna zong bawl loin, ama lampi a zuite, thupha ngah ahi hi. [4] Nangma thuhilhte limtakin zuih dingin thu nong pia hi. [5] Nangma ngeina kipte zuihna-ah ka gamtatna kip tahen. [6] Na thupiakte khempeuh mitsuanin nei ka hih manin, kei ka maizum kei ding hi. [7] Nangmah biakna ngeina kipte ka sin khit ciangin lungsim thutang tawh nangmah kong phat ding hi. [8] Nangma ngeina kipte ka zui ding hi; kei hong nusia suak kei in.
[17] Nungta-in nangma thu ka zuih theih nadingin na nasempa tungah hong cingh in. [18] Nangma thukham sung panin a lamdang nate ka muh theih nadingin keima mitte hong honsak in.
[142] Nangma thumanna kip tawntung a, na thukham zong man tawntung hi.
[16] Thukham a zuite a khansau ding a, thukham a zui lote si ding hi.
[9] Mi khat in thukham a zuihnop kei leh ama thungetna nangawn Pasian in zakthadahhuai sa hi.
[3] Amah in TOPA’ nasep nuamsa ding hi. Amah in a tungtham bek muhna tawh thu khen lo ding a, kam lengsawn bek zakna tawh thu khentat lo ding hi.

[33] Ahih hangin TOPA in kong cihin-ah, tua hun hong tun ciangin Israel minamte tawh hih bangin thuciamna ka bawl ding hi: Amaute’ sungah ka thukham ka koih ding a, amaute’ lungtang tungah ka gelh ding hi. Kei pen amaute’ Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute pen keima mite ahi ding uh hi.

[22] a pute a pate uh tungah piak dingin na ciamsa, bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin a luanna hih gam na pia hi. [23] Amau zong lutin a luahpah uh hi. Ahih hangin amaute in na thu hong mang loin, thukham hong zui lo uh a, hih dinga na thupiakte khat beek a hih kei uh hi. Tua ahih manin amaute tungah hih siatna khempeuh na tungsak hi.

[11] a zui peuhpeuh a nuntak theih nading ka thukhamte le ka thupiaknate ka hilh hi. [12] TOPA ahi keimah in amaute pen mi siangtho-in ka bawlna thu a phawk nadingun kote’ kikalah thukimna limin Sabbath tan’ ding thu ka pia hi.

[19] Kei pen TOPA ahi note’ Pasian ka hi hi. Ka thukhamte zui unla, ka thupiaknate bangin gamta un. [20] Kei pen TOPA ahi note’ Pasian ka hihna na phawkna ding uh le note tawh i bawlsa thukimna lim dingin Sabbath-te na siangthosak un,’ ka ci hi. [21] “Ahi zongin a tate nangawn un kei hong dem uh hi. A zuite in nuntakna a ngahna ding ahi ka thukhamte palsatin ka thupiaknate mang lo uh a, Sabbath-te siasak uh hi. Tua ahih manin, ka hehnateng gamlakah thuaksak gawpin, amaute a sumai dingin ka kithawi hi.

[17] “Moses Thukham le kamsangte’ thuhilhnate a phiat dingin hong pai hi, ci-in hong ngaihsun kei un. Tuate a phiat dingin a hong pai hi loin, amaute’ hilhna a kicingsak dingin a hong pai ka hizaw hi. [18] Hoihtakin na phawk ding uh thu panin: Van le lei a bei mateng, hih thukhamte a neupen khat nangawn’ deihna tangtung lopi-in mawkmai lo ding hi. [19] Tua ahih manin hih thukhamte lakpan a neupente khat bek nangawn zuikha loin, midangte in zong a zuih loh nadingin a gen mite pen vantung ki-ukna sungah mi neupen hi ding uh hi. Ahi zongin hih thukhamte zui-in, midangte in zong a zuih nadingin a hilh mite pen vantung ki-ukna sungah milian hi ding uh hi. [20] Tua ahih manin Pasian’ deihna bangin gamtat nading thu-ah Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite sangin na cihtakzawk uhleh vantung ki-ukna sungah a om thei bek ding na hi uh hi.
[12] Tua ahih manin note tungah hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah na bawl un. Moses Thukhamte le kamsangte’ thuhilhnate pen hih mah a deihna ahi hi.

[3] Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “David le a kikholhpihte a gilkial laitakun David’ gamtatna thu sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam? [4] Pasian’ inn sungah amah lut a, siampite lobuang, amah le a kikholhpihte in a nektheih ding ahi lo Ompihna Anlum la-in amah le a kikholhpihte in a ne uh hi. [5] Tua ahih kei leh zong siampite in Sabbath sim mahin biakinn sungah Sabbath thukham khial napi-in mawhsakna a ngah tuan lohna thu uh, Moses Thukham sungah sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?

[16] Khatvei, Jesuh kiangah mi khat hong pai a, “Sia aw, nuntak tawntungna ka ngah nadingin bang gamtat hoih gamta ding ka hi hiam?” ci-in a hong dong hi. [17] Jesuh in, “Bang hangin bang hoih hiam cih thu hong dong na hi hiam? A hoih khat bek om hi. Nuntak tawntungna sungah na lutnop leh thukhamte na zui in,” ci-in a dawng hi. [18] Amah in, “Bang thukhamte ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin Jesuh in, “Mi that kei in; numei tungah mawh kei in; mi neihsa gu kei in; zuauthu gen kei in; [19] na nu na pa zahtak in; nang na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in, cihnate ahi hi,” a ci hi. [20] Tua ciangin tangvalpa in, “Hihte khempeuh ka zuihsa ahi hi; bang kisam lai ding ka hi hiam?” a cih ciangin [21] Jesuh in, “Mi cingtaak na hihnop leh pai-in na neihsate va zuak inla, na sum khotte, mizawngte tungah va pia lecin, vantungah sum na hau ding hi. Tua ciangin hong pai inla kei hong zui in,” a ci hi.
[38] Hih pen a masapen, a lianpen thukham ahi hi. [39] A nihna pen a masa mah tawh kibang a, nangma pumpi na it bangin na vengte na it in, cihna ahi hi.

[17] Jesuh in a khualzinna a zom dingin a paikhiat ding laitakin mi khat hong tai-in a mai-ah hong khukdin a, “A dik siapa aw, nuntak tawntungna ka ngah nadingin bang hih ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. [18] Jesuh in, “Bang hangin kei midik hong ci na hi hiam? Pasian simloh kuamah a diktatzo om lo hi. [19] Mi that kei in; numei tungah mawh kei in; mi’ neihsa gu kei in; mi khem kei in; na nu na pa zahtak in, cihna thukhamte thei lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi. [20] Amah in, “Sia aw, ka neutung a kipanin hih thukhamte khempeuh ka zuikhin hi,” a ci hi. [21] Tua ciangin Jesuh in itna tawh tua mipa enin, “Na khat bek na kisam lai hi. Pai inla, na neih khempeuh na zuak khit ciangin mizawngte tungah na sumkhotte va pia in. Tua hileh vantungah sum na hau ding hi. Tua khit ciangin ka nung hong zui in,” a ci hi.

[28] Tua thukidotna a za Thukham hilh siate khat in, Saddusi mite’ dotnate limtakin Jesuh in a dawntheihna a muh ciangin Jesuh hong neh a, “Thukham khempeuh lakah bang thukham a lianpen ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. [29] Jesuh in, “Thukham a lianpen in: Israel mite aw, ngai un: I Topa Pasian bek mah Topa ahi hi. [30] Na Topa Pasian uh, na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na pilna khempeuh, le na thahatna khempeuh uh tawh na it un, a cihna ahi hi. [31] A nihna in: Nangma pumpi na it bangin na vengte na it in, cihna ahi hi. Hih tegel sangin thukham a lianzaw a dang om nawn lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. [32] Tua ciangin Thukham hilh siapa in, “Sia aw, na gen mah bangin hi ka sa mahmah hi. Topa bek mah Pasian hi a, amah simloh pasian dang kuamah om lo hi. [33] Mite in a lungsim khempeuh, a pilna khempeuh, le a hatna khempeuh uh tawh Pasian itin, amau pumpi a it bangin a vengte a it ding uh ahi hi. Pasian biak nadingin biakna tau tunga gan gawhnate le biakna dang khempeuh sangin hih thukham nihte zuih ding thupizaw takpi hi,” a ci hi. [34] Jesuh in hih mipa’ thugenzia hoihsa ahih manin, “Pasian’ Ukna sungah a om dektak mahmah na hi hi,” a ci hi. Tua khit a kipanin Jesuh kiangah kuamah in thu dong ngam nawn lo uh hi.
[38] Jesuh in a thuhilhna-ah, “Thukham hilh sia pawlkhatte na bat khak loh nadingun na kidawm un. Amaute in puantualpi silhnuam uh a, mite lakah mite in a zahtak hopih ding a deih uh hi.
[17] Ahi zongin Thukham a neupen themno khat nangawn a maiman’ ding sangin van le lei a manthan ding olzaw lai hi.

[46] “Thukham hilh siate na batkhak loh nadingun kidawm un. Amaute in puantualpi silhnuam uh a, mihon lakah a kizahtak hopih ding deihin, kikhopna innsung le pawi lakah a om uh ciangin uliante’ tutna mun hoihte bekah tunuam uh hi.

[16] A kicing ama hong itna hangin eite khempeuh tungah thupha a banbanin hong pia hi. [17] Pasian in Moses tungtawnin Thukham hong pia a, ahi zongin Jesuh Khrih hangin itna le cihtakna thu hong pai hi.

[34] Note tungah ka hong piak thak thu in: Note khatlekhat na ki-it ding uh ahi hi. Note ka hong it mah bangin note khatlekhat na ki-it un. [35] Note khatlekhat ki-it le-uhcin keima nungzuite na hihna uh mi khempeuh in hong thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[12] “Note tungah ka hong piak thu in: Note ka hong it zahin note khatlekhat na ki-it un.
[14] Ka hong thupiak bangin na gamtat uhleh ka lawmte na hi uh hi.
[17] Tua hi a, note ka hong thupiak in: Khatlekhat na ki-it un, cihna ahi hi.

[12] Moses Thukham a nei lo Gentail mite a khialh uh ciangin thukham nei lopi mahin siatna thuak uh a, Moses Thukham a nei Jew mite a khialh uh ciangin tua thukham tawh kizui-in amaute tungah thu kikhen hi. [13] Thukham zakna bek hangin Pasian tawh kipawlna a piang hi lo a, thukham sunga Pasian’ genna bangin a gamtate bek Pasian tawh a kipawl thei ahi hi.

[15] Amau’ lungsim sungah thukham’ deihnate omkhin ahihna thu a gamtatna un hong kilangsak hi. Amau mahmah zong khat veivei hoih kisa, khat veivei sia kisa uh ahih manin, amau’ lungsim sungah thukham’ deihnate theihna omkhin ahihna thu, hih amau’ kiphawk tawmna lungsim in nakpitakin hong kitelsak hi.

[20] Thukham in mihingte a mawhna kilangsak thei bek ahih manin thukham zuihna hangin kuamah in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna ngah zo lo hi. [21] Ahi zongin tu-in thukham zuihna hang hi loin thudang khat hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theih nading lampi hong kilangzo a, Thukham le kamsangte in zong hih thu-ah teci a pang uh hi. [22] Tua thu in: Jew mi le Gentail mi kuamah a kilamdanna om loin Jesuh Khrih upna hangin mi khempeuh in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna a ngah hi. [23] Mi khempeuh mawh ciat uh a, a hong honkhia Pasian tawh kigamla uh hi. [24] Ahi zongin Pasian in a hong hehpihna hangin Khrih Jesuh tawh hong tatkhiat manin amah tawh i kipawlthei kik hi.
[28] Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khatpeuh Pasian tawh a kipawl theihna pen Thukham zuihzawhna hang hi loin upna hang hi, ci-in i genzo hi.
[31] Tua ahihleh hih upna thu i gen ciangin Thukham a phiat ihi hiam? Hi lo hi; a kipsak semsem ihi hi.

[14] Thukham zuihna hangin Pasian’ thuciamnate a kingah ding hileh mite’ upna pen a kimanna om loin, Pasian’ thuciamnate zong a mawkna suak ding hi. [15] Thukham in Pasian’ heh nading piangsak hi. Ahi zongin thukham om kei leh thukham zui lo cih zong om thei lo hi. [16] Tua ahih manin Abraham’ suanlekhakte khempeuh tungah Pasian’ hehpihna piakkhong a suahtheih nadingin Thukham a zuite bek in ngah loin, Abraham’ up bangin a umte in zong a ngahtheih nadingun upna bulphuhin thuciamna kipia hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Abraham pen kha thu lamah eite khempeuh’ pupi ahi hi. [17] Lai Siangtho sungah zong, “Minam tampite’ pupi dingin ka hong bawl khin hi,” ci-in a kigelh hi. Tua hi a, bangmah a om nai lopi a thupiakna tawh a omsak thei, a site a hingsak thei, Abraham in a up Pasian’ muhna-ah hih thuciamna kipin a kizang ahi hi.

[6] Eite cimawhin i om laitakin Pasian’ hoihsak hunin ei mi gilote a dingin Khrih hong si hi. [7] Mihoih khat a dingin a si ngam a omkha ahi zongin thukham zuizo mipa a dingin sih ngam nading a thu haksa mahmah khat ahi hi. [8] Ahi zongin eite mawhna nei ihih laitakin eite a dingin Khrih hong si ahih manin Pasian in eite hong it mahmahna thu hong lak khin hi.

[20] Khialhna a tam semsem nadingin thukham hong kipia hi. Ahi zongin khialhna a tamna munah Pasian’ hehpihna hong lianzaw zel hi. [21] Tua ahih manin mawhna thahatin hong sihsak mah bangin, i Topa Jesuh Khrih hangin Pasian’ hehpihna thahat zaw lai a, mihoihin hong sangin nuntak tawntungna sung a hong tunpih hi.

[14] Note pen thukham’ sawlna hangin nasem hi loin Pasian’ hong lah thuhoihte’ hangin nasem na hih uh manin mawhna’ sawlna mangin na gamta nawn kei un. [15] Eite pen thukham’ uk hi loin Pasian’ hehpihna in hong uk ahih manin mawhna i gamta kei ding hi. [16] Mi khatpeuh’ thu a mang dingin ama khut sungah na kipiak uh ciangin a thu na mante uh’ sila na hi uh hi. Mawhna na bawl uhleh sihna a thuak ding na hi uh a, thumangin na om uhleh Pasian tawh pawlkhat a suak ding na hi uh hi.

[5] I leitung lungsim tawh i nuntak laiteng, thukham hangin i hihnop semsem mawhnopnate i gamta a, tuate khempeuh sihna tawh a kizom ahi hi. [6] Ahi zongin nidangin a hong lencip thukham panin Pasian in eite hong suaktasak khin ahih manin tua thukham tawh kisai-ah eite a sikhin ihi hi. Lai sungah a kigelh thukham lui sungah nungta nawn loin, Kha Siangtho’ hong piak nuntakna thakah a nungta ihi hi. [7] Tua ahihleh Thukham mahmah pen a siahuai ahi hiam? A sia hi lo hi. Mawhna bang hiam cih Thukham in hong theitel sak hi. Thukham in, “Hazatna lungsim nei kei in,” ci-in gen lo hileh, haza i cih bang ahi hiam, ci-in ka thei kei ding hi. [8] Thukham a omna hangin mawhna in nuamtak sa-in hazatna a tuamtuam ka neihtheih nading hong piangsak hi. Thukham om kei leh mawhna in bangmah sem thei lo hi. [9] Thukham ka theih ma-in mi nungta ka hi ngei a, thukham ka theih ciangin mawhnopna lungsim hong khangin kei ka si hi. [10] Nuntak ngah nadingin a kibawl thukham pen keima a dingin sihna hong hi zawsop hi. [11] Bang hang hiam cih leh thukham a om manin mawhna in nuamtaksa a, kei hong khemin tua thukham tawh a hong that hi. [12] Tua ahih ciangin Thukham mahmah hitaleh thupiaknate hitaleh hoihin man a, siangtho hi.

[21] Tua ahih ciangin a hoih gamta nuam hinapi-in a sia bekbek a gamtakha ka hihna ka thei hi. [22] Ka lungsim tawng taktakah Pasian’ thukham hoih ka sa hi. [23] Ahi zongin kei’ deih loh thudang khat in ka lungsimah na hong sem hi. Tua ka sunga na hong sem pen in mawhna thu-ah kei hong mancip hi. [24] Kei pen a lungkham mi ka hita hi. Kei a hong sisak ding hih lungsim lui panin kua in kei hong honkhiazo ding ahi hiam? [25] I Topa Jesuh Khrih in hong honkhiazo ding ahih manin Pasian tungah ka lung a dam hi. Kei’ omzia taktak ahihleh: Ka lungsim tawh Pasian’ thu ka zui a, ka pumpi in mawhna a piangsak thu a zui hi.

[1] Ahi zongin tu-in ahihleh Khrih Jesuh tawh kipawlin a nungta mite pen mawhna thukhenna tawh kipelh hi. [2] Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih Jesuh tawh a hong kipawlsak Kha Siangtho in mawhna le sihna a piangsak thukham panin kei hong suaktasak khinta hi. [3] Mihingte thahat lo ihih manin Thukham in ahih zawh loh thute Pasian in a hihzo hi. Mawhna a beisak theih nadingin mihingte sunga om mawhna tungah thu a khenna-in ama Tapa hong sawl a, amah pen mihingte’ mawhna lungsim mah a nei-in a hong pai hi. [4] Eite’ deihna bangin nungta loin Pasian’ Kha Siangtho’ deihna bangin a nungta eite sungah Thukham’ deihna teng a kicin theih nadingin Pasian in a Tapa a hong sawl ahi hi.
[31] Hih teng bang ahih khit ciangin bang gen ding om nawn ahi hiam? Pasian in eite hong koppih peuh leh kua in eite hong zozo ding ahi hiam?
[4] Bang hang hiam cih leh upna a nei mi khempeuh Pasian tawh a kipawl theih nadingin Khrih in Thukham a beisak hi.

[8] Khatlekhat ki-it ding cih lohbuang, kuama tungah leiba nei kei un. Midang a itte in Thukham deihna teng a zuikhin ahi hi. [9] Thukham sungah, “Nulepa mawhna bawl kei in, mi that kei in, guta kei in, hazatna lungsim nei kei in,” cihna le adang khempeuhte pen, “Nang na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in,” cihna thu in huam khinmang hi. [10] Midangte a it mi peuhmah in amaute tungah siatna bawl het lo ahih manin itna i neih ciangin Thukham buppi a zui khinta ihi hi.
[19] Bang hang hiam cih leh vun atna le vun at lohna a thupi hi lo a, Pasian’ thupiakte zuih ding a thupi ahi hi.

[6] Thuciamna thak nasem thei dingin kote tungah siamna a hong pia hi. Tua hong piakna pen lai-a kigelh thukham tawh hi loin Kha Siangtho tawh ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh lai-a kigelh thukham in sihna piangsak a, ahi zongin Kha Siangtho in nuntakna hong pia hi.

[16] Ahi zongin Jesuh Khrih upna hang bek tawh Pasian tawh kipawl theihna kingahin, Thukham zuihna hang tawh kingah ngei lo hi, ci-in ka thei uh hi. Kote mahmah in zong, Khrih hangin Pasian tawh ka kipawl theih nadingun Jesuh Khrih ka um uh a, Thukham deihna ka zuihna hang uh tawh hi lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Thukham zuihna hang tawh kuamah in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna ngah zo lo hi.

[19] Thukham tawh kisai-in ahihleh Pasian a dingin ka nuntak theih nadingin tua Thukham mah in kei hong thatkhin ahih manin Thukham tawh kisai thu-ah misi bang ka hi hi. Singlamteh tungah Khrih a kithah lai-in kei zong amah tawh a sikhawm ka hi hi. [20] Tua ahih manin tuhuna ka nuntakna zia pen kei hang hi nawn loin ka sungah a hong om Khrih hang ahi hi. Tua hi a, keimah hong itin, keima a dingin a nuntakna a hong pia Pasian’ Tapa ka muanna tawh tu laitakin a nungta ka hi hi. [21] Hih bang ka gen ciangin Pasian’ hehpihna thupha ka deih lohna ahi kei a, Thukham zuihzawhna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna om hileh, singlamteh tungah Khrih sihna a mawkna hi lel ding hi, a cinuam ka hizaw hi.

[1] Galati mihaite aw, singlamteh tungah Jesuh Khrih a sihna thu teltakin na theihsa uh ahih manin kua’ khemsa-in hici thei mawk na hi uh hiam? [2] Thukham na zuihna hangun Pasian’ Kha Siangtho ngah na hi uh hiam, ahih kei leh lungdamna thu za-in na upna hang uh hizaw ahi hiam? [3] Pasian’ Kha Siangtho tawh na patkhit uh ciangin nomau’ thatanghat thu tawh khup a sawm ding zahin hici hai lawmlawm na hi uh hiam?

[5] Note in Thukham na zuihna hangun Pasian in Kha Siangtho hong pia-in nalamdang hong bawl ahi hiam, ahih kei leh lungdamna thu za-in na upna hang uh hizaw ahi hiam? [6] Abraham tunga thupiang ngaihsun dih un. Lai Siangtho in, “Abraham in Pasian um a, tua a upna hangin Pasian in amah tawh a kipawlthei dingin mihoihin a sang hi,” na ci hi.

[10] Hih thu tawh kisai-in Lai Siangtho in, “Thukham laibu sunga kigelh khempeuh a vekpi-in a zuikhin tawntung lote in Pasian’ samsiatna thuak hi,” ci ahih manin Thukham a suangte pen samsiatna a ngah mite ahi uh hi.

[13] Lai Siangtho in, “Sing tungah a kikhai mi peuhmah Pasian’ samsiat mi ahi hi,” na ci ahih manin eite a dingin Khrih in samsiatna a thuak manin Thukham zuihlahna hangin samsiatna panin eite a hong tankhia ahi hi.

[17] Tu-in ka hong gennop thu in: Pasian in Abraham tawh thuciamna bawl a, tua a thuciamna peksat sawm lo hi. Tua ahih manin tua thuciamna a kibawlzawh kum zali le kum sawmthum khit ciangin a kinung piak Thukham in tua thuciamna peksatin phiat thei lo ding hi. [18] Pasian’ hong piakkhong pen Thukham zuihna hang tawh a kingah hi mawk leh piak ding hong ciamna hangin a kingah hi nawn lo ding hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in Abraham tungah letsong a piakna pen a thuciamnasa tawh kizui-in a piak ahi hi.

[24] Tua hi a, i upna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna i ngahna dingin Khrih a hong pai hun ciang dong, Thukham in eite a hong uk ahi hi. [25] Tu-in ahihleh upna hun hita ahih manin Thukham in eite hong uk thei nawn lo hi.

[4] Ahi zongin a hun a cin ciangin eite khempeuh Pasian’ tate i suahtheih nadingin Thukham nuai-ah a om mite a hong tankhia dingin Pasian in a Tapa hong paisak a, tua Tapa pen leitung ngeina bangin numei sung panin hong suakin, Jew Thukham sungah hong nungta hi.
[4] Thukham zuihna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theih nading a hanciamte pen Khrih tawh a kikhen na hi uh a, Pasian’ hehpihna in note hong huam thei lo hi.

[13] Sanggamte aw, note ahihleh a suakta mi ahi dingin Pasian in a hong sap ahi hi. Ahi zongin tua suahtakna pen na pumpi uh ut bangbangin gamtat theih nadingin paulam zonna-in nei kei unla, itna tawh khatlekhat kikhualna-in zangzaw un. [14] Bang hang hiam cih leh Thukham khempeuh thu khatin kigawm thei a, “Nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in,” cihna tawh kitomlak thei hi.
[18] Kha Siangtho’ deihna bangin na gamtat uhleh Thukham khutnuai-ah na om nawn kei uh hi.

[22] Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho’ sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna, [23] dikna le pumpi ki-ukzawhna hi a, hih bangin a gamta mite, Thukham in bangmah cih thei lo hi.
[2] Thu haksa na tuah uh ciangin khatlekhat na kihuh un. Tua hileh Khrih’ thukham a zui na hi uh hi.

[8] Note’ upna hangin Pasian’ hong hehpihna tawh hotkhiatna a ngah na hi uh hi. Note’ thalawhna hangin a ngah hi loin Pasian’ hong piakkhong ahi hi. [9] Note’ hanciamna tawh a ngah hi lo na hih manun na kisialh nading uh a thu om lo hi.
[2] Ui bangin a miginalo, a gitloh gamtat, vun at ding a ci teiteite kiang panin na kidawm un.

[9] Khrih tawh kiptakin kipawl khin ka hih manin Thukham zuihna tawh a kingah thei keima hanciamna tawh dik ngahna cihte ka nei nawn kei hi. Tu-in, Jesuh Khrih upna hangin Pasian in a hong piak diksakna ka ngah a, tua pen upna siksanin a hong kipia ahi hi.

[13] A beisa hunah na mawhna uh hangin kha thu tawh kisai-in misi na hi uh a, Gentail mi na hih manun Thukham nei lote na hi uh hi. Ahi zongin Khrih hangin Pasian in note hong hingsak a, i mawhna khempeuh hong maisak khinta hi. [14] Eite a dingin a hoih lo, i mawhna a kiciamtehna khempeuh, hong phiatsak a, tuate khempeuh singlamteh tungah kilhcipin a beisak ta hi. [15] Amah in huihlak a ukte le vangliatna a nei khempeuh, singlamteh tungah zogawp khin a, galzote in a sal matte a kaih uh bangin mi khempeuh muhin a gualzawhna a lak hi. [16] Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn, biakna pawite, Khadet pawi, le Sabbath ni tawh kisai-in kuamah in ngeina zuih ding bawl kei un. [17] Hihte pen mailam ah a hong piang ding nate’ lim hi lel a, ahi zongin tu-in a taktak ahi Khrih hong omta hi.

[8] Thukham pen a kizat nading a kilawm ciang ah zangthei lehang a hoih thu khat hi, ci-in i thei hi. [9] Ahi zongin i phawk dingah, mi hoihte a dingin thukham a kibawl hi lo a, thukham zui lote, thumang lote, Pasian’ deih bangin a gamta lote le mawhneite, biakna lungsim a nei lote le kam kilawm lo a paute, nute pate a thatte, midang a thatte, [10] nulepa mawhna a gamtate, palepa mawhna a bawlte, mi a gute, zuauthu a gente, mite’ siat nading thu a gente, le thuman tawh a kilehbulhin a gamta mite a dingin thukham a kibawl ahi hi. [11] Thuman ka cih pen thupha tawh kidimin a minthang Pasian in ka hilh dingin kei tungah a hong piak Lungdamna Thu ahi hi.

[9] Ahi zongin i phawk dingah, mi hoihte a dingin thukham a kibawl hi lo a, thukham zui lote, thumang lote, Pasian’ deih bangin a gamta lote le mawhneite, biakna lungsim a nei lote le kam kilawm lo a paute, nute pate a thatte, midang a thatte,

[5] amah in eite hong honkhia hi. Eite in na hoih i sepzawhna hangin hong honkhia hi loin eite tungah suahtakna le nuntakna thak a hong pia Kha Siangtho in hong sawpsiangna hangin a hong hehpihna tawh a hong honkhia ahi hi.

[18] Ngeina lui pen ginaloin, a kimanna om lo ahih manin kinawlkhin hi. [19] Moses Thukham ahi ngeina lui in a cingtaaksak zawh bangmah om lo ahih manin eite in Pasian i naih theih nading lametna ahi ngeina thak hong kithun hi.

[10] Ahi zongin tu-in Israel mite tawh ka bawl ding thuciamna hih bang ahi hi. Amaute sungah ka thukham ka guang ding a, amaute lungtang tungah gelhin, amaute’ Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute pen keima mi ahi ding uh hi.

[14] tawntung Kha Siangtho hangin Pasian tungah a cingtaak biakpiak nadingin Khrih in a piak ama sisan in na tam semkhia zozaw ding a, a nungta Pasian’ na i septheih nadingin bangmahin a kimang lo nasepna panin ama sisan in i lungsim hong siangsak ding hi. [15] Thuciamna masa in a huamkhak mite, a mawhna panun a suahtak theih nading uh ngeina om pen a si suak khinta ahih manin, Pasian’ sap mite in a ciamsa tawntung thupha a ngahtheih nadingun Khrih in thuciamna thak a hong vaihawm ahi hi.
[22] Thukham kizatna sungah na khempeuh sisan tawh kisiansuah a, sisan a kiluansak khit ciang bekin mawhna kimaisak thei pan hi.

[1] Jew Thukham pen mailam hunah a taktak a hong tung ding lim lahkholhna hi bek ahih manin tua Thukham tawh kizui-in a kum a kumin a kipia biakpiakna in Pasian kiang a zuan mite mi cingtaak suahzo ngei lo hi.
[16] “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Mailam hunah amaute tawh thuciamna khat ka bawl ding a, amaute sungah ka thukhamte guanin, amaute lungtang tungah ka gelh ding hi,” a cih khit ciangin,

[25] Ahi zongin mite a suaktasak thei thukham cingtaak hoihtakin a et khit ciangin a thu ngai-in a mangngilh pah hi loin, hoihtakin ngaihsun tawntungin a zuite pen a sepna khempeuh uhah Pasian in thupha a pia ding hi.

[9] Ahi zongin mi na deidan uhleh note a khial na hi uh a, Thukham a palsat na hi veve uh hi. [10] Mi khatpeuh in thukham dang khempeuh a zuih hangin khat a khialh nakleh a vekpi-in a khial mah ahi hi.

[11] Sanggamte aw, khatlekhat kigensia kei un. A mipihte gensia-in thu a khente in Thukham gensia-in thu a khen ahi hi. Thukham na gensiat uhleh Thukham a zui hi loin thu a khen na hi uh hi. [12] Thukham a pia pa le thu a khen pa pen Pasian bek hi a, amah bek in hong honkhiazo a, hong susiazo hi. Tua ahih manin bang hangin na mipihte uh gensia-in thu a khenthei dingin kingaihsun zenzen na hi uh hiam?

[3] Eite in ama thupiaknate i zuih leh amah a thei taktak ihihna hong kilang hi. [4] Mi khatpeuh in, “Pasian ka thei hi,” ci napi-in a thupiaknate a zuih kei leh tua mi a zuaugen mi hi a, a thutak lo mi ahi hi. [5] Ahi zongin ama thu a zui mite pen Pasian a itna a kicingtaak taktak mi ahi hi. Hih bangin i gamtat leh Pasian tawh a kipawl taktak ihihna i thei hi. [6] Pasian tawh ka kipawl hi, a ci mi khempeuh, Jesuh Khrih a gamtat bangin a gamtat ding ahi hi.

[4] Mawhna i cih pen thukham palsatna ahih manin a mawh mi khempeuh thukham palsat ahi uh hi. [5] Khrih pen mawhna a nei het lo hi a, mite’ mawhna a lakhia dingin Khrih hong kilang ahihna thu na thei uh hi.

[22] Ama thupiaknate zui-in ama lungkim nadingin gamta ihih manin ama kiang panin i nget peuhpeuh i ngah hi. [23] Ama hong thupiakna in: A Tapa Jesuh Khrih umin zui-in, Khrih’ hong sawl bangin eite khatlekhat i ki-it ding ahi hi. [24] Pasian’ thupiakna a zui mi khempeuh, Pasian tawh om uh a, Pasian in zong amaute a ompih hi. Pasian in eite tungah a hong piak Kha Siangtho hangin Pasian in eite a hong ompihna thu i thei hi.

[1] Jesuh, Khrih hi, ci-in a um mi khempeuh Pasian’ tate hi a, pa a it mi peuhmah in a ta zong a it hi. [2] Pasian itin ama thupiakte i zuihna tawh Pasian tate a it ihihlam i kithei ding hi. [3] Pasian i it ciangin ama thupiakte a zui ihi hi. Eite a dingin ama thupiakte zuih ding a haksa lua hi lo hi.
[12] Pasian’ thupiakna zui-in Jesuh tungah a citak Pasian’ mite a dingin thuakzawhna kisam hi.

[15] Tua ciangin TOPA in ama kiangah, “Tua bang hi lo ding hi. Khatpeuh in Kain a thah le tua pa tungah a zah sagihin kithuk ding hi,” a ci hi. Amah a tuakpeuh in a thahkhak loh nadingin TOPA in Kain’ tungah ciaptehna khat a koih hi.

[5] Mi khatpeuh in hong thah le ama tungah sihna dan ka pia ding hi. A hong that ganhing peuhmah ka that ding a, a mipihte a that mi peuhmah gim ka pia ding hi. [6] Mi a that peuhmahte pen, midangte in amah that ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in ama lim bangin mi bawl hi.
[3] Nang thupha hong piate thupha ka pia ding a, nang hong samsiate ka samsia ding hi. Nang’ thupha ngah bangin thupha a ngah nadingun leitung midang khempeuh in hong ngen ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[23] Siatna khatpeuh in a zuihbeh leh, tua ciangin nuntakna tang ding nuntakna, [24] mit tang ding mit, ha tang ding ha, khut tang ding khut, khe tang ding khe, [25] meikang tang ding meikang, liamna tang ding liamna, siatna tang ding siatna pia ding hi.

[7] mi tul tampite a dingin itna kip a nei; mawhna, thu palsatna le khialhna maisakin; ahih hangin bangbang hitaleh mawhna a khahkhong ngei lo; pate’ mawhna tate’ tung le tute’ tung, khang thum khang lina dongin a thukpa,” ci-in a pulak hi.
[18] Note in nomau’ mipihte tungah phu la loin, amau na lungsim neih kei ding uh a, nomau na ki-it uh bangin na vengte uh na it ding uh hi; kei pen TOPA ka hi hi.

[17] “Mi a that pa kithat ding hi. [18] Ganhing a that pa in a ganhing mahin loh ding hi. A thu-in ci lehang nuntakna le nuntakna a kithuk ding ahi hi. [19] “Mi khat in a vengte khat a poisak leh, ama hih bangin ama tung mahah kithukkik ding a, [20] guh kitan tang ding guh kitan, mittang tang ding mittang, ha tang ding ha kihih ding a, amah in mi khat a poisak bangin amah kipoisak ding hi. [21] Ganhing a that pa in loh ding a, mi a that pa kithat ding hi.

[5] Mi khat sing a phuk dingin a vengpa tawh gamlakah pai-in, sing a phuk dingin a khut tawh a hei vaanin, a heitang a ga panin kikhongin a vengpa kha-in a sih bang danin, mi khat in sawm lohpi, a beisa hunah amah tawh kigal neihna om lopi-in a vengpa a sihsak khak leh, hih khuapite khat peuhpeuhah amah tai-in a nuntakna hu thei ding hi. [6] Tua bang hikeileh, amah in a beisa hunah a vengpa tawh kigal neihna nei lo ahih manin sih nading thu om lo napi-in, a hehna tawh phula nuampa in mi that khapa delhin lampi a gamlatna hangin amah pha-in a si dingin liamsak kha ding hi. [7] Tua ahih ciangin, khuapi thum tuamkoih un, ci-in note thu a hong pia ka hi hi.

[18] Thukhente in limtakin kan ding uh a, teci pa pen zuau teci hi-in, a man lopi-in a sanggampa a mawhsak ahihleh, [19] a sanggampa tungah amah in hih dinga a sawm bang teekin ama tungah na hih ding uh hi. Tua bangin note sung panin gitlohna na siangsak ding uh hi. [20] Tua hileh a omlai mite in za-in lau ding a, note lakah tua bang gitlohna bawlkik ngei nawn lo ding uh hi. [21] Amah na hehpih kei ding uh hi. Nuntakna tang ding nuntakna, mit tang ding mit, ha tang ding ha, khut tang ding khut, khe tang ding khe na hisak ding uh hi.

[47] Hih a tampi nate khempeuh om napi-in note in lungdamna le lungsim kipahna tawh TOPA note’ Pasian’ na sem lo na hih manun, [48] TOPA in note’ langah a hong sawl ding na galte uh’ na, gilkialna le dangtakna, pum guakin omna, le na khempeuh kitangsapna tawh, na sem ding uh hi. Na galte un note hong suksiat matengin note’ ngawngah sik hakkol hong thuah ding uh hi.
[35] Phulakna le thukkikna kei a’ hi a, a hun ciangin amaute puk ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ gim ngah hun ding hong naita a, amau’ siat nading hong tung pah hi.
[43] TOPA’ mite phat un, no minam dangte aw; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a nasemte’ phu la a, alangte thuk-in, ama mite’ gam adingin kilemna a bawl hi,” a ci hi.

[7] Samson in amaute kiangah, “Hih pen, note’ hih ahihleh, ka kiciam hi. Note kong thuk ding a, tua khit ciangin ka khawl ding hi,” a ci hi. [8] Amah in amaute dawm loin tampi that a, tua ciangin paisukin Etam suanghawm sungah a om hi.

[28] Tua ciangin Samson in TOPA samin, “ TOPA Pasian aw, kei hong phawk in, kong thum hi. Tu-a ka mittang nihte’ tang dingin Filistia mite ka thuktheih nadingin hong thahatsak in, tu-a bek kong thum hi,” a ci hi. [29] Samson in innpi a do khuampi nihte manin, a khut taklamin khat, a khut veilamin khat lenin ama gihna tawh a khuamte a luai hi.
[12] TOPA in kei le nang kikalah thu hong khen tahen. TOPA in kei tangin nang tungah hong thuk tahen. Ahih hangin keima khut tawh nang kong hih kei ding hi.

[9] Ahih hangin David in Abishai kiangah, “Ama tungah siatna bawl kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA’ sathau nilh pa a su peuhpeuh mawhna pan peng ding sa na hi hiam?” a ci hi. [10] David in, “ TOPA a nungta ahih mah bangin TOPA in amah vat taktak ding hi; tua ahih kei leh zong a sih hun hong tung ding hi; tua ahih kei leh gal kikapna sungah amah paisukin si ding hi. [11] TOPA’ sathau nilh pa tungah ka khut ka ngak ding TOPA in kei hong kham hi; ahih hangin tu-in a lukhungah a om a teipi le a tuithawl la-in paikhia ni,” a ci hi. [12] Tua ahih ciangin David in Saul’ lukhung a a om a teipi le a tuithawl a la hi. Tua ciangin amaute paikhia uh hi. Kuamah in mu lo hi; zong thei lo hi; kuamah khanglo lo hi. Amaute khempeuh ihmu uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in amaute ihmut suak mahmah sak hi.
[27] Hebron-ah Abner hong paikik ciangin, Joab in amah tawh a kituam ho dingin kulhkongpi pamah paikhiatpih a, a sanggampa Asahel’ phulakna-in amah in a gil sun a, tua ciangin a si hi.
[7] Kamsang ka nasemte a thahna le TOPA’ nasemte khempeuh a thahna hangin Jezebel’ tungah phu ka laktheih nadingin na topa Ahab’ innkuan na satpuk ding hi.
[10] Tua ciangin Judah gam kimkotah a om kumpi gam khempeuh tungah TOPA kihtakna om a, amaute in Jehoshafat do ngam nawn lo uh hi.
[47] hong thuhkik sakin keima nuai-ah mite a hong zawhsak Pasian,
[10] Heh thukna a muh ciangin thuman mipa lungdam ding a, migilote’ sisan sungah amah in a khete sil ding hi.
[1] A thukkik Pasian, a thukkik Pasian, TOPA aw, na hehna hong lakkhia in. [2] Tho in, leitung thukhen pa aw, a kiphasak mite tungah amau’ ngah ding a kilawm gimna pia ta in.
[34] A numei’ pasal a hehzawk theih nading thudang om nawn lo a, a heh thukna-ah khawl hun cih nei thei lo hi.
[12] Muhdahna in kitotna piangsak a, itna in mawhna khempeuh maisak hi.
[3] Midikte thumanin gamta uh a, migilote amau’ hoih lohna in susia hi.
[7] TOPA’ deih bangin gamtatna pen galte nangawn lawma kaihzawhna ahi hi.
[22] Mite’ hong bawlsiatna thuk ding ngaihsun kei inla, TOPA’ hong huh ding ngakzaw in.
[17] Na galte in gimna a ngah ciangin lungdam kei inla, a puk ciangin kipak kei in.
[29] Kei tungah hong bawl bangin kei zong ka bawl ding a, ama hong hihna bangin ka thuk ding hi, cikha kei in.

[20] A dah a lungkham mipa kiangah lasakna pen khuadam laitakin puan suahkhiat tawh kibang a, meima ci-al nuh tawh kibang hi. [21] Na galte a gil a kial leh an pia inla, a dang a tak leh tui pia in. [22] Tua hileh amau’ maizum nadingin a bawl na hi a, TOPA in nang tungah thaman hong pia ding hi.
[26] Mihoih khat in mihoih lote’ gamtatna a zuihkhak ciangin hawktui nin, ahih kei leh tui uih tawh kibang hi.
[11] Mihai pa a hehna bangin kam pau-in gamta gawp a, mipil pa ahihleh ki-ipin a hehna damsak hi.

[23] Na uliante, mi lehdote hi a, gutate tawh a kikhawlte ahi hi. Mi khempeuh in sumgolh le letsong a deih uh hi. Amaute in pa nei lote panpih lo uh a, meigongnu’ thu amaute in sang lo uh hi. [24] Tua ahih ciangin, Topa, Vanglian TOPA, Israel-te’ Vanglian Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: “Ah, ka lang ahi note’ tungah ka hehna kong khahkhia ding a, ka gal ahi note tungah keimah in kong thuk ding hi.

[17] Nangmah do nadingin a kibawl hiam peuhmah maavang lo ding a, thukhenna sungah na langah a pang mi khempeuh na nialgawpzo ding hi. Hih thu pen TOPA’ nasemte’ gamhluah le keima kiang panin amaute’ dikna a kilahna ahi hi, TOPA in ci hi,” a ci hi.

[7] Note salin kong koihna khuapi’ phattuamna ding bawl unla, tua khuapi a dingin TOPA’ tungah thu ngetsak un. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua khuapi in phattuamna ngah leh no zong phattuamna a ngah mah na hi uh hi.
[12] Topa PASIAN in kei kiangah thu hong gen a, “Edom mite in Judah mite tungah a phulakna uh nasia lua ahih manin tua a phulakna hangun Edom mite tungah mawhna om hi.

[15] Topa PASIAN in kei kiangah thu hong gen a, “Filistia mite in galin a neih tawntung mite uh tungah phu nasia lakin hehna tawh susiagawp uh hi. [16] Tua ahih ciangin Filistia mite simin ka beimangsakna ding thu a hong genkhia ta ka hi hi. Filistia Zanglei a a omlai mi khempeuh ka susiamang ding hi. [17] Amaute nakpitakin gim pia-in, a kicing zah dongin amaute tungah phu ka la ding a, ka hehna a thuak ding uh hi. Tua ciangin TOPA ka hihna thu hong thei ding uh hi,” a hong ci hi.
[2] TOPA Pasian in amah a demte koihkhong lo a, amah a langpangte gim pia-in a galte thukkik hi.
[7] Midang a hehpih mite tungah Pasian in hehpihna pia ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.

[38] “Note in, ‘Mittang khat tang ding mittang khat, ha khat tang ding ha khat,’ ci-in a kigenna na zaksa uh ahi hi. [39] Ahi zongin note kiangah ke’n kong genin-ah: A gilote na thukkik kei un. Mi khatpeuh in na paang taklam hong bet leh a langkhat zong na dawh lai zaw in. [40] Mi khatpeuh in na puansungsilh a ngahnop manin zumah hong khia-in hong laksak leh na puantungsilh zong na piathuah lai in. [41] Galkapte khatpeuh in tai khat sung a van pua dingin hong sawl leh a valin tai khat sung mah na puaksak lai in. [42] Mi khat peuhpeuh in na khat peuhpeuh hong nget leh na pia inla, nang kiang panin na a hong leitawi mite na pia in. [43] “Note in, ‘Na vengte uh na it unla, na galte uh na mudah un,’ ci-in a kigenna thu na zaksa uh ahi hi. [44] Ahi zongin ke’n note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong bawlsiate a dingin thu na ngetsak un.

[14] Note in midangte’ hong mawhna na maisak uhleh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note’ mawhna hong maisak ding hi. [15] Ahi zongin note in midangte’ hong mawhna na maisak kei uhleh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note’ mawhna hong maisak lo ding hi.
[12] Tua ahih manin note tungah hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah na bawl un. Moses Thukhamte le kamsangte’ thuhilhnate pen hih mah a deihna ahi hi.

[21] Tua ciangin Peter in Jesuh va naih a, “Topa aw, ka sanggamte khatpeuh ka tungah hong khialh ciangin bangzah vei maisak ding ka hi hiam? Sagihvei dongtak maisak ding ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin [22] Jesuh in, “Sagihvei ciangbek maisak in kong ci kei hi. Sawm sagih mun sagihvei maisak in kong ci hi.
[52] Tua ciangin Jesuh in ama kiangah, “Na namsau a paai-ah siatkik in. Namsau a zangte namsau mah tawh si ding hi.

[27] “Ahi zongin ka thugen a za note kiangah kong cihin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong mudah mite tungah a pha na bawl un. [28] No hong phuisamte thupha na pia unla, no hong bawlsiate a’ ding thu na ngetsak un.
[31] Note tungah a hong kibawl ding na deih uh bangin midangte tungah na bawl un.
[35] A zingsang ciangin zintun inn nei pa kiangah sum peek nih pia a, ‘Hih mipa limtakin na khoi in. Na beina dang khempeuh, kong paikik ciangin kong loh ding hi,’ ci hi.

[3] Note hoihtakin kingaihsun un. Na sanggampa uh no tungah hong khialh leh amah taii unla, a kisik leh a mawhna maisak un. [4] Nikhat sungin sagihvei ciang dong hong khialh hangin zong, a sagihvei mahin no kiangah hong pai-in, ‘Ka kisik hi,’ hong cih nakleh na maisak khin ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[34] Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Pa aw, amaute in bang hih ihi hiam cih thei lo uh ahih manin a mawhna uh na maisak in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amau’ ngah ding ciat a theih nadingun ai sanin a puante a hawm uh hi.

[59] Tua bangin suang a khiat thuahthuah laitakun Stefen in thu ngen a, “Topa Jesuh aw, ka kha hong la in,” a ci hi. [60] Tua ciangin amah kunin nakpitakin kiko a, “Topa aw, hih mite’ mawhna na maisak in,” a cih khit ciangin a si ta hi.
