[2] Leitung mihingte’ gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahphasak un. Tua hileh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkimsakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian’ deihna na phawk thei ding uh hi.

[17] Midangte’ gitlohnate thukkik kei unla, mi khempeuh in hoih hi, ci-in a ngaihsut ding bangin gamta un. [18] Ahih theih laiteng mi khempeuh tawh na kilem nadingun hanciam un. [19] Lawmte aw, na hehna uh kuama tungah thukkik kei unla, Pasian’ thukkik dingin koih lel un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho sungah, “Keimah in amaute tungah ka thuk ding a, midangte a gimsak bangun ka gimsak ding hi, Topa in ci hi,” ci-in kigelh hi. [20] Tua ahih ciangin Lai Siangtho sungah, “Na galte uh a gil a kial leh an na pia un. A dang a taak leh tui na pia un. Tua bangin na gamtat uhleh amaute’ maizum nadingin a bawl na hi uh hi,” ci-in a kigelh bangin gamtazaw un. [21] Tua ahih manin gitlohna kizosak kei unla, a pha gamtatna tawh gitlohnate a zo na hi ta un.

[1] Note khatlekhat thu na kineih uh ciangin Pasian’ mi siangthote khensakzaw loin lawki thukhente’ mai na kitun ngam uh hi. [2] Pasian’ mite in leitung mite’ thu a khensakzaw ding ahihlam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Note pen leitung mite’ thu a khensak ding na hih uh ciangin tua bang thu neute khen thei lo lawmlawm na hi uh hiam?

[10] Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih mai-ah thusitna a thuak dingin eite khempeuh a kilak ding ihi a, leitung i pumpi-in i omlai-in i gamtatna tawh kizui-in eite tawh a kituak ciatin a sia ahi a, a pha ahi zongin a ngah ciat ding ihi hi.

[11] Sanggamte aw, tu-in mangpha na man un. Na omzia uh na kipuahpha-in ka hong thugente na zui unla, khatlekhat kithutuak kilem takin na om un. Itna le kilemna a piathei Pasian in note hong ompih tahen.

[7] Pasian a kikhemzo dingin ngaihsunkha kei un. Mi khempeuh in ama vawh nam khaici mah ngahkik ding hi. [8] Mi khatpeuh in ama leitung pumpi deihna khaici a vawh leh sihna ngah ding a, Kha Siangtho deihna khaici a vawh leh Kha Siangtho tung panin nuntak tawntungna ngah ding hi.

[31] Kimuhdahna, hehna, thangpaihna, kitotna, kikona, kilungsim neihna khempeuh beisak unla, [32] khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim nem tawh na kihozaw unla, Khrih’ hangin Pasian in note’ mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.
[25] A man loin a gamtate in ahihleh a gamtatna bangun thuak ding uh hi. Pasian in kuamah deidan loin amau’ gamtatna bang ciatin thu a khen ahi hi.
[13] Amau’ nasepna hangin amaute nakpitakin itbawlin zahtak un. Note khatlekhat kilem takin na om un.
[15] Gitlohna lamsang kuamah kithuk loin, note khatlekhat tung le mi khempeuh tungah a pha kibawl ding ngaihsutpi-in na nei un.

[6] Pasian in a manin na sem ding ahih manin note a hong gimsak mite tungah Pasian in gimna pia ding a, [7] tu-a gimna a thuak note le kote tungah zong nopsakna hong pia ding hi. Vantung panin Topa Jesuh le a vanglian a vantung mite, meikuang tawh hong kilat ciangin, [8] Pasian a thei lo mite, le i Topa Jesuh tawh kisai Lungdamna Thu a um lo mite tungah gimna a tungsak ding hi.

[26] Thuman thutak i theih khit ciangin mawhna i bawl hamtang lai leh i mawhna a kimaisak nadingin biakpiakna dang om nawn lo a, [27] a kihtakhuai thukhenna le Pasian’ thu a nial mite a kangtum ding meikuangpi bek omlai hi. [28] Moses Thukham a zui lote pen mi nih le thum in mawh mah hi, ci-in teci a pan’ khit nakleh kihehpih hetloin sihna kithuaksak hi. [29] Tua bang ahihleh Pasian’ Tapa a simmawh, mawhna a hong maisak Pasian’ thuciamna sisan a thudon lo, Pasian’ hehpihna a hong puak Kha Siangtho a hehsakte’ thuak ding bangzah takin lianzaw kan ding ahi hiam? [30] Bang hang hiam cih leh, “Phulakna keima a’ hi a, ka thukkik ding hi,” a ci pa le, “Topa in ama mite thu a khen ding,” a ci pa i theih ahi hi. [31] A nungta Pasian’ khut sungah thumang loin i tunkhak ding a lauhuai mahmah ahi hi.

[12] Tua ahih manin mi a khahkhia thei thukham tawh kizui-in thukhenna a thuak ding mi bangin kampau-in na gamta un. [13] Bang hang hiam cih leh hehpihna lungsim a nei lote tungah Pasian in thu a khen ciangin hehpih lo ding a, hehpihna lungsim a neite tungah Pasian in thu a khen ciangin a hehpihna in zozaw ding hi.

[21] Khrih mahmah in zong note a dingin thuakin, ama khekhap na zuihtheih nadingun etteh ding lim hong nusiat ahih manin hih bangin a thuak ding mahin Pasian in note a hong sam ahi hi. [22] Khialhna bangmah gamta lo a, zuau a gen lam zong kiza ngei lo hi. [23] Amah a kizahko ciangin na ko thuk lo hi. Gimna a thuak ciangin na tawnggawp lo a, a manin thu a khen Pasian muanin a na nei hi.

[9] Hong bawlsiate siatna tawh thukkik loin hong samsia mite samsia kik kei unla, Pasian in note a hong sap lai-in thupha a hong piak dingin hong ciamsa ahih manin, hong siat bawlte thupha tawh na thukzaw un.
[8] Itna in mawhna tampi khuhcip thei ahih manin lungsim takpi tawh khatlekhat ki-it ding thupi ngaihsut pha pen un.

[10] Amaute nakpitakin kiko uh a, “A thuman, a siangtho, a Vanglian Topa aw, leitungah a omlai, kote a hong that mite tungah cik ciangin thu khenin, kote hong thahna hangin cik ciangin phu la ding na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
[1] A kipat cil-in Pasian in vantung le leitung a piangsak hi. [2] Leitung in limlemel nei loin a awngthawlpi ahi hi. Tuipi tung tengah khua mial bikbek a, tua tui tungah Pasian’ Kha in na a sem hi.
[26] Tua ciangin Pasian in, “Eima lim, eimah hong sunin mihing bawl ni. Tuipi ngasate tung, huihlak vasate tung, ganhingte tung, le leitung a a bokvakte khempeuh tungah ukna neisak ni,” a ci hi.
[22] Tua ciangin TOPA Pasian in, “En un, mipa pen eite khat tawh kibang a, a pha le a sia thei hi. Amah in nuntakna singgah ne-in a hin tawntung khak loh nadingin i vaihawm ding hi,” ci hi.
[7] Hong pai un, amaute khatlekhat’ thugen a kitheih loh nadingun eite paisukin amau’ kampau va kitukalhsak ni,” a ci hi.

[6] Bang hang hiam cih leh eite a dingin naungek khat hong suak a, eite’ tungah tapa khat hong kipia hi. Amah pen eite hong ukpa hi ding a, ama min pen “Lamdang Thulak pa, Vanglian Pasian, Tawntung Pa, Nopsakna Kumpi,” kici ding hi.

[16] Jesuh a kituiphum khit phetin tui sung panin a paikhia pah hi. Tua laitakin vantung hong kihong a, vakhu bangin Pasian’ Kha Siangtho hong kumsukin ama tungah a khawl a mu hi. [17] Tua sung mahin vantung panin aw khat hong ging a, “Hih pen ka it mahmah ka Tapa hi a, ama tungah ka lungkim mahmah hi,” a hong ci hi.
[28] Note’ ngaihsut bang hi loin, Pasian’ Kha in dawi hawlkhiat nading vangliatna kei tungah hong pia ahih manin note lakah Pasian’ ukna hun hong kipan khin ahihna hong kilang hi.
[19] Tua ahih ciangin note pai unla, midang khempeuh, keima nungzui mi suaksakin, Pa min, Tapa min, le Kha Siangtho min tawh tui sungah na phum un.
[35] Vantung mi in, “Nangma tungah Kha Siangtho hong tung ding a, nangma tungah Pasian’ vangliatna hong om ding hi. Tua ahih manin a hong suak ding a siangtho naungek pen Pasian’ Tapa kici ding hi.

[21] Mi khempeuh a kituiphum khit uh ciangin Jesuh zong a kituiphum hi. Jesuh in thu a nget laitakin vantung kihong a, [22] vakhu pumpi lim nei-in Kha Siangtho ama tungah hong kumsuk hi. Tua laitakin vantung panin aw khat hong ging a, “Nang pen ka it ka Tapa na hi a, nangma tungah ka lungkim mahmah hi,” a ci hi.

[14] Tua Thu mihing hong suakin kote lakah hong om a, itna nei-in citak mahmah ahih manin Pasian’ pianzia a neihna ka mu cian uh hi. Hih pianzia pen Pasian’ Tapa khat bek hihna tawh a neih pianzia ahi hi.

[16] Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawn loin a hin tawntung theih nadingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi. [17] Pasian in leitungah a Tapa hong sawlna pen mawhsakna thukhen dingin a hong paisak hi loin, leitung mite a honkhia dingin a hong paisak hizaw hi.

[30] Kei le ka Pa pumkhat ka hi uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. [31] Tua ciangin Jew mihonte in amah deng dingin suang tawm leuleu uh ahih manin [32] Jesuh in, “Ka Pa’ hong sawl bangin note’ muhna-ah na hoih tampi ka hong sepna hangin suang tawh den hong sawm na hi uh hiam?” a cih ciangin [33] mihonte in, “Nasep hoih na sep manin hong dengnuam ka hi kei uh a, Pasian na simmawhbawl manin hong dengnuam ka hi uh hi. Nang pen mi hi lel hinapi-in Pasian na kineihnuam hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. [34] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Na Thukham sung uhah Pasian in, ‘Note pen pasian-te na hi uh hi,’ ci hi. [35] Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh thute a tawntungin a thuman hi a, Pasian’ thu a ngah mite pen Pasian in, ‘pasian-te,’ na ci hi. [36] Tua ahih manin kei pen Pa Pasian in hong teelin leitungah a hong sawl ka hih manin, ‘Pasian’ Tapa ka hi hi,’ ka cih ciangin bang hangin Pasian simmawhbawl hong cithei na hi uh hiam?

[16] Keimah in Pa kiangah ka ngen ding a, note tawh a omkhawm tawntung dingin Thuman a hong lak Kha Siangtho, note hong Huhpa ding a hong pia ding hi. [17] Leitung mite in tua Kha Siangtho mu thei lo, theithei lo uh ahih manin sang thei lo ding uh hi. Ahi zongin note sungah tua Kha Siangtho hong om ding ahih manin note in na thei ding uh hi.

[9] Jesuh in, “Filip aw, hih tanvei omkhawm khin napi kei hong thei nai lo lai na hi hiam? Kei a hong mu khinte in Pa a mu khin ahih manin bang hangin, ‘Pa hong lak in,’ ci thei na hi hiam? [10] Kei pen Pa tawh pumkhat ka hih lamtak um lo na hi hiam? Note tungah ka hong gen thute keima thu bek tawh a hong gen ka hi kei a, kei tawh a om Pa Pasian in na semin a hong gen ahi hi. [11] Pa tawh pumkhat ka hihna thu hoihtakin hong um un. Na hong up nai kei uhleh zong ka nalamdang bawlnate hangin hong um beek un.

[26] Ahi zongin Pa in keima tangin a hong sawl ding Huhpa Kha Siangtho a hong tun ciangin note tungah thu khempeuh hong hilh ding a, note tungah ka hong gensa thu khempeuh zong hong phawksakkik ding hi.
[26] “Ahi zongin Thuman a hong lak ding Huhpa ahi Kha Siangtho ka Pa kiang panin ka hong sawl ding hi. Amah hong tun ciangin keima thu hong gen ding hi.
[5] Pa aw, leitung a kipiansak ma-in nang tawh i neihkhawm na pianzia mah tu-in nangma omna munah hong pia ta in.

[10] Keima neih khempeuh nangma a’ hi a, nangma neih khempeuh keima-a’ ahih manin, tua mite’ hangin nangma pianzia ka neihna hong kilang hi. [11] Tu-in nangma kiangah kei a hong paita ding ka hih manin leitungah ka om nawn kei ding a, ahi zongin amaute a omlai ding uh ahi hi. Tua ahih manin a Siangtho ka Pa aw, nang le kei pumkhat ihih mah bangin amaute zong pumkhat ahih nadingun na vangliatna tawh hoihtakin na kem in.
[22] Nang le kei pumkhat ihih mah bangin amaute zong pumkhat a suah theih nadingun keima tungah na hong piak pianzia mah amaute tungah ka pia hi.
[4] Amaute tawh a omkhawm laitakin amah in amaute kiangah, “Jerusalem khua panin paikhia kei unla, note kiangah ka hong gensa ka Pa’ hong kamciam thu na ngak un.

[33] Amah in Pasian’ taklamah omna dongin liatna ngah a, ama tungah Pasian in a ciamsa Kha Siangtho zong a ngahkhin hi. Tu laitak a na muh na zak uh nate pen kote tungah a hong piak tua Kha Siangtho ahi hi.

[38] Nazareth khuami Jesuh tungah Pasian in Kha Siangtho le vangliatna pia a, Pasian in a ompihna hangin tua Jesuh in a paina khempeuhah na hoih semin, Dawimangpa in a gimsak mite khempeuh a damsakna thu zong na thei uh hi.

[2] Pasian in kamsangte tungtawnin hih Lungdamna Thu a gensa hi a, Lai Siangtho sungah a omsa thu ahi hi. [3] Tua thu pen eite’ Topa Jesuh Khrih ahi ama Tapa’ thu ahi hi. Tua Tapa pen leitung silesa lam panin David’ suan hi a, [4] Kha Siangtho thu lamsangah ci lehang misite lak panin vangliatna tawh a thawhsakkikna hangin Pasian’ Tapa ahihna thu Pasian in a kilangsak hi.
[9] Note sungah Pasian’ Kha Siangtho hong om nakleh nomau pumpi deihna bangin gamta loin Kha Siangtho deihna bangin na gamta ding uh hi. Khrih lungsim a nei lote Khrih tawh kipawl lo hi.
[9] Jesuh pen Topa hi, ci-in mite kiangah genin, Pasian in sihna panin amah hingkiksak zo hi, ci-in na lungsim sung uhah na up taktak uhleh hotkhiatna na ngah ding uh hi.

[17] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ Ukna pen nekledawn tawh a kisai thu hi lo a, Kha Siangtho hangin i ngah Pasian’ deih bangin gamtatna, kilemna, lungdamna, cihte hizaw hi. [18] Hih bang danin Khrih’ na a sem mite in Pasian lungdamsak a, mite zong a lungkimsak uh hi.

[10] Ahi zongin Pasian in a Kha Siangtho tawh eite tungah tua thusim a hong langsak hi. Tua Kha Siangtho in na khempeuh kankhia a, Pasian’ ngimna a ki-imcip a thutawng dongtakin a kankhia hi. [11] Mihing khat’ ngaihsutna pen ama lungsim bek mah in a theih mah bangin Pasian’ Kha Siangtho bek mah in Pasian’ thu a cingin a thei hi.

[11] Note pawlkhat, tua bangin na gamta uh hi. Ahi zongin note pen i Topa Jesuh Khrih le i Pasian’ Kha Siangtho hangin mawhna panin a hong kisiangsak khinsa, Pasian’ tungah a kipiasa, Pasian tawh a kipawlsa mite na hi uh hi.

[6] eite a dingin Pasian khat bek, Pa khat bek a om hi. Ama a dingin i nuntakna pa, na khempeuh a piangsak pa ahi hi. Eite tungah nuntakna a hong pia, na khempeuh a piangsak Topa Jesuh Khrih khat bek a om hi.

[4] Tu-in siamna a nam tuamtuam om a, ahi zongin a hong pia Kha Siangtho a kibang ahi hi. [5] Nasepna a nam tuamtuam om a, ahi zongin a na i sepsak Topa a kibang ahi hi. [6] Nasep nading siamna a nam tuamtuam om a, ahi zongin septheih nading siamna a hong pia Pasian a kibang ahi hi.

[21] Khrih sungah kote le note a hong kipsak pa, le nasem dingin kote a hong sawl pa pen Pasian ahi hi. [22] Amah in eite pen ama a’ ihihna ciaptehna eite tungah hong bawl a, ama a’ ihihna le eite tungah a hong piak ding na khempeuh a hong pia takpi ding ahihna a kitel nadingin eite’ lungsim sungah Kha Siangtho a hong mapiak hi.
[17] Hih lai munah Topa a cih pen Kha Siangtho hi a, Topa’ Kha Siangtho a omna mun peuhpeuhah suahtakna om hi.
[14] Topa Jesuh Khrih hong hehpihna thupha, le Pasian’ hong itna, le Kha Siangtho tawh kikholh theihna, note khempeuh tungah hong tung tahen.

[17] i Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pasian ahi, a minthang Pa Pasian in note tungah Kha Siangtho hong pia-in, tua Kha Siangtho in note tungah lungpilna hong pia-in, note in Pasian na theih nadingun note tungah Pasian hong kilatsak nadingin thu ka hong ngetsak niloh hi.
[18] Khrih hangin Jew mi le Gentail mi ahi eite khempeuh, Kha Siangtho huhna tawh Pa Pasian kiangah i paithei hi.
[22] Note zong midangte tawh kigawmin ama tungah na kilam uh a, Kha Siangtho-in Pasian a ten nading inn na suak uh hi.

[4] A kibang lametna khat bek a ngahkhawm dingin Pasian in note hong sap mah bangin eite khempeuh pumkhat bek hi-in Kha Siangtho zong khat bek mah a neikhawm ihi hi. [5] Topa khat bek, upna khat bek, tuiphumna khat bek mah a zangkhawm ihi hi. [6] Mi khempeuh’ Pa ahi Pasian khat bek om a, mi khempeuh’ Topa hi-in, na khempeuh hih kimin, mun citengah a om hi.

[5] Note in Jesuh Khrih lungsim puakzia na nei un. Tua lungsim puak zia in: [6] Jesuh Khrih in Pasian’ pianzia nei napi-in, Pasian tawh a kizakim theihna dingin thatanghat thu a suang kei hi. [7] Amah kiniamkhiat tawm zaw a, nasem lim a hong puazaw hi. Mihing bangin amah hong kibawl a, mihing teekteek mah a hong sun hi. [8] Amah hong kiniamkhiat tawm a, singlamteh tung nangawnah sih ding a ut hi.

[15] Khrih pen a kimu thei lo Pasian’ lim hi a, a kipiangsak khempeuh lakah tapa upa pen ahi hi. [16] Vantung le leitungah a om na khempeuh, kha thu tawh kisai vangliatna, tote, mi ukte, aana neihnate a kipan a kimuthei hitaleh a kimu thei lo hitaleh na khempeuh, Pasian in amah zangin a piangsak hi. Leitung a kipanin huih lakah a om khempeuh dongin, Pasian in Khrih a dingin amahmah zangin a piangsak hi.
[9] Bang hang hiam cih leh mihing hong suahna sungah Khrih in Pasian’ pianzia khempeuh a kimtakin nei a,

[6] Pasian in eite hong Hon Jesuh Khrih hangin eite tungah a kicing takin Kha Siangtho hong pia ahih manin, [7] ama hong hehpihna hangin Pasian tawh kilemin i lamet nuntak tawntungna a ngah thei ihi hi.

[14] tawntung Kha Siangtho hangin Pasian tungah a cingtaak biakpiak nadingin Khrih in a piak ama sisan in na tam semkhia zozaw ding a, a nungta Pasian’ na i septheih nadingin bangmahin a kimang lo nasepna panin ama sisan in i lungsim hong siangsak ding hi.

[2] Pa Pasian in ama ngimnasa bangin note hong teel a, note in Jesuh Khrih’ thu mangin, ama sisan tawh sianthona a ngah dingin a Kha Siangtho tawh note mi siangtho-in a hong bawl hi. Note tungah hehpihna le nopsakna thupha hong tam tun semsem tahen.

[11] Khrih in gimna thuakin, tua khit ciangin minthanna a ngah nading thu Kha Siangtho in a gen ciangin, amaute sungah a om tua Khrih’ Kha Siangtho in kua a cihna hi a, bang hun ciang hi ding hiam, ci-in a kankan uh pen tuhun thu a gen ahi hi.

[22] Tua ahihleh zuau thugen i cihte kuate ahi hiam? Jesuh pen Khrih hi lo hi, a cite ahi hi. Hih bangin thugente pen Khrih’ Gal hi a, amaute in Pa le Tapa a nihin nial uh hi. [23] Tapa a nialte in Pa zong a nial hi a, Tapa a sangte in Pa zong a sang ahi hi.
[7] Hih thu-ah teci a pang thum om a, [8] tuate pen Kha, tui, le sisan ahi uh hi. Hih thumte’ teci panna kibang kim hi.

[20] Ahi zongin ka it note ahihleh a siangtho na upna uhah na kip semsem unla, Kha Siangtho vangliatna tawh thu na ngen un. [21] I Topa Jesuh Khrih in a hong hehpihna tawh nuntak tawntungna hong piak ding na ngakkawmun Pasian’ itna sungah na kip un.

[6] Tua upate’ huamsung, ganhing lite le kumpi tokhom kikalah Tuuno a ding ka mu hi. Tua Tuuno pen a kigo lumsa tawh kibang a, leitung khempeuhah a kisawlkhia, Pasian’ khate’ lim ahi ki sagih le mittang sagih a nei hi. [7] Tua Tuuno va pai a, tokhom tungah a tupa in a taklamah a tawi laizial a va la hi.

[17] Nang thupha kong pia taktak ding a, na suanlekhakte vana aksite le tuipi gei-a sehnel bangin tampi ka phasak ding hi. Na suanlekhakte in amau’ galte’ khuapite luah ding uh a, [18] na suanlekhakte thupha ka piak bangin, leitung minam khempeuh in thupha a ngah nadingun hong ngen ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang in ka thu na mang hi,” a ci hi.
[5] Tua ahih ciangin tu-in note in ka thu mangin ka thuciamna na zuih uhleh mite khempeuh lak panin note pen keima mi na hi ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung khempeuh keima a’ hi a,

[21] Amah thudonin ama aw ngai unla, amah lehdo kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in note’ thu palsatna hong maisak lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh keima min tawh nasem ahi hi. [22] “Ahih hangin note in ama aw limtakin ngai-in keima gen bangin na gamtat uhleh na galte uh’ tungah gal ka hi ding a, na langte uh’ tungah lang ka hi ding hi.

[3] “Note in ka thukham zui-in, ka thupiaknate mangin tuate na sep uhleh, [4] keimah in note tungah guahtui a hunin kong pia ding a, leitang in an hong piangsakin, lo-a kungte in amau’ gah gah ding uh hi.

[7] TOPA in Moses kiangah, [8] “Ciangkhut la-in, nang le na sanggampa Aaron in mihonte khawm un la, suangpi in amau’ muhin tui a piak ding sawl un. Tua bangin mihonte le amau’ ganhingte tui na ngahsak ding uh hi,” a ci hi. [9] Moses in zong TOPA’ thupiak bangin ciangkhut a la hi.
[1] “Tu-in Israel-te aw, note nungta-in, TOPA, na pate uh Pasian in note hong piak leitangah va pai-in na luah theih nadingun note kong hilh thukhamte le ngeina kipte don unla zui un.

[39] Tua ahih ciangin tunga om vantung hitaleh nuai-a om leitung hitaleh ah TOPA pen Pasian ahihna thu tuni-in thei unla, na lungsim uhah ciamteh un; kuamah dang om lo hi. [40] Tua ahih ciangin note le note’ khita na tate uh tungah thu hong nuamin, TOPA na Pasian un a tawntung a hong piak gam sungah na khan uh na sausak theih nadingun tuni-a no kiangah kong gen ahi ama thukhamte le a thupiakte na zui ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[33] Note nungta-in, nuamsa-in na luah ding uh leitangah sawtpi na nuntak nadingun TOPA na Pasian un note hong thupiakna lampi khempeuh na tawn ding uh hi.

[18] TOPA’ hong ciamsa bangin note’ mai panin na langte khempeuh uh nawhkhiatna tawh na pu na pate uh tungah piak dingin TOPA in a ciamsa leitang hoih note in na luah theih nading uh le note na nopsak theih nadingun TOPA’ muhna-ah a man le a hoih nate na sem ding uh hi.
[1] “Tua ahih ciangin TOPA na Pasian uh itin ama hong thuhilhna, a thukhamte, a ngeina kipte, a thupiakte na zui tawntung ding uh hi.
[13] “ TOPA na Pasian uh itin, na lungsim khempeuh uh le na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh ama na na sep nadingun tuni-a kong gen ama thupiaknate na zuih uhleh,
[1] “Note in TOPA na Pasian uh thu mangin, tuni-a kong gen ama thupiakna khempeuh limtakin na zuih uhleh TOPA na Pasian un leitung minam dangte khempeuh sangin a lianzaw-in note hong bawl ding hi.
[9] “Note in TOPA na Pasian uh hong thupiaknate zui-in ama lampi na tot uhleh amah in note tungah hong ciamsa bangin ama a dingin a siangtho mi dingin TOPA in note hong kipsak ding hi.

[13] Note in tuni-a kong thugente limtakin zuihna tawh TOPA na Pasian uh thupiaknate mangin, tuni-a no kong thupiakna kammalte panin, pasian dangte’ na semin a bia dingin na pial kei nak-uhleh, TOPA in a makai-in note hong bawl ding a, mi’ nung zui-in hong bawl lo ding hi. Tunglam bekah na kah ding uh a, na nuaikiat ngei kei ding uh hi. [14] Note in tuni-a kong thugente limtakin zuihna tawh TOPA na Pasian uh thupiaknate mangin, tuni-a no kong thupiakna kammalte panin, pasian dangte’ na semin a bia dingin na pial kei nak-uhleh, TOPA in a makai-in note hong bawl ding a, mi’ nung zui-in hong bawl lo ding hi. Tunglam bekah na kah ding uh a, na nuaikiat ngei kei ding uh hi.

[8] Hih thukham laibu na mangngilh ngei kei ding hi. A sunga kigelh thute khempeuh tawh kizui-in na gamtat theih nadingin sunlezanin na lungngaingai ding hi. Tua hileh na maa vang ding a, na nasep tangtung ding hi.

[6] Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in TOPA’ thu a ngaih lohna hangun Egypt panin a hong paikhia minam bup, galhang mite a sih khit dong kum sawmli sung sehnel gamah Israel mite lam pai uh hi. TOPA in amau’ tungah a piak dingin a pu a pate tungah a ciamsa bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin a luanna leitang a muhsak loh nading thu amaute tungah TOPA kiciam hi.

[2] amaute kiangah, “ TOPA’ nasem Moses in note hong thupiak khempeuh zui-in, keimah in note kong thupiakna khempeuhah ka thu na hong mang khin uh hi. [3] Tuni dong hih hun saupi sung na sanggamte uh na nusia kei uh a, TOPA na Pasian uh hong sawlna limtakin zuih ding na ngaihsun uh hi. [4] Tu-in TOPA na Pasian un amaute tungah a ciamsa bangin na sanggamte uh tawlngakna pia hi. Tua ahih ciangin TOPA’ nasem Moses in note hong piak Jordan galkhat, note’ neihsa a omna leitang na inn uhah note ciah un. [5] TOPA’ nasem Moses in note hong piak thupiakna le thukham ahi, TOPA na Pasian uh it ding, ama lampi khempeuh zuih ding, ama thupiakte zuih ding, amah belh ding, le na lungsim khempeuh uh le na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh ama na na sep ding uh limtakin ngaihsun un,” a ci hi.

[22] Tua ciangin Samuel in, “ TOPA in meihal biaknate le biakpiaknate TOPA’ thu man’ ding zahin deih ahi hiam? En in, biakpiakna sangin thu man’ ding hoihzaw a, tuutal thaute sangin thu ngaih ding hoihzaw hi.

[12] Israel tuite khempeuh sangin Damaskas gam a om Abana le Farpar gun tuite hoihzaw hi lo ahi hiam? Tuate’ sungah kisilin siang thei lo ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah kihei-in paikhia hi. [13] Ahih hangin a nasemte a nai-ah hong pai-in ama kiangah, “Ka topa aw, kamsangpa in na lian khat a sem dingin hong sawl hileh sem ding hi lo na hi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin amah in nang kiangah, ‘Kisil inla siang in,’ hong cih ciangin na hih ding bangzah ta-in kilawmzaw hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. [14] Tua ahih ciangin Pasian mipa’ kamgen bangin amah paisukin Jordan gun sungah sagihvei kidiah hi. Tua ciangin a cilesa naupangno cilesa bangin a ngei bangkikin amah a siang hi.
[6] Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in TOPA kiptakin len hi. Amah zuihna panin kihemkhia lo a, TOPA in Moses tungah a gen thupiaknate a zui hi.
[10] Bang hang hiam cih leh Ezra in TOPA’ thukham sinin zuih ding, le Israel mite a hilh dingin amah kipia hi.
[44] Ka thu a zak phetun amaute in hong mang pah uh a, gamdang mite in kei hong mai-et uh hi.

[11] TOPA na Pasian’ tungah na thuciamnate uh pia unla, tuate khempeuh zui un. Leitung kumpite sangin a kihtakhuai zaw, uliante’ lungsim a niamkhiat, zahtak ding ahipa’ tungah, ama kiimah a om mi khempeuhte in letsong puak ta uh hen!
[7] Amah in meii khuampi sung pan amaute tungah thu gen a, ama teci pannate le amah in amaute tungah a thukham piakte amaute in a zui uh hi.
[20] Ama thugen a ngai, ama thu bangin a sem no a thahat, no ama vantung mite aw, TOPA phat un.
[10] TOPA zahtakna pen pilna kipatna ahi hi. Ama thupiak a zuite khempeuh tungah thukhen siamna a pia hi. Amah phat tawntung ding ahi hi.
[2] Ama thuhilhnate zui-in, a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh amah zongin, khialhna zong bawl loin, ama lampi a zuite, thupha ngah ahi hi.
[5] Nangma ngeina kipte zuihna-ah ka gamtatna kip tahen.
[30] Thuman lampi ka teel khin a, na biakna ngeina kipte ka deih hi. [31] TOPA aw, na thuhilhnate ka pom hi. Kei hong zahhuaisak kei in.
[44] Nangma thu tatsat loin ka zui ngitnget ding hi.
[47] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka deih nangma thupiakna zuih ding nuam ka sa hi. [48] Keima deih ahi na thupiakte ka zahtak a, na ngeina kipte ka lungngaingai ding hi.
[59] Ka gamtatnate ka ngaihsun a, na ngeinate zuih ding ka kiciam hi. [60] Kei kinawhin, na thupiakte zuih ding ka zekai kei hi.

[100] Khanghamte sangin thu ka telzaw hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh na thuhilhnate ka zui hi. [101] Na thu ka zuih theih nadingin gamtatsia khempeuh ka pelh hi. [102] Nangmah in hong hilh khin na hih manin na biakna ngeina kipte panin kei ka pial kei hi.
[112] Nangma ngeina kipte ka sih mateng a zui tawntung dingin ka lungsim ka khensat hi.
[129] Na thuhilhnate lamdang pha mahmah a, ka lungsim khempeuh tawh tuate ka zui hi.
[134] Nangma thuhilhte ka zuih theih nadingin hong nengniamte’ kiang pan kei hong honkhia in.
[168] Na thuhilhnate le na ngeina kip omte khempeuh hoihtakin ka zui a, ka gamtatna khempeuh nangmah in na hong mu hi.
[10] Keima Pasian na hih manin nangma deih bangin a gamta dingin kei hong hilh in. Kei hong hehpih inla, lam phei-ah hong kha in.
[8] Ka ta aw, na pa’ hong thuhilhna hoihtakin zui inla, na nu’ hong thugente ngai in. [9] Tua thuhilhnate in na gamtat hong hoihsak ding a, kizepna lukhu le kizepna khi bangin hong etlawmsak ding hi.
[1] Ka ta aw, kong thuhilhte mangngilh kei inla, kong thugente phawk tawntung in. [2] Kong thuhilhte in na khan hong sausak ding a, hong daupaisak ding hi.
[20] Ka ta aw, na pa’ hong gen bangin gamta inla, na nu’ hong thuhilhnate mangngilh kei in.
[8] Mipilte in thuhilhna mang a, a hai paute in lungkhamna tuak hi.
[17] Kihilhna manna nuntak lampi zuihna hi a, hilhna man’ nop lohna lampi lauhuai zuihna ahi hi.
[1] Pilna a deihte, kithuhilh ding ut uh a, kitai ding ut lohna pen haina ahi hi.
[13] Thu kihilh ding ut lohna pen siat ding utna hi a, thu kihilhna zuihna pen lungnopna ahi hi.
[18] Thukihilhna a zui lo mi in zawnna le mindaina ngah a, thukihilhna a zui mi in minphatna le pahtawina a ngah hi.
[5] A pa’ hilhna a ngai nuam lote mihai hi a, hilhna a mang nuamte mipil ahi hi.
[10] A gamta khial mite nakpitakin kithuhilh a, thukihilhna a mang nuam lote in sihna thuak ding uh hi.
[32] Kihilh ding a ut lote amahmah a kisusia hi a, kithuhilh ding a utte pil semsem ding hi.
[20] Thuhilhna a mang mite a maa vang ding a, TOPA a muang mite a lung dam ding hi.
[20] Thu kigente ngai-in hong kihilhte mang lecin mai lamah na pil ding hi.
[13] Hih thute khempeuh banah gen ding thu khat bek om hi. Mihing hong kipiansakna a thu bulpi pen in: Pasian zahtakna le a thupiakte manna ahi hi.

[19] Note in utna lungsim nei-in thu na man’ nak-uhleh lei pana piang a gah hoihte na ne ding uh hi. [20] Ahih hangin note in kei hong nialin na hong lehdo uhleh namsau in note hong vatmai ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in hih thu gen khinzo hi,” a ci hi.

[23] Ahih hangin, ‘Ka thu hong mang un; tua hileh note’ Pasian ka hi ding a, note pen ka mite na hi ding uh hi. Note a dingin a hoihzawk nadingin na khempeuhah kong thupiak bang na zui un,’ ci-in thu ka pia zaw hi.

[8] Mun khempeuhah a om no mihingte aw, TOPA in a hoih nate hong gen khinzo hi. TOPA in note tung panin hong kalh thu in: Thuman thutang sem ding a, itna kip nei tawntungin, kiniamkhiatna tawh Pasian’ thu man’ ding ahi hi.

[2] Na gamtatna uh tawh kei nong zahtak ding uh hi. Ka thugente ngai loin, thupi takin na lak kei uhleh note tungah samsiatna ka hong tungsak ding a, siampi hihna tawh na ngah uh thuphate tungah samsiatna ka tungsak ding hi. A taktakin ci lehang, note in ka thupiaknate thupi lak lo na hih manun na thupha ngahte uh tungah samsiatna ka tungsakzo hi.

[2] Ahi zongin ka thu a hong mang note tungah dikna ni hong taang ding a, tua in nizang bangin note tungah cidamna hong tun ding hi. Bawng khumna panin a kikhah bawngnote bangin suakta-in nuam na sa ding uh hi.
[9] Tua lai mun panin Jesuh a paikhiat ciangin siahdongpa Matthai a zumah tu-in a om mu a, “Hong zui in,” a cih leh amah zong dingin a zuipah hi.
[6] Nungzui tegel zong Jesuh sawl bangin va pai uh hi.
[14] Tua bangin a paina-ah Alfeas tapa Levi, a siahdonna zumah tu-in a om a mu hi. Jesuh in ama kiangah, “Kei hong zui in,” a ci hi. Levi zong dingin Jesuh’ nung a zuipah hi.

[46] “Bang hangin, ‘Topa aw, Topa aw,’ hong ci napi-in ka hong gente zui lo na hi uh hiam? [47] Ka kiangah hong pai a, ka thuhilhna za-in a zuite khempeuh pen kua tawh kibang hiam cih leh, [48] suang tungah inn lamin, a khuamkua ding suangsung thukpi tak to-in a phut pa tawh kibang hi. Tui a khan ciangin tui in tua inn a nawk hangin limtakin kilam ahih manin susia zo lo hi.

[27] Amah in, “Na Topa Pasian na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na hatna khempeuh, le na pilna khempeuh tawh na it inla, nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in,” ci-in kigelh hi, ci-in a dawng hi.
[28] Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Pasian’ thu za-in a zuite hamphazaw lai hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[36] Tua ahih manin Tapa a um mi peuhmah nungta tawntung ding a, Tapa’ thu a mang lote in nuntak mu lo ding a, amaute tungah Pasian heh tawntung ding hi,” a ci hi.
[30] “Keima thu guak tawh ka hihtheih bangmah om lo hi. Pasian’ hong genna bang bekin thu ka khen hi. Keima ut bangin sem loin kei hong sawl pa’ deih bangin sem ka hih manin ka thukhenna thuman hi.
[31] Tua ahih manin amah a um Jew mite kiangah Jesuh in, “Ka thuhilhnate na zuih paisuak nak-uhleh ka nungzui taktakte na hi ding uh hi.
[51] A mantakin ci lehang, keima thuhilhna a zui peuhpeuh si nawn lo ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[17] Hih thu thei-in na zuih uhleh na lung uh nuam mahmah ding hi.
[15] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Kei na hong it uhleh ka thupiakte zong na zui ding uh hi.
[21] Keima thupiakte sangin a zuite in keimah hong it ahi uh hi. Kei hong it mite pen ka Pa in zong it ding a, keimah in zong itin amaute tungah ka kilang ding hi,” a ci hi.
[23] Jesuh in, “Kei hong itte in ka thu zui ding uh hi. Ka Pa in zong it ding a, ka nihun tua mite kiangah pai-in amaute tawh ka omkhawm ding uh hi.
[31] Ahi zongin leitung mite in Pa Pasian ka itna thu a theih nadingun Pa’ vaihawmna bangbangin a gamta ding ka hi hi. Tua ahih manin kithawi un; hih lai mun panin paikhia ta ni,” a ci hi.
[10] Ka Pa’ hong thupiakte zui-in ama itna sungah ka om mah bangin note in zong ka thupiaknate na hong zuih uhleh ka itna sungah a om na hi ding uh hi.
[14] Ka hong thupiak bangin na gamtat uhleh ka lawmte na hi uh hi.
[4] Nangmah in sep dingin na hong piak nasep khempeuh sem khinta ka hih manin leitungah na min a thangsak ka hi hi.
[29] Ahi zongin Peter le sawltak dangte in, “Mite’ thu sangin Pasian’ thu ka mangzaw ding uh hi.
[5] Minam khempeuh in ama thu umin a zuihtheih nadingun Khrih hangin sawltak nasep sep theih nading hamphatna thu Pasian in Khrih’ na sep nadingin kote a hong pia hi.
[13] Thukham zakna bek hangin Pasian tawh kipawlna a piang hi lo a, thukham sunga Pasian’ genna bangin a gamtate bek Pasian tawh a kipawl thei ahi hi.

[16] Mi khatpeuh’ thu a mang dingin ama khut sungah na kipiak uh ciangin a thu na mante uh’ sila na hi uh hi. Mawhna na bawl uhleh sihna a thuak ding na hi uh a, thumangin na om uhleh Pasian tawh pawlkhat a suak ding na hi uh hi. [17] Nidangin silate bangin mawhna’ thu a mang hinapi-in, tu-in note tungah a hong kipia thuhilhna kipte, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh zui na hih manun Pasian tungah i lungdam mahmah hi.
[14] Pasian’ Kha Siangtho in a makaih mite, Pasian’ tate ahi uh hi.
[28] Ama deihna bang a sem dingin Pasian in a hong sap, amah a it eite a dingin na khempeuh a hoihlamin piangsak hi, ci-in i thei hi.
[1] A kuamah peuh in hong ukte’ thu na mang ciat un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ thukimpih lohin kuamah in ukna thu nei lo hi; ukna thu nei i cih mite pen Pasian’ koih mite ahi hi.
[2] Note in kei hong phawk tawntungin ka hong hilh thu khempeuh zui na hih manun ka hong phat mahmah hi.
[5] Mite’ ngaihsutna a man lote ka thalnial gawpzo uh a, Pasian’ thu theih nading a khaktan thei nate ka susiagawp uh a, mi khempeuh’ ngaihsutna zo gawpin Khrih’ thu a mang dingin ka bawl uh hi.
[16] Note kiangah ka hong gen thu in: Kha Siangtho’ hong sawlna bangin gamta unla, na pumpi uh utna bangin gamta kei un.
[10] Eite a hong bawlpa pen Pasian hi a, Jesuh Khrih tawh i kipawl ciangin i nuntakna-ah gamtat hoih a nei dingin a hong bawl ihi hi. Hih pen eite’ omzia dingin a na ngaihsut kholhsa ahi hi.
[6] Hih bang mawhnate i bawl hangin phamawh kei, ci-in a mawk gen mite’ khemsa-in ta kei un. Pasian thu mang loin hih bangin a gamta mite in Pasian’ hehna a thuak ding uh ahi hi.
[21] Khrih na zahtakna uh hangin na thu uh na kimang tuak un.

[1] Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu na man ding uh Khristian ngeina hi a, ahi ding mah ahi hi. [2] Thupiakna a lian khat in, “Na nu le na pa zahtak in,” cihna hi a, khapna thu tawh kizom pahin, “Zahtak lecin nang a dingin thu hong hoihin, leitungah na khan a sau ding hi,” na ci pah hi.
[5] Silate aw, launa le linna tawh na leitung tote uh thu mang unla, Khrih’ na na sep uh mah bangin lungsim takpi tawh na na sepsak un.

[12] Tua ahih ciangin ka hong it sanggamte aw, note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-in ka thu na hong man’ tawntung uh mah bangin, tu-in note tawh ka hong omkhawm loh hun ciangin zong ka thu na hong man’ ding uh thupizaw lai hi. Pasian kihtakna le zahtakna tawh na maa uh nawt unla, amah in note hong hotkhiatna thu a cingtaak suaksak un.
[20] Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu man’ tawntung ding pen na Khristian nasep uh ahi hi. Tua bang thumanna in Pasian lungdamsak hi.

[22] Silate aw, thu khempeuhah na leitung topa uh thu na mang un. Amau’ hong pahtak ding deihna tawh a hong muh sung bekin a hoihtatte hi kei unla, Topa na zahtakna uh hangin lungsim tak tawh gamta un.
[14] I Topa Jesuh hong kilatkik Ni dongin paubaanna le mawhsakna om hetloin nang hong kipia thute na zui in.
[1] Na mite in hong uk kumpite le aana neite’ thu mangin, thuhoih khempeuh a sem dingin a kigingsa-in a om ding uh phawksak inla,

[8] Amah, Pasian’ Tapa hinapi-in a thuakna tawh thumang ahih theih nading a na kisin hi. [9] Tua bangin a cingtaak mi a suahkhit ciangin ama thu a mang mite khempeuh a dingin tawntung hotkhiatna a kipatna hong suak a,

[7] Noah in zong a upna hang mah tawh mailam a thupiang ding a muh theih lohpi mahin Pasian’ thugenna na mang a, teembaw khat bawlin a innkuanpihte tawh na suakta hi. Hih bangin a gamtatna tawh leitung midangte a mawh ahihna kilangsak a, a upna hangin mihoih hihna thu Pasian kiang panin a ngah hi. [8] Pasian in ama tungah piak dingin a ciam leitangah Abraham a pai dingin a sap lai-in Abraham in Pasian’ sapna a manna pen a upna hang mah ahi hi. A pai nading mun nangawn thei lopi-in a gam le a lei nusia-in a ding khia hi.

[17] Na makaite uh thu na mang unla, a genna uh bangin na gamta un. Pasian kiangah amaute in a nasepnate uh a pulak ding uh ahih manin tawlnga loin note hong lunghimawh tawntung uh hi. Amaute’ thu mang le-uhcin a nasepna uhah lungdam mahmah ding uh a, mang kei le-uhcin dah pipi-in na sem ding uh hi. Dah pipi-in a nasepna uh note a dingin zong phattuamna a om tuan hi lo hi.
[23] Mi khat in thu a zak bek tawh maisakin a zakna bangin a zuih kei leh limlangah a maitang a ki-en mipa tawh kibang bek hi.
[10] Mi khatpeuh in thukham dang khempeuh a zuih hangin khat a khialh nakleh a vekpi-in a khial mah ahi hi.
[20] Lawmte aw, gamtatna in a zui lo upna pen a hawmpi ahihna thu ka hong lak ding hi.
[24] Tua ahih manin, mi khatpeuh in a upna bek tawh hi loin, a sepna tawh a kizuih ciangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna ngah pan ahihna thu na thei uh hi.
[7] Tua ahih manin Pasian’ thu na mang un. Dawimangpa na nial un. Nial le-uhcin no kiang panin taikhia ding hi.

[2] Pa Pasian in ama ngimnasa bangin note hong teel a, note in Jesuh Khrih’ thu mangin, ama sisan tawh sianthona a ngah dingin a Kha Siangtho tawh note mi siangtho-in a hong bawl hi. Note tungah hehpihna le nopsakna thupha hong tam tun semsem tahen.

[14] Pasian’ thu na mang unla, na theih nai loh uh hun lai-in na gamtat ngei uh bangin na gamta nawn kei un. [15] Note a hong sampa a siangtho ahih mah bangin note zong na gamtatna khempeuh uhah na siangtho un.
[14] a gamtat siate gim pia-in, a gamtat hoihte a pahtawi dingin kumpipa in a sawl thuneite khempeuh’ thu ahi zongin na mang un.
[18] Nasemte aw, na tote uh thu na mang un. A thudik a migi na tote bek uh a zahtak hi loin a gilo na tote uh thu zong na mang un.

[5] Tua mah bangin no khangnozaw deuhte in zong a khanghamte’ thu na mang un. Lai Siangtho in, “Pasian in a kiphasak mite nial a, a kiniamkhiat mite a hehpih hi,” a cih mah bangin na vekpi-un kiniamkhiatna puan bangin silhin, khatlekhat na na kisepsak un.

[5] Ahi zongin ama thu a zui mite pen Pasian a itna a kicingtaak taktak mi ahi hi. Hih bangin i gamtat leh Pasian tawh a kipawl taktak ihihna i thei hi. [6] Pasian tawh ka kipawl hi, a ci mi khempeuh, Jesuh Khrih a gamtat bangin a gamtat ding ahi hi.
[17] Leitung nate le leitung deihnate a beibei ding hita a, ahi zongin Pasian’ deihna bangin a gamta mite pen kip tawntung ding hi.
[22] Ama thupiaknate zui-in ama lungkim nadingin gamta ihih manin ama kiang panin i nget peuhpeuh i ngah hi.
[2] Pasian itin ama thupiakte i zuihna tawh Pasian tate a it ihihlam i kithei ding hi. [3] Pasian i it ciangin ama thupiakte a zui ihi hi. Eite a dingin ama thupiakte zuih ding a haksa lua hi lo hi.
[6] Itna thu ka hong gen ciangin Pasian’ thupiakte zui ding cihna ahi hi. A kipat cil a kipan na zaksa uh ahi hih thupiakna pen na khan tawntungun zui-in itna na nei ta un.
[9] Khrih’ thuhilhna zui loin a khengvalin a pai mite pen Pasian tawh a kipawl lo ahi hi. Ahi zongin a thuhilhna a zuite pen Pa Pasian le a Tapa tawh a kipawl ahi uh hi.
[12] Pasian’ thupiakna zui-in Jesuh tungah a citak Pasian’ mite a dingin thuakzawhna kisam hi.
[7] Jesuh in, “Kei a hong pai baihta ding ka hi hi. Hih laibu sunga kigelh thu a zui mite mi hampha ahi hi,” a hong ci hi.
[27] Abraham in thu gen leuleu a, “En in, leivui le vut bang ahi lel keimah in TOPA’ tungah thu kong gen ngamna hong maisak in.

[28] Tua lai-ah sun sawmli le zan sawmli sung TOPA tawh Moses om a, tua hun sungteng anletui a ne kei hi. Amah in suangpek tungah thuciamna kammalte ahi thupiak sawmte a gelh hi. [29] A khut sungah thuciamna suangpek nih tawh Sinai Mual tung panin Moses hong paisuk ciangin, Pasian tawh amah kiho khin ahih manin a maitang vun a taan lamtak Moses in thei lo hi.

[35] Tua ciangin ni a omlai-in an ne dingin David a zol dingin mi khempeuh hong pai uh a, ahih hangin David kiciamin, “Ni a tum matengin an ahi a, na khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin ka ciap taak leh Pasian in kei hong dawm kei ta hen!” a ci hi.
[10] Solomon’ thungetna in TOPA lungkimsak hi.
[8] Tua ciangin amah tho a, an ne-in tui dawn a, tua an thahatna tawh Pasian’ mual Horeb ciang dong sun sawmli le zan sawmli sung a pai hi.

[10] Jabez in Israel Pasian tungah thu ngen a, “Kei thupha hong pia-in ka gamgi hong keeksak in. Kei hong ompih inla, siatna khatpeuh in kei hong gimsak loh nadingin hong kem in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Pasian in ama ngetna pia hi.
[1] Solomon a thunget a tawp ciangin, vantung panin meikuang hong paisukin meihal biakna le biakpiaknate kangtum a, tua ciangin TOPA’ minthanna vang biakinn sung hong dim hi.

[14] keima minin a kisam ka mite amau mahmah kiniamkhiatin, thu ngenin ka mai hong zong a, amau’ gitlohnate panin a kihei uhleh, keimah in vantung panin ka za ding a, amaute’ khialhna maisakin a leitang uh ka hoihsakkik ding hi.

[6] Tua ciangin Pasian’ biakinn panin Ezra paikhia-in Eliashib’ tapa Jehohanan’ omna inndei-ah pai-in tua lai-ah a giak hi. Salsuahna pan a hong ciahkik mite’ khialhna hangin dah ahih manin amah in anletui ne zo lo hi.
[1] A thuman ka Pasian aw, ka hong sap ciangin hong dawng in. Gimna ka thuak ciangin nopsakna nong pia hi. Kei hong hehpih inla, ka thungetna hong za in.
[3] TOPA aw, zingsang simin ka aw nong za a, zingsang simin nangma a dingin biakna bawlin kong ngak hi.
[6] Ka gimna-ah TOPA ka sam a, ka Pasian’ tungah huhna ngenin ka kiko hi. Amah in a biakinnpi panin ka aw hong za a, amah ka kohna aw in ama bilte va banto hi.
[14] TOPA, ka belh suangpi le keimah hong tankhia pa aw, ka kammal le ka lungsim ngaihsutnate nangma muhna-ah a sanhuai suaksak ta in!
[4] TOPA’ tung panin na khat ka ngen khin a, tua ngenin ka zon ding pen: TOPA’ inn sungah ka khan tawntungin om ding, TOPA’ hoihna et ding le ama biakinn sungah thu dot dingte ahi hi.
[5] Nangma khut sungah keimah kong ki-ap hi. TOPA, a thuman Pasian aw, keimah na hong hon ding hi.
[17] Huhna a ngen dingin thumante a kiko ciangin TOPA in za a, a haksatna khempeuh panun amaute a honkhia hi.
[5] TOPA tungah na vai teng ap in. Amah muang in; amah in hong sem ding hi.
[8] TOPA in sun tawntungin a itna kip hong lak a, zan hun ciangin nuntakna a hong pia Pasian’ tungah thungetna la ka sa hi.
[15] Haksat hun ciangin keima tungah hong ko un. Note kong honkhia ding a, note in keima min nong thangsak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[22] TOPA tungah na vangik nga in, amah in hong huh ding hi. Amah in mi thumante kilingsak ngei lo ding hi.
[17] Ama tungah huhna ngenin nakpitakin ka kiko a, lasakna tawh amah ka phat hi.
[4] Amaute ka itna, amaute a dingin thu ka ngetsakna nangawn amaute in hong thukna-in kei hong mawhsak uh hi.
[5] Ka cihmawhna-ah TOPA ka sam a, TOPA in hong dawngin mun tanzau-ah hong koih hi.
[14] Kihtak dingin a kilawm na hih manin nang ka hong phat hi. Na nasepnate lamdang mahmah! Nangmah in kei nong lim theih mahmah hi.
[2] Ka thungetna pen na mai-ah paknamtui bangsak inla, ka khutte ka laptohna pen nitak biakpiakna bangsak in.
[1] TOPA aw, ka thungetna hong za inla, kong thumnate hong ngai in. Na thumanna le na thutakna tawh kizui-in kei hong dawng in.
[18] Amah a sam mi khempeuh kiangah TOPA nai om a, lungsim takpi tawh a sam mi khempeuh kiangah amah nai om hi.
[29] TOPA in midikte’ thungetna ngai a, migilote’ thungetna thudon lo hi.
[9] Mi khat in thukham a zuihnop kei leh ama thungetna nangawn Pasian in zakthadahhuai sa hi.
[4] Note in a kitawng ding, a kilai ding, gitloh gamtatin, khuttum tawh a kitum ding bekin an na tang uh hi. Hih bang lelin antanna tawh na thungetna uh hong kingai ding ahi hiam?

[7] Na an uh a gilkialte tawh nekhawm unla, inn nei lo a zawngte na innsung uhah paipihin, tangguakin a om mite puan silhsakin, na mipihte uh kiang panin bu lo ding hi lo na hi uh hiam? [8] Tua ciangin ka maipha pen phalvaktung hong bang ding a, note’ tungah hong taangkhia ding hi. Manlang takin na liammate uh hong dam ding hi. Note hong ompih tawntungin note kong hon ding a, na nung na mai uhah ka hong dal ding hi. [9] Tua ciangin nong thungetna uh ka hong pia ding a, nong sap uh ciangin ka hong dawng ding hi. Mi bawlsiatnate khawlin, mi simmawhna le kam gilo na paunate uh na khawl uh a, [10] gilkial mite an pia-in, kisapna a nei mite tungah a kisapnate na piak uhleh na kimkot uha khuamial pen khuavak hong suak ding a, na lungzinna uh nitaang hong bang ding hi.
[24] Amaute in hong sap ma-in ke’n ka dawng ding a, amaute in thu a gen laitakin ke’n ka za ding hi.
[12] Tua hun ciangin note in kei hong samin, hong pai-in thu nong ngen ding uh a, ke’n zong kong dawng ding hi.
[3] Kei nong sap leh kong dawngkik ding a, na theih ngei nai loh a ki-imcip thu lianpite kong gen ding hi.

[23] Nang pen ka pu ka pate’ Pasian na hi a, ka hong phat a, ka hong zahtak hi. Nangmah in pilna le thahatna na hong piazo hi. Ka thungetna nong za a, kumpipa kianga ka gen ding thu nong lakzo hi,” a ci hi.

[10] Tua bang thupiakna lai kihawmkhia khinzo ta hi, ci-in Daniel in a theih ciangin a inn-ah a ciah hi. A inn dawl tungnungah Jerusalem lam a nga tawlet thum a om hi. Tua laitakah tawlet honsa-in a hih ngei bangin khukdinin ni khatin thumvei ta Pasian kiangah thu a ngen hi.

[18] Kumpipa a inn-ah ciahkik a, tua zan tawntung an ngawlin gualnopna zong a bawl kei hi. Tua zanin a ihmu thei peuhmah kei hi. [19] Zingsang khuavaktung phetin kumpipa tho-in humpinelkai kikhumna-ah a va paipah hi. [20] Humpinelkai kikhumna a tun dektak laitakin aw ling kawmin, “Daniel, a nungta Pasian’ nasempa! Thuman takin na biak tawntung na Pasian in humpinelkai kamsung panin a hong honkhia thei hiam,” ci-in a kiko hi.

[2] Amah kumpi a suah a kum masa kumin keimah Daniel in, TOPA in kamsang Jeremiah tungah Jerusalem kum sawmsagih sung kisia ding hi, ci-in a genna thu ngaihsunin biakna laibute ka sim hi. [3] An ngawlin, puanhampi silhin, vut lakah tu-in, Topa’ kiangah deih takin thu ka ngen hi. [4] TOPA ka Pasian’ kiangah thu ngenin ka mite’ mawhna ka pulak hi. Keimah in, “Topa Pasian aw, nang na lian a, ka hong zahtak uh hi. Nang na thuman a, na thuciamna le na thupiakna a mangte le a hong itte a tawntungin na it hi.

[12] Tua ciangin amah in, “Daniel aw, lau kei in. Kiniamkhiat dingin na lungsim na khensat masak pen ni a kipan, tua thu na theihtheih nadingin Pasian in na thungetna a hong zazo hi. Na thungetna bang a hong pia dingin ka hong pai hi.
[44] Ahi zongin ke’n note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong bawlsiate a dingin thu na ngetsak un.

[6] Ahi zongin thu na nget uh ciangin na innsung uhah tumin kong khak unla, na muh theih loh uh na Pa uh kiangah na ngen un. Tua hileh kuama muh lohin na gamtatna uh a hong mu na Pa un note’ tungah thaman hong pia ding hi. [7] “Thu na nget uh ciangin i thunget sau leh Pasian in hong pia deuh ding hi, ci-in a ngaihsun Gentail mite bangin khiatna a nei tum lo kam tampi na luilui kei un. [8] Tua na thunget ma nangawnun na Pa un note’ kisapna teng hong theikhin ahih manin Gentail mite na bang kei un.

[6] Ahi zongin thu na nget uh ciangin na innsung uhah tumin kong khak unla, na muh theih loh uh na Pa uh kiangah na ngen un. Tua hileh kuama muh lohin na gamtatna uh a hong mu na Pa un note’ tungah thaman hong pia ding hi. [7] “Thu na nget uh ciangin i thunget sau leh Pasian in hong pia deuh ding hi, ci-in a ngaihsun Gentail mite bangin khiatna a nei tum lo kam tampi na luilui kei un. [8] Tua na thunget ma nangawnun na Pa un note’ kisapna teng hong theikhin ahih manin Gentail mite na bang kei un. [9] Tua ahih manin thu na nget uh ciangin hih bangin na ngen un: ‘Vantunga om kote’ Pa aw, na min siangtho kizahtak hen. [10] Na ukna hun hong tung hen la, vantung bangin leitungah zong na deih bangin kigamta hen. [11] Nisim khamkhop an hong pia in. [12] Kote tungah a hong mawhte mawh maisakna ka neih bangun ko’ mawhna zong hong maisak in. [13] Ze-etna lian hong thuaksak ke’n. Gilo’ kiang pan hong honkhia in,’ (Uk zawhna, vangliatna, minthanna, na nei tawntung hi. Amen.) ci-in na ngen ding uh hi.

[7] “Ngen un; na nget uhleh hong kipia ding hi. Zong un; na zon uh leh na mu ding uh hi. Kongkhak na kiu un; na kiuh uhleh hong kihon ding hi. [8] Bang hang hiam na cih uhleh a ngente khempeuh in ngah ding uh a, a zongte khempeuh in mu ding uh a, a kiute khempeuh a’ ding kong kihon ding hi.
[11] Note mihoih lo hinapi-in na tate uh tungah na hoih piak ding ngaihsun thei na hih uhleh vantungah a om na Pa un a ngen mite tungah na hoihte hong piazaw mahmah ding hi lo ahi hiam?
[21] Thungetna le antanna tawh lobuang, thudang tawh hih bangte kihawlkhia thei lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[19] Leitungah note nih thukimin na nget uh na khat peuhpeuh, vantungah a om ka Pa in hong pia ding hi. [20] Bang hang hiam cih leh keima minin mi nih le thum bek nangawn a kikhopna peuhpeuhah kei ka om hi,” a ci hi.
[22] Upna na neih nak-uhleh na nget peuhpeuh uh na ngah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[36] Tua ciangin Jesuh a nungzuite tawh Gethsemane a kici munah pai-in amaute kiangah, “Hua lamah pai-in thu ka va nget kal sungteng hih lai-ah na om un,” a ci hi.
[41] Ze-etna-ah na puk khak loh nadingun thu ngen un. Lungsim in ze-etna nang nuam napi-in pumpi in nangzo lo hi,” a ci hi.

[28] Innsungah Jesuh a tumkhit ciangin a nungzuite in, “Bang hangin kote in dawi hawlkhia thei lo ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dongsim uh hi. [29] “Thungetna simloh a dang in hih bangte hawlkhia thei lo hi,” ci-in Jesuh in a dawng hi.

[24] Tua ahih manin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na khat peuhpeuh na nget uh ciangin ngah ding ci-in um un; tua hileh na nget peuhpeuh uh na ngah ding uh hi. [16] Ahi zongin gamdaihna munah Jesuh paikhia-in thu a ngen hi.
[12] Ni khat, thungen dingin mualtungah Jesuh pai a, zan tawntung Pasian kiangah thu ngenin a om hi.
[28] No hong phuisamte thupha na pia unla, no hong bawlsiate a’ ding thu na ngetsak un.

[16] Tua ciangin Jesuh in anlum nga le ngasa tawn nih la-in vantung lam nga a, Pasian tungah lungdamna ko-in balnen a, mite tungah a lui dingin a nungzuite tungah a pia hi. [17] Mi khempeuh in ne-in a khamkhit uh ciangin, a nungzuite in a kikhamval teng khawm uh a, paipel sawm le nih a dim hi.

[9] Tua ahih manin note kiangah kong cihin-ah: Ngen un; na ngah ding uh hi. Zong un; na mu ding uh hi. Kiu un; kongkhak hong kihon ding hi.

[1] Tua ciangin amaute in thu ngen tawntungin a lungkiat ngei loh nading uh a hilh nopna-in Jesuh in a nungzuite kiangah thugentehna khat gen a, [2] “Khuapi khat sungah Pasian a zahtak lo, mi zong a don lo thukhen mang khat a om hi. [7] Kei tawh na hong kizop uh a, note sungah ka thu a om nakleh na deih peuhpeuh uh hong ngen le-uhcin hong kipia ding hi.

[16] Note in kei na hong teel kei uh a, ahi zongin keimah in note ka hong teel a, note va pai-in a kimang tawntung ding gah a gah dingin ka hong seh hi. Tua ahih manin keima min suangin Pa kiangah na nget peuhpeuh uh hong pia ding hi.

[26] Tua hun hong tun ciangin, Pa Pasian kiangah ka hong ngetsak ding hi, ka hong ci nawn kei ding a, nomau mahmah in ka min suangin Pa kiangah na ngenpah ding uh hi. [5] Tua ahih manin thong sungah Peter kikhum a, ahi zongin pawlpi mite in lungsim takpi tawh ama a dingin Pasian kiangah thu a ngetsak uh hi.

[26] Thakhatin nakpitakin zin hong ling a, thonginn a bulpi dongin a lokgawp hi. Thakhatthu-in thong kongkhak khempeuh kihong a, thongkiate a kikhihna sikkhau khempeuh a kiphelkhia hi.
[36] Paul in hih bangin a kam vaikhak a man khit ciangin a vekpi-un khukdin uh a, Paul in thu a ngen hi.

[26] Tua ahih manin eite bangzahin ginalo hitalehang eite a hong huh dingin Kha Siangtho a hong pai hi. [14] No a hong bawlsia mite, Pasian in thupha a piak nadingin thu ngetsak unla, tua bang mite samsia loin thupha piazaw un.

[5] Thungetna-in hun na zattheih nadingun tawlkhat sung tuam om ding thukim khawm masa lopi-in lupkhop ding kinialkha kei un. Tua bangin tawlkhat sung na tuam om khit uh ciangin note’ pumpi’ deihna hangin Satan’ ze-etna sungah na pukkhak loh nadingun a ngeina bangin lupkhop ding kipan kik un.

Nangma thungette a theihtheih nading uh bangmah om lo hi. [17] Pasian tungah lungdam ko-in na thungetna a hoih mahmah hangin midangte in bangmah phattuamna ngah het lo hi.

[2] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in, “A hunhoih a tun ciangin note’ hong ngetna ka hong ngai a, kong hotkhiat ni ding ciangin note ka hong huh hi,” na ci hi. Tua hi a, tuhun pen a hunhoih hi a, tuhun pen hotkhiat ni hun hita hi.

[8] Tua natna tawh ka kipelh theih nadingin Topa kiangah thumvei tak thu ka ngen hi. Tua ahih manin keima sungah Khrih vangliatna hong omtheih nadingin lungdam takin ka thaneemna ka kisialhpih semsem hi.
[12] Amah tawh i kipawlna le amah i muanna hangin kimuang takin Pasian kiangah paitheih nading hun i nei hi.
[26] Na heh uh ciangin, tua hehna hangin khialkha kei unla, a tawntungin heh paisuak kei un.
[18] Kha Siangtho tawh kopin a tawntungin Pasian kiangah na kisapna khempeuh uh ngenin na thum unla, tatsat loin Pasian mi khempeuh a dingin thu na ngetsak un.

[3] Note ka hong phawk simin ka biak Pasian tungah ka lungdamna ka ko hi. [4] Note in lungdamna thu na zak ni uh a kipanin tuni ciang dong, lungdamna thuhilh nasepna-ah kei na hong huhna uh hangin ka nuam mahmah a, note a dingin thu ka nget simin lungdam mahmahna tawh ka ngen tawntung hi.
[19] Note hong thungetsakna le Jesuh Khrih Kha Siangtho huhna tawh suakta ding hi ing, ci-in thei ka hih manin ka lungdam hi.

[6] Thu khat peuhpeuhah lunghimawh lua kei unla, na kisap bangbang uh, lungdamna tawh Pasian kiangah na ngen un. [7] Mihingte in a theihtel zawh loh Pasian’ hong piak lungsim nopna in, Khrih Jesuh tawh na kipawlna uh hangin note hong lungnuamsak ding hi.

[3] Note in Khrih Jesuh na muanna uh le Pasian’ mite khempeuh na itna thu uh za ka hih manun note a’ ding thu ka hong ngetsak uh ciangin i Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pa Pasian tungah lungdamna ka ko tawntung uh hi.
[2] Lungsim takpi tawh thu ngen tawntung unla, kidawm kawmin lungdamna tawh thu ngen un.

[17] thu ngen niloh unla, [18] bangbang hong piang taleh na lungdamna uh Pasian tungah ko tawntung un. Khrih Jesuh tawh kipawlin na nuntakna sung uhah hih bangzia-in na om ding uh Pasian in a hong deih ahi hi.
[25] Sanggamte aw, kote a’ ding thu hong ngetsak un.

[11] Tua ahih manin ama hong sapna tawh a kilawm a kituak nuntakna na nuntak theih nading uh le ama vangliatna tawh a hoih na hihnop khempeuh uh hihzo-in, na upna uh hangin na khempeuh na zawhtheihna dingun Pasian kiangah thu ka hong ngetsak tawntung uh hi.

[1] Sanggamte aw, tu-in note lak mah bangin mun dangah zong Topa’ thu manlang takin kizel pakin lungdam takin a kisan’ theih nadingin kote a’ ding thu hong ngetsak un. [2] Mi khempeuh in thu um nai lo uh ahih manin a gilo a siahuai mite panin Pasian in kote hong hotkhiat nadingin zong hong ngetsak un. [3] Note ahihleh, Topa citak mahmah ahih manin hong thahatsak ding a, A Gilopa kiang panin hong honkhia ding hi. [4] Note kiangah ka hong gen uh thute a kipat cil a kipanin na zuih uh mah bangin zui paisuak taktak ding, ci-in note muanna lungsim kote sungah Topa in hong guan hi. [5] Pasian bangin itna nei-in Khrih thuak bangin na thuakzawh nadingun Topa in note lungsim hong bawlsak tahen.

[1] A masa penin kong gennop thu in: Mi khempeuh a dingin Pasian tungah ngetna, thungetna, thumna le lungdamkohna na neih ding uh ahi hi. [2] Eite nuamtakin omthei-in, biakna lungsim nei-in a kilawm takin i nuntak theih nadingin kumpite le uliante a dingin thu na ngetsak un.
[8] Mun khempeuhah a om pasal khempeuh in kuamah tawh kitotna le lungsim kinopmawhna nei hetloin, lungsim siangtho tawh a khut uh lamin thu a nget ding uh ka deih hi.
[4] Pasian’ bawlsa na khempeuh a hoih hi a, nial loin, lungdamna pulakin san ding ahi hi. [5] Pasian’ thu le thungetna hang tawh tuate a hoih a suak ahi hi.
[14] Kamsangte’ thugennate le upate in na tungah a khut uh nga-in thu hong ngetsakna ahi nangma hihtheih siamnate na valkhongsak kei in.
[16] Tua ahih manin a kisap hunin, eite a hong huh dingin hehpihna le dikna thupha i ngahtheih nadingin, kimuanna lungsim tawh hehpihna tokhom va zuan ciat ni.
[7] Leitungah mihingin Jesuh a omlai-in sihna panin amah a honkhia thei ding Pasian tungah thu ngenin khitui naptui tawh thumin na kiko hi.

[19] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Jesuh hong sihna hangin Siangtho Pen Munah ut utin luttheih nading thu i neita hi. [20] Ama pumpi mahmah ahi dalna puan tawnin nuntakna lampi-ah i pai theih nadingin amah in lampi thak hong honsak hi. [21] Pasian’ innsung a uk siampi lianpen zong i nei hi. [22] Tua ahih manin mawhna thu-ah kisuanna lungsim om nawn loin, tui siangtho tawh i pumpi a kisawpsa-in muanna le lungsim takpi tawh Pasian kiang zuan ni.

[5] Pilna kisam na om uhleh Pasian kiangah ngen un. Mi khempeuh tungah Pasian dikin cingh mahmah ahih manin hong pia ding hi. [6] Ahi zongin na nget uh ciangin hong pia takpi ding hi, ci-in muanna tawh na ngen un. A muanglah mite pen huih nunna lam peuhah a kinil kawikawi tuihualte tawh kibang lel hi. [7] Tua bang mite, lungsim kip a nei lo, a kineihkhem hi lel uh a, Topa kiang panin bangmah a ngah hetloh ding lamtak uh a theih ding uh ahi hi.

[2] Na na deih uh a, ahi zongin nei lo na hih manun mi na thatnuam uh hi. Nate deihna lungsim na nei uh a, ahi zongin ngah zo lo na hih manun kitawngin na kilailawh uh hi. Pasian kiangah na deih uh ngen lo na hih manun a ngah lo na hi uh hi. [3] Pasian kiangah na nget sun uh ciangin zong note’ nopsak nading bek ngenin, na ngaihsutna uh man lo ahih manin a ngah lo na hi uh hi.

[13] Lungkhamna a thuak na om uhleh thu na ngen un. A lungdam na om uhleh phatna la na sa un. [14] A cina na om uhleh pawlpi upate sam un. Amaute in thu hong ngetsakin Topa min tawh sathau hong zut ding uh hi. [15] Upna tawh thu a kinget ciangin Topa in cinate noptuamsakin, damsak ding a, mawhna nei ahihleh zong a mawhna maisak ding hi. [16] Tua ahih manin na ci uh a dam nadingin khatlekhat tungah na mawhna uh kipulakin thu na kingetsak ta un. Mihoihte’ thungetna in vang nei a, na lianpi semzo hi.
[12] Topa in a thuman mite mu a, amaute’ thungetna pia tawntung hi. Ahi zongin a gamtatsia mite Topa in a langbawl hi,” na ci hi.
[7] Na khempeuh a bei nading hun hong naita hi. Nomau pumpi ki-uktawm thei-in pilvang unla, hoihtakin thu a ngen thei-in om ta un.
[7] Pasian in note hong kem ahih manin na lungkhamnate khempeuh uh ama kiang tunpih un.
[9] Ahi zongin Pasian kiangah i mawhnate va pulak lehang, amah citakin thuman ahih manin, i mawhnate hong maisakin i hoih lohnate khempeuh hong siangsak ding hi.
[22] Ama thupiaknate zui-in ama lungkim nadingin gamta ihih manin ama kiang panin i nget peuhpeuh i ngah hi.

[14] Eite in ama deihna tawh kituakin i nget nakleh i nget khempeuh Pasian in hong pia ding hi, ci-in kimuanna lungsim i nei hi. [15] Eite’ ngetna khempeuh amah in na za hi, ci-in thei ihih manin ama kiang panin i nget khempeuh zong hong pia ding hi, ci-in i thei hi. [16] Mi khatpeuh in a Khristian mipihte a sih nading zah ciang ahi lo mawhna a gamta a muh leh ama a dingin thu ngetsak tahen. Ama thungetna bangin Pasian in a nuntakna suksak lo ding hi. Hih pen sihna zah ciang mawhna a hilote ka cihna ahi hi. Ahi zongin sih nading zah ciang ahi mawhna om a, tuate a’ ding ngetsak un, a ci ka hi kei hi.

[14] Ama kiang panin Lot a paikhiat khit ciangin TOPA in Abram’ kiangah, “Khuadak to inla, nangma omna panin leilu lam, leitaw lam, nisuahna lam, le nitumna lam en in. [15] Bang hang hiam cih leh na muh gam khempeuh nang le na suanlekhakte kong pia paisuak ding hi.
[17] Nang thupha kong pia taktak ding a, na suanlekhakte vana aksite le tuipi gei-a sehnel bangin tampi ka phasak ding hi. Na suanlekhakte in amau’ galte’ khuapite luah ding uh a,

[29] Khatvei Jakob in meh huanin a om laitakin gamlak a sa betna panin phukhong vei-in Esau hong ciah hi. [30] Esau in Jakob kiangah, “Gilkialin phukhong vei ka hih manin tua na meh san tawmkhat hong nesak in,” a ci hi. (Tua ahih manin ama min Edom kici hi.) [31] Jakob in, “Na innluahza hong pia lecin ka meh kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi. [32] Esau in, “A si ding ka hita hi; kei a dingin innluahza bangin kimang ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi. [33] Jakob in, “Kei’ tungah hong kiciam masa in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama tungah Esau kiciam a, Jakob’ tungah a innluahza a zuak hi. [34] Tua ciangin Jakob in an le bemeh Esau a pia hi. Esau in zong an ne-in tui a dawn khit ciangin a pai nading a zuan hi. Tua ahih manin Esau in a innluahza tua ciang bang bekin a ngaihsun ahi hi.

[12] Isaac in tua leitangah khai tuh a, tua kum mahin a zah zakhat la hi. TOPA in amah thupha pia a, [13] a neihsa kibehlaplap ahih manin a hau mahmah khat a suak hi. [14] Amah in tuuhon le bawnghon, le innkuan mi tampi nei a, Filistia mite in amah eng uh hi.

[28] Pasian in na tungah vantung daitui hong pia hen la, na lote hoihsak tahen. An le leenggahzu tampi hong pia tahen. [29] Mite in nangma na hong sem hen la, minamte na mai-ah hong kun ta uh hen. Na sanggamte’ tungah topa hi inla, na sanggamte’ suanlekhakte, na mai-ah hong kun uh hen. Nang hong samsia peuhmah in samsiatna ngah hen la, thupha hong pia peuhmah in thupha ngah ta hen,” a ci hi.
[25] Note in TOPA na Pasian uh nong bia ding uh a, keimah in na an uh le na tui uh thupha ka pia ding hi. Keimah in note’ lak panin cinatna ka la khia ding hi.

[24] TOPA in note thupha hong pia-in hong kem tahen. [25] TOPA in note tungah a maitang hong taangsakin note hong ompih tahen. [26] TOPA in note tungah a maipha hong pia hen la, note tungah nopsakna hong pia ta hen,’ ci-in thupha pia uh hen.

[1] “Note in TOPA na Pasian uh thu mangin, tuni-a kong gen ama thupiakna khempeuh limtakin na zuih uhleh TOPA na Pasian un leitung minam dangte khempeuh sangin a lianzaw-in note hong bawl ding hi. [2] TOPA na Pasian uh thu na man’ uhleh hih thuphate khempeuh note tungah hong tung ding hi. [3] “Khuapi sungah thupha ngah mi na hi ding uh a, lote-ah zong thupha ngah mi mah na hi ding uh hi. [4] “Note’ sung pana piangte, le na leitang uh pana piangte, le na ganhing uh pana piang, na bawngte uh pungin na tuuhonte uh tungah thupha om ding hi. [5] “Na seengte uh le na annel mekna kuangte uhah thupha om ding hi.
[8] “ TOPA in note’ ansal tung le na hihna khempeuh uhah thupha hong puak ding hi. TOPA na Pasian un note hong piakna leitangah amah in note tungah thupha hong pia ding hi.

[12] Note’ leitangah ama hunin guah a zusak ding le na sepna khempeuh uh thupha a pia dingin TOPA in a na hoih kholna vantung note hong hon ding hi. Note in minam tampite tungah leitawi na pia ding uh a, ahih hangin note in leitawi na la kei ding uh hi.

[13] Amah in note hong itin, tampi hong phasak ding hi. Amah in note tungah piak dingin na pu na pate uh tungah a ciam gam sungah note’ suanlekhakte le na gam sung panun a piangte, na an uh le na leenggahzu uh le na sathau uh, le na ganhingte uh pungsakin, na tuulekeelno honte uh zong thupha pia ding hi.

[16] TOPA na Pasian uh itna, ama lampite totna, ama thupiaknate le ama thukhamte le ama ngeina kipte zuihna tawh, tuni-a no tungah kong gen ahi TOPA na Pasian uh thupiaknate na man’ uhleh, note nungta-in tampi na pha ding uh a, a luah dingin note na lutna uh leitang tungah TOPA na Pasian un note thupha hong pia ding hi.

[8] Amah in leivui panin mizawngte phongto a, amah in a cimawhte a lungkhamna panun a phongto hi. Uliante tawh tukhawmsak a, minphatna ngahsak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung khuampite TOPA a’ hi a, tuate tungah amah in leitung pumpi a koih hi.
[12] Hauhna le minphatna nangma kiang pan hong pai a, nangmah in na khempeuh tungah na uk hi. Na khut sungah vangliatna le minthanna om a, liatsakna ding le thakhauhsakna ding na khut sungah om hi.

[14] keima minin a kisam ka mite amau mahmah kiniamkhiatin, thu ngenin ka mai hong zong a, amau’ gitlohnate panin a kihei uhleh, keimah in vantung panin ka za ding a, amaute’ khialhna maisakin a leitang uh ka hoihsakkik ding hi.
[21] “Job aw, tu-in Pasian tawh kilem inla, amah galbawl nawn kei in. Tua hileh amah in nang thupha hong pia ding hi.

[1] Mi nuamsa i cihte pen migilote’ thu a zui lo mi, mimawhte’ gamtat bangin a gamta lo mi, mi a thusim lote tawh a kipawl lo mi ahi hi. [2] Ama nopsakna pen TOPA thu sung bek mah hi a, sun le zanin ama thu a ngaihsunsun mi ahi hi. [3] Amah pen lui tuiluang gei-a a kisuan ama gah hunin gah a, a teh a vul ngei lo singkung tawh kibang hi. Ama hihna khempeuhah a maa pai mahmah hi.
[4] Na lungsim’ deihna amah in hong pia hen la, na geelna khempeuh hong tangtungsak ta hen!

[1] TOPA pen tuucin bangin hong cing hi a, kisapna teng kicing ta hi. [2] Lo nona-ah hong lumsak a, tuidam kiangah hong paipih hi. [3] Thahatna thak kei hong guan hi. A hong ciamsa mah bangin-ah lampi manah kei hong kha hi. [4] TOPA aw, kei hong ompih na hih manin khuamial thukpi ka nawk hangin ka lau kei hi. Na molhtum le na ciangkhut in kei hong hu hi. [5] Keima galte’ muhna munah an nong lui hi. Thupi takin nong pahtawi a, keima hai zong dimlet ta hi. [6] Na hoihna le nong itna in ka khantawnin a hong zuih ding tel takin-ah ka thei ta a, a tawntungin na inn sungah ka om ding hi.
[19] Nang hong zahtakte a dingin na koihsa na hoihte, nang hong beelte a dingin mite’ muhna-ah na bawl, nangma hoihna kicing a, mi khempeuh in thei uh hi.
[8] TOPA tawh kikhawl phot unla, ama hoihna thei un! Amah a beel mite mi lungdam ahi uh hi.
[3] TOPA muang inla, gamtat hoih in. Gam nuamah teng inla, thumanin om in. [4] TOPA sungah lungkim in; amah in na deihna hong pia ding hi.
[4] TOPA a muang a, mi kiphasakte lamah a kihei lo, pasian man lote lamah a pialkhia lo mi thupha ngah ahi hi.

[1] Mi genthei a khualte thupha ngah ahi hi. TOPA in haksatna hunah amaute honkhia ding hi. [2] TOPA in amaute hu-in hingsak ding a, leitungah amaute thupha ngah mi kici ding hi. Amau’ galte’ khut sungah amaute pia lo ding hi.
[6] Leitang in ama hauhna gahkhia khinta a, Pasian, eima Pasian in eite thupha hong pia khin hi. [7] Pasian in eite thupha hong pia khin hi. Leimong dong mi khempeuhte in amah zahtak uh hen.
[12] TOPA in a hoih nate eite tungah hong pia ding a, i leitang in hauhna piangsak ding hi.
[7] Amah in leivui panin mizawngte laamto-in, ninphual panin mi cimawhte le a lungkhamte domto a, [8] uliante tawh kikhawl sakin ama mite’ ulianin a bawl hi.
[2] Ama thuhilhnate zui-in, a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh amah zongin, khialhna zong bawl loin, ama lampi a zuite, thupha ngah ahi hi.
[2] Zingsangin tho baihin, gimpi a nangma sepsa an na nek hakna zong a mawkna mah ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in ama itte tungah a ihmut sung nangawnun a pia hi.
[9] Na neihsa le na anpalte tawh TOPA zahtak in. [10] Tua hileh na ansalte an tawh kidim ding a, beel dimletin leenggahzu na nei ding hi.
[18] Migilote in a man nei taktak bangmah ngah lo a, thumanin a gamtate in peel loin thaman hoih a ngah hi.
[22] Midikte in a tu a tate’ luah ding gamh nei uh a, mawhneite’ neihsate ahihleh midikte a’ ding hi lel hi.
[3] Na geelnate khempeuh TOPA ap in; tua hileh na geelna bangin tangtung ding hi.
[20] Thuhilhna a mang mite a maa vang ding a, TOPA a muang mite a lung dam ding hi.
[7] Mi khat thumanin a hoihin a nuntak leh ama suanlekhakte mi hampha ahi uh hi.
[5] Limtakin ngaihsunin geelgeelna pen hauhna lampi hi a, nawhsa-in lopthop hihna pen zawnna lampi ahi hi.
[20] Mipil pa’ inn sungah neihlelam a dimin om a, ahi zongin mihai pa in a ngahzahzah zangkhia pah hi.
[20] A citak mipa in thupha tampi ngah ding a, a hau baih nuam mipa in gim tuak pelmawh ding hi.
[25] A huaiham mi in kitotna piangsak a, TOPA a muang mite mihau hi ding hi.

[26] Pasian in amah a lungdamsakte tungah pilna, theihna, le lungdamna pia a, ahi zongin a hehpihhuai mimawhte ahihleh a sep bek sisakin, amau’ thalawhsa khempeuh amah a lungdamsakte tungah a piaksak hi. Hih pen a mawknapi taktak, huihpi nungdelh bang bek ahi hi.
[13] “ TOPA in na tapate khempeuh hoihtakin hilh ding a, na tapate daupai mahmah ding uh hi.

[7] “ TOPA muangin amah a beel mi in thupha a ngah ahi hi. [8] Amah, gun gei-a a kisuan singkung bang hi a, lui gei-ah a zung a kha hi. A tehte hing den ahih manin nisa kihta lo hi. Tatsat loin gah den ahih manin guah zuk loh kum ciangin zong lungkham tuan lo hi.
[11] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in kong cihin-ah, mai lamah lametna note kong piakkik ding, na siatna ding uh hi loin na phattuamna ding uh geelna ka neihte kei bek in ka thei hi.
[10] Ka biakinn-ah an a om theih nadingin sawm-ah-khat a kimin hong paipih un. Kei hong ze-et un; vantung kongkhakte hongin, note a dingin na hoih tampi kong piakna na mu ding uh hi.
[11] “Midangte in keima hangin a man lopi-in hong simmawhin hong bawlsia a, a nam tuamtuamin hong gensiat uh ciangin thupha ngah mi na hi uh hi.

[4] Dahin a thum a tau mite Pasian in amaute hehnem ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi. [5] A lungnem mite in Pasian’ ciamsa leitang ngah ding uh ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi. [6] Pasian’ deihteng sep ding a hanciamte Pasian in lungkimna ngahsak ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi. [7] Midang a hehpih mite tungah Pasian in hehpihna pia ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi. [8] Lungsim takpi tawh Pasian a zong mite in Pasian mu ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi. [9] Kilem nading deihin a hanciam mite in Pasian’ tate cihna ngah ding uh ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi. [10] Pasian’ deihna bangin a gamtat manin bawlsiatna a thuak mite vantung ki-ukna sungah a omte ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi. [11] “Midangte in keima hangin a man lopi-in hong simmawhin hong bawlsia a, a nam tuamtuamin hong gensiat uh ciangin thupha ngah mi na hi uh hi.
[21] a topa in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi; a hoih a citak nasempa aw, a tawmno na zekna-ah siam na hih manin a tampi tak ka hong zeksak ding hi. Hong pai in; kei tawh nuamsa khawm ni,’ a ci hi.

[27] “Ahi zongin ka thugen a za note kiangah kong cihin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong mudah mite tungah a pha na bawl un. [28] No hong phuisamte thupha na pia unla, no hong bawlsiate a’ ding thu na ngetsak un.
[33] Thudang khempeuh sangin Pasian’ ukna le ama deihna na zuih theih nading uh thupi ngaihsut masazaw un. Tua hileh hih na kisapna dangte khempeuh uh zong hong piathuah veve ding hi.

[38] Midangte tungah pia un. Tua hileh Pasian in note tungah zong hong pia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh midangte na piakna uh tawh kizui-in a henhen, a tahtah, a dimletin Pasian in note tungah hong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
[16] A kicing ama hong itna hangin eite khempeuh tungah thupha a banbanin hong pia hi.

[36] Khaituh pa le anla pa a lungdam khawm theih nadingin anla pa thaman a kipiak mah bangin anla pa in zong a nungta tawntung dingin mi a khawm ding hi. [37] Tua ahih manin, ‘Khat in khai tuhin, adang khat in a an la,’ ci-in paunak a om pen thuman mahmah hi. [38] Tua ahih manin note in na khawh loh uh lo-ah an a la dingin ka hong sawl hi. Midang in tua lo na kho a, note in a lak bek a si na hi uh hi,” a ci hi.
[10] Gutate pen a gu ding, a that ding, le a siasak ding bekin hong pai hi. Kei ka hih leh tuute a nungta maimai bek hi loin nuntakna cingtaak a neihtheih nadingun a hong pai ka hi hi.

[35] Topa Jesuh mahmah in, ‘Ngahna sangin piak khiatna-ah lungdamna lianzaw hi,’ a cihna phawkkawmin nakpitakin nasepna tawh na khempeuhah a zawngkhalte huh ding hi hang, ci-in note kiangah kong lak khinzo hi,” ci-in a vaikhak hi.
[32] Ama Tapa nangawn siit loin eite khempeuh a dingin hong piakhia ahih manin, na dang khempeuh zong hong piazaw kan ding hi lo ahi hiam?
[39] leitung a om nate, leinuai-a om nate, Pasian’ bawlsa nate khat peuhpeuh in i Topa Khrih Jesuh hangin Pasian in eite hong itna tawh hong khenzo het lo ding hi.

[11] Lai Siangtho in, “Amah a um mi peuhmah tavai lo ding hi,” ci hi. [12] Bang hang hiam cih leh Jew mi le Gentail mi a kideidanna om lo ahih manin Topa pen mi khempeuh’ Topa hi kim a, ama kiangah a ngen khempeuh tungah thupha tampi tak a pia hi. [13] Lai Siangtho in zong, “Topa tungah huhna a ngen khempeuhte in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh hi,” ci hi.
[8] Note in na kisap khempeuh uh na neihtheih nading uh le midangte huh nading zong na neihthuah theih nadingun Pasian in hong pia thei hi.
[3] Khrih tawh eite i kipawlna hangin vantung gam panin kha tawh kisai letsong namkim hong pia ahih manin eite’ Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pa ahi Pasian tungah i lungdamna ko ciat ni.

[12] Ahi zongin ka utna tungkhin ing, cingtaak khinta ing, a ci ka hi kei hi. Khrih Jesuh in kei a dingin a hong sepsak hamphatnate kimtakin ka ngahtheih nadingin a hanciam lai ka hi hi. [13] Sanggamte aw, tua hamphatna a ngah khinin ka kingaihsun kei hi. [7] Mihingte in a theihtel zawh loh Pasian’ hong piak lungsim nopna in, Khrih Jesuh tawh na kipawlna uh hangin note hong lungnuamsak ding hi.
[19] A na ka sep i Topa Pasian in ama hauhna tawh kizui-in Khrih Jesuh hangin note’ kitangsapna khempeuh hong pia ding hi.

[6] Pasian biakna hangin a neihsateng tawh a lungkim mite pen biakna in mihau a suaksak takpi mah ahi hi. [7] A taktakin ci lehang, leitungah mihingin i suah laitakin sumlepai tawh i suak kei a, i sih ciangin zong leitung panin bangmah i keng thei tuan kei hi. [8] Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn, nikten puansilh i neih nakleh a phazo ahi hi. [25] Topa Jesuh Khrih hehpihna thupha, note tungah hong tung tahen.

[12] A hoih takpi mah hiam, ci-in sinna a thuak ciangin a nangzote a hampha mahmah ahi hi. Tua bangin a nangzote in, amah a itte tungah Pasian in a piak dingin a ciam nuntakna lukhu a ngah ding uh hi.

[25] Ahi zongin mite a suaktasak thei thukham cingtaak hoihtakin a et khit ciangin a thu ngai-in a mangngilh pah hi loin, hoihtakin ngaihsun tawntungin a zuite pen a sepna khempeuh uhah Pasian in thupha a pia ding hi.

[9] Hong bawlsiate siatna tawh thukkik loin hong samsia mite samsia kik kei unla, Pasian in note a hong sap lai-in thupha a hong piak dingin hong ciamsa ahih manin, hong siat bawlte thupha tawh na thukzaw un.

[3] Ama minthanna le a hoihnate a neikhawm dingin a hong sampa i theihna hangin Pasian’ deih bangin biakna mantak i nuntak theih nadingin ama vangliatna in eite’ kisap na khempeuh a hong pia hi. [1] Tua hun sungteng Saul in Topa’ thu a um mite thah dingin a hanciamna zomlai hi. Siampi lianpen pa kiangah pai a, [2] Topa’ thu a zui mi numei pasal a muh peuhpeuh manin Jerusalem khua-ah a ciahpih theih nadingin Damaskas khua-a Jew mi kikhopna inn ukte kiangah a lah dingin lai a ngen hi.

[13] Na Khristian pihte uh a kisapna bangin na neihsate uh na hawm unla, zin le leengla do a siam mite na hita un.

[13] Tua ahih manin khatlekhat kimawhsakin thu kikhen kei unla, i Khristianpihte i puksak khak loh nading, a dongtangsak ihih khak loh nadingin ngaihsun ciat ni. Na an nekna uh tawh, Khrih in a sihlawh mite’ siat nading piangsak kei un.

[7] Jew mipih ahih banah ka thongkiatpih ahi Andronikas le Junias zong na hopih sak un. Amaute pen kei’ Khristian suahma pekin a na suak khinsate na hi uh a, sawltakte khempeuh in a theihkim uh mite ahi uh hi.

[23] Keima zintunna pa le pawlpite’ kikhopna inn nei pa zong ahi Gaias in zong hong hopih hi. Ka omna khuapi sumkem pa Erastas le i Khristian sanggam Kuartas in zong hong hopih uh hi.
[15] Khrih le Dawimangpa bangci-in kithutuak thei ding a, thu um mi le thu um lo mi bangci-in a ngaihsutna uh kibang thei ding ahi hiam?
[2] Tuma kum sawm le li hun lai-in vantung a dawl tungnung penah Khristian khat kilato hi. A pumpi taktak hiam, maangmu ahi hiam ka thei kei hi. Pasian in thei hi.
[5] Thu um taktak mah ihi hiam, ci-in nomau mahmah na ki-entel ciat un. Na ki-ettelna uhah a cingtaak lo na hih kei nak-uhleh note sungah Khrih om ahih manin thu phawk un.
[2] Kei tawh a omkhawm i Khristianpihte in zong note hong hopih uh hi.
[1] Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu na man ding uh Khristian ngeina hi a, ahi ding mah ahi hi.

[13] Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih nasem ka hihna hangin thongkia ka hihna thu, inncing galkapte a kipanin mi khempeuh in a thei uh hi. [14] Tua banah keima thongkiatna hangin hih lai-a om Khristiante a tamzaw in Topa muanna-in nei uh a, lau hetloin Pasian’ thu gen ngamna-in neizaw uh hi.

[18] Zite aw, Khristiante gamtat dingin a kilawm ahih mah bangin na pasalte uh thu na mang un. [19] Pasalte aw, na zite uh it unla, amaute tungah ngongtat kei un. [20] Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu man’ tawntung ding pen na Khristian nasep uh ahi hi. Tua bang thumanna in Pasian lungdamsak hi.

[11] Justas zong a kici zel Jesuh in zong note hong hopih hi. Vun-atna a zang Jew mi Khristian a hong suakte lak panin hih mi thumte bek, Pasian thu-ah ka naseppih lakah a hong kihel ahi hi. Ka nasepna-ah amaute in nakpitakin hong huh uh hi.
