[10] Pasian, a man loin gamta ngei lo ahih manin na Khristianpihte uh a beisa hunah na huhna uh le tu dongin na huh laina uh tawh ama a dingin na nasepna uh le amah na itna uh na lahnate uh hong mangngilh het lo ding hi.
[26] Mi khatpeuh in Khristian ka hi hi, ci napi-in kampau a kidopzawh kei leh amahmah a kikhemtawm hi lel a, ama biakna neih a mawkna ahi hi.
[22] Tu-in lungdamna thuman na zuihna hangun note kisiansuah khinin, na thu uppih mite uh lungsim tak tawh itthei khinta na hih manun na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh limtakin na ki-it un.
[16] Ahi zongin Khristian hihna hangin gimna na thuak uhleh kuamah in maizum ngaihsut kei unla, Khrih min hangin na thuak manun Pasian tungah na lungdam un.
[14] Khristian ki-itna tawh khatlekhat kinamin na kihopih un. Khrih thu um note khempeuh tungah nopsakna thupha hong tung tahen.

[9] Mi khatpeuh in khuavak gamtatna ka gamta hi, ci napi-in a Khristian mipihte a muhdah leh khuamial gamtatna mah a gamta lai ahi hi. [10] A Khristian mipihte a it mite pen khuavak gamtatna a gamta hi a, tua bang mite a puktheih nading thu om lo hi. [11] Ahi zongin a Khristian mipihte a mudah mite pen khuamial sungah omin khuamial gamtatna a gamta uh hi a, tua khuamial in bangmah ngaihsunsak thei lo ahih manin a gamtat nading mel uh thei lo uh hi.
[10] Hih pen Pasian tate le Dawimangpa’ tate a kilamdanna ahi hi. A manin gamta loin, a Khristian mipihte a it lo mi peuhmah, Pasian’ tate hi lo uh hi.

[14] Ei Khristiante khatlekhat ki-it ihih manin sihna khutsung panin paikhia-in nuntakna khut sungah a lut khinta ihihna thu i thei khinzo hi. Itna lungsim a nei lote pen sihna khutsung mahah a omlai uh ahi hi. [15] A Khristian mipih a mudah mi peuhmah mi that hi a, mi thatte in nuntak tawntungna a neih lohna thu na thei uh hi. [16] Itna i cih bangci theih ding ihi hiam cih leh: Khrih in eite a dingin a nuntakna hong pia hi. Ei zong i Khristian mipihte a dingin i nuntakna i piak ngam ding ahi hi. [17] Mi khat hau mahmah hen la, a Khristian mipih a cimawhte mu napi-in huhna bangmah pianuam hetkei leh, bang hangin amah in Pasian ka it hi, ci thei ding ahi hiam?

[20] Mi khatpeuh in, “Pasian ka it hi,” ci napi-in a Khristian mipihte a muhdah le a zuaupi a gen ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a muhtheih a Khristian mipih a it lo mi in a muhtheih loh Pasian it thei lo ding hi.

[16] Mi khatpeuh in a Khristian mipihte a sih nading zah ciang ahi lo mawhna a gamta a muh leh ama a dingin thu ngetsak tahen. Ama thungetna bangin Pasian in a nuntakna suksak lo ding hi. Hih pen sihna zah ciang mawhna a hilote ka cihna ahi hi. Ahi zongin sih nading zah ciang ahi mawhna om a, tuate a’ ding ngetsak un, a ci ka hi kei hi.

[3] Nang a mantakin a gamta na hih takpi mah bangin, i Khristian mipih hih lai-a hong pai peuhpeuh in a mantakin na nuntakna thu hong gen uh ahih manin ka nuam mahmah hi. [4] Tate bangin ka hong neih mite a mantakin a gamtatna uh ka zakna hangin ka lungdamna sangin adang lungdamna lianzaw bangmah om lo hi. [5] Ka hong it lawm Gaias aw, na theih ngei loh hinapi-in i Khristian mipihte lungsim takpi tawh na na huh hi.

[8] Tua ahih manin Pasian thuman nasepna-ah nasem khawm mite ihih theih nadingin ei Khristiante in hih bang mite i huh ding ahi hi. [9] Na pawlpite kiangah lai ka gelh ngei hi. Ahi zongin na pawlpi sungah milian pen a ut Diotrefes in ka thugen hong mang nuam lo hi. [10] Tua ahih manin kong pai ciangin kote hong gensiatna, zuauthu a genna, le a gamtatna khempeuh ka pholak ding hi. Tua bang mi gensiatna ciang bek hi loin, i Khristian mipihte zin nangawn tungsak nuam lo a, zin a tungsak nuamte nangawn khamin, pawlpi panin hawlkhiat ding hanciam lai hi.

[15] Josef’ sanggamte in a pa uh a sih khit ciangin, “Josef in eite hong mudahin ama tunga siatna i bawl khempeuh hong thukkik kha ding hi,” ci uh hi. [16] Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Josef kiangah thu puak uh a, “I pa in a sih ma-in thu hong pia a, [17] ‘Josef kiangah hih bangin ci un: Na sanggamte’ thupalsatna le a khialhna na maisak in, kong thum hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang’ tungah amaute in siatna hong bawl uh hi,’ ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in nang’ tungah kong thum uh hi. I pa’ Pasian’ nasemte’ thupalsatna hong maisak in,” a ci uh hi. Amaute in ama kiangah tua bangin thu a gen ciangun Josef a kap hi.
[11] Aaron in Moses kiangah, “Ka topa aw, kote hai gamtatin ka khialhna hangun gim hong pia kei in.
[13] Siatna ding panin na leii kem inla, zuau genna panin na muk kem in. [14] Siatna panin kihemkhia inla, a hoih bawl in. Kilemna ding hanciam inla, na phak mateng delh in.

[1] Pasian aw, nangma itna kip om bangin kei hong hehpih inla, na hehpihna lian om bangin ka thu palsatnate hong phiatkhiatsak in. [2] Ka khialhna panin hong silsiang kiuhkeuh inla, ka mawhna panin kei hong siangsak in. [3] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka thupalsatnate ka thei a, ka mawhnate khempeuh ka phawk ngitnget hi.
[12] Muhdahna in kitotna piangsak a, itna in mawhna khempeuh maisak hi.
[9] Mihaite in a khialh hangun phamawh sa lo uh a, mipilte a khialh ciangun mawhmaisak ding deih uh hi.
[11] A kilawm hunin kammal khat paukhiatna pen ngun pek tunga kham pek khat a kisuang tawh kibang hi.
[13] Na mawhna na phawk ding bek kisam hi. TOPA na Pasian na langpanna, singliim nuai khempeuhah gamdang pasian-te tawh na khialh kawikawina le ka thu nong man lohnate pulak in, TOPA in kong ci hi.

[8] Lungsim takpi tawh Pasian a zong mite in Pasian mu ding ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi. [9] Kilem nading deihin a hanciam mite in Pasian’ tate cihna ngah ding uh ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.

[23] Tua ahih manin Pasian tungah biakna a pia dingin biakna tau mai-ah na om laitakin na sanggamte khat peuhpeuh na tungah a lungkim lohna thu na phawk leh, [24] Pasian na biak nading nate, a biakna tau mai-ah nusia photin, pai-in na sanggampa tawh va kilem phot inla, tua khit ciangin hong paikikin Pasian biakna pia in.

[14] Note in midangte’ hong mawhna na maisak uhleh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note’ mawhna hong maisak ding hi. [15] Ahi zongin note in midangte’ hong mawhna na maisak kei uhleh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note’ mawhna hong maisak lo ding hi.

[25] Jesuh in amaute’ ngaihsutna thei ahih manin amaute kiangah, “Gam khat peuhpeuh, a gammite kiphelkhamin pawlkhat le pawlkhat kido le-uh tua gam a sia suak ding hi; khua khat ahi a, innkuan khat ahi zongin kiphelkhamin kido le-uh kip lo ding hi.

[15] “Na sanggamte uh na tung uhah hong khialh leh pai-in no tegel bek theihin a khialhna va gen un. Na thu uh a hong man’ leh na sanggampa uh a ngahkik na hi uh hi. [16] Ahi zongin na thu uh a hong mannop kei leh, Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Mi nih ahih kei leh mi thum’ theihna bek tawh mawhsakna khat peuhpeuh man pan hi,’ a cih mah bangin midang khat ahi a, nih ahi zongin tonpih un. [17] Amah in tua mite’ thu a mannop kei leh pawlpite tungah a thu ko un. Pawlpite’ thu nangawn a mannop kei leh Gentail mite le siahdongte bangin na ngaihsun un.
[4] Kote tungah a hong mawhte mawh maisakna ka neih bangun ko’ mawhna zong hong maisak in. Ze-etna lian hong thuaksak ke’n,’ ci-in na ngen ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[3] Note hoihtakin kingaihsun un. Na sanggampa uh no tungah hong khialh leh amah taii unla, a kisik leh a mawhna maisak un. [4] Nikhat sungin sagihvei ciang dong hong khialh hangin zong, a sagihvei mahin no kiangah hong pai-in, ‘Ka kisik hi,’ hong cih nakleh na maisak khin ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[35] Note khatlekhat ki-it le-uhcin keima nungzuite na hihna uh mi khempeuh in hong thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[18] Ahih theih laiteng mi khempeuh tawh na kilem nadingun hanciam un.
[19] Tua ahih ciangin mi tawh kilem theih nading le kha thu-ah khatlekhat thahatna i kipiak theih nading thute hanciam ciat ni.

[1] Note khatlekhat thu na kineih uh ciangin Pasian’ mi siangthote khensakzaw loin lawki thukhente’ mai na kitun ngam uh hi. [2] Pasian’ mite in leitung mite’ thu a khensakzaw ding ahihlam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Note pen leitung mite’ thu a khensak ding na hih uh ciangin tua bang thu neute khen thei lo lawmlawm na hi uh hiam? [3] Eite pen vantung mite’ thu nangawn a khensak ding ihih lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam? Tua ahih manin hih leitung a no’ thu neuneute leltak na khentheih zawk kan ding uh ahi hi. [4] Tua bang hinapi-in hih bang thu themthem hong pian ciangin pawlpi sungah bangmahin a kisim lo mite’ mai kitun ding na hi uh hiam? [5] Note a dingin zumhuai mahmah hi. Note khatlekhat na kithuneihnate uh a khenthei ding note lakah mipil khat beek om buang ding hi. [6] Tua hinapi, khatlekhat thu kineihin zum na kitun uh a, lawki thukhente na khensak tazen uh hi. [7] Note khatlekhat zum na kitut mahmah uh zong a gina het lo na hihna uh hong kilangsak hi. Bang hangin thuakzaw mai lo a, sum ngamzaw mai lo na hi uh hiam? [8] Note khatlekhat kisu-in, khatlekhat na kisut zawsop uh a, na sanggamte teekteek nangawn uh tawh thu na nei uh hi. [9] Migilote, Pasian’ Ukna sungah a lut hetloh nading thu na thei uh hi. Note kihaibawl kei un. Numei tawh a paktatte, milim biate, mi zi ahih kei leh mi pasal tawh a mawhte, pasal le pasal a khialte, [10] a gutate, a huaihamte, zukhamte, mi gensiate, ahih kei leh mi’ na a sutte khat beek, Pasian’ Ukna sungah lutthei het lo ding hi. [11] Note pawlkhat, tua bangin na gamta uh hi. Ahi zongin note pen i Topa Jesuh Khrih le i Pasian’ Kha Siangtho hangin mawhna panin a hong kisiangsak khinsa, Pasian’ tungah a kipiasa, Pasian tawh a kipawlsa mite na hi uh hi. [12] “Ka ut peuhpeuh ka hihtheih nading thu om hi,” a ci omkha ding hi. Ahi zongin na khempeuh hih ding kilawm lo hi. Kei zong ka ut khempeuh ka hih theih hangin tua bang gamtatna khat peuhpeuh’ sila ka suak nuam kei hi.

[4] Itna neite a lungduai-in migi hi. Itna neite in hazatna lungsim nei loin, zong kisathei lo hi. [5] Itna neite a kilawm loin gamta lo, heh pakpak lo, mite’ mawhna ciamteh lo hi. [6] Thuman lote-ah lungdam ngei lo uh a, thumante bekah lungdam uh hi. [7] Itna neite lungkia cih om ngei lo hi; a upna, a lametna, lungduai takin a ngaknate uh a mawkna cih om ngei lo hi.
[11] Naupang ka hih hun lai-in naupang mah bangin kampau-in, thu ngaihsunin, ka gamta hi. Ahi zongin tu-in khangham ka hih manin naupang vaite ka zang nawn kei hi.

[8] Amah na itkik ding uh ka hong thumna thu zong amah na theisak un. [9] Note in ze-etna bangzah ciang thuakzo-in, ka thugente na hong mangzo uh hiam cih ka theih nadingin tua lai a hong gelh ka hi hi.

[13] Note lakah na ka sepna hangin huhna bangmah kong nget loh cih simloh, pawlpi dangte sangin kong hamsiatsak zawkna bangmah om het lo hi. Tua bangin note kiang panin bangmah kong nget lohna hangin midang tawh hong kibangsak lo suak ka hih manin, tua khialhna hong maisak ta un.
[20] Sanggamte aw, na thu ngaihsutnate uhah naupang bang kei un. Gitlohna lamah naupang bang unla, ahi zongin thu ngaihsutna-ah a khangham hi ta un.
[26] Na heh uh ciangin, tua hehna hangin khialkha kei unla, a tawntungin heh paisuak kei un.

[31] Kimuhdahna, hehna, thangpaihna, kitotna, kikona, kilungsim neihna khempeuh beisak unla, [32] khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim nem tawh na kihozaw unla, Khrih’ hangin Pasian in note’ mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.

[13] Note lakah khatlekhat a kilungkim lo na om uh ciangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh kimaisakin na kihuh ciat un. Topa in note’ mawhna hong maisak bangin note zong khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ding uh hi.
[11] Tua ahih manin tu laitakin na omzia uh mah bangin khatlekhat kihanthawnin na kihuh ciat ta un.

[14] Mi khempeuh tawh na kilem theih nading uh hanciam un. Nuntak siangtho lo tawh kuamah in Topa mu zo lo ding ahih manin nuntak siangtho na nungta un. [15] Pasian’ hehpihna a ngahlah na hihkhak loh nadingun na kidawm un. Zungkha a nei singkung hong khangin mi tampi gimsakin a siatsak bangin mite a siasak na hihkhak loh nadingun na kidawm un.
[16] Tua ahih manin na ci uh a dam nadingin khatlekhat tungah na mawhna uh kipulakin thu na kingetsak ta un. Mihoihte’ thungetna in vang nei a, na lianpi semzo hi.

[5] Tua mah bangin no khangnozaw deuhte in zong a khanghamte’ thu na mang un. Lai Siangtho in, “Pasian in a kiphasak mite nial a, a kiniamkhiat mite a hehpih hi,” a cih mah bangin na vekpi-un kiniamkhiatna puan bangin silhin, khatlekhat na na kisepsak un.
[9] Ahi zongin Pasian kiangah i mawhnate va pulak lehang, amah citakin thuman ahih manin, i mawhnate hong maisakin i hoih lohnate khempeuh hong siangsak ding hi.

[1] Ka itte aw, note na khialhkhak loh nading uh ka deihna-in hih lai a hong gelh ka hi hi. Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh a khialh ciangin eite a dingin Pa Pasian kiangah a hong thumsak dingin a thuman Jesuh Khrih i nei hi. [2] Tua Jesuh hangin eite’ mawhna hong kimaisak a, eite a’ ding bek hi loin leitung mi khempeuh’ mawhna zong a mai nading ahi hi. [3] Eite in ama thupiaknate i zuih leh amah a thei taktak ihihna hong kilang hi.

[9] Mi khatpeuh in khuavak gamtatna ka gamta hi, ci napi-in a Khristian mipihte a muhdah leh khuamial gamtatna mah a gamta lai ahi hi. [10] A Khristian mipihte a it mite pen khuavak gamtatna a gamta hi a, tua bang mite a puktheih nading thu om lo hi. [11] Ahi zongin a Khristian mipihte a mudah mite pen khuamial sungah omin khuamial gamtatna a gamta uh hi a, tua khuamial in bangmah ngaihsunsak thei lo ahih manin a gamtat nading mel uh thei lo uh hi.

[7] Ka it lawmte aw, Pasian pen itna hong piankhiatna bulpi ahih manin eite khatlekhat ki-it ni. Itna a nei mi peuhmah, Pasian’ tate hi a, Pasian a thei uh hi. [8] Pasian pen ki-itna ahih manin itna a nei lo mite in Pasian thei lo uh hi.

[12] Lo le a sunga om khempeuh nuamin diang uh hen. Gamlak a sing om khempeuh in TOPA’ mai-ah lungdamin la sa hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah hong pai ta hi. Leitung mite’ thu a khen dingin hong pai ta hi. Amah in thumanna tawh leitung ukin mite’ thu ahi bangin khen ding hi. [13] Lo le a sunga om khempeuh nuamin diang uh hen. Gamlak a sing om khempeuh in TOPA’ mai-ah lungdamin la sa hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah hong pai ta hi. Leitung mite’ thu a khen dingin hong pai ta hi. Amah in thumanna tawh leitung ukin mite’ thu ahi bangin khen ding hi.

[9] Tua ni ciangin, “En un, amah pen eima Pasian ahi hi. Eite a hong hon dingin amah i ngak hi. Amah pen eima TOPA ahi hi. Amah i ngak hi. Amah in eite hong honkhia ahih manin lungdamin kipak ni,” kici ding hi.

[13] Zan ka maangmuh hun sungin ka khuadak leh mihing tawh a kibang mi khat meii tungah a hong pai ka mu hi. A nungta tawntung mipa kiangah pai-in, ama kiangah a kipia hi. [14] Amah in vangliatna, minthanna, le kumpi za ngah ahih manin minam kimte, minam tuamtuamte, paunam tuamtuamte khempeuh in ama na a sem ding uh ahi hi. Amah in a tawntungin uk ding a, a kumpi gam a bei ngei kei ding hi.

[1] Tua ciangin saihadial puan a silh vantungmi in, “Na mite a cing, a lian vantungmi Mikhael hong kilang ding hi. Tua ciangin leitungah mihing a pianzawh a kipan a nasia penpen gimna hun hong tung ding hi. Tua hun a hong tun ciangin Pasian’ laibu sungah a min a kigelh na mite khempeuh kihonkhia ding hi. [2] A sisa mi tampite in nuntakna a ngahkik ding uh hi. Pawlkhatte nungta tawntung ding uh a, pawlkhatte in a tawntung zumna le minsiatna a ngah ding uh hi.

[7] Puanpak silhpa in a khut tegel vantung lamah laamto-in, Tawntung Pasian’ min tawh thuciamna a bawl hi. Amah in, “Kum thum le alang hi ding hi. Pasian’ mite a kibawlsiatna a bei ciangin hih thute khempeuh hong piang ding hi,” ci-in a gen ka za hi.
[6] Tua ni hong tun ciangin khuadam, vukkiat cihte om nawn lo ding a,

[27] A Pa’ minthanna vang le a vantung mite tawh Mihing Tapa hong paikik ding a, mi khempeuh amau’ gamtatna ciat tawh a kizui-in a thuk ding hi. [28] Hih lai-a a om mi pawlkhatte a sih ma-in Mihing Tapa, Kumpi-in hong pai ding ahih lamtak phawkkhial kei un,” a ci hi.

[21] Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung piancil a kipan tuhun dong, cikmahin tua bang haksatna a om ngei lo, nidang ciangin zong a om ngei nawn lo ding, tua hun laitakin hong tung ding hi. [22] Pasian in tua gimna hun a ni khiam lo hileh a suaktazo kuamah om lo ding hi. Ahi zongin ama teel mite a khualna-in a ni a khiam ding hi. [23] “Tua laitakin mi khatpeuh in, ‘Hih lai-ah Khrih om hi, hua lai-ah Khrih om hi,’ ci-in hong gen leh, um kei un. [24] Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih a kineihkhemte le kamsang a kineihkhemte hong piang ding a, ahih zawh leh a teelsa mite nangawn a khem nadingun lim le nalamdang lianpipi hong bawl ding uh hi. [25] A hun ma-in hong genkholkhin ka hih manin limtakin kidawm un. [26] “Tua ahih kei leh zong mite in, ‘Gamlakah Khrih om hi,’ hong cih leh zong va paikha kei un. ‘Innsungah Khrih bu hi,’ hong cih leh zong umkha kei un. [27] Bang hang hiam cih leh Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin khuaphialep in van mong khat panin mong khat dong a taanzaihsak mah bangin kitheikim ding hi. [28] “Sapul omna peuhah musane kikaikhawm ding hi.” [29] “Tua gimna hun a tunkhit phetin ni hong mialin kha hong taang nawn lo ding a, vantung panin aksite hong kia ding a, vantung a om nate a pai ngei-in pai thei loin lampialgawp ding hi. [30] Tua ciangin Mihing Tapa’ lim vantungah hong kilang ding hi. Tua ciangin leitung minam khempeuh dahin kap ding uh a, vangliatna le minthanna tawh meii lakah Mihing Tapa a hong pai a mu ding uh hi. [31] Nakpi takin peengkul hong ging ding a, leitung mun khempeuhah a vantung mite hong paisakin, leimong khat pan mong khat dongin, a teelsa mite a kaikhawmsak ding hi.

[31] “Mihing Tapa a vantung mite tawh Kumpi-in hong paikhawm uh ciangin a kumpi tokhom tungah hong tu ding hi. [32] Ama mai-ah leitung minam khempeuh hong kikhawm ding hi. Gancing pa in tuu le keelte a khen mah bangin mi khempeuh khen nihin hong koih ding hi.
[46] Tua ahih ciangin tawntung gimthuakna sungah amaute pai ding uh a, mihoihte ahihleh nuntak tawntungna sungah lut ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[64] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Nangmah in tua mah na ci khin hi. Ahi zongin note khempeuh kiangah ka hong genin-ah: Vanglianpa’ taklamah Mihing Tapa omin meii tungah a hong pai na mu ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[24] “Tua haksatna hun khit ciangin ni hong mial ding a, kha hong taang nawn lo ding hi. [25] Van panin aksite hong kia ding a, vantung a om nate a omngei bangin omthei nawn lo ding hi. [26] Tua ciangin Mihing Tapa, vangliatna le minthanna tawh meii lakah a hong paisuk kimu ding hi. [27] Tua ciangin leitung mun khempeuhah vantung mite sawl ding a, leimong khat pan mong khat kikalah a om a teel mite khempeuh a kaikhawmsak ding hi.
[62] Jesuh in, “Ka hi hi; Vanglian Pasian’ taklamah Mihing Tapa omin meii lakah a hong pai na mu ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[27] Tua ciangin Mihing Tapa hong kilang ding a, minthanna le vangliatna tawh meii lakah hong pai ding hi. [28] Hih thute a pian ding hong kipat ciangin, note hong kihotkhiat ding hun hong naita ahih manin, dingin nuamna lungsim tawh khuadak un,” a ci hi. [29] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah thugentehna khat gen a, “Thei kung a kipan singkung khempeuh en dih un. [30] A teh hong no na muh uh ciangin khuakhal hong naita hi, ci-in na thei uh hi. [31] Tua mah bangin hih thute hong piang na muh uh ciangin Pasian’ Ukna hun hong tungta ding hi, ci-in na thei ding uh hi.
[7] i Topa Jesuh Khrih hong kilatkik ding ngakin na om hun sungun thupha na ngah loh uh khat beek om lo hi.

[5] Tua ahih manin a hun a tunma-in kuamah mawhsakin thu khen kei un. Topa hong pai ciangin a tawpna thukhenna hong om ding a, amah in thusimte hong pholakin, mihingte in a lungsim sung uhah a ipcip uh thute hong telkheh ding hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in amau’ ngah dingin a kilawm phatna, Pasian’ kiang panin a ngah ciat ding uh hi.
[23] Ahi zongin tua hinkikna pen ama hun tawh kizui-in a banbanin hi ding hi. A masa penin Khrih hi a, Khrih hong paikik ciangin ama pawlte khempeuh hingkik ding hi.

[51] Kuamah kim in a theih loh thusim khat na ngai un. Eite khempeuh a si khin ding ihi kei a, thakhatthu-in a kikhelvat ding ihi hi. [52] Peengkul nunung hong gin’ ciangin mitphiat kikal sungin i kikhelpak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh peengkul hong gin’ ciangin misite a sithei nawn lo dingin hong tho ding a, i vekpi-in i kikheel ding hi. [53] A muatthei pumpi pen a muat thei lo pumpi-in hong kikheel ding a, a sithei pumpi pen a sithei lo pumpi-in hong kikheel ding hi. [54] A muatthei pen a muat thei lo hong suakin, a sithei pen a sithei lo hong suah ciangin Lai Siangtho thu hong tung taktak ding hi. Lai Siangtho in, “Sihna maimangin gualzawhna in khuplet hi.
[22] Topa a it lo mi peuhmah in samsiatna ngah tahen. I Topa hong pai tahen.
[14] Topa Jesuh hong paikik Ni ciangin a cingtakin thei ding na hih manun note hangin ka kisialh uh mah bangin note zong kote hangin na kisial ding uh hi.
[6] Note sungah hih nasep hoih a hong pankhia Pasian in Jesuh Khrih hong paikik hun ciang dong, mi cingtaak na hih nadingun hong huh ding hi, ci-in teltakin ka thei hi.
[4] Note’ nuntakna taktak Khrih ahih manin amah hong kilat ciangin note zong amah tawh hong kilang khawmin amah tawh na minthang khawm ding uh hi.

[13] Sanggamte aw, lametna a nei lo mite bangin na dahluat loh nadingun a sisa mite’ omzia ding thu na theih ding uh ka deih hi. [14] Jesuh si-in thokik hi, ci-in i up mah bangin Pasian in Jesuh hong paipih kik ciangin amah umin a si mite zong hong tonpih ding hi, ci-in i um hi. [15] Topa’ thugen note kiangah ka hong gen uh thu in: Topa hong paikik ni ciangin a nungta lai eite pen a sisa mite tawh i kimuh ma-in Topa tawh i kimu kei ding hi. [16] Pasian’ thupiakna awging lianpi, vantungmi mangpa’ thugenna, le Pasian’ peengkul hong ging ding a, vantung panin Topa mahmah hong paisuk ding hi. [17] Tua ciangin tua hun laitakin a nungta lai eite pen vankim lai-ah Topa a dawn dingin amah a um a sisa mite tawh hong kilakhawm ding a, Topa tawh i omkhawm tawntung ding hi, cihna ahi hi.
[10] Amah a hong paikik ciangin a hing ihi a, a si ihi zongin amah tawh i omkhawm theih nadingin eite a dingin amah a hong si ahi hi.
[8] A khamcip pa a kilakkhiat khit ciangin A Gilopa hong kilang ding a, Topa Jesuh hong pai ciangin tua A Gilopa mutlum ding a, vanglian minthangin hong kilatna tawh a maimangsak ding hi.

[1] Pasian’ mai, le a hingte hitaleh a site hitaleh mi khempeuh’ thu a khen ding Khrih Jesuh’ mai-ah nakpitakin ka hong hanthawn hi. Amah Kumpi-in hong paikikin ukna hong kipan ding ahih manin, [2] hunhoih hunsia cih khen tuan loin Pasian’ thu hilh ding na kin ngaihsut nading, lungduaina tawh mite’ lungsim zo-in, mite taii-in, hanthawnin na hilh nadingin thu a hong pia ka hi hi.

[27] Mi khempeuh khatvei si-in, tua khit ciangin Pasian’ thukhenna a thuak ding ahih mah bangin, [28] mi tampite’ mawhna a thuak dingin Khrih zong khatvei bek a kipia hi. A nihveina hong kilatkik ciangin mawhna thu tawh kisai nasem ding hi nawn loin, lawptakin amah a ngak mite a honkhia ding ahi hi.
[14] Tanglai pekin Adam pan khang sagihna Enok in zong hih thu mah na genkhol a, a genna-ah, “En un, Topa, a mi siangtho honpite tawh hong pai ding a,

[7] En un, amah hong paita ding a, meiipi tawh hong tonkhawm ding hi. Teipi tawh amah a sunte a kipan mi khempeuh in a mu ding uh hi. Amah a hong pai ciangin leitung mi khempeuh lau-in a kap ding uh hi. Hih ka gen bangin hong piang takpi ding hi. Amen.

[1] Hih thuteng khit ciangin ka khuadak leh vantungah kong a kihongsa-in a om ka mu hi. Peengkul awging tawh a kibang, kei kiangah thu a hong gensa awging mah in, “Hih lai-ah hong paito in. Tunung ciangin thupiang dingte ka hong lak ding hi,” hong ci hi. [2] Thakhat thu-in Kha Siangtho tawh ka kidim a, tua vantung a tokhom tungah mi khat a tu ka mu hi.

[14] Laidal a kizial bangin vanpi kizialin maimang a, mual le tuikulhte khempeuh a omna uh panin maimangta hi. [15] Tua ciangin leitung kumpite le miliante, galkapmangte, mihaute le mi vangliante, silate le sila ahi lote a kipanin a kuamah peuh, mualtung a leihawmte sungah bu uh a, [16] mualte le suangtum lianpite kiangah, “Kote tungah hong kiasuk unla, tokhom tungah a tupa’ maitang le Tuuno’ hehna panin kote hong liah un. [17] Amaute’ hehna hangin gimna hun hong tungta ahih manin kua in thuakzo ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

[1] Tua ciangin a thahat vantungmi khat, meiipi in tuamin, a lu tungah sakhituihup khimin, a maitang nitaang tawh kibangin, a khete meikuang khuampi tawh a kibang khat, vantung panin a hong kumsuk ka mu hi.

[15] Tua ciangin a sagihna vantungmi in a peengkul hong tum a, vantungah nakpitakin aw hong ging a, “Leitung uk nading aana neihna pen i Topa Khrih a’ hong suakkhin a, amah in a tawntungin uk paisuak ding hi,” hong ci hi. [16] Pasian mai-a a tokhom ciat uhah a tu upa sawmnih le lite zong mai pukin Pasian bia uh a, [17] “A beisa hun le tu hunah a om tawntung a Vanglian Topa Pasian aw, tu-in na vangliatna zangin uk ding hong kipan khin na hih manin nangma tungah ka nuamna uh ka hong ko uh hi. [18] Na hehna hong kilat hun hong tungta a, misite thukhen nading hun hong tungta ahih manin minam dangte heh mahmah uh hi. Nangma nasem kamsangte, a lian a neu, nang hong kihta mi khempeuhte thaman na piak ding hun hi ta a, leitung a susia mite na suksiat ding hun hi ta hi,” a ci uh hi. [19] Tua ciangin vantungah a om Pasian biakna innpi kihong a, a Thuciamna Singkuang zong biakinn sungah a om a kimu hi. Tua ciangin nakpitakin khua phia-in a ging lianpi om a, van gingin zin ling a, gialpi a kia hi.

[14] Tua ciangin ka khuadak leh meiipi a bang a kang biakbuak om a, tua meiipi tungah mihing tawh a kibang khat tu-in, kham lukhu khu-in, a khutah phiaukawi hiam khat a tawi ka mu hi. [15] Biakinn sung panin vantungmi khat hong paikhia a, meiipi tungah a tu mipa nakpitakin samin, “Leitung mite lak dingin min mahmah a, a lak hun hong tungta ahih manin na phiaukawi tawh at in,” a ci hi. [16] Tua ahih manin meii tungah a tupa in leitungah a phiaukawi hong van a, leitung mite a at hi.
[11] Tua ciangin vantung a kihong ka mu a, sakol kang khat a om hi. A tungah a tuang pa pen a Citak a Thuman pa kici hi. Amah in thumanin thu khenin gal a do hi.

[11] Tua ciangin tokhom kang a lian khat le a tungah a tupa ka mu hi. Ama omna panin lei le van lengkhiamang a, a tunna mel uh kithei lo hi. [12] A lian a neu misite tua tokhom mai-ah dingin laibute a kilem ka mu hi. Tua ciangin a nungta mite a kigelhna laibu a dang khat zong a kilem ka mu hi. Amaute’ gamtatna tua laibute sungah a kigelhna tawh kizui-in misite tungah thu a kikhen hi. [13] Tuipi sungah a om misite, tuipi in hong pusuah a, Sihna le Misite’ Gam in zong amau sungah a om misite hong pusuah uh hi. Tua ciangin a vekpi-in amaute’ gamtatnasa tawh kizui-in thu a kikhen hi.

[1] Tua ciangin van thak khat le lei thak khat ka mu hi. Van masa le lei masa maimang khin a, tuipi zong om nawn lo hi. [2] Mothak khat a pasal tawh a kituah dingin a kizem bangin vantung Pasian kiang panin Khuapi Siangtho ahi Jerusalem khua thak a hong paisuk ka mu hi. [3] Tokhom panin nakpitakin awging khat ka za a, “Tu-in Pasian omna inn pen mite tawh omkhawm ta hi. Pasian in amaute ompih ding a, amaute pen ama mite hi ding uh hi. Pasian mahmah amaute tawh omkhawm ding a, amah pen amaute’ Pasian hi ding hi. [4] Amaute’ mit panin khitui khempeuh nulsak ding hi. Thu luisate maimang khinta ahih manin sihna, dahna, le na sa-a kahna cihte om nawn lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
[15] Nang le numei kikal na suanlekhakte le ama suanlekhakte kikalah kilangneihna ka omsak ding hi. Amah in na lutang hong sunim ding a, nang in ama khetul na sunim ding hi,” a ci hi.
[21] TOPA Pasian in mipa le a zi a dingin savun puan bawl a, amaute silhsak hi.
[1] Ka Pasian, ka Pasian aw, bang hangin kei hong nusia na hi hiam? Nong huhna ding ka hong thumna panin bang hangin gamla om na hi hiam?

[6] Ahih hangin kei pen lungno khat bang lel ka hi a, mi ka bang kei hi. Mite’ ko gawpgawp, mite’ simmawh ka hi hi. [7] Hong mu mi khempeuh in kei hong zahko-in, hong mukpiksan uh a, a lu uh hong peisan hi.
[16] Ka kiimah uite om a, siatna bawl mi honkhat in kei hong umcih uh hi. Ka khut ka khete hong sunletzo uh hi.
[18] Amaute in ka puante hawm uh a, ka puan a hawm nadingun lai ai a san uh hi.
[20] Amah in thuman mipa kem a, a guh khat zong kitan lo hi.

[3] Amah pen mite in simmawhin nusia a, gimna le natna a thuak ahi hi. Mite in en nuam loin a mai uh a humsan uh mipa bangin amah kisimmawh a, eite in amah i thusim kei hi. [4] “Amah in eite’ natna teng thuakin, eite’ gimna teng pua khin taktak hi. Ahi zongin eite in amah pen ama mawhna hangin Pasian in a gimsak, gimna a thuak bangin i ngaihsun hi. [5] Ahih hangin eite’ khialhna hangin amah kiliamsak a, eite’ mawhna hangin amah kisatnim hi. Ama gim thuakna hangin nopna i ngah a, ama liamna hangin damna i ngah hi. [6] Eite khempeuh in tuu bangin lam i khial khin a, eite khempeuh eimau san ciatah i pai khin hi. TOPA in eite khempeuh’ mawhnate ama tungah a suan hi. [7] “Amah kinengniamin gimna a kithuaksak hangin amah kam khat beek pau lo hi. Sa gote kiangah a kipaipih tuuno le a mulmette mai-ah a kipaipih tuu a ham loh mah bangin amah kam khat beek pau lo hi. [8] Nenniamna le thukhenna tawh amah kipaikhiatpih hi. A hingte’ gam panin amah kikhenkhia-in, ama mite’ khialhna hangin amah in gimna thuak hi, ci-in ama khang mite kua in thei ahi hiam? [9] Amah in mawhna bawl lo, zuau gen ngei lo napi-in, amaute in migilote tawh sihna a kibang, mihaute tawh hankhuk a kibang a bawlsak uh hi,” a ci uh hi. [10] Ahih hangin amah a kisatnim ding pen TOPA’ deihna ahi hi. Amah in natna thuaksak hi. Mawhna hangin ama pumpi a kipiak ciangin amah in a suanlekhakte mu ding a, ama khan a sau ding hi. TOPA’ deihna ama khut sungah pung ding hi. [11] Amah in a gimna thaman mu-in a lungdam ding hi. A mawk thuak ahihlohna thei-in a thuman ka nasempa in mi tampi tak a dik suaksak ding a, amah in amaute’ mawhnate pua ding hi. [12] Tua ahih ciangin amah pen miliante tawh nate ka hawmsak ding a, amah in mihatte tawh nate a hawm ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in sihna dongin a nuntakna piakhia a, khialhna a nei mite tawh a kisim khawm hi. Ahih hangin amah in mi tampi’ mawhna pua a, khialhna a neite a dingin a thumsak hi.
[9] Tua ni ciangin sunkim laipi mahin ni ka tumsak ding a, sunkim laipi mahin leitung khempeuhah khua ka mialsak ding hi. Topa PASIAN ahi keimah in hih thu kong gen khin hi.

[10] “David’ suanlekhakte le Jerusalem khuamite’ tungah hehpihna lungsim le thungetna lungsim ka guan ding hi. Amaute in a sutlup uh mipa enin, ta khat neihsun a sihsuah mite bangin kap ding uh a, tacil a khuaisuahte bangin nakpitakin kapin thum ding uh hi.
[1] “Tua ni hong tun ciangin David’ suanlekhakte le Jerusalem khuamite’ mawhna le nitnateng khempeuh a silsiang dingin tuinak khat hong phul ding hi.
[2] “Na theihsa uh mah bangin tuzawh ni nih khit ciangin Paisan Pawi hun hong tungta ding hi. Tua ciangin singlamteh tungah thah dingin Mihing Tapa kipia ding hi,” a ci hi.

[20] A nitak ciangin Jesuh le sawm le nihte an ne dingin a tukhawm uh hi. [21] Amaute an ne-in a om laitakun Jesuh in, “Note khat in kei na hong lehhek ding uh hi,” a cih ciangin [22] amaute dah mahmah uh a, amaute in a banbanin, “Topa aw, kei ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. [23] Jesuh in, “Ankuang ka sawk khawmpih pa in kei hong lehhek ding hi. [24] Mihing Tapa ahihleh Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelhsa mah bangin a si ding ahi hi; ahi zongin Mihing Tapa a lehhek pa in gimna thuak ding hi. Tua mipa pen a piang vet lo hileh ama a dingin hoihzaw ding hi,” a ci hi.

[3] A lehhek pa Judas in Jesuh a si dingin thu a kikhenna a muh ciangin kisikkik ahih manin siampi liante le upate kiangah a ngun peek sawmthumte va paipih kik a, [4] “Mawhna a nei lo mipa a si dingin lehhek kha ka hih manin ka mawh hi,” a va ci hi. Ahi zongin amaute in, “Kote tawh bang kisai nawn ding ahi hiam? Nangma tavuan ahi hi,” a na cihsan uh hi. [5] Tua ciangin amah in biakinn sungah a ngun peekte lawnin paikhia a, amahmah a gui-awk hi.

[45] Sun nai sawm le nih hun a kipanin nitak nai thum dong, nai thum sung, tua gam sung khempeuhah khim a zing hi. [46] Nitak nai thum hun pawl laitakin Jesuh nakpitakin kiko a, “Ka Pasian, ka Pasian, bang hangin kei hong nusia na hi hiam?” a cihna ahi,“Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakthani,” a ci hi. [47] A gei-ah a om a pauna a za mite pawlkhat in, “Hih mipa in Elijah a sam ahi hi,” a ci uh hi. [48] Tua ciangin amaute khat va tai-in tuihupna la-in leenggahzu-hau sungah a diahkhit ciangin pumpeeng dawnah henin Jesuh’ hup dingin a tahto hi. [49] Ahi zongin adangte in, “Khawl dih un; amah a honkhia dingin Elijah hong pai hiam ngak dih ni,” a ci uh hi. [50] Tua ciangin Jesuh nakpitakin kiko kikin a si ta hi. [51] Tua laitakin biakinn sung deina puan, a lu panin a taw dongin kikekin phelnih a suak hi. Zin zong lingin suangtumpite kitam hi. [52] Hankhukte zong kihong a, Pasian’ mi a sisa tampite zong kithokiksak hi. [53] Hankhuk panin amaute paikhia uh a, sihna panin Jesuh a thawhkik khit ciangin, amaute zong khuapi siangtho sungah hong lut uh a, mi tampi in a mu uh hi. [54] Jesuh enin a om galkap bupa le galkapte in zinlinna le a thupiangte a muh uh ciangin lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Hih pa, Pasian’ Tapa taktak mah ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.

[65] Pilat in amaute kiangah, “Galkapte cingsak unla, a muanhuai theithei dingin na siam bangun hih un,” a ci hi. [66] Tua ahih ciangin amaute pai uh a, a han hukna suang limtakin a ciamteh khit uh ciangin galkapte a cingsak uh hi.

[31] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Mihing Tapa in tampi tak thuak ding hi; upate, siampi liante, le Thukham hilh siate in amah nial ding uh hi. Amah kithat ding a, ni thum khit ciangin hingkik ding hi,” ci-in a nungzuite hilh ding a kipan hi.
[31] Bang hang hiam cih leh a nungzuite kiangah thu hilh a, “Mihing Tapa, mihingte’ khut sungah kipia-in amaute in that ding uh a, ahi zongin ni thum khit ciangin hingkik ding hi,” a ci hi.
[34] Tua mite in amah simmawh bawlin, cilphihin, satin a that ding uh hi. Ni thum khit ciangin amah thokik ding hi,” a ci hi.
[1] Paisan Pawi le Silngo Sawh loh Anlum Pawi a tun ma ni nih ni-in siampi liante le Thukham hilh siate in Jesuh simmatin a thahtheih nading uh lampi a zong uh hi.

[12] Paisan Pawi an dingin tuuno a kigawh ni, Silngo Sawh loh Anlum Pawi ni masa ni-in a nungzuite in Jesuh kiangah, “Koi lai-ah pai-in Paisan Pawi an ding hong bawlsak ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.

[63] Tua ciangin siampi lianpen pa in a puan balkek a, “Thudang kisam nawn lo hi. [64] Pasian’ tungah a paukhialhna na zazo uh hi. Bangci ngaihsut na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Hih mipa thah dingin kilawm hi, ci-in amaute khempeuh in thu a khen uh hi. [65] Tua ciangin mi pawlkhat in cilphih uh a, a mai tunsakin beeng uh a, “Kua in hong beng ahi hiam, gen in,” a ci uh hi. Palikte in zong amah paipihin a beeng uh hi.

[7] Tua ciangin Silngo Sawh loh Anlum Pawi hun sungin Paisan Pawi an-a nek ding tuuno gawh ni hun hong tung hi. [8] Jesuh in Peter le Johan kiangah, “Va pai unla, eite’ Paisan Pawi annek ding va vaihawm un,” ci-in a sawl hi.

[27] Jesuh’ nung zui-in mi tampi tak pai uh a, tuate lakah Jesuh kahin a tamlawh numei pawlkhat zong a kihel hi. [28] Jesuh zong amaute lamah kihei a, “Jerusalem khua numeite aw, kei hong kah kei unla, note le na tate uh a dingin kap un. [29] Bang hang hiam cih leh mite in, ‘Ta a nei ngei lo, naungek nawi a teepsak ngei lo numei ciingte mi hampha mahmah ahi hi,’ a cih hun hong tung ding hi. [30] Tua hun hong tun ciangin mite in, ‘Mual lian mual neute in hong cipnelhin a si khin hi lehang utzaw hang,’ ci ding uh hi. [31] Singkung hing bang ahi kei tungah hih bangin hong bawl uh ahihleh singkung keu bang ahi note tungah hong nak hihzaw kan ding uh hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

[34] Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Pa aw, amaute in bang hih ihi hiam cih thei lo uh ahih manin a mawhna uh na maisak in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amau’ ngah ding ciat a theih nadingun ai sanin a puante a hawm uh hi.

[43] Jesuh in ama kiangah, “A mantakin ke’n kong cihin-ah: Tuni-in Paradais-ah kei tawh na omkhawm ding hi,” a ci hi. [44] Tua hun laitak pen sunkim nai sawm le nih pawl hi a, ni mial ahih manin nitak lam nai thum ciang dong leitung khempeuhah khua mial a, [45] tua hun sungin biakinn sung dalna puan kikekin phelnih a suak hi. [46] Tua ciangin nakpitakin Jesuh kiko a, “Pa aw, nangma khut sungah keimah kong ki-ap hi,” a cih khit ciangin a si ta hi. [47] Galkap mangpa in hih thupiang a muh ciangin Pasian phat a, “Hih pa, mihoih taktak khat ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[14] Moses in gamlak khuam tungah sumngo gul a khai mah bangin Mihing Tapa zong hong kikhai ding a, [15] amah a um mi khempeuh nungta tawntung ding hi. [16] Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawn loin a hin tawntung theih nadingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi. [17] Pasian in leitungah a Tapa hong sawlna pen mawhsakna thukhen dingin a hong paisak hi loin, leitung mite a honkhia dingin a hong paisak hizaw hi.

[23] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Mihing Tapa in Pasian’ pianzia a ngah ding hun hong tungta hi. [24] A mantakin ci lehang, mangbuhhum tang khat leilakah kituhin si masa kei leh tang khat bek mah hi ngitnget hi; ahi zongin si masa leh tang tampi tak hong nei thei hi.
[12] Tua ahih manin galkapte le a bute le Jew mi palikte in Jesuh manin hen uh a, [13] tua kumin siampi lianpen a sem Kaiafas’ sungpa Annas kiangah a paipih masa uh hi.

[38] Pilat in, “Thuman na cih bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Tua ciangin Jew mihonte kiangah Pilat va paikhia kikin amaute kiangah, “Ama khialhna bangmah ka mu kei hi. [39] Tua ahih manin na Paisan Pawi hun uh ciangin note a dingin mi khat ka khahkhiat a ngeina ahih manin note a dingin hih Jew kumpipa hong khahkhia leng na ut uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin,

[1] Tua ciangin Pilat in ama kiangah Jesuh paipih sakin a satsak hi. [2] Galkapte in a kumpi lukhu dingin ling vialin Jesuh khusak uh a, a kumpi puan dingin puansan a silhsak khit uh ciangin [3] ama kiangah nehin, “Jew mite Kumpipa, na khansau ta hen!” ci-in hopihin a khut uh tawh a beeng uh hi. [4] Pilat zong khatvei hong pusuak kikin mihonte kiangah, “Ama khialhna bangmah a mu lo ka hihna thu na theih nadingun note kiangah Jesuh ka hong paikhia sak hi,” a ci hi. [5] Tua ahih manin Jesuh zong ling lukhu khukawm leh puansan silhkawmin hong pusuak a, Pilat in mihonte kiangah, “En un, hih lai-ah na mipa uh om hi,” a ci hi. [6] Siampi liante le biakinncing palikte in a muh uh ciangin “Singlamteh tungah that in, singlamteh tungah that in!” ci-in a kiko uh hi. Pilat in amaute kiangah, “Na ut uhleh paipih unla, singlamteh tungah that un! Ke’n ama khialhna ka mu kei hi,” a cih ciangin [7] Jew mihonte in, “Amah Pasian’ Tapa-in kigen ahih manin a kithah theih nading Thukham ka nei uh hi,” ci-in a genna uh [8] Pilat in a zak ciangin a lunghimawh semsem hi.

[19] Pilat in lai khat gelhsakin, “Jew mite’ Kumpipa, Nazareth khuami Jesuh,” cisak a, singlamteh tungah a suangsak hi. [20] Jesuh a kikhaina mun pen Jerusalem khuapi tawh kinai ahih manin Judea gammi tampi in hih lai kigelh a sim uh hi. Tua lai pen Hebru lai, Latin lai, le Grik lai-in a kigelh hi. [21] Tua ciangin Jew siampi liante in Pilat kiangah, “‘Jew mite’ Kumpipa,’ ci-in gelh kei inla, ‘Hih mipa in Jew mite’ kumpi ka hi hi, ci hi,’ ci-in gelh in,” a cih uhleh [22] Pilat in, “Ka gelhsa pen ka gelhsa bangbangin kip hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. [23] Galkapte in singlamteh tungah Jesuh a khai khit uh ciangin a puante la uh a, khenkhat ciatin a ngah dingun khen li a suah uh hi. Mong a nei lo, a kiphan a puantualpi zong a la uh hi. [24] Ahi zongin amaute in, “Hih puan balkek kei ni. A ngah ding i theih nadingin ai san ni,” a kici uh hi. Lai Siangtho sungah, “Amaute in ka puante hawm uh a, ka puantualpi ngah nadingin ai a san uh hi,” ci-in a kigelhna a tun nadingin hih bangin galkapte a gamta ahi uh hi. [25] Jesuh’ singlamteh gei-ah ama nu; ama nuno ahi, Klopas’ zi Mary; le Magdala khuami Mary a ding uh hi. [26] Jesuh in ama nu le a it a nungzui pa a dingkhawm a muh ciangin a nu kiangah, “Nu aw, tua lai-ah na tapa om hi,” a ci hi. [27] Tua ciangin a nungzui pa kiangah, “Na nu tua lai-ah om hi,” a ci leuleu hi. Tua ahih manin tua hun a kipanin nungzui pa in ama inn-ah Jesuh’ nu Mary a kem hi. [28] Tua hun ciangin Jesuh in na khempeuh kicingta hi, ci-in thei ahih manin Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh thu a tuntheih nadingin, “Ka dangtak hi,” a ci hi. [29] Tua lai-ah beel khat dimin leenggahzu-hau om ahih manin amaute in tua sungah tuihupna diahin puknah hiang dawnah a koih khit uh ciangin Jesuh’ kamah a va tahto uh hi. [30] Jesuh in tua leenggahzu-hau ciamin, “Man khinta hi,” a cih khit ciangin a lu puksukin a si ta hi.

[32] Tua ahih manin galkapte hong pai uh a, a tuah masak pa uh a khe a kuaihtansak khit uh ciangin a langkhat a om pa a’ zong a kuaihtansak uh hi. [33] Ahi zongin Jesuh’ khe kuaitan dingin a kithawi uh ciangin amah a na sihkhitna thei uh ahih manin a khe a kuaihtansak nawn kei uh hi. [34] Ahi zongin galkapte khat in a teipi tawh Jesuh’ pangpi a sut leh sisan le tui hong leengkhia hi. [35] (Note in na uptheih nadingun hih thupiang a mu pa in ama muhna bang a hong gen ahi hi. Ama thugente a man thu hi a, a gen pa in a mantaktak a gen ahihna thu zong a thei hi.) [36] Lai Siangtho sungah, “Ama guhte khat zong kitan lo ding hi,” ci-in a genna thu a tuntheih nadingin hih bangin a piang ahi hi. [37] Tua banah Lai Siangtho mun dang khatah, “Teipi tawh a sut pa uh a en ding uh hi,” na kici lai hi. [38] Tua ciangin Arimathea khuami Josef in Jesuh’ luang a lakkhiat theih nadingin Pilat kiangah va pai-in a ngen hi. (Josef i cih pen Jesuh’ nung a zui khat hi a, ahi zongin Jerusalem khua-a Jew uliante a kihtakna hangin a simzuih khat ahi hi.) Josef in Jesuh’ luang a lakkhiat theih nadingin thu ngah ahih manin va pai-in Jesuh’ luang a lakhia hi. [39] Jesuh kiangah a zan hawh ngei Nikodemas zong hong pai a, Jesuh’ luang a siatloh nadingin a bawl nading myrrh le aloes paknamtui kigawm tawi sawmnih bang a gik a hong pua hi. [40] Tua mi nihte in si a vui uh ciangin a bawl ngeina bangun a paknamtuite nuhin puan tawh a tun uh hi. [41] Jesuh, singlamteh tungah a kithahna mun tawh kinai-ah huan khat om a, tua huan sungah kuamah a kivui ngei nai lohna hankhuk thak khat a om hi. [42] Tua ni pen Kigin’ ni hi a, Jew mite’ Sabbath ni hong naita ahih manin, tua hankhuk a nai ahihna hangin nawhsa thu-in tua lai munah Jesuh a vui uh hi.

[23] Pasian in thu a ma theihkholhna le ama geelna tawh kizui-in note’ khut sungah tua Jesuh a hong piak ding a ngaihsutsa hi a, note in singlamteh tungah khai-in migilote’ khut tawh amah na that uh hi.

[27] A cih mah bangin Herod le Pontias Pilat in hih khuapi sung teek mahah Gentail mite le Israel mite tawh kikupna nei uh a, nangmah in Khrih dingin na bawl, a siangtho na Nasempa Jesuh thah dingin a vaihawm uh hi.

[6] Eite cimawhin i om laitakin Pasian’ hoihsak hunin ei mi gilote a dingin Khrih hong si hi. [7] Mihoih khat a dingin a si ngam a omkha ahi zongin thukham zuizo mipa a dingin sih ngam nading a thu haksa mahmah khat ahi hi. [8] Ahi zongin eite mawhna nei ihih laitakin eite a dingin Khrih hong si ahih manin Pasian in eite hong it mahmahna thu hong lak khin hi. [9] Ama sihna hangin tu-in Pasian tawh kipawlthei ihih manin Pasian’ hehna hangin gimna panin zong hong suaktasak zaw kan lai ding hi. [10] Pasian tawh eite i kilangneih laitakin ama Tapa’ sihna hangin amah tawh hong kilemsak ahihleh tu-in Pasian tawh kipawl khinta ihih manin Khrih nuntakna in eite hong honkhiazo zaw kan ding hi lo ahi hiam?
[18] Bang hang hiam cih leh sihna a thuak mite a dingin singlamteh tungah Khrih sihna thu pen a haihuai thu ahi hi. Ahi zongin hotkhiatna a ngah eite a dingin Pasian’ vangliatna ahi hi.

[13] Lai Siangtho in, “Sing tungah a kikhai mi peuhmah Pasian’ samsiat mi ahi hi,” na ci ahih manin eite a dingin Khrih in samsiatna a thuak manin Thukham zuihlahna hangin samsiatna panin eite a hong tankhia ahi hi.
[15] Amah in huihlak a ukte le vangliatna a nei khempeuh, singlamteh tungah zogawp khin a, galzote in a sal matte a kaih uh bangin mi khempeuh muhin a gualzawhna a lak hi.
[10] Amah a hong paikik ciangin a hing ihi a, a si ihi zongin amah tawh i omkhawm theih nadingin eite a dingin amah a hong si ahi hi.

[24] Eite, mawhna lamah misi bangin, thuman lamah nungta-in i gamtat theih nadingin Khrih mahmah in eite’ mawhna ama pumpi mahmah tawh singlamteh tungah a pua hi. Ama liamna hangin note in damna na ngah uh hi.

[18] Khrih mahmah zong note a dingin si a, Pasian’ kiangah hong tunpih theih nadingin mihoih khat pen mihoih lote’ mawhna hangin khatvei a si hi. Mite in ama leitung pumpi that a, ahi zongin Pasian in kha nuntakna a pia hi.
[10] Hih ka gen itna pen eite in Pasian i itna thu hi lo a, Pasian in eite hong itin, i mawhna a maitheih nadingin a Tapa a hong paisakna thu ahi hi.

[9] Amaute inla thak khat sa uh a, “Nang Tuuno, tua laizial a lakhia ding le a ciamtehnate a lakhia dingin na kilawm hi. Nang hong kigo khin ahih manin mi namkim le pau namkim a pau mite sung panin na sisan tawh Pasian a dingin mite na lei khin a,
[15] Nang le numei kikal na suanlekhakte le ama suanlekhakte kikalah kilangneihna ka omsak ding hi. Amah in na lutang hong sunim ding a, nang in ama khetul na sunim ding hi,” a ci hi.
[25] “Ahi zongin a tawpna-ah kei hong panpih ding a nungta tawntung khat vantungah a omna thu ka thei hi.
[10] Bang hang hiam cih leh Leinuai nong zuansak kei a, na mihoih pa Leihawmpi na musak kei hi.
[8] Amah in sihna beimangsak ding a, maitang khempeuh panin khitui nul ding hi. Leitung khempeuh panin ama mite a kizahkona lakhia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA in hih thu gen khinzo hi.

[13] Note na kiphumna uh hankhuk hong honsakin kong paikhiatpih ciangin TOPA ka hihna thu nong thei ding uh hi. [14] Note sungah keima nuntakna hu kong guan ding a, note hong hingsakkikin, na gam uhah kong tengsakkik ding hi. Tua ciangin TOPA ka hihna thu nong thei ding uh hi. Hih bangin kong hihna ding thu ka kiciamzo a, ka kiciam bangin kong hih ding hi. TOPA ahi keimah in hih thu ka gen khinzo hi, ci-in gen in,” hong ci hi.
[19] Gentail mite in simmawh bawlin, satin, singlamteh tungah a khai dingin amaute khut sungah a pia ding uh hi. Ahi zongin a ni thum ni-in kihing kiksak ding hi,” ci-in a tuamin thu a hilh hi.
[53] Hankhuk panin amaute paikhia uh a, sihna panin Jesuh a thawhkik khit ciangin, amaute zong khuapi siangtho sungah hong lut uh a, mi tampi in a mu uh hi.

[5] Ahi zongin tua vantungmi in numeite kiangah, “Lau kei un. Singlamteh tungah a kithat Jesuh a zong na hihlam uh ka thei hi. [6] Hih lai-ah amah om nawn lo hi. A gensa bangin thokik khinta hi. Hong pai unla, amah a kisialna mun hong en un.

[31] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Mihing Tapa in tampi tak thuak ding hi; upate, siampi liante, le Thukham hilh siate in amah nial ding uh hi. Amah kithat ding a, ni thum khit ciangin hingkik ding hi,” ci-in a nungzuite hilh ding a kipan hi.

[5] Han sungah a lut uhleh, a taklam pang uhah, puanpak a silh tangval khat a tu mu uh a, lamdangsa-in a lau uh hi. [6] Tua tangvalpa in, “Lamdangsa kei un. Singlamteh tungah a kithat Nazareth khuami Jesuh na zong uh hi. Amah kithokiksak khin a, hih lai-ah om nawn lo hi. Amah a kisialna mun hong en un. [7] Tu-in pai unla, Peter le Jesuh’ nungzui dangte kiangah hih thu va gen un. Note tungah hong gensa bangin Galilee gam amaute mai-ah pai hi; tua lai-ah amah na mu ding uh hi, ci hi, ci un,” a ci hi.
[9] (Sihna panin Jesuh a thawhkik khit ciangin ama sung pan dawi sagih a hawlkhiatna, Magdala khuami Mary tungah Nipi ni zingsang tungin kilang masa hi.

[6] Hih lai-ah om nawn lo hi; kithosak zo hi. Galilee gamah a om lai-in note kiangah thu hong genin, [7] ‘Mawhnei mite’ khut sungah Mihing Tapa kipia ding a, singlamteh tungah kithatin, a ni thum ni-in hingkik ding hi,’ a cih thute phawk un,” a ci uh hi.

[46] amaute kiangah, “Khrih in sihna thuakin, a ni thum ni-in sihna panin hingkik ding a, [47] Jerusalem khua a kipan minam khempeuh tungah a mawhna uh kisikin a kimaisak nading thu, ama min tawh kihilh ding hi, ci-in kigelh hi.

[16] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Mary!” a cih leh Mary zong ama lamah kihei a, “Rabboni,” ci-in a dawng hi. (Rabboni pen Hebru pau hi a, “Siapa,” a cihna ahi hi.) [17] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Kei hong lenlen nawn kei in. Ka Pa kiangah a paito nai lo ka hi hi. Ka sanggamte kiangah va pai inla, ‘Keima Pa le note’ Pa, keima Pasian le note’ Pasian’ kiangah ka pai ding hi,’ ci hi, ci-in va gensak zaw in,” a ci hi. [18] Tua ahih manin Magdala khuami Mary zong nungzuite kiangah pai-in Topa a muh khitna thu va gen a, hih a kam vaikhakte zong a zasak hi. [19] Tua ni pen Nipi ni nitak lam hi a, nungzuite zong a nitakin innsung khatah a kikhop laitakun Jerusalem khua-a Jew mi uliante a kihtakna uh hangin inn a kikalhnelh uh hi. Tua bang hinapi-in amaute lakah Jesuh hong ding a, “Nopna ngah ta un,” ci-in a hopih hi. [20] Tua bangin a hopih khit ciangin a khutte le a pangpi zong a lak hi. Topa a muhna hangun nungzuite a nuam mahmah uh hi. [21] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Note in nopna ngah ta un. Pa in kei a hong sawl bangin note zong ka hong sawl hi,” ci-in a vaikhak leuleu hi. [22] Tua khit ciangin amaute lamah a hu sang a, “Kha Siangtho na sang un. [23] Mite’ mawhna na maisak uhleh amaute’ mawhna a mai hi ding a, na maisak kei uhleh amaute’ mawhna a mai lo hi ding hi,” a ci hi. [24] Nungzuite kiangah Jesuh a kilah laitakin sawm le nihte sung panin Unau Peeng minno a nei Thomas om lo hi.
[13] Jesuh hong pai-in anlum la-in amaute tungah pia a, tua mah bangin ngasa zong a pia hi. [14] Hih pen sihna panin Jesuh a kithawhkiksak khitzawh nungzuite tungah a kilah a thum veina hita hi.

[23] Pasian in thu a ma theihkholhna le ama geelna tawh kizui-in note’ khut sungah tua Jesuh a hong piak ding a ngaihsutsa hi a, note in singlamteh tungah khai-in migilote’ khut tawh amah na that uh hi. [24] Ahi zongin Pasian in misite lak panin amah hingkiksak a, sihna in amah lencip zo lo ahih manin sihna hanga gimna panin amah a suaktasak hi.
[15] Tua ahih ciangin mite tungah nuntakna a piapa na that uh a, ahi zongin sihna panin Pasian in amah hingkiksak hi. Ko tegel pen hih thu a thei teci ka hi uh hi.
[33] Topa Jesuh’ thawhkikna thu, sawltakte in vangliatna tawh teci pang uh a, Pasian in amaute khempeuh tungah thupha tampi a pia hi.
[4] Kha Siangtho thu lamsangah ci lehang misite lak panin vangliatna tawh a thawhsakkikna hangin Pasian’ Tapa ahihna thu Pasian in a kilangsak hi.
[25] Eite’ mawhna hangin a si dingin Jesuh kipia a, Pasian tawh eite i kipawl theih nadingin kihingkiksak hi.

[4] I Pa’ vangliatna tawh sihna panin Khrih a kithawhkiksak mah bangin eite zong nuntakna thak i nuntak theih nadingin tui i kiphum ciangin amah tawh kiphum khawmin a sikhawm ihi hi. [5] Bang hang hiam cih leh ama sihna-ah sikhawmin pawlkhat i suah leh amah a thawhkikna-ah zong pawlkhat suakin i thokhawm ding hi.
[9] Bang hang hiam cih leh sihna panin Khrih kihingkiksak khin a, si kik ngei nawn lo ding hi. Ama tungah sihna in vangliatna nei nawn lo hi, ci-in i thei hi.

[11] Sihna panin Jesuh a thokiksak Pasian’ Kha Siangtho note sungah hong om leh sihna panin Khrih a hingkik sakpa mah in note sungah a om ama Kha Siangtho mah tawh a sithei pumpi a hong nungtasak ding hi.

[34] Tua ahih manin kua in amaute tungah thu khenthei nawn ding ahi hiam? Eite a dingin a hong thumsak pa pen Pasian’ taklamah a tu, a sih khit ciangin sihna panin a kihingkiksak Khrih Jesuh hi lo ahi hiam?

[9] Jesuh pen Topa hi, ci-in mite kiangah genin, Pasian in sihna panin amah hingkiksak zo hi, ci-in na lungsim sung uhah na up taktak uhleh hotkhiatna na ngah ding uh hi. [10] Bang hang hiam cih leh i lungsim ah i up taktakna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna kingah a, i kamin i genna hangin hotkhiatna a kingah ahi hi.

[7] Ama a’ ding bekin kuamah nungta lo a, ama a’ ding bekin kuamah si lo hi. [8] I nuntak leh Topa a dingin a nungta ihi a, i sih leh zong Topa a’ ding mahin a si ihi hi. Tua ahih manin i si a, i hing zongin Topa a’ ihi hi. [9] Hih thu hangin Khrih pen a site le a hingte’ Topa ahih theih nadingin hong si-in hong nungtakik hi.
[14] Pasian in sihna panin Topa thokiksak hi. Tua mah bangin eite zong ama vangliatna tawh hong thokiksak ding hi.

[3] Kei tungah a hong kihilh a thupi pen note tungah ka hong gensawn a, tua in: Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin eite’ mawhna tang dingin Khrih hong si-in [4] kivui a, Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin a ni thum ni-in Pasian in hingkiksak hi. [5] Tua ciangin Peter kiangah kilang a, a zomah sawltak sawm le nihte kiangah kilang hi. [6] Tua ciangin thu um mi zanga val tungah thakhatin kilang hi. Tua mi zanga valte, pawlkhat a sih khit tei hangin a tamzaw nungta lai uh hi. [7] Tua ciangin James tungah kilang a, tua banah sawltak sawm le nihte tungah kilang leuleu hi. [8] A tawpna penah, kei pen a ngeina bangin a suak lo naungek tawh a kibang hinapi-in kei tungah zong hong kilang hi.

[17] Khrih a kihingkiksak lo hileh note’ upna a mawkna hi ding a, na mawhna sung mah uhah note a omlai na suak ding uh hi. [18] Khrih thu a um, a sisa mite zong a mawkna mah hi lai ding hi. [19] Khrih hangin i lamet thu pen hih i leitung nuntak sung thu ding bek hi takpi leh leitung midang khempeuhte sangin a hehpihhuai zaw ihi ding hi. [20] Ahi zongin a thuman taktak ci lehang, a sisa mite zong hingkik takpi ding hi cih a kitel theih nadingin sihna panin Khrih kihingkiksak khinzo hi. [21] Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khat hangin sihna a om mah bangin mi khat hang mahin misite zong hinkikna om hi. [22] Bang hang hiam cih leh Adam tawh a kizop manin mi khempeuh si a, tua mah bangin Khrih tawh a kizom khempeuh zong kihingkiksak ding hi. [23] Ahi zongin tua hinkikna pen ama hun tawh kizui-in a banbanin hi ding hi. A masa penin Khrih hi a, Khrih hong paikik ciangin ama pawlte khempeuh hingkik ding hi.
[54] A muatthei pen a muat thei lo hong suakin, a sithei pen a sithei lo hong suah ciangin Lai Siangtho thu hong tung taktak ding hi. Lai Siangtho in, “Sihna maimangin gualzawhna in khuplet hi.

[10] Jesuh Khrih thei-in, ama thawhkik bangin thokikin, kei zong sihna panin hong hingsakkik ding hi, ci-in ka lametna hangin ama thuak bangin thuakin, sihna-ah zong amah tawh ka kibat ding ka utpi pen ahi hi.
[18] Na khempeuhah amah a lianpen ahih theih nadingin, amah pen pawlpi ahi ama pumpi lutang hi a, pawlpi’ nuntakna a kipatna hi a, sihna panin a kithokiksak Tapa cil ahi hi.
[14] Jesuh si-in thokik hi, ci-in i up mah bangin Pasian in Jesuh hong paipih kik ciangin amah umin a si mite zong hong tonpih ding hi, ci-in i um hi.

[18] Thuman lampi panin amaute pialkhin uh a, thawhkikna thu pen a beisa thu hi ta hi, ci-in thu um mi pawlkhat lungmangsak uh hi. [19] Ahi zongin Pasian in a phuhsa sutpi kilokzo ngei lo ding hi. Tua sutpi tungah, “Topa in ama mi kua teng hiam cih thei hi,” cihna le, “Topa tawh kipawl ing, a ci peuhmah in mawhna sukhalo ding hi,” cihna kigelh hi.
[19] Pasian in a sisa nangawn hingkiksak thei ding hi, ci-in Abraham in a up mah bangin Abraham in a sisa a tapa Isaac a limin a ngahkik ahi hi.

[3] I Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pa Pasian tungah lungdam ni. Ama hong hehpih mahmahna hangin sihna panin Jesuh Khrih a thawhkik sakna tawh eite tungah nuntakna thak a hong pia hi. Tua ahih manin i lametna kiam ngei lo a,
[21] Sihna panin amah hingkiksakin minthanna a pia Pasian, ama hangin muang thei na hih uh manin, na up na muan na lamet uh Pasian ahi hi.

[20] Noah in teembaw a bawl hun laitakin Pasian in lungduai takin ngak hinapi-in hih kha a nei mite pawlkhat in Pasian’ thu mang lo uh hi. Teembaw sungah a om mi giat bek, tui in a suaktasak hi. [21] Tui pen note a hong honkhia tuiphumna lim hi a, pumpi panin nin sawpkhiatna lim hi loin, Jesuh Khrih thawhkikna hangin lungsim siantho nadingin Pasian’ tungah kamciamna lim ahi hi. Tua Jesuh thawhkikna in note hong honkhia ahi hi.
[48] Egypt gamah tampi a om laitakin amah in tua kum sagih sunga ante khempeuh khawm a, khuapite sungah an khol hi. A kiima lote panin khuapi simah amah in an khol hi.

[6] Thadahpa aw, miksite kiangah pai inla, amau’ nuntakzia va en in. [7] Amaute in a uk ding le a makai ding kuamah nei lo napi-in, [8] khuakhal sungin a nek ding uh, tuk hun sungin kaikhawm khol uh hi.
[16] Thungaihsun theite pilna tawh gamta a, mihaite in a haina taangko hi.
[22] Lim ngaihsut loin sepna tawh bangmah piang zo lo a, limtakin geelna tawh maa kitunzo bek hi.
[5] Limtakin ngaihsunin geelgeelna pen hauhna lampi hi a, nawhsa-in lopthop hihna pen zawnna lampi ahi hi.
[20] Mipil pa’ inn sungah neihlelam a dimin om a, ahi zongin mihai pa in a ngahzahzah zangkhia pah hi.
[4] Hauhnop man bekin sum’ sila suak kei unla, a man loin gamtakha kei un. [5] Na ngahsa uh sumte mitphiat kalin beimang thei a, muvanlai bangin thakhatin leengmang thei hi.
[3] Pilna tawh inn kilam a, ngaihsut siamna tawh inn kip hi. [4] Thungaihsut theihna inn sungah a hoih a manpha nate a dimtakin om hi.
[28] Ama lungsim a ki-uk zo lo mipa pen dalna kulhpi a nei lo khuapi tawh kibang hi.
[12] Mipilte in a lauhuai thu muthei-in pelh uh a, mi mawkmawkte in phusuakin thuak uh hi.

[23] Na tuuhonte hoihtakin thei inla, na bawnghonte hoihtakin kem in. [24] Bang hang hiam cih leh neihsa kip tawntung lo a, hauhna pen a khangkhangin kizom suak lo hi. [25] Lopate ki-atmang khin a, ahi zongin a no hong selkik hi. Mualtungah a po lopa hing khempeuh ki-atin inn-ah kipua a, [26] tuute in na puan ding hong guan a, na keeltal mante lo ciing khat man tawh kikim hi. [27] Na keelnawite ahihleh na innkuan annek ding, le na nasem numeite’ nuntak nadingin kicing ding hi.
[1] Hih leitungah a piang thu khempeuh, Pasian in ama pian’ hun dinga a sehsa hunin a piansak ahi hi.

[14] “Inn panin khualzin dingin a paikhia mipa tawh zong kibang hi. Amah in a nasemte samin, a neihsateng a nasemte’ kep dingin a ap hi. [15] Amau’ siamna tawh kizui-in khat tungah tulnga, khat tungah tulnih, khat tungah tulkhat a ap khit ciangin a zinkhia hi.

[16] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah thugentehna khat gen a, “Mi hau pa khat’ lo-ah an tampi a piang hi. [17] Tua ciangin amah in a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka an khempeuh ka koih nading mun kicing lo ahih manin bangcih ding ka hi hiam? [18] Tua ahih manin hih bangin ka gamta ding hi: Ka ansalte phelin a lianzaw ansalte ka lam ding a, tuate sungah ka ante le ka neih khempeuh ka seng ding hi. [19] Tua ciangin keimah in: Mi hampha mahmah ka hi hi. Kum tampi sung ka khom ding annek tuidawn le na hoih tampi ka nei hi. An ne, zu ne-in, a nuam theithei-in ka om hithiat ding hi,’ ci hi. [20] Ahi zongin Pasian in ama kiangah, ‘Mihai pa aw, tuzan mahmahin na si ding hi. Hih na neihsa teng kua’n zang nawn ding ahi hiam?’ ci hi,” a ci hi. [21] Tua ciangin Jesuh in a thugen a khupna-in, “Tua mah bangin amau a’ ding bekin a kholcipte pen Pasian’ muhna panin mihau hi lo uh hi,” a ci hi.
[42] Topa in, “A pil a citak nasempa i cih a bangcite ahi hiam? A naseppih dangte ukin a hun manmanin amaute’ nekzah ding ciat a pia dingin a topa in a seh nasempa ahi hi.

[28] Mi khatpeuh in inn lianpi khat lamding a sawm le, ka zozo ding hiam cih a theih nadingin a bei dingzah tuat masa hi. [29] Tua bangin tuat masa kei leh tua inn a khuampite a phuhkhit ciangin zawh lohpi-in khawl ding a, tua inn a kizo lo a mu mite khempeuh in amah nuihsan ding uh hi. [30] ‘Hih mipa in inn lamding kipan napi-in zozo lo hi,’ ci ding uh hi.

[1] Tua ciangin Jesuh in a nungzuite kiangah, “Sum hau pa khat om a, a neihsateng a uk dingin ama khutnuai-ah mi khat a koih hi. Tua a neihsateng a uk dingin a koih mipa in a topa’ sumteng phengzat gawp hi, ci-in kikhia hi. [2] A topa in zong amah sam a, ‘Na gamtatna ka zak a bangci thu ahi hiam? Keima neihsa a uk dingin hong koih thei nawn lo ding ka hih manin a beisa hun sungah ka neihsate na zeekna sazian a kimtakin hong pia in,’ a ci hi.

[10] “A tawmno-ah a diktatte pen a tamah zong diktat uh a, a tawmno-ah a citak lote pen a tamah zong citak lo uh hi. [11] Hih leitung sumte-ah na cihtak kei uhleh kua in no tungah vantung sum hong ap ngam ding ahi hiam? [12] Midangte’ neihsa tungah na cihtak kei uhleh, kua in no tungah nomau gamhluah ding hong ap ngam ding ahi hiam?
[4] Sun khuavak laiteng kei hong sawl pa’ na i sem ding hi. Kuamah in na a sep theih loh zan hun zong hong tung ding hi.
[32] Thu um mi khempeuh a lungsim uh le a ngaihsutna uh kikhat uh a, kuamah in ama neihsa kei-a’ tuam ci loin, a neih khempeuh uh a neikhawm ciat uh hi.

[4] Tua lo na zuakma-in nangma a’ hi a, na zuakkhit ciangin a sum zong nangma a’ mah ahi hi. Tua hinapi-in bang hangin tua bangin gamtat ding ngaihsun peuhmah na hi hiam? Mite a khem hi loin Pasian a khem na hi hi,” a ci hi.
[10] Amaute in na tampi tak hong pia uh a, teembaw tungah ka tuankik uh ciangin lamkal a zat ding a kisam khempeuh hong puak uh hi.
[21] Midangte a hilh note in, nomau mah kihilh lo ding na hi uh hiam? “Guta kei un,” ci-in mi hilh napi-in nomau mahmah guta hi lo na hi uh hiam?
[11] Thadah kei unla, nakpitakin na sem un. Lawp mahmahna lungsim tawh Topa’ na sem un.
[24] A kuamah peuh in note’ angsung ding bek zong kei unla, midangte’ phattuam nading zongzaw un.

[31] Tua ahih manin keimah in ka hong gennop thu in: Na hihna khempeuh uh, nekna dawnna-ah ahi zongin Pasian’ minthan nadingin na hih un. [32] Jew mi ahi a, Gentail mi ahi a, Pasian’ pawlpi mi ahi zongin na lungnopmawhsak loh nadingun na gamta un.

[1] Tu-in Judea gam a om Pasian mite huh nading sum kaihkhop nading thu tawh kisai-in: Galatia gam a pawlpite in a hih ding zia uh ka gen bangin note in zong na hih un. [2] Kei ka hong pai ciangin sumpi kaihkhop tawm a om loh nadingin na ngahna uh tawh kizui-in Nipi simin na tuamkoih unla, na na khol un.
[5] Hih bangin a gamtatna uh kote’ lamet sangin sangzaw pek hi. Amaute pen Topa tungah kipia masa uh a, tua ciangin Pasian’ deihna bangin kote tungah zong a hong kipia uh ahi hi.
[12] Piaknopna lungsim na neih nak-uhleh na neih lohnate uh siksan hi loin na neihna uh tawh kizui-in na piak uh Pasian in hong sang ding hi.
[6] Note in na phawk ding uh thu panin: Khaici tawm a vawhte in tawm mah la ding a, tampi a vawhte in tampi mah la ding uh hi.
[15] Tua ahih ciangin hoihtakin kingaihsunin gamta unla, mihaite bang hi loin mipilte bangin gamta un. [16] Tuhun pen hun hoih lo hun ahih manin na hun neih khempeuh uh a hoih lamin zang un.

[17] Tuhuna a hau mite kisatheikha loin, a kip lo hauhnate muan le suanin neikha loin, eite in nuamtakin i zat theih dingin citna tawh a hong pia Pasian a muan a suan nadingun na hilh in. [18] A hoih nate semin, gamtat pha-in, citna lungsim nei-in midangte a hopnop nadingun na hilh in. [19] Tua hileh mai lamah amaute’ nuntak nading bulpi taktak ahi neihsate, amau a dingin a khol mite ahi ding uh hi.
[10] Pasian’ piak na a zatsiamte bangin Pasian’ kiang panin na ngah uh nate, midangte’ phattuam nadingin na zang un.

[7] Ahi zongin Farisi mite le Saddusi mite tampi tak tui a kiphum dingin a hong pai a muh ciangin Johan in amaute kiangah, “Gul bangin ngian a zang note aw, a hong tung ding Pasian’ hehna panin na suahtak theih nading uh kua in hong hilhkhol ahi hiam?

[11] Na kisikkik khitna uh a kilat nadingin tui sungah note ka hong phum a, ahi zongin kei nungah a hong pai pa in Kha Siangtho le mei sungah note hong phum ding hi. Tua a hong pai ding pa pen kei sangin nakpitakin lianzaw a, ama khedap a tawisak ding nangawnin ka kilawmzo nai kei hi. [12] Amah in a khutah anzapna tawi-in a ante zap a, a taksate khawmin a ansal sungah koih ding a, a ansite ahihleh a mit ngei lo mei sungah a khul ding hi,” ci-in thu a hilh hi. [13] Tua laitakin Galilee gam panin Jesuh hong pai a, Johan’ khut sungah a kituiphum dingin ama omna Jordan Gun-ah a hong tung hi. [14] Ahi zongin Johan in na tuiphum nuam lo a, “Nang in kei nong tuiphum dingin a kilawmzaw kimlai, kei’ phum dingin nang hong pai zawsop na hi hiam?” a na ci hi. [15] Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Pasian in hih dingin kisam a sak khempeuh i hih ding a kilawm thu ahih manin tu-in hong phum hoh in,” a cih ciangin Johan in zong a mang hi. [16] Jesuh a kituiphum khit phetin tui sung panin a paikhia pah hi. Tua laitakin vantung hong kihong a, vakhu bangin Pasian’ Kha Siangtho hong kumsukin ama tungah a khawl a mu hi. [17] Tua sung mahin vantung panin aw khat hong ging a, “Hih pen ka it mahmah ka Tapa hi a, ama tungah ka lungkim mahmah hi,” a hong ci hi.
[19] Tua ahih ciangin note pai unla, midang khempeuh, keima nungzui mi suaksakin, Pa min, Tapa min, le Kha Siangtho min tawh tui sungah na phum un.
[16] Lungdamna Thu umin tui a kiphum mi peuhpeuh in hotkhiatna ngah ding a, a um lo mi peuhpeuh in mawhsakna thuak ding uh hi.

[16] Tua ahih ciangin Johan in amaute kiangah, “Keimah in tui sungah note ka hong phum hi; ahi zongin kei sangin nakpitakin a lianzaw khat hong pailai ding hi. Ama khedap khau a sutsak ding nangawnin kei ka kilawmzo nai kei hi. Amah in Kha Siangtho le mei sungah note hong phum ding hi.

[21] Mi khempeuh a kituiphum khit uh ciangin Jesuh zong a kituiphum hi. Jesuh in thu a nget laitakin vantung kihong a, [22] vakhu pumpi lim nei-in Kha Siangtho ama tungah hong kumsuk hi. Tua laitakin vantung panin aw khat hong ging a, “Nang pen ka it ka Tapa na hi a, nangma tungah ka lungkim mahmah hi,” a ci hi.

[29] A zing ciangin Johan in ama kiangah Jesuh hong pai a muh ciangin, “En un, leitung mawhna a lakhia Pasian’ Tuuno hih lai-ah hong pai hi. [30] Keima nungah mi khat hong pai ding a, keima suah ma-in amah omkhin ahih manin kei sangin amah lianzaw hi, ci-in ka gen pa ahi hi. [31] Amah a bangci mi hi ding cih thei lo napi-in, Israel mite in amah a theih nadingun tui sungah mite a phum dingin a hong pai ka hi hi,” a ci hi. [32] Johan in hih mipa thu teci na pang a, “Vantung panin vakhu bangin Kha hong paisukin ama tungah a om ka mu hi. [33] Keimah in amah ka theih nai loh hangin, tui sungah mite a phum dingin kei a hong sawl Pasian in, ‘A tungah Kha hong paisukin a omna mipa pen Kha Siangtho sungah mite a phum ding pa ahi hi,’ ci-in hong genkhol hi.
[23] Tuiphumpa Johan zong thong kia nai lo hi. Tua hi a, tui tampi omna Salim khua kiang Ainon kici munah Johan in mite tuiphum a, ama kiangah mite hong pai-in tui a kiphum uh hi.
[2] (A taktakin Jesuh mahmah in tui phum loin a nungzuite bek in a phum ahi hi.)
[5] Johan in tui sungah mite phum a, ahi zongin a sawt loin Pasian in Kha Siangtho tawh note hong kidimsak ding hi,” ci-in thu a pia hi.

[22] “Tua ahih ciangin Topa Jesuh’ thawhkikna thu teci pangin a hong genpih dingin Judas tangin mi khat i lak ding kisam hi. Tua mipa pen Johan’ tuiphum kipat hun a kipanin Jesuh vanah a kilaktoh hun ciang dong, Jesuh’ nasepna khempeuhah eite tawh a omkhawm mi khat ahih ding kisam hi,” a ci hi.

[37] Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a lungsim uh nakpitakin sukha a, Peter le sawltak dangte kiangah, “Sanggamte aw, bangci gamtat ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. [38] Tua ciangin Peter in amaute kiangah, “Na mawhna uh kisik unla, na mawhna uh hong kimaisak theih nadingin Jesuh Khrih min tawh tui kiphum ciat un. Tua hileh Pasian’ piakkhong Kha Siangtho na ngah ding uh hi. [39] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in ama kamciamna pen note tung, na suan na khakte uh tung le gamlapi-a om mi khempeuh, i Topa Pasian in a sap mi khempeuh tungah a hong bawl ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. [40] Tua ciangin Peter in amaute tungah thu tampi genthuahin hanthawn a, “Hih migilote’ gimthuak ding na tuahkhak loh nadingun nomau mah in na suahtak nading uh lampi zong ciat un,” a ci hi. [41] Mi tampi in ama thugen umin tui kiphum uh a, tua ni-in mihing tulthum bang kibehlap uh hi.
[13] Simon mahmah in zong um a, tui a kiphum khit ciangin Filip zui tawntung a, lim le nalamdang lianpipite a bawl a muh ciangin lamdang a sa mahmah hi.

[35] Filip zong a kam ka-in thugen ding kipan a, tua a Lai Siangtho simna mun a kipanin Jesuh thu ciang dong a gen hi. [36] Lampi-ah a pai laitakun tui omna mun tung uh a, mangpa in, “Hih lai-ah tui om hi. Tui kiphum nuam peuh leng kua’n hong kham thei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi. [37] Filip in, “Na lungsim takpi tawh na up nakleh tui na kiphum thei ding hi,” a cih ciangin, “Jesuh Khrih pen Pasian’ Tapa hi, ci-in ka um hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. [38] Tua ciangin a leeng a khawlsak nadingin mangpa in thu pia a, Filip tawh a nihun tui phualah pai-in Filip in amah a tuiphum hi. [39] Tui sung panin a paikhiat khit uh ciangin Topa’ Kha Siangtho in Filip paikhiatpih hi. Mangpa in Filip mu nawn lo hi; ahi zongin lungdam takin a lampai a zom hi.
[18] Tua laitakin Saul’ mit panin ngasalip tawh a kibang na pawlkhat kia a, khua a mukik thei hi. Saul zong tui kiphumpah a,
[48] Jesuh Khrih min tawh amaute tui a kiphum nading uh a sawl hi. Tua ciangin amaute kiangah Peter a tam lai nadingin a thum uh hi.
[16] Tua ciangin Topa in, ‘Johan in tui sungah hong phum a, ahi zongin Pasian in Kha Siangtho tawh note hong kidimsak ding hi,’ a cihsa thu ka phawkkik hi.
[15] Amah le a innsunga om mi khempeuh tui kiphum uh a, “Topa thu a um mi taktak hi, ci-in na hong ngaihsut nak-uhleh hong pai unla, ka inn-ah hong tung un,” ci-in hong samin a hong zol hi.

[29] Thongcing pa in zong meivak a la dingin mi khat sawl a, thong sungah tai-in laukawm lingkawmin Paul le Silas khe kiang va kidenna-in a va boksuk hi. [30] Tua ciangin amaute pusuahpih a, “Tote aw, hotkhiatna ka ngah nadingin bangci gamtat ding ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. [31] Amaute in, “Topa Jesuh um in. Tua hileh nang le na innkuanpihte in hotkhiatna na ngah ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. [32] Tua ciangin amaute in amah le a innsunga om mi khempeuh tungah Topa’ thu a hilh uh hi. [33] Tua zankim laitakpi mahin thongcing pa in amaute’ liammate sawpsiangsak a, amah le a innkuanpih mi khempeuh a kituiphum pah uh hi.

[4] Tua ciangin Paul in, “Johan’ hilh tuiphumna pen mawhna a kisik mite a’ ding ahi hi. Amah in Israel mite kiangah, ‘Keima nunga hong pai ding pa Jesuh um un,’ ci-in gen hi,” a ci hi. [5] Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Topa Jesuh’ minin tui a kiphum uh hi.
[16] Tu-in bang ngak lai ding na hi hiam? Tho inla, Pasian kiangah thu ngenin kituiphum inla, na mawhnate silsiangsak in,’ hong ci hi.

[3] Khrih Jesuh tawh i kipawl theih nadingin ama sungah a kiphum eite pen ama sihna mahah zong a sikhawm ihihlam thei lo na hi uh hiam? [4] I Pa’ vangliatna tawh sihna panin Khrih a kithawhkiksak mah bangin eite zong nuntakna thak i nuntak theih nadingin tui i kiphum ciangin amah tawh kiphum khawmin a sikhawm ihi hi.

[1] Sanggamte aw, Moses a zui i pu i pate tungah a piang thu na phawk ding uh ka deih hi. Meiipi in amaute khempeuh na hu a, a vekpi-un nuamtakin San Tuipi na kantanzo uh hi. [2] Meiipi sung le tuipi sungah ama nungzui a suak dingin Moses sungah amaute na kiphum uh hi.

[13] Jew mi ihi a, Gentail mi ihi zongin, sila ihi a, sila ahi lo ihi zongin, eite minam tuamtuam ihih hangin Kha Siangtho khat bek mah in Jesuh’ pumpi a suak dingin ama sungah hong phum a, eite khempeuh tungah a hong kipia pen tua a kibang Kha Siangtho khat bek mah ahi hi.
[27] Khrih sungah a kiphum note in Khrih’ pianzia a nei khinta na hi uh hi.
