[5] Topa khat bek, upna khat bek, tuiphumna khat bek mah a zangkhawm ihi hi. [6] Mi khempeuh’ Pa ahi Pasian khat bek om a, mi khempeuh’ Topa hi-in, na khempeuh hih kimin, mun citengah a om hi.
[12] Note tui na kiphum uh ciangin Jesuh tawh kiphum khawmin, misite’ lak panin Khrih a thosak Pasian’ vangliatna na up manun Khrih mah tawh tuiphumna panin a thokhawm leuleu na hi uh hi.

[11] Amah tawh na kipawlna uh hangin mihingte in pumpi vun a at uh bang hi loin, Khrih’ vun-atna ahi mawhnopna lungsim tawh kipelhna a ngah khinta na hi uh hi. [12] Note tui na kiphum uh ciangin Jesuh tawh kiphum khawmin, misite’ lak panin Khrih a thosak Pasian’ vangliatna na up manun Khrih mah tawh tuiphumna panin a thokhawm leuleu na hi uh hi.

[20] Noah in teembaw a bawl hun laitakin Pasian in lungduai takin ngak hinapi-in hih kha a nei mite pawlkhat in Pasian’ thu mang lo uh hi. Teembaw sungah a om mi giat bek, tui in a suaktasak hi. [21] Tui pen note a hong honkhia tuiphumna lim hi a, pumpi panin nin sawpkhiatna lim hi loin, Jesuh Khrih thawhkikna hangin lungsim siantho nadingin Pasian’ tungah kamciamna lim ahi hi. Tua Jesuh thawhkikna in note hong honkhia ahi hi.

[6] Hih Jesuh Khrih pen tui tawh kiphumna le a sisan luangin sihna tawh a hong pai hi a, tui bek tawh a hong pai hi loin tui le sisan tawh a hong pai ahi hi. Kha mahmah in hih thu a manna teci a pang hi. Kha pen thuman gen ahi hi. [7] Hih thu-ah teci a pang thum om a, [8] tuate pen Kha, tui, le sisan ahi uh hi. Hih thumte’ teci panna kibang kim hi.
[6] Amah in TOPA muang hi. Tua ahih manin ahi ding bangin Abram gamta hi, ci-in TOPA in a ciamteh hi.

[1] TOPA aw, ka galte tam mahmah a, mi tampi tak in kei hong langpan’ nainai uh hi. [2] Pasian in amah huh lo ding, mi tampi in hong ci uh hi. [3] Ahih hangin TOPA aw, nang pen ka kidalna lum, ka minthanna le ka lu hong phong pa na hi hi. [4] Nakpi takin TOPA ka galsap a, amah in a mual siangtho panin kei a hong dawng hi. [5] Lumin ka ihmu a, TOPA in hong kem ahih manin ka thokik hi. [6] Keimah a hong galbawl keimah a hong umcih mi tul sawm tampite ka kihta kei hi. [7] Tho in, TOPA! Kei hong hon in, ka Pasian! Bang hang hiam cih leh ka galte khempeuh’ paang nangmah in na beenggawp a, migilote’ ha na sutan hi. [8] Gualzawhna pen TOPA nangma hang ahi hi. Na mite tungah na thupha hong tung ta hen!
[5] Bang hang hiam cih leh haksat hun ciangin amah in a buk sungah kei hong seel ding hi. A puanbuk khuhna nuai-ah kei hong seel ding a, a sangna suang tungah kei hong koih ding hi.
[5] TOPA tungah na vai teng ap in. Amah muang in; amah in hong sem ding hi. [6] Amah in nangma dikna khuavak bangin, nangma thumanna nitaang bangin hong langsak ding hi.
[1] TOPA lamenin ka ngak ngiungeu a, amah kei lam hong nga-in ka kikona aw hong za hi.

[1] Pasian, i belh leh i thahatna hi a, haksat hunin a hong huh pahpah pa ahi hi. [2] Tua ahih ciangin, leitung kikhinin, mualte tuipi sung a kidenna zongin, a tuite ging zuazua-in phuan zuazua a, hih ginna hangin mual liante a ling zongin, i lau kei ding hi.
[10] “Om hithiat unla, Pasian ka hihna thei un. Minamte lakah keimah hong kisangsak a, leitung khempeuhah ka min hong kithangsak hi,” a ci hi.
[5] Na lungsim khempeuh tawh TOPA muang inla, nang’ theihna suang kei in. [6] Na hihna khempeuhah amah phawk in. Tua hileh lampi man amah in hong lak ding hi.
[31] Ahih hangin TOPA a muang mite a tha uh dimkik ding a, muvanlai bangin kha tawh leengto-in, amaute tai napi-un tawl lo ding uh a, amaute lam pai napi-un gim lo ding uh hi.

[5] Kapernaum khua a tun ciangin Rom mi galkapbu khat ama kiangah hong pai-in, [6] “Topa aw, ka nasempa cina-in inn-ah lupna ngakin om a, gim mahmahin taangzo het lo ahih manin hong damsak in,” ci-in a thum hi. [7] Jesuh in, “Hong pai-in ka damsak ding hi,” a ci hi. [8] Ahi zongin galkap bupa in, “Topa aw, keima inn-ah nangpipi nong pai dingin kilawm lo ka hih manin a dam nadingin thu pia lel lecin zong ka nasempa dam ding hi. [9] Kei zong uliante khutnuai-ah nasem mi ka hi a, keima khutnuai-ah zong galkapte a om hi. Tua galkapte khat kiangah, ‘Pai in,’ ci-in sawl leng pai a, adang khat kiangah, ‘Hong pai in,’ ci-in sam leng hong pai a, ka nasempa kiangah, ‘Hih sem in,’ ci-in sawl leng a sem hi,” a ci hi. [10] Jesuh in hih bupa thugen a zak ciangin lamdangsa a, amah a zui mihonte kiangah, “A mantak a kong genin-ah Israel mite lak nangawnah hih bang upna a nei ka mu nai kei hi. [11] Nisuahna le nitumna panin mi tampi tak hong pai-in vantung ki-ukna sungah Abraham, Isaac, le Jakob-te tawh an ne-in sabuai-ah tukhawm ding uh hi. [12] Ahi zongin vantung ki-ukna sungah a om dingin a kingaihsun Israel mite ahihleh pualam khuamialna-ah kilawnkhia ding a, tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding uh hi,” a ci hi. [13] Tua ciangin Jesuh in galkap bupa kiangah, “Na inn-ah ciah in. Na up bangin hong piang ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua hun laitak teek mahin a nasempa a dam hi.
[26] Jesuh in, “Bang hangin tuaci lau na hi uh hiam? Na upna uh neu mahmah hi,” a cih khit ciangin tho-in huihpi le tuihualte thu pia a, a dai dide pah hi.

[2] Mi pawlkhat in khutlekhezaw mi khat, a lupna pheek tawh hong pua-in Jesuh kiang a hong tunpih uh hi. Jesuh in amaute’ upna a muh ciangin a cina mipa kiangah, “Ka ta aw, na lungsim kinuamsak in; na mawhna hong kimaisak khinta hi,” a ci hi.
[22] Jesuh zong hong kihei a, tua numei a muh ciangin, “Ka tanu aw, na lung kinuamsak in. Na upna in nang hong damsak khinta hi,” a cih khit phetin tua numei a dampah hi.
[18] “Keimah in ka teelsa ka nasempa, ka it mahmah, ka lungkimna pa en un. Keima Kha ama tungah ka pia ding a, Gentail mite tungah upna man a pulak ding hi.

[32] Khaici khempeuh lak panin ankam tang a neupen ahi hi. Ahi zongin a khankhit ciangin ankung lakah a golpen suak ahih manin vasate in a hiang tungah bu a tomtheihna zah ding ciang hong suak thei hi,” a ci hi.

[29] Jesuh in, “Hong pai in,” a cih ciangin Peter zong gunkuang tung panin kumkhia a, Jesuh’ omna lam manawhin tui tungah a pai hi. [30] Ahi zongin huihpi nung a muh ciangin lau a, tui sungah tum dektak ahih manin, “Topa aw, hong hon in,” a ci hi. [31] Jesuh in zong a khut tawh Peter zamin len a, “Upna cingtaak lopa aw, bang ci-a hong tuaci muanlah na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

[25] Ahi zongin tua nupi hong pai-in Jesuh’ mai-ah khukdin a, “Topa aw, kei hong huh in,” a ci hi. [26] Jesuh in, “Tate’ annek ding laksakin ui khawite piak ding kilawm lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. [27] Nupi in, “Hi mah hi, Topa aw; a topa sabuai tung panin a kia annengte, ui khawite in zong ne buang hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi. [28] Tua ciangin Jesuh in tua nupi kiangah, “Nupi aw, na upna lian taktak hi. Na deihna bangin hong piang ding hi,” ci-in a dawn khit ciangin a tanu thakhatin a dampah hi.

[20] Jesuh in, “Na upna uh a cingtaak lohna hang ahi hi. Ahi taktakin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Ankam tang cia bang upna na neih nak-uhleh, hih mual kiangah, ‘Hih lai panin hua lai-ah kin in,’ ci le-uhcin kinkhia ding hi. Na hih theih loh uh khat zong om lo ding hi.

[21] Jesuh in, “Note kiangah a mantak a kong genin-ah: Note in uplahna nei hetloin, upna taktak na neih nak-uhleh hih theikung tungah a piang bang na hih theih uh banah, hih mual kiang nangawnah, ‘Na omna pan paikhia-in tuipi sung kidenna in,’ ci le-uhcin na cih bangun piang ding hi. [22] Upna na neih nak-uhleh na nget peuhpeuh uh na ngah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

[38] Jesuh pen gunkuang nung lamah lukham khamin ihmu-in a om hi. A nungzuite in amah phongin, “Sia aw, kote sita le ung phamawh hong sa lo na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi. [39] Jesuh zong tho-in, “Nung nawn kei in,” ci-in huihpi thu pia a, tuihualte kiangah, “Kilok nawn kei un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin huihnung khawlin dai khipkhep pah hi. [40] Tua ciangin Jesuh in a nungzuite kiangah, “Bang hangin lau na hi uh hiam? Tu ciang dong upna nei nai lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. [41] A nungzuite in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Huihpi le tuihualte nangawn, ama sawl bangin a gamta uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
[36] Ahi zongin Jesuh in amau thu kigen don loin kikhopna inn ukpa kiangah, “Lunghimawh kei in; upna nei peuh in,” a ci hi.
[23] Jesuh in, “Bang hangin na hihtheih leh, ci na hi hiam? A umte a dingin na khempeuh hithei hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
[52] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Na ciah thei ta ding hi; na upna in nang hong damsakzo hi,” a cihkhit phetin amah in khua mukik theipah a, tua a paina lampi-ah Jesuh’ nung a zui hi.

[22] Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Upna nei un. [23] Upna na neih nak-uhleh hih mual kiangah, ‘Na omna panin paikhia-in tuipi sung kidenna in,’ ci le-uhcin, na lungsim sung uhah uplahna om loin na gen bangun piang taktak ding hi, ci-in na up nak-uhleh, na cih bangun hong piang ding hi. [24] Tua ahih manin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na khat peuhpeuh na nget uh ciangin ngah ding ci-in um un; tua hileh na nget peuhpeuh uh na ngah ding uh hi.
[16] Lungdamna Thu umin tui a kiphum mi peuhpeuh in hotkhiatna ngah ding a, a um lo mi peuhpeuh in mawhsakna thuak ding uh hi.
[37] Tua ahih manin Pasian in a bawl theih loh khat zong om lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[45] Topa in nang tungah a hong gen thute hong tung taktak ding hi, ci-a upna pen nang a dingin a lungdamhuai mahmah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[20] Jesuh in amaute’ upna a muh ciangin a mipa kiangah, “Lawm aw, na mawhnate hong kimaisak khinta hi,” a ci hi.

[27] Gamlak a paakte ngaihsun dih un. Tuate in a nek ding uh na sem lo uh a, a silh ding uh puan zong gan lo uh hi. Ahi zongin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Bangzahin a hauh hangin Solomon nangawn, hih paakte khat zahin a hoihin kizem zo lo lai hi. [28] Upna neu mite aw, tuni-in om a, zing ciangin keutumin meikhuk sungah a kikhultum lopa kungte, Pasian in puansilh guan ahihleh note hong guanzaw kan ding hi lo ahi hiam?

[5] Nikhat, sawltakte in Topa kiangah, “Ka upna uh hong liansak in,” a ci uh hi. [6] Topa in, “Ankam tang cia a pha upna nei le-uhcin, hih nailung kung kiangah, ‘Kizunglot inla tuipi sungah va po in,’ ci le-uhcin na cih bangun piangzo ding hi.
[27] Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Mihingte’ hih zawh loh pen Pasian in hihzo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[42] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Na upna in nang hong damsak khinta hi,” a ci hi. [43] Amah in zong thakhatin khua muthei pah a, Jesuh zui-in Pasian tungah a lungdamna a ko hi. Mihonpite in zong a muh ciangin a vekpi-un Pasian a phat uh hi.

[31] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Simon, Simon aw, lokho pa in buhhum a haih bangin note khempeuh hong ze-et nadingin Satan in thu a ngah khitna thu phawk in. [32] Ahi zongin, Simon aw, na upna na khahsuah loh nadingin nang a dingin thu kong ngetsak khin hi. Kei kiangah nong kiheikik ciangin nungzui na lawmte na hanthawn in,” a ci hi.
[12] Tua bang hitaseleh ama thu ngai-in amah a um mite khempeuh tungah Pasian’ tate suahtheih nading thu a pia hi.
[16] Pasian in leitung mite hong it mahmah ahih manin ama Tapa a um mi khempeuh si nawn loin a hin tawntung theih nadingun a Tapa neihsun a hong piak dongin a hong itna a hong lak hi.
[18] Amah a um mite in mawhsak thukhenna thuak lo ding uh hi. Amah a um lote pen Pasian’ Tapa neihsun um lo uh ahih manin mawhsak thukhenna a thuak khinta uh ahi hi.
[36] Tua ahih manin Tapa a um mi peuhmah nungta tawntung ding a, Tapa’ thu a mang lote in nuntak mu lo ding a, amaute tungah Pasian heh tawntung ding hi,” a ci hi.
[25] A taktakin ci lehang: A si mite in Pasian’ Tapa’ aw a zak hun uh hong tung ding hi bek loin tu-in a hun hong tungkhin hita a, ama aw a za mi khempeuh nungta ding uh hi.
[35] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Kei pen nuntakna an ka hi hi. Ka kiangah hong paite gilkial ngei nawn lo ding a, kei hong umte dangtak ngei nawn lo ding hi.
[47] A mantakin kong genin-ah, kei hong umte bek in nuntak tawntungna ngah hi.
[38] Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Kei hong um mite sung panin nuntakna tui luangkhia ding hi,’ a cih mah bangin kei hong um mite ka kiangah hong pai-in hong dawn ta un,” a ci hi.
[24] Kei pen, ‘Kei ka hihlam na hong up kei uhleh na mawhna uh a sihpih ding na hih manun, na mawhna uh na sihpih ding uh hi,’ ci-in ka hong genna pen hih thu hang ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[25] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Keimah in a sisa mite thosakin a hingsak thei pa ka hi hi. Kei hong um mi peuhmah a sih hangin nungta ding hi. [26] A nungta a kei hong um mite si ngei nawn lo ding hi. Hih thu na um hiam?” a cih ciangin,
[40] Jesuh in, “Na up nakleh Pasian’ vangliatna na mu ding hi, ci-in hong genkhin hi lo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
[12] A mantakin ka hong genin-ah, kei hong umte in keima sep nate mah sem ding hi. Pa kiangah kei ciah ding ka hih manin keima sep sangin zong a lianzaw sem lai ding uh hi.

[28] Thomas in zong, “Ka Topa, ka Pasian!” ci-in a dawn ciangin [29] Jesuh in, “Kei na hong muhkhit ciang bekin hong um pan na hi hiam? Kei hong mu lo napi-in hong umte a dingin lungdamhuai mahmah zaw ding hi,” a ci hi.
[31] Hih laibu sungah a kigelh thute pen Jesuh, Pasian’ Tapa, Khrih ahihna thu na uptheih nading uh le ama min hangin tua upna tawh nuntakna na ngahtheih nading uh deihna tawh a kigelh ahi hi.

[38] Tua ciangin Peter in amaute kiangah, “Na mawhna uh kisik unla, na mawhna uh hong kimaisak theih nadingin Jesuh Khrih min tawh tui kiphum ciat un. Tua hileh Pasian’ piakkhong Kha Siangtho na ngah ding uh hi.

[5] A vekpi-un sawltakte’ thugente thukimpih uh ahih manin, Kha Siangtho tawh kidimin upna a nei Stefen, Filip, Prokhoras, Nikanor, Timon, Parmenas, le Antiok khua pan Gentail mi ahi Jew biakna a zui Nikolas a teel uh hi.

[22] Jerusalem-a om pawlpite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Antiok khua-ah Barnabas a paisak uh hi. [23] Barnabas a tun ciangin Pasian in amaute thupha a piakna mu-in lungdam mahmah a, amaute citakin a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh Topa tungah a thuman nadingun a hanthawn hi. [24] Barnabas pen mihoih mahmah, upna nei-in, Kha Siangtho tawh a kidim mi khat ahi hi. Mi tampi in Pasian a um uh hi.

[9] Amah in Paul’ thuhilhte limtakin a ngai hi. Tua mipa in damna a ngahzawh nading zahin upna nei hi, ci-in Paul in a muh ciangin limtakin amah en a, [10] “Na khe-in dingto in!” nakpitakin a ci hi. Tua mipa zong dingin lam pai kawikawi dingin a kipan hi.
[22] Thu um mite a upna uhah citakin a om nadingun hanthawnin tha pia uh a, “Pasian’ Ukna sungah i omtheih nadingin haksatna tampi thuak ding hi hang,” ci-in a hilh uh hi.

[8] Mihingte’ lungsim sungthu a thei Pasian in Gentail mite in zong thu a uptheih ding mah hi, cih a lahna-in eite tungah a hong piak mah bangin amaute tungah zong Kha Siangtho a pia hi. [9] Pasian in eite le Gentail mite deidanna hong nei lo a, amaute in zong a up manun mi siangtho-in a bawl hi.
[13] A Sabbath ni ciangin Jew mite’ thungetna mun om ding hi, ci-in ka upna uh khua pualama gun gei-ah ka pai uh a, tua lai-ah tu-in a kikhawm numeite tungah thu ka hilh uh hi.

[19] Jew mite in kei hong thahsawmna hangin kiniamkhiatna le khitui naptui tawh haksapi-in Topa’ na ka sem hi. [20] Mihon lak ahi a, note’ inn sungah ahi zongin ka hong thuhilhna khempeuhah note’ phattuam nading a om khempeuh siit nei loin kong gen khin hi. [21] Jew mi le Gentail mite a mawhna panun Pasian’ lamah kihei-in i Topa Jesuh a up nadingun thu ka gen khinzo hi.

[18] Pasian’ teel mite’ omna mun a amau om nading mun sanah hong om theih nadingun keimah hong upna uh tawh a mawhna uh a kimaisak theihna dingin Satan’ khutsung panin Pasian’ khut sungah a heikhia ding le khuamial panin khuavak lamah hei-in a mit uh khua a musak ding pa na hi hi,’ a hong ci hi.

[17] Lai Siangtho sungah, “Pasian a upna hangin amah tawh pawlkhat ahi mite nungta ding hi,” ci-in a kigelh mah bangin Pasian in amah tawh a kipawl theih nadingin mite a bawlna zia, lungdamna thu in hong kilangsak hi. Tua pen, a patna panin a tawp dongin upna hang bek tawh ahihna thu hong laktel hi.

[22] Tua thu in: Jew mi le Gentail mi kuamah a kilamdanna om loin Jesuh Khrih upna hangin mi khempeuh in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna a ngah hi. [23] Mi khempeuh mawh ciat uh a, a hong honkhia Pasian tawh kigamla uh hi. [24] Ahi zongin Pasian in a hong hehpihna hangin Khrih Jesuh tawh hong tatkhiat manin amah tawh i kipawlthei kik hi. [25] Ama hong sihna hangin mawhna a kimaisak theih nadingin Pasian in Jesuh hong pia a, amah a umte in mawhmaisakna a ngah uh hi. Amah tawh i kipawl theih nading zia hong lahna-in hih bangin Pasian a hong gamta ahi hi. Pasian a lungduaina hangin a beisa hunah i mawhnate hong en khong phot hi. [26] Ahi zongin tuhun ciangin Jesuh a um mi khempeuh Pasian tawh a kipawl theih nading le amah thuman ahihna a kilatsak nadingin mihingte’ mawhna tawh kisai-in na hong sem hi. [27] Tua ahihleh mihingte in i kisialhpih ding bang om ahi hiam? Bangmah om lo hi. Bang bulphuh ding ihi hiam? Thukham zuihna bulphuh ding ihi hiam? Hi lo hi. I upna a bulphuh ding ihi hi. [28] Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khatpeuh Pasian tawh a kipawl theihna pen Thukham zuihzawhna hang hi loin upna hang hi, ci-in i genzo hi. [29] Pasian, Jew mite’ Pasian bek hi a, Gentail mite’ Pasian hi lo ahi hiam? Gentail mite’ Pasian zong hi veve hi. [30] Pasian khat bek hi a, a upna uh hangin Jew mite amah tawh a kipawl thei-in a bawl mah bangin Gentail mite zong a upna uh hang mah tawh amah tawh a kipawl thei-in a bawl hi. [31] Tua ahihleh hih upna thu i gen ciangin Thukham a phiat ihi hiam? Hi lo hi; a kipsak semsem ihi hi.

[5] Ahi zongin Pasian’ maipha ngah nadingin nasepna suang loin upna a suang mipa pen Pasian in mimawh kimlai midik hi, ci-in sang ahih manin, amah tawh a kipawl theih nadingin Pasian in tua mipa’ upna thupi san hi.

[16] Tua ahih manin Abraham’ suanlekhakte khempeuh tungah Pasian’ hehpihna piakkhong a suahtheih nadingin Thukham a zuite bek in ngah loin, Abraham’ up bangin a umte in zong a ngahtheih nadingun upna bulphuhin thuciamna kipia hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Abraham pen kha thu lamah eite khempeuh’ pupi ahi hi.
[20] Amah in Pasian’ thuciamna muanlah dingin ngaihsun lo a, a upna khahsuah het lo hi. A upna hangin thakhauh semsemin Pasian a phat hi.
[24] Sihna panin i Topa Jesuh a hingsak pa a um eite khempeuh zong i upna hangin mihoihin hong kisang ding hi, ci-in eite a dingin zong a kigelh ahi hi.

[1] Tu-in upna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl khinta ihih manin i Topa Jesuh Khrih hangin Pasian tawh a kilemkik ta ihi hi. [2] Ama hangin upna tawh tu-a i omna Pasian hehpihna sungah a tung ihi a, Pasian tawh minthanna ngahkhawm ding, ci-in lamen ihih manin i lung a dam hi. [3] Haksatna i thuak laitak nangawnin i lungdam veve hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh haksatna in thuakzawh hatna piangsak a, [4] thuakzawh hatna in Pasian’ pahtakna hong ngahsak a, ama hong pahtakna in lametna lianpi hong neisak ahihna thu i thei hi. [5] Pasian in eite tungah a hong piak a Kha Siangtho tawh eite sungah ama itna hong guang ahih manin hih lametna in eite hong lungkiasak ngei lo hi.

[24] Hih bangin lamenin i upna in eite hong honkhia khin hi. Ahi zongin i lamet pen i muh ciangin tua pen lamet hi nawn lo hi. Kua in a muhsa nate lamen nawn ahi hiam? [25] I muh lohte i lamet ciangin lungduaitakin i ngak thei hi.

[9] Jesuh pen Topa hi, ci-in mite kiangah genin, Pasian in sihna panin amah hingkiksak zo hi, ci-in na lungsim sung uhah na up taktak uhleh hotkhiatna na ngah ding uh hi. [10] Bang hang hiam cih leh i lungsim ah i up taktakna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna kingah a, i kamin i genna hangin hotkhiatna a kingah ahi hi.

[16] Ahi zongin Isaiah in, “Topa aw, ka thugente uh kua in um ahi hiam?” a cih mah bangin Lungdamna Thu a za mi khempeuh in um kim lo uh hi. [17] Tua ahih ciangin zakna panin upna hong piangthei a, Khrih thu up nading pen hilhna panin hong piangthei pan hi.

[3] Pasian in kei tungah hehpihna hong piakkhongna hangin note tungah kong gennop thu in: Note tawh a kituakzah valin kilian ngaihsutzaw kha kei un. Pasian in note tungah upna hong piakzah tawh kizui-in kingaihsun bek zaw unla, a kilawm ciang khat bekin kingaihsun un.
[1] Upna neu mite pawlbawl unla, na ngaihsutna uh a kituah kei leh zong mawhsak kei un.

[22] Hih thu-ah no’ upna le no’ ngaihsutnate, Pasian tawh note’ kikal thu hisak un. Amau lungsim sungah man a sak bangun a gamta zote pen a lung uh nuam mahmah hi. [23] Ahi zongin lunghimawh pipi-in a ne a om leh, a upna uh tawh kizui-in a gamta hi lo uh ahih manin Pasian in tua bang mite a mawhsak ding hi. I upna bangin gamtat lohna peuhpeuh mawhna ahi hi.
[1] Upna lamah a thahat eite in upna zawngkhalte’ ginat lohna i thuakpih ding kilawm hi; eima ut bangin i gamta kei ding hi.

[13] Kha Siangtho’ huhna tawh note’ lametna a khan semsem theih nadingin, lametna a hong piathei Pasian in, amah na upna uh hangin lungdamna le nopsakna tawh note hong kidimsak tahen. [14] Thu upna sungah sanggamte aw, note mihoih hi-in, bangci gamtat ding cih thei-in, khatlekhat zong a kihilhthei dingin kong muang mahmah hi.
[5] Tua ahih manin note’ thu upna pen mihingte’ pilna hang hi loin, Pasian’ vangliatna hangin a um na hi uh hi.
[2] Thuhilh siamna nei-in, thusim khempeuh thei-in, na khempeuh thei-in, mualte kinsak zawh nading upna ka neih hangin itna ka neih kei leh ka kimanna bangmah om lo hi.
[13] Tu laitakin a omlai thu thumte pen upna, lametna, le itna hi a, tua thumte sung panin itna mah a thu lianpen ahi hi.
[13] Kiging tawntungin na upna uhah kip unla, thahatin hang un.
[24] Hih bangin um un, ci-in thatanghat thu tawh a hong gen ding ka hi kei uh hi. Note na upna uhah kipkhin na hih manun note’ lungdam nadingin note tawh na a semkhawm ka hi uh hi.

[13] Lai Siangtho in, “Um ka hih manin ka gen hi,” a cih mah bangin kote in zong um ka hih uh manin a gen ka hi uh hi. [14] Topa Jesuh a hingkik sakpa in Jesuh mah tawh kote zong hong hingkiksak khawmin note tawh ama omna-ah hong paipih khawm ding hi, ci-in ka thei uh hi.

[6] Tua ahih manin lungmuang takin ka om tawntung uh hi. Hih ka leitung pumpi uhah ka om laiteng uh Topa’ hong piak ding pumpi tawh a omkhawm nai lo ka hi uh hi. [7] Muhna hang tawh lungmuangin a om hi loin upna hang tawh lungmuang takin a om ka hi uh hi.
[5] Thu um taktak mah ihi hiam, ci-in nomau mahmah na ki-entel ciat un. Na ki-ettelna uhah a cingtaak lo na hih kei nak-uhleh note sungah Khrih om ahih manin thu phawk un.

[15] A taktakin ci lehang kote pen ka pian’ ka patun Jew mi ka hi uh a, “Mawhnei Gentail mi,” ka cih pawlte uh ka hi kei uh hi. [16] Ahi zongin Jesuh Khrih upna hang bek tawh Pasian tawh kipawl theihna kingahin, Thukham zuihna hang tawh kingah ngei lo hi, ci-in ka thei uh hi. Kote mahmah in zong, Khrih hangin Pasian tawh ka kipawl theih nadingun Jesuh Khrih ka um uh a, Thukham deihna ka zuihna hang uh tawh hi lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Thukham zuihna hang tawh kuamah in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna ngah zo lo hi.

[20] Tua ahih manin tuhuna ka nuntakna zia pen kei hang hi nawn loin ka sungah a hong om Khrih hang ahi hi. Tua hi a, keimah hong itin, keima a dingin a nuntakna a hong pia Pasian’ Tapa ka muanna tawh tu laitakin a nungta ka hi hi.

[6] Abraham tunga thupiang ngaihsun dih un. Lai Siangtho in, “Abraham in Pasian um a, tua a upna hangin Pasian in amah tawh a kipawlthei dingin mihoihin a sang hi,” na ci hi. [7] Tua ahih manin Abraham’ suanlekhak a man taktak i cihte pen upna a nei mite ahihna thu na theih ding uh ahi hi.
[9] Abraham in a up manin Pasian in thupha a piak mah bangin Pasian a um midang khempeuh in zong thupha a ngah ahi uh hi.

[11] Tu-in Lai Siangtho in, “Upna hangin Pasian tawh a kipawlthei mite bek nungta ding hi,” na ci ahih manin Thukham hangin kuamah in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna a ngah lohna thu teltakin hong kilang hi. [12] Lai Siangtho in, “Thukham’ deih bangin a gamta zote nungta ding hi,” na ci ahih manin Thukham zuihna le upna thu na kimemat kha lo hi.

[21] Tua ahihleh Thukham le Pasian’ thuciamnate a kilehngat ahi uh hiam? Hi het lo hi. Mihingte tungah hong kipia Thukham in nuntakna taktak hong pia thei hileh tua Thukham zuihna hangin mi khempeuh in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna ngah ding uh hi. [22] Ahi zongin Jesuh Khrih a um mite tungah a upna hangun Pasian’ thuciam a kipiak theih nadingin Lai Siangtho in, “Mawhna khutnuai-ah leitung mi khempeuh a om hi,” na ci hi.
[26] Khrih Jesuh tawh na kipawl manun note khempeuh Pasian’ tate na suahtheihna uh pen na upna hang uh ahi hi.
[5] Kote ahihleh Pasian in amah tawh a kipawlthei dingin hong bawl ding hi, ci-in lamenin, kote’ upna hangin Kha Siangtho’ vangliatna tawh hong piang ding hi, ci-in a om ka hi uh hi.
[8] Note’ upna hangin Pasian’ hong hehpihna tawh hotkhiatna a ngah na hi uh hi. Note’ thalawhna hangin a ngah hi loin Pasian’ hong piakkhong ahi hi.

[16] note’ lungsim a thahat nadingin Pasian in a kicing ama vangliatna sung panin a Kha Siangtho tawh note hong thakhauh sakin, [17] na upna hangun note lungsim sungah Khrih hong tengin, itna thu-ah zung thuk kha-in bulkip na neih nadingun thu ka ngen hi.
[16] Tua banah, dawimangpa’ hong kapna thaltang kuangte na sukmit nadingun lum puak bangin upna na nei tawntung un.

[2] Note khempeuh hangin Pasian tungah lungdamna ko tawntungin, ka thungetna uhah note ka hong phawk tawntung uh hi. [3] Bang hang hiam cih leh i Pa Pasian kiangah thu ka nget simun note’ upna hangin na nuntakziate uh, itna na neih manun nakpitakin na nasepnate uh le i Topa Jesuh Khrih hong paikik ding lametna na neih manun kiptakin na omnate uh ka phawk tawntung uh hi.

[5] Tua ahih manin ka thuakzawh nawn loh ciangin note’ upna zia a thei dingin Timoti ka hong sawl hi. Dawimangpa’ ze-etna in note hong puksakkha-in, kote’ nasepna a mawkna suakkha ding hi, ci-in ka lunghimawh uh hi.
[7] Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, note’ upna thu ka zak uh ciangin lungkham sinkhamna ka thuak laitakun ka tha uh hong hatsak hi.

[3] Sanggamte aw, note’ upna nakpitakin khang a, note khatlekhat na ki-itna uh lian semsem ahih manin Pasian tungah lungdamna koh ding a kilawm ahih mah bangin, note hangin ama tungah lungdamna ka ko tawntung uh hi.
[8] Pasian a thei lo mite, le i Topa Jesuh tawh kisai Lungdamna Thu a um lo mite tungah gimna a tungsak ding hi.
[6] Sanggamte aw, i Topa Jesuh Khrih min tawh kong sawlnop uh thu panin: Note tungah ka hong hilhsa uh thute a zui lo, a thadah gamtat thu uppih mite tawh na kikhawl kei un.
[5] Hih bangin thupiakna pen, upna taktak le kisuanna om hetloin lungsim siangtho taktak tawh ngaihsutna panin a hong piangkhia ki-itna a khantheih nading deihna ahi hi.
[14] Pasian in genzawh lohin kei hong hehpih a, Khrih Jesuh tawh kipawlna hangin i ngahtheih upna le itna a hong guan hi.
[19] na upna le lungsim kisuang loin na omna thu kiptakin len paisuak in. Mi pawlkhatte in a lungsim kitheihna uhah man a kisakna bangun gamta lo uh ahih manin a thu upna uh a mawkna a suah uh hi.
[1] Nidang ciangin a upna panun mi pawlkhat pialin, zuauthu gente le dawi thu a kigente a zuih nading uh Kha Siangtho in teltakin a gen hi.
[12] Khangno lai na hihna thu hangin mite’ simmawh dingin na om kei inla, kampauna, gamtatna, itna, upna, le sianthona-ah thu um mite’ etteh dingin na om in.

[11] Ahi zongin Pasian’ mi ahi nangmah in tua thute khempeuh pelh inla, thuman thutak, Pasian’ deih bangin nuntakna, upna, itna, kipna, le lungnemna na neihzawh nadingin hanciam in. [12] Upna thu-ah hoihtakin nawksuak inla, mi tampi’ zakin na pulaksa, Pasian in nangmah a hong piak nuntak tawntungna lenkip in.
[15] Khrih Jesuh upna hangin hotkhiatna a hong ngahsak thei ding pilna a hong pia Lai Siangtho pen na neutung a kipanin a theisa na hihna thu zong na theihsa thu mah ahi hi.

[7] Kidemna-ah ka hat tawpin ka hih khin a, a mong dongin ka tai khin a, upna thu khotakin lenin ka zokhin hi. [8] Thu a manin a khen Topa in tua Ni ciangin kei a hong piak ding thuman lukhu ahi gualzawhna thaman in tu-in kei hong ngak gige hi. Kei tung bekah a hong pia ding hi lo a, ama hong paikik ding itna tawh a ngakte khempeuh tungah zong a pia ding ahi hi.
[22] Tua ahih manin mawhna thu-ah kisuanna lungsim om nawn loin, tui siangtho tawh i pumpi a kisawpsa-in muanna le lungsim takpi tawh Pasian kiang zuan ni.

[38] Ahi zongin keima mi a thuman mite in ka thu umin nungta ding uh a, a nungkik a om uhleh tua mite tungah ka lungkim kei ding hi,” na ci hi. [39] Eite pen nungkikin a maimang mite ihi kei a, upna nei-in hotkhiatna a ngah mite ihi hi.

[1] Upna nei i cih ciangin i muhtheih nai loh i lamette ngah takpi ding, ci-in muanna lungsim neihna ahi hi. [2] Tanglai mite in upna a na neih manun Pasian in a na pakta hi. [3] Pasian’ kampauna tawh leitung le vantung piang a, tu-a i muhtheih nate a om nai lopi panin hong piang hi, ci-in i upna bek mah tawh a thei ihi hi. [4] A upna hang mah tawh Abel in Kain’ piakna sangin a santheih huaizaw biakpiakna Pasian’ tungah a na pia hi. Pasian in ama biakna na sang ahih manin a upna hangin mihoih hi, ci-in Pasian’ pahtakna a na ngah hi. Abel a sihzawh a sawtpi hikhin napi-in tu dong mahin upna thu a hong gengen lai a suak hi. [5] A upna hang mahin Enok zong sihna tawh kipelh hi. Pasian in ama kiangah lato ahih manin kuamah in Enok mu nawn lo hi. Amah a kilaktoh ma-in Enok in Pasian’ lungkimna ngah hi, ci-in Lai Siangtho in a na gen hi. [6] Upna lo tawh kuamah in Pasian lungkimsak zo lo hi. Pasian kiang a zuan mi peuhmah in Pasian a om takpi ahihna thu le amah a zongte Pasian in thaman pia hi, ci-in a up ding kisam hi. [7] Noah in zong a upna hang mah tawh mailam a thupiang ding a muh theih lohpi mahin Pasian’ thugenna na mang a, teembaw khat bawlin a innkuanpihte tawh na suakta hi. Hih bangin a gamtatna tawh leitung midangte a mawh ahihna kilangsak a, a upna hangin mihoih hihna thu Pasian kiang panin a ngah hi. [8] Pasian in ama tungah piak dingin a ciam leitangah Abraham a pai dingin a sap lai-in Abraham in Pasian’ sapna a manna pen a upna hang mah ahi hi. A pai nading mun nangawn thei lopi-in a gam le a lei nusia-in a ding khia hi. [9] Pasian in piak dingin a ciam gamah a upna hang mah tawh gamdangpi hinapi-in peemta-in va om phot a, ama ngah bangin thuciamna a ngah a ta Isaac le a tu Jakob tawh puanbuk peuhah a om phot uh hi. [10] Pasian in geelin a lam, bulkip a nei khuapi, Abraham in a ngakna-in tua bangin a om ahi hi.

[17] Pasian in Abraham a ze-et laitakin Abraham in a upna hang mah tawh Pasian biak nadingin a tapa Isaac na pia ngam hi. Pasian mah in Abraham tungah tapa ka hong pia ding ci-in a ciam hinapi-in, Pasian’ ciamna bangin a neih tua a tapa neihsun mah, Pasian biak nadingin Abraham in pia dingin na kithawi hi.
[23] Moses a suah ciangin a nu le a pa in hoihsa mahmahin, kumpipa’ thupiakna kihta tuan loin kha thum sung a seelcip ngamna uh zong a upna hang mah uh ahi hi.

[2] Eite hong makai-in i upna a hong cingtaaksak Jesuh mitsuanin nei ni. Mailamah a ngah ding lungdamna hangin maizumna kihta loin singlamteh tungah sihna hong thuak a, tu-in Pasian tokhom taklamah a tu hi.

[2] Sanggamte aw, thuhaksa a tuamtuam na thuak uh ciangin lungdam nadingin na ngaihsun zaw un. [3] Tua bangin na upna uh hong kize-etna na thuakzawh uh ciangin na kipna uh hong kilangsak ahihna thu na thei uh hi.

[22] Nomau kikhem tawmin thu zak bek tawh maisak kei unla, na zak bangun zui-in semzaw un. [23] Mi khat in thu a zak bek tawh maisakin a zakna bangin a zuih kei leh limlangah a maitang a ki-en mipa tawh kibang bek hi. [24] Limlangah a ki-en mipa in amah hoihtakin a kimuh khit ciangin paikhia a, bangci pian ka hi hiam cih a mangngilh pah hi. [25] Ahi zongin mite a suaktasak thei thukham cingtaak hoihtakin a et khit ciangin a thu ngai-in a mangngilh pah hi loin, hoihtakin ngaihsun tawntungin a zuite pen a sepna khempeuh uhah Pasian in thupha a pia ding hi.

[14] Sanggamte aw, mi khat in, “Upna ka nei hi,” a cih hangin a sepna in a zuih kei leh bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam? Tua a upna bek in amah honkhia ding ahi hiam? [15] Gentehna-in, na mipih khat peuhpeuh uh annek tuidawn, nikten’ puansilh nei loin haksapi-in om hen la, [16] note khat peuhpeuh in, ama pumpi kisapna bangmah pia lopi-in, “Khualum gilvah takin om in,” ci mawk lel le-uhcin bang phattuamna om ding ahi hiam? [17] Tua ahih ciangin gamtatna in a zui lo upna guak pen a si ahi hi. [18] Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh in, “Mi khat in upna nei a, adang khat in gamtatna nei hi,” ci zenzen leh, gamtatna in a zui lo upna hong lak dih in; keimah in ahihleh ka upna ka gamtatna tawh ka hong lak ding hi, ka ci ding hi. [19] Pasian khat bek om hi, ci-in na um hi. Tua pen hoih mahmah hi. Dawite nangawn in zong tua bangin umin lau-in ling deldel uh hi. [20] Lawmte aw, gamtatna in a zui lo upna pen a hawmpi ahihna thu ka hong lak ding hi. [21] Eite’ pupi Abraham in biakna tau tungah a tapa Isaac a piakna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl thei hi. [22] Tua ahih manin upna le sepna kizom khawm a, sepna in upna a kicinsakna thu na thei uh hi. [23] Lai Siangtho in, “Abraham in Pasian um a, a upna hangin Pasian in mihoihin a sang hi,” ci-in a genna thumanin tung takpi a, Abraham pen Pasian’ lawmpa kici hi. [24] Tua ahih manin, mi khatpeuh in a upna bek tawh hi loin, a sepna tawh a kizuih ciangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna ngah pan ahihna thu na thei uh hi. [25] Numei paktat Rahab zong tua bangmah ahi hi. Israel mi thukante hoihtakin zin na do-in, lampi dangah ciahsakin na suaktasak a, ama nasepna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna a ngah ahi hi. [26] Tua ahih manin hu a diik lo, hu a sang lo pumpi pen a si ahih mah bangin sepna tawh a kizom lo upna zong a si ahi hi.
[15] Upna tawh thu a kinget ciangin Topa in cinate noptuamsakin, damsak ding a, mawhna nei ahihleh zong a mawhna maisak ding hi.

[5] Note’ upna hangin nitawp ni ciangin na ngah ding uh hotkhiatna nomau-a’ ahihna a kilatsak nadingin Pasian in ama vangliatna tawh a hong kepsak ahi hi. [6] Tua ahih manin tu laitakin mite’ bawlsiatna a tuamtuam na thuak manun tawlkhat na lungkham uh ahi zongin hih bang thuakna hangin lungdamzaw un. [7] Hih bang thuaknate in a um takpi mah na hihna uh hong kilangsak hi. A siathei khamte nangawn, a hoih taktak mah ahi hiam, ci-in mite in mei tawh sin uh ahih manin, kham sangin a manphazaw note’ upna zong a kiptak mah ahi hiam, ci-in Pasian in hong sin ding mah ahi hi. Tua bangin na thuakzawh uhleh Khrih hong kilat Ni ciangin phatna, minthanna, le pahtawina na ngah ding uh hi. [8] Amah mu ngei lo napi-in na it uh a, amah mu ngei lo napi-in a thu umin kama genzawh loh zah dongin nakpitakin na lungdam uh hi. [9] Tua bangin na upna uh hangin kha thu-ah hotkhiatna a ngah na hi uh hi.
[21] Sihna panin amah hingkiksakin minthanna a pia Pasian, ama hangin muang thei na hih uh manin, na up na muan na lamet uh Pasian ahi hi.
[9] Leitungah thu um dang khempeuh in zong note’ thuak mah bangin a thuak ahihna thu thei unla, na upna uhah kipin Dawimangpa na nial un.
[1] Jesuh Khrih nasem le sawltak ahi keimah Simon Peter in: Eite’ Pasian le Honpa ahi Jesuh Khrih a thumanna hangin kote’ upna zah mahin upna manpha a nei mite tungah lai ka hong khak hi.

[5] Hih thu hangin na upna ban uhah gamtat hoihna na behlap unla, na gamtat hoihna uh thutheihna tawh na behlap un; [6] na thutheihna uh pumpi ki-ukzawhna tawh na behlap unla, na pumpi ki-ukzawhna uh thuakzawhna tawh na behlap un; na thuakzawhna uh Pasian’ deih bangin gamtatna tawh na behlap unla, [7] Pasian’ deih bangin na gamtatna uh sanggam ki-itna tawh na behlap un; na sanggam ki-itna uh itna thukpi tawh na behlapzawh nadingun na hanciam un. [8] Hih bang hoihnate a kicingin na neih uhleh i Topa Jesuh Khrih na theihna uhah thahatin kimanna na nei ding uh hi.
[1] Jesuh, Khrih hi, ci-in a um mi khempeuh Pasian’ tate hi a, pa a it mi peuhmah in a ta zong a it hi.

[4] Pasian’ ta ahite peuhmah in leitung nate zo uh a, i upna tawh leitung nate tungah a gualzo ihi hi. [5] Kuate in leitung nate zo ding ahi hiam i cih leh, Jesuh pen Pasian’ Tapa hi, ci-in a umte bek in zo ding uh hi.
[13] Pasian’ Tapa a um mite in nuntak tawntungna a nei na hih lamtak uh na theih nadingun hih lai a hong gelh ka hi hi.

[22] A um taktak zo lote hehpih unla, [23] meiphual sung panin dawhkhiat bangin midangte na honkhia un. Mi pawlkhatte’ mawhna-ah note zong na siatkhak loh nadingun kidop kawmna tawh na huh unla, amau’ gamtat hoih lo mawhnate na mudah un.
[22] Leitung a omlai tengin, lo pawi hun le anlak hun, a vot le a sa, khuakhal le phalbi, sun le zan bei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.

[12] Isaac in tua leitangah khai tuh a, tua kum mahin a zah zakhat la hi. TOPA in amah thupha pia a, [13] a neihsa kibehlaplap ahih manin a hau mahmah khat a suak hi. [14] Amah in tuuhon le bawnghon, le innkuan mi tampi nei a, Filistia mite in amah eng uh hi.

[16] “Mi khat in a luah ama leitang phelkhat TOPA’ tungah a ap leh, nangma sehna pen khaici vawh zah ding tawh kizui ding hi. Mangbuhham beem khat dim a pawina leitang pen ngun shekel sawmnga-in kiseh ding hi.
[30] “Leitang panin a piang khempeuh khaici hitaleh singgah hitaleh sawm-ah-khat TOPA a’ hi a, TOPA a dingin siangtho hi.

[28] Sathau tawh a kibawl ahi an tawh a biak nadingin zong, bawngtal khat ciangin annel lawh thum, tuutal khat ciangin lawh nih, [29] tuuno sagihte khat ciangin lawh khat tawh na pia khawm ding uh hi. [30] Note a dingin kilemna bawl nadingin keel a pa khat zong na pia ding uh hi. [31] A kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna le an tawh biaknate banah tuate le leenggahzu tawh biakna na pia ding uh hi. Tuate a sitbaang lo ahih ding thei ta un.
[9] “Na leenggui lo uhah khaici nam nih na vawh kei ding uh hi. Vawh le-uh cin na vawh uh an le na leenggui lo uhah a piang khempeuh a nin suak ding hi.

[2] Tua ciangin Elisha in tua numei kiangah, “Nang a dingin bang hong hihsak thei ding ka hi hiam? Inn sungah bang nei na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Na nasemnu in sathau biing khat cih simloh inn sungah bangmah dang nei lo hi,” a ci hi. [3] Tua ciangin amah in, “A pua-ah paikhia inla, beel hawm a tawm lua lo, na vengte khempeuh’ beel va kawm in. [4] Tua ciangin sungtumin, nang le na tapate kong kikhaknelh unla, hih beelte khempeuh sungah sung in. Beel khat a dim simin tuamkoih pahpah in,” a ci hi.
[8] Mawhna bawlin buaina a piangsak mi in a gamtatna bangin a gah a atna ka thei hi.
[37] Amaute in lo-ah an tuhin leenggui suan uh a, a gah tampi tak a ngah uh hi.
[5] Khitui tawh khai a tuhte lungdamin kikona tawh an la sak ta in. [6] Kap kawmin kuankhia-in a tuh ding khaici a pua mi lungdamin kikona tawh buhlomte pua-in hong ciah ding hi.
[24] Mi pawlkhat in sum zang ziahziah napi-in hau semsem uh a, mi pawlkhat cil mahmah napi, zawng semsem hi. [25] A cingh mite hau semsem ding a, midang a huhte in huhna mah ngahkik ding hi.
[8] Thuman lo khaici a vawhte in lungkhamna tuak uh a, amau’ hehna ciangduai amau’ tung mah tukik ding hi.
[3] Judah gammite le Jerusalem khuamite tungah TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Na lote uh kal unla, ling lakah khai vawh kei un.
[7] Paunak-ah, Huih a tuhte in huih ngahkik ding a, a vui om lo an kung in annek ding piangsak lo hi, kici hi. A vui om lo an kung panin an kingah mah taleh zong gamdang mite in netum ding hi.

[12] Khai tuh bangin thuman tuhin, kei nong itna hangun a piang thuphate at un. Note’ TOPA keima lamah nong kihei ding uh a hun hita ahih manin lo thak lei kalkham un. Tua hileh kei hong pai-in note tungah thupha kong pia ding hi, ka ci hi.

[3] Ahi zongin note in mi cimawhte citna tawh na huh uh ciangin na lawm naihuai pente uh nangawn in hong theih loh nadingun pia unla, [4] kuamah theisak kei un. Tua hileh kuama muh lohin na gamtatna uh a mu na Pa un note tungah thaman hong pia ding hi.
[12] Tua ahih manin note tungah hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah na bawl un. Moses Thukhamte le kamsangte’ thuhilhnate pen hih mah a deihna ahi hi.

[32] Khaici khempeuh lak panin ankam tang a neupen ahi hi. Ahi zongin a khankhit ciangin ankung lakah a golpen suak ahih manin vasate in a hiang tungah bu a tomtheihna zah ding ciang hong suak thei hi,” a ci hi.

[38] Midangte tungah pia un. Tua hileh Pasian in note tungah zong hong pia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh midangte na piakna uh tawh kizui-in a henhen, a tahtah, a dimletin Pasian in note tungah hong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.

[18] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Pasian’ Ukna bang tawh kibang a, bang tawh genteh ding ka hi hiam cih leh: [19] Mi khat in a lo-ah a vawh ankam tang khat tawh kibang hi. Tua ankam tang hong khangin kung golpi hong suak a, vasate in a hiang tungah bu a tom thei uh hi,” a ci hi.

[35] Note in na paunak uhah, ‘Khai tuh khit kha li ciangin anlak hun hi,’ na ci uh hi. Tu-in note khuadakin lote en un. An khempeuh min khinta a, lak ding bek in sam hi. [36] Khaituh pa le anla pa a lungdam khawm theih nadingin anla pa thaman a kipiak mah bangin anla pa in zong a nungta tawntung dingin mi a khawm ding hi. [37] Tua ahih manin, ‘Khat in khai tuhin, adang khat in a an la,’ ci-in paunak a om pen thuman mahmah hi. [38] Tua ahih manin note in na khawh loh uh lo-ah an a la dingin ka hong sawl hi. Midang in tua lo na kho a, note in a lak bek a si na hi uh hi,” a ci hi.

[16] Tua ahih manin Jesuh in Sabbath ni-in cina a damsakna hangin amaute in Jesuh bawlsiat ding a kipan uh hi. [17] Ahi zongin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Ka Pa in tuni dongin na sem tawntung ahih manin kei zong ka sep ding mah ahi hi,” a ci hi. [18] Hih bangin ama kampauna hangin amaute in Jesuh thatnuam semsem uh hi. Amah in Sabbath thukham a palsat bek hi loin, Pasian nangawn ka Pa ci ahih manin Pasian tawh a kikimin kiseh hi, ci-in a mawhsak uh hi.

[23] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Mihing Tapa in Pasian’ pianzia a ngah ding hun hong tungta hi. [24] A mantakin ci lehang, mangbuhhum tang khat leilakah kituhin si masa kei leh tang khat bek mah hi ngitnget hi; ahi zongin si masa leh tang tampi tak hong nei thei hi. [25] Tua ahih manin hih leitung nuntakna a itte in a nuntakna taktak taanlawh ding a, hih leitung nuntakna a it lote in nuntakna taktak nei tawntung ding hi.

[35] Topa Jesuh mahmah in, ‘Ngahna sangin piak khiatna-ah lungdamna lianzaw hi,’ a cihna phawkkawmin nakpitakin nasepna tawh na khempeuhah a zawngkhalte huh ding hi hang, ci-in note kiangah kong lak khinzo hi,” ci-in a vaikhak hi.

[1] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Pasian in eite tam veipi tak hong hehpih ahih manin ama lungkim nading le ama nasep nadingin nomau mahmah a hingtangin Pasian tungah na kipiak nadingun ka hong thum hi. Tua banga kipiakna pen Pasian biakna man taktak ahi hi.

[6] Keima nasep pen khaici vawh hi a, Apollos’ nasep pen tuibuah hi a, ahi zongin a khangsak pa ahihleh Pasian ahi hi. [7] Khaici vawh pa le tuibuak pa a thupi hi lo a, a khangsak Pasian a thupi hi bek hi.
[11] Note lakah kha thu tawh kisai khaici hong vawh ka hih manun, note tung panin leitung nate ka ngah uh hangin a lianlua hi lo hi.

[35] Mi pawlkhatte in, “A sisa mite bangci thawhkik ding a, bang pumpi tawh thokik ding ahi hiam?” cikha thei hi. [36] Tua bang ngaihsutna haihuai mahmah hi. Khaici na tuh uh ciangin a muat lopi-in hong po thei lo hi. [37] Mangbuhci ahi a, khaici dang khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin na tuh uh ciangin hong po-in a khankhit ciangin a kung omzia dingteng tawh a tuh na hi kei uh a, a khaici bek a tuh na hi uh hi. [38] Ahi zongin Pasian in ama hoihsak bangin a kung ding na pia a, khaici nam tuamtuamte a’ ding kung nam tuamtuam a guan hi.
[6] Note in na phawk ding uh thu panin: Khaici tawm a vawhte in tawm mah la ding a, tampi a vawhte in tampi mah la ding uh hi.

[10] Tua ahih manin vawh ding khaici le nek ding an hong pia Pasian in note’ cit piakna hangin nopsakna lian tampi na ngahtheih nadingun note tungah a kisam khaici hong guanin a pungsak ding hi. [11] Kote tungtawnin note’ huhna sumte a ngahna uh hangin mi tampi in Pasian a phattheih nadingin note na cit gamtatzawh tawntung nadingun Pasian in hong hausak tawntung ding hi. [12] Bang hang hiam cih leh note’ huhna sumte in Pasian’ mi a cimawhte’ dong a hu bek hi loin, Pasian’ tungah lungdamkoh nading zong a piangsak ahi hi.

[7] Pasian a kikhemzo dingin ngaihsunkha kei un. Mi khempeuh in ama vawh nam khaici mah ngahkik ding hi. [8] Mi khatpeuh in ama leitung pumpi deihna khaici a vawh leh sihna ngah ding a, Kha Siangtho deihna khaici a vawh leh Kha Siangtho tung panin nuntak tawntungna ngah ding hi. [9] Tua ahih manin na hoih sep ding cimtak kei ni. Lungkia loin i sep nakleh a hun ciangin thaman i ngah ding hi.
[20] Ama sihna hangin Tuucing Lianpa suakin, a sisan tawh tawntung thuciamna a kipsak i Topa Jesuh pen sihna panin a thokiksak, eite tungah nopsakna a hong pia Pasian in,
[18] Kilemna a piangsak mite in lungnuam takin a tuh khaici in hoihna le dikna a piangsak hi.
[1] A kipat cil-in Pasian in vantung le leitung a piangsak hi.
[22] TOPA in Moses kiangah, “Nangmah in Israel mite tungah hih bangin na gen ding hi: ‘Vantung panin note kong hopihna note mahmah in na thei khin uh hi.
[30] Amaute in hih mun lamah hong nget uh ciangin na mi Israel-te’ hong thumna zong ngai in. Na tenna mun vantung panin hong za inla, ka mawhna uh hong maisak in.
[11] Tua ciangin amaute a pai kawmkawm a kiho laitakun, mei leeng khat le mei sakolte in amaute nih a khen hi. Tua ciangin vantungah Elijah pingpei-in paito hi.

[6] Ahih hangin vantung, a sang pen vantung nangawn in amah huam zo lo ahih manin ama a dingin kua in biakinn lamzo ding ahi hiam? Ama mai-ah paknamtui halna ding cih simloh ama a dingin biakinn a lamsak dingin kei kua ka hi hiam?

[30] na tenna mun vantung panin za inla, maisakin, amau’ gamtatna khempeuh tawh kizui-in a lungsim uh na theih bangin amaute tungah pia ciat in (bang hang hiam cih leh nang, nang bek in mihing’ lungsim na thei hi).
[39] na tenna vantung panin amau’ thungetna le hong thumnate za in la, amau’ vai huhin nang tungah hong khial na mite maisak in.

[6] Nang bek TOPA na hi hi. Nangmah in a sang pen vantung le vana om khempeuh, leitung le a tunga om khempeuh, le tuipi le a sunga om khempeuh na bawl hi. Nangmah in tuate khempeuh na omsak a, vantung mihonpi in nang hong bia uh hi.
[8] Amah bek in vanpi zal a, tuipi tuihualte tuancil hi.
[4] Vantunga a tupa in amaute na nuihsan a, tua TOPA in amaute a zahko hi.

[3] Na nasepna, na bawlsa, kha le aksite, le na vantungte ka et ciangin, [4] na ngaihsut tham dingin mihing bang hi lel a, na phawk tham dingin mihing’ ta bang hi lel ahi hiam? [5] Ahi zongin, vantungmi sangin a neuzaw deuh bekin na bawl a, minthanna le pahtawina nangmah in na guan hi. [6] Na khut tawh na bawlsate khempeuh tungah ukna thu ama tungah na pia a, na khempeuh na uksak hi.
[4] TOPA a biakinn siangtho sungah om a, TOPA’ tokhom vantungah om hi. Amah in mihingte hong en a, mihingte’ gamtatna khempeuh a theitel hi.
[2] A pil gamtat, Pasian a zong a om uh hiam, cih a theih nadingin TOPA in vantung panin mihingte hong ensuk hi.
[11] Nangmah in nuntakna lampi keimah nong lak hi. Nangma omna munah lungdamna lianpi om a, nangma taklamah nop tawntungnate a om hi.
[1] Vantung in Pasian’ minthanna gen a, vanpi in ama nasepna taangko hi.
[6] TOPA in a sathau nilh pa a huh ding tu-in ka thei ta a, ama vantung siangtho panin amah dawng ding a, a vangliatna tawh amah gualzosak ding hi.
[6] Na hoihna le nong itna in ka khantawnin a hong zuih ding tel takin-ah ka thei ta a, a tawntungin na inn sungah ka om ding hi.
[6] TOPA’ kampauna tawh vantung piang a, a kam pana husanna tawh vantung nate a piang hi.
[6] Vantung in ama thumanna gen hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian mahmah thukhen pa ahi hi.
[24] Thulahna tawh keimah nong makaih a, a nung ciangin minthanna munah na hong tunpih ding hi. [25] Nang simloh vantungah kua nei ka hi hiam? Nang simloh ka deih ding leitungah kuamah om lo hi.
[11] Vantung pen leitung panin a san mah bangin amah a zahtakte’ tungah ama itna kip lianin sang mahmah hi.
[19] TOPA in vantungah ama tokhom phutkhin a, amah in mun khempeuh a uk hi.
[5] Pasian aw, vantungte’ tungah sangto lai in. Leitung khempeuhah na minthanna omsak in.
[16] Vantung pen TOPA a’ hi a, ahih hangin leitung pen mihingte tungah hong pia khin hi.
[8] Van le lei a bawl TOPA’ tung panin eite huhna hong pai hi.
[2] Thu ngaihsun masa-in pau inla, Pasian’ tungah thu mawk ciampak kei in. Vantungah Pasian om a, leitungah nang om na hih manin na pau ding a kilawm zahval pau kei in.
[15] I nute’ sung panin bangmah nei loin guaktangin i suah mah bangin guaktang mahin i ciahkik hi. I sepsate i ciahpihkik theih bangmah om lo hi.
[7] I pumpi, lei suakkik ding a, i nuntakna a hong pia Pasian’ kiangah i kha ciahkik ta ding hi.
[12] Keimah in leitung ka bawl a, tua tungah mi ka piangsak hi. Keima khut in vantungte zal a, keimah in vantung na honpite khempeuh thu ka pia hi.

[18] Vantungte a piangsak pa (amah Pasian!) Leitung piangsakin a bawl pa (a kipsak pa; a awngthawl dingin bawl loin, ten nadingin leitung a piangsak pa!) TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Kei pen TOPA ka hi a, kuamah dang om lo hi.
[9] Vantung pen leitung sangin a sanzawk mah bangin, keima paiziate zong, nomau paizia sangin sangzaw a, ka ngaihsutnate zong, nomau ngaihsutna sangin a sangzaw ahi hi.
[12] Pasian in ama vangliatna tawh leitung bawl a, ama pilna tawh leitung piangsakin, ama siamna tawh vantung a zal hi.
[17] ‘Topa PASIAN! Nangma vangpi le na khut tawh vantung le leitung na bawl khinzo hi. Nang a dingin a haksalua khat beek om lo hi.
[41] Vantunga om Pasian tungah i lungsim pia-in thu ngen ni.

[25] ahi zongin amaute’ lu tung sana om a kuum tung san panin awging kiza lai hi. [26] Tua kuum tungzangah, sapfaia suangmanpha tawh a kibawl kumpi tokhom bang pian khat om a, tua tokhom tungah mi tawh a kibang pian lim khat a tu hi. [27] Tua tokhom tungah a tu ka muh pen meikhuk sunga kihalsan sumngo bangin taang heuhau a, a kimkot khempeuh zong tua mah bangin taang pempam hi. [28] Tua a taang khuavak in meii lakah sakhituihup a kai ciangin a neih mel nam tuamtuam khempeuh a nei kim hi. TOPA’ vangliatna lim pen tu-a ka gen bang ahi hi. Hih bang ka muh ciangin leilakah ka boksuk a, tua ciangin awging khat ka za hi.
[35] Amah in leitung mite bangmahin a sim kei a, vantung mite le leitung mite ama khutnuai ahi hi. Ama deihna kuamah in nial thei lo a, a bawlnate kuamah in a hang a kan thei kei hi.
[6] TOPA in vantungah a inndeite bawl a, van kuumpi tawh leitung a khuhsuk hi. Amah in tuipi panin tuite samkhia a, leitung khempeuhah tua tuite a sung hi. Hih bangin a bawlpa’ min pen TOPA ahi hi.

[18] Hoihtakin na phawk ding uh thu panin: Van le lei a bei mateng, hih thukhamte a neupen khat nangawn’ deihna tangtung lopi-in mawkmai lo ding hi. [19] Tua ahih manin hih thukhamte lakpan a neupente khat bek nangawn zuikha loin, midangte in zong a zuih loh nadingin a gen mite pen vantung ki-ukna sungah mi neupen hi ding uh hi. Ahi zongin hih thukhamte zui-in, midangte in zong a zuih nadingin a hilh mite pen vantung ki-ukna sungah milian hi ding uh hi. [20] Tua ahih manin Pasian’ deihna bangin gamtat nading thu-ah Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite sangin na cihtakzawk uhleh vantung ki-ukna sungah a om thei bek ding na hi uh hi.
[9] Tua ahih manin thu na nget uh ciangin hih bangin na ngen un: ‘Vantunga om kote’ Pa aw, na min siangtho kizahtak hen.

[19] “Nget in ne-in a kekseu theihna, gutate in luhin a guktheihna hih leitungah na sum uh khol kei un. [20] Nget in a nek theih lohna, a kekseu theih lohna, gutate in luhin a guk theih lohna mun vantungah note a dingin kholzaw un.
[14] Ahi zongin nuntak tawntungna tun nading kong kawcikin a lampi haksa a, mi tawmno bek in a zuizo uh hi.
[21] “Kei kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa aw,’ hong ci mi khempeuh, vantung ki-ukna sungah lutthei kim lo ding uh a, vantungah a om ka Pa’ deihna bangin a gamtateng bek lutthei ding uh hi.

[11] Nisuahna le nitumna panin mi tampi tak hong pai-in vantung ki-ukna sungah Abraham, Isaac, le Jakob-te tawh an ne-in sabuai-ah tukhawm ding uh hi. [12] Ahi zongin vantung ki-ukna sungah a om dingin a kingaihsun Israel mite ahihleh pualam khuamialna-ah kilawnkhia ding a, tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[25] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Vantung le leitung Topa ahi ka Pa aw, mipilte le misiamte tungah na ip hih thute, bangmah a thei lo hih mite tungah lak na hih manin ka nuam hi.
[43] Tua hun ciangin Pasian’ mite ahihleh a Pa uh Ukna sungah ni bangin a taang ding uh hi. Zak nading bil a neite in hih thu na za ta un.
[10] “Hih naupangnote khatpeuh na simmawhkhak loh nadingun kidawm un. Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Amaute a kem vantung mite pen vantungah ka Pa kiangah om tawntung uh hi.
[14] Jesuh in, “Vantung ki-ukna pen naupangte tawh a kibang mite a’ ding ahih manin, tua naupangte ka kiangah hong paipihsak unla, khaktan kei un,” a ci hi.

[21] Jesuh in, “Mi cingtaak na hihnop leh pai-in na neihsate va zuak inla, na sum khotte, mizawngte tungah va pia lecin, vantungah sum na hau ding hi. Tua ciangin hong pai inla kei hong zui in,” a ci hi.

[29] Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Note in Lai Siangtho thu ahi a, Pasian’ vangliatna ahi zongin thei lo na hih manun na ngaihsunkhial uh hi. [30] Bang hang hiam cih leh misite a thawhkik uh ciangin vantungah a om vantung mite tawh kibang ding uh a, zinei pasalnei cih om lo ding hi.
[35] Van le lei a maimang zongin ka thugente maimang ngei lo ding hi.
[34] Tua ciangin Kumpipa in a taklamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Ka Pa in thupha a piak mite aw, hong pai ta un. Leitung piancil a kipanin note a dingin a kibawlkholsa gamnuam hong luah un.
[46] Tua ahih ciangin tawntung gimthuakna sungah amaute pai ding uh a, mihoihte ahihleh nuntak tawntungna sungah lut ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[20] Ahi zongin dawite in na thu uh hong manna hangin lungdam kei unla, vantungah na min uh a kigelh manin lungdamzaw un,” a ci hi.

[33] Na neihsa uh zuak unla, mizawngte tungah tua sumte na pia un. Note a dingin a sia thei lo sumkholna na bawl unla, gutate in a luh zawh lohna, leikha in zong a nek zawh lohna, cikmahin a kiam ngei hetloh nading mun vantungah na sumte uh na khol un.

[29] Nisuahna le nitumna, leilu le leitaw lam panin mite hong pai-in Pasian’ Ukna sung sabuai kiimah tukhawm ding uh hi. [30] Tua hi a, tuhuna mineute tuahun ciangin milian hi ding a, tuhuna miliante tuahun ciangin mineu hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
[7] Tua mah bangin kisikkik ding a kisam lo mihoih sawmkua le kuate tungah lungdamna sangin mawhnei mi khat a kisikna hangin vantungah lungdamna lianzaw ding hi,” a ci hi.

[21] mihau pa’ sabuai tung panin a kia annengte nenuamin a ngak hi. Tua bangin a om laitakin uite hong pai-in a meima hong liahliah sak uh hi. [22] Tua ciangin mizawng pa hong si a, vantung a Abraham kiangah a om dingin vantung mite in a paipih uh hi. Mihau pa zong hong si leuleu-in a kivui hi. [23] Ahi zongin hell khuk sungah gimna thuakin a om hi. A khuadak leh, gamlapi mun khatah Abraham le Lazaras a omkhawm a galmuh hi.
[69] Ahi zongin tu a kipanin a Vanglian Pasian’ taklamah Mihing Tapa tu ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[43] Jesuh in ama kiangah, “A mantakin ke’n kong cihin-ah: Tuni-in Paradais-ah kei tawh na omkhawm ding hi,” a ci hi.

Kei hong suang loin Pa kiangah kuamah tung thei lo ding hi.

[25] La in TOPA’ vantungmi a muh ciangin phung phu a, phungah Balaam’ khe nengcip ahih ciangin amah in a la sat kik hi. [26] Tua ciangin TOPA’ vantungmi na ma pai-in, taklamah ahi a, veilamah ahi zongin kihei theih nading a om lohna mun kawcik khatah na ding leuleu hi. [27] La in TOPA’ vantungmi a muh ciangin Balaam’ nuai-ah lumsuk hi. Balaam heh mahmah a, a ciangkhut tawh a la a sat hi.

[31] Tua ciangin TOPA in Balaam’ mitte honsak a, a khut sungah namsau dawhsa tawh TOPA’ vantungmi lampi-ah a ding mu ahih manin a lu kunin a boksuk hi. [32] TOPA’ vantungmi in ama kiangah, “Bang hangin na la thumvei dong sat na hi hiam? En in, hih na khualzinna-ah lungkim lo ka hih manin nang hong pang dingin kong kuankhia hi. [33] La in kei hong mu-in thumvei dong hong peel hi. Hong peel kei leh, tu mahmahin nang hong that khinin na la ka hingsak ding hi,” a ci hi. [34] Tua ciangin Balaam in TOPA’ vantungmi kiangah, “Kei hong pangin lampi-ah na dinlam thei lo ka hih manin ka khial hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka khualzinna hoihsa lo na hih leh ka ciahkik ding hi,” a ci hi. [35] TOPA’ vantungmi in Balaam kiangah, “Mite zui in; ahih hangin nang kong sawlteng bek na gen ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Balaam in Balak’ uliante a zuisuak hi.
[8] Sang Pen pa in minam dangte tungah amau’ gamh pia a, mihingte a ten nading mun a seh ciangin vantungmi a phazah tawh a kizui-in mite’ gamgi a phut hi.

[1] Tu-in Gilgal panin Bokhim-ah TOPA’ vantungmi paito hi. Amah in Israel mite kiangah, “Egypt panin note kong paipihto a, na pu na pate uh tungah piak dinga ka ciam leitangah note kong paipih hi. Keimah in, ‘Note tawh ka thuciam ka siasak ngei kei ding a,
[4] TOPA’ vantungmi in Israel mi khempeuh tungah hih thute a gen ciangin mite a kap uh hi.
[23] “ TOPA’ vantungmi in, ‘Meroz khua samsia in, a sunga teng mite nasia takin samsia in. Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA a huh dingin a thahatpa dona-ah TOPA a huh dingin hong kuan lo uh hi,’ a ci hi.

[11] Tua ciangin Ofrah khua-ah TOPA’ vantungmi hong pai a, Abiezer mi Joash neihsa tawsaw nuai-ah hong tu hi. Tua laitakin Joash’ tapa Gideon in Midian mite’ muh loh dingin leenggah sukna-ah mangbuh cil simin na om hi. [12] TOPA’ vantungmi ama tungah kilangin ama kiangah, “ TOPA in nang hong ompih hi, a thahat a vanglian mipa aw,” a ci hi.

[20] Tua ciangin Pasian’ vantungmi in ama kiangah, “Sa le silngo sawh loh moh la-in, hih suang tungah koih inla, a tungah satui sung in,” a ci hi. Tua bangmahin amah in a hih hi. [21] Tua ciangin TOPA’ vantungmi in a khutsung a om ciangkhut dawn dawksakin, sa le silngo sawh loh mohte a su hi. A suang panin mei piangkhia-in, sa le silngo sawh loh moh a kangtum hi. Tua ciangin ama muhna panin TOPA’ vantungmi a mang hi. [22] Tua ciangin Gideon in amah pen TOPA’ vantungmi ahihlam a thei hi. Gideon in, “Ala, Topa PASIAN! TOPA’ vantungmi mai kituahin ka mukha khin hi,” a ci hi.
[3] TOPA’ vantungmi tua numei kiangah kilangin ama kiangah, “En in, na tasel a, ta na nei kei hi. Ahi zongin tu-in gai-in tapa khat na nei ding hi.

[6] Tua ciangin tua nu pai-in a pasal’ kiangah gen a, “Pasian’ mi khat ka kiangah hong pai a, ama mel pen Pasian’ vantungmi mel tawh kibangin dipkuathuai mahmah hi. Koi panin hong pai cih amah ka dong kei a, amah in ama min hong gen lo hi.
[9] Pasian in Manoah’ aw ngai-in lo lai-ah tua nu a tut laitakin Pasian’ vantungmi ama kiangah hong pai hi. Ahih hangin a pasal Manoah amah tawh om lo hi.

[13] Tua ciangin TOPA’ vantungmi in Manoah’ kiangah, “Numei’ kiangah ka gente khempeuh na kidawm hen. [14] Amah in leenggui pana piang peuhmah ne thei lo ding a, leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin ne thei loin, a nin na khat peuhpeuh ne thei lo ding hi; amah ka thupiak khempeuh tang hen,” a ci hi. [15] Manoah in TOPA’ vantungmi kiangah, “Kong thum hi; tawlkhat khawl inla, nang a dingin keelno khat hong bawlsak nung,” a ci hi. [16] TOPA’ vantungmi in Manoah kiangah, “Nong khawlsak zongin na an ka ne kei ding hi. Ahih hangin meihal biak nading a baihsa-in na bawl leh TOPA tungah pia in,” a ci hi. (Bang hang hiam cih leh Manoah in amah TOPA’ vantungmi ahihlam thei lo hi.) [17] Manoah in TOPA’ vantungmi kiangah, “Na thugente a manin hong tun ciangin nang kong pahtawi theih nadingun, na min bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi. [18] TOPA’ vantungmi in ama kiangah, “Hih thu a lamdang hi, ci-in thei napi-in bang hangin ka min hong dong na hi hiam?” a ci hi. [19] Tua ahih ciangin Manoah in an-a biakna tawh a keelno la-in nalamdang a bawl TOPA a dingin suang tungah a pia hi. [20] Biakna tau panin vantung lamah meikuang a paitoh ciangin, Manoah le a zi in a et laitakun biakna tau meikuang sungah TOPA’ vantungmi kahto hi. Tua ciangin amaute leilakah a bok uh hi. [21] Manoah le a zi’ tungah TOPA’ vantungmi kilang nawn lo hi. Tua ciangin Manoah in amah TOPA’ vantungmi ahihlam thei hi.

[9] Tua ciangin Akhish in David dawngin, “Nang pen keima muhna-ah Pasian’ vantungmi khat mah bangin paubaang lo na hihna ka thei hi; ahi zongin Filistia galkap a ukte in, ‘Amah pen eite tawh galphualah hong kuanto lo ding hi,’ ci uh hi.

[17] Na nasemnu in, ‘Ka to kumpipa’ kammal in nopsakna hong pia ding hi,’ ci-in ngaihsun hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka to kumpipa pen a pha le a sia a khenthei dingin Pasian’ vantungmi tawh kibang hi. TOPA na Pasian in nang hong ompih ta hen!” a ci hi.
[20] Na thu paizia khek nadingin na nasempa Joab in hih thu hih hi. Ahih hangin ka topa in leitung a om na khempeuh theih nadingin Pasian’ vantungmi pilna tawh a kibang pilna na nei hi,” a ci hi.
[27] Amah in ka to kumpipa kiangah na nasempa hong gensia hi. Ahih hangin ka to kumpipa pen Pasian’ vantungmi tawh kibang hi. Tua ahih ciangin hoih na sak bangin hong hih in.

[16] Vantung mi in Jerusalem khua a susia dingin kithawi-in a khut a zan ciangin tua tatsiatna panin TOPA kisik a, mite lakah suksiatna na a sem vantungmi kiangah, “Phazo hi; tu-in khawl ta in,” a ci hi. TOPA’ vantungmi pen Jebus mi Araunah’ ancilna gei-ah a om hi. [17] Tua ciangin mite a vat vantungmi a muh ciangin David in TOPA’ tungah thu gen a, “En in, ka mawh hi; a khial pa pen kei ka hi hi. Hih mite in bang khialhna nei ahi uh hiam? Kong thum hi; kei le ka innkuante bek gim hong pia in,” a ci hi.

[18] Tua ciangin amah in, “Kei zong nangmah bangin kamsang khat ka hi a, TOPA’ sawlna bangin vantungmi khat in kei tungah thu hong gen a, ‘Amah in anletui ne-in a dawn theih nadingin na inn-ah amah paipih kik in,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in Pasian’ mipa tungah zuau genin a phuahtawm ahi hi.

[5] Tua ciangin poding kung khat nuai-ah amah lumsukin a ihmu hi. Tua laitakin vantungmi khat in amah lawngin ama kiangah, “Tho inla an ne in,” a ci hi. [6] Amah khuadak a, ama lutang gei suang sa tungah a ki-em moh khat le tui hai khat na om hi. Amah in tuate ne-in dawnin lumkik hi. [7] Tua ciangin TOPA’ vantungmi a nihveina hong paikikin amah lawng a, “Tho in la an ne in; tua hikeileh nang a dingin khualzinna haksa lua ding hi,” a ci hi.
[19] Tua ciangin Mikaiah in, “Tua ahih ciangin TOPA’ thu ngai in: TOPA a kumpi tokhom tungah tu-in, ama taklam le a veilamah vantung mihonpi a ding ka mu hi.

[3] Ahih hangin TOPA’ vantungmi in Tishbe mi Elijah kiangah, “Ding in, Samaria kumpipa’ kamtaite a dawn dingin paito-in amaute kiangah, ‘Ekron pasian, Baalzebub kiangah thu a dong dingin na pai nadingun Israel sungah Pasian om nawn lo ahi hiam?’ ci in.
[15] Tua ciangin TOPA’ vantungmi in Elijah kiangah, “Amah tawh paisuk in; amah kihta kei in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah dingin kumpipa kiangah amah tawh paisuk a,
[35] Tua zanin TOPA’ vantungmi paikhia a, Assiria-te giahphual ah galkap tul zakhat le tul sawmgiat le tulnga a that hi. Zingsang tungin mite a thawh ciangin, hihte khempeuh si luanghawm na hi hi.

[12] Kialpi kum thum sung, ahih kei leh na galte in nang hong simgawp laitakin na galte mai-ah kha thum sung galtaina, ahih kei leh gam sungah pulnatna le TOPA’ vantungmi in Israel sung khempeuhah suksiatna ni thum sung a piangsak TOPA’ namsau,’ ci hi. Tu-in kei hong sawl pa kiangah ka ciahpih ding dawnna ding khentel in,” a ci hi.

[15] Tua ciangin Pasian in a susia dingin Jerusalem-ah vantungmi sawl hi. Ahih hangin amah in a suksiat ding laitakin TOPA in mu a, tua thusia-ah amah kisik hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a susia vantungmi kiangah, “Phazo hi; tu-in khawl ta in,” a ci hi. Jebus mi Ornan’ ancilna gei-ah TOPA’ vantungmi a din laitak ahi hi. [16] Tua ciangin David khuadak to a, leitung le vantung kikalah TOPA’ vantungmi dingin, a khut sungah a kidoksa namsau khat omin Jerusalem tungah a zan mu hi. Tua ciangin David le a upate puanhampi silhin maipuk uh hi. [17] Tua ciangin David in Pasian kiangah, “Mi phazah a sim dingin thu a piapa keimah hi lo ka hi hiam? Khialin a gitloh gamtat mahmah pa keimah ka hi hi. Ahih hangin hih mite in bang gamtat khialhna nei ahi uh hiam? TOPA ka Pasian aw, kong thum hi, keimah le ka innkuan gim hong pia in. Ahih hangin na mite tungah gimna tungsak kei in,” a ci hi. [18] Tua ciangin David paito-in Jebus mi Ornan’ ancilna phualah TOPA a’ ding biakna tau khat a lamna ding a gen dingin TOPA’ vantungmi in Gad sawl hi. [19] Tua ahih ciangin TOPA’ min tawh a gen Gad’ kammal bangin David paito hi. [20] Ornan le a tapa lite in mangbuh a cilcil laitakin a khuadak uhleh TOPA’ vantungmi mu uh a, a tapa lite lau-in a bu uh hi.
[27] Tua ciangin TOPA’ thupiakna tawh vantungmi in a namsau a pai sungah a siatkik hi.
[30] Ahih hangin amah in TOPA’ vantungmi’ namsau kihta ahih manin Pasian tungah thu a dong dingin tua lai-ah David pai ngam lo hi.
[18] Tua ciangin Mikaiah in, “ TOPA’ thugen za in: TOPA a kumpi tokhom tungah tu a, a taklam le a veilamah vantung mihon khempeuh a ding ka mu hi.

[21] Tua ciangin TOPA in Assiria kumpipa’ giahphual ah a thahat galhang khempeuh le galkap a ukte le uliante a susia vantungmi khat a sawl hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama gamah maizumna tawh a ciahkik hi. Ama pasian’ inn sungah amah a tun ciangin ama tapate pawlkhat in namsau tawh amah satlum uh hi.

[6] Nang bek TOPA na hi hi. Nangmah in a sang pen vantung le vana om khempeuh, leitung le a tunga om khempeuh, le tuipi le a sunga om khempeuh na bawl hi. Nangmah in tuate khempeuh na omsak a, vantung mihonpi in nang hong bia uh hi.
[6] Ni khat ni-in TOPA’ omna-ah vantung mite hong pai uh a, tuate lakah Satan zong hong kihel hi.
[1] Ni khat ni-in TOPA’ omna-ah vantung mite hong paikik uh a, Satan zong amaute lakah hong kihelin TOPA’ omna mahah hong pai hi.

[15] Huih in ka mai hong mut a, ka khuasikmul hong suaksak hi. [16] A mel ka khen theih loh lim khat hong ding a, keima mai-ah mihing lim khat hong om a, tua ciangin aw un duadua khat ka za a, [17] ‘Pasian’ mai-ah mi khatpeuh paubaang loin omzo ngei ding ahi hiam? Amah a Bawlpa’ mai-ah sitbaang loin omzo ngei ding ahi hiam? [18] Pasian in ama nasemte mahmah muangzo loin, ama sawltakte’ mawhna mu ahihleh,
[15] Pasian in a siangtho vantung mite nangawn muang lo ahihleh, ei mawhnei mite bang hangin hong muang mah ding ahi hiam?
[3] Ama na a sem vantung mite bangzah pha cih kua in simzo ding ahi hiam? Pasian’ khuavak in a bat lohna koi lai mun om ahi hiam?
[23] “Mihingte’ tavuan a phawksak, Pasian’ vantungmi tul tampite lak panin vantungmi khat amah a huh dingin hong paikhia ding hi.

[4] Leitung ka bawl laitakin nang om na hi hiam? Thei kisa na hih leh tua thu hong gen in. [5] Bangcia-in golsak ding cih kua in seh ahi hiam? Kua in a golna ding zah khau khai ahi hiam? Hihte khempeuh thei kisa na hi hiam? [6] Leitung a pua khuampite bang tungah kiphut ahi hiam? Kua in leitung a bulpi phut ahi hiam? [7] Tua ni-in zingsang aksite in la sa khawm uh a, Pasian’ tapate lungdamin a kiko uh hi.
[5] Ahi zongin, vantungmi sangin a neuzaw deuh bekin na bawl a, minthanna le pahtawina nangmah in na guan hi.
[7] Amah a zahtakte’ kiimah TOPA’ vantungmi in giahphual sat a, amaute a honkhia hi.
[5] TOPA’ vantungmi’ hawlna tawh huih letkhiat ansite tawh amaute kibangsak in.
[17] Leeng muanhuai tul sawmnih, vantungmi a tultul tawh, Sinai mual pan siangtho munah Topa hong pai hi.
[25] Mihingte in vantung mite’ an ne uh a, amah in amaute tungah an tampi a puak hi.

[49] Amaute’ tungah a lauhuai ama sinsona, hehna, thangpaihna, gimna, le a susiathei van mi honkhat a khah hi. [50] Amah in a sinsona ip loin, kuamah hinkhawi lo a, pulnatna tawh amaute a sisak hi. [51] Ham’ suante’ inn sungah a ta upa pen teng, Egypt gam sung tacil khempeuh amah in a vatmai hi.
[11] Bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah a hong cing dingin amah in ama vantungmi nang hong kemsak ding hi.
[1] TOPA in uk hi. Mihonte ling hen. Kherub-te tungah amah tu hi. Leitung ling tahen.
[20] Ama thugen a ngai, ama thu bangin a sem no a thahat, no ama vantung mite aw, TOPA phat un.
[2] Ama vantungmi khempeuh aw, amah phat un. Ama mihonte khempeuh aw, amah phat un.

[1] Kumpi Uzziah a sih kumin, a sang mahmah, a lian kumpi tokhom tungah Topa a tu ka mu hi. Ama kumpi puanpi pen biakinn sungteng a dim hi. [2] Ama kiimah serafim van mite a ding uh hi. Tuate in kha guk ciat nei uh hi; nih tawh a mai liahin, nih tawh a khe tuamin, nih tawh a leeng uh hi. [3] Amaute khatlekhat kisamin: “Vanglian TOPA, siangtho, siangtho, siangtho; leitung khempeuh ama minthanna tawh kidim,” ci-in awng uh hi.

[12] “Nang Khuavak’ ta, Zingsol, Babylon kumpipa aw, vantung panin nang bangci kiat na hi hiam? Minamte a niam koihpa ahi nangmah leilak dongah hong bangci kiphukpai ahi hiam? [13] Nang in na lungsim sungah, ‘Vantungah ka kahto ding hi. A sangna mun, Pasian’ aksite’ tung pekah ka kumpi tokhom ka koih ding a, leilu lam peka kikhopna mualtungah ka tu ding hi. [14] Meiite’ tung pekah ka kahto ding a, Sang Pen pa bangin ka kibawl ding hi,’ na ci hi.
[36] Tua ciangin TOPA’ vantungmi kuankhia-in Assiria mite’ giahphual ah mihing tul za le tul sawmgiat le tulnga a that hi. Zingsangin mite a thawh ciangin hihte khempeuh misi luang bekbek na hi hi.
[28] Tua thu hangin leitung kap ding a, vantung mial ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka gensa, ka khensatsa hi a, ka kisik loh bangin ka lungsim zong ka kheelkik kei ding hi,” a ci hi.

[22] Gamdang pasian zuaute’ lakah guah a zusak thei om ahi hiam? Tua ahih kei leh zong vantungmi in ama thu-in guah zu tawmsak thei ahi hiam? Tua bang a hih thei nang bek hi lo na hi hiam? TOPA kote’ Pasian aw, nangmah in tuate khempeuh hih na hih manin nangma sungah lametna kong nei uh hi.
[1] Topa in a heh manin Jerusalem khuapi a mialcipsak hi. A vantung minthanna teng uh kisiatna a suaksak hi. Amah in a heh ni-in a Biakinnpi nangawn a susia hi.

[44] Tua kumpite a maan laitakun vantung Pasian in a bei thei ngei lo ding kumpi gam a hong phut ding hi. Tua kumpi gam kuamah in zo zo lo ding a, tua gam in gamdang khempeuhte zogawpin a kip tawntung ding hi.

[28] Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Shadrak, Meshak, le Abednego-te’ Pasian phat un. Amah in a vantung mite sawl a, amah a muang ama nasem hih mite a honkhia hi. Amaute in ka thupiakna mang loin, amau’ Pasian longal pasian dang’ mai-ah kun nuam lo, bia nuam lo uh ahih manin mei phualpi sungah khul ding a utzaw uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[13] “Ka maangmuhna ngaihsunin ka om laitakin ka khuadak leh a vil, a patau vantungmi khat vantung pan a hong tuaksuk ka mu hi.

[17] Hih pen a vil, a patau vantungmi’ thukhenna ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin mun khempeuhah a om mi khempeuhte in, a Lian Pasian in mite’ kumpi gamah vai a hawm hi, cih a thei ding uh hi. Amah in a teel peuhpeuh a neupente nangawn kumpi a suaksak thei ding hi,’ a ci hi.

[23] Kumpipa in na et laitakin, vantungmi khat vantung panin hong paisuk a, “A singkung phuk inla susia in; ahih hangin lei sungah a bul le a zungte nusia in. A bulah sik le sumngo kual vial inla, gamlak lopate tawh nusiakhawm in. A tungah daitui kia hen la, kum sagih sung ganhingte tawh omkhawm ta hen,” a ci hi.
[35] Amah in leitung mite bangmahin a sim kei a, vantung mite le leitung mite ama khutnuai ahi hi. Ama deihna kuamah in nial thei lo a, a bawlnate kuamah in a hang a kan thei kei hi.

[22] Pasian in a vantungmi hong sawl a, ka liam loh nadingin humpinelkaite’ kam a humcipsak hi. Kumpipa aw, mawhna ka bawl lohlam leh, nang tungah zong khialhna ka bawl lohna amah in hong thei ahih manin tua bangin a hong bawl hi,” a ci hi.

[13] Vantung mi khat in adang vantungmi khat kiangah thu a dot ka za a, “Hih maangmuhna bang tanvei sawt ding a, a muhdahhuai mawhna in nisim biakpiakna bang tanvei khaktan ding ahi hiam? Vantung galkapte le biakinnpi bang tanvei kituancil ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
[21] Thu ka nget laitakin ka maangmuh masak sunga ka muh mipa Gabriel, ka omna munah a hong leengsuk hi. Tua hun pen nitak lam biakpiak hun laitak ahi hi.

[13] Persia gam a cing vantungmi in ni sawmnih le khat sung kei a hong nial hi. Tua ciangin kei a hong huh dingin vantungmi thupite khat ahi Mikhael a hong pai hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Persia gam sungah keimah guak bek ka om hi.

[20] Amah in, “Bang hangin na kiangah hong pai ka hi hiam, cih na thei hiam? Thuman Laibu sungah a kigelh thute a lak dingin a hong pai ka hi hi. Tu-in ciahkikin, Persia gam a cing vantungmi tawh ka kido ding hi. Tua khit ciangin Grik gam a cing vantungmi a hong kilang ding hi. Mikhael longal kei a hong huh ding kuamah a om kei hi.
[1] Israel a cing vantungmi pen kei hong huhpa le a hong dal pa ahi hi,” a hong ci hi.

[1] Tua ciangin saihadial puan a silh vantungmi in, “Na mite a cing, a lian vantungmi Mikhael hong kilang ding hi. Tua ciangin leitungah mihing a pianzawh a kipan a nasia penpen gimna hun hong tung ding hi. Tua hun a hong tun ciangin Pasian’ laibu sungah a min a kigelh na mite khempeuh kihonkhia ding hi.

[8] TOPA’ vantungmi khat sakol san khat tungah a tuang ka mu hi. Kuam sunga a om mui singkungte lakah amah khawl a, ama nungah sakol dang a san, a gial, a kang om hi. [9] Tua ciangin keimah in, “Sia aw, hih sakolte bang a cihnopna ahi hiam?” ci-in ka dong hi. Amah in hong dawng a, “Bang a cihnopna hiam cih kong lak ding hi. [10] Hih sakol tung tuangte pai kawikawi-in leitung a en dingin TOPA in a sawl ahi hi,” hong ci hi. [11] Tua ciangin mui kung lakah a khawl TOPA’ vantung mite kiangah amaute in, “Leitung khempeuh ka en kawikawi khin uh a, leitung khempeuh khuaphawk loin nuamtakin om uh hi,” ci-in thu a zasak uh hi. [12] Tua ciangin TOPA’ vantungmi in, “Vanglian TOPA aw, Jerusalem khuapi le Judah gam khuapite tungah kum sawmsagih sung na heh khinta hi. Amaute hehpih loin bang tanvei omlai ding na hi hiam?” ci hi. [13] Tua ciangin TOPA in dikna le hehnepna kam tawh vantung mite dawng a, [14] Vanglian TOPA in ama tungah a gensa thute khempeuh keimah in ka taangko sawn nadingin tua vantungmi in kei hong sawl a, “Ka khuapi siangtho Jerusalem, nakpitakin itin ka lunghimawh hi.

[17] Tua ciangin vantungmi in ka taangkona ding hong genkik leuleu a, “Ama khuapite nakpitakin cithei kikin, Jerusalem khuapi a hehnep kikna ding, le ama khuapi-in a neihkikna ding, Vanglian TOPA in gen hi, ci-in gen in,” hong ci hi. [18] Ka khuadak leh saki li ka mu hi. [19] Bang a cihnopna ahi hiam, ci-in vantungmi kiangah ka dong hi. Amah in hong dawng a, “Judah mite le Jerusalem mite a thehthang gawp leitung vangliatnate a cihnopna ahi hi,” hong ci hi.

[3] Tua ciangin vantung mipa hong paikhia a, vantung midang khat in amah na dawntuah hi. [9] Ahi zongin Pasian’ hehpihna hangin mi khempeuh a dingin Jesuh a sih theih nadingin tawlkhat sung vantung mite sangin a neuzaw-in a kibawlna i mu a, sihna a thuakna hangin minthanna le pahtawina a ngahna thu i thei hi.
[16] Ama lunghihmawh pen vantung mite hi lo a, Abraham’ suanlekhakte a lunghimawh ahihna thu hong kitel hi.
[22] Ahi zongin note pen Zion Mual, a nungta Pasian’ khuapi, vantung Jerusalem, simzawh loh vantung mite a omna,
[2] Khualmite hoihtakin zin na do ding uh na phawk un. Mi pawlkhat in vantung mite zindo ahihlam a phawk lopi-in a do na hi gige uh hi.
[22] Tu-in vantungah tua Khrih pai khin a, Pasian’ taklamah omin, vantung mite le ukna aana a neite khempeuh tungah a ukin a om hi.
[4] Bang hang hiam cih leh vantung mite nangawn in khialhna a neih ciangin Pasian in khahkhong loin hell khuk sungah khia a, Thukhen Ni hun dong ngakin khuamial sungah kol bulhsa-in a omsak hi.
[11] Hih sia man lote sangin hatzaw-in a vanglianzaw vantung mite nangawn in Topa’ mai-ah minthanna a nei vantung mite gensia ngam lo, mawhsak ngam lo uh hi.

[6] Amau’ aana neih huamsung bekah om loin a omna panun a paikhia vantung mite zong leinuai khuamial sungah sikkol kibulhin amau’ thu a kikhen ding Ni lianpi ngakin Pasian in a koihcip hi. [7] Sodom khua le Gomorrah khua le a kiima om khuapi mite zong tua vantung mite mah bangin gamta uh a, numei tawh mawhnopna bek tham loin pasal le pasal kilunggulhna ciang dong nei uh ahih manin midangte’ etteh dingin tawntung meikuang a thuak uh hi.

[9] Vantung milian pa Mikhael nangawn tua bangin gamta ngam lo hi. Moses’ luanghawm kituhin Dawimangpa tawh a kitot laitakin Mikhael in Dawimangpa zahkona kammal zang ngam loin, “Topa in nang hong taii ta hen,” ci bek hi.

[5] Tua ciangin tuipi le leitung kalkakin a ding ka muh vantungmi in vantung lamah a taklam khut laamto-in, [6] a nungta tawntung, vantung le a sunga om khempeuh, leitung le a sunga om khempeuh, le tuipi le a sunga om khempeuh a bawl Pasian’ min tawh kiciam a, “Tu-in zekai nawn het lo ding hi. [7] A sagihna vantungmi in a peengkul a tum ciangin ama nasem kamsangte tungah a gensa bangin Pasian in ama ip thusim a geelte hong semkhia ding hi,” a ci hi. Na gil sung a tun ciangin thuk mahmah ding a, ahi zongin na kam sungah khuaizu bangin khum mahmah ding hi,” hong ci hi. [10] Kei zong tua vantungmi’ khutsung panin a laizial neu la-in ka ne hi. Ka kamah khuaizu bangin khum dekdak a, ahi zongin ka nekkhit ciangin ka gil sung thuk velvalsak hi.

Tua bang mite pen a siangtho vantung mite le Tuuno mai-ah meikuang le kat khu tawh gimna kipia ding hi.

[8] A lina vantungmi in ni tungah a hai hong bung a, ni in a satna tawh mite a kanggawp hi. [9] Nisa in mite kanggawp ahih manin mite in hih gimna tawh kisai-ah thu a nei Pasian a samsia uh hi. Ahi zongin a mawhna uh panin kisikin Pasian a phat ding uh ut lo uh hi. [10] A ngana vantungmi in ganhing tokhom tungah a hai hong bung a, tua ganhing’ ukna gam sung tengah khua hong mial hi. [12] A gukna vantungmi in Eufratis Gun lianpi tungah a hai hong bung a, nisuahna lam kumpite hong pai nading lam a bawlkholhna-in a tuite hong kangcip hi.
[17] A sagihna vantungmi in huihlakah a hai hong bung a, biakinn sung tokhom panin nakpitakin aw khat hong gingin, “Man khinta hi,” a ci hi.

[2] Leitung kumpite in tua a paktat mahmah nu tawh gamtat hoih lo gamta uh a, leitung mite in ama paktatna leenggahzu dawnin a kham uh hi,” hong ci hi. [15] Tua ciangin vantungmi in hong genthuah lai a, “A paktat numei a tutna gun tuite pen minam tuamtuam, pau nam tuamtuam a zang mihonpite ahi hi.

[15] Keima kiangah thu a hong gen vantungmi in tua khuapi, a kulhkongpite le a kulh a teh nadingin kham kibawl tehna ciang khat a nei hi.

[1] Tua ciangin vantungmi in Pasian le Tuuno tokhom panin a hong luangkhia, kristal suangmanpha bangin a tee selsel gun tui hong lak a, [2] khuapi sung lampi laizangah a luang hi. Tua gun pang tuakah nuntakna singkung po a, kha simin gah ahih manin kum khat sungin sawm le nih vei a gah hi. A tehte zong natna dam nading zatui-in kizang hi. [3] Pasian’ samsiatna a ngah peuhpeuh tua khua sungah om lo hi. Tua khuapi sungah Pasian le Tuuno’ tokhom om ding a, ama nasemte in amah a bia ding uh hi. [6] Tua ciangin vantungmi in kei kiangah, “Hih thute muantaak a, thuman ahi hi. Kamsangte tungah a Kha Siangtho a pia Topa Pasian in a hong piang baih ding thute, a nasemte tungah a lak dingin a vantung mite a hong sawl hi,” hong ci hi. [7] Jesuh in, “Kei a hong pai baihta ding ka hi hi. Hih laibu sunga kigelh thu a zui mite mi hampha ahi hi,” a hong ci hi. [8] Keimah Johan in hih thute za-in ka muh ahi hi. Hih thute za-in ka muh ciangin hih thute kei tungah a hong lak vantungmi a bia dingin a khe phungah ka boksuk hi. [9] Ahi zongin amah in, “Kei hong bia kei in. [19] Na pumpi uh, Pasian in a hong piak, note’ sungah a teng Kha Siangtho’ biakinn ahih lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam? Note’ pumpi, nomau’ neihsa hi lo a, Pasian a’ ahi hi. [20] Note pen Pasian in a hong leisa na hih manun na pumpi uh Pasian’ minthan nadingin na zang un.

[5] Tua bangin a pau laitakun meiingo hong kaai vatin amaute hong khuh a, tua meii lak panin aw khat hong ging vatin, “Hih pa pen ka it, ka lung a kim mahmahna ka Tapa ahi hi. Ama thu na ngai un,” a hong ci hi.
[9] Mualtung panin amaute a ciahsuk laitakun Jesuh in nungzuite kiangah, “Sihna panin Mihing Tapa a kithawhkiksak matengin hih na muhte uh kuama kiangah gen kei un,” ci-in thu a pia hi.

[37] “Keima hangin hih bang naupangno khat a limbawl mi in kei hong limbawl hi a, kei hong limbawl mi in kei hong limbawl hi loin kei hong sawl pa a limbawl ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[48] Kei pen nuntakna an ka hi hi. [49] Na pu na pate un gam sungah manna ne uh a, a vekpi-un si veve uh hi. [50] Ahi zongin vantung panin a hong pai an a ne mi peuhmah si lo ding hi. [5] Leitungah ka om laiteng kei pen leitung mite a dingin khuavak ka hi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
[7] Tua ahih manin Jesuh in amaute kiangah thu genkik leuleu a, “A mantakin ci lehang, kei pen tuute’ paina kongpi ka hi hi.

[17] Ka nuntakkik theih nadingin si ngam ka hih manin ka Pa in kei hong it hi. [18] Kuamah in ka nuntakna hong laksak thei lo a, keima utthu tawh ka piak hizaw hi. Ka nuntakna piakkhiat theih nading le lakkik theih nading thu ka Pa in kei tungah a hong piak ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[30] Kei le ka Pa pumkhat ka hi uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

Ka thugen a za mite kiangah dong lecin ka genteng amaute in hong genthei ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
