[14] Amah mi hoih mi siangtho hinapi-in, amah na nial zawsop uh a, mi that khat a khahkhiat nadingin Pilat kiangah na ngen uh hi. [15] Tua ahih ciangin mite tungah nuntakna a piapa na that uh a, ahi zongin sihna panin Pasian in amah hingkiksak hi. Ko tegel pen hih thu a thei teci ka hi uh hi.

[12] Ama hang bek tawh hotkhiatna kingah thei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh eite in hotkhiatna i ngahtheih nadingin leitung khempeuhah Pasian in hong piak min dang khat zong om lo hi,” ci-in a gen hi.

[23] Mi khempeuh mawh ciat uh a, a hong honkhia Pasian tawh kigamla uh hi.

[10] Pasian tawh eite i kilangneih laitakin ama Tapa’ sihna hangin amah tawh hong kilemsak ahihleh tu-in Pasian tawh kipawl khinta ihih manin Khrih nuntakna in eite hong honkhiazo zaw kan ding hi lo ahi hiam?
[17] Mi khat bek’ mawhna hangin sihna in hong uk ahihleh mi khat mah ahi Jesuh Khrih hangin nakpitakin a lian Pasian’ hehpihna le mihoih-a sanna a ngah mite nungta-in thahatzaw kan ding uh hi.
[19] Mi khat in thu a man loh manin mi tampi mimawh a suahsak mah bangin mi khat in thu a manna hangin mi tampi in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna a ngah ding uh ahi hi.
[23] Bang hang hiam cih leh mawhna in thaman hong piak pen sihna hi a, ahi zongin i Topa Jesuh tawh i kipawl manin Pasian’ hong piakkhong pen nuntak tawntungna ahi hi.
[29] Pasian’ Tapa mi khempeuh lakah a upa pen a suahtheih nadingin Pasian in a teelkholhsa mite, a Tapa tawh a kibang dingin a sehsa ahi hi.
[9] Jesuh pen Topa hi, ci-in mite kiangah genin, Pasian in sihna panin amah hingkiksak zo hi, ci-in na lungsim sung uhah na up taktak uhleh hotkhiatna na ngah ding uh hi.

[26] Tua hi a, Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh mah bangin Israel mite khempeuh in hotkhiatna ngah ding uh hi. Lai Siangtho in, “Zion panin Honpa hong pai ding a, Jakob’ suanlekhakte sunga om gitlohna khempeuh maisak ding hi.
[24] Ahi zongin Pasian in a hong sap ei Jew mite le Gentail mite a dingin Khrih pen Pasian’ vangliatna le Pasian’ pilna ahi hi.
[1] Keimah in Khrih gamtatzia ka zuih mah bangin note in zong keima gamtatzia hong zui ta un.

[22] Bang hang hiam cih leh Adam tawh a kizop manin mi khempeuh si a, tua mah bangin Khrih tawh a kizom khempeuh zong kihingkiksak ding hi. [23] Ahi zongin tua hinkikna pen ama hun tawh kizui-in a banbanin hi ding hi. A masa penin Khrih hi a, Khrih hong paikik ciangin ama pawlte khempeuh hingkik ding hi.

[47] A masa Adam pen leitung leivui tawh a kibawl hi a, a nunung Adam pen vantung panin a hong pai ahi hi.
[49] Eite in lei tawh a kibawl mite’ lim i puak mah bangin vantung panin a hong pai Mipa’ lim zong a pua ding ihi hi.
[17] Tua ahih manin mi khatpeuh, Khrih tawh a kipawl ciangin mi thak suak a, a mi lui ngeina bei-in a mi thak ngeina a neita ahi hi.
[21] Khrih tawh i kipawlna hangin eite zong Pasian tawh a kibangin midik i suahtheih nadingin mawhna a nei lo Khrih pen eite’ tang dingin Pasian in mawhnei mi a suaksak hi.

[9] Bang hang hiam cih leh i Topa Jesuh zong hau mahmah napi-in ama zawnna tawh note mihau na suahtheih nadingun note’ hangin mizawngin hong kibawl ahih manin i Topa Jesuh Khrih hong itna bangzah takin lian hiam, cih thu na thei uh hi.
[2] Pasian in hong aam mahmah bangin note ka hong aam mahmah hi. Nungak le tangval nupa dingin a kigawm mah bangin khat bek ahi Khrih tawh a kigawm dingin nungak siangtho bang na hi uh hi.

[20] Tua ahih manin tuhuna ka nuntakna zia pen kei hang hi nawn loin ka sungah a hong om Khrih hang ahi hi. Tua hi a, keimah hong itin, keima a dingin a nuntakna a hong pia Pasian’ Tapa ka muanna tawh tu laitakin a nungta ka hi hi.
[27] Khrih sungah a kiphum note in Khrih’ pianzia a nei khinta na hi uh hi.
[2] Thu haksa na tuah uh ciangin khatlekhat na kihuh un. Tua hileh Khrih’ thukham a zui na hi uh hi.

[4] Tua bang hinapi-in Pasian’ hong hehpihna le eite hong itna lian mahmah ahih manin, [5] i mawhna hangin kha thu tawh kisai-in misi ihih laitakin Khrih tawh eite hong nungtasak hi. Pasian’ hehpihna hangin hotkhiatna a ngah thei ihi hi.
[10] Eite a hong bawlpa pen Pasian hi a, Jesuh Khrih tawh i kipawl ciangin i nuntakna-ah gamtat hoih a nei dingin a hong bawl ihi hi. Hih pen eite’ omzia dingin a na ngaihsut kholhsa ahi hi.

[14] Khrih mahmah in Gentail mite le Jew mite pawlkhatin hong bawl ahih manin eite tungah nopsakna a hong piapa ahi hi. Hih minam nihte khenin gal a piangsak dalna pen Khrih in ama pumpi tawh a satkham hi.
[20] Note zong, sawltakte le kamsangte in a phuhsa innkhuam tungah a kilam na hi uh a, tua inn sutpi pen Jesuh mahmah ahi hi.
[25] Tua ahih manin zuau gen nawn kei unla, Khrih pumpi nate ihihna hangin pawlkhat ihih manin khatlekhat tungah thuman kigen ni.
[32] khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim nem tawh na kihozaw unla, Khrih’ hangin Pasian in note’ mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.

[1] Note pen Pasian in a hong it a tate na hih manun amah tawh na kibat nadingun hanciam un. [2] Khrih in eite a hong it manin Pasian in eite’ mawhna hong maisak theih nadingin a namtui biakna-in Pasian kiangah a kipiak mah bangin note zong itna tawh na gamta un.

[26] Pawlpi pen paubaanna a om het lo, a siangtho mahmahin Khrih kiangah a kipiak theih nadingin Pasian thu tawh tui-ah a silsiang khit ciangin Pasian kiangah a aptheih nadingin pawlpi a dingin Khrih a kipia ahi hi.

[4] Note’ phattuam nading bek ngaihsun kei unla, midangte’ phattuam nading ngaihsutsak zaw un. [5] Note in Jesuh Khrih lungsim puakzia na nei un. Tua lungsim puak zia in: [6] Jesuh Khrih in Pasian’ pianzia nei napi-in, Pasian tawh a kizakim theihna dingin thatanghat thu a suang kei hi. [7] Amah kiniamkhiat tawm zaw a, nasem lim a hong puazaw hi. Mihing bangin amah hong kibawl a, mihing teekteek mah a hong sun hi. [8] Amah hong kiniamkhiat tawm a, singlamteh tung nangawnah sih ding a ut hi.
[20] Note ka hong lunghihmawh zahin amah bek mah in note hong lunghihmawhpih hi.
[14] Khrih Jesuh nasepna tawh vantung nuntakna-ah Pasian’ hong sapna ahi hamphatna ka ngahtheih nadingin, a kung lam zuanin tangtakin ka tai hi.

[16] Vantung le leitungah a om na khempeuh, kha thu tawh kisai vangliatna, tote, mi ukte, aana neihnate a kipan a kimuthei hitaleh a kimu thei lo hitaleh na khempeuh, Pasian in amah zangin a piangsak hi. Leitung a kipanin huih lakah a om khempeuh dongin, Pasian in Khrih a dingin amahmah zangin a piangsak hi.
[18] Na khempeuhah amah a lianpen ahih theih nadingin, amah pen pawlpi ahi ama pumpi lutang hi a, pawlpi’ nuntakna a kipatna hi a, sihna panin a kithokiksak Tapa cil ahi hi.

[27] Pasian in mi khempeuh a dingin a koihcing hih a thupi a deihhuai a thusim pen ama mite tungah pholak ding a sawm ahi hi. Tua thusim in: Khrih tawh a kipawlte in Pasian tawh minthanna ngahkhawm ding hi, cihna ahi hi.
[9] Bang hang hiam cih leh mihing hong suahna sungah Khrih in Pasian’ pianzia khempeuh a kimtakin nei a,

[12] Pasian in note hong itin, hong teelin, ama mi siangthote hikhin na hih manun note pen hehpihna nei-in, migi-in, kiniamkhiatin, dikin, na lungduai ding uh ahi hi. [13] Note lakah khatlekhat a kilungkim lo na om uh ciangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh kimaisakin na kihuh ciat un. Topa in note’ mawhna hong maisak bangin note zong khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ding uh hi. [14] Hihte khempeuh banah, mi khempeuh kilem takin a hong om khawmsak thei ahi ki-itna na bulphuh un. [15] Note pumkhat suakin a lungdam khawm dingin Pasian in a hong sap ahih mah bangin Khrih hong piak nopsakna in note’ lungsim hong uk ta hen la, lungdamin om ta un. [16] Khrih thu a cingtakin note lungsimah hong om hen la, pilna tawh khatlekhat thu kihilhin na kitai un. Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Thuciam Lui sunga late, la thakte, le biakna late na sa un. [17] Na kampauna, na gamtatnate khempeuh uhah, Topa Jesuh hangin Pa Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Jesuh min paulamin na hih ding uh hi.

[7] tu-a gimna a thuak note le kote tungah zong nopsakna hong pia ding hi. Vantung panin Topa Jesuh le a vanglian a vantung mite, meikuang tawh hong kilat ciangin, [8] Pasian a thei lo mite, le i Topa Jesuh tawh kisai Lungdamna Thu a um lo mite tungah gimna a tungsak ding hi. [9] Ama mite khempeuh le thu um mite khempeuh hangin minthanna le pahtawina a ngah dingin Topa hong pai Ni ciangin a noptuak mahmah Topa’ minthanna huamsung panin amaute kihawlkhia ding a, tawntung suksiatna dan a thuak ding uh hi. Ahi zongin note in ka hong gen uh thute um na hih manun tua nopna sungah na om ding uh hi.

[14] Pasian in genzawh lohin kei hong hehpih a, Khrih Jesuh tawh kipawlna hangin i ngahtheih upna le itna a hong guan hi. [15] Khrih Jesuh, mawhneite a honkhia dingin leitungah hong pai hi, cihna thu a man hi a, a uphuai a sanhuai thu ahi hi. Keimah zong tua mawhnei mite lakah a mawhpha bel ka hi hi. [16] A mawhnei pha bel ka hihna thu hang mahin, nidang ciangin amah umin nuntak tawntungna a ngah ding mite’ etteh theih dingin Khrih Jesuh in a lungduaina cingtakin kei tungah hong lahtheih nadingin Pasian in kei a hong hehpih ahi hi.

[5] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian khat bek om a, Pasian le mite a hong kilemsakkik thei Khrih Jesuh khat bek om hi. [6] Mi khempeuh a tankhia dingin tua Jesuh hong kipiatawm a, a hun lian laitakin a hong kipiakna pen Pasian in mi khempeuh a hotkhiat nopna thu a kilatna ahi hi.
[14] I mawhna khempeuh panin hong honkhia ding le ama neihtuam i suahtheih nadingin Jesuh amahmah hong kipumpiak a, eite pen gamtat hoih gamtat ding a lawp mahmah ihi hi.

[1] A beisa hunah Pasian in kamsangte zangin i pupite tungah a lam tuamtuam tawh a khen khenin thu na gen ngeizo hi. [2] Ahi zongin tuhun nunung ciangin leitung vantung na khempeuh a bawlin a zat, a tawpna-ah na khempeuh a luah dingin a seh a Tapa zangin eite tungah thu hong gen hi. [3] Tua Tapa in Pasian’ minthanna vang hong taangkhiasak a, Pasian’ lim taktak mah hong pua-in, ama kampauna tawh leitung vantung buppi pai-in a kip hi. Mihingte a mawhna panun a siansak khit ciangin Vanglian pipa Pasian’ taklam, vantungah a tu hi. [4] Vantung mite’ ngah minthanna sangin Tapa tungah Pasian in a piak min a liatzawk mah bangin vantung mite sangin Tapa lianzaw thampek hi. [5] Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in vantungmi khat peuhpeuh tungah, “Ka Tapa na hi hi. Tu ni-in na Pa ka suak hi,” ci ngei lo hi. Tua mah bangin, “Kei, ama Pa ka hi ding a, amah, ka Tapa ahi ding hi,” ci-in zong kam pau ngei lo hi. [6] Tua banah, Pasian in leitungah a Tapa neihsun hong paisak ding ciangin, “Pasian’ vantungmi khempeuh in amah bia ding uh hi,” na ci hi.
[11] Mawhna panin mite a siangthosakpa le sianthosakna a ngah mite in, Pa, a kibang a neikhawm uh hi. Tua hi a, Jesuh in mite, “Sanggam,” a cih ding zum ngaihsut lo ahih manin,
[14] Tate a cih mite pen leitung cilesa a nei mite ahih manin, ama sihna hangin sihna a uk Dawimangpa a sukgawp theih nadingin Jesuh in mihing pianzia mah hong nei phot hi.

[17] Tua ahih manin mihingte’ mawhna a kimaisak theih nadingin Pasian’ na a sepna-ah mite a dingin hehpihna le cihtakna tawh Siampi Lianpen a suahtheih nadingin a sanggamte tawh a kibangin mihing lim a hong puak ding a kisam ahi hi. [18] Ama pumpi mahmah in ze-etna le gimna thuak ahih manin tuhun ciangin tua bang a thuakte a hong huhthei hi.
[1] Tua ahih manin Pasian’ sapna a ngah mi siangthote aw, eite’ upna thu tawh kisai-ah Siampi Lianpen a sem dingin Pasian’ sawltak Jesuh’ thu ngaihsun dih un.
[15] Eite’ neih Siampi Lianpen pa in i ginat lohna-ah eite a hong hehpih thei lo ding hi lo hi; eite mah bangin ze-etna khempeuh a thuak hi a, ahi zongin mawhna a bawl lo ahi hi.

[5] Tua mah bangin Khrih zong, amahmah in siampi lianpen nasep a semtawm mawk hi loin Pasian in ama kiangah, “Nang, ka Tapa na hi hi. Tuni-in na Pa ka suak hi,” na ci hi. [6] Mun dang khatah zong, “Melkhizedek siampi gui zui-in a tawntungin siampi na hi ding hi,” na ci lai hi. [7] Leitungah mihingin Jesuh a omlai-in sihna panin amah a honkhia thei ding Pasian tungah thu ngenin khitui naptui tawh thumin na kiko hi. [8] Amah, Pasian’ Tapa hinapi-in a thuakna tawh thumang ahih theih nading a na kisin hi. [9] Tua bangin a cingtaak mi a suahkhit ciangin ama thu a mang mite khempeuh a dingin tawntung hotkhiatna a kipatna hong suak a,
[22] Hih bangin a kilamdang diakin a kibawlna in Jesuh pen kiciamna hoihzaw ahihna thu hong kilangsak hi.

[1] Tu-in i gennop thu pen hih bang ahi hi: Vantungah Pasian’ tokhom taklamah a tu tua bang Siampi Lianpen khat a nei ihi hi. [2] Amah in, mite’ bawl ahi lo, Topa mahmah in a bawl a taktak puanbuk ahi a Siangtho Pen mun sungah siampi lianpen nasep a sem ahi hi.

[15] Thuciamna masa in a huamkhak mite, a mawhna panun a suahtak theih nading uh ngeina om pen a si suak khinta ahih manin, Pasian’ sap mite in a ciamsa tawntung thupha a ngahtheih nadingun Khrih in thuciamna thak a hong vaihawm ahi hi.

[2] Eite hong makai-in i upna a hong cingtaaksak Jesuh mitsuanin nei ni. Mailamah a ngah ding lungdamna hangin maizumna kihta loin singlamteh tungah sihna hong thuak a, tu-in Pasian tokhom taklamah a tu hi.
[8] Jesuh Khrih pen zani, tuni, a tawntungin kibang ngitnget hi.

[11] Khrih in gimna thuakin, tua khit ciangin minthanna a ngah nading thu Kha Siangtho in a gen ciangin, amaute sungah a om tua Khrih’ Kha Siangtho in kua a cihna hi a, bang hun ciang hi ding hiam, ci-in a kankan uh pen tuhun thu a gen ahi hi.

[15] Note a hong sampa a siangtho ahih mah bangin note zong na gamtatna khempeuh uhah na siangtho un. [16] Lai Siangtho sungah zong, “Keimah siangtho ka hih manin note zong na siangtho un,” na kici hi.

[18] Na pu na pate uh nuntakzia, bangmahin a kimang lo nuntakna panin a hong suahtaksak nadingin Pasian in note’ man dingin a piak pen a man a kiam thei ngun le khamte bang hi lo a, [19] tuuno bangin paubaanna a om lo, a manpha mahmah Khrih, biakna-in a hong kipiakna tawh Pasian in note a hong suaktasak ahi hi.

[21] Khrih mahmah in zong note a dingin thuakin, ama khekhap na zuihtheih nadingun etteh ding lim hong nusiat ahih manin hih bangin a thuak ding mahin Pasian in note a hong sam ahi hi. [22] Khialhna bangmah gamta lo a, zuau a gen lam zong kiza ngei lo hi. [23] Amah a kizahko ciangin na ko thuk lo hi. Gimna a thuak ciangin na tawnggawp lo a, a manin thu a khen Pasian muanin a na nei hi.

[15] Na lungsim sung uhah Khrih zahtakbawl unla, amah Topa-in nei un. Note’ lametna thu a hong dong a omkhak leh hoihtakin a genthei dingin kiging tawntung unla, ahi zongin lungnemna le zahtakna lim tawh gen un.

[18] Khrih mahmah zong note a dingin si a, Pasian’ kiangah hong tunpih theih nadingin mihoih khat pen mihoih lote’ mawhna hangin khatvei a si hi. Mite in ama leitung pumpi that a, ahi zongin Pasian in kha nuntakna a pia hi.
[22] Tu-in vantungah tua Khrih pai khin a, Pasian’ taklamah omin, vantung mite le ukna aana a neite khempeuh tungah a ukin a om hi.

[1] Ka itte aw, note na khialhkhak loh nading uh ka deihna-in hih lai a hong gelh ka hi hi. Ahi zongin mi khatpeuh a khialh ciangin eite a dingin Pa Pasian kiangah a hong thumsak dingin a thuman Jesuh Khrih i nei hi. [2] Tua Jesuh hangin eite’ mawhna hong kimaisak a, eite a’ ding bek hi loin leitung mi khempeuh’ mawhna zong a mai nading ahi hi.
[20] Ahi zongin Khrih in note tungah Kha Siangtho hong piakhin ahih manin note khempeuh in a man na thei uh hi.
[3] Khrih a siangtho mah bangin amah tawh kibat ding a lamen khempeuh in zong a nuntakna uh siangthosak ding hi.
[7] Ka it tate aw, mite’ khemsa-in ta kei un. Khrih a thuman ahih mah bangin a manin a gamtate khempeuh a thuman ahi hi.

[20] Pasian’ Tapa hong pai-in eite thu hong theisak ahih manin Pasian taktak a thei ihihna thu i thei hi. A Tapa Jesuh Khrih tawh i kipawlna hangin Pasian taktak mah tawh a kipawlthei ihi hi. Tua Jesuh pen Pasian taktak mah hi a, nuntak tawntungna a piathei ahi hi.
[9] Khrih’ thuhilhna zui loin a khengvalin a pai mite pen Pasian tawh a kipawl lo ahi hi. Ahi zongin a thuhilhna a zuite pen Pa Pasian le a Tapa tawh a kipawl ahi uh hi.
[8] A beisa hun, tuhun, le mailam hunah zong a om tawntung ding a Vanglian Topa Pasian in, “Kei pen na khempeuh a Kipatna le a Tawpna ka hi hi,” a ci hi.

[5] A gualzo mite in tua bangin puanpak silh ding uh a, a nungta mite a kikhumna laibu sung panin amaute’ min ka phiat kei ding hi. Ka Pa le ama vantung mite kiangah zong keima mite ahihna uh ka pulak ding hi.

[4] Tua laizial phelin a sung a en dingin a kilawm kuamah kimu lo ahih manin nakpitakin ka kap hi. [5] Tua laitakin upate khat in kei kiangah, “Kap kei in. Judah minam sung panin Humpinelkai, David suan sung panin a lianpa gualzo khinta a, tua laizial ciaptehna sagihte lakhia-in a laizial phelthei ding hi,” a hong ci hi.

[13] Tua ciangin vantung, leitung, leinuai, tuipi sung le mun khempeuhah a om nuntakna a nei khempeuh inla a sakna uh ka za a, amaute in, “Tokhom tungah a tupa le Tuuno in phatna, pahtawina, minthanna le vangliatna, ngah tawntung ta hen,” a ci uh hi.
[1] Tua ciangin Tuuno in tua ciaptehna sagih sung panin khat a honkhiat ka mu hi. Tua laitakin ganhing lite sung panin khat in vanging bangin nakpitakin, “Hong pai in,” a cihna ka za hi.

[15] Tua ciangin leitung kumpite le miliante, galkapmangte, mihaute le mi vangliante, silate le sila ahi lote a kipanin a kuamah peuh, mualtung a leihawmte sungah bu uh a, [16] mualte le suangtum lianpite kiangah, “Kote tungah hong kiasuk unla, tokhom tungah a tupa’ maitang le Tuuno’ hehna panin kote hong liah un. [17] Amaute’ hehna hangin gimna hun hong tungta ahih manin kua in thuakzo ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

[11] Tua ciangin vantung a kihong ka mu a, sakol kang khat a om hi. A tungah a tuang pa pen a Citak a Thuman pa kici hi. Amah in thumanin thu khenin gal a do hi. [12] A mittangte meikuang tawh kibang a, lukhu tampi a khu hi. Amah simloh kuamah dang in a theih loh min khat ama tungah a kigelh hi. [13] Sisan sungah a kidiah puantualpi khat silh a, amah pen, “Pasian’ Thu,” cihna min tawh a kisam hi. [14] Vantung galkapte a siangtho puanpak hoih tawh kizem uh a, sakol kangte tungah tuangin amah a zui uh hi. [15] Minam dangte a zawhgawp nading namsau hiam khat a kam sung panin a pusuak hi. Amah in sik ciangkhut tawh minam dangte ukin, a Vanglian Pasian’ heh mahmahna tawh leenggah cilna-ah leengtui a sukkhia ding hi. [16] A puan tung le a phei tungah, “Kumpite’ Kumpi, topate’ Topa,” ci-in a min kigelh hi.

[4] Tua ciangin tokhom tungah a tu mi pawlkhat ka mu a, tua mite tungah thukhen nading aana a kipia ahi hi. Jesuh thu a genna le Pasian thu hangin a kithat mite’ kha zong ka mu hi. Tua mite in ganhing ahi a, a lim ahi zongin bia lo uh hi; a taltang uhah ahi a, a khut tung uhah ahi zongin ganhing ciaptehna nei lo uh hi. Amaute hong hingkik uh a, Khrih tawh kum tulkhat sung ukna aana a neikhawm uh hi.
[12] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Kei ka hong pai baihta ding a, mi khempeuh a gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in a thaman ding uh ka hong puak ding hi.
[16] “Keimah Jesuh in pawlpite a dingin hih thute nang kiangah a hong gen dingin ka vantungmi ka hong sawl hi. Kei pen David’ zung le a suan ahi, zingsol ka hi hi,” a hong ci hi.

[14] Egypt gam sungah Abram a tun ciangin Egypt mite in tua nupi a mel hoihsa mahmah uh hi. [15] Faro’ uliante in amah a muh uh ciangin Faro’ kiangah amah phat uh hi. Faro’ inn sungah tua nupi kila hi. [16] Tua nu’ hangin amah in Abram limbawl mahmah hi. Amah in tuu, bawngtal, latal, pasal nasem, numei nasem, lanu, le kalaohte a pia hi. [17] Ahih hangin TOPA in Abram’ zi Sarai’ huhau-in Faro le a innkuanpihte gimna lianpi thuaksak hi. [18] Tua ahih ciangin Faro in Abram samin, “Bang hangin hih bangin kei hong bawl na hi hiam? Amah na zi ahihna bang hangin kei kiangah hong gen lo na hi hiam? [19] Ka zi dingin amah ka lak theih nadingin, ‘Amah ka sanggamnu hi,’ bang hangin hong ci na hi hiam? Tu-in hih lai-ah na zi om hi. Amah la in la pai un,” a ci hi. [20] Faro in amah tawh kisai-in a mite tungah thu a pia hi. Amaute in a zi le ama neih khempeuh tawh lampi-ah a khakhia uh hi.

[2] a khuadaktoh leh, ama mai-ah mi thum na ding hi. Amah in amaute a muh ciangin amaute a dawn dingin puanbuk kong panin va tai a, leilakah kunsukin, [3] “Ka tote aw, nong hehpihna-un na sempa hong kheng kei un. [4] Na nasempa’ kiang hong tung khin na hih khit buangun na thahat kik nadingun an tawmkhat ka va lak kikal sungin tui tawmkhat lasakin na khe uh sil unla, sing nuai-ah khawl un; tua khit ciangin paisuak un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in, “Na cih bangin hong hih in,” a ci uh hi. [5] Na nasempa’ kiang hong tung khin na hih khit buangun na thahat kik nadingun an tawmkhat ka va lak kikal sungin tui tawmkhat lasakin na khe uh sil unla, sing nuai-ah khawl un; tua khit ciangin paisuak un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in, “Na cih bangin hong hih in,” a ci uh hi. [6] Tua ciangin puanbuk sunga Sarah kiangah Abraham pai mengmeng a, “Annel hoihte lawh thum hong bawl mengmeng inla, meek manin mohin hong bawl in,” a ci hi. [7] Abraham zong bawnghon lakah tai-in bawngno a dawng a hoih khat la a, manlang taka a na bawlpah a nasempa tungah a pia hi. [8] Tua ciangin amah in, bawngnawi-thaukhal, bawngnawi, le a minsa bawngsa la-in amau’ mai-ah a lui hi. Amaute in a nek laitakun sing nuai-ah amau’ kiangah amah a ding hi.

[2] “Ka tote aw, kong thum hi. Na nasempa’ inn lamah hong kihei-in hong giak unla, na khete uh sil un. Tua ciangin zingsangin tho baihin na pai nading lam uhah pai pan un,” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Hi lo hi; khua lakah ka giak ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

[18] Amah in, “Dawn in, ka topa,” a ci hi. Tua nu in a khut tungah a beel niamsuksakin amah a dawnsak hi. [19] Amah in tua mipa tui a dawnsak khit ciangin, “Na kalaohte in a kham matengun a dawn ding zong tui kong tawisak ding hi,” a ci hi. [20] Tua ahih ciangin amah in a tuikuang sungah a tui bungsuk pak a, tuitawi dingin tuikhukah tai-in a kalaohte khempeuh a dingin tui a tawi hi.
[31] Amah in, “Hong pai in, TOPA’ thupha piakpa aw; bang hangin a pua-ah ding na hi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh inn-ah na om nading mun ka bawl khin a, kalaohte a’ ding mun zong om hi,” a ci hi.

[31] Tua ciangin amah in a mai phiatin hong paikhia hi. Amah ki-ip tawmin, “An hong pia un,” a ci hi. [32] Amaute in Josef amah guakin nesakin, amaute a tuam mahin nesak a, amah tawh a ne Egypt mite in a tuam mahin ne uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih le Egypt mite in Hebru mite tawh an nekhawm lo uh hi. Tua banga nekkhawm ding pen Egypt mite a dingin a kihhuai ahi hi. [33] Ama mai-ah amaute a suakmasa a suah hun tawh kizui leh a moipen a khangnona tawh kizui-in tu uh hi. Lamdangsakna tawh amaute khatlekhat ki-en uh hi. [34] Josef’ sabuai tung panin amau’ tanh ciat kipia-in, ahih hangin Benjamin’ tanh pen amaute-a’ zah nga pha hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in an ne tui dawnin amah tawh lungdam uh hi.

[10] Jakob in Faro thupha pia-in tua lai panin a paikhia hi. [11] Tua ciangin Faro’ thupiaksa bangin Josef in leitang a hoihpen, Rameses leitang, Egypt gam sungah neihsa pia-in a pa le a sanggamte a tengsak hi. [12] Josef in a pa, a sanggamte, le a pa’ innkuante khempeuh a ne ding zah tawh kizui-in an a pia hi.
[20] Amah in a tanute kiangah, “Amah koi lai-ah om ahi hiam? Bang hangin tua mipa nusia na hi uh hiam? Amah in an hong nek theih nadingin va sam un,” a ci hi.
[21] “Khualmi khatpeuh na bawlsia kei ding uh a, na nengniam kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note zong Egypt leitangah khual mite na hi ngei uh hi.
[9] “Khualmi na nengniam kei ding uh hi. Khualmi’ lungsim na thei uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note zong Egypt gamah khualmi na hi ngei uh hi.
[33] “Na gam sung uhah note lakah khualmi khat hong peem leh, ama tungah a man loin na gamta kei ding uh hi.

[3] Tua ciangin Jerikho kumpipa in Rahab kiangah mi sawlin, “Na inn sunga hong tum, na kianga hong tung mite hong paikhiatpih in; bang hang hiam cih leh gam khempeuh a en dingin amaute hong pai uh hi,” a ci hi. [4] Ahih hangin Rahab in tua mi nihte la-in na seel khin hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in, “Hi mah hi, ka kiangah mi hong pai uh hi. Ahih hangin amaute koi pan hong pai uh hiam, cih ka thei kei hi. [5] Kulhkongpi a kikhak ding khuamial ciangin tua mite paikhia uh a, koi-ah pai uh hiam, cih ka thei kei hi. Manlangin amaute delh le-uhcin na pha kha ding uh hi,” a ci hi. [6] Ahih hangin amah in innkhum zangah tua mite paipih to-in innkhum zangah a koih ngei bangin a koihsa anthul kungte lakah amaute seel khin hi.

[17] Khuapi le a sunga omte khempeuh pen TOPA’ tungah biakna-in kisusia ding hi. Amah in i sawl kamtaite na seel ahih manin numei paktat Rahab le ama inn sungah amah tawh a omkhawmte khempeuh bek hing ding hi.
[15] Manoah in TOPA’ vantungmi kiangah, “Kong thum hi; tawlkhat khawl inla, nang a dingin keelno khat hong bawlsak nung,” a ci hi.

[16] Tua laitakin puteek khat lo-a a nasepna panin nitak ciangin hong ciah hi. Tua pa pen Efraim mualtung gam pan hi a, amah Gibeah khua-ah a peem hi a, tua khuamite pen Benjamin mite ahi hi. [17] Amah khuadak a, khualzin pa, khuapi kongzingah a mu hi. Tua ciangin puteekpa in, “Koi-ah pai ding na hi hiam? Koi panin hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. [18] Amah in, “Keima hong paikhiatna Judah gam Bethlehem khua panin Efraim mualtung gam mongah a pai dingin hong nawk ka hi uh hi. Judah gam Bethlehem-ah ka pai hi. Tu-in ka inn-a a ciah ka hi hi. Kuamah in a inn-ah hong tungsak nuam lo hi. [19] Ka late uh a dingin buhtu le gan-an, kei le na nasemnu le na nasemte tawh a om tangvalpa a dingin anlum le leenggahzu ka nei uh a, a kisam bangmah om lo hi,” a ci hi. [20] Tua ciangin puteekpa in, “Lunghimawh kei in. Na kisapna khempeuh ka en ding hi. Kongzingah giak kei hamtang in,” a ci hi. [21] Tua ahih ciangin amah in a inn-ah ciahpihin late gan-an a pia hi. Amaute in a khe uh silin an a ne uh hi.

[11] Amaute in Egypt mi khat gamlakah mu uh a, David kiangah amah paipih uh hi. Amaute in an pia uh a, amah in ne hi. Amaute in tui dawn ding zong a pia uh hi. [12] Theimoh khat le leenggahkeu bawk nih zong a pia uh hi. Amah in tuate a nek khit ciangin a tha hong dimkik hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh an ahi a, tui ahi zongin sun thum le zan thum ne lo dawn loin om hi. [13] Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, “Nang kuate na hi hiam? Koi pan na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Kei pen Amalek-te khat’ nasem, Egypt mi tangval khat ka hi hi. Tuma ni thum lai-in ka ci na ahih manin ka topa in hong nusia hi.

[10] Tua ahih ciangin amah dingin Zarefath-ah a pai hi. Khuapi kulhkongpi a tun ciangin, meigongnu khat in sing na tom hi. Amah in tua nu samin, “Ka dawn theih nadingin beel khat sungah tui tawm hong paipih in,” a ci hi. [11] Tua nu in paipih dingin a kisak laitakin, amah in tua nu samin, “Anlum neu khat hong tawi kawm in,” a ci hi. [12] Tua ciangin amah in, “ TOPA na Pasian a nungta ahih mah bangin emsa bangmah ka nei kei a, beel sungah annel khutdim khat le um sungah sathau tawmno khat bek om hi. Tu-in keimah le ka tapa a dingin tuate bawlin kote in ka nek theih nadingun singkang nih khawng a tom ka hi a, tua ciangin a si ta ding ka hi uh hi,” a ci hi. [13] Tua ciangin Elijah in ama kiangah, “Lunghimawh kei in; pai inla na gensa bangin an hong bawl in. Kei a dingin mohneu khat hong bawlsak masa-in kei kiangah hong paipih inla, tua khit ciangin nang le na tapa a’ ding bawl in. [14] Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel Pasian, TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: ‘ TOPA in leitungah guah a zuksak ni matengin beel sunga annel bei lo ding a, um sunga sathau zong kiam ngei lo ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.

[8] Ni khat Shunem-ah Elisha paisuak a, tua lai-ah a hau numei khat tengin tua nu in an ne dingin amah a sam hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in tua lam a nawk peuhpeuh ciangin an ne dingin tua lai-ah baang zel hi.

[19] Tua ciangin Elisha in amaute kiangah, “Hih pen a lampi hi lo a, hih zong a khuapi hi lo hi; hong zui un; na zon uh mipa kiangah note kong paipih ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in Samaria-ah amaute a paipih hi. [20] Amaute Samaria-ah a lut phetin Elisha in, “ TOPA aw, amaute in a muh theih nadingun hih mite’ mitte honsak in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin TOPA in amau’ mitte honsak a, tua ciangin amaute in khua mu uh hi. Samaria khua sungah a om ahihna uh thei uh hi. [21] Israel kumpipa in amaute a muh ciangin amah in Elisha kiangah, “Ka pa aw, amaute ka that ding hiam? Amaute ka that ding hiam?” a ci hi. [22] Amah in dawngin, “Amaute na that kei ding hi. Na namsau le na thal tawh loin galmatin na laksate that ding na hi hiam? Amaute in an ne-in tui a dawn khit ciangin a topa uh kiangah a ciahkik theih nadingun amaute’ mai-ah anletui lui in,” a ci hi. [23] Tua ahih ciangin amah in amaute a dingin pawi lianpi khat bawl hi. Amaute in an ne-in tui a dawn khit uh ciangin amaute sawlkhia a, tua ciangin a topa uh kiangah amaute a ciah uh hi. Tua ciangin Israel gam a sim dingin Syria-te hong pai nawn lo uh hi.
[17] Kiim le pama minam dangte’ kiang pan hong paite banah, nisimin ka sabuai-ah an a ne, thukhente le Jew mi a kihelin leengla za le sawmnga bang ka nei den hi.
[32] Khualzin mi khempeuh ka inn-ah ka tungsak tawntung a, kongzing lakah amaute ka lumsak ngei kei hi.
[5] TOPA in, “Mizawngte a neihsa kihawkkhia a, mi cimawhte thumin tau uh ahih ciangin tu-in dingin, amau’ lunggulh, lungmuanna munah amaute ka koih ding hi,” a ci hi.

[1] Pilna in a inn lam a, a innkhuampi sagih a phut hi. [2] Amah in pawi bawl dingin sa go-in leenggahzu khaih a, annekna ding sabuai a bawl hi. [3] Khuasung munsang khempeuh panin mi a sam dingin a nasem numeite sawl a, [4] “Thu thei lote aw, hong pai un,” ci-in samsak a, mihaite kiangah, [5] “Hong pai unla, ka an huansa ne-in, ka bawlsa leenggahzu hong dawn un.
[17] Mizawngte tungah a piate in TOPA’ tungah a pia hi a, TOPA in a cingin amaute tungah lohkik ding hi.
[9] Sathau namtui le paknamtui in lung nuamsak a, lawmte’ limbawlna in tha hatsak hi.
[20] A zawng mite tungah amah cingh mahmah a, a cimawh mite tungah huhna a pia hi.
[7] Na an uh a gilkialte tawh nekhawm unla, inn nei lo a zawngte na innsung uhah paipihin, tangguakin a om mite puan silhsakin, na mipihte uh kiang panin bu lo ding hi lo na hi uh hiam?
[49] Na sanggamnu’ mawhna pen: Amah le a tanute in nek ding tampi nei-in nuamsa mahmahin, daitakin om uh ahih manin amaute kiphasak uh a, a zawng a cimawhte don lo uh hi.
[16] Midangte in na gamtatna hoihte uh a muh ciangin vantungah a om na Pa uh min a phat theih nadingun mite mai-ah na gamtat hoihna uh khuavak bangin na kilangsak un.

[43] “Note in, ‘Na vengte uh na it unla, na galte uh na mudah un,’ ci-in a kigenna thu na zaksa uh ahi hi. [44] Ahi zongin ke’n note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong bawlsiate a dingin thu na ngetsak un.

[1] “Biakna tawh kizomin na hoih khat peuhpeuh na sep uh ciangin mite’ phat ding deihna tawh a kilang theithei dingin na sepkhak loh nadingun na kingaihsun un. Tua bangin gamta le-uhcin, vantungah a om na Pa uh kiang panin thaman na ngah kei ding uh hi. [2] “Tua ahih manin mi cimawhte tungah huhna na piak uh ciangin, mite in a phat ding uh a deihna tawh a kineihkhem mite in kikhopna innsung le kongzing lakah a kilang theithei-in a hih uh bangin na hih kei un. Tua bangin a hih mite in thaman a ngah khinta ahihna thu limtakin na phawk un. [3] Ahi zongin note in mi cimawhte citna tawh na huh uh ciangin na lawm naihuai pente uh nangawn in hong theih loh nadingun pia unla,
[12] Tua ahih manin note tungah hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah na bawl un. Moses Thukhamte le kamsangte’ thuhilhnate pen hih mah a deihna ahi hi.
[10] Jesuh in Matthai’ inn-ah nitak an a nek laitakin siahdong dangte le thukham a khial midang tampite in zong Jesuh le a nungzuite tawh an a nekhawm uh hi.

[11] “Khuapi ahi a, khuaneu ahi zongin khua khat peuhpeuh na tun uh ciangin tua khua sungah note zin hong tungsak nuam kua om ahi hiam, ci-in zong unla, na muh uh ciangin tuate’ inn-ah tungin, tua khua na nusiat mateng uh tua lai mahah omsuak pah un. [12] Inn khat peuhpeuhah na lut uh ciangin a mite hopihin thupha na pia un. [13] Tua na hopihna uh innsunga mite in note hong tunsaknop leh na hopihna thupha uh amaute tungah kip ding a, ahi zongin hong tunsaknop kei uhleh na hopihna thupha uh na dokkik ding uh hi. [14] Inn khat peuhpeuh in ahi a, khua khat peuhpeuh in ahi zongin note hong tunsaknop kei a, na thugen uh hong ngaihnop kei leh tua lai panin paikhia unla, na khe uha leivui bangte sinkhiat un. [15] Thukhen ni ciangin tua khuamite’ thuakna sangin Sodom khua le Gomorrah khuamite’ thuakna olzaw lai ding ahihna thu hoihtakin phawk un.

[40] “Na thugen uh a hong sangte in kei’ thu a hong sang hi a, kei a hong sangte in kei a hong sawl pa zong a sang ahi uh hi. [41] Pasian’ thugen ahihna hangin Pasian’ thugen mi a sangte in Pasian’ thugente’ thaman ngah ding a, mihoih hihna hangin mihoih a sang mite in mihoihte’ thaman ngah ding uh hi. [42] Keima nungzui mi a neupen khat nangawn, keima nungzui ahihna hangin tuivot hai khat bek a suahte nangawn in pel loin thaman a ngah ding lamtak phawk un,” ci-in a vaikhak hi.

[2] “Vantung ki-ukna zia pen a tapa a dingin mo pawi a bawl kumpipa’ gamtatzia tawh kibang hi. [3] Mopawi siim dingin a khohsa mite a sam dingin a nasemte sawl a, ahi zongin kuamah pai lo hi. [4] Tua ciangin nasem dangte sawl leuleu a, ‘Ka khohsaksa mite kiangah hih bangin va gen un: Ka bawngtalte le ka bawngno thaute kigo khin a, nitak an a minsa-in a om banah, na khempeuh a mansa-in om khinta hi. Mopawi an ne dingin hong pai ta un, ci hi, ci-in va gen un,’ a ci hi. [5] Ahi zongin a khohsa mite in na thusim lo uh a, pawlkhat in lo na kuansanin, pawlkhat in a sumbukah na paisanin, [6] adangte in a nasemte manin a na satgawp khit uh ciangin a na that uh hi. [7] Kumpipa zong heh mahmah a, a galkapte kuansakin tua mi thatte a thahsak khit ciangin a khua a haltumsak hi. [8] Tua ciangin a nasemte kiangah, ‘Mopawi an a baihsa-in om a, ahi zongin ka sap mite a ne dingin a kilawm lo mi a suak uh hi. [9] Tua ahih manin lamlianpi-ah va pai unla, mi na muh zahzah uh hong sam un,’ a ci hi. [10] Nasemte zong lamlianpi-ah va pai uh a, mihoih mi hoih lo ci loin a muh khempeuh uh va kaikhawm uh ahih manin mo pawi bawlna innsung dimin leengla hong om hi.

[34] Tua ciangin Kumpipa in a taklamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Ka Pa in thupha a piak mite aw, hong pai ta un. Leitung piancil a kipanin note a dingin a kibawlkholsa gamnuam hong luah un. [35] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka gilkial laitakin an nong pia uh a, ka dangtak laitakin tui nong pia uh a, khualmi ka hih laitakin zin nong do uh a, [36] puan nei loin ka om laitakin puan nong guan uh a, ka cinat laitakin nong veh uh a, ka thongkiat laitakin nong hawh uh hi,’ a ci ding hi.

[41] “Tua ciangin a veilamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Pasian in a samsiat mite aw, keima kiang panin paikhia unla, Dawimangpa le a nungzuite a dingin a kibawl meikuang tawntung sungah pai un. [42] Bang hang hiam cih leh ka gilkial laitakin an nong pia kei uh a, ka dangtak laitakin tui nong pia kei uh a, [43] khualmi ka hih laitakin zin nong do kei uh a, puan ka neih loh laitakin puan nong guan kei uh a, ka cinat laitakin nong veh kei uh a, ka thongkiat laitakin nong hawh kei uh hi,’ a ci ding hi.
[41] Khrih pawl na hihna hangun tui hai khat hong suah mi peuhmah in thaman ngah hamtang ding ahihna phawk un,” ci-in Jesuh in a gen hi.
[36] Farisi mite khat in a inn-ah an ne dingin Jesuh sam a, Jesuh zong pai-in an ne dingin a tu hi.
[7] Nasemte in a thaman a ngah ding a kilawm ahih mah bangin na zintunna inn mah uhah omsuak unla, a hong piak peuhpeuh uh na ne un. Na zintunna inn uh kheel themthum kei un.
[10] Ahi zongin khua khat peuhpeuhah na lut uh ciangin note hong tunsaknop kei leh a khuasung kongzingah pai unla,

[31] Tua laitakin siampi khat tua lampi tawnin hong paisuk a, amah a muh ciangin lamnawl lam tawnin a paisan hi. [32] Tua ciangin Levi mi khat zong tua mah bangin hong pai a, amah a muh ciangin lamnawl lam tawnin a paisan leuleu hi. [33] Ahi zongin Samaria mi khualzin khat, tua lai mun hong tungin a liam pa a muh ciangin hehpihhuaisa a, [34] a kiangah va pai-in a liammate sathau le leenggahzu a nuhsak khit ciangin a tunsak hi. Tua ciangin a la tungah tuangsak a, zintun inn khatah paipihin tua lai-ah a khoi hi. [35] A zingsang ciangin zintun inn nei pa kiangah sum peek nih pia a, ‘Hih mipa limtakin na khoi in. Na beina dang khempeuh, kong paikik ciangin kong loh ding hi,’ ci hi. [36] Hih mihing thumte sung panin, a kisuampa a dingin a koi pen a vengpa hi dingin na um hiam?” a ci hi. [37] Amah in, “A hehpih pa hi ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Jesuh in ama kiangah, “Nang zong pai inla, tua bangmahin gamta in,” a ci hi.

[5] Tua ciangin Jesuh in a nungzuite kiangah, “Note khatpeuh, na lawmte uh khat inn-ah zankim laitakin pai-in, ‘Lawm aw, anlum lum thum khawng hong leitawi sak in. [6] Ka lawmte khat zin hong tung a, ka piak ding ka nei het kei hi,’ ci le-uhcin,

[12] Tua ciangin Jesuh in a innteek pa kiangah, “Sun-an nekna-ah ahi a, nitak-an nekna-ah ahi zongin mi na sap ciangin, na lawmte ahi a, na sanggamte ahi a, na behte ahi a, mihau na vengte ahi zongin sam kei in. Amaute in zong an ne ding mahin nang hong samkik ding uh a, hih bangin hong sapna hangin na anvakna thaman a ngahkik na hi ding hi. [13] Tua bangin anvakna pawi na bawl ciangin mizawngte, khezawte, khebaite, le mittawte sam in. [14] Amaute in nang hong thukkik zo lo ding uh ahih manin nang a dingin a lungdamhuai hong hi ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh sihna panin mihoihte a thawhkik hun ciangin Pasian in nang tungah hong thukkik ding hi,” a ci hi.

[5] Jesuh, tua mun a tun ciangin khuadak to-in ama kiangah, “Zakkhias aw, manlangin hong kumsuk in. Na inn-ah tuzan kong taam ding hi,” a ci hi. [6] Tua ahih manin Zakkhias zong hong kum mengmeng a, lungdam mahmahin a inn-ah Jesuh a tungsak hi.
[29] ahi zongin amau tegel in kho-in, “Tu-in nitak lam hita a, ni tum dektak ahih manin ko tawh hong tamkhawm in,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih manin Jesuh zong amaute tawh a tam hi.

[7] Jesuh in nasemte kiangah, “Tua thambelpite sungah tui a dimin koih un,” ci-in a sawl mah bangin a dim sitsetin tui a koih uh hi. [8] Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Tu-in tui pawlkhat suak unla, zuphung pa kiangah va paipih un,” a ci hi. Amaute in zong tua mah bangin a va paipih uh hi. [9] Zuphung pa in leenggahzu a suak tui a ciap ciangin, (tui a sung nasemte in a theih hangin) koi panin kingah ahi hiam, ci-in thei lo ahih manin zinei tangvalpa samin, [10] “Midangte in leenggahzu khumte hawm masakin nei uh a, mite in a khamgawp khit uh ciangin a ngeinate hawm pan uh hi. Ahi zongin nangmah in a khum pen teng tu dong na sitlai hi,” a ci hi.
[2] Amaute in nitak an na vak uh a, Lazaras ahihleh Jesuh tawh an ne-in tukhawmin, Martha pen anpia-in a manlah hi.

[12] Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Hong pai un; zing an ne ni,” a ci hi. Amah pen Topa ahih lamtak thei uh ahih manin, “Nang kua na hi hiam?” ci-in a nungzuite khat beek in dong ngam lo uh hi.
[46] Nisimin biakinn-ah kikhawm uh a, a innte uhah an nekhawmin, lungdamna le kiniamkhiatna tawh a ne ciat uh hi.
[6] Tua mipa pen, tuipi gei-a teng savunnim nasepin a nei Simon inn-ah zin tungin a om ahi hi,” a ci hi.
[10] Peter a gil kialin an duh mahmah hi. A zinte in an a huanhuan laitakin Peter in maang a mu hi.

[14] Tua ka thuhilhna uh a za mite lakah Thiatira khuami, a manpha mahmah puansan a zuak, Lydia kici numei khat a om hi. Tua nu pen Pasian a bia numei khat hi a, Paul’ thugente a sangthei dingin Pasian in a lungsim a honsak hi. [15] Amah le a innsunga om mi khempeuh tui kiphum uh a, “Topa thu a um mi taktak hi, ci-in na hong ngaihsut nak-uhleh hong pai unla, ka inn-ah hong tung un,” ci-in hong samin a hong zol hi.
[34] Tua ciangin a inn-ah amaute ciahpihin an a pia hi. Tu-in Pasian thu um uh ahih manin amah a kipan a innkuanpih khempeuh a lungdam mahmah uh hi.
[8] A zing ciangin ding leuleu-in Sisaria khua ka tung uh a, Pasian thu a hilh Filip’ inn-ah tungin tua lai-ah ka taam uh hi. Tua pa pen Jerusalem khua-a a kiteel mi sagihte sungah a kihel ahi hi.
[2] Tua lai-a teng mite ko tungah hong nuam mahmah uh hi. Guahzu-in khua dam mahmah ahih manin meiphualpi hong cihsak uh a, limtakin zin hong do uh hi.
[7] Tua lai panin a gamla lo mun khatah tua tuikulh hausa pa Publias’ lo a om hi. Amah in limtakin kote zin hong do a, ni thum sung ama zinin ka om uh hi.
[13] Na Khristian pihte uh a kisapna bangin na neihsate uh na hawm unla, zin le leengla do a siam mite na hita un.

[20] Tua ahih ciangin Lai Siangtho sungah, “Na galte uh a gil a kial leh an na pia un. A dang a taak leh tui na pia un. Tua bangin na gamtat uhleh amaute’ maizum nadingin a bawl na hi uh hi,” ci-in a kigelh bangin gamtazaw un.

[8] Khatlekhat ki-it ding cih lohbuang, kuama tungah leiba nei kei un. Midang a itte in Thukham deihna teng a zuikhin ahi hi. [9] Thukham sungah, “Nulepa mawhna bawl kei in, mi that kei in, guta kei in, hazatna lungsim nei kei in,” cihna le adang khempeuhte pen, “Nang na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in,” cihna thu in huam khinmang hi. [10] Midangte a it mi peuhmah in amaute tungah siatna bawl het lo ahih manin itna i neih ciangin Thukham buppi a zui khinta ihi hi.

[5] Note in lungsim kikhatin i Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pa ahi Pasian na phatkhawm theih nadingun Pasian in thuakzawhna le thahatna hong pia hen la, Jesuh Khrih deihna bangin gamta-in khatlekhat kithutuak takin hong omsak tahen. [6] Note in lungsim kikhatin i Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pa ahi Pasian na phatkhawm theih nadingun Pasian in thuakzawhna le thahatna hong pia hen la, Jesuh Khrih deihna bangin gamta-in khatlekhat kithutuak takin hong omsak tahen. [7] Tua ahih ciangin Khrih in note hong san mah bangin midangte in Pasian a phattheih nadingun note khatlekhat na kisang un.

[2] Amah pen keimah a kipan mi tampi a dingin lawm hoih mahmah khat ahih manin, Pasian’ mite in a hih dingin a kilawm ahih mah bangin Topa’ thu sungah mihoihin na sang unla, note’ huh ding a kisapna khempeuhah hoihtakin na huh un.
[23] Keima zintunna pa le pawlpite’ kikhopna inn nei pa zong ahi Gaias in zong hong hopih hi. Ka omna khuapi sumkem pa Erastas le i Khristian sanggam Kuartas in zong hong hopih uh hi.
[13] Topa’ nasepna sungah a kikhai mahmah Rufas, le ta bangin kei a hong bawl tawntung ama nu zong na hopih sak un.

[18] Note kiangah Titus a hong pai nading ka hahsawl a, amah tawh a kithuah dingin thu upna sungah ka sanggampa uh zong ka hong paisak hi. Titus in nuamtaksa-in note tungah bang hong ngen zenzen ahi hiam? Kote in lungsim kibangin na semin ka kalsuanna zia uh zong a kibang hi lo ahi hiam?

[14] Ka pumpi cidam lohna pen note a dingin thu haksapi hinapi-in kei na hong simmawhbawl tuan kei uh a, zong na hong nolh tuan kei uh hi. Vantung panin a hong pai vantungmi zin do bang le Khrih Jesuh mahmah zin a do bangin na hong limbawl uh hi.

[13] Sanggamte aw, note ahihleh a suakta mi ahi dingin Pasian in a hong sap ahi hi. Ahi zongin tua suahtakna pen na pumpi uh ut bangbangin gamtat theih nadingin paulam zonna-in nei kei unla, itna tawh khatlekhat kikhualna-in zangzaw un. [14] Bang hang hiam cih leh Thukham khempeuh thu khatin kigawm thei a, “Nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in,” cihna tawh kitomlak thei hi.
[22] Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho’ sawlna bangin gamtatnate pen: Itna, lungdamna, lungnopna, lungduaina, migitna, hoihna, cihtakna,
[10] Tua ahih ciangin hunhoih i ngah simin midangte tungah a hoihin i gamta ding a, a diakdiakin thu upna sungah i innkuanpihte khempeuh tungah i hoih gamtat ding i phawk ding hi.
[10] Eite a hong bawlpa pen Pasian hi a, Jesuh Khrih tawh i kipawl ciangin i nuntakna-ah gamtat hoih a nei dingin a hong bawl ihi hi. Hih pen eite’ omzia dingin a na ngaihsut kholhsa ahi hi.
[32] khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim nem tawh na kihozaw unla, Khrih’ hangin Pasian in note’ mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.
[7] Mihingte’ na a sem bang lelin kingaihsun loin Topa’ na a sem bangin kingaihsun unla, thanopna tawh sem un.

[14] Na khempeuh phun lo, thu nial loin sem un. [15] Tua hileh a lungsim kawi, a hoih lo leitung mite lakah paubaanna a nei lo a siangtho, Pasian’ tate na hi ding uh a, nuntakna thu na genna uh hangin leitung mite lakah khuavak bangin na hoihna uh a kilang mite na hi ding uh hi.

[23] Mite’ nasem bangin kingaihsun loin, Pasian’ nasem bangin kingaihsun unla, na sep peuhpeuh uh lungsim takpi tawh lawpin sem un. [24] Topa in note tungah thaman a hong piak ding lamtak phawk gige un. Tua bangin na sepna uhah Khrih Topa’ na a semsem na hi uh hi.
[9] Note kiangah ka hong pai lai-un kote na hong limbawlna thu uh, le a nungta a man Pasian’ thu zui-in a bia ding le,

[2] Tua ahih manin siate pen paubaanna a nei lo mi, zi khat bek a nei mi, lungsim hoih hithiat mi, thu a ngaihsun thei mi, a kilawm a kituakin a gamta mi, zin le leengla do a siam mi, thuhilh a siam mi,

[10] Tua banah a gamtat hoihna a kitheite, a tate hoihtakin a khansuahsate, a inn-ah zin le leengla do a siam mite, kiniamkhiatin Pasian’ mite’ khe a silsakte, a lungkham mite a huhte, le thu khempeuhah a hoih gamtat mite hi lai ding uh hi.

[7] Pawlpi siate pen Pasian’ nasem ahih manin paubaanna a om lo, a kiphasak lo, zukham thei mi ahi lo, a ngongtat lo, a huaiham lo, [8] zinleleeng do a siam mi, thuhoih a deih mi, a pumpi a ki-ukzo mi, a thutang mi, a siangtho mi, le a kisekzo mi hi ding uh hi.
[1] Khrih sungah unau bangin na ki-itna uh na zomsuak un. [2] Khualmite hoihtakin zin na do ding uh na phawk un. Mi pawlkhat in vantung mite zindo ahihlam a phawk lopi-in a do na hi gige uh hi.
[16] Khatlekhat tungah thuhoih kibawlin na kihuh ding uh mangngilh kei un. Hih bang gamtatnate pen Pasian a lungkimsak thei biakna ahi hi.
[25] Numei paktat Rahab zong tua bangmah ahi hi. Israel mi thukante hoihtakin zin na do-in, lampi dangah ciahsakin na suaktasak a, ama nasepna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl theihna a ngah ahi hi.
[9] Khatlekhat maitai takin zinleleeng na kido un.

[5] Ka hong it lawm Gaias aw, na theih ngei loh hinapi-in i Khristian mipihte lungsim takpi tawh na na huh hi. [6] Amaute na limbawlna thu, hih lai-a pawlpite kiangah hong gen uh hi. I biak Pasian’ deihna tawh kituakin a khualzinna uh nuamtakin a zoptheih nadingun na huh in. [7] Amaute pen Pasian’ nasem dingin a khualzin khia uh hi a, thu um lo mite tung panin bangmah huhna ngah lo uh hi. [8] Tua ahih manin Pasian thuman nasepna-ah nasem khawm mite ihih theih nadingin ei Khristiante in hih bang mite i huh ding ahi hi.

[20] Noah pen lo kho masa pa hi a, amah in leenggui lo khat a bawl hi. [21] Amah in leenggahzu ne-in kham a, a puanbuk sungah bangmah silh loin a lum hi. [22] Kanaan’ pa Ham in a pa guaktangin a omna mu a, a pualama om a sanggam nihte kiangah a gen hi. [23] Tua ciangin Shem le Jafeth in puan khat la-in amau tegel’ liangko tuakah baang uh a, a nung leh lamun pai-in a pa uh’ guaktang omna a khuh uh hi. Amaute in maingat lo uh ahih manin a pa uh guaktang omna mu lo uh hi. [24] Noah a zukhamna panin a pilvan’ ciangin ama tungah a tapa Ham’ gamtatna thei a, [25] amah in, “Kanaan in samsiatna ngah ta hen la, a sanggamte’ sila hi tahen. [26] TOPA ka Pasian in Shem thupha pia hen la, Kanaan, ama sila hisak hen.
[18] Tua ciangin Jerusalem kumpipa Melkhizedek in an le leenggahzu hong pusuah hi. Amah pen Sang Pen Pasian’ siampi zong ahi hi.

[31] A u pen in a nau tungah, “I pa lah teek ta a, leitung ngeina bangin eite hong luppih ding pasal khat zong om lo hi. [32] Hong pai in; i pa leenggahzu khamsak ni; i pa tawh suanlekhak i kizopsak theih nadingin amah tawh lumkhawm ni,” a ci hi. [33] Tua ahih ciangin amaute in tua nitakin a pa uh leenggahzu khamsak uh hi. A unu pai-in a pa tawh lum hi. A tanu a luplam hitaleh a thawhlam hitaleh amah in phawk lo hi. [34] A zing ciangin a u in a nau tungah, “En in, zan zanin i pa tawh ka lum hi. Tu nitakin zong amah leenggahzu khamsak leuleu ni. Tua ciangin nang pai inla, i pa tawh suanlekhak i kizopsak theih nadingin amah tawh lumkhawm in,” a ci hi. [35] Tua ahih ciangin amaute in tua nitakin zong a pa uh leenggahzu khamsak uh hi. A nau pai-in amah tawh lum hi. A tanu a luplam hitaleh a thawhlam hitaleh amah in phawk lo hi. [36] Tua ahih ciangin Lot’ tanu tegel in a pa uh tawh naupaii uh hi.

[25] Tua ciangin amah in, “Ka tapa nangma sa matsa ne-in thupha kong piak theih nadingin ka kiangah hong paipih in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a kiangah paipih a, amah in a ne hi. Amah in leenggahzu paipihin, amah in a dawn hi.
[28] Pasian in na tungah vantung daitui hong pia hen la, na lote hoihsak tahen. An le leenggahzu tampi hong pia tahen.

[8] TOPA in Aaron kiangah, [9] “Nang hitaleh na tapate hitaleh kikhopna bukah na pai uh ciangin leenggahzu hitaleh khamtheih zu hitaleh ne kei un. Na nek uhleh na si ding uh hi. Tua pen na suan na khakte uh tungah khang tawntungin ngeina kip khat hi ding hi. [10] Note in a siangtho le a mawkmawk, le a nin le a siang na khen ding uh hi.
[3] leenggahzu le khamtheihzu ne lo ding hi. Leenggahzu le khamtheihzu pan a kibawl tuithuk dawn lo ding a, leenggahtui khat peuhpeuh dawn loin, leenggah a hing hitaleh a keu hitaleh ne lo ding hi.
[12] “Sathau limci pen khempeuh, le leenggahzu le an a limci pen khempeuh, TOPA’ tungah amau’ piak anpalte, note’ tungah kong pia hi.
[7] Leenggahzu tawh biakna pen tuuno khat ciangin hai khat hi ding hi. TOPA’ tungah leenggahzucil tawh biakna pen siangtho munah na sung ding uh hi.

[13] Amah in note hong itin, tampi hong phasak ding hi. Amah in note tungah piak dingin na pu na pate uh tungah a ciam gam sungah note’ suanlekhakte le na gam sung panun a piangte, na an uh le na leenggahzu uh le na sathau uh, le na ganhingte uh pungsakin, na tuulekeelno honte uh zong thupha pia ding hi.

[26] na deih peuhpeuh uh bawng ahi a, tuu ahi a, leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin, na duh peuhpeuh uh leina-in a sum na zang ding uh hi. TOPA na Pasian uh mai tua lai munah na ne ding uh a, note le na innkuanpihte uh na lungdam ding uh hi.
[20] amaute in a khuapi upate kiangah, ‘Hih ka tapa uh lungkhauhin hong langpang thei a, amah in ka thu uh hong mang lo a, an hai, zu hai bek ahi hi,’ ci ding uh hi.
[6] TOPA pen na Pasian uh ahihna na theih nadingun nek ding anlum, le dawn ding leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheih zu ahi zongin na ne nai kei uh a, ahi zongin na kisapna teng uh hong pia hi.
[14] Bawnghon panin bawngnawi thaukhal, tuuhon panin tuunawi, tuunote le tuutalte’ thau tawh, Bashan bawnghonte le keelte, mangbuh hoihpente tawh leenggahtui san na dawn uh hi.
[33] Amau’ leenggahzu pen gulpi gu le a gupha gul gunei gu tawh kibang hi.
[13] Ahih hangin leenggui in amaute kiangah, ‘Keimah in pasian-te le mite a lungnuamsak ka leenggahzu nusia-in singkungte a uk dingin hong pai ding ka hi hiam?’ ci hi.
[4] Tua ahih ciangin kidawm inla, leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin ne loin, a nin bangmah ne kei in.

[7] Ahih hangin amah in kei kiangah, ‘En in, nang gai-in tapa khat na nei ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin ne kei inla, a nin bangmah ne kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh naupang pen a suah a kipan a sih dong Pasian’ tungah Nazir mi hi ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.

[14] Amah in leenggui pana piang peuhmah ne thei lo ding a, leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin ne thei loin, a nin na khat peuhpeuh ne thei lo ding hi; amah ka thupiak khempeuh tang hen,” a ci hi.

[14] Tua ahih ciangin Eli in ama kiangah, “Bang tanvei zu kham ding na hi hiam? Na leenggahzu nek khawl in,” a ci hi. [15] Ahih hangin Hannah in dawngin, “Hilo hi, ka topa aw; kei pen nakpitakin a lungkham numei ka hi hi. Leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin ka ne kei a, TOPA’ mai-ah ka lungsim a sungkhia ka hi hi.

[36] Tua ciangin Nabal kiangah Abigail hong tungkik hi. Kumpipa’ pawi tawh kibangin amah in a inn sungah pawi na kham hi. Nabal lungnuam mahmah hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in zu kham mahmah hi. Tua ahih ciangin zingsang khuavak mateng ama kiangah bangmah gen peuhmah lo hi. [37] Zingsang ciang, Nabal’ zukhamna a ven’ ciangin a zi in ama kiangah hih thute gen a, thakhatin a lungtang si-in amah suangtum bang hi. [38] Tua khit ni sawm bang ciangin TOPA in Nabal vat a, amah a si ta hi.
[13] David in amah samin ama omna-ah zu le an nesak a, amah zu khamsak hi. A nitak ciangin amah a lum dingin a topa’ nasemte tawh paikhia a, ahih hangin ama inn-ah ciahsuk tuan lo hi.

[28] Tua ciangin Absalom in a nasemte thu pia a, “Ammon in zu a kham hun phawk unla, note kiangah, ‘Ammon sat un,’ kong cih ciangin amah that un. Lau kei un; note thu hong pia khin hi lo ka hi hiam? Hang unla, thahat un,” a ci hi.

[8] Judah kumpi Asa’ kum sawmnih le gukna kumin Baasha’ tapa Elah in Tirzah panin Israel tungah uk ding kipan a, kum nih sung uk hi. [9] Ahih hangin ama leengte alang a ukpa ama nasem Zimri in amah sawmsim hi. Tirzah-a kumpi innsung a ukpa Arza’ inn-ah zukhamin Tirzah-ah a om laitak, [10] Judah kumpi Asa’ kum sawmnih le sagihna kumin Zimri hong pai-in Elah sattukin that a, ama tangin a uk hi.
[12] Bukte sungah kumpite tawh zu ne-in Benhadad a om laitakin hih thu a zak ciangin amah in a mite kiangah, “Panmun la un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in khuapi a simgawp dingin panmun a la uh hi.
[16] Tua ciangin Benhadad, bukte sungah amah a huh kumpi sawmthum le nihte tawh zukhamin a om laitak sun hunin amaute kuankhia uh hi.

[7] Kham hai nam tuamtuamte tawh zu kihawm a, kumpipa’ hauhna tawh kituakin deihdeihin zu kizang hi. [8] Tua lai-ah zu nekna zia pen kihah piak cih om lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh in amau’ duh zahzah bek a neksakna ding uh kumpipa in a nuai-a a uliante thu pia hi. [9] Tua banah Kumpinu Vashti in zong numeite a dingin Kumpipa Ahasueras’ innsung mahah pawi khat a bawl hi. [10] A ni sagih ni, zunekna hangin a lung a nop ciangin kumpipa in ama na a sem innsungmang sagihte Mehuman, Biztha, Harbona, Bigtha, Abagtha, Zethar, le Karkas-te sam a, mite le uliante mai-ah Kumpinu Vashti a melhoihna a lahtheih nadingin a kumpi lukhu khusa-in ama kiangah a paipih nadingun a sawl hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua nu a mel a hoih takpi mah ahi hi.

[18] Amah in a thugen a khit ma-in kamtai dang khat hong tung leuleu a, “Na tapate le na tanute a u pen uh inn-ah an ne zu ne-in om uh hi. [19] Tua laitakin sehnel gam panin huihpi pingpei hong nungin a inn mutpai-in na tate denglum hi. Nang kiangah hih thu a hong ko thei dingin kei bek kong suakta hi,” a ci hi.

[8] Bang hang hiam cih leh TOPA’ khut sungah leenggahzu a phuan, a kihelkim ngingei hai khat om a, amah in tua sung panin hong bungkhia ding a, leitung migilo khempeuh in a tawdat dong takin a liaktum ding uh hi.

[14] Nangmah in ganhingte a dingin lopa, mihing in leilak panin an a ngah theih nadingin a khawh ding ankungte, [15] mihing lungsim a nuamsak ding leenggahzu, mihing maitang a zolsak ding sathau, mihing lungsim a hatsak ding an na piangsak hi.
[10] Tua hileh na ansalte an tawh kidim ding a, beel dimletin leenggahzu na nei ding hi.
[2] Amah in pawi bawl dingin sa go-in leenggahzu khaih a, annekna ding sabuai a bawl hi.
[1] Leenggahzu in mi kamtam sakin khamtheihzu in mi kitawngsak a, zukhamna pen haina ahi hi.
[17] A noptat nuamte zawng uh a, zu ne-in sathau namtui a nilhte hau lo uh hi.

[19] Ka ta aw, ka thu ngai inla, mipil suak in; lampi man zuih ding ngaihsutpi-in nei in. [20] Zu nenete tawh kikhawl kei inla, a uisante tawh kithuahkha kei in. [21] Zu nenete le a uisante zawng ding uh a, a ne beka nitumte in puansia bek silhzo ding hi.

[29] Kuate in gal nei a, kuate in dahna thuak hiam? Thu om lopi-in kuate liam a, thu om lopi-in kuate a mit san gega hiam? [30] Zu ne-a a tut khote zu a nenete ahi hi. [31] Hai sungah a phuan seuhseuh gawl sungah a tumsuk hithit thei leenggahzu san et-in nei kei in. [32] A tawpna-ah gulpi bangin nang hong tu ding a, gul gunei in a tuk na bang ding hi. [33] Na mitah na lamdangdang hong suak ding a, hoihtakin na pau thei nawn kei ding hi. [34] Tuipi tungah a lum tawh na kibang ding a, a suk awn a to awn teembaw dawna tuang tawh na kibang ding hi. [35] “Hong vuak hangun ka liam kei a, hong sat hangun ka phawk kei hi. Ka pilvang ciangin zu ka ne kik ding hi,” na ci ding hi.

[4] Lemuel aw, ka thugen hong ngai in. Kumpite in zu nek huai lo a, mi ukte in khamtheihzu a duh ding hi lo hi. [5] Zu ne le-uh, thukham mangngilh uh a, thukham hei-in mizawngte gim pia khathei uh hi. [6] A si dekdekte, khamtheihzu pia inla, a lungkham mahmahte, leenggahzu pia in. [7] Amaute nesak lecin a zawnna uh mangngilhin, a lungkhamna uh phawk nawn lo ding uh hi.
[3] Mihingte in leitungah tomno a nuntak sungin bangci om leh hoih ding ahi hiam, cih ka muh theih nadingin pilna ka deihna mah tawh, zunekna tawh ka lung nuamsakin, ka utut sep ding ka hanciam hi.

[15] Tua ahih ciangin mihing in hih leitungah nuam a sak theih ding adang om lo ahih manin an ne tui dawnin nuamsa-in a om ding bek ahi hi. Pasian in hih leitungah nuntak a piak sungteng a sep thaman a ngah theih ding hih bek om hi.
[7] An ne-in lungdam inla, zu ne-in lungnuam in. Na gamtatna peuhpeuh Pasian in hoih a sa hi.
[17] A kumpipa in lungsim khentatna nei thei a, a makaite in annek tuidawn a hun thei a, amau ki-uk thei-in zu a kham lo makai a nei, gam khat peuhpeuh a hampha gam ahi hi.
[22] Jerusalem khuapi aw, nguntang na bang ngei a, tu-in ahihleh ngun-ek na suakta hi. Leenggahzu limci na bang ngei a, tu-in ahihleh tui mawkmawk na bangta hi.

[11] Zingsang tungin tho-in, khamtheihzu delhin, leenggahzu in amaute a satsak pialpual matengin nitakin a tutkho mite in gimna ngah ta hen! [12] Amaute in a pawi sung uhah laiza lasakna le harp lasakna, khuang, tamngai, le leenggahzu, tampi a nei uh hi. Ahih hangin amaute in TOPA’ sepnate don lo uh a, a khut tawh a bawlte zong mu lo uh hi.
[22] Leenggahzu tampi a dawnte, khamtheih zunek a hatte, [23] mimawhte sumgolh tawh khah a, midikte a mawhsakte in gimna ngah ta hen!
[14] TOPA in amaute’ lungsim kitukalhsak khinzo hi. Zukham pa ama luak lakah a puk bangin Egypt gam mite’ hihna khempeuh khialin hoimang khin hi.

[12] Tua ni ciangin Vanglian Topa PASIAN in kahna le thumna, sam mettolna le puanhampi silhna a zang dingin thu hong pia hi. [13] Ahih hangin note in lungdamna le kipahna, bawngtalte le tuute gawhna, sa nekna le leenggahzu nekna na nei zawsop uh a, “Zing ciangin si ding ihih ciangin nene-in dawndawn ni,” na ci zawsop uh hi.
[9] Zu phungah lungdam a lasakna om nawn lo a, zu khempeuh kisia-in khagawp ta hi.
[6] Vanglian TOPA in hih mual tungah mi khempeuh a dingin anlim nekna pawi, a ciil mahmah leenggahzu nekna pawi, guhngek tawh a kidim an nekna, a siangtho leenggahzu ciil nekna pawi bawl ding hi.
[2] Tua ni ciangin, “A deihhuai leenggah lo thu la-in sa un!

[1] Israel Kumpi gam in siatna a thuak ding hita hi. Zu a kham, a gam makaite’ lu tungah a om pak tawh a kibawl Kumpi lukhu bangin a minthanna maimangta hi. A lutang uh paknamtui kinuh napi-in zukhamin tukmangkhin uh hi.

[7] Hih mite zong leenggahzu tawh hoi-in khamtheihzu tawh awn uh hi. Siampite le kamsangte nangawn zukhamin hoi uh hi. Kamsangte in zu kham lua uh ahih manin Pasian’ muhsak maangmuhnate theithei lo uh a, siampite in zong zu kham lua uh ahih manin a thukhen dingte uh khen thei lo uh hi. [8] Bang hang hiam cih leh sabuai tung khempeuh a luak uh tawh kidim a, a nit lohna mun om lo hi.
[9] Lamdang kisasak unla lamdang a sa hi un! Kimittawsak unla a mittaw hi un! Leenggahzu a dawn lopi-in a zukham hi unla, khamtheihzu a ne lopi-in hoi un!

[26] Nang hong nengniam mite pen amau’ satak mah ka nesak ding a, zukham bangin amau’ si mah a kham ding uh hi. Tua ciangin kei pen Jakob’ Vanglian Pa, nang hong Tankhiapa, nang hong Hon TOPA ka hihna mi khempeuh in hong thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
[1] A dangtak mi peuhmah tui phualah hong pai un. An nei lote aw, hong pai unla hong ne un! Hong pai un; a man ding bangmah piak kul loin leenggahzu le bawngnawi na duh zahzah uh hong ne un.

[9] Lo sungah a om ganhing khempeuhte, gamlakah a om ganhing khempeuhte aw, a netum dingin hong pai un. [10] Amau’ galvilte a mit uh taw a, amaute khempeuh in bangmah thei lo uh hi. Amaute khempeuh ui ham thei lo inncing tawh kibang uh a, amaute in tawng thei lo uh hi. Mot paupau, lumlum, lususu in om ding bek nuam a sa uh hi. [11] Uite in nakpitakin duh uh a, kham hun cih nei ngei lo uh hi. Tuucingte in zong thutheihna nei lo uh hi. Amaute khempeuh amau tum ciatin gamta uh a, a vekpi-un amau’ phattuamna ding bek a zong ciat uh hi. [12] Amaute in, “Hong pai un, leenggahzu nene ni; khamtheihzu dawndawn ni. Zing ciangin zong tuni sangin nuamzaw lai ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
[8] TOPA in limtakin thuciamna bawl khinzo a, a vangliatna tawh tungsak ding hi. “Na galte’ an dingin na ante ka piakik nawn kei ding a, nangma sepsa leenggahzu gamdang mite in dawn nawn lo ding hi.

[8] TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: “Leenggahzu pen leenggah bom panin kingah a, mite in, ‘Tuate kimang thei ding ahih ciangin susia kei un,’ a cih mah bangun kei zong a minam bupun susia loin, keima na hong semte ka suaktasak ding hi.
[11] “Ahih hangin kei a hong nusia, ka mual siangtho a mangngilh, Gad pasian a dingin sabuai phahin, Meni pasian a dingin zu helsa hai sungah a dim note pen,
[9] Kamsangte tawh kisai-in: TOPA’ hang le ama thugen kammal siangthote’ hangin keima sungah ka lungsim hong kitamkham a, ka guh ka taang a ling hi. Zu tam ne lua-in a kham mipa tawh ka kibang hi.

[5] Tua ciangin Rekhab behte’ mai-ah leenggahzu a dimin a kikoih hai le keute ka pia a, leenggahzu dawn un, ci-in ka sawl hi. [6] Ahih hangin amaute in, “Kote in leenggahzu ka ne kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Rekhab’ tapa, ka pu uh Jonadab in thu hong pia a, ‘Note a kipan na ta na tute un leenggahzu na ne ngei peuhmah kei ding uh hi. [7] Inn na lam kei ding uh a, khai na tuh kei ding uh hi. Singno na suan kei ding uh a, leenggah lo na bawl kei ding uh hi. Ahih hangin na tenpakna uh gam sungah sawtveipi na tentheih nadingun na nuntak hun sungteng uh puanbuk sungah na teng ding uh hi,’ hong ci hi. [8] Kote in Rekhab’ tapa ka pu uh Jonadab’ hong thupiak khempeuh ka mang uh a, ka nuntak hun sungteng uh ko a kipan ka zite uh, ka tapate uh le ka tanute uh in leenggahzu dawn loin,

[14] Rekhab’ tapa Jonadab in a suanlekhakte tungah leenggahzu a dawn loh nading uh a thupiakna amaute in zui uh a, tuni ciang dong bangmah a dawn kei uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a pu uh’ thupiakna a mang uh hi. Keimah in note kong hopih tawntung hangin ka thu nong mang kei uh hi.
[7] Babylon khuapi, TOPA’ khut sungah a om kham hai tawh kibang a, leitung buppi zu a khamsak hi. Gamdangte in a zu a dawn manun a hai khin uh hi.
[39] A duh mahmah laitakun amaute ka vak ding a, khua a phawk nawn loh dong uh zu ka khamsak ding hi. A tawntungin ihmu paisuak ding uh a, a khanglo nawn kei ding uh hi, TOPA in kong ci hi.
[57] A kumpi uliante le a mipilte uh a kipan ukpite, uliante, le galkapte, zu ka khamsak ding a, a tawntungin ihmu-in a khanglo nawn kei ding uh hi, ci-in Vanglian TOPA a kici kumpipa in kong gen hi.
[21] Biakinntual sungnungah a lut ma-un siampite in leenggahzu ne lo ding uh hi.

[5] Amaute pen kumpi innsunga nasem dangte mah bangin nisimin an le leenggahzu tawh a vak dingin kumpipa in thu a pia hi. Tua bangin kum thum sung sinna a neih khit uh ciangin kumpipa mai-ah amaute a kilak kik ding uh ahi hi.

[8] Daniel in kumpi innsunga an le leenggahzu tawh a pumpi a thanghuaisak loh nadingin a lungsim a khensat hi. Amah in innsungmang lianpen Ashpenaz kiangah tua bang an a kipiak loh nadingin a ngen zaw hi.
[16] Tua ciangin a cing pa in kumpi an le leenggahzu pia loin amaute anteh an a pia hi.

[1] Kumpi a suah ciangin Belshazzar in pawi lianpi khat bawl a, a mi liante tulkhat samin amaute tawh zu a ne uh hi. [2] Zu a nek laitakun, Belshazzar in a pa Nebukhadnezzar in Jerusalem biakinnpi panin a puakkhiat ngun hai, kham hai, le kuangte a va la dingin thu a pia hi. Kumpipa in a miliante le a zite le a zineute in tua haite tawh zu a nektheih nadingun hai la dingin thu a pia hi. [3] Thakhatin kham haite, kuangte hong paipih uh a, a vekpi-un tua haite tawh zu a ne uh hi. [4] Amaute in zu ne uh a, kham tawh, ngun tawh, sumngo tawh, sik tawh, sing tawh, suang tawh a kibawl pasian-te a phat uh hi.

[23] Vantung Topa’ langah na pang hi. A biakinnpi hai le kuangte la-in sabuai tungah nangmah tawh, na miliante tawh a zineute le na zite uh tawh zunekna-in na zang uh hi. Theihna a nei lo, a mu thei lo, khua a za thei lo ngun, kham, sumngo, sik, sing, le suang tawh a kibawl pasian-te’ min na phat uh hi. Na nuntakna le na hihna khempeuh a hong uk Pasian na zahtak kei hi.
[3] Zu le sa ahi a, anlim ahi zongin bangmah ka ne kei a, nipikal thum a bei mateng ka sam zong ka hiat kei hi.
[11] Leenggahzu in ka mite’ thungaihsut theihna beisak hi.
[5] Kumpipa in pawi a Sbawl ni-in amaute in uliante zu khamsakin haisak uh a, amau’ ngimna a thei lopi-in kumpipa zong tua lakah hong kihel hi.
[5] No zukhamte aw, tho unla kap un. No leenggahzu nete aw, thumin tau un. Na zunek ding teng uh beimang khinta hi.
[3] A galmatte uh kua in ngah ding, ci-in ai san uh a, zu le numei lei nadingin numeino le naupangnote sila-in a zuak uh hi.
[8] Biakna tau gei khempeuhah amaute lum uh a, sum leitawina hangin a puan kepsakte uh a phah uh hi. Amaute in a Pasian uh’ biakinn sungah leibate kiang pan a laksak uh leenggahzu a dawn uh hi.
[6] Leenggahzu hai lianpipi-in na dawn uh a, sathau hoihpente tawh na kizut uh hi. Ahi zongin Josef minamte’ siatna hangin themkhat zong na dah het kei uh hi.

[13] TOPA in hih bangin ci hi: An a kihauh luat manin, anlak a kizawh ma-in lo khawhkik hun tungin, leenggahte, leenggahzu a bawl a kizawh ma-in a suankik hun hong tun ding, hun nuam hong tungta ding hi. Mual lian khempeuh panin leenggahzu khum hong taakkhia-in, mual neu khempeuh tungah leenggahzu a luang ding hi.
[11] Zuau genin khemna tawh thu gen kawikawi a, “Note a dingin leenggahzu le khamtheihzu tampi tak hong om ding hi,” a hong ci kamsangte pawl, note’ deih kamsangte ahi hi.
[10] Amaute, linglom bangin om uh a, zulesa tawh kidiahin a om laitakun ham bangin kihaltum ding hi.

[5] Hauhna pen zuaupi hi a, a huaiham mite kiphasakin omkhong thei lo uh a, hankhuk mah bangin, phazo, cih omsak thei lo uh a, lungkim hun cih nei thei lo uh hi. Tua ahih manin minam dangte a ban banin simin a uk uh hi.

[15] Na hehna uh tawh na gamvengte uh niamkhiatin na mindaisak uh a, zukham bangin amaute hoisak na hih manun gimna na ngah ding uh hi. [16] Tua ahih manin note in zong minthanna ngah loin maizumin mindaina tawh na kidiah ding uh hi. Note mahmah in na hoi dongun na dawn ding uh hi. TOPA in gimpiakna hai, note hong dawnsak ding a, na minthanna uh mindaina a suak ding hi.

[17] Kuamah in savun um lui sungah leenggahzu thak thun lo hi. Kithun leh a savun um phukham ding a, a leenggahzu bua-in a savun um zong a sia a suak ding hi. Leenggahzu thak pen savun um thak sungah kithun bek hi. Tua ahih manin a nihin a sia om lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

[18] Bang hang hiam cih leh Tuiphumpa Johan hong pai a, amah in zu le an tangin a om ciangin, ‘Dawivei hi,’ a ci uh hi. [19] Mihing Tapa hong pai leuleu a, zune anne-in a om ciangin, ‘Zuhai anhai pa; siahdongte le midangte in a kikholhpih nop loh mite tawh a kikhawlpa,’ ci leuleu uh hi. Ahi zongin Pasian’ pilna a man taktakna thu a gah panin hong kilang hi,” a ci hi.

[48] Ahi zongin tua nasempa nasem hoih lo hi hen la, a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka topa hong ciahhak ding hi,’ ci-in, [49] a naseppih a lawmte satgawp hen la, zukham thei mite tawh anne zune-in na om leh, [50] a topa tung dingin a uploh ni hun khatpeuhin a topa hong tung ding a, [51] a topa in nakpitakin gim pia-in, mihoih a kineihkhemte’ gimthuak dingteng thuaksak ding a, amah kapin a hagawi ding hi.
[29] Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Ka Pa’ Ukna sungah note tawh leenggahzu thak ka dawnkik ni matengin leenggahzu ka dawnkik nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
[15] Topa’ muhna-ah amah milian khat hi ding hi. Amah in leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin ne lo ding hi. A suah phet a kipanin Kha Siangtho tawh kidim ding hi.
[45] Ahi zongin tua nasempa in a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka topa hong ciahkik hak ding hi,’ ci-in ngaihsunin a naseppih numei le pasalte satgawp hen la, zukham ankhamin ommawk leh,

[33] Van le lei a mangthang zongin ka thugente maimang ngei lo ding hi. [34] “Limtakin kidawm un. Thakhat thu-in tua Ni hong tung kha ding ahih manin zune anne le leitung nuntakna lunghimawhin thamang kei un.
[10] “Midangte in leenggahzu khumte hawm masakin nei uh a, mite in a khamgawp khit uh ciangin a ngeinate hawm pan uh hi. Ahi zongin nangmah in a khum pen teng tu dong na sitlai hi,” a ci hi.
[13] Ahi zongin mi pawlkhatte in hih Jesuh a umte simmawhbawl uh a, “Zukham ahi uh hi,” ci-in a zahko uh hi.

[1] Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Pasian in eite tam veipi tak hong hehpih ahih manin ama lungkim nading le ama nasep nadingin nomau mahmah a hingtangin Pasian tungah na kipiak nadingun ka hong thum hi. Tua banga kipiakna pen Pasian biakna man taktak ahi hi. [2] Leitung mihingte’ gamtat bangin gamta kei unla, na lungsim uh kikheelin Pasian kipuahphasak un. Tua hileh a hoih nate bang hi a, bangte in amah lungkimsakin, bangte a kicing hiam ci-in thei-in Pasian’ deihna na phawk thei ding uh hi.

[13] Sun khuavak sunga om mite bangin a kilawmin gamta ni. Gualnopna le zukhamna, mawhna le thangtatna, kitotna le kihazatnate-in i hun beisak kei ni. [14] Kidal nadingin, Topa Jesuh Khrih’ hong piak galhiamte zang unla, na pumpi uh deihna bangin gamtat nading hun omsak nawn kei un.
[21] Midangte in a puklawh theih annekna, zunekna, le na khat peuhpeuh i kikep ding a man pen ahi hi.
[17] Mi khatpeuh in Pasian’ biakinn susia leh Pasian in tua mipa susia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ biakinn a siangtho hi a, note zong tua biakinn siangtho na hi uh hi.

[6] Note lakah hih bang gamtatna om napi-in na kisaktheih uh dahhuai mahmah hi. Silngo themkhat in annel lompi a pawmsak theih lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam? [7] Note na siangtho theih nadingun mawhna silngo luite na paikhia un. Tua hileh silngo sawh loh annel lom thak na hi ding uh a, zong ahi takpi mah na hi uh hi. Bang hang hiam ci leh i Paisan Pawi hun hong tungta a, eite’ Paisan Tuuno ahi Khrih kigo khinzo ta hi. [8] Tua ahih ciangin mawhna le gitlohna ahi silngo lui a kisawh anlum tawh Paisan Pawi bawl loin, silngo a kisawh lo, sianthona le thutakna tawh bawlzaw ni.

[11] Tua ka hong laigelhna sungah ka cihnopna pen, thu upna sungah unau khat hi hang, ci napi-in numei tawh a paktat, a huaiham, milim a bia, mi gensia, zukham, ahih kei leh a guta theite tawh kikhawl kei un, cihnopna ahi hi. Tua bang mite tawh an ne ding nangawnin zong na tukhawm kei un.
[10] a gutate, a huaihamte, zukhamte, mi gensiate, ahih kei leh mi’ na a sutte khat beek, Pasian’ Ukna sungah lutthei het lo ding hi.
[19] Na pumpi uh, Pasian in a hong piak, note’ sungah a teng Kha Siangtho’ biakinn ahih lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam? Note’ pumpi, nomau’ neihsa hi lo a, Pasian a’ ahi hi.
[9] Ahi zongin note’ utbangin gamtat theih nading thu na neihna uh hangin upna a neu laite a puksak na suahkhak loh nadingun hoihtakin kidawm un.

[23] “Ka ut peuhpeuh ka hihtheihna ding thu om hi,” a ci omkha ding hi. Ahi zongin na khempeuh ka hih ding kilawm lo hi. Na khempeuh hihtheih nading thu a om hangin a kihihthei khempeuh hihna in midangte’ hoih nading piangsak lo hi. [24] A kuamah peuh in note’ angsung ding bek zong kei unla, midangte’ phattuam nading zongzaw un.
[31] Tua ahih manin keimah in ka hong gennop thu in: Na hihna khempeuh uh, nekna dawnna-ah ahi zongin Pasian’ minthan nadingin na hih un.

[25] Tua mah bangin nitak an a nekkhit uh ciangin hai la a, “Hih hai sunga om leenggahzu pen keima sisan tawh a kikipsak Pasian’ thuciamna thak ahi hi. Hih bangin na dawn simun, kei na hong phawk nadingun na dawn un,” ci hi.

[21] enna, zukhamna le biakna pawi-ah zukhamna a kipan adangdangte ahi hi. A beisa hunah ka hong hilhkholhsa bangin tu-in ka hong genkikin-ah: Hih bangin a gamta mite pen Pasian’ Ukna sungah omkha het lo ding hi.
[18] Zu in mi siasak thei ahih manin zu ne kei unla, Kha Siangtho tawh a kidimin omzaw un.

[6] Tua ahih ciangin midangte bangin eite mawk om hithiat loin khua phawkin pilvang ni. [7] Zan khuamial pen mite’ ihmut hithiat hun le zukham hun ahi hi. [8] Ahi zongin eite pen khuavak gamtatna a nei sun khuavak mi ihih manin pilvang ni. Awmdal bangin upna le itna bulhin, siklukhu bangin i lamet hotkhiatna khu ni.
[3] zu a kham lo mi, a ngongtat lo mi, lungsimnem mi, kitot a uk lo mi, sum a deihlua lo mite hi ding uh hi.
[8] Pawlpi upa dingte zong a gamtat hoih, a lungsim citak, leenggahzu tam a ne lo, sum thu-ah a huaiham mi hi lo ding uh hi.
[23] Na gil sung natna le na nat mun zelzelna hangin tui bek zang nawn loin leenggahzu tawmtawm na zang in.

[7] Pawlpi siate pen Pasian’ nasem ahih manin paubaanna a om lo, a kiphasak lo, zukham thei mi ahi lo, a ngongtat lo, a huaiham lo, [8] zinleleeng do a siam mi, thuhoih a deih mi, a pumpi a ki-ukzo mi, a thutang mi, a siangtho mi, le a kisekzo mi hi ding uh hi.

[3] Tua mah bangin mite in Pasian’ thu a gensiatkhak loh nadingun numei khanghamte zong a gamtat a khuahek uh a zahtakhuai ahih nading, mi gensiate ahih loh nading, zunek kiphamawhte ahih loh nading, thuhoih thupha hilhin,
[13] Tua ahih manin na lungsim uh ki-ukin a kigingsa-in om unla, Jesuh Khrih hong kilat ni ciangin na ngah ding uh hehpihna thupha ngaihsutin nei un.

[3] A beisa hunah dawibiate’ gamtat bangin a hoihkhop khat na gamta khinta uh a, a kilawm loin gamtatna, hukna lanna, zunekna, uangtatna, zukham luatna le a muhdahhuai milim biakna-in na hun uh na beisak uh hi. [4] Tu-in note in dawibiate pawlpih nawn loin ut utin na phengtat loh uh ciangin lamdangsa-in note hong kosia uh hi.
[7] Na khempeuh a bei nading hun hong naita hi. Nomau pumpi ki-uktawm thei-in pilvang unla, hoihtakin thu a ngen thei-in om ta un.

[39] TOPA in thuman mite honkhia a, amah pen haksat hun ciangin amaute’ bukna ahi hi.
[5] Thuman gen lo teci in gim tuak pelmawh ding a, zuaugen mi suakta lo ding hi.
[9] Thuman lo teci in gim tuak pelmawh ding a, zuaugen mi in sihna thuak ding hi.
[22] Duhhopna pen mindaina hi a, zuau gen pa hihna sangin mizawng hihna hoihzaw lai hi.
[6] Zuaugenna tawh hauhnate beimang pak a, sihna khuk sung hong tunpih hi.
[22] Zuauna lungsim in a suksiat khitsa, nidangin na nuntakna ngei uh ahi na pianlui uh paikhia unla, [23] na lungsim uh le na ngaihsutna uh thaksuak sak un.
[14] Adam in khemna thuak masa lo a, numei in thuakin a khial masa a suak hi.

[5] Ama kiang panin za-in note tungah ka hong gen uh thu in: Pasian, khuavak hi a, khuamial tawh kizopna themkhat zong nei het lo hi. [6] Tua ahih manin Pasian tawh ka kipawl hi, ci napi-in khuamial tawh kisai gamtatnate i gamtat le i kampauna le i gamtatna tawh zuauthu a gen ihi hi.
[4] Mi khatpeuh in, “Pasian ka thei hi,” ci napi-in a thupiaknate a zuih kei leh tua mi a zuaugen mi hi a, a thutak lo mi ahi hi.
[7] Ka it tate aw, mite’ khemsa-in ta kei un. Khrih a thuman ahih mah bangin a manin a gamtate khempeuh a thuman ahi hi.
[9] Jew mi hi lo napi-in Jew mi hi ung, ci-in zuau a gen Satan’ pawlte, note’ mai-ah hong paisakin na khephung uhah ka boksak ding a, note ka hong itna thu amaute ka theisak ding hi.
[10] Amaute a khem Satan pen ganhing le kamsang zuau pa a omna mun, kat a kikhulna meiphualpi sungah kilawn a, a sun a zanin tua lai munah amaute in gimna a thuak tawntung ding uh ahi hi.
[8] Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, le zuaugente om nading mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi,” a ci hi.

[14] Khuapi kulhkongpi sungah a luttheih nading le nuntakna singgah a nektheih nadingun a puan uh a siangin a sawp mite, mi hampha ahi uh hi. [15] Ahi zongin a lampial mite, aisan mite, a paktat mite, mi thatte, milim biate, le zuaugen nuamsa-in zuau a gengen mite, khuapi pualamah a om uh hi.
